Name: B Travel
Company description: B Travel is a premier travel agency dedicated to providing exceptional travel solutions, with a particular focus on hotel accommodations across Peru's vibrant cities, including Lima, Miraflores, and San Isidro. The company specializes in offering a diverse selection of lodging options, ranging from charming boutique hotels to luxurious five-star establishments, ensuring that every guest finds the perfect fit for their adventure. B Travel's mission is to simplify the travel planning process for its clients, delivering a seamless and enjoyable experience from start to finish while emphasizing exceptional hospitality and a unique cultural experience. To achieve this, B Travel partners with renowned hotel chains and local establishments, allowing them to offer competitive pricing and tailored services that cater to various budgets. The agency serves a diverse clientele, including leisure travelers, business professionals, and families, all seeking comfort, convenience, and a taste of Peru's rich heritage. By focusing on customer satisfaction and personalized service, B Travel aspires to be the go-to resource for unforgettable stays in Peru. In addition to hotel bookings, B Travel provides comprehensive travel solutions, including flights and vacation packages, ensuring that clients have access to exclusive deals and expert advice. The agency's target market encompasses both domestic and international travelers who value convenience and value in their travel arrangements. With a commitment to being a trusted partner in travel, B Travel helps clients explore new destinations while providing personalized support tailored to their individual needs.

Name: Reisebüro
Company description: Reisebüro is a leisure, travel & tourism company in Düsseldorf

Name: VIAJES HALCON S.A.
Company description: VIAJES HALCON S.A. is a travel company specializing in creating unforgettable experiences through meticulously planned tours across Europe. With a mission to enrich travelers' lives by providing unique and memorable journeys, the company offers a diverse range of itineraries that include breathtaking destinations such as the Norwegian Fjords, the castles along the Loire, and the majestic cities of Vienna, Prague, and Budapest. VIAJES HALCON S.A. caters to a wide clientele, including families, couples, and solo travelers, and partners with various travel agencies to ensure seamless booking and customer service. The company targets the leisure travel market, focusing on those seeking cultural enrichment and adventure, while also offering magical experiences at Disneyland Paris, making it a go-to choice for both European tours and family vacations.

Name: Beijing Caesars Travels
Company description: In 1993, Caesars Travel was founded in Hamburg, Germany. Over three decades of steady development, we have successively established branches in global port cities and core business cities such as London, Paris, Monaco, Mumbai, Hamburg, Beijing, Guangzhou, Shanghai, Shenyang, and Chengdu. As of 2010, it has more than 10 branches worldwide, and is a member of CATS (China Association of Travel Agents), BTIA (Beijing Tourism Industry Association), and PATA (Asia Pacific Tourism Organisation). Its business scope includes inbound tourism, domestic tourism, Outbound tourism (license number: L-BJ-CJ00051), MICE tourism, tourism e-commerce and other businesses. Originating from Europe, Caesars Travel has followed the advanced concepts of the international mature tourism market, fully leveraged its overseas advantages, and grown into a unique commercial brand in China's outbound tourism market, and has become China's largest large-scale comprehensive tourism operation integrating wholesale, retail and reception. business. With its perfect service system, rigorous corporate style, and fashionable brand image, Caesars Travel has successfully ranked among the top 100 international travel agencies in China, and has been awarded the "Best Travel Agency of the Year" by "Travel Agency" magazine for many consecutive times. As of 2011, Caesars Travel has been awarded the "Top Ten Wholesalers of China's Outbound Travel" for many times in a row. The city travel agency rating committee was rated as the highest level travel agency - AAAAA level travel agency. Caesars Travel has more than 300 high-end travel products covering nearly 100 countries around the world and serving different groups of people. Satellite TV launched the "Okinawa 100k-person Super Tour Group", and in 2011 jointly launched the "100K-person Tour to Switzerland" large-scale summer event with the Swiss National Tourism Administration and Swissair, & recently ventured into Women's fashionable travel lifestyle line.

Name: DER Touristik
Company description: Die DER Touristik zählt zu den führenden Reisekonzernen in Europa. Jährlich vertrauen millionen Gäste aus 16 europäischen Ländern mit den Veranstaltern der DER Touristik in 179 Reiseländer weltweit. Zu den deutschen Reiseveranstaltern zählen im Volumengeschäft die Marken ITS, Jahn Reisen, DERTOUR, und Meiers Weltreisen. Hinzu kommen Spezialisten wie camperboerse.de oder Clevertours. Im Reisevertrieb ist die DER Touristik mit rund 2.100 Vertriebsstellen, dem Online-Reiseportal der.com und zahlreichen Veranstalter-Onlineportalen deutschlandweit Marktführer. Hierzu gehören die Vertriebslinien DER Reisebüro, das Franchisesystem Derpart sowie die Organisation der mittelständischen inhabergeführten Reisebüros unter dem Dach des DER Touristik Partner-Service (DTPS). Mehr über die Vielfalt in unserem Unternehmen erfahren Sie auf unserer Unternehmenswebseite: www.dertouristik.com ÜBERZEUGENDER – Was die DER Touristik als Arbeitgeber attraktiv macht Chancen und Perspektiven Jeder hat bei uns die Chance, sich zu entwickeln. Deshalb fördern wir ein Karriereverständnis, das den Aufstieg innerhalb der DER Touristik und der REWE Group einschließt – und dabei individuelle Entwicklungs-Chancen eröffnet. Die DER Touristik Akademie bietet zahlreiche Weiterbildungs- und Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten, die Sie im Beruf und als Persönlichkeit weiterbringen.  Work-Life-Balance Die Vereinbarkeit von Familie und Beruf ist uns wichtig. Wir unterstützen unsere Mitarbeiter auf ihren unterschiedlichen Wegen in allen Lebensphasen, beruflich wie privat. Ganz gleich, ob es sich beispielsweise um die flexible Jahresarbeitszeit-Regelung handelt, um die Planung eines mehrmonatigen Sabbaticals oder einen Platz in den Kindertagesstätten in Frankfurt und Köln. http://www.dertouristik.com/de/impressum/

Name: Tjäreborg
Company description: Tjäreborg is a prominent travel company that specializes in offering comprehensive vacation packages, primarily targeting Nordic travelers. With a strong focus on beach holidays in popular destinations such as Greece, Spain, and the Canary Islands, Tjäreborg aims to provide a seamless travel experience that allows clients to enjoy their holidays with ease and comfort. The company’s mission is to create unforgettable travel experiences by combining high-quality services with a customer-centric approach, ensuring that every traveler’s needs are met. Catering to a diverse clientele that includes families, couples, and solo travelers, Tjäreborg partners with a variety of hotels and service providers to deliver exceptional accommodations and services. The company offers a range of options, including all-inclusive stays, family-friendly resorts, and luxury accommodations, making it a versatile choice for different types of travelers. In addition to vacation packages, Tjäreborg provides essential services such as airport transfers and local activity bookings, enhancing the overall travel experience. Tjäreborg is committed to responsible tourism, actively working to minimize its environmental impact while supporting local communities and promoting sustainable practices. The company collaborates closely with local partners to offer authentic experiences that allow travelers to engage with the local culture. With a vision to be a leading travel agency known for its excellent customer service and high-quality travel products, Tjäreborg strives to simplify the travel planning process, making it accessible and enjoyable for all its clients.

Name: Ávoris
Company description: Ávoris Corporación Empresarial is a leading player in the tourism and travel industry in the Iberian Peninsula, specializing in providing comprehensive travel solutions through its wholesale division, Welcomebeds. The company operates a global distribution platform that offers over 350,000 hotels, transportation, tours, and services, catering to both leisure and corporate travel markets. Ávoris is committed to enhancing local employment and operational presence, exemplified by its recent office opening in Lanzarote. The company also produces the Ávoris Travel Insights report, which analyzes business travel trends and the MICE segment, providing valuable data to help stakeholders make informed decisions. With a focus on traditional travel agencies as key partners, Ávoris aims to navigate the evolving landscape of corporate travel, emphasizing personalized service and technological integration. Its target market includes medium to large enterprises, particularly in regions like Madrid and Catalonia, where business travel expenditure is significant.

Name: DERTOUR Deutschland
Company description: DERTOUR Deutschland, part of the DERTOUR Group and a subsidiary of the REWE Group, is a leading player in the European travel industry, specializing in both package and individual travel solutions. The company is committed to providing high-quality travel experiences, focusing on sustainable growth, individuality, and quality across its diverse portfolio, which includes over 100 hotels and resorts in 14 countries. With a strong emphasis on earthbound travel, DERTOUR Deutschland has recently expanded its hotel division by acquiring a majority stake in DR Hospitality GmbH, enhancing its presence in the German-speaking vacation hotel market. The company serves a wide range of clients, from leisure travelers to families, and collaborates with numerous partners, including over 2,100 travel agencies and various hotel brands. DERTOUR's mission is to ensure that every vacation remains the highlight of its customers' year, while its vision aims to increase visibility and relevance in the international tourism market.

Name: Evolution Travel
Company description: Evolution Travel, fully operating online since 2000, is to this day the first 100% cloud working Travel Agency and Tour Operator.  Moreover it is the N.1 Online Travel Consultants' Network. A few numbers? - More than 500 Consultants; - More than 100 thematic portals; - At least 160 hourse of training a year. Who are the Online Travel Consultants of the Evolution Travel Network? They are free professionals with a great passion for travelling and they love to organize holidays and trips for themselves and for others. They are entrerpreneurs who work from home or from wherever they want, thanks to Evolution Travel Network  tools. Why do our Consultants choose Evolution Travel? - Inside the Network the Consultants can focus solely on the parts of the job they enjoy the most, that is taking care of the clients and planning the trips, while the headquarter handles the accounting, fiscal, legal and bureaucratic work. - Through Evolution Travel tools the Consultants constantly receive contacts and quotation requests. - Through Evolution Travel online platform it's possible to easily create customized offers in real time and find the best proposal for every client by comparing many Tour Operators products. Is working as an Online Travel Consultant a job suitable for everyone? NO, it is not suitable for everyone, because in order to succeed as an Online Travel Consultant some characteristics are necessary. Which ones? To become successful Online Travel Consultants people have to: - Be responsible and reliable at work.  - Continuously train themselves and be willing to learn new things every day. - Cooperate with their coworkers. - Love taking care of their customers. - Be continuous in their effots. Do you think it could be an activity suitable  for you?  Find out everything about this work! Click here, fill out the form and read the Free Introductory Guide to become an Online Travel Consultant: https://goo.gl/CBSh2G

Name: ESky Group
Company description: eSky Group is a Polish-based travel technology company, that owns and operates several online travel agency brands including eSky, Thomas Cook (since 2024) and eDestinos. It operates in over 50 countries and is a leader in Central and Eastern Europe and a key player in South America.  The company offers stand-alone flights and hotels as well as city break and holiday packages with a wide range of ancillary products such as travel insurance, car rentals, transfers, and others. In September 2024, eSky Group acquired Thomas Cook, the world's oldest travel brand. The acquisition agreement signed with Fosun Tourism Group is expected to enable the Polish company to enter the top tier of package tour operators in Western Europe.  In 2023, eSky closed with an impressive EBITDA of over €18.7 million and 3.3 million customers served, earning it recognition as the most valuable Polish travel e-commerce company by Forbes.  eSky Group is also a long-standing member of the International Air Transport Association (IATA) and is part-owned by listed private equity fund MCI, a leading Digital & ClimaTech fund in Central and Eastern Europe.

Name: FTI GROUP
Company description: With its brands, the FTI GROUP is the fourth largest travel operator in Europe. FTI Touristik, as well as the last minute operator 5vorFlug, the rental car broker driveFTI, the online portal fly.de, the largest German language tour operator LAL Sprachreisen, the Destination Management Company Meeting Point International, which is active in over 40 destinations worldwide, and the operator for promotional products BigXtra, belong to the FTI GROUP. Under the umbrella of the hospitality company Meeting Point Hotels the hotel brands LABRANDA Hotels & Resorts, Design Plus Hotels, Kairaba Hotels & Resorts, Club Sei and Lemon & Soul are bundled. The consolidator FTI Ticketshop is responsible for scheduled flight ticket sales while FTI Cruises bundles the cruise business.  Around 10,000 travel agencies sell FTI products throughout Germany. The FTI GROUP has consolidated its franchise systems in its subsidiary Touristik Vertriebsgesellschaft mbH (TVG). Under the TVG the Group brings together its franchise systems with the brands sonnenklar.TV Reisebüro, 5vorFlug and Flugbörse. Other important distribution channels are the travel shopping channel sonnenklar.TV and the British online B2B provider for hotel bookings, Youtravel.  In Austria FTI is represented by a subsidiary in Linz, while FTI Touristik AG is located in Basel, Switzerland. The French tour operator FTI Voyages has been part of the FTI Group since 2012. With FTI Reizen the Group is also active in the Netherlands since 2016. The service center erf24 and travianet and touristic24handle bookings from the FTI GROUP and external customers.  Headquartered in Munich, the FTI GROUP employs 10,000 staff worldwide and achieved sales volumes of 3,6 billion euros in the fiscal year 2017/18

Name: EDreams ODIGEO S.A
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 35 Calle López De Hoyos, 28002
Company description: eDreams ODIGEO is one of the world's largest online travel companies and one of the largest European e-commerce businesses. Under its four leading online travel agency brands – eDreams, GO Voyages, Opodo, Travellink, and the metasearch engine Liligo – it offers the best deals in regular flights, low-cost airlines, hotels, cruises, car rental, dynamic packages, holiday packages and travel insurance to make travel easier, more accessible, and better value for the more than 18,5 million customers it serves across 43 markets. eDreams ODIGEO is listed in the Spanish Stock Market. Because we are growing rapidly globally, we are covering more and more regions. As a result, we are culturally diverse, with more than 65 different nationalities represented throughout the group. #WE FLY HIGH #WE SET THE PATH #WE JOURNEY TOGETHER #WE EXPLORE ... GROW AND DISCOVER!

Name: Mitsis Group
Company description: As Greece’s largest privately-owned hotel chain, MITSIS has been a tourism pioneer for 50 years now, making its own mark on Greece’s tourist industry, driven by a customer - centered philosophy and the promise of an unparalleled holiday experience.  With 24 hotels in our portfolio in Athens, Chalkidiki, Corfu, Crete, Kamena Vourla, Kos, Rhodes, Piraeus and Santorini, we aspire to stand out as the preferred portfolio of hotels & resorts in Greece offering excellent service, great locations, impeccable facilities, sophisticated dining and a broad spectrum of options for our clientele.  We bring to life enriching experiences for our guests, making the most of our unparalleled family touch and genuine Greek essence, always seeking to be flexible and adaptable to individual customer needs and the mindset of new generations.  Transforming each visitor into a special guest is the key to our success.  Mitsis Group has been awarded several prizes by local and international tour operators and travel organizations in recognition of the high quality of the services provided, its contribution to upgrading local tourism and its respect for the environment. We are proud to be named Great Place To Work® Certified™ thanks to our people.

Name: IAG7 Viajes
Company description: IAG7 Viajes, parte del Grupo IAG7, es una agencia de viajes que se especializa en la distribución de viajes corporativos y vacacionales, ofreciendo un servicio personalizado y eficiente a sus clientes. Con un equipo de más de 350 profesionales comprometidos, la empresa se dedica a gestionar reservas de vuelos, trenes, hoteles y otros servicios relacionados con los viajes, garantizando una atención al cliente de alta calidad. La misión de IAG7 Viajes es proporcionar experiencias de viaje excepcionales, mientras que su visión se centra en el crecimiento sostenible y la innovación en el sector turístico. Su clientela abarca tanto empresas que requieren servicios de Business Travel como viajeros individuales en busca de ofertas vacacionales. Además, IAG7 Viajes colabora con diversos proveedores y partners en la industria para ofrecer soluciones integrales y personalizadas a sus usuarios. La empresa también se compromete a proteger la privacidad de los datos personales de sus clientes, cumpliendo con las normativas de protección de datos vigentes.

Name: Viajes Carrefour
Company description: Viajes Carrefour is a travel agency that specializes in organizing trips and circuits throughout Spain, offering a wide range of travel experiences tailored to meet the diverse needs of its clients. The company aims to provide exceptional service from the planning stage to the return home, ensuring that travelers enjoy authentic experiences while exploring Spain's rich history, culture, and stunning landscapes. With a focus on personalized assistance, Viajes Carrefour caters to various target markets, including solo travelers, couples, families, and groups of friends, and collaborates with local providers to offer exclusive rates and benefits. Their offerings include weekend getaways, organized tours, beach vacations, and rural tourism, making it easy for clients to find the perfect escape. Through their commitment to customer satisfaction and attention to detail, Viajes Carrefour strives to create unforgettable memories for every traveler.

Name: Special Tours
Company description: Special Tours, que forma parte de la división Ávoris, del Grupo Barceló, es una mayorista con más de cuarenta años de experiencia en el sector que opera en España y Latinoamérica.  Formada por un equipo humano de trescientas personas altamente cualificadas, hace realidad los sueños de miles de viajeros cubriendo, en la actualidad, grandes viajes culturales en Europa, Medio & Lejano Oriente, África y Oceanía-Exóticos, siempre en pos de la más avanzada tecnología, guiados por una cultura empresarial responsable y sostenible. Reconocimientos: -Fitur 2015: Premio Iberia Airlines al Mejor Touroperador. -Fitur 2017: Diploma de Honor Iberia. -Ladevi 2018: Premio Insignia de Ladevi al apoyo a la red de distribuidores y su contacto directo continuado con los agentes de viaje.

Name: Trivago NV
Company description: trivago NV is a holding company, which engages in the provision of a global hotel and accommodation search platform. The company is headquartered in Dusseldorf, Nordrhein-Westfalen and currently employs 668 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2016-12-16. The firm and its subsidiaries offer online meta-search for hotel and accommodation through online travel agencies (OTAs), hotel chains and independent hotels. The firm is focused on focused on reshaping the way travelers search for and compare hotels while enabling hotel advertisers to grow their businesses by providing access to a broad audience of travelers through the Company's websites and apps. The platform allows travelers to make informed decisions by personalizing their hotel search and providing access to a deep supply of hotel information and prices. The firm operates in three operating segments namely the Americas, Developed Europe and the Rest of the World. The firm offer marketing tools to help promote their listings on platform and drive traffic to their websites. The tools and services, including the subscription-based trivago Business Studio Pro Apps Package.

Name: FTI Touristik GmbH
Company description: FTI Touristik GmbH is a prominent travel company based in Germany, specializing in providing a wide range of holiday packages and travel services. The company aims to deliver exceptional travel experiences by offering tailored solutions that cater to the diverse needs of its clients. FTI Touristik serves a broad target market, including families, couples, and solo travelers, and collaborates with various partners in the tourism industry, such as airlines, hotels, and local tour operators. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, FTI Touristik strives to be a leading player in the travel sector, helping clients create unforgettable memories through their travel adventures.

Name: Wamos
Company description: Wamos es el nombre y marca de  un  grupo  turístico,  que  aglutina varias  compañías  del  sector,  con  amplia experiencia  en  su  área  de  actividad  y una visión conjunta de crecimiento y apuesta  de  futuro.   El grupo es propiedad de la sociedad Andros en un 81 por ciento (propiedad en su mayoría del fondo de inversión Springwater Capital) y de Royal Caribbean (19 por ciento restante). En  concreto,  Wamos está integrado por dos turoperadores (Wamos  Tours  y  Wamos  Circuitos),  una línea aérea (Wamos Air) y la red de agencias Nautalia.  •	En el área de turoperación, Wamos Tours, compañía que ofrece  paquetes  vacacionales  al  Caribe. •       En esta misma área, Wamos  Circuitos, con una programación de circuitos exclusiva para pasajeros latinoamericanos hacia España, Portugal, Marruecos, Resto de Europa, Oriente Medio, Lejano Oriente y África, comercializa en 19 países de Latinoamérica.  •	Wamos Air, con una flota de 5 aviones Jumbo (y en este año se sumará un nuevo avión) que colocan a la compañía como la tercera aerolínea de largo radio más importante de España. •	Nautalia, empresa turística dedicada a la comercialización de productos y servicios turísticos 360º y todo lo que un cliente pueda necesitar de una agencia de viajes. Queremos ser más que una compañía de viajes. Queremos ser tus compañeros de viaje. Una gran empresa en continuo crecimiento y en continuo aprendizaje. Un gran equipo de personas que trabajan buscando lo mejor del mundo para ofrecértelo. Nos encantan los viajes y viajar y nos emociona hacer felices a las personas que quieren pasar unas vacaciones geniales. Las vacaciones que siempre recordarán. Somos un equipo comprometido con la sociedad. Por ese motivo, apoyamos diferentes causas sociales y encaminamos nuestras actuaciones a preservar el medio ambiente. Tenemos el mejor trabajo del mundo. Conseguir que las ilusiones de nuestros clientes se hagan realidad con la mejor experiencia de viaje.

Name: TopAtlântico
Company description: TopAtlântico is a travel agency dedicated to creating unforgettable vacation experiences for its clients. With a team of specialized travel experts, including Carole Lima, Cláudia Melo, and Frederico Nobre, the company offers personalized travel planning services across diverse destinations such as Africa, Asia, America, Europe, and Oceania. TopAtlântico's mission is to provide tailored travel solutions that cater to individual preferences, ensuring that every journey is memorable. The agency collaborates with various partners to deliver exclusive offers and promotions, enhancing the travel experience for its clientele. Targeting both leisure travelers and adventure seekers, TopAtlântico aims to be the go-to choice for those looking to explore the world with expert guidance.

Name: Gattinoni Group
Company description: Gattinoni was created in 1983 from the passion for travels and events organization of Franco Gattinoni, founder and still president of the Group. With him are working over 200 peoples which shares the same pleasure and professioanlism.  Under the Gattinoni brand 6 divisions work to ensure the best experience for your travels and events.  GTN/Travel Network: over 200 travel agencies in Italy and Switzerland Business Travel: to cover all your needs for business travels  Communication: which supports the efforts of all the other branches with creative ideas  Incentive&Events: which covers the MICE market Made in Italy: prize winning DMC team   Travel Experience: tour operator with exclusive travel destinations

Name: Grupo IBERSOL
Company description: IBERSOL, empresa creada en el año 1964, hace más de 45 años, está dedicada principalmente al sector turístico e inmobiliario. Sus orígenes y su existencia debe a unos profesionales de gran talla y bravura, que, ya en aquella época tuvieron una gran visión de futuro y fueron ampliando las actividades de su pequeño negocio hasta llegar a lo que es hoy IBERSOL. Las riendas de la empresa están aún en manos de alguno de sus fundadores. Más tarde, a ellos se incorporaron otros profesionales, uniendo así el conocimiento y la experiencia con la gallardía y las ganas de triunfo de la juventud. Combinación que no podía conducir a otra cosa más que al éxito rotundo en todos los aspectos empresariales: solvencia, seriedad, calidad de productos y de servicios. En los últimos años, IBERSOL ha consolidado su imagen, tanto ante clientes como ante proveedores, siendo una empresa estable, fiable, en plena expansión en todas y cada una de sus actividades, y con la suficiente solvencia para emprender cualquier proyecto por ambicioso que sea. Esperamos seguir en esa línea y merecer indefinidamente la credibilidad y el respeto que actualmente se está depositando en nosotros. La empresa explota más de 14 aparthoteles de ***, 3 hoteles de ***, 4 hoteles de **** y más de 1000 apartamentos, en régimen de apartamentos turísticos. También cabe destacar la explotación de un hotel rural en Tiedra (Valladolid): El Complejo de Turismo Rural de Tiedra. Tiene en funcionamiento un departamento dedicado a agencia de viajes receptiva. Cada año IBERSOL ofrece sus servicios a más de 15.000 veraneantes, de los que orientamos sus reservas, con toda la responsabilidad de hacer su estancia lo más agradable posible proporcionándoles servicios complementarios, con la calidad y eficacia suficiente como para merecer la confianza de todas las empresas del sector, con las que mantenemos las relaciones comerciales.

Name: Exoticca
Company description: Exoticca is a travel company dedicated to creating unforgettable vacation experiences by offering the best flight and hotel packages at competitive prices. With a mission to turn dream trips into reality, Exoticca focuses on providing exceptional service and personalized travel solutions to its clients. The company has garnered positive feedback from travelers, highlighting its professionalism, organization, and attention to detail in planning trips to various destinations, including Peru, India, and Costa Rica. Exoticca's target market includes adventure-seeking travelers looking for unique experiences, and it partners with local guides and service providers to ensure high-quality excursions and accommodations. With a strong presence in the travel industry, Exoticca aims to inspire wanderlust and facilitate memorable journeys for its customers.

Name: Schauinsland-reisen
Company description: Schauinsland-reisen ist ein etablierter deutscher Reiseveranstalter, der seit seiner Gründung im Jahr 1918 eine bedeutende Rolle in der Touristik spielt. Als drittgrößter Flugreiseveranstalter in Deutschland bietet das Unternehmen eine breite Palette an Reiseangeboten, darunter Pauschalreisen, Bausteinprodukte und individuelle Urlaubsplanungen. Die Mission von Schauinsland-reisen ist es, qualitativ hochwertige Reisen anzubieten, die den Bedürfnissen und Wünschen der Kunden gerecht werden, während die Vision des Unternehmens auf langfristigem Wachstum und nachhaltiger Entwicklung basiert.  Die Kunden von Schauinsland-reisen sind sowohl Einzelreisende als auch Reisebüros, die von den umfangreichen Angeboten und der engen Zusammenarbeit mit renommierten Partnern in der Luftfahrt und Hotellerie profitieren. Das Unternehmen hat sich der Schaffung unvergesslicher Urlaubserlebnisse verschrieben und legt großen Wert auf Nachhaltigkeit, indem es sich aktiv für umweltfreundliche Praktiken und soziale Verantwortung einsetzt.  Durch strategische Übernahmen, wie die von Explorer und Sundair, erweitert das Unternehmen kontinuierlich sein Portfolio und stärkt seine Marktposition. Schauinsland-reisen bietet eine Vielzahl von Reiseleistungen, die Hotel, Flug, Transfers und die Betreuung durch deutschsprachige Reiseleiter in verschiedenen Urlaubszielen umfassen. Die Zielgruppe umfasst umweltbewusste Reisende, Familien, Paare und Alleinreisende, die Wert auf Qualität und Verantwortung legen.  Das Unternehmen arbeitet eng mit zahlreichen Fluggesellschaften, Hotels und anderen Partnern zusammen, um seinen Kunden ein umfassendes und ansprechendes Reiseerlebnis zu garantieren. Mit einem Fokus auf Kundenservice und Innovation strebt Schauinsland-reisen danach, die Erwartungen seiner Kunden zu übertreffen und ihnen die besten Angebote und Insider-Tipps für ihre Reisen zu bieten. Durch transparente Kommunikation und Engagement in sozialen Projekten möchte das Unternehmen das Vertrauen seiner Kunden gewinnen und eine bessere Zukunft für alle schaffen.

Name: Viagens Abreu S.A.
Company description: Established in the city of Porto in the year 1840, ABREU is the world’s oldest travel agency, as well as the largest travel organization in Portugal. The current headquarters remains in Porto, with the main office in Linda–a –Velha, a suburb of Lisbon, in a spacious and modern office building. Abreu has offices throughout mainland Portugal, Madeira and Azores Islands, with over 140 retail locations in the main cities and towns. A steady growth in the Portuguese market lead to the expansion of the company to international locations, with the opening of companies in Brazil, Spain, United States, UK and more recently in Angola. This effort has been accompanied with improvements in infrastructure, communications, technology and the continuing fine tuning of our trademark: quality service to our clients.

Name: Mirai
Company description: Mirai is a leading provider of hotel distribution, marketing, and direct sales solutions, dedicated to enhancing the profitability of hotels through innovative technology. The company's mission is to empower hotels to maximize their revenue by offering tailored solutions that streamline their online distribution and improve direct bookings. Mirai serves a diverse clientele, including independent hotels, hotel chains, and travel agencies, and collaborates with various partners through strategic, white label, and lead referral partnerships. By focusing on direct sales and reducing reliance on third-party intermediaries, Mirai aims to create a more efficient and profitable environment for its clients in the competitive hospitality market.

Name: Reederei F. Laeisz
Company description: The F. Laeisz Group was founded in 1824. The family-run shipowner with over 190 years of experience continues to have its main business interests in shipping, but is also active in trade, insurance, financing, real estate/land  and a travel agency.

Name: Azulmarino
Company description: Azulmarino is a prominent travel agency network in Spain, specializing in unique travel experiences, including exotic destinations, hotel circuits, and tailored activities for individuals over 55. The company is dedicated to creating unforgettable journeys, with a particular focus on personalized honeymoon packages that cater to the specific desires of couples. Azulmarino operates through a vast network of over 200 travel agencies across Spain, ensuring expert advice and support for clients seeking memorable travel experiences. Their mission is to provide exceptional service and unique travel solutions, while their vision encompasses becoming a leading name in the travel industry, known for quality and customer satisfaction. The agency collaborates with various partners in the tourism sector to offer a diverse range of travel options, targeting a wide demographic, including couples, families, and senior travelers.

Name: Veratour
Company description: Veratour S.p.A. is a leading travel company that specializes in providing tailored vacation solutions, particularly through its all-inclusive holiday packages. With a mission to deliver exceptional travel experiences, Veratour is dedicated to meeting the needs and expectations of its Italian clientele. The company boasts a portfolio of over 50 carefully selected resorts and hotels situated in breathtaking seaside locations, ensuring that guests enjoy both comfort and quality service. Veratour partners with Europ Assistance Italia S.p.A., a leading insurance provider, to offer comprehensive protection and assistance for travelers throughout their journeys. Targeting families and individuals seeking memorable vacations, Veratour places a strong emphasis on the unique charm of Italian hospitality. Through its Veraclub brand, the company specifically caters to families with children, providing specialized activities and entertainment designed to enhance the holiday experience. Veratour operates in various destinations, including Italy, Egypt, Greece, Tunisia, and the Caribbean, and is committed to delivering high-quality hospitality and culinary experiences.  The company prides itself on offering authentic Italian cuisine, prepared by skilled chefs using fresh, local ingredients, ensuring that guests feel at home no matter where they are. Veratour's focus on quality and customer satisfaction drives its goal of creating unforgettable travel memories for its guests. By partnering with local suppliers, Veratour enhances the authenticity of its offerings, making each vacation a unique and enriching experience. Overall, Veratour S.p.A. stands out as a prominent tour operator dedicated to providing exceptional travel experiences that resonate with its diverse clientele.

Name: Atrápalo
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes y de promoción de actividades de ocio que nacimos y vivimos en Internet. Para ello utilizamos el comercio electrónico, centrado en el sector de las agencias de viajes, vuelos, hoteles, alquiler de coches, entradas, actividades y restaurantes, convirtiendo sus promociones y transformando sus excedentes en ofertas de Internet. Además de encontrar las mejores ofertas, nos esforzamos para que nuestros clientes estén siempre informados sobre ellas, enviamos e-mails personalizados según sus gustos donde les sugerimos las propuestas más interesantes para que puedan atraparlas al instante. Y después de que las hayan disfrutado, publicamos sus opiniones (si les apetece enviárnoslas, claro) para que otros usuarios puedan tenerlas en cuenta a la hora de decidir qué hacer en su tiempo libre.

Name: Guerin - Car Rental Solutions & Enterprise
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, 3 Av. Severiano Falcão, 2685-379
Company description: Guerin - Car Rental Solutions & Enterprise is a leading car rental company that specializes in providing flexible and convenient transportation solutions for travelers. With a mission to enhance the travel experience, Guerin offers a diverse fleet of vehicles available for pickup and drop-off at various airports and cities, catering to both leisure and business clients. The company aims to empower customers to explore their destinations with ease, exemplified by their curated travel guides, such as the one for a day trip to Guimarães, which highlights local attractions and cultural experiences. Guerin partners with various travel agencies and tourism boards to ensure a seamless journey for its clients, who range from solo travelers to families and corporate groups. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and a focus on enriching travel experiences, Guerin is dedicated to being a trusted companion on every road trip.

Name: Tiqets
Company description: Tiqets is a leading online ticketing platform that revolutionizes how travelers access cultural experiences and attractions worldwide. With a mission to make culture more accessible, Tiqets connects users with a diverse range of venues, from museums to immersive experiences, allowing them to book tickets seamlessly through a user-friendly digital interface. The company primarily targets the tech-savvy Gen Z demographic, who prioritize unique, authentic experiences and value sustainability in their travel choices. Tiqets collaborates with various partners, including museums and attractions, to enhance visitor engagement and satisfaction, while also recognizing and celebrating excellence in the industry through initiatives like the Remarkable Venue Awards.  With over 50 million experiences served, Tiqets continues to shape the future of travel by catering to the evolving preferences of modern travelers. The platform simplifies the process of booking tickets for cultural attractions, museums, and activities around the world, enhancing the travel experience by providing instant access to a wide range of attractions. Customers can explore iconic sites at their own pace, making it a convenient option for both local and international travelers. Tiqets partners with various cultural institutions and tour operators to offer a diverse selection of experiences in popular destinations such as Rome, Bangkok, and various cities across Italy. Committed to making cultural experiences more accessible and enjoyable for everyone, Tiqets is at the forefront of transforming how people engage with cultural heritage and entertainment.

Name: EUROPA MUNDO VACACIONES S.L.U.
Company description: EUROPA MUNDO VACACIONES S.L.U. is a travel company that specializes in organized tours across a variety of destinations, with a strong emphasis on customizable travel experiences. The company is dedicated to creating memorable journeys for its clients by offering a diverse range of tours, including cultural explorations in countries such as Mexico and Japan, among other international locations. With a mission to promote sustainable tourism, EUROPA MUNDO VACACIONES prioritizes social impact through its foundation, which supports humanitarian initiatives globally.  The company caters to a wide audience, including travel agencies, individual travelers, families, and groups, ensuring that there is something for everyone. By partnering with local guides and hotels, EUROPA MUNDO VACACIONES enhances the travel experience, providing clients with authentic insights into the cultures they explore. The company’s vision underscores the importance of responsible travel as a means to foster social change and support local economies, aiming to connect travelers with enriching experiences that contribute positively to the communities they visit. EUROPA MUNDO VACACIONES S.L.U. strives to be a leader in the tourism industry by combining comfort, cultural immersion, and responsible travel practices. Its target market consists of socially conscious travelers who seek to engage in cultural exchange and community development through their journeys. By focusing on sustainable tourism, the company not only enriches the lives of its clients but also works towards the well-being of the destinations it serves, making a meaningful impact on the global travel landscape.

Name: Mouzenidis Travel
Company description: Leading tour operator in Greece. More than 20 years of successful work. Wide spectrum of services. Stainless reputation. A few facts: • founded in 1995, IATA member since 1998,  ATOR member • more than 81 local offices in Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Moldova, Kazakhstan, Romania, Serbia, Latvia, Bulgaria, Hungary • head office in Thessaloniki (Greece) • 14 offices in Greek holiday resorts: Athens, Kastoria, Peloponnese, Chalkidiki, Pieria, Thassos, Corfu, Rhodes, Crete • at about 500.000 tourists in 2014 • more than 3.000 permanent employees •  more than120 direct flights to Greek resorts  a week from 36 CIS and Eastern European cities in summer • owns air company Ellinair • year-round regular flights in cooperation with airlines "Astra Airlines" (Greece), "Aeroflot", "Vim-Avia", "Ural Airlines", "Yamal", "Orenair", "UIA", "Belavia", etc. • coach fleet consists of more than 100 A-class Setra buses with free WI-FI • VIP-services (including VIP-lounges in the airports  of Thessaloniki and Heraklion) • offers the biggest choice of accommodation at the best Greek hotels 2*-5* • owns hotels (Bomo Club) • instant confirmation in on-line booking system • English speaking tour operator representatives at hotels • new destination for outgoing tourism – Baltic countries • quality control department • guarantee of high-quality services at every step of the journey • favorable cooperation conditions.

Name: Nicolaus SpA
Company description: Nicolaus Tour was founded in Ostuni in 1993 as a travel agency. The company gradually specialized in incoming to Puglia and the South of Italy, gaining a leadership role among the Italian Destination Management Companies (DMC). Nicolaus DMC became the main point of reference as an Incoming Tour Operator to Puglia for more than 4000 Italian travel agencies, Incentive Houses and international tour operators (approx. 1000), thanks to the expertise in programming tourist services that convey an innovative image of the territory, keeping at the same time its authenticity. In addition to the seaside Holiday, Nicolaus tour creates tailor-made theme packages, related to food and wine, culture, religion, sports (especially golf), wellness & spa, wedding. Nicolaus Tour also provides professional MICE services, including team building and motivation activities.

Name: Eden Viaggi
Company description: Eden Viaggi is a well-established travel agency with over 40 years of experience in the tourism sector, specializing in providing a diverse range of vacation packages and travel experiences. The company focuses on popular destinations in the Mediterranean, Africa, and the Caribbean, offering tailored solutions that combine flights and accommodations to ensure a seamless travel experience. Eden Viaggi's mission is to create unforgettable journeys that cater to the unique preferences of its clients, emphasizing personalized service and customer satisfaction. The agency serves a varied clientele, including families, couples, solo travelers, and young adventurers, making it a versatile choice for different travel needs. Eden Viaggi collaborates with a network of trusted partners, including airlines and high-quality accommodations, to deliver competitive pricing and exclusive deals. The company is particularly focused on providing options for both short getaways and long-haul vacations, ensuring that every traveler can find the perfect escape. With a commitment to sustainability and respect for the environment, Eden Viaggi also promotes responsible travel practices. The agency's vision is to be a leader in the travel industry, continuously innovating and enhancing its offerings to inspire wanderlust and facilitate memorable experiences for its customers. By prioritizing customer feedback and satisfaction, Eden Viaggi aims to be a trusted choice for those seeking authentic adventures and stress-free travel planning.

Name: DERTOUR DMC Network
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, 30 Carrer Genil
Company description: DERTOUR DMC Network, operating under Go Vacation Spain, is a leading Destination Management Company (DMC) that specializes in providing comprehensive travel services to B2B clients, including tour operators and travel agencies. The company is dedicated to sustainable tourism practices, aiming to minimize its carbon footprint and promote responsible sourcing by collaborating with local suppliers and ensuring fair working conditions. DERTOUR DMC Network's mission is to enhance the travel experience while respecting local cultures and environments, and it adheres to a strict Code of Conduct that emphasizes human rights, environmental management, and child safeguarding. The company serves a diverse clientele, including various brands within the DER Touristik Group, and is committed to continuous improvement in sustainability through regular monitoring and reporting. By prioritizing local engagement and ethical practices, DERTOUR DMC Network strives to contribute positively to the destinations it operates in, ensuring a beneficial impact on local communities and ecosystems.

Name: EXIM TOURS A.s.
HQ Location: Czech Republic, Hlavní Město Praha, 2 Babákova, 148 00
Company description: Cestovní kancelář EXIM tours je členem Asociace cestovních kanceláří České republiky a RDA Internationaler Touristik Verband e.V. v Kolíně nad Rýnem. Svou činnost zahájila letní sezónou 1993 a v současnosti je největší cestovní kanceláří na českém trhu. Aktivní obchodní politiku EXIM tours lze doložit postupným zakládáním dceřiných cestovních kanceláří v Polsku – EXIM tours Poland, na Slovensku – Kartago tours Slovakia a v Maďarsku – Kartago tours Hungary. V roce 2011 se tyto dceřiné společnosti staly součástí EXIM HOLDING a.s., a tak i největším středoevropským gigantem v oboru cestovního ruchu. Celkový obrat skupiny tak dosahuje v přepočtu více než osmi miliard korun. SOUČASNOST Realizační tým EXIM tours a.s. dnes čítá takřka 270 zaměstnanců a přibližně 100 delegátů v destinacích, kam směřují naše lety. V prvním desetiletí činnosti naší cestovní kanceláře se osvědčila strategie orientovat se s maximálním úsilím na spokojenost zákazníka. Kromě 41 vlastních provozoven a provozoven na bázi franchisy realizujeme podstatnou část prodeje prostřednictvím husté sítě cestovních agentur. Egypt - Tunisia - Greek islands - Spain - Morocco - Turkey - Bulgaria - Dominican republic - Mexico - Cuba - Isla Margarita - SAE - Kenya - Zanzibar winter skiing - Austria, Switzerland, Italy, France branch offices around Slovakia - Prague - Ceske Budejovice - Tabor - Plzen - Karlovy Vary - Teplice - Chomutov - Liberec - Mlada Boleslav -. Pardubice - Jihlava - Brno - Olomouc - Zlin - Ostrava - Opava

Name: City Sightseeing Spain
Company description: City Sightseeing Spain is a premier tour operator specializing in providing unique sightseeing experiences across various Spanish cities, including Las Palmas de Gran Canaria and Madrid. The company offers a range of services, such as panoramic bus tours and boat excursions, allowing clients to explore iconic landmarks and hidden gems from a fresh perspective. With a mission to enhance the travel experience, City Sightseeing aims to deliver memorable adventures that combine leisure, education, and cultural appreciation. Its target market includes both local and international tourists seeking convenient and informative ways to discover Spain's rich heritage. The company partners with local attractions and businesses to offer exclusive deals and experiences, ensuring a comprehensive and enjoyable visit for all its customers.

Name: Apollo Member Of DERTOUR Group
Company description: Apollo is one of the Nordic region’s leading travel agencies, with almost 300 employees and a million travellers annually. With us, customers can travel all over the world, regardless of whether they want a relaxing and sunny beachside holiday, a warm-weather fitness getaway, or a weekend in an exciting major city. We arrange travel packages, fitness trips, cruises and city trips. We also offer secure flight and hotel bookings separately for customers who prefer to assemble the trip themselves.  Apollo actively works for sustainable travel and social responsibility, and we collaborate with SOS Children’s Villages, Ecpat and the Swedish Olympic Committee (SOK). Apollo has been Travelife-certified since 2016. Read more at www.apollo.se  We are proud to be a member of DERTOUR Group, a leading international tourism company with over 100 years of history. DERTOUR Group encompasses 180+ companies across the world and employs around 13,000 international travel experts. The network includes around 20 tour operators, approximately 30 specialized travel providers, and about 2,000 travel agencies, serving millions of guests each year. For further information, visit www.dertour-group.com. Do you share our passion for travel, our feel for service, people and great travel experiences?  We are always looking for those who are bold enough to act in new ways and who are motivated by working together and with partners to fulfil our travellers' dreams. Come work for us or tell a friend! Look out for open opportunities in the Nordics or our travel destinations.

Name: Nordic Collection
Company description: Nordic Collection est un acteur majeur dans le secteur du tourisme, spécialisé dans les voyages en Scandinavie et opérant principalement sur les marchés belge, néerlandais, allemand et français. Fondé en 2008 par Maarten Raes, le groupe a connu une croissance rapide, intégrant plusieurs marques sous son aile, dont Nordic, Atacama, et Norske, ce dernier étant un spécialiste des voyages en Norvège récemment acquis. La mission de Nordic Collection est de fournir des expériences de voyage authentiques et mémorables, tout en mettant l'accent sur la durabilité et la responsabilité sociale, comme en témoigne leur obtention du Travelife Certified Award. Avec une équipe passionnée de plus de 100 employés, Nordic Collection s'engage à offrir des produits de qualité, en collaborant étroitement avec des partenaires locaux pour enrichir l'expérience de ses clients. Leurs clients incluent des voyageurs individuels, des groupes d'entreprises et des agences de voyage, tous attirés par la beauté naturelle et la culture des pays nordiques.

Name: VB Group
Company description: VB Group is a leading company in the travel and mobility industry, specializing in comprehensive solutions for corporate travel, events, and sports. Founded in 2009 by brothers Jorge and Guillermo Espinós, the company has grown from a local travel agency to a global partner for businesses, with a strong presence in Spain and Latin America. With over 270 professionals, VB Group is committed to innovation and excellence, offering tailored services through its ten recognized brands. The company aims to redefine standards in corporate travel management and event planning, focusing on delivering premium services and leveraging technology to enhance client experiences. Its diverse clientele includes sectors such as entertainment, sports, and corporate travel, supported by strategic partnerships with organizations like Corporate Travel Management and Traveller Made. VB Group's mission is to accompany clients in their projects with a global mindset, ensuring a positive and collaborative approach to every journey.

Name: Agenzia Immobiliare Adriatica
Company description: Active in the real estate field since 1968, the agenzia adriatica is able to satify requests both about touristic rentals (more than 150 apartments in all over the island) and about house sales in Grado, the sunny island between Trieste and Venice. Collaboration with foreign touristic agencies and tour operators.

Name: Viajes El Corte Inglés Empresas
Company description: Viajes El Corte Inglés Empresas is a specialized travel agency that focuses on providing tailored travel solutions for businesses and corporate clients. With a mission to enhance the travel experience through personalized service and expert guidance, the company aims to simplify the complexities of business travel while ensuring cost-effectiveness and efficiency. Their target market includes a diverse range of corporate clients, from small businesses to large multinational corporations, seeking comprehensive travel management services. Viajes El Corte Inglés Empresas collaborates with various partners in the travel industry, including airlines, hotels, and local tour operators, to offer unique travel experiences that cater to the specific needs of their clients. The company is committed to delivering exceptional service and innovative travel solutions that align with the evolving demands of the corporate sector.

Name: Medov
Company description: Medov’s history begins more than 60 years ago. It was 1947 when the shipping agency started the activity in Genoa with basic interest in the cruise business. Thanks to the long tradition and experience Medov has widened its areas of business, coming to cover practically all different fields in the shipping world, either directly or through controlled companies: - cruises - container - RO-RO - liquid and dry bulk - salvage - off-shore - heavy-lift - port representation In the above areas of business Medov offers a complete range of efficient services through experienced and dedicated personnel: - port agency - shore excursions and ground - customs and logistics - ship chandling - services to cabotage - heavy-lift chartering - newbuildings and shipyard assistance - travel agency All services are offered on a 24 hours a day, 7 days a week availability and long standing relations with local authorities and various port operators are the key to solve any kind of problem related to a vessel’s call in any Italian and French port. The  management has a proven track record in liner and container terminal operations. Moreover, 20 years of experience in the management of DG administration formalities by in-house staff (employees with DGSA title) regarding IMDG (sea), ADR (road) and RID (rail) know-how and in-house forwarding agent license in Genoa, Leghorn and Naples complete the port agency service offer. For further information, please visit www.medov.it

Name: FareHarbor
Company description: FareHarbor is a comprehensive online booking and reservation solutions company that specializes in facilitating payments for activity and tourism businesses. The company acts as a limited purpose payment agent, enabling customers to book and pay for various activities and services through its platform. FareHarbor's mission is to streamline the booking process for both customers and providers, ensuring a seamless experience while maintaining a clear separation between the service it offers and the providers it partners with. Its clients include a diverse range of activity providers, from tour operators to adventure companies, catering to a target market of travelers seeking convenient and reliable booking options. By focusing on user-friendly technology and robust support, FareHarbor aims to enhance the overall customer experience in the tourism sector.

Name: Sunweb Group
Company description: Sunweb Group is one of Europe’s largest online travel agencies, bringing unforgettable holiday experiences to eight international markets, including the Netherlands, Belgium, Denmark, Sweden, France, the UK, and Germany. With our well-known brands, Sunweb and ‘Eliza Was Here,’ we cater to every kind of traveler—from beach lovers to winter sports enthusiasts and those seeking unique, off-the-beaten-path destinations. We believe everyone deserves a great holiday. It’s a time to recharge, make memories, and escape the everyday. With over 35 years of expertise, we use data-driven insights and advanced technology to offer personalized holiday experiences that are just a few clicks away. Our approach is simple: we build holidays around what travelers love. By partnering with trusted suppliers, we deliver high-quality flights, accommodations, and local services at competitive prices. When you book with Sunweb Group, you’re choosing a seamless journey, from the initial inspiration to the final memory. With a team of 600+ dedicated colleagues and over 200 local guides, we’re always close by to support our travelers. Our operational hubs in Rotterdam, Girona, Paris, Copenhagen, Stockholm, Antwerp, Chambéry, and Zurich ensure we stay connected and responsive to customer needs. Our Fast Forward culture encourages focus and trust, allowing us to shape the future of holidays while helping our customers press pause.

Name: Rolfs Flyg & Buss
Company description: With over 3 500 groups and serving 120 000 travellers per year Rolfs Flyg & Buss is the leading group tour operator in Sweden. Established in 1975 today we offer over 450 different itineraries all over the world. Main focus is cultural tours but also including cruises and active travel.

Name: THERME GROUP
Company description: Therme Group is driven by the belief that wellbeing should be accessible to all.   Therme Group’s vision is to create the world’s most advanced wellbeing resorts, achieved by harnessing the complex interplay of nature, technology and culture.   By combining the traditions of global thermal bathing with an indoor tropical ecosystem, Therme Group’s resorts deliver an experience that enhances mind, body and soul.   Therme Group’s resorts are more than relaxing and fun places to meet; they nurture mental and physical health and offer a vital piece of public and social infrastructure. THERME EUROPE Therme Group is renowned as a European wellbeing leader. For more than 20 years, the technologies of Therme Group have been deployed in wellbeing resorts throughout Germany.  THERME UK Responsible for the strategic planning, development and roll out of Therme Group resorts in the UK. THERME ASIA Will create globally unique iconic landmarks that are strongly anchored in each location’s local cultural heritage and values. THERME NORTH AMERICA Therme Group has active projects in some of North America’s most iconic locations.  THERME ARC Delivering world-class architectural solutions using cutting-edge materials, for iconic, sustainable facilities that become landmarks for the communities they serve. THERME DTX The engineering competencies of Therme DTX (Delta-X) allow it to deliver highly complex solutions with the greatest degree of safety for all Therme Group projects. THERME XPR Providing essential analysis for Therme Group, covering topics such as demographics, customer experience, local economy, public infrastructure and cultural preferences. THERME Forum Hosting global events with a focus on finding solutions to the most pressing questions of our age. THERME KAI This specialist tour operator provides tailor-made travel solutions for business and leisure travellers worldwide.

Name: D-reizen
Company description: D-reizen is a leading travel agency in the Netherlands, specializing in personalized travel planning services. Established in 2011 by Marc van Deursen, the company has grown to become the largest travel retailer in the country and a significant player in the European travel industry. With locations in Winterswijk, Kerkrade, Halsteren, and Winsum, D-reizen is dedicated to helping clients find their dream vacations, whether they are seeking sun holidays, cruises, or tailored round trips. The agency's mission is to provide a stress-free booking experience, offering a wide range of travel options while delivering expert advice and competitive pricing. D-reizen collaborates with various partners, including airlines and tour operators, to ensure the best deals and guarantees through recognized organizations like ANVR and SGR. The agency serves a diverse clientele, including leisure travelers looking for unique experiences, families seeking convenient holiday packages, and groups wanting memorable trips. With a strong emphasis on customer-centric service and innovation, D-reizen aims to exceed customer expectations by combining quality service with attractive offers. The company maintains a robust presence in both online and physical retail environments, reflecting its commitment to growth and market leadership. D-reizen is focused on enhancing the customer experience and has plans for further expansion and improvement in the future. Through its dedicated teams of experienced travel advisors, D-reizen continues to prioritize a personal touch in its services, ensuring that every client receives tailored support in planning their ideal getaway.

Name: Idee Per Viaggiare
Company description: Idee Per Viaggiare is a prominent Italian tour operator that has recently acquired the historic brand Marcelletti, known for its specialization in travel programming for Central and South America. With a mission to enhance high-quality travel experiences, the company aims to revive and expand Marcelletti's legacy by integrating expert professionals from the brand into its team. This strategic acquisition allows Idee Per Viaggiare to offer a diverse range of premium travel options to destinations such as Argentina, Chile, Peru, Bolivia, Colombia, Ecuador, and Guatemala. The company is committed to delivering exceptional service and innovative travel solutions, catering primarily to travel agencies and discerning travelers seeking unique and luxurious experiences. Under the leadership of CEO Danilo Curzi, Idee Per Viaggiare emphasizes meticulous attention to detail and a passion for travel, ensuring that every journey is memorable and inspiring.

Name: Grupo Maso
HQ Location: Latvia, Centro, 145 Av. Principal De La Castellana, 1060
Company description: Turismo Maso es la Agencia de Viajes líder en el mercado Venezolano.Cuenta con 35 oficinas a nivel nacional, y ofrece una amplia gama deservicios de viajes, incluyendo: Travel Management (Gerencia de la Gestion de Viajes) para Clientes Corporativos; Ventas de todo tipo de Viajes para Clientes Personales; Manejo de Eventos y Convenciones; y Representaciones de empresas y proveedores de productos relacionados a la industria de Viajes y Turismo en el Mundo

Name: Smiler
Company description: Smiler is a dynamic photography service that specializes in enhancing travel experiences by providing high-quality, professional photography for tour operators and online travel agencies (OTAs). The company's mission is to transform memorable moments into lasting memories and powerful marketing assets, helping clients boost engagement and brand visibility. With a user-friendly platform, Smiler allows photographers to create personalized storefronts that showcase their work, integrate booking systems, and automatically update portfolios with the latest photos and client reviews. Targeting tour operators and travelers, Smiler partners with renowned brands like Heineken Experience and Big Bus Tours, offering tailored photography solutions that not only capture the essence of tours but also drive positive customer feedback and marketing opportunities. By leveraging technology and a network of skilled photographers, Smiler aims to elevate the standard of travel photography while ensuring a seamless experience for both clients and their guests.

Name: MIAB
Company description: MIAB specializes in providing professional hotel cleaning and housekeeping services across Sweden and Finland, ensuring that every hotel room is left sparkling clean and well-maintained. With a mission to enhance the guest experience and strengthen hotel reputations, MIAB collaborates with a diverse range of clients, from large hotel chains like Strawberry, Holiday Club, and Scandic to small boutique hotels. The company is committed to delivering tailored cleaning solutions that adapt to the specific needs of each hotel, focusing on guest comfort and operational efficiency. By utilizing environmentally friendly products and maintaining high standards of service, MIAB aims to contribute to customer satisfaction and a pleasant hotel environment. Each year, MIAB services over 1.6 million hotel rooms, showcasing its dedication to quality and reliability in the hospitality industry.

Name: HolidayPirates Group
Company description: One of the fastest-growing online travel companies in Europe.  Operating in 10 countries across Europe and North America, our award-winning editorial teams are trusted by our partners, subscribers and followers to deliver inspirational travel deals. From holiday packages, flights and hotels through to car hire, holiday homes and more, our audience knows a HolidayPirates deal is going to be unusually good value. We currently employ around 160 crew members, who can choose from visiting our Berlin HQ or working remotely thanks to our hybrid, flexible work policy.

Name: Emile Weber
Company description: Emile Weber is a prominent travel and mobility company based in Luxembourg, with a rich history that dates back over 150 years to its founding in 1875 as a postal carriage service. The company specializes in organized trips across Europe and beyond, offering a diverse range of travel options including bus, train, and flight services. Emile Weber's mission is to provide unforgettable travel experiences while ensuring safety, comfort, and sustainability for its clients. The company caters to a wide audience, from individual travelers seeking unique adventures to corporate groups in need of tailored travel solutions.  With a workforce of over 2,300 employees and a fleet of more than 1,600 vehicles, Emile Weber offers a comprehensive array of services, including public and private passenger transport, travel agency services, event planning, and innovative digital mobility solutions. The company is committed to social responsibility and environmental sustainability, as highlighted by its recognition with the "Responsibility Europe" label. Emile Weber partners with various organizations to enhance its service offerings and is dedicated to integrating tradition with modernity, making it a cornerstone of mobility in Luxembourg and the Greater Region. In its pursuit of innovation, Emile Weber has recently collaborated with Twiliner to redefine night bus travel in Europe, showcasing its commitment to enhancing the travel experience. The company aims to create memorable moments for travelers while maintaining high standards of quality and service. Emile Weber's vision is to continue evolving in the mobility sector, ensuring that it meets the diverse needs of its clients while promoting sustainable travel practices.

Name: Italcamel Accommodation & Destination Services
Company description: Founded in 1979, Italcamel is a family-owned Destination Management Company (DMC) specializing in delivering comprehensive ground services throughout Italy to international tour operators. Our offerings include hotels, transfers, tours, and excursions tailored for both individual travelers and groups. Our extensive network features a wide range of accommodations, from rural luxury resorts to urban business-class hotels, complemented by a diverse selection of excursions led by licensed, specialized multilingual guides. We also operate a fleet of buses, cars, and minibuses to ensure seamless private and group transfers across every Italian city. Exclusively focused on the B2B market, we are supported by an in-house team of 120 skilled multilingual professionals across three offices located in Rimini, Rome, and Venice. We serve over 150 clients via XML/API, with 9,000 travel agencies accessing our booking engine worldwide. --------------------------------------------- Fondata nel 1979, Italcamel è una DMC (Destination Management Company) specializzata nell'offerta di servizi turistici in tutta Italia, tra cui hotel, trasferimenti, visite ed escursioni per clienti individuali e gruppi. Collaboriamo con i principali tour operator, agenzie di viaggio e OLTA, sia in Italia che a livello internazionale. Operiamo esclusivamente nel segmento B2B, con un team di oltre 120 professionisti multilingue distribuiti su tre sedi: Rimini, Roma e Venezia. Offriamo una selezione di oltre 5.000 hotel e servizi turistici in Italia, con contratti diretti. Le nostre soluzioni sono disponibili sia in modalità offline che online. Grazie a un'infrastruttura tecnologica avanzata, serviamo oltre 150 clienti internazionali tramite XML/API, mentre 9.000 agenzie di viaggio utilizzano il nostro Booking Engine. Inoltre, la nostra piattaforma è connessa a più di 40 Channel Managers, assicurando un'integrazione fluida e un'efficienza operativa.

Name: Aerotravel
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Nr. 31 Str. Mântuleasa, 023961
Company description: With 25+ years of activity on the local market, Aerotravel is one of the most powerful travel companies from Romania, supplying business travel and M.I.C.E. services. Proudly serving more than 120 000 customers who travel with us every year, Aerotravel has been focusing on growth and development. Thus, Aerotravel can serve even more customers, in ways that better fulfill their travel needs and dreams. Aerotravel Group includes the national network specialized in business travel, the leisure agencies organized under the Fabrica de Vacante brand and AeroVacante and CruiseHub tour operators. A new leap in Aerotravel’s development! In the first semester of 2019, Aerotravel has signed the partnership with Travel Leaders and thus become the exclusive representative in Romania for the largest network of travel agencies in the USA. For Aerotravel is essential to anticipate and answer the shifting realities of travel industries, in order to ensure customer satisfaction. In this respect, the partnership with Travel Leaders represents a unique opportunity to upgrade operational and technological capabilities. •	exclusive representative of Travel Leaders in Romania •	ability to provide business travel and M.I.C.E. solutions all over the world •	adoption of cutting-edge technological solutions, with tangible and quantifiable benefits for corporate clients •	access to the most important global travel service providers •	the guarantee that travel services meet the same quality standards, regardless of the destination where they are delivered. Travel Leaders Network is the largest network of travel agencies in North America with nearly 7,000 locations producing annual sales of more than $20 billion. According to the annual Business Travel News survey, Travel Leaders is the highest-ranking travel management company for seven straight years.

Name: Travel Time
Company description: Travel Time was founded in 2006, and is the result of 20 years of experience within the Travel Industry between its Shareholders, in the fields of Corporate and Leisure Travel.  The demand for Quality of Service has lead our company to become an IATA agency, since 2009. Our Quality of Service has been audited and received ISO 9001:2008. We’re committed to offer high level services and competitive value for money products in order to satisfy our clients’ needs. We want to meet and exceed our clients’ goals but always having Quality Service in mind. We have now four departments to provide products and services: Corporate Travel, MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences and Events), Ticketing and Leisure Travel. Each department is based on professionals who are on continuously training to fulfill our Quality of Services requirements. They can satisfy all demands, providing accommodation - for all categories, starting with hostel/B&B to exclusive Deluxe Hotels, having more than 250000 hotels in our portfolio; airfares, transfers, cruises, rail tickets, car rental, travel insurance, holiday packages, tickets to various events (cultural, sport, concerts), visa and passport services, meet and greet at the airport, etc. We offer 24 hour emergency assistance service for our customers and our team is ready to help you with any demand during your journeys. You can contact them anytime at: +4 0730 245966 or at email office@traveltime.ro

Name: MasterGroup World
Company description: MasterGroup World is a leading Destination Management Company (DMC) with over 20 years of experience in the Italian tourism sector. The company specializes in providing tailored travel solutions across Italy, ensuring that clients experience the rich cultural and scenic diversity the country has to offer. With a mission to deliver high-quality, personalized services, MasterGroup World caters to a wide range of clients, including travel agencies and international tourism firms, boasting a network of 5,500 affiliate agencies and partnerships with 3,000 contracted hotels. The company is committed to innovation and excellence, recently enhancing its leadership team to further strengthen its global positioning and service offerings. MasterGroup World aims to be the go-to choice for travelers seeking unique and memorable experiences in Italy, supported by a dedicated team and advanced technological solutions.

Name: CIÉ - Córas Iompair Éireann
Company description: Córas Iompair Éireann (CIÉ) is a commercial semi-state company and the largest provider of public transport services in Ireland.  In excess of 281 million passenger journeys are undertaken annually on the CIÉ network and the group employs over 10,000 people nationwide. CIÉ provides services through its subsidiary companies: Bus Átha Cliath / Dublin Bus (https://www.dublinbus.ie) provides bus services in the greater Dublin area  Bus Éireann (https://www.buseireann.ie) provides intercity and regional bus services outside of Dublin as well as city bus services in Cork, Galway, Limerick and Waterford Iarnród Éireann  / Irish Rail (https://www.irishrail.ie) provide Intercity, commuter and DART rail services throughout the country and jointly together with Northern Irish Railways the Dublin to Belfast Enterprise Service  In addition, CIÉ Tours (https://www.cietours.com) is Ireland and Britain’s largest tour operator offering inclusive and fully guided vacations into Ireland and the UK.  CIÉ is proud of the part we continue to play in the provision of public services the difficult times of Covid-19 and grateful for the efforts of all members of staff across the group during this time. Through the operation of our public transport services, the development of our lands based upon Transport Orientated Development principles and the roll out of our new Sustainability Strategy, we will play an increasingly important role in contributing to the State’s economic, environmental and social goals especially during the recovery phase from Covid-19.

Name: FRIGERIO Il Gruppo
Company description: FRIGERIO Il Gruppo is a well-established company in the travel and tourism industry, boasting over 75 years of experience in creating memorable travel experiences. Specializing in a wide range of services, including vacation packages, cruises, and tailored travel experiences, the company is dedicated to delivering exceptional travel solutions that prioritize customer satisfaction. FRIGERIO Il Gruppo partners with various airlines, hotels, and local attractions to craft comprehensive travel packages that cater to both leisure and business travelers. The company primarily targets individual travelers, families, and corporate clients, ensuring that each offering is customized to meet the unique needs of its diverse clientele. With a strong commitment to innovation, FRIGERIO Il Gruppo leverages advanced technology to provide efficient booking services and personalized travel solutions. The company collaborates with major cruise lines such as MSC and Costa, offering exclusive packages for popular destinations including the Mediterranean, Caribbean, and Northern Europe. FRIGERIO Il Gruppo's mission is to make travel accessible and enjoyable for everyone, while its vision emphasizes sustainability and responsible tourism practices. By fostering long-lasting relationships with customers and partners, the company aims to become a leading reference in the tourism sector. With a dedicated team of over 200 professionals and a network of more than 90 affiliates, FRIGERIO Il Gruppo continuously adapts to market demands, enhancing the travel experience for all its clients. The company is committed to creating unforgettable journeys, ensuring high-quality service and innovative offerings that resonate with travelers seeking unique experiences.

Name: TOURGREECE
Company description: TOURGREECE founded in 1979 by Mr. Vassilis Sakellaris, TourGreece has consistently delivered exceptional travel experiences, offering each of your clients a warm welcome and top-quality vacation packages at competitive rates. Now under the dynamic leadership of Mr. Sakellaris’s son, Phillip Radopoulos—who brings over 32 years of experience in the company, a Master’s in Tourism from Switzerland, and a Doctorate in Business Administration—TourGreece continues to set new standards in the industry. We are honored to hold our position as Greece’s largest and oldest Destination Management Company, a title we’ve proudly maintained for 46 consecutive years. Our unparalleled reputation is further reinforced by securing the largest insurance policy ever awarded in the Greek travel industry, ensuring maximum protection for our clients. Moreover, we are on the path to becoming the first Greek travel company to achieve zero or negative carbon emissions within the next three years, underscoring our commitment to sustainability. For over 46 years, TourGreece has been the trusted partner for travel professionals seeking reliable and innovative services in Greece. Our deep expertise, strong purchasing power, and extensive network of connections enable us to provide comprehensive, tailor-made solutions for tour operators, MICE specialists, leisure group organizers, and FIT agents.

Name: Musement
Company description: Musement is the digital platform that allows you to book travel activities in over 1,400 destinations and 130 countries around the world. The service was created to help travelers discover and book things to do – from museum visits to city tours, food and wine tastings, sports events and wellness activities – wherever they go, with the goal of enriching their travel experience. The service is available in 8 languages through various digital touchpoints: the B2C websites and apps with the Musement and Triposo brands; the platform for travel agencies; while platforms and integrations have been carried out with countless online distribution partners, from Google to hotels.com. Musement is headquartered in Milan and has offices in Hamburg, Amsterdam, Barcelona, Dubai, London, Monaco, New York, Orlando and Paris. The company has been certified as a Great Place To Work® and in 2018 was listed in the top 20 Best Workplaces® in Italy.
