In September of the same year, Musement became part of the German group TUI, the largest integrated tourism operator in the world. Following its acquisition, Musement has remained an independent company in the TUI Destination Experiences division (TUI DX). The collaboration and integration between the two companies has already brought significant benefits to both and a strong growth in combined turnover, which in the last year reached 1,2 bilion euros. In 2020 we have been awarded with the Great Place To Work Italia Certification.

Name: OSIRIS
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, 35 A Av. Marquês De Tomar, 1050-153
Company description: A OSIRIS é uma agência de viagens e de eventos que cria experiências exclusivas e altamente personalizadas.  A OSIRIS actua no mercado nacional, quer na gestão de viagens, de deslocações e de eventos empresariais, quer na organização de viagens de lazer à medida. A OSIRIS é ainda uma referência a nível internacional  na captação e na organização de viagens de lazer ou temáticas  e de “eventos & incentivos “ a serem realizados em Portugal & Espanha. O grupos OSIRIS engloba mais 4 empresas: O-JETS ( www.o-Jets.com): broker de aviação privada ; O-SPORTS ( www.o-sports.pt): gestão de eventos e estágios desportivos em Portugal & Espanha; O- BUS (www.o-bus.pt): um meio de transporte premium e especial . Onde começa e acaba o seu evento! O-BIKE (www.o-bike.pt): empresa especializada em viagens de bicicleta para Portugal, quer na vertente de estrada quer de montanha (BTT), e organização de eventos corporativos com bicicletas .

Name: DERTOUR Online GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 6 Emil-von-behring-straße, 60439
Company description: DERTOUR Online GmbH is a leading European tourism company dedicated to making travel dreams a reality. As a trusted partner for travelers, the company prioritizes safety, stability, and carefree vacation experiences, supported by a team of approximately 1,800 travel experts across over 400 DERTOUR travel agency locations in Germany. DERTOUR's mission is to provide personalized advice and exceptional service, ensuring that each client receives tailored travel solutions from a diverse range of offerings, including flights, cruises, and additional services from renowned tour operators. The company embraces an OmniChannel strategy to connect with customers through various communication channels while maintaining a strong focus on personal consultation. DERTOUR Online GmbH seeks passionate individuals to join its team, fostering a motivating work environment that encourages personal responsibility and success within the travel industry.

Name: Coral Travel Poland
Company description: Coral Travel Poland is a prominent travel agency specializing in providing a wide range of travel services, including holiday packages, flight bookings, and tailored travel experiences for both individual and group clients. The company's mission is to create memorable travel experiences that cater to the diverse needs of its customers, while its vision focuses on becoming a leading player in the travel industry by offering exceptional service and innovative solutions. Coral Travel Poland primarily serves leisure travelers, families, and adventure seekers, partnering with various airlines, hotels, and local tour operators to ensure high-quality offerings. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and a passion for travel, Coral Travel Poland aims to inspire and facilitate unforgettable journeys for its clients.

Name: Gulliver Travel
HQ Location: Croatia, Dubrovačko-neretvanska, Dubrovnik, Obala Stjepana Radića, 20000
Company description: Gulliver travel, founded on February 1, 1989, as the first private tourist and travel agency in Dubrovnik, is currently the leading destination management company (DMC) in the region. By following and adapting to global and local trends, we upgraded our successful business with our transformation from a travel agency into a DMC. We were proud to be a part of TUI Group from 2001 to 2016, and from 2016 to 2018 we were a part of Hotelbeds Group, the leading provider of services to the global travel trade and in reshaping travel. Since 2018 we have again become part of the leading travel company in the world - TUI Group. Our products can be recognised by our special “Gulliver Seal “, which we believe to be both a product trademark and an element distinguishing us from the competition. Our mission is to offer competent partnership in destination management. OUR PRODUCT & SERVICES: Cruises, Tours (group, guaranteed, self drive), Excursions, Easy Ride, Premium, Wine & Dine, Adventure, Weddings & Honeymoons, Country, Nautical, Medical, Tailor-made programs, Ground handling, Accommodation, Land & Sea transfers, Guest service, Shore excursions & Port agent, MICE, Business travel, Domestic & international air ticket sales, Rent-a-car & Rent-a-chopper. MARKETS: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, China, Croatia, France, Germany, Greece, Holland, Hong Kong, Ireland, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, New Zeland,  Poland, Portugal, Romania, Russia, Serbia, Scandinavia, Slovenia, Spain, Swiss, Taiwan, Turkey, UK, Ukraine, USA COVERAGE OF: Slovenia, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Serbia, Macedonia, Montenegro, Kosovo, Albania EMPLOYEES: 74 FTE MEMEBERSHIPS: UHPA Association of Croatian Travel Agencies; IATA International Air Transport Association CERTIFICATES & AWARDS: ISO 9001; EOS CODE; Travelife Engaged; Simply the best 2012; Simply the best 2013; Simply the best 2014; DMC of the year 2015 HEAD OFFICE: Dubrovnik / BRANCH OFFICES: Split, Poreč

Name: FUTURA VACANZE Tour Operator
Company description: Futura Vacanze is a dynamic tour operator dedicated to providing high-quality travel experiences tailored to the evolving needs of its clients. With a mission focused on strategic growth and innovation, the company has recently strengthened its management team to enhance its operational capabilities in finance, human resources, and marketing. Futura Vacanze serves a diverse clientele, including travel agencies and individual travelers, offering a wide range of destinations such as the Red Sea, Porto Santo, and Italy's coastal regions. The company is committed to delivering personalized travel solutions while maintaining a strong emphasis on quality and teamwork. As it continues to expand its portfolio and enhance its brand identity, Futura Vacanze aims to solidify its position as a leader in the tourism sector, ensuring memorable experiences for all its customers.

Name: Perfect Tour
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Nr. 14 Bd. Decebal, 030967
Company description: Business Travel Management doesn't mean rocket science in Central and Eastern Europe. Perfect Tour was awarded "Best Business And MICE Agency in Romania 2015" by the specialized jury of Romanian TopHotel Conference and is the leader of the business travel management sector in CEE, having 13 agencies in Romania and strategically powerful branches in Republic of Moldova, Ukraine, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Slovakia and the United States. Moreover, Perfect Tour was awarded "Best Travel Agency in Romania 2014". With over ten years of experience, we have a reputation for delivering a high quality, made to measure service for our clients. Our total focus is in understanding our clients’ individual needs and designing our service solution around them. Our in-house expertise and our reputation for delivering innovative technology solutions set us apart from the competition. Perfect Tour has consolidated its top position by associating with the leading provider of travel management GlobalStar. Being a GlobalStar partner, Perfect Tour provides the necessary tools for all companies that want to optimize their travel budgets. We stand for value for money, quality and innovation. We strive to achieve this by empowering our employees to continually deliver an unbeatable customer experience. Travel Management Services •	Account implementation methodology plan; •	Assistance in defining the travel policy and ensuring its application; •	Detailed analysis and negotiation with service providers (airlines, hotels, etc.) in order to obtain preferential rates and conditions; •	Provide monthly, quarterly and annual reports, regarding travelling costs, detailed depending on type of service and achieved savings; •	Periodical evaluation of customer’s satisfaction regarding services; •	Tracking loyalty cards offered by different suppliers (airlines, hotel chains) and warning when obtained miles expire, assistance in obtaining free tickets, etc.

Name: NAUTALIA EMPRESAS
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, Calle De La Mahonia, 28043
Company description: Agencia de viajes de empresas, del grupo Travel Live, que combina el factor humano con el mejor componente digital, preocupada por la sostenibilidad y la seguridad.  Empresas e instituciones públicas confían en nosotros para cubrir las necesidades de sus empleados cuando tienen que viajar por motivos profesionales.

Name: FTI Touristik GmbH
Company description: Fourth biggest Tour Operator in Europe.

Name: Imperatore Travel
Company description: Imperatore Travel è un tour operator nato a Ischia nel 1990, specializzato nell'accoglienza e nella promozione turistica delle destinazioni più esclusive del sud Italia: dalla Costiera Amalfitana alle isole di Ischia e Capri, dalla Puglia alla Sardegna, dalla Calabria alla Basilicata, passando per l’affascinante Sicilia e le magnifiche Isole Eolie, Lampedusa e Pantelleria. Inoltre, dal 2002 promuoviamo le città d’arte italiane per il mercato spagnolo, avendo una sede a Madrid con una squadra di lavoro ad essa dedicata. Sappiamo che la vacanza non è un’occasione di svago puramente materiale, ma un’emozione, un desiderio, un bisogno indispensabile delle persone poiché agognata tutto l’anno. Per questo, la nostra mission consiste nel mettere a disposizione di chi viaggia un mosaico di offerte unico per la nascita di un’esperienza di viaggio indimenticabile: dalle maggiori attrattive del territorio italiano come l’enogastronomia, i siti archeologici di immenso valore culturale, il mare cristallino, la natura incontaminata, la moda firmata made in Italy e l’esclusivo design, alle strutture ricettive più belle, confortevoli e affascinanti, focalizzando l’attenzione sulla qualità di servizi. Sul sito web  www.imperatore.it è  possibile  consultare i cataloghi, sfogliarli online,  richiedere un  preventivo, consultare  l'elenco agenzie di viaggio che collaborano con Imperatore Travel e  scegliere  quella più comoda dove concludere la pratica relativa alla vacanza scelta.

Name: Pelicantravel.com
Company description: Cestovná kancelária Pelikán - najväčší slovenský predajca leteniek a zájazdov pôsobiaci v šiestich európskych krajinách. Na webe Pelikána nájdeš letenky od viac ako 800 leteckých spoločností. Ročne si tu nájde letenku 400-tisíc cestovateľov.  Pelikán ponúka aj kompletné dovolenkové balíky od slovenských, rakúskych a nemeckých cestovných kancelárií.  V portfóliu nechýbajú ani revolučne cestovateľské produkty ako napríklad zmena letenky z akéhokoľvek dôvodu. Pelikán je prvým on-line vyhľadávačom leteniek na Slovensku a jednou z najväčších OTAs v strednej a východnej Európe.

Name: Invia.cz A.s.
Company description: CA Invia is the biggest internet travel agency in the Czech Republic providing vacation packages from over 200 renowned tour operators on the Czech and Slovak market. Furthermore, Invia offers flight tickets, accommodation in the Czech Republic & worldwide and other services and useful information related to travelling. Since 2006, the company operates on the Polish and Hungarian market as well and continues expanding to Eastern Europe.

Name: SERVICE-REISEN Heyne GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: SERVICE-REISEN is one of the largest package tour operators in Europe and market leader in Germany. Our company has been in existence for almost 50 years and now has over 140 employees in the group of companies. As a package tour operator, we bring together several individual components of a group tour and sell them as a complete package for an unforgettable travel experience.

Name: Cntravel
Company description: cntravel es un reconocido operador turístico (agencia mayorista) especializada en la gestión de grupos turísticos. Nació en el año 1999 de la mano de Jose Fernández, como una pequeña empresa familiar. Más de veinte años después, sigue manteniendo su esencia, a pesar de la expansión vivida desde entonces.  Está especializada en la gestión de grupos turísticos y circuitos culturales, además de disponer de otros productos.  Su principal cliente son las agencias de viajes tradicionales, aunque también las OTA´S, de toda la Península Ibérica. Además, en su plan de expansión se ha externalizado, de forma que también trabaja como incoming para agencias extranjeras (principalmente europeas).

Name: Vienna Tourist Board
Company description: The Vienna Tourist Board is the official organization dedicated to promoting Vienna as a premier travel destination, with a focus on both leisure and business tourism. Its mission is to enhance the city's visibility and attractiveness on the global stage by showcasing its rich cultural heritage, historical landmarks, and vibrant contemporary life. The board collaborates with a diverse range of partners, including local businesses, cultural institutions, hotels, and international travel agencies, to create comprehensive marketing strategies that cater to various target markets, including families, art enthusiasts, culinary explorers, and corporate event planners. With a commitment to inclusivity and sustainability, the Vienna Tourist Board aims to foster a welcoming environment for all visitors while celebrating the city's unique identity and history. The organization actively supports sustainable tourism practices through initiatives like the Vienna Meeting Fund, which helps attract high-profile events and congresses, positioning Vienna as a leading hub for cultural exchanges and corporate meetings.  By providing valuable resources and information, the Vienna Tourist Board ensures that visitors have a memorable experience while exploring the city's renowned museums, historic sites, culinary delights, and vibrant events. Through innovative marketing strategies and partnerships, it seeks to connect tourists with the authentic essence of Vienna, making it a must-visit destination on the global tourism map. The board's efforts contribute significantly to the local economy and foster international connections, ultimately enhancing the overall tourism landscape of Vienna.

Name: Esperia Group
Company description: Esperia Group has been established in the tourism industry since 1969 on the island of Rhodes with Esperia Hotel in Rhodes downtown. Esperia Group today owns ten hotels in Rhodes, six of which are located on the east coast of the island in Kallithea and four in Rhodes town. With dedication and flexibility to changing times and tourism needs and requirements ESPERIA HOTELS is developing in a modern tourism environment with a series of hotels each with different characters and identities that cater to all visitors of Rhodes in the best possible way. ESPERIA HOTELS facilities are constantly renovated, the services are always upgrading and the staff distinguishes for its kindness, and dedication to welcoming and hosting our  visitors. The philosophy of the company from its inception until today, features: -the pioneering investments -the flexibility and adaptation to the requirements of every tourist market -the promotion and enhancement of the local elements and products -the respect for people -the investment in local workforce -the emphasis on segregation and identity of each hotel unit -the pricing policy (value for money) The large number of repeat customers, the excellent relationships with major European tour operators, the awards and distinctions mark the recognition of the philosophy of Esperia Group from our customers and partners.

Name: Rome And Italy
Company description: Rome and Italy Group was born in 2007, and has now a main office in Rome and a branch office in Florence, but operates on whole Italian territory.  Rome and Italy offers a wide range of incoming services to travellers visiting Italy, proposing a huge selection of activities, great professionalism, years of experience in the field, and an exhaustive knowledge of the territory, together with the best price deals.  All services are tailored to customer satisfaction, reaching any target. You can create with us your personalized tour of Italy!  Rome and Italy Group is also the only italian Tour Operator specialized in ACCESSIBLE TOURISM in Italy, providing a wide range of selected services to help travellers with any disability, in visiting Italy with no barriers.   All the hotels, villas, tours, excursions and activities that we offer have been tested and certified by our professional Staff to always guarantee a total accessibility.  Further we rent equipment, and provide medical and technical assistance all around Italy. We are also involved into Wedding & Event sector, providing support to international Event Planners and couples, helping them realizing memorable experiences!

Name: Tour America
Company description: Tour America: Travel Agency of the Year - Irish Travel Industry Awards. Tour America, a 100% Irish owned travel company, is celebrating 28 years in business next October.  During this time we have seen many changes in our industry from online bookings to world tragedies. We are proud to have stood the test of time thanks to our extremely dedicated team of travel experts and you, our loyal customers.  Tour America started up in the Managing Director sitting room with a team of 3 and we currently employ 50. Tour America not only offers holidays to North America but also cruises throughout the world with our Cruise Holidays brand.   Our Mission Statement is very clear, To Have a Raving Fan Club, and our team are willing and able to exceed all your holiday expectations. Our Vision is to be different, and provide you, our customer, with new and unique ways to enjoy your holiday.  We are the only Tour Operator or Travel Agent that offers a 24 hour service to all our clients. We are licensed and bonded by the commission of aviation which protects all our customers.  We are a member of the ITAA (the Irish Travel Agent Association).  Tour America have won Deloitte's Best Managed Company for the 12th consecutive year and in January 2021, our marketing team scooped up two prestigious marketing awards at the Irish Travel Industry Awards 2019, for Best Bricks and Mortar Marketing Campaign and Best Digital Marketing Campaign. Mary McKenna also scooped the TAB Excellence in Business Award 2019. This success follows on from a very successful previous few years.  Tour America is licensed by the Commission for Aviation Regulation, TA 0443.

Name: Carr Golf
Company description: The experts in the business of golf. Legendary in Irish golfing circles, the Carr family has been welcoming golf travellers to Ireland and Scotland for over 60 years. In 2019 Carr Golf celebrates 30 years in play. The business continues to show growth in the area of golf club management, course maintenance and advisory services, acquiring numerous contracts of well-respected golf clubs in 2018 and will continue to do so. Luxury travel and events golf tour operator, widely known for "creating unique experiences and memories for life", Carr Golf were proud to be awarded Golf Digest's Editors' Choice for "Best Tour Operator 2017". Carr Golf are proud partners of Met PGA, NEPGA, IGTOA, IAGTOA, Travel Leaders and Donald Ross Sportswear.

Name: Voltereta
Company description: Todo comenzó con un gran viaje por el mundo que hicimos con las mochilas y mucha ilusión. Quisimos convertir nuestra pasión en nuestra forma de vida, por lo que trabajamos mucho para conseguir poder viajar a través de la experiencia de venir a Voltereta.  Nos dicen que somos  un restaurante, una selva en medio de la ciudad, una agencia de viajes… y el realidad somos una fusión de todo. Queremos que todos hagáis este viaje con nosotros, que viváis una montaña rusa de emociones desde el momento que entráis por la puerta.

Name: Hansea
Company description: Hansea is een Belgische groep actief in het personenvervoer in Vlaanderen en Wallonië met DWS als aandeelhouder.  Iedere dag staan onze bedrijven met hun 1.270 medewerkers en hun moderne vloot van 830 voertuigen garant voor kwalitatieve dienstverlening binnen de openbare busdiensten (De Lijn / TEC), het school - en fabrieksvervoer en autocarreizen. Alle bedrijven hebben openbare busdiensten voor De Lijn of TEC als basisactiviteit.  Bij Heidebloem (Lanaken), Autocars De Polder (Antwerpen), De Duinen (Herentals) en Autobus & Autocars Georges (Antoing) kan je ook terecht voor een kwalitatief aanbod aan autocarreizen en voor het boeken van een vakantie in het reisbureau.

Name: DETUR GROUP
Company description: 20 years ago, Detur was established as a local travel agency in Turkey. Even in its early days, Detur adopted a strong customer-oriented approach, underlining “genuine hospitality and dedicated service.” Throughout the years, Detur continuously invested in this philosophy and ensured full customer satisfaction with the help of its skilled human resources. In 1998, just five years after its establishment, Detur started branching out of Turkey into Europe and rapidly developed a sought-after name for itself as Detur International as a growing tour operater. Pretty soon, Tunisia, Egypt and Thailand were added to its ever growing list of destinations. Today, Detur is a world class agency, serving proudly as a leading tour operator, in Northers Europe like Finland, Norway, Sweden and Denmark as well as in Austria. Detur is also an Destination Management Company in his own Destinations from Turkey to Tunisia, from Egypt to Thailand and nowadays further in Greece, serving all own source markets.

Name: Vega Tour
Company description: Vega Tour Group is family owned and includes an extensive portfolio of services from tourism and transportation to travel agency, bus lines, renting cars and leasing. Coach transportation started as the initial point and still is Vega Tour’s main domain, but as the firm continued expanding, we have started to offer more and more services from other areas. The company was founded in 1991 and currently belongs to the top European coach operators providing reliable and high quality services to clients from all over the world. By operating more than 150 luxurious coaches, mini-coaches and limousines all over Europe places us among the most significant players in this field.

Name: Kel 12 Tour Operator
Company description: Kel 12 Tour Operator is a distinguished travel company based in Turin, Italy, specializing in curated travel experiences that emphasize cultural immersion and personal discovery. The company aims to transform travel into an art form, offering unique itineraries led by expert tour leaders for small groups or tailored individual journeys. With a focus on sustainability and ethical travel practices, Kel 12 fosters meaningful connections between travelers and the diverse cultures they encounter. Its clientele includes discerning travelers seeking authentic experiences, while partnerships with local experts enhance the depth and quality of each journey. The company’s mission is to inspire exploration and understanding of the world, making every trip a memorable adventure.

Name: BUBO Travel Agency
Company description: BUBO Travel Agency is a leisure, travel & tourism company based in Bratislava, Slovakia

Name: Valpi
HQ Location: Portugal, Paredes, 256 Av. Joaquim Ribeiro Da Mota, 4585-166
Company description: A Valpi, sociedade gestora de participações, emprega atualmente cerca de 400 colaboradores distribuidos pelas seguintes empresas: Valpi Bus - Transporta anualmente cerca de 12,5 Milhões de passageiros, designadamente em transporte regular (urbano e interurbano) nas áreas dos Concelhos do Porto, Penafiel, Valongo, Paredes, Lousada, Amarante e Matosinhos, em transporte ocasional (aluguer) nacional e internacional. Valpi Rent - Solução rent-a-car com numa rede nacional de estações distribuídas por 40 concelhos e 10 distritos para entrega e recolha de viaturas. Soluções flexíveis adaptadas a todas as necessidades: uso pessoal, viagem em família ou necessidade empresarial. Valpi Travel - Uma agência de viagens com oferta global de serviços, desde aviação ao alojamento hoteleiro, aluguer de automóveis e viagens de autocarro, passando também pelos pacotes turísticos e organização de viagens próprias. Britafiel - É uma referência de inovação e qualidade no sector da industria extrativa. Sendo reconhecida como uma das principais alternativas ao fornecimento de agregados e rochas ornamentais de granito, marcando presença nas principais obras nacionais e multinacionais. Bioport - A Bioport dedica a sua actividade industrial à produção de biocombustível desde o ano de 2009. Localizada a norte de Portugal, no parque empresarial de Paredes, tem actualmente uma capacidade de produção anual de 35.500 m3.  A Valpi tem como missão o mérito e o empenho. O nosso objetivo é criar as condições para que todos os que ingressam nos nossos projetos se possam realizar individualmente, contribuindo para um futuro comum cada vez melhor. Trabalho, Ambição e Honestidade, estes são os valores da Valpi. Valores que nos acompanham desde sempre.

Name: Estravel Group
Company description: ESTRAVEL is the largest, oldest and most trusted travel agency in the Baltic States. The company’s most important values are reliability and responsibility. Estravel offers the best travel solutions with high-quality customer service for private and business clients. Thanks to our experienced employees and large network of partners, and our memberships in global groups such as American Express GBT, we are able to fulfill the most complex travel wishes. Be it an exotic holiday in a jungle, or a tight-schedule business trip, Estravel consultants ensure that all the objectives are met without a hitch. We offer all kinds of support from the planning phase of a trip to the time the client returns home. Our 24/7 professional call centre assists with existing and new bookings around the clock. Estravel sells airline tickets, hotel accommodation, holiday packages, cruises, ferry and rail tickets, travel insurance and bus and car rental services. In addition to outgoing trips Estravel is also involved in inbound tourism (DMC) and selling trips to the Baltic States and Scandinavia. We organise conferences, incentive travel trips, seminars and other events. Estravel has a total five representations in four Estonian towns, a 24/7 operating Call Centre, a representation in Latvia and subsidiaries in Lithuania, Australia, Finland and USA. Estravel is the largest tourism services employer in Estonia, employing ca 200 people.  From 1995 to 2015, Estravel was majority owned by Finnair Plc, but since January 2016, the company is 100% privately held again.  See more about our international group at www.estravelgroup.com

Name: Puzzle Travel
HQ Location: Cyprus, Ammochostos, Bölgesi, No 23 Gülseren Yolu Cahit Sıtkı Tarancı Sok.
Company description: When it comes to traveling, Puzzle Travel is your key partner in North Cyprus. For conferences or holidays, in North Cyprus, Puzzle Travel should be your choice of travel planner. We offer comprehensive services of organising meetings, journeys, accommodations and holidays to our customers.  Our MICE department will take full responsibility of organising your congresses, meetings and general events. We offer flexible, customer-oriented services, catering for the individual needs of attendees from the very beginning to the end of an event. Our experience in the business is profound, we have organized more than a thousand conferences till date;  it would be our pleasure to take the responsibility of arranging yours too! For a personalised holiday experience in North Cyprus, our FIT department is more than happy to provide you with all you may need, including the offer of an opportunity to discover the spectacular beaches, historical places, unspoiled nature, quality hotels and bright casinos of Northern Cyprus. Among Puzzle Travel’s wide range of holiday products and services, you will definitely find one that suits your preference finely.

Name: PANGEA The Travel Store
Company description: PANGEA The Travel Store is a premier travel agency dedicated to crafting personalized travel experiences for adventurers and culture enthusiasts alike. With a mission to inspire and facilitate unique journeys, PANGEA offers a diverse range of travel options, including adventure, wellness, gastronomy, and cultural experiences across numerous global destinations such as Alaska, Australia, and Spain. The company caters to a wide array of clients, from families seeking memorable vacations to couples looking for romantic getaways, and collaborates with various partners to enhance the travel experience. PANGEA's vision is to create unforgettable memories through tailored travel solutions, ensuring that every journey is as unique as the traveler.

Name: Ask2Travel
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Athens, 188 Syggrou Avenue Info@ask2travel.com
Company description: Ask2Travel  is based in Greece and operating worldwide. Ask2Travel operates a dedicated Corporate Travel division specialized in providing high-value, customized travel solutions to organizations, corporate clients and shipping companies Our activities are focused on sectors of Business Travel, Online Travel Agency, B2B Consolidation, Yachts Chartering and Top Notch Travelers Services. Take a fresh look at your Business Travel.

Name: Albatravel
Company description: Albatravel is part of Worldwide Hotel Link Group and it is a European tour operator leader in the B2B market. With the assistance of our worldwide offices we provide the best service and assistance to more than 20,000 travel agencies registered on our platform albatravel.com with a a clear B2B strategy. Our mission is the distribution of the best tourist services (hotels, flights, trains, escorted tours, sightseeing, transfer) at the most competitive rates, using high and modern technologies. Our in-house technology allows all our content to be easily available via our platform, with the same simplicity and convenience that has always distinguished us. We look forward to a bright future ahead. Our values are our advanced and reliable technology, high profitability, a commercial flexibility and a 24/7 customer support service.

Name: TUI Belgium
Company description: TUI Belgium is market leader in Belgium for the organized travel industry. Annually, more than 2 million passengers choose to travel with TUI. We offer a wide range of holiday possibilities: from short trips in Belgium to an extensive world tour of several months. Together with TUI Netherlands, TUI Belgium forms the cluster TUI Benelux. Both countries are responsible for their own market, but collaborate closely in many parts of their business and benefit from the joint scale. At TUI, our travelers play a central role. They choose how they get in touch with us and we guarantee to fulfill our promise to receive them, across all channels, with a smile. We have an extensive network of travel agencies and partners. We are also at their service by email, phone, website, social media or through our own TUI app.

Name: Iway
Company description: i’way provides transfer service in 670 airports worldwide. We’re able to organize individual and group transfers as well as we could take all transportation solutions for global events. What differentiates us:  •	Meeting with signboard  •	Any type of vehicles •	Free waiting in case of flight delay •	Fixed prices •	24/7 live support •	High-level service Every day we organize approximately 2500 trips. i'way invites for cooperation: Ticket offices, Travel agencies, Hotel reservation services, Online booking systems, Travel management companies, Corporations Government departments, Airlines, Hotel chains, Independent travelers. Our online booking engine www.iway.io is available for API integration. Easy online booking, comfort and safety trip, that's i'way service! Contact us   London +44 20 3318 0444 info@iway.io

Name: Anatolia Hospitality
Company description: "Anatolia Hospitality" is a Greek family owned company with a stellar reputation drawing on the extensive experience & know-how of three generations. Having started in the hotel business in Komotini, Greece, in 1930, the Chrysochoidis family has grown a successful brand that owns two city hotels, villas and luxury apartments in Cyclades and Ionian Sea and an incoming travel agency ASIT. The aim of the group is development through new management contracts, the creation of a network of franchises and new owned or leased hotels or villas. Whether you are new to the hospitality business and want to acquire a property, or thinking of rebranding your existing hotel we will assist you every step of the way.  Anatolia Hospitality follows the philosophy developed by the experience & passion of years to create a new concept in Greek hospitality with trend-setting concepts, chic design elements combined with signature service and personalized hospitality. We would like to welcome you to discover our new philosophy and be part of our successful winning team.

Name: Soltour
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, 31 Gremi Velluters, 07009
Company description: Nacido en 1975 como primera unidad de negocio del Grupo Piñero, somos el turoperador independiente líder de España y Portugal en el segmento de sol y playa que entiende la personalización y la cercanía en su grado máximo: como la creación conjunta del viaje con agencias y clientes. Velamos porque una vivencia que empieza en la imaginación acabe en los mejores recuerdos. Hemos ido evolucionando hasta conformar en nuestra estructura de trabajo una oferta turística integrada y completa, contando con aprox. 12.700 puntos de venta y 200.000 viajeros al año.

Name: SATUR Travel
Company description: Najväčšia slovenská cestovná kancelária s dlhoročnou tradíciou, s ktorou každoročne do 130 krajín sveta a kedykoľvek počas celého roka cestuje viac ako 90 000 spokojných klientov. V rámci produktového portfólia ponúkame pobytové a poznávacie zájazdy v Európe aj exotike, rodinné dovolenky, okružné plavby, lyžovačky, wellness pobyty a pod značkou Exclusive by SATUR aj pobyty pre náročnejšiu klientelu. Našim klientom sme k dispozícii prostredníctvom siete 45 pobočiek po celom Slovensku. The largest Slovak tour operator relying on many years’ tradition and seeing off 90,000 satisfied clients to more than 130 countries all over the globe each year. Its product portfolio includes resort packages and excursion tours all over Europe and to more exotic destinations, family vacations, cruises, skiing packages, wellness packages; packages offered under the ‘Exclusive’ mark are targeted to a more demanding clientele. Satur Travel is the leading travel agency in Slovakia. Its history can be tracked back to the year 1920 what confirm a long term tradition on tourism market.

Name: TravelTrex GmbH
Company description: Company TravelTrex GmbH was founded in 1999 in Cologne and initially specialized in the sale of ski holidays with the trading name SnowTrex. In the space of a few years, the company rose within the segment to become the largest tour operator in Germany. Since 2005, SnowTrex holidays have also been sold internationally. After a successful entry on to the Polish market, the French and English markets followed. SnowTrex holidays are now avai- lable in 15 languages. Consequently TravelTrex now belongs to the leading international tour operators selling winter sports holidays. Since 2007, the company has also marketed summer holidays under the trading name HolidayTrex. Starting with the Alps, in the meantime many other regions, including for instance the regions along the North Sea, Baltic Sea and Mediterranean coasts are now bookable. Attractive city trips round off our offer. In the following year 11/12, over 106,000 guests spent their holiday with TravelTrex.

Name: Anchersen A/S
Company description: Welcome to Anchersen! Anchersen is one of the most versatile and flexible coach companies in Denmark. Our primary aim is to deliver high-quality transportation where security and service is the main focus. We are a company that is continuously on the move and from that perspective we find ourselves in the position to always solve any specific needs. There is over 30 years of experience and know-how in the field of transportation at Anchersens - and we cooperate with several bus companies in Europe, which helps us provide the best service to our customers. We can solve any task - from an individual short transportation to a multi-day trip abroad or larger transportation needs in connection with events. We have coaches in all sizes and for all purposes, including conference and VIP-buses. We operate from our garage, which is located centrally in Copenhagen, and provide services for private arrangements, companies, travel agencies, institutions and schools. In the case of specific needs, we customize our services to fit the best optimal solution for you. Coach service from Anchersen is not just transportation from A to B - it is a travel experience based on the best service! WE MAKE A DIFFERENCE!

Name: Panavision Tours
Company description: Panavision Tours is a dynamic travel agency dedicated to crafting unforgettable travel experiences for clients eager to embark on adventures and immerse themselves in diverse cultures. The company operates with a mission to provide exceptional service and tailor-made itineraries, ensuring that each journey is uniquely suited to the individual needs of its travelers. By connecting clients with some of the world's most captivating destinations, Panavision Tours aims to inspire wanderlust and facilitate memorable journeys. To achieve its goals, Panavision Tours partners with a variety of high-quality hotels, including prestigious establishments like the Sheraton Cairo Hotel & Casino, as well as transportation services and local guides. This extensive network allows the company to offer seamless travel experiences that prioritize quality and customer satisfaction. The target market for Panavision Tours encompasses both leisure and business travelers, including individuals, families, and corporate clients seeking personalized travel solutions that integrate accommodations, activities, and transportation. By focusing on innovative travel options and a commitment to customer satisfaction, Panavision Tours strives to position itself as a leader in the travel industry. The company’s dedication to creating unique and memorable experiences sets it apart, making it a preferred choice for those looking to explore the world in a meaningful way.

Name: Travel Ways
Company description: Travel Ways is a personalized travel consultancy dedicated to transforming vacation planning into a tailored experience that comes directly to your home. With over 25 years of expertise, the company specializes in creating both classic package holidays and bespoke travel experiences that cater to individual preferences, whether they involve wellness, culture, adventure, or relaxation. The mission of Travel Ways is to provide clients with a "more of an experience" by meticulously planning trips that reflect their unique tastes and desires. The company prides itself on its commitment to exceptional service, ensuring that every detail is handled with care and precision. Travel Ways serves a diverse clientele, including families, couples, and solo travelers, and collaborates with various partners to offer a wide range of travel options. Its target market includes those seeking personalized travel solutions that go beyond standard offerings, making every journey unforgettable.

Name: GiraMondo Viaggi
Company description: Based in Verona - Italy, GiraMondo Viaggi is the largest Italian franchising of retail travel agencies. Everyday we choose, train and assist entrepreneurs with their GiraMondo agencies all united under our brand. On May 9th 2019 we proudly celebrated our 40 year anniversary.

Name: Matkapojat Oy
Company description: ENG: Travel company and tour operator with over 40 years of experience of selling travel experiences.  FIN: Matkapojat on Suomen suurin laiva- ja lähialuematkojen myyjä ja matkanjärjestäjä. Kauttamme matkustaa yli 250 000 tyytyväistä matkustajaa joka vuosi. Matkapojilla on myös laaja lentopohjainen tuotanto Eurooppaan ja kaukokohteisiin.  Myös kokousmatkat helposti ja vaivattomasti yhdellä soitolla kauttamme! Pyydä tarjous: 010 2323 440

Name: CK FISCHER
HQ Location: Czech Republic, Hlavní Město Praha, 2390 Babákova, 14800
Company description: FISCHER is one of the biggest and most popular tour operators on the Czech market. Every year they satisfy the wishes of more than 130,000 customers. Clients especially appreciate the high quality service, guaranteed standard of accommodation in hotels, reliability and the personal touch when planning a holiday. In 2011 CK FISCHER and tour operator Nev-Dama (a specialist in winter ski holidays in the Central European region) merged into the travel group FISCHER. This is now the biggest travel group in the Czech Republic and its services are used by more than 250,000 customers. The yearly turnover of the group has reached 3 billion CZK. In 2012, a third business brand, Privileq, was launched to organize tailor made luxury holidays. Additionally, the internet travel agency eTravel.cz, one of the biggest e-commerce sites in the Czech market, joined the group. Travel group FISCHER is part of KKCG’s financial and investment portfolio.

Name: Go World
HQ Location: Italy, The Marches, Ancona, 22 Via Canale, 60125
Company description: Go World è un gruppo di 5 tour operator specializzati nell'organizzazione di viaggi in tutti i continenti del mondo: Go Afrique, Go America, Go Asia, Go Australia e Go Pacific.  Vacanze di lusso, viaggi individuali e di gruppo, viaggi di nozze, itinerari culturali e spiagge indimenticabili. Grazie all’esperienza decennale del nostro team siamo in grado di soddisfare le esigenze di ogni tipo di viaggiatore. Con noi puoi scoprire il mondo inseguendo le tue passioni con i nostri cluster Go Biker, Go Scuba, Go Surf, Go Horse, Go Trekking, Go 4 All, Go to Fish e Io Viaggio con Dio.    Crea con noi il tuo viaggio su misura e scopri il tuo mondo senza confini!

Name: Travelplan.gr
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Athens, 17 Vrana & Katechaki Streets, 115 25
Company description: travelplan.gr is one of the most modern Tour Operators in Greece with on-line services & the largest retail network, with branches in Athens & Thessaloniki. WORLDWIDE TOUR OPERATOR - ACTIVITIES: - All Travel & Tourism Arrangements - Incoming & Outgoing Tours & Services - Quality Tailor made organized Individual (For Independent Travellers-FIT) & Group Travel - Air/Boat Ticketing - Hotel Reservations - Cruises - Car Hire - Business Travel - Incentives Congress & Events BRIEF HISTORY Travel Plan is one of the most modern Tour Operators in Greece, founded in 1981 by Lambrakis Press SA, the largest Media Business Group in the country. Since October 2000, that seceded from Lambrakis Press, operates under the name EUROSTAR SA as a company of tourist activities, which holds the management of the travel agency Travel Plan and uses today the trademark travelplan.gr. In 2009 Mr George Daskalakis With Mr Restis Victor bought 49% of Eurostar, Mr Restis Victor in 2011 bought again 36% , and in 2014 the 99% of the company is bough from Global Investment Tourism in Dubai and Mr Daskalakis George resigned from the position of President & CEO of Eurostar’s group / Travel Plan . Selected travel agent in Greece for: CLUB MED, SILVERSEA CRUISES, SEA CLOUD CRUISES, LUFTNER CRUISES, THE YACHTS OF SEABURN Sales distributor for: REGENT SEVEN SEAS CRUISES & DISNEY CRUISE LINE EOT License: 0206E61000088400

Name: Voyages Flammang
Company description: Voyages Flammang is a travel company specializing in creating unique and memorable travel experiences, particularly in destinations like the United States and Greece. The company aims to provide exceptional service and personalized travel solutions, ensuring that every detail is taken care of for a stress-free journey. Voyages Flammang offers a variety of travel packages, including road trips, cultural tours, and adventure holidays, catering to diverse client needs and preferences. Their target market includes travelers seeking both all-inclusive and à la carte options, with a focus on providing peace of mind through comprehensive support before, during, and after their trips. With a commitment to local expertise and flexibility, Voyages Flammang partners with various service providers to enhance the travel experience for their clients.

Name: Itur Natura Cultura Turismo
HQ Location: Italy, Piedmont, Mondovì, 1 Via San Lorenzo, 12084
Company description: Dal 2011 Itur progetta, gestisce e promuove l'accoglienza sul territorio italiano. Itur gestisce in outsourcing uffici turistici, beni culturali, musei, teatri e cinema, occupandosi anche di tutte le attività collaterali e di supporto, direttamente o grazie a partnership strategiche. All'interno delle proprie attività gestionali Itur offre servizi all inclusive di fornitura personale e componenti tecniche e tecnologiche. Itur è inoltre titolare di licenza di Tour Operator. L’azienda aderisce alla rete di imprese DE.DE – Destination Design.

Name: Coral Touristik GmbH
Company description: Coral Touristik GmbH, formerly known as Ferien Touristik GmbH, is a leading dynamic tour operator in Germany with over 20 years of experience in the travel industry. Since the summer of 2018, the company has offered classic package tours under the brand "Coral Travel," providing customers with user-friendly options for booking. As part of the Coral Travel Group, which has successfully sent over 30 million travelers on vacation from 22 countries, Coral Touristik operates through more than 6,000 travel agencies and was recognized in 2021 as one of the top five large tour operators for best travel agency service at the Globus Award. The company aims to be a trusted partner for clients seeking memorable vacation experiences, offering a wide range of travel options, including renowned hotel brands like Xanadu and OTIUM Hotels. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and a focus on delivering exceptional service, Coral Touristik continues to thrive in the competitive tourism market.

Name: Emma Villas SpA
HQ Location: Italy, Siena, Chiusi, Zona P.a.i.p. Localita Le Biffe
Company description: Emma Villas SpA engages in the provision of vacation rental of villas, farmhouses, and luxury homes. The company is headquartered in Chiusi, Siena and currently employs 47 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2023-09-29. Emma Villas is a tour operator firm active in weekly tourist rentals of prestigious villas and farmhouses with private pools, to which it combines the offer of additional products and services to the stay. All properties are exclusively marketed and managed by Emma Villas. The firm operates exclusive properties with a widespread presence in Italy. The Business Model is focused on the exclusive management of a portfolio of prestigious properties bookable by users with immediate confirmation directly from the Company’s own website. The Group’s organizational model can be divided into the following activities: marketing and communication; acquisition of exclusive management contracts (acquisition of the properties and management of the relationships with the hosts); sales channels; ordinary and extraordinary management; and customer service.

Name: Aurinkomatkat
Company description: Aurinkomatkat offers inspirational package tours to Finns who are quality-conscious and value convenience. Our passion, combined with 60 years of experience, guarantees certainty, reliability and unique expertise. And that makes us Finland’s most appreciated travel companion. We create moments that live on. Aurinkomatkat Oy - Suntours Ltd was established in 1963. As a part of Finnair Group, Aurinkomatkat operates in Finland.  Aurinkomatkat has made Finnish holiday dreams come true for 60 years already. As the biggest and most trusted Finnish tour operator and the most sustainable travel brand in Finland we want to serve our clients with solutions to all holiday travelling needs.  // Aurinkomatkat tarjoaa elämyksellisiä valmismatkoja laatutietoisille ja vaivattomuutta arvostaville suomalaisille. Intohimomme yhdistettynä 60 vuoden kokemukseen takaa varmuuden, luotettavuuden ja ainutlaatuisen osaamisen, mikä tekee meistä Suomen arvostetuimman matkakumppanin. Olemme myös Suomen vastuullisin matkailubrändi. Luomme hetkiä, jotka jäävät elämään.  Suomalainen Oy Aurinkomatkat - Suntours Ltd Ab on perustettu vuonna 1963, ja se kuuluu Finnair-konserniin. Aurinkomatkan voi varata vaivattomasti verkkokaupasta tai puhelimitse myyntipalvelusta. Aurinkomatkojen tuote- ja palveluvalikoimaan kuuluvat mm. Aurinkomatka-paketit ja omatoimiset Kaupunkilomat.

Name: VIAJES PARA TI S.L.
Company description: ¡Hola! Somos Viajes Para Ti S.L.U, una agencia de viajes especializada en la venta on-line, propietaria de las marcas Esquiades.com y BuscoUnChollo.com. ¿Sabías que Esquiades.com es la marca líder en la venta de packs de esquí y deportes de aventura en España y que BuscoUnChollo.com es web pionera en la venta flash de paquetes turísticos en España? Además de estas marcas, recientemente hemos lanzado un nuevo proyecto de buscador de hoteles: www.amimir.com Actualmente, somos un equipo formado por 84 empleados que trabajan a diario en diferentes departamentos distribuidos entre las oficinas de Reus y Andorra.  Viajes Para Ti S.L.U se caracteriza por la pasión por los viajes y el turismo, y eso, sumado a nuestra amplia experiencia en el sector, nos hace esforzarnos todavía más en conseguir publicar las mejores ofertas de viajes y paquetes de esquí para nuestros clientes.  Si compartes nuestra pasión y eres una persona dinámica, creativa y con ganas de aprender, ¡éste es tu sitio! ¿Quieres unirte a nuestro equipo? Escríbenos a personal@viajesparati.com ¡Te esperamos!

Name: Aktina Travel Group
Company description: Aktina Travel was founded in 1975 by Panagiotis and Claire Zerzivilis. Being prominent figures in the Greek tourism industry, they managed to establish Aktina Travel as the leading travel organization in Greece. By capitalizing on the expertise and the hard work of its personnel, Aktina Travel grew into AKTINA TRAVEL GROUP, incorporating a number of affiliates and subsidiaries and offering a wide spectrum of tourism services. We use  our leadership position in air travel so our partners can respectively benefit from the opportunities that arise and take advantage of the innovative technological solutions we provide. The assurance of this mutually beneficial cooperation is a commitment for us.  The best hotel deals are also offered through Aktina Travel Pro. By using our state of the art booking platform one can have access to the best hotel rates and benefit from the most extended availability while offering the best service to his clients. All activities are supported through the headquarters as well as the company’s two branch offices, one in Maroussi and one in Athens International Airport. It is worth mentioned that Aktina Travel Group is the only travel agency with presence at the Athens International Airport (Eleftherios Venizelos). Moreover, Aktina Travel Group participates in several other companies in the tourism sector.

Name: ABSOLUT Sport
Company description: With extensive expertise in managing and delivering unforgettable sports travel experiences at the world’s biggest sporting events, ABSOLUT Sport is a leading full-service agency providing hospitality and tourism services with more than 15 years of experience. Based in Frankfurt/Darmstadt, Rio de Janeiro, and Los Angeles, ABSOLUT Sport is made of different talented professionals sharing an unstoppable power to create unique sports travel experiences to suit the needs and requirements of sponsors, their agencies, corporate clients, tour operators, federations, media clients, as well as individual guests and passionate fans worldwide. Some of our Highlights! - Official Travel Package Partner for CONMEBOL Copa America 2024™ - Official Travel Package Partner for CONMEBOL Libertadores™ and CONMEBOL Sudamericana™ Finals - Official Tour Operator for FIFA 2010 World Cup in South Africa - Official Distributor of Tickets & Travel Packages for FIFA Women's World Cup Germany 2011 - Largest Transfer Solution Provider during EURO 2012 in Poland & Ukraine - Exclusive Partner for Sponsors, Media, and International Tour Operators during EURO 2012 - Exclusive Supervision of Logistics for Media and Fan Groups from Various Countries during FIFA Confederations Cup 2013 - Accommodation Brokerage for FIFA World Cup 2014 in Brazil for High-End VIP Clients, including Leading 5-star Hotels in Host Cities - Conception and implementation of Transfer Logistics Solutions for International Media Clients, Sponsors, and Tour Operators during FIFA World Cup 2014 & Rio Olympic Games 2016 - Authorized German Agent of On Location Experiences, Official NFL Hospitality for Super Bowl Connect with us to explore how we can elevate your sports event experiences to unparalleled heights. Let ABSOLUT Sport be your trusted partner in all international sports events.

Name: Carrani Tours
Company description: Carrani Tours, established in 1925, is a leading destination management company in Italy, renowned for providing high-quality, tailor-made travel experiences that cater to the diverse needs of both B2B and B2C clients. With a mission to deliver authentic and personalized journeys, Carrani Tours emphasizes the importance of Italy's rich cultural and natural heritage, ensuring that every traveler enjoys unique and memorable experiences. The company has successfully transported over 318,000 passengers through its Open Bus service and managed more than 110,000 travelers in 2024 alone, showcasing its extensive reach and expertise in the tourism sector. Carrani Tours partners with tour operators and travel agencies worldwide, offering customized itineraries for individuals and groups, including premium travel options. Guided by a passionate team of travel experts, Carrani Tours is committed to maintaining high standards of service and fostering trustful relationships with its partners, making it a reliable choice for those seeking to explore the wonders of Italy.

Name: Tallink Silja Line Sverige
Company description: Tallink Silja Line Sverige is a leading passenger shipping company operating in the Baltic Sea region, specializing in high-quality minicruises and transportation services between Estonia, Finland, Sweden, Latvia, Lithuania, and Germany. As a subsidiary of AS Tallink Grupp, the company is dedicated to enhancing regional connectivity and promoting tourism through its extensive ferry and cruise operations. With a mission to bring people closer together, Tallink Silja Line emphasizes sustainability and exceptional service, ensuring that every journey is not just about reaching a destination but creating lasting memories for its passengers. The company operates a modern fleet of 14 vessels, providing a range of services that include overnight cruises, passenger transport, and ro-ro cargo services. Tallink Silja Line caters to a diverse clientele, including leisure travelers, business professionals, and families, offering a variety of onboard experiences such as dining, shopping, and entertainment. The company also manages several hotels and restaurants, further enhancing the travel experience for its customers. Tallink Silja Line Sverige is committed to sustainability and aims to minimize its environmental impact through innovative practices and compliance with international regulations. The company actively engages in environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives, reflecting its dedication to corporate social responsibility. It collaborates with various partners, including travel agencies, local businesses, and tourism boards, to create a comprehensive travel ecosystem that benefits both customers and the broader community. With a successful loyalty program, Club One, boasting over 3.4 million members, Tallink Silja Line reinforces its commitment to customer satisfaction. The company targets environmentally conscious consumers and aims to integrate innovative technologies and sustainable practices into its operations. By prioritizing safety, efficiency, and enjoyable travel options, Tallink Silja Line Sverige strives to be synonymous with quality, reliability, and innovation in the maritime industry, making it the preferred choice for ferry and cruise services in the Baltic Sea region.

Name: Otravo
Company description: Otravo is a leading European online travel organization. With our brands we enable travelers in over 50 countries to enjoy saving money while booking their flight tickets and holiday packages. We work closely with our partners like airlines, tour operators, hotels, car rentals, insurance companies etc. This way we guarantee our customers a complete and competitive offer. We make the shopping and booking process as easy, quick and enjoyable as possible. And with success: we process over 3 million reservations per year.  Otravo was established at the start of 2014 by the merger of Vliegtickets and WTC and added Schipholtickets to its brands in December 2015. In February 2016 Waterland Private Equity took a majority shareholding in the company, with the objective to become a leading European Online Travel Agency through the combination of internal growth and acquisitions. This led to the acquisitions of Flygstolen (Nordics) in July 2016, VakantieDiscounter (Benelux, Packages) in February 2017 and Interneto Partneris (Baltics) in October 2017. In May 2018 Travelgenio was added, which means Otravo now sells over 3 million trips/holidays per year, generating close to 2 billion EUR in gross Sales.

Name: Reykjavik Excursions
Company description: Reykjavik Excursions is a fully licensed travel agent & tour operator in Iceland, offering day tours & guided trips around Iceland. Book a tour with us online!

Name: Uniglobe Robins Travel
HQ Location: Belgium, Flanders, Kontich, 7 C Prins Boudewijnlaan, 2550
Company description: Since 1994, Robins Travel has grown to a well known professional travel agency in the Antwerp area with over 25 professional and motivated employees.  Our services are unlimited: flight tickets, hotel reservations, car rental, incentives, guided group travel, cruises, city trips and leisure travel. Robins Travel is a part of the Uniglobe Travel Group, an international travel organization which offers a personal and high standard service. Professionalism and loyalty to our clients are our main concern. Robins Travel has been specializing in business travel management. We engage ourselves to long term partnerships with our clients and try to find them the best travel solutions and savings.  The complete travel procedure from price offer to invoice is arranged by one person… your own personal travel assistant.  Our services are not limited to flight tickets alone. We take care of your train tickets, as well as your hotel and car rental reservations, local transfers and visa application. Thanks to our professional business consultants and the latest technologies, we are able to realize savings up to 20% of your travel expenses. Interested? Do not hesitate to contact us, our sales representatives are happy to tell you more about our high standard services and are able to show you how to cut down your travel expenses.  Robins Travel: your travel partner !

Name: Alessandro Rosso Group
Company description: Alessandro Rosso Group acts as a point of reference for all Expo Milano around the world and offers special accommodation packages, tours, events including entrance tickets. Over the years, Alessandro Rosso Group expanded its core business and it is now  leader in MICE and Tourism markets also thanks to the latest acquisitions  of the tour operator Best Tour Italia and Unique, company leader in designing, construction an set up of  fair pavilions. Alessandro Rosso Group was founded in 2002 by a group of professionals with 30years experience in the incentive travel market. Today it is a market leader with more than 20 group companies, offering diversified products and services: from incentive travel to team-building events, from conferences to communication projects, from event organization to medical-scientific congresses.     Alessandro Rosso Group has transformed its products and services into solutions designed to satisfy the needs of modern business, providing clients with qualified and specific professional, financial-business, strategic and organizational tools. It has achieved this by structuring its operations through the acquisition of Italian and international companies that specialize in each of the services proposed, and by innovating its core business, which in turn has enabled the Group to diversify its target market. The Group’s globalization process has further sharpened its competitive edge. Know-how, diversification, innovation, and the competitiveness of a major Group combined with style and passion, never forgetting that each client is unique, make Alessandro Rosso Group the Marketing Global Partner, associated to: ASSI GEP Global Events Partners IATA ICCA MPI SITE ISO 9001:2008 Certified

Name: VAYAMUNDO
Company description: In the heart of Ostend lies a special oasis of comfort and pleasure: Vayamundo. You wake up to the soothing sound of the sea and the feel of sand under your feet as soon as you step out the door. At our holiday club, you will be immersed in a world of convenience and luxury. Designed with attention to detail, our comfortable hotel rooms and flats offer a home away from home. The buffet restaurants with drinks all-in offer lots of goodies on your plate. The lounge bars with panoramic views of the North Sea are a feast for the eyes and the many sights in bustling Ostend are definitely worth a visit. Families will also appreciate the child-friendly facilities and activities where beach and sea on our doorstep is a big plus. On holiday with the association or group, a meeting or seminar with the company? We have everything you need for a successful stay!

Name: Berg-Hansen Reisebureau AS
Company description: Berg-Hansen Reisebureau AS is a leading travel agency in Norway, specializing in providing comprehensive travel solutions for both corporate and individual clients. The company is committed to maintaining the highest standards of information security and privacy, as evidenced by its ISO 9001 certification and adherence to GDPR regulations. Berg-Hansen offers a range of services, including online booking for flights, hotels, and transportation, as well as tailored travel experiences that highlight Norway's stunning landscapes and rich cultural heritage. Their target market includes businesses seeking to organize corporate travel and events, as well as individuals looking for unique travel experiences. With a focus on continuous improvement and robust security practices, Berg-Hansen ensures that client data is protected while delivering exceptional travel services. The company collaborates with various partners to enhance its offerings, including local hotels and activity providers, ensuring memorable experiences for its clients.

Name: AMResorts Europa
Company description: AMResorts Europa is a premier hospitality company that specializes in luxury all-inclusive resorts across various stunning destinations, including Mexico, the Caribbean, and Europe. As part of the Hyatt Inclusive Collection, AMResorts is dedicated to providing exceptional vacation experiences that combine comfort, elegance, and personalized service. The company's mission is to create unforgettable memories for guests while promoting sustainable tourism practices and community engagement. With a diverse portfolio of brands such as Secrets, Dreams, and Zoëtry, AMResorts offers unique atmospheres and amenities tailored to different preferences, catering primarily to leisure travelers, including couples, families, and groups. The company envisions a world where every traveler can indulge in luxurious escapes that cater to their individual needs, whether for romantic getaways, family vacations, or wellness retreats. AMResorts partners with travel agencies and tour operators to enhance accessibility and reach a broader audience, ensuring that discerning travelers seeking relaxation and adventure can easily find their ideal vacation. The company emphasizes the art of fine dining through its signature restaurant, Teodoro, which offers a unique seven-course culinary journey that highlights local and global ingredients. In addition to providing high-quality offerings, AMResorts Europa is committed to enhancing the guest experience by partnering with local communities and businesses to offer a variety of events and activities, such as cultural festivals and eco-friendly initiatives. Targeting travelers who seek luxurious, hassle-free vacations in breathtaking beachfront locations, AMResorts Europa positions itself as a leader in the all-inclusive resort market. Through its commitment to excellence and community engagement, the company aims to enhance the tourism landscape while ensuring a safe and enjoyable environment for all visitors.

Name: Bytetravel
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Sant Cugat Del Vallès, 15-25 Local 30 Avenida Via Augusta, 08174
Company description: ByteTravel S.A. is a TravelTech company dedicated to creating auxiliary services (ancillaries) for tourism and business travelers. We work closely with travel agencies, airlines, cruise companies and tour operators through our affiliation program, access to backend or API connection. Our offices are located in Sant Cugat del Vallés (Barcelona), Madrid and Miami   Our first service, VISAGOV, processes online visas for more than 70 destinations across the globe: https://www.linkedin.com/company/visagov/

Name: Trotta Bus Services S.p.A.
Company description: Da oltre 50 anni Trotta è tra i leader nel territorio della Capitale per quanto riguarda il settore del noleggio di pullman gran turismo.  La nostra esperienza nel settore, è in grado di garantire al cliente il trasporto ideale per ogni diversa esigenza di viaggio. Collaboriamo con i più grandi Tour Operator nazionali ed internazionali per l’organizzazione di servizi turistici in Italia e in Europa.Forti di un ricco parco automezzi, siamo il punto di riferimento per importanti aziende organizzatrici di congressi e grandi eventi. Ci occupiamo da sempre anche di trasporto scolastico e di pellegrinaggi verso le maggiori località interessate dal turismo religioso, in Italia e all’estero, sia per organizzazioni che per privati.  Operiamo anche nel trasporto pubblico in numerose città d'Italia.

Name: Gruppo Filo Diretto
Company description: IL GRUPPO FILO DIRETTO è attivo dal 1987 e offre soluzioni assicurative e servizi alla persona in 4 aree di bisogno: turismo e viaggi, auto, salute, casa e assistenza. Tutte le proposte del Gruppo sono pensate per il singolo individuo e i suoi bisogni in termini di protezione, sicurezza e comodità. L’offerta di Filo diretto viene erogata in modalità sia diretta (B2C) sia B2B o B2B2C, tramite Aziende, Enti, Istituzioni finanziarie, Fondi, Tour Operator e Agenzie Viaggi e, per la parte assicurativa, anche attraverso consolidati rapporti con i più importanti broker nazionali e una rete di quasi seicento partner sul territorio.  La filosofia del Gruppo Filo diretto è di proporsi come problem solver garantendo interventi e prestazioni tempestive, 24 ore su 24, 7 giorni su 7, in Italia e nel mondo. Grazie alla sua capacità organizzativa , all’esperienza consolidata in ambito nazionale e internazionale e alla professionalità dei suoi collaboratori, Filo diretto è stato il primo gruppo assicurativo italiano ad aver ottenuto la certificazione UNI EN ISO 9001 estesa a tutti i processi e a tutte le sue Società ed è oggi certificato ISO 9001:2008.  Fanno parte del Gruppo Filo diretto: Filo diretto S.p.A., Filo diretto Assicurazioni SpA, Ami Assistance SpA, Filo diretto Service SpA, Filo diretto World Care SpA  e Filo diretto Onlus FILO DIRETTO ONLUS  Dal 2002 è operativa Filo diretto Onlus, la società senza fini di lucro del Gruppo Filo diretto, che promuove e finanzia progetti e iniziative in ambito sociale, dedicandosi in particolare ai bambini in difficoltà, alle loro famiglie e alle persone anziane. Per la grande partecipazione emotiva dello staff e dei volontari, il motto che anima da sempre Filo diretto Onlus è “Insieme per un sorriso!” Per maggiori informazioni www.filodirettoonlus.org

Name: Abreu Online
Company description: Abreu online is part of Grupo Viagens Abreu S.A., was founded in 2003 and is one of the leading e-wholesalers in Europe. Abreu online has established a strong reputation for providing our clients with excellent value for money, the highest standard of service, creative technology and flexible credit facilities. We are recognised as being a fast, innovative and flexible company within the industry. Abreu online serves over 185 000 hotels and land arrangements worldwide, spread over 120 countries and over 4 900 locations. We are allied with more than 8,500 tour operators and travel agencies across the world. It's an online booking platform of hotels and services, exclusively for travel agents, operators and various sales solutions available for B2B and B2C channels. Don't need to pay any registration fee or sales commission. It's free! It's a "User Friendly" system, which offers its partners the most advanced XML technology, enabling online search engines holders, integrate all of our inventory.

Name: Lusanova
Company description: Lusanova is a travel company specializing in curated tours and travel experiences across various global destinations, including Europe, Africa, North America, Central America, South America, Asia, the Middle East, and Oceania. The company offers a diverse range of products, such as European circuits, city breaks, and family-friendly vacations, with a focus on providing unique travel experiences that cater to different interests and preferences. Lusanova's mission is to create memorable journeys for its clients, ensuring that each trip is enriched with cultural insights and local experiences. The company primarily serves travel agencies and individual travelers, with a target market that includes families, couples seeking romantic getaways, and adventure seekers. Through partnerships with hotels and local guides, Lusanova aims to deliver high-quality services and unforgettable travel experiences.

Name: Paralela 45
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, 29-31 Regina Elisabeta Bd, 020586
Company description: Paralela 45 is today the strongest brand among romanian travel agencies. With more than 25 years of experience we are the most prolific tour-operator from romanian market.  From charters, travel tours, airfare, bookings, lodging, board to guided tours with tour leaders conversant in international languages (from Italian to Japanese) as well as Romanian, all the details can be arranged expediously and economically by our company.

Name: Hospiten
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Santa Cruz De Tenerife
Company description: Hospiten is a healthcare company with over 50 years of experience, dedicated to improving health and well-being across five countries, including Spain, the Dominican Republic, Mexico, Jamaica, and Panama. The company's mission is to create a wellness ecosystem centered around individuals, empowering patients to take charge of their health through personalized care and innovative solutions. With a team of over 7,000 professionals, Hospiten emphasizes collaboration, empathy, and a forward-looking approach to healthcare, ensuring high-quality services that meet the evolving needs of patients. The company serves a diverse clientele, including individual patients, insurance companies, hotels, and tour operators, providing 24/7 medical assistance through its Clinic Assist network and various hospital specialties. Committed to continuous improvement and technological advancement, Hospiten aims to redefine healthcare experiences while maintaining a strong family-oriented culture.

Name: Demy Schandeler
Company description: Demy Schandeler is a premier transportation company specializing in providing luxurious travel experiences through its fleet of state-of-the-art Setra buses. With a mission to deliver comfort, style, and cutting-edge technology, the company aims to enhance every journey, whether for weekend getaways, business trips, or long-distance adventures. Their latest additions include a stunning double-decker bus and two travel coaches, all designed with ergonomic seating, advanced climate control, and top-tier safety features, ensuring a seamless travel experience for passengers. Demy Schandeler caters to a diverse clientele, including corporate groups, tour operators, and leisure travelers, and is committed to making a positive impact through community initiatives. With 75 years of service, the company continues to prioritize customer satisfaction and innovative travel solutions.

Name: Kras
Company description: Kras is a prominent travel company that specializes in providing a wide range of holiday packages and travel services to its clients. With a mission to enhance the travel experience, Kras focuses on delivering personalized offers and improving user engagement through advanced technology and analytics. The company caters to a diverse clientele, including families, couples, and solo travelers, offering tailored solutions that meet their unique travel needs. Kras collaborates with various partners in the travel industry to ensure high-quality services and memorable experiences for its customers. The target market includes individuals seeking both leisure and adventure travel, with an emphasis on creating lasting memories through exceptional service and support.

Name: Avventure Nel Mondo
Company description: Avventure nel Mondo is a travel agency based in Rome, specializing in the organization of unique and adventurous travel experiences across a diverse range of global destinations. The company offers a wide array of itineraries that cater to various interests, including adventure discovery for young adults, family trekking, diving, and cultural exploration. With a mission to promote responsible and sustainable tourism, Avventure nel Mondo encourages travelers to immerse themselves in different cultures and engage in authentic experiences. Their target market includes families, groups of friends, and adventure enthusiasts of all ages, seeking to explore the world in an engaging and interactive manner. The agency's extensive portfolio features trips to regions such as Africa, Asia, the Americas, the Middle East, and Oceania, ensuring that there is something for everyone. Avventure nel Mondo collaborates with a network of partners, including local accommodations and operators, to provide high-quality services and memorable experiences for their clients. The company is dedicated to creating a positive impact in the communities they visit, working alongside local associations and volunteer organizations. By offering flexible itineraries that adapt to the interests and rhythms of participants, Avventure nel Mondo aims to deliver not just vacations, but transformative life adventures that foster a deeper understanding of the cultures and environments explored.

Name: Troll.is
Company description: Troll.is is a spirited and adventurous tour operator based in Iceland, where the rugged, quirky, and unpolished Icelandic spirit comes to life. Our tours are more than just trips—they’re playgrounds for adventurers seeking unforgettable experiences.   From hiking across majestic glaciers and diving between two continents to chasing the magical Northern Lights and exploring iconic destinations like the Golden Circle, every journey with Troll.is embraces the fun, unpredictability, and occasional rough edges of true adventure.   With expert guides, small group tours, and a deep respect for nature, we deliver safe, personalized, and thrilling adventures that reflect Iceland’s raw beauty. Join the Troll family and let’s create legendary memories together!

Name: FIRO-tour.cz
Company description: Cestovní kancelář FIRO-tour působí na českém trhu od roku 1990, z právní formy fyzické osoby se v roce 2004 transformovala na akciovou společnost. Jedná se o českou společnost, která je zároveň jednou z největších cestovních kanceláří v České republice. Významné zastoupení má FIRO-tour také na Slovensku.

Name: Last Minute Tour
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 10 Bastioni Di Porta Volta, 20121
Company description: Entra nel fantastico mondo del turismo. Apri la tua agenzia e vendi viaggi in tutto il mondo a fianco del LEADER del mercato del turismo in Italia : il gruppo UVET con oltre 2 mld di euro di fatturato nel 2014. Last Minute Tour nasce nel 1995. L'idea di business, innovativa nel panorama italiano, fu quella di proporsi ai Tour Operator come canale di recupero dei pacchetti vacanza rimasti invenduti, consentendone la commercializzazione a partire da 15 giorni data partenza : il viaggio LAST  MINUTE. Settembre 2006 : parte il progetto di apertura delle agenzie sul territorio con la formula dell'associazione in partecipazione. Settembre  2014 : Last Minute Tour entra a far parte del gruppo UVET, il principale polo distributivo di servizi per il turismo nato 64 anni fa in Italia. Uvet viaggi e turismo fu fondata a Milano nel 1950 da Francesco Patanè, padre dell'attuale presidente Luca Patanè.  In quegli anni  inizia la propria crescita dimensionale che la farà diventare uno dei principali player nel settore dei viaggi d'affari, degli eventi, dei servizi e delle vacanze in Italia e in Europa con circa 800 dipendenti.

Name: WorldTours
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Naples, 7 Via Cavone Degli Sbirri
Company description: Worldtours is an incoming tour operator based in Naples, Italy. Our company specializes in a wide range of services: from airport transfers to private tours, from daily group tours to boat excursions, from helicopter rides to private chauffeur services for dinners and special events. Our main destinations are: Pompeii, Herculaneum, the Amalfi Coast, Sorrento, Capri, and Naples.

Name: MEITU TRAVEL MILAN
Company description: TOURISM AND EXPO SERVICES ACCOMMODATION An expert team, will take care of  choosing and booking the best solutions for  everything you need in the accommodation field. Any kind of hotel for your visit in Italy! TRANSPORTATION SOLUTIONS We think about you for everything you may need: starting from the flight  from home to Italy, a ride on a Vespa or Limousine tour, a huge choice of solutions to make your visit to Italy unforgettable .  FOOD & BEVERAGE Exclusive locations or very rustic taverns: the Italian taste is available for you at  the best restaurants.
