"Gourmet quality" is our motto for our best customers: eat good eat healthy,  eat Italian! EVENTS PLANNING We are event planners, and we enjoy doing it. That's why we try to do it as best we can. Gala dinners, company parties or any other kind of event: we want you and  your clients to be sadisfied! GUIDES & ASSISTANCE We look only for the best in the guide and assistance field: our staff know how  to translate a place into pure emotion. Tour guides, stewards, hostesses, chauffeurs: tell us what you need, we easily  arrange it! MeiTu International Travel Company is acting major global airline flights, cheap airline tickets sold in Europe, Italian and European train's tickets, the world's best travel packages and pre-cost global star hotel (MeiTu global hotel Protocol)! MeiTu is the 2015 Milan Expo official ticket office, providing domestic and overseas group travel, private travel customization, Travel Insurance, Rental Transportation  (5 places car to various bus), charge d'affaires States Visa, Tourist route planning, Business reception, Show translation services, Business planning and other Activities related to Tourism services. PLEASE VISIT OUR WEBSITE: WWW.MEITU-TRAVEL.COM TEL：0039 - 02 87391267 Facebook/skype: meitutravel    E-mail: info@meitu-travel.it             TOUR OPERATOR: to@meitu-travel.it ADDRESS: VIA FARINI 38/A, 20159 MILAN - ITALY

Name: Benerail
Company description: Our mission? benerail makes it possible to easily book international train travel through Europe. No more manually trying to piece together international train trips. Via our unique API platform, we make the booking process simple, accessible, stress-free and crystal clear. How it works? Just type in your journey’s starting point located in “country A” and its destination in “country B”, and immediately be shown all possible train combination options – along with their total travel times and prices. The chosen option is then booked as one single ticket to be used throughout the whole journey. Basically, we do the work for you – to save you valuable time and money. Why partner with us? * increase client base by offering one international train travel platform * incredibly user-friendly API platform, with integrated functionality for scheduling, inventory management, pricing, distribution and ticketing * instant access to multiple European railway carriers and their destinations * content from various railway carriers and inventory systems combined for seamless comparison and booking * access to a standardized solution When the national railway companies from Belgium and the Netherlands in 2003 decided to start a joint venture to combine and integrate their strengths to make booking and travelling easier, benerail was born. Going outside comfort zones is the core of collaborating on mutual terms; for the benefit of travellers in Europe that embark on a cross country journey with a single ticket. Now, nearly two decades later, benerail is ready to connect all European destinations with the ambition to deliver climate-neutral travel in the 'flight shame zone' under 800 km. Topics that are related to the business of benerail: climate-neutral travel, green transportation, railway ticket technology, travel management companies, travel agencies, self booking tools, online booking tools, eco-friendly travel, OSDM, ETCD, multimodal travel, trains, railway undertakings.

Name: Viyatravel
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Sofia-capital, Sofia, 80 Akad. Stefan Mladenov
Company description: Founded in 2009, Viyatravel has been a trailblazer in the travel industry, curating extraordinary experiences across the Balkans, Europe, and Turkey. Our passion for travel extends beyond borders, and our commitment to excellence has made us a trusted name in the world of tourism. With offices strategically located in multiple countries, we've become a global presence, connecting cultures and creating memories for over 100,000 tourists each year. At Viyatravel, we pride ourselves on our meticulous planning, attention to detail, and a team dedicated to ensuring every journey is nothing short of spectacular. Why Choose Viyatravel? Unparalleled Expertise: Over a decade of expertise in crafting seamless travel experiences. Diverse Destinations: From the enchanting Balkans to the heart of Europe and the allure of Turkey. Global Presence: Offices in multiple countries, ensuring personalized support wherever you go. Tour Operator of Choice: Preferred partner for numerous agencies, providing top-notch service. Embark on a journey with Viyatravel, where every destination becomes a story, and every experience is a chapter in your travel tale. Let's explore the world together! Connect with us for travel inspiration, industry insights, and updates on our exciting ventures. Feel free to reach out for collaborations or to share your travel dreams - we're here to turn them into reality!  #Viyatravel #TravelExcellence #ExploreWithUs

Name: Adriatic.hr
Company description: Adriatic.hr, founded in the year 2000 and based in Split (Croatia), is one of the leading Croatian travel agencies providing online holiday rentals booking services. With more than 16,000 accommodation units all along the Croatian coast, Adriatic.hr's website has became the starting point when planning holiday in Croatia. Successful relationship with our clients and business partners is based on continual enrichment of our offer, improvement of the website features and quality of the service we are providing. Our team is consisted of young educated professionals highly motivated to learn, work hard and give their best in exciting industries of internet technologies and tourism.  That's why we consider that company today is a rightful holder of its motto "The shortest way to the Adriatic".

Name: Golf Plaisir
Company description: Golf Plaisir is the leading golf tour operator on the Nordic market. Founded in 1992 and part of the DER Tour Travel Group since 2017. Revenue now exceeds EUR 28 million with over 18 000 clients from Sweden, Denmark, Norway and Finland. Within the Golf Plaisir group we also have the brand Out Of Bounds that specializes in tailor-made golf trips and Pro Tours by Golf Plaisir, specializing in groups travelling with their own golfpro.

Name: Gruppo Mancinelli
Company description: Gruppo Mancinelli dal 1965 è leader in Italia come fornitore di alimenti e bevande per la ristorazione, pasticceria, gelateria e panificazione. Il Gruppo è costituito da tre aziende: Mancinelli S.p.A., Dipral s.r.l. e ILPA s.r.l. Con le sue 6000 referenze e i 43 brand creati, la società si è arricchita di una sempre maggiore versatilità incontrando e soddisfacendo ogni tipo di richiesta di mercato, divenendo il più importante distributore nel settore pasticceria, panificazione e gelateria. Ristorazione, catene alberghiere, compagnie aeree e tour operator hanno trovato in Dipral s.r.l. un partner specializzato e all'avanguardia per la scelta di articoli semilavorati e finiti, freschi e surgelati.  La Mancinelli S.p.A. importa e distribuisce materie prime da tutto il mondo, selezionando con cura ed esperienza prodotti da offrire a una rete di clienti in continua espansione.  La ILPA s.r.l. completa nella totalità la gamma di prodotti offerta occupandosi della realizzazione di miscele ad hoc per bakery and pastry. Il Gruppo ha varcato i confini nazionali, rivelandosi partner ideale anche nell'export attraverso il servizio groupage, l’approvvigionamento di prodotti opportunamente studiati per ogni Paese e la personalizzazione della produzione in base alle esigenze del cliente tramite le private Label. L’azienda difende e sostiene la competenza professionale. Contribuisce alla promozione della cultura del mestiere attraverso la formazione gratuita e continuativa dei propri clienti. I corsi si realizzano all'interno dei laboratori presenti in ogni sede e con la collaborazione dei migliori maestri pasticceri, panificatori e maître chocolatier internazionali, così da fornire un aggiornamento all'avanguardia e di respiro internazionale. Grazie ai livelli di eccellenza garantiti nel servizio, nella produzione e nella selezione dell’offerta, il brand Gruppo Mancinelli si attesta come leader nel settore, onorando il suo principio di qualità totale senza compromessi.

Name: BOREALIS DMC
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Copenhagen, 10 Ground Hauser Plads, 1127
Company description: Borealis DMC – Abercrombie & Kent Nordics is a leading regional DMC & Incoming Tour Operator in the 𝗡𝗼𝗿𝗱𝗶𝗰 & 𝗔𝗿𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝗘𝘂𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗲. As part of the 𝗔𝗯𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗿𝗼𝗺𝗯𝗶𝗲 & 𝗞𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝘃𝗲𝗹 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽, we combine global excellence with deeply rooted local expertise to deliver exceptional travel experiences. Our operations span a vast geographical area comprising 𝗜𝗰𝗲𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱, 𝗡𝗼𝗿𝘄𝗮𝘆, 𝗦𝘄𝗲𝗱𝗲𝗻, 𝗗𝗲𝗻𝗺𝗮𝗿𝗸, 𝗚𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗻𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱, 𝗙𝗮𝗿𝗼𝗲 𝗜𝘀𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗙𝗶𝗻𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱, serving the 𝗟𝗲𝗶𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝗖𝗿𝘂𝗶𝘀𝗲, 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗠𝗜𝗖𝗘 segments. We are your 𝗼𝗻𝗲-𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗽 𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗻𝗲𝗿 for hotel bookings, FIT packages, groups, series & charters, guaranteed small group journeys & MICE Alongside one of the region’s largest FIT departments, we pride ourselves on a highly creative team designing leisure and 𝗠𝗜𝗖𝗘 programs that are recognized worldwide by leading incentive houses. With full-service operations across the Nordic countries in our teams of highly skilled professionals ensures seamless delivery and innovative travel solutions across the Arctic & Nordic region. Welcome to the World of Borealis - A&K Nordics !

Name: GrandVoyage
Company description: GrandVoyage es una agencia de viajes online líder en España, especializada en ofrecer experiencias de viaje personalizadas a más de 30,000 viajeros en 70 destinos a lo largo de 4 continentes. La misión de la empresa es redefinir la experiencia de viaje mediante un enfoque integral que incluye asesoramiento personalizado, organización de traslados y actividades, así como la colaboración con guías locales expertos. Su visión se centra en la innovación y la digitalización del sector turístico, lo que se refleja en su podcast "TravelTech by GrandVoyage", donde se discuten las últimas tendencias tecnológicas en viajes. La empresa trabaja con una amplia gama de clientes, desde turistas individuales hasta grupos, y se asocia con diversas plataformas y expertos en la industria para ofrecer un servicio de alta calidad. Su mercado objetivo incluye viajeros que buscan experiencias únicas y enriquecedoras, así como aquellos interesados en la tecnología aplicada al turismo.

Name: Azemar Spa
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 3 Via Averardo Buschi, 20131
Company description: Azemar è un Tour Operator Italiano con oltre 30 anni di esperienza in viaggi nell'Oceano Indiano e località esclusive come Maldive, Sri Lanka, Dubai, Zanzibar, Tanzania, Mauritius e Seychelles.  La nostra passione è l’Oceano Indiano, che conosciamo ed amiamo profondamente da oltre 30 anni.  Per noi è un piacere, oltre che un dovere, mettere a disposizione dei nostri clienti, viaggiatori curiosi, le esperienze che custodiamo e con trasporto condividiamo per rendere ogni vacanza un viaggio straordinario. Viaggiare con Azemar significa imparare a conoscere il mondo, i popoli che lo abitano, le loro abitudini e i costumi, assaporare nuovi gusti, a volte sconosciuti, e ogni esperienza riuscirà ad arricchire l’anima e lo spirito di chi la vive. La nostra professionalità è a completa disposizione per costruire insieme il viaggio che ognuno desidera, perché ogni viaggio sia unico ed indimenticabile come i nostri clienti.

Name: Tensi Kft
Company description: Tensi  is a limited liability company founded in 1983 as the first private travel agency in Hungary. The company was established with the purpose of organizing tennis and ski courses now is one of the most capital-intensive and dynamic tour operator in the Hungarian travel market, which offers uniquely comprehensive service package for individuals, groups and business clients.

Name: The Travel Company
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Athens, 3 Karagiorgi Str. N. Iraklio, 14121
Company description: The Travel Company is a member of the Heraklio Travel Group of Companies that was established in 1981 developing the entire range of tourist services.  Having high levels of growth in the tourism sector over the last 35 years, our Group is currently ranked in the leading tourism companies in Greece, based on the BSP turnover. The Travel Company, founded in early 2014, aims to become one of the most modern travel agencies in Greece in terms of tourism. The executives that make up the administration of the Organization, have had a leading position in the travel and airline sectors of the tourism industry. Based on their high theoretical training, expertise and experience, our executives are one of the key success factors and an important asset for the operation, the quality of the project, the objectives and the company’s perspective. The Travel Company has an extensive experience in managing local and international clients and corporate accounts. Our executives, with their experience and expertise, provide integrated services, competitive solutions and prompt operation in order to achieve the best possible budget. Our company offers services availability on a 24-hour basis. Registration number: 0206E60000350901

Name: Riccardo Sanges & C.
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Trapani, 19 Via Libica Primo Piano Int.1, 91100
Company description: La società Riccardo Sanges & c. è stata fondata nel 1929.  Da quella data Riccardo Sanges & c. esercita la propria attività d’impresa nel territorio nazionale e internazionale. Riccardo Sanges & c. S.r.l. svolge oggi fondamentalmente due tipi di attività d’impresa.  Una commerciale riguardante il commercio degli idrocarburi ed una industriale e di servizi legata all’industria marittima, portuale e dei trasporti. Più nel dettaglio con riferimento all’attività commerciale Riccardo Sanges & c. è concessionaria “Eni gas gpl” per le provincie di Trapani ed Agrigento ed anche concessionaria “ENI fuel” con la gestione diretta di 5 impianti nel porto e nella città di Trapani. Con riferimento invece all’attività industriale e di servizi Riccardo Sanges & c. è impresa portuale autorizzata (terminal operator) per lo sbarco, imbarco e movimentazione di merci nei porti di Trapani e Mazara del Vallo. Riccardo Sanges & c., inoltre, sin dal 1929 esercita l’attività di agenzia marittima, broker marittimo, spedizioniere e doganalista con ormai una consolidata presenza in tutti i porti del territorio nazionale. Infine attraverso l’insegna “Panfalone viaggi”, Riccardo Sanges & c. dal 1990 opera con l’attività di agenzia di viaggi e turismo e di tour operator. Nell’ambito di queste ultime attività d’impresa, recentemente si è acquisita un’interessante specializzazione nelle escursioni riguardanti le navi crociere.

Name: Airtours Sverige AB
Company description: Airtours är Sveriges fjärde största researrangör och vi har som mål att växa och bli en ännu starkare researrangör tillsammans med Sunweb. Vi är specialiserade på sol- och badcharter till Medelhavet. Vi väljer noggrant ut alla våra hotell och flyger med välrenommerade flygbolag för din trygghet. Med oss får du de bästa förutsättningarna för en lyckad resa!

Name: Directia Travel
Company description: En Directia Travel, somos un turoperador online especializado en viajes de larga distancia a Asia.  Nos enorgullece contar con un equipo joven y dinámico compuesto por más de 30 especialistas, cuyo compromiso consiste en hacer realidad los sueños de más de 5.000 viajeros cada año. Desde nuestro inicio en 2015, nos hemos posicionado como líderes en la oferta de destinos asiáticos para el mercado español, con oficinas en España y Argentina. Como una agencia de viajes online líder en innovación tecnológica, estamos capacitados para ofrecer un asesoramiento personalizado y una experiencia de viaje inigualable, todo ello con la mejor relación calidad-precio.

Name: ÖGER TOURS
Company description: Der Reiseveranstalter ÖGER TOURS ist einer der führenden Spezialisten für Türkei- und Orientreisen im deutschsprachigen Raum. Der Name ÖGER steht damit seit über 50 Jahren für Qualität zu fairen Preisen und eine hohe Zielgebietskompetenz. ÖGER TOURS hat in seiner über 50jährigen Firmengeschichte immer wieder Pioniergeist bewiesen. Mitte der 80er Jahre machte der Veranstalter das Urlaubsland Türkei, und dort vor allem die türkische Riviera, in Deutschland einem großen Publikum bekannt. In seinem ersten Türkeikatalog präsentierte ÖGER TOURS Badereisen nach Alanya, an die Lykische Küste und ein Rundreisen-Programm mit Istanbul-Schwerpunkt. Zu Beginn der 1990er Jahre folgten erste Orientkataloge mit Reiseländern wie Ägypten und Marokko. ÖGER TOURS ist eine Marke der ANEX Tour GmbH.

Name: Voyages Léonard
Company description: Voyages Léonard is a travel agency dedicated to providing exceptional travel experiences across Belgium, France, and Luxembourg. With a focus on personalized service, the company aims to connect clients with their ideal travel destinations through a network of conveniently located agencies. Voyages Léonard's mission is to make travel accessible and enjoyable for everyone, offering tailored solutions for both individual travelers and groups. The agency serves a diverse clientele, including families, schools, and corporate groups, and collaborates with various partners to enhance its service offerings. By leveraging an interactive map feature, clients can easily find and contact their nearest agency, ensuring a seamless travel planning experience.

Name: Canarias.com
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Adeje, 14 Avenida De Bruselas, 38660
Company description: With over 130 employees the Canarias.com Group centers its activities in the touristic industry covering almost every possible service to its B2C and B2B customers. We count with: 1.- An state of the art  car rental car fleet of around 1000 vehicles (small, medium, high end, SUV, 4x4, manual and automatic transmission)    2.- A modern fleet of high end sedans, limousines and luxury minibuses and vans for transfers and VIP excursions within Tenerife 3.- An Online Travel Agency powered by a proprietary booking engine with XML interfaces with over 25 suppliers selling hotels, touristic packages and flights to over 35,000 custumers per year. Integrating over 60 thousand hotels worldwide  4.- An Incoming Service in Tenerife that can handle any MICE event from the very beginning and back to the plane gate  5.- An IT team that supports our websites and continously works in improving and launching new products and website versions. 6.- a network of some 45 offices across Tenerife (mostly in 4 and 5 star hotels and premium locations) selling our products and services and 3rd party excursions, shows, etc (we are number 2 seller for Loro Parque Worldwide) These are some of our websites    https://www.Canarias.com http://www.Tenerife.com  http://rentacar.canarias.com http://www.Viajar.net http://www.Tuhotel.com  http://www.LimusinasTenerife.com http://www.NizaRent.com http://www.TenerifeCar.com http://www.TenerifeCarhire.com http://www.Aquaclubtermal.com

Name: Giver
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Genoa, 15r Via Anton Maria Maragliano, 16121
Company description: Giver Viaggi e Crociere è il tour operator leader in Italia per crociere fluviali in Europa e viaggi in Scandinavia, Finlandia e Islanda. Fondata a Genova nel 1949, nel 1967 inizia l’attività di tour operating programmando, per i successivi 30 anni, crociere full charter nei mari Mediterraneo, Baltico e del Nord. Nei primi anni ’90 raggiunge una posizione di leadership assoluta in Italia per la destinazione Scandinavia, Finlandia e Islanda. Nel 2002 Giver Viaggi e Crociere inizia un percorso che la porterà ad un altro primato italiano. Con la programmazione di crociere fluviali tra San Pietroburgo e Mosca lungo La Via degli Zar alle quali, nel corso degli anni, si sono aggiunte le rotte su grandi fiumi europei quali Danubio, Reno, Douro, Rodano e Elba, Giver Viaggi e Crociere diventa leader in Italia per le crociere fluviali in Europa. Giver Viaggi e Crociere, unica in Italia, opera con successo programmazioni charter verso Rovaniemi, il villaggio di Babbo Natale, Bodø e Tromsø. Giver Viaggi e Crociere opera con successo una programmazione con destinazioni Canada, Stati Uniti d’America e Alaska. Giver Viaggi e Crociere è Agente Principale per l’Italia di Hurtigruten ASA – Il Postale dei Fiordi Norvegesi.

Name: Amadeus Polska
Company description: Travel powers progress. Amadeus powers travel.  Amadeus’ solutions connect travelers to the journeys they want, linking them via travel agents, search engines and tour operators to airlines, airports, hotels, cars and railways.  Technology has always been critical to developing global travel, increasing scale, choice and access. We have developed our technology in partnership with the travel industry for 30 years.  We combine a deep understanding of how people travel with the ability to design and deliver the most complex, trusted, and critical systems our customers need.

Name: Mistral Tour Internazionale SRL
Company description: Outgoing and incoming Tour Operator based in Turin, Italy. Main destinations are: Asia (Far East, India, Middle East) North Africa (Morocco, Egypt, Libya, Sudan, Ethiopia), Latin America (Mexico and Peru).

Name: Master Explorer
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Bari, 5 Via Prospero Petroni
Company description: Fondata nel 2001 come tour operator, Master Explorer ha rapidamente conquistato una posizione di rilievo nel settore turistico grazie alla sua dedizione all'innovazione e all'eccellenza nei servizi offerti. Oggi, l'azienda si distingue come uno dei principali fornitori di servizi online per il settore travel, rivolgendo la propria offerta sia al B2B trade che al corporate. Il successo di Master Explorer negli anni è stato amplificato dall'introduzione del portale "Prenotando", una piattaforma all'avanguardia che semplifica e ottimizza la gestione delle prenotazioni per i clienti business e leisure. Un portale che ha rivoluzionato il modo in cui li player del settore viaggi operano, offrendo soluzioni personalizzate e un'esperienza utente senza pari. Grazie a un team di esperti appassionati e competenti, Master Explorer continua a distinguersi sul mercato con innovazioni costanti forte di una visione strategica a lungo termine che consente all'azienda di fornire soluzioni efficaci e di valore, che rispondono alle esigenze in continua evoluzione del settore travel. Master Explorer rimane fedele alla sua missione iniziale di esplorare nuove frontiere nel turismo, mantenendo al contempo un forte legame con le proprie radici e valori fondamentali. Questa visione chiara e ben definita del Dott. Gaetano Catacchio continua a guidare l'azienda verso un futuro ricco di nuovi progetti e traguardi sfidanti.

Name: Benarrivati Travel Services
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 10 Via Cesare Fracassini, 00196
Company description: Benarrivati Travel Services is a Luxury Travel Company, born in Italy from the love and passion of its Founder, Antonella Giancoli.  With over 15 years of experience, we have built an extraordinary synergy with our customers, partners, and suppliers, achieving excellence in everything we do while valuing people and respecting the Italian culture and territory. With local teams in Italy, Greece, Portugal, and Africa, we bring unmatched insider expertise to every journey we design.  As a high-end tour operator, we specialize in tailor-made itineraries that go beyond expectations, crafted with precision, care, and a deep understanding of each destination. Experience the difference of journeys shaped by those who call these places home.  Discover the extraordinary — visit our website or contact us to plan your next adventure!

Name: SEL | Sport & Events Logistics
Company description: SEL - Sport & Events Logistics is a company specialized in logistics, travel & event management for sports. We provide project management for freight forwarding, customs operations, charters, travel agency, major event mobility and staff management. With our services we support Promoters, Sports Federations, Teams and manufacturers for their global travel and relocation, planning them down to the smallest detail leaving nothing to chance. SEL unites people of different ages, cultures and backgrounds, turning the work into a place where challenges are faced and celebrated together. Passion for sports knows no boundaries and inspires individuals to constantly pursue their best version, whether on the playing field or in everyday life. #WeMoveSport #WeMovePassion Logistics: Air Freight Ocean Freight Land Freight Customs Clearance ATA Carnet Warehousing & Distribution Cargo Charters Forklifts & Cranes On Site Coordination  Luxury Cars Handling Travel: Accommodation Flights Booking Transfers & Car Rental Passengers Charters On Site Assistance During the Event Event Management: Transportation Staff Management Events Set Ups Temporary Structures Hospitalities & Expo Trailers Special Services

Name: Reisebüro Schmidt GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Wolfenbüttel, 33 Halchtersche Str., 38300
Company description: Reisen, wie sie sein sollen – entspannt, herzlich und unvergesslich. Die Reisebüro Schmidt GmbH, der Busreiseveranstalter der DER SCHMIDT GRUPPE, steht für „Urlaub mit Herz“ in ganz Europa. Ob Sie Ruhe und Erholung suchen, Sonne, Strand und Meer genießen möchten oder lieber die Berge erkunden – bei uns finden Sie Ihre Traumreise. Im Süden, Osten, Norden oder Westen: Mit unseren Busreisen und Schiffreisen entdecken Sie die schönsten Regionen Europas bequem, komfortabel und bestens organisiert. Egal ob Kurztrip, Rundreise oder ein musikalisches Highlight wie ein Konzert in der Elbphilharmonie – wir bieten Ihnen Komfort von Anfang an. Unsere modernen, hervorragend ausgestatteten Reisebusse, erfahrene Fahrer und herzliche Reiseleitungen sorgen dafür, dass Sie sich rundum wohlfühlen. Selbstverständlich haben Sie auch die Möglichkeit bei uns Busse anzumieten. Mit Liebe zum Detail planen wir jede Reise: geprüfte Qualität, ausgewählte Hotels und abwechslungsreiche Ausflugsprogramme gehören bei uns zum Standard. Lehnen Sie sich zurück, lassen Sie sich inspirieren – und genießen Sie das gute Gefühl, rundum bestens betreut zu sein. Denn: Urlaub mit Herz ist für uns nicht nur ein Versprechen – es ist unsere Leidenschaft.

Name: Ticket Feriereiser AS
Company description: Ticket Feriereiser AS is the largest travel agency chain in the Nordic region, offering a comprehensive range of travel services through physical stores, phone sales, and online platforms. The company collaborates with leading charter companies, travel organizers, cruise lines, airlines, hotels, and car rental services, providing customers with access to over 400 travel options. With 68 stores across Norway and Sweden and online sales in ten countries under the brands Ticket, AirnGo, and Charter, Ticket aims to deliver exceptional travel experiences. Owned by the investment company Braganza, Ticket Feriereiser is committed to an omnichannel strategy that combines personalized service with the convenience of online booking. The company targets a diverse clientele, including families, young travelers, and adventure seekers, while continuously adapting to market trends and customer preferences.

Name: Malik Travel SL
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Calle De Bravo Murillo
Company description: Malik Travel provides travel agency services  for customers worldwide. Travellers speaking different languages can explore the website in their own native language and choose their favorite destinations to travel. Malik Travel is one of the Iberia region’s leading travel agencies. With us, customers can travel all over the world, regardless of whether they want a relaxing beachside holiday, or a weekend in an exciting major city. We arrange travel packages.  Malik Travel actively looks for sustainable travel and social responsibility.  Come and visit us at es.maliktravel.net

Name: Accent Travel & Events
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, 215 Șoseaua Mihai Bravu, 021323
Company description: Accent Travel & Events is a full-service travel agency based in Romania, with 22 years expertise in business travel. Since 2009, Accent Travel & Events is the exclusive partner in Romania of Egencia, the 4th largest travel management company in the world and part of Expedia, Inc., leader of the travel industry worldwide.  Accent Travel & Events is a Travel Management Company, providing business travel services to corporate clients, as well as a Destination Management Company for Romania, providing leisure services for groups, meetings and incentives. Strengths & Highlights of Accent Travel & Events: • Personalized service with dedicated team of travel consultants; • After-hours support service available 365 days and 24/7 emergency response; • Access to negotiated and other discounted rates for flight and hotel bookings; • Travel budget analysis and cost savings strategies; • Full transparency of the process with reporting; • Travel policy enforcement; • Visa and passport information services;  • VIP and MICE services; • Local Language and English support.

Name: De Buck Agency NV
Company description: De Buck Agency is made to move you. Een incentive reis, een internationaal congres, een conferentie, een seminarie of een spectaculair bedrijfsevenement: alle projecten die wij aanbieden zijn op maat gemaakt en afgestemd op al jouw wensen.  Bovendien opereert De Buck ook als tour operator bij shore excursions in België, Frankrijk en Nederland en werkt ons reisbureau zo hard als het kan om de wensen van onze klanten te vervullen.  Met meer dan 50 jaar ervaring binnen deze sectoren en met 25 gemotiveerde werknemers is De Buck al geruime tijd een vaste waarde. Wij onderscheiden ons door de jarenlange ervaring die we in het buitenland hebben opgedaan en onze samenwerking met lokale partners.  Geïnteresseerd in onze diensten? Dan kan je ons contacteren op het nummer +32 (0)9 385 46 46, een contactformulier invullen op onze website of eens binnenspringen op volgend adres: Steenweg 233a, 9810 Nazareth.  Neem zeker ook eens een kijkje op onze website om cases en uitgebreidere informatie terug te vinden!

Name: SAISTOURS S.R.L.
Company description: World Tourist Saistours, is a leading inbound Tour Operator, a sister company of the Group Interbus / Etna Trasporti Group. It has consolidated its image and its know-how in more than 45 years of experience, stating its role as "key-agent” for important Foreign Tour Operators, also leaders in their markets. Reliability and professionalism have enabled W.T. Saistours to become one of the leading Tour Operators in Italy, thanks to the considerable contribution of the network of our offices located in Rome (Lazio), Palermo and Taormina (Sicily), Alberobello (Apulia), Olbia (Sardinia), Riccione (Emilia Romagna). The strength of W.T. Saistours is the excellent balance between special rates and quality and the high standards of efficiency of its services. The W.T. Saistours is representative of the following associations: - Italian Association of Tour Operators (ASSOTOUR) - European Tour Operators Association (ETOA) - International Air Transport Association (IATA) - Club Italy by Italian State Tourist Board (ENIT) - Chamber of Commerce of Sicily The Incoming Department, managed by a multicultured team of very experienced staff and highly professional, organizes trips and stays for both individuals and groups for private customers or companies from different markets around the world. The deep knowledge of the territory allows us to offer a wide choice of interesting tourist services: cultural tours, archaeological tours, wine tours, theme tours, adventure tours, unusual turs for the most curious, cooking classes of regional cuisine, tastings of local products, golf, and relaxing stay for the sun-lovers. The MICE Department is specialized in organizing incentives, meetings, conferences and special events. It is managed by a specialized staff that boasts decades of experience and speaks many languages. We offer tailor made program for any need and desire of the clients. http://www.saistoursevents.com/

Name: Deutsches Reisebüro GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 6 Emil-von-behring-str., 60424
Company description: Das Deutsche Reisebüro (kurz: DER) ist ein Unternehmen der Touristikbranche mit Sitz in Frankfurt am Main. Gegründet als eigenständiges Unternehmen 1917 in Berlin (damals unter dem Namen MER für Mitteleuropäisches Reisebüro), gehört das DER seit 2000 zur Rewe Group und ist eines der führenden deutschen Touristikunternehmen. Die Veranstaltermarken Dertour (Eigenschreibweise DERTOUR), Meier’s Weltreisen und ADAC Reisen gehören zur DER. Zum Reisebürovertrieb gehören 766 Kettenreisebüros (DER Reisebüro, Atlasreisen, FCm Travel Solutions), über 560 Franchise-Nehmer (Derpart und Atlasreisen Franchise) und über 1500 rechtlich selbstständige Reisebüros (zusammengeschlossen in den Kooperationen TourContact, Deutscher Reisering, RCE/ProTours). Alle Reisebüros treten unter einem eigenen Namen auf. DER Reisebüros bieten das gesamte Sortiment der großen Reiseveranstalter an und reicht von Urlaubsreisen, Flug-, Schiff- und Bahntickets über individuell ausgearbeitete Reisen bis zu Eintrittskarten und Reiseversicherungen. Seit März 2013 fimiert die Deutsche Reisebüro GmbH unter DER Touristik GmbH.

Name: Tarannà Viajes Con Sentido
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 174 Calle Del Vallespir, 08014
Company description: Tarannà, Viajes con Sentido es una agencia de viajes con 30 años de experiencia. Estamos especializados en crear experiencias que van más allá del turismo convencional. Ofrecemos tanto viajes en grupo como viajes a medida, totalmente personalizados y diseñados para satisfacer los deseos y necesidades únicas de cada viajero y viajera.   En Tarannà, creemos que los viajes pueden ser mucho más que simples vacaciones. Nos esforzamos en promover viajes responsables que dejen un impacto positivo en las comunidades locales y ayuden en la preservación del medio ambiente.   Contamos con un equipo de profesionales que te escucharán para confeccionar y ofrecerte la mejor alternativa para disfrutar de tus vacaciones. Viajes de aventura, safaris, culturales,  fotográficos, de autor, viajes para novios... Ofrecemos una amplia variedad de viajes, tú eliges.   Viaja con Tarannà a cualquier parte del mundo con la seguridad de estar asesorado por un equipo experto que te brindará los mejores servicios en cada momento.

Name: Smartvel
Company description: Smartvel offers a complete suite of solutions to solve different needs along the customer journey, where the right content makes de difference. Our technology gathers, categorizes, translates, enriches and validates both destination content and requirements to travel (health requirements, travel documentation, visa). From museums, restaurants, city councils to official sources like IATA, government agencies and official bodies.  ✔️ Up-to-date information ✔️ Automatic checks process every hour ✔️ Alert if any change ✔️ Content updates ✔️ Manual quality checks Our destination content solution helps companies inspire their customers on what to do and see on the exact dates they are going to travel to that city. Travel guides, travel planners, calendars...the choice is yours! Smartvel's EntryDocs Solution helps take the stress out of travel by providing a one-stop information centre with everything the traveler needs: necessary documentation, visa information and application, health requirements (covid, other vaccinations, insurances...)  Our content can be used in many ways across the customer's journey: on your website, digital boarding passes, booking confirmation and pre-departure or pre-stay emails, app or to reduce your call centers inquiries. ✔️ 2-day implementation with limited internal resources ✔️ Adapted to your company's corporate image Visit us at www.smartvel.com

Name: TUI Spain
Company description: TUI Spain is a leading travel and tourism company that specializes in providing a comprehensive array of holiday packages, including flights, accommodations, and tours to various destinations worldwide. The company is dedicated to creating memorable travel experiences for its clients, with a mission to deliver exceptional customer service and innovative travel solutions. TUI Spain offers a wide range of services designed to cater to the diverse needs of its clientele, which includes families, couples, and solo travelers.  By collaborating with numerous partners in the hospitality and transportation sectors, TUI Spain enhances its offerings, ensuring that clients enjoy seamless and enjoyable vacations. The company places a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction and sustainable tourism, striving to be a trusted choice for travelers seeking both adventure and relaxation in popular destinations. TUI Spain's target market primarily consists of Spanish-speaking travelers who are looking for leisure and adventure in their holiday plans.  With a commitment to creating unforgettable memories, TUI Spain continues to innovate and adapt its services to meet the evolving needs of its clients, making it a prominent player in the travel industry. The company’s vision is to be recognized as a leader in providing personalized travel experiences that resonate with the desires and expectations of modern travelers.

Name: Explora Traveler
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, San Sebastián De Los Reyes, 10 Avda. Puente Cultural, 28702
Company description: 🌍✈️Turoperador especialista en convertir tus viajes en experiencias únicas

Name: Destination One
Company description: Destination One is an incoming tourism agency, operating on the Greek islands. We focus on establishing remarkable product portfolios for tour operators in our destinations that they can then offer to their clientele. Additionally, we manage the clientele of the tour operators on the destinations by offering quality services of transportation and local sea and land excursions as well as office and representation support. We are currently handling more than 110.000 clients on Rhodes, Crete and Kos islands.

Name: Tourismotion Srls
Company description: Touristmotion srls è un tour operator italiano specializzato nella gestione ed organizzazione di servizi turistici di tipo incoming. Con sede operativa situata a Roma, offre servizi turistici anche in altre città italiane: Firenze, Milano, Venezia.  L’offerta di prodotti e soluzioni turistiche proposte ha come obiettivo quello di valorizzare le risorse culturali e artistiche dell’Italia. Nello specifico, si occupa di organizzare tour e visite guidate nei principali siti di attrazione turistica.

Name: Rumbo
Company description: Rumbo es una agencia de viajes en línea líder en el mercado desde el año 2000, que ofrece una amplia gama de servicios, incluyendo billetes de avión, paquetes vacacionales, cruceros, hoteles, coches de alquiler y billetes de tren. Su misión es facilitar la planificación de viajes, proporcionando a los clientes acceso a las mejores ofertas y opciones de viaje, mientras que su visión se centra en ser la plataforma de referencia para los viajeros que buscan experiencias únicas y personalizadas. Rumbo se asocia con más de 400 aerolíneas y numerosos hoteles, lo que le permite ofrecer tarifas competitivas y una variedad de opciones para diferentes tipos de viajeros. Su mercado objetivo incluye tanto a turistas que buscan escapadas de lujo como a aquellos que desean opciones más económicas, abarcando un amplio espectro de preferencias y presupuestos. Con un enfoque en la satisfacción del cliente, Rumbo también ofrece seguros de viaje y asistencia para garantizar una experiencia sin contratiempos.

Name: Hostaway
Company description: Hostaway is a leading technology platform designed to empower vacation rental property managers by streamlining their operations and enhancing their marketing strategies. The company focuses on helping clients connect to major online travel agencies like Vrbo in minutes, rather than days, enabling them to maximize their visibility and bookings. Hostaway's mission is to simplify the complexities of vacation rental management, allowing property owners to build their brand, attract ideal guests, and drive direct bookings through their own websites. With a diverse clientele that includes individual property owners and larger management companies, Hostaway partners with various businesses to provide comprehensive marketing tools, analytics, and support. The target market encompasses a wide range of vacation rental hosts, from those just starting out to seasoned professionals looking to scale their operations effectively in a competitive industry.

Name: Bustravel Iceland
Company description: BusTravel Iceland is a youthful and ageless day tour operator, providing guided day tours from Reykjavik to the most popular tourist attractions in Iceland. With over 50 years legacy in the industry, we are known as a leading public transport concessionaire in Iceland. Our daytours encompass various fascinating places that will create a memory that lingers and make your journey more colorful. Some of these tourist attractions include Circle, Glacier Lagoon,  Northern Lights Bus, Premium Southern Iceland, Fjords & Into The Glacier.  We are committed to providing long bus journey that is filled with so much fun and excitement without losing focus in leading you with an experienced guide who has in-depth knowledge about these areas and myths. As a result of our world-class tour history, we have been distinguished by repeatedly receiving a Certification of Excellence from TripAdvisor in 2015 & 2016.  Our goal and motivation are to provide high quality service and interesting tours for travelers like you, and share our unique expertise. We attempt to make travelling in Iceland more pleasant, simpler and richer. As a leader in the industry, your satisfaction is our utmost priority, and this is why we have designed some special services just for you. We can pick you up either from the airport or hotel in ensuring that you have ultimate Iceland experience without hassle Doing a stop offer in Iceland? Let's show you the true definition of nature that is enriched with history! For more information, visit our website: https://bustravel.is/

Name: TLT Urlaubsreisen GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Hannover, 23 Karl-wiechert Allee, 30625
Company description: Werde Teil vom größten Reisebüro Europas und gestalte mit uns die Zukunft der Reiseberatung! Als Teil der World of TUI bieten wir Dir maximale Freiheit bei minimalem Risiko, denn nur wir vereinen das Beste aus zwei Welten: Die Selbstbestimmtheit und Flexibilität der persönlichen Reiseberatung mit der Sicherheit des stärksten touristischen Partners an Deiner Seite.

Name: CaminoWays.com
Company description: At CaminoWays, we all share a common passion: The Camino de Santiago. As one of the most loved tour operators for the Camino, we have been helping pilgrims discover the joy of the Camino de Santiago for more than 10 years. When booking with us, there is no intermediary. We have great connections and relationships with local businesses along the Camino, and we book local hotels, taxis and guides for you directly. This is the belief on which CaminoWays has been built, and this personal touch gives our clients high satisfaction. We are a team of knowledgeable and enthusiastic travel professionals from different countries and continents, and we are proud to be part of the Camino journey for many pilgrims worldwide every year. Travelling is about enriching personal experiences and the people you share the journey with or meet. But mostly, travel is about opening yourself up to new perspectives. This is one of the many reasons to experience the Camino de Santiago.

Name: Donatello
Company description: Créé en 1981, Donatello est le tour-opérateur français spécialiste des séjours de charme et du voyage sur mesure vers plus de 25 destinations en Italie, Europe, Afrique et dans l'Océan Indien. > Voyages de charme et art de vivre Donatello propose des séjours artistiques, romantiques, historiques, notamment au cœur des plus célèbres villes d’art du monde. Grâce à une large gamme d’établissements hôteliers de cachet et de prestige, de style classique ou design, chaque voyage s’enrichit des grandes tendances décoratives d’hier et d’aujourd’hui. > Le style Donatello Voyage à deux, en famille, entre amis... Voyage “d’exception” ou à “petits prix”, du week-end au séjour ville d’art, du circuit au voyage personnalisé, Donatello propose toutes les formules pour voyager en liberté. > Les critères d’exigence Donatello propose une sélection de séjours de charme et d’exception au cœur de destinations incontournables et de leurs régions méconnues. Donatello offre aux voyageurs individuels des formules de voyages adaptées à leurs attentes. > A la découverte d'autres univers Donatello propose un large choix de destinations proches ou lointaines pour composer ses voyages au gré de ses envies : recherche d’authenticité, d’insolite, de culture, de nature sauvage... Comme les voyages sont des occasions pour apprécier des instants qui changent les habitudes, Donatello permet d’aller à la rencontre de soi-même en programmant des rendez-vous de remise en forme, de découvertes artistiques et festives. > Destinations moyen courrier : - Italie, Sicile, Sardaigne - Espagne, Baléares, Canaries - Portugal, Madère, Açores - Autriche, République tchèque, Hongrie, Russie - Île de Malte - Île de Chypre - Maroc > Destinations long courrier : - Afrique du Sud - Namibie - Botswana - Kenya - Tanzanie - Zanzibar - Madagascar - Seychelles - Île Maurice - Sultanat d’Oman - Émirats Arabes Unis.

Name: Holiday Club Åre
Company description: Holiday Club Åre is the hotel that offers experiences and adventure all year around. Here you will stay in spacious hotel rooms or apartments in central Åre with adventurepool, spa, bowling and other fun activities for the conference or family.  Åre's many adventures waiting just outside the door, as well as the village's entire range of activities, entertainment and shopping.

Name: CAP Cooperativa
Company description: Nata sul bisogno di mobilità degli operai dai centri periferici alle fabbriche in città, dal 1945 CAP è divenuta l’azienda del trasporto pubblico locale di Prato e, presto, è entrata a far parte del tessuto sociale cittadino. La Cooperativa ha sempre avuto un’anima imprenditoriale che l’ha portata a diversificare i propri business, a intraprendere operazioni societarie e ad innovare i propri settori di interesse. Lavorare a stretto contatto con il territorio da oltre 75 anni ha permesso a CAP di sviluppare un know how con radici profonde che viene riportato tutti i giorni nei diversi ambienti di lavoro. Ed in relazione ai continui solleciti della quotidianità, investiamo in nuove figure, altamente professionali e giovani che possano mettere in campo nuovi approcci e nuove visioni. In un mondo in continua evoluzione e sempre più votato alla sostenibilità, CAP si sta preparando a recepire gli stimoli legati all’attenzione all’ambiente e ai processi virtuosi. Nuove sinergie, efficacia aumentata, investimenti sostenibili per garantire una crescita nel tempo. CAP ha, negli anni, ampliato la propria influenza ad altre 6 Province, diventando l'azienda di riferimento per la Toscana nord-occidentale oltre a consolidare la propria presenza nell'area metropolitana fiorentina. Tramite il proprio tour operator Capviaggi offre esperienze di viaggio in bus con accompagnatore, servizi di noleggio bus e lavora per gruppi precostituiti e per l'organizzazione di convegni. La proposta si completa con l'Hotel Raffaello (4 stelle e 142 camere) a Firenze. La manutenzione grandi flotte è un settore in forte sviluppo: questo perché CAP ritiene da sempre che la sicurezza dei mezzi debba essere trattata come un vero e proprio asset aziendale. Un viaggio di qualità passa dalla sicurezza e dal comfort del mezzo su cui siamo. CAP ha realizzato interventi di riqualificazione di aree abitative di Prato con la costruzione e la vendita di unità immobiliari in diverse zone della città

Name: We Love To Travel
Company description: We Love To Travel is a premier travel agency based in Luxembourg, specializing in creating tailor-made tours that cater to the unique desires of each traveler. With a mission to provide authentic experiences, the company designs exclusive itineraries that allow clients to explore the world beyond standard tourist paths. We Love To Travel operates 13 agencies across Luxembourg, ensuring that their dedicated Travel Designers are always available to assist clients in planning their dream adventures. The company targets a diverse clientele, including individuals and groups seeking personalized travel experiences, and collaborates with various partners to enhance the quality and variety of their offerings. Ultimately, We Love To Travel aims to empower curiosity and inspire wanderlust, making every journey a memorable one.

Name: Viaggiare S.r.l.
Company description: Viaggiare.it is the website dedicated to vacation package holidays.  It offers dynamic packages created by customers by using our platform to combine offers for flights and accommodations. Dynamic sourcing enables customers to tailor their travel experience by combining two or more travel components from our extensive product and service offering.  Viaggiare.it also offers static packages pre-arranged by tour operators.

Name: Memento Group Holding BV
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Amsterdam, 200 Prins Bernhardplein, 1097
Company description: Memento Group Holding BV is one of the most homogeneous tourism groups in Europe, having its headquarters and strategic location in Holland, with operations in Spain, Greece, Turkey, Hungary, Romania. The Administrator of the company is Intertrust Group (https://www.intertrustgroup.com). The mission of the Memento Group is to help people experience the world beyond clichés, to become travellers, not simply tourists. Give time to discover new places, unique savours, different civilisations. Remember to enjoy every moment and every experience.   Memento Group is both a provider of management services for companies under its umbrella and an investment fund. The company develops hotel and hotel management services, land and air transport, insurance and construction.   - iMemento Inc., provider of technology solutions to the travel sector, specialising in the management and delivery of passenger transport services, (StellaBus, StellaFlights), in Property Management Solutions, in  travel management systems ( Experiences by MementoBooking).   - MementoBus : ground passenger transport services in Romania, Spain, Serbia, Greece, Turkey but also an online marketplace for other bus operators via www.mementobus.com.   - MementoAir : online travel agency, charter broker. - Memento Hotels : hotel Management, hotel consultancy and  franchise.  - Memento Holidays: integrates all types of services into a complete tourist package, relying on local know-how in some of the most important and attractive tourist destinations as Turkey, Greece and Spain, supported by Memento Turkey, Memento Greece and Memento Spain. -Memento Insurance : insurance broker. - Memento Real Estate

Name: Scenic - Luxury Cruises & Tours
Company description: Scenic is a private, Australian-owned company, employing staff and tour crew worldwide. We are truly global, operating hundreds of extended touring programs to many exotic domestic and international destinations.    From humble beginnings to world-renowned luxury cruise and tour operator, in 2016 Scenic celebrated 30 years as a leader in its field. The Scenic team has worked tirelessly to earn a world-class reputation for creating and delivering the ultimate cruising and touring itineraries for travellers who seek wondrous experiences and exceptional 5-star service.   The Scenic Malta office is located in Naxxar. The team consists mainly of qualified and semi-qualified accounting personnel together with supporting staff who work across a variety of functions such as corporate reporting, financial consolidation,  treasury management & financial planning & analysis. We also provide support to Operational Finance by preparing the accounting books of the river and ocean vessel operating entities and support our marketing entities by assisting with receipting processes. We pride ourselves in being an equal opportunity employer and in supporting career growth for our employees. We also strive to maintain a healthy work-life balance by organizing a number of social activities on a regular basis.

Name: Costa Crociere S.p.A.
Company description: Costa Crociere S.p.A. is a leading cruise company renowned for delivering unforgettable travel experiences across the seas, particularly in the Mediterranean and Northern Europe. The company is dedicated to its mission of bringing happiness and creating lasting memories for its guests, which is reflected in its exceptional service and diverse itineraries. With a modern fleet of cruise ships, Costa offers a wide range of travel options that cater to various markets, including families, couples, and adventure seekers.  Costa Crociere fosters a diverse community of over 20,000 employees from 70 different countries, emphasizing the importance of human connections and cultural collaboration. This commitment to inclusivity and sustainability is deeply embedded in the company's corporate culture and initiatives, ensuring that every journey is enjoyable and responsible. The company partners with various travel agencies and tourism boards to enhance its offerings, making it a preferred choice for travelers seeking unique maritime adventures. Targeting a market that values exploration and leisure, Costa Crociere highlights the beauty of cultural and natural landscapes, appealing to those who seek both adventure and relaxation at sea. Through its innovative approach and dedication to customer satisfaction, Costa Crociere S.p.A. continues to solidify its position as a leader in the cruise industry, committed to providing enriching journeys that create unforgettable moments for its guests.

Name: Tid Til Ro
Company description: Danish tour operator specialized in mindfulness and yoga retreats. We currently travel to Denmark, Spain, Greece, South Africa, Thailand and Indonesia.

Name: Unitas Rejser
Company description: Unitas Rejser arrangerer grupperejser for skole- og ungdomsgrupper (ski-, storby-, adventure- og studieture), sognerejser og er ene-agent i Danmark for Raptim, verdens største udbyder af rejser til kirkelige og humanitære organisationer samt NGO'er. Derudover tilbyder vi kulturhistoriske rundrejser med dansk rejseleder, hvor alt er tilrettelagt på forhånd.  Unitas Rejser er grundlagt i 1948, men har rødder helt tilbage til 1920'erne og er dermed en af branchens ældste rejsebureauer. Rejsebureauet er ejet af KFUM og KFUK i Danmark, der er en del af verdens største ungdomsbevægelse YMCA og YWCA. Unitas Rejser er medlem af Danmarks Rejsebureau Forening samt medlem af Rejsegarantifonden (nr. 128). Vi er autoriseret IATA rejsebureau med egen billetudstedelse af flybilletter til hele verden. Welcome to Unitas Rejser We offer journeys for school and youth groups (educational, ski, city and action journeys), we do parish trips and we are the only agent in Denmark for Raptim, the world's largest provider of travel for religious and humanitarian organizations. Futhermore we arrange cultural and historical tours with a Danish tour guide where everything is organized. Unitas Rejser was founded in 1948 but has roots dating back to 1920, making it one of the oldest Danish travel agencies. Unitas Rejser is owned by the KFUM and KFUK in Denmark which are parts of the largest youth movements YMCA and YWCA.

Name: Aller Leisure A/S
Company description: Aller Leisure A/S is a subsidiary of Aller Holding A/S. Aller Leisure own, bring together and administer Aller's travel business that includes the travel agencies Nyhavn Rejser, Kulturrejser-Europa, Nilles Rejser, Aller Travel, Gislev Rejser, Stjernegaard Rejser, Let´s do Cruise and Gaia Travel.

Name: Landescape
HQ Location: Portugal, Aveiro, Ovar, 7 Rua Dr. Zagalo Dos Santos, 3880-206
Company description: We are a cultural and adventure travel agency with a strong investment in sustainable tourism.  We work with small groups of 4 to 12 travellers, and we count on an experienced travel leaders team that share their knowledge and passion to create the best designed travels. Our aim is to provide to the ones who travel with us the immersion on the local culture, enjoying to the fullest landscapes, historic richness and gastronomic diversity that each country as to offer. More information available on our website : www.landescape.pt

Name: Glamour
Company description: Glamour Tour Operator is a travel agency dedicated to creating bespoke itineraries that emphasize authenticity and comfort for discerning travelers. With a mission to ensure that every journey leaves a lasting impression, the company meticulously curates travel experiences that highlight the unique culture, history, and natural beauty of various destinations. Their offerings include self-drive tours, such as a 7-night adventure through Louisiana, featuring stays in vibrant cities like New Orleans and Baton Rouge, along with car rentals for exploration. Glamour Tour Operator caters to a diverse clientele, including individual travelers and families, and partners with selected four-star hotels to provide high-quality accommodations. The company’s vision is to transform every departure into a memorable discovery, making it a preferred choice for those seeking luxurious and unforgettable travel experiences.

Name: OK.go MobilitätsAG
Company description: OK.go MobilitätsAG ist ein modernes Omnibusunternehmen in Baden-Württemberg, das mit 60 Fahrzeugen im Linien- und Schülerverkehr sowie im europäischen Reiseverkehr unterwegs ist. Eine weitere Sparte ist die zertifizierte Abfallentsorgung. 2018 ist OK.go entstanden aus 3 traditionsreichen Busunternehmen - mit viel Erfahrung und Know-How und ist damit das größte Busunternehmen auf der Ostalb. 200 Mitarbeiter in Voll- und Teilzeit arbeiten derzeit an fünf Standorten als Busfahrer*innen, Busbegleitungen, in der Werkstatt, in der Reinigung und in der Verwaltung.  Kernkompetenz ist der ÖPNV  - der Öffentliche Personennahverkehr mit dem StadtBus Ellwangen und zahlreichen Linien- und Schülerverkehren auf der Ostsalb. Als Reiseveranstalter ist OK.go mit eigenen Reisebussen im In- und Ausland unterwegs - sowohl in der Eigentouristik als auch im Mietbus-Bereich. Firmen, Vereine und Schulen können Busse mit Fahrpersonal für ihre Ausflüge, Reisen und Transferfahrten anmieten. Firmen und private Kunden können ihre Abfälle durch OK.go professionell entsorgen lassen.

Name: Toerkoop Reisburo Groep
Company description: (EN) The Toerkoop Travel Agency Group is the largest association of independent, self-employed owners of travel agencies in the Dutch travel industry. On October 24, 1968 Toerkoop was founded as a cooperative union of travel agencies. Since then we make reservations for all our customers at all major touroperators and we supply an extensive range of services. (NL) De Toerkoop Reisburo Groep is het grootste samenwerkingsverband van onafhankelijke, zelfstandige reisbureau-eigenaren in de Nederlandse reisbranche. Op 24 oktober 1968 is Toerkoop als coöperatieve vereniging van reisbureaus opgericht. Sindsdien bemiddelen wij in de afspraken met alle gerenommeerde reisorganisaties en leveren wij een zeer uitgebreid pakket aan diensten.

Name: Kompas d.o.o.
Company description: Kompas is one of the most important travel companies in Europe and most definitely one and only genuine Adriatic Ambassador. Based in Slovenia, Kompas connects all the important European markets with its wide range of premium, classic and innovative travel services, which are handled by an impressive and extensive national and global network of 20 Kompas offices located all around Europe and in the USA. After more than 60 years of tradition, experience and expertise, Kompas is internationally renowned for its top quality services and uncompromising dedication to customer satisfaction. This enables us to effectively organize truly remarkable tours, holiday packages and business services in the Adriatic region, in Europe and other continents.

Name: Airtickets
Company description: airtickets® is an online travel agency specialised in providing quality services to help you find and purchase air tickets, hotel accommodation, car rental, transfer, as well as tours & activities worldwide.  Our goal is to ensure excellent customer experience and offer innovative tools and services to simplify the process of finding, planning and purchasing the right product at the lowest price. Our team consists of experienced agents with excellent knowledge of the travel market, as well as the special needs of the modern traveller. airtickets® operates under the management of Airtickets Travel Services S.A. . Having accumulated more than 10 years of experience and know-how in providing travel services, it has a leading role in the development of online travel in South-eastern Europe.  With headquarters in London and local presence in Greece, Cyprus, Russia, Poland and Turkey, Airtickets Travel Services S.A. guarantees top quality travel services, excellent customer service and the best prices the market has to offer.

Name: Aditus
Company description: Aditus S.r.l. is a dynamic tour operator based in Torino, Italy, specializing in providing immersive cultural experiences through audio guides and guided tours of archaeological sites and museums. The company is dedicated to bringing history to life, with a mission to enhance the visitor experience by offering informative and engaging audio content that highlights the rich historical heritage of locations such as Canosa di Puglia. Aditus collaborates with various museums and archaeological parks, ensuring that clients have access to official ticketing and educational offerings. Its target market includes both local and international tourists seeking to explore Italy's historical treasures, as well as educational institutions looking for enriching field trip experiences. With a commitment to quality and safety, Aditus is certified in environmental management and information security, reflecting its dedication to sustainable tourism practices.

Name: PANGEA Travel
Company description: Zoekt u een reisorganisatie die echt luistert naar uw wensen? Een reisbureau dat serieus aandacht aan uw reis besteedt? Die geen bouwstenen aanbiedt of alleen met standaard hotels werkt? En een reisspecialist die de bestemmingen en hotels zelf regelmatig bezoekt? Bij ons bent u aan het juiste adres. PANGEA Travel maakt het verschil door een persoonlijke benadering, aandacht voor de reiziger, flexibiliteit en het bieden van kwaliteit. Daarom heeft u uw eigen contactpersoon die uw reiswensen eerst telefonisch of in een persoonlijk gesprek met u doorneemt. Op deze wijze kunnen we echt aan de slag met uw wensen en zorgen dat ons aanbod past bij de reisplannen die u in gedachte heeft. Plannen, vragen of ideeën? Laat het ons weten en we helpen u vrijblijvend verder.

Name: Abercrombie & Kent Italy & Croatia
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Florence, 7 Piazza San Jacopino, 50144
Company description: TOUR OPERATOR E AGENZIA DI VIAGGIO DAL 17/02/2005

Name: Ta.ts Travel Agency Technologies & Services GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 70 Hahnstraße, 60528
Company description: ta.ts bietet Ihnen effiziente und speziell auf den Reisevertrieb maßgeschneiderte Backoffice- und Reporting Lösungen an.  Mit unseren IBIZA-Systemen IBIZA Buchhaltung und IBIZA Cockpit sowie den Zusatzprodukten IBIZA Smart View und IBIZA Szenario Manager haben Sie die perfekte Kombination, um Ihre Betriebsabläufe in den Bereichen Buchhaltung, Controlling und Reporting möglichst Zeit- und Ressourcen sparend vollautomatisiert zu nutzen. IBIZA Buchhaltung und das Reporting-System IBIZA Cockpit sowie die entsprechenden Zusatzprodukte sind für Leisure- und Business-Reisebüros jeder Größe, für Reisebüro-Ketten und Kooperationen sowie Online-Unternehmen im In- und Ausland einsetzbar. Wir bieten unseren Kunden ein umfassendes Leistungsspektrum rund um die kaufmännischen Prozesse an und sind marktprägender und erfolgreicher Anbieter für den deutschen Reisevertrieb. Mit unseren Dienstleistungen und einem eigenen Support- und Trainingsbereich sowie professioneller Prozessberatung, erhalten Sie gebündelt alles was Sie benötigen, aus einer Hand.  Dieses Angebot ist im Markt einzigartig. Die IBIZA Produktwelt: IBIZA Buchhaltung Controlling und Anlagenbuchhaltung IBIZA Smart View webbasierter live - Datenabruf der Buchhaltungsdaten  IBIZA Cockpit (Reporting) mit den Modulen: IBIZA Basic Cockpit IBIZA Business Cockpit - Professionelles Reporting für Firmenkunden IBIZA Leisure Cockpit - Reporting für die Steuerung der gesamten Umsätze IBIZA Management Cockpit - Reporting der Finanzbuchhaltung IBIZA Travel Management Cockpit - Online Zugriff für Travel Manager von Firmenkunden IBIZA Cockpit Analyse - Reports nach individuellen Anforderungen IBIZA Szenario Manager - der Blick in die Zukunft mit individuellen Szenarien    ta.ts Travel Agency Technologies & Services GmbH  Bürocenter Lyoner Stern Hahnstraße 70  60528 Frankfurt am Main  Tel.: +49 (69) 6 63 77 - 500 E-Mail: info@ta-ts.de

Name: Nordic Visitor
Company description: Headquartered in Reykjavík, Iceland, Nordic Visitor is an innovative and client-oriented travel agency that caters to leisure travellers to the Nordic region and other selected Northern European destinations. We also have smaller offices in Sweden and Scotland. Throughout our diverse operations, we take pride in our local knowledge and operate according to our core values: quality, dedication, trust and personal service. Over the years, Nordic Visitor has developed strong relationships across Northern Europe, a solid reputation among clients, and an in-depth knowledge of our exciting, off-the-beaten-path destinations. At Nordic Visitor, we pride ourselves on fostering a supportive and open work environment. Thanks to the positive perception of the company by staff, Nordic Visitor was honoured as “Company of the Year” (Fyrirtæki ársins) at the VR awards for four consecutive years: from 2017 to 2020. Interested in joining us? Check out open positions here: https://www.nordicvisitor.com/career/ You can also find us here: Facebook - https://nordicvisitor.facebook.com/ Instagram @nordicvisitor - https://www.instagram.com/nordicvisitor/ #nordicvisitor

Name: Dalstra Reizen BV
Company description: Een touringcarbedrijf en veel meer Dalstra Reizen is een touringcarbedrijf en touroperator. Op reis door binnen- en/of buitenland? Eén dag of meerdere dagen? Met de bus, boot of vliegtuig? Dalstra Reizen doet het allemaal. Reizen Wij hebben het hele jaar door een uitgebreid reisaanbod. Boek individueel of voor meerdere mensen een reis. Onze ervaren chauffeur is tevens reisleider, soms gaat er zelfs een extra reisleid(st)er mee. Onderweg heeft u tal van interessante excursies in de mooiste regio’s van binnen- en buitenland. Groepsreizen U kunt ook uw eigen reis samenstellen (één dag of meerdere). Weet u precies wat u wilt? Onze reisadviseurs kunnen u alles uit handen nemen. Bijvoorbeeld het regelen van hotels, restaurants, vliegtickets, overtochten, toegangskaarten, etc. Heeft u nog geen idee wat u precies wilt gaan doen? Onze reisadviseurs helpen u graag. Touringcarverhuur Alleen een touringcar met chauffeur nodig? Ook dat kan bij Dalstra Reizen. Wij hebben ca. 30 goed onderhouden touringcars: luxe VIP-bussen, royal- & comfortclass touringcars, lage vloer touringcars, dubbeldekkers en zelfs liftbussen voor b.v. rolstoelen. Direct contact afdeling groepen/touringcarverhuur 0512 - 369 031 reisbureau 0512 - 369 030

Name: Marine Travel
Company description: Marine Travel is a Danish specialised travel agency that has been providing targeted and individually customised travel solutions within the areas of marine traffic, business travel, offshore traffic and alternative energy projects, including windmill and solar energy, since 1991. Employing more than 25 dedicated and experienced staff members at four locations in Denmark and Germany, Marine Travel is ready to serve our customers 24/7 all year round. By applying the most modern booking system on the market, as well as providing a 24-hour emergency service that is only manned by our own highly qualified staff, we guarantee flexibility, lucrative prices and optimal consultancy services to all our customers – also in stressful periods and when unexpected events happen throughout the world. Marine Travel is an authorised IATA travel agency that only cooperates with approved airline companies and low cost carriers that prioritise efficiency, quality and satisfied customers – just like we do. Apart from our own offices we also have a network of close cooperation partners throughout the world. At Marine Travel, attentive customer service, lucrative tickets and flexible travel solutions make up the cornerstone in a dynamic industry that never stops to rest. In short: Marine Travel moves people.

Name: Berge & Meer Touristik GmbH
Company description: Die Welt mit Berge & Meer entdecken: Seit über 45 Jahren steht der Spezialist für Rundreisen und Kreuzfahrt-Kombinationen für einmalige Urlaubsmomente und unvergessliche Begegnungen. Die Erlebnismacher aus Rengsdorf im Westerwald haben für jeden das passende Reiseabenteuer – klein und groß, nah und fern, in der Gruppe oder individuell. Berge & Meer-Reisen sind online unter berge-meer.de buchbar, unter der Hotline 02634/9626169 (Mo - Fr 8 bis 21 Uhr, am Wochenende und an Feiertagen 10 – 18 Uhr) und auch im Reisebüro. Geschäftsführer der Berge & Meer Touristik GmbH ist Marcel Mayer. Englisch: Discover the world with Berge & Meer: for over 45 years, the specialist for round trips and cruise combinations has stood for unique vacation moments and unforgettable encounters. The adventure makers from Rengsdorf in the Westerwald have the right travel adventure for everyone - young and old, near and far, in a group or individually. Berge & Meer trips can be booked online at berge-meer.de, on the hotline 02634/9626169 (Mon - Fri 8 am to 9 pm, at weekends and on public holidays 10 am - 6 pm) and also at travel agencies. The managing director of Berge & Meer Touristik GmbH is Marcel Mayer.

Name: RK Travel Group AB
Company description: RK Travel Group (formerly named Rese-Konsulterna) is the leading wholesaler in the Nordic region for leisure and business group travel arrangements. Our clients are group tour operators, coach companies, travel agencies, associations and companies in the Nordic region who use us to customize their tours, conference trips and all kinds of travel arrangements for groups. We book hotels, all major airlines, ferries, cruises, restaurants, special events, guides, local visits – always customized to the special needs and requests of each group. As an independent and privately owned operator, we handle all steps included in arranging a tour (from initial booking, follow-up confirmation, providing list of participants to paying the final bill). Forty Nine years of travel business experience, makes RK Travel Group one of the longest serving and leading wholesaler in the market. Our well established company with its expertise, experience, volume and network is a guarantee for quality. For many years we have annually been awarded for the highest credit rating, latest 2023 in Dun & Brandstreet credit rating system - AAA.

Name: Guidor De Nederlandse Gidsenorganisatie
Company description: Guidor represents professionally qualified guides in the Netherlands, who take pride in introducing visitors to Dutch life, culture, history, art and more. Member of FEG & WFTGA All our 120 registered guides have the national diploma and /or certificate for the profession to be a guide. These guides are reliable, informative, and professional and take pride in introducing visitors to the various aspects of Dutch life, culture, history, art and much more. Guides are available for Tour Operators, Private groups, Individuals Coach tours, walking and cycling tours Museum and art gallery visits Thematic tours Conference excursions Incentive groups Sightseeing tours by coach, private vehicle, canal boat or any other means of transport.Furthermore, many of our guides are specialised in such fields as agriculture, horticulture, water management, history, art history and many more. Guidor can provide guiding services in 20 different languages – including Russian, Greek, Swedish, Arabic, Czech, Afrikaans and Japanese. Guidor tries to assign a guide to fit with your wishes!

Name: Dimensione Sicilia
Company description: Dimensione Sicilia DMC Incoming Tour Operator is specializing in leisure and business tourist services in Sicily. Our island has a great natural and cultural heritage, very important archaeological proofs and gastronomic delicacies. Dimensione Sicilia’s team, has been organizing tours in Sicily for 30 years, offering tourist packages and services of excellent quality. The wide range of products offers tour of Sicily, for individuals, with regular departures, themed itineraries for groups and tailor made products. Furthermore Dimensione Sicilia plans conventions and incentive travels and also weddings in Sicily, an increasing business in our area. A wide selection of hotels in Sicily, transfers, multilingual guides, complementary services and location for the organization of meetings and events. Dimensione Sicilia, thanks to an excellent knowledge of territory and all its tourist aspects, is able to provide the best travel solutions, both for groups and individuals, with a constant support. In addition to our leading product, the tour of Sicily “Sicilian Secrets”, we suggest a wide range of proposals for classic and mini-tours of Sicily strictly tailor-made, themed tours which focus on history, art, archaeology and literature. Furthermore Dimensione Sicilia plans event tours and luxury packages for demanding travellers, wedding planning, for unforgettable moments, and finally business events and incentive travels in Sicily. Take a look at our Sicilian Secrets Tour for a very fascinating journey https://www.siciliansecretstour.eu/ Stay connected for further Travel News with https://blog.siciliansecrets.it/

Name: OVET VIAGGI
Company description: Siamo l’agenzia di viaggi, dal 1972 (e siamo anche tour operator). Uniamo passione, competenza e tanta esperienza con l’obiettivo di esaudire i sogni di chi si affida a noi, per rendere il mondo alla portata di tutti e tutte. Organizziamo viaggi di gruppo – in giornata o di più giorni, sia in Italia che all’estero – e viaggi individuali su misura. Siamo specializzati in viaggi di nozze e partner affidabili per business travel, mice ed eventi.

Name: AllTours.it
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 45 Via Vittorio Metz, 00173
Company description: AllTours.it è il tour operator leader on line che, da più di 14 anni, propone un ampio ventaglio di oltre 350 strutture, tra villaggi e hotel, selezionati con cura da professionisti del settore e proposti alla miglior tariffa garantita. Anche per il 2019, la governance si prefigge come obiettivi la crescita dell'offerta e la proposta sempre più variegata di strutture ricettive del Bel Paese, mantenendo inalterati gli eccellenti standard di qualità sia dei villaggi che dell'esperienza fornita al cliente e l'eccellenza del Customer Care, da sempre tra i valori imprescindibili della filosofia aziendale. Oltre 1 milione di viaggiatori ha già scelto AllTours.it per organizzare le proprie vacanze in tutta Italia e all'Estero. Questo grazie soprattutto al valore esperienziale offerto alla propria clientela, che viene assistita e seguita da un consulente personale, e da un team sempre a disposizione per qualsiasi evenienza, che la accompagnano dal primo contatto fino al ritorno a casa, al termine del viaggio. AllTours.it non è solo una web travel agency, ma una realtà vicina al consumatore che lo aiuta a immaginare, pianificare e vivere la vacanza dei propri sogni.

Name: Altura
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, 16 Carrer De Sant Ramon Nonat, 07610
Company description: Altura is a DMC, Bedbank and Hotel Representation company based in Majorca and the Canary Islands specialising in sun and beach hotels in Spain, the Caribbean, Greece, Turkey and Egypt, amongst others. We are part of a group called Optursa, the same group as Hoteles Globales, a well-known and well-established hotel chain in Spain with over 50 properties In the Balearics, Canaries and Spanish mainland. As part of the same family we are able to bring you very competitive rates in their hotels. We also have guarantees and direct contracts with many other properties and hotel chains, giving us a very extensive portfolio. Aside from this, we commercialise 2 brands in Mexico: Sensira Resorts and Crown Paradise Resorts. We put service to agents and tour operators at the heart of everything we do; all of our resort senior leadership team are from a traditional tour operating background, and fully understand the importance of fast response times for in-resort issues and quick turn-around to the customer.

Name: Haman Group
Company description: Travel created by locals. With over 60 years of experience, Haman Group unites four specialist travel companies under one roof. As a leading incoming tour operator in the Nordics, we create both ready-made journeys and tailor-made itineraries for clients around the world — working with industry professionals and direct clients alike.

Name: Charlie's Travels
Company description: Charlie's Travels is the go-to off the beaten track tour operator of East and Southern Africa!  Check out charlies-travels.com for more information. Tourism in Africa is extremely traditional. Before you know it, you're traveling from safari lodge to safari lodge, without experiencing the actual Africa. Charlie's Travels is a travel agency annex tour operator, specialized in tailor made adventurous trips. With an international, young team with the same adventurous mentality, we're organizing unique trips all across the continent. Furthermore, this is what we stand for: • We're the only Dutch, on the ground travel agency in Kenya. This doesn't only mean that we've got an endless amount of first-hand Africa knowledge, it also means that our team is 24/7 on stand-by, and never too far away! • We develop our own tours - there's no middle man. Charlie has been traveling the continent since 2014 and everywhere he comes, from relatively unknown Masai territory to the white beaches of the Indian Ocean, he develops new routes with local partners: an offbeat trip is guaranteed! • No standard package trips - if you ask us, the perfect Africa trip is the product of a co-creation: every adventure starts with a personal conversation in which we discuss your travel style and personal interests, so we can design a fully tailor made trip. • Our team is a dynamic, international mix of locals and Dutchmen - everyone has their own specialties and everyone is afflicted by a bad case of 'mal d'Afrique'! • A healthy, Kenyan economy is important to us - Charlie's travels works with local partners and works as much as possible with local organizations.

Name: Language Team
