HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 41 Via Fabio Filzi, 20124
Company description: Language Team è un Tour Operator italo-inglese operante dal 1997, con sede principale a Milano e ramificazioni in centro e sud Italia. Organizza Vacanze Studio all’estero, Soggiorni studio in strutture Italiane, PON, Stage e Soggiorni linguistici. Collabora con Privati, Enti, Scuole e numerose Pubbliche Amministrazioni (INPS, ecc.). Language Team lavora da anni con passione e dedizione credendo fortemente all’unicità che un’esperienza formativa, professionale ed umana può regalare!

Name: Prive Safari
Company description: Prive Safari is a travel agency in the Netherlands, founder and co-owner of the tour operator in Arusha, the safari capital in the northern part of Tanzania. Therefore we have very short operational lines for the organization of your tailor-made safari. The tour operator has a full Tourist agent class-A license and is member of the Tanzania Organization of Tour Operators.  By specializing in the northern part of Tanzania, Zanzibar and the southern part of Kenya, we know by own experience which routes, parks and lodges to suggest for your safari. We prepare a tailor-made proposal, detailed with maps and photo material, enabling you to make a good decision on your safari of a lifetime. We make sure that you are well prepared and enjoy your preparation well in advance of the actual journey to the magnificent Heart of Africa including the world known Kilimanjaro, Serengeti NP, Ngorongoro crater and the Masai Mara.

Name: Caravantours Tour Operator Gruppi
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Rimini, 19 Via B. Parmense, 47923
Company description: La Società è stata fondata nel 1984 da un gruppo di operatori turistici, giovani ma con l'esperienza derivante dall'avere contribuito in modo determinante ad avviare il successo di un'altra organizzazione nel turismo dei gruppi. Questi giovani hanno messo insieme la loro esperienza, il loro entusiasmo e tanta, tanta voglia di fare e di migliorare continuamente le loro capacità organizzativa e di lavoro. E per oltre trent'anni hanno intrattenuto un rapporto continuo con clienti e fornitori, per interpretare, da un lato, le esigenze ed i gusti dei gruppi desiderosi di vivere al meglio i viaggi in Italia e in Europa, con le migliori combinazioni di qualità e prezzo, e per selezionare, dall'altro lato, le offerte più interessanti e gli operatori più capaci, con i quali intrattenere rapporti ispirati alla massima collaborazione e correttezza. Poi un aggiornamento ed una selezione continua del personale che aumentava con il crescere della clientela, l'utilizzo delle migliori tecnologie per le comunicazioni, anch'esse in costante evoluzione, la partecipazione a fiere, rassegne, work-shop, in Italia e in Europa, luoghi privilegiati di incontro fra domanda e offerta. Hanno destinato pochi fondi alle iniziative pubblicitarie, consapevoli che l'effimero clamore di uno slogan indovinato è nulla in confronto alla solida pubblicità che deriva dalla soddisfazione dei clienti e dall'assolvere con puntualità gli impegni con i fornitori. Così si è scritta la storia della Caravantours, inserita ora fra i 40 maggiori tour operators italiani e fra i primi nel settore specifico dei viaggi per gruppi.

Name: Go4sea Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Bari, 340/6 Corso Alcide De Gasperi, 70125
Company description: Go4sea tour operator è un azienda fondata nel 2013. Nata e consolidata con proposte di viaggio sui Balcani, con focus particolare sulla Grecia ionica, nel corso degli anni Go4sea ha diversificato produzione, distribuzione e promozione di più prodotti turistici: dal pacchettizzato nave/volo con appartamenti ed hotel, ai tour guidati in Europa, al luxury travel medio e lungo raggio. Nel 2019 si inserisce tra le eccellenze del tessuto economico pugliese e riceve il prestigioso premio Industria Felix – La Puglia che compete. Nel 2020 è nella ristretta lista delle 450 aziende italiane che hanno ottenuto la maggiore crescita di fatturato nel triennio 2016-2019. Nel 2021 entra nel ranking “FT1000 Fastest Growing Companies 2021” stilato dal F.T.

Name: Arctic Adventures
Company description: Arctic Adventures is Iceland’s leading tour operator, offering unforgettable small-group experiences since 1983. From glacier hiking and snowmobiling to whale watching and lava tunnels, we bring travelers closer to Iceland’s wild beauty. We’re a family of trusted brands - including Into the Glacier, The Lava Tunnel, Your Day Tours, Adventure Hotels, and more - all driven by one purpose: creating lifetime memories while protecting the nature we explore.

Name: Voetbaltrips.com
Company description: ⚽ Voetbaltrips.com –Betaalbare voetbalreizen! Sinds 2011 brengen wij voetbalfans dichter bij hun droomwedstrijden. Wat ooit begon als twee voetballiefhebbers die betaalbare voetbalreizen toegankelijk wilden maken, is inmiddels uitgegroeid tot een succesvol reisbureau. Vanuit ons kantoor in Utrecht verzorgen wij compleet verzorgde voetbalreizen naar de grootste clubs in Europa! Of je nu droomt van een wedstrijd in het iconische Santiago Bernabéu of de sfeer wilt proeven bij Borussia Mönchengladbach, wij maken het mogelijk. Bij Voetbaltrips.com profiteer je van: ✔️ Voordelige en volledig verzorgde voetbalreizen ✔️ Een ruim aanbod: van de grote clubs als Real Madrid en Liverpool tot verborgen parels als FC Porto ✔️ Volledige flexibiliteit: kies zelf je vlucht, hotel en extra’s ✔️ Betrouwbare service met jarenlange ervaring Wil jij de ultieme voetbalervaring beleven? Stel je reis samen zoals jij dat wilt en beleef een onvergetelijke wedstrijd! ⚽ 📅 Boek nu jouw voetbaltrip en ervaar topvoetbal van dichtbij!

Name: Novaturas group
HQ Location: Lithuania, Kaunas, Kaunas, 27 A. Mickevičiaus Str., lt-44245
Company description: We are the largest tour operator in the Baltic region, with a strong market position built over time since 1999. Our advantages include a strong position in a developing market, well-recognised brand, high customer loyalty and very good relations with tourism agencies and service providers, thanks to which Novaturas can provide its clients with a diverse and attractively priced offering.  Our product portfolio includes fully organised summer and winter package holidays as well as sightseeing tours by coach and plane to more than 30 destinations worldwide, including the most popular holiday resorts in Southern Europe as well as select locations in North Africa, the Middle East, Asia and Latin America. We also sell airline tickets and hotel accommodations, thanks to which we are able to reach an extensive group of clients with different preferences. Our products are sold through more than 400 external travel agencies, our own sales offices in main cities of the Baltics and fast-growing e-commerce channels.

Name: Ceibo Viajes
HQ Location: Spain, Valencia, Alicante, 36 Calle De Elda, 03013
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes con 7 sucursales en España. Llevamos 20 años dedicados exclusivamente a las ofertas para volar a Latinoamérica. Nuestro sello de identidad es la atención personalizada que brindamos a nuestros clientes. Nos enfocamos a un publico habitualmente inmigrante que vuelve a su país a visitar a la familia, y sabemos muy bien cuales son las necesidades. Bueno, bonito y barato nos gusta a los latinos. Ofrecemos poder pagar los vuelos en cuotas con y sin nómina. Llevamos 20 años y hemos crecido cada vez más, eso se debe a la dedicación, el amor y la calidad en el servicio. La experiencia no se improvisa. Actualmente estamos ofreciendo un servicio cada día mas amplio para nuestros clientes, incluyendo servicios de extranjería.

Name: Zainetto Verde Viaggi Studio
Company description: Benvenuto su Zainetto Verde, dove l'educazione globale incontra la passione per le esperienze straordinarie. Zainetto Verde Viaggi Studio è nato da Mara Fabbri e Vincenzo Falco che hanno unito le loro competenze nell'organizzazione di viaggi studio al loro desiderio di creare delle esperienze di studio all'estero con la stessa cura che metterebbero per i loro figli. Che cosa ci guida: - Il nostro motto, "Pensiamo ai tuoi figli come fossero i nostri", non è solo uno slogan, ma la nostra filosofia radicata. Con un team, in gran parte composto da mamme, comprendiamo le preoccupazioni e le speranze dei genitori. Offriamo più di un semplice supporto: siamo qui per te, fornendo assistenza continua e impegno sincero. Con Zainetto Verde, la tua famiglia è nelle mani di chi comprende veramente il significato profondo del viaggiare per imparare. - Non ci limitiamo a creare viaggi studio; plasmiamo esperienze di crescita e apprendimento uniche all'estero per tutte le età. Dai programmi di vacanza studio e di anno scolastico all'estero a soggiorni studio e work experiences, il nostro impegno va oltre quello di un semplice tour operator: siamo custodi delle esperienze di vita e delle aspirazioni educative dei tuoi figli.

Name: Valentour Incoming
HQ Location: Italy, Calabria, Tropea, 17 Piazza Vittorio Veneto, 89861
Company description: Dal 2001, trasformiamo l’amore per la Calabria e il Sud Italia in esperienze uniche. Come DMC e specialisti del turismo incoming, siamo il partner ideale per tour operator italiani e internazionali alla ricerca di autentiche esperienze locali in Calabria, Sicilia e Puglia. Grazie a un team di esperti profondi conoscitori del territorio, selezioniamo con cura hotel e resort di alto livello, offrendo sistemazioni perfette sia per soggiorni al mare che in montagna. Inoltre, attraverso il nostro brand V-Collection, gestiamo direttamente una serie di strutture ricettive in Calabria, tra cui: ananea Tropea Yachting Resort: un resort di lusso situato sul lungomare di Tropea, di fronte al Porticciolo Turistico. B&B Palazzo Toraldo di Francia: un antico palazzo nobiliare trasformato in un moderno bed & breakfast nel cuore di Tropea. B&B Blu Tropea Maison: situato all'interno di uno storico palazzo nobiliare, offre un soggiorno autentico a Tropea. Sentido Michelizia Tropea Resort: un resort nel centro di Tropea con vista panoramica sul porto e sulla costa. Villaggio Baia d’Ercole: un villaggio a Capo Vaticano ideale per famiglie, con numerosi servizi e comfort. Residenza Borgo Italico: una residenza che combina comfort moderno e tranquillità vicino a Tropea e Capo Vaticano. La nostra missione è valorizzare le meraviglie del Sud Italia, garantendo ai nostri partner un servizio impeccabile e personalizzato, per far vivere ai loro clienti la vera essenza di questa terra straordinaria.

Name: Perlatours
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Calella, 69-75 C/ Sant Jaume, 08370
Company description: Founded in 1995 with the Spanish market on the basis that we will continue how the company began. A transformation in the political enquiry and the confidence which our clients have placed in us, has seen Perla Tours Travel Agency grow considerably, allowing us to expand to become an important factor in the tourist industry worldwide and having the necessary aptitude to meet the differing needs of our clients. The concept which presides with our team is flexibility based on a modern, open mentality and a vision of the future. We listen to our clients in order that we can adapt ourselves to their needs and offer them solutions which allow them to achieve full satisfaction. These are the key factors to obtaining our quality of service. We give personal attention to every market and every client, offering a wide range of possibilities and using all our quality of service. We have a young dynamic and creative team with a wealth of experience in the necessary technology, working together to aspire to the expectations and confidence wich our clients have placed with us. Competitiveness, efficiency and flexibility are our proposals

Name: Viajes Surland
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 20 Calle De San Bernardo, 28015
Company description: Agencia de Viajes Mayorista Receptiva especializada en mercado latinoamericano. Circuitos en autocar por Europa, Lejano oriente, estancias para clientes individuales, city breaks, alquiler de coches, alojamientos con encanto, rutas enogastronómicas. Rutas en bus para grupos, incentivos, congresos. Empresa con alta orientación a los viajes de calidad , fundada en 1983.  Otras empresas del grupo son Imagine , Click On Line ( Receptivo Mercado europeo, asiatico y americano ). Sunotel ( cadena de hoteles que en la actualidad cuenta con 1 hotel en Madrid y 3 hoteles en Barcelona ).

Name: NEX Travel
Company description: Vart vill du resa? Det är ungefär allt vi behöver veta som din personliga  resebyrå i jobbet. Sen tar vi hand om hela resan och tänker på allting åt  dig – med ansvar från dörr till dörr och planering till fakturering. Så att du  kan luta dig tillbaka och tänka på annat. Vi finns där före, under och efter  resan. Du får tag på oss när du vill och du får hjälp när du behöver. Med hjärtat i Norrbotten, med stora och små kunder över hela Sverige och  med vida världen som arbetsplats, gör vi din affärsresa trygg, enkel och  trevlig. Vi är din bästa resekompis, brukar vi säga. Det är fint att få vara.  Trevlig resa! NEX Travel är norra Sveriges största affärsresebyrå.  Bolaget grundades 1975 och ägs idag av Unlimited Travel Group.

Name: Beder
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 162 164 Carrer De La Llacuna, 80818
Company description: Think of Beder as the ultimate combination of TikTok's addictive videos and TripAdvisor's travel expertise. Our B2C platforms allow users to explore destinations through videos from real travellers and book experiences seamlessly through our website or app.   Our B2B solutions provide businesses such as airlines, cruise lines, travel agencies and activity providers with a library of quality, brand-aligned, out-of-the-box video content. And here's the key: EXCLUSIVITY: As long as our customer subscribes to a video, it's theirs alone.   With Beder, we're not just changing the way we travel, we're redefining the way we discover, plan and experience the world.

Name: KARTAGO TOURS A.s.
Company description: slovak travel agency Egypt - Tunisia - Greek islands - Spain - Morroco - Turkey - Dominican republic - Mexico - Cuba - Isla Margarita - SAE branch offices around Slovakia - Bratislava - Nove Zamky - Nitra - Trnava - Trencin - Banska Bystrica - Zilina - Poprad - Presov - Kosice

Name: Viajes Allsun S. A.
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, 7 Carrer De Fluvià, 07009
Company description: Viajes Allsun es una agencia de viajes receptiva especializada en proporcionar experiencias únicas y personalizadas a nuestros clientes. Trabajamos en estrecha colaboración con Alltours España y Allsun Hotels para garantizar que cada viaje sea memorable y satisfactorio. Nuestro equipo de expertos en destinos está comprometido con la excelencia en el servicio y se esfuerza por superar las expectativas de nuestros viajeros. Desde emocionantes aventuras hasta relajantes escapadas, en Viajes Allsun, nos encargamos de que cada detalle esté cuidado para que nuestros clientes disfruten al máximo de sus vacaciones.

Name: TUI TRAVELStar
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Hannover, 23 Karl-wiechert Allee, 30625
Company description: TUI TRAVELStar steht für eine optimale Unterstützung und einen starken Zusammenhalt: Rund 300 freie und qualitätsbewusste Reisebüros bauen auf die starke Partnerschaft zu Europas führendem Reiseveranstalter TUI, ohne dabei auf die eigene Freiheit zu verzichten. Entdecken Sie Ihre Perspektiven einer erfolgreichen Zusammenarbeit. Wir bieten Ihnen ein umfangreiches und qualitativ hochwertiges Leistungspaket sowie ein breites Dienstleistungsangebot, auf das Sie wahlweise zurückgreifen können. Eine starke Marktpräsenz, kompetente Unterstützung im Marketing, ein umfassendes Schulungsprogramm, persönliche Betreuung, innovative Technik und besonders die sehr attraktiven Provisionen sind die Grundlagen für Ihren persönlichen Unternehmenserfolg. Gehen Sie mit uns auf Erfolgskurs - wir halten Sie fit für den Wettbewerb! Beständiger Austausch, professionelle Zusammenarbeit, Gemeinschaft und familiäre Verbundenheit zeichnen uns aus. Ob Regionaltagungen, Managementtage oder Jahrestagungen – unsere Familientreffen sind Ihr Garant für einen lebendigen und kreativen Austausch im Rahmen einer starken Kooperation. Profitieren Sie von den Erfahrungen einer starken Gemeinschaft und werden Sie Teil der TUI TRAVELStar Famile. Wir freuen uns auf Sie!

Name: Gruppo STAT
HQ Location: Italy, Piedmont, Casale Monferrato, 28 Via Pier Enrico Motta, 15033
Company description: Dal 1919 il Gruppo STAT opera nel settore dei trasporti e del turismo, attraverso le sue agenzie di viaggio e non, ha creato un' importante rete commerciale in cui svolge il ruolo di Tour Operator sviluppando al proprio interno prodotti di successo e qualità; tramite le sue aziende il gruppo opera nel settore del trasporto pubblico e privato nell'Italia nord occidentale con attività di noleggio bus ed autolinee. Il Gruppo STAT è leader del territorio nel settore del business travel. I numeri del gruppo: 180 dipendenti, 110 bus, 1 officina meccanica centralizzata, 5 depositi, 1 tour operator, 6 agenzie viaggio.  Since 1919 the STAT Group acts in the ground transport and tourism area, mainly through its bus fleet and the travel agencies, but not only, it has created a strong commercial Tour Operating Network and developed its own quality products which achieved a large success. Through its companies, the group operates in the public and private coach transportation mainly in the northwest of Italy. STAT Group is also leader for business travel solution to several companies in his own area. Group numbers: 180 employees, 110 buses, 1 centralized mechanical workshop, 5 bus deposit, 1 tour operator, 6 travel agencies.

Name: Viajes Aliguer
Company description: Agencia de viajes que se dedica exclusivamente a importar turismo a España y Portugal tanto de forma mayorista como minorista. Nos respaldan 40 años de experiencia en el sector para ofrecer el mejor servicio turístico como de incentivos. Tour operator specialized on Incoming tourism in Spain and Portugal. 40 years of experience in this market allows us to offer the best turistic and incentive services.

Name: TourRadar
Company description: TourRadar is a leading online platform based in Vienna, Austria, that connects travelers with over 2,500 adventure operators worldwide, offering more than 50,000 organized tours across 160 countries. Founded by brothers Travis and Shawn Pittman, the company is dedicated to democratizing adventure tourism, making it accessible and sustainable for everyone. TourRadar's mission is to enrich the world through curated adventures, fostering cultural diversity and promoting responsible travel practices. The platform simplifies the travel planning process by providing a user-friendly interface where customers can easily search, compare, and book unique travel experiences tailored to their interests and budgets. Targeting a diverse clientele that includes individual travelers, families, travel agencies, and adventure enthusiasts, TourRadar partners with trusted local operators to ensure high-quality service and authentic experiences. The company emphasizes customer satisfaction by offering 24/7 support, flexible payment options, and a best-price guarantee, making it a reliable choice for those seeking memorable travel experiences. Additionally, TourRadar is committed to environmental sustainability, providing tools for travelers to understand and offset their carbon footprint, thereby ensuring that their adventures positively impact local communities and the planet. With a focus on creating a global community of passionate explorers, TourRadar aims to inspire and empower travelers to explore the world with confidence. By leveraging technology and strategic partnerships, the company enhances the travel experience, making global exploration accessible to all. Whether it's a solo traveler seeking adventure or a family looking for a unique getaway, TourRadar offers a comprehensive marketplace for multi-day tours that cater to various interests and preferences.

Name: Primarete Viaggi E Vacanze Network
Company description: Il gruppo Primarete Viaggi e Vacanze opera nel settore turistico con una rete di oltre 100 agenzie filiali ed affiliate distribuite in tutto il territorio nazionale. Scegliere Primarete Viaggi e Vacanze significa avvalersi dell'esperienza di professionisti che hanno dedicato la loro vita nel turismo e che con passione lavorano ogni giorno al servizio delle Aziende, delle Agenzie di Viaggi e del Cliente. Oltre a collaborare con i migliori Tour Operator, Compagnie di Crociera e Compagnie Aeree, Primarete Viaggi e Vacanze ha sviluppato, nella sua esperienza pluriventennale, servizi dedicati alle proprie Agenzie per rispondere alle esigenze di ogni cliente, al passo con l’evoluzione dei trend e del mercato.

Name: Esatour Opera&Music Travels
Company description: Esatour Opera&Music Travels is the internationally known Italian tour operator providing and promoting of the best opera and music events in Italy and Europe.  Established in 1997 in Pesaro, Italy, Esatour has always been able to detect and develop solutions for a wide audience of experts and enthusiasts.  Esatour staff has always been made of  professionals with cultural and organizational expertise, shaped by years of experience in the fieldwork, that our customers trust and respect. Esatour O&M is recognized by cultural and musical insiders the  capability to design and offer “tailormade” solutions shaped on customers’ needs, creating specialized and professional packages including tickets services, hoel, guided tours, transfers, thematic evenings and many more options.  Esatour Opera&Music Travels srl  is a company connected with important referrals located in the main european Capitals, to broaden in time its offer and catalogue: “We always want to impress and surprise our partners with original, comprehensive and above all exclusive proposals “. Our proposals include full packages with ticketing services for all primary international events and festivals: Opera with the most important lyric events in Italy  and Europe, music and culture.  Our mission Since the beginning we have always worked with commitment, skill and accuracy. Giving importance to details, listening to customers, prompt fulfilment of custom requests, growing a reliable network of contacts built at national and international level with important and professional stakeholders: efforts that have allowed us to grow and become a firm and established company in our fields. Our growing customers reward us with trust and continuity, that we use to build partnerships and the sharing of new and important challanges.  Our team Esatour Opera&Music organization provides customers with direct personal reference for each area of interest.

Name: Verdesicilia Tour Operator
Company description: VERDESICILIA is a Tour Operator specialized in incoming tourism in all Italy. More than ten years ago we started the commercialization of the whole South of Italy, Sicily and Malta and now we can offer Italy from the extreme north to the southern part.  Verdesicilia is a part of the corporate group AGGroup, which also includes the department of M.I.C.E. and one of the most important company of Luxury Bus and Cars.   In all ours destinations we can offer a wide variety of services for individuals and for groups and we cover all the southern regions of Italy and the island of Malta    In our confidential rates you'll see our: §     Regular guaranteed tours §     Regular Excursions from the most important touristic places §     Huge hotel's offer   §     Fly&Drive Packages and car rental  §     Combined tour between the regions before mentioned  §     Beach stays §     Transfers §     Excursions and general incoming services §     Special Programs §     Luxury Programs

Name: Bus2alps
Company description: Bus2alps is the leading tour operator for 20-somethings who want an authentic experience visiting Europe's top destinations. Bus2alps operates valuable experiences that allow our travel enthusiasts to explore more of Europe.

Name: Reserva Del Higuerón
Company description: Un lugar de ensueño situado entre Fuengirola y Benalmádena, pensado para aquellas personas que apuestan por la calidad de vida. Una urbanización diferente a nivel arquitectónico y urbanístico, que ha construido sus pilares fundamentales en torno a la naturaleza, la salud, el deporte y la seguridad. La urbanización se encuentra en lo alto de la montaña, lo que garantiza vistas espectaculares al Mediterráneo y la Bahía de Fuengirola, a tan sólo 10 minutos del Aeropuerto Internacional de Málaga y a 15 minutos de la Estación de Trenes “María Zambrano”. Un recinto cerrado con acceso controlado, circuito de vigilancia por cámaras y guardias de seguridad las 24 horas.  Cuenta con una amplia tipología de viviendas, desde apartamentos de 1 dormitorio hasta villas de máximo lujo. Dentro del recinto funciona el Sport Club Reserva del Higuerón, un centro lúdico y deportivo, con sala de fitness, 11 pistas de pádel y 2 de tenis, piscinas exterior e interior, y un moderno circuito de SPA dirigido por cualificados profesionales.  En la urbanización también se encuentra un Centro comercial: todos los servicios y comodidades a un paso. Además de lavandería, bares y restaurantes, agencia de viajes, papelería, asesoría y todas las comodidades para la vida diaria. El 2012 abrió sus puertas en nuestra urbanización el Hotel THB Reserva del Higuerón, un hotel para adultos único, moderno, confortable, amplio y espacioso en pleno corazón de la Costa del Sol.

Name: Olympia Kaukomatkatoimisto
Company description: Olympia on suomalainen, perinteinen ja perheomisteinen kiertomatkojen järjestäjä yli 70 vuoden kokemuksella. Teemme matkoja kaikille mantereille ja yli 80 maahan.  Tuotamme myös erikoisryhmämatkoja asiakkaan toiveiden mukaisesti niin yritysryhmille, yhdistyksille, järjestöille kuin myös kaveri- ja harrasteporukoille.   Teemme kaikki järjestelyt puolestasi tarjoamalla lennot, majoituksen, maakuljetukset, kattavan ohjelman sekä ateriat. Konseptimme sisältää tarvittaessa myös matkanjohtajapalvelun. Voit toteuttaa matkan omalle ryhmällesi, kun teitä on vähintään 10 aikuista.   Kiertomatkamme ovat usein kulttuuri-, historia- tai luontopainotteisia. Teemme myös urheilullisia aktiivimatkoja pyöräillen tai jalan. Valitsit sitten perinteisen kiertomatkan, safarin, luontomatkan, risteilyn tai aktiivimatkan - tavoitteenamme on aina tarjota unohtumaton elämys ja huoleton matkakokemus jokaiselle asiakkaallemme.   Suunnitellaan yhdessä tuleva matkasi: www.olympia.fi/tietoa-meista/raataloity-matka-omalle-ryhmallesi ___________ OLYMPIA Air Travel Ltd. is a Finnish, traditional and family-owned tour operator with over 70 years of experience. We organize tours to all continents and over 80 countries. We also produce specialty group tours according to the client's wishes for corporate groups, associations, organizations, as well as friend and hobby groups. We handle all arrangements on your behalf and provide flights, accommodation, ground transportation, comprehensive programs and meals. Our concept also includes the option of tour leader services if needed. You can organize a trip for your own group when there are at least 10 adults. Our tours often focus on culture, history or nature. We also offer sporty active trips by bike or on foot. Whether you choose a traditional tour, safari, nature tour, cruise or active trip - our goal is always to offer an unforgettable experience and a worry-free travel experience for every customer.

Name: Orchidea Viaggi
Company description: A team made of operators who, for decades, have shared the passion of travel organization with the founder, Mr. Giafranco Mainardi, the one who have gained the great merit of knowing how to listen and propose solutions and advice that they themselves would follow for their travels around the world. Our distinguishing factors: • Creativity • Technology • Collaboration • Open doors Thanks to the commitment we put into our daily work and the collaboration of travel agencies to which we ensure professionalism, quality, competitiveness and a correct commission, we hope to go a long way together to have both the right rewards, professional and economic.

Name: Anton Götten GmbH
Company description: Die Welt des Reisens unter einem Dach Im Saarbrücker „Haus der Reise“ sind alle Sparten des Reiseunternehmens Anton Götten Reisen unter einem Dach: der Busreiseveranstalter, der Flusskreuzfahrten- und der Seekreuzfahrtenspezialist. Darüber hinaus sind Anton Götten Reisen im firmeneigenen Reisebüro in Saarbrücken und Neunkirchen sowie in vielen hundert Reisebüros deutschlandweit buchbar.

Name: Surprice Car Rentals
Company description: Surprice Car Rentals is a day to day growing car rental network, which provides high quality services to its customers. Our priority as a company is to provide quality services at affordable rates and flexible terms and conditions, combined with real 24 hours support that has established us as one of the most competitive companies in the market. Surprice Car Rentals combines service, technology and professionalism required nowadays at the rent a car market. During the last years, we have made major steps in order to ensure a dynamic and a leading position in the car rental market, by expanding our business in other countries. Our franchisees use our trademarks, support, technology and mostly business philosophy. Surprice Car Rentals is constituted of highly trained and well experienced personnel and it uses the latest technology in order to achieve its targets. Our in office IT department has developed a main reservation and car rental management system, in which our partners have the opportunity and the accessibility to manage their reservations in real time, easily and effectively. We are offering to our associates a warm, friendly and professional cooperation, acting and responding quickly and responsibly to any issues arising. Surprice Car Rentals cooperates with tour operators, travel agencies and online reservation systems, from all over the world and every year provides service to thousands satisfied customers, as our complaints percentage is lower than many multinational companies in the market.

Name: Viktors Farmor Worldwide Expeditions
Company description: Viktors Farmor Worldwide Expeditions is a travel agency with cultural and nature tours as its core products. The company sends around 3,200 passengers more than 80 countries annually. Mainly in small groups of 12 to 20 participants depending on the destination and local transportation. A Danish tour leader follows each group in co-operation with a local English-speaking guide. Viktors Farmor follows these principles: Small groups - 20 customers is the maximum for our tours. Danish tour leaders - with practical and social skills, and a good basic knowledge of the destination.  Local English-speaking guides - with the detailed knowledge of country and lifestyle. Well-planned tours – with a detailed day-to-day itinerary. “Meet the people” – is key to us. We like to include experiences like a local dinner or lunch with a family, visit a local home, a tribal village, a farm or a school etc.  Time for the spontaneous events – when the chance is there, we like to grab it!

Name: GEM Group
Company description: GEM TRAVEL was founded by Mr Michalakis George in Rhodes in 1991 as an incoming tourism agent. Since then GEM Travel is enjoying a dynamic growth every year regarding the number of the passengers and the markets that we provide our services. The knowledge and the professionalism of the owner and his team, develop long term partnerships with tour operators from 22 markets.  From 2014 GEM Travel starts operating in Kos Island , offering a full package of tourism services such as hotels , transfers and excursions. The last years Gem Travel was evolved in one of the biggest Destination Management Company in the island of Rhodes and Kos.  Our Mission “Building unforgettable memories and relationships through travel” Our value is to achieve total client satisfaction by creating unique tourism icons and experiences based to the quality, the value and the differentiation of our services. To achieve strong and long term partnerships with tour operator around the world by sharing our  25 years experience, knowledge and professionalism. Our vision is to become the leading Destination Management Company in Rhodes and Kos Island , providing all possible tourism services , focus to the highest quality and the best value for money relationship. The main office of Gem Travel is in Rhodes. We are operating with our own offices in Kos Island and we have a strong network of partnership’s round all Greek Islands.  We can provide all the necessary services to tour operators as well to Groups and Incentives. These include: Accommodation Transportation (incl. disabled) Excursions Groups - Events - Conference Gem Travel also has designed and offers V.I.P. accommodation, transfer and excursion services aiming at providing high quality services, comfort, privacy and security of passengers. The services can be provided to small groups and individual clients

Name: RESTEL
Company description: Restel, a global hotel supplier, is integrated into de Tourism Area of Grupo Hotusa and plays a strategic role in the commercialization of portfolio of hotels associated with Keytel, world’s leader in hotel representation and properties integrated in other areas of Grupo Hotusa. In 2019, Restel reached a business volume superior to 600M euros. Founded in 1982 and with a catalogue of over 125.000 establishments spread across five continents, Restel dedicates its business activity to the distribution of hotels in 150 countries and more than 10.000 destinations worldwide. The company’s advanced technology supported by an in-house API development guarantees the access to extensive hotel directory with high availability. Currently, it distributes offline to more than 25.000 travel agencies, while through API connectivity to more than 1.000 customers: global wholesalers, major OTAs and tour operators. With its headquarters located in Madrid, Restel disposes of a network of 200 employees distributed around Spain, Portugal, France, United Kingdom, Italy, UAE, China, Argentina, Brazil, Colombia and Mexico.

Name: Huttopia Nederland
Company description: De Huttopia Groep, bedenker en beheerder van natuurcampings, is een Frans familiebedrijf dat in 1999 in Lyon is opgericht en sindsdien een sterke groei heeft doormaakt.  Op dit moment zijn er vele campings in Frankrijk, maar ook enkele in o.a. Nederland, België, China en Amerika.  In 2023 telde Huttopia maar liefst 105 camping in 8 landen en had ze meer dan 700 vaste medewerkers en meer dan 1700 seizoensmedewerkers in dienst. Huttopia heeft als uitgangspunt te blijven groeien, waardoor er elk jaar weer nieuwe campings bijkomen en oudere campings opgeknapt worden. De komende jaren zal Huttopia zich verder uitbreiden in onder andere Nederland, Zweden, België en Frankrijk.  Onze kracht is dat wij mensen en natuur weer samenbrengen – op unieke locaties in het hart van de natuur en met onze eigen unieke accommodaties. Onze campings liggen allemaal in een gebied met een schitterend uitzicht, een bos en vaak een bron van water. Het Huttopia concept wordt getypeerd doordat dat we de natuur respecteren en dus niet zullen vernietigen bij de aanlegging en exploitatie van een camping. Daarbij zijn de campings ruim opgezet, waardoor de gasten veel ruimte hebben. Het creëren van 'family time' en rust zijn belangrijke uitgangspunten.  Het hoofdkantoor van Huttopia is gevestigd in Lyon, met daarbij meer dan 60 verschillende campings in Frankrijk. In Utrecht hebben wij op het kantoor een reisbureau voor de Nederlandse, Duitse en Engelse markt, een winkel en hier wordt ook de marketing voor Noord-Europa gedaan.  Voor meer informatie over het concept en de campings kun je een kijkje nemen op onze website: https://europe.huttopia.com/nl/

Name: Southern Cross Tour Operator
Company description: Turoperador especializado en viajes a medida a destinos en todo el mundo, y con oficinas en Barcelona y Madrid, Southern Cross diseña anualmente el más lujoso y completo catálogo de viajes, que es distribuido a agencias de viajes en toda España y Andorra. Con especial énfasis en viajes de experiencia, un equipo altamente cualificado de diseñadores crea elaborados programas a la carta para parejas, familias y pequeños grupos. ___________ Trade-only luxury tour operator designing bespoke tailor-made journeys to worldwide destinations. With offices in Barcelona and Madrid, Southern Cross produces Spain’s most luxurious and comprehensive travel book on a yearly basis, which is then distributed to travel agencies throughout Spain and Andorra. With a special stress on experiential travel, a highly qualified team of travel specialists creates bespoke journeys for both individuals and small groups.

Name: Jefe De Ventas Nacional Division Tour Operadores Grupo Avoris
Company description: Desde que se constituyó como agencia mayorista de viajes en 1986, Travelplan se ha configurado como el primer touroperador del mercado español tanto en número de destinos como en número de pasajeros. Su programación abarca todo tipo de productos y destinos. Las claves del éxito de Travelplan como touroperador han sido desde un principio las siguientes:  * Especialización en determinados destinos turísticos basados en vuelos especiales operados por Air Europa.  * Desarrollo de productos que abarcan a todos los segmentos de mercado y a una amplia variedad de destinos en todo el mundo.  * La contratación de grandes volúmenes en determinados destinos es lo que ha permitido una significativa reducción de los costes medios y ofertar unas condiciones inmejorables de mercado. Travelplan ha sido pionera en la apertura de tendencias turísticas proporcionando por primera vez al consumidor español la oportunidad de viajar a distintos destinos a un precio razonable.  Travelplan cuenta con la última tecnología informática para la realización de reservas, así como un cualificado equipo humano, lo que permite dar un inmejorable servicio a las agencias de viajes minoristas de nuestro país.

Name: Cuba Travel Network
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Amsterdam, 60 Alexander Boersstraat, 1071
Company description: We are not that classic travel agency that can send you to many different destinations with a few possible travel itineraries. We live in Cuba. We are Cuban. We love Cuba! We can make almost anything happen for you in Cuba. We can offer so much more than an ordinary agency can offer. We’re your local host, with international standards. Instead of wishing you a great holiday, we welcome you to Cuba. We will help you to truly grasp Cuba at every layer that Cuba has to offer. We will make sure that you feel listened, so we can design a travel experience that truly fits your needs. We will help you to ‘get local’, with one-off experiences, just for you.  Since our launch in 2002, we have become the world’s #1 company specialized in independent travel to Cuba. We sell directly to the public, via our network of websites, and through thousands of retail travel agencies worldwide. Last year we booked services for some 50,000 travellers, originating from more than 120 countries.  Our team consists of some 30-people spread across our offices in Curacao, Cuba, the Netherlands and Australia. Our Cuba branch office in Havana is our largest physical presence where some 30 of our colleagues are based and our senior management team (CEO, CFO, CMO, CSO) is based at our Europe office in Amsterdam.

Name: Alpetour Klassenfahrten & Gruppenreisen
Company description: Die alpetour Touristische GmbH zählt mit 60 Jahren Erfahrung zur Liste der größten Reiseveranstalter in Deutschland. Rund 130 hochmotivierte Mitarbeiter/innen unterstützen Gruppen aller Art bei der Planung, Organisation und Durchführung von Gruppenreisen weltweit. Der Reiseveranstalter gilt mit mehr als 8.000 Reisegruppen und rund 300.000 Reiseteilnehmern als Spezialist für Klassenfahrten und Gruppenreisen. Im Bereich Klassenfahrten gilt alpetour als Marktführer in Deutschland.

Name: Greenland Travel
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Copenhagen, 13a 1 Wilders Plads, 1403
Company description: About us Greenland Travel Agency is the world's largest specialist in and provider of trips to Greenland. We are experts in package tours, individual trips, and business trips, not just in Greenland, but also Iceland and other Arctic regions. You will find us in Copenhagen and Aalborg in Denmark, as well as in the four largest cities in Greenland, Nuuk, Sisimiut, Ilulissat, and Qaqortoq. Greenland Travel is fully owned by Air Greenland and, through this, we are part of the Air Greenland Group. Our travel specialists are all of Greenlandic origin or have lived there, so we know what we are talking about. The company has been up and running for more than 30 years, so we are not afraid to call ourselves the leading travel experts in Greenland.  We offer Package tours with and without travel guides, group tours, individual trips, tailor-made trips, business trips, meetings, conferences, events, and team building. Greenland Travel Agency is IATA certified, a member of the Danish Travel Agency Association and, of course, the Danish Travel Guarantee Fund (Rejsegarantifonden).

Name: Travel Agency Reisiekspert
Company description: Full service travel agency, tour operator, professional conference organiser (PCO) and destination management company (DMC) based in Estonia and offering services inside and outside Estonia. We provide both online and offline services (offices in Tallinn, Tartu, Viljandi, Pärnu).

Name: Dolomite Mountains
HQ Location: Italy, Bolzano, San, 18 Strada Micurá De Rü, 39030
Company description: Dolomite Mountains is the only high-end inbound tour operator based in the Dolomites, providing the benefit of local knowledge and expertise unlike any other: the real Dolomites. Our passionate, expert travel consultants not only hail from the region, the Italian Alps of Northern Italy, but they have in-depth knowledge of the area, essential to produce the perfect, custom designed itinerary. Moreover, our local English Speaking Professional Mountain Hiking and Skiing Guides hold the highest international certifications, and are whole lot of fun to travel with! Our travel experiences unfold in areas of outstanding beauty, immersed in UNESCO World Heritage Site landscapes. Our trips are not only active, but also authentic, inspired by the local culture and traditional cuisine to provide the most rewarding cultural and gourmet experiences. Our luxury trips are indulgent, with active and leisurely days, combining luxurious accommodations and impeccable level of service, allowing our guests to unwind and to discover the Dolomites and surroundings at a relaxed pace. Dolomite Mountains is not only about the Dolomites: our knowledge and experience have enabled us to craft unique experiences ‘Beyond’ our mountains, including active and leisure experiences in Sardina and Lake Garda; trip extensions to Venice, the Prosecco region of Northern Italy, and the lesser known Friuli region. Another exciting addition to our portfolio is ‘Caballadas’, at our founder’s family estancia. Nestled in the heart of the Patagonian Andes in Argentina, we offer exciting horseback and fly fishing experiences for the avid travellers seeking a unique and exclusive retreat in secluded luxury!   At Dolomite Mountains, we combine the beauty of each incredible region we visit, with accommodations that best reflect the style of the area, and local guides who love sharing insights beyond what other companies offer, providing guests with the ultimate, exclusive, personal experience!

Name: Voxel An Amadeus company
Company description: Voxel develops digitization solutions for the value chain: electronic invoices and approval flows, electronic payments, supplier management, electronic orders and delivery notes, expense management and connection with public administrations through its Bavel platform. Bavel Billing is the leading e-invoicing solution; Bavel Pay, the B2B payment solution; and Bavel Procurement digitizes the entire supply chain and automates all related processes. The Bavel platform has more than 70,000 hotels, 1,000 tour operators and travel companies, 1,200 food, beverage and maintenance suppliers, and 3,000 restaurants and franchises. Voxel is present in 100 countries and the Bavel network handles more than 100 million transactions per year. Founded in 1998 in Barcelona, Voxel has 25 years of experience in the development of technological solutions, helping clients in the travel sector to digitize 100% of their billing processes. We have grown and innovated to continue providing value in the purchasing, invoicing and payment circuits to all types of companies, with a strong commitment to efficiency, process improvement and innovation.  Recently, Voxel has joined Amadeus with the ambition to create the largest payment partner in the travel industry.  But the best part is that, at the same time, we have fun! Our values #PeopleFreaks #ChallengeManiacs #FUNtasticTeamPlayers and #ChangeLovers are part of everyone and guide our decision-making. Voxel’s culture and values are rooted in our purpose as a company: to promote the happiness of those who make up the organization through personal and professional development, thus achieving a fairer and more sustainable society.

Name: Eurohotel Group
Company description: EUROHOTEL Group - Crete is a business group including four Hotels, a Car Rental Company and a Seaside Restaurant. We are part of: KATRIN SUITES Boutique Hotel (adults only)  located in Stalis/Heraklion KATRIN HOTEL & BUNGALOWS   located in Stalis/Heraklion AZURE MARE HOTEL (adults only) located in Hersonissos. THEO HOTEL located in Agia Marina / Chania. EASY AUTO rent a car with service all over the island  ISOLA SEASIDE RESTAURANT Agia Marina / Chania. Eurohotel Group  wants to grow with the ambition of new and naturally continued preference of its customers, so that the group can keep up and improve the service standard. We carry on striving for the best quality of service and achieving our goal for excellent accommodation and our customers' relaxation. Eurohotel Group  has been awarded  by  travel organizations and tour operators in recognition of the high quality of the services provided and its respect for the environment.

Name: Adventura
Company description: Adventura group consist of Adventura Travel Agency Worldwide, China Tours Travel Agency and Pragia Incoming agency. Adventura Worldwide is the Czech travel agency specializing in outdoor adventure as a biking, rafting and high-altitude tourism and also sightseeing travel. We cover 82 countries on 5 continents. Our agency has been established in 1990 right after Velvet revolution.

Name: Coach Partners
Company description: Coach Partners (CP) is met 400+ bussen één van de drie grootste autocarbedrijven in België. CP heeft per provincie een tweeledige structuur.  Eén autocarbedrijf;  Coach Partners die dank zij een lage kostenstructuur en een foutloze werking uitmuntend is in vervoersopdrachten ; Eén reisorganisator – Viamundi - die uitmuntend is in  het organiseren van belevingsreizen voor (gesloten) groepen. Voor een groep gaan deuren open die anders gesloten blijven, de convivialiteit boost de beleving. De baseline van Viamundi is dan ook : 'IK beleef MEER in GROEP"

Name: Cyberlogic
HQ Location: Greece, Crete, Irákleion, 85 Leoforos Dimokratias 1st & 2nd Floors, 713 06
Company description: Cyberlogic revolutionizes the travel supply chain with cutting-edge technology, focusing on Tour Operators and Destination Management Companies (DMCs). Our innovative solutions drive digital transformation, by boosting efficiency, optimizing operations, and delivering outstanding travel experiences through continuous technological excellence.

Name: Liligo
Company description: Liligo is a travel search engine which instantly compares available flights on websites of travel agencies and airlines, including low cost companies. Under this brand, we compare car rental deals and hotel rooms as well. We got offices in Paris, Budapest and Barcelona with a presence across 4 continents. Our plan is to steadily improve both our technology and our business, so we are looking for talented people who are passionate and motivated about making an impact and helping us change the world by empowering consumers to find the best travel deals across the web. Liligo is part of eDreams ODIGEO, one of the world's largest online travel companies and one of the largest European e-commerce businesses. Under its four leading online travel agency brands – eDreams, GO Voyages, Opodo, Travellink, and the metasearch engine Liligo – it offers the best deals in regular flights, low-cost airlines, hotels, cruises, car rental, dynamic packages, holiday packages and travel insurance to make travel easier, more accessible, and better value for the more than 18,5 million customers it serves across 43 markets. eDreams ODIGEO is listed in the Spanish Stock Market.

Name: Scandinavian Near East Agency S.A.
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Piraeus, 35-39 Akti Miaouli Street, 18535
Company description: SCANDINAVIAN NEAR EAST AGENCY S.A. (SNEAL), for over a century, remain a very important Agency by offering high class services in the representation of some of the top shipping companies, forwarding, customs clearance as well as export and import of various commodities from all over the world. SNEAL have started the new millennium confidently and looks forward to new business developments opportunities, based on the experience, reputation and the high standards of the qualified personnel, the combination of which guarantees the full satisfaction for SNEAL's customers. Scandinavian Near East Agency S.A. (SNEAL) offer a wide variety of services, as follows: SHIPPING SERVICES INLAND HAULAGE CONTAINER CONTROL CONTAINER REPAIR VESSELS ATTENDANCE SERVICES COMPRISING:  Clearance in and out Stevedoring Pre-planning of stowage Supervisions of cargo loading/discharging through attendance by SNEAL port supervisor Cargo documentation Container stuffing/unstuffing  Depot Worldwide transshipments  Chartering & brokering Supply of bunker & luboil Fresh water supply Supply of deck / engine stores and provisions Crew changes Crew medical attendance  Custom clearance for speedy delivery of spare parts Tank & hull cleaning Maintenance & repair of vessels Survey for: quantity & quality of cargo, hull & machinery, draft CRUISE VESSELS Attending to all matters concerning cruise vessels calling Piraeus or any other Greek port.  Inbound Tour Operator services are offered through our fully owned subsidiary, STAT Hellas S.A., which offers a wide variety of services including shore excursions, pre/post tours and tailor-made programs of high quality throughout Greece.

Name: MAZI TRAVEL & EVENTS
Company description: Mazi Travel & Events is a distinguished agency, specializing in the provision of exceptional services for tourists traveling to Greece and Cyprus. With 30 years of experience, 3 agencies in Athens, Thessaloniki and Cyprus and with an impressive fleet of coaches. Mazi travel is a tour operator specializing in cultural, MICE, leisure travel destinations, both for individuals and groups. F.I.T - Incentives. Our expertise and rich experience, inspired by the knowledge and the taste of our customers originating from all over the world, allow us to consider ourselves an essential partner for everyone wishing to organize their travel be it for leisure or business reason to Greece. Mazi travel & events is member of IATA, ETOA, W.T.O.A, PATA, HATTA. Over the years we have learned to respect the traveler, and continually improve all our travel destinations following the current trends.

Name: Urbany Hostels
Company description: Urbany Hostels belongs to Grup RV some of their brands include RV Hotels and Rosa dels Vents.  It all started in 1976 with a Catalan farmhouse and three years later with a travel agency. This Catalan farmhouse became the 1st of all the facilities managed by Rosa dels Vents in Spain, both for summer camps and school stays. Currently Rosa dels Vents is the leading company in the field of youth tourism in Spain, and the 1st holiday camp company to obtain the ISO 9001 quality certificate and biosphere tourism accreditation. The travel agency began in the post-war era and was the dream of a few young travellers who wanted to make it possible to explore the world, experience new cultures and have adventures.  Nowadays it is one of the oldest travel agencies in Spain with CIF A-08626483. The company grew as the years passed and slowly the hotel division known as RV Hotels took shape. Today we have 11 hotels and more than 350 apartments along the Spanish coast. Urbany hostels started with the 2nd generation of this family business in 2006. The idea was to merge all the knowledge and experience gained through Rosa dels Vents and RV Hotels, and reinventing the concept of budget accommodation, without losing the essence of our origins in adventure tourism and backpacking. Urbany Hostels manages youth hostels for all type of travellers, we develop a mixed concept of accommodation between youth hostels & city hotels, moving away from the typical hostel or hotel services, and offering what our customers are looking for at the best quality. Today Urbany Hostels have 2 hostels in Barcelona, 1 in London, and very soon a new one in Milan.

Name: Natura-turist D.o.o. Travel Agency
HQ Location: Croatia, Lika-senj County, Plitvička Jezera, 132 Jezerce, 53231
Company description: NATURA-TURIST is travel agency with headquarters in The Plitvice Lakes National Park, Croatia. We are a travel agency which adapts to needs of our guests and partners, specialized for the Plitvice Lakes National Park, Croatia , Slovenia and Montenegro tours. We hope you will consider our mutual cooperation. We are sending you our list of most popular services. Our agency’s services are: - all transfers in Croatia, Slovenia, Bosnia & Herzegovina and Montenegro by very affordable prices (minivan 8+1, mini bus 19+1) - Plitvice Lakes tour with our licensed tourist guides (available on English, German, Italian, French and Spanish language) - Coordination with other local guides in other Croatian destinations - Croatia 7/8 days tours, Slovenia/Croatia/B&H/Montenegro tours, Plitvice weekend and 5 days tour - Private and hotel accommodation in Plitvice Lakes region - Rafting and kayaking - Team building These are our most popular services, and we hope you see in our services a chance for mutual cooperation. We look forward to your reply. Yours faithfully SLAVEN BROZOVIĆ General manager Jezerce BB, 53231 Plitvička Jezera,  Tel: +385 53 774 061, Fax: +385 53 774 061, Mob: 098/441-874 Website: www.plitvicebooking.com E-mail: info@plitvicebooking.com  MB: 01525255 ID HR-AB-53-020030217

Name: Nev - Dama
Company description: Nev-Dama is the leader in winter skiing holidays in the Czech Republic and Central Europe. The main focus is on providing ski holiday packages to the Alps. In the summer we offer packages for self-drive holidays as well as bus based tours to European destinations, and flights to favourite seaside destinations for reasonable prices. Every year, the services of Nev-Dama are used by more than 120,000 clients. In 2011 Nev-Dama and CK FISCHER (one of the biggest tour operators for summer holidays by sea) merged into the travel group FISCHER. This is now the biggest travel group in the Czech Republic and its services are used by more than 250,000 customers. The yearly turnover of the group has reached 3 billion CZK. In 2012, a third business brand, Privileq, was launched to organize tailor made luxury holidays. Additionally, the internet travel agency eTravel.cz, one of the biggest e-commerce sites in the Czech market, joined the group. Travel group FISCHER is part of KKCG’s financial and investment portfolio.

Name: BeBlue - Tour Operator & Yacht Broker
Company description: BeBlue is an international Tour Operator and Yacht Broker Company that present a various portfolio of sailing holidays all aroud the world, tailored on different mood to match any taste and desire.  Based on a strong and solid experience on the seas, BeBlue organize professional courses for Skippers, boat owners and sailing passionate. Passion driven, we believe and work every day for better quality on the water, training our Skippers and discovering new destinations. Visit BeBlue.it, take your time, select the best boat available on the market or the sailing tour you prefer and let the Holiday starts. Welcome on board...

Name: Traveltino
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Santa Cruz De Tenerife
Company description: TRAVELTINO has more than 40 specialised recruiters for destination, dynamic programming, Low Cost flights included in packages and circuits. In late 2013, it began its foray into Circuit and Long Trip programming, matching the current needs of clients to tablet and mobile technologies. Destinations such as Costa Rica, Thailand, China, Mexico, or those closer such as Morocco, Turkey, Egypt or Central Europe are some of its specialties. The Coasts in summer, as well as Special Operations to the Islands, are its core in high season, with dynamic packages, integrating services such as ONLINE car hire or transfers. In winter, City Breaks and Snow are its strengths, operating and contracting its own products around the world. A Tour Operator for the XXIst Century

Name: Touristation
Company description: We organize Guided Tours to the main monuments and heritage of Rome and much more 🗺️ ------------------------------------------------------- Touristation è un Tour Operator nato nel 2016 specializzato per ogni soluzione adatta alle esigenze del turismo moderno, con servizi personalizzati mirati alla valorizzazione delle risorse storiche, artistiche e paesaggistiche delle principali città italiane. Qualificato punto di riferimento nel settore dei tour per famiglie e dell’intrattenimento in generale, è inoltre ideatore e organizzatore di mostre di eccellenza visiva e di contenuti, sia permanenti che temporanee, al fine di far vivere innovative esperienze a turisti, visitatori e pellegrini.

Name: Hankyu Travel International Europe Srl
Company description: Hankyu Travel International Europe was founded in Madrid, Spain in 1991 as a European subsidiary of "Hanshin Friend Tour" - a brand specializing in tours of Europe. We are currently a wholly-owned subsidiary of "Hankyu Travel International Co., Ltd.", which is the core company of Hankyu Hanshin Holdings. Resident staff in our head office in Rome, Italy and in our branch offices of Madrid, Spain and Munich, Germany provide strong support not only for guests coming to Italy, Spain, and Germany, but also to those travelling elsewhere in Europe. We arrange various travel services including accommodation, buses, restaurant reservations, guides and various tickets primarily for the "Hanshin Friend Tour" brand, which is renowned for its "high-quality" services. Since 2008 we have made many satisfied customers by providing local travel arrangements for "Trapics" - the main brand of Hankyu Travel International Co., Ltd., "Crystal Heart" - a brand that pursues relaxing and high-quality travel, "Royal Collection" - a brand which delivers the finest tours, and "E-very" - a brand specializing in individual travel. We will continue to provide satisfying tours for our customers going forward. We also started arranging tours to Japan from Europe in 2008, and are registered as an authorized Japan Rail Pass agent. Today we handle general travel to Japan as the European sales rep of "Hankyu Travel International Co., Ltd." - a Japanese DMC, and as the planning and sales base of original tour brands "EST Hankyu" and "ORO tour". Leveraging the superior purchasing power and arrangement network of "Hankyu Travel International Co., Ltd." - a major Japanese travel agency with over 70 years experience, we will continue to propose more attractive "Japanese tours" going forward. Japanese and European customers, please leave your travel arrangements to Hankyu Travel International Europe!

Name: TrustForce S.r.l.
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, Via Carlo Maria Maggi, 20154
Company description: TrustForce, il cui nome coniuga il principio della fiducia (trust) con la pragmaticità della Forza Vendita (sales force), si rivolge a un selezionato numero di operatori del settore turistico (Tour Operator, Compagnie Aeree e di Navigazione, Catene Alberghiere, Destinazioni Turistiche e Attrazioni Museali), con l'obiettivo di distribuirne i prodotti e i servizi su scala nazionale ed internazionale grazie ad un qualificato team di promotori commercial e al know-how acquisito in anni di esperienza distributiva.  La strategia di TrustForce è di costruire con i propri Clienti piani di vendita, di trade marketing e di rappresentanza in modo da assicurare risultati in aree geografiche o su canali di vendita fino ad oggi non presidiati.

Name: La Fabbrica Dei Sogni
Company description: Ovunque tu vai, vacci col cuore ... Questa è la nostra filosofia, questo è quanto ci ha spinto a chiamarci LA FABBRICA DEI SOGNI: il desiderio di non vendere solo “viaggi” ma di costruire sogni a misura di ognuno. Nasciamo a Roma nel 1993 dall’incontro di gavette molto diverse, da esperienze di agenti di viaggio con impostazioni e destinazioni differenti ma con un’unica grande passione per questo lavoro e per il mondo come unica grande affascinante meta di conoscenza. La scelta di diventare tour operator è stata obbligata e lo spostamento a Milano un’ennesima sfida per poi concludere (almeno per ora) il nostro peregrinare a Verdello, realtà famigliare quanto la nostra azienda.  I numeri sono cresciuti, le destinazioni anche ma quello che non è cambiato e ci auguriamo non cambierà mai è la passione e il cuore che mettiamo in ogni viaggio e la cura e l’attenzione che dedichiamo ad ogni “creatura” come se fosse la prima!!

Name: ALOSCHI BROS.
Company description: Aloschi Bros, founded in 1932 by Adolfo and Alessandro Aloschi, is a leading tour operator in Italy, specializing in providing comprehensive travel services tailored to the needs of tourists. With over 90 years of experience, the company has established itself as a pioneer in the tourism industry, offering a wide range of services including luxury transfers, authentic excursions, and cruise-related programs across more than 100 destinations in Italy. The third generation of the Aloschi family continues to expand the business, which now encompasses multiple brands and serves over 500,000 international tourists annually. Aloschi Bros is dedicated to enhancing the travel experience by personalizing vacations and ensuring high-quality service, making it a trusted partner for both travelers and cruise lines alike.

Name: Travel Agency KOLUMBS
HQ Location: Latvia, Riga, Riga, 65-16 Elizabetes Iela, lv-1050
Company description: The travel agency Kolumbs is a company for impressions, memories and freedom that gives you the joy of life and travels! Kolumbs works on Latvian tourism market since 1997. In 2001 the company established corporate clients department that organises business trips. The company serves private customers providing them leisure travels. Two leisure departments are opened for convenience of the customers – holiday offices in the shopping park Alfa and in the shopping centre Spice. In 2005 Kolumbs was the first Latvian travel agency that started offering on-line booking of flight tickets. Currently Letasaviobiletes.lv is one of the most popular websites among Latvian travel agencies where flights can be purchased on-line. Since 2010 Kolumbs is the owner of the website Pedejaisbridis.lv that provides regular update of information about the latest last minute travels. Kolumbs offers charter flights, flight tickets, hotels, short city break trips, SPA relaxation, bus tours, bus and train tickets, travel insurance and different gift certificates. Kolumbs is a member of Association of Latvian Travel Agents (ALTA) and The International Air Transport Association (IATA), and the company is registered in the Database of Tourism Agents and Tourism Operators of the Ministry of Economics (TATO) and has the financial guarantees of customers' money.

Name: Trésor Hospitality
Company description: Trésor Hospitality was founded in 2012 and is one of the leading independent hotel management and development companies in Greece. Committed to maximize the value of a unit, Tresor transforms the knowledge and experience of its hotel experts into innovative solutions that lead to sustainability and profitability. Offering services that can cover all aspects of operating a hotel, from the feasibility study and the pre-opening actions, to human resources, sales management, marketing activities and public relations, the company is responsible for a total of 470 employees and works with over 520 travel agencies around the world, for the 612 rooms it manages. Trésor Hospitality has been supporting the efforts of the Greek hoteliers, developing strong partnerships with luxury brands such as Ios Palace Hotel & Spa, Ios Grand Suites, Teight Hotel, The Port Square Hotel, Monastiri Beach Bar & Restaurant and Lango Hotel Design & Spa.

Name: Transvia - Mucho Más Que Viajes
Company description: Transvia - Mucho Más Que Viajes is a comprehensive travel agency that specializes in creating unique travel experiences tailored to individual preferences. The company offers a wide range of travel packages, including cultural tours, honeymoons, group trips, and educational journeys, with destinations spanning from Canada and Japan to Egypt and Vietnam. Transvia's mission is to provide memorable travel experiences that go beyond mere sightseeing, fostering a deeper connection with the cultures and environments of the places visited. The agency caters to a diverse clientele, including families, couples, and educational institutions, and collaborates with various partners to enhance the quality and variety of its offerings. With a commitment to sustainability and ethical travel practices, Transvia aims to inspire travelers to explore the world while respecting local cultures and ecosystems.

Name: Huakai
Company description: Huakai es una innovadora agencia de viajes que conecta a jóvenes aventureros con el deseo de explorar el mundo, crear amistades y vivir experiencias únicas. Su misión es ofrecer viajes en grupo de hasta 15 personas, organizados por un coordinador experto que se encarga de la logística y asegura que cada viajero disfrute de una experiencia inolvidable. Huakai se enfoca en grupos homogéneos por edad, clasificando sus viajes en dos rangos: 25-35 años y 35-45 años, lo que permite a los participantes compartir intereses y crear lazos significativos. La empresa promueve un turismo responsable y sostenible, respetando las culturas locales y el medio ambiente, y trabaja exclusivamente con empresas que garantizan el bienestar animal. Su clientela abarca a jóvenes adultos que buscan aventuras auténticas y conexiones personales, mientras que sus socios incluyen proveedores locales que comparten su compromiso con el turismo sostenible.

Name: ProfessioneAnimatore
Company description: ProfessioneAnimatore si occupa di reclutare, selezionare e formare animatori turistici di tutte le categorie di settore per conto di agenzie di animazione e tour operator in Italia e estero.

Name: Sailwithus GmbH
Company description: Wer sind wir?⛵ Willkommen bei sailwithus – Deinem Segel-Reiseveranstalter aus dem wunderschönen Frankfurt am Main! Was machen wir?✅ Wir sind leidenschaftliche Segler und möchten diese Begeisterung mit Dir teilen! Unsere Segelreisen sind für jeden geeignet, egal ob Du ein kompletter Anfänger oder bereits ein erfahrener Segler bist. Ob Du alleine reist, mit Freunden, als Paar, mit der Familie oder als Team – wir gestalten Deinen ganz persönlichen Törn! Wo segeln wir? 📍  Entdecke atemberaubende Reiseziele im Mittelmeer, der Ostsee, in Thailand, den Seychellen und der Karibik. Wo darf es für Dich hingehen? Was macht uns besonders?✨ Bei uns steht die Gemeinschaft im Mittelpunkt. Wir stellen jede Crew individuell nach Alter und Interessen zusammen. Erlebe, wie schnell aus Fremden Freunde werden, während ihr gemeinsam segelt und neue Fähigkeiten erlernt. Unsere erfahrenen Skipper stehen Dir zur Seite und helfen Dir, die Faszination des Segelns hautnah zu erleben. Bist Du bereit für ein unvergessliches Abenteuer? Wir freuen uns darauf, abenteuerlustige Menschen – ob in Gruppen oder allein – an Bord willkommen zu heißen! Folge uns für spannende Einblicke, Tipps und Angebote rund ums Segeln!

Name: BookLogic
Company description: “BookLogic |Revenue Maximizing Solutions for Hotels & Online Reservation Systems” BookLogic provides Revenue Maximizing Solutions for Hotels & Online Reservation Systems for the Travel industry. BookLogic enables you to easily maximize your hotels’ bookings and revenue and to increase your sales by your online distribution channels. BookLogic maximizes your hotels’ yearly RevPAR ratio, automate your hotel reservation management process, and connect your hotel to 650.000+ travel agencies and 150+ online hotel portals worldwide through our one-stop-distribution solution. For Travel Agencies and Tour Operators, BookLogic provides Automation System and Online Reservation Systems for the management and sales of tourism services such as hotels, flights, car rentals, excursions, transfers, cruises, boat rentals, yachting, packages, dynamic packages and so on. BookLogic provides Complete Hotel Solutions and Online Reservation Systems for hotels and hotel chains.

Name: Vitus Rejser
Company description: Vitus Rejser er en dansk rejsearrangør, der organiserer grupperejser for voksne, der holder af at rejse i godt selskab. Geografisk spænder vores rejsemål bredt i hele verden, men den store fællesnævner er glæden ved at nyde kultur, natur og velsmag i selskab med ligesindede rejsegæster.  Alle vores rejser foregår med vores egne dansktalende rejseledere, som sørger for, at alt det praktiske er taget hånd om, så vores gæster har en god ferie.  Vitus Rejser er en erhvervsdrivende fond, hvilket betyder, at rejsebureauet ikke er privat- eller aktionærejet, men en del af Albert Olsens Rejsefond. Hvert år uddeler fonden rejsemidler til de af vores medborgere, som ikke kan rejse på egen hånd, men har brug for ekstra støtte og hjælp. Udover grupperejser for private, arrangerer vi specialproducerede rejser for virksomheder, foreninger og separate grupper. For mere information kontakt os på info@vitus-rejser.dk. ------------ Vitus Rejser is a Danish tour operator that organizes group trips for adults who enjoy traveling in good company. Our travel destinations span the globe, but they all share a common theme: the joy of experiencing culture, nature, and local cuisine alongside like-minded travelers. All our trips are led by our own Danish-speaking tour guides, who handle all the practical details so our guests can fully enjoy their vacation. Vitus Rejser operates as a commercial foundation, meaning the travel agency is not privately or shareholder-owned. Instead, it is part of Albert Olsen's Travel Foundation. Each year, the foundation distributes travel grants to fellow citizens who cannot travel independently and require extra support. In addition to group trips for individuals, we also arrange customized trips for companies, associations, and private groups. For more information, please contact us at info@vitus-rejser.dk.

Name: Traventia
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 135 C/lopez De Hoyos, 28002
Company description: Traventia es una agencia de viajes especializada en la venta de paquetes turísticos. Ha conseguido diferenciarse del resto de agencias gracias a la especialización y personalización online de sus productos. Actualmente Traventia vende principalmente esquí, parques temáticas y escapadas, siempre combinando hotel + actividades en destino. Entre su oferta cuenta con más de 25 Estaciones de esquí en España, Francia y Andorra y 65 ciudades repartidas por España, Portugal, Andorra, Francia e Italia.

Name: I VIAGGI DI LITTA
Company description: I VIAGGI DI LITTA è una azienda fondata nel 2003. Nel 2004 si sviluppa attraverso l' apertura di punti filiali in tutta Italia e punti in franchising. In meno di 6 anni, la crescita è esponenziale vengono aperte più di 100 sedi in tutta Italia, con la massima con centrazione in Sardegna, Puglia e Lazio. Ogni agenzia tratta tutti i tipi di viaggio con tutti i tour operator, oltre ad emettere tutti i tipi di biglietteria ed organizzare viaggi, incentive aziendali e gruppi. Vanta tra i suoi migliori clienti la squadra calcistica Cagliari Calcio cui ne segue - come fornitore ufficiale - tutte le trasferte.

Name: DERTOUR Austria GmbH
HQ Location: Austria, Vienna, Vienna, 1a Am Europlatz Europlaza, 1120
Company description: DERTOUR Austria GmbH is a premier travel agency based in Austria, specializing in luxury vacations at affordable prices. The company offers a diverse range of premium travel experiences across the globe, focusing on exclusive destinations such as the Maldives, Mauritius, the Dominican Republic, Mexico, Thailand, and Dubai. With a mission to transform dream holidays into reality, DERTOUR Austria is dedicated to delivering high-quality travel services that ensure every client enjoys a memorable and luxurious getaway without exceeding their budget.  The agency collaborates with renowned hotel brands and resorts, providing exceptional accommodations and unique experiences tailored to the needs of families, couples, and adventure seekers alike. DERTOUR Austria emphasizes customer satisfaction and transparency, ensuring that clients can enjoy their holidays without hidden costs. The company primarily serves discerning travelers from Austria, offering personalized consultations to help them plan their ideal vacations. In addition to luxury travel, DERTOUR Austria is committed to sustainability, promoting eco-friendly travel options that allow clients to enjoy their holidays while being mindful of their environmental impact. The agency caters to a diverse clientele, including leisure travelers and families, and partners with reputable hotels, airlines, and local tour operators to deliver all-inclusive packages that encompass accommodations, meals, and activities.  With a focus on creating unforgettable journeys that cater to individual preferences and budgets, DERTOUR Austria GmbH strives to be a trusted choice for travelers seeking memorable experiences in popular tourist destinations, particularly in Turkey and beyond. Through its commitment to excellence and personalized service, the company aims to set a standard in the travel industry, ensuring that every journey is a remarkable one.

Name: College Of Polytechnics Jihlava
Company description: VŠPJ je veřejná vysoká škola zaměřená na aplikovanou vzdělanost, jejímž posláním je poskytovat odborně různorodé studijní programy zaměřené zejména na potřeby regionálního trhu práce, pěstovat intenzivní spolupráci s aplikační sférou, odpovídající tvůrčí činnost a aplikovaný výzkum, poskytovat pestrou nabídku celoživotního vzdělávání a napomáhat kulturnímu a obecně vzdělanostnímu rozvoji regionu. VŠPJ nabízí akreditované studijní programy bakalářského a magisterského typu. Obecným cílem studia v akreditovaných studijních programech je poskytnout zájemcům možnost získat profesně orientované vzdělání s výrazně praktickými výstupy. Významnou součástí studia jsou týdenní až celosemestrální praxe. Studium v akreditovaných studijních programech probíhá v prezenční i kombinované formě. Další výuka probíhá v kurzech celoživotního vzdělávání včetně Univerzity třetího věku. VŠP Jihlava je zapojena do různých výzkumných a tvůrčích aktivit, participuje na řešení zadání z podnikové či veřejnoprávní sféry, pořádá konference i s mezinárodní účastí, vydává vlastní časopisy a studenti i akademičtí pracovníci se účastní mezinárodních výměnných pobytů. Jako jediná vysoká škola v ČR provozuje také vlastní cestovní kancelář.

Name: G&J Tour Operator
Company description: Entra in un mondo differente Game&Job Tour Operator Siete arrivati a visitare il nostro sito e quasi certamente avete un sogno che volete realizzare. Eccoci, pronti. Le nostre proposte spaziano, da quelle più semplici e distensive, senza spendere cifre eccessive, fino ad arrivare a viaggi particolari e personalizzati per un’esperienza peculiare o addirittura per chi vuole un tour privato e di prestigio. Nelle Agenzie della Game&Job Tour Operator troverai uno staff giovane e dinamico, assistito e supportato da “tecnici” di lunga esperienza.  E allora cosa aspetti! CONTATTACI e vieni a trovarci. Ufficio Booking - booking@gejservice.it - tel. 069888630  Sede  Agenzia  Velletri  tel. 069635689  Città di Roma  Agenzia Filiale Anagnina tel. 0672016003  Agenzia Filiale Quartiere Trieste tel. 0684240324  Agenzia Filiale  Re di Roma tel. 0670392555 Agenzia Filiale Romanina tel. 0672672990  Agenzia Filiale Talenti tel. 0664110145  Agenzia Filiale Tuscolana tel. 0676988948  Roma Città Metropolitana Agenzia Filiale Genzano di Roma  tel. 069390367  Agenzia Filiale  Nettuno tel. 069888630  Frosinone e Provincia  Agenzia Filiale di Frosinone  tel. 0775853366  Agenzia Filiale  di Ferentino   tel. 0775246637

Name: Club De Vacaciones +60
Company description: Somos el primer touroperador español especializado en turismo para +60 años, ofrecemos una gran variedad de hoteles, viajes internacionales, viajes nacionales, circuitos, viajes en tren, balnearios, experiencias únicas y a la carta para el colectivo sénior. La falta de especialización ha dado lugar a la creación de nuestra empresa. Ésta se dirige a personas que por fin disponen del tiempo libre necesario para realizar unas actividades que en otro momento de sus vidas les fue imposible. La identificación de este hecho es lo que nos permite ofertar una experiencia única, exclusiva y segura, cuyo fin es satisfacer las expectativas del viajero. Club de Vacaciones es mucho más que una forma de viajar: es la respuesta para todas esas personas a las que les queda mucho por descubrir.

Name: Manessis Travel
Company description: Manessis Tour Operator was established in 1988 offering complete range of services with respect to fulfill the needs of the modern traveler.   Today is one of the leading travel organizations in Greece, having strong collaborations with the greatest airlines and sea carriers and the major hotel groups in Greece and abroad.    Manessis in brief… - 100 special trained staff members - 700 sq m of headquarters in the heart of Athens - 2nd position in the Greek Market - Complete range of travel services - First TTG Prize for the excellence of services

Name: West Express
HQ Location: Lithuania, Vilnius, Vilnius, 5 A. Stulginskio G.
Company description: West Express is a leading travel agency in Lithuania. Started its activities in 1992. With 14 offices in Lithuania, company has created the largest business travel service network.
