West Express offices are in Vilnius (among them - the central office, business customer service branch, a branch at the Vilnius International Airport), also there are offices in Kaunas, Panevezys and Klaipeda (2 offices), Palanga, Mazeikiai, Siauliai, Alytus and Visaginas.  We organise many business trips for Lithuanian and foreign companies annually and help them travel more comfortably and effectively. Company offers business trips, internships, fairs and exhibitions trips, as well as recreation and touring around the world in terms of personal preferences and according to global tour operators proposed routes.

Name: Kamari Tours Group
Company description: Kamari Tours was established in 1976, and today is one of the best-known travel agency in Cyclades. For 40 years we have been shaping the Hospitality Industry in Cyclades and Santorini, bringing innovation at your travel leisure. Experience Santorini through our wide-ranging vacation packages, unique services and alternative excursions. What we offer Selected accommodation in Cyclades with 5*,4*,3* and boutique hotels, advanced transportation services, car and bus rental, memorable excursions which include boat, bus and island tours, wedding arrangements, event planning and group handling. Enjoy the exceeding services of the biggest tourist agency in Santorini through our tour operators all over the world. Our Approach We are pledged to meeting our customers’ needs and expectations through our continuously improved services and facilities. Our aim is to provide distinctive and customer- focused services, with attention to detail. We are committed to providing with excellence and create an unforgettable experience for our guests. Our People We are committed to developing and supporting our people in working as a worldwide, high performing team. We inspire and energize them to engage to our common purpose and vision.

Name: S-Cape Partners Italy Walking & Cycling Adventures
Company description: S-Cape Partners Italy, a leading independent European Active, Eco and Adventure Travel specialist. Our team of walkers, cyclists and adventurers are passionate about delivering the best possible authentic active holidays offering competitively priced, great value escorted and independent trips using hand picked accommodation, detailed route notes, outstanding local leaders and strong environmental and social values.  S-Cape Partners Italy is a fully licensed and bonded Italian incoming adventure holiday tour operator based in Florence, Italy and is part of the PIT Group; 6 companies with specialized incoming offices in Italy, Spain, Greece, France, The Netherlands and United Kingdom.  Since the early 80’s, we have been passionately and creatively developing and organizing active and adventure holidays for, individuals, groups, clubs, families and companies. We like to create experiences that are as easy or as challenging as you like, travelling off the beaten track on foot or bike and at your own pace, mixing with locals, savoring the specialties and sleeping in authentic places.  Our trips are not just about adventure but also the people, culture and gastronomy of each place and we want to give you an Authentic Holiday Experience Having extensive and in depth knowledge of each of our countries, we create all our own group and independent, self-guided trips and assist many tour operators and travel agents with all types of bespoke tours.  We are creative, keen on details, resourceful and through a vast network of reliable local partners and guides we work with regularly we can provide anything from a single service to complex packages and incentives, including: accommodation, expert local guides, luggage transfer, van support, bike rental, transfers, wine tasting, lessons of various sorts etc Specialties: Walking, Hiking, Trekking, Cycling, Active Family holidays, Gastronomic tours

Name: YGO
Company description: YGO TRIPS is offering an entirely new way to book, experience, and visualize holiday packages – tailored to a new generation. YGO is the only player in the industry that enables users to combine any experiences (like festivals, concerts, retreats, etc.) with flights and hotels and book it directly with YGO TRIPS – with maximum convenience and zero pain.

Name: A3M Global Monitoring GmbH
Company description: Travel Security Solutions We offer the most effective early warning, information and communication systems Due to increasing awareness of natural disasters and security risks throughout the world, it is important to have access to timely, reliable information, and to communicate that information to the relevant people as fast as possible. With Global Monitoring, Travel Alerts, Travel Tracking, Country Risk Database and Destination Manager, companies and tour operators can optimise their safety management procedures and respond quickly in a crisis. By using our systems and services you can improve the safety of your employees and customers.

Name: Bottenschein Reisen GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: BOTTENSCHEIN REISEN IMMER MEHR ERLEBEN Vor über 60 Jahren gegründet, hat sich unser einstiges Kleinunternehmen zu einem renommierten mittelständischen Reiseveranstalter mit einem Fuhrpark von über 60 Bussen etabliert. Seit inzwischen 30 Jahren arbeiten wir zuverlässig und vertrauensvoll innerhalb der Partner Internationaler Touristik (P.I.T.-Touristik) mit einem anderen Reiseunternehmen zusammen und bieten eines der größten Reiseangebote im Süddeutschen Raum. Seit über sechs Jahrzehnten sind wir für unsere Kunden in Bewegung. Weltweit, weil wir Urlaub grenzenlos planen. Europaweit, weil wir Ziele komfortabel erreichen. Regional, weil im Nahverkehr Zuverlässigkeit zählt. Wir kennen die Menschen und ihre Wünsche in unserem Gebiet genau und setzen diese immer wieder in neue und attraktive Reiseangebote um. Unser kompetentes Touristik-Team, die geschulten Reisebegleitungen sowie unsere bestens ausgebildeten und verantwortungsbewussten Reise-Chauffeure leisten mehr als die sichere Personenbeförderung und sorgen dafür, dass Ihre schönste Zeit im Jahr zu einer ganz besonderen wird. Wir haben uns zu den höchsten Sicherheitsstandards der Busreisebranche verpflichtet, die über die Normen des Gesetzgebers hinausgehen. Täglich sind insgesamt über 100 Mitarbeiter an insgesamt vier Standorten im In- und Ausland für Ihren Traumurlaub im Einsatz. Viele begeisterte Kunden sind der Beweis, dass unsere Reisen einzigartig sind. Überzeugen Sie sich selbst!

Name: Tours For You
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, 18 Rua Do Pólo Norte, 1990-266
Company description: We're an Incoming Tour Operator and D.M.C. (Destination Management Company) in Portugal, focused in developing charming, luxury & experiential travel services and special events. Our specialization is to provide tailor-made, personalized and creative travel planning, where all details are important. We've started our business in 2003 and we became a Virtuoso On-Site to Portugal in January 2008 as a natural recognition of our reliable and special way of work (and we're the only Portuguese Virtuoso On-Site). We are also the only Ensemble Travel Group On-Location to Portugal as well as for Traveller Made, American Express Crafted Journeys Program and Travel Leaders Group.  Tours For You is the only Portuguese DMC selected to attend very exclusive and "by invitation only" Travel Events since the very first editions (like Pure Life Experiences since 2009, Travel Week São Paulo, in Brazil, since 2011 and Limited Edition Miami since 2013). Tours For You has also 2 other specialized brands: TFY Events (www.tfyevents.com) Tours For You Spain (www.toursforyouspain.com)

Name: Ving Norge AS
Company description: Ving Norge AS is a leading travel company specializing in creating unforgettable vacation experiences for its clients, particularly focusing on honeymoon and adventure travel. With a mission to provide personalized travel solutions, Ving Norge aims to ensure that every journey is tailored to meet the unique desires of its customers, whether they seek relaxation on pristine beaches or thrilling explorations. The company has established strong partnerships with various hotels and service providers, allowing it to offer a diverse range of destinations, including the exotic island of Mauritius, which has become a popular choice for newlyweds. Ving Norge's target market includes couples planning their dream honeymoons, families, and adventure seekers looking for memorable travel experiences. Through expert guidance and a commitment to customer satisfaction, Ving Norge AS strives to make every trip a cherished memory.

Name: Extreme Iceland
Company description: Extreme Iceland is a fully licensed travel agency that assists individuals and groups with planning anything to be seen and done in Iceland all year round.  A strong focus is placed on providing the best available service. The tours are operated by Extreme Iceland directly or teamed up with other accredited travel agencies of high professional standard. We specialize in tour design and travel operation for both scheduled and private tailor-made trips, summer or winter. We offer to arrange holidays from beginning to end: accommodation adapted to wishes – whether budget or higher-end. All sorts of activities can be organized as well. We can provide vehicles that fits every tour. We handle each request individually and adjust the tour to the dreams and wishes of our clients. Our guides have extensive knowledge and expertise in the great outdoors. They render a proficient service with inside knowledge of nature phenomena throughout Iceland. In our own tours we constantly aim at providing the best experience possible and therefore often limit our tours to small groups to obtain a maximum of flexibility and ease. That way our clients can savor the extreme Icelandic nature as opposed to just seeing it.

Name: Four Seasons Natura E Cultura
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 44 Via Guglielmo Degli Ubertini, 00176
Company description: Four Seasons Natura e Cultura è il Leader italiano nel settore dell'Ecoturismo e dell'escursionismo consapevole. Nel 1993, un gruppo di esperti nell'escursionismo, amanti della natura e della montagna, appassionati di arte e archeologia, decisero di creare una società con l'obiettivo di accompagnare adulti e bambini alla scoperta di ambienti naturali.  L'amore per la natura, la forza della cultura, il desiderio di conoscere i molteplici aspetti di Gaia, il nostro Pianeta, ci hanno portato sin dall'inizio a intraprendere un cammino di esplorazione e scoperta; la sfida è di ricercare insieme il vero "spirito dei luoghi", l'essenza della Terra. La nostra specializzazione è nel camminare, scelto come metodo di viaggiare lento, modulato dalle giuste pause per osservare e fare amicizia con tutto ciò che ci circonda, come un fiore, un albero, un tramonto o una traccia di un animale, per dare il giusto peso al trascorrere del tempo, lontano da un turismo consumistico "mordi e fuggi". Oggi due anime compongono il Gruppo Four Seasons: Il Tour Operator Four Seasons Natura e Cultura by Gaia900, specializzato in viaggi culturali e ambientali, con l'obiettivo della conoscenza del mondo sotto tutti i suoi aspetti ambientali, storici e gastronomici, ma che si occupa anche di ideazione e realizzazione di attività di Educazione Ambientale, di progetti di sviluppo sostenibile con aree protette e di gestione strutture e servizi nell'ambito del mondo dei parchi;  L'Associazione Four Seasons, che propone ogni fine settimana escursioni a piedi e attività socializzanti nel Lazio e dintorni, in Lombardia ed in Emilia-Romagna.

Name: Days Of Adventure
HQ Location: Portugal, Faro, Lagos, Loja 2 Passeio Dos Descobrimentos, 8600-315
Company description: We are a specialist tour operator for both sea and land adventures on the Algarve, operating from Lagos Marina. - Our activities on the ocean are: Dolphin spotting on our large catamaran designed for family adventures, providing stunning views of these fabulous mammals, toilets sun protection and freedom to move around, suitable to all ages. - Dolphin spotting on a RIB rigid inflatable boat, up close and personal with these fabulous mammals this is more suitable to the adventurous type; - Grotto trips to the famous Ponta da Piedade, using specially constructed 9 seater boats, enabling excellent access to the fabulous grottos and caves of this area, suitable to all ages; - Kayaking at Ponta da Piedade, transporting you to Ponta da piedade on one of our specially constructed vessels launching you fresh and ready on board your kayak at Ponta da Piedada, suitable to all ages; - Benagil caves on our large catamaran designed for family adventures, especially designed vessel for incredible views, toilets sun protection and freedom to move around, suitable to all ages; - Benagil caves on a RIB rigid inflatable boat, ultra-high speed journey, and incredible views at the Benagil caves, this is more suited to the adventurous type; - WATER TAXI water taxi adventure to and from Lagos and Alvor through the stunning Alvor nature reserve.

Name: TUI Ireland
Company description: Ever since 1988, TUI have been sending Irish holidaymakers to the sunshine. We're one of Ireland's largest tour operators, with fun-packed holidays for everyone from families to groups and couples and part of TUI Group, one of the World’s leading leisure travel companies.

Name: JOY TOURS
Company description: JOY TOURS is a travel agency with over 40 years of experience, with a steady upward course, which now has to offer the most complete range of travel services.  In brief, we offer:  -Excursions in Greece & Abroad -Tickets: Air, Ferry, Rail -Hotels: Reservations with more than 80,000 hotels worldwide -Cruises -Special travels: for conferences - corporate bonuses -Sports trips, individual trips, wedding trips -Conferences organization -Transports by private buses (9-56 seats)  -Car rentals  Our extensive experience, the organization system, our interest for the customer, the selection of the most appropriate partners, our specialized and helpful staff and our work ethic are the values that place us at the top.

Name: MORANDI GROUP
HQ Location: Italy, The Marches, Ancona, 4/e Via Xxix Settembre, 60122
Company description: Le origini di Morandi Group risalgono al 1913, anno in cui il broker marittimo Gustavo Morandi - insieme ai suoi fratelli - fonda ad Ancona la F.lli Morandi & C., agenzia marittima e casa di spedizioni che in pochi anni diventa punto di riferimento per il settore dello shipping e per il mondo armatoriale internazionale.  Oggi alla guida del Gruppo ci sono Chiara e Andrea Morandi, la 4° generazione. Il core business è lo shipping con  servizi ampiamente diversificati alle merci e ai passeggeri. Fanno parte di Morandi Group:  - le storiche agenzie marittime F.lli Morandi & C e Maritransport, entrambe casa di spedizioni e spedizioniere doganale,  - l'impresa portuale ASE (Adriatic Services Enterprise) dedicata ai servizi inerenti la terminalistica portuale, la logistica e l’autotrasporto,  - il Tour Operator e agenzia di viaggi Webtours  - l'impresa portuale Co.m.m.p.a., concessionaria del terminal rinfuse nel porto di Ancona.  - l’Agenzia Marittima Le Navi Ancona, che rappresenta MSC Cargo nel porto di Ancona, nata in partnership nel 2015 con l’Agenzia Marittima Le Navi, agente Generale di Mediterranean  Shipping Company  (MSC)  in  Italia. Sul fronte passeggeri, da oltre 20 anni, Morandi Group - attraverso l’agenzia marittima F.lli Morandi & C. - è agente generale e rappresentante in Italia di Attica Group, gruppo armatoriale greco di riferimento nel settore traghetti con le compagnie Superfast Ferries, Blue Star Ferries, AML e Hellenic Seaways.

Name: Associação Turismo Do Algarve/ Algarve Tourism Bureau
HQ Location: Portugal, Faro, Faro, 18 5 Avenida 5 De Outubro, 8000076
Company description: The Algarve Tourism Bureau is the only organization appointed by the Portuguese National Tourism Board to promote the Algarve Region and its touristic products within overseas markets, thus establishing partnerships with both public and private sector to achieve this goal, such as joint marketing campaigns with Tour operators and airlines, press and fam trips, destination trainings, trade shows, tourism fairs etc.”

Name: TravelEssence Nederland
Company description: TravelEssence Nederland is a travel agency specializing in creating personalized dream trips to Australia and New Zealand. Founded in 2003, the company aims to provide clients with unique travel experiences that connect them with the rich cultural heritage and stunning natural landscapes of these countries. Their mission is to offer expert advice and tailored itineraries, ensuring that every journey is memorable and fulfilling. TravelEssence Nederland caters to a diverse clientele, including families, cultural enthusiasts, and adventure seekers, and collaborates with local partners to enhance the authenticity of their travel offerings. With a commitment to sustainability and cultural appreciation, the company invites travelers to explore the beauty and history of Australia and New Zealand while making a positive impact on the environment and local communities.

Name: Coral Travel Baltics
Company description: We are part of the Turkish-owned „Coral Travel Group“, which has been operating successfully on 5 continents for 30 years. Coral Travel Group has organized trips for more than 28 million customers and now operates in more than 40 countries around the world with the help of 7,000 professionals. The group of companies includes hotels, airlines, travel agencies, and accompanying tourist resorts. As OTI Holding, we can ensure a better quality of services and a competitive price. Coral Travel operates in 10 countries as a tour operator and in 2021 it started to operate in the Baltic region: Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia. In Baltic countries, more than 50 professionals work to provide quality and comfort in a wide range of hotels, tours, and entertainment for children and adults in the Turkey, Egypt, and Greece regions.

Name: Newblue
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, 154 Calle General Riera, 07010
Company description: We are a new way to create, inspire, discover and live your next trip in Bulgaria. Fully digital and absolutely personal. Discover your new blue with us.  You can find us here ⤵️ 📧 booking for travel agencies: booking.bul@newblue.es 📧 groups for travel agencies: grupos@newblue.es 📞 exclusive booking for travel agencies: 910 002 181 📞 24h exclusive for clients at destination 910 008 701 ⏰ booking: from 9h to 18h from Monday to Friday

Name: Tee Times Golf Holidays
Company description: 🌟 Welcome to Tee Times Golf Holidays – Your Premier Golf Holiday Partner! 🌟 Established in 1993 against the breathtaking backdrop of Vilamoura in the Algarve, Tee Times Golf Agency stands as a beacon of excellence in curating unforgettable golf experiences. Proudly affiliated with the International Association of Golf Tour Operators (IAGTO), the Portugal Tourism Board, and the Algarve Tourism Bureau, we seamlessly blend passion with professionalism. 🏌️♂️ Why Tee Times? 🏌️♀️ ✨ No. 1 Golf Vendor in Portugal: From our humble beginnings, our commitment to making golf accessible and unforgettable has propelled us to become the top golf vendor in Portugal. 🤝 Trusted Advisors: The Tee Times Team is your dedicated partner, offering assistance and advice at every step. From tailored quotations and green fees to comprehensive golf packages, tee times, and accommodation at the finest hotels, villas, or self-catering apartments – we've got you covered. 🌐 Online Convenience, Local Presence: While you can conveniently book online, our two well-located offices in Vilamoura ensure a personal touch, making your golf dreams a reality. 🏨 More Than Golf: Beyond golf, we offer club rental, car hire, and reliable transfers, ensuring a seamless, stress-free experience. ⛳ Golfers Serving Golfers: Tee Times was born from a passion for golf, by Mr. Carlos Ferreira, our CEO and keen golfer. As fellow golfers, we're dedicated to providing the best service, as we know what you need! Booking with us grants peace of mind, dealing with a well-established company committed to making your golf holiday or break perfect at discounted rates, year-round. Join Tee Times, where your golf journey is more than a trip – it's an experience crafted with care, expertise, and a commitment to making every moment on the green unforgettable. ⛳🌴 #TeeTimesGolf #GolfHolidayExperts #ExperienceGolfExcellence #ImWithTeeTimes

Name: Atelier Vacanze Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Naples, 47 Piazza Ettore Vitale, 80126
Company description: Tour Operator Campano nato nel 2000 e operante sul mercato regionale/nazionale in veste di specialista per la distribuzione di prodotti turistici Le idee ben chiare e soprattutto il preacquisto dei servizi con la garanzia di vendite e conferme immediate fanno di noi oggi un Tour Operator affermato soprattutto per la destinazione Mare Italia , Egitto e Turchia. La competenza e professionalità dei collaboratori unita alla validita delle strutture proposte , ci hanno permesso di divenire oggi una realta di fatto e di proporci sul mercato ottimizzando al massimo il rapporto con i fornitori e curando al meglio l’assistenza al cliente finale Ogni anno siamo presenti con un nostro Stand presso la BORSA MEDITERRANEA DEL TURISMO DI NAPOLI Sempre sicuri di soddisfare ogni vostra esigenza !!

Name: Axis Data S.L.U.
Company description: Axis Data S.L. is an international enterprise providing IT Services to MTS Globe and OTS Globe, which consist of Office Automation systems, Networking and Applications.  Our mission statement is to provide innovative technology to the MTS Globe Group's  66 destination offices in 22 countries in and around the Mediterranean Sea, North Africa, the Black Sea, the Arabian Gulf, the Atlantic Ocean and the Gulf of Mexico. 5,3 million guests were managed through our systems in 2017. We provide excellent and highly automated integration to our customers (tour operators). MTS Globe, OTS Globe and Axis Data are determined to deliver a superior service to the end customer, travelling to one of our destinations. Axis Data operates in a flexible and dynamic environment, has a flat hierarchy and values initiative and pro-activity very highly. Flexibility, good team-work and excellent communication skills are requirements for any function.

Name: AIR TICKETING SERVICE
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Constantin Nacu Street, 020996
Company description: TRAVEL AGENCY AIRPLANE TICKETS HOLIDAYS RENT A CAR HOTELS RESERVATION TRANSFERS TRAVEL INSURENCE ACCREDITETED AGENT IATA office@atsturism.ro 0040-213143061 - phone 0040-213143062 - phone 0040-213143064 - phone 0040-213137754 - fax 0040-213137755 - fax

Name: Rampinini Ernesto S.r.l.
Company description: Rampinini Ernesto S.r.l. ...dal 1906 Servizi di alta qualità. Natale Gaetano Rampinini nasce a Gorla Maggiore (VA), si trasferisce a Fino Mornasco dove gestisce la locale stazione di posta con “stallazzo”. Con carri e carrozze trainate da cavalli, iniziano i primi servizi di trasporto merci, dalla stazione di Fino Mornasco e Como S. Giovanni e di trasporto passeggeri diretti alle ville del lago di Como e della Brianza. Nel 1906 viene costituita la società “Vetture e Trasporti” di Rampinini Natale, orientata al trasporto di persone e merci. Dal 1945, il figlio Ernesto, sullo stesso sentiero tracciato dai carri e dalle carrozze del padre, incrementa lo sviluppo dell'azienda e, con l’entrata della terza generazione, vi è l'affermazione dell'impresa con una meglio delineata identificazione dei settori: - SERVIZI LOGISTICI INTEGRATI, DEPOSITI E TRASPORTI;  - NOLEGGIO PULLMAN, AGENZIA VIAGGI E TOUR OPERATOR.  SERVIZI LOGISTICI INTEGRATI: DEPOSITI E TRASPORTI Il 1965 vede la nascita di attività collaterali e la costruzione dei primi magazzini per le merci.  Iniziano i primi contratti di magazzinaggio e stoccaggio. Dal 1980 Il primo contratto di outsourcing. La sede legale ed amministrativa resta a Fino Mornasco ma si aggiungono gli impianti per lo stoccaggio merci in conto terzi come operatori 3PL e 4PL di Lomazzo (CO), Cermenate (CO), e Turate (CO). La società ha nel frattempo esteso la propria esperienza in ambito Logistico-Distributivo con servizi di: custodia, gestione fisica e informatizzata delle merci, lavorazioni accessorie (quali kitting, co-packing, etichettatura, servizi di campionatura, controllo qualità, ecc.) trasporti, spedizioni e distribuzione sono il campo di attività della business unit SERVIZI DI LOGISTICA, specializzandosi e raggiungendo le opportune autorizzazioni nelle diverse merceologie.

Name: Experienza
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 66 Calle De Alonso Cano, 28003
Company description: Experienza is the distribution platform for tours & activities built exclusively for B2B. We help OTAs, wholesalers and travel agencies grow their activities business with a comprehensive rate mix, global coverage and dedicated support. With 5,000+ products in 250 destinations and 70 countries, our portfolio includes one-day excursions, guided tours, tickets, transfers, hop-on hop-off, theme parks and city cards, all carefully contracted directly with trusted operators. What makes us different: ·         100% B2B focus – we don’t compete with you, we work for you. ·         Flexible pricing models that maximize profitability. ·         24/7 customer service for agencies and travelers. ·         Omnichannel distribution solutions: API, B2B Portal, White Label, Widgets. At Experienza, we turn tours & activities into a competitive advantage for your business. We build your tours & activities business, so you don’t have to.

Name: Adriatic DMC
HQ Location: Croatia, Dubrovačko-neretvanska, Dubrovnik, 45 Dr Ante Starcevica, 20000
Company description: Adriatic DMC is a leading destination management company based in Croatia offering authentic travel programs for discerning travelers to the region. We specialize in crafting group and bespoke excursions, land tours, cruises, MICE travel programs and logistics support in Croatia, Slovenia, Montenegro, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Albania, Serbia and Macedonia. Born out of 25 years of experience in the travel industry in this region, our company has grown from a travel agency to a leading regional DMC. It is our mission to continue delivering sustainable, inspirational travel experiences that are locally sourced and exceed our client’s expectations every single time. Our knowledge Our knowledge and passion for travel, and this region we call home, shines through every bespoke itinerary, seamless ground operation, and immersive tour and cruise program we deliver. We are in tune with our client’s needs and market trends and continue developing innovative, flexible programs like the Fly & Drive and the Island Hopping while extending on the traditional travel products. Our team works diligently to design value and quality based programs to the finest detail around your interests, budget and timelines. We are the ideal travel partner for those who are looking to work with an expert DMC committed to delivering quality and creating excitement in Croatia and the Balkans.

Name: Eurotours
Company description: The Kitzbühel/Tyrol based tourist enterprise, Eurotours International, is the largest incoming agency in Central Europe, as well as the largest tour operator in direct sales in Austria.  The company also belongs to the Verkehrsbüro Group, the leading concern in tourism in Austria.  With a team of 300 highly qualified experts in tourism, Eurotours markets the full range of touristic offers in Austria and the surrounding countries on a worldwide basis and in doing so covers all forms of organized travel: from individual travel arrangements in both resort destinations and cities, to group travel, incentives and conventions.  In 2012 the company handled a total of 1.245 million passengers and generated a turnover of 240 million Euro. ***************************************** Das in Kitzbühel/Tirol beheimatete Touristikunternehmen Eurotours International ist die größte Incoming-Agentur sowie einer der größten Direkt-Reiseveranstalter Zentraleuropas und gehört zur Verkehrsbüro Group, Österreichs führendem Tourismuskonzern. Mit einem Team von 300 hochqualifizierten Tourismusprofis vermarktet Eurotours die touristischen Angebote Österreichs und seiner Nachbarländer weltweit und deckt dabei alle Formen des organisierten Reisens ab: von Individualreisen in Ferienregionen und im Städtebereich bis hin zu Gruppenreisen, Incentives und Conventions. 2012 wurden insgesamt 1,245 Millionen Passagiere abgewickelt und 240 Millionen Euro Umsatz erzielt.

Name: Wave
Company description: Wave è un’azienda che unisce turismo esperienziale e innovazione culturale.  Da oltre un decennio creiamo esperienze trasformative e community autentiche. Il nostro percorso è iniziato con la passione per connettere le persone attraverso sport e cultura, evolvendosi in un approccio metodico alla facilitazione aziendale. Nata per creare connessioni autentiche tra persone, territori e passioni, operiamo come tour operator e hub creativo, sviluppando esperienze sostenibili che valorizzano le comunità locali e il benessere personale. In un ambiente completamente remoto, Wave si struttura su valori come la responsabilità, l’inclusione e la crescita continua.  Con brand come SurfWeek, SkateWeek, Colivex, MeetUp e SurfHouse, offriamo non solo viaggi, ma percorsi di trasformazione personale e collettiva. Siamo un’organizzazione fluida, distribuita e guidata dal principio Ubuntu: “io sono perché noi siamo”.

Name: Smart Tours Transylvania
Company description: We are the no.1 travel agency in Brasov, with 20 years of experience and more than 80,000 happy SmartTourists. With our dedicated account managers, we can shape a trip whichever way suits your needs – be it for holiday, corporate events or personalised activities. Our assistance and expertise will always be guaranteed. As a DMC (Destination Management Company), we employ our extended local knowledge, connections and partners to craft carefully selected travel services and out-of-the-box travel experiences in Transylvania and beyond. With our experience and brilliant customer support, our DMC department is here to unveil you the best Transylvania has to offer. For a full list of our DMC services check out: https://smarttours.ro/en/ We are IATA (International Air Transport Association) accredited and members of the ANAT (National Association of Travel Agencies in Romania), and hold all the required certifications to ensure the safest and highest quality services.

Name: GTS World - Tour Operator
Company description: We are a tour operator with 30 years of experience in the tourism industry. We are specialized in incoming travel arrangements and special tailor-made groups, including religious choirs, students, pilgrims, cultural and gastronomic tourists etc. Thanks to our international team of tourism experts, we strive to provide the best quality products and services, and complete knowledge of the destinations we promote. We aim to become world leaders in offering quality travel arrangements and services. Welcome to GTS World!

Name: Ahrens GmbH & Co. KG
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Marburg An Der Lahn, 14-22 Universitätsstraße, 35037
Company description: Wir sind ein Einzelhandelsunternehmen mit über 250 Mitarbeitern und einer Verkaufsfläche von rund 13.500 qm auf 6 Verkaufsebenen. Verschiedene Einkaufs- und Erlebniswelten präsentieren sich heute mit einer Kompetenz von über 250 internationalen Top-Marken mit Schwerpunkten in den Bereichen Mode, Accessoires und Sport. Bekannte Partnerfirmen wie Görtz für Schuhe, Thalia für Bücher und Rewe für Lebensmittel ergänzen uns dabei perfekt. Außerdem betreiben wir im Haus in eigener Regie ein großes Reisebüro, sowie ein Restaurant mit Panorama Richtung Schlossberg.

Name: ReisenAKTUELL.COM
HQ Location: Germany, Rheinland-pfalz, Koblenz, 1 In Den Weniken, 56070
Company description: Seit 2010 steht ReisenAKTUELL.COM als unabhängiger, inhabergeführter Reiseveranstalter für Qualität zu günstigen Preisen. Wir bieten neben Eigenanreisen mit dem PKW auch Kreuzfahrten und Flugreisen für Paare, Singles und Familien an. Als Arbeitgeber bieten wir an unserem Firmensitz in Koblenz am Rhein unseren rund 300 Mitarbeitern eigenverantwortliche und herausfordernde Tätigkeiten an einem modernen Arbeitsplatz mit flexiblen Arbeitszeiten in einem sympathischen Team. Zur Verstärkung unseres Teams suchen wir engagierte Kolleginnen und Kollegen, die uns in unterschiedlichen Geschäftsbereichen und Tätigkeitsfeldern auf unserem Erfolgskurs begleiten möchten. Es erwartet Dich eine familiäre und erfolgsorientierte Unternehmensführung mit flachen Hierarchien und Raum für Deine Ideen. Name: Ricasoli Group
Company description: Explore the world with Ricasoli Group, an IATA-accredited travel agency specialized in private transfers and bespoke travel services worldwide.  Ricasoli Group boasts an extensive network of trusted global partners and a talented team dedicated to organising every aspect of your travel. We offer 24/7 support to individuals and companies, ensuring personalized assistance and with the utmost respect for your privacy. We aim to continuously innovate and upgrade our services, ensuring that we not only meet but also exceed our clients' expectations, maintaining our position as a leader in the international travel industry. Milan - Paris - Zurich - London - New York - Dubai

Name: RVHotels
Company description: RVHotels is a dynamic hospitality company dedicated to providing unique and memorable experiences through a diverse range of accommodations, including hotels and apartments, primarily situated in sought-after destinations such as Costa Brava, Costa Dorada, Menorca, and Barcelona. The company's mission is to ensure that every guest enjoys their holidays with the comfort of feeling at home, offering exclusive advantages for direct bookings, such as the best price guarantee, flexible cancellation policies, and unique discounts. RVHotels caters to a wide array of clients, including families, couples, groups, and individual travelers, making it an ideal choice for various types of vacations. To enhance the guest experience, RVHotels partners with local businesses, creating a network that enriches the stay for its visitors. The company places a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction and personalized service, aiming to evoke vibrant emotions and unforgettable moments for all its guests. With a focus on a seamless online booking experience, RVHotels is committed to transparency in its booking policies, providing clear guidelines on reservations, cancellations, and additional services to ensure a hassle-free experience from check-in to check-out. Additionally, RVHotels recognizes the importance of accommodating all travelers, including those with pets, by offering pet-friendly options and various amenities. By collaborating with major online travel agencies like Booking, Airbnb, and Expedia, RVHotels effectively reaches a broader audience, making it a preferred choice for travelers seeking comfort, flexibility, and memorable stays. Through its dedication to enhancing guest satisfaction with modern amenities and personalized services, RVHotels continues to establish itself as a leader in the hospitality industry.

Name: Visit Finland
Company description: Visit Finland is the national tourism promotion agency of Finland, dedicated to enhancing the visibility and appeal of Finnish travel experiences to international markets. The company organizes events such as sales runs, where Finnish tourism operators can connect with American buyers, including travel agencies and tour operators, to showcase their offerings. With a mission to foster sustainable growth in the tourism sector, Visit Finland aims to balance continuity and innovation in its product offerings, ensuring they remain attractive to buyers in the future. The agency collaborates with various stakeholders in the tourism industry, focusing on creating a compelling and diverse portfolio that meets market demands. Targeting primarily the American market, Visit Finland seeks to establish Finland as a premier travel destination through strategic partnerships and engaging promotional activities.

Name: Honeymooners
Company description: Honeymooners is a travel company specialized in designing personalized honeymoons and transformative experiences for couples in love. Anywhere in the world. Founded by Joana & André, a couple who turned their own love story into a lifelong mission, Honeymooners was born to celebrate romance with meaning, detail, and sophistication. Since 2021, we’ve crafted thousands of one-of-a-kind journeys for couples across more than 40 countries, always treating each story as if it were our own. With headquarters in Portugal and an expanding international presence — including Brazil, Mexico, UAE, the US, the UK, and Australia — we create soulful trips, blending human connection, sensitive curation, and excellence in every detail. We are more than a travel agency: we are a legacy of love, resilience, and purpose. 🌍 Because when two hearts come together, the whole world becomes a destination.

Name: ReNatour Reiseveranstalter
Company description: ReNatour - natürlich reisen Individuell, naturnah & nachhaltig Reiseveranstalter seit 1994 Familienurlaub Wanderurlaub Auszeit & Yoga Geheimtippunterkünfte Homebase: Brunner Hauptstr. 26 90475 Nürnberg

Name: JAN-POL Incoming Tour Operator
HQ Location: Poland, Lesser Poland Voivodeship, Kraków, 8 Misiołka, 31-525
Company description: We’re one of the most experienced tour operators in Poland. Having been in the business for over 30 years, we gained in-depth expertise in organising domestic and multi-country group tours. Among other things, we arrange holiday stays and cultural trips as well as take care of accommodation, transportation and entertainment. Our mission is to serve people with quality, unforgettable experiences and unique emotions while visiting Poland.

Name: Keys Of Italy
Company description: Since 2014, we have been operating in the tourism sector under the original name of Keys Of Florence, now known as Keys Of Italy. Our story begins in the charming Tuscan city, where local entrepreneurs established a company destined to grow into a nationwide inbound travel agency. Our goal from the outset has been to merge different concepts of hospitality. On one hand, we specialize as a property management company, focusing on apartment rentals in the heart of cities. On the other hand, we develop our identity as a premium tour operator company. We are pleased to offer you exclusive guided tours and authentic experiences in the most famous and unspoiled places of our beloved Belpaese. Our model unfolds with calm and constancy, based on strong principles of sustainability, attention to product quality, and deep knowledge of the territory. Mass tourism finds no place here; our goal is to create personalized experiences with tour packages designed for small groups of up to 12 people. Our tours are exclusively monolingual, ensuring the utmost enjoyment of your vacations. We are ready to let you discover Italy in a unique and unforgettable way. In the coming years, we aim to move forward, ensuring stable and continuous employment for many professionals who embody the essence of our project. The development of future Italian destinations, as well as the maintenance of high-quality standards for those already in existence, depends on our invaluable network of local suppliers and our ambition to create a true lifestyle company.

Name: Bancotel
Company description: Bancotel, the company that created the hotel Checkbook payment method in Spain, was founded in 1988 with the aim of acting as an intermediary between hotels and travel agencies, making hotel rooms available to its users under highly beneficial conditions. With over 20 years’ experience, Bancotel has become a means of payment (Checkbook and e-bancotel – electronic payment of reservations) accepted in over 50,000 3-, 4- and 5-star hotels belonging to national and international hotel chains and the best independent hotels in 130 countries. Bancotel is, above all, committed to the growth of tourism, through a perspective of quality, opening of new markets, products and services. Bancotel has launched its Strategic Plan 2008-2015, split into two phases whose areas of action cover, both organic and inorganic growth; innovation, offering the market new payment methods for hotel services; international expansion with Europe and America as its main focal points and providing parallel advantages to the Bancotel means of payment, through new tourism consumption habits. To this end it has created its RD&I laboratory, essential for raising the depth of insight into consumer trends in travelling and holidaying, in order to create solutions for the future based on new technologies. The company currently attracts over 3 million customers a year and works with over 15,000 Spanish and international travel agencies, for whom it has come to be the best partner in the search for customer satisfaction.

Name: Domina Vip Travel
Company description: We are the italian Tour Operator promoting and selling in Italy the Domina Hotel Group Properties and also promoting  abroad our main Resort the Domina Coral Bay.

Name: Scanworld Corporate Travel & Events
Company description: One of the largest privately owned travel agencies in Sweden with specially negotiated air fares and agreements with leading suppliers around the globe.  Our goal is to find the best possible solution for all your travel requirements; whether you are travelling for business, attending a conference or congress or planning an event, our aim is to provide you with a personal and customized service. Our commitment to you as a client is to provide you with the highest level of service and to build a long term relationship; regardless of the size of your business and needs.

Name: Nekera
Company description: The new concept of touroperator’s travel e-commerce platform, integrating over 25 years of the best experience, propositions and values in the travel & leisure business. Nekera’s offer covers the entire Mediterranean area, including all most important destinations for polish travel industry such as Greece, Spain, Croatia, Italy, Turkey, and Bulgaria. But we also offer smaller ones like Malta, Cyprus, Israel, Jordan and Albania, as well as exotic destinations, e.g. countries Caribbean: Cuba, Dominican Republic, Mexico, Jamaica, African: Kenya, Zanzibar, Seychelles, Egypt, Tunisia, Morocco or Asian: Maldives, Thailand, Vietnam, Bali, Dubai, Georgia and SriLanka. For the first time on the market, to meet the needs of our customers, Nekera offers a possibility of buying holidays for over 600 hotels in Poland. Never before has a travel agency and traditional tour operator offered a native product on such a scale. All trips are covered by the lowest price guarantee, its unchangeability, as well as 24/7 Polish-language care. For more information visit: www.nekera.pl

Name: TUI Poland
Company description: TUI Poland is a leading travel agency dedicated to providing exceptional holiday experiences for Polish travelers. Specializing in comprehensive holiday packages, the company offers a wide array of options, including flights, accommodations, and unique excursions, with a strong emphasis on all-inclusive vacations. TUI Poland's mission is to make travel accessible and enjoyable for everyone, ensuring that each client experiences unforgettable moments during their journeys. The company's vision is to be the top choice for holidaymakers in Poland, recognized for its commitment to quality and affordability. TUI Poland caters to a diverse clientele, including families, couples, and solo travelers, all seeking both relaxation and adventure in popular destinations around the globe. The agency partners with a variety of hotels and resorts, such as the luxurious Riu Baobab and the Baia Imperiale hotel, to provide high-quality accommodations and services tailored to the needs of its clients. With a focus on customer satisfaction, TUI Poland offers personalized support through its 24/7 TUI Service Center, ensuring travelers have assistance whenever needed. The company is known for its attractive pricing and comprehensive customer support, making vacation planning seamless and enjoyable. TUI Poland's commitment to delivering memorable travel experiences is evident in its diverse range of holiday packages, which cater to various preferences and budgets. By emphasizing quality service and a user-friendly mobile app, TUI Poland continues to be a trusted choice for travelers looking to create lasting memories on their next getaway.

Name: West Norway Guides / Møre Og Trøndelag Guideservice
Company description: West Norway Guides has been operating in Norway since 2007, starting services in Molde, Åndalsnes and Kristiansund  and rapidly expanded its operations to Ålesund and Trondheim.  Today, we are the main providers of guiding services in the region, and arrange tours for cruise ships, the Coastal Steamer (Hurtigruten) and tour operators in Ålesund, Molde, Åndalsnes, Geiranger/Hellesylt, Olden/Nordfjordeid, Kristiansund and Trondheim. Our main customers are: •	The Norwegian Coastal steamer (Hurtigruten) •	European Cruise Service •	Olsen Cruise Service •	Nordic Gateway And Cruise Lines like AIDA Cruises, Costa Cruises, MSC Cruises, Royal Carribean Cruise Line, TUI Cruises, Norwegian Cruise Line, Hapag Lloyd Cruises, Carnival Cruises, Silver Cruises and Phoenix Reisen.

Name: World Trade Center Amsterdam
Company description: World Trade Center Amsterdam is an award-winning commercial center with more than 125,000m2 of office space occupying a prime location in the new economic heart of Amsterdam, The Netherlands’ premier city. Featuring first-class office space for lease, unrivalled accessibility, and the convenience of many onsite business and personal facilities, World Trade Center Amsterdam is a pleasurable place to do business. World Trade Center Amsterdam is populated by a more than three hundred internationally active companies with representatives of around 30 nationalities. Tenants are active in a variety of fields, including finance, law, international trade and development, education, and the labor market. Due to its unique public-private space combination, the proximity to the station and variety of shops, cuisine and services on offer, the center is a magnet for the public. This creates a dynamic environment for resident organizations, unmatched in The Netherlands. Personnel and guests enjoy the vibrant atmosphere created by the public spaces, quality retailers, culinary enterprises and other conveniences on site. Access to plenty of onsite facilities and services ensures a working day in the World Trade Center Amsterdam is as productive as possible. Facilities include a central reception hall manned by professional staff, onsite information and communication (ICT) facilities, banking and postal services (including PO boxes), ample parking for cars and bicycles, and general storage space.  World Trade Center Amsterdam also offers superior convention facilities; providing a 200-seat auditorium, with advanced audiovisual technology, four well-appointed boardrooms and six meeting rooms. In addition, there is an attractive selection of shops, such as a florist, supermarket, and travel agency housed in the center, as well as personal services, including hairdresser, dentist, fitness center, physiotherapist, dry-cleaner, and a childcare center.

Name: Windrose Finest Travel GmbH
Company description: WINDROSE Finest Travel GmbH specializes in creating bespoke luxury and exclusive group travel experiences, catering to discerning clients seeking unique and memorable journeys. With a mission to provide exceptional service and personalized travel solutions, the company offers a wide range of travel themes, including private tours, cruises, and family vacations, across diverse global destinations. WINDROSE collaborates with luxury hotels, private yacht services, and event organizers to ensure a seamless and high-quality travel experience for its clients. The company targets affluent travelers who value exclusivity and personalized service, making it a preferred choice for those looking to explore the world in style and comfort. With a commitment to integrity and customer satisfaction, WINDROSE actively seeks feedback to continuously enhance its offerings and maintain transparency with its clients and partners.

Name: TRAVEL PARTNER GMBH
Company description: We are Austria's largest group-independent tourism incoming agency. As an incoming agency with over 30 years of experience, we offer individual vacation holidays with an unforgettable experience. Suitable for every taste, every budget and every target group, we create exclusive holiday offers for the holiday destinations Austria, Germany and other countries. Whether city trip, combination trips, group events, ski or hiking trips, family or active holidays - we compile individually tailored hotel and adventure packages for tour operators, individual and group travelers, which offer attractive added value. We are resort specialists and know local events and facilities that are worth discovering. We are the local specialists - creativity and innovation coupled with a high quality standard and a sense of service are what sets us apart.

Name: Tourist Travel Service S.r.l
Company description: Tourist Travel Service S.r.l. Group has been working in tourism for the past 20 years. The activity, born with Hotel Reservation (Hotel Consortium operating in last minute hotel booking), has expanded over the years through the creation of key companies. Over the years new touristic products have been developed: Cruises on the River of Rome (Battelli di Roma), Shuttle Service - door-to-door connection between Rome Fco Leonardo Da Vinci Airport and accommodation facilities in Rome, Hop-on Hop-off tours as Rome Open Tour, Athens Open Tour  and Heraklion Open Tour( which represents, thanks to a partnership with Marinakis a.x.e.t.e, the start up of a project in Greece).  The creation of its own tour operator to support the business."Margana Travel" represents  a very important step concerning our Group's development,  Every year our touristic products involve more than 900.000 tourists, placing T.T.S. among the most important operators. In 2011 we founded Golf Rome &… which, under the agreement with Golf District Rome (consortium that brings together, under the aegis of Roma Capitale, golf clubs in Latium Region), aims at transforming Rome, already famous for its distinctive landmarks, in the center of a new touristic destination which is developing rapidly: Golf. 2012 is the year of TOURIST TRAVEL CARD - THE DISCOUNT PASS TO ROME !  - A unique and exclusive product designed to provide Eternal City visitors with special offers, privileges, amenities and services!

Name: Viajes InterRías
Company description: Viajes InterRías is a travel company specializing in cultural circuits across Spain, Portugal, France, and Morocco. With a mission to provide enriching travel experiences, the company offers a variety of itineraries that allow clients to explore unique destinations while enjoying exceptional service. Their target market includes both individual travelers and travel agencies, with a focus on cultural tourism that highlights historical and scenic locations. Viajes InterRías is committed to enhancing customer satisfaction through innovative travel packages and partnerships, ensuring a memorable journey for all clients. The company also emphasizes safety and peace of mind by providing comprehensive travel insurance coverage. With over 30 years of experience in the industry, Viajes InterRías continues to strengthen its presence in the southern regions of Spain, fostering relationships with local travel agencies to expand its reach.

Name: Life Events ltd
HQ Location: Malta, Il Gżira, 14 Vjal De La Salle, gzr1531
Company description: Life events arises from the need to stand out from the classic entertainment and event planning agencies, focusing on the exclusivity and novelty of its tourism and entertainment products.  We operate on a national and international level in the field of animation , event planning , creation of successful entertainment formats, training and selection of PRs, team leaders and entertainers.  Our professional staff cooperates in order to achieve the companies target focusing on the growth and satisfaction of it’s partners along with the satisfaction of all it’s customers.  The company represents a versatile reality offering multiple services that vary in different sectors , but tourism is definitely its core business. For this reason Life Events l.t.d. is corroborative of highly prestigious collaborations including national and international tour operators , travel agencies , technical sponsors and the most prestigious locations that increase both the value of the company and the credibility towards it’s final customers Life Events ltd has been in the business for almost 15 years and throughout this time our main goals have been :  Creating a real added value for our partners and representing a concrete advantage against their competitors.  Developing a targeted productive synergy with the partners and successfully achieving the goals overcoming the expectations.  Contributing to the process of increasing the business and strengthening of the companies with which we operate.   Establishing it self in the world of event planning providing and creating products and new forefront top notch events by listening to the customers needs.

Name: ITrinus
Company description: iTrinus è una piattaforma in costante evoluzione, specializzata nella gestione immobiliare ed alberghiera. L'eccellenza è la nostra passione, e vogliamo che lo sia anche per voi. Aiutiamo il vostro albergo a guadagnare di più, forniamo servizi ai proprietari di immobili che vogliono avere un ricavo maggiore dell’affitto, offrendo soluzioni diverse in base alle loro esigenze. Ci occupiamo di Hotel Business Development, sviluppo commerciale, pianificazione strategica, strategie di vendita, collaborazioni con Tour Operator italiani ed internazionali, controllo di gestione delle prenotazioni, gestione degli adempimenti burocratici, fornitura biancheria e welcome kit, pulizia, manutenzione e qualsiasi servizio extra di cui il cliente ha bisogno.iTrinus, inoltre, ha un proprio asset immobiliare in costante crescita , per offrire un servizio sempre aggiornato e con proposte per ogni cliente che si rivolge a noi. Massimizziamo la rendita del vostro immobile o albergo, sponsorizzandolo su tutte le piattaforme Nazionali ed Internazionali nonché su tutte le riviste di settore. Garantiamo la massima trasparenza grazie al servizio login sul nostro portale, in modo tale da poter controllare in ogni momento il resoconto dettagliato delle prenotazioni ricevute e di ogni altra notizia cui si ha bisogno; Garantiamo la nostra totale disponibilità all'ascolto: vogliamo essere i vostri partner strategici; Lavoriamo con tenacia ed in modo “smart” per ottenere il massimo risultato

Name: Atlântida WTA Viagens Portugal
Company description: Atlântida WTA Viagens Portugal is a travel agency established in February 2020, specializing in providing comprehensive travel services including hotel bookings, travel arrangements, activities, and car rentals. The company is dedicated to delivering exceptional customer experiences, as evidenced by its perfect ratings in sleep, location, service, cleanliness, and rooms. Atlântida WTA Viagens aims to be a trusted partner for travelers seeking memorable experiences in Portugal, catering to a diverse clientele that includes both leisure and business travelers. The agency collaborates with various partners in the hospitality and transportation sectors to ensure high-quality service and satisfaction for its customers. With a commitment to excellence, Atlântida WTA Viagens strives to enhance the travel experience for all its clients.

Name: Xperience & Travel Lounge
Company description: Xperience  is a new generation Travel Agency with a special focus on the following services :  - Worldwide Tailor Made Travel Services - Corporate Incentives with unique "Xperiences" - National & International Congresses - National & International Events - Teambuildings

Name: Pinto Lopes Viagens
Company description: Agência de Viagens em Grupo, Culturais e de Autor, com guia. A Pinto Lopes Viagens é um operador turístico e agência de viagens especializada em Viagens em grupo, culturais e de Autor, com Guia em português. Com 50 anos de experiência, organizamos anualmente cerca de 1.000 circuitos, levando mais de 30.000 viajantes aos quatro cantos do mundo. A programação por nós desenvolvida é comercializada em exclusivo pela Pinto Lopes Viagens, não sendo possível encontrá-la numa outra agência. RNAVT n.º 2070.

Name: Guiness Travel Tour Operator
Company description: Guiness Travel Tour Operator specializes in providing tailored travel experiences in Laos, focusing on cultural immersion and adventure tourism. The company's mission is to promote responsible travel while showcasing the rich heritage and natural beauty of Laos, ensuring that clients have a memorable and authentic experience. Guiness Travel caters to a diverse clientele, including individual travelers, families, and groups seeking unique itineraries that highlight local traditions and attractions. The company collaborates with local partners to enhance its offerings, ensuring high-quality services and support for travelers. With a target market that includes both international tourists and local explorers, Guiness Travel aims to foster a deeper understanding of Laos and its vibrant culture.

Name: Matkavekka
Company description: Matkavekka is a Finnish tour operator that has provided Finnish people with various holiday packages for decades. We make your holiday dreams come true - whether you want to spend a week in a sunny beach destination, take a family trip to LEGOLAND, visit a nice city over the weekend or travel in a bigger group. Most of the holidays are nowadays sold in our webshop https:/www.matkavekka.fi and in our call center.  The world has become bigger and our holiday selection constantly changes to meet to our customers' needs. However, the core of our business has remained – satisfied customers and good service, always in Finnish language. Matkavekka is part of the Nordic travel company TravelCo Nordic which operates also in Sweden, Norway, Denmark and Iceland. Matkavekka headquarters is located in Vantaa near Helsinki Airport. Visiting address:  Äyritie 12 C, FI-01510 Vantaa

Name: Larus Viaggi DMC
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Comacchio, 199 Viale Alpi Centrali, 44022
Company description: From 1984 Larus Viaggi DMC – Inbound Tour Operator for Italy. It was founded by Mr. Franco Vitali and opened in the city center of Comacchio, an historical lagoon town in the Ferrara province of Italy, famous as the “little Venice”; from a couple of years, Larus Viaggi’s main offices has been moved directly to the Coast of Mar Adriatico in Lido degli Scacchi, inside the Holiday Village Florenz 4*, a wonderful resort always belonging to Vitali’s Family. During all these years, Larus Viaggi has used its own experience in the tourism field in order to organize holidays for FIT as for GROUPS, for thousands of people interested in visiting our amazing country. Our best partners are Travel Agencies and Tour Operators scattered around all Europe, especially Eastern Europe (Russian language countries), but recently we have focused our attention on Arab states, Middle East and East markets; among our clients we can count Fly-Groups and Bus-Groups, Families with children, Students Groups, Senior Groups and simple couples. Our main activity is the creation of “tailor-made” tours and offers for each kind of clients, Groups as well as Fit; we plan and realize programs on the base of clients’ s need, requests and budget. Through Larus Viaggi, you can reserve accommodation, guided-tours, transfer services, entry tickets to the most important sightseeing and events choosing among all Italian destinations; and for clients more demanding we have selected high-quality and exclusive services in our special luxury brand “Top Italy”.

Name: Travel Service I Göteborg
Company description: Company travel, meetings and events are the foundation of what we do. We take a ­comprehensive ­approach to the entire ­process - from planning and  booking, to efficient ­payment methods, ­administration and following up of statistics. We care about sharing a good ­cooperative ­experience with our customers and we take an active interest in­ ­­helping and ­developing our customers in ­accordance with their preferences and market conditions. Travel Service was founded in 1991 as a ­traditional business travel agency. Over the years we have ­developed and built upon a solid base of ­experience on how to sensibly and ­efficiently plan, ­coordinate and maintain control over ­companies’ business travel solutions. Today we have ­become a highly skilled, integrated ­cooperative partner within the areas business travel, trade fair ­travel, meetings, conferences and events, with the ­documented ability to efficiently offer more than the traditional business travel agency.

Name: Airtuerk Service GmbH
Company description: Airtuerk Service GmbH is a dynamic flight consolidator dedicated to revolutionizing the travel distribution industry through innovative technology and exceptional service. The company’s mission is to simplify and expedite travel bookings, empowering travel agencies to thrive in a competitive market. With a focus on building long-term partnerships, Airtuerk fosters trust and collaboration, helping its clients—primarily travel agencies—achieve sustainable growth. The company is committed to creating value through targeted marketing campaigns that enhance visibility and drive success for its partners, including airlines. Driven by a team of market-savvy professionals, Airtuerk is a place where ideas flourish and solutions that truly matter are developed.

Name: Multireisen Deutschland MRD GmbH Groups
Company description: Multireisen Booking Engine, the biggest international B2B travel consolidator headquarters in Germany, Since 2003 we have been collecting reviews, feedbacks, questionnaires, and surveys from different travel agents, tour operators, and travel management companies all over the world to build the most user-friendly and multifunctional online booking engine that will fit to any business needs. By integrating the biggest number of suppliers in our system we guarantee to offer the best rates on any travel services. Currently, we have integrated more than 650 suppliers of flights, hotels, car rentals, transfers, packages, cruises, trains, buses, activities, and we are eager to keep expanding our travel inventory.

Name: GALERIA Reisen Powered By ADAC
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 22 Lyoner Straße, 60528
Company description: GALERIA Reisen Powered By ADAC is a prominent travel agency that specializes in offering a diverse array of vacation packages, including flights, hotels, and rental cars, with a particular emphasis on sought-after destinations like the Seychelles and the Maldives. The company is dedicated to delivering exceptional travel experiences by providing tailored services that meet the unique needs of its clients, which range from families and couples to adventure seekers. With a mission to make travel accessible and enjoyable for everyone, GALERIA Reisen envisions a future where every traveler can explore the world with ease and confidence. The agency prioritizes customer satisfaction and collaborates with a variety of partners, including airlines and renowned hotel chains, to ensure high-quality offerings and competitive pricing. GALERIA Reisen is especially known for its focus on stress-free and personalized travel experiences, allowing clients to book unforgettable holiday packages that include flights and accommodations conveniently online. The target market encompasses families, couples, and active travelers who seek both relaxation and adventure during their journeys. In addition to its core offerings, GALERIA Reisen emphasizes the importance of clear communication regarding clients' special needs and preferences, ensuring that every traveler receives customized recommendations and support. The agency also promotes various travel insurance options and provides essential travel information, demonstrating its commitment to minimizing risks and enhancing the overall travel experience. By prioritizing data protection and customer privacy, GALERIA Reisen showcases its dedication to maintaining trust and transparency in all its operations, solidifying its reputation as a reliable partner in the travel industry.

Name: Travel Jet co
Company description: Tour operator e agenzia viaggi dal 1975. Vendita per corrispondenza mediante appisito catalogo di servizi turisici dal 1990

Name: New Flymar Travel Agency
Company description: New Flymar è una realtà imprenditoriale specializzata in business travel. Nata nel 1985 come agenzia viaggi leisure, si specializza nel settore Business Travel e Fair Travel cominciando un percorso di crescita professionale importante che renderà New Flymar una delle agenzie leader nella gestione dei viaggi di lavoro per il B2B. Dal 1989 New Flymar fornisce ai propri clienti servizi di viaggio e management per il corporate travel. L’unione tra tecnologia all’avanguardia e un team con un'esperienza media di 14 anni nel settore, offre ai propri clienti un importante “VALORE AGGIUNTO”. Nel 2015 New Flymar diventa partner in Italia di Reed & Mackay e siamo orgogliosi di far parte della partnership internazionale. New Flymar is Travel Agency specialized in corporate travel. Founded in 1985 as a leisure travel agency, it started an important professional growth that allows New Flymar to become one of the leading professional agencies in the management of business Travel for the B2B. Since 1989 New Flymar has been providing its customers with high quality standard travel services. 14 average agent's experience offers its customers the high "ADDED VALUE". In 2015 New Flymar become partner in Italy for Reed&Mackay and we are produr to be part of this International Partnership.

Name: VakantieVeilingen
Company description: Online platform (web & app) voor vrije tijd, tickets, vakanties en producten, opererend in Nederland en België. VakantieVeilingen.nl is verantwoordelijk voor de introductie van prijsstelling door de consument op de leisure markt in de Benelux door het lanceren van internet veilingen via een professioneel platform ("Jij bepaalt wat jij betaalt"). Rapidly growing online auctioneer of leisure activities, event tickets, holidays and holiday packages in the Dutch & Belgian marketplace. VakantieVeilingen.nl introduced the concept of consumer pricing to the Benelux, allowing customers to set their own price for leisure activities though online auctions.

Name: GOLFREIZEN.NU
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Brabant, Rijsbergen, 70 Sint Bavostraat, 4891
Company description: GOLFREIZEN.NU is dé specialist voor uw golfreis op maat. We bieden golfvakanties over de hele wereld, van een weekendje golfen in Nederland tot een 30-daagse rondreis met golf in Zuid-Afrika!  Bij al onze golfreizen staat u als klant voorop. Met een persoonlijke benadering en aandacht voor uw wensen verzorgen wij graag uw golfreis, zodat u onbezorgd op vakantie kunt. GOLFREIZEN.NU is een label van Par Travel Agency.

Name: DELEM Ocio
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Sevilla, 17 C/ Dr. José María Bedoya, 41004
Company description: DELEM es una agencia de viajes mayorista y minorista con diversas marcas de referencia en viajes para jóvenes. Tras 10 años de experiencia en el sector turístico, nos especializamos en estudiantes, grupos y centros académicos. No obstante, gracias a nuestro constante crecimiento a través de la implantación de nuevas líneas de negocio, conseguimos acercarnos a todos los públicos. Dentro de nuestras líneas de trabajo, destaca también nuestra sección de organización de eventos, que opera por toda Andalucía. Contamos con un equipo joven formado por más de 60 profesionales cuidadosamente seleccionados, con iniciativa, sentido del trabajo y responsabilidad. Esto, unido a la completa formación a la que son sometidos, hace que el conocimiento del producto y el mercado sea total, y que la comunicación, el trato personal y la empatía con el cliente sean máximos. Hay momentos que, directamente, se graban a fuego en nuestra memoria. Por eso, en DELEM nos dedicamos a convertir esos momentos importantes en recuerdos imborrables. Lo conseguimos hacer porque llevamos más de 9 años trabajando en el sector del ocio. Los viajes y los eventos forman parte de nuestro ADN, creando experiencias, momentos y aventuras para ti porque sabemos cómo lograrlo. Sabemos de lo que hablamos porque somos una empresa joven que se dedica a los jóvenes, apostando por el talento fresco y jovial en nuestras filas. Y, sobre todo, disfrutamos como nadie trabajando en lo que nos apasiona.

Name: Santiago Ways
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Las Palmas De Gran Canaria, 3 Calle Antonio María Manrique, 35011
Company description: We love the Camino de Santiago. We are Camino de Santiago Official Tour-operator and travel agency with many years of experience offering unique experiences along the Camino.  Santiago Ways offers Cultural & adventure walking and cycling holidays on the Camino de Santiago. Our tailor-made packages are created by Camino de Santiago lovers and designed to give you a unique active experience. Contact our team at info@santiagoways.com Let's us organice your next Camino! Buen Camino!

Name: Usit Colours Bulgaria
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Sofia-capital, Sofia, №1 Пл. Папа Йоан Павел Ii, 1164
Company description: Usit Colours is one of the biggest and most progressive tourist agencies in Bulgaria. Founded as a student travel agency, Usit Colours soon expanded its business and currently provides diverse tourist products and services to fully address the needs of a wide variety of customers – corporate, leisure and students. For the Corporate clients, Usit Colours offers a professional arrangement of business trips in Bulgaria and abroad, and full support of corporate events, like conferences, trainings or team buildings. By incorporating good understanding of companies’ specific travel needs and personal approach, Usit Colours guarantees its business clients service of high standard and reliability. For the Leisure travelers, Usit Colours aims to provide high-quality travel solutions for a vacation or trip of any liking and budget. The products for holiday makers that we offer range from airline tickets, city breaks, or vacation packages in Europe, to exotic excursion, cruises and all accompanying travel services. Regardless of the product, it is our determination to give our leisure travelers the product, care, and attitude we would expect to get for our own holidays. For the Students and young people, Usit Colours provides special airfare, discount cards, exchange programs and internships in various countries. We constantly develop our student products to make them more affordable and in the same time valuable, aiming to facilitate their travel and stimulate their personal progress. Being one of the biggest companies, leading the Bulgarian tourism market, Usit Colours enjoys the financial strength and negotiating power to offer better prices and more flexible conditions, thus creating value for all its clients. Engaged in the development of its community, Usit Colours maintains long standing tradition in creating initiatives that encourage young Bulgarians to develop valuable skills and personal qualities while giving them a chance to grow professionally.

Name: Bókun A Tripadvisor company
Company description: Bókun, a Tripadvisor company born in Iceland is designed to help tour and activity providers worldwide stay organised and grow bookings with 27,000+ connections to Online Travel Agencies (OTAs), Resellers & Suppliers. ✅ Import products from Viator in one-click for a fast set-up ✅ Wave goodbye to double bookings by effortlessly managing availability on all booking channels  ✅ Increase revenue by accepting direct bookings  on your website  Claim your two week free trial (no credit card required) at: https://bokun.io

Name: Apollomatkat
Company description: Apollo is one of the largest tour operators in the Nordic countries.  The brands Apollo in Sweden, Denmark, Norway and Finland, the Netherlands, golf specialist Golf Plaisir, luxury specialist Lime Travel and the training resort Playitas in Fuerteventura form DERTOUR Nordic. Apollomatkat is the fourth largest tour operator in Finland and had c. 80.000 happy passengers in 2018.

Name: Transol SA
Company description: Fundada em 1994, a Transol – Transportes e Turismo, SA, é uma empresa de Transportes de Turismo de Passageiros e Agência de Viagens. Desenvolveu-se a partir da necessidade que o mercado turístico Algarvio apresentava respeitante ao transporte de passageiros de turismo. Iniciou com uma frota reduzida, cerca de 20 autocarros, ultrapassando rapidamente a capacidade instalada. O crescimento nos primeiros anos foi exponencial, captando os principais agentes de viagens da região, operadores estrangeiros, empresas e escolas de toda região Algarvia. Hoje, a Transol, SA é sem dúvida uma das empresas de maior dimensão da região algarvia na área dos transportes de turismo, com mais de 100 viaturas de Turismo. A qualidade de serviço, para a qual contribui a diversificada frota de autocarros e o profissionalismo de todos os colaboradores, é amplamente reconhecida por todos os clientes.

Name: Towns Of Italy | Tour Operator
Company description: Towns of Italy is a premier tour operator specializing in bespoke travel experiences across Italy, with a rich history dating back to 1969. Originally founded in Florence, the company has evolved into a leader in luxury tourism, catering to discerning clients from the United States, Canada, Australia, Brazil, and Mexico. Its mission is to create unforgettable itineraries that highlight Italy's hidden treasures and iconic attractions, all while ensuring a personalized and immersive experience for travelers. The dedicated team of travel planners at Towns of Italy focuses on understanding clients' desires, crafting unique journeys that exceed expectations through meticulous organization and creativity. With a commitment to excellence, the company emphasizes small group tours and private experiences, allowing guests to engage deeply with the culture and traditions of Italy. Partnering with highly qualified local suppliers and maintaining strong relationships within the industry, Towns of Italy is dedicated to delivering exceptional service and memorable adventures.

Name: Agencija Oskar
Company description: Established in 1996, based in Kranj, Slovenia Highly experienced in tour operations all over the world Leading Slovenian travel agency, 30+ employees, 60+ professional licensed tour guides Branch office in Croatia Known for unique travel philosophy  WHAT OTHERS SAY ABOUT US: Trustworthy, responsible, reliable, efficient  Known for high quality, reasonable prices and personalized products We love and care about what we do!

Name: Apartool
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 6 Passatge De Pagès, 08013
Company description: Apartool is a leading provider of corporate housing solutions, specializing in simplifying the management and booking of temporary accommodations for business travelers. With a mission to enhance the travel experience, Apartool offers a centralized platform that allows companies, travel agencies, and relocation services to efficiently manage their lodging needs across a global network of over 300,000 fully furnished apartments in 85 countries. The company aims to provide a seamless and stress-free booking process, ensuring that corporate clients feel at home during their business trips. Apartool's target market includes corporate clients, travel agencies, and event organizers, all of whom benefit from tailored accommodation options and dedicated account management. By prioritizing customer satisfaction and adapting to industry trends, Apartool positions itself as a trusted partner for businesses seeking high-quality housing solutions for their employees and teams.

Name: Bivestour Viajes
HQ Location: Spain, Galicia, Vigo, 4 Plaza De Compostela, 36201
Company description: Bivestour Viajes, una agencia de viajes dedicada a crear experiencias de viaje inolvidables para empresas, grupos y viajeros individuales. Con una trayectoria de excelencia, nos especializamos en la organización de viajes corporativos, retiros de equipo y vacaciones personalizadas. ¿Qué ofrecemos? Viajes Corporativos: Optimización de viajes de negocios, conferencias y retiros empresariales. Viajes en Grupo: Planificación y gestión de viajes para grupos grandes, con atención personalizada y soluciones a medida. Vacaciones Personalizadas: Paquetes vacacionales adaptados a las necesidades y deseos de cada cliente. Nuestro Compromiso: Nos dedicamos a proporcionar un servicio de alta calidad, asegurando que cada viaje sea seguro, eficiente y memorable. Nuestro equipo de expertos trabaja incansablemente para ofrecer las mejores opciones y el máximo valor, siempre con una sonrisa. Testimonios: “La buena organización de los viajes” MC Gil “A pesar de ser una persona exigente, han conseguido el viaje perfecto para nosotros . Una agencia ee toda la vida de plena confianza “ K. Pena “Excelente trabajo con la organización de nuestro viaje, totalmente recomendable “ M.Romero Visítanos en www.bivstour.com o contáctanos en informacion@bivestour.com para descubrir cómo podemos ayudarte a planificar tu próximo viaje.

Name: HIMBA TOURS
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Mataró, 11 Calle De La Unión, 08302
Company description: Himba Tours es una agencia de viajes especializada en viajes a medida totalmente personalizados, viajes de aventura, viajes de novios y viajes en grupos reducidos. En Himba Tours cada uno de nuestros viajes es una experiencia única e inolvidable para nuestros viajeros. Tenemos claro que lo más importante en un viaje es que nuestro viajero se sienta arropado en todo momento para que pueda disfrutar al máximo cada uno de los días de su viaje. Para ello todos los viajes están llenos de momentos inolvidables, de experiencias únicas e irrepetibles y de estancias singulares. En este sentido, pretendemos ofrecer un trato totalmente personalizado, para poder lograr alcanzar los sueños de nuestros viajeros. Nos sentaremos juntos, escucharemos vuestros deseos, y juntos haremos realidad la ruta de vuestros sueños. Para nosotros son muy importantes las personas de cada una de nuestras destinaciones, es por eso que siempre que sea posible, intentamos colaborar con la población autóctona, ayudando así a la economía local.   “ Un viaje de mil millas empieza con un paso”   Lao Tse

Name: MIF Mallorca Island Festival
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Igualada, 34 Local Calle De Girona, 08700
