Company description: Mallorca Island Festival ® forma parte de la agencia de viajes líder en organización de viajes de fin de curso, elegida por excelencia entre los Centros Educativos y Asociaciones de Madres y Padres de Alumnos de toda España, convencidos que la educación que reciben sus hijos e hijas en las aulas y hogares, es complementaria a la formación didáctica y pedagógica en la que se orientan nuestros viajes de fin de curso programados.

Name: Club Marco Polo
HQ Location: Spain, Basque Country, Bilbao, 4 Hurtado Amézaga, 48008
Company description: Expertos en Grandes Viajes desde 1980.  Agencia de Viajes Mayorista internacional especializada en viajes de aventura y viajes alternativos. CLUB MARCO POLO:  TOUROPERADOR MAYORISTA INTERNACIONAL En Club Marco Polo fuimos pioneros al crear una línea de viajes diferente al turismo vacacional tradicional, allá por 1980. Desde entonces, el mundo ha cambiado mucho. Y nosotros también. Hoy en día, con el apoyo de nuestro propio grupo, la modernización de nuestras oficinas, la obtención y consolidación de la Q de calidad turística, así como nuestra creatividad y constante adaptación a las últimas tecnologías, podemos estar orgullosos de ser el touroperador Nº1 en España en viajes alternativos y de aventura. Una constante renovación que, sin embargo, no ha alterado lo más mínimo unos principios y valores que forman parte de la esencia de Club Marco Polo desde el primer día: crear viajes diferentes, con un fuerte componente cultural, humano y sostenible; con grupos reducidos, enfocados a ofrecer experiencias únicas y auténticas. Gracias por acompañarnos en este apasionante viaje. #ClubMarcoPolo

Name: Arkria Group
Company description: Arkria is a company that provides emergency after-hours services for Travel Agencies, using different tools to give the support needed when the main office is closed, to ensure the perfect assistance at all times.  We are specialised in VIP passengers follow-up, from the beginning to the end of the journey. Multilingual staff based in Europe, with international training on problem solving.

Name: Grupo Orbitalia
Company description: En Grupo Orbitalia llevamos más de un siglo haciendo que viajar sea una experiencia segura, cómoda y flexible para todos nuestros clientes.  Desde nuestros inicios acercamos a las personas a su lugar de destino a través de una red de autobuses y autocares con servicio discrecional y regular. Nuestros diferentes centros de trabajo están ubicados en la Región de Murcia y ofrecemos servicio tanto en España como en Europa.   Nuestro grupo es mucho más que transporte, ¿Planeando unas vacaciones inolvidables? Nuestra agencia de viajes, Viajes Mercurio, ¡tiene todo lo que necesitas para vivir aventuras asombrosas! Y para aquellos que prefieren conducir, nuestra marca Orbirent ofrece un alquiler de vehículos que se adapta a tus necesidades, ya seas un particular o una empresa.  En Grupo Orbitalia no nos conformamos con ofrecer un buen servicio, nos esforzamos por brindarte lo mejor. Nos comprometemos a mejorar constantemente tu experiencia de viaje, porque tu satisfacción es nuestra mayor recompensa.  Únete a nosotros y déjanos llevarte a donde quieras ir, ¡con seguridad y una sonrisa en el camino!

Name: AirGateway
Company description: AirGateway is a facilitator for the IATA NDC (New Distribution Capability) age in the air travel distribution industry. We enable, both via API or with an end-to-end Agent Desktop solution, travel agencies that want to join the new distribution model for the future agency. If you are a Consolidator, TMC, or OTA seamless, looking for a reliable long-term NDC partner that provides technology and guidance, we are probably a good fit for you. #iataNDC #AirlineNDC #NDC

Name: AARON GROUP
Company description: Founded in 1998 as a local technology company and quickly transformed into a global player that captures the trends of 21st century travel and defines the appropriate technological solutions. Technology partnership for market leaders Our three core product areas, working together or standalone, cater for needs of any entity in today’s commercial aviation business: NDC Distribution Thanks to almost two decades of intensive cooperation with global GDS/ CRS players like Amadeus and SITA and solutions implemented with over a hundred of our customers, we know all the pros and cons of this traditional Distribution model. That’s why we developed and run a brand new Distribution concept, certified by IATA and based on its NDC, allowing the airlines to offer a customized content for each business partner by significantly cutting its Distribution cost. And likewise enabling agency customers to access the airline content without any GDS surcharges. E-Commerce for Airlines, Travel Agencies and Corporates Our E-Commerce solutions reflect our goal for the IBE to serve as the airline’s or OTA’s official shop-window. With this in mind it does not only provide our customers with the latest revenue driving streams like Fare Families or Bundled Fares, but also various Ancillary Services and sophisticated tools for cross- or upsell and digital marketing. Fin-Tech Solutions We consider offering a wide option of secure payment methods as a basic principle of a good E-Commerce solution. That’s why we decided to go even beyond and help our customers to maximize efficiency even for credit card payments and currency conversions – both, on direct payments and even the BSP.

Name: DGITAL Labs
Company description: DGITAL is a travel technology and e-commerce start-up based in Budapest, providing development, operations and consultation services for airlines and online travel agencies from all over the world. The company was founded by former Wizz Air Head of IT, Zsolt S. Csernak and senior IT managers from the airline. DGITAL is expert in Microsoft technologies especially in delivering high traffic and high availability solutions for both cloud-based and on-premise platforms.   We are a fun and collaborative work crew delivering state of the art online travel solutions involving cutting edge technologies. At DGITAL we honor our employees by excellent remuneration, compensation package, family friendly work and workplace conditions. You can be part of the success as a shareholder after 12 successful months in position by participating in DGITAL employee stock purchase plan.

Name: Europlayas
Company description: Mayorista con 50 años de experiencia. Soluciones tecnológicas B2B para agencias de viajes. Socio estratégico en campañas de marketing institucional para promocionar destinos en el canal profesional. Europlayas | Turoperador mayorista 100% B2B. Con más de 50 años de trayectoria, Europlayas es un turoperador mayorista especializado en la comercialización turística a través de agencias de viajes. Ofrecemos un catálogo completo de producto nacional e internacional, integraciones tecnológicas B2B y soporte comercial personalizado. Trabajamos exclusivamente con agencias de viajes y contamos con más de 18.000 agencias conectadas en España, Portugal, Francia, Italia y Reino Unido. 👥 Soluciones para agencias de viajes - Portal B2B con acceso a más de 120.000 hoteles. - Paquetes vacacionales en destinos nacionales e internacionales.  - Paquete dinámicos:  Vuelo + hotel, Ferry + Hotel y Tren + Hotel - Parques temáticos y escapadas. - Red comercial nacional con delegados comerciales y atención personalizada. 🌍 Campañas institucionales para destinos turísticos Europlayas colabora con administraciones públicas, oficinas de turismo y fundaciones para el diseño, comercialización y promoción de destinos turísticos en el canal profesional. Acciones de promoción con alto alcance: ▪ Web B2B con más de 20 millones de sesiones/año ▪ Campañas de marketing con soporte internos y externos ▪ Presentaciones y formación de destinos.  Europlayas. Distribuimos turismo. Promocionamos destinos. Conectamos personas.

Name: Destinia
Company description: Destinia is a leading online travel agency that specializes in providing a comprehensive range of travel services, including hotel bookings, flight reservations, and vacation packages. The company focuses on offering a wide variety of accommodation options, such as hotels, hostels, and vacation rentals, particularly in popular tourist destinations like Myrtle Beach, South Carolina. Destinia's mission is to simplify the travel booking process, enabling users to find the best prices and accommodations tailored to their specific needs, whether for business trips, family vacations, or weekend getaways.  The company partners with numerous hotels and resorts to ensure a diverse selection that caters to different budgets and preferences, making it a preferred choice for travelers seeking value and convenience. Destinia's target market encompasses both leisure and business travelers who are looking for reliable and affordable lodging options. By enhancing the overall travel experience through user-friendly technology and dedicated customer support, Destinia aims to make travel accessible and enjoyable for everyone. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and innovative solutions, Destinia strives to be a leading player in the online travel industry. The company’s dynamic approach and focus on competitive pricing allow it to cater to a diverse clientele, including families, business travelers, and vacationers. Through its extensive partnerships with hotels and airlines worldwide, Destinia offers a comprehensive selection of accommodations and travel options, ensuring that every traveler can find the perfect fit for their journey.

Name: TravelStoreMaker.com
Company description: TravelStoreMaker.com technology powers thousands of travel websites, including the sites of airlines, travel agencies, hotels, corporations and web portals. The flexible and user friendly technology provides information and booking capabilities to book flights, hotels, packages, cruises and rental cars via the Web. TravelStoreMaker offers a portfolio of products and services to the travel industry including Search Engine Marketing, Social Media Optimization, Web Design, Technology and custom application development, contact center services, and other solutions focused on the Internet and Travel.

Name: Tranås Resebyrå
Company description: Tranås Resebyrå AB grundades 1979 och är ett svenskt privatägt och oberoende företag. Vi är idag 20 medarbetare där både kontor och styrelsens säte är belägna i småländska Tranås. Vårt mål är att som samarbetspartner hjälpa våra kunder att få så mycket som möjligt för pengarna när det gäller resor och hanteringen av dessa utan att ge avkall på kvaliteten! Vi är sedan starten självklart medlemmar i Svenska Resebyråföreningen och IATA. Företaget ägs och drivs av Anders Lindén och Kenneth Wigren. Med rötterna djupt i den småländska myllan så är vårt mål att göra skillnad efter devisen att hjälpa er att hjälpa fler. Allt sedan starten i september 1979 har vi inriktat oss på att samarbeta med dem som gör skillnad i världen.   Startskottet var familjen som skulle ut och arbeta i Cochabamba och vi hittade en bra resa till ett bra pris. Detta spred sig sedan inom missionärs- och biståndskretsar och vi kom att bygga upp en kompetens runt biståndsdestinationer, många av dem i Afrika. Tack vare att fler och fler av dessa olika organisationer började samarbeta med oss så kom vi i kontakt med nätverket Raptim, vars syfte var att främja detta resande. Vi blev en del av Raptim och fick så småningom rättigheterna för hela Norden vilket gav oss specialavtal med alla stora flygbolag. Visst har det varit tufft ibland, allt stod stilla när askmolnet drog in över Europa. Gruppen som satt fast på Island och där vi fick väcka dem när det plötsligt öppnades en flight ut, samtidigt som de skyndade ut till flygplatsen så skrev vi om alla biljetterna… nu kom de bara till Trondheim så vi fick snabbt hyra en buss som tog dem hem därifrån… Eller alla biskoparna, som satt fast i Rom, som vi fick trixa att ta hem via buss, tåg och taxi… men  de kom hem!     Vår ambition och stora mål är än idag att vara en samarbetspartner i och runt resandet och göra skillnad – även om aldrig så liten!  Välkommen till oss!

Name: NAT.travel Sp. Z O.o.
Company description: NAT.travel Sp. z o. o. is a travel agency with a All Over The World tour operator license, and also a group of travel enthusiasts. We are specialising in both outbound and inbound tourism in the MICE and FIT sectors. We organize trips to all regions of the world. We offer to our Customers spending active time (rafting, trekking, scuba diving, golf, safari etc..) as well as the cooking class and other local activities. We have a network of several dozen agents (sab agents) throughout the country. With a huge quality demanding expectations our local DMC’s partners from all over the World are strictly selected as the best for us and finaly our Customers. Moreover, we are not only focused on the central and middle- east region of the continent- we are as well reaching for other lands. Our company makes it possible for the travelers from all over the world to discover gorgeous and picturesque places of the planet, even those the most remote and culturally different. We can show not only the beauties of our own area, but also we are the ones who can take you for a off-the-bitten-track route or into the luxurious, up-the-market resorts surrounded by nature. This means that our business is not particularly a DMC- in reality, this is only a part of our specialization. This leads to the conclusion, that we organize both inbound and outbound tours. We can also connect travelling to Central Eastern Europe with the rest of this continent especially for you- our advantage is that we offer you special and the most interesting events, with regard to natural resources and variety of cultural places and cities. Our company assure you of complex service of a range from technical and logistic solutions to catering, artistic setting and making reservations. Once you have entrusted us organising an event, you have a certainty that our professional team will take care of everything.

Name: Deltanet Travel S.A.
Company description: Deltanet Travel is one of the leading Destination Management Companies in Greece and Cyprus, having an extended network of offices in all major destinations. Based in Heraklion - Crete with branches in Rethymno, Rhodes, Kos, Karpathos, Athens, Corfu, Zakynthos, Lesvos, Santorini, Paphos and Ayia Napa.  Having a serious and well – established infrastructure and skilled team with long experience in tourism and strong access to the local market, Deltanet can provide high level services at the most competitive conditions. Our quality standards, certified by ISO quality control, as well as our commitment to quality can ensure clients`​ satisfaction. We are serving more than 300.000 passengers per season from various markets and are dealing with back – to – back charter operations, Groups & Incentive handling as well as with Internet bookings and FIT’s. Our spectrum of services includes an extended portfolio of accommodation (we are co – operating with all major hotel chains, as well as individual hotels and have an extended bed – bank of guarantee beds in hotels of all classes), transfers, excursion organizing, cruises, car rental, leisure group travel, congress and incentive groups organizing as well as special holiday packages for special interest guests and VIP’s.  In addition we dispose about a state of the art B2B system with XML Interface. The B2B System Deltanet Travel offers a state-of-the art B2B Internet Booking system, specially designed for use of partner Tour Operators & travel agencies, providing online bookings with real time availability for accommodation, transfers & excursions in all the Greek & Cypriot destinations we operate. Depending on the needs of our partners, we have the possibility to offer 3 different methods namely Back office bookings via the “ Web Booking System”, White Label Affiliation and the automated bookings via “XML connection Services”.

Name: Qondor
Company description: Qondor is the meetings and events management platform built to empower event professionals, travel agencies, and TMCs to streamline their operations, maximise profitability, and deliver seamless experiences.  From managing event requests to handling budgets, proposals, invoicing, and reporting, Qondor simplifies every step of the event lifecycle. With full financial oversight and real-time project management capabilities, M&E professionals can gain complete control over their events, reduce complexity, and drive operational excellence— all in one powerful, user-friendly platform.  Whether organising large-scale events, group travel, or conferences, Qondor ensures that you operate with confidence, efficiency, and precision.

Name: MULTINUCLEO High Performance Solutions
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, 1 Calle Foners, 07004
Company description: Multinucleo builds high-performance, cloud-based B2B platforms for the travel & tourism industry. Founded in Mallorca in 2008, we help tour operators, OTAs, bedbanks and suppliers integrate, scale and run their operations in real time. Our solutions connect the travel value chain - suppliers, distributors and customers - seamlessly and instantly. We focus on: 	•	Custom B2B platforms tailored to each client’s workflows 	•	High-performance APIs & interfaces handling millions of requests 	•	Scalable cloud architectures (AWS, automation, SRE, DevOps) 	•	Real-time data & process optimization With a remote-first, senior team and a strong R&D culture, we deliver platforms that don’t just meet today’s demands, but anticipate tomorrow’s challenges in a fast-changing industry.

Name: Travel Connection Maldives
Company description: Travel Connection Maldives (TCM) is the Maldives’ leading luxury travel agency, specializing in tailor-made holidays, honeymoons, and group escapes. With over 15 years of experience and partnerships with 170+ world-class resorts, we deliver seamless, personalized travel experiences for clients from Europe, the Middle East, America, and beyond. Our award-winning team offers 24/7 local support, insider knowledge, and exclusive perks to ensure every journey is unforgettable.

Name: GoGolf Oyj
Company description: GoGolf.fi is the trendiest and most active golf media in Finland with an ever expanding and captive clientele. We have rapidly grown to engulf the entire golf scene in Finland and now can boast as having the best fan base and readership in the region.  The company consists of GoGolf media & web shop, tour operator Golfresepti, gear store Golf Sky and golf course Kurk Golf.  GoGolf is very actively presented on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TV, golf events and from 2016 onwards through our own "GoGolf Magazine". As a GoGolf-member you join the + 38 000 golfers that enjoy amazing green fee deals, a HIO-insurance and much more!  As devoted golfers ourselves, we at GoGolf believe that golf is not only a privilege for a chosen few but also a dynamic sport across all demographic groups. We are reshaping and revitalizing the golf scene as young, fresh and exciting choice, not only for green card holders, but also for those with limited experience of this amazing sport. While creating more ways to enjoy the game, our goal is to drive the entire golf industry towards a healthier future.

Name: Hoteliers.com
Company description: Hoteliers.com is a unique hotel comparison website designed specifically for travelers seeking commission-free bookings. Unlike traditional online travel agencies, Hoteliers.com connects users directly to hotel websites, allowing them to secure the best rates and exclusive offers without incurring additional fees. The company's mission is to empower both travelers and hoteliers by eliminating commission costs, enabling hotels to pass savings directly to customers. Targeting a diverse clientele across Europe and the Caribbean, Hoteliers.com partners with hotels that pay a modest monthly membership fee to be featured on the platform, ensuring transparency and a commitment to quality service. With a focus on enhancing the booking experience, Hoteliers.com aims to foster direct relationships between guests and hotels, ultimately enriching the travel experience for all involved.

Name: Primavera Hotele
Company description: Primavera Hotele Sp. z o.o. is a hospitality company based in Gdynia, Poland, specializing in providing exceptional hotel and wellness services that create comprehensive experiences for its guests. The company's mission is to ensure the highest level of comfort and safety during stays, achieved through strict adherence to regulations and service standards. Catering to a diverse clientele, Primavera Hotele attracts families with children, individuals seeking relaxation, and those interested in active leisure, making its offerings appealing to a wide audience. The hotel in Jastrzębia Góra features a variety of services, including health programs, spa treatments, and child-friendly attractions, positioning it as an ideal destination for family vacations. Primavera Hotele collaborates with various partners, including travel agencies and local attractions, to enhance the experiences of its guests and provide a well-rounded stay. The company places a strong emphasis on safety and comfort, particularly for children, and is committed to maintaining high-quality service while creating a friendly and secure environment for all visitors. By focusing on detail and professionalism, Primavera Hotele has earned the trust and loyalty of its guests, contributing to its dynamic growth in the hospitality market. With a vision to lead in the hospitality sector, the company prioritizes customer satisfaction and wellness, aiming to deliver personalized experiences that enhance the well-being of its clients.

Name: COLUMBUS Reisen
Company description: The COLUMBUS Group, owned by the Dr. Richard family, is one of Austria's largest privately owned travel companies. With core areas including travel agencies, business travel, incentive, congress and event management, incoming tourism, and its own tour operator, Reisethek, COLUMBUS comprehensively covers the spectrum of tourist services. With over 160 employees at 14 locations, the company generates more than 110 million in revenue (2023). Ongoing investments in state-of-the-art technologies, sustainability and a diverse range of offerings for employee training and development ensure sustainable, high-quality professional service.

Name: Travelcircus
Company description: Travelcircus (www.travelcircus.de) is an online booking platform for travel packages and was founded in Berlin by Bastian Böckenhüser in 2014. Despite its recent founding, Travelcircus has rapidly grown into an internationally active firm of over 115 employees from over 22 countries. Travelcircus creates unique holiday packages at attractive rates by combining tickets for internationally sought-after events (e.g. theme parks, musicals, exhibitions and concerts) with quality-checked, premium hotels. Since its founding, over 1 million customers have booked getaways with Travelcircus. At the start of 2022, Travelcircus expanded its horizons from Germany, Austria and Switzerland and moved into other European markets. Now, travel fans in the Netherlands, France, Italy, Spain, Denmark and the UK can book exceptional holiday deals with Travelcircus. In September 2022, Travelcircus acquired the Travelking brand, resulting in an expansion into Czech, Hungarian and Slovakian markets. Steered by the motto “by travellers, for travellers”, the Travelcircus team shares a passion for giving travel enthusiasts access to the most popular events and the most in-demand weekend getaway destinations online with the best value for money.

Name: Bluvacanze
Company description: Bluvacanze S.p.A. is a prominent travel agency specializing in providing a wide range of travel services, including hotel bookings, transportation, and vacation packages. The company aims to simplify the travel planning process for its clients by offering competitive prices and personalized itineraries tailored to individual preferences. Bluvacanze's mission is to enhance the travel experience by ensuring customer satisfaction through exceptional service and support. The agency primarily targets leisure travelers seeking affordable and memorable vacations, particularly in popular destinations such as the Canary Islands. Collaborating with various partners, including airlines, hotels, and tour operators, Bluvacanze strives to deliver comprehensive travel solutions that cater to the diverse needs of its clientele.

Name: Omnibusverkehr Spillmann GmbH
Company description: Spillmann – Mobilität mit Leidenschaft und Expertise Seit 1928 steht Spillmann für zuverlässige, komfortable und innovative Mobilitätslösungen. Als eines der wenigen Unternehmen vereinen wir öffentlichen Personennahverkehr, Reiseveranstaltung, Busvermietung und Touristik unter einem Dach – und bieten damit ein einzigartiges Leistungsspektrum im Großraum Stuttgart. Unsere moderne Busflotte und unser Reisebüro ermöglichen maßgeschneiderte Lösungen für Unternehmen, Behörden, Vereine, Schulen und Gruppenreisende. Ob Shuttle- und Transfermanagement für Großveranstaltungen, individuell geplante Gruppenreisen oder klassische Linienverkehre – wir bringen Menschen sicher und komfortabel ans Ziel. Mit ausgezeichneten Beratern, prämierten Fahrern und höchsten Sicherheitsstandards setzen wir auf Qualität, Innovation und Nachhaltigkeit. Dank jahrzehntelanger Erfahrung und modernster Technologie bieten wir maßgeschneiderte Reise- und Transportkonzepte, die höchsten Ansprüchen gerecht werden.

Name: Mideast Travel Worldwide
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Athens, 105-107 Vas. Sofias Avenue, 115 21
Company description: Mideast Travel Worldwide is an award-winning group of companies operating in the travel and tourism industry for 40 years.  It all started back in 1983 in Athens, when the Mousbeh family decided to create a travel agency to cater for the special and exclusive needs of travelers in Greece and the world.  Today, Mideast Travel Worldwide is listed among the top travel providers in Greece. The company offers a variety of travel services, from vacation and individual packages to luxury tourism, planning of Meetings, Incentives, Congress & Events (M.I.C.E.), business travel and destination management. The group of companies is awarded as “Europe’s & Greece’s Leading Destination Management Company 2024” and as “World’s Leading Destination Management Company 2023” by the World Travel Awards.  Mideast Travel Worldwide offers its services from its Head Office in Athens. Since 2016 the company is the Official Partner of BCD Meetings & Events in Greece.   Reg. No.: 0206Ε60000125600, 0206E60000259300, 0206Ε60000408001

Name: WYSE Travel Confederation
Company description: WYSE Travel Confederation is a global not-for-profit membership organisation dedicated to promoting and developing opportunities for the youth, student and educational travel industry. Providing international travel experiences to over 30 million youth and students each year, WYSE Travel Confederation’s global community 800+ members spans 120 countries in these sectors: Adventure Tour Operators - Au Pair Agencies - Backpacking - Cultural Exchange Programmes – Hop-on Hop Off Buses - International Education Providers - Language Schools & Agents - National Associations - Student Insurance - Student Flights - Student Identity Cards - Study Abroad Programmes - Tourism Boards & Official Tourism Organisations - Travel Industry Services - Universities -Volunteer Programmes - Work Abroad Opportunities - Youth Hostels and Booking Engines - Youth & Student Travel Retailers It is the world's most powerful network of youth and student travel professionals, connecting key industry players with decision makers and government officials. Trusted members of WYSE Travel Confederation are recognised in their market as leaders in youth, backpacking, educational and student travel. Their activities are consistent with our strict codes of conduct.

Name: Quintessence Consulting GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Hannover, 18 C Großer Kolonnenweg, 30163
Company description: With a core team of over 30 engineers, consultants and project managers and over 20 years of experience in the leisure airline and tour operator business, quintessence is the one-stop shop for integrating airlines and tour operators.

Name: Nuestro Pequeño Mundo Viajes
HQ Location: Spain, Valencia, Alicante, 16 Calle Pérez Medina, 03007
Company description: Nuestro Pequeño Mundo Viajes, nuestra agencia de viajes minorista, cuenta con 2 oficinas en Alicante en las cuales desempeñan su trabajo diario un equipo de 15 profesionales del sector. Nuestro modelo de agencia combina la organización de viajes para grupos con la comercialización de viajes vacacionales de carácter individual y familiar, así como viajes de empresa. Anualmente más de 300 grupos son gestionados en nuestras oficinas, pertenecientes a diferentes tipos de colectivos, centros de estudios, colegios profesionales, asociaciones, clubes, turismo religioso, deportivo… Anualmente más de 300 grupos son gestionados en nuestras oficinas, pertenecientes a diferentes tipos de colectivos, centros de estudios, colegios profesionales, asociaciones, clubes, turismo religioso, deportivo… En cuanto a los viajes de individuales, nuestros agentes atienden anualmente a más de 2.000 clientes, que requieren todo tipo de servicios turísticos, desde billetes aéreos, hoteles, paquetes turísticos, seguros, etc. También tenemos que destacar la comercialización de viajes a medida de organización propia, viajes en los que son nuestras agencias las que se ocupan de reservar y gestionar todos los servicios del viaje como prestadores directos de los mismos, adaptados a los gustos específicos de cada cliente.

Name: Achenseeschifffahrt GmbH
Company description: Achenseeschifffahrt GmbH is a premier provider of scenic boat tours on Lake Achensee, offering unique experiences for both individual travelers and groups. The company is dedicated to enhancing customer satisfaction through exceptional service and exclusive partnerships, making it an ideal choice for group travel organizers seeking reliable and attractive options. Achenseeschifffahrt GmbH aims to foster strong relationships with its partners, providing them with special benefits and expanded services that enhance their offerings and strengthen customer loyalty. By collaborating with various stakeholders, the company seeks to create synergies that lead to innovative projects and mutual growth. Its target market includes tourists, travel agencies, and group organizers looking for memorable experiences on one of Austria's most beautiful lakes.

Name: TuBillete.com
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Santa Cruz De Tenerife, Nº 15 Calle Fernando Beautell, 38009
Company description: TuBillete es la agencia de viajes online líder en ventas en las Islas Canarias y Baleares.  Constituida originalmente en 2003 con capital 100% canario, hoy, tras años de experiencia y trabajo a nuestras espaldas, contamos con el respaldo del Grupo Avoris, el mayor grupo turístico español convirtiéndonos en la principal OTA del grupo, que incluye a otras grandes marcas como Halcón Viajes, Be Live Hoteles, Barcelo, MuchoViaje etc. Nuestro objetivo principal siempre ha sido ayudar a esos cientos de miles de personas que cada año confían en nosotros para organizar sus vacaciones y grandes viajes. Para ello nos valemos de un profundo conocimiento de nuestro sector, de una gran especialización en los destinos en los que somos líderes indiscutibles, y, sobre todo, de un trato y cercanía que hace sentir a nuestros usuarios que somos #eseamigoquesabedeviajes. Además de esto, la verdadera clave de nuestro éxito se encuentra en un equipo humano de más de 20 personas que, desde Santa Cruz de Tenerife, aúnan sus esfuerzos a diario para logar la mejor experiencia para nuestros clientes. Si estás interesado en trabajar con nosotros, no dudes en ponerte en contacto, estaremos encantados de conocerte. https://www.tubillete.com/ https://blog.tubillete.com/

Name: Irish Ferries Freight
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, Alexandra Road, d01 w2f5
Company description: Irish Ferries (www.irishferriesfreight.com) is the market leading ferry operator to and from the Republic of Ireland and is part of Irish Continental Group (ICG) plc (www.icg.ie).  Irish Ferries owns and operates eight vessels across eight strategic RoRo routes between Ireland - Britain, Ireland - France and the UK - France catering for passengers, vehicles and roll-on roll-off freight units. We also operate as a tour operator, selling inclusive package holidays in both the Irish and British markets. As a key contributor to the tourism economies of Ireland, Britain and France, and as a strategic connector in business supply chains, we are committed to delivering reliable, timely and high quality travel experiences for all our passengers. With a committed and passionate team, we will achieve success by anticipating our customers’ needs and matching those with superior services through constant innovation and the rapid application of new proven technology. We measure our success through the quality of our service, as seen by our customers, which should result in delivering sustained and profitable growth for the benefit of our shareholders and staff. •	Key freight positions on short sea routes between the Republic of Ireland and the UK. •	Inclusive package holidays to the Republic of Ireland and the UK. •	Modern fleet of multi-purpose ferries operating between the Republic of Ireland and the UK and France. •	667,800 passengers carried in 2021 on up to 27 daily sailings. •	203,600 cars and 290,000 freight units carried in 2021.

Name: Mixx Travel AB
Company description: Mixx Travel är en liten resebyrå med stor kapacitet. Du hittar oss på Triangelns köpcentrum i Malmö. Vi har funnits sedan 2009, och har sedan dess skickat ut 50.000 glada resenärer på semester från Kastrup flygplats, år 2015 kunde vi öppna upp flyg från Stockholm, och 2017 kunde vi med glädje öppna upp resor från Göteborg, Billund och Aalborg.  Vårat sommarprogram består primärt resor till Turkiets sydkust, som vi allt eftersom har blivit specialister på att arrangera resor till, utöver det erbjuder vi även resor till Nordcypern, Istanbul, Jordanien och området runt Izmir. Våran framtidsvision är att inom de närmsta åren kunna erbjuda resor från alla skandinaviska länder, så håll ögonen öppna efter nyheter på våran hemsida! Hos oss är det mesta möjligt, och vi strävar efter att kunna skräddarsy en resa som passar perfekt för just dina önskemål och behov. På Mixx Travel är vi övertygade om att alla har rätt till semester. Därför är det viktigt för oss, att kunna erbjuda ett stort och varierat program där alla kan vara med, oavsett plånbokens storlek. Vi sätter därför en ära i att hitta bra hotell till rimliga priser. Familjen är i centrum, och det är viktigt för oss att det finns plats till både barn och vuxna på våra destinationer. Vi menar att det ska vara möjligt att låta barnen springa, leka och plaska i poolen, medans de vuxna ska kunna vila och slappna av under semestern. En stor del av våra hotell är designade till familjer med barn, och de flesta har många aktiviteter anpassade för barn, till exempel vattenrutschbanor, lekplatser och lekrum. Varje år skickar vi tusentals förväntansfulla turister på sitt livs semester, och många av våra gäster återvänder till oss, år efter år. Vad man än önskar sig, sol, strand och badsemester, kultursemester med massor av historiska sevärdheter eller en semester med flera sportaktiviteter, så kan vi hjälpa till med att hitta det bästa semesteralternativet. Våran ambition är att ge våra kunder "mycket mer semester för pengarna"!

Name: MOGU
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Las Rozas De Madrid, madrid
Company description: MOGU is an integrated mobile app and desktop solution that provides travel agencies optimal real-time communications with their clients through all stages of the trip.

Name: KTS - Kärntner Tourismusschule
Company description: Die Kärntner Tourismusschule (KTS) in Villach-Warmbad ist eine Privatschule des Landes Kärnten mit Öffentlichkeitsrecht. Die KTS wird als berufsbildende höhere Schule geführt und setzt Ausbildungsschwerpunkte u.a. in den Bereichen Tourismus, Wirtschaft, Hotellerie und Gastronomie. Zudem besteht die Möglichkeit bei zahlreichen Zusatzausbildungen weitere branchentypische Qualifikationen zu erlangen. Aktuell werden zwei Schulformen als fünfjährige Ausbildung angeboten: - Höhere Lehranstalt für Tourismus (schulautonome Vertiefungsmöglichkeiten: Hotelmanagement mit IT oder Internationales Tourismusmanagement inkl. dritter lebender Fremdsprache) - Höhere Lehranstalt für Tourismus und Pferdewirtschaft Zudem besteht für Personen mit bereits absolvierter Reifeprüfung auch die Möglichkeit ein zweijähriges Tourismuskolleg (schulautonome Vertiefung: Destinations- und Hotelmanagement) zu besuchen.  Neben der Schule befindet sich am Standort auch ein Internatsgebäude, welches auch als Lehrhotel (Das Atrium****) fungiert. KTS - KÄRNTNER TOURISMUSSCHULE The graduates of this private school in Carinthia with its incorporated boarding school are highly sought after as employees by hotel chains, cruise ships or tour operators. The well-founded tourism management, language and practical training is complemented by additional qualifications such as a young sommelier, barista or barkeeper. There are two school types to choose from: • The 5-year secondary school for tourism ending with Matura (Abitur/A Levels), specialising in the following subjects: - International Tourism Management - Hotel Management with IT - New from 17/18: Tourism and Horse Economy • or the 2-year college for high school graduates

Name: AbenteuerWege
Company description: Wir von AbenteuerWege sind ein Reiseveranstalter für selbst geführte Wanderreisen in Deutschland, Europa und weltweit.  Für unsere Kunden organisieren wir täglich individuelle, unvergessliche Abenteuer. Wir sind ein Unternehmen mit hoch motivierten Mitarbeiter:innen, und teilen unsere Leidenschaft für Reisen, Wandern und Natur.  Unser AbenteuerWege Team in Saarbrücken besteht derzeit aus 45 Abenteurern. Weltweit sind wir rund 160 Mitarbeiter in der Macs Adventure Gruppe mit Hauptquartier in Glasgow, sowie einer weiteren Niederlassung in den USA.

Name: M&C Travel Events
Company description: We help businesses involved in international motorsports to save time and money on their travel preparations. Being a full-service travel agency, we provide racing teams, suppliers, racing organisations, and other businesses of the motorsport industry with our travel and event services: Hotels near the racetracks, flights, rental cars, transfers and shuttles, catering, event services, and much more.  Imprint and Privacy Policy: https://mc-travel-events.de/privacy-notice/privacy-notice-linkedin/

Name: Tailorbeds
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, 1b Rotunda Nuno Rodrigues Dos Santos, 2685-223
Company description: We are a global Global Hotel Supplier and DMC in Portugal. We offer quality services to Tour Operators and Travel Agencies. Our objective is to offer the best quality standard of services, at very competitive prices and obtaining the commercial trust of our clients and partners, while committing to a continuous growth hand in hand with them. We negotiate personally and directly with the hotels and the best local suppliers to guarantee the best quality of service at the best possible rates. We are constantly exploring the world to be always at the forefront of technology and of distribution channels, either via direct XML Connections, XML Integrators or via our Own Booking site. We are already connected with some of the best integrators worldwide.

Name: Geotoura GmbH
Company description: Geotoura ist ein deutscher Reiseveranstalter mit Sitz in Heidelberg. Wir organisieren individuelle Mietwagenrundreisen in Spanien, Italien, Portugal, Griechenland, Kroatien, Montenegro, Schottland, Irland und Südengland. DAS GEOTOURA-REISEKONZEPT Maßgeschneiderte Reisen Unser Ziel ist es, jedem Kunden eine ganz besondere Reise zu bieten. Unsere landeskundigen Mitarbeiter erstellen für Sie eine maßgeschneiderte Reiseroute nach Ihren Vorgaben (Abflugort, Startdatum, Dauer, Strecke). Schon vorab können Sie über uns für viele Reiseziele handverlesene Zusatzangebote buchen.  Individuelle Routen Stadt oder Natur, Berge oder Strand, Aktivitäten oder Entspannen, gesellige Feste oder einsame Wanderungen — was auch immer Sie interessiert: Sagen sie uns, wie Ihr idealer Urlaub aussehen soll. Wir stellen für Sie eine Reise nach Ihren Vorlieben zusammen. Haben Sie weitere Wünsche, erhalten Sie ein zusätzliches Angebot. Unsere Mitarbeiter sprechen die Reise mit Ihnen durch. Solange, bis alles passt. Hotels mit Flair Bei der Wahl unserer Hotels ist uns nicht nur ein hoher Qualitätsstandard wichtig. Wir bevorzugen landestypische Unterkünfte mit speziellem Ambiente. Sie unterstreichen den Charakter einer Individualreise: Panoramablicke, eine besonders liebevolle Einrichtung, die Lage in historischen Zentren und natürlich außergewöhnlich freundliche Gastgeber. Länder und Regionen authentisch erleben Wir möchten Ihnen das Land, seine Menschen, seine Kultur und seine Natur näherbringen. Wir empfehlen landestypische Restaurants und stellen für Sie nach Wunsch ein besonderes Zusatzprogramm zusammen: Besuchen Sie die Alhambra, erleben Sie Flamenco, besichtigen Sie eine Bodega, beobachten Sie Delfine in der Straße von Gibraltar und vieles mehr. So wie Sie es möchten.

Name: Absolute Tours
Company description: Absolute Tours started in 1999 as a simple walking tour company looking to fill a hole in the market and offer something for those looking for more than a bus tour. We now operate in 3 cities - Budapest, Prague, Krakow - and are a leading authority on city tourism within Central and Eastern Europe.  We offer a full range of high-quality services and cater for a wide variety of guests - from individuals looking to join a small group walking tour and families wanting to rent bikes and explore our cities, to private tours for student groups and company team building activities on Segways and everything else in between. We work only with experienced and qualified tour guides and are a fully registered, licensed and bonded tour operator and travel agent.  Absolute Tours is the mother brand for other leading tourism providers in the region including: - Yellow Zebra Segways and Bikes - Discover Budapest - Discover Prague - Discover Hungary - Discover Central Europe

Name: KaiYuan Information & Business GmbH
Company description: Kaytrip is a company focused on overseas destination online travel services and is one of Europe’s largest Chinese travel agencies. Since it’s foundation in 2002 in Munich, Germany, Kaytrip has been deeply rooted in European tourism markets and established further offices in China, Australia and European countries. The company now has a great many of rich tourism products, covering a variety of forms including bus tours, FIT tours, special groups on individual request, theme tours, business exhibitions, as well as the official reception and so on. Kaytrip has been granted IATA qualification as the most professional Chinese incoming institution in Europe. Our professional Call Center covers ticketing sales in Europe and China and by its technological advantages can provide professional and also efficient travel and ticketing services. For an online company such as Kaytrip, the focus is based on technological innovations. Over the years, it  always kept up with the latest trends of the Internet, the accurate grasp of customer needs, based on the continued integration of its increasingly powerful tourism resources and improve the various sales channels and service system. Currently Kaytrip not only has its own travel service department, it has also developed very popular Social Media channels and further Media tools to target the Chinese customers in Europe and China. Kaytrip repeatedly won the tourism industry- and media award.

Name: HighPass
Company description: At Highpass.aero we are not just a global distribution system for booking airport-related services – we are a technology that provides a digitalized communication between an Airport and a Passenger. We promote queueless passenger experience through any airport with any airline ticket. With us, any chosen service is just a few clicks away. We offer the following services in over 100 destinations: •  VIP lounge •  Business lounge •  Meet&Greet •  Fast track •  Baggage delivery (coming soon) •  Parking (coming soon) We provide a free solution for Airports: - to increase sales - to develop sales network - to optimize marketing related costs We are building our sales network and growing a global loyalty program with the key players in the travel market. Our partners are: - Airlines - Online travel agencies - Travel management companies - Hotels - Banks - Travel operators HighPass is a unique online system for booking the following services: •	vip-lounge •	business lounge  •	fast track

Name: Swan Expeditions
Company description: In the early ‘90’s the people who preceded Swan Expeditions were the first adventurers with the idea of travel with a classic Tall Ship to extraordinary destinations. Until then, there was no such thing. So we have been real explorers for almost 30 years! Swan Expeditions’ Tall Ships sail to unique destinations. What exactly makes a destination so special? If you can easily get to a place by car, then everyone can get there. That is not special and not the right place. If budget airliners go somewhere, you know for sure that you are in the wrong place. The exclusivity of beautiful areas often lies in their inaccessibility for the masses. The remote islands, deep bays and fjords frequented by Swan Expeditions’ Tall Ships are often only accessible by ship. You are going to experience something really extraordinary. Traveling by sailing ship is an adventure in itself, apart from the unique destinations. You are immediately away from mass tourism. A few miles from shore your cellphone range is lost and you live in the present moment again. Sailing the Tall Ship together is very special and creates a wonderful bond with the other expedition members. With that team you will travel to the remote and undiscovered nature. The combination of the Swan fleet and the destinations that only we can visit makes Swan Expeditions a special travel agency.

Name: Círculo De Viajeros
Company description: Somos una una agencia de viajes mayorista-minorista líder en el mercado de alojamiento hotelero con más de 20 años de experiencia en el sector turístico. Nuestro objetivo es ofrecerle un servicio de calidad con atención personalizada de seguimiento desde su estancia hasta su salida del hotel. Ofrecemos un servicio integral tanto viajes de incentivo, convenciones, ferias, como también vacaciones promocionales. Tenemos un amplio abanico de destinos tanto nacionales como internacionales, con presencia en las principales ciudades europeas y del mundo. Organizamos circuitos, cruceros, viajes especiales y/o grupos con un alto nivel de especialización y personalización. Estamos constituidos con una licencia de la Consejería de Turismo I-AV-0000877.2 con capital social es de €180.000 y seguro de protección civil de €10.000.000. Representamos, además, un grupo de 700 agencias de viajes de España al que ofrecemos alojamiento y otros servicios turísticos en el mundo entero, lo que nos permite ofrecer precios muy competitivos.

Name: MartiGO
Company description: MartiGO is a travel company specializing in providing a wide range of vacation packages, including last-minute deals, all-inclusive trips, and tailored travel experiences to popular destinations such as Turkey, Egypt, and the Maldives. The company's mission is to offer affordable and memorable travel experiences, catering to diverse client needs, including families, couples, and solo travelers. MartiGO also focuses on halal accommodations, ensuring that Muslim travelers have access to suitable lodging options across various countries. With a commitment to exceptional customer service, the company partners with reputable hotels, airlines, and local tour operators to deliver seamless travel experiences. Targeting a broad market, MartiGO aims to make travel accessible and enjoyable for everyone, regardless of their travel preferences or budget.

Name: GTI TRAVEL
HQ Location: Ireland, Co Dublin, Donabate, Ballisk Court
Company description: Welcome to GTI - the Group Travel Specialists, a professional, Irish owned and operated travel company specialising in high quality escorted tours to destinations all over the world. With a real love of travel and a dynamic, enthusiastic team to help you every step of the way, we have been successfully providing affordable luxury tours to the Irish market for more than ten years. Escorted Tours Our fascinating, out of the ordinary escorted holidays visit an array of charming and exotic worldwide destinations. Travel with like-minded people into the very heart of a country to reveal the history, culture and traditions of the land and its people.     Tailor Made Tours We also specialise in tailor made tours for special interest groups, whether it’s leisure, sports, agriculture, music, charity, youth or simply a group of friends wishing to travel together.     School Tours We are are a leading Irish school tour operator, delivering high quality, tailor made tours at affordable prices. Our school  tours are educational, professional and packed with value.    Specialist Staff Our holiday specialists are experienced, passionate and the best in their field. You can rely on their first-hand knowledge and exceptionally high standards to ensure your holiday is meticulously planned and full of wonderful, long lasting memories.

Name: Innstant Group
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, Northern Cross, d17
Company description: The Innstant Group was founded on the belief that the travel business was ready for a new and improved strategic model. Through the years the company has carefully nurtured and grown by adopting 5 fundamental principles: * Competitive pricing * Leading inventory availability * High customer satisfaction * Efficient and innovative application of technology * Focus on profits With more than 300,000 properties worldwide including hotels, apartments, holiday homes and villas, Innstant Travel has one of the largest inventories of unique product of any accommodation wholesaler. In addition, the group offers many great features especially designed for making our clients life easier and with excellent service in an instant! The company provides travel inventory and XML solutions of its globally contracted rates to retailers and tour operators in travel industry.

Name: Hirondelle
Company description: Ecosystem is said to be a perfect balance that lets all elements grow in the best possible way. Similarly, Hirondelle’s ecosystem is a perfect balance of experience and competences that allows clients to receive an excellent service.  Hirondelle LLC was founded  in 1986 and today, after 26 years of constant growth, is one of the most historic travel agencies and tour operators of the city of Treviso and surrounding areas. In Hirondelle you will find different departments with specialized employees, who are trained to satisfy all requests you may have. After 33 years of experience in the tourism market, our philosophy remains the same: the knowledge of the product we offer and the ability of creating tailor made itineraries by offering sincere suggestions and opinions, and by building with clients a long-term relationship based on trust. The quality of service is always our best strength; we select the best hotels and resorts in the world, the most trustworthy collaborators in every destination, the most specialized guides, and the most comfortable transportation services. We always try to enhance creativity and offer new products by creating a difference between what is taken for granted and what is special.

Name: CAS Trips
Company description: CAS Trips is a sustainable student tour operator. We bring together teachers and international students for Service projects across the globe. We educate, challenge, inspire.

Name: Luleå Travel
Company description: Luleå Travel is an incoming travel agency (DMC) and all- season activity supplier, located in Swedish Lapland. We bring together experience, knowledge, professionalism, creative ideas and high-quality service focused entirely on the client. Whether you are planning to travel with friends, family or work. We can put together a unique program based on your needs and wishes. Our strength is our local network, flexibility and expertise. What we offer: - Excursion programs - Itineraries for individuals, families and groups - Incentive programs and teambuilding events - Event and special interest tours - Logistics and transfers

Name: RM HUB
HQ Location: Portugal, Porto, Maia, Nº 132 Via Norte Trade Center Avenida Dom Mendo, 4470-038
Company description: RM HUB, with 3 distinct areas of activity. RM Academy - Provides in depth on-site and online training in all áreas of Revenue Management, including Optimization of Online Distribution and Digital Marketing for Hotels and Hoteliers. RM Accelerate - Through our network of sales representatives in Portugal we can assist you in driving more business to your hotel. Whether you need to attract corporate travel, be included in national and international tour operator brochures or have the opportunity to bid for MICE and Sports Groups, RM Accelerate can support your hotel with sales representation. RM All In One  - Works side by side with the hotels, integrated as part of the team in the execution of the pillars of Revenue Management, as Segmentation, Yield Management, Forecast, Distribution and development of the Strategic Plan.

Name: Nordis Travel ApS
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Copenhagen, 83 2 Vester Voldgade, 1552
Company description: As a well-established local DMC and B2B Incoming Tour Operator in Copenhagen, we support leading international tour operators in creating unique travel experiences for their clients in Scandinavia and the Baltic countries, covering destinations such as Denmark, Norway, Finland, Sweden, Iceland, the Faroe Islands, Greenland, Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania. Scandinavia and the Baltic countries are extraordinary destinations, offering unparalleled cultural and scenic diversity. Our deep local knowledge and extensive international network allow us to provide a flexible and personalized approach, collaborating with local partners first-hand and operating for clients from various cultures and nationalities. We operate in key markets such as East and Southeast Asia, Europe and America, with a multilingual and diverse team always ready to meet clients' expectations and needs. We are committed to ensuring that every tour is a memorable journey, regardless of the participants' nationality, offering complete support throughout all phases of the tour. Thanks to this approach, our partners save valuable time, knowing that their clients are always our top priority. The destinations we offer are versatile and capable of reflecting the diverse perspectives of those who visit them. Our group tours range from tailor-made experiences to large-scale series, covering market segments such as leisure, MICE, adventure, multi-country tours, and study trips. Our motto: Beyond Boundaries, Beyond Expectations is not just a phrase, but a true philosophy that guides every aspect of our work.

Name: GRUBER-reisen
Company description: Machen Sie Reisen zu Ihrem Beruf! Wir beschäftigen in unserem Familienunternehmen insgesamt mehr als 300 Mitarbeiter. Wir verfügen über einen starken Reiseveranstalter, sind zum größten Reiseunternehmen für Golf-Sportler ge­worden und besitzen mit dem BRETANIDE ein großartiges Sport- & Wellness Resort in Kroatien. Unsere Mitarbeiter sind uns ein großes Anliegen. Daher versuchen wir Rahmenbedingungen zu bieten, die verschiedene Entfaltungsmöglichkeiten und eine langfristige Zusammenarbeit ermöglichen. Persönliches Engagement und Leidenschaft für den Job zeichnen unsere Mitarbeiter aus. Wir verfügen über eine hauseigene GRUBER-reisen Akademie und ermöglichen unseren Mitarbeitern gezielte Schulungsmaßnahmen in unterschiedlichsten Bereichen. Damit fördern wir die Karrieremöglichkeiten innerhalb des Unternehmens durch fachliches und persönliches Wachstum. Durch ein leistungsorientiertes Prämiensystem beteiligen wir unsere Mitarbeiter am Unternehmenserfolg. Wir sind immer auf der Suche nach Talenten – bewerben dich jetzt bei uns!

Name: Sveriges MotorCyklister
Company description: SMC är en intresseorganisation för motorcyklister. SMC har omkring 65 000 medlemmar. Var fjärde svensk MC-ägare är medlem i SMC.  SMC:s viktigaste arbetsområden är trafiksäkerhet, turism, försäkringar, konsumentfrågor, opinionsbildning, information och internationellt arbete.  SMC:s medlemstidning MC-Folket är Nordens största MC-magasin. Den kommer ut sju gånger per år och varje nummer har 100 000 läsare. MC-Folkets redaktion finns i Borlänge tillsammans med SMC.  SMC har fyra dottervarumärken; SMC Travel, SMC Club, SMC School och SMC Sport.  I SMC Travel delar vi information om resande och har en egen resebyrå med resor för och av motorcyklister. www.svmc.se/travel I SMC Club finns olika events för motorcyklister som till exempel Mälaren Runt, SMC Weekend, Hoj-X och Riksträffen. Här finns våra 350 klubbar, SMC Boken och SMC Appen. www.svmc.se/club SMC School erbjuder kurser för alla motorcyklister på storbanor, gokartbanor, grus och annat. Alla kurser är kvalitetssäkrade. www.svmc.se/school I SMC Sport kan man träna och tävla under ordnade former.  www.svmc.se/sport

Name: High Schools International
Company description: HSI is a world leader in providing educational opportunities for second level students. We offer a comprehensive placement and guardianship service in both Public & Private Schools in the UK, Ireland, Canada and the US. HSI incorporates ETE, our original company founded in 1988. HSI in Ireland is accredited by AGPI and the Department of Education and is a member of MEI. HSI in the UK is accredited by AEGIS for guardianship services. HSI is a member of ALTO CONNECTIONS We welcome connections from study travel agencies and study travel professionals in any part of the world who might be interested in working with us in placing students into the UK, Ireland, USA or Canada, or simply for networking and knowledge sharing opportunities. We also welcome connections from schools and colleges and education professionals therein who are thinking about developing their international student populations, and feel that High Schools International might be able to play a valuable part. Please follow our page, or connect with us in person: Tom Reed: treed@hsinet.org

Name: Nordic Unique Travels
Company description: Nordic Unique Travels is a new travel agency located in Rovaniemi, the threshold of the Arctic. Specializing in adventurous and cultural holidays that the winter lands of Nordic countries can offer, we create tailored tours to create the best experiences for our customers. Besides the standard package tours, we also specially design routes off the beaten path. Our customized tours lead you to some of the greatest hidden treasures for a unique and individual experience of the Lapland. With our passionate and international team of travel experts, we guarantee the high level of services, going above and beyond with our customer/affiliate support.

Name: World Of Travel
Company description: Travel agency based in Kortrijk, West-Flanders (Belgium); specialized in business travel, tailor made FIT,  leisure and luxury travel around the world ... handling all major aspects of the travel agency business for leisure, tailor made as well as business travel     including booking of flights, accommodation, rental cars, activities and excursions, guiding, transfers, ... separate      or in package ... assistance of our clients during each step of the booking process with personal advice ... providing accurate advice to our clientele on major tourist destinations around the world ... producing customized and international inclusive tours ... organizing international business, incentive and conference travel arrangements ... extensive knowledge of different travel destinations

Name: Skiworld | Intertravel Corporation
Company description: travel | tour operator ski incentives

Name: ImpacTrip - Responsible Travel & International Volunteer Programs
Company description: ImpacTrip is a Responsible Travel Operator which promotes International Volunteer Programs and Responsible Travel Experiences in Portugal, Spain, Croatia and Italy. Travel responsibly and embark on an unforgettable trip that combines the best of traveling like a local with having a positive social and environmental impact on the local communities and the planet. Get to know the locals, get immersed in the local culture, eat tasty and typical food and get the best out of your trip in a meaningful experience. We are a social business, B-Corp certified, launched in 2013 by two social entrepreneurs that want to change the way people travel. With the increasing number of people looking for alternative travel experiences to explore Europe, ImpacTrip want to be a fresh and positive option for these sustainable travelers. We really want to offer the most impactful travel experiences in Europe. RNAVT (Travel Agency licence): 5193 Let's talk?: info@impactrip.com

Name: Sporski
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, 90 Av. Da República, 1649-024
Company description: Número 1 em Portugal, a Sporski é uma agência de viagens 100% especializada em férias de ski e snowboard para Andorra, Espanha e Alpes. Aliando um profundo conhecimento das destinos à qualidade, inovação e segurança dos seus programas e serviços, a Sporski foi eleita por mais de 300 mil clientes desde 1995. Reconhecida internacionalmente, faz parte do Grupo Wamos, um dos líderes na prestação de serviços turísticos no sul da Europa e com presença em Portugal, Espanha e Itália. Na Sporski, a cada Inverno, a paixão é o sentimento que nos leva a querer fazer das suas férias aquilo que a neve continua a ser para nós: uma experiência inesquecível.

Name: Dr. Fried & Partner GmbH
Company description: Dr. Fried & Partner verfügt über langjährige Branchenkompetenz im Bereich Tourismus und Mobilität. Seit der Gründung des Unternehmens im Jahre 1968 begleitet Dr. Fried & Partner wichtige Projekte verschiedenster Tourismusorganisationen der öffentlichen Hand und namhafter Unternehmen aus den Sparten Reiseveranstalter und -vertrieb, Destinationsmanagement/ Incoming und Events, Transportation und Mobility sowie Kreuzfahrtveranstalter und Reedereien. „Seriosität und Kompetenz für die Reisebranche“ Mit einem ganzheitlichen Beratungsansatz arbeitet Dr. Fried & Partner zielorientiert auf den langfristigen Erfolg ihrer Kunden hin. Grundvoraussetzung dafür ist eine zukunftsorientierte Denk- und Arbeitsweise. Des Weiteren hilft unsere enge Vernetzung und Zusammenarbeit mit Kooperationspartnern und Branchenexperten unseren Weitblick zu schärfen, denn die gemeinsame Betrachtung und Bearbeitung von Zukunftsthemen eröffnet fortwährend neue Horizonte.

Name: LINEA AZZURRA
Company description: We take care of transporting people by providing a certified quality service tailored to each kind of customer: from company representatives to school groups, from sports teams to workers, from tourist groups to businessmen. Quality levels are ensured through periodic checks and constant maintenance interventions on the entire fleet, thus offering vehicles always at the forefront and equipped with the best comforts.  We belong to the largest consortium of operators in Europe with over 10,000 vehicles available on the continent. Ranging from minibuses to touring coaches, from school buses to cars with driver for events and ceremonies. We offer a complete service for companies, agencies and tour operators, associations and individuals.  We aim to constantly improve our service through the development of innovative solutions in step with the times, to pursue our mission of ensuring customer satisfaction and safety.

Name: Swingo
Company description: Swingo is a Portugal-based tour operator creating personalised travel experiences that feel effortless, thoughtful, and uniquely yours. Born from a love of travel, we believe no two trips should ever feel the same. That’s why our private tours are fully shaped around what you love — whether that’s history, nature, local food, or simply going with the flow. With a passionate team, years of experience, and a 70% electric fleet, we take care of every detail so you can focus on discovering Portugal in a way that feels natural, laid-back, and unforgettable.

Name: HellenicTravelNetwork
Company description: Hellenic Travel Network S.A. is a Greek Destination Management Company, located in the historical center of Athens with joint ventures in the most important Greek Islands. Our company is manned by a group of multilingual professionals both young, driven by contemporary ideas, and mature ones, with a proven experience of more than 30 years in the industry. In cooperation with our abroad partners and our high specialization we design best-value-for-the-money holiday packages and tailor-made itineraries.

Name: SMS Tourism
Company description: Established in the 1960s, SMS Tourism is your destination specialist on the Maltese Islands committed to delivering consistent, high-quality and tailor-made travelling experiences that last a lifetime. We specialise in providing any form of tourism-related services including accommodation arrangements, excursions, transport, weddings, leisure and MICE groups organisation, car hire, shore excursions, English language courses and a full range of services for online travel agents, tour operators, cruise companies and specialised travel agents.

Name: ARGO TRAVEL SA
Company description: ARGO travel was founded in Athens in 1952 by the pioneers in the rising sector of ship crew movement and corporate travel: George D. Fytilis, Demetrios G. Fytilis and the present Chief Executive Officer Demetrios A. Pithis. Starting as an agency specializing in ship crew movements, ARGO Travel has grown into one of the leading agencies in this sector. The second generation and members of the board, consisting of G.D. Fytilis, A.D. Pithis and P.D Fytilis are carrying the group forward to the new challenging era . In 1953, just one year after its foundation, ARGO Travel was among the very first travel agencies in Greece that were approved and accredited/certified by IATA. ARGO Travel is the first Greek travel agency that was awarded with "Quality Assurance Certification" for its services. This certification reflects our commitment that the travel services we offer will continue to meet the increasing demands of the 21st century traveler with consistency, seriousness reliability and effectiveness.

Name: My Tours Zante
Company description: My Tours! Our travel agency was established twenty years ago, in 1994 by locals and it’s the biggest  company in  the island but for us each one of you is very important. Each and every day  we try our best and  we share our passion and  love for Zakynthos with you. Our  20 agencies are located in the following resorts: Laganas, Agios Sostis, Kalamaki, Argassi, Tsilivi, Alikes, Alikanas and our staff is always glad and willing to help you to discover our amazing island.

Name: Ameropa-Reisen GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Bad Homburg Vor Der Höhe, 27 Siemensstraße, 61352
Company description: Ameropa-Reisen GmbH, based in Bad Homburg, is a well-established travel company with over 70 years of experience, specializing in sustainable travel experiences across Germany and Europe. The company is dedicated to creating unforgettable journeys that combine comfort, adventure, and cultural exploration, with a strong emphasis on environmental responsibility. Ameropa-Reisen offers a diverse range of travel packages, including city trips, scenic train journeys, cycling tours, and hiking adventures, catering to both individual travelers and groups. Their mission is to provide high-quality services that promote eco-friendly tourism while ensuring customer satisfaction. The target market for Ameropa-Reisen includes environmentally conscious travelers, families, and adventure seekers who value authentic experiences and quality accommodations. The company partners with various hotels and local attractions to enhance the travel experience, ensuring that clients enjoy exclusive benefits and seamless service. Ameropa-Reisen is known for its commitment to transparency, providing clients with detailed information about travel conditions and accommodations, including the use of 100% green energy for train journeys. With a focus on minimizing the ecological footprint of their travel offerings, Ameropa-Reisen aims to inspire travelers to explore the beauty of nature and cultural highlights responsibly. The company serves approximately 500,000 travelers annually, making it a trusted choice for those seeking memorable and sustainable travel experiences. Through its user-friendly website and collaborations with travel agencies, Ameropa-Reisen strives to simplify the booking process and enhance overall customer satisfaction, solidifying its position as a leading provider of sustainable travel in the region.

Name: Go Asia Srl
Company description: GoAsia nasce come operatore specializzato nelle destinazioni asiatiche. Siamo tra i primi operatori in Italia per passeggeri trasportati su voli di linea per l’Asia. Programmiamo viaggi in tutto il continente asiatico, proponendo accanto alle mete di viaggio tradizionali, percorsi inconsueti attraverso paesi poco conosciuti e ancora inesplorati, come il Laos o il Bhutan. Grazie alla professionalità e all’esperienza pluridecennale del nostro personale siamo in grado di offrire diverse tipologie di viaggi in base agli interessi ed alle esigenze del cliente. Il nostro obiettivo è, infatti, essere un Tour Operator specializzato in viaggi con un alto contenuto di interesse storico, antropologico, culturale e  naturalistico con un grande rispetto per le culture locali e per il loro territorio. Gli itinerari da noi proposti sono una continua ricerca per offrire a coloro che amano viaggiare il meglio di ogni paese affinché il viaggio diventi un’esperienza unica ed irripetibile.

Name: Trident Holiday Homes
Company description: Trident Holiday Homes is the largest Irish owned and operated holiday rental company in Ireland, which specializes in the management and marketing of self- catering holiday homes to the domestic and overseas tourism markets.  Working closely with Tourism Ireland, Failte Ireland and overseas tour operators since 1986, we have been successfully letting holiday homes in the best locations in Ireland to hundreds of thousands of holidaymakers.   Trident Property Services www.tridentpropertyservices.ie  provides Property Management Services to Residential Management Companies throughout Ireland and also offers owners of non-holiday rental properties a letting and management service in North Wicklow/ South Dublin.  Trident Holiday Homes is the exclusive Irish agent for cottages4you in Ireland, part of Wyndham Vacation Rentals the leading cottage rental company in the UK.  With our team of 9 Regional Managers we recruit, inspect and grade the properties for the Irish programme.    Trident Holiday Homes head office and call centre is based in Kilcoole, Co. Wicklow.  Sales agents have excellent knowledge of our holiday homes, the facilities and local attractions and can give comprehensive advice on planning your holiday.

Name: Travel Family
Company description: Jsme cestovní kancelář Travel Family, která sdružuje tři tradiční české brandy: Viamare, Vítkovice Tours a VTT. Sídlíme v Praze a v Ostravě a máme kamenné pobočky po celé republice.

Name: TVG Touristik Vertriebsgesellschaft MbH
Company description: Mit sonnenklar.TV Reisebüro, Flugbörse Reisebüro und 5vorFlug Reisebüro bieten wir unseren Reisebüropartnern starke renommierte Marken und innovative zukunftsorientierte Konzepte mit attraktiven Konditionen.  Bereits seit 1995 agieren wir für unseren gemeinsamen Erfolg partnerschaftlich und wegweisend. Dabei stehen die Kunden stehts im Mittelpunkt unseres Handelns. Hierzu kombinieren wir die lokalen Service- und Beratungskompetenzen der Reisebüros mit den modernsten Kommunikationsmöglichkeiten.  Europas größter Reiseshoppingsender sonnenklar.TV stellt zudem ein wesentliches Alleinstellungsmerkmal im Vertrieb von Reisen dar. Profitieren auch Sie von unserem einzigartigen Omni-Channel-Konzepten!  Impressum: http://tvg-franchiseerfolg.de/impressum/

Name: Tour Plus Sicilia
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Palermo, 103 Via Della Liberta, 90143
Company description: We are a leading incoming Tour Operator, operating since 1996, specialized in groups, individuals and events in Sicily. Recognized by partners and guests among the best DMC in the island and scored in Sicily’s TOP rank by suppliers for its reputation, we built a strong relationship with the best hotels, transportation companies, tour guides and restaurants in Sicily. Thanks to our dynamic and multilingual team, able to satisfy any request and having a great knowledge of the destination, we are able to offer best possible conditions and extreme flexibility.   Over the past 20 years we have created high quality, tailor made and cost effective travel experiences in co-operation with our customers. With products from over 400 travel suppliers we deliver tour operators and travel agents with everything their clients could need to create travel experiences.   A constant presence on the territory, a continuous selection of locations, properties and new experiences personally analyzed and checked, set us as the ideal DMC and the best partner in Sicily. And the ideal company to guarantee efficient and high quality services at competitive prices.

Name: Svetatour
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 4 Via Libero Temolo, 20126
Company description: La pagina ufficiale linkedin del tour operator Sveta Tour

Name: Sardegna.com S.r.l.
Company description: Sardegna.com is a leading Tour Operator Incoming Company for travellers to Sardinia Island. Establish in 1995 as a website Tourist Information, started to sell accomodation and booking online Hotels in 2002. Sardegna.com is translated in English, German, Russian, Spanish, French and Italian. In July 2016 the company was acquired by Alpitour S.p.A. group.

Name: UniTravel Srl
Company description: UniTravel was founded in Venice in 1999 as a company specialized in booking online hotels through a vast network of web sites and portals for the final consumer. Since 2014 it has developed a platform exclusively dedicated to professional tourism operators, Travel Agencies and Tour Operators, which allows them to book 288,000 unique hotels in over 33,000 destinations worldwide, rental cars, transfers, city tours, museums, attractions , shows and theme parks at extremely competitive reserved NET rates. Since the beginning of 2018 a partnership has been established with Interplanet-gsa, a leading company in the tourism representative sector, to offer Italian agencies an even more widespread assistance network in the area, attentive to the needs of the growing number of affiliated agencies. For info: Tel: +39 041 8620400 Email: support@unitravel.com

Name: Eurolines Romania
Company description: Eurolines Romania was established in 1995, as a founding member of the National Association of Travel Agencies (ANAT). Two years later, in 1997, Eurolines became a member of the largest European passenger road transport organization.  With the 78 Eurolines and TUI TravelCenter sale offices, the Eurolines Group holds the widest network of travel agencies in Romania.  Touring Europabus Romania, the company holding the Eurolines Romania and TUI TravelCenter travel agency networks, concluded 2013 with a turnover of approx. lei 231 million, compared to the lei 178 million registered in 2012.

Name: Ixpira
Company description: IXPIRA è un Tour Operator che attraverso la sua piattaforma online B2B multicanale si rivolge alle agenzie di viaggio e Tour Operator italiani ed esteri, anche via XML.  IXPIRA propone innovative soluzioni tecnologiche ottimizzando giorno dopo giorno la piattaforma di vendita online. IXPIRA conta su  di uno staff, che - nell'ottica della modernità - si è adeguato ai tempi, senza tuttavia dimenticare il calore del contatto umano, il rapporto personale e diretto con la clientela che viene seguita con esperienza, competenza e professionalità. IXPIRA con le sue risorse ascolta le richieste dei clienti, le loro aspettative, i loro bisogni, le loro preferenze, aiutandoli a confezionare il prodotto di vendita in quanto esperti del settore ed infine concretizza assieme a loro la vendita.   L'obiettivo è un futuro dove Tour Operator e Agenzie di viaggio lavorano insieme per conquistare il cliente. Ixpira tiene conto del mondo che cambia. OFFRENDO VALORE AGGIUNTO.

Name: Grupo Marsans
Company description: Grupo Marsans was a private Spanish consortium mainly dedicated to tour operations. It had operations in Spain, France, Italy, Brazil, Mexico, Venezuela, and Argentina, as well as representations in Latin America. It was founded in 1910 and based in Madrid, Spain. Over the years it became Spain's largest travel agency. According to Spanish newspaper ABC, the downfall of Grupo Marsans was precipitated by mounting financial difficulties arising from the inability of the management to properly handle the airlines that had been gradually incorporated, which eventually led to a €320 million debt the group was unable to afford. The company went out of business in 2010.

Name: ADAC Reisebüro Papendick
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Siegburg, 1 Auf Dem Seidenberg, 53721
Company description: 1946 als klassisches Reisebüro gegründet, widmen wir uns seit jeher unserer großen Leidenschaft: Geschäftsreisen so effizient und komfortabel wie nur möglich zu gestalten. Dazu agiert unser erfahrenes Team von ADAC Travel Management Services Papendick mit Herzblut und Innovationskraft. Mit exzellenten Kenntnissen des Geschäftsreisemarktes und der Geschäftsreisewelt, begleiten und unterstützen wir Unternehmen wie Geschäftsreisende mit individuell zugeschnittenen und kosteneffizienten Angeboten und Lösungen aus einer Hand. Dabei bieten wir unseren Kunden ein hochmodernes System mit dem klaren Fokus auf Innovation, Effizienz und Reisekomfort. Auch wenn sich unser breit aufgestelltes Business Travel Angebot deutschlandweit an mittelständische Unternehmen richtet, haben wir die stetig fortschreitende Globalisierung im Blick und richten daran unser Tun und Handeln aus.

Name: Crystal Communications
Company description: Crystal-clear communications for tourism, sport and lifestyle clients around the globe. Traveling the world, discovering exciting products, telling stories, sharing true passion and unforgettable experiences with like minded people - as an agency, we have the privilege of combining these two sides.
