Our customers are destinations, tour operators, (luxury) hotels, attractions as well as fashion, sports and lifestyle brands - our partners are the media. Using innovative ideas that open up new ways of thinking and unusual approaches, we create exciting concepts with personal commitment and professional expertise. We ensure sustainable results, which have that special sparkle and which testify to extraordinary collaboration.

Name: Kon-Tiki Tours
Company description: Kon-Tiki Tours is a privately owned tour operator and travel agency in Finland. We do tailor made tours for groups on request. Operating all around the world we have an extensive choice of travel destinations. During past years Kon-Tiki Tours has acquired special interest travel agencies and due to this we have got lots of experience of nature tours and bird watching tours, senior travellers´ culture tours, opera and music tours, wellness and hiking tours, forest and agriculture study trips, sports and hobby tours. We operate with local agents and incoming agencies all over the world and are happy to offer tailored culture, nature & wellness tours as well as other special interest tours all over the world.  We are a member of AFTA (The Association of Finnish Travel Agencies) and Finnish Association for Fair Tourism.  We acquired an incoming tour operator Lapland Leisure Tours and start producing inbound travel services for groups in Helsinki area and Lapland. Due to our experience and partners all over the world in outbound business we are able to offer tours in neighbouring countries in addition to Helsinki area and Lapland. *** Kotimainen, yksityinen Kon-Tiki Tours on täyden palvelun ryhmämatkatoimisto, joka toteuttaa matkoja erilaisille ryhmille: yhdistyksille, yrityksille, seuroille ja kaveriporukoille. Kon-Tikin kohdekartta kattaa koko maapallon. Yrityskauppojen myötä olemme saaneet lisää erikoisosaamista räätälöityjen luonto-, kulttuuri- ja wellness-matkojen lisäksi. Jatkamme Trio Travelsin maa- ja metsätalouden asiantuntijamatkojen tuottamista ja Björk & Boström Finland Oy:n urheilumatkojen tarjontaa. Lapin Lomamatkat Oy:n yrityskaupan ansiosta Kon-Tiki aloittaa myös incoming-liiketoiminnan keskittyen aluksi Lappiin ja Helsinkiin saapuvien ryhmien palveluun.  Kon-Tiki on enemmän kuin matkatoimisto, Kon-Tiki on elämyslautta. Olemme SMALin (Suomen Matkatoimistoalan liiton) jäsen ja Reilun matkailun yhdistyksen kannatusjäsen.

Name: Claus Haupts GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Mönchengladbach, 317 Neusser Straße, 41065
Company description: Die Claus Haupts GmbH ist ein Familienbetrieb in der fünften Generation am Standort Mönchengladbach. Neben dem Busbetrieb bietet das Unternehmen ins seinem Reisebüro Pauschalreisen an.

Name: Mondial Tours
HQ Location: Germany, Baden-württemberg, Ulm, 24 Im Lehrer Feld, 89081
Company description: Seit 1985 bieten wir abwechslungsreiche und qualitativ hochwertige Städte-, Europa-, Fern-, Schiffs-, Musik- und Bahnreisen. Regelmäßig begeistern wir unsere Kunden auch mit besonderen Spezialreisen zu unterschiedlichsten Themen. Außerdem sind wir seit 30 Jahren Ihr zuverlässiger Partner für Leser- und Incentive-Reisen.  Unsere Reisen für Sie: Städtereisen, Europareisen, Fernreisen, Schiffsreisen, Musikreisen, Bahnreisen, Kulturreisen, Eventreisen, Aktivreisen, Leserreisen, Ferienhäuser, Reiseveranstalter, Rom, Nizza, Venedig, Côte d’Azur, Cannes, Monaco, Entdeckungsreisen, Familienurlaub.

Name: Top Travel Reisebüro GmbH
Company description: Reisebüro

Name: GUIBO
Company description: GUIBO enables hiking, biking and specialist tour operators to upgrade their travelers' experience with an all-in-one travel guide app. Combined with automation for ✅ self-print booklets, ✅ high-resolution maps, ✅ turn-by-turn navigation, ✅ booking-specific travel docs, ✅ flexible reseller brandings, ✅ AI-powered geo data system and our ✅ GUIBO tour operator and reseller network.

Name: My Athens Transfers
Company description: My Athens Transfers is a travel agency based in Athens, Greece.

Name: BTU Business Travel Unlimited Reisebüroges.m.b.H
Company description: BTU Business Travel Unlimited Reisebüroges.m.b.H. ist ein österreichisches Reisebüro mit IATA-Lizenz sowie weltweiten Agenturverträgen.  BTU wurde im August 1993 gegründet und hat sich im Laufe der Jahre zu einem führenden Unternehmen im Bereich „Geschäftsreisemanagement“ in Österreich entwickelt.  Zur Festigung und zum Ausbau der Marktposition hat die Raiffeisenlandesbank Oberösterreich im Jahr 1999 ihre Firmenkunden in das Portfolio der BTU eingebracht und dafür 74% Beteiligung erworben. Im Jahr 2021 wurde BTU vollständig von der Oberösterreichischen Raiffeisenlandesbank übernommen. Seit Januar 2022 ist BTU durch die Übernahme von VB Business Travel die Nr. 1 im österreichischen Geschäftsreisemarkt.  Die BTU-Gruppe besteht aus der BTU, AX Travel Management und HBT Herburger Business Travel.

Name: Geomoon
Company description: Geomoon es un modelo de asociación de agencias de viajes independientes, perteneciente a la División Minorista del Grupo Globalia. Nace en enero de 2016, con la intención de complementar la red de distribución de viajes del primer Grupo Turístico Español, ofreciendo a las agencias asociadas, todas las ventajas de pertenecer a un grupo vertical, manteniendo su propia identidad. Nuestros valores: EXPERIENCIA, TRANSPARENCIA, CONFIANZA, CERCANIA, CAPACIDAD DE TRABAJO, MOTIVACION,TESÓN ... han animado a muchos emprendedores a unirse a nuestro equipo, consiguiendo más de 30 incorporaciones en poco menos de 4 meses. Si tienes una agencia de viajes, unete a Geomoon, y empieza cuanto antes a ver cómo crece tu negocio: Más AHORRO Más RENTABILIDAD Más PRODUCTO Más SERVICIOS Te esperamos. Contacto: Información@geomoon.com

Name: VELABUS
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Rapallo, 20 Via Santa Maria Del Campo, 16035
Company description: Da oltre 25 anni Velabus è noleggio pullman, agenzia viaggi e tour operator. Con sede a Rapallo, oggi rappresenta un consolidato punto di riferimento per il mercato turistico italiano ed è affermata tra le aziende leader nell’organizzazione di viaggi guidati in pullman anche all’estero.  With more than 25 years of experience, Velabus is bus operator, tour operator and travel agency. Based in Rapallo, we are one of the leading Italian Tour Operators specialized in group tours by coach. Thanks to our experience and active presence on the Ligurian territory, we can offer tailor-made tours, daily excursions and packages for pre-established, corporate, schools or small family groups.

Name: ELITE TRAVEL Travel Agency Ltd.
Company description: ELITE TRAVEL Travel agency Ltd. is Croatian DMC with extensive experience in providing superior travel service to all our clients and business partners. As a full service destination management company we provide expert advice and personalized travel planning, design of tailor made programs, conference & meetings planning and incentive organization. ELITE TRAVEL journeys reveal stunning Croatia and Adriatic Coast through first-hand experience, exploring history, culture, cuisine, nature and adventure with skilled Elite Travel professionals. ELITE TRAVEL staff will tailor perfect Dubrovnik holiday and make your Dubrovnik travel into a memory you will cherish forever.

Name: Globtour Event
HQ Location: Croatia, City Of Zagreb, Zagreb, 1a Radnička Cesta, 10000
Company description: We are a leading Croatian travel agency with more than 40 years of experience in tourism and a partner of CWT for more than 25 years. We operate in Croatia and the region of Southeast Europe with the HQ in Zagreb and offices throughout Croatia, BIH and Slovenia. Specialized in meeting and events (PCO, EMC), corporate travel (TMC), destination travel management (DMC), incentive travel, leisure travel and cruises, our employees provide the highest quality service to national and international customers in full acknowledgment of cultural diversity and social responsibility. We are creating contemporary approach to the development of the new tourism products and an emphasis on indigenous values and cultural heritage. Thanks to continued improvements in management of systems for quality and the environment with certificates of international standards ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015, Travelife, Ecovadis and Eos Code, Globtour Event ranks as a leading regional company.  As well as corporate travel, we have a longstanding tradition in luxury individual and group travel, serviced by incoming and outgoing divisions. To keep up with the growing demand for Meetings and Events, we have specialized as a Destination and Event Management Company and Professional Congress Organizer (DMC, EMC and PCO), offering only the very best from Croatia and the region.

Name: MAKALIUS
HQ Location: Lithuania, Vilnius, Vilnius, 124 Ukmergės G., lt-08100
Company description: Makalius – kelionių organizatorius, siūlantis įsigyti pažintines ir poilsines keliones į užsienį, o taip pat poilsį bei pramogas Lietuvoje. Didžiąją Makaliaus verslo dalį sudaro mūsų pačių organizuojamos kelionės, kurių nėra galimybės įsigyti jokiose kitose kelionių agentūrose, tik www.makalius.lt. Dirbame tik su tais partneriais, kuriais pasitikime, parduodame tai, ką patys išbandome. „Iki pat šios dienos asmeniškai kasdien peržiūriu klientų atsiliepimus ir tuoj pat susisiekiu su kolegomis, jei pamatau, ką galėtume patobulinti savo veikloje“, – pasakoja Rimvydas Širvinskas. – Makalius is a travel organizer offering both sightseeing and leisure trips abroad, as well as vacations and entertainment in Lithuania. The majority of Makalius' business consists of our own organized trips, which cannot be purchased through any other travel agencies, only on www.makalius.lt. We work exclusively with partners we trust, selling only what we’ve personally tested. 'To this day, I personally review customer feedback daily and immediately contact my team if I see areas where we can improve,' says Rimvydas Širvinskas.

Name: From2 Travel Agency
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Malgrat De Mar, Camí De La Pomereda, 08380
Company description: FROM2 TRAVEL AGENCY SL is a real estate company based in Malgrat de Mar (Barcelona), Spain as part of Group Moventis

Name: Hydrotour
Company description: Cestovná kancelária HYDROTOUR bola založená v roku 1994. Začínali sme s ponukou autokarových zájazdov na vtedy obľúbené Chalkidiki, neskôr nasledovala prvá letecká destinácia - grécke Tolo. Hrdí sme aj na to, že sme na slovenský trh ako prví priniesli zájazdy na ostrov Rodos, potom sme pre našincov otvorili brány do večne slnečného Egypta. Do našej ponuky sme postupne zaradili nádhernú Krétu, Menorku, Marmaris, Peloponéz, Sardíniu, Sicíliu a takisto sme predstavili pre Slovákov takmer neznámu exotickú destináciu - Kapverdy. Všetko dnes už obľúbené letoviská, ktoré sa stali pravidelnou súčasťou ponuky nie len CK Hydrotour. V ponuke máme už aj veľmi obľúbený Omán a novinku, kráľovský Bahrajn. Začínali sme so stovkami klientov, dnes sa toto číslo pohybuje v desaťtisícoch klientov ročne. Začínali sme s jednou destináciou, dnes ich máme desiatky. Veríme, že neustále rastúci počet verných klientov a stabilní obchodní partneri sú odrazom toho, že naša práca nás naozaj baví a snažíme sa ju robiť dobre.

Name: Alakatanga Animation Events
Company description: “La Alakatanga Animation Events srl nasce nel 1996 con lo scopo di creare una struttura organizzata, efficiente, caratterizzata da un forte spirito di gruppo, con un metodo di lavoro chiaro e ben definito. Dal 2015 amplia il proprio organico dirigenziale e tecnico con figure di spicco provenienti dai piu importanti tour operator con l 'obiettivo di un totale restyling aziendale mirando ai villaggi turistici e ai tour operator piu forti sul mercato nazionale Ad oggi la Alakatanga rappresenta ancora un punto di riferimento certo e unico per tutti  coloro che cercano soluzioni personali e professionali per soddisfare i propri desideri di felicità. Il nostro slogan “ Smile with Style” esprime a pieno l’obiettivo della nostra società. Per la Alakatanga la principale risorsa è l’ ANIMATORE , ed il suo lavoro, la sua passione, il suo sorriso, la sua gentilezza e la sua professionalità….. Da oltre 20 anni il sorriso, la serietà e la trasparenza sono i nostri valori guida….idee sempre nuove , professionalità e simpatia dei nostri animatori , impegno costante e tanta passione sono gli ingredienti del nostro successo….. Per questo motivo, ogni operatore della Alakatanga riceve una specifica formazione di base, e dunque sviluppa tutta una serie di attività diversificate, alle quali risponde con gradi diversi di abilita, conoscenza ed esperienza. L’insieme di queste capacità concorre a costituire il profilo professionale e globale dell’operatore turistico Alakatanga. A nostra disposizione abbiamo personale qualificato, professionale ed esperto provenienti da tutta Europa. Infine, ci preme porre l’accento che servizi quali animazione e assistenza turistica, se manifestati nella maniera ottimale non possono che rendere più piacevole e divertente il soggiorno, ed è per questo motivo che noi della ALAKATANGA ci prefiggiamo di offrire sempre e comunque un servizio di qualità. Alakatanga….Smile with Style!!

Name: Travel Agency INGSVA
Company description: Travel Agency INGSVA specializes in creating unique travel experiences, particularly focused on culinary journeys in Andalusia, Spain. The agency's mission is to provide clients with memorable adventures that combine local culture, gastronomy, and exploration of historical sites, all while ensuring a high level of service and enjoyment. The target market includes food enthusiasts and travelers seeking immersive experiences, particularly those interested in exploring the rich culinary heritage of Spain. With a commitment to responsible tourism and customer satisfaction, INGSVA aims to create lasting memories for its clients through thoughtfully curated travel packages.

Name: Expediatur Global
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 22 Calle De La Alameda, 28014
Company description: Expediatur is a global company dedicated to the processing and handling of travel visas. Our services include both B2C and B2B solutions; integrations for travel agency websites and wholesalers. In addition, we provide all the necessary tools to guarantee our partners the simplest and most straight forward procedures. In a market where profit margins are continually narrowing down, standing out in service quality makes the difference. Our services allow travel agencies to increase operating profit as well as to obtain loyalty from customers who want more benefits than just reasonable travel rates. In a more personal level, we strive for our final customers to put their trust in us with the application of their visas since this is a tedious and time-consuming process subject to constant legal changes, document management and the dedication of many hours. Entrust in a professional team that will optimize your effort and thus you will be able to dedicate your time to what really matters. We firmly believe that the bureaucracy required to apply for a travel visa should not be a restriction or barrier to the free movement of people, or to free cultural exchange between countries. Although we cannot eliminate it, our aim is to make these processes much simpler for the traveller, offering them security and professionalism.

Name: Mastro Viaggiatore

Ogni itinerario nasce dall’expertise dei nostri Mastri, specialisti che conoscono le destinazioni in profondità e le raccontano con passione. 🌍 Il nostro approccio Viaggi su misura: itinerari personalizzati in ogni dettaglio. Esperienze tematiche: dal diving alle spedizioni polari, dalla fotografia al wellness. Vieni a scoprire come trasformiamo un’idea in un’esperienza indimenticabile.

Name: Utat Viaggi

Company description: Utat Viaggi: Passione per il Mondo Questo è cio che guida Utat nel proporre i suoi viaggi. Ed è anche il suo motto aziendale da sempre. Creare programmi che arrivino dritti al cuore, scoprendo l’anima di un paese o di una città, la sua unicità, la sua parte più autentica, quella che emoziona, quella che resta fra i ricordi più cari. Considerato Tour Operator di riferimento nell'organizzazione di viaggi su misura e viaggi guidati con accompagnatori parlanti italiano, confezioniamo con attenzione sartoriale e attenta il viaggio dei tuoi sogni in Eurasia, Medio Oriente, Emirati Arabi, Nord Africa e Africa Australe, India e Sri Lanka, Cina e Indocina, Sud Est Asiatico, Giappone, Malesia, Stati Uniti e Canada. Utat si prende cura della pianificazione del tuo viaggio, dei trasferimenti intermedi, del soggiorno e degli itinerari. Organizza tour guidati, trasferimenti che combinano il volo in aereo ed il viaggio in pullman, visite presso i più importanti siti storici ed archeologici dei luoghi che hai scelto, pernottamenti nei posti più originali ed emblematici delle località in cui ti trovi.

Name: TUI TravelCenter Romania
Company description: In June 2011, the Eurolines Group Romania concluded a strategic partnership with TUI Travel PLC, the largest tour operator in the world.  Two Years of TUI Business in Romania  In September 2013, two years after the launching of TUI in Romania, the Eurolines Group expanded in the Republic of Moldova, establishing a TUI TravelCenter agency in in Kishinev.  In 2013, the Eurolines group founded 16 new TUI TravelCenter and Eurolines travel agencies, most of which were opened, according to the Group’s development and consolidation strategy, in malls, which has been the main trade area of interest during the last 3 years. With the 78 Eurolines and TUI TravelCenter sale offices, the Eurolines Group holds the widest network of travel agencies in Romania.

Name: Outdoor Albania
HQ Location: Belgium, Flanders, Halle, 9/2 Str "gjin Bue Shpata", 1019
Company description: Outdoor Albania - Trips into the Albanian nature and culture We are Outdoor Albania; a tour operator specialized in hiking and trekking holidays, cultural roundtrips and active tours, such as cycling, sea-kayaking, snowshoeing and ski touring.  For more than two decades, we have been leading adventure travel in every region of Albania every season of the year. We're experts at organizing a number of activities that bring travellers to experience what our company loves most: pure, authentic Albania.  Albania is a small eastern Mediterranean country with an impressive blend of diverse landscapes, ancient traditions, contrasts of preservation versus development, hospitality, and a deep history and some unique UNESCO World heritage sites which are ready to be explored!  Besides Albania we also offer extensions to our neighboring counties; Montenegro, Kosovo, Macedonia and Greece, giving a broader Balkan dimension to the tours we offer. We invite you to go off the beaten path and explore Shqiperia - the land of Shqipetar- and its neighbouring countries with us.    Our Philosophy   We love what we do, and we want to sustain it. That's why the preservation of Albania's unique natural and cultural assets is crucial for the success of our activities. The paradox of rapid development in Albania means new infrastructure and benefits, but often at a sore  environmental price. In the face of this reality, we have been the foremost advocates of responsible tourism in  Albania for years. We believe in keeping the groups small in size, respecting the environment and local traditions, minimizing the impact that tourism can produce, and working close with local suppliers and family-owned  businesses that share the same values.

Name: Clio Muse Tours
Company description: Clio Muse Tours is an award-winning company operating in the tourism and culture sector trusted by over 3 million travelers. Since our foundation in 2014, we have collaborated with world-class cultural institutions and museums, we have curated more than 600 audio tours in over 30 countries & 7 languages and we have built a strong network of partners including the world’s largest tour operators. Today, Clio Muse Tours specializes in the creation and curation of audio and virtual tours as well as the development of state-of-the-art technologies for cultural institutions. Our multi-faceted identity has enabled us to work together with the world’s largest online travel agencies and cooperate with leading cultural institutions in Greece and abroad in order to create top-rated cultural tourism experiences. Key Partnerships: Goulandris Natural History Museum, Athens International Airport, The Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Center, B. & M. Theocharakis Foundation, Athens Biennale, Technopolis, Art Athina, Embassy of Germany in Greece, Embassy of the Netherlands in Greece, Association of Licensed Tourist Guides, European Federation of Tourist Guide Associations: FEG, Horizon 2020, Diazoma, Museum of the City of Athens.

Name: AVRA Tours S.A.
Company description: AVRA GROUP of Companies is an innovative, well established & rapidly developing corporation in the field of tourism. The rapid and continuous growth of the company is the result of the work of a highly experienced team of professionals and efficient worldwide partnerships. Our existing customers are major charter and group operators, internet operators, bed banks, travel agents specialized in exclusive packages and FITs from Europe and other parts of the world. Indicative of the above is the amount of over 450.000 customers (per annum) to Greece through AVRA. Name: Traffics GmbH
Company description: Since 1999, traffics has been one of the leading companies in travel technology and a pioneer in the digital travel industry. In June 2022, traffics became part of the Travelsoft Group, further expanding its international footprint while continuing to develop smart, user-friendly technologies that support the travel industry — from comparison and search tools to fully integrated booking systems. Today, more than 6,000 travel agencies trust traffics solutions, alongside major online travel agencies (OTAs), airlines, hotels, and other travel providers. Through continuous innovation, traffics has earned multiple industry awards and helped establish lasting standards within the travel sector. As co-founder and initiator of the Open Touristic Data Standard (OTDS), traffics also plays a central role in shaping digital standards across the industry. The company is actively involved in key industry associations such as the Deutscher ReiseVerband (DRV), the Travel Industry Club (TIC), the Verband Internet Reisevertrieb e.V. Name: Kentlucky
Company description: Cestovní kancelář KENTLUCKY, dříve Kentaurus, působí v oblasti cestovního ruchu od roku 1991 (od roku 2001 jako Kentlucky), v minulosti zejména v příjezdovém cestovním ruchu se zaměřením na klienty ze Španělska, Itálie, Maďarska, Anglie a dalších zemí. CK Kentlucky se v roce 2010 rozhodla vytvořit komplexní produkt se zaměřením na exotické destinace, především pak na Kubu a Srí Lanku. V současné době nabízíme české a slovenské klientele variaci exotických zájezdů do následujících destinací: Kuba, Srí Lanka, Maledivy, Mexiko, Dominikánská republika a Emiráty. Jsme cestovní kanceláří, která kromě svých pevných termínů a pevných programů zájezdů dává klientům i možnost přetvořit si zájezd dle vlastního obrazu (vlastní termín, individuálně volený program, kombinace produktů, kombinace hotelů, kombinace destinací apod). Pro ty z Vás, co mají vlastní dopravu (letenky), dokážeme realizovat zájezd od momentu příletu do destinace. Převážně cestujeme v malých skupinách, do 20 cestujících, abychom mohli poskytnout co nejosobitější a nejkvalitnější služby (ubytování, transfery, exkurze, pronájmy aut atd.) Nemáme minimální limity na počty účastníků ve vybraných zájezdech. Pro 2 klienty zrealizujeme plnohodnotný zájezd. Pro naši klientelu ze Slovenské republiky zajišťujeme leteckou přepravu i z Vídně. Dále pro realizaci zájezdu (administrativně) není nutné jezdit za námi do Prahy. Vše lze vyřešit elektronicky a platbu poukázat na náš EURO účet či kreditní/debetní platební kartou. Víza do všech destinací dokážeme vystavit a poštou doporučeně (v případě Srí Lanky emailem) zaslat k rukám klientů.  • Kuba – vlajková loď mezi našimi destinacemi. Kancelář a služby česky hovořícího delegáta 365 dní v roce. Nejoblíbenějším produktem jsou kombinované zájezdy do Havany + Varadera (poznání + pobyt u moře), organizovaný poznávací okruh Kubou s česky hovořícím průvodcem, Cuba Autentica. Dále na Kubě realizujeme pobyty na Varaderu s hraním golfu, lekce Salsy, potápění anebo rybářskými výlety za lovem mečounů.

Name: Volcano Trails
Company description: Celebrating 27 years of Highland tours and expeditions in Iceland. Volcano Trails is a licensed tour operator and Destination Management Company in Iceland, founded in 1997. We are committed to providing unforgettable Highland tours and experiences in Iceland, for groups and individual travelers. For more than two decades, we’ve had the privilege to explore in detail the beautiful nature of Iceland, taking away valuable lessons on how to operate tours and services in the Icelandic Highlands. We’ve built a network of hundreds of service providers, including expert guides, trained our own staff in the field, set up base camps in the Highlands, and acquired a large fleet of classic 4x4 adventure vehicles - all of which enable us to operate tours to all corners of Iceland, all year round.  If you wish to experience the best hidden, hard-to-reach places in Iceland, we will get you there! Volcano Trails is committed to conducting its business and day to day operations in a sustainable way. We emphasize caution and care for the natural environment and we respect the culture, history, and background of the people we engage with through our business. Volcano Trails has worked hard on maintaining long-standing mutually beneficial relationships with its customers, co-workers, suppliers, and contractors. It is our mission to be in business for decades to come and to do so we feel it is important to respect our land, our business partners, customers, employees, and our community. Volcano Trails trades as a fully licensed  Travel Agency under Icelandic legislation and is a member of the Icelandic Travel Industry Association.

We develop our own brands, such as Flag Hotels, Lam Hotels and Asite Hotels, with a strong national identity, where each unit has its own personality. Company description: Svalbard Adventure Group AS is a group consisting of the wholly owned subsidiaries HRD, Svalbard Snøcooterutleie AS ,Svalbar Pub AS and Svalbard Booking Svalbard Booking Svalbard Booking is Svalbard Adventure Group`s booking portal and one of the largest adventure - tour operators at Svalbard. The company covers a wide range of activities, accommodation and dining. Svalbard Booking also customizes different packages for groups and conference events. Web: http://svalbardbooking.com/ Huset "Huset” is one of Longyearbyen’s most legendary buildings. During the dark season you see it lit up at the top of the valley, the town's beacon for culture and community. The infamous house was built in 1951 and initially served the purpose of a village hall. The name “Huset” came from the people as it was collectively known as the definitive “House”. There has been serving of fine liquors, beers and wines since it was first permitted in the '50s. Most of the city's institutions, including schools, hospitals and post offices, have been stationed within “Huset”. Today “Huset” is famous for its wine cellar and kitchen. Since the '80s, a wine cellar has been growing and developing to become Scandinavia's largest, gaining exquisite recognition around the world. With over 20,000 bottles, it is sure to win the affection of the most accomplished wine lovers. Name: SAXONIA Touristik International GmbH
Company description: Als heute weltweit aktive Full Service- Agentur wurde SAXONIA Touristik International GmbH im Januar 1990 von Dr. Klaus Platzdasch in Leipzig gegründet (Handelsregister-Nummer 3!). Entstanden aus dem ersten Reisebüro in Ostdeutschland verfügt SAXONIA heute mit Filialen in Leipzig und Dresden sowie einem Service- Büro in Berlin über ein sehr effizientes Netzwerk in Mitteldeutschland und ist darüber hinaus in Deutschland, ganz Europa und Weltweit tätig. Neben den Agenturbüros und einem Reiseveranstalterbereich zählen zudem 4 voll-lizensierte FIRST REISEBÜROs in Leipzig und Dresden sowie eine integrierte Firmenreisedienst-Unit FIRST Business Travel zum Portfolio der SAXONIA Touristik International GmbH.

Name: Akwaba Afrika - Die Experten Für Afrikareisen
Company description: Akwaba Afrika ist ein junges, nachhaltig orientiertes Reiseunternehmen aus Leipzig, dass auf individuelle Aktiv-, Abenteuer- und Erlebnisreisen in Afrika spezialisiert ist. Seit der Gründung im Frühjahr 2014 planen, organisieren und führen wir Privatreisen in Afrika mit höchstem qualitativen und nachhaltigen Anspruch durch. Wir sehen es als unsere Aufgabe aus Ihrem Urlaub in Afrika ein Abenteuer zu kreieren, an das Sie sich ein Leben lang gerne erinnern werden und dabei die negativen Aspekte des Tourismus zu lindern bzw. positive Aspekte verstärken.  Das Wort Akwaba stammt aus der Sprache der Akan-Völker Westafrikas und bedeutet „Willkommen“. Es steht für die unvergleichliche afrikanische Herzlichkeit und Gastfreundschaft, die Gästen und Reisenden vielerorts entgegengebracht wird. Als Reiseveranstalter möchten wir dieses tolle Willkommensgefühl in Afrika mit Ihnen teilen. Daher haben wir „Akwaba“ ganz bewusst sowohl zu unserem Namen als auch zum Leitmotiv unserer Reisen gemacht. Auf individuelle, persönliche und nachhaltige Weise bringen wir Ihnen die Faszination Afrika näher und begleiten Sie auf Ihrem Abenteuer in eine aufregende Welt, die Ihnen vor Staunen den Atem verschlagen wird. Für uns ist jeder Reisegast einzigartig und als Persönlichkeit wichtig. Daher setzen wir auf intensive Betreuung unserer Gäste und sind besonders stolz auf unsere maßgeschneiderten Reisen.

Name: Uniglobe Top Travel

There are many different travel agencies across the world but our global reach and unique structure allows us to offer you many features and services that our competitors fail to match. What sets us apart is our innovative UNIGLOBE business model which enables us to reduce your travel costs AND provide a consistently high level of service. Larger travel management companies may be able to offer some cost savings due to negotiated rates however they often fall short when it comes to service, personalisation and attention to detail.  Their clients are simply ‘one of many’. On the other end of the scale, other smaller travel management companies potentially offer a high level of service but are unable to access the best rates on the market.

AKI Travel startade 1991 och är en lokalt, privat ägd affärs- och gruppresebyrå. 2005 startade vi systerbolaget AKI Golftravel för att även kunna erbjuda golfresor. Name: Welcome Berlin Tours GmbH
Company description: welcome berlin tours is a tour operator specialised in class trips, study trips and youth group travel and was established in January, 1992. welcome berlin tours has grown to become one of the leading specialists for class trips in Germany and all across Europe. Over 150 destinations in 15 countries await you and your class. No matter the type of school or age group, we can provide you with a tailor-made offer that is right for you. Our carefully-assembled programme suggestions for class trips are in line with the guidelines by educational authorities and still leave you room to add your personal touch. We have put together our programme in cooperation with experienced educators. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Wir bringen Sie und Ihre Klasse durch ganz Europa! Welcome berlin tours ist ein TÜV-geprüfter Spezialreiseveranstalter für Klassenfahrten, Studienreisen und Jugendgruppenreisen. Mittlerweile ist welcome berlin tours einer der führenden Spezialisten für Klassenfahrten deutschland- und europaweit. Jährlich verreisen mit uns über 2.500 Gruppen mit mehr als 70.000 Teilnehmern.  Mit unseren gründlich ausgearbeiteten Programmvorschlägen für Klassenfahrten gehen wir ebenso auf die Richtlinien der Schulbehörden ein, wie wir individuellen Spielraum zur eigenen Gestaltung lassen. Unsere Programme haben wir in Zusammenarbeit mit erfahrenen Pädagogen erstellt. Selbstverständlich lassen sich unsere Programme individuell modifizieren oder auch kombinieren.  Unser kompetentes und engagiertes Team garantiert eine sorgfältige Organisation und steht Ihnen jederzeit mit Rat und Tat zur Seite, ob vor, während oder nach der Reise. Name: Trabax
Company description: Desde que se constituyó como agencia mayorista de viajes en 2.012, Trabax Turismo S.L., se ha configurado como la alternativa a los productos de circuitos en Europa, adicionalmente a las necesidades personalizadas de cada cliente. El equipo está formado por profesionales de probada experiencia, quienes, a lo largo de más de 30 años en la creación y elaboración de productos turísticos, permiten dar todo tipo de respuestas a necesidades de gestión de grupos, eventos personalizados, viajes de incentivos, de empresas, etc., gracias a lo cual, en Trabax Turismo S.L. priorizamos la calidad a la hora de diseñar un viaje a su medida, que nunca olvidará. Nuestra programación de contratación propia abarca rutas diferentes que permiten conocer, de una forma regular, zonas de la vieja Europa que no están ofertadas en estos momentos en los mercados Latinoamericanos. Las claves del éxito de Trabax Turismo S.L. como turoperador han sido desde un principio las siguientes: •	Nuestros muchos años de experiencia en el turismo, avalados por un conocimiento profundo de los destinos en Europa y Oriente. •	Nuestra amplia red de corresponsales y contactos nos permiten ofrecer unos precios y servicios sin competencia. •	La excelencia en el servicio es nuestra prioridad. •	Nuestros acuerdos comerciales con distintas redes de transporte aseguran la eficiencia en este servicio, permitiendo coordinar todo tipo de combinaciones necesarias en Europa, cuidando siempre de la seguridad de nuestros clientes y observando el más estricto cumplimiento de la normativa europea. •	La contratación de grandes volúmenes en determinados destinos es lo que ha permitido una significativa reducción de los costes medios y ofertar unas condiciones inmejorables de mercado. •	Trabax Turismo S.L. cuenta con la última tecnología informática para la realización de reservas, así como un cualificado equipo humano, lo que permite dar un inmejorable servicio a las agencias de viajes.

Name: Ratpanat Luxury & Adventure
HQ Location: Spain, Castille And León, Valladolid, 6 Pasaje Gutiérrez, 47002
Company description: Ratpanat Luxury & Adventure es la mayorista y agencia de viajes dedicada al diseño de viajes de lujo y aventura en África perteneciente al Grupo Ratpanat. Nuestra forma de entender los viajes, basada en dos conceptos clave, lujo y aventura, junto con la sostenibilidad, nos han posicionado como el referente de los safaris del S.XXI y principal mayorista del sector en España.  Contamos con oficinas e infraestructura propia en África, que, junto a nuestros alojamientos sostenibles situados en los mejores parques nacionales de Kenia y Tanzania nos permiten ofrecen una producto exclusivo integrado con la mejor relación calidad - precio del mercado. Contamos con una gran flota de vehículos 4x4 y los mejores camiones con zona chill-out, comodidad sin renunciar a la aventura para recorrer Africa. ¿Contactamos?

Name: Italian Tours
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Castelnuovo, 24 Via Umberto I, 37014
Company description: ItalianTours is a B2B tour operator specialized in high quality programmes tailored for groups in all parts of Italy. Why Italian Tours? Because we are an international team of professionals, with years of experience, from key tourism sectors, who love to travel, who discovered Italy and chose to live here. Our mission is to impress unique images of Italy on the memory of your travellers. We know how difficult it is to get together a group or convince a customer to take a trip. We make sure your guests are fully satisfied with their trip so that they travel with you again and again. Our knowledge is enriched by our membership with STAN, an international network of tour operators/ DMC for student travel, in which we are the Italian representatives.  To date we have satisfied customers from UK, Germany, Denmark, Netherlands, South Africa, USA…   The knowledge of the area combined with the strength of our network of qualified suppliers allows us to guarantee efficient and high-quality service at competitive prices. We will take care of all the services you need: - Accommodation: hostels, hotels, apartments, campsites, resorts  - Quality transfers: transfers by coach, van, minivan and car  - Professional city guides, reps or tour assistants; depending on your needs  - Creative and innovative team building/leisure activities - Thematic Tours: Cultural, Food & wine, Sport, Music, Educational   - Organization of sport tournaments, camps and retreats, music concerts in     impressive venues, meetings and conferences Together we can plan the perfect trip to inspire and motivate even your most demanding customers.

Name: Al Di Là Dei Sogni... Viaggi Di Honeymoon Travel Srl
Company description: 15 ANNI DI ESPERIENZA 5 SEDI 20 PERSONE DI STAFF 5000 VIAGGI DI NOZZE ORGANIZZATI Ebbene sì, la nostra azienda nasce proprio dalla bellissima laguna di Honeymoon Island ad Aitutaki, uno dei posti più incantevoli al mondo. La laguna con il suo mare cristallino e questa splendida isoletta nel bel mezzo dell’Oceano Pacifico ci hanno fatto sognare… ed ancora ci fanno sognare! Da lì nasce l’idea di concentrare gran parte del nostro lavoro alla ricerca di sempre più perfezionate “Lune di Miele”… Honeymoon appunto! E’ proprio questo che contraddistingue il nostro lavoro: La professionalità al primo posto. I nostri collaboratori sono esperti in ogni destinazione al mondo, con esperienze di vissuto che caratterizzano l’informazione quanto più precisa possibile. L’amore immenso per questo lavoro ci porta sempre di più a studiare nuove soluzioni, viaggiare su nuove frontiere e a far scoprire questo mondo complicato ma sensazionale ai nostri clienti. Amiamo il nostro lavoro e facciamo in modo che i sogni dei nostri clienti diventino realtà… in uno dei viaggi più importanti della  vita! Molti di loro poi diventano nostri fedelissimi…e negli anni li accompagnamo anche nei viaggi successivi! Perché… perché sulla maggior parte delle destinazioni da Sogno siamo Tour Operator e seguiamo direttamente i nostri clienti rimanendo, come ovvio che sia, anche più competitivi sul giusto prezzo. Provare per credere…

Name: SponsorLink AS
Company description: SponsorLink AS er en turoperatør som feiret 20-års jubileum i 2018.  Vi har bred erfaring med å organisere reiser for grupper og bedrifter, og ønsker å gi deg som kunde en annerledes og minneverdig opplevelse gruppen sent vil glemme. Vi jobber hele tiden med å finne nye destinasjoner og aktiviteter, og tar på oss alle typer arrangementer. En ny destinasjon er for oss kun en ny utfordring, og sammen med våre agenter i utlandet og personlige oppfølging av deg som kunde, skreddersyr vi et program tilpasset deres behov og ønsker.  Vår spesialitet foruten gruppereiser, er turer til idrettsarrangement. Vi tilbyr et bredt utvalg som blant annet World Cup og VM i nordiske grener og i skiskyting, europeisk fotball, ishockey VM, Formel 1, NHL (National Hockey League) og golfturer rundt om i verden, både som spiller og tilskuer.  Vi har i flere år hatt et tett samarbeid med Norges Skiforbund Langrenn, Norges Skiforbund Kombinert og Norges Skiskytterforbund, og arrangerer årlig turer til World Cup, VM og andre internasjonale konkurranser, der du kommer tett på opplevelsen. Våre verdier «KUPP», står sentralt i alt vi gjør, for at du som kunde skal få en best mulig opplevelse. Vi leverer KVALITET, vi er UNIKE, vi er PÅLITELIGE, og vi har hele tiden fokus på PERSONLIG oppfølging. SponsorLink er offisiell IATA- agent og er medlem av Reisegarantifondet. HVORFOR VELGE OSS? Vi leverer kvalitet Vi gir deg unike opplevelser Vi er pålitelige Vi er personlige Vi tilbyr trygghet gjennom medlemskap i Reisegarantifondet

With a continuous investment in the field of technology, the company maintains a state-of-the-art, in-house computer system which is connected online with various business providers, as well as contracts with several International Computer Reservations systems. Heraklio Travel is looking forward to continue on its successful course as it moves dynamically into the future, setting as its goal the development of its network and the expansion of activities. Our company has been awarded several distinctions, for its high quality services and sales, by various airlines, hotels and organizations. The primary objective of Heraklio Travel is the rendering of high quality services. For this reason, our company employs multilingual executives specialized in travel and tourism. Moreover it has developed, strong relationships and excellent partnerships with airlines and tourism companies, worldwide. Choosing Us We offer efficient and reliable services with simplicity, perfectly aligned with the strategy of our customers. High quality services prompt replies, finding solutions for any travel need  | 24/7 customer service  Competitive pricing | High efficiency Milestones 1981  Founding of Heraklio Travel Group of Companies, in Neo Irakleio, Attica region 2009  Establishing a subsidiary in Athens, GTRS, for the exclusive representation of airline companies 2010  Heraklio Travel acquires a position in the TOP 10, best producers in Greece 2013  Providing online reservation platform www.tickettravelhotel.com to our corporate customers 2014  Establishing a subsidiary in Athens, The Travel Company focusing on Incoming, M.I.C.E & Corporate travel  MH.T.E 0206E60000350901

Name: BoatNow
Company description: BoatNow is an innovative and independent online platform that enables customers to book private boat tours. This platform existing of a mobile application and a website contains boats for every occasion and that matches your personal needs. Boats for every occasion All the Amsterdam licensed Boat-tour operators with +100 vessels are connected to our innovative and independent platform. This ensures that we have boats for a fun day out with family & Friends, romantic tours for couples but also larger boats suitable for company parties, weddings and other parties.  The BoatNow mobile application The BoatNow mobile application that is available for iOs and Android ensures that you can complete the booking process with a few simple clicks. After you have download the app, you can click your ‘pick-op’ location and choose your ‘boat-type’. After you have done this, you can be on the water within 60 minutes and enjoy all the beauty that Amsterdam has to offer.

Name: Mercado Das Viagens
HQ Location: Portugal, Braga, Braga, 313 Rua Dr. Francisco Duarte, 4715-017
Company description: O Mercado das Viagens é a nova rede de agências de viagens em Portugal, e uma marca 100% Portuguesa. Fundada em Julho de 2013 por 6 empresários, ex - franchisados de uma rede de franchising espanhola, estes 6 empreendedores, juntamente com as suas 3 agências, criaram uma marca que tinha como objectivo inicial agregar as agências inicialmente existentes, mudando no entanto completamente o conceito em que a mesma estava assente - estruturar o Mercado das Viagens como uma agência de viagens orientada para o cliente exigente e presente, devolvendo o modelo de negócio das agências de viagem ao balcão físico, acompanhado pela inovação na promoção e distribuição dos seus produtos, assim como nos canais de comunicação com o cliente. Dizemos por isso que somos um grupo de Amigos para Amigos. A nossa missão é a satisfação completa dos nossos clientes, sendo esta a base para a rentabilidade do negócio dos nossos balcões. Com uma gestão do negócio assente em balcões independentes e empreendedores que garantem a aplicação dos padrões de qualidade definidos pela marca, gera emprego e contribui positivamente para a riqueza nacional. É uma rede especializada em turismo de lazer, focando também a sua actividade em áreas como as viagens de grupo, empresariais e nichos de mercado bem definidos. É uma marca independente de outros parceiros de mercado (aviação, hotelaria, operação turística) na definição da sua política de produto e estratégia comercial, o que lhe permite total isenção no momento de aconselhamento ao seu cliente. Comercializamos todos os produtos existentes no mercado, desde que estes garantam os níveis de qualidade exigidos para as viagens dos nossos clientes. O Mercado das Viagens apresenta uma imagem inovadora e moderna, composta por equipas jovens e dinâmicas com sólidos conhecimentos do universo do turismo, sempre com o intuito de proporcionar experiências diferentes e inesquecíveis aos nossos clientes.

Name: Laika Ocio
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Leganés, 22 Calle Del Ampurdán, 28915
Company description: Agencia de viajes especializada en escolares. Organizamos y gestionamos viajes para primaria, secundaria y bachillerato con programas multiaventura, acuáticos, culturales e inmersión en inglés. Tratamos de generar una experiencia inolvidable y estar a la altura de lo que un viaje de fin de curso o un campamento implica en la vida de nuestros participantes. Por este motivo tratamos de cuidar cada detalle de principio a fin y darle a cada viaje o campamento la calidad que se merece.

Name: Politours 360
Company description: Politours 360º is a Spanish Tour Operator & Travel Wholesaler) since 1974. Specialised in River Cruises, as well as tours in Europe, North, Central and South America, Middle East, Far East, Indian Ocean and Africa.

Name: Pausanias Viajes Arqueológicos Y Culturales
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 42 Calle De Abtao, 28007
Company description: Pausanias es una agencia de viajes minorista (CICMA 2744) especializada en el diseño y organización de viajes de temática arqueológica y cultural Lejos de los viajes comerciales que ofertan los canales  tradicionales, diseñamos cuidadosamente itinerarios y recorridos diferentes con una especial atención a los contenidos históricos y arqueológicos. Con estas premisas los viajes de Pausanias empiezan en nuestra oficina. Aquí  se realiza una presentación del viaje, a través de proyecciones de imágenes, mapas, cronologías y reconstrucciones con el fin de trasmitir los conocimientos más interesantes  para interiorizar y disfrutar el viaje de una forma única y exclusiva.  Nuestro reto por lo tanto es intentar trasmitir a las personas que participan en nuestros viajes el entusiasmo que sentimos nosotros mismos cuando contemplamos los lugares donde la humanidad ha vivido grandes acontecimientos históricos o ha realizado las obras artísticas y arquitectónicas más bellas de la antigüedad.

Name: Olery B.V.
Company description: Olery is a leading hospitality provider of performance data. We collect reviews from 40+ online platforms for accommodations, restaurants, attractions, airports and airlines. Learn more fill in the contact form -->> By tapping into the opinions of traveler's shared online (e.g. online hotel reviews) Olery is able to assess hospitality businesses, destinations and markets worldwide. Advanced technologies such as Natural Language Processing and Big Data methodology make it possible to analyse large quantities of content every day. Destination marketing organisations, hospitality & asset management companies, hotel groups, investment companies, Hospitality tech companies,  online travel agencies and many other companies make use of  this data to monitor performance, conduct research and improve services.  With its applications, reports,  APIs and SDKI Olery is an valuable partner for these organisations.

Name: Sigeric - Servizi Per Il Turismo
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Pontremoli, 10 Via Ricci Armani, 54027
Company description: Sigeric Soc. Coop. è una Cooperativa di Comunità Toscana formata da professionisti del turismo, guide turistiche e guide ambientali. Nasce nel 2015 in Lunigiana da un’esperienza decennale nel settore del turismo, per fornire servizi turistici di alto livello a turisti, scuole, aziende, Agenzie di viaggio, Tour Operator, Enti e Istituzioni pubbliche. Da sempre, il nostro obiettivo è creare un’offerta ampia e varia che possa soddisfare le esigenze di ogni tipologia di visitatore che sceglie di scoprire la Lunigiana, ma non solo! Operiamo, infatti, sia in Lunigiana che nel Parco Nazionale dell'Appennino Tosco-Emiliano, alle Cinque Terre e Levante Ligure e nella Provincia di Parma. Il nostro lavoro è per noi prima di tutto una passione. E il nostro obiettivo è condurre il viaggiatore alla scoperta di questi territori, ponendo particolare attenzione verso la loro storia e cultura, le loro tradizioni, le numerose bellezze naturali e le tante eccellenze gastronomiche! Per rendere un semplice viaggio una vera esperienza indimenticabile.

Name: Pierce Kavanagh Coaches IRELAND
HQ Location: Ireland, Eastern Region, Urlingford, Churchview Main Street, w8y6
Company description: We're a customer focused group transport charter company based in Ireland,  offering a safe, reliable and quality assured product to leading incoming Tour Operators and Event Management Companies. We've have 60 years experience in tourism and transport and take great pride in our vast range of superbly finished coaches built to suit our clients requirements.   We hire people passionate about their jobs and their industry, people who understand true customer service and are committed to the principles of good service, innovation, attention to detail and value for money. Our high level of repeat custom and long term client relationships is testament to our many satisfied clients.

Name: TPO Pastuszak/GPN Poland
Company description: TPO Pastuszak company provides coach transportation in Poland and around the entire Europe. We provide the best in luxury rent a coach travel service offering high standards of safety and comfort. Safety is the highest priority for us,  all our coaches are routinely inspected and maintained by team of skilled technicians. Prices are calculated depending on time, number of clients and a purpose of coach hire. We offer special winter prices and discounts for regulars. We provide you with information required at any time. Safe, smart, comfortable, professional …. Don’t settle for anything less. Poland Coach hire: http://pastuszak.com/ Poland Incoming Tour Operator: http://www.tpoincoming.pl/

Name: Wild Rover Day Tours
Company description: Immerse yourself in the rugged and refined beauty of Ireland with Wild Rover’s award-winning day trip tours from Dublin. From the peaks of the Wicklow Mountains to the shores of the Giant’s Causeway, embrace your wild side in some of Ireland’s most breathtaking landscapes at wildrovertours.com. The best adventures lead to great stories. At Wild Rover Tours, we have plenty to tell. Experience Ireland's wild side in a fun and unforgettable way with Wild Rover Tours. Escape from the streets of Dublin on day trips to the Cliffs of Moher & Galway City, Belfast & Giants Causeway, Kilkenny & Glendalough and more. At the heart of each of our one day tours is a quest to illuminate Irish history, folklore, storytelling and music through the lens of Ireland’s rugged beauty. Because we value both good storytelling and safety, a spirited tour guide and a dedicated driver will accompany you on each tour we offer of the Emerald Isle.  What puts us above the rest?   Wild Rover Tours was awarded the Best Local Tour Operator 2014 award by Viator members. Viator is the leading global online seller of travel experiences.  Winners of 5 Star Certificate of Excellence from Trip Advisor 2012, 2013,2014 and 2015.  Learn more about the enchanting locations we explore on our trips and our seasonal offers at wildrovertours.com.

Name: Kristina
Company description: Kristina Cruises  is a Finnish family-owned tour operator company with over fifty years of experience in travel business.  Olemme yhteismatkailuun erikoistunut suomalainen perheyritys, joka on huolehtinut asiakkaidensa toiveista ja tarpeista jo seitsemän vuosikymmenen ajan. Suunnittelemme ja toteutamme teemallisia yhteismatkoja laatutietoisille suomalaisille maalla ja merellä. Palvelemme vuosittain tuhansia elämyksiä, kokemuksia ja mukavaa matkatunnelmaa arvostavia matkailijoita. Vuonna 1953 alkanut tarinamme on kiehtova kertomus kyvystä uudistua muuttuvan maailman melskeissä. www.kristina.fi

Name: Triana Viajes
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Sevilla, 80 C/pagés Del Corro, 41010
Company description: 🌟 35 años de experiencia en viajes a medida 🌟 Somos una agencia de viajes con 35 años de trayectoria, especializada en crear experiencias únicas y personalizadas para cada cliente. Nuestra organización en departamentos específicos – Empresas, Congresos y Eventos, Peregrinaciones, Turismo Accesible y Grupos – nos permite ofrecer soluciones hechas a la medida de tus necesidades. ✈️🌍 Con oficinas en el corazón de Sevilla y en Badajoz, contamos con un equipo de profesionales altamente cualificados y en constante formación, dedicados a brindarte una atención cercana y de calidad. 🤝 Nuestra membresía en Travel Advisors Guild respalda nuestro compromiso y nos conecta con destinos en todo el mundo. 🌎 ✨ Muy cerca para llevarte lejos ✨ En cada viaje, nuestro objetivo es superar tus expectativas, ofreciéndote asesoramiento experto y una experiencia de cliente inigualable. Descubre cómo, con 35 años de experiencia, podemos hacer realidad el viaje de tus sueños. 🚀🌈

Name: Arawak Viajes
Company description: Arawak es una agencia de viajes especializada en viajes propios de senderismo y culturales, reconocida por la Dirección General de Turismo de la Comunidad de Madrid con el título CICMA 893, y autorizada a desarrollar cualquier viaje o actividad de turismo para ofrecer al público en general. Arawak realizó su primera salida de senderismo el 10 de Octubre de 1992, siendo una de las agencias pioneras del sector en España. En Arawak Viajes actualmente planificamos, diseñamos y acompañamos a nuestros clientes a cualquier destino del mundo para disfrutar de actividades culturales y/o de senderismo. Arawak ofrece programas extensos de viajes dirigidos por guías profesionales que explicarán detalles de interés cultural y ambiental para conocer los lugares de destino en profundidad, estarán dotados de equipamientos tecnológicos de comunicación y orientación para dar el mejor servicio a nuestros clientes, darán atención personalizada para resolver dudas y proporcionarán asistencia en viaje en caso de necesidad. Arawak provee ocio y cultura para grupos de amigos y asociaciones, así como viajes privados, con todas las garantías (transporte, alojamiento, seguro adicional, vehículos de alquiler, actividades a la carta, etc.) a través de un gran equipo humano que trabaja exclusivamente para que nuestros clientes sientan tranquilidad, facilidad y seguridad en sus viajes. En Arawak se está en buenas manos. Contamos además con una amplia oferta de seguros de responsabilidad civil en caso de accidentes y repatriación. Arawak tiene oficinas en Madrid y Las Palmas de Gran Canaria y una página web para compra online. En nuestra web se encuentra toda la programación detallada por meses y destinos, así como las normas generales de nuestros viajes. Puedes encontrarnos en nuestras oficinas y en nuestros canales online.

Name: Visagov By BYTETRAVEL
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Sant Cugat Del Vallès, 15 Avenida Vía Augusta, 08174
Company description: More than 150 countries in the world require a visa to travel as as tourist or business.  Some procedures can be done online and some other require you to move to the embassy and consulate and wait in long queues. Get your travel visa in Visagov.com.  Fill our online form and get your visa in less than a week. We work closely with OTAS, Travel agencies, Airlines, Cruiselines and touroperators, trough our afffiliate, backend and API system.

Name: Timetravels Ltd
Company description: Timetravels Ltd is a Finnish tour operator and travel company, specialized in incoming/DMC activities, sports & fan travel and youth tourism. Our sports department provides value for Finnish fan tourism, supporting Finnish sports team (Ice Hockey and Volleyball) on their global travels. Our young adults (age 18-35) department organises budget friendly youth travel in Scandinavia, Lapland and is a helpful hand & long term partner for the Nordic, Scandinavian and Finnish universities in their travel portfolio. Our international team is on a mission to take the Finnish and Scandinavian tourism global. They work extensively with the Visit Finland & Sweden & Norway and Denmark and help global B2B companies with their travel portfolios. For our outstanding performance and constant commitment to customer orientation, we have been chosen to be the one and only official travel experience partner of Santa Claus.

Name: CK Kudrna
Company description: Naše cestovka jistě není největší a neznámější, jistě však v sobě skrývá daleko víc, než jen označení “cestovní kancelář”. Všechny akce se snažíme připravit tak, abyste nejen viděli a zažili maximum, ale taky aby byla možnost si zemi doopravdy prožít, ochutnat, přivonět, zastavit se, naladit se na vlnu nového poznání, srovnat zkušenosti s novými kamarádi a dát pravý význam nejen slovu “dovolená”, ale i “cesta”.  Jezdíme do celého světa a stále se snažíme nacházet nová zajímavá místa i způsoby jak vám přiblížit jiné kraje, hlavně proto, aby si člověk rozšířil obzory a lépe tak nalezl své místo na mapě světa. Cestovat se snažíme v maximální možné míře odpovědně vůči všem místním i hostům. Do světa blízkého i dalekého se vydáváme už od roku 1979 a za tu dobu se naše cestovka stala synonymem pro aktivní dovolenou. Mrkněte se na naši nabídku a když vás cokoliv zaujme, dejte nám vědět. Těšíme se na vás.

Name: Press & Swan S.p.A
Company description: Press & Swan S.p.A. Part of the Alpitour World is one of the major tourist groups that bring Italians on vacation abroad and has always been a specialist and leader on the Caribbean and the American Continent and now offers travel to new destinations but always with the approach of building your customized travel. Press & Swan S.p.A. it is a young, flexible and innovative company, but with a background of professional seriousness, solidity and experience, capable of satisfying the wishes and expectations of our customers. We are the leading Italian Tour Operator on Cuba (data certified by the Ministry of Tourism of Cuba and confirmed by sector research on the preference of Italian Travel Agents, source Travel Guide Observatory) and among the three favorites both by the Agency network and by the final consumer for Jamaica (number 1 in Italy in 2009), Mexico, Dominican Republic, Honduras, Antigua and now also Barbados, as well as for the main countries of the American continent. Set as default language

Name: ESky Romania
Company description: eSky is the Online Travel Agency that travellers love. Why? Because we tailor our products and services for our clients' needs better than any other online travel agency. That is just one of the superpowers eSky has been using to conquer the online travel markets of Poland, Romania, Bulgaria, Brazil, Peru, Turkey, Moldavia and Czech Republic.

Name: Riseday Ltd.
Company description: RISEDAY is an independent shipping company, operating river cruise holiday ships newly built Albertina, Princess Isabella, Princess Sisi and Princess Katharina and contributing to the European cruising. The management of both the technical and the hotel operations of the ships are carried out in house, as the knowledge and expertise of our company covers most of the facets of cruise ship management. Nowadays we are proud for our biggest accomplishment, newly built ship Albertina designed in Slovakia and provides the highest standards. In the last years, thousands of satisfied passengers have spent unforgettable week on board of our vessels. Our ships are refurbished and upgraded continuously to maintain in the highest standards of quality and service. Quite a number of regular guests as well as the steady growth of our company confirms to us that we have found the right recipe for our gest’s lovely holiday with our ships and their friendly crews. Being a relatively young company, RISEDAY has already built a worthy reputation for its professionalism and quality. Its longtime alliance with leading European tour operators, the Phoenix Reisen GMBH, has significantly strenghened its position in the European cruising market.

Name: Cinco Estrellas Club
HQ Location: Spain, Aragon, Zaragoza, 114 Avenida De Manuel Rodríguez Ayuso, 50012
Company description: Somos una empresa familiar con más de 30 años como touroperador vacacional ofreciendo un trato cercano con el deseo de ser el apoyo para las agencias de viajes.   En 5 Estrellas Club ofrecemos un producto basado en tres pilares: la experiencia & know-how de nuestro equipo, la confianza, gracias a nuestros proveedores, y nuestra vocación de servicio y flexibilidad.  Nuestros destinos estrella están en Oriente Medio con foco en Egipto, Turquía y Jordania, con un marcado componente cultural y donde somos referentes en el mercado.  Igualmente disponemos en un amplio abanico de destinos internacionales donde aplicamos la misma filosofía de producto de calidad y servicio. Costa Rica, Argentina, Perú, Cuba y USA en el continente americano, Bálticos, Rusia o Grecia en Europa e Indochina, Japón, Emiratos, Maldivas, India y Sri Lanka en Asia. Todos nuestros programas y productos tienen un mismo hilo conductor, acercar la cultura a las personas, transmitir valores de tolerancia y respeto hacia la diversidad cultural. Viajar va más allá de conocer un destino, es cultura, historia, arte, religión o gastronomía.  Desde 5 Estrellas Club tenemos el compromiso de construir un turismo más sostenible, tomando las decisiones adecuadas en la búsqueda del difícil equilibrio entre medioambiente, sociedad y economía y procurando generar un impacto positivo en las comunidades locales. Es necesario respetar y defender nuestro planeta y por ello trabajaremos alineados con los objetivos ODS y la RSC.

Name: CAMINO DE SANTIAGO RESERVAS
Company description: Camino de Santiago Reservas es una agencia de viajes y central de reservas especializada en el Camino de Santiago. Nuestra empresa nació en el año 2008, y desde entonces hemos estado trabajando para ofrecer a más de 55.000 clientes el mejor servicio.  Nuestros principales clientes son touroperadores, agencias de viajes, asociaciones, escuelas, familias, grandes y pequeños grupos, e individuales. A lo largo de estos años hemos participado como expositores en principales ferias de Turismo, FITUR 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 y 2020, 2023, 2024 (Madrid, España), FIT 2016 (Guarda, Portugal) y WTM 2016 (Londres, Reino Unido), ITB Berlín 2018, Holiday WS Dublín 2018 y otros. Nuestro objetivo principal es que el Camino de Santiago se convierta en una experiencia al alcance de todos. Queremos que nuestros clientes disfruten de un viaje diferente, lleno de sensaciones y aventuras que van más allá de los típicos destinos turísticos a los que todos están acostumbrados. Para ello, ofrecemos las principales formas organizadas en diferentes tramos y opciones de alojamiento. El Camino Francés, el Camino del Norte, el Camino Primitivo, el Camino Inglés, el Camino Portugués, el Camino de la Plata, el Camino Sanabria y el Camino Fisterra. Un total de 130 opciones diferentes con el mismo objetivo: disfrutar de un período de autodescubrimiento mientras se llega a conocer lugares nuevos y emocionantes y establecer amistades inolvidables. Ya sea que busque el confort y el placer de los Hoteles con Encanto o prefiera rodearse del ambiente clásico de peregrinación en Hostales, le ofrecemos la oportunidad de elegir el tipo de alojamiento que más le convenga. También tenemos una opción básica, Albergues Privados, que ofrecen comodidad y sencillez, así como una ubicación perfecta en las ciudades y pueblos. Además de las opciones para aquellos que prefieren realizar el Camino como un tour autoguiado, también ofrecemos la organización de visitas guiadas para grupos.

Name: Valencia Premium
HQ Location: Spain, Valencia, Valencia/valència, 67-4 Calle Del Turia, 46008
Company description: Valencia Premium offers an unparalleled tourist experience in the Region of Valencia, blending luxury with authenticity. Our network includes top-tier hotels, Michelin-starred restaurants, premier golf courses, upscale shops, and cultural attractions, ensuring a bespoke experience for discerning travelers. As a strategic partner for travel agencies and luxury tour operators, we guarantee unparalleled quality, personalization, and excellence in every service, establishing the region as a must-visit destination for high-end tourism.

Name: Club América Touroperador
Company description: Nuestro Touroperador mayorista de viajes te consigue los mejores viajes. Más de 25 años como mayorista en larga distancia, organizando grandes experiencias de turismo. Club América, Club Asia, Club África, Club Oriente y Club Oceania.

Name: VILLA VIATGES
Company description: Specialized travel agency with more than 25 years of experience in the world of travel. We are experts in vacation travel, business, events and incentives, honeymoon and family trips.

Name: IN TOURS PORTUGAL - DMC
HQ Location: Portugal, Leiria, Lote, Rua Cidade Tokushima, 2400-119
Company description: IN TOURS PORTUGAL, is a Destination Management Company (DMC) based in Portugal . As a local incoming travel agency for Portugal, Madeira and Azores, IN TOURS is specialized in groups and incentive travelling, granting you a close follow up of all your travel projects such as:  escorted  tours in Portugal, weekends in Lisbon and Oporto, thematic tours, leisure stays and cruisers on the Douro. Since 1995 we offer tailor made services, assist you 24 h by seven, and look for the best value for our clients. We will cooperate with you to offer an original and exclusive program Visit us on www.in-tours.com. Send us your request and let IN TOURS PORTUGAL guide you through a unique travel in this wonderful and warming country.

Name: Exit Reizen
Company description: Exit Reizen is al jarenlang dé gespecialiseerde touroperator voor reizen naar de Verenigde Staten en Canada. Sinds 1991 gingen reeds honderdduizenden tevreden reizigers via ons op reis.  Iedere rondreis die we aanbieden hebben we zelf gereisd. Zo hebben onze reisspecialisten de afgelopen twintig jaar ruim vierhonderd Amerika-reizen gemaakt. Wij kennen onze rondreizen dan ook als geen ander en voorzien u graag van onze persoonlijke tips voor wat betreft routes, excursies, bezienswaardigheden en zelfs goede restaurants!  Onze reizen zijn veelal goedkoper dan bij een 'normaal' reisbureau omdat wij ze zélf direct grootschalig inkopen en organiseren. Inkoopvolume direct naar de klant zorgt ervoor dat er geen overbodige commissies aan tussenpersonen (lees: reisbureaus, boekingssites) verloren gaan, oftewel 'value for money'. Wij werken online en telefonisch, tevens brengen wij geen reisbrochures uit; alles om uw droomvakantie zo voordelig mogelijk te kunnen aanbieden!  Op onze website www.exit-reizen.nl vindt u meer dan driehonderd reizen naar de Verenigde Staten en Canada, inclusief de meest actuele prijzen. Ook kunt u alleen huurauto’s of excursies boeken. Wilt u toch liever iets anders? Geen probleem! Laat ons uw wensen weten, wij stellen graag een vrijblijvend maatwerkvoorstel voor u samen. Meer informatie? Neem contact met ons op via tel. 0314 - 375666 of mail naar info@exit-reizen.nl.

Name: Krantas Travel
Company description: Company KRANTAS TRAVEL started its business in 1998. Now we are a team of 27 qualified and creative employees. The company has a network of offices in biggest Lithuanian cities - Vilnius, Kaunas and Klaipėda.  Our annual sales turnover amounts to EUR 8.4 mill. Therefore, today KRANTAS TRAVEL is one of the leading travel companies in Lithuania. In 2000 Krantas Travel became member of International Air Transport Association (IATA). In 2001 the enterprise became a part of Danish shipping corporation - DFDS. Activity KRANTAS TRAVEL is a tour operator and a travel agency that provides a wide range of tourism services. In the company’s offices our clients can purchase flight and ferry tickets, bus tickets, buy a trip to any country in the world, book hotel, rent a car or bus, get a travel insurance. INCOMMING: KRANTAS TRAVEL provides services for the foreign visitors who come to the Baltic states and offers various kinds of tours embracing Lithuania and other Baltic countries, Scandinavia and Russia. Besides standard bus tour packages, we also offer walking tours or trips by bicycles, business travel arrangements, incentives and conferences, transfers and other special orders. SHOREX: KRANTAS TRAVEL welcomes cruise ships calling port of Klaipeda and arranges sightseeing tours and other services for the passengers.

Name: Fruit Viaggi
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Caserta, Piazzetta Paul Harris Aversa, 81031
Company description: La Fruit Viaggi è un tour operator che nasce come ricettivista in tutto il bacino del mediterraneo. Corrispondente di molti tour operator internazionali, da diversi anni è presente nelle agenzie di viaggio con un prodotto Mare Italia, Ischia, Neve, Agriturismi e Croazia L’eccellenza e la professionalità del personale permettono alla Fruit Viaggi di diventare in breve tempo un punto di riferimento nella …costruzione e vendita di pacchetti turistici. Un’azienda sempre in crescita ed in continua evoluzione, contraddistinta da professionalità e competenza in fase di programmazione, nel rapporto con i fornitori e nella cura e l’assistenza al cliente finale. Una realtà tutta italiana a supporto del Trade nell’affascinante mondo delle vacanze

Name: Grupo Island Tours
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 33 Santa Cruz De Marcenado, 28015
Company description: Island Tours es el primer Tour Operador especialista en Islandia. IslandTours España nace en el año 2002 a partir de una agencia de viajes islandesa. También podemos ofrecerle extensiones desde Islandia a Groenlandia así como viajes a Nueva Zelanda y Alaska. Nuestra labor como especialistas en Islandia es la de asesorar la opción de viaje que mejor se adapte a sus gustos, ayudados por nuestros conocimientos de la isla. IslandTours posee más de 20 años de experiencia como especialistas en Islandia, por lo que el conocimiento del país es excelente. Este conocimiento nos permite asesorar de la mejor manera a nuestros clientes para aprovechar y disfrutas al máximo sus viajes. Por esto nuestros catálogos se confeccionan buscando la mejor calidad en los viajes, así como la mayor variedad en los mismos, existiendo siempre la posibilidad de realizar un viaje totalmente a la medida, si ninguno de nuestros programas se ajusta a sus necesidades.

Name: Top Euro Travel
Company description: Top Eurotravel Net is a Destination Management Company / Incoming Travel Agency established on the island of Rhodes. The Company possesses extensive destination knowledge, with expertise and resources providing services to Tour Operators, Travel Agents and Event Organizers on the Island of Rhodes and Kos. Former Europe Travel S.A.

Name: Rhodos Tours Traveland Kos Ltd.
Company description: Incoming Travel Agency co-operating with European Tour Operators , Congree organizer  and Incentive /Group travel expert.

Name: OriCon
Company description: We here at OriCon have a clear mission statement: "Assist our customers in achieving their goals by providing the best-in-class service for the travel industry". A simple statement, but one that clearly says what we do, no nonsense! Our consultants all have an extensive background in the travel industry. Our domains of expertise are amongst others project management online travelsite implementations and mid office systems, development of custom travel tools on all major GDSs, integration of online booking engines, search engine optimization, travel policy creation, ... We're also active in integrating the travel offerings with the newest social media offerings, integrating applications on Facebook, etc. Our strength comes from hands-on experience at the leading industry players as our consultants come from the wide spectrum of major players, ranging from leisure and corporate travel agencies to GDS. All this experience is put to work when your projects are managed by OriCon, be it small or large-scale. We invite you to learn more about the different core areas of expertise and we hope to be working on one of your projects in the near future.

Name: 5vorFlug GmbH
Company description: 5vorFlug is one of the largest last-minute tour operators in the German-speaking market. The focus of its worldwide offer is on bookings up to 42 days before departure.  The specialist offers up to one billion travel offers to over 80 countries on a daily basis. The portfolio includes holiday destinations around the Mediterranean Sea, such as Turkey, Greece, Spain and Italy, long-haul travels to Asia, the Caribbean and the USA, city trips and flight-only solutions. 5vorFlug is part of the FTI GROUP, the fourth largest tour operator in Europe. Headquartered in Munich, the FTI GROUP employs 10,000 staff worldwide. It achieved sales volumes of 3,6 billion euros in the fiscal year 2017/18 and serviced seven million customers.

Name: Inter-Connect GmbH
Company description: Inter-Connect GmbH repräsentiert seit über 30 Jahren von unserem Hauptsitz in München und dem Standort in Zürich internationale Reedereien wie Princess Cruises, Carnival Cruise Line, P&O, Celestyal etc. im deutschsprachigen und europäischen Markt. Als erfahrener Reiseveranstalter bieten wir ein globales Netzwerk und umfassende Dienstleistungen.

Name: Nickes.Com - Sport & Concert Trips
Company description: Nickes.Com was founded by Managing Director Niklas Hellberg in Sweden 1997. The company went Limited in 2001. Nickes.Com is a Swedish company but are also represented in The UK. We organise package tours to sporting and entertainment events worldwide. Over the years we have arranged packages to everything from lower league football matches to World Cups and Olympics. As a reward for our reliability, efficiency and willingness to go the extra mile for our customers Nickes.Com were selected as an official Tour Operators in Sweden for the 2010 World Cup in South Africa.  We offer basic packages with tickets and accommodation but can also assist with transports, airport transfers, restaurant bookings, activities, organise conferences at major sporting venues, training camps, Stag /Hen Nights and much more. We market ourselves under the name Nickes.Com.  Nickes.Com Datorgatan 3 561 33 Huskvarna Sweden  Tel: 0046 (0) 36 - 14 14 43  Fax: 0046 (0) 36 - 39 69 29  E-mail: info@nickes.com

Name: K3 Travel
Company description: K3 TRAVEL - Scandinavia's smartest business travel.  K3 Travel takes your business travels to a whole new smooth, professional and personal level. You choose in what extent you wish to have our help. With two different services that offer several different solutions, we find the right help for you and your company.  AFFÄRSRESEBYRÅN by K3 Travel  Here we collect all the services you need to book, administer and gain control of the entire company's travel. The business travel agency helps you with all the company's travels in a personal and professional way, as business travel should be.  HOTEL EXPRESS by K3 Travel  Hotel Express is our hotel booking concept. Here we help you who live a lot in hotels. With Hotel Express, you get access to the industry's widest range of contract hotels. All nights are also bonus-based.

Name: Animax Animazione
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Jesolo, Via Cesare Battisti, 30016
Company description: Animax collaborates with important tour operators, hotel chains and international resorts in Italy and abroad. Our goal is to surprise our guests by creating a tailor-made entertainment proposal for each partner structure. We like to invest in training and team building We offer numerous job opportunities to established professionals as well as young enthusiasts who want to be part of the tourism, hospitality and entertainment industry. We are committed to improving business standards to ensure a healthy, satisfying and dynamic working environment. Our goal is to retain more and more resources over time transmit the corporate appearance and we do so by providing a service not only seasonal but 365 days a year, at the sea, in the mountains in Italy and abroad. We are committed to the transmission of values such as transparency, collaboration and professionalism.

Name: Greeking.me
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Athens, 35 Syngrou Avenue Kallithea, 11743
Company description: Greeking.me is a boutique travel agency specializing in crafting bespoke journeys to Greece and Italy, tailored for discerning travelers from across the globe. Since our inception, we've been dedicated to transforming travel dreams into unforgettable adventures, combining cultural immersion, luxury, and unparalleled service. With expertise in curating private tours, unique experiences, and seamless itineraries, we focus on authentic connections to the destinations we serve. From the iconic landmarks of Greece to the enchanting towns of Italy, every journey is designed with precision, reflecting our clients' preferences, travel styles, and aspirations. Our team of passionate local experts ensures every detail is handled with care, from accommodations and transportation to exclusive activities. Rated "Excellent" by hundreds of travelers, Greeking.me is more than a travel agency — we are your gateway to exploring Greece and Italy with insider knowledge and a personal touch.

Name: Telenordi
HQ Location: Lithuania, Vilnius, Vilnius, 7 Piliakalnio St., lt-06229
Company description: TELENORDI is a professional contact centre that provides services to clients from Lithuania and other countries 24 x 7 in 8 languages. We have experience in executing various customer care, telemarketing and help desk / technical support projects.  We have Scandinavian business approach to business. Our core values: satisfied clients, high-quality services and respect for employees. We are experienced professionals, guarantee transparency, do our best to build up a long-term relationship with TELENORDI clients.  We provide customer care service in 9 languages: English, Russian, Lithuanian, Latvian, Estonian, Swedish, Finnish, German, Polish languages.  TELENORDI has a big experience in customer support of on-line travel agencies, airline industry companies, e-shops.

Name: Fit Reisen
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 28 Ferdinand-happ-str., 60314
Company description: Fit Reisen ist ein Reiseveranstalter für Gesundheits- und Wellnessreisen mit Sitz in Frankfurt am Main und Hamburg. Mit unserem hochwertigen, vielfältigen Angebot und individuellem Service haben wir uns als Marktführer in diesem Segment etabliert.
