Bereits vor über 50 Jahren wurde Fit Reisen als Kur-Reiseveranstalter von Herbert Haum gegründet - mit einem damals völlig neuartigen Konzept: Im Mittelpunkt des Programms stand der gesunde Urlaub mit attraktiven Schönheits-, Fitness- und Freizeitangeboten für eine bessere Lebensqualität. Der Gast sollte nicht nur gesund urlauben, sondern sich dabei vor allem wohlfühlen.  Seither hat sich Fit Reisen auf dem deutschen Markt zum Marktführer von Wellness- und Gesundheitsreisen entwickelt. Über 400 Hotels auf der ganzen Welt bieten den Urlaubern alles was es zum Wohlfühlen und Erholen braucht. Von Fangokuren in Italien, Yoga und Ayurveda in Indien und Sri Lanka, klassische Kuren in Tschechien, Ungarn und Polen, Wellness Wochenenden in Deutschland, Fastenkuren in Bayern, Aktiv-Reisen mit Wandern und Nordic Walking bis hin zum Luxus-Wellnessurlaub auf Mauritius. Job gesucht? Wir suchen stets kluge und engagierte Köpfe, die Lust haben mit uns zu wachsen.  Aktuelle Stellenausschreibungen: https://www.fitreisen.de/group/de/karriere/stellenangebote/

Name: Carnect
Company description: Car rental. Your way.   Carnect is a leading car rental distribution specialist working worldwide with a portfolio of over 150 car rental suppliers. Through Carnect's class-leading technology and intelligent solutions, our clients (OTAs, Bedbanks, Tour Operators, Travel Agencies and membership organisations) are able to access a massive range of car rental content, adapted to their individual requirements.  Carnect was founded in Hamburg in 1999 as MicronNexus GmbH and is part of Hotelbeds Group. We are a leader in delivering tailored and fully managed solutions to grow your car rental profits. Our focus is simple: providing your customers with the right car, in the right place, at the right price.

Name: ADAC Mittelrhein E.V.
Company description: Wir sind einer von 18 Regionalclubs des Allgemeinen Deutsche Automobil-Club e. V., kurz ADAC. Ob am Hauptsitz in Koblenz oder in den Geschäftsstellen und Reisebüros in Mainz, Trier, Bad Kreuznach und Idar-Oberstein – wir bieten unseren Mitgliedern und Kunden Rat und Schutz in allen Fragen der Mobilität und des Reisens. Unsere Mitarbeiter sind für jedes einzelne unserer rund 745.000 Mitglieder mit Herzblut da, immer vertrauenswürdig und persönlich, ob in der Geschäftsstelle oder im Reisebüro, telefonisch oder im Internet. Wir beraten unsere Mitglieder und Kunden zu unseren Leistungen und Produkten und verwirklichen in unseren Reisebüros ihren Traumurlaub. Mit vielseitigen touristischen Projekten und unserer Expertise im Bereich Mobilität engagieren wir uns außerdem für die innovative Weiterentwicklung unserer Region. Auch im Motorsport sind wir aktiv: Wir fördern den Breitensport und veranstalten selbst spannende und internationale Motorsport-Events in der Region, auch im eSports-Bereich. Neugierig? Kommen Sie einfach in einer unserer Geschäftsstellen vorbei, rufen Sie uns an oder besuchen Sie uns online auf adac.de/mittelrhein.  Außerdem: Wir suchen Profis, die mit Leidenschaft für ihre Ideen brennen, Teamarbeit leben und Innovationen vorantreiben. Ist unser Funke bei Ihnen übergesprungen? Dann nehmen Sie mit uns Kontakt auf und bewerben Sie sich: https://karriere.adac.de   Impressum: www.adac.de/der-adac/regionalclubs/rheinland-pfalz/impressum/ Infopflicht:  https://www.adac.de/-/media/pdf/adac-regionalclubs/mittelrhein/20220523_datenschutzinformation-adac-mittelrhein.pdf

Name: Haman Travel
Company description: As one of the most experienced incoming tour operators in the Nordics, we combine decades of expertise with a passion for creating travel experiences. We are part of Haman Group, based in the heart of Scandinavia.  Looking for a local partner in Scandinavia? Let's work together! Contact us today.

Name: Uemura - Travel & Leisure Social Network
HQ Location: Cyprus, Nicosia, Nicosia, 12 John Kennedy Avenue, 1065
Company description: Uemura is a travel agency and Social Network. Without fees, not extra expenses, and you have an assistant to manage your account if you want it. And what's better: this is not only perfect for you but for your travelers, because we provide them with the tools to organize their leisure time. Check our videos and discover the future tourism & leisure trips.

Name: Topflight Holidays
Company description: Topflight is a wholly Irish-owned company run by Tony Collins, Managing Director, and Carmel O’Reilly, Director. It is 100% bonded and secure, with staff working from the company’s Head Office in Dublin and a full team of winter and summer representatives based in resort.  The company has been voted Best Winter Ski Tour Operator for the last 17 years at the Irish Travel Trade News Awards as well as Best Winter Ski Tour Operator for the last 8 years at the Northern Ireland Travel Awards. Other awards include Best Winter Ski Tour Operator at the inaugural ITAA Awards in January 2011 and Best Ski Tour Operator at the Consumer Awards in 2009.  Building on the company’s philosophy of providing quality, service and value to its customers, Topflight introduced new Ski Bundle packages to its 2011-12 programme. Particularly suited to improvers, intermediate and advanced skiers who do not require tuition, these include accommodation, flights, transfers, local lift pass and standard skis/snowboard and boots – all the requirements for a great ski or snowboard holiday in one great value, convenient package.  The company enjoys a high level of repeat bookings with its clients who travel in complete confidence, knowing that their holidays are secure, fully bonded and represent great value.

Name: Pixie Animazione
Company description: La Pixie Animazione nasce dall’ idea di Andrea Fedi e Lorenza Boldura che dopo aver girato il mondo lavorando nei villaggi con i più prestigiosi tour operator decidono di creare un prodotto qualitativamente elevato per soddisfare le esigenze di ogni tipo di clientela.Affidabilità, competenza e creatività sono solo alcuni dei principi che animano la filosofia di questo progetto che parte dal desiderio di distinguersi per innovazione e qualità. Grossa attenzione, vista la sempre maggior richiesta, viene rivolta ai più piccoli con programmi e divertimenti organizzati da professionisti del settore. La nostra agenzia si occupa direttamente della selezione del personale attraverso colloqui conoscitivi in cui vengono valutate le doti comunicative, le capacità relazionali, i comportamenti e successivamente attraverso stage di formazione in cui ogni nostro collaboratore riceve una formazione professionale a 360 gradi. Infine ci preme ricordare che noi della pixie animazione ci prefiggiamo di offrire sempre un servizio di qualità per trasformare ogni singolo attimo della vacanza in un momento indimenticabile

Name: Xcape Viajes | Grupo Xcape
Company description: Somos Xcape, la agencia de viajes para estudiantes mas TOP del país.  Con más de 15 años de experiencia en España, vivimos cada viaje con la misma emoción que vivimos nuestro primer viaje.  Trabajamos 24/7 para que tu viaje se convierta en la mejor experience de tu vida. Welcome to Xcape, welcome to the movement.

Name: CK Elixír Tours
Company description: CK Elixír Tours...specialista na sportovní pobyty pro ženy, pohádkové Seychely, kouzelný Mauricius a další vanilkové ostrovy.  Cestovní kancelář Elixír tours vznikla jako přirozený vývoj Elixír studia pro zdravý pohyb a životosprávu. Elixír studio® je známý propagátor zdravého životního stylu, specialista na pilates a zdravá záda. Pohyb, zdravá výživa, psychická pohoda a schopnost relaxovat…  To je elixír, který v  Elixír studiu® mícháme již osm let. A protože pro své milé klientky a příznivce chceme jen to nejlepší z nejlepšího, řekli jsme si – jasně, pojďme toho!  Pojďme cestovat, objevovat svět, těšit se ze života. Představujeme Vám  cestovní kancelář CK ELIXÍR TOURS, která je jedinečná tím, že pořádá skupinové relaxační a cvičební pobyty v ČR i zahraničí, ale hlavně dokáže vykouzlit individuální zájezd na pohádkové Seychely, kouzelný Mauricius či další vanilkové ostrovy!  Díky perfektní znalosti prostředí je naše cestovní kancelář unikátní v organizaci a přípravě cesty na tyto překrásné ostrovy. Splníme Vaše sny o exkluzivní dovolené a dopřejeme Vám luxus za mimořádně příznivé ceny...    Toužíte po dokonalé svatbě? Uspořádáme Vám svatbu nebo svatební cestu na jeden z vanilkových ostrovů! Připojíte-li se k nám ve skupinovém zájezdu se cvičením, čeká Vás skvělá parta příznivců zdravého pohybu a lektoři z Elixír studia® - www.elixirstudio.cz Více o jedinečných - cenově výhodných zájezdech - najdete na www.elixirtours.cz.

Name: FRACTAL S.r.o.
Company description: Jsme přední česká cestovní kancelář s 30 letou zkušeností na trhu. Zajistíme vám kompletní cestovní služby na míru do celého světa: letenky, ubytování, pojištění, rent a car, víza, jízdenky, vstupenky, incentiva, kulturní a sportovní akce. Specializujeme se na korporátní klientelu a zajišťujeme kompletní cestovní servis na míru po celém světě. Nabízíme unikátní online rezervační systém letenek – www.smartterminal.cz. Rezervujte letenky ve svém mobilu nebo tabletu. Pohodlně, rychle, na cestách, kdekoli.  V aplikaci SmartTerminal máte vše na jednom místě. Stáhnete jednoduše do vašeho mobilu přímo tady. Váš tým Fractal

Name: Échappée Nord
Company description: Échappée Nord est une agence de voyage spécialisée dans les voyages faits sur-mesure en Norvège, Suède et Finlande. Que vous soyez roots, vacancier, baroudeur ou slow traveler, nous sommes prêts à relever le défi de vos envies et à vous faire vivre un voyage à la hauteur de ces pays : extraordinaire.

Name: TRAVELNET Reisevarehuset AS
HQ Location: Norway, Sør-trøndelag, Trondheim, 7-9 Thomas Angells Gate
Company description: TRAVELNET Reisevarehuset er et fullservice reisebyrå, forretning- og feriereiser. Kontakt oss på 73884100 eller ordre@reisevarehuset.no. Hos oss får du alt på ett sted: fly, cruise, hotell, leiebil, restaurant, sightseeing -anbefalinger. Vi har vært der! Våre 29 ansatte har et snitt på 15 års erfaring i bransjen. Hos oss er kunden alltid i fokus! Gjennom en helhetlig oversikt over våre kunders reiser og reisepolicy vil vi alltid kunne foreslå den beste løsningen ut fra kundens behov. Velkommen hos oss!

Name: Emerald Elite Group
Company description: Emerald Elite Group is a leading tour operator specializing in the UK, Ireland and Italy.  Founded in 2004 we are among the top tour operators leading the way in luxury travel to Britain and Ireland. Our key areas of expertise are; - Leisure travel to UK, Ireland & Italy. - Golf travel to Ireland, Scotland, England & Wales. Guaranteed Old Course St. Andrew's tee times available. Authorised Travel Provided for The Open. - Group travel to UK, Ireland & Italy. Whatever your reasons for visiting UK, Ireland & Italy, you can rest assured you're in capable hands. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, the culture, the history, the music, the scenery, the golf, or just a little bit of everything, we'll make sure your time spent here is time well spent. We work closely with travel agents from Ensemble, Virtuoso, Signature and American Express. The most popular types of request we receive are for Group, FITs and Multi-generational travel. We are members of IGTOA, IAGTO and ASTA.

Name: Stardekk
Company description: Stardekk is a dynamic company specializing in online hotel booking services, operating under the umbrella of the Emerging Travel Group. With a vast portfolio of over a million listings across 220 countries and territories, Stardekk caters to a diverse clientele that includes independent travelers, travel agencies, and corporate clients. The company's mission is to simplify the travel experience by providing an easy-to-use platform that leverages advanced technology to enhance search capabilities and customer service. Stardekk's vision is to make travel dreams a reality by offering affordable accommodation options ranging from hotels to hostels and apartments. By facilitating flexible payment systems and providing robust support services, Stardekk aims to increase bookings for properties of all sizes, from large hotel chains to small private establishments, while advertising across multiple markets in various languages.

Name: Vola.ro
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, No. 25-29 Decebal Boulevard, 030964
Company description: We are the Vola.ro team, the most trusted online travel agency in Romania, according to the Mercury Study Research in 2024. We are the biggest and fastest growing online travel agency, servicing business and independent customers with airline tickets, hotel bookings, holiday packages, traveling insurance and rent-a-car services. 9 out of 10 Romanian travelers have heard of Vola.ro, making us the online agency with the highest degree of recognition in the country. Our customers are always happy and very happy with our services because we have a very professional working atmosphere, combined with friendly and warm assistance that makes us irresistible at what we’re doing. In more than 18 years of activity, our only constant drive is the passion for traveling. We changed offices, tech platforms, we evolved from paper plane tickets to electronic ones, from bank transfers to bitcoin payments, but the passion for travel is deep in our DNA.  Our team mission is to offer a unique customer experience. The technologies we use, combined with our vision, awarded us with The Most Trusted Online Travel Agency in 2017, 2019 and 2024, The Best Online Booking Website in 2016, Excellent Customer Service 2015 and the Company with the Biggest Growth in Central and Eastern Europe in the last 5 years, in 2013.  As an employer brand, we value attributes such as determination, originality, and innovation, hereby maintaining our position as The Number One Online Travel Agency in Romania.

Name: Athos Hellas Group Of Companies
Company description: Athos Hellas Leading tourism organization in Northern Greece Established in 1988 in Thessaloniki, Athos Hellas has grown to become the largest tourism organization in Northern Greece. We offer a comprehensive range of travel services, including thoughtfully designed holiday packages, aiming to provide quality services at competitive prices. Our experienced team is dedicated to creating exceptional travel experiences that cater to the diverse needs of our clients. At Athos Hellas, we are committed to delivering high-quality travel solutions that exceed expectations, ensuring memorable journeys for all our clients.

Name: Travel Agency Dr. Tigges GmbH - Business Travel And More
Company description: Business travel From planning to booking to invoicing your business travel - we offer you professional management and cost control of all services from a single source, so that you can concentrate on the essentials: your own business.   With our many years of experience and individual, customer-oriented service, you benefit to the fullest extent - with the focus always on showing you the best rates, conditions and potential savings. Private travel We design your holiday - the most beautiful time of the year - unforgettable and according to your wishes. Whether it's a package tour, an individually designed tour, a cruise or a city break.   As a tour operator-independent travel agency chain, we offer you the programmes of all well-known tour operators. This gives you a clear overview, competent advice and the best possible prices!

Name: AurumTours GmbH
Company description: Vielfältig, kreativ, individuell - das ist AurumTours. Wir sind ein deutscher Reiseveranstalter mit Sitz in München und Leipzig. Langjährige Reiseexpertise, neuartige Systemtechnologien und innovative Ideen bestimmen den Zeitgeist des Unternehmens. Alle Reisen werden in Echtzeit ("dynamic packaging") zusammengestellt. Ein hoher Grad an Servicequalität und rechtliche Sicherheit für unsere Kund*innen stehen an oberster Stelle. AurumTours setzt damit neue Maßstäbe für individuelles Reisen.

Name: Wolters Rundreisen GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Stuhr, 61 Bremer Str., 28816
Company description: Over 100 years of experience, Wolters Rundreisen GmbH, based in Stuhr near Bremen, is your specialist for perfectly organised round trips. You can find our wide range of tours at wolters-rundreisen.de. In addition to the online portals, all Wolters Rundreisen offers can be booked in over 8,000 travel agencies. Wolters Rundreisen GmbH is a member of the e-hoi Group.

Name: Fit Reisen Group
Company description: Since 1975, the Fit Reisen Group has been offering tours with a special focus on health. The offers for health-conscious customers are enriched with professional beauty, activity and leisure elements. With seven brands, 1,500 hotels and 10,000 programmes, the Fit Reisen Group is the number one in the growing health tourism market and ranks among the top 50 tour operators. In addition to Fit Reisen, the international brand SpaDreams, the online portal Kurz-mal-weg.de, Yoga Escapes, Aytour, Lotus Travel and Tripz also belong to the corporate group.

Name: Bulgaria Holidays
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Sofia-capital, Sofia, 9-11 Kn. Maria Louisa, fl.2
Company description: Bulgaria Holidays is a licensed Bulgarian tour operator, an IAGTO member since 2009.Expanding our business in the last 3 years led to establishing of 4 different departments: ·          Bulgaria Holidays Hotels & Resorts ·          Bulgaria Holidays Sport Department ·          Bulgaria Holidays Property Management ·          Bulgaria Holidays Travel Services  Under the brand Bulgaria Holidays Hotels & Resorts the company manages 4 hotels, an apart hotel and a golf resort in the region of Bansko and Razlog with total capacity more than 1000 beds

Name: Tripical Ferðaskrifstofa
Company description: Við urðum til árið 2015, þó svo að hugmyndin um okkur hafi verið til lengur. Með nýjum áfangastöðum, öðruvísi ferðalögum og ferskri nálgun á ferðaþjónustu bjóðum við Íslendingum að upplifa eitthvað alveg nýtt. Við höfum vaxið hratt og örugglega síðan við byrjuðum. Við bjóðum ævintýraförum okkar upp á góða og persónulega þjónustu, með megin áherslu á að setja upp ævintýraferðir, hreyfiferðir og hópaferðir fyrir fjölskyldur, fyrirtæki og skólahópa Það eiga allir sína drauma, þeir eru bara misstórir. Tripical er fersk ferðaskrifstofa sem hjálpar ævintýragjörnum ferðalöngum að láta drauma sína rætast, sama hver stærðargráðan er. Tripical útfærir og skipuleggur ferðir fyrir þá sem njóta þess að fara á nýja staði, kynnast annars konar menningu, smakka nýjan mat og upplifa annað umhverfi. Við erum í raun bara með eitt markmið: að gera ferðalagið þitt að ógleymanlegu ævintýri. Á tímum hnattvæðingar verður heimurinn sífellt minni og minni og það verður stöðugt einfaldara að ferðast. Stundum snýst þetta bara um að kýla á hlutina, hoppa upp í vél og halda á vit ævintýranna. Við hjá Tripical erum ævintýragjörn, uppátækjasöm og við elskum að ferðast. Við viljum nálgast íslenska ferðaþjónustu á alveg nýjan hátt og hjálpa fólki að láta alla sína villtustu ferðadrauma rætast. Þess vegna erum við svo miklu meira en bara ferðaskrifstofa, við erum ævintýramiðlun. Hafir þú áhuga á ótrúlegri lífsreynslu og að skapa minningar sem endast hafðu þá samband við okkur og við setjum saman draumaferðina. Þú getur sent okkur skilaboð, hringt í okkur eða komið við á skrifstofum okkar í Borgartúni 8.

Name: Marina Travel Ehf
Company description: Marina Travel is a local Destination Management Company and travel agency in Iceland providing day tours, multiple-day tours, private tours, group tours, activities, etc. We also organise company incentive trips, MICE, and more. We strive to showcase the best of Iceland to our guests. Iceland is a country where fire meets ice and it is our mission to enable our guests to experience the wonders of our nature. Our tours bring guests to our amazing and beautiful landscapes, to experience unique activities, and to learn about our interesting culture and history. We do honest business, providing reliable and personal services to our guests. It is very important to us that we provide value for money services tour clients and we share our knowledge of Iceland with our business partners to empower them to introduce Iceland to guests from all over the world. Founded in 2014, all our drivers and guides are locals who know Iceland on their fingertips. We have coaches, minibuses, super jeeps and luxury vehicles. We want to share this love that we have for our land and at the same time, we want to share the message of protecting the earth with as many people as possible.

Name: ATHENS EXPRESS S.A.
Company description: Athens Express (S.A), established in 1946,is one of the first tour operators in Greece.  In its seven decades of successful operation, the company has expanded its reach to travel professionals outside Greece, offering superior travel-related products to agents all over the world.  Today, Athens Express is one of the most successful tour operators in the European Community.  The company also maintains a prominent presence in South America, both in the Spanish-speaking countries and Brazil.   More recently it has expanded its clientele to include travel professionals in emerging markets such as China and India.  Athens Express also has a developing presence in the USA and Canada. Recognizing emerging trends, Athens Express has developed a modern, user-friendly, on-line reservation and booking system.  Member travel agents use it to access a wide range of travel products such as hotel accommodation, sightseeing tours, cruises and transfers.  The online system functions as a convenient "one-stop shop" giving the end user the independence and flexibility to customize travel packages according to needs of their clients.  The system is accessible only to travel professionals who have registered with the company.  Athens Express SA is committed to maintaining its superior professional services while offering products with good value for money.

Name: ON TOUR - Tour Operator
Company description: Tour Operator / Travel Agency We are the biggest national tourism sales network, covering more than a 180 cities and towns in Bulgaria with around 330 direct sales and service points. Outgoing and incoming tourism activity. Max100 ltd.  - Tourism brand Europe Board of Directors and  Co-founder of  'National Tourism Association' Bulgaria.

Name: Aukana Travel
Company description: Aukana Travel es una agencia de viajes mayorista especializada en el viaje a medida de larga distancia, especialmente Estados Unidos y sobre todo Asia, aunque también aprovecharemos nuestra larga experiencia en destinos como Australia o África entre otros. Tratamos de ofrecer una buena selección hotelera y un producto de calidad, pero sin olvidarnos que el precio es importante. Por ello tratamos de tener en mente lo que en marketing  llaman “Value for Money”. Nuestro objetivo no es otro que darles un buen servicio y ayudarles en cuanto necesiten de manera personalizada. La profesionalidad y la ilusión de todo el engranaje de Aukana Travel son las herramientas que usamos para la confección de un viaje a la medida de sus necesidades, teniendo en cuenta para ello, la mejor selección de destinos y alojamientos, y de proveedores en los que depositamos nuestra plena confianza. Asimismo, les deseamos que con su viaje, vean cumplido el mejor de sus sueños.

Name: Seatravel A/S
Company description: Seatravel is a danish-based travel agency that specializes in boating holiday in Europe and Yacht Charter worldwide. We have several years of experience in the business and have developed a unique knowledge about the different kinds of "holiday on the water".  We have clients from all over Europe and as main agents for some of the world's largest and most competent yacht charter companies. Therefore we are able to find the perfect boat to suit the client needs and wants. Seatravel is a company that places great emphasis on personal contact with the customers - in that way we are able to give our customers the best advice in the choice of everything concerning the client's holiday on the water. Our own and many travel experiences on a yacht charter we happily share with our customers, so they can enjoy an unforgettable sailing holiday.

Name: Prestige Car Limousine Milano
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 8 Via Silvio Peillico, 20121
Company description: Prestige Car Limousine with all its experience and professionalism is specialised in hired chauffeured driven vehicles.  We offer a high class limousine service for our clients home and abroad in luxury cars that are full of comfort with a driver that takes care of all your travel requirements and personal needs.  It is for this reason PCL has a national and international cliental base ranging from the world of business to the private sector, finance to high fashion and also collaborating with high end tour operators.  Prestige Car Limousine gives you a 24 hours service with a fleet of new registration luxurious cars to ensure and guaranty our customers a comfortable and secure journey at all times. Prestige Car Limousine Milano, offre ai suoi Clienti, un servizio esclusivo e di lusso per quanto concerne il noleggio di autovetture con autista: trasferimenti nazionali e all'estero; transfer aeroportuali; road show; auto a disposizione; city tour; matrimoni; eventi sportivi e di rappresentanza; servizio autista.  Il nostro servizio Ncc opera su Milano e su tutto il territorio italiano ed europeo, grazie ad una vasta e consolidata collaborazione con le più importanti società di noleggio con conducente.  Offriamo un servizio di noleggio con autista 24/h, 365 giorni all'anno; non esitate a contattarci per qualsiasi informazione. Prestige Car Limousine, со всем своим опытом и профессионализмом, специализируется в аренде автомобилей с водителем. Мы предлагаем услуги высокого класса, в передвижениях наших Клиентов, как в Италии, так и за границей, на автомобиле со всевозможными опциями.

Name: Estravel Latvia
Company description: The company Estravel Latvia is the branch of the biggest travel agency in the Baltic States – Estravel AS Group, and a member of Estravel group of companies operating in Estonia, Latvia. Lithuania, Australia, Finland and united States of America The company operates over 20 years in Latvian market – founded in 27 November 1996 (as the agency Norvista Rīga). The branch office of the Estonian company Estravel A/S in Latvia Estravel Latvia belongs to the network of the traditional travel agencies and tour operators and offers full range of travel-related services for out bound and inbound clients.  Our direct cooperation partners are world-wide recognized airline, ferry, cruise, railway, and car rental companies, and other transportation organizations, as well as the hotels, conference and event centres, resorts,  catering companies, etc. The annual sales volume of the group enterprises exceeds 150 million EUR. International partnership of Estravel Latvia:    American Express Global Business Travel – Partner Licence    IATA (International Air Transport Association)    ALTA (Association of Latvian Travel and Operators Agents)    ECTAA (European Travel Agents ́ and Tour Operators ́Association) ASTA - American Society of Travel Agents LCB - Latvian Convention Bureau LTRK - Latvian Chamber of Commerce Swiss Chamber of Commerce in Latvia

Name: Ecco Reisen
Company description: Ecco-Reisen GmbH is a German tour operator specialized in offering cultural and beach holiday packages. The company is currently contracted with almost 10,000 hotels and is flying from all major airports in Germany. Our packages are offered in travel retail shops, online portals and our website. We focus mainly on Mediterranean destinations and we are continuously expanding our portfolio. Taking into consideration our most important commitment, which is our friendly and professional customer care services.

Name: CANARIA TRAVEL Spol. S R.o.
Company description: Cestovní kancelář Canaria travel je jediným českým specialistou na španělské souostroví v Atlantském oceánu. Kanárské ostrovy známe jako nikdo jiný a v rozsahu služeb, které jsme na nich schopni pro naše klienty zajistit, nemáme na trhu konkurenci. Letos oslavíme již 20. výročí a jsme právem hrdi na to, že každý týden s námi několikrát týdně létají klienti za sluncem a pohodou tamních pláží, sportem i relaxací. Zařídíme i pro Vás přesně takovou dovolenou, jakou si přejete. Pokud budete chtít, můžete maximálně ušetřit, nebo si naopak dopřát dokonalý luxus. Kromě individuálních cest nabízíme i skupinové a firemní zájezdy, tematické dovolené nebo sportovní soustředění. Cestují s námi školní výpravy i senioři. Vezmeme Vás na Kanáry za golfem, rybařením, potápěním, kondičním cvičením, nebo si prostě jen odpočinout. Budeme to my, kdo se přizpůsobí. Ušijeme Vám zájezd na míru. Kvalitu našich služeb potvrzuje skutečnost, že naše zájezdy prodává přes 1.400 cestovních kanceláří v České republice (např. ČEDOK a.s., INVIA.CZ, s.r.o., Agentura Zájezdy.cz, Thomas Cook s.r.o atd.) a desítky dalších na Slovensku i v Polsku. Za obchodní spolupráci s našimi partnery jsme získali řadu ocenění. Na vysněnou dovolenou létají naši klienti vždy jedním z moderních letadel Boeing 737 či Airbus A320 soukromé letecké společnosti Travel Service, a.s. (ta od roku 2004 provozuje i nízkonákladovou leteckou společnost Smart Wings a od roku 2007 rozšířila portfolio svých služeb o provozování privátních letů - aerotaxi kategorie Business Jet). Travel Service má letos za sebou 17. let úspěšné existence a my se chlubíme tím, že jsme jedním z jeho spoluzakladatelů. Komplexní služby od nás samozřejmě čekejte i na Kanárech. Naše delegátky ostrovy dokonale znají, protože na nich trvale žijí. Zkušeně a profesionálně Vám poradí a pomohou, kdykoli se na ně obrátíte. Najdou pro Vás nejvhodnější pláže, poradí místa k potápění nebo surfování, zařídí všechno, co bude v jejich silách.

Name: Ecotravel Lda.
Company description: Ecotravel is one of the leading Portuguese Incoming Tour Operator and D.M.C. Founded in 2007, we are focused in developing charming and luxury travel experiences, providing group and tailor-made private tours in Portugal. Our dedicated travel team has the expertise, creativity and know-how to design and manage a successful program regardless of your budget and destination. Ecotravel has undergone rapid international expansion and therefore we segmented our business into three main areas, in order to provide the best travel experience: - Tours in Portugal (www.ecotoursportugal.com): we organize the best charming and cultural tours. We organize group tours and customized private tours in Portugal. We have a strong presence in 7 countries, including Spain, Brazil, USA and UK, France and German. - Incentives Portugal (www.incentives-portugal.com): we create original experiences that inspire people, motivate teams and grow business. We design Incentive Travel Programs, we organize Team Building Activities and we plan and manage all kind of events. Our corporate programs fit the needs, goals and budget of any Company. - Douro Cruises (www.cruzeiros-douro.pt/en/): we have the largest offer of Douro Cruises and our online booking is easy and affordable: see what´s available and book instantly with a lowest price guarantee. In recognition to the quality of our services, responsibility and trust, we won the National Prize for “Best of Wine Tourism” (2009) and we have the Certificate of Excellence (Tripadvidor) for the second year in a row.

Name: IRI Travel
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Nr. 15 Maresal Alexandru Averescu, 011455
Company description: Tour-operator specializat pe vacanțe în Bulgaria

Name: Trip.me
Company description: Following our merger our main LinkedIn account can be found here, www.linkedin.com/company/travel-local  TravelLocal is a travel company with a difference. We work in partnership with hundreds of handpicked, locally-owned tour operators, based in almost 100 destinations worldwide, to create amazing tailor-made holidays. We are connecting people to reimagine travel, by making it fairer and more sustainable - everyone who travels with us is helping to make travel a force for good.  For us travel is about real human connections made across the world, and the incredible, life-changing rewards that ensue - for everyone - when it's done in the right way.   In the last few years we have helped more than 50,000 customers from 90 countries to create their perfect trip on the TravelLocal platform. Each time they book with us they're supporting our local tour operators to grow their businesses, increase local employment and change a whole industry. They get an amazing trip too - the kind that only local knowledge and expertise can create. We are a VC-backed travel company with offices in the heart of Bristol and Berlin, and a team which can work remotely as preferred.

Name: BCD Travel Bulgaria - Represented By ASTRAL Holidays
Company description: WHO WE ARE? BCD Travel, with its global network spreading to more than 108 countries and  $24.6 billion USD sales in 2016, is one of the three world’s largest corporate travel management companies.  Since 2007, BCD Travel is being successfully represented on the Bulgarian market by the Business Travel Department of ASTRAL Holidays, one of the biggest Bulgarian tour operators. On the event management part we team up with BCD Meetings & Events, which is uniquely positioned to support clients at both ends of the meeting spectrum—and everything in between. Our "Event-to-Enterprise"​ approach means we’re just as adept at executing conferences and incentives as we are at providing strategic meetings management solutions that maximize cost savings while minimizing risk. The successful partnership between BCD Travel and ASTRAL Holidays has turned the business unit into one of the strongest market leaders in Bulgaria. Here a useful link if you want to know more about: ASTRAL Holidays: https://www.linkedin.com/company/astral-holidays-jsc WHAT WE DO? We help companies make the most of what they spend on travel.  For travelers, this means keeping them safe and productive, and equipping them to make good choices on the road. For travel and procurement managers, it means advising them on how to grow the value of their travel program. For executives, we ensure that the travel program supports company objectives.  In short, we help our clients travel smart and achieve more. ASTRAL Holidays: https://www.linkedin.com/company/astral-holidays-jsc

Name: SCANDI Travel Group
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Castelldefels, 335 Passeig Del Ferrocarril, 08860
Company description: SCANDI Travel Group is an incoming agency, which offers its customers in Scandinavia, tailor made company- and incentive trips, as well as events and conferences for groups of all sizes.  We specialize in destination management and bookings in the Czech Republic, Germany, Hungary, Portugal, Romania and Spain, securing a seamless stay and happy end customers..  SCANDI Travel Group offers a complete range of services, including making reservations of hotels, transfers, guides, restaurants, venues, concerts or tourist attractions, etc. These services are sold both as packs and individually.  Our business idea is simple: to offer our customers, the travel agencies, first rate help in the preparation, implementation and follow-up of big, as well as small events, in the countries where we work. All of this is done with the help of our highly qualified staff, all Scandinavian or fluent in a Scandinavian language.

Name: IDare Space Travel Limited
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, 22 Northumberland Road, d04ed73
Company description: A space tourism and atmospheric adventures "travel agency" - helping future adventurers to pick their dream-trips. / A consultancy - helping investors and operators to find and understand each other. The company was incorporated in Ireland on July 13, 2022, as a Private Company Limited by Shares (LTD).

Name: AOVO AG
Company description: Die aovo Touristik AG mit Sitz in Hannover hat sich als virtueller Reiseveranstalter auf den Direktvertrieb hochwertiger Reiseangebote zu überzeugend günstigen Preisen spezialisiert. Das Leistungsangebot umfasst attraktive Paket- und Bausteinlösungen in den Segmenten Kultur, Wellness, Flusskreuzfahrten, Gourmetreisen, Familienurlaub und „Urlaub mit dem Hund“. Dabei wird konsequent die Doppelstrategie Online und Offline verfolgt. Die aovo Touristik AG vertreibt ihre Produkte nicht nur unter der eigenen Marke, sondern auch als Reiseveranstalter für renommierte Marken wie zum Beispiel Stage Entertainment, Tchibo, Lidl und Secret Escapes. Durch ihre langjährige Erfahrung und Leistungskompetenz im Reisegeschäft ist die aovo Touristik AG in der Lage, ihren Partnern immer optimale Lösungen für gewünschte Produkte zur Verfügung zu stellen und damit das Image der Partner am Markt nicht nur zu bewahren, sondern auch zu stärken.

Name: Grupo Montiel Y García Real Estate
HQ Location: Spain, Murcia, Águilas, 1 Avenida Del Puerto Deportivo, 30880
Company description: Since 1966, Grupo Montiel y García has been synonymous with “constant development” and continuous growth generated by the strength of a group of companies that are currently undertaking the realization of a large family business project. Grupo Montiel y García is a real estate agency that is mainly dedicated to the management, promotion and marketing of land, tourist, tertiary, commercial and residential projects in Spain, both its own and those of third parties. 👉 Current projects under management or development: ✅ Single-family plots in Águilas (Murcia Region). ✅ Development of tertiary land in Lorca (Murcia). ✅ Development of commercial land in Aguilas (Murcia) ✅ Development of residential land in Aguilas and San Juan de los Terreros, Almeria (Andalusia). ✅ Development of tourist land in Aguilas. ✅ Sale or rental of own and/or third-party assets. 👉 Some of our reference residential projects are: ✅ “La Loma” Residential in Águilas (R.M.). Award for Best Tourist-Residential Promotion from the Association of Developers (APIRM). ✅ “Los Huertos” Residential in Murcia (R.M.). ✅ “Águilas Playa” Residential in Águilas (R.M.). ✅ In addition to more than 2,000 homes promoted and built over all these years. 👉 Within the tourist field, we can highlight several projects in which we have intervened as developers, promoters, builders and/or managers, such as, among others: ✅ Hotel Puerto Juan Montiel**** in Aguilas. Award for the best tourist real estate performance in the R.M. 2007. ✅ Juan Montiel Sports Port in Aguilas (Blue Flag and Sustainable Port by the CARM). Award for the best real estate tourism performance in the R.M. 2009. ✅ Bea Beach Hostel in Aguilas (First Hostel opened in the Region) ✅ Costa Cálida Travel (Receptive travel agency). ✅ Restaurant - Terrace “La Mar”. ✅ Restaurant “Club Europeo”. ✅ Various nightclubs and party venues in Lorca and Mazarrón. Contact: 📧 direccion@montielygarcia.com 📞 +34 968 493 271

Name: Matoke Tours
Company description: Matoke Tours raakt reizigers in het hart met de mooiste reizen door het oosten en zuiden van Afrika. Wij zien het ontwikkelen van reizen als een ambacht en met onze ambacht stellen wij u in staat om de mooiste plekken op een persoonlijke, exclusieve en comfortabele manier te beleven. Exclusiviteit zit bij ons niet alleen in de lodges waar u verblijft, maar juist ook in de ervaringen die u beleeft. Van oudsher hebben we voet op Afrikaanse bodem met een eigen kantoor in Afrika en juist daarom zijn wij de ware Afrika specialist. Matoke Tours koestert een diepe liefde voor Afrika en deze liefde vindt u terug in onze Afrika reizen. Kwaliteit, comfort, persoonlijke contact, exclusiviteit, maatwerk, kleinschaligheid en duurzaamheid zijn belangrijke pijlers in ál onze reizen en duizenden klanten die met ons op reis zijn geweest hebben hier reeds ervaring mee. We opereren zowel nationaal en internationaal en behoren tot de best beoordeelde Afrika reisaanbieders wereldwijd (top 5 van best beoordeelde tour operators in Afrika).

Name: Etraveli
Company description: Etraveli Group is one of the leading online travel agencies in Europe, offering a wide range of airline tickets, hotel accommodations and other travel related services. We operate in 72 countries on 6 continents through brands such as Supersaver/Supersavertravel, Gotogate, Mytrip.com and Pamediakopes.gr. In Sweden we also operate the price comparison website Flygresor.se. With a total booking value of EUR 2.9 billion in 2017 and 12 million customers per year, we are Europe's second largest flight-centric online travel agency. Offices in: Uppsala, Athens, Stockholm and Göteborg. Owners: CVC Capital Partners Are you interested in working at Etraveli? Visit etraveligroup.teamtailor.com to see our current job openings.

Name: Sunway Travel
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dún Laoghaire, Clarence Street
Company description: Sunway is Ireland’s largest Irish owned tour operator offering over 70 destinations worldwide. We offer the widest range of products from European Package Holidays to Cruises and Escorted Tours. We are proud to provide exceptional holidays at competitive prices and are a fully bonded travel company.

Name: RatesPro
Company description: RatesPro was founded by professionals and specialists with Hotels, Flights and Wholesale Travel background. We coverinmarkets over EMEA ,AMER and through a strategic sales alliances in APAC region. Whether you're Tourism wholesaler Distributor or travel agency and you looking for a accommodations, Flight tickets, or packages we have you covered. Simply tell one of our specialists how you would like to get access into our products via API or Portal user, and we'll help you figure out the rest. We work directly with hotels ,Airlines, and global DMCs to get the best deals. While working with us, we want you to be completely happy with the experience. If you have questions about us, our services, get in touch!

Name: TOURKNIFE
Company description: TourKnife is a cloud-based Tour & Activity management solution which revolutionises how Tour Operators, Travel Agents, and DMCs create and manage their products, enabling them to be in full control of all aspects of both complex multi-day group tours and day activities.

Name: TUI Hellas
Company description: Η TUI στην Ελλάδα  Η TUI Hellas (πρώην AIRTOUR GREECE S.A) είναι μέλος της TUI Travel PLC που δημιουργήθηκε στις 3 Σεπτεμβρίου του 2007 από την συγχώνευση της First Choice Holidays PLC και της TUI AG. Σήμερα, με ένα δίκτυο 25 υποκαταστημάτων σε όλους τους σημαντικούς ελληνικούς προορισμούς και με τη διεθνή συνεργασία του Ομίλου της TUI, η εταιρία έχει ισχυροποιήσει την θέση της ως ο μεγαλύτερος τουριστικός οργανισμός στην Ελλάδα.  Εισερχόμενος τουρισμός  Η TUI Hellas μπορεί να προσφέρει μία αστείρευτη αγορά στους tour operators οποιουδήποτε μεγέθους, καλύπτοντας όλο το φάσμα των υπηρεσιών κάθε προορισμού, από τον προγραμματισμό του προορισμού, την επικοινωνία/αγορά καταλυμάτων, τον έλεγχο αγοράς, τις κρατήσεις, τις μεταφορές, τις εκδρομές έως την υποδομή γραφείων, τη σύνδεση πληροφοριακού συστήματος και την τιμολογιακή και μισθολογική διαδικασία.  Ταξίδια αναψυχής  Για την TUI, «αναψυχή» σημαίνει χαλάρωση, περιπέτεια, διασκέδαση σε κοντινά ή μακρινά θέρετρα της Ελλάδας, στις ευρωπαϊκές μητροπόλεις, σε εξωτικούς ή μακρινούς προορισμούς... Σας «ταξιδεύουμε» με αξιοπιστία στην ποιότητα, την οργάνωση και την συνέπεια στις υπηρεσίες που σας προσφέρουμε.  Επαγγελματικά ταξίδια  Στους εταιρικούς πελάτες και τους επαγγελματίες ταξιδιώτες, η TUI μέσω του τμήματος Corporate Services, προσφέρει ένα μεγάλο φάσμα υπηρεσιών που περιλαμβάνουν την οργάνωση επαγγελματικών ταξιδιών και ταξιδιών κινήτρων, το σχεδιασμό και την οργάνωση εταιρικών συναντήσεων, συνεδρίων και εκθέσεων, την οργάνωση ειδικών εκδηλώσεων και αθλητικών events καθώς και την επαγγελματική μετεγκατάσταση στελεχών.  Chapter Airline Services  Ο όμιλος της TUI Hellas δραστηριοποιείται και στο χώρο του airport supervision με την Chapter Airline Services η οποία ενεργοποιείται στη διαχείριση υπηρεσιών εδάφους, τις αεροπορικές υπηρεσίες, την αεροπορική αντιπροσώπευση και τις υπηρεσίες αεροσκαφών.

Name: Poli Tour & Travel
Company description: Poli Tour SA (est 1992) is one of the first travel agencies in post-communist Romania. Yet small, but active tour operator with a vast experience in organizing exotic excursions for groups and individuals: Thailand, Vietnam, Malaysia, Singapore, Myanmar, Australia, New Zealand, but also the classics such as: France, Spain, Italy, England. Since 2007 the company began to develop the corporate segment, through Poli Tour & Travel. Business trips, organizing conferences, national and international conferences, thematic excursions, team - building in one word MICE. Our company, is recognized by large booking reservations systems, air transport companies, being able to offer travel services in different categories at reasonable prices for any destination. We consider ourselves that we are one of the few creators of innovative and interesting itineraries that highlights the balanced beauty, culture and local traditions and those who care for our customers comfort. In terms of transport, transfers and accommodation services we try to create a perfect setting for business opportunities and vacations. Poli Tour & Travel warrants, regardless of the complexity of the desired program or budget, meeting all requirements as you work with creative professionals, specializing in providing services to the highest standard quality according to customer wishes.

Name: Itaka Hungary
Company description: "As you set out for Ithaka hope your road is a long one, full of adventure, full of discovery." Poland's largest travel agency now in Hungary! Why choose us? - Seasoned management team, with extensive experience in tourism  - Hungarian speaking hosts in each our destinations  - Own charter flights  - Hotels handpicked one by one to make sure they meet the expectations of our travellers  - Innovative solutions Check out our latest offers!  https://www.itaka.hu/

Name: Giovanti Travel
Company description: The story begins in 1984, when the company took it's first steps in the field of tourism and shipping, based in Piraeus. With the desire to “direct” small and large trips inside and outside of Greece, very soon GIOVANTI Travel evolves into one of the most dynamic rising travel agencies. Having completed a successful course, but also and excellent reputation in the field of shipping agencies, in 2001 it started offering Central Agent services to the largest Greek shipping company, “BLUE STAR FERRIES”, which has to date the most modern fleet in Greece. The rapid growth of the company, as well as the quality service of thousands of travelers, will lead in 2013 to the certification by IATA (International Air Transport Association), which will allow the immediate issuance of airline tickets for the whole world. Following the developments and the tourist market demands, GIOVANTI Travel expands its activities even more by offering tourist services, such as the organization and sale of packages in Greece and abroad, hotel reservations, cruises etc. Today, GIOVANTI Travel is daily upgraded with new ideas and proposals using the most modern booking and ticketing systems. With the construction of new offices and the creation of new departments (corporate, call center, marine ticketing, consolidation) it now organizes all services with maximum confidence and efficiency. The team of GIOVANTI Travel combines know-how, courtesy, continuous training, friendly and at the same time professional service, ensuring the trust of the tourist public by building strong relationships.

Name: Nordmc
Company description: nordmc are specialists in designing and operating unforgettable group tours to the Nordic countries, Iceland and the Baltics.   As a DMC and Incoming Tour Operator, we only work B2B, with select partners, and we understand the needs of tour operators and wholesaler, and therefore offer quality service and speedy turn-around from time of request, to quotation, and to final confirmed programs.  With many years of experience and passion for the Nordic region, nordmc have access to any destination you may desire and have a large network of suppliers, in order to tailor the perfect journey for your clients. We are critical about the details and planning stage, and hence putting the end clients in focus. People and relationships are core in our DNA and our main goal is to offer the highest quality service.

Name: Vamonos Vacanze
Company description: Tour Operator di vacanze di gruppo per single. Organizziamo vacanze emozionali per persone che hanno voglia di uscire dalla propria routine per condividere tutte le emozioni di un viaggio con nuovi amici.

Name: Ulisse Dmc & Tour Operator Sicily Italy
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Palermo, 100 Via Giovanni Bonanno, 90143
Company description: Ulisse is a Sicilian Tour Operator and DMC (Destination Management Company) specialized in Sicily/Italy incoming services. Ulisse makes their clients’ wishes come true, creating an interesting combination of styles and professionality and offering them all colourful sides of Sicilian traditions: art, culture, food, wine and nature. We create exciting itinerary and experiences, providing fresh ideas and concepts making your holiday or event a true “once in a lifetime” experience. Discover with us intriguing World Heritage sites (including nine cities, the Aeolian Islands and Mount Etna, the Europe’s highest active volcano), Taormina the pearl of Mediterranean, the Greek archaeological park in Syracuse, exclusive food and wine experiences and much much more! Be Unexpected, Be Unique, Be Unconventional!

Name: World Face
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Siena, Via Ugolino Di Vieri, 53100
Company description: Siamo World Face, un tour operator specializzato nell'organizzazione di viaggi in tutto il mondo.  Con oltre 180 itinerari in più di 80 nazioni, offriamo esperienze di viaggio indimenticabili in piccoli gruppi guidati da esperti coordinatori. Amiamo l'avventura, la scoperta delle culture locali e l'amicizia tra viaggiatori.  I nostri programmi di viaggio sono pensati per soddisfare tutte le vostre esigenze. Che vogliate intraprendere un’avventura divertente, on the road o rilassante, noi vi regaleremo un’esperienza unica. Sappiamo quanto possa essere difficile organizzare un viaggio con gli amici, considerando gli impegni lavorativi e personali di ciascuno e sappiamo anche che non tutti amano viaggiare da soli. Partendo insieme a noi non vi dovrete più preoccupare di questo. Avrete l'opportunità non solo di esplorare destinazioni fantastiche, ma anche di fare nuove amicizie e arricchire ulteriormente la vostra esperienza di viaggio.  Unitevi al nostro gruppo per scoprire realtà incredibili e creare ricordi straordinari. Viaggiate insieme a noi, il mondo vi lascerà la sua impronta!

Name: Andare A Zonzo
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Florence, 27 A Via Frà Paolo Sarpi, 50136
Company description: Siamo un giovane e dinamico tour operator specializzato in trekking, outdoor travel e slow tourism. Appassionati di escursioni e viaggi a piedi, innamorati della natura e dei paesaggi unici che ci regala, siamo un team di professionisti dell'outdoor, pronti a far vivere piccole grandi avventure dall'alto contenuto esperienziale e in totale sicurezza.  Come lavoriamo? Al centro del nostro agire c'è il rispetto e la valorizzazione dell'ambiente. Offriamo proposte sostenibili, autentiche e fuori rotta, ben lontane dal turismo mordi e fuggi. I professionisti che accompagnano i nostri gruppi sono guide formate per offrire delle esperienze coinvolgenti, sicure e con quell'ingrediente che insaporisce tutta la nostra realtà, l'allegria. Allegria e impegno, anche impegno dal colore verde intenso dei boschi. Ogni acquisto sul nostro sito, un albero nel bosco di Andare a Zonzo, per contribuire in modo efficace a progetti di riforestazione in Nepal, India, Nicaragua, Madagascar e Tanzania. We trek different, we do green.

Name: Planet Viaggi Srl Travel Agency And Tour Operator
Company description: Agenzia Planet Viaggi Carbonia, in Sardegna, da sempre rappresenta un partner ideale nell'organizzazione di viaggi e tour nel mondo, organizzazione consolidata nelle due sedi di Carbonia e Iglesias, tour operator Brasile, assistenza post partenza, consigli e consulenze, liste nozze, biglietti aerei e navi, crociere, tours organizzati. Visita il sito www.planetviaggibrasile.it per scoprire l'intera programmazione Planet Viaggi su uno dei paesi piu belli al mondo

Name: Rona Booking
Company description: Rona apartments travel agency offers over 700 apartments on 7 different locations in the northern Adriatic. All apartments have been personally checked before they have opened their doors to guests. We take great care and pride in the quality of our accommodation and moreover we take satisfaction in providing exceptional service towards our guests.

Name: T+M LEGAL GmbH & Co. KG
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Oberursel, 31 An Den Drei Hasen, 61440
Company description: Tradition I Erfahrung I Kompetenz I Sicherheit I Schnelligkeit Auf diesen Säulen baut das Denken und Handeln von T+M auf. Als Dienstleistungspartner in allen juristischen Belangen betreut T+M ihre Mandanten mit nur einem Ziel – Ihrem wirtschaftlichen Erfolg. T+M wurde 1977 von Rechtsanwalt Klaus Thieleking als ehemaligem Justitiar der Neckermann und Reisen GmbH gegründet und betreut seit dieser Zeit überwiegend touristische Mandantschaft im In- und Ausland, darunter einige der Top Ten aus den Bereichen Reiseveranstalter und Fluggesellschaften. Zu den Mandanten von T+M gehören ebenso Unternehmen aus der gesamten touristischen Wertschöpfungskette. Als weiteren Schwerpunkt hat T+M den Bereich Forderungsmanagement ausgebildet.

Name: Uschi Liebl Pr
Company description: uschi liebl pr - "one of Germany's top ten leading media communications agencies in tourism", says a jury of more than 100 renowned travel journalists and bloggers during the Touristik PR Handbuch's annual PR agency survey. uschi liebl public relations specializes in media communications for the lifestyle, travel and tourism industry - hotels, destinations, tour operators and other tourism service providers across all segments. A strategic approach with an eye on creativity and long-standing personal media contacts throughout Germany, Austria and Switzerland are two of uschi lieb pr's success factors. Imprint: https://tinyurl.com/ulpr-imprint Data Protection: https://tinyurl.com/dataprotection-ulpr

Name: Hummingbird Lifestyle Travel
Company description: About us:  Hummingbird Lifestyle Travel is a Scandinavian Tour Operator that tailors an active clientele with a desire to discover new places and an appreciation for an elite travel experience.  Traditionally Hummingbird has specialized in cruises and exotic islands, taking travelers to interesting and beautiful places all over the world, while keeping a primary focus on the Indian Ocean Islands. Over the years, Hummingbird has become known for finding those unique places and boutique hotels with an exklusive touch.   Hummingbird Lifestyle Travel’s great history began in 1947 when Swedish newspaper companies started a tour operator that specialized in theme trips under the name “Pressresor” (Press Travel).  As pioneers in arranging trips in and out of Europe following the second World War, this premium travel provider has since expanded to various destinations in North, Central and South America, cruises in the waterways of the Galapagos Islands, adventures in Africa, wine and gourmet tours in France and Italy and discovery tours throughout China and other parts of Asia.   Under the guidance of new ownership in 2007, Pressresor was aptly re-named “Hummingbird”. The travel organization with a great tradition was proud to now carry the namesake of the fascinating exploratory bird that moves with both grace and agility as it travels from place to place, pausing in a moment of astonishing natural beauty, before moving on to its next destination beyond our sight.

Name: Meeting Point Hellas
Company description: About us Meeting Point Hellas (MPH) is a subsidiary of Meeting Point International (MPI), a leading global destination management company with fully fledged office infrastructures in several of the most popular tourism destinations in the world.  Meeting Point International is a part of the FTI Touristik Group, the fourth largest Travel Operator in Germany.  We offer DMC services in 4 continents, 19 countries.  Our strong purchasing power, professional tailored services and technology solutions enables constant growth opportunities for our business partners. We serve 450 partners and 4 million passengers yearly from 52 source markets At MPH we offer tailor-made products and concepts to a wide spectrum of Tour Operators and Travel Organizations worldwide. We provide first class destination management solutions such as; the provision of hotels, transfers, excursions, representation and all ground handling services.  Meeting Point Hellas operates with 5 branch offices in Rhodes, Kos, Corfu, Crete and Athens  and 13 partner offices - all over Greece.  Other than Greece  Meeting Point operates   in  19 different countries such as Italy, Croatia, Spain, Cyprus, Egypt, Malta, Turkey further afield resorts such as Oman ,Azores,  Morocco, Tunisia and Lebanon, and long-haul destinations such as USA, the Caribbean, Thailand, the UAE.  We dedicate our time and attention to our clients requirements and market trends. Our teams deliver unique service and products, which will help your business stand out in this highly competitive environment.

Name: NordicMarketing
Company description: NordicMarketing  Tourism Marketing for Northern Europe. Specialized in Finland, Sweden, Norway. Services for tour operators & incentive agencies. www.nordicmarketing.de

Name: MARSHAL TURISM
Company description: At first it was MARSHAL TURISM. One of the most important Romanian Tour Operators. Given the nature of our activity, we have always been connected to the latest news in the hotel area but more than that, we have had the occasion to find out which are the needs and the requests of our clients concerning the accommodation. Nowadays we operate 2 hotels in the very centre of Bucharest.

Name: Grupo Transhotel
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, San Sebastián De Los Reyes
Company description: Grupo Transhotel  is currently Europe's leading hotel provider and consists of 5 trademarks related to the tourism sector. The company has more than 600 highly qualified professionals working towards the main goal of offering its portfolio of more than 60,000 hotels and all types of services such as flights, transfers, tours and group reservations throughout the world for 78,800 travel agencies worldwide.  It provides a new concept in Service and always with the latest technology, offering the best solutions for professionals within the tourism sector.

Name: Interchalet
Company description: Interchalet bietet über 40.000 Ferienhäuser und Ferienwohnungen für den Urlaub. Seit über 45 Jahren können Kunden individuelle Feriendomizile sowohl im Sommer als auch im Winter bei Interchalet buchen. Das Angebot reicht vom einfachen Chalet bis zur hochwertig ausgestatteten Villa. Es wird in sieben - im Reisebüro erhältlichen - Katalogen sowie im Internet (www.interchalet.de) präsentiert.  Besonders umfangreich ist das Programm im Sommer in Südeuropa und im Winter in den Alpenregionen.  Interchalet gehört zur Hotelplan Holding AG mit Sitz in Zürich/Glattbrugg. Zusammen mit Interhome bildet Interchalet die Holiday Home Division (HHD) von Hotelplan. Die Hotelplan Holding AG wiederum gehört zu 100% der Migros, dem größten genossenschaftlich organisierten Detailhandelsunternehmen der Schweiz. Sowohl Kunden als auch Reisebüros profitieren von der Qualität, dem großen, breit gefächerten Angebot an Ferienhäusern und Ferienwohnungen, der langjährigen Erfahrung im Ferienhaussektor sowie der intensiven Produktkenntnis, die bei Interchalet nicht nur die Produktmanager sondern auch die Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter der Buchungsabteilung besitzen.  Die Vermieter schätzen die enge persönliche Zusammenarbeit und das große Vertriebsnetz von 7000 Reisebüros in Deutschland, Österreich, den Benelux-Ländern und der Schweiz.

Name: Scanworld Travelpartner AB
Company description: TravelPartner is an Internet-based travel agency with localized sites for 20 european countries. TravelPartner books airline tickets, hotel reservations, car rentals and vacation packages via the World Wide Web and telephone travel agents. TravelPartner was founded in 1997 and has its headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden. TravelPartner is publicly traded on Nasdaq OMX First North.

Name: Expo Travel Group
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, 1 Carmanhall Road, d18 y3x2
Company description: Expo Travel Group® is a trade fair and event tour operator. We provide a range of accommodation and meeting services to over 1200 businesses worldwide. Our clients attend an average of 5 events every year. Using our in-house travel technology and our direct relations with over 9500 hotel properties and meeting venues, we help our customers save an average of 15% from each booked trip.  We offer a range of customer engagement tools for a highly customised booking experience. Every booking request is treated individually and a personal service and support at no extra cost is provided to each business at all stages of the booking and post-booking process.

Name: ANETOURS Travel Agency And Luxury Transportation
HQ Location: Portugal, Porto, Matosinhos, Nº 4524 Avenida Mário Brito, 4455-494
Company description: We are the ANETOURS, a Travel Agency and Tourism, Lda & National and International Transporter (licensed by DGTT / IMTT). We are an accredited company in Transports of Tourism, transfers and City Tours, with our own programs and providing personalized transport services. Creating great moments in Tourism since 1995! We have all the means and own fleet as well as official guides to receive you in the most appropriate way. Our services are based not only on short trips but also on "Tours" around the country, organized and accompanied by accredited professionals in the area of Tourism (Tour Operators and Official Interpreter-Guides). We have a large fleet of premium vehicles for VIP services; Private driver at the airport and different vehicles for special events. We adapt to the needs of our customers, offering a more productive and efficient time management. The quality of our ground transportation is ensured by the personalized support of the teams involved. Our tour operators have extensive experience in the field of tourism, with knowledge of English, Spanish and French. Our agency is located near the Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, being a strategic point for a quick response to the arrival and departure of passengers.

Name: Domenica Group
Company description: Domenica Group was Founded in 1961 as a building construction company and set up by the late Mr. George Hadjidemosthenous. During its first years the company was involved in both the public and the private sector, building houses, villas, schools, road works and executing project for the electricity authority, the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Interior. After the Turkish invasion of 1974 and being a class “A” construction firm, it was involved in the restoration of the island. It was appointed to build projects for Banks, Municipalities, Organisations and Ministries, including the Ministry of Defence, something that only a handful of companies in Cyprus have experience with. The large number of commercial and residential projects in Pafos and Limassol are further proof of high standards of quality and reliability. From apartments to luxury penthouses, from town houses to individual villas in superb locations Domenica Group has something to suit every individual and lifestyle. Today, Domenica Group is one of the largest development groups in Pafos with approximately 480 employees throughout seven different companies, having currently a huge amount of properties available. Besides Real Estate & Property Development, the Group is also active in the Tourist sector owing a number of Hotels in Paphos and Ayia Napa. The Group’s Travel Agency offers ideal tourist and investment tours and services. The Property Rental & Management Company binds the services that an Investor is expecting to get. All developing projects are self-financed by the Group and it prides itself on its flexibility in terms of selling prices and methods of payment due to the lack of the usual constraints or pressures as a direct result of external finance.

Name: Rapsody Travel & Events Bulgaria
Company description: Rapsody Travel is a worldwide travel agency and an event planning company in Europe. Since being founded 15 years ago, we have grown to become a wholesome provider of products and services for young people.   We currently have 20 offices in 13 countries.  The Bulgarian offices based in Sofia and Plovdiv was inaugurated in 2013. Our agency’s professional staff (coordinators, tour guides, animators, security, DJs, photographers and cameramen) is made exclusively out of young but experienced people who share their interests and who are familiar with the needs of young tourists and students: to be free and to economize, to be original and to be creative!  We aim to build an international trend that unites travel, fun, music and entertainment.

Name: Destination Touristic Services Spain
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, 30 C/ Genil
Company description: destination touristic services was founded in July 2013 as a new global DMC network to provide incoming services to tour operators (B2B). destination touristic services has now developed into a broadly positioned and globally acting company and implemented a bed bank with a highly competitive product portfolio to its clients. In order to monitor all offices in the destinations, an independent headquarters has been formed, based in Palma de Mallorca, DER Touristik Services S.L.U. It functions as a holding company for all destination touristic services subsidiaries.

Name: Panorama Tours & Travel GmbH
Company description: Salzburg Panorama Tours is Salzburg's premier sightseeing tour operator. More than 60 years of experiences and dedicated services, Salzburg Panorama Tours is renowned for great quality awarded with the certificate of excellence by TripAdvisor for several years in a row. A daily guaranteed tour program all year round, which also includes the Original Sound of Music Tour® twice a day making the hills alive again. In addition to the regular group tours benefit from our individual tour programs, European tours, private and group arrangements, transfers and limousine service. We specialize in providing our guests with comfortable and entertaining tours based upon individual interests.

Name: Potturinn Og Pannan
Company description: *** Who are we? ***  We are a family-run restaurant with long tradition and trust of local community. Our main goal is to turn your visit into a meaningful experience and to make you feel like at home.  *** What do we do? *** We offer a broad range of services: à la carte menu, lunch buffets, catering and big group reservations.  We cooperate with many tour operators and travel agencies, both icelandic and international. What makes us stand out is the quality and variety of our group menu, good sitting capacity, flexibility and professionalism.  *** What can you expect? *** Nothing less than delicious food, professional service, friendly staff and welcoming atmosphere! 📩 If you’d like to know more about us, schedule a meeting or make a reservation - contact us. We’ll be more than happy to hear from you!

Name: RUSTICHELLI SRL
Company description: RUSTICHELLI SRL is a catering business and manufacturer of sweet baked goods based in Italy.  Founded in 1919 in Faenza, RUSTICHELLI SRL has over 100 years of experience in the production of high quality cakes and biscuits, as well as gluten-free products, with its own brand NOGLUT®. In 2003, RUSTICHELLI SRL set up a new factory in Milan entirely dedicated to the production of kosher food. Since then, we have been serving leading international airlines, cruise companies, caterers, railways companies and tour operators around the world with full kosher catering services. Our mission is to provide our customers with outstanding quality and culinary excellence, matching the authenticity of a restaurant-style menu with the highest food safety and hygiene standards. We do this by tailoring our products, and offer to our clients a wide range of both frozen and ambient fresh long lasting meals. RUSTICHELLI SRL also offers catering services for parties and ceremonies (weddings, special events, office parties etc.).  All RUSTICHELLI SRL products and services are kosher certified.

Name: E&P Reisen Und Events GmbH
Company description: Viel Schnee für wenig Flocken! E&P Reisen wurde als "2-Studenten GbR" gegründet und firmiert seit 2001 als E&P Reisen und Events GmbH mit Sitz in Köln. Seit dem verstehen wir uns als ein professioneller und spezialisierter Reiseveranstalter für preiswerte Wintersporturlaube, unteranderem nach Saalbach, Davos, Lenzerheide, Montafon, Zillertal uvm. Unser Portfolio reicht von Kurztripps über Wochen- und Gruppenreisen bis hin zu Eventreisen und unserer Marke "E&P Events".  Unter "E&P Events" planen und vermarkten wir individuell konzipierte Incentivereisen und Firmenveranstaltungen bis zu 1000 Personen. Um eure Reise so professionell und unvergesslich wie möglich werden zu lassen, ist unser gesamtes Team mit Herz und Seele dabei: Engagement im Büro, auf der Piste und beim Après-Ski! Wir kennen jedes unserer Skigebiete und sind im Winter gerne bis zum letzten Glühwein dabei! Mit Know-how und Motivation stehen wir euch bei eurer Veranstaltung zur Seite: Spezialisierte und professionelle Planung und kein Urlaub von der Stange! FACTS & FIGURES KUNDEN 30.000 gesamt (Winter 24.000, Sommer 6.000) davon 3.000 MICE&Eventkunden) MITARBEITER Office Köln: 2x Geschäftsführung, 4x Marketing, 2x Events, 5x Firmenevents & Incentivereisen, 3x Kundenoffice, 7x Reise- und Produktmanagement, 4x Gruppenreisen, 2x Personal & Operations, 2x Buchhaltung Mitarbeiter vor Ort: 6 Festangestellte 75x Saisonmitarbeiter, 200x ‚Wochenteamer‘ SPORTCLUBS (durch unsere Tochtergesellschaften geführte Gruppenhäuser und Hotels Schweiz:  3x Davos, 2x Klosters, 1x Lenzerheide-Arosa, 1x Portes du Soleil	 Österreich:  2x Saalbach-Hinterglemm, 1x Montafon Italien: 1x Ahrntal EVENTREISEN FRANKREICH Ski & Boarderweek (Val Thorens) SnowZone (Les Deux Alpes) UniChamp (Les Deux Alpes) TOCHTERGESELLSCHAFTEN Alpine Vacation GmbH Hauptstrasse 25, 7076 Parpan, Schweiz CLLT Touristik GmbH Dielstraße 22, 6773 Vandans, Österreich

Name: BigXtra Touristik GmbH
Company description: BigXtra Touristik GmbH, headquartered in Munich, is one of the leading tour operators for the distribution of travel packages. Since more than 17 years BigXtra is specialized in the production of offers with an attractive cost-performance ratio and included additional services. The company sells its journeys with added value over the travel TV channel sonnenklar.TV as well as over travel agencies and internationally well-known retail chains.  The broad portfolio of the tour operator covers worldwide destinations. The BigXtra product range also includes cruises both in Europe and on the world's oceans. BigXtra is part of the FTI GROUP since the end of 2007, the fourth largest tour operator in Europe. Headquartered in Munich, the FTI GROUP employs 10,000 staff worldwide. It achieved sales volumes of 3,6 billion euros in the fiscal year 2017/18 and serviced seven million customers.

Name: Napoli Sotterranea
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Naples, 68 Piazza San Gaetano, 80138
Company description: #NapoliSotterranea handles the recover and the reshape of ancient archaeological sites in Naples, taking care of their restoration and their enhancement for the public use scope. For the Visitors (B2C scope) An 1,30hour journey 40mts under the streets of Naples, visiting the quarries of the Greek era, the Greek-Roman aqueduct, the WWII bomb shelter, the Hypogeum Gardens and the remains of the Greek-Roman Theater, on which the Emperor Nero debuted with his lyre. For Corporate (B2B scope) Various possibilities to create and host corporate meetings, teambuilding activities and food&wine events in an unique archaelogical location. Possibility to organize tailored tours & experiences for Companies, Schools, Cruise passengers and Tour Operators. For PA & Foundations (B2B scope) A list of scientific researches on geolocigal studies (seismograph), underground botanical experiments, eco friendly projects and archaelogical insights.  #NapoliSotterraneaVirtualExperience A brand new service, who can permit to visit the archaelogical site directly from your home. A virtual and interactive tour, on which you can discover the  site being lead from a real guide.

Name: SKILINK
Company description: Skilink is established in 2021 by a group of the most experienced people in the ski travel industry. A combined experience of more than 100 years provides knowledge about the best resorts, hotels and apartments in the Alps. We create the best ski holiday packages for our guests at the lowest possible price.

Name: Travelino
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Palermo, 10 Via Generale Carlo Alberto Dalla Chiesa, 90143
Company description: Travelino rivoluziona l'incoming e l'outgoing nel settore turistico con l'Intelligenza Artificiale.  Dal 2020, siamo i pionieri in Italia nel fornire soluzioni proprietarie di Intelligenza Artificiale e Marketing avanzate per il settore turistico, sia a livello nazionale che internazionale. Con un forte know how nel settore dei viaggi, ci rivolgiamo esclusivamente ai tour operators, alle agenzie di viaggi e hotel, servendo operatori che abbracciano il mondo B2B e B2C.  Servizi artigianali cuciti per le imprese turistiche che intendono innovarsi.

Name: Pilgrim Travel & Services
HQ Location: Spain, Galicia, A Coruña, Calle De Manuel Murguía Edificio Casa Del Agua, 15011
Company description: Pilgrim Travel is a company specialized in the Camino de Santiago, selling through our market place experiences and services related to this product. We are a digital company, which apply and develop our own technologies aimed at digital tourism marketing and online marketing of services and experiences. We have license XG-635 of travel agencies and we have physical presence in the cities of A Coruña and Santiago de Compostela...

Name: GJ Travel
Company description: ICELANDIC COACH COMPANY & TOUR OPERATOR  GJ Travel Iceland is one of the most trusted tour companies in Iceland with over 90 years of experience. We are a family run, independent coach company, incoming tour operator and travel agency in Iceland. Specialized in tailor–made group tours, scheduled escorted tours for FIT’s and multi-activity adventures in Iceland and Greenland.  We own a fleet of modern, Mercedes-Benz street- and highland buses and vehicles which range in size from 4 to 69 seats. We offer high standard in quality and safety, an average age of 3 years and free WI-Fi in all vehicles.  Our dedicated team of diverse, highly professional, local experts create the perfect tailor-made group tour according to our clients’ needs and interest. We strive for customer satisfaction with broad knowledge, initiative, first class service, a personal touch and of course love for Iceland and Greenland. For individual travelers we offer fixed escorted tours on SIC basis all year round with different itineraries for different seasons.   Please contact us for more information or assistance for Iceland and Greenland

Name: Ruby Rejser
Company description: Ruby Rejser is a travel agency which has existed more than 40 years. Ruby Rejser differs from other travel agencies by arranging holidays which are typically located outside the conventional tourism. We organize tours all year round, where the activities vary according to season. Ruby Rejser also organizes joint trips for groups and special packages for singles. Ruby Rejser offers active holidays and organizes vactions which include hiking, biking or skiing. We have a large selection of hiking and cycling vacations around Europe, where our guests can choose to travel on their own or in groups. One of our specialties is ski holidays that we have 40 years of experience in arranging in Norway. The priority of Ruby Rejser is to arrange a vacation for our guests, that will match the individual needs and interests 100%. The vacations of Ruby Rejser are created on our core values as diversity, community and responsibility for each other and for our nature. We are convinced that our guests have the same approach, which is why we have been so successful in arranging joint trips.

Name: Blue Style K.s.
Company description: Blue Style je jedna z největších cestovních kanceláří na českém trhu, kde působí již od roku 1997. Specializuje se na nabídku dovolených v zemích u Středozemního moře, konkrétně Egypt, Tunisko, Maroko, Turecko, Řecko, Španělsko a Itálie. Blue Style is one of the biggest travel agencies on the czech market, where it operates since 1997. It specializes on offering holiday trips to countries bordering the Mediterranean sea, particularly Egypt, Tunisia, Morocco, Turkey, Greece, Spain and Italy.

Name: Stratsin Winery
Company description: Stratsin Winery is located in the region of Pomorie – an area with ancient traditions in the winemaking. The winery began operation in 2015 and is provided with modern and advanced equipment. It is oriented towards the production of high-quality varieties of wines with a protected geographical indication (PGI). The winery owns over 300 ha of own vineyards with Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc and Muscat, and the red ones: Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Syrah. Vineyards are planted between 2006 and 2010, with the planting material supplied by France.  The proximity of the Black Sea contributes to the favorable climate of the region. Winter is soft, autumn is long and warm, spring – cool, and summer – warm and humid. Daily and night breezes, as well as good weather conditions, favor the good ripening and accumulation of fine fruit flavors.   The winery develops wine tourism and welcome individual winelovers and works well with tour operators. After a short visit of the wine cellar (fermentation area, barrel area, enotheque) the visitors taste the wine in the cozy tasting room. Wine events, corporate and private events can be held in the tasting room and the big terrace with panoramic view.  The wine brands are Picky Magpie, Early Birds and Soulmates.

Name: WE-Flytour GmbH
Company description: Reiseveranstalter

Name: Silverjet Belgium
Company description: We are a niche tour operator in the luxury category. We focus on the traveller who chooses luxury, comfort, quality, service and flexibility. As an independent tour operator, in addition to far-reaching service by our committed team, we guarantee our travellers a distinctive offer with the very best quality and objective information. We offer a choice of the most beautiful and elegant hotels, carefully selected accommodations in many destinations within and far beyond Europe visited by us.

Name: Reisebüro Wöhrle GmbH
