Company description: Reisebüro Wöhrle GmbH ist eine Omnibusfirma aus Oberderdingen mit Mobilitätslösungen im Miet-, Reise- und Linienverkehr.

Name: TravelDeals24 GmbH
Company description: Wir sind eine Gruppe Reiseverrückter, die es satt hatten, dass es auf den großen Reisewebseiten so schwierig ist wirklich tolle Angebote zwischen den Unmengen an Durchschnittlichen zu finden. Deshalb haben wir TravelDeals24 als mobile App für Smartphones und Tablet gestartet, um dort die besten Angebote zu veröffentlichen, die wir gefunden haben. Ganz ähnlich wie ein Blog, aber komfortabler zu nutzen. Seitdem sind wir ziemlich stark gewachsen, aber unsere Prinzipien sind immer noch dieselben: Weiter Horizont:  Wir recherchieren täglich die Angebote hunderter Reiseveranstalter und Reise-Webseiten Unabhängigkeit:  Wir erhalten eine Provision, wenn Sie eine Reise buchen, die Sie bei uns gefunden haben. Aber nur wir entscheiden, welche Angebote gut genug sind, damit sie auf TravelDeals24 veröffentlicht werden können. Reisefreude:  Wir empfehlen nur Angebote, die einen tollen Preis und hervorragende Qualität verbinden. Wir glauben es geht bei Reisen nicht einfach um Sparen, sondern um maximale Reisefreude pro Euro. Aktualität:  Wir setzen auf Technologie und automatisierte Updates, um Ihnen möglichst immer die korrekte Verfügbarkeit und aktuelle Preise zu zeigen. Unsere Mission ist für Sie die besten Reiseangebote im Internet zu finden. Herzlichen Dank, dass Sie uns auf diesem Weg begleiten.

Name: König ́s Reisen GmbH
Company description: Wir sind ein mittelständisches Busunternehmen aktiv im europaweiten Katalog- und Ausflugs- sowie im regionalen Schülerverkehr. Weltweite Reisen aller namhaften Urlaubsveranstalter vertreibt unser separates Reisebüro. Im Zuge der Erweiterung unserer Geschäftsaktivitäten suchen wir aktuell:

Name: Reisebüro Faber
Company description: Reisebüro Faber is a leisure, travel & tourism company based out of Hasental 7, Kastellaun, Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany.

Name: Spain Travel News
Company description: Spain Travel News is a medium for professionals from British travel agencies, specializing in news from and about the Spanish market. You will learn everything you need to know about travel destinations, new developments, and tourism businesses. Spain Travel News is a subsidiary of the Spanish tourism media group Hosteltur. https://spaintravelnews.co.uk/

Name: Viaggi Del Mappamondo S.R.L.
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Rome, 270 Viale Regina Margherita, 00198
Company description: Viaggi del Mappamondo S.r.l. - Wholesale Tour Operator since 1976 Da oltre 40 anni in viaggio nei mondi lontani. "Il viaggio non soltanto allarga la mente: le dà forma" scrive Bruce Chatwin. Un viaggio regala emozioni, accresce la cultura, arricchisce la personalità. Ma non si improvvisa. Servono capacità, organizzazione, esperienza. Serve un Tour Operator che conosca le strade del mondo e sappia come percorrerle. Noi vi proponiamo la nostra storia, 40 anni e più spesi a programmare viaggi in tutti i continenti e ad accompagnare chi ha le nostre stesse curiosità: esplorare, conoscere, percorrere nuovi sentieri. Si chiama affidabilità, certificata da migliaia di viaggiatori che dai nostri itinerari sono tornati più che soddisfatti. Il mondo cambia in fretta e noi di Mappamondo sappiamo adeguarci alle nuove esigenze. Forti nella nostra esperienza, con lo stesso, enorme entusiasmo di sempre.

Name: Malatesta Viaggi
Company description: Malatesta Viaggi has been one of Italy’s leading tour operators for group travel since 1980.  The company succeeds in combining very competitive prices thanks to the extensive allotments in their accommodation facilities in Italy, Europe and beyond with highly customized travel itineraries and services. A professional and dynamic team of 60 people takes care of every single detail in group travel: transport, hotel, restaurant, museum, guide and the tasting of typical products are never left to chance. They also provide a non-stop assistance in 9 different languages. Highly qualified and specialized departments (domestic, outgoing, incoming) meet the requirements of all kinds of groups, whether they travel for leisure, cultural, religious, study, sports, music, incentive purpose.  Every request is fulfilled quickly and attentively never forgetting their first passion: travelling and discovering places together with travel companions.

Name: Eco Art Travel
Company description: Welcome to EcoArt. There’s something different about EcoArt Travel. It’s not just that you’ll see different things (you will) or just that you’ll see things differently (again, you will). It’s the whole experience, from the second you step info our office around the corner from the Colosseum and are warmly greeted by our staff. It’s in every detail of the tours we power. At EcoArt, we’re interested in showing you the Italy that you dreamt about in the weeks leading up to your trip – and we’ll do so in ways that will surprise and inspire you. We care about Italy’s delicate ecology, and the tours we power are created with the environment in mind. We believe travel is an art and craft each experience accordingly. EcoArt Travel is a fully licensed and insured Italian Tour Operator, born in Rome and employing a young, dynamic staff of international travelers.

Name: TOCO TOUR ROMÂNIA
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Sector, 55 Calea Floreasca, et.3
Company description: - Tour operator cu experiență de peste 20 de ani - Pachete charter stabile - Relații de încredere pe termen lung cu cei mai influenți operatori de turism din țările de destinație - Condiții foarte atractive de rezervare și plată - Sistem de rezervări propriu user friendly

Name: Get It Across GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: Get It Across (GIA) is a marketing and PR agency based in Cologne, Germany. Travel and communication are our passion. As nature lovers, culture enthusiasts, foodies, and adventurers, we live authentic experiences and know how to inspire German-speaking travelers to discover new destinations. Founded in 1999 by Managing Director Albert Jenning, GIA has over 25 years of experience positioning international destinations in the German-speaking markets, as well as the Nordics and BeNeLux regions. We connect clients with journalists, influencers, publishers, tour operators, and travel agencies. Your goals drive us. Let’s inspire travelers together!

Name: TUI TRAVELStar
Company description: Stationäres Reisebüro - Vermittlung von Reisleistungen fürPrivat- und Geschäftsreisen

Name: LTP.Travel - Your Luxury Travel Partner
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Florence, 87 Via Pier Capponi, 50132
Company description: LTP.travel is a new brand of BTS Group Italy, an Italian incoming Tour Operator specialised in tourist services that has been operating since a few years. Our deep knowledge of the country goes along with the ability of making unforgettable every single moment of a holiday. With an excellent selection of Hotels and Villas and a wide variety of bespoke Services, we guarantee a 5 Stars booking experience for the agents and memorable holidays for the clients. Behind the scene operates a dedicated team of professionals that will assist with any queries and take care of any custom made requests. Why Italy? Without a doubt one of the most visited country in the world, Italy is filled with captivating natural beauty, incredible food and wine and an abundance of history and culture to intrigue every type of clientele. From the white peaks of the Dolomites, to the verdant hills of Tuscany; from the remains of ancient Pompeii, to the crystal clear waters of Sicily and Sardinia. Our Specialties: Rich & diverse culture; Unique history and traditions; Majestic religious monuments; Variegated landscapes; Warm hospitality; Delicious food and wine

Name: Touristticket
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Puerto Del Carmen, 20b C/anzuelo, 35510
Company description: Travel agency specialized in offering leisure products in Lanzarote and Fuerteventura, both through its network of points of sale on the islands and through e-commerce portals such as www.touristticket.com

Name: Helios Viaggi Srl
Company description: Helios Viaggi è un tour operator e agenzia di viaggi specializzata nel turismo scolastico e nei viaggi per ragazzi con base in Italia. Helios Viaggi srl is a leisure, travel & tourism company based out of Italy.

Name: AllTourNative Amsterdam
Company description: AllTourNative is the number 1 street art tour operator in Amsterdam. We have been around since 2009. Allow us to be your local friend in Amsterdam and we'll make sure you'll have an unforgettable experience! What we offer: - street art tours at the NDSM terrain and other iconic street art spots in Amsterdam; - guided tours at the 8000 m2 street art museum STRAAT; - street art tours by bike (lots of ground to be covered); - graffiti and street art workshops; - tailor made tours and events for bigger and smaller groups.

Name: Uniko Scandinavia
Company description: Uniko, established in 2008 is an established inbound tour operator servicing Asian outbounds throughout the Nordics. Uniko deals with restaurants, hotels, buses, flights and transfer companies, all over the Nordics. Groups handled by Uniko are mainly from Korea, China, Malaysia and Thailand.

Name: UNITRIP
Company description: The idea : Northern Greece becomes more and more accessible and attractive as a tourist destination for leisure or shopping. Greek sea shores and hospitality resorts seem ideal both for a summer vacation or a winter trip. Our aim is to provide the optimum service in this area through total commitment and absolute focus.   The company : “Unitrip”, part of “Unit54 S.A.”, was founded in order to facilitate the above activities and provide premium services to partner Travel Agents. As an independent specialist inbound tour operator we assure best value deliverance and we are devoted to creating unique travel experiences. We are ideally based in the outskirts of Thessaloniki, very close to the Airport and the renowned holiday destinations of Halkidiki and Olympus Riviera. We are also at close proximity to Mount Athos.    The people : “Unitrip’s” personnel consists of professionals in the tourist business with long experience in tour operator activities and strong expertise in hospitality services. Our client service executives are highly skilled and multi-lingual. All our staff posses the necessary communication skills in order to transform a simple holiday desire into an unforgettable experience.   Our virtues and goal : we are fresh, eager, direct and fast. We possess the knowledge of the tourist trade, we hold dear the will to enhance it. We aspire “Unitrip” to become the reference in the tourist trade, concerning Greek destinations.

Name: Nova Mar Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Venice, 96 Corso Del Popolo, 30172
Company description: Nova Mar Srl is a shipping agency operating mainly in the ports of Venice, Porto Marghera, Chioggia and Porto Levante. Furthermore, it also has sub-agencies throughout Italy.  Nova Mar Srl covers the role of general agent in Italy on behalf of many important national and international shipping companies and currently manages a fleet of 8 ships operating in many ports along the Adriatic Sea (mainly Venice, Chioggia, Ravenna, Rimini, Pesaro, Ancona, Trieste and Porto Nogaro), supplying them with thorough technical, commercial and administrative assistance.  Recently, a new and important collaboration has begun with CA.NA.DRY (Consorzio Armatori NAvi DRY – Shipping Company Consortium), representing a consortium of small and medium sized shipping companies of a solid family tradition which can currently offer 11 ships with a load capacity ranging from 4,000 to 10,000 mts. and 6 units which have been built recently (delivery schedule forecast is for the year 2010) with a cargo capacity of about 8,000 mts., operating in the business of national and international transport of dry bulk. In its constant pursuit of diversification and the expansion of its professional activities, Nova Mar Srl is proud of its illustrious title of ship agent in the Port of Venice on behalf of “Kompas” (group adriatica.net), considered one of the leading international tour operators that currently has 47 agencies in 22 European countries and other nations such as the U.S.A. and Canada.

Name: Flight Refund Ltd.
Company description: We support TRAVEL AGENCIES, TRAVEL TECHNOLOGY PROVIDERS and OTAs by: Making the growth of their client base simpler Increasing customer retention Building new revenue streams effortlessly Establishing a new form of instant cashflow We deliver the end-user extra benefits and security by helping them get their rightful refunds when their flights are cancelled or delayed based on the EU261 directive.

Name: Adibus
Company description: adibus aims to deliver solutions, that enhance the journey experience for passengers, as well as offering transport companies, tour operators and transport providers advantages on an economically advantageous basis. adibus has agreed usage rights with the largest Danish news media providers to deliver news coverage adapted to our media solutions. E.g. TV2news and DR. Adibus offers turn-key solutions spanning from development, installation to operation and service. Adibus aims to solve and lift any special assignment by balancing specific needs with recognized product solutions. We are not intimidated by the complexity or size of an assignment; it is these challenges that motivate us.

Name: Spauwen Travel Group
HQ Location: Netherlands, Limburg, Geul, 3 Valkenburg A/d De Valkenberg, 6301
Company description: 🌍Welcome to Spauwen Travel Group🌍 Spauwen Travel Group is a third-generation, family-owned company that has evolved into a dynamic and internationally recognized leader in the travel, transportation, and mobility sectors. With a rich heritage spanning decades, we pride ourselves on our commitment to quality, innovation, and personalized service across all our brands. As the umbrella organization for Jacobs Travel, Het Zuiden & Jacobs Reizen, STG Touroperating, and Oulvgo, Spauwen Travel Group delivers tailored solutions for a diverse range of clients. From premium coach travel and event transportation to bespoke group travel packages and cutting-edge mobility platforms, we offer services that redefine industry standards. Our Vision At Spauwen Travel Group, our vision is to connect people with unforgettable experiences while ensuring exceptional service at every touchpoint. We are dedicated to providing high-quality solutions that prioritize safety, comfort, and sustainability, fostering long-term relationships with our clients and partners worldwide. What We Do Jacobs Travel: High-quality coach and transportation services for international events, tourism, and corporate travel. Spauwen Travel: A trusted travel agency and tour operator offering carefully curated group travel packages, city trips, and incentive travel with a personal touch. STG Touroperating: Expertly crafted white-label travel solutions, from group tours to custom itineraries. Oulvgo: An innovative global platform connecting Chinese travelers with real-time transportation and travel services worldwide. Why Choose Us Spauwen Travel Group combines decades of experience with forward-thinking innovation. Whether you’re planning a seamless group tour, managing large-scale event transportation, or seeking advanced mobility solutions, we have the expertise and infrastructure to deliver results. Partner with Spauwen Travel Group to explore opportunities and unlock the potential of travel!

Name: All Nordics
Company description: Arctic Inbound is an inbound DMC specialising in high end FIT itineraries across the Nordic Regions . With in-depth knowledge of the Nordic regions, a professional, flexible and service-minded company we have extensive experience and direct relationships with suppliers across the entire destination. Working only with tour operators and travel planners we offer great value, quick response time and perfectly planned programmes focused on the individual client.

Name: Onlineweg.de Touristik GmbH
Company description: Die onlineweg.de Touristik GmbH ist der starke Partner für den professionellen Internetauftritt von Reisebüros. Wir zeigen Ihnen die Symbiose aus stationären Reisebüro und modernster Internettechnologie und bieten Lösungen, die im Reisebüro Alltag leicht und unkompliziert umsetzbar sind.

Name: Nuova Travel Professionals
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Piraeus, 13 Agiou Konstantinou Street, 18532
Company description: Nuova Travel Professionals | Crafting Exceptional Journeys in Corporate, Marine & Bespoke Travel Since 1984. For four decades, Nuova Travel Professionals has been a trusted leader in the Greek travel industry. We are more than just a travel agency; we are architects of seamless, memorable, and impactful journeys. Our legacy is built on a deep understanding of our clients' unique needs and a relentless commitment to exceeding their expectations. Our Expertise: 🔹 Marine & Shipping Travel: Tailored travel solutions for the demanding needs of the Greek shipping industry, ensuring seamless crew changes and executive travel with precision and reliability. 🔹 Corporate Travel Management: Comprehensive, bespoke travel programs for leading companies and organizations. We focus on delivering efficiency, cost-effectiveness, and unwavering support for your travelers. 🔹 Bespoke Leisure Travel: Unforgettable, custom-designed tours to premier destinations like Dubai and Sardinia, curated by our destination experts to create unique, once-in-a-lifetime experiences. 🔹 Meetings & Incentives (MICE): Expert planning and flawless execution for small to medium-sized corporate meetings and incentive trips that are designed to inspire, motivate, and reward. Why Choose Us? What sets us apart is our blend of decades-long experience with a modern, agile approach. Our deep-rooted industry relationships grant our clients access to exclusive opportunities, while our dedicated team ensures every detail is perfectly managed. We don't just book trips; we build lasting partnerships based on trust and results. Let's Plan Your Next Journey. Ready to experience the Nuova difference? Follow our page for industry insights and travel inspiration, or visit our website to start the conversation.

Name: Simply Shuttles
Company description: Since its founding in 2011, Simply Shuttles has become the most trusted transfer company on the Costa del Sol – the preferred choice for professional tour operators, travel agencies, golf, luxury rental and concierge companies. Why? Because we offer transfer services that make getting around the coast a smooth, convenient and relaxing experience. Our fleet of vehicles is specially designed to offer a wide range of services for visitors, business people and local residents, and our professional drivers ensure you have a safe and comfortable experience. Their friendly, courteous manner and local knowledge are backed up by an office team that plans the schedules and works hard to guarantee punctuality and quality service whenever you use us. Our track record in this regard is unequalled because we plan ahead and have a flexible approach designed to provide solutions when they are needed. This dedication along with the flexibility to offer a bespoke service, form the basis of our business – and the reason for our five-star customer reviews.

Name: MrOrange Travel Technology
Company description: MrOrange knows the Online Travel Industry! MrOrange is a AAA rated leading travel technology company specializing in travel automation systems, with a focus on the online sector.  - A team of 26 employees + external consultants - Our team has a solid background in the travel industry and travel technology - MrOrange is a full solution provider for online travel agencies in Leisure and Corporate travel Since 2001 we have operated solely in the travel industry. MrOrange produce one of Europes most used online booking engines with more than 3000 individual bookings in a single day.

Name: Klooster Reizen
Company description: Al drie generaties lang is Klooster Reizen het startpunt voor nieuwe avonturen, want wat in de jaren 60 begon als een touringcarbedrijf is uitgegroeid tot hét onafhankelijke reisbureau van Noord-Nederland. Of u nu tot rust wilt komen op een luxueuze cruise, een adembenemende safari wilt maken of een nieuwe stad wilt ontdekken, bij Klooster Reizen bent u verzekerd van een reis die uw verwachtingen overtreft!  Wij vergelijken voor u de prijzen van aanbieders in binnen- en in buitenland en beschikken over de prijzen van Nederlandse en Duitse touroperators. En vindt u een bestemming niet terug in één van de brochures of op onze websites, dan wil dat nog niet zeggen dat wij deze niet in ons assortiment hebben. Vraag er naar bij onze medewerkers, eventueel proberen wij waar mogelijk het rechtstreeks voor u in te kopen. Dat is voor ons de beste manier om kwaliteit, snelheid, een flexibel aanbod en een scherpe prijs aan u te garanderen. Bij Klooster Reizen kunt u ook op afspraak langskomen. Op die manier kunnen wij er voor zorgen dat u niet hoeft te wachten en u bespreekt de mogelijkheden van uw reis wanneer het u het beste uitkomt.  Klooster Reizen is aangesloten bij het ANVR, SGR en de Stichting Calamiteitenfonds Reizen. Dat betekent dat uw reis of vakantie onder de best denkbare garanties wordt geregeld! Klooster Reizen - Thuis in vakanties!

Name: AT Cracow
HQ Location: Poland, Lesser Poland Voivodeship, Kraków, 21 Świętego Marka
Company description: AT Cracow is an incoming tour operator in Krakow.  It is providing tours, tickets, transfers and activities in Krakow and neighbourhood.

Name: TRAVEL TOURS
HQ Location: Portugal, Faro, Albufeira, Rua Oliveira Martins, 8200
Company description: Established in 1991, Travel Tours is an incoming agent, representing several Dutch Tour Operators in Portugal, handling over 50.000 clients and almost 2.000 flights each year. Our staff has over 20 years experience, and we are able to provide any service needed. From ground assistance, transfers, accommodation, excursions and car hire, to local assistance and contracting. We are also reachable 24/7 for urgent situations.

Name: Incoming Liguria Srl
Company description: Tour operator specializzato leader nell'Incoming a Genova e in Liguria

Name: Noema Viaggi S.r.l.
Company description: Noema is a Greek word meaning "knowledge". Our knowledge of Sicily guarantees satisfaction for clients who are a little more discerning. Noema Viaggi is made by an experienced group of travel industry professionals, who consider organizing travels a passion. This is reflected in the way in which we shape and develop our specialist programmes in order to match the expectations of our customers. Since 1984 we propose unique itineraries offering the very best in value for money. During the years all services proposed by us have been maintained with honesty and with constant and excellent performances. Today our company has grown and with our branch offices in Taormina and Cefalu we guarantee assistance and services to our partners operating in Sicily with weekly charters (Luxembourg, United Kingdom, Ireland, The Netherlands, Germany, Finland, Hungary, Spain). We offer an extensive range of services from hotel accommodation, roundtrips, fly & drive, car rental, transfers, daily excursions, guiding services to tailor-made holidays with the discerning traveller in mind.Furthermore, our Head office, based in Palermo can assist you with incentives, congresses and special events.   Noema Viaggi S.r.l. Palermo - Cefalù - Taormina Via Francesco Petrarca, 6 90144 Palermo P.IVA 02980840827 Tel. +39.091.625.24.86 Fax +39.091.625.62.63 e-mail: booking@noemaviaggi.it Skype: pino.lombardo50 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Noemaviaggi?fref=ts Twitter: https://twitter.com/NoemaViaggi Head Office:  Palermo Via Francesco Petrarca, 6 Tel. +39.091.625.24.86 Fax +39.091.625.62.63   mail: booking@noemaviaggi.it Branch office Taormina Via Luigi Pirandello, 14  Tel. +39.0942.62.53.23 Fax +39.0942.62.56.12 Branch office Cefalù Via XXV Novembre, 29 Tel. e Fax:  +39.0921.92.23.94/  +39.0921.92.29.32 Travel Agency Palermo: Via Gioacchino di Marzo, 13-13A Tel. +39.091.30.06.75 Fax +39.091.30.25.21

Name: Rete Del Mediterraneo
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Foggia, 10 B Viale Degli Artigiani, 71121
Company description: Costituito integrando i settori ritenuti strategici ai fini della costruzione e della promozione di una destinazione turistica (tour operator, operatori della ricettività turistica, dell’enogastronomia, del marketing territoriale e operatori culturali), il contratto di Rete è aperto a qualsiasi azienda, ente e/o associazione che vuole realmente organizzare ed essere protagonista di un cambiamento. Non parliamo di un progetto in particolare, ma di un processo d'innovazione che permette di realizzare progetti di valorizzazione e commercializzazione di intere filiere che vogliono integrarsi tra loro. I finanziamenti ci sono ma le idee su come far diventare sostenibile un progetto? La Rete del Mediterraneo può aiutarti.

Name: Talin S.p.a. - Seating Solutions
HQ Location: Italy, Vicenza, Cornedo Vicentino, 2/4 Via Monte Ortigara, 36073
Company description: ≈ Talin on the market since 1955, designs and manufactures chairs, tables and complements for office and community with a complete production cycle. ≈ Our collections are usually proposed by architects, interior designers, contractors to fit out modern areas such as: meeting rooms, conference rooms, waiting rooms, auditoriums, hotels, shops, travel agencies, call centres, libraries, museums, hospitals, schools, universities, airports, clinics, restaurants, offices in general, bars and cafeterias, kitchens and home furnishings.   ≈ The office chairs departement is specialized in task, managerial and meeting chairs and armchairs. ≈ The community departement is concentrated in chairs, tables and complements for waiting areas, teaching, meeting, auditorium with specific attention to hospitals, hotels, airports, ports, schools, universities, restaurants, coffees, reading rooms, congressional and domestic. ≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈ ≈ Talin presente sul mercato dal 1955, progetta e produce a ciclo completo sedute, tavoli e complementi per ufficio e collettività. ≈ Le nostre collezioni sono solitamente proposte da architetti, interior designers e contractors e sono progettate per l’allestimento di aree moderne come sale riunioni, sale conferenze, sale d'attesa, auditorium, hotel, negozi, agenzie di viaggio, call center, biblioteche, musei, ospedali, scuole, università, aeroporti, cliniche, ristoranti, uffici in genere, bar e mense, cucine e complementi d'arredo. ≈ Nell'ambito delle sedute per ufficio la Talin è specializzata nei prodotti operativi, direzionali e meeting/incontro. ≈ La proposta volta alla collettività include invece sedute, tavoli e complementi destinati all’arredo di sale attesa, didattiche, riunione, auditorium negli ambiti: ospedaliero, ufficio, alberghiero, aeroportuale, navale, scolastico, universitario, ristorazione, caffetteria, lettura, bibliotecario, congressuale e domestico.

Name: LeaderVacanze Srl
Company description: Siamo nati nel 1998 e i nostri clienti sono esclusivamente aziende interessate a soluzioni di marketing B2B. La nostra decennale esperienza ci ha portato ad accumulare un prezioso know-how nel sviluppare progetti di  marketing personalizzati adatti a  trovare soluzioni operative e logistiche per chi  intenda acquisire nuova clientela, impadronirsi del mercato e catturare la preferenza del consumatore, o semplicemente fidelizzare il proprio parco clienti, tutto questo con il prodotto vacanza. Il possesso della doppia licenza, Tour Operator/Booking ci permette di disporre pienamente e in prima persona delle convenzioni con le strutture ricettive, senza i limiti determinati da accordi unilaterali. L’assenza di intermediari migliora il rapporto con la clientela, rimarcato da una maggior coerenza e chiarezza della politica commerciale e alimentato dal contatto diretto. Indagini motivazionali e qualitative accertano che la vacanza e’ il premio piu’ ambito, infatti, rimane il piu’ appropriato e quello di maggiore successo, grazie all’alto valore aggiunto che ne deriva e che supera, di gran lunga, il suo reale valore economico.

Name: RitAIr
Company description: Ritardo Aereo ( RitAIr 🌎) offers assistance to passengers worldwide, helping them obtain rightful compensation for inconveniences caused by airlines. With PayNow Innovative Travel Solutions, we offer B2B ancillary services to protect your customers and your business. Are you a Travel Agency, OTA, TMC, GDS, accommodation facility, parking near the airport, or a car rental company? Discover our PAY NOW services .

Name: Garda South Cycling
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Peschiera Del Garda, 35 Via Bell'italia, 37019
Company description: Garda South Cycling is a bike rental and sales company based in Peschiera del Garda, operating since 2014. We provide comprehensive cycling solutions across Northern Italy for both private clients and tourism professionals. We serve both B2C (tourists, families, schools, athletes) and B2B (tour operators, travel agencies, hotels, events), delivering reliable, personalized, and high-quality services. Our fleet includes around 500 bikes, including e-bikes, road bikes, gravel, and trekking bikes, suitable for all levels — from beginners to experienced cyclists. In addition to rentals and sales (new and used), we offer professional transfer services for people, bikes, and luggage, covering airports, train stations, and accommodations. We also organize guided cycling tours and cultural experiences across Northern Italy — from food and wine tastings, fresh pasta and tortellini workshops, to cooking classes and city tours. Our itineraries include local experiences on Lake Garda, cultural rides through Milan, and immersive routes designed to explore the territory through its flavors, history, and traditions. With years of experience and a quality-driven approach, we cover every key area of the bike economy: sustainable mobility, cycling tourism, logistics, retail, technical support, and experiential travel. 👉 Since 2014, your trusted partner for exploring Northern Italy by bike!

Name: TOURISM IN ITALY
Company description: TOURISM IN ITALY APTN is an international network operating in the tourism industry since 2006. Dealing exclusively with Italian incoming tourism trends, It gathers only the best among Italian tourist operators. Tourism in Italy provides support and assistance to: -Well-off families looking for safety & exclusivity in Italy; -UHNWIs & HNWIs who are comfort and excellence oriented but looking at the same time for new and exciting experiences in Italy; -Enterprises, Delegations and Individuals who need to organize incentive trips, business trips and weddings in Italy; -Tour Operators, D.M.C. and Travel Agencies looking for agreements with Italian tourist operators to satisfy the needs of the mentioned above categories. The high quality standards of each member and the verticalization on which the network has been thought and developed, award TORUSIM IN ITALY APTN as a unique organization.

Name: Xjourney.travel
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Odivelas, 4 R. Fernando Namora, 2675-487
Company description: EMOTIONS AND LIFESTYLE TRAVEL Tudo faremos, para que a sua viagem aconteça de uma forma única e memorável! A X Journey é uma boutique e luxury travel agency, fundada pelo Event Designer Carlos Medeiros e pelo Travel Expert Miguel Procópio e licenciada oficialmente pelo Turismo de Portugal (RNAVT 9004 ), entidade oficial turística de Portugal. Com mais de 25 anos na área de produção e planeamento de viagens exclusivas, decidiram unir as suas próprias experiências de emoções e luxo ao longo dos anos e combinar o “know how” com o planeamento, o design e a produção. O resultado são viagens de paixão, com alma. Excelência, serviço personalizado e compromisso com todos os nossos parceiros e clientes é a nossa promessa. A X Journey tem os melhores parceiros nos mais diversos “hot spots” do Globo. Simplesmente os mais sofisticados hotéis e resorts, transfers de luxo e personalizados, espaços premium, guias com formação específica e os mais exímios e detalhistas DMCs locais.

Name: Cheqqer
Company description: Cheqqer is an independent holiday planning website where likeminded travelers exchange holiday recommendations and experiences on where to go and what to do. Whether it is Thailand on a shoestring with excellent nightlife and dining or a luxury vacation in Venice with lots of shopping and interesting attractions; Cheqqer helps you travel your way. “Cheqqer is the review site that collects and presents holiday recommendations from people like you” Cheqqer is a start-up funded by TUI Travel PLC, but operates completely independently from all TUI activities. TUI Travel PLC is with 30 million travellers the largest tour operator in the world, operating with over 300 brands in over 180 countries. In addition TUI Travel PLC owns more than 200 commercial websites that attract millions of users per day. Cheqqer is an open platform that will also partner with other tour operators outside of the TUI organization.

Name: THIS IS GOLF
Company description: THIS IS GOLF  is a golf company in the Netherlands. Promoter and organizer of European Tour Events (KLM Open, Abn Amro Ladies Open and Van Lanschot Senior Open). Publisher of the newspaper GOLF Weekly, organizer of business events and owner of the travel agency Pro Golf.

Name: Experience Summer Camp
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Busto Arsizio, 1b Via Iv Novembre N., 21052
Company description: Experience Summer Camp nasce nel 1985 sotto la denominazione di "Sport & Holidays" con l’obiettivo di proporre una vacanza sportiva non agonistica, per giovani dai 6 ai 19 anni, orientata verso lo sport, il divertimento, l’attività di gruppo in mezzo alla natura e la fraternizzazione tra i partecipanti.  Dal 2013 l'accordo di collaborazione tra Sports Promotion , Sport & Holidays (Tour Operator specializzata in vacanze sportive) e La Gazzetta dello Sport – RCS Group ha dato vita ai "Gazzetta Summer Camp", Camp Estivi Ufficiali del famoso quotidiano sportivo. Nel corso degli anni, Experience Summer Camp ha sviluppato nuove idee di vacanza finalizzate all’approfondimento di una singola disciplina sportiva o dedicate alle tante “passioni” dei giovani (fotografia, musica, lingue straniere, canto, danza, ecc...). In quest’ottica sono nate le proposte di camp tecnici, stage di alta qualificazione e camp tematici, sia al mare che in montagna.  I numeri - 176.249 persone ospitate agli Experience Summer Camp ad oggi; - 13.000 partecipanti all'anno e oltre 2000 persone tra tutor, istruttori, coordinatori e staff tecnico.; - 130 settimane complessive di camp organizzate ogni anno, divise per tipologia di camp e località (mare, montagna ed estero); - Oltre 450 realtà sportive coinvolte nei progetti targati Experience Summer Camp (società e club del calibro di FC Internazionale Milano, Arsenal FC, UC Sampdoria, Pallacanestro Varese, Fiorentina, Virtus Bologna, Pallacanestro Olimpia Milano, A.C. Roma, UYBA Busto Arsizio ecc.), oltre ad istituti scolastici (privati e non) ed associazioni; - 70 proposte di camp diverse divise in camp multisport, camp tecnici (calcio, basket, tuffi, ginnastica artistica ecc.), tematici (inglese & sport, fotografia, danza ecc.) e vacanze all’estero.

Name: Grecia365 Di Karlitalia Tour Operator Srl
Company description: Siamo operatori turistici innamorati persi della Grecia. È la nostra seconda patria, con i suoi panorami indimenticabili e la straordinaria ospitalità dei suoi abitanti.  Offriamo e garantiamo qualità, assistenza, professionalità e attenzione ai dettagli, per ogni tipo di esigenza. Dal 1995, organizziamo viaggi individuali, aziendali e di gruppo in Grecia e tutto ciò che proponiamo lo abbiamo provato e scelto personalmente. Conosciamo le destinazioni e abbiamo selezionato i servizi, operando in sinergia con le strutture del posto. La nostra esperienza e profonda conoscenza del territorio è il nostro know how. Il nostro obiettivo è portarvi a conoscere e amare una Grecia meno stereotipata. Ci rivolgiamo a chi desidera viaggiare in modo indipendente ma organizzato. Dal volo o dal viaggio in nave, vi accompagniamo in tutto il vostro itinerario e vi proponiamo escursioni e attività esclusive. Realizziamo anche viaggi ad hoc, su misura delle esigenze e delle richieste dei clienti, offrendo sempre il meglio nel rispetto delle possibilità di budget.  __ Karlitalia Tour Operator nasce nel lontano 1995 e stagione dopo stagione, grazie alla grande passione per la Grecia, si è trasformata in un'organizzazione che negli anni ha fatto della forte specializzazione del territorio greco il suo punto di forza. Nel 2017 Karlitalia arricchisce le sue proposte con l'acquisizione di Incentive System, storico marchio bolognese in Portogallo, Turchia e Cipro - che è tornato a pieno titolo alla famiglia Karlitalia per metodologia di programmazione, professionalità e competenza. Nel 2019 sono nati i marchi Exclusive Greece e Outdoor Experience Travel, per rispondere alle esigenze sempre più mirate e particolari dei clienti.

Name: Nitrodi Viaggi | Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Barano D'ischia, 159 Via Vincenzo Di Meglio
Company description: Nitrodi Viaggi Tour Operator, nato nel 1992, che, grazie alla sua straordinaria capacità di imporsi sul mercato turistico, è stata in grado di crescere così tanto da diventare un punto di riferimento per centinaia di adv, che organizzano per la loro clientela la vacanza o l’evento in Campania, Sicilia, Puglia, Calabria e Basilicata. Con la sua esperienza professionale maturata in tanti anni di attività ed i consolidati rapporti di partnership con le più qualificate aziende del settore turistico, Nitrodi Viaggi è in grado di assistere qualsiasi tipo di clientela in modo completo offrendo servizi con i più alti standard qualitativi, garantendo performance di assoluta eccellenza. In particolare Nitrodi Viaggi può fornire sistemazioni alberghiere di ogni livello, servizi di biglietteria on line sia aerea (IATA) che ferroviaria (Trenitalia), per il management congressuale, management del business travel e management dell’incentive e special events. Pubblichiamo per il mercato Italia due cataloghi turistici, di cui uno tutto Campania e Isole ed un altro che comprende Sicilia, Isole Eolie, Isole Egadi, Ustica, Favignana, Lampedusa, Pantelleria, Calabria e Basilicata, che prevedono soluzioni di soggiorno per tutti i gusti, dalla più classica vacanza mare a quella benessere, che vengono distribuiti ad oltre 2500 agenzie di viaggio italiane.

Name: Zepponi Group
Company description: Agenzie Viaggi e Turismo - Noleggio autobus, minibus ed autovetture con conducente - Tour Operator. Un gruppo composto dai marchi Zepponi Tours e Federico II Viaggi, da 30 anni leader nel settore del leisure e del business travel. Punti di forza: ampio risalto alle risorse umane, convinti che la conoscenza e la professionalità, possa ancora fare la differenza

Name: Viloratour Srl
Company description: Viloratour è un marchio creato oltre 20 anni fa, una realtà aziendale dalla lunga tradizione che rappresenta oggi un operatore turistico all’avanguardia, tra i più apprezzati.     Grazie alla accurata scelta dei fornitori, alla sensibilità nei confronti del cliente e all’abilità nel proporre pacchetti di qualità altamente convenienti, Viloratour è da tempo marchio leader nel settore Gruppi in bus o aereo in Italia ed Europa. Nel 1993, per soddisfare la richiesta di soggiorni individuali da parte... Name: Eden Travel Group
Company description: Eden Travel Group is a leading player in Italian travel industry, active in the fields of tour operating, hotellerie and DMC. Eden Viaggi boasts a wide range of travel solutions: from Eden Village, which offers all-in holidays at vacation villages in Italy and many other exotic locations, to alternative holiday ideas by Eden Margò, up to sartorial travel experiences crafted by Eden Made.  Eden Italy is the incoming DMC division of Eden Viaggi and is targeted to European travel agencies and tour operators. Eden Hotels is a chain of prestigious hotels and resorts in Sicily, Sardinia, Marche and Umbria (Italy). Finally, Turisanda, which marks the history of Italian tourism since 1924, offers all-in holidays at premium international resorts in the world.

Name: Trentino Holidays
HQ Location: Italy, Trentino-alto Adige, Trento, 78 Via Dei Solteri, 38121
Company description: Vacanze in montagna. Ogni giorno, straordinario. Trentino holidays è un operatore specializzato nella vacanza in montagna, Trentino, Alto Adige, Dolomiti Venete, Valtellina, Valle d’Aosta e Tirolo Orientale (Austria). La scelta spazia dalle Dolomiti Venete fino ai gruppi montuosi dell’Adamello Ortles Cevedale, dai grandi altipiani al Lago di Garda, da Trento città d’arte e del Concilio, ai parchi naturali, dalle località termali ai ghiacciai per la pratica dello sci estivo, tanto da rendere l’offerta “montagna” completa sotto tutti i punti di vista. Trentino holidays è un tour operator di proprietà dell’Unione Albergatori del Trentino. Operiamo sul mercato da 38 anni e mettiamo a tua disposizione il nostro servizio Clienti che potrà aiutarti nella scelta della tua destinazione per rendere la tua vacanza unica ed indimenticabile. In estate l’ambiente è la nostra più grande ricchezza, che da sempre tuteliamo e curiamo per regalarvi esperienze vere. Le nostre destinazioni sono ricche di sentieri, itinerari e percorsi ciclabili adatti a tutte le esigenze, è il luogo ideale per dedicarsi a una salutare attività circondati dalla natura. In inverno troverete piste leggendarie, angoli segreti, scenari naturali unici e stazioni sciistiche adagiate ai piedi delle Dolomiti, le più belle montagne del mondo, Patrimonio dell’Umanità per l’Unesco.

Global Events has invested in 13 executives whose qualifications cover thoroughly all the range of the company's activities. Reliability, professionalism, trust, discreet management, flexibility and human relations are values that have been cultured between the company and its clients in Greece and abroad.

NSM Group is an Incentive Travel House and Tour Operator too and can manage your event logistics and take care of your participants throughout their journey. Whether you are hosting corporate events, small-scale business meeting, birthdays or anniversaries, Spazio Cairoli is a distinctive and functional structure combining characteristic design and being flexible for a different number of setups. We ensure each guest enjoys a high-quality, bespoke service in an idyllic and inspirational location in the historic centre of Milan.

Profesorado (CLIL, Erasmus), Colonias, Extraescolares, Vacaciones en familia + idiomas, Servicios, etc. ¡La mejor forma de aprender es vivirlo! Una planificación detallada, junto con un asesoramiento profesional y una atención exclusiva a nuestros clientes son nuestro valor añadido y tu total garantía. LEOH idiomas - Educación Internacional y Viajes (International language schools and trips SL) is an Educational travel agency founded in 2015 in Barcelona, with the aim of counselling, advicing and giving the opportunity to all our students access to international education (languages, High school programmes, summer camps, University etc.), and also give the opportunity for other students to come to Spain for the same programmes. We prepare tailor made programmes inbound and outbound to all our students. LEOH goals are to give the chance and facilitate the needs and aspirations of all the people, adult and young people to achieve their goals and be able to receive as much education, training, culture and experience as they could, and the best way to do it is travelling, doing immersion programmes, studying abroad or simply travelling for playful, cultural or social purposes. LEOH takes the best things related with Education and culture of every country and we advise the people, bringing the chance to everyone to study and/or travel abroad, encouraging them to visit the world, increasing all their knowledge about the countries, and also their skills and life experience...

Name: SBS Travel
Company description: Wir sind ein Kur und Wellness Reiseveranstalter. Unser Konzept: B2B - kein Endkundenvertrieb. SBS Travel ist ein junges Unternehmen das von Erfahrung der Gründer profitiert und sich auf den Weg macht, in wenigen Jahren zum bedeutendsten Anbieter der Kuraufenthalte im deutschsprachigen Raum und GUS- Länder zu werden.  Wir nutzen die Synergien der Outsourcing, um unseren Partnern die bestmöglichen Konditionen zur gewohnt hochkaratigen Leistungen anzubieten. In der ersten Phase konzentrieren wir uns auf den russischsprachigen Markt sowohl in GUS-Länder als auch in Deutschland wo über 4 Millionen aus UdSSR stammigen Menschen zur Zeit leben.  Die meisten davon kennen und schätzen tschechische und slovakische Kurorte noch aus der Zeit als die zum einen Land gehörten. Diese Kundschaft ist von der Nostalgie getrieben! Andererseits hat sie sich schon an den westlichen Service- Standards gewöhnt.  Eben diesen Spagat aus Qualität und Behaglichkeit vermittelt SBS an deren Partner in dem sie die nicht nur mit guten Preisen sondern auch mit hochqualifizierter Vertriebsunterstützung beliefert.

Thanks to our efficient processes and highly qualified Operation team, we have an average answering ratio of 24h, with a very high attention to detail at all times. Furthermore, we are committed to innovation through the development of two concepts which include our Experience Manager and our Shopping concept. An Experience Manager is an expert guide in Spanish culture, customs, history, cuisine and the city he hosts: its fashionable stores, special restaurants, craft and design shops, etc. He is a close companion who has extensive knowledge of worldwide cultures, their tastes, preferences, concerns and will be at your service to meet them.  Spain is a shopping destination par excellence. Competitive prices, quality of workmanship and the exquisite level of design make this country an irresistible shopper´s Paradise. This incredible shopping opportunity is made easy by knowing where to go and making everything available to customers, adding value to their experience. We will arrange the shopping experience to suit any needs. We are based worldwide with offices in Barcelona, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Marbella and Madrid. The close proximity to our agencies and being fully aware of the needs and customs of their customers; our expertise in Spain for many years, combined with very competitive wholesale prices is definitely our major competitive edge.

Name: DANCE TRAVEL
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 4 Calle De Medea, 28037
Company description: ¿QUE ES DANCE TRAVEL? El mundo cambia, las nuevas tecnologías hacen que hoy en día todo deba adaptarse a los tiempos que corren, y las agencias de viaje no son una excepción. DANCE TRAVEL es una Agencia de Viajes online/offline creada por profesionales con más de 15 años de experiencia en Turismo. Dentro de la estructura de la empresa podemos diferenciar varios departamentos y tipos de producto: 1/ Congresos de Baile(salsa, bachata, kizomba, tango, ...) - Para el asistente al congreso:Reserva de vuelos, buses, trenes, hoteles, Full Pass y todo lo necesario para asistir como participante a un congreso.  Ayuda en la reserva a congresos para grupos, escuelas y academias de baile. - Para el organizador del congreso o festival: Asesoramiento, búsqueda de espacios, negociación de tarifas, gestión de venta de entradas, creación de booking para reserva de alojamiento a asistentes, DJ, fotógrafos, ...     2/ Organización de Viajes de Grupo: Gestión de Grupos Deportivos, Escolares, viajes de empresa, incentivos, mayores, asociaciones,... 3/ Eventos de empresa: reserva de salas para reuniones, congresos de empresa, viajes temáticos. 4/ Gestión de billetes aéreos, Alquiler de coches, buses, entradas a monumentos, espectáculos, conciertos.   5/ Departamento Vacacional: viajes individuales, familiares, amigos, lunas de miel, estancias cortas, escapadas, grandes viajes, cruceros, etc...   GESTOR A DOMICILIO. Hoy en día el ritmo de vida hace que en ocasiones sea imposible coincidir en horarios con la agencia de viaje. Por ello muchos recurrimos a internet desde nuestra casa. Hay casos en los necesitamos ayuda, asesoramiento y alguien de confianza más allá de la pantalla de nuestro ordenador. Nuestro Gestor de DANCE TRAVEL acudirá sin compromiso a tu casa o lugar de trabajo a llevarte la información, explicarte todas las dudas o preparar vuestro viaje.  Dance Travel es una Agencia de Viajes adaptada a satisfacer las necesidades del viajero de hoy.

Name: UNIT.TRAVEL

Complete booking solution: hotels, flights, dynamic packages, cruises, transfers, cars, excursions - real-time inventory from multiple suppliers on one platform | Instant confirmations | Multi-currency payments | Multilingual interface with 24/7 support | Secure, licensed operations. Competitive pricing that works for you: multi-supplier sourcing delivers competitive B2B rates so you can optimize mark-ups and maximize commissions. Built to convert and scale: Professional UX that converts at OTA level | Tools to acquire and retain clients  |Free mini-site for independent advisors |F ull white-label for established agencies. Launch in days, not months - no developers, no technical investment required. We succeed only when you succeed. Your growth is our mission.

Name: Hamilton Travel
