Since then the company has expanded steadily, sending Maltese tourists to more and more new destinations. During 2011 and 2012, 150 tours were successfully organised and the annual figure of Maltese tourists travelling with Hamilton Travel grew to over 20,000.  The most popular and successful tours have always been to Paris and Disneyland, to the UK, Costa Brava in Spain, Sicily and Italy.  However, tours available today range from trips to New York, Los Angeles, Las Vegas, the West Coast and Orlando in America, including cruises in the Caribbean and Bahamas, to Istanbul and Antalya in Turkey, to North Africa, to cruises around Europe and the Mediterranean, and to various other countries, including Scandinavia, Holland, Belgium, Germany, Switzerland, Spain, Portugal, the Czech Republic, Slovenia, France, Italy and the UK. Our offices are situated on the Granaries in Floriana, just outside the capital city of Valletta. In Gozo, we are represented by Links Travel in Rabat, for the convenience of our clients on Malta’s sister island.  Our staff are highly trained, motivated and experienced in this line of business and we are familiar with the latest technologies relevant to the industry.  We employ the best tour leaders on the island, who are hand picked, trained and assigned to their specialised destinations.  The company now boasts 15 full-time staff, six part-timers and over 40 tour leaders. We keep an eye on the latest trends in international travel, and do our best to cater to market needs.Our motto, which is included in our mission statement, has always been “quality affordable tours” and our aim is being met, as can be evidenced by the positive feedback we receive from our clients. Hamilton Travel, in essence, is an incoming and outgoing tour operator, organising its own tours, constantly in search of great deals with airlines, cruise liners, hotels, cars and coach companies.  We also cater for individual travellers who may opt to travel alone for leisure or business purposes, and are also equipped to help soon-to-be-wed couples organise their dream honeymoon. Flights, accommodation, car hire, trains, football and concert and theatre tickets may all be booked through Hamilton Travel. The company is one of the top three outgoing travel enterprises on the island. Since 1996, Hamilton Travel has been the exclusive Malta General Sales Agent for one of the world’s top cruise line companies – MSC Crociere.  Over 8,000 Maltese people travel on cruises out of Malta each year.  Our company also carries out shore excursions for the foreign passengers on board the MSC ships. We are one of the leading companies in MICE and are the local representatives for several European travel agents for group and individual travel, organising flights, hotel and private apartment accommodation, sightseeing tours, transfers and private chauffeur and self drive cars for people attending MICE conferences. We also provide a personal meet and greet service at the airport or/and sea port. Air Malta, our island’s national carrier, counts Hamilton Travel as its number one partner in the Maltese travel business, both in the incoming and outgoing sectors. We specialise in outgoing and incoming tours together with ensuring the requirements of individual travellers are met. We are proud to form part of the main tour and individual travel operators in Malta.

Name: Puglia Private Tour
Company description: Puglia Private Tour is an incoming tour operator based in Bari in Italy. We would like to play an essential complementary role in organising your holiday by providing a range of optional services in Apulia and the Basilicata, such as accommodation in charming hotels or cosy apartments, passenger transfers in cars with drivers, sightseeing tours by plane, cultural tours, special visits to olive mills, wine tastings, cooking classes etc. Gourmet Food and wine tours, cooking classes wine and olive oil tastings: Puglia private tour is an incoming travel agency and tour operator based in Bari in Apulia. We cooperate with Alltimevacation in order to give our customers to select from many holiday homes and apartements and book directly with the owners, while Puglia Private Tour offers additional services on request in Apulia. We can organize cooking classes, wine and olive oil tastings or guided thematic tours of Bari, Lecce, Alberobello, Matera (in nearby Basilicata) and so on. Please do not hesitate to contact us and we will be happy to send you an offer.

Name: India Travel
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Amstelveen, 71 Gijsbrecht Van Amstellaan, 1181ek
Company description: We at India Travel.nl provide our customers with all one might need to commence planning their trip to India. We provide our customers with complete tour packages; this includes offering an interface for car rental services, as well as electronic travel guides for orientation. In the near future we seek to broaden our range of services to include an interface for flight and hotel bookings.  Our ambition at India Travel.nl is to provide every customer with value based solutions. India Travel.nl strives to lead the market in terms of quality services offered at affordable rates. It is our way of making India more accessible, thus bringing India to you. Our mission is to provide travelers worldwide with all their needs to plan their travel to India, for a reasonable price, delivered consistently in a simple, accessible and comprehensive manner. Our diverse portfolio gives you a strong base to begin planning your holidays, whereas the fact that we only provide our holiday packages individually, provides us with the flexibility to accommodate for all your personal wishes.  India Travel works with a team of young Indian freelancers, through a pay-roll construction aligning incentives. The financial rewards are directly proportioned to service level maintained. Hence, the company structure is designed to maintain high quality service as our priority

Name: Alfamaritime Ltd
Company description: Yachting and travel agency providing proffessional services to the visiting yachts such as berthing, custom clearence, fuel, provisioning etc. Founded by a Naval Architect and Marine Engineer, We feel proud that Alfamaritime has blossomed into a professional, international team. We are firmly customer focused and as such strive to ensure that every aspect of your contact with us leaves you utterly satisfied. Alfamaritime offers unrivaled personal service and bright enthusiastic staff. Our office is located right on the Mandraki Harbour in Rhodes to ensure that we are always close at hand for visiting yachts to this beautiful port. Of course our services encompass the whole cruising region of Greece and her surroundings ensuring that Alfamaritime can guide you around this rich and varied setting.

Name: ASTUR Education
Company description: Welcome to ASTUR! We are a language tour operator, concentrating on educational programmes four adolescents and young adults, located in Fulda. Since our foundation in the year 1986, we have been creating educational content, teaching languages and promoting intercultural exchange. ASTUR brings together people from all across the world through our various programmes with destinations in Germany and Europe - from international Summer Camps and tailor-made Language Travel or  Highschool programmes to Class Trips and preparatory College Pathway Courses. Every year we welcome about 15,000 international participants to Germany and we are happy and proud to be able to make our internationally diverse customer base more familiar with German language, culture and way of life.

Name: Itinera Servizi Turistici
Company description: Itinera Servizi Turistici was founded in 1997 to provide incoming touristic services in Piedmont. We come forth to be your single reference point during conception, design process and arrangement of touristic services in Piedmont. Thanks to our multilingual staff our services can be carried out in the main European and world languages. As an incoming touristic services company we work together with tour operators, public institutions, private companies, and associations. Our services range from guided city visit and nature walking, to assistance for events, translations and interpreting.

Name: SWING Golf Ireland
Company description: Swing Golf Ireland has been in the golf tour business for over 30 years and operates a highly professional ground handling and tee-time reservation service where golfers can avail of a range of services including friendly advice and planning and the organization of complete golf vacations and golfing package. SWING ensures our visiting golfers have a once in a lifetime experience on the fairways of Ireland. SWING Golf’s operations cover golf in all of Ireland and not just the South West of Ireland and services individuals, large groups and corporate trips. SWING’s popularity is recognized by many tour operators worldwide who also use its services. The company is present at many golf tournaments and trade shows worldwide. SWING’s success is based on being able to offer a world-class golf destination in an idyllic setting and its renowned quality of customer service.

Name: Yellow Zebra Bikes And Segways
Company description: Established in 2001 in Budapest, Hungary, Yellow Zebra Tours is an American-Hungarian privately owned company focusing working mainly within the Hungarian domestic city tour market. We offer entertaining, innovative, and interactive bike and Segway tours for a wide range of individuals and groups in Budapest, as well as bike rental and an English language bookstore. We can provide up to 250 bikes and 50-75 Segways at one time and have extensive experience working with large groups for incentive and team building activities.   We only use experienced and qualified local licensed guides, conforming with Hungarian tourism laws. Yellow Zebra is branded Trademark and we are a fully registered, licensed and bonded Hungarian tour operator and travel agent.

Name: Inovtravel
HQ Location: Portugal, Azores, Ponta Delgada, 235 Estrada De São Gonçalo, 9500-343
Company description: Created in 2011 with the main purpose of promoting and selling Portugal in North America and Europe, Inovtravel is a modern and innovative Tour Operator and DMC that offers a wide range of products and services for any travel agency, tour operator or online travel agency that wants to add Portugal to its portfolio of destinations. With offices in the Azores Islands and in Boston, Inovtravel is an IATA (#64212116) and ARC (#22547615) Certified Agency that currently serves as a DMC for a few big players like Delta Vacations in the US and Secret Escapes in the UK, as well as hundreds of independent travel agencies in the US, Canada and Europe. Inovtravel alleviates the headache of planning by providing an array of turnkey packages and travel options, connecting your clients to top insider experiences in Portugal curated by our team of local experts. We provide a wide range of solutions for small independent travel agencies, specialized tour operators, big tour operators, travel management companies and OTAs. Inovtravel is also the owner of the B2C online brand Azores Getaways

Name: Umbrella Holiday S.r.o.
Company description: Our team has many years' experience in the tourist industry. We also cooperate closely with German travel agency KDE Reisen GmbH, working together to provide travel agency services in both the Czech Republic and Germany.  We will arrange everything you need for your holiday – itinerary, accommodation, transport, as well as reservations and entrance fees at any places you would like to visit.  We will tailor your holiday exactly to your needs – on land, at sea, in Europe, or in a choice of exotic destinations.  We listen to our clients and guarantee them a unique travel experience. Umbrella works in synergy with its sister companies, Umbrella Coach & Buses, which offers coach transport services, and Umbrella Yacht, which is a yacht charter specialist.

Name: Maxitours
Company description: Présent depuis 35 ans sur le marché belge, Maxitours est le Tour Opérateur de référence pour l’organisation de tous les voyages en Roumanie en Monténégro. Plus de 250.000 voyageurs de toute nationalité lui ont fait confiance. Son équipe composée de natifs passionnés sillonne chaque année cet étonnant pays latin enclavé dans une Europe de l’Est très slave. Suivant l’évolution de la demande européenne, Maxitours offre une réponse d’expert apte à satisfaire les aspirations d’un public exigeant. Il visite et explore constamment de nouveaux lieux et hôtels dont l’offre ne cesse de s’étoffer en quantité et en qualité. Il organise des séjours sur mesure pour tous les goûts et budgets. Individuel, groupe, détente ou business, à la mer ou en montagne, au soleil ou sous la neige, tout est possible :de la formule “Fly & Drive”, la location simple de voiture, l’organisation d’incentives, de meetings aux forfaits Plage, Thalasso et autres circuits City trips, culturels, nature ou aventure … Sa parfaite connaissance du terrain, des transports aériens à tous les services terrestres lui permet d’offrir les meilleurs produits du marché pour un rapport qualité-prix totalement imbattable. Lifestyle Holidays est bien leurs conviction et leur force de concepteurs d’espace pour vivre ses vacances, préoccupés d’apporter à leurs clients la satisfaction plénière de vraies vacances réussies! C’est bien cette force que ils ont acquiert au bout de 35 années d’existence, qui les guidera tout au long du processus de sélection des programmes afin de vous présenter votre espace du "lifestyle vacances"​.

Name: SAITAS Travel
Company description: Kelionių agentūra SAITAS, įkurta 1992 metais, viena pirmųjų Lietuvoje pradėjo atstovauti Lietuvos ir užsienio aviakompanijoms ir siūlyti profesionaliai organizuotas keliones. Nuo 1997 metų agentūrai suteiktas Tarptautinės oro transporto asociacijos IATA statusas, kuris suteikia garantiją, kad SAITO siūlomų produktų bei paslaugų kokybė ir darbuotojų kvalifikacija atitinka tarptautinius reikalavimus.  Misija: Siūlyti tik kokybiškas ir geriausiai Jūsų poreikius atitinkančias turizmo paslaugas. Kodėl mes skaičiais: ► Kelionių organizavimo patirtis nuo 1992 metų ► Organizavom keliones į daugiau nei +100 pasalio šalių ► Aptarnavome daugiau nei +3500 Lietuvos ir užsienio įmonių ► Saito klientų skaičius jau perkopė +40000 turistų ► Vidutinė darbuotojo patirtis įmonėje +13 metų Daug metų aptarnaujame užsienio svečius, atvykstančius į pažintines, poilsines keliones bei sporto renginius: Novaturas, TEZ TOUR, TUI, Neckermann Reisen, Thomas Cook, Meier’s Weltresen, DERTOUR, 1-2 Fly, ITAKA ir kt. Daugiau nei 10 metų dirbame su didžiausiomis kruizinėmis kompanijomis, todėl galime pasiūlyti Jums aplankyti įvairiausius pasaulio kampelius ne tik keliaujant lėktuvu, bet ir plaukiant ištaigingais kruiziniais laivais: Royal Caribbean Int, MSC Cruises, Norwegian Cruise Line, Costa Cruises, Cunard, Princess Cruises, Celebrity Cruises, Azamara, Carnival. Holland America Line.  Klientai kuriais didžiuojamės: Vidaus reikalų ministerija (VRM), DHL, Zepter International, Orlen Lietuva, Omnitel, Lietuvos parolimpinis komitetas, Krašto apsaugos ministerija (KAM), Alita, Lengvosios atletikos federacija, AVON, Hanner, Topcentras, Stumbras, Lietuvos Tautinis Olimpinis komitetas, FIBA Europe, LR Teisingumo Minsterija, LRS Lietuvos Respublikos Seimas, Achema, LKF Lietuvos krepšinio federacija, ACME Europe, Kauno Technologijos universitetas (KTU), Kauno miesto savivaldybė, Algol Pharma, Eoltas, Lietuvos darbo birža prie Socialinės apsaugos ministerijos, Vytauto Didžiojo Universitetas (VDU)

Name: Riviera Holiday Club Varna
Company description: Riviera Holiday Club Varna is multi-hotel vacation complex located in the northern part of the Bulgarian Black sea coast, outside Varna and close to Golden Sands - famous local sea resort. The complex provides all kinds of summer vacation facilities, including outside pools, tennis courts, restaurants and beach bars, as well as children areas. Apart from that, Riviera offers various fully equipped business rooms and halls of different types and sizes, suitable for all kinds of business events, such as meetings, team-buildings, conferences, and more.

Name: Greentours
HQ Location: Greece, Central Macedonia, Kilkís, 38th Kostis Palamas St, 61100
Company description: With respect to the environment, the culture, the history, the ethos and status, we are taking you to known and unknown parts of Greece with great ecological, geological, historical and cultural value.  a licensed travel agency and tour operator in Greece, specializing in adventure, wildlife, cultural and city holidays

Name: Primavera Viaggi - Vacanze Studio All'estero
Company description: Da oltre 30 anni Primavera Viaggi è un tour operator specializzato in Vacanze Studio all’estero.  ESPERIENZA & AFFIDABILITA' Offriamo programmi di alta qualità, viaggiando regolarmente per trovare le destinazioni migliori e selezioniamo in prima persona le strutture da proporre, lavorando a stretto contatto con le organizzazioni locali. Partecipiamo inoltre alle principali fiere del settore per tenerci sempre aggiornati e offrire programmi sempre più interessanti! ASSISTENZA La nostra professionalità è al tuo servizio per organizzare programmi adatti ad ogni esigenza. Grazie ad informazioni dettagliate ed un’assistenza costante il nostro team vi seguirà in tutto il percorso, dalla scelta della Vacanza Studio più adatta alle vostre esigenze fino al rientro in Italia. Sappiamo che per molti ragazzi può essere la prima esperienza senza genitori e restiamo sempre in contatto con gli accompagnatori e le scuole locali per assicurarci che tornino dalla loro vacanza studio con splendidi ricordi.   QUALITÀ & RICONOSCIMENTI Qualità certificata di scuole e programmi. Con la nostra esperienza abbiamo selezionato le migliori scuole, certificate dagli enti locali competenti, che ne garantiscono standard e affidabilità: British Council, Eaquals, Feltom, Accet, Fle, Ceele, ecc... Al termine del soggiorno, inoltre, tutti gli studenti ricevono un attestato di frequenza riconosciuto. Primavera Viaggi è membro Assoviaggi ed è accreditata sul Registro Nazionale per l’Alternanza Scuola-Lavoro. Da oltre 30 anni siamo a vostra disposizione per organizzare programmi adatti ad ogni esigenza. SCOPRI TUTTI I NOSTRI PROGRAMMI – Vacanze Studio per ragazzi da 8 a 18 anni – Corsi di Lingua per adulti da 16 a 99 anni – Anno Scolastico all'Estero per studenti da 15 a 18 anni – Summer Camp  in Toscana per bambini da 8 a 13 anni – Work & Study all’Estero per ragazzi da 16 anni – Stage Linguistici all'Estero per ragazzi da 10 18 anni – Alternanza Scuola/Lavoro all’estero per ragazzi da 16 an

Name: Caldana Europe Travel
HQ Location: Italy, Brescia, Toscolano Maderno, 19 Via Benamati, 25088
Company description: Caldana Travel Service S.p.A. , azienda nata nel 1954, è il tour operator italiano specializzato in Viaggi di Gruppo in autopullman  in Europa e rappresenta una delle più radicate e conosciute realtà del turismo internazionale.  L'esperienza, la meticolosa conoscenza degli itinerari proposti, la cura nella scelta dei vettori, degli hotel, delle guide e degli accompagnatori e soprattutto l'ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo , sono gli ingredienti con i quali Caldana rende indimenticabili i viaggi in Europa di milioni di persone che si sono affidate alla sua organizzazione.

Name: Sato Tours
Company description: Sato Tours es un operador turístico fundado en 1989 en Viena que ofrece una amplia gama de circuitos en Europa del Este, Escandinavia, Rusia y Croacia, dirigido exclusivamente a clientes de América Latina. Nuestro equipo está formado por expertos en turismo con más de dos décadas de experiencia en el ámbito turístico, acompañados por especialistas en tecnología, marketing y business leaders enfocados en ofrecer un servicio y vivencias de viajes que cumplan con nuestra visión.

Name: Sol Y Ocio
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes minorista/mayorista especializada en GRUPOS, independiente, pertenecemos al grupo GEA y tenemos un catálogo de productos propios con viajes plaza a plaza y salidas desde Andalucía.   Somos EXPERTOS CONSULTORES con una dilatada experiencia profesional. Nuestra misión es ayudar a nuestros clientes a seleccionar y adquirir, en las mejores condiciones, los servicios que desea para su viaje, aparte de ofrecer un servicio personalizado y basado en nuestra NEUTRALIDAD en la eleccion de proveedores cuidando siempre los intereses del pasajero.   Antes, durante y después, son las tres fases de un viaje y esa asesoría y garantías, solamente se las puede ofrecer una agencia de viajes tradicional como nosotros.   Pero si usted solo da importancia al antes, algunos viajes ya se pueden reservar por internet a través de esta web, pero preferimos atenderle en nuestras oficinas puerta a calle. Siéntase a gusto en nuestras casas y deje que nosotros trabajemos para usted.   Nosotros si somos profesionales y ante cualquier incidencia, siempre nos va a tener a su disposición.   Nuestras oficinas centrales están en Ronda y recientemente y a pesar de la crisis hemos abierto una oficina nueva en Olvera   Si deseas contactar con nosotros por teléfono llámanos al 902 933 358 o al 95 287 41 40 (oficinas centrales) 956 12 00 77 (oficina de Olvera)

Name: Anek Lines Italia
Company description: Anek Lines Italia is Anek Lines' General Agent in Italy. ANEK LINES was, and still remains, the coastal navigation pioneer company. Modern passengers' vessels offer high quality services in domestic and international lines between Italy and Greece. Moreover, ANEK LINES' fleet is famous for its high standard of safety. All ANEK LINES vessels comply with the most recent safety rules set by the European Union. Moreover they are perfectly maintained to offer you the safety that is necessary in every journey. The Company also complies with the "International code for the safe operation of vessels and the protection of the sea environment" (ISM CODE). Our domestic lines (Piraeus- Chania and Piraeus- Heraklion) and Ionian lines (Patras - Igoumenitsa - Corfù) are served by large capacity vessels. The basic characteristics of all international and domestic lines are speed, luxury, comfort and safety. You will also find routes from Patras to Ancona with intermediate stop in Igoumenitsa with the comfortable, luxurious brand new vessels F/B "OLYMPIC CHAMPION" and F/B "HELLENIC SPIRIT". Since the beginning of 2005 the line connecting Venice to Corfù, Igoumenitsa and Patras has become operative. This new line is served with modern vessels, that is M/N Lefka Ori, M/N Sophocles V. and M/N Kriti. Besides being a shipping company that offers fast and luxurious vessels, Anek Lines Italia is also a Tour Operator.

Name: Gray Line Iceland
Company description: Gray Line Iceland is a fully licensed tour operator, travel agency, and coach company that has been in operation for more than 30 years.  It is one of the leading specialists in incoming tourism in Iceland, with a large selection of services available for individuals and groups. Its main goal is to give personal service, show flexibility and guarantee safety to all its customers. It organizes a wide variety of day tours, from basic coach tours to adventure tours. They have their own fleet of first-class coaches, with capacity ranging from 9 seats to 71 seats.  Gray Line Iceland is a member of Gray Line Worldwide. For 100 years, Gray Line has been the trusted name in sightseeing tours around the world. With tours and excursions in more than 700 locations, spanning six continents, it is the largest sightseeing company in the world.

Name: KONÁNIMA TRAVEL SOLUTIONS S.L.
Company description: Agencia de viajes orientada a Turismo Familiar innovador, responsable y comprometido NUESTRA IDEA Ofrecer a las familias la logística necesaria para disfrutar de una escapada de fin de semana con total libertad: un viaje que permita a los padres/madres reencontrarse como pareja/persona mientras los hij@s se divierten en nuestras casas de colonias como niñ@s libres de planes de adultos.  NUESTRA MISIÓN Dar un chute de energía positiva a las familias con hij@s, refrescar la convivencia entre sus miembros y provocar reencuentros felices. Ayudar a nuestros clientes para que continúen con éxito su vida familiar.  LA VISIÓN Mejorar la vida de muchas familias. Buscar soluciones en cualquier ámbito que permitan conciliar la vida entre todos los miembros de la familia.   Encontrar opciones que hagan compatible el rol de padres/madres con el resto de los roles que los definen como personas. Ofrecer alternativas de ocio a los niñ@s diseñando actividades que les diviertan y que al mismo tiempo les eduquen en valores y mejoren sus competencias. Comprometernos e implicar a nuestros clientes en proyectos solidarios de proximidad que ayuden a otras familias que se encuentren en situación de vulnerabilidad o en peligro de exclusión.  Hacer más sostenible el sector del Tiempo Libre, contratando sus servicios como parte indispensable de nuestro proyecto y dando a conocer su importante labor social.

Name: AST Group
HQ Location: Italy, Te, Tortoreto, Snc Lungomare Sud, 64018
Company description: AST Group è l’organizzazione delle competenze professionali maturate da Abruzzi Socialturist S.p.A. in oltre 40 anni di gestione del villaggio turistico Salinello Camping Village. In questo lungo periodo l’azienda ha vissuto l’intero percorso di evoluzione nel settore della ricettività turistica in Italia e nel Mediterraneo. Dal turismo pionieristico open air degli anni ’70 alle più contemporanee forme di godimento della vacanza nel terzo millennio. Il management di Abruzzi Socialturist ha imparato a leggere i trend nei comportamenti e aspettative dei clienti, ad interpretare le dinamiche del mondo professionale della distribuzione turistica, a sperimentare le soluzioni più avanzate della tecnologia informatica, ad allineare il proprio sistema di pianificazione e controllo alle esigenze di un contesto sempre più competitivo e all’evoluzione della normativa in materia societaria, a cogliere tutte le opportunità dell’impetuoso sviluppo del mondo on line. Dopo 40 anni ininterrotti di successi commerciali, costantemente tradotti in soddisfazione per gli investitori, la Società ha intrapreso nel 2020 il passo naturale di ampliamento del portafoglio prodotti espandendo la propria attività ricettiva dalla vacanza al mare alla vacanza in montagna affiancando al Salinello Camping Village di Tortoreto sulla riviera adriatica da 3.000 posti letto, l’hotel Aqua Montis di Rivisondoli, 4 stelle S da 80 suites. Al villaggio turistico marino più grande del centro sud Italia si aggiunge nel 2020 l’hotel più completo e confortevole della montagna appenninica. I numeri di AST Group (2020/2019): Presenze: 193.000 (2019) Performances dei canali: Diretti: +9%                     OTA: +19% Tour Operators: +15% Booking on Line: +11% (+300% 2019/2018) Gruppi: +4% % di risorse dedicate agli investimenti su fatturato: 30% circa nel 2020 Produttività per addetto dello staff commerciale:  +17% Produttività per mq.: +135% (2019/2009) Ebitda (in % su fatturato):  +30%

Name: First Reisebüro Wilmering
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Vechta, 44 Große Str., 49377
Company description: First Reisebüro Wilmering is a hospitality company based out of GROßE STR. 44, Vechta, Germany.

Name: Seataly & Svenobi Tour Operator
Company description: Con l'acquisizione del noto marchio SVENOBI, la SEATALY Tour Operator si presenta come il principale punto di riferimento delle agenzie di viaggio e dei suoi clienti per la scelta delle più incantevoli destinazioni aventi come protagonista il Mare Italia. SEATALY è in grado di associare la conoscenza del turismo con le più moderne tecnologie potendo contare su un team con esperienza pluriventennale che ben conosce l'offerta turistica e pertanto in grado di soddisfare le esigenze del "viaggiatore"​

Name: Brixia Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Brescia, 13 Via Aldo Moro, 25124
Company description: Brixia Tour Operator, nasce nei primi anni del secolo scorso e precisamente nel 1902 come Pro-Brixia ufficio viaggi e biglietterie, bus, treni, traghetti ed informazioni turistiche. Nel 1979 da pura agenzia viaggi, inizia la sua attività di Tour Operator avvalendosi della creatività, passione ed inventiva del suo titolare prima sviluppando i viaggi di gruppo e poi specializzandosi sulle mete Spagna, Ischia, Malta e Cipro, Egitto, Capoverde ed infine Cuba diventando un Tour Operator affermato, stimato ed amato da tutti, per il costante impegno e dedizione profusi per offrire un prodotto accessibile a tutti i viaggiatori senza mai dimenticare il rapporto qualità prezzo. Di anno in anno siamo cresciuti insieme alle nostre mete e questo ci ha consentito, come dice Herman Hesse, "di imparare, fare, guardare e ....viaggiare " insieme a loro.

Name: City Walkers Tours
Company description: Official Tour Operator based in Rome. Private or Group tours to the Colosseum, Vatican Museums transfers, and more! It started as a modest small business between a couple of young friends and growing since then together with our most valued partners and wonderful clients.

Name: Sand Tour
Company description: Sand Tour is an outgoing Italian Tour Operator specialized in destinations like Greece, Red Sea, Zanzibar, Maldives and Cuba . We also deal with tailor made travels in many destinations. www.sandtour.it

Name: Travelum SRL
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 8 Via Panfilio Castaldi, 20124
Company description: Travelum SRL è un Tour Operator e Agenzia Viaggi che opera nell'organizzazione di viaggi ed eventi e collabora con diverse catene alberghiere per la ricerca del personale.

Name: Destination Options
Company description: Destination Option is an incoming tour operator based in Italy , France ,  Morocco , Iran , Jordan & Jerussalem , Malaysia and Turkey with licensed tourism offices  and result of several years of experience in tourism business of the manager and a group of professional qualified experts and experienced guides .Established in 2009 . Our aim is to provide the highest quality in professional travel services including . Business Travel Incentive Groups and Conventions Tailor made F.I.T & Group Travels Accomaodation contracting Escorted Coach Tours Transfers and Excursions Special tours such as Art and History Tours, Exploring national parks . Name: BiHoliday
Company description: Sinonimo di qualità, unicità e affidabilità, oggi il gruppo BiHoliday è tra i principali protagonisti del settore turistico italiano. L’esperienza maturata negli ultimi 50 anni, nella cura di eventi sportivi e formativi, di business e di promozione, offre a BiHoliday la possibilità di realizzare progetti personalizzati nazionali e internazionali in grado di soddisfare le esigenze dei propri clienti. Asset aziendali sono: il Villaggio San Francesco, centro vacanze 5 stelle sul mare di Caorle. Grande struttura immersa in 33 ettari di terreni privati, dista appena 500 metri dalla sua spiaggia privata e offre 4 piscine, 3 ristoranti, un campo da tennis e un centro fitness.  Il Villaggio BiVillage, camping 4 stelle situato di fronte al mare a Fažana a sud dell’Istria. Sorge nei pressi di una spiaggia della Croazia e offre una piscina all’aperto, un ristorante alla carta e una vista sul Parco Nazionale di Brioni. L’ideale per una vacanza indimenticabile a stretto contatto con la natura. BiHoliday pianifica, organizza e gestisce ogni tipologia di evento aziendale e privato. Coordina con professionalità la pianificazione di ogni progetto in tutte le sue fasi. Offre un’assistenza completa in tutti gli aspetti legati all’organizzazione, per raggiungere con successo l’obiettivo prefissato con il cliente. BiBooking, tour operator Internazionale, grazie alle connessioni con operatori locali e amministrazioni pubbliche, ti farà conoscere da vicino il territorio e le sue diverse peculiarità.

Name: Cuba Buddy
Company description: Durch eine private Reise flammte bei uns die Begeisterung für Kuba auf. Wir haben angefangen, für Freunde und Kollegen reisen zu planen. Irgendwann haben uns Leute geschrieben, die wir gar nicht kannten. Diese hatten den Tipp von Leuten bekommen, die wir auch nicht mehr kannten. Das war für uns das Zeichen, dass wir gerade eine Sache wirklich gut machen. Wir hatten zeitgleich so viel Spaß dabei, dass wir Cuba Buddy gegründet haben. Inzwischen ist unser Team stark gewachsen und viele Dinge haben sich verändert. Einige sind geblieben: Die Leidenschaft individuelle Kubareisen zu planen und dabei weiterhin viel Spaß zu haben. Wir sind ganz bewusst auf Kuba spezialisiert, weil wir glauben, dass viele Menschen nur ein Mal in Ihrem Leben nach Kuba reisen und deshalb möchten wir uns völlig darauf fokussieren. Wir sind permanent in Kuba vor Ort, um neue Ideen zu sammeln und die aktuelle Lage zu kennen. Wir beschäftigen uns den gesamten Tag ausschließlich mit einem Thema und das heißt Kuba. Wir haben den Anspruch, die für Euch beste Kubareise zu organisieren. Dafür setzen wir zu Beginn alles daran wirklich zu verstehen, was Euch bewegt und worauf Ihr Wert legt. Wir planen jeden Tag Kubareisen und wissen, dass es für Euch vermutlich das einzige Mal sein könnte, dass Ihr nach Kuba kommt. Vielleicht ist es sogar ein Traum, den Ihr schon lange habt? Genau diesen Anspruch haben wir an die Reiseplanung. Cuba Buddy - Dein Reiseveranstalter für Kuba - www.cuba-buddy.de

Name: PROMETOUR ESPAÑA S.L.
Company description: PROMETOUR ESPAÑA S.L. es una agencia de viajes especializada en viajes educativos y lingüísticos formada por un grupo de profesionales procedentes de distintas partes del mundo, con espíritu joven y dinámico . Juntos formamos Prometour, una empresa avalada por casi treinta años de experiencia.   Conocemos la diferencia entre un viaje vacacional y un viaje educativo, esto es lo que nos distingue de otras agencias. Nuestro objetivo es ofrecer a nuestros clientes una experiencia única basada en el aprendizaje y en el conocimiento de lugares y culturas nuevas, siempre con la mejor relación calidad – precio. En nuestros principales destinos, todas las reservas las hacemos sin intermediarios, usando la autenticidad como elemento clave en la organización del viaje. El trabajo de Prometour es el resultado de la relación con nuestros clientes, aprendiendo de sus deseos y necesidades, adaptándonos continuamente al mercado.    Nacimos en 1992 de la ilusión de Stanislas, Xavier y Sebastien, tres jóvenes de nacionalidad francesa cuyos caminos se cruzaron durante una de sus aventuras en Canadá. Prometour nació de las ganas de promover las inmersiones lingüísticas en Quebec para fomentar el aprendizaje del francés entre los estudiantes de EEUU. Este proyecto nos posicionó como una agencia especializada en grupos. Gracias a su éxito, la empresa se expandió por Europa abriendo nuevas oficinas en París (1998) y Málaga (2000), ampliando y mejorando de esta forma su oferta. En 2015, Prometour continuó creciendo, esta vez en San Diego, bajo el nombre de Forum Language Experience. Con esta última expansión, la empresa se consolida en el mercado, como una agencia especializada en viajes educativos y de intercambio.

Name: Popular Travelers
HQ Location: Spain, Sta, Calle Las Palmas De Gran Canaria, 35450
Company description: Popular Travelers Instagram, like YouTube, Twitter and Facebook is the primary social network that distributes genuine information in real time, where the image - the photo shot or the video - is used to deliver a message. Who does Popular Travelers want to intercept? The objective is to target potential travelers segmented by: • charter villa packages • low-cost alternative holidays • tailor-made • incoming Nowadays, images instantly reach the final user, in our case the Follower, rather than just an article in a catalog, reviews on portals like TripAdvisor or travel agencies. Photography is the most effective means of communication to capture potential clients’ attention in the immediacy of the moment. The potential tourist shows greater need to touch different aspects of the travel experience, bypassing the interlocutors. He needs to see through the eyes of people that he trusts - in real time, often - the reality of the experience. Everyone would like to take a look behind the curtain. Just like at the Theater, the greatest curiosity comes from going "behind the scenes" and discovering the Theater’s secrets. Popular Travelers, in its way, allows the tourist to look behind the curtain and find how the service is delivered, from the flying experience to the on-site reception and from excursions to direct services given by people who work on the field.  Popular Travelers divulgates elements are that fundamental to assure that one can trust the operators of the sector, and confirms the quality of the investment to whom travels, and to its familiars.

Name: Turobserver
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Torremolinos, 15 Bloque 4 Avenida Manuel Fraga Iribarne, 29620
Company description: #PREDICTIONS #DECISIONMAKING #ACTIONPLANS #MARKETING #COMPETITIVENESS #PROMOTION #GOVERNANCE Turobserver's main objective is to increase the visibility and promotion of tourist destinations and help them to be more efficient in decision-making. Technological advances and Big Data give us the opportunity to improve the management of an increasingly demanding and competitive tourist destinations. Extracting data from over 250 information sources, analyzing it, shaping it and drawing conclusions, is the key to our success. Our platform and our Destination Diagnostic Reports offer an accurate snapshot, accompanied by conclusions and recommendations. Analysis of its distribution, evolution of the average price of the hotel offer, vacation rentals or flights, global satisfaction or traveler profile, are examples of the data that can be accessed with these 100% personalized reports, as easy to read, as to share. Turobserver is compatible with other systems, and our developers provide all the facilities for integration. In addition, we help destinations to boost their marketing and promote themselves through: • DESTINATION VIRTUAL WORKSHOPS • WEB PAGE OF THE DESTINATION • TOURIST CONSULTANCY • TRAINING FOR THE TOURISM SECTOR The Turobserver Destination Virtual Workshops are tailor-made virtual events that aim to boost the marketing of the destination, a new showcase through which try to seduce those players called to market its benefits. For tour operators and agencies, they are an opportunity to discover or rediscover new destinations. For local companies, a unique setting to meet, both with the tour operators and with the staff of the destination. Costa del Sol, Benidorm, Madeira, Granada, Andalusia, Costa Cálida, Almería or Roquetas de Mar have already opted for Turobserver to improve their management and promote co-governance, by supporting the local tourism business fabric.

Name: Hélice Viajes

Name: EVENTS ARENA
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 46 Carrer De Zamora, 08005
Company description: We are a B2B travel agency specializing in sports events and cultural experiences. Each day, we partner directly with the world’s leading sports organizations, travel providers, and event producers to deliver exceptional event and travel services to professionals in the industry. Our mission is to curate and promote unforgettable global experiences centered around sports, culture, and leisure. We prioritize long-term relationships with our partners, built on trust, growth, and sustainability. In addition to our core business, we actively collaborate with associations and NGOs to support social causes through targeted initiatives.

Name: CumLaude Travel
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 220 2-4 Carrer Del Torrent De L'olla, 08012
Company description: We are a wholesale and retail travel agency, proudly affiliated with the Catalan Association of Travel Agencies (ACAV), with over 28 years of industry experience. Specializing in school and immersive language trips, we manage over 35,000 bookings annually, delivering enriching and unforgettable experiences for students.

Name: Suny Travel Diving Agency
Company description: En Suny Travel Agency tenemos el compromiso con nuestros clientes y amigos que nos lleva a buscar nuevos destinos, nuevas zonas y a mejorar los productos que ya tenemos. Siempre con un trato personalizado y dando la máxima calidad posible en nuestros servicios, con salidas todo el año para grupos o para individuales. Nuestro equipo es un profundo conocedor de los destinos que ofrecemos. Tanto los guías e instructores de los barcos, como el de los hoteles o resorts harán de sus vacaciones de buceo una experiencia inolvidable. A bordo de nuestros barcos con un estándar de calidad muy alto y en exclusiva para España podrá, durante una o dos semanas de vida a bordo, bucear en los lugares más exóticos y maravillosos del mundo submarino. Además, combinándolo con sus días de buceo, le ofrecemos la posibilidad de ampliar sus vacaciones visitando el país donde tenemos los destinos de buceo diseñando programas a medida.

Name: Rekrea Travel
Company description: Rekrea es una agencia de viajes y ocio especializada en viajes para estudiantes. Tenemos una misión clara: convertir el viaje de fin de curso de los jóvenes en el mejor viaje de su vida. Porque un viaje para Rekrea es mucho más que coger un barco o un avión; un viaje con nosotros es sinónimo de un sinfín de experiencias, nuevas amistades, bailes, atardeceres en la playa y mucha diversión. Descubre todo lo que Rekrea puede ofrecerte en: https://rekreaonline.com/

Name: Baja Bikes Barcelona
Company description: Baja Bikes Barcelona organizes guided bike tours through Barcelona. Our tours take you through the story behind the magical city of Barcelona. Our tour guides speak Dutch, English and German. Baja Bikes Bike tours are sold through major tour operators in various countries as well as incentive and leissure agencies, but can also be booked directly. Now also available in Madrid and Valencia

Name: Viajamor.com
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Alcobendas, 1 Av. De La Vega, 28108
Company description: Fundada en 2014, Viajamor es una empresa con dos líneas de negocio: Agencia de Viajes única y diferente & Franquicias Viajamor. Somos la mejor agencia de viajes en Alcobendas (Madrid - España) con presencia global en el mundo entero. Más que clientes, tenemos amigos y juntos conformamos una comunidad viajera increíble. No hay agentes de viajes, somos Dream Travel Makers. No vendemos viajes, transformamos sueños en realidades. Nuestra prioridad es escucharte activamente para poder comprender tus necesidades, darte respuestas efectivas, conseguir tu máxima satisfacción, aportándote el precio competitivo de los más grandes con la atención cercana y mimosa de los más pequeños.  Tenemos amplia experiencia en el sector turismo, tanto en el segmento de individuales como en el de corporativos, siendo el aliado ideal para las organizaciones, al ofrecer un servicio 360º que incluye: traslados desde el hogar u oficina hasta el aeropuerto y viceversa o internamente en la ciudad, billetes aéreos al mejor precio e itinerario, cruceros, para incentivos y eventos de la empresa o para relajarse en pareja o familia y disfrutar unos días sobre el mar, alojamientos que incluyen apartamentos, venta de tickets a parques, conciertos, eventos deportivos, etc, seguros de viaje internacional, adaptado para cada ocasión y  necesidad, circuitos turísticos con los mejores planes para disfrutar los viajes. En Viajamor creemos que los viajeros no pueden ser tratados como un número más y es por ello que a través del sistema de reserva a medida, podréis contactar con vuestros Dream Travel Makers vía Whatsapp antes, durante y después del viaje, en distintos husos horarios, para atenderte de forma personalizada. Somos una agencia de viajes eficiente, eficaz, fiable, competitiva y sobre todo, comprometida contigo.

Name: Viajes Es Freus
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Ibiza, 7 C/ Navarra, 07800
Company description: Agencia de viajes mayorista y minorista especializada en las Islas Baleares y la venta de paquetes turísticos completos.

Name: Namila Tour
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Brabant, Eindhoven, 438 Boschdijk, 5622 pc
Company description: Namila®, founded in 2021 in the Netherlands based on 20 years of experience in the travel and tourism industry, brings together users with halal holiday sensitivity with facilities that offer excellent service all over the world. With this main motivation, Namila® aims to be a tour operator that provides the comfort of a package holiday (flight, accommodation, transfer) to those who make their preferences with halal holiday awareness and to provide telephone and face-to-face support services to its users during their holidays.    Namila believes that those who prefer halal holidays have the right to have a "comfortable holiday while buying, paying, going, staying, having fun and relaxing".    Namila®, which was established with the aim of offering the best service and price, exists to offer pleasant vacations with a high satisfaction rate by keeping the essentials of a good vacation and Islamic sensitivities at the forefront.   Aiming to raise the standards with its user-friendly reservation and tour system, Namila is always present as a friend to its users in both their travels and holidays and in realizing their dreams.   Namila also makes visionary contributions to the halal holiday sector with its strong collaborations, innovative and future-oriented investments.

Name: TrueTrips
Company description: Born following the successful course of TrueGreece, founded by Christos Stergiou more than a decade ago, TrueTrips is a cutting edge, luxury travel agency that creates meticulously designed vacations for discerning travelers.  Since 2008, Christos Stergiou has been continually recognized as one of the World's Top Travel Specialists for Greece by Condé Nast Traveler magazine; and he has also been selected by Travel+Leisure magazine as an A-List travel agent since 2009. Since 2014, he has been included in Wendy Perrin’s WOW List as a trusted travel expert for Greece. These distinctions showcase our commitment to planning and executing once-in-a-lifetime travel experience for its guests.  Our entrepreneurial climate and varied, challenging assignments create a stimulating environment for driven individuals. Our approach—building a service-oriented team that combines expertise in the tourism industry, solid managerial, organizational, communication, and social skills, and is comprised by motivated individuals who seek to grow their skill set and responsibilities within the company—is geared towards maintaining TrueTrips' position as a leader in the incoming luxury travel industry. What is perhaps most striking about TrueTrips is our constant pursuit for improving the quality of service and experience for our guests and affiliates, and creating a strong, team-based company culture founded on respect, personal and corporate growth, and job satisfaction stemming from our company’s achievements.

Name: The Royal Sport Management
Company description: The Royal Sport Management is a leading sports management company, specializing in sports travel, hospitality, and event management. With a team of experienced professionals and a commitment to excellence, we strive to exceed expectations and deliver memorable experiences for athletes, teams, and fans alike. As a licensed travel agency and proud member of IATA, as well as a FIFA match agent licensed company, we uphold the highest standards of professionalism and integrity in all our endeavors within the sports industry. We are a sports agency working globally. The countries listed below are our primary destinations. Apart from these, you can also contact us for your events that you want to hold in other destinations. Spain - Turkiye - Cyprus - Austria - Poland - Hungary - Slovenia - United Arab Emirates-  Italy - Germany - Netherland - China - Portugal Our Services; 🔸️Training Camps  🔸️Friendly match organizations 🔸️Team hospitality for away matches  🔸️National teams tournament organization 🔸️Royal Cup 🔸️Commercial Endorsement 🔸️FC Porto Summer Camps 🔸️Fan Packages for Major Sporting Events Reach out to us via phone or email and let's embark on this journey together. 📩 pz@theroyalsport.eu

Name: Rugby Travel Ireland
Company description: We are Rugby Travel Ireland. We organise inbound and outbound rugby tours for teams of all ages and all levels. We organise supporter tours for Ireland’s overseas Six Nations games, Rugby World Cup campaigns and Summer Tours. Rugby Travel Ireland are the ONLY IRISH tour operator to have been appointed as an Official Sub-Agent to the British and Irish Lions Tour to New Zealand in 2017.  We also organise corporate hospitality for rugby matches as well as corporate incentive travel and prizes.

Name: Cruiseland - Disney Croisières
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 1 15 C Roger De Llúria, 08010
Company description: CRUISELAND (Viajes y Cruceros - Cruiseland S.L) est revendeur officiel du Disney Cruise Line en France. Et aussi, un Tour Operator de Croisières en Espagne avec la plus grande offre de produits. Il est également Agent Général et Représentant Exclusif de quelques-unes des meilleures compagnies maritimes au monde. Vous pouvez nous contacter au 902 365 454 en Espagne, et au 01 76 54 34 96 en France. Du lundi au vendredi de 9h à 19h (Le tarif international s'applique)

Name: Indcen Resor
HQ Location: Sweden, Stockholm County, Norrmalm, 12 Olof Palmes Gata, 111 37
Company description: Travel agency cum tour operator  Airtickets to all over the world and tailor-made tours to India, Far East, Indian Ocean Islands, and East Africa as well (long) weekend holidays in Europe. Also airtickets from all over the world. Make a preliminary booking with us (for visa application). Special deal that allow up to 46kg check-in baggage and with re-bookable return dates. It is recommended to book well in advance for the best price. Take advantage of our interest-free payment plans (3/6/12/24 months).  Visit us at Olof Palmes gata 12, drop an email at info@indcen.se, or call 08-562 65 000.

Name: Tour Mit Schanz
Company description: Seit 1978 hat Tour-mit- Schanz ca. 2.000 Gruppen erfolgreich in mehr als  40 verschiedene Länder dieser Erde geführt. Häufig führen unsere Reisen in den Nahen Osten. So entwickelten wir uns im Lauf der Jahre u.A. zum Spezialisten für Reisen nach Israel, für sehr unterschiedliche Zielgruppen:    •  Kirchengemeinden auf Jesu Spuren – getreu unserem Motto „ . . . und biblische Geschichte wird lebendig“    •  Reisebüros    •  Institutionen der Erwachsenenbildung    •  Politische Stiftungen    •  Zeitungs-Leser    •  Chöre, Vereine & Verbände sowie    •  Freundeskreise Tour-mit- Schanz bringt Ihnen nicht nur die Geschichte des Reiselandes näher, sondern bietet auch Kultur zum Anfassen – Einblicke ins alltägliche Leben. Ein wichtiger Bestandteil einer Reise von Tour-mit- Schanz sind daher Begegnungen zwischen Reisenden und Einheimischen. Auf diese Weise wird das Reiseland mit allen Sinnen erlebt und unvergessliche Erinnerungen werden geschaffen. Aus unserem Büro im Schwarzwald planen wir mit viel Herz und Liebe zum Detail ihre  individuellen Studien- & Begegnungs-Reisen. Wir stehen Ihnen als Gruppenplaner nicht nur als verlässlicher Reiselogistiker zur Seite, sondern unterstützen Sie auch vertrieblich mit Werbeunterlagen für Ihre Gruppenreise. Auch vom administrativen Aufwand entlasten wir Sie gerne: Anmeldungen und Inkasso können auf Wunsch über uns laufen. Damit können Sie sich voll darauf konzentrieren Interessenten zu Mitreisenden zu machen.   Wir handeln nach dem Motto: „Sie sorgen für Teilnehmer – wir kümmern uns um den Rest!“ Impressum Tour mit Schanz Reisebüro GmbH Geschäftsführer: Joachim Anz Handelsregister Stuttgart HRB 340 638 UstID: 156701179 Sulzer Straße 118 72218 Wildberg Tel.: +49 7054 9265-0 Fax: +49 7054 9265-55 E-Mail: info@tour-mit-schanz.de Internet: www.tour-mit-schanz.de

Name: Radreisen-mecklenburg
Company description: radreisen-mecklenburg ist ein Reiseveranstalter für Individualreisen mit einem ausgefeilten Tourenprogramm, welches sich auch auf individuelle Bedürfnisse anpassen lässt. Komplett organisiert von der Buchung der Hotels, bis zum Tourenmaterial und Gepäcktransport ist alles dabei. Radreisen aus erster Hand: Unsere Touren gibt es nur bei uns - wir leben und arbeiten das ganze Jahr im eigenen Reisegebiet. Zur Auswahl stehen Radrundreisen, Streckenradreisen und Sternradreisen sowie kombinierte Rad-Kanu-Reisen. Das Tourenprogramm ist ausgewogen und nachhaltig, es können Verlängerungstage hinzugenommen werden. Besonders interessant ist es, die Mecklenburgische Seenplatte auch einmal vom Wasser aus zu erleben. Dazu gibt es die Möglichkeit, einen oder mehrere Paddeltage einzu legen. Dieses besondere Erlebnis ist sowohl für erfahrene Paddler als auch Einsteiger geeignet. Die motorbootfreien Gewässer des Müritz-Nationalparks sind für eine Kanutour wie geschaffen.

Name: Entdecke.net DMC GmbH
Company description: We are DMC (Destination Management Company) & PCO (Professional Conference Organiser) for many countries in Central & Eastern Europe, Caucasus, Balkans and the Baltic States, working B2B and supporting travel agencies, professional trip organizers, package tour operators and bus companies.  As one of the leading companies in the Eastern European market, we are focusing on promotion of Eastern Europe, Caucasus, Balkans and the Baltic States as an authentic destinations by offering the most attractive tourist products, such as classical tours, combined tours, incentive trips, adventure, thematic, cross-border travel, MICE travel, UNESCO heritage tour, SPORT travel (wholesaler to sporting events worldwide), etc.  We have offered our clients the most exciting and innovative travels across such unique countries (Ukraine, Poland, Hungary, Slovakia, Belarus, Russia, Moldova, Romania, Bulgaria, Azerbaijan, Georgia, Armenia, Serbia, Montenegro, Croatia, Slovenia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Albania, North Macedonia , Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia). Since we have been specialists in this region for many years, don’t you find our possible cooperation promising and useful?  Feel free to contact us for any question you may have. It will be our pleasure to assist you in every way possible. see more at our homepage - https://www.entdecke.net/

Name: SPB-Tours
Company description: Your European Tour Operator  Our family of professional tour managers, coordinators and especially enthusiastic tour guides provide benchmarked experiences for travelers from every corner of the world.  SPB Tours was established 2006 with a focus on the high quality services expected by cruise ship passengers. Since then our expertise of the Baltic Sea Region has rewarded us with a leading position not least in Russia and especially in St Petersburg and Moscow.  Today SPB Tours also offers a wide variety of experiences in the Mediterranean together with global travel agents and other partners. For instance group tours, events and multilingual booking solutions customized to appeal to our guests itineraries and interests. We look forward to hearing from you regarding intended individual travel plans! We constantly also review our service quality and expand our SPB Tours network. Subsequently we encourage potential new long term partnerships and team members!

Name: Attika Reisen GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: With more than 47 years of experience, Attika Reisen is one of the leading tour operators in Germany specialising in trips to Greece and Cyprus.

Name: Reisebüro Behrens GmbH
Company description: Behrens-Reisen ist eine Reiseveranstalter mit Stammsitz in der Region Ostholstein. Angeboten werden Urlaubs-, Wellness, Städte- und Tagesfahrten mit eigenen Buskapazitäten.

Name: HEIDEKER REISEN GMBH
Company description: Als einer der größten Reiseveranstalter Süddeutschlands bietet Heideker Reisen seit über 70 Jahren Gruppenreisen im Premium-Segment auf der ganzen Welt an. Dabei stehen einzigartige Reiseerlebnisse, kulturelle Highlights und ein erstklassiger Service im Mittelpunkt. Unsere erfahrenen Produktmanager entwickeln in engem Kundenaustausch Erlebnis-, Kultur- und Musikreisen sowie Wanderreisen, Fernreisen und Flusskreuzfahrten. Dabei legt Heideker großen Wert auf den Schutz der Umwelt - alle Reisen sind durch den Kauf geprüfter Zertifikate bzw. Investitionen in erneuerbare Energieträger klimaneutral. Die Zufriedenheit unserer Kunden beruht zum einen auf außergewöhnlichen Reiseprogrammen, zum anderen auf guter Organisation und einem Rundum-Service, wie der Haustürabholung. Hinzu kommen hervorragend ausgebildete, oft einheimische Reiseleiter, die unseren Reisegästen die Kultur ihres Heimatlandes näherbringen und Sie an Plätze abseits der Touristenströme führen. Nicht zu vergessen sind unsere versierten Bus-Chauffeure.  Kunden, Mitarbeiter und Reisen bilden bei Heideker eine Einheit und machen uns stark!

Name: Best Mood Events
Company description: Best mood events ist ein exklusiver Reiseveranstalter von den größten Premium Sportcamps in ihrer Art in ganz Europa mit den Fokuspunkten Gesundheit und Fitness 💪 Die Sportcamps finden in Kooperation mit den deutschlandweit bekannten Magazinen Women's Health, Men's Health, ROADBIKE, MOUNTAINBIKE und GRAVELBIKE statt 🏅 An den schönsten Stränden Südeuropas oder auch in den Bergen werden fitnessbegeisterte Teilnehmer*innen mit qualifizierten Expert*innen vereint. Sonne, Sport und Spaß versprechen die CAMPs. Eine Zeit, bei der man sich wohlfühlt und über sich hinauswächst. Für so manche*n ist die Teilnahme am Camp sogar ein echter GAMECHANGER für einen nachhaltig gesunden Lebensstil 🌅⛰ Bist Du bereit für deinen lebensverändernden Moment? 🚀	 Werde Teil der best mood events Community, ob als Team-Mitglied, Coach, Kooperationspartner*in oder Teilnehmer*in.  Wir freuen uns, von dir zu hören unter +49 30 23 25 58 77 oder zu lesen camps@bestmoodevents.de

Name: Meso Reisen GmbH
Company description: Meso Reisen ist ein mittelständischer Reiseveranstalter spezialisiert auf maßgeschneiderte Fernreisen. Mit dem Hauptsit in Berlin agiert das Unternehmen bereits seit über 25 Jahren erfolgreich am Markt.

Name: Reisebüro Pomorin
Company description: Reisebüro Pomorin is a leisure, travel & tourism company based out of 1 Birretstraße, Jestetten, Germany.

Name: Little America Deutschland
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Düsseldorf, 30 Barmer Straße, 40545
Company description: Little America ist der Ansprechpartner für maßgeschneiderte Reisen in die Vereinigten Staaten und Kanada. 2019 wurde Little America als Schwesterfirma von TravelEssence gegründet. TravelEssence, gegründet von Neuseeländer Andrew Morten, macht seit 2005 Reiseträume in Neuseeland und Australien wahr. Unser Team verfügt über langjährige Erfahrung in der Organisation von maßgeschneiderten Reisen. Bei Little America konzentrieren wir uns auf kleine Unterkünfte und Touren an weniger bekannten Orten, um lokale Communitys zu unterstützen. Wir arbeiten direkt mit unseren lokalen Anbietern zusammen und besuchen sie regelmäßig. Unsere einzigartigen Unterkünfte und Aktivitäten sind sorgfältig von uns ausgewählt. Etwa 70 % davon sind bei keinem anderen Reiseveranstalter oder Online-Buchungsportal der Welt erhältlich. Dabei konzentrieren wir uns auf kleine, persönliche Unterkünfte. Unsere oberste Priorität ist es dabei immer, die individuellen Wünsche und Vorstellungen unserer Kunden umzusetzen. Deshalb beginnen wir jede Reise mit einem umfangreichen Erstgespräch. Danach planen und organisieren wir die Reise bis ins letzte Detail, mit Ortskenntnis, Erfahrung und unseren umfangreichen lokalen Kontakten.  Sind Sie Eigentümer oder Gastgeber einer kleinen und einzigartigen Immobilie? Wir würden uns freuen, von Ihnen zu hören. Wir wollen von Gastgebern mit echten Geschichten hören, die unsere Gäste herzlich willkommen heißen und ihre Geheimtipps über ihren Wohnort mit ihnen teilen. Wir verfügen über effiziente Systeme, die einfach zu handhaben sind. Dazu gehört unser Vorauszahlungssystem, das dafür sorgt, dass Sie als Anbieter eine Woche vor der Ankunft des Kunden bezahlt werden.  Wir sind ein bodenständiges Unternehmen, professionell und gut organisiert. Wir freuen uns, sagen zu können, dass unsere Partner uns lieben, unsere Mitarbeiter uns lieben und - last but nit least - 99 % unserer Kunden uns lieben.

Name: Inspiring Travel Club Family GmbH
Company description: Die Inspiring Travel Club Family GmbH ist ein Online-Reisebüro, das sich auf die Zielgruppe Familie spezialisiert hat. Auf unseren Portalen Club Family und Familienschiff bieten wir in bisher einzigartiger Weise die besten Reiseangebote für Familien an. Soll es Hotel- oder Cluburlaub sein, ein gemütliches Ferienhaus, der perfekte Skiurlaub oder doch eine Kreuzfahrt? Bei uns findet man all das und noch viel mehr. In Zusammenarbeit mit namhaften Partnern bieten wir die besten Angebote für den Familienurlaub. Durch Homeoffice-Angebote und Remote-Möglichkeiten findet man unsere Kollegen inzwischen jedoch deutschlandweit. Flexible Arbeitszeiten, ein umfangreiches Bonusprogramm (z.B. Internetzuschuss, Sport, etc.) und eine offene Feedback- und Kommunikationsstruktur sorgen für ein maximales Rundum-Wohlfühl-Paket. Denn vor allem eine gute Work-Life-Balance ist uns sehr wichtig. Neben ausgebildeten Reiseverkehrskaufleuten suchen wir immer wieder nach neuen Gesichtern, die mit uns an der Weiterentwicklung und Verbesserung unserer Portale arbeiten. Ob Online-Redakteur/in, Content Marketing Manager/in, SEO-Spezialist oder IT-Experte/in – wir freuen uns über engagierte neue Kollegen/innen. Wenn Du die Reise- und Tourismusbranche genauso spannend findest wie wir, klick doch ganz einfach einmal auf unsere Job-Seite: https://www.inspiring-travel.de/karriere

Name: Sorient Travel
Company description: Sorient Travel ist ein spezialisierter Reiseveranstalter mit Fokus auf hochwertige, maßgeschneiderte Reisen in den Iran. Gegründet im Jahr 2019 von Arash Moeini und Fereshteh Ebrahimi, zwei Experten mit persischen Wurzeln und über zwei Jahrzehnten Erfahrung in der Tourismusbranche, verbinden wir fundiertes Zielgebiets-Know-how mit einem klaren Verständnis für die Anforderungen unserer B2B-Partner im deutschsprachigen Raum. Als Partner der renommierten DMC „1001 Nights Tours“ in Teheran bieten wir direkten Zugang zu einem starken lokalen Netzwerk und garantieren authentische, professionell organisierte Reiseerlebnisse. Unser Angebot richtet sich an Reisebüros, Veranstalter und Firmenkunden, die ihren Kund*innen besondere und sichere Reisen nach Persien ermöglichen möchten. Unsere Schwerpunkte: 	•	Individuell gestaltete Iran-Reisen für Einzelkund*innen und Gruppen 	•	Kultur- und Sonderreisen 	•	Geschäftsreisen & Incentive-Programme 	•	Persönlicher Service mit festen Ansprechpartnern in Deutschland und im Iran Sorient Travel steht für Zuverlässigkeit, Qualität und echte Expertise – Ihr starker Partner für Iran-Reisen auf B2B-Ebene. #IranReisen #PersienReisen #IranStudienreisen #SorientTravel #B2BReiseveranstalter #Kulturreisen #MaßgeschneiderteReisen #TourismusIran #ReisebüroPartner #ReiseveranstalterIran #IranTravel #TailorMadeTours #CulturalTravel #SorientTravel #PersianExperience #B2BTravel #TravelIndustry #TravelPartner #IranTourOperator #AuthenticTravel #IranDMC

Name: Reisebüro Feyhl GmbH
Company description: Das Beste für unsere Kunden, wir sind erst dann zufrieden, wenn Sie glücklich sind! Das ist unser Anspruch seit 1932.  Das Reisebüro Feyhl möchte seine Kunden immer wieder überraschen – heute und zukünftig, wie vor 85 Jahren. Wir beraten Sie weit über die Grenzen Ludwigsburgs hinaus.  Wir alle haben die Verantwortung, unsere Kunden bei jedem Besuch neu zu begeistern. Dies erreichen wir durch unseren hohen Anspruch an Service, Qualität und Leistungsvielfalt. Unser Ziel ist es, für Sie die schönsten Momente des Jahres zu schaffen, damit sie diese so lange wie möglich festhalten. Erst dann sind wir glücklich und stolz auf unsere Arbeit.

Name: EVR Reisen GmbH
Company description: Als Reiseveranstalter mit langjähriger Erfahrung sind wir auf die Planung und Durchführung von Klassenreisen mit Partnern in Deutschland und ganz Europa spezialisiert. Dabei profitieren besonders Lehrer und Eltern von unseren Leistungen aus einer Hand. EVR Reisen gehört heute zu den führenden deutschen Spezialreiseveranstaltern für Klassenfahrten.

Name: Feuer Und Eis Touristik GmbH
Company description: Feuer und Eis-Touristik GmbH (Fire and Ice Tourism) is a family-run travel agency, specialized in Alpine Crossings and hiking and biking tours in and around the Alps. Whether you prefer to be active and sporty or relax at your own pace, our focus is on experiencing nature - individually or in a travel group. Our tours take you through breathtaking landscapes, along idyllic paths, and to cultural highlights – always well planned, carefully selected, and with a focus on quality and comfort. With a wealth of experience and passion, we organize trips that combine exercise, relaxation, and enjoyment. Whether you are looking for the tranquility of the mountains, want to cycle through vineyards, or discover historic towns – our tours are personalized and planned with attention to detail.

Name: ITT GmbH
Company description: Die ITT GmbH ist ein seit 1996 in Deutschland etablierter Reiseveranstalter, welcher sich auf Badeurlaub an der Türkischen Riviera spezialisiert hat, deine Produktpalette seit Firmengründung jedoch stetig um Reiseziele im Mittelmeerbereich erweitert hat.

Name: Meinurlaubstraum.de
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Bad Harzburg, 40 Goethestr., 38667
Company description: Reiseagentur mit Sitz in Bad Harzburg /Niedersachsen Webseiten des Unternehmens unter www.meinurlaubstraum.de und www.jobs-reisen.de Alle unsere Jobangebote finden Sie in der Jobbörse der Arbeitsagentur  Bewerbungen bitte per Mail an mueller@meinurlaubstraum.de oder telefonisch unter 05322 3089

Name: My Seychelles
Company description: My Seychelles is a tour operator who organise your holiday in Sechelles for more than 20 years now. My Seychelles is the perfect solution for organising your Seychelles holidays as they know each single aspect of this amazing nation in the Indian Ocean.

Name: XPLORE TOUR OPERATOR
HQ Location: Italy, Piedmont, Turin, 50 Via Pietro Palmieri, 10126
Company description: Grazie alle nostre conoscenze, alla nostra grande passione e al piacere di lavorare insieme siamo in grado di trovare la soluzione più adatta per il tuo viaggio, sia che si tratti di un viaggio di laurea di quattro amici o che si tratti di un soggiorno lusso negli Stati Uniti. Entrando nei nostri uffici di Via Matteo Pescatore entri direttamente nel cuore di un Tour Operator, siamo noi stessi a contattare i fornitori negli Stati Uniti, siamo noi in prima linea che componiamo il pacchetto per il tuo viaggio! Nei nostri uffici potrai parlare di turismo, di viaggi e della pianificazione dell’itinerario, troverai cartine gratuite e tutta la nostra disponibilità, anche se si tratta di un soggiorno di solo 4 giorni a New York o un giro nei parchi americani, la nostra professionalità è a tua disposizione. Contattaci per un preventivo o vienici a trovare in ufficio, anche solo per curiosare, l’atmosfera è rilassata e se ti piace l’America ti sentirai sicuramente a tuo agio.

The prestige of our clients, who include companies such as Citibank, Chase Manhattan, Coca-Cola, Concur, Oracle, travel agencies as  American Express, Thomas Cook, CCL Conference, Čedok and major hotel chains as Marriott, Four Seasons, Mandarin Oriental, Sheraton, Rocco Forte – The Augustine, Aria etc., is a testimonial to the quality of our services. Name: SMARTSEER GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 21 Rödelheimer Bahnweg, 60489
Company description: Our AI driven decisioning system is designed to help you set your goals, to ask more pertinent questions and to make the right decisions.  It profiles every product and service that you offer.  It monitors what works and for whom and why.  It profiles in real time every user to help make the ideal decision to achieve the business goals you are after.   And the interaction of these product insights and revealed user profiles brings a raft of new opportunities to decide how to interact at scale.   We believe relationships are what makes us all tick. Consciously deciding how to interact is the basis for good relationships. In the pre-AI world the use of segments and personas was the best way to try and achieve a fit between users and products; the basis for commercial relationships. The market has woken up to the tremendous potential for improvement that comes through leveraging AI. We started SMARTSEER in 2023 after years of working with some of the largest airlines, OTAs, tour operators and retailers.  Our experience has shown that AI can indeed create breakthrough solutions across the enterprise, creating new levels of aspiration and goal achievement.

Name: Naturbike S.L.
Company description: With more than 25 years of experience designing, organizing and guiding active and cultural trips in the most spectacular areas of Spain and neighbouring countries outside of mass tourism. Outside Europe, we operate with trips in Central America, Cuba, Morocco, Madagascar, Vietnam, Jordan and Sri Lanka. We leave the marketing and direct sales to our partners abroad, some of the most distinguished tour operators in the adventure holidays industry, such as www.wikinger.de in Germany, www.explore.co.uk in the UK or www.djoser.nl in the Netherlands, and fully focus on each detail of our trips. All of us are experienced travellers and nature lovers and we believe that our own enthusiasm is essential for creating new, interesting tours. We are constantly searching for new ideas so as to offer our clients the best itinerary possible, the best hotel with character or the most surprising restaurant with local cuisine. Because we believe you see more in small groups and in order to minimise any impact we make on local culture and the environment it is our conviction that we should travel with groups usually no larger than 10 – 18 people. Please contact us for our proposal if you want to run a tour with a minimum of 6 people.

Every year our team arranges a happy holiday for thousands of travellers. Baltic Blues House consists of 3 companies:  Baltic Blues Travel: Inbound tour operator in leisure segment specialising in round trips for groups often combining several countries of the Baltic States, Scandinavia and Eastern Europe. Our mission: provide efficient and high quality services that improve your product while increasing its market share. Our goal is continuous growth and eventually our establishment as one of the best service company in the tourism industry. Our satisfied clients, our long term relationships with them and the feeling of trust are the elements that will lead us to the desired goal through the success of our collaboration for your business.

Name: Fiore Bus S.r.l
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Terlizzi, 6 S.p. 231 Via Mariotto, 70038
Company description: L’azienda ha una storia che comincia nel 1958, quando Giuseppe Fiore offriva la sua collaborazione a un’azienda operante nel campo del noleggio di pullman. L’esperienza maturata e la professionalità applicata al servizio hanno contribuito alla nascita nel 1974 dell’Azienda Fiore. Da oltre quarant’anni l’organizzazione si propone con uno staff altamente professionale che vanta competenze specifiche nel vasto settore del turismo di gruppo, congressuale ed incentive. La storia ricca di competitività e prestigio si avvale della notevole capacità di adeguamento alla frenetica espansione del turismo e dalla puntuale risposta ai mutamenti geografici ed emozionali del viaggio. La struttura moderna le permette di essere uno tra i principali corrispondenti in Puglia dei Tour Operator italiani e stranieri per servizi di tour, transfer e noleggio autobus con conducente (NCC). I numerosi riconoscimenti e la fedeltà dei clienti sono un’ulteriore testimonianza di una filosofia lavorativa dinamica e al passo con i tempi, basata su una perfetta sinergia tra la costante adeguatezza del servizio e la capacità di sapersi perfettamente interfacciare alle esigenze del viaggiatore. L’esperienza è nulla senza la vitalità.

Name: Fish Partner
Company description: Fish Partner is a fully licensed travel agency and tour operator that offers a wide range of high-quality services for angling travelers from all over the globe.Fish Partner organizes various scheduled tours; professional angling tours, fishing vacation packages, combinations of day tours and fishing adventures, multiple fishing activities, and lastly, we tailor tours in many of the greatest rivers and lakes of Iceland. Not only do we offer one of the largest selections in fishing spots in Iceland, but we also offer our customers to combine their trips with other activities from our trusted tour operator partners. A Passion for fishing We at Fish Partner have more than 70 years of combined fishing experience, and over 30 years of experience in servicing foreign and domestic fishermen as guides and tour operators. For us fishing is a passion, one that we could not be without. Therefore we know the importance of a well-organized fishing trip. From the attributes of the fish and the beauty of the landscape to the quality of the food and the smoothness of the transport, we know that every detail is essential to the overall experience. Since the founding of Fish Partner, it has been our passion to make your fishing experience in Iceland an unforgettable one.

Name: Aspida Travel
Company description: Aspida Travel has served the shipping and tourism industry for over 35 years. Our company was established in 1981 and since then, it has become one of the largest travel agencies in the country. No.1 in Air Ticket Sales in Greece for 2020 Member of MTA 7 Aspida Travel is one of the founding members of Mta7, a global marine travel alliance, that enables us to have the lowest available marine fares worldwide. ISO 9001 Bureau Veritas ISO 9001 Bureau Veritas quality Management systems certified. 100+ Shipping Companies Aspida travel is a pure Marine Agency servicing more than 100 shipping companies in the Greek and European market. 24 Hour Service For the last 15 years, our office has ranked among the Top Five Greek Marine Travel agencies, primarily due to our dedicated and professional 24-hour service.

Name: 1000 Út Travel Agency

Our main profile includes organising solo, group and business trips, VISA administration, lodging reservation, marketing plane -, and train tickets.

Name: Cistour Agency
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, 71 Bulevardul Iuliu Maniu, 077042
Company description: Cistour Agency is not just another travel agency. It is an idea born from desire to be closer to people in the most pleasant way - Holidays. Families are busy, you work, you clean and cook, you have meetings, but by the end of the day you avoid spending more time on a computer looking for flights, hotels and best deals. That is why we are here for you. Cistour was born in 2015 to fulfill all the needs and wishes you are looking for in a vacantion. We work in 3 locations, 2 in Bucharest and one in Râmnicu Vâlcea, with over 30 employers on all departments. We are just some friends helping you find the perfect holiday. We are just some collaborators helping you find the perfect business trip. We are close to your needs. The company creates personalised travelling packages, from one day trips in Romania and Bulgaria to an all inclusive holiday in many other destinations across the world. We offer deals for business companies and organise teambuildings or short travel trips. So, all you have to do is pack your bags! We are your personal travel assistant. Tell us where and when you want to go and you will receive a full itinerary with all the details you need. Come with Cistour Agency around the world and make some remarkable memories.
