Za exotikou do Japonska, Emirátů nebo na Srí Lanku. Prodloužené víkendy v Lisabonu, Stockholmu, Londýně, Římě, Paříži, Barceloně a dalších evropských metropolích. Poznávací zájezdy do Anglie, Francie, Itálie, Skandinávie, Kanady, USA, Pobaltí i Ruska. Odlétáme z Ostravy, Brna, Prahy, Vídně, Katovic a Krakova nebo cestujeme pohodlným autobusem.

Name: Alexander Tour
Company description: Alexander Tour is a tour operator and a travel agency operating on Bulgarian market since 1991. The company is a member of ABBTA (Bulgarian association of Travel Agents), IATA, BAAT and many others.  The company sells tours, cruises, hotels, car rentals and vacation packages all over the world and has proved itself as a reliable partner in organizing Team Building programmes, congresses, seminars and special events for many Bulgarian and international companies. Alexander Tour offers  standard round trips in Bulgaria and Balkan Peninsula, but also tailor-made programmes which can suite to all clients’ specific travel plans. We are arranging combined trips in the countries from the Balkan Peninsula - Romania, Greece, Turkey, Serbia and Macedonia. All provided services are of highest standard and can cover even the most extraordinary requirements.  We are also specializing in hobby itineraries and outdoor activities as hiking, trekking horseback riding, mountain biking, white-water rafting, kayaking, yachting, ornithological and botanical tours.  For all tourists eager to learn more about Bulgarian history, culture and traditions, Alexander Tour offers its theme tour programmes, focused in different fields of interests: Archaeology, Architecture, UNESCO World Heritage, Folklore Festivals, Music and Theatre Events, etc. Clients who are interested in the urban life of Bulgarian towns, modern architecture, social and cultural activities combined with ancient history and interesting sites can enjoy the city tours and city break programmes of Alexander Tour.  Alexander Tour provides tour guides in all major languages, as well as special services for its VIP clients. Transfers and transportation with vehicles that vary in size and capacity can be arranged upon request.

Name: L'Agenzia Di Viaggi Magazine
Company description: L’Agenzia di Viaggi è il primo network multimediale dell’informazione turistica in Italia, edito dalla società cooperativa Editoriale 3.0.  L’Agenzia di Viaggi magazine, che raccoglie l’eredità del quotidiano fondato nel 1964, è oggi un quotidiano online e un periodico cartaceo inviato in abbonamento a 14.000 aziende in tutta Italia, di cui 7.000 tra agenzie di viaggi e tour operator.  Il calendario editoriale prevede approfondimenti dedicati a destinazioni, segmenti, prodotti turistici e fiere di cui L’Agenzia di Viaggi è media partner.  Il sito web, aggiornato in real time, offre notizie di attualità, di economia e di mercato sull’industria dei viaggi italiana e internazionale.  La newsletter responsive è spedita dal lunedì al venerdì a 52.000 utenti professionali.  L’Agenzia di Viaggi Plus è la newsletter dedicata (D.E.M.) ad aziende, enti o singoli prodotti, spedita su richiesta all’intera mailing list.  Block Notes Digital sono i corsi di formazione online promossi da lagenziadiaviaggimag.it:  programmi di elearning che consentono agli agenti di viaggi di diventare “Esperti” di una destinazione o un prodotto, con relativo attestato.  L’Annuario del Turismo è il database ufficiale delle imprese turistiche in Italia. Raccoglie i dati aggiornati di agenzie di viaggi dettaglianti, operatori, ricettivisti, network, compagnie aeree, di navigazione, gsa, tecnologia, rappresentanze e catene alberghiere, dmc, enti del turismo. Il database consultabile gratuitamente prevede, con l’accesso Premium, l’utilizzo commerciale dei dati: mailing, etichette, invio fax, elaborazioni statistiche. Tra le voci aggiornate, anche quella su fondi e polizze di garanzia.  ViaggiOff è un giornale online di informazione turistica alternativa. Nasce nel 2019 come spin-off della testata L’Agenzia di Viaggi Magazine, con cui condivide il team redazionale. L’Agenzia di Viaggi organizza il Premio Turismo Responsabile Italiano (TRI).

Name: PROVATIS Steuerberatungsgesellschaft MbH
Company description: Unser kleines Einmaleins für Sie Kennen Sie den Ariadnefaden? Mit seiner Hilfe fand Theseus, Vater der griechischen Prinzessin Ariadne, den Weg zurück aus einem Labyrinth. Unsere Steuergesetzgebung kann Verwirrung stiften und den Blick für das Wesentliche versperren. Ein roter Faden kann bei Entscheidungen sehr hilfreich sein. Das wissen auch unzählige Mandanten aus unterschiedlichsten Branchen zu schätzen, die wir langjährig in allen Fragen rund um die Themen Steuern und Finanzen begleiten. Hervorgegangen ist unsere Gesellschaft aus zwei Einzelkanzleien, die sich als Partner des Einzelhandels und des produzierenden Handwerks etabliert haben. In der jüngeren Vergangenheit haben insbesondere Mandanten mit Fragen des Sozialversicherungs- und Lohnsteuerrechts und mit umsatzsteuerlichen Spezialproblemen (Immobilienwirtschaft, Künstler, Reiseveranstalter und unterschiedliche Verbände) ihren Weg zu uns gefunden. Heute verstehen wir uns als kompetente Ansprechpartner für Handwerk und Einzelhandel einerseits, sowie für Mandanten des Dienstleistungsbereichs (Ärzte und Apotheker, Freiberufler und Verbände) andererseits.

Name: Discover Cracow
Company description: Discover Cracow is a leading tour operator based in Kraków, dedicated to showcasing the city's rich history, culture, and heritage since 2009. The company collaborates with local museums and guides to provide tourists with unique experiences that highlight the most interesting aspects of Kraków. With a mission to create memorable moments for visitors, Discover Cracow emphasizes teamwork and mutual support among its passionate staff, fostering a vibrant work atmosphere. The company offers a range of services, including guided tours, transportation, and tourist cards, catering to a diverse clientele that includes both individual travelers and groups. Committed to innovation and quality, Discover Cracow aims to revolutionize local tourism while ensuring that every interaction leaves a lasting impression.

Name: Connoisseur Circle
HQ Location: Austria, Vienna, Vienna, 5 / Stiege 1 / Top 8 Waaggasse, 1040
Company description: Der Wunsch, ferne Länder zu sehen, Außergewöhnliches zu bereisen und zu erleben ist heute ausgeprägter denn je. Insbesondere im Bereich der Luxusreisen verzeichnen Reiseveranstalter seit einigen Jahren kontinuierliche Zuwächse. Dabei werden die Ansprüche der Gäste immer höher, die diese in Wünschen nach exklusivem Service in einem Topambiente und bester Lage des Hauses zum Ausdruck bringen. Doch auch vorhergehende Information über eine Vielzahl von Bewertungsportalen ist keine Garantie für den perfekten Urlaub. Welches Fünfsternehotel nimmt für sich nicht in Anspruch seinen Gästen „eine atemberaubende Aussicht“, „traumhaftes Ambiente“ oder „exklusiven Service“ zu bieten. Vertrauen hierin hat schon bei so manchem Luxusreisenden herbe Enttäuschungen hinterlassen.Hier ist es wo „Connoisseur Circle“ ins Spiel kommt. Unsere Redakteure/Innen prüfen Reiseziele lieber persönlich vor Ort, mit professionellen Augen, Ohren und allen Sinnen auf Herz und Nieren. Die objektiven Ergebnisse ihrer Quality-Checks finden sie exklusiv bei „Connoisseur Circle“. Der Erfolg gibt uns recht: In den letzten Jahren konnten wir die Auflage von „Connoisseur Circle“ vervierfachen. Die zunehmende Beliebtheit von „Connoisseur Circle“ bei wohlhabenden, anspruchsvollen und reiseerfahrenen Kosmopoliten ist für uns der beste Leistungsbeweis die zunehmenden Bedürfnisse dieser erlesenen Klientel zu erfüllen. An dieser Stelle danken wir unseren Lesern für Ihr entgegengebrachtes Vertrauen. Wir versprechen Ihnen weiterhin jederzeit unser Bestes zu geben und Ihnen dabei zu helfen gerade bei hochklassigen und teuren Reiseerlebnissen Enttäuschungen zu ersparen. Verzichten Sie nicht länger auf die Qualität unserer Bewertungen, bestellen Sie noch heute Ihr Abonnement bei „Connoisseur Circle“. Sie ersparen sich damit Enttäuschungen bei Ihrem nächsten Urlaub und sorgen selbst dafür, dass Ihr Urlaub wird was er sein sollte: Die beste und schönste Zeit im Jahr.

Name: Pink Iceland
Company description: Pink Iceland is a leading LGBT travel specialist, tour operator and wedding planner in Iceland. All our partners are gay owned/operated or gay friendly and of a high standard.  Iceland is a great destination for LGBT travelers because of the gay friendly atmosphere. Pink Iceland's goal is to make your stay in Iceland as wonderful and welcoming as possible. Pink Iceland offers an array of services from booking short tours around Reykjavík to all-inclusive luxury excursions around the country.  Pink Iceland is gay owned and operated by couple Birna Hrönn and Eva María alongside Hannes Páll who joined in 2012. More: Pink Iceland is a new breed of travel agency for the 21st Century. We believe in creating unforgettable experiences and lasting memories, we offer a personal service and strive to come up with ideas and itineraries to suit you and your budget. In most cases we'll match, or beat online prices for accommodation, activities and services, while still offering 24/7 access to a real human being, ready willing and able to assist you with all your travel needs. We are Iceland's first and foremost gay and lesbian owned and operated, travel and event expert. We specialize in day tours, weddings, international and domestic events and festivals as well as organizing tailor-made luxury travel. We love all and serve all, as long they're not mean. Just don't be mean, life's too short.

Name: DIMENSIONE TURISMO
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Treviso, 15 Viale Monte Grappa, 31100
Company description: Dimensione Turismo è stata fondata nel 1984 a Treviso, da Mario Di Nicolantonio che, con oltre 50 anni di esperienza in campo turistico, ha realizzato un sogno creando un’azienda che lo rappresenta perfettamente. A settembre 2020 è stato chiamato a far parte  del collegio dei Probiviri dell’associazione Astoi che, com’ è noto, racchiude e rappresenta i più importanti Tour Operator italiani. Una nomina che ne riconosce e premia le spiccate qualità imprenditoriali e morali. Serietà, professionalità e competenza sono infatti le caratteristiche che sono alla base di ogni obiettivo dell'azienda.  Nei primi anni di attività, alla programmazione sul Brasile si affianca, dopo poco, quella sull’Estremo Oriente e viene costituito un reparto dedicato ai viaggi aziendali. Nel 1992 ha inizio la rotazione di voli charter su Cartagena e San Andres e, nel 1995, quella con destinazione Natal, nel Nord Est del Brasile. Seguiranno altre operazioni con voli speciali diretti a Panama, Birmania, Aruba, Roatan, Cesme e Cipro Nord. Il 2003 ha segnato l’inaugurazione del DBeach Resort, struttura di proprietà, a Natal. Il Brasile, l’Estremo Oriente (Thailandia, Bali e Indonesia, Birmania, Vietnam, Laos e Cambogia, Malesia, Sri Lanka), mete a cui Dimensione Turismo ha dedicato la maggior parte della propria ricerca nel settore dell’organizzazione viaggi, vengono proposte nella loro essenza più pura, con l’attenta selezione degli itinerari e degli alberghi. Questi ultimi sono oggetto di ispezioni periodiche che ne assicurano la qualità, facendo viaggiare i nostri clienti nella tranquillità che solo una rete di assistenza seria può garantire. Dimensione Turismo continua inoltre a proporre con successo dal 2007 la programmazione su Cipro Nord, meta del Mediterraneo dal mare incantevole, con l’esclusiva per il mercato italiano dell’hotel 5* Kaya Artemis Resort & Casino, capace di garantire una vacanza di altissima qualità a prezzi davvero contenuti.  Scegliere Dimensione Turismo vuol dire affid

Name: BOOKINGPOINT.NET
Company description: The World is beautiful! At online travel agency BOOKINGPOINT.NET we're convinced of that. Those who agree with us are our loyal, satisfied customers from all corners of the world, who via our online portal are able to choose between two options: Those, more individualistic among you may browse our website www.bookingpoint.net and find the desired information, accommodation, airline tickets or other tourist offers from our wide range. The system operates on the principle »Just click and go«, which means that from the comfort of your own home 24/7 you can find a suitable airline ticket or hotel accommodation and pay for the service via our secure credit card or by bank transfer or cash. After payment you will be sent your airline tickets and all other important documents direct to your email address. Those who like to be spoiled will be taken care of by us! All you have to do is send us an email at: info@bookingpoint.net stating your desires or simply dial our Call Centre, where friendly consultants will be able to advise you, delving deep into the finest detail of your trip.   Our main consideration is to allow customers and partners the chance to view our offers and professional services using the latest information technology so they may quickly, simply and safely find and book a holiday according to their own desires, or let us do it for them with a professional and individual approach. With our excellent quality standard and service control we strongly desire to become one of the worlds leading tour operation companies and follow the course of time. Keep up to date, trust in us and let us do the work for you... Because the world is beautiful!

Name: Nuovevacanze

Company description: Il progetto del Gruppo Turistico Nuovevacanze nasce nel 2000 dall'iniziativa di un gruppo di imprenditori provenienti da un’esperienza decennale maturata nel mondo dei viaggi, che decide di intraprendere questa grande avventura nell'affascinante mondo del Turismo. In quell'anno nasce la prima agenzia di viaggi  che si sviluppa e cresce fino a diventare un punto di riferimento importante nella realtà delle agenzie di viaggio milanesi. Il Network comincia a costituirsi e a comporsi di un numero significativo di agenzie storiche che riconoscono nelle nostre idee e nei nostri progetti un insieme di valori, speranze e ideali che ancora oggi rappresentano l'essenziale fattore aggregativo del nostro Gruppo. Nel 2007 avviene la svolta in termini numerici e strutturali. Il gruppo si compone di nuove figure commerciali e operative e la scelta di impostare il proprio credo e la propria mission sullo sviluppo e la progettazione di un innovativo modello di Rete in grado di rispondere alle esigenze e ai cambiamenti del mercato, investendo in tecnologia, risorse umane e innovazione, si rivelerà vincente. Essa ci ha consentito di centrare l'obiettivo prefissatoci alla nascita del progetto Nuovevacanze, ossia di divenire il punto di riferimento del mercato turistico italiano con l’ambizione e la certezza che il nostro marchio rappresenti e si distingua nel panorama turistico come sinonimo di qualità, servizi, guadagno, indipendenza.

Name: GenGle
Company description: GenGle è il primo social network al mondo dedicato ai Gen-itori Sin-gle per dare loro, e ai figli che li accompagnano, l’opportunità di farsi una nuova cerchia di amici. GenGle si rivolge alle famiglie monoparentali di genitori separati, divorziati, vedovi o semplicemente single. Iscriversi per un utente è semplice e gratuito: l’unico requisito richiesto è quello di essere un genitore single. “Mai più soli!!” è il motto di Gengle!! GenGle is the first social network in the world dedicated to single parents, in order to give them and their children the opportunity to make a new circle of friends. GenGle is specifically aimed at all those divorced, widowed or just single parents. Signing up is easy and free, the only requirement request is to be a single parent. “Never alone again!“ is our slogan. Giuditta Pasotto is the founder and the voice of GenGle, which has now been declared Leader Tour Operator for single parents. The uniqueness of the website has immediately brought a great interest from the Italian press, who called Giuditta to spread the voice of GenGle all over Italy through TV and radio shows.

Name: The Travel Agency

With our young and tuned-in travel agents, The Travel Agency can help your story travel anywhere in the world. We stake everything to track every recent technological trend that will effectively acknowledge this new challenges we are already facing in the extremely competitive online travel agency industry. Name: MGMT.

Company description: MGMT is redefining corporate travel management. We are not a travel agency nor just a booking platform. We act as your external Travel Management department, providing companies with a dedicated Travel Manager who works exclusively in their best interest. Our mission is to bring transparency, efficiency, and traveler satisfaction back into business travel. We know the industry inside out — airlines, hotels, agencies, and tech platforms — and we use that knowledge to eliminate hidden costs, negotiate better agreements, and optimize every step of the travel process. With MGMT, companies typically save between 10% and 22% of their annual travel spend, while giving their employees a smoother, stress-free travel experience. We work with SMEs and large corporations alike, offering flexible service plans that adapt to their size, objectives, and travel needs. Your travel strategy, simplified. Your travelers, better cared for. Your company, saving more.

Name: Dcs Plus BPO
Company description: dcs plus BPO is dcs plus’ travel services company, created to increase the efficiency of technological platforms – ERPs, booking engines, online selling platforms – through advanced connected services.  dcs MarketPlace, Content Mapping and Online Marketing are BPO’S main services and were developed to help you build a synergy between your business’s core components: Technology, Content and Marketing. 1. dcs MarketPlace dcs MarketPlace is meant to be a global B2B community linking travel players around the world – travel agencies, tour operators, consolidators etc. – and allowing them to access, promote and distribute travel services through the dcs plus technology. 2. Content Mapping The Content Mapping service refers to joining the static travel content from more integrators into a single database with unique identification for locations, hotels and hotel details (geocodes, addresses etc.). 3. Online Marketing dcs plus BPO builds and integrates Marketing on the Technology and Content components. Our Online Marketing services include setting, implementing and monitoring digital marketing campaigns for the travel agencies with a web presence, using the most important digital promotion tools: SEO/ SEM, Google AdWords, SMO, Analytics (Web Analytics & Performance), E-mail Marketing.

Name: Puglia Cycle Tours
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Putignano, 146 Estramurale A Levante, 70017
Company description: Started as a group of cycling enthusiasts, we have become over time an Active Tour Operator specialized in active travel on two wheels.  Our headquarter is in Putignano but our bicycles cross all of Puglia and Basilicata for guided or self guided tours. We are passionate travel designers and authentic hosts of our land, in fact we offer trips in which the active and outdoor aspects are combined with the slow and conscious discovery of the local culture.  In each trip there are so many points of contact with food and wine, art and stories related to the soul of places. Our guests can choose to travel in self guided mode, with tracks designed by us and Gps navigator provided, or they can choose to be accompanied by our local and multilingual guides to discover the places. We also make fully customised trips, both for individuals and groups. We collaborate with selected local accommodations, including trulli, masserie and rural houses, and we offer luggage transport service throughout the trip. Our motto is "Don't hurry, ride happy" because we believe that crossing Puglia by bicycle is a way to experience true happiness moments.

Name: Arno - Travel And Event Design

Company description: Founded in 1969 Arno Travel, onsite Italian travel planner, has been the leading company for luxury tourism for over 50 years.  Committed to offering its clients the best in Italy, and providing guests with memorable experiences, Arno Travel specializes in selecting the finest properties, sourcing and ideating outstanding experiences and partnering with charismatic experts to create uniquely enlightening Italian journeys.  Arno’s dedicated team guarantees professional assistance and creative solutions at all times, and ensures guests enjoy personalized attention and care throughout their stay. Thanks to our extensive network of contacts throughout the country we are able to open the doors of those museums, landmarks and main sites not accessible to the general public.  Committed to guests’ full well-being we check and double check services, brief our escorts, guides and drivers, and then brief them again, to make sure each and every one of them knows the logistics, is aware of each guest’s needs, and offers a genuine, heartfelt Italian style hospitality. Check the link in bio for more details about us.

Name: Reisebüro Stiefvater

Company description: Our Philosophy: "This is where your vacation begins!" Since 1972, this has been our motto, and every day we strive to live up to it. Over 50 Years of Experience in Tourism & Continuous Growth: Founded by Fridolin Stiefvater in 1972, we have grown from a small family business into one of the leading tourism companies in the region over the past 50 years. We serve clients well beyond regional and national borders and maintain close relationships with hotels, destinations, airlines, and tour operators. Additionally, we are deeply committed to training and education in the tourism industry. Passionate Service, Highest Quality & Independence: Our passion for travel shapes our service. Customer focus, quality, and flexibility are at the core of what we do. As an independent, tour operator-neutral travel agency, we offer customized solutions tailored to the needs of our clients, making each trip unique. Awarded for Excellence & Innovation: We have been recognized multiple times for our excellent service, expertise, and innovative spirit as one of Germany's leading tourism companies. We are especially proud of our concept store “Kaffee&Kreuzfahrt,” opened in 2019, which was awarded as "Germany's Most Beautiful Travel Agency." Digital & Personal: Stiefvater24.de: With our new hybrid brand "Stiefvater24.de," we combine the advantages of online booking with personalized advice from our travel experts. We have already garnered significant attention on social media, with one of our Instagram reels achieving over 1.2 million views. With motivation and many exciting projects ahead, we look forward to the future with great anticipation!

Name: Caravela - Agência De Viagens

Company description: Quem somos: A Agência de Viagens Caravela é uma empresa fundada em 1958, sediada em Braga, operando com a atual gestão desde 1996. A nossa sede situa-se na Rua Eça de Queirós, 92 em Braga. Contamos com 9 colaboradores permanentes em Braga e múltiplos parceiros de negócio por todo o país com um crescimento de negócio baseado na nossa própria capacidade financeira. Somos uma agência acreditada pela  IATA - International  Air Transport  Association, APAVT, Turismo de Portugal e parceiros da Associação Comercial de Braga. Temos contratos de colaboração e venda com as principais centrais de reservas de hotéis, o que nos facilita a compra on-line, aos melhores preços, de mais de 100.000 unidades hoteleiras a nível mundial. O mesmo se aplica às mais conceituadas companhias de aluguer de automóveis, cruzeiros, pacotes de férias, em todo o mundo. Somos especialistas na organização de eventos corporativos como congressos e reuniões empresariais onde tratamos de toda a logística organizacional e financeira. Os nossos clientes vão desde empresas multinacionais a instituições públicas de todo o país. Como trabalhamos: Face às nossas necessidades operacionais e corporativas, associamo-nos ao grupo Go4Travel de quem somos acionistas desde de 2013, constituído por agências especialistas em ajudar o cliente a selecionar e adquirir nas melhores condições os serviços que deseja para a sua viagem, baseado num serviço personalizado e neutral no sentido de privilegiar sempre os interesses do passageiro. Temos, por isso, os melhores fornecedores de serviços nacionais e internacionais, o que nos permite ter on-line os melhores preços de mercado negociados para grupos e individuais. O nosso método de trabalho passa pela personalização do serviço, indo ao encontro das necessidades do cliente, oferecendo alternativas para que o cliente, individual ou corporativo, possa escolher a melhor proposta, que garanta o melhor preço do mercado e o maior nível de satisfação. VIAJAMOS CONSIGO

Name: MERIDIANO S.p.A.

Meridiano è un tour operator con più di 40 anni di storia nel mondo del Turismo. Il tour operator ha visto da subito uno sviluppo nel segmento dei viaggi individuali e di gruppo con destinazioni di lungo raggio quali gli Stati Uniti, i Mari Lontani della Polinesia e l'area del Pacifico fino alle coste dell'Australia e della Nuova Zelanda. A questi paesi negli anni si sono uniti anche il Messico, Canada, i Caraibi e l'America del sud.

Name: FLORA TOUR
Company description: http://www.floratour.sk/en/ Founded in 1991, our travel agency Flora Tour has become the leading tour provider specializing in the Danube River and Central Europe. Our domain is the Danube River and its surrounding region which is a great inspiration in designing the individual products. Being aware of the significance of the Danube Region, our aim is to provide clients with high quality, creative and authentic experiences as well as to create conditions for regional development and sustainable tourism. Focusing on experience: We offer our clients not only the service itself, but we want to offer a unique lifetime experience with the warmest hospitality they will always remember. The heart of our company is our team, counting 45 members, who speak several languages and always provide services with a smile. And because the work we do is also our hobby, you can expect even something more. Creativity and originality: We prepare the great majority of our products ourselves or in cooperation with our partners. Creativity is another crucial value of ours and this makes our brand recognizable on the market. We do not want to just provide an excellent service, but also pleasantly surprise our clients. Variability and flexibility Our portfolio consists of a wide variety of services: from bus tickets sale to providing complex customized holiday packages. Thanks to our almost limitless offer, we can satisfy every spoken and unspoken desire. Specialization

Name: Diplomat Travel And Tourism Ltd
Company description: Απο το 1987 εως σήμερα οι καλύτερες υπηρεσίες ταξιδιού DIPLOMAT TRAVEL & TOURISM LTD·ΤΡΊΤΗ, 17 ΔΕΚΕΜΒΡΊΟΥ 2019· Η ιστορία μας ξεκινάει πίσω στο μακρινό 1987 όπου ένα μικρό ταξιδιωτικό γραφείο συστήθηκε στο κέντρο του Χολαργού . Από την αρχή πρώτο μέλημα μας ήταν και είναι η ικανοποίηση του πελάτη μέσα από την εμπειρία του ταξιδιού και των υπηρεσιών μας . Γι αυτό και όποιος επιλέγει εμάς βρίσκει προσφορές που του ταιριάζουν και τον κάνουν να αισθάνεται ότι κερδίζει πολλά μέσα από αυτό . Μπείτε και 'σείς στη παρέα μας και δείτε πώς το ταξίδι μπορεί να γίνει εμπειρία ζωής !  Σας ταξιδεύουμε σε όλο το κόσμο!  Αεροπορικά εισιτήρια όλων των αεροπορικών εταιρειών  Πάνω από 220.000 ξενοδοχεία Ταξιδιωτικά πακέτα οργανωμένα και μη  Υπηρεσίες Transfer  Ενοικιάσεις πούλμαν  Ενοικιάσεις yacht, ελικοπτέρων και private jets

Company description: Travel agency and tour operator, providing group and individual tours all over the world. Name: Whale Safari
Company description: Whale Safari is Reykavik's and Akureyri´s only small groups whale watching tour operator. Our specially constructed RIB boats are made to get you as close as possible to the whales, dolphins and puffins of the Faxaflói Bay and the famous Eyjafjord humpbacks. Our RIBS only seat 12 passengers per boat, each with an expert whale watching guide and captain on board. All our small group tours are real ocean safaris and the ride on our 450 to 700 horsepower boats is an adventure in itself. On our Reykjavík tours we also visit the puffins when they are in season before searching for the minke and humpback whales, we even do a sightseeing tour of Reykjavík from the sea front. On our Akureyri tours explore the deepest and most beautiful fjord in Iceland before searching for the famous "Eyjafjord Humpbacks"  Oh! And both these tours only less take then two hours. We see whales and/or dolphins on more then 92% of our tours. If we don´t see whales or dolphins on your tour you can try again for free on the Whale Watching Classic or Akureyri Whale Watching any time you like. Our ticket office and service centers are located in the Old Harbour of downtown Reykjavík and next to the Hof Cultural Centre in downtown Akureyri and are open from 8:00-20:00 during the season. Whale and wild life tours are operated up to 7 times a day, everyday from the 15th of April to the 31st of October.  Tours can be booked here online, with an email to info@whalesafari.is or via phone on +354-497-0000.

Name: Exquisite Experiences
Company description: YOUR DMC FOR THE NETHERLANDS, BELGIUM & LUXEMBOURG  We are an incoming tour operator for high-end tours through The Netherlands, Belgium and Luxembourg. As a DMC for the Benelux we provide exclusive individual tours for business and leisure clientele.  For all our exclusively designed tours we put together exceptional accommodations with unique (VIP) experiences that give an itinerary just that little extra. More information on Exquisite Experiences you find on our website www.exquisite-benelux.com.

Name: SAD Prievidza A.s.
Company description: SAD Prievidza a.s. is a leading Slovakian company with 69 years of rich history in the transport industry.  The history dates back from the year 1949 when the first transport system was created in Czechoslovakia inorder to cater the public transportation and logistic of the goods.  SAD Prievidza, the joint stock company, as known today was established back in 2002 with the mission of offering high quality transportation services to the public and private sector carrying forward the initial idea of paving a path on the field of transportation. The ideology being providence of high level of comfort and technical excellency to the public via different types of automobile vehicles. The safety of people is given the top priority. The large vehicle fleet includes over 250 busses and represents brands as Setra, Man, Iveco, Neoplan, Scania, SOR. The average age of the fleet is below 4,8 years. The international transport department was created based on the demand of international transport and sightseeing. It serves inbound tourism comming mostly from Asia taking tourists through east and west countries of Europe and Scandinavia. The most favourite brand for such a travels was gained by SETRA, therefore 80% of the international travel fleet carry this name. Each bus used by International travel department is less than 1 year old. The buses rarely stays in Slovakia, pick up and drop off points are usually in different countries. The comforf and safety along with technical and visual perfection of the busses gives the high standard and perfectionism - the values company is proud to present. In general, the company offers transport services for: - Public, groups or individuals - Travel agencies - Schools, companies, sports clubs - Incoming events, congresses, VIP events - Airport and city transfers as well as transfers with Europe - Sightseeing tour across Europe - Coordination and organisation of transport during congresse and fairs

Name: Glauka Viajes
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Alcalá De Henares, 8 Avenida De La Alcarria, 28806
Company description: Glauka viajes no es una agencia de viajes al uso, es un espacio donde compartimos nuestra forma de viajar y vivir con nuestros clientes. Creamos experiencias únicas para cada viajero. Nos gusta el trato persona a persona, que nos cuentes qué quieres y crearlo juntos. Ofrecemos siempre un trato personalizado con una persona del equipo a tu disposición durante toda la aventura. En 2007, gracias al apoyo del grupo Glauka, abrimos nuestra agencia de viajes minorista en Alcalá de Henares: Glauka Viajes. En 2 años, nos consolidamos en la zona gracias al valor añadido que damos a nuestros viajes y a la creación de un departamento exclusivo de excursiones propias, teniendo en cartera varias asociaciones que confían desde entonces en nuestro trabajo para la programación de todas sus salidas durante el año, tanto de fin de semana como más largas. En 2010 captamos la primera empresa para la gestión integral de sus viajes de negocio: reserva de hoteles, vuelos, coches, eventos y cualquier servicio necesario. Y partir de ese momento glauka viajes es especialista en viajes corporativos. Desde entonces hemos seguido creciendo y consolidando nuestra marca. En 2019, decidimos dar un giro más a nuestra historia, apostando por la digitalización y además, tras doce años… ¡Cambiamos de local! Creamos un espacio más amigable e interactivo con mesas compartidas y pantallas para que nuestros clientes puedan ver lo mismo que visualizamos nosotros, ganamos en transparencia en la venta. Nos gusta diseñar el viaje con nuestros viajeros, creando itinerarios exclusivos y personalizados. Hemos ampliado la plantilla, estructurando la agencia en diferentes departamentos para prestar una atención más especializada a cada uno de nuestros clientes y nuestro objetivo sigue siendo el mismo: Trabajar para que nuestros viajeros inviertan su tiempo en lo que de verdad importa: DISFRUTAR.

Name: SiciLife
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Siracusa, 284 Viale Scala Greca, 96100
Company description: We are Sicilian people. We travel a lot all around the world. We often found ourselves around a table full of pizzas and cold beers talking about our trips. Through the telling of our experiences, day by day it took shape what we are now.  It has been a long course, made of ideas and discussions, study and work, dreams and ambitions. That dream that today is no more a dream, it has become reality: it is Sicilife.    It is a Tour Operator - or a Digital Company, or better both of them -  made up by Sicilians who want to differentiate themselves on the global market through their ability to offer itinerary and experiences reflecting the lifestyle and the traditions of its own territory. Moreover, we do it using the most innovative digital tools: “Do-it-yourself” and soon also the Itinerant Immersive Reality are our key principles. The entirely digitalised proposal of tours allow us to satisfy the request of current travel market: thematic itinerary, tales, travel. These are all new paradigms that satisfy an emerging need of living an original experience. We satisfy the necessity of our guests to share impressions and emotions in order to live them in group, using audiovisual and multimedia tools, included the Virtual Reality. On the website, you will find contents written in several languages: this is our way to promote the true discovery of territory and traditions, tearing whatever cultural and linguistic barrier down. Our main aim is let you live Sicily as you were Sicilians, through excursions, activities, tastings, cooking experiences; everything that made our proposal appropriate to the new requests of market. Our mission is let you discover the essence of the QUINTESSENCE OF SICILY.

Name: ItinerAria
HQ Location: Italy, Biella, Roppolo, 8 Via Al Castello, 13883
Company description: We travel by foot or bicycle along ancient trails or new itineraries, promoting through the use of the latest technology. We are specialized in the development of smartphone Apps, for tour operators, tourism boards, publishers. We als work in itineraries design, consultancy in the slow travel field, GPS surveys of big networks or long distance routes and we cooperate with the main Italian tourist boards. But there’s one thing that makes our services truly unique: the  passion for our work, day after day, step by step. We use the latest technology to create and promote itineraries for hikers and cyclists. Our efforts are concentrated on spreading the concept of “slow” tourism as a means of development for local communities, capable of giving rise to healthy processes of economic, social and cultural growth. ItinerAria has been recognised as an “Expert partner” by the European Association of the Vie Francigene and Garmin. We are the first and only Italian technology provider to be registered with the Adventure Travel Trade Association.

From the rental selection until the completion of the payment process, Easy Reserve customers are followed and supported all the way by real people via email, phone, and live chat. So from the most popular tourist areas and cities of Italy, to the most beautiful locations in France, Spain and more, Easy Reserve’s websites are the best place to start when planning a vacation. Easy Reserve offers a variety of different kinds of vacation rentals worldwide to choose from in Europe, America and elsewhere. The company runs four multi-language websites: www.easyreserve.com, www.italy-villas.com, www.tuscany-villas.it and www.holidayhomesprovence.com. Easy Reserve is based in Dublin, Ireland, but its multi-lingual support personnel are located internationally. Easy Reserve's mission is to help people find the perfect accommodation that will suit all their needs so that they can have a stress-free booking experience and can look forward to enjoying the local culture, history and the beauty of the location they choose for their holiday. The motto of the company is 'Easy Reserve… Great vacations made easy!'

Friendly, professional guides take members from all over the globe on unforgettable adventures through Iceland’s most beautiful natural wonders - such as lava tubes, waterfalls, geysers, and rifts.

Name: Dansk Rejsehjælp
Company description: Dansk Rejsehjælp gør kompensation ukompliceret.  Det gør vi ved at hjælpe den rejsende med at få den erstatning, som fly- eller rejseselskabet skylder dem, når deres fly er blevet forsinket eller aflyst.  Dansk Rejsehjælp er et statsautoriseret inkassobureau, som står for hele processen med henblik på at inddrive kompensation og refusion. Betaler flyselskabet ikke, tager vi kravet i retten, hvor vi sikrer retfærdighed for den rejsende.  Dansk Rejsehjælp tilbyder en no win, no fee løsning til alle vores kunder, da vi er selvsikre på vores service og kompetencer. Dette er indtil videre resulteret i mere end 35.000 til kunder med en gennemsnitligt score på 4,9 ud af 5 stjerner på Trustpilot.  /// Dansk Rejsehjælp makes your compensation claim less complicated. We help the traveler claim the compensation that is owed to them by the airline or travel agency when their flight has been delayed, overbooked or canceled. Dansk Rejsehjælp is a state-authorized debt collection agency. Dansk Rejsehjælp manages the whole process in regards to recovering compensation and reimbursement. If the airline does not pay, we take the claim to court, where we ensure justice for the traveler. Dansk Rejsehjælp offers a no win, no fee solution to all our customers, as we are confident in our service and competences. This has so far resulted in more than 35,000 customers with an average score of 4.9 out of 5 stars on Trustpilot.

Company description: Da 30 anni trasformiamo la passione per la musica in esperienze di viaggio straordinarie. Oltre ai viaggi, curiamo eventi privati e cene di gala con artisti d’eccezione, per momenti indimenticabili all’insegna dell’arte e dell’eleganza. Name: Dödlinger Touristik GmbH
Company description: Wir sind euer Ansprechpartner, wenn ihr einen Omnibus benötigt und bieten in unserem Fuhrpark moderne Reisebusse in den Größen von 8 bis 50 Sitzplätzen an! Gerne übernehmen wir aber auch die Organisation eures gesamten Programms und arbeiten dabei mit langjährigen Partnern zusammen - damit habt ihr einen sorgenlosen Ausflug und Zeit zum Genießen ...   Außerdem sind wir euer zuverlässiger Partner, wenn es um Flughafentransfers oder die Abwicklung größerer Shuttle-Dienste geht (wir haben den Shuttle-Service für die Biathlon WM 2017 organisiert)! Wenn es euch weiter in die Ferne zieht, sind unsere Kolleginnen im Reisebüro aufgrund ihrer langjährigen Erfahrung eure kompetenten Reiseberater und haben den ein oder anderen Geheimtipp bereit ...  Wir freuen uns auf euch :)

Name: BeKings
Company description: BeKings – Dove ogni torneo diventa un’esperienza da professionisti. BeKings è un’agenzia e tour operator specializzata nell’organizzazione di tornei di calcio giovanile internazionali e viaggi sportivi su misura. Da anni accompagniamo migliaia di giovani calciatori in esperienze indimenticabili, creando eventi curati in ogni minimo dettaglio, capaci di trasformare una semplice competizione in un vero sogno da vivere. 📍 Tornei internazionali di altissimo livello Ogni evento è progettato per offrire standard professionali: dalla qualità degli avversari alla gestione logistica, fino all’esperienza a bordo campo. I nostri tornei coinvolgono club professionistici, dilettanti e accademie da tutta Europa. ✈️ Tour sportivi ed esperienze uniche Offriamo pacchetti completi per squadre e famiglie: voli, hotel, navette, pasti personalizzati, visite agli stadi e musei del calcio. Ogni trasferta è un viaggio all’insegna dello sport, della cultura e della crescita. 🤝 Un ecosistema al servizio del talento Collaboriamo con società professionistiche, brand internazionali e istituzioni sportive per garantire un’organizzazione solida, sicura e coinvolgente. Ogni partecipante vive un’esperienza immersiva pensata per valorizzare il talento e creare ricordi indelebili. 🎯 Oltre 5000 squadre – Più di 60.000 giocatori coinvolti I numeri raccontano chi siamo, ma è l’entusiasmo dei ragazzi e delle famiglie a definire la nostra missione: fare del calcio giovanile un’esperienza straordinaria.

HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Naples, 27 Via Vannella Gaetani, 80121
Company description: Airontour è la storica agenzia di viaggi napoletana che dal 1975 realizza i tuoi sogni e ti accompagna in ogni parte del mondo.

Name: Gruppo Veronelli - Inventori Di Viaggio
Company description: Il Gruppo Veronelli si occupa di turismo in tutte le sue declinazioni. Dall’inizio del 2001 è divenuto proprietà di un gruppo di giovani imprenditori e professionisti, che ne stanno assicurando un importante sviluppo. Attualmente il Gruppo Veronelli risulta composto da: 6 agenzie di viaggi: Arese, Lainate, Legnano, Milano, Rho e quella svizzera di Chiasso; il business travel: riconosciuto dalla clientela più esigente come altamente qualificato ed efficiente per rispondere a tutti i bisogni di mobilità aziendale, servizio che forniamo anche a Regione Lombardia ed Università Cattolica; l’ufficio gruppi: capace di soddisfare qualunque esigenza legata al turismo collettivo per ogni tipo di organizzazione (scuole, parrocchie, cral, associazioni, ecc.); il tour operator: specializzato nelle destinazioni dei continenti americano ed australiano.

Name: African Explorer
Company description: African Explorer è un Operatore Turistico specializzato esclusivamente verso il continente africano. Nasce negli anni settanta per un "mal d'Africa" contagiato dal fondatore che comincia a proporre al mercato il Kenya e la Tanzania. L'African Explorer arricchisce negli anni le sue proposte con tanti altri paesi africani includendo soltanto negli ultimi anni anche il Sud Africa, da quando anche quest'ultimo paese è diventato veramente e completamente africano. L'African Explorer si afferma sempre di più come leader della destinazione, non solo perché è rimasta fedele alla scelta di programmare viaggi solo verso questo continente, ma soprattutto perché bellissimi e ben organizzati che sono sempre prima provati e colludati direttamente dalla squadra dei giovani collaboratori di cui è formata la società. Malgrado tutte le difficoltà logistiche e strutturali che molti paesi di questo continente presentano, sono viaggi sicuri e selezionati tenendo presente tutte le esigenze del viaggiatore italiano. Sono viaggi studiati per chi vuol conoscere questo meraviglioso continente nel modo migliore, con i migliori servizi disponibili, nei luoghi più belli ed interessanti e, anche molto importante, a prezzi giusti! L'Africa di African Explorer è: L'Africa degli Animali - L'Africa degli Uomini L'Africa del Mare - L'Africa delle Montagne Sono i quattro aspetti più affascinanti di questo continente. Sono i quattro interessi principali per cui un viaggiatore attento e curioso sceglie questa destinazione.

Name: CTA Travels
Company description: LA NOSTRA STORIA  CTA TRAVELS è un’agenzia viaggi e tour operator che nasce dall’idea di coniugare un modo di viaggiare responsabile e sicuro, con il desiderio di realizzare viaggi su misura per i propri clienti. LA NOSTRA MISSION La nostra mission è quella di rendere ogni Vostro viaggio indimenticabile curando ogni dettaglio dalla partenza all’arrivo….e poi ancora! IL TEAM DI CTA TRAVELS prende vita dall’esperienza e dalla professionalità pluriennale di CTA Consorzio Torinese Autoservizi, che dal 1995 si contraddistingue come leader nel settore delle NCC e Bus GT, e dalla acquisizione di realtà consolidate in ambito turistico, tailor made, business travel e viaggi di gruppo.

Name: Gastaldi Holidays
Company description: Siamo un tour operator italiano specialista nelle vacanze personalizzate, nel mondo. Grazie a oltre 150 anni di competenza, creiamo vacanze su misura, garantendovi qualità e attenzione.  Vogliamo farvi vivere il mondo con uno sguardo nuovo, perché - in fondo - cos'è una vacanza se non l'opportunità di rimettersi in contatto con sé stessi e con l'ambiente che ci circonda? VACANZE SU MISURA Ogni viaggio deve essere su misura. Perché su misura sono le aspettative, il modo di viaggiare e di vivere l'esperienza. Organizziamo viaggi per tutte le esigenze: per chi ama non pensare a nulla, per chi ama l'indipendenza, per chi ama la comodità, per chi ama l'"on the road", per chi ama l'avventura, per chi ama il divertimento, per chi ama la tranquillità e il relax. Iniziate a sognare, al resto ci pensiamo noi.

Name: Mondo Scuola Viaggi Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 10 Via Filippo Argelati, 20143
Company description: Tour Operator Specializzato in Turismo Scolastico VIAGGI DI ISTRUZIONE ITALIA/ESTERO STAGE LINGUISTICI PCTO ITALIA / ESTERO PCTO IN GITA PROGETTI PON / POR ERASMUS+ BIGLIETTERIA AEREA/FERROVIARIA PROGRAMMI SU MISURA

Name: Sardinia360
HQ Location: Italy, Arzachena Sardinia, Località Baja Sardinia, 07021
Company description: Tour Operator specializzato nell'offerta in Sardegna di: Hotel 4 e 5* - Resorts -  Ville - Appartamenti - Residence Esperienze, Tour di gruppo e Tour Privati Transfer e assistenza Biglietteria Aerea e Navale

Name: America Unlimited GmbH
Company description: Der renomierte Reiseveranstalter America Unlimited garantiert bei allen Reisen höchste Flexibilität sowie einmaligen Service. Alle Kunden erhalten von uns umfangreiches Informationsmaterial mit jeder Buchung und nützliche Extras, wie Adapter, Dokumententaschen und/oder Gutscheinhefte. Wir beraten Sie jederzeit gerne am Telefon sowie im Beratungsbüro in Hannover.

Name: Select Holidays C/o New2go GmbH
Company description: Sie wollen mehr als den „Urlaub von der Stange“? Dann ist Select Holidays Ihr Reiseveranstalter des Vertrauens! Von Selbstfahrer- und Mietwagen-Rundreisen über Kombinationsreisen, bis hin zu perfekten Kreuzfahrt-Erlebnissen, mit den schönsten Ozeanriesen weltweit, finden Sie bei uns eine bunte und dennoch erlesene Vielfalt an individuellen Reise-Spezialitäten. Was uns seit 2007 mit unseren Kunden verbindet, ist die Leidenschaft zu ausgefallenen Reisen mit Charakter sowie die Gestaltung eines rundum zufriedenstellenden Ablaufs. In Kroppach im Westerwald beheimatet – in der Welt Zuhause! Unser Team mit 20 Urlaubsgestaltern setzt jeden Tag alle Energie und Kreativität dazu ein, Ihnen die schönste Zeit des Jahres zu einem unvergesslichen Erlebnis zu machen.    Wenn Sie regelmäßig reisen, wissen Sie wie zeitraubend und aufwendig die Vorbereitung einer Reise sein kann. Das Internet verschafft Ihnen die notwendige Transparenz – aber die Vielzahl an Informationsquellen, Buchungsmöglichkeiten und Konditionen ist nicht nur verwirrend, sondern oftmals auch frustrierend.  Wir haben es uns daher zum Ziel gesetzt, Ihnen diesen Aufwand abzunehmen und attraktive Reisen, sauber ausgearbeitete Reiseverläufe und einmalige Angebote anzubieten.

Name: Sunwave Gruppen- Und Singlereisen GmbH
Company description: Sunwave ist seit Winter 1986/87 im Reisegeschäft tätig und hat sich heute auf Singlereisen spezialisiert. Wir wissen, was wir tun und was die Menschen von unseren Singlereisen erwarten. Ein weiterer Geschäftszweig sind Incentive Reisen, wo wir insbesondere mit unserer Einzelzimmerkompetenz und Organisation als Reiseveranstalter unsere Stärken haben.

Name: Hami Tours
Company description: Hami Tours GmbH, a German-based travel agency, specializes in offering global travel services, including flights, hotels, car rentals, and transfers, catering to both individual and corporate clients. Hami Tours partners with major providers to deliver competitive rates and specialized services for destinations, especially across Turkey and Europe.

Name: STR Destination Handling GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: STR is your partner for success: Tap into the potential of the German-speaking tour operator market with a strong partner at your side. As a sales and marketing office for clients in Germany, Switzerland and Austria, we have a contract with our partner DMCs to carry out targeted activities in sales and marketing to promote the services of incoming agencies.

Name: VIAJES ON TIME
Company description: Agencia de viajes minorista. Especialista en Cuba el caribe.

Name: KOMPAS Touristik Spain
Company description: KOMPAS Touristik España is a travel agency founded in 1992 in Barcelona. With our extensive knowledge of different destinations, we have become specialists in group and individual travel throughout Spain, Portugal and other European countries. Our experienced team is at your disposal to organise tours, incentive trips and events throughout Europe. The years of experience, expertise and broad product selection are the reason why international partners place their trust in us. About KOMPAS Group  KOMPAS is one of the most important travel companies in Europe and most definitely one and only genuine Adriatic Ambassador. Headquartered in Slovenia, KOMPAS connects all the important European markets with its wide range of premium, classic and innovative travel services, which are handled by an impressive and extensive national and global network of 20 KOMPAS offices located all around Europe and in the USA.  After more than 60 years of tradition, experience and expertise, KOMPAS is internationally renowned for its top quality services and uncompromising dedication to customer satisfaction. This enables us to effectively organise truly remarkable tours, holiday packages and business services in the Adriatic region, in Europe and other continents.

Name: DRUMWIT
Company description: DRUMWIT nace en 2017 como una revolución del sector turístico. Un concepto innovador y pionero en España. Somos la agencia de viajes sorpresa. Una nueva manera de viajar para los amantes de la aventura y de los viajes económicos. ¡Nosotros nos encargamos de todo! Incluye vuelos y alojamiento.

Name: Armitour | DMC
Company description: Based in Spain and Morocco, Armitour is an B2B incoming travel agency and DMC which has been providing ground services to several agencies and tour operators from countries all around the world, especially in Spain, and Portugal, Morocco, France and Benelux, since 2016.Our work principle is not only to provide our services to our customers but also to be a solution partner in the region for the companies reaching out to us and help them get over the possible difficulties they may have on their itineraries and organisations in the area. What matters to us most is to ensure that all -from companies we provide corporate services to a one single traveller using our facilities- enjoys and completes their journey in a safe and comfortable environment. To work with Armitour will make you feel special giving you the comfort of feeling safe and at ease on your travel experience.

Name: NEOWAY TRAVEL
HQ Location: Spain, Murcia, Yecla, 2 Calle De San Francisco, 30510
Company description: Agencia de viajes receptiva y emisora: Peregrinaciones, servicios para misioneros y ONG. Empresas y vacacional Experiencia, tecnología, innovación

Name: Crosseye Marketing GmbH
Company description: crosseye Marketing was founded in 1999 and is now one of the leading internet agencies in the tourism sector in Styria. The team consists of tourism professionals, marketing experts, and digital specialists. Together, they bring many years of experience to the table – a strong asset for a young company in a still young medium. In addition to complete website projects, the daily business includes online marketing and the active sale of overnight stays and holiday packages. With passion and curiosity, tourism projects are initiated, developed, and managed – always keeping a close eye on online developments and guest behavior. In strategic consultations and collaborative workshops, we work together with tourism businesses to make the most of the internet as a medium. Numerous long-term partnerships with hotels and destinations reflect the quality and reliability of the projects we deliver.

Name: ViaVitória
HQ Location: Portugal, Azores, Praia, 8 Largo Conde Da Praia, 9760-438
Company description: Somos uma Agência de Viagens e Turismo, desde 1994. Planificamos viagens para si e para a sua empresa, sejam elas em família ou em grupo, para qualquer destino.  Aliado às reais mudanças no mundo moderno, olhamos para a sustentabilidade como um forte pilar. As nossas atividades e tours, em solo Açoriano, seguem essa visão. Estamos na Ilha Terceira (Açores), nas cidades de Angra do Heroísmo e Praia da Vitória.

Name: SLIDE IN Travel
Company description: A SLIDE IN é um operador turístico e agência de viagens irreverente, dinâmica, jovem que reflete uma nova abordagem e visão na forma como concebe a sua oferta turística. É nossa ambição tornar viagens em experiências únicas e inesquecíveis. Refletimos nos nossos pacotes o que faz a diferença no momento da decisão: experiências únicas. A trabalhar no sector do turismo desde 2007, a SLIDE IN destaca-se por desenvolver um projeto vencedor de encontro às necessidades e exigências dos seus clientes, sendo reconhecida como uma das principais agências de viagem de programação e promoção junto do target jovem e snowtrips.   A SLIDE IN ocupa uma posição de liderança no mercado jovem vincada pelos seus programas inovadores, originais e divertidos. A organização de eventos e animação turística faz parte do leque de produtos oferecidos pela agência. Na sequência de uma procura cada vez mais elevada, por parte de vários segmentos de mercado, nomeadamente viagens desportivas, surftrips, viagens corporativas e M.I.C.E., temos como objetivo oferecer a melhor relação no binómio qualidade/preço, com uma resposta rápida e eficiente garantindo a plena satisfação de todos os clientes.   Em 2015, lançamos o desafio de criar uma nova marca na área de incoming. Com uma abordagem diferenciadora e eficaz na promoção turística de Portugal, assim surge a MY LISBON CONCIERGE, que pretende satisfazer os pedidos mais exclusivos e dar a conhecer o que de melhor o país dos descobrimentos e navegadores tem para oferecer em hotelaria, gastronomia, vinhos, cultura, história, shopping e animação noturna.   O SLIDEINTRAVEL.COM reúne um conjunto de profissionais experientes no sector de viagens, turismo e lazer, especialistas na área tecnológica e peritos em comunicação e media cuja finalidade é oferecer em qualquer momento as melhores soluções para as suas viagens, aliadas sempre à segurança, personalização e à comodidade das compras online. geral@slidein.travel

Name: Associazione Distretto Turistico Costa D'Amalfi
Company description: Il  Distretto Turistico Costa d’Amalfi è un Distretto riconosciuto il 17 gennaio 2014 dal Ministero per i beni e le attività culturali e per il turismo MiBACT facendo riferimento alla delimitazione territoriale definita da Regione Campania con il decreto dirigenziale n°43 del 28 giugno 2013. Il Distretto Turistico Costa d’Amalfi È un soggetto pubblico/privato che si pone l’obiettivo di contribuire con progetti e capitale umano ad una crescita sostenibile e ordinata non solo della Destinazione in chiave di Economia Turistica, ma anche di generare vantaggi per i cittadini residenti, per migliorare la loro vita quotidiana favorendo l’accesso a nuovi servizi pensati per loro, con un’attenzione particolare a chi risiede nelle aree interne, spesso “dimenticate” nelle policy di sviluppo sostenibile. Alla data di questo documento, fanno parte del Distretto Turistico Costa d’Amalfi circa 70 soggetti del privato, imprese attive non solo nel comparto ricettivo, ma anche servizi di noleggio, ristorazione, agrifood, guide e trekking, agenzie di viaggi e tour operator, operatori dei trasporti e della mobilità, editoria, servizi di comunicazione e marketing.

Name: Spanish Trails Tours And Events
Company description: Spanish Trails is a boutique incoming travel agency that offers intimate, informative and entertaining day tours in and around Barcelona. We pride ourselves on our ability to provide truly unique and personalized guided tours.  We keep our groups small and cater to independent travelers of all ages looking for the perfect getaway to exciting Catalonia.  Spanish Trails was founded by seasoned, local guides with a genuine love for Catalonia and a fluency in its culture. Our commitment to our clients is to provide a genuinely personable and affordable opportunity to discover and enjoy the rich culture, nature and adventure of Catalonia…if even for just a day.  Our small group day trips are for two to eight guests only per tour and for larger groups upon request. All groups are led by one of our English speaking, entertaining and knowledgeable guides and a modern touring van. All of Spanish Trails’ mountain, coastal, city and wine region tours are tailored over the course of the day to match the group's interest and ability levels.  It is important to us for our guests to know the value of what they are paying for. When asked why our tours are more expensive than a seemingly comparable tour from another operator, we can only reply that it is simply not the same tour. This is what you get when you book with Spanish Trails:  Local Knowledge & Experience Entertaining & Knowledgeable Guides Consistency & Professionalism All Inclusive tours  Contact us for more details!

Name: Global United Esales Europe ApS
Company description: Global United Esales  Who we are: Global United Esales serves as a vital resource for travel professionals, agencies, OTAs, OTO, looking to expand their hotel offerings efficiently and affordably. By leveraging the resources and technology of a B2B hotel wholesaler, clients can improve their service to clients and enhance their competitiveness in the travel market. Services Offered 1. Wide Range of Hotel Options 2. Exclusive Deals 3. Booking Technology 4. Support and Assistance 5. Partnership Opportunities Benefits of Using Global United Esales 1. Cost Savings:    - Travel professionals can take advantage of lower rates which can lead to increased profit margins when reselling to end customers. 2. Efficiency:    - Simplifies the booking process, allowing you to quickly find and reserve accommodations without dealing with multiple hotel suppliers. 3. Increased Offerings:    - Enables smaller agencies to offer a diverse range of hotel options, enhancing their service quality and customer satisfaction. 4. Market Competitiveness:    - Access to unique deals helps travel professionals to remain competitive in a crowded marketplace. Considerations 1. Terms and Conditions:    - Travel agencies should be familiar with the terms related to cancellations, modifications, and commissions. 2. Quality Assurance:    - It’s essential to understand how Global United Esales verifies hotel quality and what measures are in place to ensure customer satisfaction. 3. Integration Capabilities:    - Information about API integration or technology compatibility is vital for agencies utilizing their own booking systems. 4. Reputation and Reliability:    - Researching the company’s reputation and any reviews from existing clients will help assess reliability and service quality.

Name: GO Sport Travel
Company description: GO Sport Travel, founded in 2001, operates in the Corporate Hospitality and Sport Travel Industry in the Scandinavian and European market. The Company offering solutions to individual- and corporate clients and operates as well as supplier of matchbreak packages to Travel Agencies. The company are until now official reseller of Chelsea FC, Manchester United, Tottenham Hotspur, Fulham FC, AC Milan, Wembley Stadium, AS Roma, Crystal Palace, Watford FC, Manchester City, Brentford FC, Millwall FC, Juventus, Como 1907 & Parma Calcio. The company is member of ISTAA (International Sport Travel Agencies Association). The company is member of ETOA (European Tour Operator Association)

Name: Nordic Invasion AB
Company description: Nordic Invasion är en svensk researrangör som sedan år 2011 arrangerar ungdomsresor till Magaluf, Rhodos och Ayia Napa. Vi är för närvarande det enda svenska företaget som arrangerar paketresor för ungdomar till Magaluf, Rhodos och Ayia Napa. Att vi är en svensk researrangör innebär trygghet för resenären, både inför resan och under resans genomförande. Vi har enbart svenska reseledare vilket underlättar kommunikationen med resenären och dess anhöriga, vilket kan vara betydande om något skulle hända. Att resa med Nordic Invasion är en garanti för fest, strandliv och inte minst minnen för livet. Vi erbjuder paketresor för kompisgänget, klassen eller skolan – som kombinerar fest, kultur och nöje. Med våra guider tillgängliga 24 timmar om dygnet på plats som ordnar allt kan du som resenär hos oss slappna av och njuta så mycket som möjligt.

Name: Active Ski Travel
Company description: Active Ski Travel är en researrangör som i huvudsak arrangerar skidresor till några väl valda skidorter. Active Ski har en inriktning mot offpist, men vårt utbud riktar sig till alla typer av skidåkare. För oss är det väldigt viktigt att de orter som vi åker till kan erbjuda åkning på en nivå som passar alla. Vår strävan är att ha skidresor för alla typer av plånböcker, från prisvärda bussresor till Kittelfjäll till exklusiva heliski-arrangemang på Kebnekaise. På våra resor erbjuds man stora möjligheter till en aktiv skidåkning. Den som vill kan komplettera sin resa med offpistskidskola, offpistguidning och toppturer med UIAGM bergsguider eller heliskiing i en fjällmiljö som är oexploaterad och fantastiskt vacker. Allt för att kunna få ut det där extra av skidresan. Vi vill ge upplevelser för livet och vi sätter skidåkningen och den personliga servicen i centrum. Samtidigt är det av stor vikt för oss att prislappen på produkten är under marknadens i helhet. På alla våra resor finns en Active Ski-guide som gör allt för att du ska få en så lyckad skidresa som möjligt. Active Ski Travel ägs och drivs av skidåkare och vi vet vad som krävs för en lyckad skidresa.

Name: Idega
Company description: Idega offers a great variety of web based solutions: ePlatform - open, complete, integrated and modern. eGov - 24/7 service, streamlining and electronic governing. eTravel - an online travel agency, booking services and disbursements. eCampus - campus applications from A to Z. eMember - a complete member system for sports associations and other organizations. eGolf - a golf system that guarantees you tee-time among other things.

Name: Vanessa Capital
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Florence, 6/r V.le S. Lavagnini, 50129
Company description: Vanessa Capital by ALBA srl is a limited company that invests in the tourism sector. Between 2007 and 2008 it has 5 travel agencies strategically located in the Tuscan territory were surveyed by Alba. The recipe for the first success: well-controlled territory, modern agencies, advanced technologies, 24-hour assistance, professional consultants, led in a few years to the exponential increase in the volume of business; from € 470,000 in 2007 to € 5,000,000 in 2010. A few years of consolidation and the introduction in new markets such as the transport of organs in collaboration with the Florence civil protection operations team have brought a progressive increase in turnover and the positioning of the Vanessa brand at the height of evidence on the Tuscan territory but above all on the international market. New partners take over in the capital of the company that invests in the Business Travel sector and volumes go up to about 9,000,000 euros. The Capitals are again invested in new projects of experience towards the final customer, the MotoGP paddock from which a new Vanessa Paddock brand is born and the international concert in the context of POP music and Disco events of the greatest world DJs. A network of 4500 rental yachts be2sea.com and travelgram.net the largest platform of European Travel Influencer Marketing. Vanessa Capital ® supports and invests start-ups with a model of philanthropy based on the value of young people and their contribution to allow, constantly, to improve services for the end user. Vanessa Capital ® touches 12,000,000 euros in 2018, over 24 times more than the first year, 1,000,000 euros a month, an average 33,000 euros transacted per day and about 2500 passengers per year trips for a total of 33,510 passengers booked .

Name: Patricio Travel GmbH
Company description: Patricio Travel GmbH ist ein Reiseveranstalter, der Sportreisen nach Kreta, Antalya, Mallorca und Kroatien anbietet. Unser Schwerpunkt liegt auf Tennisreisen, von ITF Events über Gruppenreisen bis hin zu LK-Camps.

Name: Limpopo & Diana Hunting Tours
Company description: Limpopo & Diana Hunting Tours is the biggest hunting agency in Europe with more than 36 years experience in arranging quality hunting worldwide. We operate with 2 brands – Limpopo Travel A/S, Scandinavia´s leading specialist travel agency for destinations in Africa, with sections for both hunting travel and more general tourism and Diana Hunting Tours who is a specialist in arranging hunting tours to all other destinations worldwide.  Our efforts to always deliver the best hunting tours on the market rest on the solid foundation of the most experienced staff in the business. We have, in all, more than 150 years of experience in arranging hunting tours between us, and every single member of the staff is definitely a first-rate worker in the field – for them quality has long ago become a habit.  Every 14 days we send out a comprehensive newsletter giving the latest news about our tours. If you don’t already receive our newsletter, you can register on our web site and start receiving good hunting offers as soon as they arise.

Name: Esitur Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, The Marches, Jesi, 12 Corso Matteotti
Company description: Il Tour Operator Esitur nasce nel 1973 come Agenzia Viaggi all'interno del Gruppo Crognaletti, già operativo nel trasporto pubblico locale e del trasporto della posta sin dal 1880. Nel corso degli anni ci siamo contraddistinti come Tour Operator per l'organizzazione di viaggi di gruppo sia in autobus sia in aereo. La sinergia con le Autolinee Crognaletti e con i suoi autobus Gran Turismo ci ha permesso di offrire ai clienti nel corso degli anni un servizio sempre ottimo e soprattuto sicuro. Nei nostri pacchetti sono racchiusi innumerevoli tipologie di viaggio: dal turismo culturale con visite nei vari musei d'Italia e d'Europa fino alle settimane bianche. Da sempre ci siamo dedicati a soddisfare le esigenze dei nostri clienti e continuamente ci teniamo aggiornati cercando sempre di migliorare i nostri prodotti. Il Gruppo Crognaletti grazie alla Esitur sta facendo conoscere nel mondo la Regione Marche grazie alle innumerevoli collaborazioni con le strutture del posto potenziando sempre di più il settore del turismo incoming. Nel 2013 sono stati organizzati i primi centri estivi di scherma con le Campionesse Olimpiche Valentina Vezzali, Elisa di Francisca e Giovanna Trillini, evento che avrà una cadenza annuale e accoglierà ragazzi da tutto il mondo. Dal 2009 abbiamo reso operativo il nuovo sito internet www.esitur.com dove tutti i viaggi di nostra organizzazione sono facilmente consultabili. Nel 2013 siamo stati premiati dalla Regione Marche con il premio Valore e Lavoro, un'onoreficenza consegnata alle aziende impegnate nell'innovazione e riqualificazione dell'impresa marchigiana. Sarà nostro compito offrirvi un prodotto cucito sulle vostre esigenze e soprattutto sicuro.

Name: Opertur
Company description: Opertur is a leading Spanish Tour Operator helping over twenty-five thousand people each year arrange their international holiday in Europe and Middle East. Founded in 2011 by an entrepreneur from Madrid with a profound knowledge of technology and the travel industry. Opertur's mission was to create a travel company that empowered their accredited re-seller in Latin América in order to distribute their PREMIUM travel experiences. Over the last 05 years Opertur has undergone rapid expansions, and today operates with over 250 re-sellers across Argentina, Brasil, Colômbia, Chile and México. We pride ourselves on our passion for travel and believe excellent customer experience is the way to success. Our accredited re-sellers and their customers are the focus of our business efforts and our day to day activities are defined by their travel needs and desires.  Opertur is made up of a team of over 25 young and talented employees. We believe that our success is driven by our people. We have no secrets, no private offices and no formal dress code, We are stablished in a place where our team feel inspired, motivated and encouraged to work hard and bring fresh ideas that will help shape our future.  If you’re interested in working with us at Opertur please get in contact, we’d love to hear from you.

Name: Genko
Company description: Genko is specializing on customizing Mercedes-Benz minibuses & buses. Full interior & exterior individual design solutions for travel agencies in mind.  we are offering different trim levels to suite every budget and need up to VIP top trims.  For more visit www.genko.gr

Name: Servantrip
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, Reina Mercedes Street 22, 28020
Company description: Servantrip is a Global B2B consolidator in the tourism sector, a leading technology platform which works as a "one-stop-shop" and offers multiple products and functionalities with a single API connection. Servantrip offers Tours & Activities, Airport Transfers, door to door chauffeur service and hourly drivers in over 180 countries worldwide. With more than 700,000 services and 20,000 providers and more to come. We are an "all in one" platform. Servantrip is PCI Compliance and applies artificial intelligence (AI) to present immediate, dynamic and competitive prices in real time and for different categories of services, selecting those suppliers which best suits customers’ requirements. We offer a selection of all leading suppliers in the market, unified in a single platform, allowing a faster and more personalized response, with lower production costs and greater opportunities for sales increasing and cross-selling. We help the entire travel industry, from GDSs, OTAs, Tour Operators, Travel Agencies, up to large multinational departments.

Name: UCSL United Certification Systems LTD
Company description: UCSL is an independent international Certification Body with headquarters in the EU and operating globally. We take pride in being one of the first in the world Accredited Certification Bodies for GSTC Certification, and hold accreditations in a diverse array of other volunteer sustainability certification schemes, including ASC and MSC. Our mission is to offer unmatched expertise, championing the adoption of genuine sustainable practices with our knowledge and enhancing a better tomorrow for both Nature and People. Our activities within Tourism Program include: • GSTC-Accredited Certification for Hotels & Tour Operators • Sustainable Tourism and Hospitality Trainings for business and protected natural areas • Tourism Impacts Research Projects • Communication and Awareness Building Campaigns for general public Sustainability is a journey, and UCSL is here to guide you every step. Join us in redefining the future of hospitality, where sustainability isn’t just a goal - it's a way of life.

Name: Made In Italy Tour Operator Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Portoferraio, 12 Viale Teseo Tesei, 57037
Company description: Made in Italy tour operator è una nuova azienda che può vantare uno staff con anni di esperienza nel settore del turismo. La nostra professionalità e l'ottima conoscenza del territorio acquisita, ci permettono di realizzare viaggi e vacanze di alta qualità. Nel tempo siamo riusciti a selezionare con molta cura i migliori hotel, ristoranti, castelli, dimore storiche, pullman, guide e agriturismi. La nostra specialità sono i tour per gruppi e la nostra destinazione principale è la Toscana ma siamo in grado di fornire ottimamente i nostri servizi in tutta Italia e nel resto del Mondo. La programmazione nostra vanta anche numerosi pacchetti turistici ed offerte vacanze che spaziano dal mare alla montagna, in hotel e appartamenti in rinomate località come l'isola d'Elba (dove risiedono i nostri uffici amministrativi), la Sardegna e la Toscana, nonchè particolari pacchetti agriturismo e wellness. Oltre alle prenotazioni di hotel, traghetti, voli e crociere avrai a disposizione le nostre numerose proposte per tour e viaggi guidati in gruppo, dedicate appositamente a coloro che amano viaggiare in compagnia, vacanze di Capodanno e viaggi in moto.

Name: Diòmira Travel
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Pessano Con Bornago, 20 Via Ada Negri, 20060
Company description: Diòmira Travel intende offrire i suoi servizi come Tour Operator proponendo itinerari che favoriscano una significativa conoscenza di luoghi, culture, religioni e tradizioni, anche attraverso l’interazione sul territorio e l’incontro con figure significative.  Gli itinerari proposti rivolgono pertanto una particolare attenzione sia alla cultura e alla religione dei popoli con i quali si viene a contatto che alla loro storia, alle caratteristiche dei diversi territori e alle tradizioni che nel tempo si sono consolidate. Per questo sono previsti incontri preparatori con i gruppi in partenza e sussidi da utilizzare durante il viaggio. La cura e l’attenzione per ogni dettaglio si riflettono anche nella scelta degli accompagnatori e delle guide in loco che assicurano un’assistenza altamente professionale e personalizzata. A muovere l'intero staff Diòmira è la passione nello studiare sempre nuovi itinerari, per condividerli poi con coloro per i quali un viaggio é un entusiasmante momento di conoscenza, scambio, amicizia. In una parola: felicità.

Name: Farm Holidays

Name: HP Travel Capri

Name: Viaggi Del Genio
Company description: Viaggi del Genio è uno dei primi tour operator italiani ad operare nel campo del turismo sostenibile e dell'educazione ambientale. Siamo specializzati in viaggi e vacanze naturalistiche e culturali e promuoviamo un tipo di turismo a basso impatto ambientale, esperienze attive e sportive, trekking e cammini per individuali e piccoli gruppi, in Italia e nel mondo.  La nostra storia inizia nell’Arcipelago Toscano, all’Isola d’Elba. Da molti anni lavoriamo nelle isole toscane e siamo veri specialisti del territorio. Collaboriamo con agenzie viaggi, scuole italiane e gruppi precostituiti. Una particolare attenzione è rivolta all’educazione ambientale: da anni siamo promotori dei principi cardine dell’educazione ambientale e ospitiamo i più giovani per viaggi di istruzione a stretto contatto con la natura, per riscoprire le nostre radici più autentiche e l’importanza che l’ambiente naturale riveste per tutti noi.

Name: Red Sun Tour

Name: VakantieStunt

Company description: Vakantiestunt B.V. is vele jaren geleden opgericht als reisbureau gespecialiseerd in het organiseren van duikreizen. Vakantiestunt B.V. is aangesloten bij het Algemeen Nederlands Verbond van Reisondernemingen (ANVR 4897) en de Stichting Garantiefonds Reisgelden (SGR 3001). Zo kunnen onze klanten te allen tijde vertrouwen op kwaliteit en financiële zekerheid! Vakantiestunt B.V. was established many years ago as a travel agency and has grown over the years to become an internet Tour Operator selling online products under the trade name VakantieStunt, mainly focused on individual tours and Fly-Drive trips to destinations far and near. With our independent travel specialists, we have an expert for every destination. In addition, Vakantiestunt BV is organising tailor-made diving expeditions under the tradename DuikReizen.nl  VakantieStunt B.V.  is a member of the ANVR license nr 4897 (The general Dutch association of travel enterprises and Tour Operators) and the SGR license nr 3001 (the travel compensation fund).  This way our customers can always rely on quality and financial security.  Vakantiestunt B.V. +31 20 34 15 035 Whatsapp +31 6 14 36 31 31 E: info@vakantiestunt.nl www.VakantieStunt.nl De Boelelaan 771 1082 RT Amsterdam The Netherlands

Name: Time2 Travel
Company description: Time2 Travel (T2T) is a travel agency specialized in the planning of international student exchange programs, and has been active in the Brazilian market for many years, operating today in the Mexican and Bolivian market as well.  The name Time2 Travel itself defines our essential Mission: to make our clients´ dreams come true and to do everything for them to have the best experience of their lives - the international exchange program they have always dreamt of.
