Company description: Vulkan Travel Group is the main tour operator to Iceland out of Scandinavia. We focus on maximizing the experience of Iceland by carefully choosing and putting together trips for our groups, companies and private travellers. Packaging  We have made it easy to find and book the trips with flights, hotels, rental cars and activities on our web or with a helping hand from one of our staff members. By working directly with hand picked suppliers on-site we also make sure the prices are good. Groups  We offer overall solutions for the conference, the kickoff or other kinds of group trips. Along the way we’ve developed a sense for adapting the trips to each groups unique expectations and needs. We always give every group their own personal contact. Our story  Vulkan travel group, which is headquartered in Umeå, Sweden, is the largest tour operator to iIceland in Scandinavia. We focus on maximizing the experience of Iceland by carefully choosing and putting together trips for our groups, companies and private travellers. We have helped over 100 000 travelers discover Iceland through the years.

Name: TravoAI
Company description: TravoAI is a cutting-edge platform designed specifically for travel agencies to streamline and enhance their operations through advanced AI technology. By consolidating reservations from major Online Travel Agencies (OTAs) into a single, user-friendly interface, TravoAI simplifies the management process. The platform automates order handling and tour grouping, significantly reducing administrative tasks by up to 90% and decreasing staffing requirements by 30%. With features like intelligent order-tour management, customizable dashboards, and real-time collaboration tools, TravoAI empowers travel agencies to operate more efficiently and deliver superior service to their clients.

Name: Altair Travel Agency S.A. - Tripair GmbH
Company description: Altair Travel S.A. is a traditional travel agency which operates in Athens since 1980 and consists of three departments: Incentives, FIT (leisure) and Corporate (B2B).   In 2010 Altair expanded its operations to the e-commerce and inaugurated www.petas.gr for the Greek and Cypriot markets, followed by www.tripair.com for our customers in Europe, Asia and the Americas.  Our online platforms provide flight and ferry tickets, accommodation, car rentals, travel insurances and ancillary services.  In 2019 Altair Travel formed Tripair GmbH, a subsidiary company with physical presence in Germany to solidify our e-commerce activities abroad.  Throughout the last decade our experienced team has created a technologically sophisticated online environment for bookings of travel services in Greece and abroad.

Additionally, GuideCompaniet can arrange visits to local museums and dining experiences, ensuring a comprehensive and memorable stay for visitors. With a strong network of local providers, the company aims to create unique experiences that showcase the beauty and culture of Stavanger.

Name: CASAMUNDI TURISMO

Company description: A Casamundi é uma agência de viagens que agrega cultura ao turismo. Além disso, negociamos as condições mais favoráveis para nossos clientes, sempre com foco na sua satisfação e tranquilidade. A cultura e o conhecimento são fontes constantes de inspiração para o nosso trabalho, por isso, além de intermediar serviços turísticos, a Casamundi procura promover o conhecimento em turismo e cultura através de eventos especiais. Name: Solia - Tid For Ferie
Company description: Solia er en mellomstor reisearrangør som tilbyr pakkereiser med både rutefly og charterfly. Selskapet er eid av TravelCo Nordic, et av Nordens største reisekonsern, med kontorer i alle de nordiske landene. Solia er kjent for å tilby reiser med høy kvalitet, samt en spennende miks av reiser med unike opplevelser til unike reisemål.  Vårt hovedkontor er plassert i Digevej i København, hvor vi holder til i nye og moderne lokaler.  Bransjen er i rask utvikling, og de senere årene har vi utvidet porteføljen fra klassiske pakkereiser til reiser som inneholder langt flere elementer enn bare fly og hotell. Våre ansatte har alle ulik bakgrunn og alder, noe som fører til et dynamiskt og engasjert miljø. Ta gjerne kontakt direkte med oss på www.solia.no eller tlf. 22 47 73 10 dersom du vil vite mer om våre produkter, bli en av oss ved vårt kontor, eller ønsker å jobbe i vår organisasjon i utlandet.

Name: Betravel

El equipo de vacacional trabaja en viajes hechos a medida para satisfacer todas las necesidades del cliente.

Name: OneTourismo
Company description: One Tourismo is an All In One Solution for the Travel Professional, fully supporting your business objectives by offering you technology, strategy & promotion. Reinventing Travel Agencies through the transformation of your business from offline to online.  Gain access to a variety of suppliers, offer more products and better prices with our Multi XML infrastructure.  Your brand is important to us, therefore we provide a tailor made solution for your needs with a fully customizable user interface.  Comprehensive Admin allows you to set up all your customers and policies in depth, but still remain simple.  Compliment your booking platform with a brand new website. Designed by travel industry experts, we offer a specialized CMS and an easy to use booking engine. The system is intuitive and requires the minimum of training.  We promote your business using a variety of digital Marketing tools.    Last but not least, we help you built your strategy and plan your business.

Name: Galway Tour Company
Company description: Galway Tour Company is Ireland’s leading coach tour operator in the West of Ireland. With a strong reputation for providing entertaining and memorable tours for all. We are also the proud recipient of TripAdvisors Travellers Choice award for the past 14 years in a row! Established in 2007, Galway Tour Company has always had one goal in mind and that is for you to enjoy and experience the best of Ireland. Our customers are extremely important to us and we work hard to ensure you have the best tour experience possible. Our team of local drivers are overflowing with knowledge of not just each destination but everywhere in between. We don’t do scripted tours, each one is truly unique with our drivers bringing their personal touch of fun and humour to each tour.  It’s time for an Adventure!

Name: City Splash Tours
Company description: WHO WE ARE City Splash Tours operate entertaining city sightseeing tours using amphibious vehicles travelling on both land and water. The route takes in many of the main attractions a city has to offer including an exciting ‘splash’ where our unique vehicles transition from road to water. Tours generally last between 70-85 minutes. Our tours are interactive featuring live commentary from knowledgeable and humorous guides that encourage passenger participation. Mission: To provide the ultimate fun and engaging sightseeing experience of a city, delivered by witty, humorous and informative driver-guides through leading edge technology to the highest safety standards. Vision: To be recognised as the leading amphibious tour operator worldwide Our Brand Values: Health & Safety - Health and Safety is at the heart of everything we do and guide our decisions on a strategic and operational basis daily Innovation – To lead the amphibious Splash Tour industry by continuous ongoing Research & Development resulting in the best in class equipment and working to best in class safety and quality standards Fun, witty & entertaining – To provide a memorable experience putting smiles on the faces of our customers Unique experience – To be different to others and to surpass our customer’s expectation Family Ethos – To create an environment and workplace where everyone feels part of an extended family. Our Ethical Principles shape our culture, underpin our reputation, and must be recognised and demonstrated by all partners, franchisees and employees. Integrity: To act with integrity to build and maintain trust and good relationships Courage: To create the solution if it doesn’t exist Leadership: To shape/guide the industry to a better future Transparency: To always be truthful, sincere and able to justify our actions and decisions

Name: The Irish Tourism Group
HQ Location: Ireland, County Limerick, Newcastle, Killarney Road
Company description: The Irish Tourism Group specializes in creating customized self-drive tours, chauffeured tours and golf vacations for FIT’s and exclusive tours for larger groups to Ireland. Our large team of experienced, dedicated and friendly staff take great pride in the high level of personal service we offer to all of our international customers and travel agents. All clients are assigned a dedicated travel adviser in our Irish offices, complete with direct contact details via e-mail and TollFree numbers.  While our internet presence is significant, most of our business is derived by way of recommendation and word of mouth. In a nutshell we are Local, Flexible and Trustworthy. Ireland as a destination promises so much and our job is to provide this wonderful experience in an easy and seamless manner. Following recent significant acquisitions and the opening of additional offices in Ireland’s South West, IrishTourism are now considered one of Ireland’s premier inbound tour operators and in the last decade our regular attendance at the major travel expos throughout the world has only served to raise this profile. Testament to this is the reputation that we have developed over the years with the top accommodation providers in the country, a reputation we are extremely proud of.

Name: Suend Di TSM Tourism & Services Management Srl
Company description: Il gruppo Suend al suo interno lavora in diverse aree operative: ➤ TSM Tourism & Services Management: è un'azienda specializzata in consulenze manageriali nel settore turismo per imprenditori che decidono d'investire nel settore Tour Operator, dove curiamo ogni fase dell'azienda, dallo start up alla ottimizzazione del profitto. ➤ Suend Business Travel: Ci occupiamo di mobilità aziendale  mettendo a disposizione la nostra esperienza per l'ottimizzazione di costi e risorse, con un risparmio medio del 10% sui volumi acquistati. ➤ Suend Viaggi: il settore Leisure del gruppo Suend, che comprende attività di Tour Operator B2B specializzata sul Brasile, attività di agenzia viaggi online e sul territorio (agenzie a Milano, Monza e Piacenza) ➤ Suend Italy: Tour Operator specializzato nell'​ inbound turistico. Name: Amerigo Viaggi
Company description: Il viaggio come esperienza fisica e mentale. Su questo concetto organizziamo le nostre proposte, attraverso una rigorosa selezione di destinazioni e tour operators di qualità, con la consapevolezza e l’esperienza di un gruppo da 35 anni nel settore .

Name: Comitel & Partners
HQ Location: Italy, The Marches, Ascoli Piceno, 171 Marino Del Tronto, 63100
Company description: Comitel & Partners è un’azienda italiana leader nel settore dell’organizzazione di eventi volti alla promozione e alla commercializzazione, in Italia e all’estero, del prodotto turistico italiano. Organizziamo workshop, educational tour, conferenze stampa e operazioni di PR rivolti ai principali tour operator internazionali e alla stampa specializzata italiana ed estera, affiancando le Regioni italiane, le società private di settore ed enti e realtà diverse legate al turismo nelle attività di promozione, rendendole maggiormente efficaci sui diversi mercati di riferimento. Grazie a queste azioni, infatti, le aziende turistiche mantengono i rapporti esistenti e innescano nuove collaborazioni, grazie al ventaglio di contatti che Comitel & Partners può garantire. Dalla grafica all’advertising, passando per gadget e altri strumenti di lancio, elaboriamo sempre nuove idee per la promozione di ogni singola attività e azienda, supportando a 360 gradi le imprese turistiche o gli enti che partecipano a fiere ed eventi di settore in Italia e all’Estero. Con più di 10 anni di esperienza nelle attività turistiche, la nostra azienda ha guadagnato stima e apprezzamento nel settore, grazie alle nostre competenze e alla nostra estrema professionalità; non a caso, I.T.W. ®, marchio registrato Comitel & Partners, ha raggiunto la sua 60a edizione e stiamo già lavorando per il futuro. Siamo anche un web center focalizzato sul settore del turismo: per chi ce lo richiede creiamo database di contatti, statistiche, previsioni e proiezioni di mercato, insieme a strumenti volti ad indagare la customer satisfaction.

Name: Barcelona Day Tours
Company description: If you are looking to tour in and around Barcelona in comfort and style - we can offer you amazing tours at affordable prices. With so much to see and do in Barcelona you will want to use your time as best as possible. We are most recommended on TripAdvisor and voted as the best option in Barcelona by reviewers on cruise critic and luxury cruise talk. We are the original and LICENSED Barcelona Day Tours. Our friendly and passionate local driver-guides and expert guides who are committed to making your holiday in Barcelona the best possible! We will not bore you with rehearsed text and we will give you an insider look into real life in Barcelona with interesting anecdotes and a professional service. You will not be disappointed. We can offer you just about everything you need to have the perfect holiday. Airport transportation, hotel pick-up and drop-off, high-quality day tours, wonderful evening flamenco shows, and much more. We are very proud to declare that we have only parted ways with very satisfied and happy new friends. We hope that we can welcome you in Barcelona soon too! Important note: please help us stop the piracy of tourism in Barcelona by only booking your services with a genuine Tour Operator. To make sure you deal with a genuine travel company please inquire with the American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA) which regulates the industry worldwide. We hope to see you in Barcelona very soon!

Name: Fresco Tours - Camino Specialists
HQ Location: Spain, Basque Country, Bilbao, 26 7 C Calle Colón De Larreátegui, 48009
Company description: We are a travel agency specializing in cultural walking tours along the Camino de Santiago, Basque Country, and all parts of Spain. Based in Spain, we develop routes from our backyard through firsthand knowledge of the land and its people. We continue to foster and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with local hotels, restaurants, and suppliers in order to assure that they meet our highest quality standards. Through regular visits and open communication with our many partners, we have formed a network of people and places ready to assist you on every step of The Way. We will truly take you off-the-beaten path and introduce you to our friends and favorite secret spots! Traveling with our company is a very different experience than traveling with a large tour operator that sends one of their many employees to one of their many destinations. Not only do we specialize in Spain, we call it our home, and we work hard to make it feel like it's yours as well. At Fresco Tours, we take the challenge to heart of guaranteeing that your vacation is all that it can be. Our guides are handpicked and receive rigorous training to ensure that they share our vision. We are constantly keeping our eyes and ears peeled for feedback during each trip, in hopes of making those minor adjustments or special details that will take your trip from "great" to "unforgettable." After all, at the end of the tour, we hope to be more than just your tour company, we hope to become your friends. Vacation time is a precious commodity for all of us. Just as you work hard to earn it, we work hard to deliver it to you. At Fresco Tours, our expertise, attention to detail, commitment to the client and personal touch will allow you to enjoy every minute of your vacation to the fullest. Are you a travel agent, hotel, restaurant, or industry supplier looking to partner with us? We would be delighted to receive your contact request!

Name: Atmosfair GGmbH
Company description: Atmosfair gGmbH is a non-profit organization dedicated to promoting green energy and contributing to the global energy transition by reducing CO₂ emissions. Founded in 2005, the company focuses on developing and financing high-quality climate protection projects, particularly in non-Annex I countries, utilizing proven renewable energy technologies. Atmosfair's mission is to facilitate carbon offsetting for individuals and businesses, offering tools such as CO₂ calculators and climate protection packages tailored for the travel industry. The organization collaborates with various partners, including travel agencies and environmental organizations, to enhance sustainable travel practices and support innovative projects like the production of green kerosene. With a commitment to transparency and sustainability, atmosfair ensures that the majority of its funding directly supports climate initiatives, making a significant impact on both ecological and social development.
