Ať už se jedná o dovolenou na kouzelném atolu Malediv nebo poznávací cestu na Aljašku. Luxusní dovolená je členem sítě Trav eller Made – poskytovatelů jedinečných dovolených po celém světě. Zimní Alpy (www.zimni-alpy.cz) a Skinet (www.skinet.cz) nabízí kompletní informace o lyžařských resortech, ubytování, počasí a službách v Alpách. Zajišťuje i ubytování, skipasy a další program v Alpách pro jednotlivce, skupiny a firmy.

Name: Sunny Days - Czech Rep.
Company description: Leading tour operator in Czech Rep. and eastern europe. Sunnydays celebrates its 14th anniversary this year, we reflect on our history of offering travelers a world of endless joy and happiness a wide range of offers to Tunisia, Egypt, Greece, Marocco and Turkey

Name: ETravel.cz
Company description: The internet travel agency eTravel.cz is one of the five biggest internet vendors on the Czech market. Every day eTravel.cz offers a wide selection of current holidays. They also provide information about popular tourist destinations and their website shares traveller reviews from those who have experienced the hotel or holiday before. Since 2003, eTravel.cz has delivered holidays to several thousand happy customers and has won many certificates and awards from different tour operators. Since 2012 eTravel.cz has been part of the travel group FISCHER. The other members of this group are CK FISCHER – a specialist in providing summer holidays by the sea and organising children’s clubs, Nev-Dama – a specialist in winter skiing holidays and Privileq – a bespoke luxury holiday provider for the most demanding clients. Travel group FISCHER is part of KKCG’s financial and investment portfolio.

Name: THV
Company description: THV-REISEN ist ein Reiseveranstalter, der Ihnen zu fairen Preisen vielfältige Reiseprogramme anbietet. Unsere MitarbeiterInnen haben Erfahrung in Planung und Durchführung von Reisen - profitieren Sie von dieser Erfahrung und erleben Sie schöne Urlaubstage, die wir Ihnen mit Hilfe unserer Partnerunternehmen entspannt gestalten werden. Sie haben die Möglichkeit österreichweit in modernen Reisebussen Platz zu nehmen und gelassen in den Urlaub zu starten. Es erwarten Sie Top-Hotels, abwechslungsreiche Ausflugsprogramme, erfahrene Reiseleitungen und nette Mitreisende. Rufen Sie noch heute unsere Buchungshotline +43 (0)662 - 90 650 an – unsere freundlichen, aufgeschlossenen Mitarbeiter/-innen freuen sich auf Ihren Anruf! Neben Ihrer Buchung kümmern Sie sich auch gerne um Ihre Fragen, Wünsche und Anregungen!

Name: FOR-LINE TOUR
HQ Location: Czech Republic, South Moravian, Brno, 8 Dominikanske Namesti
Company description: Cestovní kancelář FOR-LINE TOUR působí na trhu již 25 let. Specializujeme se na lyžařské i pobytové zájezdy do Itálie, Slovinska či Chorvatska. Rádi zprostředkujeme zájezdy i do dalších destinací. Vracející se klienti jsou důkazem toho, že kvalitní služby a osobní přístup jsou správnou motivací pro náš celý tým. Nabídku zájezdů vytváříme na základě ověřených zkušeností a zážitků našich zákazníků a věříme, že si z ní vybere téměř každý.

Name: Oliven Reiser AS
Company description: Vi har tilholdssted i Skien og er en turoperatør hvis visjon er å tilrettelegge spennende reiser med fokus på kultur, aktivitet, livsglede og naturopplevelser. Vi er ekte engasjert i våre turer og hovedkonseptet vårt er gruppeturer på sykkel, samt sykkel- og vandreturer. Vi skreddersyr og tilrettelegger også individuelle turer for vennegrupper og bedrifter. Siden oppstarten av firmaet i 2001 har antall destinasjoner, ansatte, samarbeidspartnere og guider steget i jevn takt med et stadig økende antall kunder. I dag er vi 4 ildsjeler ansatt og Helge er Oliven Reisers grunnlegger og jobber i hovedsak med forretningsutvikling og kvalitetssikring av våre turer. Våre reisemål er konsentrert rundt flere Europeiske destinasjoner, som Italia, Spania, Frankrike, Portugal, Storbritannia, Tyskland og Ungarn. I tillegg til spennende oversjøiske destinasjoner som Cuba, Chile, Argentina/Uruguay, Vietnam/Kambodsja og Sri Lanka. For oss er «noe ekstra» at våre ruter er unike og autentiske for det stedet du besøker. Det er pittoreske landsbyer, vakker natur, god vin, avslappende pikniker i det fri, dyktige guider, sjarmerende overnattingssteder og restauranter som appellerer til sansene dine. Og ikke minst den lokale kompetansen vi kan tilby for hvert eneste reisemål. Vi frakter dessuten bagasjen din, så du kan bare tenke på å sykle eller gå. Dette er verden sett nært fra sykkelsetet og med vandrerens øyne. Vi vil bidra til vekst i de land vi besøker, så vi inkluderer og samarbeider alltid med lokale partnere og ildsjeler. Det er de som vet hva som bør oppleves der du er, som kan dele tradisjonene og som alltid arbeider til det beste for våre reisende. Det gjør også våre norske reiseledere, som alle brenner for at nettopp du skal ha Olivenopplevelsen. Vi tar deg kanskje med dit du ikke hadde funnet frem til selv? Olivenopplevelsen er å vende hjem med (hjertet fullt av) uforglemmelige minner og sansene fulle av nye inntrykk. Det er opplevelsen av raushet og kvalitet.

Name: World Travel Group WTG ROMANIA
Company description: World Travel Group este un tour operator cu experienţă de peste 20 de ani în turismul de calitate din România, profund specializat în incoming, având în portofoliu clienţi de top din întreaga lume.

Name: Animazione In Azione
Company description: Animazione in azione nasce dall'unione di risorse che militano nel settore turistico da più di 15 anni al servizio dei più grandi tour operator nazionali ed internazionali , con ruoli che vanno dalla direzione artistica , alla direzione dei villaggi turistici , garantendo , grazie alla loro storia ,serietà e professionalità. Il nostro obbiettivo è di fornire un servizio di qualità facendovi vivere un'esperienza unica nel suo genere , scegliendo i nostri animatori non solo per le qualità professionali , ma anche per quelle umane , riuscendo sempre a regalare vacanze da non dimenticare. Mettiamo il cliente a proprio agio ascoltandolo e comprendendolo , così da costruire una partnership basata sulla reciproca fiducia.

Name: ALAYCATOUR TRAVEL
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, Nº 1 Plaza Santa María Soledad Torres Acosta, 28004
Company description: We organize different, exclusive, solidary trips that will allow you in addition to knowing other cultures to be able to live with them from the respect and admiration of living unique experiences. Alaycatour is the result of the great growth and reach of the Yacha Group. A tourist group with more than 20 years of experience in the field of pilgrimages, religious and vacation trips that has opted to create this new Tour Operator, internationalizing it and expanding its business lines with experiences, solidarity and spiritual trips. A travel brand created to respond to the new demands of the most demanding and dreamy travelers, in this new era of change and reinvention.

Name: Albatross Reisen GmbH
Company description: Albatross Reisen GmbH, based in Ochsenfurt, Germany, operates and rents out mobile homes, tents and holiday homes. It owns three subsidiaries in Croatia, Italy and Spain. Together they operate 850 units on 41 campsites in Germany, Austria, Croatia, Italy and Spain. Albatross also rents out mobile homes and tents from selected partners. The distribution takes place via an own travel brochure and the Albatross websites, as well as selected travel agencies and tour operators in Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary and Croatia. Albatross Reisen GmbH has been owned by the Knaus family since 1972.

Name: Barcelona Arab Tours
Company description: Barcelona Arab tours is an inbound tour operator for leisure and M.I.C.E. tourism with own registered brand in Spain By our head office in Barcelona and Madrid branch we offer a wide range of Touristic services especially selected for Arab tourists.

Name: OhhItaly!
Company description: OhhItaly! is the virtual travel planner that helps you discover the most authentic side of Italy. We offer unique travel experiences that blend comfort and hospitality with rich Italian landscapes, arts and culture. With us, even a short vacation becomes a spectacular adventure. Our unique formula includes all transfers by a private luxury minivan and around-the-clock assistance from a tour leader that speaks your language. OhhItaly! has made a fine selection of the best that Italy has to offer: hotels, restaurants, tours and activities that allow you to create unforgettable all-inclusive personalized travel packages.

Name: GotoSailing.com
Company description: Based in the Netherlands, GotoSailing.com is a brand new, independent online travel agency for yacht charter holidays.  We provide an easy to use, safe and efficient online booking platform for charterers and charter operators. We serve our customers around the globe in the hottest charter destinations; Croatia, Greece and Turkey.  With its state of the art design, GotoSailing.com keeps it simple and easy to use. We know you're planning for the most pleasant of holidays, so we try to make the process just as pleasant.

Name: Parsec Comunicaciones S.L.
Company description: Parsec was established in 1996 as a company dedicated to develop reservation systems making use of the latest Internet technologies. We have acquired wide experience customizing our booking engine for different travel company profiles: incoming, traditional tour operators, online travel agencies, consolidators. Our deployments serve large companies as well as very small agencies: we can create a budget solution for every need.

Name: StayPoland
Company description: StayPoland is a registered Polish travel agency since 2003 specializing in incoming tourism. We offer a wide range of services. All of them can be conveniently reserved on-line. You can contact us by e-mail, phone, chatbox (SP-eaker) or alternatively visit our office in the centre of Warsaw.  We cooperate with a network of partner agencies in Europe and overseas. We serve tourists for whom we offer individual reservations or tailor-made travel packages, and business professionals for whom we assure consultancy and background information. StayPoland offers a personal approach and help with exploring Poland for those who look for a stay or holiday with insight. Our main services include discounted hotel reservations (no booking fees, all-inclusive prices with on-line availability), car rental, tours around Poland/ Central Europe, and consultancy. We provide a reliable and responsible service to those who need any travel arrangements in Poland.

Name: Astra Tour
Company description: We are a travel agency located in Cluj Napoca, with more than 10 years experience in travel industry. We offer a wide range of services, such as: - online hotel reservations(online booking engine with multiple providers) - incoming services - car rental - flights reservations - charter reservation - city break programs - cruises reservations

Name: Holatravel
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Sevilla, 23 3º D Plaza De La Encarnación, 41004
Company description: Agencia de Viajes online Seleccionamos las ofertas de viajes mas atractivas y te las ofrecermos al mejor precio en nuestra web www.holatravel.es Viajes para fechas especiales, puentes, escapadas de fin de semana. vacaciones todo incluido en la mejores destinos de España, Europa, Caribe, Islas, Cruceros, etc.

Name: Felixrestare
Company description: Felixrestare derives from the combination of Latin Italian Language which stands as  Latin Language: Felix- Happy (English) Italian language: Restare- Stay (English). Which combine mean; Happy stay, also the agenda of our platform. We are a Leisure, Travel & Tourism platform excellently running in more than 96 Countries in various field of Tourism Industry.  Objective: The objective of www.felixrestare.com is to put on the table those subject & categories with the help of which any one related to Tourism Industry can get  benefit at its best. We define and claims our Slogan: THE ERA OF VACATION Users of Felixrestare: * Rental Property Owner * Rental Motor Bike Owner * Event / Concert Manager & Organizer * Restaurants Owners * Rental Car Owners * Yacht Owners * Inbound & Outbound Travelers * Tour Agency * Tour Operator * Tour Guide * Travel Blogger * Content Writer * Cruise Operator * Cultural, Heritage & Educational Traveller  * Motel and Hostel Owners * Ancient Cuisine Experts * Digital Marketing and Social Media Experts * Tourism Industry Experts * Inbound and Outbound Travelers We are working with the travellers worldwide. Hence keenly with Europe, Switzerland, New Zealand, Australia, Singapore, Russia, Africa, as well as Hong-Kong. Felixrestare is the result of hard work & dedication of experts who are into deep study and research to come up with what is needed.  Key Inspiration person with felixrestare come into shape and existence are: Austin, Prakhar and Jennie. Certification: Tourism Board of Singapore Luxemburg Tourism Expansion Authority Tourism Association Of Malta Ministry of Tourism, New Zealand Cruise Associate of Australia

Name: Visit Meteora
Company description: Visit Meteora is a group of travel professionals and local destination experts who have combined their talents, knowledge, resources and passion for tourism to become the pioneers of Destination Management Company in Meteora. Our main focus is to meet the range of needs of our visitors by providing extraordinary and enriching experiences. Visit Meteora launched www.visitmeteora.travel, the first full-service online travel agency and destination marketing portal, hosting and marketing a number of accommodation facilities, excursions, outdoor activities, transfer options and many more. Visit Meteora offers the most exclusive mixture of enjoyable and memorable excursions both in the Meteora region and also around it, ranging from soft adventure and sight-seeing tours to daily cruises, day trips and rock climbing! We provide a wide range of bookable services – accommodation, transportation, dinner options, walking tours and taxi transfers. With our secure and reliable booking system, you can easily book tours and hotel accommodation online with confidence, and receive an instant booking confirmation. Our site is filled with tourist information and Internet links to help you plan your visit to Meteora. Whatever you are looking for in your visit to Meteora we can help you find it. Contact us and let us help you get the most out of your Meteora visit! And finally, have an unforgettable adventure in Meteora – see it all, taste it all, experience everything and make the most out of your time in Greece’s most unique place!

Name: Bernard Hayes Travel
Company description: Located in Cork City, Bernard Hayes Travel is a leading and well respected travel company within the Irish travel industry. Boasting vast experience in all aspects of travel, we pride ourselves in our quality of work and service where our customer and their needs always come first. We have been dealing with corporate travel arrangements since our inception. We place great pride and value in the relationships we have built with our corporate clients and in the trust they place on us in delivering quality and cost-effective travel programmes.  We are a fully licensed and bonded travel agency - licensed by the Irish Aviation Authority (TA0408). We are also an IATA accredited agency which enables us to distribute all major worldwide airlines inventory and issue tickets on the their behalf. If your business requires an agile and responsive travel company to assist your workforce in making international travel a seamless and effortless process, we would be delighted to hear from you. We will gain a deep understanding of your business needs which will enable us to provide a top-class and personalized travel service.

Name: UNDER PAR GOLF MANAGEMENT
Company description: UNDER PAR GOLF MANAGEMENT was created in 2012 by three qualified golf professionals. Our vision is to deliver a solution for golf courses that require a solution to outsource their golf academy operation and marketing to grow the game of golf. Nowadays we operate 2 locations in Mallorca: Golf T-Poniente, Golf Son Antem. Our company also operates de virtual golf simulator in the hotel Pure Salt Port Adriano.  Our professional team and instructors have many years of experience teaching and growing the game of golf. If you are considering improving your game during your vacation in Mallorca, please contact us. We also collaborate with professionals, tour operators, agencies and hotels that like to cross marketing or establish collaborations.  Our company also dedicates to rent golf equipment, golf shop management, junior academy, summer camps, golf tournaments, golf packages and more.

Name: TUI.it
Company description: We are an Italian Online Travel Agent belonging to TUI GROUP, worldwide leader in travel industry. We offer to our clients a wide range of tourist services: more than 130.000 hotels worldwide, airlines-scheduled and low cost flights, more than 20.000 holidays of the most important Italian tour operators and an endless number dynamic packages. And now everybody can enjoy our innovative travel auction!

Name: TEDDY KAM
Company description: Tourist company TEDDY KAM has more than 25 years’ experience in the tourist business, bounded mainly with incoming tourism. The company was awarded with many prizes for Tour operator №1 for incoming tourism, Tour operator of the year and for its 20-year contribution in tourism. Our activities as we mentioned are mainly incoming tourism but we also develop a closed circle of services including incoming tourism, eco-tourism, winter tourism, congress tourism, youth tourism, cultural tourism, transfers, short and long stays, group tourism, incentives and etc.

Name: Four Seasons Travel Prague
Company description: Four Seasons Travel operates in Prague, Vienna and Budapest, dedicated to the provision of excellent destination management services. Our multilingual staff takes care of every detail and has been providing quality services to many tour operators, incentive houses and meeting and convention organizers. Together with our partners in the Czech Republic and Central Europe, we have excellent relationships with hotels, service suppliers and municipal authorities ensuring that we can do our best.

Name: Try Nature Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Viterbo, 52 Via Luigi Galvani, 01100
Company description: Try Nature Tour Operator is a company based in Italy than promotes Italian tradition and culture. We are a Travel Planner, we specialise in Lazio, Umbria, Toscana e Marche with main topic in gastronomy, culture and nature.  The company firmly believes in the importance of values and travel; it operates, builds and grows following these values, never forgetting that: "People will forget what you said, they will not remember what you did, but they will never forget how you made them feel..."

Name: Roombites Ltd.
Company description: Roombites Ltd. is an online travel agency, designed and built to serve one clearly defined purpose - provide the right hotel room for you. Our expertise is focused on just one particular aspect of the business-travel world – accommodation. It is this peculiarity, which makes us stand out among the rest. We do not sell travel packages; we do not pretend to have the most extensive network of airline carriers and transfer companies; we have no intentions of throwing overwhelming numbers at you to impress you. We can proudly and confidently state, though, that when it comes to hotel accommodation during trade fairs and medical congresses, the right solution for you needs can be offered by our accommodation experts. Your key benefits if you decide to trust us:  - No booking/reservation fees – our services are absolutely free of charge (we prefer to negotiate our commission with the hotels and our partners rather than charge our customers a fee);  - A synergy of directly contracted allotments and supplier-provided B2B rates with only one goal – to provide you with the optimal accommodation solution;  - A team of focused, dedicated, multilingual professional willing to take the extra step, so that you can rest assured that your needs are being looked after; Our business model lies in simplicity and is easily described – we monitor the market, prescreen the hotel offers, pick up the ones that matter and then we start negotiating. Still not convinced we are the right provider for you? It is free to try – comparing rates with us is cost-free and bears no obligations.

Name: Hellenic International S.r.l.
HQ Location: Italy, Friuli Venezia Giulia, Trieste, 3 Via Donota, 34121
Company description: Hellenic International S.r.l. nasce dall'unione di due società con un’ esperienza ventennale nel mondo del turismo ed in particolar modo per la destinazione Grecia.  ‘HELLENIC’  ha sempre stretto forti rapporti commerciali con le maggiori compagnie di navigazione - in primis con la Minoan Lines - e con i migliori rappresentanti e agenti locali garantendo  ai propri clienti un elevato standard di qualità e servizi. Responsabili passeggeri, Minoan Lines al porto di Trieste, Agenti Generali  Minoan Lines per Slovenia e Ungheria, rivenditori ufficiali delle principali compagnie di traghetti interni in Grecia, il nostro ufficio booking è in grado di effettuare prenotazioni dai principali porti italiani fino alla più piccola e remota isola greca di destinazione. Tour  Operator specializzato nella destinazione Grecia. La profonda conoscenza del prodotto permette, con l’organizzazione tecnica della nostra agenzia di viaggio (IATA), la TERGESTE VIAGGI,  la creazione di pacchetti su misura in grado di soddisfare anche la clientela più esigente e  con la stessa minuziosa cura e attenzione, il nostro reparto gruppi organizza itinerari ad hoc. Dal 2005 la società ha potenziato ulteriormente il settore informatico e la sua presenza sul web con un sito internet dei più avanzati sul mercato, veloce e sicuro. Per chi preferisce il "canale" di prenotazione tradizionale rispetto a quello on-line, Hellenic International mette a disposizione dei propri clienti due uffici : Trieste dove c'è anche la sede legale e Milano.  Attualmente possiamo vantare il miglior rapporto qualità – prezzo sia per i traghetti che per i servizi a terra e siamo a disposizione per qualsiasi tipo di richiesta e prenotazione.  Buone vacanze quindi ... con HELLENIC INTERNATIONAL !!!

Name: Study Agency
HQ Location: Czech Republic, South Moravian, Brno, 79 Svatopluka Cecha
Company description: - Online based educational travel agency to provide students comprehensive data on possibilities of studying languages and other fields abroad. (website currently under development, launch 2011) - Certified agent to many cooperating schools. - arranging study stays for students abroad - prices always lower than those of particular schools! - full service, personal consultancy (only in Brno)

Name: Nomades Voyages
HQ Location: Belgium, Uccle Bruxelles, 27 Place St Job, 1180
Company description: Créée en 1999, Nomades est une agence de voyages implantée en Belgique. Notre siège est situé à Bruxelles et nous avons 2 bureaux de vente à Uccle et à Woluwe. Les 2 agences de Nomades rassemblent une équipe de 12 collaborateurs, tous grands voyageurs, pétillants et expérimentés possédant une très bonne connaissance terrain. Ensemble, nous avons un incroyable réseau et une pépinière d'idées, nous avons quadrillé la planète pour vous et aujourd’hui nous possédons plus de 200 ans d’expériences à nous tous ! Nos offres  Voyages sur-mesure sur les 5 continents avec la collaboration de tours opérateurs spécialisés (Club Med, Thomas Cook, Jetair, Club Aventure, Rainbow…) et de nos partenaires locaux. Voyages individuels à la carte pour une approche plus intimiste du pays.  Voyages culturels à thèmes : ethnies, cuisine, bouddhisme, agriculture et autres thèmes.  Voyages Incentives sur mesure au service de la communication des entreprises.  Voyages scolaires, séjour linguistique et multi-sport : pour les 7/25 ans. Voyages Business ; une manière originale de motiver ou remercier vos employés. Spécialités Notre propre Tour Opérateur : Lignes Nomades  Des voyages hors normes, sur mesure, au centre de vos passions; stage organisé ou découverte individuelle,... Polynésie, Madagascar, le désert algérien, la culture amérindienne au Canada, la nature costaricienne, les montagnes marocaines, l’architecture malienne, l’hindouisme népalais ou la méditation tibétaine…

Name: Komet Reisen Ges.m.b.H.
HQ Location: Austria, Burgenland, Pinkafeld, 7a Ing. Julius Raab Straße, 7423
Company description: Komet Reisen – Reisebüro | Busreisen Seit 1992 betreibt das Familienunternehmen ein Reisebüro und einen Busbetrieb in Pinkafeld. Gemeinsam mit 50 Mitarbeitern wird ein starkes regionales Reisebüro und ein Fuhrpark mit 30 Bussen betrieben. Reisebusse, Regionalbusse und Linienbusse sind täglich auf den Straßen Europas unterwegs.

Name: Creme Guides
Company description: Creme Guides Lifestyle & Travel is an online magazine that combines a sophisticated lifestyle with individual and high-class travel experiences. Besides cultural, gastronomic and shopping tips for the cities of Berlin, Hamburg and Munich as well as Vienna, Zurich and Copenhagen, Creme Guides Lifestyle & Travel, together with the tour operator Ella Fogg, offers exclusive trips to any destination and according to individual customer wishes. With comprehensive and competent consultation, Creme Guides guarantees accompaniment before, during and after the trip.

Name: Worldwide Travel Group
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Amsterdam, 3-117 Gustav Mahlerplein, 1082ms
Company description: Worldwide Travel Group is a Tour Operator based in the Netherlands. Our full service brands providing tailor made vacations include Pacific Island Travel (Hawaii, New Zealand, Australia and the Pacific Islands), Impala Tours (Africa) and South America Tours. We also have CheapCampers for easy and affordable online booking of campervans for travel in New Zealand, Australia and The United States of America and Canada. We pride ourselves on being specialists in our destinations and our employees know from their own personal experience with all of our destinations. Please feel free to contact us to assist in putting together an unforgettable trip for you and your loved ones.

Name: RejsRejsRejs Travel Magazine
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Copenhagen, 15 Vester Farimagsgade
Company description: Travel better, travel longer, travel responsible!  RejsRejsRejs (literally TravelTravelTravel in Danish) is the largest travel magazine in Denmark, as well as a thriving travel community and an upcoming travel agent.  We currently reach more than 3 million travel eager Scandinavians each month, of which many are women.  RejsRejsRejs consist of the website rejsrejsrejs.dk, a newsletter, 2 apps and a number of Social Media sites and groups, 12 channels all in all.  We focus on providing real insights, travel planning tools and the most relevant travel packages for any traveller across Scandinavia who is keen on going beyond the standard travel routes or seasons.  We aim to support travellers in discovering local destinations, find new places all over the world, and get social with people during travels - no matter how they travel and where they go.  We create an easy overview of the best existing travel advice, by working together with a selected network of great writers. Besides this, we are sharing insider guides in the shape of professional articles and pictures delivered by the editors' group.  RejsRejsRejs has been founded by two keen travellers, Jacob Gowland Jorgensen and Jens Skovgaard Andersen, with a background within travel, communications and culture. They have travelled more than 150 countries in the world, and have worked as travel talkers, travel guides, travel magazine editors, photographers and journalists and are proud members of the Travellers´ Club of Denmark. Jens is also a board member and tourist guide, while Jacob is an adj. associate professor at the business university in Copenhagen, CBS. Do reach out if you can see a potential for professional cooperation. We are currently cooperating with more than 100 national tourist organisations, travel agencies, hotels and airlines. We do content marketing, awareness campaigns and market travel offers and tours.  You can contact us at hq@rejsrejsrejs.dk.

Name: HOPPETRAVEL
Company description: Hoppetravel is een zelfstandig en onafhankelijk reisbureau met meer dan 30 jaar ervaring in de reiswereld.

Name: Fadiro BV
Company description: Developper and distributor of BAS travel-agency administration system. Leader in the Dutch market since 2007, and BAS is used by most of the Toerkoop and VakantieXperts travelagency's. Also de ANWB is using BAS for their travelshops. BAS is a webbased administrationprogram with much facilities en webservices. Fadiro is also ANVR partner.

Name: Centrum Krakov
Company description: Cílem Centra Krakov je poskytnout návštěvníkům moderní, pohodlné a funkční prostředí, které při nákupech ocení. Obchodní centrum nabízí pohodlné umístění a velikosti vstupů do objektu, vysokou míru přirozeného osvětlení díky světlíku v celé délce pasáže, nabídku místnosti pro matky s dětmi nebo téměř 300 parkovacích míst pro automobily, z nichž je skoro 240 umístěno v podzemních garážích objektu a cca 60 na povrchovém parkovišti, s vjezdem z ulice Hnězdenská. Centrum Krakov nabízí ve třech nadzemních patrech téměř 14 500 m2 prodejních ploch s širokým spektrem obchodů. V přízemí je kromě supermarketu (o výměře 1800m2) situována řada dalších obchodů a služeb, jako např. drogerie, banky, tabák, lékárna, čistírna oděvů, knihkupectví, cestovní kancelář či rychlé občerstvení. První patro Centra Krakov je koncipováno především jako patro obchodů s módou, obuví, módními doplňky, sportovními potřebami, domácími spotřebiči či elektronikou. Ve druhém patře je umístěn foodcourt s jednotkami rychlého občerstvení, running sushi a italskou restaurací, dále dětský koutek, hračkářství, fitness centrum a saunový svět Saunia. 14.500 m2 pronajímatelná plocha 30.000 m2 užitná plocha 22.000 m2 nadzemní podlaží plochy 8.000 m2 podzemní podlažní plochy 240 podzemních parkovacích stání 72 obchodních jednotek 60 venkovních parkovacích stání 3 nadzemní podlaží 1 podzemních podlaží 4 vstupy do objektu v prestižní soutěži "BEST OF REALTY - NEJLEPŠÍ Z REALIT" se Centrum Krakov umístilo na úctyhodném 3. místě!

Name: Nortlander
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Copenhagen, 149 Bygning 9 Vesterbrogade, 1620
Company description: Nortlander is one of Scandinavia’s leading ski tour operators. Nortlander has over 30 years of experience and currently send more than 30,000 ski guests to France, Austria and Italy every year.   Nortlander offers ski holidays to all group sizes and budgets. Nortlander  tailor every trip to your individual needs to ensure that you will enjoy the best ski holiday.       Nortlander Business specializes in business trips, and we can accommodate all your needs from flight and transfer, to daily activities and much more.    Nortlander are ambitious about our ski holidays and strive to give customers the best holiday experience every time.     Nortlander are a part of Skinetworks, which is the largest ski tour operator in Scandinavia. Skinetworks ensures that all practicalities and inconveniences are taken care of, and all you have to do is enjoy your holiday.    For more informaiton – visit Nortlanders websites at www.nortlander.dk and www.nortlander.se.

Name: Mediteran Travel
Company description: Mediteran Travel is a Polish leader in campsite resorts in Croatia. As a tour operator, we manage over 300 mobile homes in 4 locations in Croatia, 1 in Slovenia and 15 luxury apartments on the Adriatic coast. We have been developing dynamically since 2015, constantly expanding our portfolio with new attractive locations and tourist products. Our houses are built according to original projects using new, innovative technologies. We take advantage of valuable comments and suggestions of our guests, constantly improving our projects. We can proudly say that our houses are among the world leaders in terms of quality and comfort. We have our own tourist agency in Croatia, which prepares a comprehensive offer of attractions and excursions on site for the guests of our houses and apartments. Our offer includes cruises on Croatian islands, sightseeing tours and extreme attractions such as rafting, zipline or canoeing on rushing Croatian rivers.   In the organization of the holiday we take care of comprehensive satisfaction of the needs of all our guests. See for yourself, spend your vacations with us!

Name: Tripsta
Company description: In 2005, two restless entrepreneurs founded a startup in the heart of one of the world’s travel hot spots—Athens, Greece. Initially called travelplanet24, our online travel agency is one of the largest and most recognized leaders in the industry. Our trusted brands, tripsta, airtickets and travelplanet24 are preferred by more than a million loyal travellers throughout the 50+ global markets that we presently operate in.  Philipp Brinkmann, Co-founder & CEO, and Kristof Keim, Co-founder & CCO, set out to make their idea a reality by establishing the niche market of selling Greek ferry tickets online to tourists. As their business grew, so did their dreams. Their focus on ferry tickets expanded to include plane, train and car rentals and they successfully entered new markets. The startup quickly evolved into a growth company and was renamed to tripsta. In 2015, tripsta acquired “airtickets®” a leading competitor in southeast Europe and became a global success.  With offices in Athens and Bucharest, our committed team of over 300 passionate travel geniuses work to ensure that you reach your destination with guaranteed low prices and dedicated support. Our booking engine processes more than two million travel requests per minute to provide you with the most up-to-date options and prices available. We collect over 100 gigabytes (that’s equal to roughly 50,000 songs worth) of travel data daily and use it to make your search and booking process a seamless and intuitive experience!  We’re proud of our company’s diversity and the multilingual support we’re able to give our customers because of it. We are constantly innovating to add value to your journey and we strive to offer great experiences to online travelers anywhere in the world.

Name: PROVIAGGI Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Fiorano, 205 Via S. Francesco, 41042
Company description: AGENZIA DI VIAGGI E TOUR OPERATOR Proviaggi srl nasce a Fiorano Modenese nel 1983 e nel 1999 viene aperto un nuovo punto vendita a Modena. Durante questi anni l'attivita' e' cresciuta e si e' consolidata la nostra presenza nel tessuto economico di Modena e provincia. Il risultato di questi evidenti progressi e' frutto di scelte aziendali orientate da un lato, verso la professionalita' e continua formazione del personale e dall'altro verso scrupolose scelte di partner affidabili. Queste scelte  aziendali hanno portato ad organizzare viaggi individuali e di gruppo di nostra produzione. Nel 2005 l'azienda e' stata certificata, dalla regione Emilia Romagna, come Agenzia Sicura con il marchio di "Agenzia Amica". Nel mese di Gennaio 2010 l'agenzia si e' affiliata al Network One Travel, per ottimizzare la sua offerta di turismo; inoltre nell'ottica di sviluppare ed offrire sempre maggiori servizi nel mondo del Business Travel, ha costituito nell'anno 2009, insieme ad altri partner, un network denominato B'nt.

Name: Action Sports Travel GmbH | WAVETOURS
Company description: Wavetours is one of the largest German tour operators, specialized in surfing holidays. For more than 27 years we have been organizing surf trips worldwide in our own camps which are organized and carried by us. Besides our own camps we have been maintaining good contact to our partner camps for many years and we arrange many of our guests to our partners. Among our customers are school and group trips, single travellers, couples, families and kids aged 13-17 years. The surfer's heart beats here in all areas.

Name: Poland Travel
HQ Location: Poland, Lesser Poland Voivodeship, Kraków, 18b Wielopole, 31-072
Company description: We are fully licensed and experienced incoming tour operator in Poland. We offer wide choice of tours, transfers and activities in all major cities in Poland. Moreover we are able to organize almost every service of this kind on your request in almost every place in Poland. We are focused on meeting expectations of every foreign guest visiting our country. We try to help you organize your stay in best way and always give you as many useful tips as possible. Satisfaction of our clients is the most important thing to us.

Name: NVN. Viajes De Novios.
HQ Location: Spain, Galicia, A Coruña, 22 Avenida Finisterre, 15009
Company description: Primera Wedding Travel Organizer de España, en cuya página web encontrarán un servicio en exclusiva y gratuito con el cual los novios se ahorrarán entre 400 y 800€ sin tener que renunciar a la calidad ni al destino deseado. NVN no es una agencia de viajes, sino que es la intermediaria  entre los novios y las propias agencias. NVN siempre mirará por el beneficio de los novios, obteniéndoles la mejor oferta para el destino que hayan seleccionado. Solo trabaja con las agencias mas importantes del panorama nacional, y con las mejores mayoristas de viajes. En la página de NVN se pueden encontrar viajes propuestos por otras parejas, y viajes propuestos por las mayoristas de viajes con las que trabaja el NVN.

Name: BusinessGO
Company description: A business travel agency with accurate knowledge and a high service level,  that is Business Go. Your personal team knows your travel demands and provides a suitable offer for your trip. We support you during the whole trip: from airline tickets, hotel, car rental, visa to a business travel insurance.

Name: Resecentrumgruppen AB
Company description: Resecentrumgruppen AB is a privately held online/offline travel agency operating in Sweden, With a physical presence in both Stockholm and Gothenburg. The company was established 1989 by the current owners. In January 2015 the company made a joint venture with Odenresor AB and became ResecentrumGruppen MB AB, with subsidiaries Odenresor AB and Resecentrum i Stockholm AB. The company has gone from being a one person business to today’s 34 employees with a combined experience of 84 years in the travel industry, with an annual sale of almost one billion Swedish kronor. Our main business is to sell flight tickets, hotel and rental cars and other ground arrangements online and offline. Our branch at Flemmingsgatan in Stockholm and Viktoriagatan in Gothenburg offers our customers full flexibility and you may arrange almost any adventure through them. Whether it’s an around the world ticket or a safari in Kenya, we can offer you something within your desired budget, both in economy or an exclusive experience in business class. If you bought your adventure online and have questions or problems with your booking, our experienced and skilled staff are here to help. We are happy to assist with your booking if you need any advice or if you just can’t find your desired trip on our website

Name: Der Traveller
Company description: Independence, expertise amd quality. For almost 40 years traveller has been standing for independant professional journalism, that reliably covers all industry-relevant topics of the world of travel. As an important link between service providers and travel agency employees we attend to current events in tourism, new as well as traditional travel destinations, airlines and cruise operators, cover congresses, events and roadshows. In addition we organise the big annual get together on evening of the first day of the "Ferien-Messe" in Vienna.

Name: Atlantic Travel
HQ Location: Latvia, Riga, Riga, 5 Merķeļa Iela, lv-1050
Company description: Atlantic Travel is a tour operator and travel agency founded in 2001. We are proud that over 70% of Atlantic Travel's sales come from our loyal customers and that we are recommended as travel professionals by friends. On average, Atlantic Travel employees have worked in the travel industry for 7-12 years, providing a high level of service, accuracy and efficiency in their work, knowledge of destinations, optimisation of flight options and complex itineraries. We are an IATA accredited agent (No. 67 3 2041 1) and a member of the Latvian Association of Travel Agents and Operators (ALTA). Our two main offices in the city centre allow us to offer and handle both outbound and inbound tourism. We have long-standing and stable relationships with partners and suppliers of tourism services worldwide.

Name: Logitravel.it Srl
Company description: Travel Agency on line

Name: Culture Trip GmbH
Company description: Culture Trip, Germany’s leading, luxury travel planner, has been creating unforgettable experiences in all major destinations in Germany  since  1995. We are a team of professionals who understand the needs and expectations of today’s discerning traveller. With our enviable contacts, we are able to provide access to the inaccessible: private homes and collections, exclusive wine tastings &  culinary events with master sommeliers and star chefs, curator walks through extraordinary museum treasures and the most fabulous team of expert/guides available. Our specialty is customised programs throughout Germany for FIT and small groups associated with museums or other cultural institutions, and Shore Excursions. In addition, we have an excellent group of hand-selected driver/guides at our disposal for touring and transfers. We are your up-to-date resource concerts, performances, sports events, restaurants and the latest in what’s going on in Germany!   Our list of references includes such distinguished clients as the Trustees and Benefactors of the most prominent US Museums and Orchestras: Museum of Modern Art, TATE, Guggenheim, LA Philharmonic Patrons and the Young Presidents Organization (YPO)

Name: Wi-Resor AB
Company description: Wi-Resor is a swedish based tour operator. It's two major branches of tours are hiking tours and special theme tours (culture, wine, food, etc.) Wi-Resor offer more than 30 different tours and destinations, mostly within Europe. The company is one of the main Swedish tour operators within the field of hiking tours.

Name: Local Guide Of Vatnajökull
Company description: Local Guide is a small, family-run company that has been operating in the Öræfi region for generations. We specialize in glacier tours on Vatnajökull, including glacier hiking, ice climbing, and ice cave tours. Our base is located in South east Iceland, nestled between Skaftafell in Vatnajökull National Park and Jökulsárlón Glacier Lagoon. All our guides boast extensive experience in guiding and training on Vatnajökull. Throughout the summer months (April to October), we offer variety glacier hikes depending on difficulty level on Vatnajökull. We are also the leading ice cave tour operator in Iceland, with tours available during the winter months (October to April) when colder conditions allow for safe exploration. Why Choose Local Guide? As a team of passionate guides, we are dedicated to providing the best experience and ensuring a memorable adventure on every tour. We use 4x4 vehicles to transport our guests closer to the glacier, significantly reducing walking time from the main glacier bus parking lot, allowing more time for exploration. We pride ourselves on maintaining a high standard of safety and expertise. Our guides are certified in glacier guiding by the Association of Icelandic Mountain Guides. Drawing on our rich heritage of generations of glacier explorers, we focus on delivering quality small-group experiences, making us the leading glacier tour operator in Iceland.

Name: Japanista GmbH
Company description: Japanista LLC (GmbH) is the Japan contact for tour operators: Whether group or individual tours - together with various local partners and through close cooperation with experienced tour guides, Japanista brings experience, enthusiasm and exceptional ideas to provide your guests with an authentic travel experience in Japan.  From the first draft of your custom trip to aftercare and social media marketing - Japanista is your one stop shop with local contacts in both Germany and Japan.

Name: Tourist Trend
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Zola Predosa, 14 Via Del Greto, 40069
Company description: The brand Tourist Trend® exists since 1994, from 2006 with the current corporate structure.  Focusing on B2B events for tourism business, Tourist Trend has built its brand identity in Italy and Europe, helping Buyers and Suppliers to develop trust and strengthen relationships. The company’s core business is to designing, planning and organizing workshops, roadshow, sales tours, famtrips, training seminars and conferences in the tourism field. Tourist Trend is in contact with more than 30.000 profiled tourist operators all over the world.  For this reason, Tourist Trend is the right partner for Tourist Boards, DMO, Trade Fairs, Tourist Companies to find quality B2B contacts and to increase business opportunities. OUR EVENTS •	B2B Workshop: intense days of gatherings for professional tourist Buyers and Suppliers  •	Roadshow: promotional tours in Italy and Europe •	Famtrip for tourist professionals to experience a destination or to test a tourism product •	Digital Events: webinar, presentations, virtual workshops, marketplace platforms OUR TOPICS •	Food and Wine Tourism •	Sport & Active Holidays •	Slow and Nature tours •	Mountain and Snow tourism  •	Families and Children’s Holidays  WE INVOLVE •	Travel Companies: tour operators, travel agencies, tour organizers, coach operators, OLTA •	Social Tourism: company staff clubs, thematic associations, federations •	Meeting Industry: PCO, incentive house, teambuilding agencies, meeting planners, corporate welfare platforms, business managers •	Media: Press, Radio, TV, blogger, influencers  ALWAYS BY YOUR SIDE TO PROMOTE AND SELL HIGH-QUALITY TOURISM

Name: Motivation - Italia
Company description: Since 1986, Motivation supports clients in the organization and on-site management of successful events and experience travels all over Italy and the Mediterranean area.  Motivation is a full licensed and insured tour operator, based in Rome and Milan with partner offices in five more cities of Italy. We know the area inside and out and constantly keep ourselves up to date on new openings, special activities and modern technologies to improve the experience of your clients. We are proud to extend to you our network of relations with the best local partners, built in years of activity. We have a long experience in supporting clients with special needs. Together we will work with a commong goal: your success and your client satisfaction.

Name: Gruppo Vila
Company description: La Vila caratterizzata all'inizio come punto vendita specializzato verso la clientela individuale, si sviluppa successivamente nell'area dei viaggi di gruppo, rivolgendosi in particolar modo alle aziende come supporto e organizzazione di incentive, congressi ed eventi. L'agenzia ben presto diviene un punto di riferimento importante nel proprio territorio tanto da essere tra le prime come sviluppo d'affari. Lo sviluppo è tale da annoverare tra i propri clienti aziende che non si limitano all'area territoriale pugliese, come: Beghelli, Comet-Tarlazzi, Osram; solo per citarne alcune. L'agenzia si specializza nel taylor made costruendo le proposte più adeguate alla tipologia e alle esigenze del cliente. La collaborazione con i maggiori tour operators e i vettori nazionali e esteri, ha permesso alla Vila Viaggi di presentarsi come "player" di primo livello nel panorama turistico italiano. Il valore esperienziale di quasi 25 anni di attività, in un mercato che nell'ultimo decennio ha vissuto modifiche tali da sconvolgere sia i modelli dell'offerta che le tipologie della domanda, hanno portato la Vila Viaggi verso un'evoluzione innovativa del proprio core business. Riaffermare la centralità del cliente e concentrarsi nel servizio reso con creatività, organizzazione e disciplina, sono i temi sostanziali dell'evoluzione nella trasformazione in marca di servizio differenziata per segmento.

Name: Active Events
Company description: Active Events inizia la sua storia nel mondo degli eventi ed in particolare del team building nel 2001. Le prime attività sono quelle outdoor in collaborazione con la Cascina Caremma di Besate ed in particolare orienteering, discese in canoa e format adventure. Dopo pochi anni abbiamo cominciato a sviluppare una stretta collaborazione anche con agenzie di incentive e società di formazione. Fino al 2011 siamo conosciuti nel mondo degli eventi come Kailas Active Events abbinando all’attività outdoor anche l’attività di tour operator con viaggi di tipo naturalistico e avventuroso. Nel 2012 nasce Active Events, così come è conosciuta oggi, con il contributo in particolare di Cinzia Migliavacca e Davide Casati. La proposta di format di team building oggi si è nettamente ampliata rispetto a 15 anni fa sia per l’esperienza acquisita sia per il contributo dato da nuove collaborazioni. Lo staff è formato non solo da esperti di outdoor ma anche da persone che vengono dal mondo dell’animazione, del teatro, della musica, dell’arte e delle nuove tecnologie. Oggi abbiamo la capacità di seguire le attività in tutti i loro aspetti, come si suol dire, a 360°. In un’attività di team building consideriamo importante non solo l’aspetto tecnico (materiale e staff) ma anche l’impatto emozionale e di ambiente che un evento suscita nei partecipanti. Siamo impegnati anche con il progetto “giornata dell’accoglienza” con le scuole superiori della provincia di Milano; una giornata dove, per migliorare la conoscenza reciproca dei ragazzi che iniziano una nuova realtà scolastica, vengono effettuate attività di team building.

Name: Botel Admirál
Company description: Admirál Botel was built in the Czech dockyard as the last one of three Prague boatels. In 1971, it was anchored at the left bank of the Vltava river between the Palackého and Railway bridges. The ship body was built as a three-floor floating object of a steel construction which is connected to the municipal facility networks with own gas heating. The boatel is designed for year-round hotel use and restaurant operation. After twenty years of its existence, it was privatized in 1993. Travel agency Allvatours s.r.o. became its owner and operator; the agency is with its nature a position purely Czech company and a family firm. Admirál Botel has gradually undergone a complete reconstruction and gained back its glance and style. Now it is already 35 years from the time when the boatel became an inseparable part of specific atmosphere of the old Prague with a view of the Prague Castle, Emmauses, the National Theatre, Vyšehrad or of Prague bridges. Admirál Botel is still actively involved in the Prague tourism and provides its guests with hotel services in category ***; this is a romantic accommodation in new, standard furnished double rooms in cabins and four-bed apartments. Admirál Botel also provides restaurant services in in-style premises on the third floor offering a large range of international cuisine including a wide assortment of drinks.

Name: Inspiravia
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Sant Cugat Del Vallès, 15-25 Av. Via Augusta, 08174
Company description: We develop innovative online and mobile technology solutions, easy to implement and adapted to the emerging needs of the travel agencies, tour operators, travel intermediaries and OTA platforms!  With a totally visionary approach and a team focused on innovation and inspiration solutions that meet and anticipate emerging customer needs. Our main objective is to be a benchmark in the global travel industry, providing “Business Intelligence” technology solutions that inspire emotions and experiences when booking a trip.

Name: TravelMedia.ie
Company description: Travel PR and travel trade representation.  TravelMedia.ie is Ireland's only specialist travel public relations, marketing and trade representation company. We work exclusively with airlines, tour operators, travel agents, hoteliers and other travel specialist companies. TravelMedia.ie was founded in 2006 by former travel editor and journalist Michael Collins. For more information please visit our website http://www.travelmedia.ie/about-us/

Name: Webmapp
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, San Giuliano, 60 Via Giosuè Carducci, 56017
Company description: Webmapp creates web and mobile maps for the Outdoors and Tourism Marketing. Webmapp clients are public authorities and private firms that need to promote their activities and guide travelers on their visit: Natural Parks, Destination Management Organizations, Tour Operators, Accommodation Facilities. Webmapp Srl is an innovative Startup established in July 2017, as a Net7 spinoff https://www.linkedin.com/company/net7/about/ In January 2020 Webmapp entered into partnership with Cyclando Srl https://www.linkedin.com/company/cyclando/about/

Name: VisitorFlix
Company description: VisitorFlix create interactive destination video guides featuring things to do, places to go, stay, eat, drink and shop, for tour operators, transport and accommodation partners online, onboard and social media marketing. Our destination video guides showcasing each destinations visitor experiences in 30 second videos and enables partners to reach, engage and inspire more people to book, share and return while adding value to visitors seeking the greatest insights when dreaming, considering and planning their vacation.

Name: Travelink Travels
Company description: OTA Travel Agency | Wholesaler | Retailer | Global Tour Operator At Travelink, we transform the way people explore the world. We are a global travel agency, specializing in delivering tailored solutions for all types of travelers. As an OTA, wholesaler, retailer, and global tour operator, we adapt to the latest digital market trends to offer unique and personalized experiences. We use specialized strategies to create experiences that emotionally connect with our clients, understanding their desires and needs beyond the obvious. We know that the journey begins with the first click, which is why we design intuitive purchasing processes, with engaging content and fast solutions, building trust every step of the way. We offer a wide range of travel products, from luxury packages to more accessible options, covering both domestic and international destinations. Our team of experts is dedicated to ensuring that each trip is an unforgettable experience, with personalized attention and continuous support, before, during, and after the journey. With Travelink, planning your next adventure is easier, faster, and most importantly, memorable.

Name: TrainPlanet AB
Company description: En unik resebyrå med tåg i fokus Vi kan tåg, och det är ingen överdrift. Faktum är att vi har arbetat med tåg ända sedan bolaget startade, där vi tillhandahållit bl.a. kundservice, utbildning och support för flera av de tyngsta aktörerna på marknaden. Efter att ha byggt upp spetskompetens i över ett årtionde tog vi 2015 det naturliga steget till att själv öppna en resebyrå. Lika naturligt var det att kalla den för Tågbokningen, och idag är vi en av de snabbast växande och ledande resebyråerna för tåg.

Name: Bäckman & Berg AB
Company description: Bäckman & Berg är en modern resebyrå med lång erfarenhet av smidiga affärsresor och upplevelserika semesterresor!

Name: CIANCI LUXURY RENT
Company description: CIANCI LUXURY RENT è il partner ideale per i vostri transfert di lusso, per lavoro o per il tempo libero. Assicuriamo puntualità, eleganza, riservatezza, massima sicurezza e un elevato comfort garantito dalle nostre vetture di altissimo livello. Il punto di forza è  un noleggio di lusso personalizzato. Tutti i mezzi a disposizione garantiscono viaggi e spostamenti in un ambiente adeguato a standard di eccellenza. Entrare nel mercato delle eccellenze è stata una scelta di carattere. Non ci accontentiamo di offrire noleggi. Disponiamo di yacht, elicotteri e jet di lusso per trasferimenti a medio/lungo raggio in totale riservatezza, con personale plurilingue di formazione cosmopolita. I SERVIZI CIANCI LUXURY RENT: - Transfert da e verso aeroporti, stazioni ferroviarie e porti - Servizio trasporto management di multinazionali, personaggi pubblici e VIP - Transfert per Tour Operator e Hotel di Lusso - Noleggio elicotteri, jet e yacht - Tour nelle principali località turistiche Con Chaffeur eleganti e plurilingue. I veicoli blindati Cianci Armoring, azienda partner di CIANCI LUXURY RENT,  sono unici, costruiti con componenti certificati e con protezione balistica. Professionalità ed esperienza sono i plus che ci distinguono sul mercato nazionale e internazionale.

Name: Aristotle Travel
Company description: Our company was founded in 1989 and has become one of the premier incoming tour operators in Greece, providing a full range of services tailored to the needs of today's travelers. With strong partnerships in Greece and abroad, we have helped thousands of travelers visit Greece and the Mediterranean.   Aristotle in brief: -Over 30 years of experience in the travel industry -Team of highly trained professionals -Office located in Glyfada, Athens, Greece -Certified by the Greek National Tourism Organization (GNTO) -Comprehensive travel services, including hotel reservations, tours, cruises, and more -Renowned for reliability, professionalism, and personalized itineraries We are dedicated to providing high-quality services and memorable travel experiences to clients worldwide.

Name: Himalaya Travel S.A.
Company description: Himalaya Travel S.A. is a Travel Agency active since 1985, providing reliable, 24/7 and competitive travel services for your Corporate needs and Leisure desires.

Name: Planet Travel Center
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Sofia-capital, Sofia, 28 Hristo Botev Blvd., 1000
Company description: 27 YEARS PLANET TRAVEL CENTER BULGARIA Since 1995. www.planet.bg IATA certified tour operator company Holiday packages Charter flights operations Hotel reservations all over the world Outbound and inbound tour operator services Air ticketing Online reservation platform both B2B and B2C Corporate services Rent-a-car Cruises Yacht rentals Excursions Bundles Travel insurances Charter flights

Name: North And West Coast Links Golf
HQ Location: Ireland, Co. Galway, Ballycuirke West Moycullen, 9 An Fuarán
Company description: With 30 years experience in promoting Irish links golf around the world, North & West Coast Links Golf prides itself in our ability to offer both Golf Tour Operators and the General Public a top class product, value for money and excellent customer service. We specialize in creating unforgettable golf vacation packages for our clients. We offer Ireland Golf Packages, Accommodation, Transport, Dinners, Culture and Heritage, Wild Atlantic Way experiences, Fishing, Shooting, Archery, Shopping, Beaches, and all the delights that Ireland has to offer. Please take some time to look through our website and we hope you can visit us soon in the West, the North West and Northern Ireland.

Name: Wild Westfjords
Company description: Travel agency & tour operator specialised in customised Iceland holidays and tours in the Westfjords region

Name: Arabia Felix Synform GmbH
Company description: Tour operator, incoming: Sultanate of Oman

Name: Trinatours Ltd
Company description: Trinatours Ltd (Malta) was established in 1990 as travel wholesalers concentrating mainly on the British, Italian and French market.Over the past years, the company has expanded its services to include all destinations worldwide. This was made possible by creating strong links with major tour operators and direct contracts with various hotels.Thanks to the good reputation we have acquired, we now enjoy a leading role in the local travel market relating to hotel bookings.  We are always trying to expand our services and offer our clients a wider choice of hotels, ranging from low-budget three star hotels to top-of-the-range five star luxury hotels. Besides accommodation, we also offer competitive rates for transfers, excursions, car hire, theatre tickets, ski packages.  Godwin Mercieca, who was the founder of the Company, always believed in hard work, determination and a good, friendly approach. This is the way a Company should be run and today, that is what we strive to do and achieve

Name: Blixen Tours A/S
Company description: Blixen Tours is a tour operator specialized in safari holidays to eastern and southern Africa and exotic holidays to Indian Ocean destinations such as the Maldives, Mauritius, Seychelles and Zanzibar. Typical safari destinations are Kenya, Tanzania, South Africa, Botswana, Namibia, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Uganda and Mozambique.

Name: Escapeaway
Company description: Escapeaway is a scandinavian based tour-operator holding multiple brands with direct access to end-customers in several european countries. We pride ourselves on providing a highly personal travel experience for both individual travellers and groups, that is facilitated by our dedicated customer services team and an IT-infrastructure that enables a high level of communication between customers and travel advisers.  And not least by our unique accommodation portfolio of handpicked structures throughout the southern european countries.  We aim to offer a high quality experience for each customer regardless of the customer entry point. The customer experience begins at multiple touchpoints, both online and offline.  Regardless of where the customer meets a brand of Escapeaway on their buying journey, the impression will always connotate quality, and the user experience will always be intuitive from inspiration to confirmation. Through our network of highly qualified local partners and in-house quality control, we continously strive to ensure that the expectations of each guest travelling with a Escapeaway brand are met. This is part of providing the customer with proven quality and a trustworthy experience, and furthermore – good value for money. Our aim is always to connect passionate and highly selective travellers with exciting, and unusual places for their holiday destination.

Name: De Brede Planker
Company description: De Brede Planker (DBP Adventures) is a dedicated travel agency, who loves the water and the mountains. It all started in 2010 with off-piste skiing in Macedonia for both private and companys. The starting point for DBP Adventures has always been and will still be first-tracks in the off-piste, the best conditions, nature experiences and to meet like-minded adventurers who also loves the water and the mountains. Take a look at our website www.dbpadventures.com and get inspired for your next trip. E-mail: info@dbpadventures.com Phone: +45 31600407 Facebook: www.facebook.com/debredeplanker.dk/ Instagram: @debredeplanker

Name: RC Sports Travel
Company description: Somos uma agência de viagens especializada em turismo esportivo. Nós oferecemos aos nossos clientes opções exclusivas e um atendimento personalizado, para atender às exigências deste setor e a necessidade particular de cada cliente.  A nossa missão é fomentar no Brasil o turismo de experiência esportiva, pautado na educação e focado no desenvolvimento dos valores essenciais para o crescimento pessoal e profissional de uma grande pessoa. Além disso, também temos como missão impulsionar o interesse do público brasileiro pela participação nas prestigiadas competições esportivas de nível internacional.  A RC Sports Travel é a parceira oficial da Rafa Nadal Academy (Manacor, ESP), Valencia CF (Valência, ESP), RC Celta de Vigo (Vigo, Espanha) e SL Benfica (Lisboa, Portugal) no Brasil. --- We are a travel agency specialized in sporting experiences. We offer our customers exclusive options and personalized service to meet the requirements of this sector and the particular needs of each customer. Our mission is to promote sporting experience tourism in Brazil, based on education and focused on the development of the essential values for the personal and professional growth of a human being. In addition, we also have a mission to boost the interest of the Brazilian people by participating in prestigious international sports competitions. RC Sports Travel is the official partner of Rafa Nadal Academy (Manacor, Spain), Valencia CF (Valencia, Spain), RC Celta de Vigo (Vigo, Spain) and SL Benfica (Lisboa, Portugal) in Brazil.

Best Travel is a Danish tour operator making quality group tours through out Europe. We are a part of Stena Line Travel Group, but the company works 100% independently with its own management and own purchasing, product and operations departments. We do not offer FIT - but many of our groups are groups of individuals.

Name: Hello Vacanze
HQ Location: Italy, The Marches, Porto San Giorgio, 2 Via A. Costa, 63822
Company description: Hello Vacanze Srl è un tour operator che opera sul mercato italiano con strutture ricettive quali hotel, residence, appartamenti, villaggi e campeggi vendendo esclusivamente on line, attraverso un network di siti, newsletter e social media, raggiungendo un’altissima visibilità  E' il primo Tour Operator italiano on line specializzato nel segmento Mare Italia per famiglie con il più alto gradimento da parte dei suoi clienti: il 98,5% “riprenoterebbe con noi” La conoscenza delle dinamiche del settore e la sua forza contrattuale le conferiscono la possibilità di fornire soggiorni a prezzi competitivi in strutture ricettive di buona qualità e con un ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo, facendosi riconoscere dai suoi Clienti per un servizio memorabile offerto da persone affidabili e professionali.  La cultura del miglioramento continuo, la formazione costante e la ricerca della soddisfazione del Cliente sono state le fondamenta importanti del suo successo. Alcuni numeri: - oltre 100 fornitori; - NPS Fornitori 2023 56%; - oltre 20 specialisti nel prodotto, nella vendita e nel digital marketing; - 98,5% di gradimento da parte dei nostri clienti finali. La solidità aziendale, l’ottimo clima interno, la possibilità di crescita con aggiornamenti costanti sono il segno distintivo di Hello Vacanze che è riuscita a costruire e mantenere nel tempo uno staff giovane con età media di 34 anni, prevalentemente femminile, con spiccata attitudine al problem solving, concentrato al raggiungimento di obiettivi sfidanti e sempre nuovi, tenendo fede alla mission e alla vision aziendale.

Name: Rual Travel Ltd
Company description: EXPERIENCE  Rual Travel LTD created in 1991, is a Tour Operator specialized in organizing guided tours, cultural trips or private holidays in Bulgaria and all over Europe. Our packages are tailored to satisfy the most fastidious taste.  We are very proud with the fact, that most of our customers make use of our services more than once and recommend us to their friends and relatives. We work equally well with individual and corporate customers and thanks to our wide network of partnerships throughout Europe we offer a great variety of premium quality services at attractive prices.  PROFESSIONAL TEAM  Since we first opened for business, our company has been growing exponentially. That growth is expressed in continuous increase of the number of customers, attracted by the quality of the various services offered and in a constant improvement of the business processes. At present we have 45 people employees working in our company who with their knowledge, professional skills, responsibility and passion for their work are always eager to comply with our customer’s requirements.  WE OFFER  Our company offers a product that satisfies a wide spectrum of interests. In all our packages we have listed opulent routes that include different cities and sights. These are wonderful cultural tours, which introduce the participants to the history, memorials, architectural landmarks and museums of the cities, included in the tours. Rual Travel LTD is also specializing in individual handling of customers and offers tailor made packages for VIP tourists. These packages can include airplane ticket, accommodation in a chosen hotel, transfers, guided tours etc. Other services we offer are rent-a-car, train tickets, reservations for opera, theater, restaurants, nightclubs and many more. We also organize all kinds of business events such as congresses, symposiums, seminars or team buildings.

Name: Centro Guide Turistiche Milano
Company description: Il Centro Guide Turistiche di Milano è una associazione composta da guide turistiche in possesso di regolare abilitazione alla professione. Oltre alla qualifica di guida locale, molti dei nostri soci sono anche accompagnatori turistici e tra i nostri iscritti si contano architetti, storici dell’arte, archeologi, esperti di musica e di lingue straniere in grado di offrire con competenze specifiche servizi diversificati ai nostri clienti. Le conoscenze e le esperienze dei nostri iscritti sono rivolte ad agenzie, tour operator, istituzioni ed enti pubblici, privati, scuole e aziende. Esercitiamo la nostra professione con passione, determinazione, entusiasmo, competenza e serietà. Ognuno degli associati, con la propria formazione culturale e la collaudata esperienza sul campo, ha un obiettivo: essere un host perfetto della città e condurre i visitatori a conoscere non solo i luoghi più classici, ma anche gli angoli più remoti e suggestivi di Milano. In questo ci aiuta la specializzazione in un gran numero di lingue: dall’inglese all’olandese, dallo spagnolo al portoghese, dal francese al russo, dal polacco al giapponese allo svedese fino al cinese, al serbo croato e altre ancora.

Name: Wörlitz Tourist Reisebüro GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: Seit unserer Gründung im Jahr 1990 sind wir, die Wörlitz Tourist Reisebüro GmbH & Co. KG, stolz darauf, ein vertrauenswürdiger Begleiter in der Welt des Reisens und Urlaubs zu sein. Mit einem engagierten Team von 85 Mitarbeitern und 12 Reisebüros in Berlin, Potsdam und Werder haben wir uns einen Namen als renommierte Marke für die Vermittlung von Reisen geschaffen. Unsere Mission ist es, individuelle und maßgeschneiderte Reiseerlebnisse für unsere Kunden zu gestalten. Unsere Expertise: Als Teil der Wörlitz Tourist GmbH & Co. KG bieten wir eine breite Palette von Reisedienstleistungen. Unser Schwerpunkt liegt in der Vermittlung von Pauschalreisen, Flügen, Hotels und Mietwagen in Zusammenarbeit mit namhaften Reiseveranstaltern und Airlines. Egal ob Strandurlaub, Städtetrip, Fernreise oder Geschäftsreise - wir finden die passenden Angebote, um die Reisewünsche unserer Kunden zu erfüllen. Wir stehen nicht nur für die Buchung von Reisen, sondern für die Gestaltung von unvergesslichen Erlebnissen. Unsere Unternehmenskultur: Bei Reisebüro Wörlitz Tourist legen wir großen Wert auf die Zufriedenheit unserer Kunden und Mitarbeiter. Unser professionelles Arbeitsumfeld zeichnet sich durch flache Hierarchien und kurze Entscheidungswege aus. Wir sind stolz auf unsere familiäre Unternehmenskultur, in der Teamarbeit, Austausch und Zusammenarbeit gefördert werden. Lob, Anerkennung und Wertschätzung stehen bei uns an erster Stelle, denn wir wissen, dass engagierte Mitarbeiter der Schlüssel zu unserem Erfolg sind. Unsere Vision: Unsere Vision ist es, weiterhin als führende Reisebüro-Marke in der Region bekannt zu sein und unseren Kunden erstklassigen Service zu bieten. Wir möchten Reiseträume wahr werden lassen, indem wir individuelle Bedürfnisse verstehen und maßgeschneiderte Lösungen anbieten. Unser Engagement für Exzellenz, Kundenzufriedenheit und Mitarbeiterwohlbefinden treibt uns jeden Tag an, unser Bestes zu geben.

Name: Kompass Tours GmbH
Company description: Kompass Tours ist Ihr Spezial-Reiseveranstalter für Russland. Das Land bietet ein enormes touristisches Potential, das weitgehend unerschlossen ist. Neben den bekannten touristischen Zentren wie St. Petersburg oder Moskau, die einen berauschenden Einblick in die jahrtausendealte Geschichte geben, und den Besucher mit opulenter Architektur und Kunstschätzen verwöhnen, bietet Russland aber auch ein reines und unverfälschtes Naturerlebnis, wie man es sich sonst nur von den eher geläufigen Destinationen in den USA oder Kanada erwartet. Die Natur in Russland ist einfach grandios und ungeheuer vielfältig. Seien es die Wüsten nahe Astrachan mit bizzaren, vom Wind geformten Felsformationen und Dromedar-Karawanen, seien es die Seen- und Flußlandschaften Kareliens nahe der finnischen Grenze mit seinen tiefgrünen Wäldern oder seien es die feuerspeienden Vulkane und heißen Quellen auf Kamtschatka und die Begegnung mit einem der riesigen Kamtschatka-Bären - erst diese enorme Vielfalt läßt einen verstehen, daß dieses Land das Herz des gesamten eurasischen Kontinents bildet. Kompass Tours hat es sich zur Aufgabe gemacht, Ihnen dieses weite Land zu erschließen und Sie mit unserer Begeisterung ein wenig anzustecken. Dann hätten wir schon unser Ziel erreicht: Ihnen eine Reise zu ermöglichen, die Ihnen noch nie zuvor erlebte Eindrücke von diesem Planeten vermittelt. Mit eigenen Büros in Moskau und St. Petersburg verfügen wir auch über die notwendige Infrastruktur vor Ort, um unserem Anspruch gerecht zu werden, hochwertige Individualreisen nach Kundenwunsch zusammenzustellen. Hier unterscheiden wir uns von den meisten Reiseveranstaltern: die auf unserer Homepage veröffentlichten Reisen können auf Ihren Wunsch hin beliebig geändert werden - Sie bestimmen den Reisetermin, Abflughafen, Airline, Hotel und die Ausflüge. Schon ab 2 Personen haben Sie Ihren individuellen Reiseführer und Fahrer. Es gibt kaum einen Wunsch, den wir Ihnen nicht erfüllen können.

Name: BEST Franken Reisebüro

Based in Haßfurt, we offer a wide range of customized travel packages tailored to the needs and desires of our customers. 🧳🌴🚲🛳️🏞️

Name: Berchtold ́s Autoreisen Und Reisebüro GmbH & Co.KG.
Company description: Ein Familienunternehmen mit Know-how.  Wir sind schon in der dritten Generation erfolgreich in der Reisebranche tätig. Vor 15 Jahren haben die Seniorchefinnen Renate Berchtold und Lotte Unflath die Geschäftsführung des Familienunternehmens an ihre Söhne übergeben. Die dritte Generation steht dabei voll hinter dem dynamischen Bus- und Reiseunternehmen. Alexander Berchtold ist im Reisebüro Sektor mit tätig und Helmut Berchtold in der Verwaltung. Horst Unflath hat seinen Wirkungskreis im technischen Bereich des Unternehmens gefunden. Die neue Generation ist sich ihrer Verantwortung bewusst und will alles daran setzen das Familienunternehmen im Sinne der letzten Generationen zur besten Zufriedenheit der Berchtold Kunden weiter zuführen. Desweiteren steht die 4. Generation schon in den Startlöchern und ist schon voll im Unternehmen Integriert  Wie alles begann 20.04.1924 gegründet von Alexander Berchtold – Mietwagen und Werkstätte  Mai 1937Kauf des ersten ReisebussesEnde  1937 Einrichtung der Linie Kempten – Kottern – Sulzberg – Niedersonthofen. Ende 1938 Einrichtung der Linie Kempten – Durach Bis 1939 Kauf von 3 weiteren Omnibussen 1939 – 19452. Weltkrieg – Zunichtemachung der fast gesamten Aufbauarbeit. 2 Busse wurden beschlagnahmt. Einer verkauft. Mit einem Bus wurden die bestehenden Linien notdürftig aufrechterhalten. Ab 1945 Neuaufbau des bestehende Unternehmens. Dez. 1972 Flugzeugabsturz Teneriffa – Helmut Berchtold und Sepp Unflath kamen ums Leben.

Name: Mietwagenvermarktungs GmbH
Company description: MIETWAGEN.DE - Mietwagen billig buchen. Die Mietwagen.de Vermarktungs GmbH ist eine Unternehmen der 1998 gegründeteten Billigfluege.de GmbH. Mietwagen.de hat seinen Sitz in Frankfurt am Main und ist ein unabhängiges Mietwagen-Portal für den direkten Preisvergleich. Wir verfügen über ein professionelles Team, welches auf den Mietwagen-Bereich sowie über eine fundierte Reisebüro-Ausbildung und die nötige Erfahrung verfügt. Flüge, Hotels, Reiseschutz und komplette Pauschal- sowie Lastminute-Reisen können auf www.mietwagen.de aufgrund der Integration des Reisespektrums der Billigfluege.de GmbH zugebucht werden.
