Name: Seereisen.de GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Düsseldorf, 119 Kölner Landstraße, 40591
Company description: Ahoi - frischer Wind & Leinen los - Der Online-Marktplatz für einzigartige Auszeiten auf allen Meeren und Flüssen weltweit ist da. Seereisen.de- Das Kreuzfahrtportal der Experten  Wir bieten Ihnen Zugang zu über 30 renommierten Reedereien und mehr als 10.000 Reisen – bequem und übersichtlich auf einer Plattform mit stets tagesaktuellen Preisen. Ergänzt wird unser Angebot durch inspirierende Reiseberichte und exklusive Insider-Tipps, die Ihren Urlaub auf dem Wasser zu einem besonderen Erlebnis machen. Gegründet im November 2023 mit Sitz in Düsseldorf, vereint Seereisen.de die Kompetenz und Erfahrung starker Partner: Gemeinsam mit urlaubsexperte.de Düsseldorf und dem Reiseveranstalter Hanseat Reisen aus Bremen sind wir Teil der Travel & Cruises Company. Diese Zusammenarbeit bündelt über 25 Jahre Erfahrung, um Ihnen erstklassigen Service und ein breites Spektrum an Kreuzfahrten weltweit zu bieten. Ihre Buchung liegt bei uns in den besten Händen – sie wird von unseren erfahrenen Schwesterunternehmen mit höchster Sorgfalt bearbeitet und bestätigt. Vertrauen Sie auf Seereisen.de für Ihre nächste Reise und lassen Sie sich von unserer Expertise begeistern. Jedes Jahr vertrauen uns Zehntausende von Reisenden ihren Urlaub auf dem Wasser an. Wir sind TOP Partner von allen führenden Reedereien im Hochsee- und Flussbereich.

Name: NAMUN Group
Company description: Namun Group se positionne comme un acteur majeur dans la promotion et le développement de l'art culturel africain, tant en Europe qu'en Afrique. Sa mission s'articule autour de trois axes principaux, chacun incarné par une branche spécialisée :  * Namun Tourisme :    * Cette agence de voyage a pour objectif de faire découvrir les richesses culturelles et naturelles de l'Afrique à travers des expériences de voyage authentiques et immersives.    * Elle propose des circuits et des séjours axés sur la découverte du patrimoine culturel, des traditions, de la musique, de la danse, de l'artisanat et de la gastronomie africaine.    * Namun Tourisme contribue ainsi à promouvoir le tourisme culturel et à soutenir le développement économique des communautés locales.  * Namun Music :    * Cette agence de production artistique se consacre à la promotion et à la diffusion de la musique africaine sur la scène internationale.    * Elle accompagne les artistes africains dans le développement de leur carrière, la production de leurs albums, l'organisation de leurs concerts et la promotion de leur musique auprès d'un public plus large.    * Namun Music joue un rôle essentiel dans la valorisation de la diversité et de la richesse des expressions musicales africaines.  * Namun Event :    * Cette agence d'événementiel est spécialisée dans l'organisation d'événements culturels qui mettent en lumière les différentes facettes de l'art et de la culture africaine.    * Elle conçoit et réalise des festivals, des expositions, des conférences, des spectacles et d'autres événements qui permettent de faire découvrir et d'apprécier la créativité et le talent des artistes africains.    * Namun Event contribue à créer des espaces de rencontres et d'échanges entre les cultures africaines et européennes. En combinant ces trois activités, l'entreprise Namun se positionne comme un pont culturel entre l'Afrique et l'Europe, favorisant les échanges artistiques, culturels et touristiques.

Name: Apollo Coaches Europe
Company description: Apollo Coaches Europe established in 2005 and  more than 50 newest buses in the fleet we have been providing reliable, high quality and cost-effective bus partner of  tour operators, travel agencies in Europe with services in Paris, Amsterdam, Frankfurt, Munich, Venice and Ljubljana. By pioneering safety and comfort within the bus charter and tour, sightseeing, school and student transportation, CORPORATE, CONGRESS CONFERENCES, as well as Destination and Event Management services. Apollo coaches operate luxury coach buses, executive and entertainment motor coaches, VIP mini buses, and vans. Our coach charter services are known Europe wide to be one of the most reliable, safe and affordable, because we take pride in delivering the best of bus charter services, at the most reasonable prices. Our own buses as well as our partner’s coaches are located at strategic locations across Europe. All our drivers have 10+ years of driving experience and fluent in English. All our Coaches are brand new Mercedes, Setra, Man and Scania with the highest safety and comfort standards. Our operators are available 24 hours 7 days a week, to provide the best customer support, safety and comfort to our passengers and clients. With more than 15+ years of experience in LDC Europe coach hire business and operating in more than 16 European countries including local services in Paris, Zurich, Amsterdam, Rome, Venice, Munich, Frankfurt and many other European cities

Name: GSM Travel & Tourism LTD
Company description: Grèce sur Mesure est une agence de voyage locale, basée à Athènes, spécialiste de la Grèce. Kostas Bourdos, aussi français que grec, dirige une équipe dynamique, polyglotte et forte d’une riche expérience professionnelle dans le tourisme en Grèce. Depuis notre création, nous avons eu le temps d’apprendre, de nous adapter et d’évoluer afin de vous proposer une qualité de service irréprochable, en phase avec vos attentes et vos envies. Nous sommes passionnés par notre métier et par notre pays bien sur ! Notre objectif est de vous faire partager notre savoir faire et la connaissance que nous avons de la Grèce. Chaque année, nous avons le plaisir de faire voyager plus d’un millier de clients en autotour, en séjour, en voyage d’aventure, dans les iles ou sur le continent. Notre ambition est aussi de vous aider à concevoir un voyage qui vous ressemble et qui soit le reflet de ce que vous avez imaginé. « Préparer votre voyage comme si vous étiez déjà sur place » résume bien notre volonté. Vous êtes aussi les bienvenus dans nos bureaux à Athènes, en centre ville, autour pourquoi pas d’un ouzo dans une taverne locale. Nous sommes aussi là pour vous assister tout au long de votre séjour en cas de besoin. A nos yeux, le tourisme doit être un échange qui bénéficie à chacun et nous vous proposons d’être le lien entre vous et notre pays. Kalo Taxidi ! Bon voyage en Grèce

Name: Club Magellan
Company description: Club Magellan is a travel agency established in 2006 in Varna. It is founded by specialists with many years of experience and established positions in the tourism industry. Actively works in both directions - incoming and outgoing tourism.   Incoming tourism The company has contracted contingents in all resorts along the Black Sea coast, in the mountain and balneo resorts in the country. The good positions in the most requested resorts - Golden Sands, Albena, Sunny Beach - make it possible to realize significant volumes in accommodation and guarantee the agreed contingents for the partners tour operators. The huge variety in hotel supply - as a category, location and forms of catering, enables our partners at home and abroad to meet the demand of a wide range of potential clients.   In addition to hotel bookings, the Magellan Club also guarantees impeccable service to tourists on site; organizes transfers, guided tours and offers events and excursions. The professionalism and experience of the company team earns the trust of clients and partners. Outgoing tourism The services we offer in this area include: Individual and group trips throughout the year - excursions and vacations to the most attractive domestic and international destinations; beach and ski vacations; short-term programs; bus travel; cultural and cognitive hobby tourism; spa and balneology; ecological and mountain tours; organized visits to interesting sports events, entertainment programs and events. Travel-intensive and corporate events - to create and establish a new corporate culture and professional loyalty, to stimulate positive results and business achievements. Hotel reservations for the country and abroad - sales through leading international hotel reservation chains. Ticket sales worldwide - on scheduled flights, for charter flights, and for low-cost airline operators.

Name: Raftrek Adventure Travel
Company description: Raftrek travel d.o.o. is a young travel agency with a primary goal to put Croatia on the world map as an essential destination for adventure tourism! We want to affirm our agency as a synonym for adventure, active holidays and traveling in this part of Europe. Our mission is to provide first rate equipment and highly motivated professional guides who will ensure that all adventurers and travelers searching for breathtaking beauty, active holidays and extraordinary thrills will find their piece of heaven on Earth. We do our best to make everyone feels at home under our blue skies!

Name: Czech Sport Travel
Company description: Cestovní kancelář CZECH SPORT TRAVEL vznikla transformací CK SPORTEVENTS, jež dlouhodobě působí v oblasti sportovních zájezdů. CZECH SPORT TRAVEL přichází s rozšířenou nabídkou v nových sportovních oblastech, a také s unikátním projektem nízkonákladové cestovní kanceláře, jež nabízí zájezdy za sportem v příznivých cenových relacích. CZECH SPORT TRAVEL chce vytvářet zájezdy, kterých se mohou zúčastnit v dnešní složité ekonomické situaci všichni fanoušci sportu. Díky smlouvám s významnými tour operátory můžeme garantovat kvalitní služby za velmi příznivé ceny.

Name: Globalair Travel & Tourism Ltd. Malta
Company description: Having first started as a family firm. We set out to build lasting relations. With over 25 years serving world-wide Travel Provider Services in Malta, our incoming department is one of the most recognizable agencies in Malta for tourist services. Name: Arctic Yeti

El Ártico es el mejor lugar del planeta para experimentar como la Tierra está viva bajo nuestros pies, desde volcanes y glaciares hasta ríos calientes e inmensos bosques. Nuestra misión es ofrecerte una experiencia única y memorable en plena naturaleza. ¿Te vienes?

Japanese sense of business with a European spirit, exactitude and flexibility, JTB and Net Travel Service together offer a seamless and coordinated approach to corporate and business travel, constantly working on offering the highest level of service for you.

Name: Groupscape Travel & Conference Services
Company description: Groupscape Travel and Conference Services is a tour operator which specializes in group trips and journeys all around Greece and abroad. Group Trips Management Every year, an average of 40,000 people chooses Groupscape for their trips’ planning. Our target clienteles are large groups and the organization of their educational and recreational trips that take place in Greece and abroad. Most popular among the destinations, are, for spring and summer holidays, the Greek islands, such as Mykonos, Santorini, Paros and during winter time, winter resorts like Arachova, Pilio and Kaimaktsalan. Furthermore, Groupscape company has organized many excursions to the United States of America, namely New York and the East Coast, while many tours have been organized in Europe, such as Spain, Germany, Turkey, Bulgaria and Italy. Event Management Groupscape Travel and Conference Services has organized the last 12 years more than 350 student parties with total average participation of 180,000 students per year, 4000 students per party. We have, up to now, successfully undertaken the responsibility of coordinating and hosting various music festivals and concerts, with average participation of 6,000 guests per event. In addition to that, Groupscape company and its experienced staff, have organized in the past, numerous cultural events such as student theatrical plays, artistic photography exhibitions and graffiti shows, as well as sports events like paintball contests and football championships among the Greek universities and colleges.

The birthplace of great personalities such as Socrates, Aristotle, Platon, Solon, Euripides & others. We are here for helping you in exploring this ancient magic world with privatization, comfort, flexibility & safety. JG Athens Tours is an official travel agency with License Number: GNTO 0261E60000706901. We are performing private activities such as Half or Full Day Athens Sightseeing Tours, Athens (Piraeus) Shore Excursions, Day or Multi Days Tours all over mainland Greece, Customized Sightseeing Tours, Transfers (from/to airports/seaports, business, etc). Our professional drivers with our new Mercedes type vehicles (4 seater sedan, Mini Van, Mini Bus / air-conditioning, with DvD & with free WiFi access) will take care of you & they will guarantee an unforgettable visit in Athens Greece. Try the traditional Greek hospitality in magic corners all over Greece. The mysteries of Athens, Delphi, Mykenae, Epidaurus, Ancient Olympia, Meteora Monasteries & of so many other places, are waiting for you.

Name: Meridien Ten
HQ Location: Croatia, Split-dalmatia, Split, 7 Obala Ivana Pl. Zajca, 21000
Company description: Cycling and adventure travel DMC for Croatia!  Meridien Ten is a group of professional, enthusiastic and passionate people focused on preserving and promoting local values of Croatia, while at the same time offering services and bikes at highest level regardless of the holiday package chosen. Meridien Ten provides personalized services and tours tailored to the needs of each client.  Our offer starts with cycling and multisport tours, where Croatian finest guides will be presenting great and traffic free roads for cycling, authentic Mediterranean meals, accommodation and local experiences in unique way!  Meridien Ten has great experience in development of bespoke tours; whether it is 10 day bike tour from Venice to Dubrovnik, triathlon and cycling camps, luxury yacht cruise with activities such as biking, yoga practice, kite surf, SUP tours, special adventure windsurf and sail cruises, signature bike and sail trips, and many more...  Further Meridien Ten offer are self guided bike tours, which can commence at any date you prefer. Very detailed route notes created by our team, amazing restaurant and wine cellar suggestions, 24/7 support, luggage shuttles and accommodation taken care by us take away the stress of planning details while you are on holidays and leave you to enjoy the bike rides along roads with stunning views and have fun from the start till the end of your trip!   Besides tours, we offer bike rentals and daily active, culinary and cultural tours.  Our bikes are carefully custom built and optimized for several day tours; they have all the necessary equipment you might need during your Croatian adventure.  For business: We are interested in partnering with outside tour operators and managing their programs. We managed over 200 clients for outside TO in 2013. All of our tours can be customized for tour operators.  Meridien Ten’s local knowledge is unmatched by any other DMC in the area.

Name: Shuttle.si | Ljubljana Airport Shuttle And Private Transfer. Professional Service For Professionals.
Company description: More than twenty years of experience in tourism, private car hire and ground transportation industry. As business owners our first jobs were in the hotel industry at the front desk and in sales. Through the years we have developed a rather acute sense of what you need and an understanding of your expectations. A simple airport transfer or a dedicated car charter for the day requires a professional approach with full support from a team you can trust. You are always first and we are not afraid to take the extra step to offer you an excellent service. Above all, we don`t make promises we can`t keep and are firm believers in your privacy. Your business is just that, YOUR business. Through the years we have had the pleasure of working with many of the best people in their departments. A number of businesses and agencies in Slovenia and abroad have entrusted their services to us. Among them you will also find Ministries, Embassies, Limo services,  Airlines, Travel agencies etc… that keep on sending repeat business. Individual travelers and families have used our services during holidays. Many of them have been with us for years. We have managed to develop a keen sense of what is right and how it should be done. That is why we believe that a chauffeured service should be reliable, efficient, and discreet, yet simple. When you book a service you should know exactly what it`s going to cost and what you are getting. Do not settle for less. We are not believers of big words and long eloquent introductions. Let us take this opportunity to welcome you to our company and express our hope that you found what you are looking for.

Name: Aratravel Turismo Medicale
HQ Location: Italy, Lecce, Aradeo Aradeo, 64 Via G. Di Vittorio, 73040
Company description: Aratravel è un tour operator italiano leader nell’organizzazione di vacanze medicali con speciali pacchetti all-inclusive. Prendersi cura di se stessi entrando in contatto con la bellezza di nuove mete trasforma il viaggio in un’esperienza di rinascita, ci rende migliori, più felici e forti. E Aratravel ne ha fatto il suo unico obiettivo, condividendo la cultura del viaggio con la ricerca del benessere Da anni ci avvaliamo della collaborazione dei migliori professionisti internazionali nel campo della tricologia, della chirurgia estetica, dell'odontoiatria e della prevenzione completa, garantendo ai nostri clienti un servizio medico specialistico all’estero.  Pionieri del turismo medicale in Italia, dal 2012 apriamo nuove prospettive di cura e di benessere grazie alla nostra presenza su diversi mercati, dall’Italia alla Spagna, dal Portogallo alla Repubblica Ceca e Romania, fino ad Argentina e Brasile, prendendoci cura dei circa 400 clienti che ogni mese ci scelgono per tornare a sorridere. Aratravel è inoltre una delle prime agenzie ad aver portato il trapianto di capelli in Italia, diventando rappresentante ufficiale dell'eccellenza tricologica in Spagna, Portogallo, Repubblica Ceca e Slovacchia.  Viaggio, transfer, hotel 4 stelle, guida in lingua, trattamento sanitario e assistenza h24: un unico esclusivo pacchetto per lasciare a casa stress, preoccupazioni e… non solo. Se è vero quel che il proverbio cinese dice: “Chi torna da un viaggio non è mai la stessa persona che è partita”, preparati ad accogliere una nuova “versione” di te, più serena, forte e felice che mai.

HQ Location: Netherlands, North Brabant, Lith, 14 5397 Mr. Van Coothstraat, 5397ar
Company description: Touroperator We offer a complete package of custom-made tours and excursions in Europe, answering your highest demands.  No question that we use first class coaches with Dutch and English speaking drivers plus very good hotels with separate beds and American breakfast in or around all the major destinations. According to your wishes we will realise a complete itinerary including transportation and hotels, providing you a troublefree and  successful trip! Providing 25.000 people with their holiday or excursion, offering a diversity of products ranging from coach- excursions and roundtrips to fly/coach combinations in countries such as Turkey, Spain, Italy and Croatia.. Our team consists of 45 enthusiastic and professional colleagues!   Coach Company Every coach company in the Netherlands can provide you with a good coach, but there are only a few that can provide you with driver/guides that know the whole of Europe! Due to our experience as a tour operator our driver/guides literally know Europe from Ireland to Romania and from the North Cape to Andalusia!     Flexible Call us today and we have a coach running for you tomorrow, or even the same day! That’s how flexible we are! Our planning staff is working around the clock to keep our (future) customers happy!

Name: EVENIA TRAVEL
Company description: Creada en 1960 bajo el nombre de Bravasol Viajes, Evenia Travel Services es actualmente una empresa participada 100% dentro del grupo EVENIA . Evenia Travel Services SL es una empresa mayorista, Agencia de Viajes, dedicada al turismo en España, Andorra, Portugal y Francia desde 1970. Dentro del mismo grupo de colaboración disponemos de cadena hotelera, receptivo en España y receptivo en Andorra. En Evenia Travel, entendemos que son las pequeñas cosas las que marcan la diferencia y es por eso que nos encargamos de nuestros clientes y hacemos que sus vacaciones sean especiales en muchos sentidos. El Grupo Evenia es una de las empresas del sector mejor posicionada en el mercado, con hoteles y oficinas situadas en destinos turísticos emblemáticos y de más afluencia. Como receptivo/proveedor ofrecemos camas de Hotel, traslados, excursiones, transfers, circuitos y todo tipo de servicios de destino, bien sea para individuales o para grupos. Considerados el mejor receptivo de turismo deportivo en Costa Brava / Maresme desde hace muchos años nos dedicamos a satisfacer las necesidades de los deportistas de todo el mundo que vienen a preparar sus temporadas en nuestro país, ofreciéndoles todas las comodidades posibles para que se centren exclusivamente en entrenar y potenciar su juego. Nuestros servicios incluyen Hoteles, transfers, instalaciones deportivas (campos de fútbol, piscinas, pabellones, pistas de tenis ...), partidos amistosos y un largo etcétera para todo tipo de deportes (fútbol, basket, ciclismo, natación, atletismo ...

Name: TRIAENA TOURS & CONGRESS
Company description: Triaena Tours & Congress is a leading Professional Organizing Company aiming to provide high-end services regarding the organization of congresses, corporate meetings and vacation packages.  Founded in 1959,Triaena Travel, originally operated as a travel agency. Ιn 1976, the company was renamed Triaena Tours & Congress and became a pioneer in organizing conferences. Today, under the young entrepreneur CEO, Giannis Tsertos, Triaena engages in delivering impeccable PCO services as well as tourist services by innovating on all fronts.  A team of experts leads any corporate event, through careful planning and execution, towards success. Large and diverse by nature, Triaena Tours & Congress provides tailored, affordable and innovative solutions to its customers. Congress and Events Management The company’s professional services and expertise in this field are undeniable as numbers come to corroborate the long experience and the in-depth know-how: 	2.500 Congress Events 	1.500 Medical Congresses 	700.000 Participants & Accompanying persons Our Services also include:  Triaena Business Center Corporate Travel  Luxury Travel & VIP Services

Name: Earth Viaggi
Company description: Pagina ufficiale di Earth Viaggi, tour operator che dal 1989 esplora le meraviglie del mondo rispettando gli ambienti naturali e la ricchezza culturale dei popoli. “Un viaggio” iniziato nel 1989 con la spedizione: “da Lecco a Pechino, 50 giorni per Oriente” 10.000 chilometri dall'Italia attraverso Jugoslavia, Montenegro, Grecia, Turchia, Iran, Pakistan e Cina Fin da subito questa esperienza ha fatto confluire nel tour operator il desiderio di esplorare, di conoscere, di capire il mondo. Questo lo spirito che ha caratterizzato i primi viaggi itineranti di Earth, oggi punto di riferimento per coloro che desiderano conoscere il mondo in modo diverso, lontano dalle rotte e dai modelli commerciali, sempre attenti alla combinazione tra scoperta delle civiltà ed esperienza nella natura.  L’uomo e il suo ambiente sono la vera esperienza di viaggio con Earth.

Name: Napoleon Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Li, Portoferraio, 11 Via G. Cacciò, 57037
Company description: Siamo il più importante tour operator per l’Isola d’Elba e per la Costa Toscana, ma siamo molto bene organizzati anche per la Sardegna, oltre alla novità 2019 Corsica. Tranquillità, fiducia, solidità e specializzazione sono le qualità sulle quali Napoleon Tour Operator, pur limitandosi all'Isola d'Elba, a tutta la Costa Toscana, alla Sardegna e la Corsica ha caratterizzato da sempre la propria programmazione ed il suo modo di porsi sul mercato. Napoleon Tour Operator è nata nel 1984 come ufficio prenotazione di soggiorni individuali e gruppi.  La presenza di NAPOLEON sul mercato dell'offerta turistica è andata di conseguenza aumentando di anno in anno grazie anche alle nuove destinazioni proposte nel corso del tempo.  NAPOLEON sul mercato delle vacanze è presente con 5 cataloghi dedicati alla sua intera programmazione:  Per soggiorni Individuali: "Isola d'Elba, Capraia e Giglio", "Mare di Toscana", "Sardegna", , "Corsica" "Vacanze con Stile" Proposte per Gruppi: "Confidenziale Gruppi" Un importante settore della nostra attività turistica deriva dal lavoro prodotto dal Reparto Gruppi che annualmente organizza sull'Isola d'Elba, l'Isola del Giglio, la Toscana, l'Umbria, il Lazio, la Sardegna e la Corsica l'arrivo di oltre 1000 bus di visitatori italiani e stranieri, composti da anziani, adulti, scolaresche ed escursionisti. Dedichiamo particolare attenzione al turismo scolastico a quello della terza età, per il quale, grazie alla nostra ventennale esperienza, abbiamo elaborato dei pacchetti turistici attentamente  studiati e convenienti  per  offrire le migliori soluzioni a livello di comodità ed affidabilità, assicurando sempre il giusto rapporto qualità prezzo.

Name: Holidays Inc.
Company description: Holidays Inc. brings to you millions of holidays and connected services from 70 of the world's largest tour-operators, from Thomas Cook, TUI and Dertour, to 5vorflug and Interchalet.  One reservation system, one travel agency and one goal in mind: to deliver the friendliest, most professional and cost effective possible service we can to YOU, our customer and our biggest fan.  And because we know you're busy, we have our doors open for you 12 hours a day, 7 days a week, 360 days a year! We look forward to welcome you to our office in Polus Center Cluj, Romania.

Name: China Tours Dein Weg Ins Reich Der Mitte
Company description: ChinaTours.de - tour operator and specialist for China Travel With 20 years of experience in the industry, China Tours is Germany's leading specialist for China Travel. As a tour operator, with headquarters in Hamburg and various offices in Germany and China, we offer one of the most comprehensive and high-quality services for China as a travel destination. As a specialist tour operator, our strongest customer markets stem from Germany, Austria and Switzerland.  In addition to group travel, we also offer tailor-made individual trips that can be created using our special Travel-Configurator website (Reisekonfigurator.de) or our support team. In addition, our team from the special group develops special modules for, for example, business travel and customized travel. We publish information about China as a travel destination in our own China Travel Magazine on blog.chinatours.de.  Our added value: In the foreground of China Tours is always the philosophy to create innovative and authentic travel concepts, with which the customers have a unique look behind the scenes of China. With qualified advice from competent China specialists, our own Chinese tour guides, small groups and special added value in the programs during our itineraries, we attach great importance to service and quality at an affordable price. This orientation is also reflected in our customer satisfaction: more than 96 percent of travelers recommend China Tours. For our travel ideas, we have been awarded several times as a specialist, e.g. with the "Golden Palm" of the Geo season (2006 and 2011) and with the coveted Tourism Prize of the Sonntag Aktuell (2007 and 2011). The China Travel-Configurator website offers customers a variety of over 1.000 China travel modules, transfers and trips, China Tours was honored with the well-known "Red Dot 2012" design award and the Internet Travel Distribution Springboard Award. © China Tours Hamburg 2018. All rights reserved.

Name: Local Guides
Company description: Local guides are your local experts. We have hand picked a selection of the best tours and tour operators to work with. Each and every one is a specialist in his area and his field with years of experience, ready to make your dreams come true. Small groups and private tours. Local Guides is fully licensed tour operator and travel agency. We specialize in planning guided group tours in Iceland and offer a variety of day tours all year around. There is always the possibility to customize all of our tour packages to fit your schedule, budget, and time restraints. You can also choose from our various pre-planned tours in each travel category. We are fortunate to have highly motivated guides with years of experience to service your every need. The tour groups are small so we’re able to give everyone some extra time for questions and discussions which are necessary so everyone gets the most out of the excursion. Local Guides was started with the vision of offering visitors a truly local and personal service whilst providing all around service standards customers get when dealing with a tour agency conglamorate. Our specialty revolves around creating "whole" travel experiences for our customers. Assisting in planning their travel journey from landing till departure.

Name: Viaggiando Srl
Company description: Viaggiando è nata nel 1985 da professionisti del settore turistico con una grande passione per i viaggi.  Specializzata nei viaggi su misura, programmati con cura per le esigenze del cliente, nel corso degli anni ha ampliato la propria attività accreditandosi come agenzia IATA ed occupandosi anche di viaggi aziendali.  Un continuo aggiornamento tecnologico ha permesso di iniziare la vendita online e di aprire vari reparti specializzati che abbinano la cura ed assistenza del cliente, tipica di un’agenzia tradizionale, con l’immediatezza di una On Line Travel Agency. www.viaggiando.com

Company description: Hoteque is a Luxury tour operator with offices in Greece, Cyprus and Italy. We operate inbound and outbound offering our Luxury travel services to wealthy individuals travelers, our destinations covers 4 continents between: Europe, Americas, Asia and Australia.

Name: Creative Tours | Cyprus

Company description: The company was formed in 1985 as a family company under the name Creative Travel, and rapidly became one of the leading Incoming Agents for some very important European Tour Operators and MICE agencies. Due to the needs in today's business world to associate, in the year 2000 we have joined the Olympic Group of Companies, one of the major Cypriot Tourists Groups. Olympic Holidays, is a  leader in Cyprus with regards to tour operating business from United Kingdom.  In 1990, CREATIVE TOURS established the DMC department to meet the ever-increasing demand of the MICE business. Our department today consists of a highly professional, multi-lingual team ready to provide a personalized service for your Conference, Seminars and Incentive projects. In 2009 Creative Tours was awarded for assisting in re-establishing of CIMA (Cyprus Incentives & Meetings Associates) in Cyprus. Today, we are an active member and as a proof, M. Christophe Chaillou - Creative Tours managing director- was newly elected President of the association.  Furthermore, we also are the local exclusive DMC partner of ANAE (Association of Communication Events Agencies) in France and others MICE networks in the world. Flexibility, Reliability and Creativity: Creative Tours has this winning combination that you and your customers are looking for.   Looking forward to welcoming you personally in Cyprus.

Name: Guest First
Company description: Guest First is a Destination Management Company born in 2018 with the goal of providing innovative logistical and ground operation solutions to online tour operators, distributors and the travelers who book with them.  Guest First want to emerge as a market leader in outsourced ground operations for the travel industry in Italy and Europe. Over time, Guest First is expanding its services to become a full-fledged Destination Management Company serving the top cities in Italy: Rome, Milan, Venice and Florence. Moreover in Europe where is present with a branch office in Paris.

Name: Flamingo Tours GmbH
Company description: Flamingo Tours – Ihr deutscher Reisespezialist für das Albena Beach Resort an der bulgarischen Schwarzmeerküste. Flamingo Tours steht seit über zehn Jahren für maßgeschneiderte Reisen ins Albena Beach Resort – eines der schönsten Urlaubsziele Europas. Unser Fokus liegt ausschließlich auf Albena, dem einzigartigen Ferienort mit direkter Lage am kilometerlangen Naturstrand und grenzenlosen Freizeit- und Wellnessmöglichkeiten. Wir kennen Albena aus erster Hand und gestalten Ihren Urlaub mit exklusiven Angeboten, die Sie bei keinem anderen Reiseveranstalter finden. Ob Familienurlaub mit Animation und Kinderbetreuung, Sportreisen mit über 30 Disziplinen, Gesundheits- und Wellnessaufenthalte in zertifizierten SPA- und Medical Centern oder Kultur- und Entdeckungsreisen in die Region – wir bieten alle Wünsche für Sie an.  Unsere enge Partnerschaft mit den Hotels und Einrichtungen des Resorts garantiert höchste Qualität, faire Preise und authentische Erlebnisse. Entdecken Sie mit Flamingo Tours die Vielfalt von Albena – vom Aktivurlaub über Erholung am Meer bis zum inspirierenden Naturerlebnis. Flamingo Tours – Ihr direkter Weg zum Urlaub im Albena Resort, Bulgarien. Hotels, Tipps & Angebote bei 👉 https://www.flamingotours.de/ Viel Spaß und einen wunderschönen Urlaub 🏝️☀️ wünschen wir.

Name: Reise-Inspirationen
Company description: Reise-Inspirationen is a leisure travel magazine in German, addressing the FIT traveller and is published quarterly.  It features on the one hand well-known and popular travel destinations under new aspects and on the other hand new or lesser known destinations. The articles do not aim to sell illusions or dreams, they want to create the appetite among the readers for the destination/hotel/activity described while offering pragmatic tips on travelling and travel booking. At the end of the article, the reader should want to book! The quality of articles is high. Renowned freelance travel editors contribute to the magazine on a regular basis.  The eMagazine is published in digital form and is available through 3 different distribution channel: 1. As PDF-download for from the website complementing the magazine 2. As an eBook embedded in the covermount CDs of two major German print computer magazines 3. Distributed to employees and customers of a travel agency chain in Germany with 300 agents. The travel magazine portal provides the reader with background information, news from the travel industry, additional destination features and an online shop for travel guides.

Name: Nokumo
HQ Location: Croatia, City Of Zagreb, Trešnjevka Sjever, 2 Bosiljevska Ulica, 10110
Company description: Nokumo is a cloud-based Property Management System (PMS), Channel Manager (CM) and Online Booking Engline (OBE) designed specifically for the hospitality industry - including hotels, travel agencies, and short-term rental operators. Our platform helps businesses streamline daily operations, automate administrative tasks, and grow revenue, all from one intuitive system. Whether you're managing a boutique hotel, operating a travel agency, or running a portfolio of vacation rentals, Nokumo adapts to your unique business model. It combines ease of use with powerful functionality to simplify your entire operation - from reservations to finance. Unlike legacy systems, Nokumo is built for speed, simplicity, and scalability. We offer fast onboarding with minimal training, integrated distribution to OTAs and booking engines, automated invoicing with tax-compliance support, and seamless multi-property management — all from a single dashboard. Nokumo is trusted by hundreds of hospitality professionals across Europe. Our clients consistently reduce operational workload by up to 30%, increase direct bookings, minimize overbookings, and gain full control over performance metrics in real time. Whether you're a solo operator or a growing hospitality brand, Nokumo empowers you to operate more efficiently and scale with confidence. 🌍 Learn more at www.nokumo.net 🎯 Try it for free - request your demo account today.

Name: Kolenia

Name: Crepaldi International S.r.l.
Company description: CREPALDI INTERNATIONAL srl is a Tour Operator operating since over 20 years in Venice, Italy and all around the Europe. - Its management structure is meant at: 1. Obtain and offer the highest levels of services, looking at the continuous improvement of its efficiency; 2. Reach the best operating procedure in order to satisfy the expressed and hidden needs of the customers; 3. Understand the evolving desires of its clients; 4. Prepare packages of services that can anticipate the need of the customers; 5. Constantly evolve the procedure so that all the service provided reach the clients in an real way. The History of Crepaldi International started from Ideas and Passion of his owner Nicola Crepaldi, a Venetian, charmed from Marco Polo and from the beauty of his city, Venice. The Company wants to transmit culture through the journey. In these years the clients choose our tour operator for his professional and the style that we give to all of our tours. Our main areas of operation are : - Taylor made groups - individual journeys - itineraries - land services The services provided by Crepaldi International  are mainly addressed to the National and International Travel Agencies, and also to the differents Italian Associations . Crepaldi  is projected to promoting the beauties and wonders of our country, Italy. This is the reason that from year 2013 we start with a project named “NOSTRA ITALIA” to improve the tourism in Italian cities that are not famous and to promote to the tourists the famous products Made in Italy (food&wine, fashion) in cooperation with our firms partners located in all part of Italy  Our Services: - transfers - bus service on private bases for small and big groups - customized and exclusive tours - private guided tours in all languages - typical lunches and dinner in fine restaurants - local assistance - congress, trade fairs and events participation - tours of museums, exhibition and galleries

Name: Guardian Security Risk Management
Company description: Guardian Security Risk Management specializes in providing comprehensive travel security solutions through its innovative GAP Guardian platform. The company’s mission is to enhance the safety and well-being of travelers and expatriates by delivering real-time, location-based information and support, ensuring organizations can fulfill their duty of care obligations. The platform features a mobile app, a traveler portal, and an administrator portal, all designed to facilitate effective communication, risk assessment, and incident management. Guardian Security Risk Management serves a diverse clientele, including corporations and organizations with employees traveling to high-risk areas, and partners with travel agencies to create a seamless security ecosystem. By focusing on automation and tailored solutions, the company aims to empower organizations to manage security challenges efficiently while keeping their travelers informed and safe.

Name: Samarka Viaggi

Name: Studiamondo - The Travel Factory

Noi di Studiamondo abbiamo conseguito negli anni una preparazione completa nel settore del turismo che ci permette di offrirvi un servizio qualificato e attinente alle vostre esigenze. Operiamo nel rispetto della vigente legislazione italiana ed europea, e siamo quindi in grado di offrire al viaggiatore tutte le garanzie necessarie per un viaggio sicuro. Collaboriamo con le migliori compagnie aeree, con i Tour Operator più affidabili, con le più prestigiose catene alberghiere, con le scuole di lingue di tutto il mondo riconosciute dagli enti competenti. 𝐒𝐄𝐑𝐕𝐈𝐙𝐈 𝐎𝐅𝐅𝐄𝐑𝐓𝐈 - CORSI DI LINGUA PER GIOVANI E ADULTI IN TUTTO IL MONDO, dai 18 anni, con partenze individuali tutto l’anno, corsi di diverse tipologie, sistemazione in famiglia, residence e in hotel su richiesta. - VIAGGI STUDIO ESTIVI di gruppo con accompagnatore e individuali PER RAGAZZI da 7 a 17 anni, con accompagnatore. Corsi di lingua generali o intensivi, sistemazione in famiglia, college o residence, programmi speciali abbinati alla pratica di sports (INGLESE + CALCIO, INGLESE + BASKET, INGLESE + GOLF, INGLESE + EQUITAZIONE, ROBOTICS & CODING, ecc.) - PROGRAMMI GENITORI + FIGLI - STAGE LINGUISTICI E GITE SCOLASTICHE su misura. - VIAGGI CULTURALI PER GRUPPI DI GIOVANI E ADULTI su misura. - CORSI DI LINGUA ALL’ESTERO PER AZIENDE, con programmi ad hoc, individuali e/o di gruppo, con analisi preventiva delle esigenze specifiche del cliente e del livello linguistico di base.  - HIGH SCHOOL PROGRAM: ANNO ACCADEMICO/SEMESTRE all’estero per studenti delle scuole superiori, nelle più prestigiose scuole di tutto il mondo. - ALTERNANZA SCUOLA-LAVORO con partenza di gruppo o individuale in Europa.

Name: Mamberto Viaggi - Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Borgio Verezzi, 78 Via Valle, 17022
Company description: It was 1950 when Dr. Carlo Mamberto founded one of the first travel agencies in Italy, in Finale Ligure, in a small office a few steps from the sea. Much has changed since then, but not the love and passion for tourism that we at Mamberto have had in our DNA for three generations. The company has grown over the years and today has about 45 employees who, with dedication, contribute every day to improving the product and are at your disposal to guide you in choosing your holiday. For over 40 years, the Riviera à la Carte catalog has offered Hotels, Apartments, packages and thematic tours with a proposal of over 300 different structures and types of accommodation in Liguria and the French Riviera. We specialize in holidays and short stays in Liguria, in the south of France and Monte Carlo and lower Piedmont. We have been a partner of Disneyland ® Paris for over 25 years and have sent thousands of people to Paris and the world of magic! Choose to travel with us, choose the excellence!

Name: Carpe Diem S.r.l.
Company description: Società di gestione di servizi turistici e residenziali. proprietaria del Tour Operator Carpe Diem Tour. Particolare risalto è dato al SALENTO, confermato per il secondo anno consecutivo “Territorio dell’anno” da un sondaggio effettuato in vista dell’edizione 2014 della BIT. Carpe Diem Tour, con sede a pochi km da Gallipoli, ha concentrato la sua attenzione sul prodotto “CASE VACANZA”, selezionando le migliori soluzioni nelle zone di Baia Verde, Centro Storico, Gallipoli Città e garantendo un’assistenza in loco costante e continuativa.  “In Un Attimo Tour Operator” di Carpe Diem S.r.l. Name: Top Sardinia
Company description: Top Sardinia/Shangrila Vacanze:  nata nel 1983 con una forte specializzazione sulla Sardegna ha realizzato una crescita costante divenendo - per numero di passeggeri e volume di traffico – uno tra i più importanti Tour Operator per questa destinazione. Nel tempo, con un team qualificato, l'Azienda  ha ampliato le destinazioni ed è oggi un Tour Operator che offre soluzioni per qualsiasi esigenza di viaggio, dai viaggi individuali ai viaggi di gruppo,  dalle proposte più prestigiose ed esclusive a quelle più classiche destinate ad un pubblico più ampio; sempre con la garanzia delle migliori condizioni di accoglienza e di una elevata qualità dei servizi. Presente in Sardegna con 36 Strutture Speciali gestite in Esclusiva o per la quasi totalità delle disponibilità:  oltre 1000 camere e circa 1200 appartamenti nelle località più suggestive dell'Isola alle migliori condizioni e con la massima flessibilità dei trasporti.  L'offerta è contenuta in quattro cataloghi tematici: “TOP SARDINIA il mare” con  molte strutture in esclusiva in tutta l’isola, “TOP MARITALIA le coste e la Sicilia” con proposte nelle più belle località delle coste italiane e della Sicilia, “TOP ISOLE d’ITALIA le minori”, con un'ampia selezione di strutture nelle isole più piccole, “TOP CARIBE e le Americhe” con una serie di combinazioni per le principali destinazioni caraibiche e gli Usa.

Name: BS Travel

A loro offriamo una linea di servizi specifici, ampiamente personalizzabili, ed un’assistenza dedicata attenta alle esigenze di ogni singolo cliente. La grande passione per lo sport e l’aver praticato a livello agonistico diverse discipline, ci  consentono di  mettere al servizio del mondo sportivo  la nostra esperienza nel travel service. Abbiamo quindi dedicato una particolare sezione allo Sport Travel, rivolgendoci agli sportivi di qualsiasi disciplina e livello che effettuano trasferte in Italia e all’estero.

Additionally, Hosteltur enhances user experience by prioritizing privacy, offering a "Premium Membership" option that provides subscribers with full access to exclusive content while ensuring data security. With a commitment to transparency and user control over cookie preferences, Hosteltur establishes itself as a trusted source of industry insights and news. The target market includes travel professionals and industry stakeholders who value both high-quality information and privacy in the digital age. Through its initiatives, Hosteltur aims to empower its audience with the knowledge and tools necessary to navigate the complexities of the tourism industry effectively.

Name: Delta Amsterdam Event Management & DMC

Company description: As a company we are carrying on the philosophy of one of the pioneers of Destination Management and Incentive Travel, Ingrid Teyema. With Rotterdam being the city of residence to the then young Teyema family the company too was started in Rotterdam. After 2 years in business it became more and more obvious that the big draw for Holland is Amsterdam and thus the move to Amsterdam was an easy decision.  The second generation, Andreas and Alexandra have successfully taken over the company with John and Ingrid still very active as Advisory Board. In the meantime our core business is divided equally between Events, Incentives and running of Conferences. The 24 hour availability remains.

Sport is about winning, about losing, but more importantly, about participating! The experience of sports is great! Not only as an athlete, but also as supporter – to feel the experience. If you are interested in exploring the possibilties, please contact us and share your request: info@zooversporstevents.nl  We are looking forward to assist you during your event and provide you a high-level experience!

Mars Sport Travel is fully owned by Sport Progress Ltd. and until July 2013 was an official travel agency of the Slovak Football Association. Da allora il mercato del divertimento è cambiato e sia culturalmente che imprenditorialmente si è indubbiamente evoluto…. almeno secondo noi. Oggi Digital Promoter srl è una realtà permeata dalla trasformazione digitale, che ha la consapevolezza di operare in un mercato in continua evoluzione dove le offerte di festival, concerti, eventi, iniziative aziendali sono spesso una componente strategica di raffinate politiche turistiche.

Company description: We are craftsmen of unique events in Poland! We are a team of experts working on your behalf to ensure your visit becomes unforgettable. Our crew is always accessible to the clients, going out of our way to find innovative solutions that bring uniqueness to each event or trip and make guests’ visits to Poland unforgettable. Name: Sports Tours International - Ireland

Company description: Sports Tours International - Ireland was founded in Dublin in 1988 by Martin Joyce. Name: Escape Travel Agency
Company description: Escape Travel Agency is a Romanian touroperator based in Bucharest. Let us show you the Black Sea, the beautiful unique Danube Delta with one of a kind flora and fauna! our goal is for you to: Dare to escape to Romania!

Name: GTgroupHotels
Company description: G.T.group (Garelli Tourist group) was set up in 1998 as a direct consequence of a vast experience in the tourist field acquired starting from 1955 with WagonLits Thomas Cook and continuing with the most important Italian tour operator both for quality and quantity until the 90’s: Francorosso International S.p.A Have you ever been to the Far East (especially Bali), to the Maldives or to Kenya through Francorosso in these rising years for Italian tourism? If so, you have tasted some of the organisation that now belongs to the G.T.group. A main step of our evolution and gift given by our experience, was also the invention of the Residence Formula in the 1960’s. Today the concept of hospitality for one night or a month melts in a final step and comes to one unique result, a Formula close to perfection: we proudly invite you to discover it. The hospitality service proposes an incentive too: discover Italy with wisdom, vision and method of those that let Italians discover the world for over 40 years. Last but not least, during the Olympic Games 2006 period, G.T.travel has brought over 8.000 tourists from all over the world. Today, G.T.group operates through different companies that own hotels, residences and aparthotels in Italy and in the world, directly or indirectly managed, created fort a selected business and tourist clientele.

Name: Ataman Tours
Company description: Tour operator company, ranked #1 in Helsinki, providing customized private walking tours; architecture, history, culture, walking, sightseeing and more.

Name: Turismo Motivatours

The secret of our success is in the simplicity of our philosophy, by supplying the best quality on this service industry, working closely with our clients enabling us to answer all their specific requirements.

Name: SpaDreams
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 28 Ferdinand-happ-str., 60314
Company description: SpaDreams is the international branch of FIT Reisen, a specialist tour operator in the Health & Wellnes travel industry with headquarters in Frankfurt am Main. With our high-quality, diverse offers and personal approach to customer service, we have established ourselves as the market leader in this sector.  Over 40 years ago, Herbert Haum developed an entirely new concept which centres on the idea of healthy holidays. These include beauty, fitness and leisure activities to enhance the guests' quality of life. These programmes aim not only to help guests become healthier, but to also give them a feeling of complete wellbeing. The first resorts offered were in Germany, but FIT Reisen quickly expanded and began offering holidays in traditional spa towns in the Czech Republic, Hungary and Slovakia.  In March 2013 FIT Reisen launched its international branch and can now be found in the English, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Polish and Swedish markets under the name SpaDreams. Today we offer over 3,500 different spa, health, fitness and beauty treatments in more than 50 countries, and still strive to keep expanding.

Name: Hospitality Travel And Tourism News

Name: Amfipoli Travel

Name: Togreiser.no
Company description: Togreiser.no er Norges eneste turoperatør som spesialiserer seg på gruppereiser med tog! Vi legger både opp helt flyfrie reiser, og reiser der man flyr den første og siste strekningen for å komme seg litt lengre før man går på toget. Vi setter alltid sammen et program med hyggelige hotell, spennende utflukter og gode reiseledere – nøye utvalgte høydepunkter fra de fineste togturer i Europa og andre steder i verden. – Og transporten foregår selvsagt med tog! Reiseglede på skinner!

Name: Join Travel S.r.l.
Company description: La Join Travel è nata nel 1999 dall’idea di creare un’Agenzia di Viaggi che non si limitasse a prenotare voli e hotel ma che fungesse da vero supporto alle Aziende nella pianificazione e nella gestione dei loro viaggi d’affari. Visto il comune intento, fu naturale per la Join Travel entrare nel gruppo UNIGLOBE, il più grande network al mondo di agenzie indipendenti specializzato nel Business Travel.   Negli anni successivi, grazie anche all’affinamento e all’adattamento al mercato italiano di tecniche e procedure nate e sviluppatesi negli Stati Uniti e in Canada, la Join Travel ha saputo espandersi in un mercato in continua evoluzione come è stato quello dei viaggi nel primo decennio del nuovo millennio. Nel 2010, dopo la lunga e formativa esperienza all'interno del network UNIGLOBE, si è deciso di intraprendere un percorso autonomo che potesse consentire all'azienda una maggiore libertà nello sviluppo di proprie metodologie e l'espansione nel settore del turismo e dei viaggi di vacanza. Questo cammino ha portato la Join Travel a comprendere ancora di più le esigenze e le problematiche delle piccole e medie Imprese italiane e, allo stesso tempo, ad estendere gli alti standard di servizio e di professionalità riservati ai viaggiatori d'affari ad una clientela spesso trascurata come quella di chi viaggi per vacanza,   Ad oggi siamo il punto di riferimento nell'organizzazione dei viaggi di tante Aziende operanti in Italia e all'estero, come Electronic Theatre Controls e Innova S.p.A., nonché di importanti istituzioni statali come l'Istituto Superiore di Sanità e di tante piccole Imprese, che grazie al nostro impegno e alla nostra esperienza hanno potuto ottimizzare i propri costi di viaggio. Inoltre, grazie agli accordi preferenziali stipulati con Tour Operator del calibro di Eden Viaggi, Veratour, Costa Crociere e tanti altri, siamo in grado di trovare la vacanza migliore alla tariffa più conveniente.

Name: FunTour Viajes SL
Company description: En FunTour trabajamos para hacer realidad vuestro sueño!  Acaba el bachillerato, los exámenes de Selectividad y ahora es momento de preparar una experiencia inolvidable entre amigos ¡a un precio muy asequible! ¿Nuestro valor añadido? Ofrecemos un paquete único y muy económico con el que podréis disfrutar con vuestros amigos y, sobre todo, disfrutar de unas vacaciones únicas en Salou con las mejores fiestas que hayáis podido imaginar. Podéis pedirnos lo que queráis, los límites los ponéis vosotros. Tras años en el mercado, detectamos la necesidad de los estudiantes de encontrar un pack que incluyese alojamiento y entradas para disfrutar del viaje de fin de curso en Salou. Nosotros os facilitamos la búsqueda y creamos un pack que lo tiene todo (apartamento, entradas a las discotecas, descuentos...). La combinación perfecta para tener un recuerdo que durará para siempre. Trabajamos durante todo el año para ofrecer los mejores precios y los servicios más completos para vuestro pack de fin de curso. Eso nos hace organizar los viajes más completos de la Costa Dorada para estudiantes y os permite tener plaza con el precio más bajo garantizado. FunTour Viajes S.L se crea como una agencia de viajes para jóvenes y estudiantes. Formada por un grupo joven de emprendedores (Grupo ID+EA) con más de 15 años de experiencia en el sector de viajes y entretenimiento, interesados por temas de gran variedad, desde la seguridad hasta la diversión y confortabilidad del cliente. Entendemos a las nuevas generaciones. Nos adaptamos a las tendencias. Fomentamos activamente la amistad y el trato entre compañeros, esto lo transmitimos a través del contacto directo con cada cliente y con la organización de actividades, que servirán como medio de integración de los distintos grupos. Nuestra misión principal es brindar a los jóvenes un recuerdo inolvidable.  FunTour es y será un momento para recordar toda la vida.

Name: Spain Travel Experience
Company description: Agence Réceptive experts dans l'organisation de voyage vers l'Espagne.  Incoming Travel Agency dedicated to Spain.  Spain Travel Experience es una agencia de viajes joven y profesional. Como Agencia Receptiva en España, somos expertos en la organización de viajes por España, Portugal, Andorra y Marruecos. Organizamos a su medida todo tipo de viajes tanto para grupos como para singles: circuitos,  viajes en toda la costa , viajes a islas, viajes VIP, viajes de novios en España, viajes de incentivos. Igualmente contamos con equipo multidisciplinar y plurilingüe (Español, Inglés, Francés y Árabe)  para organizar eventos, seminarios y conferencias internacionales, y para ofrecerle servicios complementarios como entradas a espectáculos en todo el país, servicios de tierra o guías profesionales. Conózcanos y disfrute de la mejor experiencia en cada uno de sus viajes.

Name: StagForYou
Company description: Tour operator focused on party travelers to several cities of Europe, that currently include Kiev, Odessa & Lviv in Ukraine, Bucharest in Romania and Zagreb in Croatia. With dedicated staff in each destination and is asociation with reputable suppliers, we are able to offer great party weekends for stag & hen groups, boys-out-weekends, girls-out-weekends, company incentive trips and travelers in general.

Nakon godina iskustva u organizaciji individualnih putovanja i rada u turizmu, ohrabrili smo se započeti svoju priču i pružiti klijentima ono što najbolje znamo - kreiranje putovanja. Name: Eternal Tours
Company description: Eternal Tours is a Tour Operator specialist in Tours and Receptive Tourism, both in Spain and in Europe in general. Eternal Tours began its activity in September 2012, establishing the headquarters in the city of Madrid, under initiative and leadership of Luis Luna, offering to travel agents in Latin-America, a receptive in Madrid offering services throughout the European continent since that time. From the beginning, we have developed flexible and attractive tours, both in Spain and Europe, which have been expanding, increasing and improving our product portfolio every year. At the end of 2014, Eternal Tours begins offering services in the Middle East markets. In a short period of time, the Middle East is established in our company, as a separate business unit, becoming today a department in its own right. Travel agents from Egypt, Lebanon, UAE, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, Turkey, Algeria, Tunisia, etc. they use our services in several European destinations. It is in 2015, when Eternal Tours begin to offer their services to travel agents in Canada and United States. The development of this business unit, leads us to consider the possibility of establishing an specific department in 2017 addressing the specific needs of that market. 2016 is the starting up of our business in Asia. Initially Malaysia and Thailand where the first markets we serve in different parts of the European continent. Over the year 2016, we continue getting closer to China, Indonesia, Vietnam, Taiwan, Philippines, etc. From this page, we would like to thank our employees, our customers, our suppliers and all our friends for the effort, support and attention, that all of them spend with us day by day and year after year. Eternal Tours is the story of all of them and hope to continue walking together toward success.

Name: Ruralis.com

Through an easy-to-use app, it integrates with 100+ online travel agencies to boost visibility and reservations. It helps set the right price based on tourism demand analysis, manages bureaucracy, communications, payments, and even connects owners with local partners.

Name: Sondevela
Company description: Sondevela: The Art of Luxury in Navigation At Sondevela, we believe that sailing is more than just a journey: it's an experience to connect with the sea, enjoy the moment, and create unforgettable memories. From our privileged location at Marina Port Vell in Barcelona, we design unique trips that combine elegance, comfort, and exceptional service. Every detail of our outings matters, from personalized decorations for private celebrations to music or branding for corporate events. Sailing with Sondevela means enjoying the Mediterranean in an exclusive setting, where attention and care make all the difference. What we offer Personalized experiences: Birthdays, marriage proposals, weddings, or any special moment. Corporate events and team building: Transform a meeting or activity into a unique and unforgettable experience on the coast of Barcelona. Luxury outings: From wine tastings and private chef dinners to magical sunsets or relaxing brunches on board. With capacity for small groups and always accompanied by our professional crew, our trips include quality appetizers, drinks, and everything needed for you to enjoy to the fullest. Connect with us We are open to new collaborations with companies that share our vision of offering exclusive, high-quality services. We believe in forming strategic partnerships with travel agencies, event organizers, and businesses that want to offer their clients luxury nautical experiences in Barcelona. Together, we can reach an audience that values detail, elegance, and excellence in every moment. 📍 Marina Port Vell, Barcelona 🌐 www.sondevela.com 📱 665 03 456 📩 info@sondevela.com Discover the art of luxury in navigation with Sondevela, where every detail matters.

Name: EOS TOURS
HQ Location: Cyprus, Pafos, Kings, 15 Tombs Of The, 8045
Company description: Our company «EOS Tour» was founded in 2012 by professionals of the Cyprus tourism industry.  Later, our team welcomed new partners, and together we began to develop a successful business, which has achieved significant results over the years. From the start, we have rendered our service to more than 40 thousand tourists, the majority of them has become our regular customers. Today the company has come to be ranked among the top 5 leading travel agencies in Paphos. With our headquarters in Paphos, we also have an office in Limassol, planning to open representative offices in other cities of Cyprus. At present,  we are actively receiving tourists and sending our customers abroad (including tour packages from Cyprus to a number of countries). The major markets we are cooperating with are Cyprus, the United Kingdom, Russia. Our reliable partners will be ready to cater to your requests, such as renting cars and yachts, arranging diving, fishing, jeep safaris and more. Our priority is comfort, convenience, friendliness, as well as reasonable prices for our customers.  We take great pride in our tailor-made tours. The programs are developed by our staff, we go along every route with the aim to improve it and make it perfect, taking careful note of your needs. It is time-consuming and thorough work to ensure that your stay in Cyprus will be truly unforgettable. Particular attention is paid to people with disabilities. We also try to "smooth out" the differences in the mentality and perception of our tourists, fortunately, years of our experience and the sunny island's opportunities allow us to successfully cope with this difficult task. We love Cyprus and know everything about life and holidays in Cyprus! And we will always find ways to please both first-time visitors and those who are already familiar with our island.

Name: CK MARiMAR
HQ Location: Czech Republic, Hlavní Město Praha, 878 Bořivojova, 13000
Company description: We have been offering tours for our clients in the country and abroad for more than 17 years. The travel agency CK MARiMAR was established on the basis of a valid authorization to operate a travel agency issued by the competent authorities of the Czech Republic. The travel agency started to offer year-round residential and sightseeing tours to Italy, Croatia and the Czech Republic, and based on interest, clients still use these tours to this day. The expansion of the number of regular clients of the MARiMAR travel agency is just proof that there is interest in our services in tourism. The travel agency focuses mainly on trips to the sea, ski trips to the Alps and exotic tours. Outside the main season, the travel agency organizes various sightseeing tours (Vienna, Salzburg, Budapest, Krakow, Barcelona, Paris, Rome, ...), thermal tours, gastronomic tours, short-term tourist and bicycle tours to Austria and Italy. Group tours also have a certain place in a travel agency. Clients from schools (primary schools, high schools and universities), sports clubs and other hobby organizations use the offer of tours with animation programs and winter tours with skiing and snowboarding lessons. In a travel agency, we pay great attention to the quality of services provided. Thanks to the quality services provided during the tours we offer, we are expanding our tour portfolio with other destinations. We value our clients very much and that is why we prepare all tours based on their needs. We choose suitable accommodation for families with small children, for large families, groups or for our seniors.  Bankruptcy insurance is arranged by the TA with the ČPP insurance company.  MARiMAR s.r.o., travel agency

Name: Falak Travel & Tourism
HQ Location: Czech Republic, South Moravian, Brno, 15 Pellicova, 602 00

Name: Open Skies Travel & Tours Ltd.
Company description: Open Skies Travel & Tours was formed in May 2007, by two enthusiastic to the travel business ladies, who carry years of experience in the field. Namely Maria Mikellides Kalimeri and Georghia Alexandrou. The story goes something like this. They met in a travel agency in Nicosia as colleques and since then a strong friendship was grown between them and it’s still growing strong. Apparently both left the said Travel Agency to look forward to a more prominent facility, but their eagerness to create something of their own was in place. Eventually in March of 2007, they decided that they should seek of their dream. Their dream was to create one of the best Travel Agencies in the market. By the end of March 2007, everything was ready, premises, Travel Agency’s name, formalities etc. Ever since, Open Skies Travel & Tours has been growing and a satisfied clientele is growing along. Their professionalism, personal customer approach, vast knowledge of the business and their job excitement, has brought up Open Skies to become one of the prominent Travel Agencies in Nicosia.

Name: Alambiq Oy - Gourmet & Experience
Company description: Alambiq Group has two divisions: Gourmet and Experience. The services are offered to international tour operators, wholesalers, meeting planners, incentive houses and congress organizers. www.alambiqexperience.fi Alambiq Gourmet brings to Finland fine Spanish delicacies directly from unique brands. We work with independent producers whose focus is superior quality, both in their product and along the whole production process.  * To stay tuned join us on facebook.com/alambiq.oy or twitter @AlambiqOy

Name: Success Travel
Company description: We are a dynamic incoming travel agency with an extensive fleet of over 25 buses and managing another 40 buses. Our main services include transportation all over Europe, especially for the Asian market.  We strive to provide only top quality services, and that is why the vehicles we operate are equipped with satellite GPS navigation systems, air conditioning, DVD, CD, fridge, Wi-Fi, seat belts on all seats, ABS, ASR and ESP safety systems and more

Name: Start Travel Crete
Company description: Welcome to Start Travel! We are a family-owned incoming travel agency - destination management company(DMC) located on the Greek Island of Crete.   Since our founding in 2002, our main focus is to offer the best quality and value services that will satisfy our customers all over the world.   Our 35+ experience and professional approach to handling tour operators as well as M.I.C.E., corporate and individual clients, enabled us to build a stellar reputation and dynamic presence in Crete’s travel industry.  Strong company culture, passion for our profession and positive attitude makes our multi-lingual, Greek and international team committed to bringing the best travel arrangements possible. Hospitality is the main feature of Crete and it is also our principle. Satisfied employees lead to satisfied customers. We know the growth and success of our company depends upon fulfilling our partners and customers needs every day.   That is also our promise.

Name: Novacortiça - Indústria Corticeira S.A.

Recently it has also engaged with an ambitious project for industrial tourism. We now invite tour operators to bring visitors to the factory to learn more about one of the most ecological and sustainable materials given by nature. Cork!

Name: Night2Stay

Tourists arrange their trips with us as well as travel agencies, who wish to sell more and get a commission.  Join Night2Stay to discover world or book for your partners at the competitive price.

Name: SportFelix
Company description: Sportfelix è un brand Raduni Sportivi [https://www.linkedin.com/company/raduni-sportivi].  Raduni Sportivi è un Tour Operator italiano che da oltre vent’anni opera nel panorama del Turismo Sportivo focalizzando la propria attività nell’ideazione, promozione e organizzazione di eventi sportivi a forte valenza partecipativa, viaggi di istruzione, camp e ritiri sportivi. Una realtà aziendale consolidata che si rivolge a quanti desiderino scegliere per se e per i propri familiari una vacanza basata sul “riposo attivo”, qualunque sia la preparazione sportiva, l’età e la forma fisica. Oltre a vantare collaborazioni con alcune tra le più importanti aziende internazionali, Raduni Sportivi collabora da sempre con la Federazione Italiana Pallavolo (Fipav) nell’organizzazione di progetti mirati allo sviluppo dell’attività sportiva giovanile.

Name: Authentic Europe AS
Company description: Authentic Europe is an innovative online tour operator, creating and selling customisable independent and escorted package tours throughout Europe. We call ourselves specialists since we only sell what we know well; our travel specialists have in-depth knowledge of the destinations we sell. We always aim to give our travellers professional and personal service to help realise their dream vacation in Europe.

Name: B2Book.net
Company description: B2Book.net is a meeting platform between tourist accommodation owners or managers (Seller) and travel agencies, tour operators, OTA and GDS (Buyer). The Seller publishes its own property and decides the commission fee for the Buyer who will offer accommodation to their final customers at competitive prices. B2Book platform is looking to fulfill the important missing area which is present in the vacation rental distribution, allowing travel agents, tour operators, OTA & GDS direct access at best commission fees. More than half of the online bookings are related to a combination of hotel and transport reservations; our mission is to allow the vacation rentals being part of the online reservation system, giving to our suppliers the full visibility, beside the traditional OTA channels. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mIXxFXx48WA

Name: Spirit Of Ireland Executive Travel
Company description: Spirit of Ireland Executive Travel Ltd. are dedicated to providing the complete travel package experience, transport and guiding services, all at competitive rates. We bring a new dimension to luxury travel in Ireland. Operating an extensive fleet of prestige vehicles, and providing 24-hour service, from chauffeur-driven executive cars to state of the art town cars, luxury Midi coaches and coaches. We also provide comprehensive executive and luxury transport solutions to Ireland’s leading companies, hotels, institutions and tour operators for both groups and individual clients. Spirit of Ireland Executive Travel, is a family run business and we take pride in creating long-lasting memories for our clients. When you book with us you can be sure that your clients will be well looked after and that they will have a fantastic trip to the Emerald Isle. We offer a variety of luxury tours that focus on highlighting the best of Irish culture, gastronomy, and hospitality. Our tours primarily operate along the Wild Atlantic Way but we also offer package tours that feature the north of Ireland and Dublin.  We operate all year round, catering for any size group. Meaning you don't need to worry about scheduling trips at certain times of the year.  On top of this, we have developed an easy to use agent booking portal, where agents who partner with us, can book and create bespoke tours in just a few clicks. Agents who register with us to use this agent booking portal have access to special rates which enable great potential profit margins.  If you feel that your business could benefit from partnering with us and using our new agent booking portal, send an email to me, Liam, at liam@spiritofirelandtravel.com and we can organize a quick 20-minute call to register and train you up on the portal.  Website: www.spiritofirelandtravel.com Facebook: www.facebook.com/SpiritofIrelandExecutiveTravel

Name: More Stamps Global Kft
Company description: More Stamps Global is an online travel agency and crypto-enthusiast industry leader. The company helps intrepid globe-trotters from around the world fill their passports with "More Stamps". More Stamps Global is the first worldwide online travel agency to accept over 40  individual cryptocurrencies and tokens as payment for travel services. Based in Hungary and operating  internationally, the company specializes in unique vacation packages and customized  itineraries, international and domestic flights, hotel accommodation, and transportation   services. A pioneer in the consumer digital asset field, More Stamps Global welcomes and encourages its clients to use safe and secure cryptocurrencies for all online bookings and  payments. Please visit www.morestamps.global for more information.

Name: BIRORENT S.R.L - RENTAL BUSINESS
HQ Location: Italy, Treviso, Dosson Di Casier, 7 Via Tarantelli, 31030
Company description: Birorent è una società di servizio nata in collaborazione con Fantic Rent, leader italiana nel business del noleggio flotte E-Bikes, che fa parte della storica azienda Fantic Motor. Il nostro obiettivo è quello di dare la possibilità alle strutture ricettive di possedere beni e servizi di alta gamma e allo stesso tempo migliorare l’occupazione alberghiera nei periodi di media e bassa stagione. Abbiamo creato, insieme ai nostri partners, fornitori e tour operator, un Rental Business dedicato agli Hotel e strutture turistico-ricettive. Offriamo un servizio che permette di possedere prodotti di alta gamma in cambio di camere invendute, attraverso la formula del baratto. Partiamo da dati indiscutibili relativi ad una percentuale di camere invendute. Su questo creiamo delle offerte di prodotti e servizi a costo ZERO modellata alle esigenze della struttura. Grazie al nostro sistema, e senza interferire con il booking alberghiero, le notti invendute diventano un ulteriore fonte di reddito.

Name: COVEX SAS
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 5 Via Antonello Da Messina, 20146
Company description: COVEX -  Commercial & Consular Visas Express – è un’agenzia leader in Italia specializzata nel rilascio di visti consolari su passaporti e documenti per l’esportazione presso tutti i Consolati e Ambasciate straniere presenti in Italia.  La società, con sede a Milano e Roma, grazie alla profonda conoscenza del mercato maturata in oltre 35 anni di esperienza, è il partner ideale per Aziende, Spedizionieri, Agenzie di viaggi e Tour operator.  Il servizio di assistenza e disbrigo delle richieste di visti su passaporti e legalizzazione di documenti per l’esportazione offre ai nostri Clienti la possibilità di avere un partner sicuro e affidabile per il proprio business. Viene garantito un servizio tempestivo e completo in quanto COVEX provvede direttamente alla presentazione e al ritiro dei documenti poiché non si appoggia ad intermediari esterni. COVEX opera a Milano e Roma dal 1983 ed è una delle prime agenzie del settore ad aver ottenuto la certificazione del proprio sistema di gestione della qualità, ad oggi certificato con la norma UN EN ISO 9001:2015. COVEX è stata agenzia partner della Camera di Commercio Italo Araba di Roma per il servizio di legalizzazione documenti per l’esportazione, iscrizione e rinnovo al registro degli esportatori della Camera per tutto il Nord Italia, fornendo agli associati il servizio per la legalizzazione di documenti commerciali (certificati di origine, fatture, etc.) presso i Consolati e Ambasciate di Milano e Roma e l'ottenimento di visti su passaporti per tutti i partecipanti delle missioni all'estero organizzate dalla Camera. I Servizi offerti da COVEX: -Visti su passaporti per Affari, Lavoro, Turismo, Studio -Polizze assicurative -Lettere di invito per tutti i paesi -Legalizzazione di documenti per l’esportazione su certificati di origine, fatture, dichiarazioni etc. -Rilascio del Certificato di origine online presso la Camera di Commercio -Traduzioni libere e giurate in tutte le lingue -Servizio di presa e consegna
