Name: EUROLINE Travel Shipping & Cargo L.T.D.
HQ Location: Greece, Epirus, Ioniou Pelagous Νew Port, 461 00
Company description: Το ταξιδιωτικό γραφείο ΜΠΑΚΟΛΙΑΣ Σ. & ΣΙΑ Ε.Π.Ε., με διακριτικό τίτλο EUROLINE Shipping & Cargo L.T.D., λειτουργεί από το 1999 στο λιμάνι της Ηγουμενίτσας. Το 2006 έγινε Εμπορικός Αντιπρόσωπος - Ναυτικός πράκτορας της ANEK LINES στην Ηγουμενίτσα. To 2013 πήρε την κεντρική πρακτόρευση της ANEK LINES και στην Πάτρα και τον Ιούνιο του 2015 τού έγινε ανάθεση για τη λιμενική πρακτόρευση του πλοίου της ΛΑΝΕ από Καλαμάτα για Κύθηρα - Καστέλι Κρήτης. Εξυπηρετούμε δρομολόγια εξωτερικού από Πάτρα & Ηγουμενίτσα για  Βενετία Ανκόνα & Μπάρι . Το 2017 και 2018 η Εuroline Shipping & Cargo L.T.D. διαχειρίστηκε περισσότερα από 25.000 φορτηγά ανά χρονιά στις γραμμές Ελλάδα Ιταλία και Ιταλία Ελλάδα. Κατά περιόδους αναλαμβάνει πρακτορεύσεις από κρουαζιερόπλοια όπως για παράδειγμα τον Σεπτέμβρη του 2017 το Silver Spirit της εταιρίας  SILVER SEA. Το πελατολόγιο της εταιρείας καλύπτει γεωγραφικά όλη την Ελλάδα και το εξωτερικό. EUROLINE - BAKOLIAS S. Co. Ltd. - Central Agent ANEK LINES & ANEK SUPERFAST The travel agency BAKOLIAS S. & Co. Ltd., under the trade name EUROLINE Shipping & Cargo LTD, has been operating since 1999 at the port of Igoumenitsa. In 2006 the agency became a Commercial Representative - Nautical agent of ANEK LINES in Igoumenitsa. In 2013 Euroline started operating as a central agency of ANEK LINES in Patras. We serve international routes from Patras and Igoumenitsa to  Venice Ancona & Bari. The company operates in ticketing - cargo - shipping agent services with four sophisticated facilities in Igoumenitsa - Patras - Kalamata and 50 employees. In 2018, Euroline handled more than 25,000 trucks en route from Greece to  Italy and vice versa. The values of Euroline are expressed through the triangle: Friendliness / Protection Reliability / Ethics Dynamism / Modern Services Our values constitute the character of the Group and inspire confidence and security to our partners and customers.

Name: MundoLengua
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Sevilla, 8 Cuesta Del Rosario, 41004
Company description: Centro MundoLengua is a private international language school and educational tour operator dedicated to providing opportunities for students to improve or perfect their proficiency in the Spanish language while experiencing the culture of Spain firsthand. Established in 2005 by Yaye Baena (Spain), Stefanie Kempf (Switzerland), and David Hirsch (United States), we offer individual, group, and customized program options and work with numerous high schools, colleges, and universities to organize study abroad programs in Spain. We are headquartered in the historic center of Seville and offer Spanish courses throughout the year to students from all over the world. We design our courses and programs for all types of students: high school, college and university, adults, teachers, and professors. Our international Spanish school in Seville is part of the network of centers accredited by the Cervantes Institute. Since 2005, Centro MundoLengua has also collaborated with the College Board, providing the only accredited AP Summer Institute for Spanish language and literature teachers in Spain. Aside from our office in Seville, Centro MundoLengua offers Spanish courses in other destinations across Spain. High school students may choose from a variety of programs located in Seville, Cádiz, and Madrid. University students have the option to study in Seville, Cádiz, Madrid, Salamanca, Alcalá de Henares, and Barcelona. We have signed agreements for these programs with Pablo de Olavide University, University of Cádiz, University of Salamanca, and University of Alcalá de Henares. Our staff at Centro MundoLengua is incredibly passionate about their work. We are a team of young, multilingual professionals with experience in study abroad who genuinely want to see each and every student succeed and have an unforgettable experience. We invite you to discover more about our programs and services at www.centromundolengua.com

Name: CasaDominicana
Company description: Our passion for real property and love for Dominican Republic is something we want to share. We make your dreams to build your own hotel, residence or purchase the apartment. We design, sell and develop hotels, houses, apartments building, villas, properties on the golf fields and building plots. If you want to decide to purchase immediately – we will find perfect proposals – we are real estate agents. With us you will find your dream property in casa de campo, punta cana, cap cana or bavaro. In our offer you will find the best investments of developers and private investors. We have over a dozen years of experience, extensive contacts, full offer and market knowledge. All this guarantees a safe investment in real estate in the caribbean. for our clients, we carry out the entire process of investment service: We will design and build a residential property (house, villa, apartment building). If your choice is to buy real estate, we will find the best offer that market can give in the top locations. We have the knowledge to negotiate the best sales conditions and construction costs. We also handle all legal and notarial formalities. We help organize flights and accommodation, and optional tour operators and water sports will fill for you leisure time filled with attractions.   Our main office is located in warsaw. We are also permanently in Dominican Republic and our office can be found in Bavaro, Punta Cana. Let’s meet and talk about your dream home in the Caribbean.

Name: BARCELONA GUIDE BUREAU
Company description: Barcelona Guide Bureau is an inbound tour operator with 25 years of experience, specialized in providing a wide range of guided tours in Barcelona and Catalonia.  Committed to providing high quality standards of service, we are eager to meet our customers’ expectations. Our company maxim is “A customer is the most important visitor on our premises, he is part of our business and the purpose of it.” (Mahatma Gandhi) For this reason, among the services we have developed, we are specialized in: - Exclusive Private Tours tailor-made according to our customers’ preferences and at their own time schedule. We provide expert licensed guides in the customers’ own language, luxury vehicles and entrance fees to monuments.  - Daily Sightseeing Tours carefully designed to ensure we make the most of our customers’ time. These enjoyable escorted tours have an affordable price, are exclusively provided in English by experienced guides and include fast track entrance to monuments and museums. We look after people, cultural heritage and the environment, and accordingly, we actively work towards the sustainable development of tourism. Work well done in quality of service and responsibility towards our environment has been rewarded by being the world’s first tour operator to obtain the Biosphere Responsible Tourism Certification. Enjoy Barcelona in total comfort!!

Name: Magic Tours
Company description: Magic Tours blev i juni 2019 en del af Ruby Rejser: https://ruby-rejser.dk Vi giver dig, din partner og ikke mindst dine børn magiske oplevelser i Disneyland® Paris’ eventyrlige forlystelsespark og fantasiverden.   Som selected tour operator har vi arrangeret drømmeferier i Disneyland® Paris siden de åbnede i 1992. Vi arbejder passionerede for alle vores gæster og kan hjælpe dig med at arrangere kør-selv-, bus- eller flyrejse dertil, ligesom vi kender alle hotellerne i Disneyland® Paris med deres temaer og særlige atmosfærer. Magic Tours - det er ren magi. Ring til os i dag og lad os hjælpe dig med at arrangere din drømmeferie! Website: https://www.magictours.dk/ Du kan også finde Magic Tours på Facebook. Name: Helkin Vacanze Studio

Company description: Helkin è un tour operator specializzato in viaggi studio per l’apprendimento delle lingue straniere, in particolare l’inglese, per bambini, ragazzi e adulti. Offriamo pacchetti di gruppo per scuole, Ministay, programmi individuali per adulti, semestri o anni all’estero e corsi intensivi business. Personalizziamo i nostri pacchetti per garantire esperienze didattiche, formative e ricreative di altissimo livello, collaborando con le migliori strutture internazionali. Dal 2011, abbiamo contribuito alla crescita umana, culturale e linguistica di oltre 2000 studenti ogni anno. Valori come esperienza, professionalità e affidabilità guidano il nostro lavoro. Crediamo che le vacanze studio debbano andare oltre l’apprendimento linguistico, offrendo esperienze utili per la vita e la carriera futura. Supportiamo insegnanti e studenti con uno staff dedicato, garantendo serenità e sostegno costante. Per noi, le vacanze studio sono un’estensione dell’attività didattica e un’opportunità per vivere momenti di vita comunitaria con studenti di diverse nazionalità. Crediamo nel valore formativo del viaggio unito all’apprendimento immersivo della lingua. Scopri di più su come Helkin può trasformare l’apprendimento in un'avventura indimenticabile!

Name: DANUBIUS TRAVEL
Company description: Founded in 1991, Danubius Travel, is one of the most experienced companies on the Romanian tourism market, constantly managing to stay ahead of tourism trends and taking advantage of the amazing technological developments in the IT field. Our company staff is active in the various company departments, namely: Business Travel & Events, Online Business, Transportation, Incoming, and Cruises. This modern company still holds at its core the incredible legacy of its former status as TUI Romania, upon which it successfully developed its own distinct personality, values, and organizational culture.   As of 2011, we became part of Eurolines Group, currently the strongest and most successful group of companies on the Romanian tourism market. Among many other advantages, this gives us full access to a modern tourism bus fleet which is currently being used by our Incoming Department. Speaking of the incoming side of our business, it is worth mentioning that for three consecutive years, 2013, 2014, 2015, our company has been deemed “Best Incoming Tour Operator in Romania”, at the yearly HTL Excellence Awards, held each May at the JW Marriott in Bucharest. During over 25 years of activity the company evolved into one of the prominent tour operators in the country and achieved national recognition as a strong and consistent brand. We strive for excellence as a collective and we seek to provide the value-centered services our clients deserve. Internally, it is a great place to work in, fostering opportunities for career development and advancement, while promoting self expression in a blame-free environment.  Due to our great services, offered at competitive rates, and through our well trained professional staff, we function as a reliable partner for tourism key players around the world. Our page will offer you carefully curated posts, travel tips and recommendations, tour and excursion suggestions and will keep you posted with regards to developments in our destination!

Name: My Blossom Travel
Company description: My Blossom Travel  Redefining the way we travel Welcome to My Blossom Travel   A unique, new-concept travel agency for the contemporary, time-poor, world-traveller, seeking for his personal “travel fairy” to take care of everything in the blink of an eye.  Everyone loves travelling, but very few love all the fuss around organising a trip. The tickets, the itineraries, the guides, the reading, the studying, the google-searching, the timetables, the seeking, the rate comparing, the flights, the passports, the lines… so many things to do, and so little time to do them. At the same time, there are no two travellers identical to one another. Not all people like the same things. So, what may seem fun to you, may appear as hassle to the next person.  Keeping these two major factors in mind, and using our 20 years of experience in the demanding field of Luxury Holiday Design as our guide and reference, we decided to launch a new type of Travel Agency; a new age, lifestyle Travel Agency focusing on the smallest of details to offer you a flawless, effortless and hassle-free ride to the world of magical, tailor-made and stress-free holidays!

Name: Cestovni Kancelar NOVA S.r.o.
Company description: Quality travel with trust! Our travel agency is on the Czech market for 23 years. So far we organized primarily exotic and cognitive trips in and outside Europe. The agency is member of AČCKA (Association of Czech Travel Agents’ and Tour Operators’) since the year 1993. We joined the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) to prove the constant quality of our services.  The office is located in Znojmo, South Moravia, Czech Republic. The principal of our company is the individual treatment of our customers with attention to their needs and wishes. Our main advantages are reliability, agility, punctuality and positive attitude to modern solutions. Based on the experience we gathered for the past decades, we recently started to focus on the possibilities of incoming tourism. Name: NetFerry
Company description: NetFerry is transforming the way people travel by ferry, combining technology, innovation, and a customer-first approach. For years, we have been dedicated to making ferry journeys seamless, reliable, and enjoyable for millions of passengers across Europe and beyond. Our platform offers travellers an intuitive, end-to-end booking experience, allowing them to search, compare, and book ferry routes with ease. Behind the scenes, NetFerry leverages scalable booking systems, advanced CRM tools, and a mobile app to ensure every journey is smooth for both passengers and travel partners. Innovation drives everything we do. From optimising booking processes to enhancing customer engagement, we continuously develop technological solutions that improve efficiency and create memorable travel experiences. Our team works closely with ferry operators, travel agencies, and corporate clients to deliver value at every stage of the journey. At NetFerry, we believe travel should be simple, safe, and accessible. Whether planning a short getaway or a business trip, passengers can rely on our platform to provide smart, convenient, and secure ferry options. Over the years, our commitment to quality and service excellence has allowed us to expand into new routes and markets while maintaining the trust of our users. Our mission is to connect people with opportunities to explore Europe and beyond, driving digital transformation in the ferry industry and setting new standards for reliability and convenience. NetFerry continues to grow as a trusted partner for travellers and businesses alike, combining expertise, innovation, and a passion for travel to redefine ferry journeys.

Name: Speed Vacanze

La nostra attività imprenditoriale si basa sulle emozioni, che ha dato vita a community fidelizzate, sempre al centro delle nostre strategie di business, con un esemplare riscontro positivo, un fatturato sempre crescente, e un’offerta di prodotti all’avanguardia e sempre aggiornati. Tale crescita è stata onorata anche dal Premio Allianz per la miglior crescita di fatturato. Vantiamo collaborazioni con marchi importanti, quali Alpitour, Eden,  Veratour, MSC, COSTA… Speed Vacanze è fatta da giovani talenti specializzati, che garantiscono una solida presenza sul mercato e una previsione di crescita annua costante del 10%  di utenti e fruitori.

Name: Heritage Study Tours

Dalle vacanze studio agli stage linguistici, dai viaggi di istruzione al work experience, dai progetti PON/POR alla formazione linguistica per gli insegnanti, abbiamo a cuore innanzitutto la qualità dei servizi offerti. L’esperienza di full immersion, costituita dal soggiorno all’estero, dalle attività quotidiane e dalla vita sociale nel paese straniero, contribuisce a potenziare l’efficacia didattica del corso: i nostri studenti passano quotidianamente dalla teoria alla pratica, vivendo un’esperienza altamente formativa sia sul piano culturale che umano.  Siamo un Ente di Formazione accreditato dal M.I.U.R. (Ministero dell’Istruzione, dell’Università e della Ricerca), siamo un’agenzia riconosciuta dalla IATA (International Air Transport Association), siamo un’azienda certificata con Sistema di Qualità ISO 9001:2008, siamo agenzia partner di English UK, siamo membri della Camera di Commercio e Industria Italiana per il Regno Unito.

Stamps aims to reintroduce the MENA region in a different narrative as a top destination for international travelers. A destination that's safe, cultural and free. Our goal is to make the region more accessible, more visible and  closer to you than ever - Through immersive tours, retreats, and personalized experiences, we showcase the region’s vibrant cultures, its generous hospitality, and its untold stories, all while prioritizing sustainability and giving back to the local communities that make it all possible. Every Stamps experience is operated by local experts, ensuring that travelers enjoy not only seamless itineraries but also meaningful cultural exchanges. From wellness retreats in the desert to corporate team-building retreats, our services cater to a wide range of interests while maintaining a focus on education and storytelling. If you’re a practitioner, creator or a business seeking partnership to create retreats together - Bookings@Stampstours.com  If you’re a traveler looking to join on of our upcoming retreats, head to our website - www.Stampstours.com Let’s create beautiful experiences together!

Name: Baltik d.o.o.
HQ Location: Croatia, City Of Zagreb, Samobor, 13 Ulica Tatjane Marinic, 10430
Company description: Privately owned company, founded in 1990. Tour operator and coach company specialised in Europe, West Africa and South America.

Name: Car Target Group
Company description: Car Target Group - A family of three brands with one promise: We make rentals simple!  Car Target Group is an international rent a car broker company that provides car rental solutions for both, travel businesses as well as end-customers. Through three different members of our Car Target Group family and our team of experts we offer best possible rent-a-car solutions around the world. •      Car Target:  B2B car rental platform – your connection to all big names in the rent a car industry  Our mission is to open growth opportunity windows for travel professionals in the rent-a-car world.  We believe that agility is one of the most influential attributes in this fast-paced industry. With this insight, we increase our limits of flexibility to meet each partner's unique needs.  Our B2B car rental solutions are user-friendly, visually appealing and adaptable for all travel businesses like airlines, accommodation sites, online travel agencies and online travel websites.  •	Vehicle Rent:  B2C car rental website – direct connection for end-customers to a global network of suppliers At the heart of CTG, we have our fastest growing online car rental broker business with the network that extends across the world.  Vehicle Rent is driven by passion and excellence in customer experience. To fulfill our customers' needs we make rentals friendly and simple.  •	Mehr als Mietwagen = More than Car Hire  This full-German premium brand is changing the definition of superior car rental customer experience by making it easy, transparent and as comfortable as possible. We deliver this by choosing only top-rated suppliers and offering an all-inclusive & hassle-free product.

Name: Lindbergh Tour & Travel
Company description: Lindbergh Tour & Travel is an incoming tour operator for Amsterdam and the Netherlands. Based in Amsterdam, Lindbergh offers many services in and around our capital like: Around 90 hotels; Airport and city transfers. Shared as well as private and from luxury sedan to coach;  Excursions and sightseeing opportunities. City tours, half day and full day excursions to a variety of destinations, even as far as to Brussels and Bruges in Belgium;  Canal Cruises. A whole range is available, from 1 hour cruises to Hop on - Hop off lines as well as private canal cruises including drinks and dinner on the beautiful canals of Amsterdam;  Tickets for the major museums and attractions of the Netherlands.  Started as an excursion company almost 100 years ago, Lindbergh has extended knowledge about sightseeing in the Netherlands and Amsterdam and has established long term relationships with all the major attractions and tourism sites.  Lindbergh Tour & Travel is an expert in the field, for FIT as well as group bookings. We work with the large and global booking platforms for hotel and excursions, but also with independent travel agencies and tour operators. Lindbergh operates its own excursions, so is always in touch with the quality of the product and has the opportunity to listen to the end user. Therefore, Lindbergh keeps on investing in the quality of its products and is able to offer the best quality against the best price.

Name: Iceland Travel Assistance
Company description: Iceland Travel Assistance is a comprehensive booking service in Iceland. The company operates sales and information offices in Reykjavík. We are located at the Tourist Information Center at Aðalstræti 3, Radison Blu Saga, Radison Blu 1919, BSÍ Bus Termina and at Inspired by Iceland at Bankastræti main shopping street.  We book all tours with registered tour operators in Iceland, and we also book accommodation, rental cars and flights as well as providing general information on travelling in Iceland. This aspect of the business in primarily oriented for over-the-counter sales, i.e. for travelers already in Iceland.  For people planning a trip to Iceland, our online service is www.ita.is and those who want entire trips planned in advance, including tours and accommodation can send an e-mail to bookings@ita.is.  Our main advantage is that since we work with all the licensed tour operators and hotels, we can literally arrange anything you want with trusted professionals.

Name: Skol Apartments Marbella
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Marbella, 45 Avenida De Ricardo Soriano, 29601
Company description: Beachfront Holiday Rentals and Sales, Property Management, Refurbishments, Boutique Travel Agency.

Name: Arctic Guide Service AS
Company description: Arctic Guide Service is a guide company with offices in Lofoten, Tromsø and North Cape. Our company started up in Lofoten 2001. In 2006, we established our second office in Tromsø, and further expanded to North Cape in 2009. Our name Arctic Guide Service represents our strong connection to the Arctic region. We are proud to be the guide supplier of choice for many adventurous travelers, tour operators, cruise companies and the well-known coastal steamer, Hurtigruten. With nearly two decades worth of experience, we have established ourselves as the leading supplier of guide service in the northern parts of Norway and provide expert guides in a wide range of languages: English, German, Spanish, Norwegian, Italian, French and Japanese. In addition to other languages upon request.  Whether you are an adventurous tourist, a tour operator, or the representative of a corporation, Arctic Guide Service will put the most knowledgeable guides and coordinators at your service. We are a year-round service and offer tours that fit your needs!

Name: Snowtime Travel BV
Company description: Snowtime Travel is a 100% Dutch, direct selling travel company with 25 years of experience in organizing complete ski trips to key destination France and other countries like Austria, Switzerland, Canada and the USA. Snowtime travel offers accommodations and various additional services, such as Royal Class bus tours, ski passes, ski lessons, ski and snowboard rental and catering. Snowtime Travel has a long booking season. It starts early December in a selected number of villages and end at the end of April / begin of May. Snowtime is founder of the famous Dutch Week in Val Thorens, the largest winter event in the Alps. Every year this event welcomes about 7,000 to 8,000 visitors. In addition to the Dutch Week, Snowtime also organizes the Snow Fam Week in Tignes, during the spring holidays in May. The Snow Fam Week welcomes yearly about 800 Dutch visitors.  Snowtime Travel distinguishes itself in the wintersport market by offering high quality accommodations, great customer service and by offering many additional options and use of customer knowledge (direct feedback through customer satisfaction surveys. Snowtime is affiliated with the Dutch Association of Travel Agents and Tour Operators (ANVR), Travel Compensation Fund Foundation (SGR) and the Calamity Fund.

Name: Killiney Travel
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dún Laoghaire, Rochestown Avenue
Company description: Killiney Travel is a travel agency based in South Dublin.  We are part of the Brooklyn Travel Group which includes the Stewart Travel travel agency chain; cruise retailers CruiseKings and Scotland’s Cruise Centre; plus specialist operators including GolfKings, Santa Claus Trips and My Canada Trips.

Name: IHZ Italia - Tour Operator & DMC
Company description: Founded by Bruno Ruggiero, a pioneer in the tourism and hospitality sector, in 1964 in Hamburg (Germany). In 1982 moved its headquarter in Rome (Italy) as Incoming Office and Tour Operator.  With two rapresentative office in Europe: Hamburg (Germany) and Valencia (Spain) and one rapresentative office in Asia: Shanghai (China) we manage more than 2.000 adult and students groups per year booked by travel agencies and tour operator all over the world.    Specialized BtoB for groups, both adults and students, thanks to our long cooperation with hotels, restaurants, coach companies, guides, etc. we are able to give the optimum accommodation with the best rates on the market. Our professional and experienced team takes care of you and your guests from the beginning to the end of your booking. IHZ is also member of IATA (no. 3822436) and Fiavet.

Name: Z Travel Agenzia Di Viaggi
Company description: - Viaggi dei migliori Tour Operator - Agenzia Web Trenitalia  - Pacchetti personalizzati - Viaggi di nozze - Crociere Costa  - Crociere Msc - Vacanze Studio all'Estero - EF- - Soggiorni Linguistici all'Estero - EF- - Biglietteria Simet  - Biglietteria LaVAlle  - Biglietteria Ibus (Intersaj e Consorzio) - Biglietteria Esposito  - Voli Low cost  - Voli di linea

Name: Red De Patrimonio Histórico De España
Company description: La Red de Patrimonio Histórico de España tiene como misión unir el valioso patrimonio histórico y cultural de nuestro país, promoviendo su aprecio, difusión y acceso para todos. Con una visión clara y ambiciosa, buscamos crear una plataforma colaborativa, única y singular que aglutine la oferta turística en torno a estos monumentos, poniéndolos en valor y trabajando por su sostenibilidad. Nuestro objetivo es generar un retorno positivo tanto para los visitantes de calidad como para los destinos que los acogen. Nuestra iniciativa se enmarca en la estrategia Experiencias Turismo España de la Secretaría de Estado de Turismo y se sustenta en una Asociación sin ánimo de lucro. Esta entidad gestiona esta Plataforma tecnológica y colaborativa de la Red y la Agencia de Viajes de la Red, que se encargan de distribuir y promocionar las propuestas e iniciativas turísticas de los municipios y gestores de conjuntos históricos y monumentales. A través de esta plataforma, ofrecemos experiencias integradoras que conectan territorios y destinos en torno al patrimonio histórico, la naturaleza, el bienestar y las experiencias enogastronómicas, entre otras. Los paquetes combinados y las experiencias personalizadas permiten a los visitantes explorar y disfrutar de una forma única y enriquecedora. Como valor añadido, los miembros de la Red y socios colaboradores obtienen numerosas ventajas gracias al conocimiento compartido y a la multicanalidad e hiperconectividad proporcionadas por nuestra plataforma. Esto no solo propicia mayores ingresos a los conjuntos monumentales por visitas, sino que también contribuye a la reducción de costes, mejorando así el beneficio y contribuyendo a la generación de buenas prácticas. Todo esto se logra mediante un equilibrio perfecto entre preservación del patrimonio y el desarrollo turístico. ¿Crees que conoces España?  ¡Compruébalo!

Name: Diva Odysseys
Company description: Diva Odysseys is a fully licensed online boutique tour operator that offers personally crafted holiday experiences for the Discerning Diva.   These Signature Odysseys aim to bring together like-minded divas through theme-based, paced and authentic local experiences.  These memorable and inherently personal activities involving engagement and not presentation distinguish us from other off-the-shelf, cookie-cutter package holidays. www.divaodysseys.com

Name: Wowtrip
Company description: Wowtrip is neither a standard company nor a typical travel agency, and it is not a trade name either… Wowtrip is a new concept of travelling, an experience that any traveller should try at least once in their lifetime and never forget it. Wowtrip is a trip to the unknown, a breath of excitement on the traveller’s face, an anecdote to be shared with all our friends, a challenge to the daily routine. This, so simple but complex at the same time, is what we are engaged with. Wowtrip, designed to surprise you

Name: Global Travel
Company description: Travel agency in Ostend, Belgium

Name: IL GIRASOLE VIAGGI
Company description: Tour Operator specializzato in viaggi su misura in Svizzera, Spagna, Portogallo, Azzorre, Canarie etc.  Agente generale per l'Italia delle Ferrovie Spagnole Renfe e delle Ferrovie Svizzere SBB e Tour Operator certificato Svizzera Turismo.

Name: Longitours
Company description: Embark on unforgettable journeys with Longitours, a burgeoning tour operator and online travel agent catering to discerning Nordic travelers.  Established in 2022, we specialize in curating tailor-made holiday packages to popular charter destinations, captivating city breaks, and luxurious accommodations worldwide. Our operations commenced in Finland, with our office in the bustling heart of Helsinki. In June 2023, we unveiled our sales platform, offering Finnish customers an unparalleled array of travel experiences. Embracing the Finnish Competition and Consumer Authority's (Kilpailu- ja kuluttajavirasto) strict standards, we hold a travel guarantee license (registration number: 1329/22/Mj), ensuring peace of mind throughout your travel journey. Furthermore, Longitours Ab has a travel guarantee license from Kammarkollegiet.  Explore the vast array of holiday options at our user-friendly Finnish website, www.longitours.fi. or www.longitours.se. Our intuitive platform streamlines the booking process, enabling you to design your dream getaway seamlessly. Expanding our reach, we pre-launched in Sweden in March 2024 and have plans to open Norway and Denmark later in 2025. Our commitment to providing seamless travel experiences extends across the Nordic region. Recognizing the challenges associated with traditional travel planning, we at Longitours are dedicated to revolutionizing how you book, travel, and savor your holidays. Our personalized approach empowers you to craft an itinerary that aligns with your unique preferences and aspirations. With Longitours, travel becomes an effortless and enriching experience, allowing you to cherish every moment of your Nordic adventure.

Name: Havanatur Italia S.r.l.
Company description: Nel 1992 l'ufficio centrale Havanatur della Habana decise di aprire una sede in Italia, la sua ragione sociale fu Havanatur Italia Sr.l. Oggi Havanatur Italia S.r.l. lavora come tour operator per gli agenti di viaggio italiani, ma è anche impegnata nel proporre servizi a terra a Cuba a tour operator esteri, principalmente in Grecia e Turchia. Attraverso Havanatur Italia S.r.l. è possibile prenotare servizi a terra o pacchetti che includono i voli di compagnie coma Blu Panorama, Iberia, Air Europe, Neos, Cubana de Aviacion. Lo staff italo-cubano di Havanatur Italia S.r.l. è a disposizione di tutti i tour operator operanti fuori dall'Italia interessati nella promozione del prodotto Cuba; il suo personale, di riconosciuta esperienza, può essere di grande aiuto nella preparazione di pacchetti di viaggio, conoscendo in tutti i dettagli tutti gli aspetti di Cuba.

Name: Visit Lillehammer
Company description: Visit Lillehammer AS is the destination management company for the Lillehammer Region. The region comprises of Lillehammer, Gausdal, Øyer, Ringebu, Sør-Fron, Nord-Fron, and the Sjusjøen region in Ringsaker.  Our main task is to work within the leisure and MICE markets to increase the number of visitors to our region. Are you a tour operator, tourist, a company that wants to place your next kick off, conference or incentive trip in the Lillehammer region? www.lillehammer.com provides information, and you are more than welcome to contact us with any questions you might have.

Name: Norrøna Hvitserk Adventure
Company description: We offer nature-based adventure holidays for active explorers in Norway.  Hvitserk is what the Vikings called the highest mountain on Greenland - which during the time of the Vikings used to be a part of Norway. When the toughest Vikings sailed west from Iceland on a voyage of discovery, the 3,693-metre-high mountain on the east coast of Greenland was an important landmark. After they left Iceland, they didn't see land until the white, snow-covered mountain emerged like a lighthouse in the distance. In the same way, as Hvitserk served as a ‘lighthouse’ for adventurous Vikings 1,000 years ago, the company Hvitserk now serves as a 'lighthouse' for active explorers with a desire for nature-based travel and adventures. For more than 30 years, Hvitserk has organized exciting journeys for adventurous people to all corners of the world. At the same time as we have taken people to exciting destinations abroad, we have also built up an extensive network in Norway. We have skilled guides and local partners across the length and breadth of our beautiful country. In recent years, more and more Norwegian and foreign guests have joined us on trips to unique Norwegian nature experiences! We also have extensive experience in extreme trips and demanding logistics. Hvitserk was the first Norwegian operator to offer expeditions to the South Pole, and no other Scandinavian tour operator has accompanied as many guests as we have on skiing expeditions to the Antarctic. No other tour operator in the world has accompanied as many guests on skiing expeditions across the inland ice of Greenland, and we have organized several skiing trips to the Arctic, and climbing expeditions to the peaks of the Himalayas.

Name: WalkingPalates - Palati A Spasso Srl
Company description: WalkingPalates is a start-up that produces and sells high-quality food and wine experiences. The two funders are food and travel experts who met in 2000 when they both held managerial positions for a major international Tour Operator. Antonio Autore, funder and owner of Autore Chocolate ltd, is an expert - and a producer - of high quality artisanal chocolate. Paolo Barbaro, PhD, has more than 20 years of experience in the tourist industry and has worked with high-standard international travel companies (e.g. Air France, EF Cultural Tours, AOT).  WalkingPalates produces and sells five types of products: Food Walks; Wine Tastings; Food Tours; Cooking Classes; motivational & incentive Food and Wine experiences. Food walks are run daily around lunch and dinner time, in five italian cities: Milan, Naples, Venice, Rome and Florence. They last about 3,5 hours and include stops with sampling in a minimum of six venues carefully chosen for the high standard and representativeness of their food/recipes, as well as for their location and history, to "let clients enjoy the real soul of a city through its food and wine". Wine tastings are of two kinds: short ones that last 3 hours and happen inside a cities, or full-day ones, during which clients are taken to the countriside (e.g. the Chianti region in Tuscany or the Roman Castles close to the Italian capital) in order to visit some of the best local wineries. Food Tours are 7 to 14 days-long trips for small groups that are focused on high-quality food and wine on many aspects: from the production to the tastes, from history to nutritional facts and more. Walking Palates also proposes Cooking Classes from great chefs in different italian cities. Incentives and motivational activities are designed starting from the other products but tailored to the needs of each client. WalkingPalates is a brand owned by the travel company L'Emporio de' Viaggiatori. It operates in twelve Italian cities.

Name: Agenzia Per Amica
Company description: Agenzia per Amica è il marchio con cui Achille Lauro Netravel Srl opera nel settore del turismo come Network di Agenzie di Viaggio. Ad oggi conta 320 Agenzie partner, con un rapporto esclusivo, distribuite nel mezzogiorno d'Italia. Nel 2015 Achille Lauro Netravel s.r.l. viene fondata per sviluppare business nel comparto del mercato turistico italiano ed internazionale. L’ingresso nel settore è avvenuto indirizzando gli investimenti nella creazione di sinergie e modelli economici che ponessero in relazione la piccola impresa turistica, il territorio di appartenenza e i grandi operatori turistici.  Si è consolidato, quindi, uno schema operativo costruito attorno ad una canalizzazione commerciale, capace di redistribuire sulla rete delle imprese un’ampia offerta di prodotto, in grado di intercettare la propensione all’acquisto da parte del cliente finale grazie alle attitudini peculiari dell’agente di vendita nella specifica area geografica.  L’alimentazione della produzione di offerta è stata, quindi, supportata dall’instaurarsi di un rapporto bidirezionale tra unità centrale ed unità periferica in cui, anche quest’ultima, ha partecipato immettendo nell’ampio canale di vendita il prodotto turistico costruito con la sapienza di chi ha piena conoscenza del proprio territorio. Questa dinamica ha favorito l’alto gradimento da parte della clientela che ha ben risposto individuando in queste tipologie di offerta degli aspetti qualitativi di autenticità e di originalità che raramente sono presenti nei cataloghi degli operatori turistici leader di mercato.  Agenzia per Amica si connota come Network di Agenzie di Viaggio (AdV). Con le AdV si stipulano accordi di rete esclusivi in modo che queste ultime possano avvantaggiarsi di eccellenti condizioni commerciali con i Tour Operator, sistemi di trasporto Aereo, Treni, autobus, autonoleggi, assicurazioni, programmi di escursione, crociere e biglietteria navale.

Name: Acquaforte Travel Designer
Company description: Tour Operator and DMC Italy  MICE, Agricultural Travel, Cultural Travel, Luxury Travel, Wedding Planner

Name: TRAFFICANTI DI VIAGGIO Agenzia Di Viaggi E Tour Operator
Company description: Trafficantidiviaggio.com è una nuova concezione di agenzia di viaggio online e Tour Operator con punto vendita dedicato ai clienti.

Name: &Olives Travel
Company description: &Olives Travel is a Dutch tour operator specialized in authentic holidays to Greece, Cyprus, Portugal, Malta, Israel, Italy, Jordan, Morocco and Oman.

Name: Viaggiuniversitari.it | Tour Operator
Company description: viaggiuniversitari.it è un Tour Operator che nasce dall'esperienza dell'Agenzia di Viaggi VIP Conoscere il Mondo, presente nel mondo del turismo da ben 25 anni. Il suo scopo ultimo è valorizzare la socializzazione attraverso il turismo certi che il viaggio sia il momento migliore per far nascere nuovi legami. Si propone come prodotto turistico per giovani in grado di unire i vantaggi e le comodità del web alla professionalità di un Tour Operator: tutte le proposte sono organizzate con cura, offerte al miglior prezzo ed arricchite da un'incisiva assistenza in loco.

Name: Block Travel Agency
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 21 2 Avenida De Francesc Cambó, 08003
Company description: 🚀 Block Travel Corporate Travel Agency specialized in Crypto & Web3 Events We manage corporate travel for Web3 companies, exchanges and blockchain events. Flights, hotels, transfers, and more. All with the flexibility of crypto or fiat payments. Why choose us? ✅ Corporate Travel Management: flights, hotels, transfers, eSIM. ✅ Crypto Payments & Unified Invoicing: BTC, ETH, USDC and more. ✅ Event Travel Partner: official hotel and logistics for Web3 conferences. ✅ 24/7 Human Assistance: dedicated support in every trip. ✅ Sustainable Travel: carbon-neutral journeys. 🌍 Trusted by Merge, LaBitconf, ETH Latam, Panama Blockchain Week, Blockchain Jungle, Cripto Latin Fest. 💡 We empower Web3 companies to travel without borders, combining crypto payments, corporate efficiency and human support 24/7. 🌍 Nuestra Visión: Ser el socio estratégico de confianza para tu empresa, facilitando la expansión de horizontes con soluciones innovadoras y adaptadas al mundo moderno. 📲 Contáctanos: 📧 info@blocktravelagency.com 📱 +34 653 615 805

Name: River Cruise Europe
Company description: River Cruise Europe is a community for all organizations who are working in the River Cruise business in Northern & Atlantic Europe. Not only ports, but also Cruise Lines, Destination Management Companies, Service Providers and Cruise Clubs are invited to join our community. We started in March 2019 as an independent self-supportive daughter of Cruise Europe.  Our goal is to create a platform for business partners who are willing to invest in this community by sharing their knowledge. We will welcome organizations who are committed to contribute to this platform by enabling co-operation and interaction between ports, cruise lines, tour operators, destinations, DMC’s and cruise clubs.

Name: Happy Travel
Company description: Agenzia di Viaggi e Tour Operator. Happy Travel nasce dall'unione tra una lunga e consolidata esperienza nel settore dei trasporti e una smisurata passione per i viaggi. Si avvale di un team giovane e qualificato, per adeguarsi al continuo mutamento del settore turismo. Tutti i prodotti Happy Travel sono acquistabili anche direttamente online sul sito internet www.happy-travel.it SERVIZI -  Viaggi incoming -  Viaggi outgoing - Prenotazione noleggio bus di linea - Lista nozze - Vendita pacchetti turistici dei migliori Tour Operator del mondo - Vendita crociere  - Biglietteria autorizzata ferroviaria, marittima, aerea e di bus di linea - Organizzazione eventi turistico-culturali - Agenzia online

Name: Sto Gran Tour
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Puerto Del Rosario, 11 Calle Vascongadas, 35600
Company description: Sto Gran Tour è la prima Travel BOOM Factory, una realtà che unisce tutte le caratteristiche di una Casa di Produzione Cinematografica ed Agenzia Creativa, alle attività di un Tour Operator. Un concetto nuovo ed unico nel panorama italiano, che sta rivoluzionando il mondo del Tour Operating e dei contenuti multimediali. La Travel Boom Factory è un laboratorio nel quale si combinano creatività, contenuti multimedia e partecipazione attiva degli utenti, dando vita al circolo virtuoso per un turismo innovativo.

Name: Herget Representation & Networking GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Seligenstadt, 12 An Der Pfingstweide, 63500
Company description: Herget Representation & Networking GmbH provides flexible options on a monthly fee basis for sales & marketing representation comprising the following services: Developing marketing & sales strategies Marketing channel management & multichannel promotion solutions Travel distribution channel management Hotel and destination marketing planning Brand strategy alignment Customer relationship management & segmentation processes Benchmarking & market penetration strategies Developing product innovation & diversification strategies General management advisory services Revenue management & pricing strategies The success of Herget Representation & Networking GmbH is based on long-term experiences and a broad market knowledge, backed up by its unique network of high end tour operators, wholesalers, travel and event agencies to ensure an optimal product positioning to maximise the return for the product placed on target markets in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Benelux (Belgium, The Netherlands, Luxembourg) and Scandinavia. Our service is tailor-made and starts with detailed research works. In order to create a strategic plan, first of all, we identify the needs of our customers. Coherence, a common sense, innovation and values are our holistic main guidelines Herget Representation & Networking GmbH stands for candor, honesty and loyalty within their working relationships with all their business partners. Characteristic of our work is a very fast reaction time on market chances and other external factors. An efficient performance of our partner's and client's needs is most important to us. This is only possible when we consider all needs of all involved parties. Our service is affected by creativity, concentration, constructiveness and expertise - we also pursue extraordinary approachs. Transparency is important. We set a high value on internal communication and frequent verbal staff communication.

Name: Karawane Reisen GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: Karawane ist Reiseveranstalter für Individualreisen, Studienreisen & Erlebnisreisen, Kreuzfahrten und Sondergruppen. Seit über 70 Jahren finden Sie bei Karawane erlebnisreiche Reisen weltweit, hochwertig und sorgfältig ausgearbeitet.

Name: Miller Incoming GmbH
Company description: Miller Incoming GmbH Miller Incoming is a renowned German tour operator (DMC) with over 30 years of experience, specializing in destinations across Germany, Austria, and Switzerland. With a focus on North and South American, Canadian, Spanish, and Portuguese markets, the company offers a broad spectrum of services for both individual travelers (FITs) and groups. Their offerings include custom-designed tours that cater to the specific needs of clients, from initial booking to the completion of the trip. Miller Incoming is committed to providing high-quality customer service, ensuring safety, and offering expert assistance in multiple languages, including English, Spanish, and Portuguese.

Name: The Grand Tour
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 5 Calle Bahía De Pollensa, 28042
Company description: The Grand Tour – Agencia de Viajes recupera el espíritu de los grandes viajeros, que, con su afán por conocer y compartir, son precursores del turismo moderno. Con nosotros podrás descubrir ciudades sorprendentes, culturas milenarias, rutas de aventura, hoteles de ensueño… todo con las mayores garantías y comprobando que estamos a tu lado desde el primer momento y hasta tu vuelta a casa.

Name: Viajes Loreto
Company description: Viajes Loreto es una agencia de viajes situada en Lloret de Mar. Estamos especializados en excursiones, circuitos nacionales e internacionales y cruceros. Nuestras salidas y tarifas son de grupo, y están patrocinadas por nuestro 'sponsor' Don Viaje. Estamos especializados en producto propio fórmula 'ni un euro más', lo que significa que nuestro viajes tienen precio final de venta al público, sin excursiones opcionales/facultativas en los circuitos.

Name: Toms Travel Tours
Company description: Toms Travel Tours is an Amsterdam-based tour operator offering a variety of fun, personable tours of the Netherlands and Belgium. We specialize in organizing private tours on-demand, customized to what you want to see and do - all with that local touch! Tours range from a couple of hours to full-day trips and multiple-day excursions.

Name: Balslev.
Company description: Balslev - tidligere Expert Reiser, ble stiftet i 1984 og registrert som aksjeselskap i 1984, og vi er stolte av å være en familiebedrift med 3. generasjon ansatte i vår stab. Høsten 2023 skiftet vi navn til Balslev og har inkludert sterke merkevarer som Temareiser Fredrikstad, Nordmanns-Reiser, Amerikaspesialisten, Cruisereiser, Discover Norway, Maxpulse, Messereiser i vår familie.  - Vi kaller oss næringslivets turoperatør Vi mener det er viktig å kombinere ideer fra forskjellige deler av bransjen for deretter å tilpasse til andre reisemønstre. Eksempelvis kan betingelser for pakkereiser tilpasses forretningsreisende - til størst mulig fordel for den forretningsreisende. Det skal lønne seg å være kunde hos oss! Det er viktig med lojale og hardtarbeidende samarbeidspartnere som er villig til å gå den nødvendige ekstra milen. Avtaler med slike partnere ligger i kjernen av vår virksomhet. Vårt personale har lang erfaring og vi mestrer mange språk. Vi har moderne tekniske løsninger, kostnadsfritt 24 timers nød-/hastetelefon og konkurransedyktige betingelser. For oss dreier det seg om den totale pakken. Dette kaller vi Travel Management Control (TMC), og kan spare din bedrift for flere tusen kroner. Du er velkommen som kunde!

Auf den Fahrten habt ihr die Möglichkeit viele Studierende kennen zu lernen. Studierende anderer Studiengänge, anderer Herkünfte sowie aus anderen Universitäten. So könnt ihr vieles miteinander austauschen und neue Freundschaften gründen. Auch für Abiturienten, die kommenden Studierenden, ist es eine tolle Gelegenheit Studierende kennenzulernen und Informationen auszutauschen.  Bei allen Fahrten sind wir immer persönlich dabei - vor allem, um die Qualität auf dem Weg (Busse, Fahrer, etc.) und vor Ort ständig zu prüfen, aber auch um mit euch zu reisen und die wunderbaren Städte kennen zu lernen. Die bisherige Reisen haben mit Euch immer sehr viel Spass gemacht und die Teilnehmer waren auch immer begeistert! Wir hoffen, dass ihr auch mit uns viel Spaß haben werdet! Wir freuen uns auf euch!  Viel Spass Euer Studifahrten Team

Name: Storywalking
Company description: We are a Boutique Tour Operator, Benefit Company, with extensive experience in Italy.   We go far beyond the classic images and the overcrowded popular Italian destinations, to enable our customers to immerse themselves in the real vibes of the place, with all their senses.  They can discover the unseen layers of all the cultural and regional traditions, which date back to ancient times in history but are still well alive today.   We carefully design our trips with local experts and only work with local entrepreneurs and businesses while supporting youth employment.  We believe that tourism needs to create real benefits for the destination and our mission is to move together towards local sustainable development through tourism.   We curate all the aspects of the vacation to deliver exceptional quality service, and we are proud to offer detailed pre-trip guidance and 24/7 assistance during the trip.   Our services: * A variety of selected high-standard accommodations (Hotels, Apartments & Private Villas) * Package tour organizations (FIT & small GRPS) * Daily tours organizations * Tour guide in English, French, German, and Spanish * Transfer services (Luxury cars, Minivans) * Luxury tailor-made services

We experience everything we recommend. We have entered the heart of Papua New Guinea and going paragliding over the Musandam Peninsula. We have been exploring the Antarctica many times and been sleeping in the South Pole. We will fly to the North Pole in a Hybrid Air Vehicle, also to Space: We are Virgin Galactic Accredited Space Agents and Future Astronauts!!!  Because we are not a travel agency, we are an agency of travelers.

DGV Travel è un tour operator con un profilo “Tailor Made” e la sua mission è di costruire soluzioni di viaggio personalizzate per una clientela che avanza specifiche richieste. Elementi distintivi, oggetto di una costante ricerca quotidiana, sono la cura dei particolari, legata alle esigenze del viaggiatore, la sicurezza durante il soggiorno e l’affidabilità nel proporre i servizi. Attraverso il suo innovativo portale www.dgvtravel.com permette al cliente di esprimere le sue richieste di viaggio in modo interattivo o poter visionare proposte già elaborate. DGV Travel è specializzato nella realizzazione di viaggi esclusivi e su misura in Asia, Medio Oriente, Oceano Indiano e Americhe

Name: Overland Network Srl

Company description: Overland Network è un'azienda italiana attiva in due settori; Produzione di Documentari e Tour Operator. Questa pagina LinkedIn si riferisce al nostro Tour Operator. il primo tour operator italiano nella storia a diffondere in Italia il concetto di viaggio-trekking in giro per il mondo. Dal 1967 esploriamo i paesi più incredibili della Terra e ci accompagniamo gruppi di Italiani appassionati della scoperta. Ci siamo affermati subito nel settore del viaggio d'avventura e, nel corso degli anni, abbiamo acquisito esperienza da Il Jet e la Montagna, Alpinismus International e Trekking International, ereditando la passione di Beppe Tenti, fondatore del tour operator e ideatore del format televisivo di documentario di viaggio "Overland", in onda su RAI1 dal 1995. La nuova gestione dell'azienda, guidata da Filippo Tenti, figlio di Beppe, porta migliaia di appassionati alla scoperta degli angoli più remoti e affascinanti del pianeta, da veri viaggiatori sfruttando i contatti e l'esperienza maturata sia dal tour operator ma anche dalla produzione del più famoso programma di viaggi televisivi in onda su Rai 1 chiamato Overland.

Name: Streaty Street Food Tours Of Italy
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Palermo, 93 Via Principe Di Belmonte, 90139
Company description: We run street food and local market walking tours designed for curious travelers and foodies. Everything is Made in Italy at Streaty.  Made in Italy Tour Operator. Made in Italy tour guides. And of course, all selected dishes offered on our tours belong to the Italian tradition.  Sustainability is what we count on. All our tours are plastic free. We only gather small groups because we don't want to bring a negative impact to locals' daily life and work.  Our mission is to save traditional street food stalls and family-run business. Our will passion is about making travelers FEEL and EXPERIENCE Italy. All staff is well trained as professional guides and food experts. And most important thing, we love our land and we love meeting new friends to take around and have cheerful toasts with! This is what we call the Streaty style!

Travels and excursions are suitable for any level, and you will be always guided by professionals of the outdoor activity choosen, leading you on the best trails according to your experience and fitness. Grazie a una profonda conoscenza del territorio e a partner fidati, realizziamo itinerari unici in Africa meridionale e orientale, con nuove mete in Algeria, Mauritania e Senegal. Perché scegliere noi:     Conoscenza diretta e pluriennale del territorio     Itinerari su misura per esigenze specifiche     Gestione logistica affidabile e assistenza continua     Supporto rapido e professionale per clienti e partner B2B     Elevati standard di sicurezza e qualità     Turismo responsabile, attento a comunità locali e conservazione Collaboriamo con agenzie di viaggio, tour operator e aziende per offrire soluzioni di viaggio di alta qualità e curate nei minimi dettagli. Think You Know Africa? Think Again! Since 2005, Mokoro Tours has specialized in tailor-made and group trips across Africa, creating authentic and safe experiences beyond the usual safari clichés. With deep local expertise and trusted partners, we craft unique itineraries in Southern and Eastern Africa, plus new routes in Algeria, Mauritania, and Senegal. Why Choose Us:     Direct, on-the-ground expertise     Tailor-made itineraries for specific needs     Reliable logistics and continuous support     Fast, professional assistance for clients and B2B partners     High safety and quality standards     Responsible tourism focused on local communities and conservation We collaborate with travel agencies, tour operators, and businesses to deliver high-quality, detail-oriented travel solutions.

Name: Desartica Adventures

L’azienda nasce nel 2006 con l’obiettivo di permettere ai propri Clienti di raggiungere alcuni dei luoghi tra i più remoti al mondo, non solo da turisti, ma anche da viaggiatori. La missione dell'Agenzia è garantire un’esperienza immersiva e coinvolgente, il Cliente e il proprio veicolo devono essere i protagonisti del viaggio in prima persona.  Viaggiare con Desartica significa esplorare il mondo seguendo le proprie passioni. I molti format proposti, tra cui anche i trekking, sono studiati per adattarsi al meglio alle esigenze del Cliente. La formula fly&drive permette al viaggiatore di raggiungere le destinazioni e noleggiare il mezzo direttamente in loco. Desartica Adventures propone anche una sezione dedicata alle aziende e ai loro dipendenti: •	viaggi incentive •	formazione •	eventi outdoor L’azienda potrà usufruire di location inedite e fuori dal comune, in cui il team potrà lasciarsi ispirare e dare spazio alla creatività.

Les plus de OSS Barcelone : notre accueil francophone ainsi que notre présence sur place pendant votre séjour !

Name: Club Magellano
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Tavazzano Con Villavesco, 14 Via Bagnolo, 26838
Company description: Club Magellano nasce nel 2006 da un’idea di Alessandro Fico… da un’idea o da un sogno…quello di creare una realtà che riuscisse a regalare momenti di gioia, momenti di serenità, momenti da ricordare e da conservare nel cassetto della memoria. Il sogno era quello di fondere il lavoro con la passione, e fare delle passioni un lavoro; il sogno di tutti non è d’altra parte passare più tempo possibile a fare le cose che amiamo fare, e buttare meno tempo possibile per le cose che “dobbiamo” fare…? Basta solo capire cosa amiamo, cosa ci piace fare, cosa non ci peserà mai… e qui ognuno dice la sua… Personalmente? Viaggiare, vedere posti nuovi, conoscere sempre gente nuova, venire a contatto con culture diverse, talvolta opposte, avere un mare di amici, giocare a calcio, guardare il calcio, fare sport in generale, stare il più possibile a contatto con la natura, sciare, prendere il sole, fare l’amore, fare teatro, andare a teatro… E’ questo che rispondiamo a chi chiede cos’è il Club Magellano, viaggi, raduni, tornei, feste, cene, teatro, un ritrovo con amici, e tutto quello che ci verrà in mente di fare domattina al nostro risveglio… un Club di sognatori. Possiamo dire che quel sogno è diventato una realtà affermata nel panorama turistico nazionale, grazie infatti agli oltre 30.000 clienti all’anno Club Magellano copre un ruolo da assoluto protagonista nel panorama dei Tour Operator specializzati in viaggi in bus e gruppi. Anni di esperienza, uno staff giovane, preparato, capace di cambiare e di rimettersi in gioco quotidianamente con le sfide che il mercato ci pone, sensibile alle esigenze delle persone, disponibile per ogni tipo di assistenza pre, durante e post viaggio, un parco pullman di proprietà, una rete commerciale fittissima…e ancora, dopo anni, tanta passione…ecco alcuni degli ingredienti del nostro successo.

Name: Polish Chamber Of Tourism

Its mission is to enhance the development of tourism by fostering collaboration among its members, which include travel agencies, tour operators, and various stakeholders in the tourism sector. The chamber aims to promote best practices, advocate for favorable policies, and facilitate networking opportunities within the industry. With a diverse membership base and numerous regional branches, PIT serves as a vital resource for professionals seeking to navigate the evolving landscape of tourism. The organization is committed to ensuring that Poland remains a competitive and attractive destination for both domestic and international travelers.

Name: PATA-Norway
Company description: PACIFIC ASIA TRAVEL ASSOCIATION – a world-wide organization PATA is a “non-profit” organization founded in Hawaii in 1951, currently with its HQ in Bangkok.  The PATA region is comprised of 43 countries; from Pakistan and India in the east, across Asia and the Pacific, and to the North American west coast. PATA’s principal aim is to promote tourism and travel to these areas and to increase the travel trade’s knowledge of the world’s fastest growing tourist market. PATA strives to find and maintain a balance between the promotion of economic growth through tourism and to the preservation of nature and cultural identity of the region. Currently, over 100 national and local tourist organizations, 55 airlines and cruise companies and several thousand participants in the travel trade are PATA members. PATA HQ issues publications and organizes workshops, fairs and other relevant activities. For more information see PATA’s official web site www.pata.org PATA CHAPTERS The organization’s interests are otherwise maintained by the increasing amount of local member associations spread around the whole world; PATA Chapters. The Norway Chapter is one of over 70 chapters with a total of over 17,000 members in the travel trade.  PATA NORWAY CHAPTER PATA Norway was established in 1992 and today has a total of 150 members amongst the country’s travel agents, tour operators, airlines and national tourist offices.  PATA Norway primarily works with offering important and relevant information on development within the PATA region (destinations, products, events), as well as organization of member activities, such as study trips, seminars, workshops and other events. For the latest news and updates, please sign up for out monthly newsletter at www.pata.no NORDIC CHAPTERS PATA Denmark www.pata.dk PATA Sweden www.patasweden.se PATA Finland www.patafinland.org

Name: AMG Experiences GmbH
Company description: The AMG Driving Academy unites the unique AMG Performance with unforgettable experiences in the most beautiful locations in Europe. We will show you driving pleasure, lifestyle and motorsport in their purest form. AMG is a registered trademark of Daimler AG and is used under license from AMG Experiences GmbH.

Name: Lake Como Tourism
Company description: We are the Online Travel Guide to Lake Como and its surroundings since 2011.  Our website, rich in contents and subjects, is easy to use, intuitive and available in three languages: Italian, English and Russian. It offers updated contents and news to share, also by comments and reviews. Visitors can find all the useful information for a perfect holiday on Lake Como: sites of interest and itineraries, events and news and information about hospitality, transports, restaurants and shops.   Our target is anyone who want to know and experience our beautiful region. We offer to our clients various types of tours and unique experience. Lake Como Tourism provides assistance and works with accommodation facilities, companies and travel agencies that need ancillary tourist services like tours and activities for individuals and groups, guided visits, tickets for museums, transfer services, restaurants and locations for meetings and events. Our mission is the enhancement of our territory, through information and the development of activities and initiatives that can contribute to the promotion of the tourist system of Lake Como, in full respect of the values of this place, people and the environment.

Name: Thabela Travel
Company description: Thabela Travel är specialist på rundresor med svensk guide till länder med spännande natur och kultur. Thabela betyder på det sydafrikanska språket sotho ”någon som bringar glädje”. Vår förhoppning är att på våra rundresor binga glädje genom nya kunskaper, upplevelser och bekantskaper. Thabela Travel är en researrangör som anordnar kvalitetsresor med personlig prägel. Våra säljare och producenter har god kunskap och lång erfarenhet från länderna de arbetar med. Hotell, restauranger och utflykter är noggrant utvalda. Våra guider är professionella med imponerande kunskap och gedigen erfarenhet från platserna. Vi vill med all rätt vara stolta över våra produkter. Vår målsättning är att producera marknadens bästa rundresor med svensk guide.

Name: Rutas Meigas Travel Agency
HQ Location: Spain, Galicia, Santiago De Compostela, 16 Bajo B Rua Lisboa, 15707
Company description: En Rutas Meigas creamos  experiencias únicas para peregrinos  que desean recorrer el Camino de Santiago y viajeros que quieran explorar el norte de España y Portugal. Desde nuestra fundación en 1998, hemos diseñado y organizado excursiones y rutas turísticas a medida para viajes individuales y en grupo.   Nuestro principal objetivo es garantizar que cualquier viaje sea una experiencia mágica y se disfrute sin preocupaciones:   1. 	Contamos con un teléfono de emergencias 24 horas en español, inglés, alemán e italiano. 2. 	Estamos ubicados en Santiago de Compostela, the place to be para conocer mejor que nadie lo que hacemos. 3. 	Nuestra forma de trabajar está basada en la honestidad. 4. 	Flexibilidad para hacer la ruta según las preferencias de nuestros peregrinos y viajeros.   Como agencia minorista mayorista online (XG-500), ofrecemos  servicios tanto a clientes finales como a otras agencias de viajes nacionales e internacionales. También organizamos viajes para empresas que quieran realizar viajes de negocios, incentivos, conferencias y reuniones.   Nos enorgullece ser la primera agencia de viajes de Galicia en ofrecer excursiones personalizadas para grupos pequeños de 2 a 8 personas. Desde 1999 también hemos incluido el ENOTURISMO en nuestras rutas por Galicia. Además, en el año 2000, fuimos una de las primeras empresas en apoyar a los peregrinos del Camino de Santiago.   Nuestro radio de acción es cada vez mayor y contamos con más de 30 rutas en Galicia, lo que nos convierte en especialistas y conocedores de los lugares más espectaculares que se pueden visitar, donde la cultura, la naturaleza y la gastronomía se fusionan de manera excepcional.

Desde 1994 já criámos e implementámos centenas de projetos por todo o mundo. Valori aziendali Miglioramento continuo: Vogliamo crescere ogni giorno in termini di competenze e professionalità, innovando prodotti e processi, al fine di garantire maggiori risultati e benefici alla crescita generale dell'azienda. Sicurezza: Garantiamo massima affidabilità nei confronti dell’azienda, dei clienti e dei fornitori. Svolgiamo tutte le azioni necessarie per assicurare il backup di tutte le attività, la protezione dei dati e la trasparenza delle informazioni. Responsabilità: Siamo consapevoli dell’importanza del nostro lavoro. Agiamo con la massima collaborazione e onestà, garantendo puntualità e reperibilità. Ci impegniamo ad assumere un comportamento giusto ed equo, che tenga conto delle ripercussioni economiche, sociali e ambientali del nostro operato. Orientamento al risultato: Lavoriamo con costanza e perseveranza per raggiungere gli obiettivi programmati, elaborando strategie e tecniche efficaci, studiando nuovi scenari e nuove opportunità.

Name: Kompas Budapest DMC
Company description: Welcome to KOMPAS Budapest DMC, your premier partner for destination management services in Budapest and throughout Hungary. With over 25 years of experience in the industry, we are committed to providing exceptional and reliable services for travel agencies and their clients. At KOMPAS Budapest DMC, we specialize in curating unforgettable travel experiences by leveraging our extensive network of local suppliers. We offer a wide range of products and services to meet the diverse needs of our partners: Transfer Services: Seamless and comfortable transportation solutions for individuals and groups, ensuring a smooth journey from arrival to departure Hotel Bookings: Access to a variety of accommodations, from luxury hotels to cozy boutique stays, tailored to fit any preference and budget Dining Experiences: Reservations at top restaurants offering exquisite local and international cuisine, perfect for any occasion Museum Tickets & Entrances: Easy access to Budapest's rich cultural heritage with pre-arranged tickets to museums and other attractions Customized Programs: Unique and engaging activities designed to showcase the best of Budapest and Hungary, from guided tours to special events Whether you're looking for comprehensive travel packages that include hotels, transfers, and programs, or specific individual services KOMPAS Budapest DMC has you covered. Our expertise extends to both group travel and individual guests. Join us in creating memorable journeys and exceptional experiences in Budapest and beyond. With a legacy of over 25 years, KOMPAS Budapest DMC is your reliable choice for destination management in Hungary.

Name: Accessible Romania By Sano Touring
Company description: Driven by the desire to put Romania on the map of tourism for people with disabilities, we created Accessible Romania by Sano Touring, a travel agency that makes adventure and discovery accessible for all of us. We had patience, perseverance and confidence that we are on the right track and confirmation came from both partners and tourists. With each tourist we welcome at Otopeni Airport in Bucharest or elsewhere in the country, we learn something new about accessible tourism – a special, challenging and rewarding field.

Name: Travel Specialist Group Oy - Risteilykeskus
Company description: Travel Specialist Group Oy (TSG) on vuonna 1992 perustettu, vakavarainen ja nopeasti kehittyvä yksityinen suomalainen matkanjärjestäjä. TSG:n operoimia vapaa-ajan matkailubrändejä ovat Suomessa Risteilykeskus ja Saga Matkat, Ruotsissa Kryssningscenter ja Vega Resor sekä Tanskassa Krydstogtcenter. Risteilykeskus on vuonna 2015 perustettu risteilyiden asiantuntija ja Suomen suurin kansainvälisiin risteilyihin keskittynyt matkatoimisto. Yhteistyökumppaneinamme on yli 30 risteilyvarustamoa, joiden mukana pääset risteilemään kaikille maailman merille. Varausmoottoristamme löydät yli 20 000 kansainvälistä risteilyä ympäri maailman muun muassa Karibialla, Välimerellä, Norjan vuonoilla, Euroopan joilla ja Aasiassa. Saga Matkat on erikoistunut Islannin ja arktisten matkojen tuotantoon. Lisäksi tarjoamme laajan valikoiman risteilyjä sekä muun muassa F1-kisamatkoja. Saga Matkat on perustettu vuonna 1992. -- Travel Specialist Group Ltd is a privately owned, Helsinki-based, well-established Finnish tour operator and a travel agency. The company was founded in 1992. Travel Specialist Group has offices in Helsinki, Stockholm, Copenhagen and Tallinn.  We are operating the following leisure travel brands:  Risteilykeskus (Cruise Center) and Sagat Matkat (Saga Tours) in Finland, Kryssningscenter (Cruise Center) and Vega Resor (Vega Tours) in Sweden and KrydstogtCenter (Cruise Center) in Denmark. Risteilykeskus is a full-service cruise specialist travel agency and tour operator with largest selection of cruises in the Finnish market. The staff has vast experience of the cruise business. Risteilykeskus offers cruises around the world on all seas and most rivers. The brand has been offering tours for the Finnish market since 2015. Risteilykeskus is currently (2019) the biggest cruise agency in Finland. Saga Matkat - Saga Tours offers a wide selection of leisure tours to Iceland and arctic destinations. The brand has been offering tours for Finnish market since 1992.

Name: Piroth.kommunikation GmbH
Company description: Als Tourismus Marketing- und PR-Agentur planen und realisieren wir mit unserem Team aus begeisterten und begeisternden Touristik- und Medienexperten seit über 10 Jahren strategische Marketing- und PR-Maßnahmen mit Leidenschaft und Fachkenntnis. So zählen namhafte Destinationen, Hotels, Ferienhausanbieter, Reiseveranstalter, touristische Internetportale und branchennahe Produkte zu unseren Referenzen. Kurze Kommunikationswege, der hohe persönliche Einsatz und die individuelle Kunde-Agentur-Beziehung zeichnen uns als Agentur aus. So ermöglichen wir eine kreative, unkomplizierte und Kosten-Nutzen-orientierte Realisierung der Ziele unserer Kunden. Bei uns spielen ein gutes Agenturklima sowie ein motivierendes Arbeitsumfeld eine große Rolle. Das harmonische Miteinander und die Freude an der Arbeit bilden nach unserem Verständnis die Basis für ein kreatives und erfolgreiches Schaffen. Hierbei gehören der hohe persönliche Einsatz jedes Einzelnen, eine gesunde Portion Humor und die familiäre Atmosphäre zu den Grundpfeilern unseres starken Zusammenhalts im Team. Im offenen und konstruktiven Austausch untereinander und mit unseren Kunden setzen wir auf eine ehrliche, transparente und faire Zusammenarbeit auf Augenhöhe. Wir arbeiten und leben wertebewusst, was ebenso ein nachhaltiges Wirtschaften im Bereich Energieversorgung sowie das Wahrnehmen unserer sozialen Verantwortung miteinschließt. Das Freistellen von Mitarbeitern für ehrenamtliches Engagement sowie kostenlose PR- und Marketingbetreuung für soziale Projekte und Vereine sind daher für uns eine Selbstverständlichkeit. Flexibel und verantwortungsbewusst für Kunde und Mitarbeiter gestalten wir die Vereinbarkeit von Familie und Beruf, die für uns einen wichtigen Stellenwert hat.

Name: The MARITIME CONSULTING GROUP Spain

Company description: Consultores - Asesores de empresas / Consejeros  Transport Advisors & Shipping Consultants / General Management Especializados en planteamiento e implantación de Procesos de Management Estratégico, definición y reestructuración de Unidades Estratégicas de Negocio, y Gestión de empresas.   Consejeros y cofundadores de varias sociedades relacionadas con la industria del Transporte (transporte de mercancías, y transporte de pasajeros), el sector de la Logística (logística de almacenamiento, y logística de distribución), y el sector turístico (líneas marítimas metropolitanas de interés turístico, agencias de viajes, receptivos, etc).  + 25 años de experiencia profesional en el sector del transporte (desde 1987). Specialized in approach and implementation of Strategic Management Processes, definition and restructuring of Strategic Business Units (SBU), and General Management.  Directors/Advisors and cofounders of several companies related to the Transportation industry (cargo freight, and passenger transport), Logistics (warehousing, distribution, surface transport), and the Tourism sector (metropolitan/touristic shipping lines, travel agencies, tour-operators, etc). Over 25 years of professional experience in the transport sector (since 1987).
