Name: CMM S.a.s. Di Redaelli Elisabetta Ed Eleonora & C.
HQ Location: Italy, Monza E Della Brianza, Usmate Velate, 11 Corso Italia, 20865
Company description: L’Italia è un Paese che pullula di arte, cultura e storia. Dovunque vada, il visitatore rimane incantato dalle sue bellezze, molte volte testimoni di un passato glorioso, altre simbolo di una rinnovata modernità. È quindi un vanto, oltre che una grande responsabilità, promuovere questo enorme patrimonio ed è molto importante che le nuove tecnologie ci supportino in questa “missione” mettendo a disposizione strumenti adeguati per consentirci di far conoscere le bellezze del nostro Paese al resto del mondo. La nostra azienda è specializzata nella vendita di sistemi wireless per tour operator: - Radioguida COBRA "Cicero" - Audioguida COBRA "Virgilio" - Audioguida COBRA "Omero" I prodotti professionali a marchio COBRA dedicati al settore degli operatori turistici rappresentano una risposta semplice, funzionale e competitiva alle diverse esigenze di comunicazione verso gruppi di visitatori: per esempio, quando si deve accompagnare un gruppo in un museo o in una chiesa, dove è necessario mantenere basso il tono di voce, oppure in un luogo ampio, aperto e rumoroso, dove è invece necessario gridare per farsi sentire da tutti. Questi prodotti offrono numerose possibilità di utilizzo in quanto consentono la trasmissione audio senza fili da uno Speaker ad un gruppo di visitatori scegliendo la combinazione di apparecchi ideale per le proprie esigenze: dimensione del gruppo, presenza di più gruppi contemporaneamente, tipologia di viaggio/trasporto, modalità di ricarica degli apparecchi, etc.  Oltre agli impieghi nel settore turistico, i sistemi COBRA trovano svariate applicazioni anche in altri ambiti come visite aziendali, traduzioni simultanee, laboratori linguistici, sale conferenze, scuole sportive (sci, equitazione, etc.) o gite scolastiche.

Name: Židana Marela d.o.o.
Company description: Židana Marela was born when a few Slovenian guides experienced a typical Greek evening program and we thought to ourselves, why not do this in Slovenia? Once we returned to Ljubljana we launched the Traditional Slovenian evenings and later formed Židana Marela, meaning “the jolly umbrella”. This new formed company allowed each of us to play to our strengths: Tomaž with his myriad of ideas & love of music, Luka with his passion for photography and Miha’s expertise in business and public relations. Once we got rolling, an explosion of new ideas and new connections allowed us to expand our offerings and our team. Dragana, previously a tour operator for 10 years, wanted a chance to show off Slovenia and joined us to work on incoming tourism. Andrew, an American with an insatiable taste and curiosity for the Balkans, was brought into the fold, relocating all the way from Seattle. And the energy from Zidana has continued to attract others wanting to work with Zidana. We now offer many specialized travel products: from traditional Slovenian evenings and culture shows to photography tours, food & wine tours from stag parties to short trips and we’re still expanding.

Name: Romtour
Company description: Romtour staat voor reizen in Roemenië. Wij zijn een klein en enthousiast reisbureau met een passie voor Roemenië. Wij bieden reizen op maat. Voor iedereen. Een actieve wandelvakantie, een mooie fietstocht of een compleet georganiseerde Fly & Drive met de nadruk op cultuur en steden. Romtour verzorgt reizen in Roemenië voor één persoon of een hele groep, in de zomer én de winter. Persoonlijke wensen staan altijd voorop. Romtour ziet de mogelijkheden van Roemenië, met haar prachtige natuur en cultuur, en die delen we graag.

Name: Taxon Foundation
Company description: Taxon Foundation runs community projects with the best biodiversity experts for nature education and conservation. Our aim is to work with community groups, schoolchildren, and citizen scientists and to run field courses and research projects, with a special focus on insects and other tiny creatures. We started as the non-profit branch of scientific travel agency Taxon Expeditions, which organises real scientific expeditions all over the world for non-scientists.

Name: Webprint S.p.A.
Company description: Webprint è un industria grafica che offre un servizio completo ai propri clienti per la produzione di prodotti stampati destinati alle principali società italiane ed estere sia editoriali che della grande distribuzione (Gdo), così come per le maggiori agenzie pubblicitarie, banche, assicurazioni, tour operators.

Name: Ferdeghini Comunicazione Srl
Company description: Ferdeghini Comunicazione è un’agenzia di pubbliche relazioni, comunicazione e marketing.  I suoi campi d’azione sono travel (hotellerie, vettori aerei, imbarcazioni, tour operator, enti, distribuzione, tecnologia, associazioni di categoria), dove ha maturato una pluriennale specializzazione, luxury e food.  Offre attività di media relation, ufficio stampa, organizzazione eventi, servizi editoriali, operazioni di co-marketing e social media marketing, pianificazioni media, digital PR.  Opera in smart working e ha un approccio integrato per potenziare la visibilità sui media e i risultati commerciali delle aziende con cui collabora.

Name: Travter
Company description: We want to change the way of traveling that needs a fresh perspective. We are driven by socio-economic changes. The oldest travel agencies are collapsing. Sharing trend is becoming stronger and more present in different areas of our lives. Global brands that have revolutionized the world are our role models. Our motivation is love for travel and passion for innovation.

Name: Lastminute Tour
Company description: Lastminute tour is the Slovak online travel agency that provides information about holiday and tour packages, transportation, and hotel booking services. The company is based in Bratislava, Slovakia. For more information about us check website: www.lastminutetour.sk ______________________________________ Lastminute tour je slovenská internetová cestovná agentúra poskytujúca informácie o dovolenkách, cestovných balíčkov, dopravy a rezerváciu hotelov. Firma má sídlo v Bratislave na Slovensku. Pre viac informácii o nás návštívte internetovú stránku: www.lastminutetour.sk

Name: Apulia Bike Tours
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, San Vito Dei Normanni
Company description: Apulia Bike Tours is a company based in San Vito dei Normanni, Puglia.  We are a tour operator specialized in walking and cycling tours in Puglia and Basilicata 🚲☀️

Name: V Social Foundation
Company description: V Social Foundation started operating in 2001 under the name of viSozial by an initiative of members of the tour operator Viventura (https://www.viventura.de/). viSozial e.V. was officially founded in 2005 to work independently and effectively. In 2008 our NGO received the recognition of charitable status from the responsible tax office and fiscal authorities in Germany.  In 2016 we changed the focus of our statute together with a rebranding. Since 2017 V Social Foundation exclusively supports community projects worldwide. The Foundation wants to help communities to develop a sustainable community strategy and/or supporting them e.g. financially in different aspects (official guide trainings, etc). The aim is to help projects to benefit from sustainable tourism. Therefore, we do not only support with money, more important in the knowledge transfer.  We only support communities that want to establish sustainable tourism in their community by self-motivation.  Our mission: We create powerful connections between people and their territories to foster the autonomy and well-being of communities. Our promises:   Impact Every cent of your donation counts. Which is why we only select projects where your donation can have a significant impact on the community's development. Transparency Follow the money. Find out exactly how your donation is used. You can even visit community projects for yourself and see how your donation directly benefits the community.  Connection Join the movement. Become part of the VSocial community, choose a project to support, receive regular progress reports, and take part in defining objectives. Autonomy The community decides. We support communities in finding their own sustainable solutions, so that they remain self-determining and can thrive long into the future.

Name: Cruise2Go
Company description: Cruise2Go was founded in 2008 and specializes in river cruises on European rivers. The company runs MS Leonora which is a 4-star river cruise ship with room for 138 passengers. The ship with it’s English and Scandinavian speaking cruise manager, operates primarily on the rivers Mosel and Rhine and secondarily on the river Danube. Cruise2Go offer B2B allotments on MS Leonora to tour operators worldwide.

Name: Sailing Challenge
Company description: Sailing Challenge, agenzia specializzata in regate ed eventi velici per le aziende dal 2001, nasce dalla lunga esperienza del suo staff nell'organizzazione di eventi, nelle fiere del settore Mice, nel turismo nautico e yacht charter.    Con oltre 8.000 ospiti imbarcati, Sailing Challenge organizza regate ed eventi velici per aziende in tutta Italia e all’estero. La regata velica supporta straordinariamente l'evento  "leisure", “incentive” o “formativo” e regala elementi non convenzionali, adrenalinici e di esclusività che lasceranno ai partecipanti un ricordo positivo ed entusiastico. La durata degli eventi Sailing Challenge varia a seconda delle esigenze del cliente, dalla mezza giornata a tre giorni di evento. Vengono utilizzate barche a vela da 7 a 30 metri, dalle più confortevoli, alle più tecniche fino a quelle da regata pura, scelte accuratamente in base agli obiettivi dell'evento e alle necessità del cliente. Il nostro staff e i nostri skipper sono preparati e formati per gestire persone inesperte di vela, soprattutto mai salite in barca, assistendole nel vincere le resistenze e perplessità iniziali, e per coinvolgerle velocemente nel ruolo attivo durante tutta la regata. Sailing Challenge si rivolge ad agenzie di organizzazione di eventi, PCO, Meeting Planners, Incentive House, Agenzie di Consulenze, Agenzie di PR, Marketing e Agenzie di Comunicazione, Agenzie Viaggi, DMC e Tour Operator, Agenzie di Pubblicità, Agenzie di Eventi Speciali ma anche direttamente ad Aziende di qualunque settore merceologico. "E' sempre un piacere lavorare con il team di Sailing Challenge perché alla indiscussa competenza sugli eventi velici, offre passione e creatività, un mix che li rende unici nel loro settore. La creatività di Sailing Challenge genera un vulcano di proposte originali, segno di una squadra che ha ben compreso il concetto di partnership con il cliente e con le agenzie" Fabio Albanese - Presidente Action Brand s.r.l.

Name: ADANNA LUXURY TRAVEL
HQ Location: Romania, Timiş, Timişoara, Nr. 5 Str. Ion Ghica, 300172
Company description: The Bastour specializes in tours in Romania , its decades of experience and many successes mean that we are one of the leading tour operators Romanians regarding guided tours and visits to the most important places in Romania . Our success is made by your reviews that help us to improve and to always be there for your every need . People in BasTour are the most important resource in order to offer the best service. Young people , in particular , are one of the keys to our success and that is why we invest a lot in terms of training and career paths to ensure continued development for our talents . In addition to training on the job , our people are regularly involved in training sessions in the areas of management , specialist - functional linguistics and computer science . To become a part of our tour operator contact .

Name: Sole Blu
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Palermo, 7 Via Isidoro La Lumia, 90139
Company description: Sole Blu, Tour Operator e Professional Congress Organizer, apre i battenti nel 1997 a Palermo da un’idea di Margherita Perricone intesa a creare una società dinamica nella promozione del prodotto “Sicilia”, come destinazione congressuale e incentive. Il risultato? Itinerari ed eventi tailor made grazie a una profonda conoscenza del territorio siciliano e di tutte le sue straordinarie risorse oltre alla capacità di saper fornire una gamma completa di servizi con standard eccellenti, contando su personale altamente qualificato e prestando la massima attenzione ai dettagli. È necessaria un'attenzione speciale per raggiungere l'unico scopo che conta, ovvero la soddisfazione del cliente: per Sole Blu ogni evento deve essere curato in ogni dettaglio e in accordo ai budget della committenza. Una particolarità: oltre a essere il partner ideale per qualsiasi tipologia di evento, Sole Blu spicca nel panorama dell’Ecm in quanto è anche Provider ECM. Quanto ai viaggi incentive nell’antica Trinacria, con il supporto globale di Sole Blu è possibile coniugare al meglio gli obiettivi strategici che ogni azienda si propone di raggiungere: un’atmosfera ricca di suggestioni naturali, culturali, storiche e di entertainment, senza perdere di vista la mission del cliente.

Name: La Morra Wine Tours
HQ Location: Italy, Cn, La, 18 Bis Via G. Marconi, 12064
Company description: Welcome to La Morra Luxury Wine Tasting Tours. Name: Detur Norway
Company description: Detur Norway AS en turoperatør som ble etablert i Skandinavia på slutten av 90-tallet. Detur Norway AS er en del av Detur International. Detur driver primært innen segmentet charterreiser og har spesialisert seg på de populære destinasjonene Tyrkia, Hellas, Tunisia, Egypt og Thailand. Selskapet opererer med charterreiser til Tyrkias sydkyst; Antalya, Alanya, Side, Belek, Kemer, Bodrum og Marmaris. Til Hellas flyr vi til Kreta. Ved Tunisias middelhavskyst går våre reiser til Sousse, Monastir og Hammamet. Til Egypt tilbyr vi reiser til Sharm El Sheikh, spesielt i vintersesongen. I Thailand tilbyr vi reiser til Phuket. Alle våre reiser har samme formål; å sørge for at våre kunder får mest mulig for pengene. Med en sterk og dynamisk bakgrunn, og omfattende erfaring, får Detur sin styrke og inspirasjon fra våre kunder. Å gjøre ferier til et gledelig og uforglemmelig minne for livet, har vært Deturs særskilte ambisjon siden firmaets begynnelse.  Det er selvfølgelig også en ære å bli tildelt 3 A, som er den høyeste rangering innenfor kredittanseelse klassifisert av D&B (Dun & Bradstreet), og i tillegg bli gitt Lindorff Topscore sertifikat som viser til et sunt og solid selskap. Dette styrker Deturs kredibilitet i bransjen.

Name: Resecity
Company description: Resecity - Rätt resa till bäst pris Välkommen till Resecity privat- och företagsresor Resecity har bedrivit resebyråverksamhet sedan 1982, med första kontoret i Huddinge/Stockholm. Nu har Resecity tio kontor i Sverige på följande orter: Huddinge/Stockholm, Hudiksvall, Härnösand, Ljusdal, Mora, Motala, Nyköping, Oskarshamn, Söderhamn och Västervik.  Ska du på en privatresa med familjen, vännerna eller idrottsföreningen - kontakta Resecity. Vi säljer allt från charterresor med Ving, Apollo, Solresor, Club Med till specialresor med Swanson's, Lotus och Tour Africa. Bussrundturer med Ölvemarks och Scandorama till Europas vackraste delar. Östersjökryssningar med Birka, Viking Line och Silja/Tallink och längs Norges fjordar med Hurtigruten. Till Medelhavet och Västindien kan vi boka Princess Cruises, MSC Cruises och Royal Caribbean Cruises m.fl. Boka flyg, hotell och hyrbil. Vi skräddarsyr din resa enligt dina önskemål - dit du vill. Weekend i London, Paris, Barcelona, Rom eller New York.  Behöver ditt företag, din organisation, institution, kommun, landsting eller myndighet hjälp med affärs- och konferensresor? Vänd dig till Resecity, vi kan allt om resor och reserelaterade tjänster. Flyg, tåg, båt, bil och hotell – tack vare att Resecity är en fullserviceresebyrå med samtliga biljetträttigheter kan vi hjälpa våra kunder med alla typer av färdmedel. Självklart bokar vi din tjänsteresa både inom Sverige och i utlandet.  Ägna inte onödig arbetstid till att boka resan själv. Låt oss göra jobbet – ni spar både tid och pengar och ni får ett arrangemang där alla delar fungerar. Resecity har kunskapen, de intelligenta systemstöden och de globala samarbetsavtalen som ger dig de bästa rabatterna. Hur litet ditt företag än är så får du alltid samma låga pris som det stora företaget får. Eftersom Resecity är leverantörsoberoende bokar vi alltid den mest effektiva och prisvärda resan för dig. Resecity, din lokala resebyrå med de globala resurserna - för din trygghet!

Name: BRENNA S.r.o. - Cestovní Kancelář
HQ Location: Czech Republic, South Moravian, Brno, 7 Jakubské Nám., 602 00
Company description: Cestovní kancelář BRENNA® byla založena v roce 1992. Její jméno vychází z názvu města Brna na přelomu 11. a 12. století. S Brnem je spojeno i logo kanceláře, kde i přes několik úprav, kterými logo prošlo, zůstává motiv brněnského draka. Od roku 1996 je CK BRENNA® členem Asociace cestovních kanceláří a agentur – AČCKA. V roce 2017 slavíme 25. narozeniny. BRENNA patří k tradičním cestovním kancelářím, které si vydobyly a následně i obhájily své místo na českém trhu. Klienti nás vyhledávají opakovaně. Věří našim zkušenostem. Jsme pro ně zárukou kvality. Na druhé straně si však připadáme stále mladí, nebojíme se zkoušet nové věci a nespokojíme se s kompromisy. Především do Řecka, Turecka, Španělska a Itálie. Naší hlavní činností je pořádání leteckých pobytových zájezdů do Řecka – ostrov Thassos, Zakynthos, Lefkada, Ithaka, Rhodos, Santorini, Karpathos a Kréta - Turecko, Kalábrie a Sicílie, Španělsko - ostrov Mallorca.

Name: Easy Yacht Di Globoways S.r.l.
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Ufficio, 9 Via Vittorio Alfieri, 18100
Company description: The company Globoways Srl was founded in 1981 as one of the first travel agencies in the city of Imperia and the Riviera di Ponente. The agency is always busy with tourist services and travel arrangements both on the territory and throughout the rest of the world. The company has always had a verse towards on yachting, thanks to the passion of its founder. Finally, from the previous projects, we have given the right development to the Nautical sector thanks to the merger with the Easy Yacht, as the experience gained over the years is put into practice with the maritime brokerage, specially for the Liguria area and the French Riviera but with expansion throughout the Mediterranean. The two joint activities have created a synergy for the achievement of common objectives such as the nautical combination to tourism through chartering and the chartering of boats throughout the Mediterranean. Easyyacht is a young and dynamic company which is capable to find a solutions to all your needs. From buying a new or used boat to a number of services which make your cruising in and around Italy or your voyage around the world comfortable and safe. We are able to give you assistance for the handling of your boat from getting through the nautical bureaucracy, to maintenance, to laying up including specialized artisan work and mechanical help. Our team of experts will help you handle assessments, insurance and leasing of any and all maritime necessities. We work hand in hand with our client to guide and advise them on all aspects of the purchase process, our brokers will give you confidence and security in buying or sell a boat. You can find us in Alassio and in Imperia.

Name: Das Islands Team
Company description: Islands.Team is a new generation DMC operating on a business model which supplants traditional local DMCs. Our specialization: Islands and Beach Destinations anound the World. We get contracts rates from around 50 5 star deluxe and 5 star resorts around the World. In addition, all 5 stars hotels and resorts in Emirates and Qatar. We are a closed club for tour operators and agencies with top level bookings only. Our offices and staff are located around the world (US, HK, UK, DE, AT, RU, UA). We do Destination Marketing, we work only on the principle of by email or via instant messengers, our exclusive prices and offers strictly confidential and not published online. Our main outbound markets is UK and RU now, but we belive that US market couls be one of the top.

Name: AIM Ltd.
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Sofia-capital, Sofia, 4 Yordan Yosifov Str., 1700
Company description: AIM Bulgaria Ltd. is established in 2014 as a youth non-governmental, non-profit making organization working on the territory of Bulgaria, specialized in education abroad, and supporting language travel abroad, various Youth Exchanges, Training and Volunteer Programmes.  AIM Bulgaria Ltd. soon expanded its business and currently provides the J-1 Summer Work Travel USA cultural exchange program which is a unique opportunity for university students to experience life in the United States first-hand through summer work experience with American host companies. Today AIM Bulgaria Ltd. Is a leading Work and Travel agency on Bulgarian market. For the Students and young people, AIM Bulgaria Ltd. provides exchange programs and internships in various countries in Europe and USA and also on a local level we organize Training Courses, campaigns, cultural events, discussions and debates on different topics with the aim to develop intercultural dialogue and understanding between young people from whole Europe crossing all the differences.

Name: Easy Way Travel Srl
Company description: Crediamo profondamente che il viaggio porti dentro di sé tanti significati: di scoperta, di conoscenza, di approfondimento personale e degli altri, di avventura, di condivisione, di divertimento, di relax . Name: Colibri Travel Ltd.

It organizes trainings, visits to trade fairs and exhibitions, business delegations, etc. Colibri Travel and its management has more than 20 years of experience on the Polish tourist market and servicing Polish tourists in Bulgaria.

Name: INTERESTING SPORTS
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 24 Portal Del Angel, 08002
Company description: INTERESTING SPORTS is a global accommodation specialist for the sports travel market. We provide serviced apartments and hotel room inventory to national sports federations, event sponsors and sports marketing agencies, corporate clients, sports tour operators and broadcasting media during global sports events such as the Football World Cup, Champions League Final, Formula1 and Olympic Games. INTERESTING has earned a reputation for being a reliable partner, capable of securing hard to get a-la-carte accommodation at 5-star hotels or affordable rooms for long stays during these sports events. INTERESTING SPORTS also provides ground transportation services, charter flights and everything in between where and when needed.

Name: Palmaretta Turismo
HQ Location: Belgium, Wallonia, Chapelle-lez-herlaimont, Rue Du Jeu De Balle, 7160
Company description: En été, organisation de vacances sur mesure dans le centre de l'Italie : conseils sur le lieu de vacances, l'hébergement, prise en charge sur place, excursions personnalisées. Nous prenons en charge les vacanciers dès leur arrivée à l'aéroport, et les guidons pendant toute la durée de leur séjour à chaque fois que cela s'avère nécessaire. Toute l'année, excursions et voyages sur mesure en minibus, en Belgique et dans toute l'Europe. Navettes vers les différents aéroports et durant les grands événements.

Name: Www.viajarsolo.com
Company description: www.Viajarsolo.com es el punto de encuentro de los que comparten : la pasión por viajar y el deseo de no renunciar a ello aunque en un momento dado no se tenga con quien hacerlo. Reunir a todos los que quieren compartir su tiempo libre con otros, sin límite de edad, condición ni estado.  Centro de información de destinos y opciones de actividades, viajes y escapadas de tiempo libre.  Una web referente para viajeros independientes, solteros o singles, gente impar o en singular que busca viajar, conocer gente y pasarlo bien.  No somos un oportunista departamento más de una agencia de viajes; ViajarSolo.com se creó unicamente para ofrecer este tipo de viajes a un segmento  específico: los "singles" y los viajeros individuales.  Somos los primeros que empezamos a dedicarnos a los que viajan solos y quieren hacerlo de otra forma, y nuestros orígenes como tal se remontan al 2002.  Sólo nos dedicamos a esto, y nuestra exclusividad nos diferencia y nos hace poder ser buenos en nuestra pequeña parcela de trabajo. Cister - Viagens e Turismo, SA is a Portuguese travel agency, belonging to the independent corporate group Cistergroup with 25 years of experience in travel and tourism operations. Name: Health & Medical Tourism In Italy

Company description: “Health Medical Tourism Italy”  is a brand of Termetour Srl, an Italian tour operator operating in the field of incoming and health tourism  for 18 years. The project has been created from the collaboration between Termetour and Kristin Maria Stensrud who has more than 20 years of experience in the health sector as a nurse in various hospitals and clinics in Oslo. Her knowledge of the territory, the Italian culture and of many spas and clinics specialized in psycho-physical rehabilitation guarantees a perfect synergy with the tourist organization experience of Termetour. The combination of medical knowledge and specialized tourism incoming for Italy has given birth to this first and big project in medical tourism in Italy. We create package trips for anyone who wishes to go through treatment, therapy or rehabilitation, combined with a holiday stay in Italy. Our programs can be tailor made to fit anyone’s personal or medical needs. Each medical therapy and SPA facility we work with has been carefully tested, so we only offer travel to facilities with the medical and scientific qualifications necessary to provide the best treatment. Every treatment we offer is documented to work and proven totally safe. This combined with some of the most beautiful, accessible and calming locations in all of Italy, provieds a therapeutic break for both body and mind. We want to create a positive change in lifestyle and quality of life, for people of all ages.

At El Greco Tours we work for you. We do this by following a simple, but repeatable system every time—a system that will work to help you help your clients, and help us ensure that everything is perfect first time, and every time, we do business with you. This is a description of what we normally call an AD HOC request from a tour operator, normally this is only a small portion of our business, mainly we provide a tariff and XML connection to our system and tour operators requests and sell via the databases. Company description: La Sardegna Non Solo Mare è una società di servizi integrati per il turismo in Sardegna, nata con l’intento di far scoprire l'isola ai turisti ed ai curiosi, desiderosi di scoprirne la vera essenza, fortemente legata al mare ma anche alle tradizioni del mondo agro-pastorale, alla natura, alla cultura ed agli aspetti meno conosciuti e più autentici. Sardegna Non Solo Mare svolge quindi la sua attività a tutto campo nel settore del turismo, organizzando escursioni e pacchetti turistici alla scoperta della Sardegna attraverso il suo Tour Operator “Incantos” ed organizzando iniziative, manifestazioni, incontri e convegni; studiando e predisponendo itinerari turistici e progetti di valorizzazione per il territorio e, non ultimo, realizzando portali web turistici dedicati a specifiche zone della Sardegna, per consentire ai potenziali turisti di intraprendere un “viaggio virtuale” alla scoperta del territorio e stimolarli a visitarlo.

Name: NonSoloCrociere By Multimedia - Cincotta Group
Company description: L’agenzia di Viaggi "Non Solo Crociere” a Cagliari mette a vostra completa disposizione la propria professionalità per accompagnarvi ed aiutarvi a realizzare il vostro viaggio su misura. La Multimedia S.r.l, società del Gruppo Cincotta con sede a Cagliari, nasce nel 1986 con lo scopo di offrire supporti commerciali e logistici alle imprese che intendono commercializzare i propri servizi. Nel 1991 la Società inizia ad operare nel settore turistico, offrendo la propria struttura e le proprie competenze alle più importanti compagnie di navigazione del mondo. La varietà dei suoi servizi e la sua esperienza, acquisita da lungo tempo, rende MULTIMEDIA ben attrezzata e preparata ad assistere qualsiasi società fornendole promozioni e supporti logistici in tutta la Sardegna. La naturale conseguenza di questo percorso professionale è che alla fine del 2006 ottiene dalla Regione Autonoma della Sardegna l'autorizzazione ad esercitare l'attività' di Agente Viaggi e Tour Operator con la denominazione commerciale Non Solo Crociere, iscritta al Registro Regionale delle Agenzie di Viaggio e Turismo al numero 272

Name: SOLEN TRAVEL DMC & Tour Operator

SOLEN is a one-stop-shop for group and FIT tour operators from the leisure, school and corporate markets across the world. Focusing on all the major cities throughout Croatia and neighboring areas, we service the requirements of an ever-expanding client base and thanks to our successful partnerships with hotels and suppliers we offer a premier service that is second to none. We are proud to work with the leading players in the travel industry with a client based all around the world. We are not the largest wholesale tour operator (but some of our clients are the biggest in the business) which gives us the flexibility and agility to respond quickly to the ultimate in bespoke requirements. We can't claim to be the oldest either (but yes some of our clients have been going for over 100 years!) so we're not resting on our laurels but are getting out there and making it happen. Certainly our directors and dedicated staff have been in the business a very long time - and this shows in our ability to meet the stringent demands of the best in the business and our ability to satisfy time and time again. Send us your request or your proposal for collaboration to: solen@solen.hr or booking@solen.hr Check our website for some more info! www.solen.hr

Name: Географски Свят ООД
Company description: Туристическа агенция "Географски свят" ООД е създадена през 1990 г. Агенцията е член на IATA (Международна асоциация за въздушен транспорт) и на БАТА (Българска асоциация на туристическите агенции). "Географски свят" активно работи от 24 години на българския туристически пазар, като предлага пълния спектър от туристически услуги. Основни направления в дейността на агенцията са:     организиране на екскурзии и почивки;     продажба на самолетни и автобусни билети;     организиране на индивидуални и групови пътувания с цел туризъм, почивка или бизнес;     резервация на хотели в цял свят;     обслужване на международни прояви, конгреси, конференции, семинари; Туристическите услуги с "марката" на "Географски свят" може да намерите в офисите и представителствата на агенцията в София, Пловдив, Варна, Бургас, Велико Търново, Плевен, Хасково, Благоевград, Смолян, Габрово, Кърджали, както и в бюрата на редица други туристически агенции от цялата страна. Елате при нас, обадете се и ние ще Ви помогнем да откриете "Светът на Вашите мечти"!

Name: Directski.com
Company description: Directski.com the leading online ski tour operator in the UK and Ireland. Founded in Dublin in 2000, we are part of the family-owned Topflight Travel Group who employ almost 300 people between our offices in Ireland, England and France and in-resort across our destination resorts.

Name: Gourmety

Company description: Desarrollado desde el conocimiento en primera persona y alimentado por las experiencias de aquellos que se unieron en el camino. Gourmety nace como una marca que abandera lo “Gourmet” no solo como algo gastronómico, sino como un estilo de vida. Un estilo que supone exprimir cada experiencia vivida para saborearla al máximo y hacer de cada momento un acontecimiento. Experiencias únicas y viajes soñados a lo largo de toda la geografía, diseñados al detalle para aportar valor cultural, crecimiento personal y recuerdos que marcan para toda la vida. Recorre la Ruta 66 en coche o en Harley Davidson; Disfruta de Los parques de Yosemite o Grand Canyon en nuestros Viajes a la Costa Oeste; Reserva una escapada a Nueva York o conoce la cultura de la  Costa Este en nuestros viajes guiados.

Name: Eventi Motivazionali Team Building
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 27 Via Vittoria Colonna, 20149
Company description: Eventi motivazionali è un brand di Team Up & Partners S.R.L. Creiamo esperienze emozionanti da vivere e condividere. Momenti unici in cui ritrovarsi, sperimentare, conoscersi e conoscere. Siamo il partner ideale per le corporate, le agenzie di comunicazione e marketing, i tour operator e i pco che vogliono inserire un alto valore aggiunto ai propri eventi o a quelli dei propri clienti. Attraverso le nostre esperienze raggiungiamo obiettivi legati al teambuilding, alla motivazione, allo sviluppo del senso di appartenenza, alla fidelizzazione di collaboratori e clienti, al riconoscimento del brand e del prodotto. La nostra competenza consiste nel trovare le giuste corde emozionali su cui strutturare i progetti con voi. Ogni proposta nasce dal lavoro di squadra tra noi e voi, per pensare, costruire e realizzare un momento unico e irripetibile. La nostra filosofia si basa sul libero scambio di idee, competenze e risorse per sviluppare una reciproca crescita e ottenere grandi successi.

Name: Upstream Portugal
HQ Location: Portugal, Castelo Branco, Covilhã, Rua António Augusto De Aguiar, 6200-053
Company description: UPSTREAM PORTUGAL promotes Portugal and its Natural & Cultural Heritage, spotlighting primarily the interior regions of the country, by providing a scope of services and commercializing specialized thematic products within the areas of Active, Cultural & Sports Tourism, thus contributing to a Local and Sustainable Development of the country with global impact.  For public territorial and tourism management entities and the private sector, UPSTREAM PORTUGAL provides specialized consultancy services in the areas of Designing, Structuring, Implementation of Touristic Products & Resources, Territorial Marketing & Communication, focusing on highlighting the patrimonial assets, the natural and cultural resources of the country.  We conduct our travel Agency & Tour Operational activities under the registered trademark TRY PORTUGAL, providing a digital marketplace, www.tryportugal.pt, that integrates the largest national offer of a qualified Network of touristic programs, experiences, and outdoor activities brought about by our Tourism and Hospitality Partners from all over the country to position Portugal as a destination of excellence for Natural, Cultural and Sports Tourism, 365-days a year, and in total safety!  Complementing our Tour Operational activities, as TRY PORTUGAL, we design, organize and provide on-ground logistic services for “Outdoor” Events differing from other local service providers by presenting innovative solutions that contribute to the international promotion of Portugal as "the" destination and potentiating Corporate and Sports Tourism in the regions where they take place.

Name: Nordmanns-Reiser Amerikaspesialisten Og Cruisereiser
Company description: En av Norges største turoperatør for skreddersydde reiser. Amerikaspesialisten har USA, Canada, Karibien, Mellom-Amerika og Sør-Amerika som spesialfelt og har bred erfaring med å arrangerer gruppeturer og skreddersy individuelle reiser til disse reisemålene.   Cruisereiser hjelper deg med et stort utvalg på cruise i hele verden, alt fra små luksusyachter til verdens største cruiseskip. Gjennom merkevaren Nordmannsreiser skreddersyr vi selvsagt også reiser til resten av verden: Asia, Afrika, Polynesia, Australia... Hos oss finner du de spennende opplevelsesreisene, som du reiser til på egen hånd, ikke i stor gruppe. Vi legger alt til rette for at din ferie skal bli den ultimate drømmereisen! HVORFOR BRUKE OSS TIL DIN NESTE REISE – Vi KAN reisemålene og kjenner til de små detaljene som gjør reisen komplett! – Vi skreddersyr i tillegg din drømmereise i hele av verden etter dine ønsker og budsjett – Vi ordner med fly, hotell og leiebil, så du får tilbud om en totalpakke – Du er dekket av pakkereiseloven, med den trygghet det gir – Vi samarbeider med flere spennende aktører og ordner reiser med det lille ekstra Les mer:  https://www.amerikaspesialisten.no https://www.cruisereiser.no https://www.nordmannsreiser.no/ Amerikaspesialisten og Cruisereiser er en del av Nordmanns-Reiser AS som siden 1983 har hjulpet tusenvis av nordmenn på reise.  Totalt er vi 9 ansatte som sitter på Rosenholm utenfor Oslo.  Vi KAN reiser og er spesialister til å få til din drømmereise! Kontakt oss - vi hjelper deg: nordmann@nordmann.no

Fundada hace más de una década en el concepto de aprendizaje experiencial aseguramos mediante la prestación de todos los servicios no sólo la seguridad y bienestar del estudiante, además se cuida en detalle que la actividad turística reúna todas las cualidades culturales que las instituciones con las que colaboramos nos trasladan.

Name: Knossos Travel
Company description: Knossos Travel: Your Expert DMC in Cyprus For almost three decades, Knossos Travel, headquartered in Larnaca, has been the trusted partner for unforgettable experiences in Cyprus. We leverage our extensive local expertise and global network to craft seamless journeys for Tour Operators, Travel Agents, and Group Organizers worldwide, from the Far East to Latin America. We excel in creating powerful MICE and special interest group programs, proudly delivering bespoke services and products. Our deep-rooted relationships within Cyprus’s travel and tourism sector position us as a leading agency for: • Immersive Cultural & Archaeological Tours: Expertly guided in English, German, Spanish, Romanian, Polish, and French, ensuring authentic exploration of C• Meaningful Pilgrimage Journeys: Dedicated programs designed with sensitivity and profound local knowledge. • Premier Civil Weddings: As Cyprus’s top organizer, we orchestrate over 1,000 dream ceremonies annually, making your special day truly unique. Our commitment to excellence has been consistently recognized, earning us the prestigious World Travel Award for Cyprus’s Leading Travel Agency eight times, from 2016-2019 and 2021-2024. Licensed by the C.T.O and a proud member of ACTA, Cyprus Convention Bureau, and CCCI, Knossos Travel is your guarantee of quality, reliability, and an unparalleled Cypriot experience. Discover Cyprus with us.yprus’s rich heritage.

Name: INSPIRATION AFRICA
Company description: INSPIRATION AFRICA is a specialized tour operator offering tailor made travel design and holiday planning for visitors the Indian Ocean Islands as well as both Eastern and Southern Africa. In addition to having a sales and marketing team in Europe, we do have physical offices or local partners' presence on the ground in the countries we promote travels to. That would included Botswana, Ethiopia, Kenya, Madagascar, Malawi, Mozambique, Namibia, Rwanda, South Africa, Tanzania, Uganda, Zambia, Zanzibar and Zimbabwe. Our main focus is exclusively at Tailor Made Travel and our specialties include tailor made travel design for Individual Travelers (such as Honeymooners, Families, Couples, Groups of Friends), for Special Interest Travel (such as Birding, Hiking, Canoeing, Arts & Culture, Golfing, Photographic Safari, etc.). Although a pretty recent venture - 2014 - our key team members have a long experience in the industry. We believe tourism remains a "people's business" and that we are there to make a difference!

Name: Marco Polo Reisen GmbH
Company description: Marco Polo ist Spezialist für preiswerte Erlebnis- und Entdeckerreisen in Europa und weltweit. Der günstige Basispreis umfasst alle wichtigen Leistungen: Anreise, Unterkunft und Rundreise inklusive Führung und Betreuung durch einen landeskundigen Marco Polo Scout. Ebenfalls immer dabei: "Marco Polo Live" - das Entdecker-Highlight auf jeder Reise. Viele zusätzliche Extras können dazugebucht werden: Ausflüge, das Rail & Fly-Ticket zum Abflugsort, die Visabesorgung. Eintritte werden direkt vor Ort beglichen. So kann sich jeder Marco Polo Gast sein individuelles Reisepaket genau so zusammenstellen, wie er es haben möchte und zahlt nur das, was er auch in Anspruch nehmen will. Marco Polo ist ein Reiseveranstalter mit langer Tradition. Seit Mitte der fünfziger Jahre bereist Marco Polo die Welt und hat dabei jede Menge Erfahrung im Umgang mit anderen Kulturen und neuen Situationen gesammelt.

Name: Beauty24 GmbH
Company description: The Wellness Travel Agency for exclusive and high quality spa and wellness travel to Germany. beauty24.de is the largest online portal for wellness in Germany (stated by GfK 2011). Customers can choose worldwide from more than 8.000 wellness tratments in over 650 select hotels, with the supply priority in Europe. beauty24 Wellness travels are available on www.beauty24.de, travel agencies, on TV and on direct sale.

Name: AÇOREANA THE AZORES DMC
HQ Location: Portugal, Azores, Ponta Delgada, 9500 Rua De Lisboa
Company description: A nossa missão é clara: proporcionar experiências reais e inesquecíveis, apoiando o turismo sustentável nos Açores. A Açoreana DMC é mais do que uma simples agência de viagens. Somos a porta de entrada para os verdadeiros Açores. Com um profundo conhecimento local e parcerias de confiança, criamos viagens personalizadas que conectam os visitantes à cultura única da região, à natureza deslumbrante e à hospitalidade acolhedora. * Our mission is clear: provide real and unforgettable experiences while supporting sustainable tourism in the Azores. Açoreana DMC is more than just a travel company. We are the gateway to the true Azores. With strong local knowledge and trusted partnerships, we create personalized trips that connect visitors to the region’s unique culture, stunning nature, and warm hospitality.

Name: Visit GoodPlace
Company description: Visit GoodPlace – the sustainable travel agency Visit GoodPlace is everything that the enthusiastic traveler is looking for; A cycling and outdoor agency, exploring destinations that include a wealth of natural beauty, vibrant history, rich culture and superb biking. Travelling and the bicycle have been in a serious committed relationship for centuries, as just about every environment you wish to explore is accessible with a trusty bike. And the world is always eager to offer options aplenty for leisurely paddlers and hardcore asphalt-eaters alike. Our mission is to create authentic and unique experiences for our guests while supporting responsible trade and nature preservation. With our sustainability policy, we aim to minimize negative effects on the natural and social environment and maximize benefits to local businesses supporting them towards sustainable management. Therefore, we develop our tours working with nature, being friendly to travelers and locals at the same time. Active, adventurous, healthy, green and local. These are the main things that identify us as a cycling and outdoor tourism agency.

Name: STARTOUR
Company description: Incoming Travel Agency - professional incoming services - accommodation in all hotel categories - catering - transportation - guides - city tours & excursions - tailor-made events - conferences, seminars, meetings - incentives - weddings - flights - tickets for cultural & sport events

Name: Be2Sea
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Florence, 6r Viale Spartaco Lavagnini, 50129
Company description: Be2Sea is the first B2B platform dedicated exclusively to travel agencies. An extensive fleet of over 9000ft yachts, motorboats, catamarans (up to 12 beds), and sailboats in almost 500 destinations including Italy, Spain, Croatia, Greece, Spain and Turkey as well as the Caribbeans, Seychelles, Thailand and many others. On the website, you can check the actual, real-time availability of boats in the chosen destination and compare prices.  An Italian back office, at your disposal 7/7, will help you complete your booking. During the booking process, you can choose and add many services (ad-hoc insurance caboose, tender, itineraries, moorings, safety nets, etc.), in order to create a complete and safe product, satisfying the requests and expectations of even the most demanding customers.

Name: Prague Airport Taxi & Limousine Service TAFI S.r.o.

We are your partner for everyday, reliable, secure and discreet traveling in Czech Republic and throughout Europe.

Name: Maarlab - Rethinking Tourism
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Santa Cruz De Tenerife, 53 Calle Ramón Y Cajal, 38006
Company description: We have a purpose: To create smarter and more sustainable destinations, boosting the autonomy and digital competitiveness of their local industry.  We are the first tour operator in the world specialised in increasing direct sales of accommodation. We combine your rooms with your entire flight offer in a fully integrated way on your website and booking engine. Our experience in digital marketing, combined with our knowledge of the airline ecosystem, gives us a differentiating know-how that allows you to optimise your marketing actions to the maximum. How do we do it? By helping and driving companies with useful and effective technological solutions. We create disruptive solutions using the most advanced technology to respond to your current needs and anticipate future ones. Discover Maarlab Join us in changing the rules of the game and be part of the shift towards a more sustainable tourism at an economic, social and environmental level. Don't stay on the ground and reach new customers selling flight + hotel on your own website Shall we take off? Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

Name: SEE YOU TRAVEL
Company description: SEE YOU TRAVEL is a Cyprus based travel agency where you effortlessly can book day tours, fixed group departures, holidays and vacation packages in +120 countries around the world. Today, booking the right tour or holiday package has become a time consuming and painful process. Which tour operator is qualified? What’s the right tour price? When you pay an upfront deposit to an unknown tour operator, is your money safe? Are the reviews seen on a local operators website genuine? SEE YOU TRAVEL gives you a painless and easy tour booking process by: Only offering tours delivered by qualified and licensed tour operators, supported by unbiased and genuine customer reviews. Giving you a Best Price Guarantee for all tours offered. Customized tour package, and local travel advice.

Name: UNIQUE TRAVEL & DMC
Company description: Unique Travel is a dynamic B2B Tour Operator and Destination Management Company based in Rome offering tailor-made travel services for individual tourists, leisure groups, business travellers and MICE in Italy and all over of Europe. We offer a wide range of bespoke travel services and our activities are backed up by a careful and constant analysis of the tourist demand from different countries and by a highly professional staff with many years of experience in the business. We aim to provide you and your passengers quality products at the most competitive prices, and a personalised service that is tailored to meet your clients' expectations. We create unique and memorable experiences with superior service and integrity, our business philosophy relies on the two pillars of Quality & Service.

Name: Ezy
Company description: With its background in the travel trade and focus on customers within the travel industry, ezy has acquired an extensive experience and knowledge about the online travel business. ezy’s solutions are developed and evaluated in cooperation with airlines, travel agencies, tour operators, cruise lines etc. taking advantage of the deep knowledge from the experience as suppliers for travel companies since 15 years. ezy strives to bridge the gap between the complexity of the travel industry and the specialist knowledge of an IT-consultant and has the ambition to be an effective and reliable partner, actively contributing to the development of the online travel business. Name: Italy Group Specialists
Company description: Italy Vacation Specialists is your boutique small group tour operator in Italy. When we say specialists, we mean it and for many returning customers who want us to plan smaller scale trips, even solo trips, we do that too. Name: Ishestar Riding Center
Company description: MORE THAN 30 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE We are a horseback riding tour operator who has been offering horseback riding tours in Iceland for over 30 years. Our main goal is to offer our guests exceptional service, excellent horses and a safe ride in the Icelandic nature. We place great emphasis on sustainable tourism by offering adventurous riding tours in the unspoiled nature of our country. DAY TOURS AND MULTI-DAY HORSE RIDING TOURS Day tours are operated from our Stables in Hafnarfjörður which is in the Reykjavík area about 15 minutes from city center in a beautiful nature of lava, lakes, and wilderness. The riding tours are for beginners up to experienced riders, ranging from 1-7 hour tours. Our multi-day tours are operated all over Iceland from local farmers. Our tours are ideal for riders who are looking to riding in Icelandic highlands, exploring Icelandic nature while riding and riding the Icelandic horse. We offer riding tours for experienced riders as well as riding tours for not so experienced riders. RIDING IS FOR EVERYONE Riding the Icelandic horse is the most authentic travel experience you can get and we look forward to giving you an opportunity to enjoy the Icelandic horse in its natural surroundings. Our experienced multilingual team members are happy to assist you in making your horse-riding dream tour come true.

Name: Holli-day.com

If your are a Hotel, campsite, B&B or a travel agency, we do have the right tools for you and your customers to reach all there is to do to make the holiday an incredible experience!

Name: Del Mundo Reisen GmbH

Seitdem hat sich das Team mit viel Sachverstand und Engagement einen beständig wachsenden und zufriedenen Kundenstamm erarbeitet. Mit einem umfangreichen Programm aus Pauschal- und Katalogreisen, Gruppen- und Individualreisen, Kreuzfahrten, Linien- und Charterflügen, Mietwagen, Fähren, Seniorenreisen, Ferienwohnungen und Busreisen gehen wir auf die Wünsche und Anforderungen unserer Kunden ein und bieten dementsprechend Reisen aller namhaften Reiseveranstalter an. Wir kennen viele der angebotenen Reiseziele von eigenen Besuchen und können so aus eigener Erfahrung kompetent beraten. Name: GriecoTours
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Molfetta, 27 Via Felice Cavallotti, 70056
Company description: UNA TRADIZIONE STORICA: La GriecoTours nasce nel 2000 grazie a Sergio Grieco, suo fondatore e direttore, con l'idea di voler fare del viaggio organizzato un modello di vita. Ad oggi, l'Agenzia Viaggi/Tour Operator, grazie alle varie esperienze fatte negli anni, le hanno conferito la specializzazione in questo settore. La GriecoTours vanta all’attivo più di 600 viaggi organizzati in Italia ed all’estero per un totale di oltre 24.000 viaggiatori nei viaggi organizzati con accompagnatore e partenze da Bari, Molfetta e paesi limitrofi PERCHÈ SCEGLIERCI? La chiarezza, correttezza, attenzione ai dettagli e, non meno importante, il rapporto che instauriamo con i clienti, sono da sempre i punti cardine del nostro lavoro. Cerchiamo di soddisfare con premura tutte le esigenze dei nostri clienti, proponendo sempre la miglior offerta in termini di assistenza, qualità e giusto prezzo. LA MISSION Da sempre i nostri obiettivi sono: l’innovazione e l’orientamento al cliente. Innovazione in un settore in continua evoluzione offriamo pacchetti caratterizzati da novità, tendenze ed originalità; Orientamento al cliente, cerchiamo sempre di soddisfare i suoi desideri con una personalizzazione sempre maggiore. Per raggiungere i nostri obiettivi, ogni giorno ricerchiamo informazioni per accrescere la nostra esperienza, la professionalità e la preparazione. Affidiamo la nostra pubblicità ai clienti che ci hanno conosciuto, in modo che siano loro la firma della nostra autorevolezza con la voglia di continuare a lavorare restando vicino ai nostri nuovi e vecchi clienti, spinti da una caratteristica comune: La passione per i viaggi.

Company description: La G&G Travel è un Tour Operator giovane che nasce nel 2013, formato dall'unione di ragazzi volenterosi che lavorano nel turismo da moltissimi anni, operatore specializzato in viaggi di nozze e viaggi medio lungo raggio, le nostre destinazioni di punta sono: Medio Oriente e Nord Africa, Oriente, Australia, Sud Pacifico, Stati Uniti e Messico

Name: Living Tour Operator
Company description: www.LivingManhattan.com Living Manhattan è un brand di Living Tour Operator. Living è una realtà italiana che opera nel settore degli affitti di appartamenti a breve termine, attraverso un servizio semplice ed innovativo di prenotazioni on-line. Tutti i nostri appartamenti rappresentano la soluzione ottimale per tutte quelle persone che desiderano vivere la vacanza in libertà senza le limitazioni di una semplice camera di albergo. La vacanza in appartamento è un’ottima alternativa all’albergo o all’hotel per viaggiare risparmiando senza rinunciare alle comodità, o per soggiornare in un ambiente più familiare. In particolare l’appartamento è ideale se si hanno bambini piccoli perché si possono gestire i pasti come a casa propria. Living offre l’opportunità di vivere la città in pace e armonia durante il vostro soggiorno, sia esso per affari o piacere. La nostra gestione diretta della maggior parte degli appartamenti disponibili su questo sito web, assicura prezzi e servizi imbattibili e la qualità che solo gli italiani sono in grado di offrire. I nostri appartamenti vengono attentamente selezionati ed esaminati per rispondere ai criteri di ubicazione, qualità e servizio della nostra società Living World Wide s.r.l. email: info@livingmanhattan.com

Name: Emotional Sicily
Company description: Emotional Sicily is a boutique DMC and tour operator specializing in bespoke luxury travel and immersive events that celebrate the authentic essence of Sicily. We focus on sustainability, cultural preservation, and local engagement, creating personalized journeys that connect travelers to the island's rich history and landscapes. Our team works closely with local providers, chefs, artisans, and historians to deliver unique itineraries and exclusive cultural experiences that go beyond the ordinary. Whether it's a curated tour or an innovative event, we foster meaningful connections between visitors and the soul of Sicily. In addition to our travel offerings, we also provide innovative event management solutions for businesses seeking impactful, sustainable events. Emotional Sicily has been featured in international press for its unique approach and earned recognition for its award-winning video production, showcasing Sicily’s beauty through captivating storytelling. As part of our commitment to cultural preservation, we launched The Last Shipwright, a project focused on preserving traditional Sicilian craftsmanship and the art of shipbuilding, ensuring these skills are passed to future generations. At Emotional Sicily, we strive to redefine travel by creating experiences that blend luxury, sustainability, and authentic cultural connections.

Name: IT Exists - Uncoventional Italy
Company description: IT Exists is an Italian EXPERIENCE  tour operator.  IT Exists offers real experience tours to discover the still unknown Italy. Gastronomic excellences, crafts, local productions and ancient villages. The authentic Italy, alive and hidden in the streets of historical neighborhoods, on the tracks seldom beaten of the hills of its territories, that trembles desiring to show off and make you fall in love.  The Italy you've always thought about, the one you always dreamed of and imagined exists and is real. IT Exists wants you to discover it! Guided tours, tastings, nature trails, events. The taste of tradition. Natural immersions. Villages and castles. Cities and their art. History and food. Elderly people and their stories.  IT Exists tours will show you an Italy that will remain in your heart for its beauties and its contradictions, for the unique way of thinking and living. Our goal is to amaze. To thrill. Because IT Exists begins from a big love: the one we have for our cou IT Exists does not only offer tours or simple services. Our activity is based on a solid network and synergies in order to make your stay gratifying and memorable on the Italian territory. Our strength is the collaboration with our quality partners that allow us to offer different types of tours and a wide range of choices. IT Exists is an EXPERIENCE TOUR OPERATOR that wants to give a new meaning to the word TOURSIM: emotions to live and to experience . And such a big love needs to be shared.

Company description: Professionisti in emozioni. Viaggiatori di professione. Mondo Incentive & MICE GiTravel Specialista nelle attività di turismo incentive per aziende, eventi e convegni, Gruppo Incentive Travel One è presente con le sue professionalità, sul mercato della Comunicazione e del Turismo dal 1990. Il Gruppo si è da sempre caratterizzato per una serie di servizi innovativi rivolti alle imprese, realizzando in conto proprio o per conto terzi, eventi di carattere nazionale e internazionale. Mondo TravelPromoter® by GiTravel One TravelPromoter una rete di promotori turistici per la vendita, sul territorio nazionale e internazionale, dei migliori viaggi on-line e off-line. Name: Umbria Con Me - Tours Excursions And Experiences - Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Assisi Assisi, 8 Via Pietro Nenni, 06081
Company description: After over 20 years work experience as tour guides in central Italy and especially in Umbria and Tuscany (Assisi, Orvieto, Cortona, Perugia, Spello, Arezzo and and many other cities) our team decided to offer its knowledge and competence also as tour operator.  Since many years we have offered personalized guide services in Italy to hundreds of people, travelling as individuals, couples or groups, introducing them to our spectacular landscape, our magnificent art cities, and to our wines, food and culture. Now we can provide you a complete tour in Italy from the accommodation to transport and other facilities you might need.  During our tours we will follow a number of charming, interesting and evocative classical routes through Italy, exploring the best known Italian cities and towns. We can offer you also routes designed for discovering typical local wines, food and natural beauties. Some others are thought for those who like ancient churches, hermitages and abbeys.  We will work with you before you arrive to make sure your itinerary meets your greatest expectations. Through this process we will create programs that will leave you with enchanted memories of Italy. To assist your planning at our best, please have a look at our suggestions and contact us.  We'll wait for you in Umbria for sharing with you the wonder and the rich surprises of every journey.

Name: Rimontitours Srl - Rising Incoming Organizer
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Naples, 9 Via Monte Di Dio, 80132
Company description: Boutique Incoming Tour Operator Naples & Campania: La Dolce Vita Best Travel Experiences & Activities, Bus Rental, Daily & Shore Excursions, Tour Guides, & Daily City Tours. Italian Boutique Incoming Tour Operator with over three generations of experience.  We welcome travelers to Naples and Campania with the mission of sharing la dolce vita experience and all the history, culture and natural beauties of our city and region in a traditional and memorable way through the tours we offer and the travel services we provide.  With professionalism, great love and thorough knowledge of the area, we offer cultural and gastronomic itineraries in Italy and in our region Campania: land of volcanoes, medieval towns, archaeological sites, long standing customs and land of delicious typical unique food and wine production.  The elements of quality, attention to detail, uniqueness, authenticity and harmony are part of our business philosophy. We plan and customize individual or group itineraries, activity experiences, and tours for the individual traveler, tour operators and travel agents.  Our team is Your team and our travel experts are here to assist you with planning every detail of your trip from one-day city tours, to food and wine tastings, to travel services that you may need such as transportation, expert tour guides, and accommodation; as well as tailored suggestions for any type of request when planning a visit Italy.   Expertise, passion and loyalty are ours keys to success, and this is what we give to our customers and business partners.  info@rimontitours.com

Name: Incoming To Italy
Company description: NCOMING TO ITALY is a Tour Operator located outside Rovigo, near Venice. Name: Mugello&Tuscany
Company description: Mugello&Tuscany is an online travel agency organizing great tailor made holidays in Mugello, Florence and the whole Tuscany. Especially in Mugello and the Florentine area the range of our contacts can really make a difference when it comes to building a customized proposal. We are a young start-up but formed by a close-knit and competent team. We also avail ourselves of the expertise of qualified staff who work on place for a continuous monitoring of the quality of services offered to our guests. The strength of our agency is to have qualified staff who know their area very well and can thus respond quickly to our guests, paying attention to their needs in a way that a large tour operator, or even worse, a call center, will never be able to do. The surplus value that we intend to propose is to provide our guests a customized holiday near Florence with a high quality service.

Name: Aresviaggi

Name: Explora Nel Mondo |Alla Ricerca Del Viaggio Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, The Marches, Pesaro, 30 Via Degli Abeti, 61122
Company description: Siamo un Tour Operator di Pesaro specializzato in organizzazione di viaggi di gruppo, trekking, itinerari su misura e Viaggi di Nozze. Riteniamo che il viaggio sia un momento di crescita, un’opportunità di arricchimento e di interscambio culturale sia per il viaggiatore sia per il popolo ospitante: l’itinerario vuole essere un percorso da vivere in modo da apprezzare le particolarità ambientali e culturali dove le tipicità e le tradizioni locali assumono un ruolo centrale ed esperienziale. Per questa ragione studiamo il viaggio in modo da promuovere un comportamento responsabile volto alla conservazione e al rispetto del territorio contribuendo allo sviluppo sostenibile dell’economia delle comunità ospitanti. Chi è Explora? Explora è la mascotte di Alla Ricerca del Viaggio: Explora nel Mondo! Explora personifica l’idea del nostro viaggiatore, curioso di: • esplorare nuove terre e sperimentare nuove esperienze come momento di crescita, un’opportunità di arricchimento e di interscambio culturale • conoscere il territorio e gli usi e costumi locali, le particolarità ambientali e culturali dove le tipicità e le tradizioni locali assumono un ruolo centrale ed esperienziale • incontrare gli abitanti del luogo e vivere da vicino la quotidianità con un atteggiamento responsabile, di accoglienza e rispetto • vivere nuove avventure • conoscere nuovi compagni di viaggio con cui condividere insieme emozioni ed esperienze • contribuire allo sviluppo sostenibile dell’economia delle comunità ospitanti.

Name: Vviaggi
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Sora, 1 Via Chiesa Nuova, 03039
Company description: Siamo la tua agenzia di viaggi e turismo di fiducia. Il nostro team mette a vostra completa disposizione la sua professionalità con l’obiettivo di realizzare il Vostro viaggio. Siamo parte della community Takumians by Traveller Made®, il network di eccellenza che riunisce, solo su invito, i migliori agenti specialisti del lusso e le strutture più esclusive del mondo, per offrire viaggi su misura unici e riservati ai viaggiatori in cerca di esperienze fuori dal comune. Siamo stati selezionati dal network, prenotando con noi ed alla tariffa più bassa del mercato, possiamo quindi garantirvi benefits, amenities speciali e trattamenti VIP nelle strutture associate. Grazie ai circuiti esclusivi di cui fa parte Vviaggi, offriamo quindi l’accesso a strutture ed esperienze esclusive. La rete dei nostri partner ci consente di creare esperienze di Viaggio curate nel minimo dettaglio ed in ogni angolo del mondo. BEST VALUE: Le migliori offerte, servizi / disponibilità extra con i nostri partner e contratti diretti con i più prestigiosi brand alberghieri. COMPRENDERE LE TUE ESIGENZE: Comprendere prima le tue esigenze e le tue necessità per poi aiutarti a nella costruzione dell’esperienza di viaggio, su misura, è la nostra massima priorità! CONSULENTE DI VIAGGIO PERSONALE: Consulente di viaggio personale che ti assisterà nella fase di pre prenotazione, durante l’intero viaggio ed al termine dello stesso. MASSIMA FLESSIBILITA: Flessibilità prima e, con il nostro servizio concierge 24/7, anche durante il viaggio ESPERIENZE UNICHE: Itinerari autentici, accesso speciale ad attività ed eventi esclusivi!

Name: ATMAN VIAGGI
Company description: Travel agent, tour operator and tour organizer, highly specialized in organizing tailor-made trips and group trips, with particular inclination towards unusual itineraries and connoisseurs. Agency chosen by the FRIENDS OF MUSIC Sacile (PN) Agenzia di viaggi, tour operator e tour organizing, fortemente specializzata nell'organizzazione di viaggi su misura e di gruppo, con particolare inclinazione verso itinerari insoliti e da intenditori. Agenzia prescelta dagli AMICI DELLA MUSICA di Sacile (PN).

Name: BigaBike Rental & Tour Bike & Scooter
Company description: Biga Bike is a travel agency and tour operator in Rome, recipients of the TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence in 2014, 2015 and 2016.  Mission Offer tourists alternatives to discover Rome, Biga Bike strives to offer various alternatives to explore Rome. For those who wish to be outdoors, avoid traffic, see the city from a different perspective, discover cobbled alleys and narrow streets, there is nothing better than renting a bike or a scooter, the easiest way to get around Rome in total freedom, without parking, time and traffic restrictions. Promote quality tourism, including deseasonalized, by proposing innovative and sustainable experiential cultural, historical, artistic and gastronomic itineraries.  Personalize offers: avoid rigid ready-made packages, listen to customer needs and create a "tailored" service, customizing a guided tour, an itinerary, for a wish, a desired food, a nice shop, a view to admire. Attention makes the difference between a passing tourist and a satisfied customer. Services offered Rental of Citybike with Shimano gears for ladies & men, including helmets & safety locks. Rental of scooters 50 c.c. & 125 c.c. with liability insurance, helmets & safety chain. Vehicle delivery & pick-up service to lodgings or location indicated by the client. Selected Professional Tour Guides in various languages (English, French, Spanish, German, etc.).  Organization of tours by bike/scooter: traditional, alternative, tailored with qualified guides. Organization of walking tours in museums, art galleries and exhibitions, reservations, skip-the-line tickets included. Shopping or gastronomic tours.  Promotion and organization of recreational, cultural, ecological, gastronomic events by bike, scooter or on foot.  Car, minivan or bus rental and organization of outside-the-city visits.  We can personalize departure times and duration as well as tailor itineraries according to the client's interests.  Open 7 days a week from 9:00am to 7:00pm.

Name: SOLANDA Tours & MICE
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Monopoli, 27 Via Fratelli Bandiera, 70043
Company description: SOLANDA Tours & MICE works in two fields: LEISURE: dedicated to our travelling clients: this involves everything relating to holidays, tours, weddings and honeymoons, courses and activities associated with the regional destinations we offer.  MICE: dedicated to businesses, non-profit organizations, institutions, associations etc: this is for everything regarding incentive trips, meetings, team-building activities, conventions, events. THE TOUR OPERATOR We organize trips for small groups (from a minimum of 12 to a maximum of 24 people) all over Southern Italy. This allows the participants both to enjoy more freedom and independence than they would in a large group and to visit secret, hidden-away places, far from the mass tourist routes (private homes, privately-owned historic houses, wine-cellars and small farms, village markets, monasteries and religious shrines not open to the public), which you would not be able to visit if travelling independently. We only select hotels which we judge to be best not only in terms of comfort and high standards, but also with regard to their relevance to their locality and to the culture and activities involved in the tour. DMC Our Destination Management Company specializes in Southern Italian destinations. We organize incentive trips, meetings, meetcentives, workshops, conventions, events and team building activities in the wonderful regions of Puglia, Campania, Sicily, Basilicata, Calabria and Sardinia. We have a thorough knowledge of these areas and present them to our clients in a original way. We offer you historic locations, itineraries dedicated to archaeology, nature or culture, discovering the secrets of these Mediterranean places. We operate with a team of professionals, while also making use of a large network of experts to help us in the management of the services and activities we provide.

Name: BRIO Brindisi

You will be able to count on unusual and off the beaten track activities to make your group’s program exclusive.

Name: Pamm Travel
Company description: Agenzia Viaggi e Tour Operator Online, operatività esclusiva su Web. L'azienda è organizzata per l'utenza esclusiva del mondo web, ma si distingue dai sistemi automatizzati di prenotazione online.
