Il reparto dedicato al business travel si occupa di gestire ad hoc sia le richieste di viaggi d’affari a livello individuale che la creazione di viaggi di gruppo, dai viaggi incentive alle convention e meeting aziendali ed eventi in tutto il mondo.

Name: Sicilying
Company description: Sicilying is a fast growing web company founded in 2012, focusing on high quality tourist services in Sicily. Based in Catania, in the Eastern part of Sicily, we have acquired a wide knowledge of Sicilian operators and provide a strong presence throughout the territory. Sicilying.com is not just any regular Tour Operator. We are the first to offer an online booking engine allowing clients to book services such as sports, wine tasting and nature tours in real time and are the only company in Sicily to offer this service.  Anybody who is looking for holidays in Sicily or simply for things to do in Sicily can use our e-commerce platform as the first point of reference. People visiting Sicily will be happy to have a look at www.sicilying.com to organize their journey before going or to book last minute experiences while in Sicily. Sicilying.com helps both local operators to outline very good and attractive propositions and tourists to plan their holidays or their free time by putting forward itineraries that are easy to purchase without any risks. We don’t like to think of this as us “selling services” but rather “proposing experiences to live in Sicily” and to fully immerse our clients in Sicilian culture.

Name: Parma Incoming
Company description: PREMIER INCOMING TOUR OPERATOR IN PARMA Welcome to Parma Incoming, the pioneering incoming tour operator in Parma, specializing in immersive experiences centered around opera, culinary delights, and cultural treasures in Parma, Emilia Romagna, and throughout Italy. With our dedicated M.i.c.e. Division, we stand as a trusted hub for conferences, conventions, and incentives, providing impeccable service and seamless execution. A LEGACY OF EXCELLENCE SINCE 2001 For over two decades, we have set the gold standard for organizing tailored, emotionally-charged musical, cultural, and gastronomic tours. Our wealth of knowledge and unwavering professionalism ensures that each tour is a one-of-a-kind and unforgettable adventure. From securing premium, first-category tickets to the Festival Verdi and Italy's most iconic operas, to arranging exclusive private concerts and curating food experiences that highlight the exquisite products of the Food Valley, we leave no detail overlooked. REVEALING THE RICH TAPESTRY OF PARMA, EMILIA ROMAGNA, AND ITALY Our tours weave together a rich tapestry of experiences, including visits to historic monuments, theatre backstage, museums, castles and enchanting gardens. We offer an all-inclusive service, meticulously crafted by our highly-qualified and detail-oriented team.  Try our delicious cooking classes on Parma and Emilia top food! With us, you are not just a traveler; you become a connoisseur of culture, music, and gastronomy. YOUR TRUSTED PARTNER FOR CONFERENCES AND INCENTIVES Our intimate knowledge of the region empowers us to provide tailored services, offering you the assurance of a seamless event. From coordinating secretarial support to managing hotel reservations, transfers, and organizing equipment and team-building activities, we handle every facet, allowing you to concentrate on what matters most. Stay connected with us on LinkedIn!

Name: Enjoy Tour Tuscany
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Siena, 111 Via Dei Rossi, 53100
Company description: Enjoy Tour Tuscany was inspired by our passion for our homeland and our desire to share its uniqueness and charm with our guests. Let us offer you our experience e knowledge of the area and experience a unique and unforgettable vacation. The love for our land will be the main service offered and our being Tuscan the key to a unique and different journey, an emotional experience, an immersion in the Tuscan character that over the centuries has made these places famous throughout the world. Our reception services, created as tools for a wider transmission of Tuscany, include visits, lessons, tastings, experiences designed for each individual visitor in a different way and always adaptable to different needs. Enjoy Tour Tuscany service is therefore not a travel agency, but a point of reference for all those who want to distinguish themselves from mass tourism, who know they can ask for their own personalised experience, who want to try to feel, at least once in their life, like real guests on holiday. Our experiences range from activities, with fixed days and times, for small groups of 8/10 people with a dedicated guide, to exclusive tours that can be customized according to your requests or needs, included car hire services for transporting people to private individuals, companies or tourists for daily Tours and Transfers to and from the airport, sea port, railway station and any other location on request.

Name: ZEUS Travel Tech & Service
Company description: In the development of the new tour operator system ZEUS, we have applied over 20 years of accumulated expertise and created functions that solve well-known problems in the tourism industry, especially in travel distribution. The cloud-based system does not require any complicated setup. The scope of services covers the process chain from the purchase of travel services (hotel, flight, additional services, cruises) to the distribution of travel offers in the market-leading CRS systems. Online sales are served via interfaces for B2B, B2C and meta search. The goal: to distribute individual trips as well as package tours quickly and cost-efficiently.

Name: Inboxroad
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Amsterdam, 130 De Lairessestraat, 1075
Company description: The highway to the inbox: https://www.inboxroad.com/ Seven years ago, we started as a small email marketing company working for a big Dutch Travel Agency. It turned out so successful that within years we were sending enormous volume in more than 15 countries around the world. As a result, we were outgrowing our existing email tools, which lead to unwanted risks and delays. Since deliverability became key to our business, we needed to have full control over our email campaigns. We took matters in our own hands and decided to purchase our own advanced SMTP server. It ran simultaneously with the previous existing platforms that we had connected, and we noticed that our own server had not only better deliverability, more important, it also resulted in a higher ROI. More and more friends in the business reached to us out for help and asked if they could take benefit of using our mail server. Not long after that, we decided to market our product, and Inboxroad was born.

Name: Cuba Travel - Kubaspecialisten I Skandinavien
Company description: Cuba Travel - Kubaspecialisten i Skandinavien är en svensk researrangör som skräddarsyr arrangemangen utifrån Dina intressen och önskemål.  Vi har ställt resegaranti till Kammarkollegiet för våra resenärers säkerhet. Oavsett om Du reser själv, tillsammans familjen, med vänner eller kollegor så har vi olika alternativ att erbjuda. Våra medarbetare har ett gediget intresse för Kuba och till vår hjälp har vi ett brett kontaktnät av lokala specialister i landet.  Sedan år 2003 är vi specialiserad på skräddarsydda resor till Kuba och vi har ställt resegaranti till Kammarkollegiet. Sedan november 2010 har vi egen svensktalande personal i Havanna som assisterar våra resenärer på plats. Havanna och Varadero i all ära, men Kuba är så mycket mer. Detta fascinerande land kan erbjuda sina gäster ett spektra av olika upplevelser. Varför inte prova på: - Dykning i Maria La Gorda - Några dagars rundresa med fokus på kultur och härlig avslutningsvecka med sol & bad - Flugfiske i Las Salinas - Salsaresa till Havanna - Golf på Varadero Golf Club - Bröllopsresa eller t.o.m. giftermål i underbar, romantisk miljö - Rundresa med guide - Casa particulares - Utflykter Vi har avtal med kubanska ambassaden och ställer ut turistvisum till Kuba. Detta behöver vi: Maila kopia av pass, vi behöver endast sidan med foto, samt uppge när ni senast behöver få visumet. Uppge e-postadress, telefon samt adressuppgifter. Maila även kopia på er elektroniska flygbokning. Betala in sek 350 per visum till bankgiro 5758-2207, uppge visum och efternamn som referens. Betalningsmottagare är Tropical Holidays of Sweden AB. Då betalning inkommit på vårt konto påbörjar vi handläggningen av visumet. Visumet postas till angiven adress. Välkommen att kontakta oss inför Din resa till Kuba. Carina Backman Grundare och VD Skicka förfrågan om researrangemang till resa@cubatravel.se

Name: Scandinavian Discovery DMC
Company description: Scandinavian Discovery DMC is a Tour Operator & Destination Management Company (Incoming services in Stockholm - Sweden, Copenhagen - Denmark, Oslo - Norway, Helsinki - Finland and Lapland) specializing in venues management in Scandinavia and providing unique travels of quality. Scandinavian Discovery DMC organizes incentive trips, meetings, congresses and events in Scandinavia since 1989. As Scandinavian Discovery works very closely with travel agencies or incentive houses since the early planning of the itinerary, it can offer a wide range of itineraries and options. We have been organizing venues of the most prestigious accounts in the international corporate world. Our experienced specialists have a complete knowledge of all the major destinations in Scandinavia, so we are always able to offer the best possible itinerary that the available budget can afford.

Name: Kenba Travel Sverige
Company description: Kenba Travel erbjuder oförglömliga resor till förnuftiga priser.  På Kenba Travel har vi medvetet valt att fokusera på destinationer i Mellaneuropa och Medelhavsområdet, där vi kan garantera unika kulturella upplevelser och intressanta aktiviteter för vuxna som vill uppleva kulturella resmål utöver det vanliga. Vårt speciellt utvalda sortiment är grundläggande för vår filosofi att kunderna och deras upplevelser är det viktigaste – därför är det av vikt för oss att vi arrangerar resor till destinationer där vi kan kalla oss experter. Kenba Travel är din resebyrå med utvalda kulturrundresor i Mellaneuropa och Medelhavsområdet. Vi erbjuder kulturella resor till våra speciellt utvalda destinationer där vi med bakgrund av vår expertis kan garantera att du som kund får en unik och minnesvärd reseupplevelse. Vi erbjuder guidade turer på våra speciellt utvalda destinationer till Tyskland, Italien, Holland, Turkiet och Grekland. Våra spännande reseprogram tar alltid hänsyn till att det är aktiviteter och upplevelser för både aktiva och kulturintresserade.   Kenba Travel sätter kundens upplevelser främst. Det ser vi till genom att arrangera resor utanför högsäsongen, där det finns bättre möjligheter att njuta av det som våra olika destinationer bjuder på – oavsett om du vill uppleva stranden, staden eller de historiska och kulturella sevärdheterna. Vi kan erbjuda låga priser på alla våra resor då vi inte tycker att mellanled ska öka priset för våra kunder. Därför är inte andra resebyråer inblandade när du bokar resor genom Kenba Travel.

Name: Hallands Affärsresor AB
Company description: Hallands Affärsresor- An innovative and customer focused Business Travel Agency for Business & Leisure  In Our point of view personal service is simple –We are with you all the way -  a customer focused Business Travel Agency  - Whether you live on the road or travel rarely, we're there to help every step of the way.  Our Promise is our pledge to ensure every trip is as successful, rewarding and pleasant as possible  Partner to VIA Egencia and subsidiary to Smålands Affärsresor

Name: LAGENTOUR
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 42-50 C Eschborner Landstraße, 60489
Company description: En qualité de première agence de communication en Allemagne proposant un service global qui s’est spécialisée dans le tourisme en France & dans la Francophonie, nous vous proposons des actions de communication individuelles et sur mesure. Relations presse : Des relations publiques efficaces nécessitent un fil rouge, des caractères captivants et des thématiques qui vous rendent unique. C’est votre propre histoire que nous racontons. Marketing Think global – act local. C’est notre conviction. Grâce à notre longue expérience en marketing touristique, nous nous adressons précisément à votre cible allemande. Promotion commerciale Se positionner par se différencier – ce concept vaut pour votre destination de même que pour le domaine des tour-opérateurs. Ensemble avec vous, nous constituons votre profil individuel et le communiquerons directement à notre réseau B2B, établi depuis de longues années. Réseaux sociaux Des recommandations personnelles comptent plus que 1.000 slogans publicitaires. Votre communauté connaît votre destination et son charme unique. Nous nous servons de ce potentiel et créons de l’interaction, de la portée et du succès mesurable. Suivons la logique du bouche-à-oreille ! Rédaction online, Google Ads et traductions Votre site web en allemand est plus qu’une simple traduction. Nous ne traduisons pas, nous adaptons. Nous transportons l’envie de voyager, suscitons de la curiosité, créons un contenu spécial pour votre cible allemande et nous nous servons de toutes les astuces de notre langue maternelle.

Name: Profi Travel Center
Company description: Профи Травъл Център е лидер на българския пазар за групови екскурзии до шестте континента! Всяка година изпращаме над 40 групи с подготвени водачи до Бразилия и Аржентина, Перу, Чили и Великденските острови, Колумбия, Еквадор с о-ви Галапагос,Канада и САЩ с Хаваи,Гватемала, Коста Рика и Панама, Индия, Непал и Бутан, Южна Корея, Китай с Тибет и Япония, Индокитай - Мианмар,Тайланд, Камбоджа, Лаос и Виетнам, Австралия и Нова Зеландия, ЮАР, Намибия, Ботсвана и Зимбабве, Кения и Танзания!Всички наши екскурзии се организират в най-подходящото време и с необходимия комфорт и сигурност на пътуването! Екипът ни е с повече от 20 години опит и е вдъхновен да създава перфектните пътешествия за Вашата колекция от незабравими спомени! Защо да пътувате с Профи Травъл Ние се вслушваме Вашето мнение е важно за нас и ние постоянно преглеждаме Вашите отзиви и обновяваме своите маршрути в съответствие с Вашите препоръки. Най-подходящия сезон Всички наши екскурзии се извършват в най-подходящото време за съответната дестинация. Ние сме професионалисти Профи Травъл Център има всички нужни сертификати и застраховки като лицензиран туроператор и акредитиана ИАТА агенция. Специални бонуси и отстъпки Винаги със специално отношение към нашите лоялни клиенти и значителни отстъпки за ранни записвания. Ние сме вдъхновени Точно като Вас, ние сме вдъхновени да пътуваме и откриваме за Вас все по-нови и красиви места, да създаваме перфектните пътешествия и да обогатяваме Вашата колекция от незабравими спомени. Малки групи Високо качество на обслужване и внимание към всеки наш клиент в групите ни от 15 до 20 туристи. Сигурни партньори Нашите партньори от 6те континента са професионални туроператори с лицензирани местни екскурзоводи, транспорт и всички необходими застраховки. Стил и комфорт Настаняването е само в 4 и 5 звездни хотели и лоджове.  За екипа Екипите ни са професионално подготвени и с дългогодишен опит в туризма, което е и гаранция за качеството на нашите продукти.

Name: Dumas Media
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Genoa, 5 Via Lodovico Muratori, 16152
Company description: Una vera e propria redazione digitale specializzata nella progettazione di strategie e nella creazione di contenuti per i media digitali e tradizionali, al servizio del partner. Affianchiamo istituzioni, enti per il turismo e aziende che hanno bisogno di supporto nella loro attività di comunicazione sui media. Lavoriamo con piattaforme digitali, broadcast, enti del turismo, tour operator, organizzazioni istituzionali, brand e aziende. Seguiamo tutto il processo creativo, dal concept alla distribuzione.

Name: Orlandini Gadgets
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Pistoia, 110 Via Aristide Gabelli, 51100
Company description: The Orlandini company was founded in 1987 as an advertising agency. In 1990, thanks to an intuition of the founding partner Fabio Orlandini, he began to market advertising gadgets for local companies and by collaborating with a bag manufacturer he expanded into the tourism sector, addressing himself above all to travel agencies. From the first contacts with agencies in the Pistoia hinterland, Orlandini manages to acquire customers throughout Tuscany, up to the current spread throughout the national territory. The constant research and evolution of the products offered meant that the company was in continuous growth and expansion. In fact, from an initial small artisan production, it moved on to import lines of quality articles, designs and selected materials. Since 2014 Orlandini, thanks to the collaboration with professionals in the fashion sector, is also a manufacturer of lines of articles suitable for the needs of a clientele looking for practicality, price and quality. The strength of the achievement of the aforementioned objectives is undoubtedly the very streamlined structure, which allows you to relate directly with customers, creating that fundamental synergy, so that relationships, in addition to being profitable, become long-lasting.

Name: M&cs Marketing & Communication Strategy
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 12 Via Domenico Cimarosa, 20144
Company description: Dopo aver maturato una esperienza in qualità di Direttore Commerciale e Marketing alla Dresser Wayne, multinazionale americana operante nel settore dei beni strumentali per il mercato petrolifero, Tiziana Pini entra a far parte del Tour Operator I Viaggi del Ventaglio in qualità di Direttore Marketing. Fonda nel 2000 m&cs, un’agenzia di comunicazione e pubblicità con sede a Milano. m&cs si rivolge alle aziende, agli enti pubblici e privati e ai professionisti che hanno scelto di costruire o migliorare la propria immagine e rinnovare il proprio stile di comunicazione per renderlo più accattivante ed efficace. m&cs collabora con l'ufficio marketing del cliente integrandone le attività, consente di avvalersi di un teame di professionisti di alto livello mantenendo un'organizzazione flessibile e senza costi fissi. m&cs offre tutti i servizi legati alla sfera della comunicazione e della pubblicità: art direction, web design, web marketing, pianificazione pubblicitaria, organizzazione eventi e fiere, campagne di incentivazione, pubbliche relazioni e ufficio stampa. m&cs realizza loghi aziendali e brand di prodotto, esegue lo studio o il restyling della corporate identity, elabora e concretizza ogni tipo di attività promozionale, sviluppa e costruisce campagne pubblicitarie su tutti i canali: direct marketing, pubblicità outdoor, annunci stampa, radio, tv, pianificazioni online, web e viral marketing. Attraverso le attività di PR e ufficio stampa, m&cs costruisce e orienta un flusso di comunicazione funzionale agli obiettivi del cliente verso giornalisti, blogger e altri stakeholder, in grado di amplificare i messaggi verso i pubblici di riferimento. m&cs Website http://www.marketingcom.it

Name: Enrico Travel

Company description: Enrico Travel provides world wide travel services. Corporate travel services and leisure travel packages inbound and outbound. Nonni Travel is firmly dedicated to the promotion of sustainable tourism and is proud to have received the World Wildlife Fund's Pilot Project Award for the development of sustainable tourism in the Arctic. Conducting business and making contracts is always based on good faith. Our company prides itself on having built a reputation of trust and reliability with both our clients and suppliers while delivering a personal service with close attention to detail. Nonni Travel offers its own excursions as well as a carefully chosen selection of other tours and recreational pursuits in all three countires at any time of the year.

Name: Asklepieia Health Cluster

Health Tourism is considered to be a great challenge for Greece as the level of the Medical Services provided by our doctors, in combination with the extremely competitive pricing policy in relation to other countries, can create a significant pole of attraction of International Patients. In order to respond effectively to this important challenge, we created "Asklepieia" Which are the gradually Targets:  The cooperation with insurance organizations, big foreign Companies, certified tour operators and facilitators that are going to ensure the flow of International Patients to the Cluster members. Company description: weltweiser is an independent educational counselling service & publishing house. We are neither an exchange organisation nor a tour operator. Our work consists of examining the offers of different organisers and finding the best individual programmes for each party. In addition, as a publishing house, we publish printed guides on the topic of a year abroad & gap year. Last but not least, weltweiser is the founder of and contributor to the WELTBÜRGER scholarships.

Name: LAND & SKY GROUP
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 1/a Viale Francesco Restelli, 20124
Company description: Land&Sky Group, founded in 2005, operates across the tourism, mobility, and hospitality sectors, with a distinct focus on serving the Chinese market, both for inbound tourism and local services. The group provides personalized travel solutions, including visa services, airline ticketing, and curated travel packages aimed at individual tourists and corporate clients. It has established a strong presence in major Italian cities, becoming a trusted partner for both leisure and business travelers. In addition to these core services, the group offers a premium chauffeur-driven vehicle rental service, catering to international tourists and business travelers alike. This transportation network provides efficient, customized solutions for short trips within Italy as well as long-distance travel across Europe. Furthermore, Land&Sky Group is actively involved in digital innovation, developing platforms that enable travelers to plan their journeys in real time, ensuring flexibility and convenience. Beyond its core travel and transportation services, Land&Sky Group is also involved in the hospitality and real estate sectors. The group owns and manages prestigious properties, including high-end hotels, where it blends modern amenities with traditional Italian hospitality. These properties cater to an international clientele, offering personalized services that ensure a luxurious and memorable experience. The group's mission is to provide integrated and innovative travel solutions that respond to the ever-evolving needs of global travelers. While maintaining its expertise in the Chinese market, Land&Sky Group aims to offer seamless, comprehensive services for an international audience. By merging travel, mobility, and hospitality, the group creates enriching and memorable experiences for its customers, emphasizing quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

Name: Fiavet Lazio
Company description: La Fiavet Lazio, Associazione delle Imprese del Turismo, è stata costituita a Roma il 26 Settembre 1961 per raggiungere le finalità proprie delle Imprese turistiche della Regione Lazio: Agenzie di Viaggi, Tour Operator di incoming, outgoing, incentive e congressi. L’Associazione collabora e si confronta con istituzioni nazionali, regionali e associazioni varie per uno sviluppo sempre maggiore del sistema turistico locale e per la condivisione delle strategie politiche del Turismo nella Regione. La mission principale riguarda la rappresentanza delle proprie Associate, tutelandone gli interessi in campo politico, economico, giuridico e sindacale, combattendo e denunciando ogni attività abusiva, esigendo il rispetto delle norme e disposizioni di legge. Gli asset strategici sono salvaguardare ed elevare il prestigio e lo status della professione, dando costante importanza alla formazione tecnica e professionale del personale dipendente e manageriale delle Imprese Associate.

Name: Baldoin Viaggi
Company description: WHO WE ARE Baldoin Viaggi is a travel agency and coach rental company with over 40 years of experience. Founded in 1980 to provide coach rental services, and since 1996 also as a travel agency and tour operator, we are a point of reference for those looking for tailor-made, safe, and high-quality travel solutions. WHAT WE DO Coach, Minibus and NCC rental services: - Coach trips for short and long distances in Italy and abroad for groups and schools. - Pick-up, drop-off, and transfer services for businesses. - Transfers to and from airports, train stations, hotels, and accommodations. - Travel for teams and sports clubs. Travel Agency and Tour Operator: - Tailor-made trips: personalized experiences for every type of traveler. - Outgoing travel packages: organizing trips in Italy and abroad. - Honeymoon trips: dream destinations with the option to create a wedding registry. - Incoming travel packages: exclusive tours to discover the Treviso area and Veneto, with tailor-made itineraries. - Food and wine tourism: organizing tastings in local farms and wineries. - Corporate team building: engaging activities to build winning teams. HOW WE HELP YOU We stand out for our reliability and personalized services. Our fleet of coaches, minibuses, and NCC vehicles is owned and managed in-house, ensuring the highest levels of safety and comfort on every journey. Each client can rely on a tailor-made service that meets their specific needs, with constant attention to quality and details.

With taking the service from Luxury Slovenia you rest assured you and your clients will receive personalized service you and your clients truly deserve wether you are local or traveling from other parts of the world.   Sustainability Luxury Slovenia is committed to serve as a community leader of sustainable tourism, providing our clients all the best the destination has to offer in terms of cultural and natural heritage including the historical sights, cultural experiences, farm to table dining options including organic and products friendly to the environment and locally sourced. We strive to influence our partners with efforts to also promote sustainability and keep Slovenia as one of the leading countries with sustainable tourism.

Name: Race Experience
Company description: Race Experience: uw toegang tot een onvergetelijke Formule 1-ervaring! Race Experience brengt u dichter bij Max en de Formule 1 dan ooit tevoren. Ongeacht welke race u bijwoont, Race Experience biedt u de beste tickets, eersteklas hotels, de soepelste transfers en ongekende toegang op het circuit. Haal het meeste uit een Grand Prix-weekend en boek vandaag nog uw ticket naar een unieke Formule 1-beleving.  Race Experience is lid van de Algemene Nederlandse Vereniging van Reisondernemingen (ANVR), de Stichting Garantiefonds Reisgelden (SGR), de Stichting Garantiefonds Reisgelden Zakelijk (SGRZ) en de Stichting Calamiteitenfonds Reizen. Als reiziger bent u op deze manier goed beschermd en kunt u vertrouwd op reis!  Garanties Race Experience is lid van de Algemene Nederlandse Vereniging van Reisondernemingen (ANVR), het Garantieregeling STO Garant (STO) en de Stichting Calamiteitenfonds Reizen. Als reiziger bent u op deze manier goed beschermd en kunt u vertrouwd op reis! Als kleinschalig reisbureau beloven wij ook: de prijs zoals die er staat, is de prijs die u betaalt voor het arrangement. Geen verborgen verzend- of boekingskosten. Voor aanvullende wensen, zoals upgrade van hotel of entree, worden de kosten vooraf duidelijk gecommuniceerd. De reisprofessionals van Race Experience zijn deskundig, servicegericht en transparant: elk reisdetail wordt op deze manier zorgvuldig voor u uitgezocht. Uiteraard staan zij paraat voor al uw vragen over een gewenste of reeds geboekte race experience. Race Experience is dé Nederlandse reisspecialist in F1-tickets, -experiences, & reizen!

Name: Africa Spirit
HQ Location: Italy, Buttigliera Alta Piedmont, 91 A Corso Torino, 10090
Company description: AFRICA SPIRIT, tour operator specialista in viaggi in Tanzania e Zanzibar, nasce dalla ventennale esperienza alberghiera del Karafuu Beach Resort & Spa, offre una specializzazione e un’ampia scelta di proposte su entrambe le mete. Grazie alla partnership con Tanganyika Expeditions, Africa Spirit è in grado di offrire circuiti Safari, privati o combinati, nei più bei siti di Tanzania, grazie a un solido parco macchine, mezzi tecnici che garantiscono l'autonomia in molti campi e strutture ricettive private che si collocano oggi come punto di riferimento del settore alberghiero della Tanzania. Oltre a questi prodotti, Africa Spirit è in grado di proporre una vasta gamma di strutture ricettive sull'isola di Zanzibar, preziosa gemma dell'oceano indiano, dove il blu profondo delle acque si fonde con le bianche spiagge ricche di vegetazione. L’attività’ di Africa Spirit è caratterizzata da una profonda conoscenza delle destinazioni tale da permettere la creazione di pacchetti ‘su misura’ costruiti sulla base delle singole e personali esigenze di vacanza.

Name: Medieval Mile Museum
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Kilkenny, 2 St.mary's Lane High Street, 0000
Company description: The former St Mary’s Church has been converted into a modern museum and will also be a venue for select events and exhibitions. Designed to enrich the cultural life of the city and provide a new international standard attraction for visitors the museum has several functions: as the starting point for understanding Kilkenny’s medieval history, to display Kilkenny’s Civic Treasures and replicas of some of Ossory High Crosses and to provide a space for temporary exhibitions and cultural events. Displays of Kilkenny’s civic treasures and replicas of some of the High Crosses of Ossory illustrate the local Gaelic monastic heritage and the ancient city’s historic role in Ireland. Kilkenny’s 800-year story is told with a contemporary twist within the new museum. The customer experience contains a long colourful interactive table similar to a giant iPad, an elongated plasma TV screen and projected imagery onto a giant wall allowing visitors to get immersed in the rich history with the aid of modern technology. Kilkenny Civic Trust is a registered charity set up by Kilkenny County Council in 1989 to acquire the premises in Kilkenny of the former Kilkenny Design Workshops.  In late 2016 Kilkenny Civic Trust appointed a new management team to implement a new strategic ambition: to achieve better use of the existing Trust assets, through careful management policies, and identifying new commercial opportunities, to increase visitors and footfall to Butler House and the Castle Yard, to play a strategic role in the development of Heritage Tourism in Kilkenny, to collaborate with the key tourism industry stakeholders (O.P.W., Failte Ireland, Local Authorities, and Tour Operators) to achieve increased economic activity and to oversee the management of the new Medieval Mile Museum, at St. Mary’s Church, off High Street, Kilkenny.

Name: DestinetCHANGE
Company description: +++ Köpfe statt Konzepte +++ Das ist unsere Idee von Wandel. Natürlich ist nicht jedes Konzept unangebracht, aber viele. Und: Wir brauchen einen Wandel im Denken, ein neues Mindset, dazu Selbstführung von Teams, schnelle Methoden, konkrete Lösungen, den Wandel als Normalität.  Genau das wollen wir. Geht nicht, meinst Du? Doch. Wir befähigen Dich und Dein Team mit den aktuellen und künftigen Herausforderungen anders umzugehen, neu zu denken und zu handeln. Freier, kreativer, sinnstiftender.  +++ Für wen? +++ Tourismus: Für Tourismusorganisationen, Tourist-Informationen, Hotellerie, Reiseveranstalter*innen und Freizeitbetriebe, die wollen, dass die Branche zukunftsfähig bleibt - und sich wandelt. Kultur: Für Museen, Theater und alle Kulturbetriebe, die unter "Kulturwechsel" auch einen Wandlungsprozess bei sich selbst verstehen. Für Dich: Für Führungs- und Fachkräfte, Einsteiger*innen,  Selbstständige, Kulturschaffende, Künstler*innen und alle, die sich oder etwas verändern wollen. Wir haben die Tools. Ihr habt das Team. Wir haben das Wissen. Ihr wollt den Wandel.

Name: ACT E.v. Adventure Country Tracks
Company description: Adventure Country Tracks e.V. is a registered non-profit organization whose mission is to establish and maintain off-road routes and tracks in European countries for so-called adventure motorcycles / dual purpose bikes. RESPONSIBLE. By providing information, advocacy and promoting responsible motorcycle travel, ACT seeks to preserve motorcycling on unpaved roads in the hinterland for generations to come and also to promote tourism in rural areas. Adventure Country Tracks works with enthusiastic partners in some countries of Europe, with tourism authorities, land administrations, forest services, tourist boards, tour operators, etc. to provide routes and remote roads for motorcycling. SUPPORTIVE. By investing in communication and hopefully supporting local petty businesses, guesthouses, and local resources, ACT is able to provide free GPS tracks and advice, create photo and video archives of the routes, and educate the motorcycle community on the routes.  EPIC. Our desire is to provide a detailed documentation of the routes, areas and backgrounds and to motivate the traveler to follow these routes. Epic rides that you can self-guide, taken at your speed, with your friends just however you like to travel. Trails that take you away from population into empty valleys, up windswept hills and mountains, that place you in the nature, and roads – empty sinuous country roads – that make the breaks between the trails every bit as fascinating.

Name: France Écotours
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 1a Kasseler Str., 60486
Company description: France écotours is a mix of French and Francophile travel experts working towards a common goal: Presenting France in an authentic way, facilitating encounters between visitors and locals and promoting cultural exchange. France écotours offers themed trips and reality tours which subscribe to the principles of responsible and sustainable tourism. Our aim is to allow visitors to discover the many facets of the country by taking them off the beaten path and getting them in touch with its nature and residents, while ensuring that their visits do not have a negative effect on its natural environment and people. As such, our trips are built upon low-carbon mobility such as hiking, bike tours, train and bus rides as well as family-owned accommodations, traditional and often organic foods and local tour guides.  We currently run two online marketplaces. One dedicated to green travel in France: www.france-ecotours.com and the other one dedicated to eco-friendly accomodation and sustainable activities in selected European countries: www.myecostay.eu  With the latter marketplace, we want to build a community of engaged sustainablity-conscious actors: owners and clients. Each accommodation requires a per rental CO2 balance from our partner Atmosfair (a greenhouse gases compensator). That's why, in addition to the presentation of selected eco-friendly accommodation and activities, we post specific blog articles regarding sustainability innovations and news (permaculture, naturo-culture, slow food, eco-construction such as the straw-bale construct...) in three languages: German, French and English.  As a responsible tour operator, we are a member of the German Association for Sustainable Tourism "forum anders reisen" and we have been awarded the "CRS for tourism" certificate by the certification office "TourCert" member of the Global Sustainability Tourism Council. Our multi-national and multi-lingual team operates in English, French and German.

Name: DMC EUROPE
Company description: Destination Management Europa GmbH – Ihr Partner für individuelle Planung, Organisation und Durchführung von Gruppenreisen(Leisure), Businessreisen, Betriebsausflügen, Messereisen, Busreisen und Einzelreisen – Ihr Reiseveranstalter für Deutschland und Europa.  Starke Partner Kooperationen mit ausgewählten Partnern aus Hotellerie, Gastronomie, Shuttle-Services sowie zahlreichen, attraktiven Aktiv- und Erlebnisunterbringungen in der Bundeshauptstadt, im Umland, weiteren Metropolen und natürlich in ganz Deutschland, geben uns die Möglichkeit, Ihre individuelle Reise nach Ihren Wünschen zusammen zu stellen. Name: MyBs Travelers GmbH
Company description: Wir sind ein neuer Reiseveranstalter und positionieren uns in der Branche mit einem professionellem Team mit langjähriger Erfahrung. MyBs Travelers hat die Vermarktung im Quellmarkt Deutschland vor über 2 Jahren begonnen. Unsere Angebotsproduktion basiert auf ''Dynamischer Paketierung''. Wir sind technisch in allen relevanten Vertriebssystemen verfügbar und buchbar. Es konnten bisher etwa 4.000 Agenturverträge mit Reisevertriebsstellen (Reisebüros, OTA’s) abgeschlossen werden. Wie der Name MyBs Travelers schon andeutet, bezieht sich die Veranstaltermarke im Besonderen auf die enge und intensive Beziehung zu ausgewählten Destinationen, hier ist der Gast nicht nur zu Besuch, sondern erlebt das Zielgebiet mit allen Sinnen. MyBs Travelers ist eine junge Marke, die sich aus dem Destination-Management heraus entwickelt hat. Hier ist vor allem die Region Antalya auf der türkischen Riviera als wesentlicher Treiber zur Gründung von MyBs Travelers zu nennen.  - Türkei ist nicht gleich Türkei.  Die verschiedenen Regionen bieten unterschiedliche touristische Leistungen mit unterschiedlichen Schwerpunkten, die sich sogar im Saisonverlauf in den Regionen verschieben können. Es geht immer um die Erlebnisse unserer Gäste und das Verstehen und Erfüllen von Kundenerwartungen. So versteht sich MyBs Travelers als Spezialist für ausgewählte Urlaubsregionen. In enger Zusammenarbeit mit den kommunalen Vertretern vor Ort werden zurzeit verschiedene Urlaubsregionen in der Türkei für MyBs Travelers erschlossen. Weitere Regionen sind in der Planung. Ihr MyBs Travelers Team – Unsere Mission heisst: Die Beste Art zu Reisen…

Name: World Of Mountains GmbH
Company description: World of Mountains ist ein Spezialveranstalter für Wander- und Trekkingreisen. Zudem umfasst unsere Produktpalette auch alpine Aktivitäten und Ausbildungen sowie Skitouren, Winter- und Schneeschuhwandern. Unsere Reisen können online oder im Reisebüro gebucht werden.

Name: Wildlife Explorers
Company description: We are a tour operator with focus on educational ecotourism, wildlife observations and expeditions. Our headquater ist based in Berlin / Germany. It is our mission to present spectacular animals and natural areas in all their beauty and diversity to our guests, but also to provide a differentiated and realistic picture of conservation with all its challenges and difficulties in an ever changing world. Education and understanding of coherences becomes an adventure. On our tours we visit various exciting projects of international researchers and conservationists, who allow us and our explorers exclusive insights into their work.  We offer tour packages for small groups between four  and ten persons. Our groups are accompanied by qualified specialists with sound knowledge of biology. Their function is to cater to the individual wildlife interests of our guests, answer their questions and to talk with them about their newly gained impressions. We also arrange individual tours for single customers, associations, clubs, scientists or film productions.

Name: LN Worldwide Travel GmbH
Company description: LN Worldwide Travel ist ein Reiseveranstalter und wird derzeit in erster Linie durch die Marke "Ivory Tours" repäsentiert. Mittelfristig sollen neben Afrika (Ivory Tours) weitere Weltregionen zum Portfolio hinzukommen. Auch dort soll die Ivory-Tours-Philosophie gelebt werden.  Unsere Philosophie ist es, das „echte“ Afrika zu zeigen. Wir wollen nicht auf den Hauptrouten unterwegs zu sein, sondern den sanften Tourismus unterstützen. Das bedeutet, dass die besuchten Regionen nicht beeinträchtigt werden. Ivory Tours will Reisen anbieten, die im Einklang mit Land und Leuten stehen. Wir arbeiten vor Ort fast ausschließlich mit Einheimischen zusammen und unterstützen dank Ihrer Hilfe unsere Reiseleiter, deren Familien und Dörfer seit vielen Jahren. Wir möchten, dass Ihr Geld auch dort ankommt, wo es gebraucht wird – bei der lokalen Bevölkerung. Wir lieben Afrika und hoffen, dass unsere liebsten Ecken für unsere Kunden zugänglich bleiben. Das gelingt nur, wenn die Natur geschützt und den Einheimischen geholfen wird. Dann ist es möglich, mit Ivory Tours das „echte“, unverstellte und ursprüngliche Afrika zu erleben. Unsere Kunden erleben eindrucksvolle Landschaften, riesige Wüstengebiete und traumhafte Strände. Sie lernen stolze Stämme und Kulturen genauso kennen wie Wildtiere in ihrem natürlichen Lebensraum. Wir haben alle Ziele, die wir anbieten, auch selbst bereist und können so aus der Vielfalt, die der afrikanische Kontinent bietet, die spannendsten Regionen auswählen.  Ivory Tours wurde 1986 von Rainer Lösel, einem langjährigen Afrika-Kenner, an der Elfenbeinküste gegründet. Lange bot Ivory Tours als einer der wenigen Reiseanbieter Reisen in die eher unbekannten Länder West- und Zentralafrikas an. Das pure Abenteuer sozusagen mit all seiner Schönheit, Wildnis und Herausforderungen.  Heute hat Ivory Tours sein Portfolio auch um gängigere Reiseziele erweitert – auch hier immer mit dem Anspruch, das Besondere zu bieten.

Name: Alternativ Tours GmbH
Company description: Bereits seit 1975 gibt es unser Reisebüro in Berlin, seit 2005 finden Sie uns zudem in Leipzig und seit 2019 nun auch in Erfurt und Dresden. Name: Senlac Tours Schulfahrten Und Bildungsreisen GmbH
Company description: SENLAC ist der persönliche Reiseveranstalter für Gruppenreisen und ist seit seiner Gründung ein pädagogisch geführter Betrieb. Seit Jahrzehnten sind nachhaltiges und umwelfreundliches Reisen mit uns selbstverständlich. Die Interessen unserer Schüler, Lehrer und Gäste stehen immer im Mittelpunkt. Jede Klassenreise oder Lehrerfortbildung wird individuell nach den Bedürfnissen der Gruppe geplant und betreut. Wir lieben unsere Arbeit und den Kontakt zu unseren vielen Stammkunden und Gastfamilien. Mit unserer langen Erfahrung und unserer Freude am Reisen haben wir erfolgreiche Programme und Materialien entwickelt. Wir sind Spezialisten für Reisen nach Großbritannien und organisieren auf Wunsch unserer Gäste auch Klassenfahrten innerhalb Deutschlands und in unsere Nachbarländer Niederlande, Frankreich, Dänemark, Schweden, Polen, Tschechische Republik, sowie traumhafte Reisen nach Spanien und Kroatien.

Name: Sun-World Reisebüro

Company description: Reisen verkaufen ist unsere Leidenschaft und unser Auftrag. Ganz gleich ob es Sie aufs Meer hinauszieht oder Sie gerne am Strand spazieren gehen. Name: Meli Tours
Company description: For more than 35 years (est. 1985), Meli Tours is a leading Destination Management Company and a B2B wholesaler offering a full spectrum of Destination Management and Handling services, utilizing its extensive local presence all over Greece and its own online (B2B) reservation system.  Meli Tours boasts an extensive network of branches and associates covering the Greek Mainland and Greek Islands on a 24/7 basis.  The network is supported by our international sales offices in Bulgaria and Romania. Meli Tours operates and distributes travel services in Greece to B2B customers worldwide in the following ways:  1. Accommodation: we are able to offer to our clients (Tour Operators and Travel Agencies) access to confidential B2B rates via our online Agent System, which they can use in order to make bookings with NET B2B rates and live availability. Name: QuPlace
HQ Location: Belgium, Wallonia, Tournai, 6 Rue Des Jardins, 7500
Company description: Introduction QuPlace est un outil de géolocalisation pour objets ou personnes égarées.Il consiste en un bracelet doté d’un QR code et d’un code PIN qui sont identifiés sur une plateforme web. Le bracelet peut être géolocalisé de plusieurs façons. Soit par son QR code, soit par son code PIN. Ces deux éléments sont complémentaires à l’efficacité du bracelet et sont détaillés au point deux. QuPlace s’ajoute à la liste des outils de recherche et de prévention centrés sur les disparitions d’objets ou de personnes. Le service est le fruit d’un rêve commun de quatre entrepreneurs belges. Comment ça fonctionne ? Le système QuPlace est propre à notre ère numérique et son développement prend appui sur les nouvelles technologies mobiles. QuPlace, c’est la combinaison de deux codes, le QR code et le code PIN, inscrits sur un bracelet que peut porter n’importe quel objet ou personne. Le bracelet peut être géolocalisé de deux façons. Soit une personne tierce scanne le QR code avec son smartphone et un sms est envoyé au propriétaire avec les coordonnées géographiques à dix mètres près. Soit cette même personne relève le code PIN, se rend sur le site de QuPlace et inscrit l’endroit où elle a repéré le bracelet. QuPlace fonctionne sur tous les systèmes mobiles (Android, Apple, Windows Phone,...). Les bracelets peuvent être personnalisés pour une commande massive à destination des institutions comme les parcs d’attractions, les agences de voyage, les constructeurs de bagage,... Les cibles QuPlace s'adresse aux personnes âgées et atteintes de démences (Alzheimer, autisme, schizophrénie,...). Un bracelet QuPlace porté à la main, c’est une chance plus grande d’anticiper de nombreux soucis. QuPlace cible aussi les animaux et d'autres structures comme les maisons de retraite, les constructeurs de voitures, les agences de voyage, les refuges pour animaux , les tours opérateurs, les associations de recherche d’enfants, les pharmacies,...

Name: 4Springs Case Mobili

Company description: L’azienda 4Springs, da anni leader in Italia nel settore delle case mobili, è nata sull’esperienza ventennale del titolare Paolo Lombardi. Dopo aver venduto per anni case mobili nuove ai Tour Operator europei per conto della ditta Shelbox, Lombardi ha iniziato a comprare gli stock delle loro case mobili usate e a proporle ai suoi clienti italiani, sia campeggi che privati.  Provenendo da flotte di aziende prestigiose, spesso di Tour Operator o di grandi campeggi, le nostre case mobili sono, quindi, state realizzate da aziende di primaria importanza (SHELBOX, WILLERBY, IRM, O’HARA, SUNROLLER) e sono spesso ricche di accessori che quasi mai figurano nella dotazione standard delle case mobili, inoltre, il nome prestigioso delle aziende che le utilizzavano garantisce che fino all’ultimo giorno avevano ricevuto tutta la manutenzione necessaria per essere all’altezza dei loro standard di qualità. Siamo molto competitivi nelle forniture di grossi stock a campeggi o rivenditori sia italiani che esteri e siamo in grado di far partire le case direttamente dai campeggi in cui ritiriamo, accompagnando in questo caso il cliente sul posto e permettendogli di scegliere le case mobili che gli saranno poi inviate. Abbiamo anche un’ottima organizzazione logistica, grazie alla quale siamo in condizione di consegnare in tutta Italia, isole comprese, a costi competitivi, senza che il nostro cliente debba preoccuparsi di predisporre un trasporto eccezionale. Inoltre, avendo spesso disponibilità di vari modelli in diversi campeggi, è nostra cura suggerire al cliente le soluzioni più vicine al luogo di destinazione e quindi più convenienti sul piano economico. Per tutte queste ragioni la nostra azienda cresce ogni anno, sia vantando un forte indice di fedeltà da parte dei nostri clienti storici, sia acquisendone continuamente di nuovi, spesso grazie al semplice passaparola partito da persone che si sono servite da noi. http://www.casemobilioccasione.com/

Name: IFT Reiseagentur
Company description: Die 1972 in Hamburg-Eppendorf gegründete IFT – Internationale Flug & Touristik GmbH & Co. hat im Januar 2018 einen Gesellschafterwechsel erfahren und mit ihm eine Runderneuerung – innerlich und äußerlich. Nicht nur die schönen Jugendstilräume wurden in monatelanger Detailarbeit komplett renoviert, auch der Name hat sich geändert in die heutige IFT Reiseagentur GmbH & Co. KG – kurz IFT. Technische Innovationen und neue Ideen gepaart mit alten Werten, das ist das heutige Konzept, über das sich langjährige Stammkunden mit uns genauso freuen wie alle, die jetzt zahlreich hinzukommen.

Name: Stephanos Holidays
HQ Location: Italy, Siena, Chianciano Terme, 39 Via Paolo Ingegnoli, 53042
Company description: Il Gruppo In.Tur.Alb. srl nasce in Costiera Sorrentina nei primi anni '70. Inizialmente come agenzia di viaggi, svolgendo anche il ruolo di Tour Organizer. Nel 2008 si espande creando una nuova realtà il Tour Operator "Stephanos Holidays" con propri prodotti e vari dipartimenti suddivisi in settori: * “Incoming & Tour”: Gruppi per il Centro Sud Italia con Sorrento, Capri, Ischia, Puglia, Sicilia, Sardegna con programmi e tour personalizzati. * “Servizi”: Noleggio Bus G.T., Guide ed Assistenza Multilingue, Ristoranti, Passaggi Marittimi, Voli Aerei, Noleggio imbarcazioni, Dimore d'epoca. * “Outgoing gruppi e tour organizzati”: Italia/Europa/Mediterraneo. * “Individuali mare Italia”. * “Individuali mare estero”: Slovenia, Croazia, Grecia, Turchia, Tunisia, Libia, Marocco, Messico, Mar Rosso ed Egitto Classico con Crociere sul Nilo. "Stephanos Holidays", pur mantenendo un ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo, mira all’abbattimento dei costi attraverso una serie di servizi accessori come la diminuzione della spesa “Quota apertura pratica”; dell’assicurazione inclusa “assistenza-medico-bagaglio” la formula “prenota prima paghi meno”, la polizza facoltativa di “annullamento viaggio” e la formula “parti prima paghi dopo”. Nel 2009 la "Stephanos Holidays" lancia sul mercato italiano un efficiente sistema di prenotazioni alberghiere e pacchetti on-line nel mondo, in esclusiva per le ADV per il mercato FIT.

Name: Simply Education
Company description: Siamo un Tour Operator specializzato nell’organizzazione di viaggi, vacanze studio e lavoro all’estero, stage professionali retribuiti e non, per ragazzi di ieri, di oggi, di domani e non solo. I nostri obiettivi: migliorare l’aspetto didattico del prodotto e cercare senza compromessi la migliore soluzione turistica possibile. Garantiamo un elevato standard di formazione e la possibilità di conoscere i molteplici aspetti della cultura del paese visitato. La varietà dei corsi, sia da catalogo che tailor-made, e le numerose destinazioni disponibili, dimostrano che Simply Education Travel non è solo viaggi studio, ma è la chiave per una nuova esperienza di vita, per un nuovo lavoro, per una crescita   professionale. Viaggiare ed apprendere le lingue non è difficile … è Simply!

Name: Marca Treviso
Company description: MARCA TREVISO is a Foundation that since 1996 has been the Tourism promotion consortium of the city of Treviso. It includes and represents over 200 tour operators and local authorities whose goal is to represent the entire territory of Treviso, and who have chosen to get together and integrate their activities with other private, public parties and charities to meet the needs of cultural and naturalistic tourism (and tourists). This is the tourism which gives value to the authenticity of agricultural products and relates to tourists who want to immerse themselves in the streets and squares of our urban and cultural centres, where quality, sustainability and accessibility of our hospitality reflects our quality of life. MARCA TREVISO conveys the most important tour operators, agencies and local stakeholders, and thematic routes to discover the flavours and culture of Treviso.  MARCA TREVISO cares about promotion and marketing of affiliated companies participating in trade fairs, educational and various moments, built according to the new (but also the classics) tourism markets, combining a large selection of Treviso with the increasingly detailed and complex demand of the worldly travel tourist. From 1996 Marca Treviso took part in an average of 35 trade shows per year; hosted more than 150 journalists and tour operators a year; organized and participated annually in about 20 workshops and exchanges in the middle of international meeting between demand and supply.

Name: Voyemo

Voyemo is your expert travel agency: Regardless whether you just need a few good suggestions, a wonderful select accommodation, or special services such as a personal photographer, a chauffeur, or a private dinner at the beach, or a gay-friendly destination trip. Our team of travel specialists will provide truly individual travel experiences. Direct contact with you will enable us to find the perfect destination and the best accommodation as well as wonderful activities to help you realize your unforgettable experience. You will not get a standard holiday package and you do not have to spend your own valuable time to search through a myriad of options out there. Voyemo will fully support you before, during and after your holiday to offer you the best possible travel experience. You will find travel suggestions in our recommendations. We can't wait to design your next bespoke luxury travel experience. We create also the best incentive trip for your company or business partners. Please send us a message or call us for more information: Mail to: info@voyemo.com Phone: +49 151 25 30 70 41

Name: ToPeru
Company description: Beste reizigers, Hartelijk welkom op de website van reisbureau ToPeru. Wij zijn de Peru specialist voor rondreizen in Peru. Als Peruaan in Nederland hoop ik u met de informatie op onze website enthousiast te maken voor mijn prachtige land. Peru is de bakermat van de Inca cultuur en is vooral bekend als het land van de Inca’s. Maar Peru heeft veel meer te bieden. Ook vóór de Inca tijd werd Peru al gekenmerkt door een rijke culturele geschiedenis. En naast een rijke culturele historie heeft Peru veel natuurschoon. Het is één van de meest landschappelijk gevarieerde landen die u kunt bezoeken. Het heeft drie landschappelijke zones: De kust (La Costa), het hooggebergte (La Sierra) en het tropisch regenwoud (La Selva). Alle drie worden gekenmerkt door hun eigen specifieke schoonheid. Onze individuele rondreizen zijn dan ook een mix van cultuur en natuur en u kunt daarbij zelf de accenten aanbrengen door de keuze van de rondreis. Wij hebben actieve, avontuurlijke en ontspannende rondreizen. Ook vindt u op onze website de mogelijkheid om uw eigen rondreis samen te stellen met de hier aanwezige bouwstenen. En mocht u met de bouwstenen ook niet uitkomen dan kunnen wij voor u een reis op maat samenstellen. Wij hopen u binnenkort als klant te kunnen begroeten bij ToPeru. Met vriendelijke groet, Hugo Luis Obregón Marquina General Manager ToPeru

Name: TourismForAll - Tour&Agency
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Sintra, 14 Rua Adelino Amaro Da Costa, 2725-208
Company description: A TourismForAll é um Operador Turístico DMC e Agência de Viagens, reconhecidos pelo Turismo de Portugal (RNVAT 4227), especializados em Turismo Acessível, de Saúde, Bem-Estar e Médico. Somos pioneiros na prestação de Cuidados Especializados, sendo os primeiros a providenciar estes serviços a qualquer pessoa com incapacidade, doença ou dependência. Acreditamos que as limitações de mobilidade, a dependência de terceiros, a necessidade de assistência continuada e alterações no seu estado clínico não deverão representar barreiras para uma viagem. Desta forma, asseguramos uma extensa variedade de serviços especializados com profissionais experientes e licenciados e garantia de condições de segurança e acessibilidade. Devido à nossa experiência, detemos o conhecimento e a consciência do quanto pesam estes detalhes na escolha de um destino de viagem. Os seu sonhos, a nossa determinação… O seu sucesso, a nossa satisfação!  -- TourismForAll is a Travel Agency, D.M.C and Tour Operator, acknowledged by Turismo de Portugal (RNVAT No. 4227), specialized in Accessible, Health, Wellness and Medical Tourism. We are pioneers in providing specialized direct care, being the First Travel Agency in the world providing these services to people with any kind of disability, illness or dependency. We believe that mobility limitations, dependence on others, need for assistance and changes in your clinical condition should not be barriers in leisure and pleasurable traveling. Hence, we assure you a range of specialized services with highly qualified and experienced professionals and guaranteed accessibility conditions. Thanks to our experience we are aware of your main needs and conscious of the weight these factors have when selecting travel destinations. Your dreams, our determination… Your success, our satisfaction!

Name: Cosy For You - Tour Per Tutti
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Naples, 249 Via Aniello Falcone, 80127
Company description: Cosy For You - Tour per Tutti  is a Tour Operator specialized in Accessible Tourism. We identify the accessible structures in Naples and Campania and build tours around them that allow to enjoy the beauties of the city and the region - Naples Historic Center and hills, Campi flegrei, Vesuvian area, Sorrento and Amalfi Coast, Benevento, Caserta , Avellino, Salerno. The main aim is to promote Naples and Campania as a tourist destination that offer ‘COSY" hospitality (‘COmfortable and eaSY’) through an efficient tourist service full of complete, reliable and up-to-date information on tourist offer in the area. Cosy For You adresses to ‘special’ tourists: not only motor disabilities or intellectual and sensorial disabilities, but also tourists who have special needs such as food intolerances, allergies, elderly tourists, pregnant women and families with very young children or temporary disabled ones. Cosy For You - Tour per Tutti è un Tour Operator specializzato in Turismo Accessibile. Individuiamo le strutture accessibili napoletane e campane e costruiamo attorno ad esse percorsi turistici che permettano a tutti di accedere alle bellezze che offrono la città e la regione - Napoli Centro e aree collinari, Campi flegrei, Area vesuviana, Sorrento e costiera amalfitana, Benevento, Caserta, Avellino, Salerno. L'obiettivo è promuovere Napoli e la Campania come destinazione turistica in grado di offrire un’accoglienza ‘cosy’ (‘confortable’ and ‘easy’) attraverso un efficiente servizio turistico ricco di informazioni complete, attendibili e aggiornate sulle offerte turistiche esistenti sul territorio.  Cosy For You si rivolge ai turisti ‘speciali’ : non soltanto disabili motori, intellettivi o sensoriali, ma anche ai turisti che presentano necessità particolari, come intolleranze alimentari, allergie, turisti anziani, donne incinte e famiglie con bambini piccolissimi o disabili temporanei.

Name: Iceland Luxury Tours
Company description: Iceland Luxury Tours is an authorised local travel agency founded in 2009 or with 10 years of experience in offering bespoke travel services.  ILT specialises in private tours and activities for individuals, families, small and large groups alike.  Iceland Luxury Tours is a one stop shop where you get a full itinerary including transfers, accommodation, activities, dinner reservations etc.  We take pride in offering a wide range of services to fit every customers needs. Iceland Luxury Tours owns and manages its own fleet of super jeeps (4x4's) which are specifically modified for Icelandic conditions, winter, summer, spring or fall, highway and off-road.  Approximately 70% of Iceland is highlands which means that you need 4x4's to get to see what we call essential Iceland, the highlands. Our staff is local Icelanders with decades of experience in travel and service. Make sure you choose a travel agency that is authorised and certified by the local authorities like Iceland Luxury Tours. We are looking forward to hearing from you. Your Iceland Luxury Tours staff.

Name: Ekorna
Company description: EKORNA is a local travel agency specialised in tailor-made trips and holidays in Slovenia, Croatia, and other Balkan countries. In 2019 we are launching EKORNA EXPERIENCE – a new brand directed towards luxurious travel. With us everything is not just about the gold and the glamour, it is the luxury of the experience that we value the most. We are locals, an enthusiastic and experienced team. We know all the secrets, all the hidden places, all the shortcuts, all the most beautiful and amazing sights. With us, you will get the best luxurious tailor made experience – the most personalized, unique and luxurious tour through Slovenia, Croatia, Montenegro and the rest of the Balkans. We will be there for you every step of the way before, during and after the trip. We will organize everything so you can just relax and enjoy.  Contact us - we will make sure you will feel luxurious and have the time of your life.

Name: Classy Romania
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, No 7 Intrarea Eliza Moroiu, 040135
Company description: We are a cozy in-country tour-operator that has a special way of setting up holidays and trips of any kind, from customized tours or vacation packages with a wide selection of itineraries throughout Romania and beyond. Classy Romania is interested in building up reliable and long-term partnerships with Tour Operators and Travel Agencies who are searching for the best solutions for their customers. WHAT WE OFFER: -Cultural tours: Medieval fortresses in Transylvania, churches and fortified monasteries in Bucovina, wooden churches in Maramures, all unique UNESCO World Heritage Sites -Wine tours in Transylvania with specialized foodie & cultural guides -Food tours upon your taste (street food, traditional, gourmet or multicultural minorities food in Romania) -Tours in the Danube Delta, a UNESCO biosphere reservation which is a well-preserved habitat with rare species of plants and birds -East European tours – combined countries tours -Special Interest Tours & Luxury Tours - Logistics and VIP handling -SPA and treatment holidays at resorts in the mountains, at the seaside, natural salt mines  -Corporate meetings, team buildings and incentives -Special life events - various local activities and excursions  Let`s explore ROMANIA together!

Name: LIPTOUR Travel Agency
Company description: Cestovná kancelária Liptour už viac ako 20 rokov poskytuje služby Vám, naším klientom. Za tie roky sú to už tisícky zahraničných a spokojných klientov, ktorí prostredníctvom Liptouru spoznali krásy Slovenska, Tatier a Liptova. Ale aj tisícky klientov z nášho regiónu, ktorí spoznávali krásy turistických destinácií na celom svete. Alebo tisícky leteniek, predaných obchodným cestujúcim. Za každým spokojným klientom je kus poctivej práce našich predajcov.  Cesta k nevšedným zážitkom, to je náš nový slogan. Pôvodný slogan “ Vaše správne rozhodnutie “ sme sa rozhodli doplniť. Máme za to, že Vám vieme ponúknuť v tejto ťažkej dobe nevšedný zážitok. Chceme Vám totiž trvale ponúkať niečo viac. Aj tým klientom, ktorí si vyberajú svoje zájazdy z katalógov partnerských cestovných kancelárií, aj tým klientom, ktorí si objednávajú letenky aj low costových spoločností a aj tým klientom, ktorým sa zažiadalo horskú chatu na Podbánskom, bez tečúcej vody, elektriky, len pri petrolejke.  Chceme Vám totiž ponúkať naše vedomosti a skúsenosti.  Chceme Vám ponúkať pravdivé informácie a úsmev.  Chceme Vám ponúkať nevšedné zážitky aj v bežnom živote.  Tešíme sa na Vaše návštevy, či už na našom webe, alebo v našej kamennej kancelárii v Liptovskom Mikuláši. Urobíme všetko pre to, aby sa Vaše požiadavky stali realitou a aby boli pre Vás zážitkom. To je náš cieľ a Vaša Cesta k nevšedným zážitkom.

Name: Plotin Travel
HQ Location: Greece, Ionian Islands, Corfu, 386 Kolokotroni Str. P.o., 49100
Company description: Plotin Corfu is a Tour Operator agency fully licensed by the GNTO, and is member of AOCTA ( Association of Corfu Travel Agents). The establishment of Plotin Corfu dates back to 1973 as a result of a different vision we had about the development of the leisure industry on Corfu, and the firm belief that qualitative services, honest relationships and a human touch are integral parts of long-term success. Our ambition has always been to offer a balanced mix of promoting Cor-fiot history and culture, with establishing modern business structures, ensuring reliability and efficiency in our corporate activities.   Our People Knowledge and experience in tourism and hospitality management has given us the expertise to integrate every new member of the Plotin Corfu team into our working ethos, and equip them with skills that directly reflect on our superior provision of ser-vices. Thanks to our high qualified staff we pride ourselves about our attention to the fine details while fully complying with highly demanding health and safety standards. We are passionate about what we do and it shows: with enthusiasm and creativity we create your unique holiday program or design tailor-made packages in Corfu. The feedback we frequently get from our customers are evidence of our achievements. In a nut-shell, we are here to make the difference!

Name: Lithuanian Tours
Company description: Lithuanian Tours is an inbound Tour operator and DMC providing full travel services in Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia, and the surrounding region. Being one of the oldest and most experienced private tour operators in Baltic countries, we offer our expertise in the region for outbound tour operators, agents, and individual travelers. We organize high standard cultural, historical, city break, nature, and bird watching tours for groups and individual travelers. You can also order tailor-made tours within our destination to get the best trip experience for you and your travelers. We offer high standard services to our tourists. Modern, comfortable and reliable buses and minibuses, local, gourmet restaurants and pubs, accommodation to meet everybody's taste and needs. Our highly professional staff will take care of all your and your clients' needs preparing the trip and during the tour.

Name: Iceland Escape
Company description: Iceland Escape est une agence locale francophone installée à Reykjavik qui vous propose des voyages en Islande et au Groenland. Une équipe passionnée et innovante met à votre service son expertise, sa connaissance et son amour du terrain dans la conception de votre projet de voyage sur-mesure.  En nous basant sur le succès de nos formules individuelles en auto-tour, nous avons développé un panel de produits groupes avec des thématiques de voyage plus précises, afin de répondre à l’évolution de la demande en termes de contenu, de confort et de qualité. Choisir l’agence Iceland Escape, c’est l’assurance : • d’être conseillé par des professionnels francophones sur le terrain connaissant leurs destinations sur le bout des doigts • de profiter d’une expertise et d’un savoir-faire vous donnant accès à des hébergements et des prestataires fiables et compétents • d’une assistance permanente sur place pendant toute la durée du  séjour.  N'hésitez pas à nous contacter, nous nous réjouirons de pouvoir vous répondre à toutes vos demandes : info@icelandescape.com.   Retrouvez-nous également sur Facebook : www.facebook.com/IcelandEscape

Name: VISIT TRANSILVANIA TRAVEL
Company description: We are a travel agency , tour operator, based in Brasov-Romania. On the travel market since 2005, specialized in incoming for private and group tours we are one of the romanian specialists on this market. One of our best products is the Halloween Tour and party.

Name: DMC & Travel Agency Eklata
Company description: Travel agency and destination management company Eklata from Split was founded in 1991 and is one of the leading incoming tour operators specializing in children's and youth tourism in Croatia. Thematic package arrangements, educational programs, excursions, school trips, international summer camps for children and youth as well as party trips are our business specialty.  We are a certified specialist in the organization of school trips according to the criteria set by the Association of Croatian Travel Agencies, Travelife "engage" entity, and we are rated the highest "AAA" rating of creditworthiness and financial stability by international standards.

Name: Travel ID
Company description: Travel ID is founded by Mr. Dimopoulos Dimos, whose experience in the touristic industry makes him a specialist in many areas, as he has worked for over 20 years in Greece but also in Europe from various positions, having a key role in the development and the expansion of the tour operators he has worked with. Our Vision Our belief is that travelling  transforms people  through the experiences it creates in its particular context, there fore, Travel ID is dedicated  to offer exclusive, highly personalized travel experiences endowed with the special meaning that are planned for. meet your expectations in   » City breaks with a cultural focus   » Body  and soul experiences with elegance and opulence in luxurious hotels   » Wedding and Honeymoon in exceptional settings   » Culinary tours experiencing the local living and tasting   » Cruises and Yachting in Greek seas   » Active and Adventure Tours DMC services by   » Accommodation & reservation handling   » Purchasing and Product development   » Yield management   » Content Management   » Groups and Incentives   » Meet and Greet Services   » Transfers   » Excursions &  Organized Tours   » Car/Bike Hire Services our products   With hand-picked luxury hotels Travel ID comes second to none in the quality of services it provides. Therefore our goal is to become a leading luxury travel company, providing an incomparably  high level of  service and destination knowledge, with all the attention to detail you'll come to expect.The insights and information Travel ID offers, help you discover the essence of the destination you choose, making  it easy and fun to meet your expectations for a holiday that will be memorable and unique.

Name: Team Neusta | Experts For Tourism
Company description: Our experts for tourism combine the expertise from all team neusta areas and deliver tailor-made solutions for the industry sectors of tour operators, travel agencies, destinations, tourism marketing, shipping companies, airports and airlines, as well as bus and rail transport.

Name: Trailfinders Ruitervakanties
Company description: Trailfinders Ruitervakanties is a travel agency specialised in horse riding holidays. We offer a large selection of horse riding holidays worldwide.

Name: Diplomata Tours
Company description: Empresa de cariz familiar, fundada em 1981. A sua fundação teve como objectivo criar uma Agência de Viagens / Operador Turístico com uma estrutura simples e dinâmica, que suportada pelas melhores tecnologias e ferramentas de cada época fosse capaz de dar resposta rápida às solicitações de um mercado em crescimento. Um dos seus fundadores - Armando Fernandes - esteve também ligado à fundação de diversos operadores nacionais, dos quais podemos destacar a Top Tours (actualmente TopAtlântico) e Mapa Mundo. Paralelamente esteve também ligado à Algarve Marina, Mundial Turismo e Cityrama, entre outros. Tem como missão "proporcionar a todos os clientes um sorriso de ida e volta, através de uma criteriosa selecção de todos os fornecedores (companhias de aviação, hotéis, rent-a-car, restaurantes, autocarros, guias, etc...), e da conjugação das melhores soluções, por forma a criar pacotes de viagens à medida das suas exigências e sonhos"

Name: Wolfreisen Reisebüro Konstanz
Company description: Wolfreisen ist ein modernes, inhabergeführtes Reisebüro im Herzen der Konstanzer Altstadt. Hier hat der Inhaber Andreas Wolf zusammen mit seinen sieben Mitarbeiter:innen sein eigenes Reisebüro aufgebaut.  Unsere Kund:innen stehen bei uns an erster Stelle. Mit viel Herzblut helfen wir ihnen, ihre perfekte Reise zu finden. Sei es eine entspannte Kreuzfahrt oder ein aufregendes Safari-Abenteuer. Ob Ruhe am Strand oder Action pur – Wir sind da, um Reiseträume wahr werden zu lassen. Auch unseren Mitarbeiter:innen bieten wir nicht nur ein inspirierendes Arbeitsumfeld, sondern auch attraktive Benefits, darunter 30 Urlaubstage pro Jahr, flexible Arbeitszeitgestaltung, eine betriebliche Altersvorsorge und vieles mehr.

Name: Unike Reiser

Name: Din Reisepartner AS
Company description: Tailor Made group travels for businesses, companies and organisastions to were they want there venue/travel. Incentive trips, kickoffs, teambuilding, theme trips etc. Norwegian version: Vi kan tilby et skreddersydd turprogram etter deres behov hvor vi har ordnet alt fra a-å. Vi tar aktivt del i planlegging og tilrettelegging av deres tur og kommer med forslag til innhold og aktiviteter etc. Foruten alt det praktiske rundt reisen med booking av fly, hotell og transport, ordner vi bespisningen skaffer reiseleder/guide. Vi har tilgang til et verdensomspennende agentnett og tar gjerne imot og ordner arrangementer over hele verden. Våre agenter ivaretar kundens og våres behov iforbindelse med dette. Vår partner er en IATA-registrert reisearrangør. Det vil si at vi kan utstede egne flybilletter og kan benytte oss av alle flyselskap - innenlands og utenlands. Foruten flyselskapene samarbeider vi med fergeselskaper, busselskaper, cruiserederier etc.  Ring oss på tlf. +47 93 00 96 80 idag og vi kommer raskt med et godt tilbud på deres gruppereise, firmatur, incentive reiser eller blåtur.

Name: ReasonToGo
Company description: ReasonToGo will be the exclusive partner of the one of Europe's most recognized and proven booking solutions in the Nordics. The unique agreement combines global experience and local knowledge. Book accommodation, activities/skipass and transport in one payment - all-in-one multi destination solution. Travel to and from anywhere in the world with a simple purchase structure function. ReasonToGo will make a travel portal with our own brand and be a distributor of solutions to the travel industry in the Nordic region. The company will market the Nordics in Europe. The technology opens up a completely new marketplace that will give sales opportunities through collaboration with more than 200 tour operators, OTAs and travel agency networks worldwide.  We will also bring to the market ReasonToGo Super App in collaboration with OmniaX International. This solution offers a digital travel assistant to accompany the traveller throughout the journey, inspiring for the the best opportunities at the right time and place, according to their interest with a main focus on sustainability.  ReasonToGo established October 2023

Name: Fantasive UI/UX Design Agency
Company description: Fantasive:  Crafting Impactful Digital Solutions We're a passionate team of strategists, designers, and developers who specialize in crafting impactful digital solutions for a diverse range of businesses and organizations, including NGOs, real estate companies, travel agencies, and tech startups. Name: DanCyber

We get to know you and your brand and products and services, your vision and goals and your business strategy and then we make a brand new and effective Digital marketing Strategy for your business.
