Name: Japonal
Company description: En JAPONAL, agencia de viajes especializada en Japón, llevamos creando viajes únicos para nuestros clientes desde 2019.  Nuestra promesa es crear experiencias personalizadas para cada viajero basándonos en sus necesidades e intereses. No somos sólo una agencia de viajes digital, hemos redefinido los viajes a Japón y ayudado a más de 1000 viajeros a descubrir Japón con total libertad y sin preocupaciones acompañados por los mejores expertos en el país nipón. Todo esto gracias a una cultura basada en el trabajo colaborativo de un equipo joven de más de 30 profesionales, apasionados por Japón y su cultura, ansiosos por compartirla con el mundo. Valoramos la creatividad y la innovación, fomentamos la comunicación continua y escuchamos la voz de todos. Seguimos la filosofía Kaizen, y por ello somos curiosos y trabajamos por mejorar continuamente. Y, sobre todo, ponemos nuestro kokoro en el día a día.

Name: Go West
Company description: Business and leisure travel agency

Name: WILI SLOVAKIA S.r.o.
Company description: V oblasti cestovného ruchu sa pohybujeme už od roku 1992, kedy naša spoločnosť vznikla. Založil ju bývalý podpredseda Národnej rady Slovenskej republiky, úspešný podnikateľ, JUDr. Viliam Veteška, ktorý sa stal v roku 1998 držiteľom Zlatého podnikateľského biatecu a v rokoch 1998 a 1999 bol Prominentom ekonomiky Slovenskej republiky. S pôvodným zámerom vytvorenia prvej holdingovej spoločnosti cestovného ruchu bol pilierom spoločnosti Hotel WILI v Púchove, ktorý sa v roku 2004 stal Hotelom roka. Hostili sme osobnosti z celého sveta zo spoločenskej, kultúrnej, ale aj športovej oblasti. Získali sme bohaté cateringové skúsenosti v zahraničí i na Slovensku. Naše, vo svojej dobe najmodernejšie hotelové wellness centrum na Slovensku, otvárali úspešní hráči NHL Pavol Demitra, Rastislav Pavlikovský a Richard Zedník. A päť rokov sme boli domovom pre Slovenskú hokejovú reprezentáciu do 20 rokov. Súčasťou holdingu sa neskôr stali spoločnosti na prenájom áut, sprievodcovských služieb, obchodu, ale aj cestovná kancelária WILI Travel, ktorá sa starala nielen o obsadzovanie vlastných hotelových kapacít, ale organizovala pobyty zahraničných hostí na Slovensku (lyžovačky, športové sústredenia, detské tábory). Mali sme aj 2 vlastné zastúpenia v zahraničí. Ďalším hotelom v našej sieti bol Hotel WILI v Tatranskej Lomnici (bývalý hotel Družba), ktorý v roku 2006 prešiel rozsiahlou rekonštrukciou a stal sa z neho nádherný apartmánový dom, kde 80% apartmánov vlastnia súkromné osoby a naša spoločnosť prenajíma zvyšných 20%, ako WILI TATRY. Vďaka tomu, že nás to vždy tiahlo do prírody, v roku 1999 vznikol nápad postaviť a prevádzkovať chaty v nádhernom prostredí Veľkej Fatry, v Liptovských Revúcach. Tie sú, dnes už ako WILI HUNTER, veľmi obľúbené aj pre možnosť pozorovania medveďov v ich prirodzenom prostredí. V rovnakom roku ako sme previedli Hotel WILI v Púchove (2010), sa súčasťou našej holdingovej spoločnosti stala vila WILI ROYAL v Belušských Slatinách, ktorú sme do tej doby prenajímali. Tenisový kurt (v dnešnej dobe multifunkčné ihrisko) pôvodne otváral slovenský olympionik Miloš Mečíř, spolu s ďalšími úspešnými slovenskými tenistami. Začiatkom roka 2018 sa turizmové aktivity spoločnosti (prenájom apartmánov WILI TATRY a chát WILI HUNTER) pretransferovali na spoločnosť WILI SLOVAKIA s.r.o. Náplňou tejto spoločnosti je aj prenájom kancelárskych priestorov v Púchove a správcovské úkony v Tatranskej Lomnici. Sídlo spoločnosti WILI SLOVAKIA s.r.o. je v súčasnej dobe v Púchove.

Name: HTS Travel Service Ltd.
Company description: Full service tour operator for culture tours, agriculture tours, corporate travel, performing tours. Incentives and conferences,  special events management. Destinations: Baltic Sea countires and Russia.

Name: Onex Tour
Company description: С настоящото представяне имаме изключителното удоволствие да Ви запознаем накратко с дейността и програмите, които разработваме, както за групови, така и за индивидуални и бизнес пътувания, организиране на семинари и продажба на самолетни билети за цял свят.  ONEX TOUR е лицензиран туроператор с повече от 16 години стаж на туристическия пазар, като в зората на своята кариера стартира като малка, никому непозната, фирма и постепенното израстване се дължи на много труд, старание, умения и вглеждане дори и в незначителните на пръв поглед детайли, както и с помощта на ВАС, нашите клиенти, без които няма да сме това, което сме сега. А именно в момента се нареждаме в едно от водещите места на фирмите партньори в страната и това е факт, с който много се гордеем.  В офисите на ONEX TOUR за въпроси и съвети относно настоящи или предстоящи пътувания на Ваше разположение са висококвалифицираните ни служители, които са готови да помогнат в избора на програма или условия, отговарящи на желаното от Вас пътуване. Съчетанието от приятна обстановка, първокласно обслужване, преференциални цени и всякакъв вид услуги, свързани с туризма е уникалното съчетание, което можете да бъдете сигурни, че ще намерите при нас в офисите на ONEX TOUR. Няма да е пресилено, ако кажем, че нашият екип работи неуморно, като за всеки клиент имаме индивидуален подход и отделяме нужното време и внимание, без да омаловажаваме желанията и възможностите му. Стараем се да сме максимално полезни, като едновременно с това основно правило е да се вслушваме в съветите и препоръките на нашите клиенти и това помага да се дообогатяват познанията ни в различни посоки и сфери.

Name: ID Tours
Company description: ID Tours is a platform which provides you with specially selected, quality tours and destination experiences from reliable tour operators, at an affordable price.

Name: Lingua & Cultura Tours
Company description: Travel Agency specialist on cultural tours for more individualistic travelers typically not susceptible for group travel - combining the advantages of group travel with flexibility. Major topics: literature, theology, dolce vita.

Name: 1DaySailingTrips
Company description: We are a web travel agency located in Rhodes, Greece. We specialize in sailing/yachting/ferry tours in the Dodecanese area and enhancing our wide range of offers, as well as adding new and exciting tours of other Greek regions. What makes us different from all other agencies? Through booking a ticket on our website, you get exclusive access to the payback benefits of local high-standard chosen businesses in the destination you choose.

Name: Travel Company Rossiya GmbH
Company description: Sie wollen mit ihrer Familie verreisen oder planen eine Geschäftsreise? Verlassen Sie sich nicht auf den Zufall, vertrauen Sie auf die Kompetenz der Spezialisten. Wir möchten, Ihre Traumreise nach Ihren Vorstellungen zusammenstellen. In unserem Reisebüro „TC-ROSSIYA“ bieten wir ein breites Spektrum an Reisedienstleistungen, Gesundheits- und Geschäftsreisen. Lassen Sie sich von uns schnell und einfach Ihre individuelle Reise erstellen. Sie können sich auf uns verlassen, wir arbeiten stets mit Zeit geprüften Agenturen. Wir garantieren Ihnen die Einhaltung aller gesetzlichen Bestimmungen und eine einspannte Zeit, auch vor der Reise.

Name: Dik & Company
HQ Location: Croatia, Istria, Rovinj, 2c Ulica Pietro Ive, 52210
Company description: Dik & Company is local oriented travel agency based in Rovinj, the most picturesque town of Croatia. With help of our highly motivated and professional employees which are all passioned for creating the perfect customer experience we aim to empower travelers to collect unique memories of our beautiful town and country.

Name: Spiel Mir Einer! B.V.
Company description: Spiel mir einer! B.V. Wil je graag Duitstalige concerten en evenementen bezoeken? Nieuwe mensen ontmoeten en genieten? En heb je zin in een geweldige muziekreis in Oostenrijk, Duitsland, Italië of Zwitserland?  Dan ben je hier op de juiste plek. Mijn naam is Wijbrand van der Sande, evenementen- en reisorganisator sinds 2003. Als Holländische Käsekopf is het mij en team Spiel mir einer inmiddels gelukt om meer dan 230.000 mensen een fijne avond of vakantie te bezorgen. Dat zijn meer mensen dan het aantal inwoners van Eindhoven, de 5de stad van Nederland. En daar zijn we ontzettend blij mee.   We scheppen er een groot genoegen in om: - de allerbeste Schlager en Duitse Volksmuziek artiesten naar Nederland te halen - dicht bij huis de mooiste shows en evenementen neer te zetten die je even helemaal meenemen naar de Alpenlanden - de leukste muziekreizen te creëren, die je dichterbij je favoriete artiesten brengen dan je ooit voor mogelijk hield - een sfeer te creëren die warm, uitnodigend en gezellig is - je in contact te brengen met gelijkgestemden OMDAT: Samen een fijne tijd beleven, het leven mooier maakt. We hopen je binnenkort te ontmoeten. Hartelijke groet, Wijbrand van der Sande Schlager / Volksmusik Evenementen en Muziekreizen Radio & Televisieproducties DVD Producties Artiestenburo CD/DVD Verkoop Evenementenorganisatie Evenementenbegeleiding, marketing, communicatie

Name: Culture Tours
Company description: Culture Tours is a tour operator offering immersive experiences in Bulgaria and Mexico. Our team speaks German, English, Spanish and Russian. We present you with individualized programs tailored to your personal needs and interest. All of us are very passionate about Bulgaria and Mexico, working closely with the local community to combine culture, history, art, adventure and traditions into an unforgettable experience by you. Our extensive local knowledge allows us to satisfy our customers’ needs through quality and diversity of our tours. Your wishes and ideas are our parameters for a professional service. There are no second chances when you travel.  We’re an established tour operator you can trust. Whether you are a first-time adventure seeker or a seasoned independent traveller, we can help you to discover Bulgaria’s most amazing places, cultures and landscapes in an authentic and exciting way. Our friendly and approachable staff have extensive regional knowledge and their expertise will help to lift your experience out of the ordinary. Our attention to detail and high level of service ensures our happy customers come back to us year after year. Amazing adventures at amazing prices When you are booking the adventure tour of a lifetime, you need to know your holiday is safe, well planned and lead.  We believe that everyone is entitled to have amazing adventures at affordable prices. We take great care to ensure that our tours are the best value for money in the business, and we know that outstanding value means ensuring that all of the ingredients are right, not just the price. We can take you on a journey to the country’s staple landmarks but also to some of its off-the-beaten track sites. Thus you will get a feel of authentic Bulgaria –a country of vivid contrasts, astounding natural landscapes, millennial history and rich archaeological heritage. Book with Us!

Name: Tripsum
Company description: Tripsum es un market network que permite a los usuarios, por un lado, encontrar y planificar el viaje que más le gusta y se adapta a lo que busca y, por otro lado, conecta al usuario con la agencia de viajes española que mejor lo puede preparar.

Name: RMV INTERNATIONAL TOURIST SERVICE
Company description: La RMV International Tourist Service nasce dall’ampliamento dell’organico della già nota azienda di autobus GranTurisimo: Romano Bus, che opera nel settore turistico dal 1978. I tour in bus e i combinati volo+bus rappresentano un considerevole lato della nostra azienda oltre ai servizi di biglietteria aerea, ferroviaria e marittima, noleggio di autobus GT da 32 a 56 posti. Ad oggi con l’incrementare di vendite di pacchetti vacanze organizzate tutto compreso e di organizzazioni di eventi, annoveriamo un costante aumento di Enti pubblici e privati che ripongono in noi la loro fiducia, affidandosi per competenza e rapporto qualità-prezzo che ormai ci contraddistingue da anni. La conoscenza diretta delle strutture e dei fornitori, tutti altamente selezionati ci contraddistingue come partner ideale per proporre ai vostri Associati pacchetti turistici come Tour Enogastronomici, culturali, soggiorni marini, montani o anche solo singoli servizi - Ovunque in Europa sarete guidati , assistiti ed accolti con la migliore ospitalità. Grazie alla collaborazione di grandi Tour Operator nazionali,siamo riusciti ad entrare in progetti finalizzati alla valorizzazione e alla commercializzazione di una serie di prodotti, per viaggi di gruppo Incentive, Meeting, Congressi e Team Building, avvalendoci di esperti nei settori e organizzando pacchetti ed itinerari su specifiche esigenze, fornendo un prodotto con un elevato standard qualitativo.

Name: HISPANO SAUDÍ TRAVEL
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 4 Local 6 Modesto Lafuente, 28010
Company description: TRAVEL AGENCY Nuestra Agencia de Viajes Internacional y Operadora de Turismo, pone a su disposición una amplia  gama de opciones de viajes en  la que ofrecemos servicios garantizados, enfocados a satisfacer sus necesidades profesionales o de ocio. لدينا وكالة للسفر الدولي و تنظيم الرحلات ، نقدم مجموعة واسعة من خيارات السفر المضمونة و نركز على تلبية احتياجاتكم المهنية و الترفيهية.

Name: My Own Travel
Company description: My own Travel – Boutique Reiseveranstalter und Travel Designer Ihre Exklusive GenussReise in Europa Wir planen - Sie reisen - alles ganz entspannt... Träumen Sie schon von Ihrer nächsten Reise? Gut so! Oh - Sie haben keine Zeit, Ihre Rundreise selbst zu planen? Lehnen Sie sich bitte beruhigt zurück. Dafür sind wir ja da! Wir hören uns Ihre wunderbar inspirierenden Wünsche an und formen daraus genau die Reise, die Sie sich in Gedanken vorstellen. Egal, ob Sie in Landschaft schwelgen (oh, ja, davon gibt es in Europa reichlich!), kulturelle Schätze heben, sich feine lokale Spezialitäten auf der Zunge zergehen lassen oder einfach aktiv sein möchten: Wir mixen Ihren ganz persönlichen Urlaubscocktail aus Genuss, Aktivitäten und Erholung. Natürlich mit buntem Schirmchen und extra saftiger Kirsche!

Name: Viajes Gastronómicos S.L
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes mayorista-minorista especializada en viajes gastronómicos por todo el mundo. Creamos los mejores paquetes de viajes a destinos increíbles para que puedas conocer su cultura local a través sus productos, ingredientes y sabores.  Somos miembro afiliado a la OMT y contamos con los mejores asesores del mundo en materia del turismo gastronómico y asesoramos en la creación de planes estratégicos, promoción y marketing de destinos en  turismo gastronómico.   Nuestras principales líneas de actuación son: Grandes Viajes, viajes personalizados, organización de eventos, asesoramiento estratégico, promoción  y marketing de destinos y viajes de incentivo.

Name: Campos Bus S.L. - Viajes Campos
HQ Location: Spain, Asturias, El Entrego, Nº2 C/albéniz, 33940
Company description: Viajes Campos nace como la agencia de viajes colaboradora de la empresa Campos Bus S.L. , empresa fundada hace mas de 40 años dedicada al transporte de viajeros por carretera, ubicada en Asturias y que presta servicios de transporte discrecional para eventos, viajes de corto, medio y largo recorrido, bien sea para grupos o viajes organizados por la propia empresa de diversa índole. La agencia Viajes Campos presta servicios de intermediación turística por todo el territorio nacional e internacional, ajustándose a las necesidades de cada cliente.

Name: Claro Nice Trips
Company description: Confeccionamos ilusión a tu medida, convirtiendo Claro Nice Trips en una agencia de viajes orientada al cliente, especialista, excelente en calidad y con un equipo ganador.... NICE Especialistas en CANADÁ, EEUU, POLINESIA FRANCESA e INDOCHINA Visítenos en www.claronicetrips.com y déjate ilusionar por un viaje inolvidable.

Name: Go2Australia
HQ Location: Czech Republic, Praha, Prague, 2 Biskupsky Dvur, 11000
Company description: We provide tailored holidays for travellers from Czech and Slovak republic to Australia and Pacific Islands. We offer flight tickets, accommodation, transportation, activities and customized itineraries all over Australia. In Australia, we are licenced tour operator in all states and we work only with certified tour guides licenced for NP Uluru and Kata Tjuta.

Name: To-ibiza.com
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 95 Passeig De Gràcia, 08008
Company description: To-ibiza.com est une agence de voyage réceptive spécialisée sur Ibiza. Notre spécialité est d'orienter tous les voyageurs qui souhaitent visiter la perle des Baléares. Nous offrons exclusivement des séjours sur mesure, ou des "bons plans". Notre objectif, est d'accompagner, conseiller, et d'optimiser les vacances de nos voyageurs en fonction de leurs envies et de leurs objectifs. Nous recherchons actuellement des personnes dans les secteurs suivants : - SEM / SEA - Community Management - Ventes spécialisées tourisme (B2C & B2B) - Journalisme & rédaction Si vous êtes un voyageur : n'hésitez pas à nous contacter via notre site internet https://www.to-ibiza.com Si vous êtes un indépendant à la recherche de missions intéressantes : Rejoignez notre communauté de passionnés aux activités dématérialisées. Bon voyage.

Name: Spainally
Company description: Spainally is a company providing comprehensive incoming services all over Spain for travel agencies. We tailor-make each programme from the beginning to the end. We provide the whole package, this includes the design of the tour, the reservation of the services and the supervision whilst the travellers are in Spain.   Spainally is Fiona Pinder and Helle Kofod.  20 years in this business has taught us much and provided us with a network of quality suppliers. Spainally is our personal project and the result of our knowledge and our enthusiasm.  We are two professionals who love our work and pay attention to each and every detail. Everything we do is with the traveller in mind and we do it as if we were planning the trip of a lifetime for our best friend.  We want to transmit this philosophy to the travel agency, to be their ally, so that together  we ensure that the traveller enjoys a singular and unforgettable experience in Spain.

Name: PolishOrigins
Company description: PolishOrigins is licensed by Polish state authorities and insured Tour Operator. We organize private Genealogy Tours, tailor-made Family & Friends Tours and the historical Galicia Tour and Kingdom of Poland Tour. We have been providing genealogy research and tours services in Poland since 2004. With time we gained experience and established contacts and cooperation with other genealogists and historians in Poland, Belarus, Ukraine, Western Europe and in the USA. We decided to create a place in virtual space where people, descendants of the many different nations of old Poland, could freely exchange their interests, feelings and experiences about their common kinship: Polish origins. We set up the website http://PolishOrigins.com which we want to be “the leading way to Polish genealogy”. We have dozens of returning guests. All of our visitors (we don’t remember any exceptions) declare they want and will sooner or later come back to meet with newly found relatives, continue their family search or just experience more Poland with us.

Name: Barolo Wine Tours Experience
Company description: Barolo Wine Tours in Italy (Piedmont Region) is a specialist tour operator.

Name: MOLINÉ TRAVEL
Company description: Agencia de viajes especializada en eventos deportivos

Name: Alternatura Travel Vis Island
Company description: Alternatura is the first and most important provider of adventure tourism on the island of Vis(Croatia), with programs based on the interpretation of natural and cultural heritage. Over the past eleven years tourist agency Alternatura grew into respectable adventure holiday travel agency known for its creativity and passion in traditions, nature of our island and adventure activities. In AlterNatura team are local people who grew up on the island, outdoor sport enthusiasts and nature lovers who have passion in sharing it all with you! We want to introduce you to authentic local traditions and customs, natural phenomena and people, without which the island would not be what it is. Together we will find out why the World Wide Fund for Nature ( WWF) has declared the island of Vis one of the last jewels of the Mediterranean. Our tour begins with hiking and kayaking, rock climbing and abseiling and continues with paragliding, sailing on traditional fishing boat “Gajeta falkusa” on lateen sail and caving in the Queen’s Cave near Okjucina! From the most fishing place on the Adriatic, you will sail to Bisevo, to Brusnik and Svetac, all the way to Palagruza and Jabuka. And the history of Vis? Volcanos, caves. Ionnius, Diomedes, Dionysius of Syracuse, Issa, Plato, Teute, Julius Caesar, The Benedictines, Pope Alexander 3rd, Venice, English on the Adriatic, Governer Robertson, young Nelson, Cricket club, Napoleon, George 3rd, Franz Joseph, Tito, Churchill, commandos, RAF… there’s no other island in the Adriatic with stories like these, told in the way of, maybe, Ionnius way or Teute tours! We will show you fortresses, underground labyrinths, former military bases, airport, a great archaeological museum at Vis. Each day is planned the evening before, giving you the ultimate flexibility to enjoy activities in the very best conditions. You will be the part of the group of 12 people maximum and we are not restricted to the normal schedules, we can be flexible.

Name: Gopack Portugal
Company description: A GoPack é uma agência de viagens que oferece uma experiência personalizada e única, construída à sua imagem. Nós acreditamos que viajar é demasiado especial para não ser feito como deve ser e por isso queremos construir apaixonantes experiências para os apaixonados em viagens. A experiência ensinou-nos que há momentos para tipos diferentes de viagens e viagens com diferentes tipos de momentos, a GoPack entende que uma agência deve perceber o espírito do seu cliente e ajudá-lo com o que este quiser, de uma maneira flexível: há opções para aqueles que querem fazer as suas próprias decisões no terreno até aqueles que preferem estar perfeitamente preparados para tudo o que vier.

Name: Blu Club Villaggi Vacanza
Company description: Nel 1993 Il tour operator, 2° in Italia per numero di clienti, Teorema Tour anticipa i propri investimenti  creando  una struttura di gestione alberghiera denominata “BLU CLUB Villaggi Vacanza” per offrire al mercato prodotti esclusivi alle esigenze del cliente italiano. BLU CLUB ha iniziato ad operare con una gestione diretta in Ibiza nel 1993 e che oggi opera in 8 Paesi (Italia, Spagna, Tunisia, Egitto, Maldive, Santo Domingo, Messico e Cuba) con sedici Club/hotels. L’obiettivo BLU CLUB è quello di confezionare prodotti esclusivi consentendo sia il consolidamento di Teorema Tour sulle destinazioni ove è più significativa e più impegnata in termini di concorrenza sia di aprire nuovi mercati ove Teorema Tour intende sviluppare, proponendo un prodotto sicuro, affidabile che il mercato possa subito premiare. Ciò rende BLU CLUB una Società modulare, in grado di soddisfare le diverse esigenze del mercato, ed offrendo un prodotto con notevole valore aggiunto, esclusivo per le esigenze ed i gusti degli italiani. Scoprire un nuovo modo di fare vacanza, il piacere di essere all’estero senza rinunciare all’ospitalità italiana. Dai campi da gioco alla spiaggia, dal palco al podio, ci si diverte perchè con Blu Club si parte per la località, ma si torna per l’entusiasmo degli animatori. Una vacanza in una nuova grande famiglia, di ospiti ed animatori,  non sembrerà di essere in un villaggio ma di appartenere ad esso. A chi chiede entusiasmo e divertimento o desideri solo relax e comodità; e'  capitato nel posto giusto, dove si e'  sempre liberi di farsi trascinare nel dolce oblio della vacanza o di scatenarsi tra avvincenti tornei sportivi, lezioni di danza, o incredibili giochi. Durante divertenti serate giochi o pizza party sulla spiaggia, tra il riecheggiare delle risate del cabaret, le canzoni del karaoke o le mille luci di un musical, ci si sentirà immersi in un’atmosfera inebriante, perchè si e' i veri protagonisti della vacanza. Nel Blu Club si trovano i sapori della cucina italiana, ma anche il piacere di gustare i piatti tipici locali. Un’armonia di sapori e profumi della tradizione mediterranea sapientemente mescolata con il gusto e la fragranza della gastronomia classica.  Blu Club non dimentica i suoi clienti più piccoli e dedica loro particolari gratuità e riduzioni. Bambino Gratis, l’offerta è sempre valida solo per i bambino/i in letto aggiunto ed in camera doppia con due adulti.

Name: Over Alle Bjerge
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Copenhagen, 29 Julius Bloms Gade, 2200
Company description: "Over Alle Bjerge" is a recently established travel agency built on 20 years of experience in hand crafted travel. We offer breath taking adventures for pioneers and inspirational talks. At Over Alle Bjerge we know that over every mountain top is an undiscovered journey. Our typical guest are pioneers ready to embark the road less travelled: The Tibetan highlands, the Inca heartland of Peru and behind the iron curtain of North Korea. When we travel to far corners of the world our beliefs are challenged and in the meeting between cultures understanding arise and we get a new perspective on ourselves.    "Over all the mountain tops is peace" Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Name: HorseXplore
Company description: HorseXplore - Amazing Riding Holidays Travel Agency from Sweden, specialized in world wide horse riding holidays.

Name: Côtel Hospitality
Company description: -Do you want to create or redefine a commercial team within your organization? -Are you opening a new hotel and want to take the key steps to gain market share as efficiently as possible? -How can you drive more direct bookings and minimize share and dependency on Online Travel Agencies? -Do you need help implementing the latest technology that the industry provides or are you simply thinking of switching PMS or Channel Manager?  Do you have a well-developed distribution strategy that reaches out to relevant markets and segments? -Are you looking for more resources when it comes to hands-on sales management or revenue strategy? -Do you need help to spread commercial understanding throughout the whole organization? -How can the operations team assist in driving profitability? As the industry has developed and competition has become more fierce, we have developed a way of working that has proven to partly drive strong commercial results, but also spread a commercial understanding and commitment through the organization's various departments. The Scandinavian hospitality industry is traditionally not used to working with consultants, this mainly due to the lack of supply and knowledge within commercial understanding. From our years of experience within all different departments in the industry we have realized that there is a need of extra resources and competence in this field. This has lead us to create Côtel Hospitality, where we help other organizations reach their goals. And most importantly understanding the benefits of what setting a distinct commercial strategy will do to your bottom line. Together we can identify challenges and outline possibilities, but nevertheless we also want to help get the work done and evaluate the outcome. During the whole process we make sure to establish the Côtel way of working and make sure the team is confident to carry out the work themselves when our job is done.

Name: LAL Sprachreisen GmbH
Company description: LAL Sprachreisen is part of the FTI GROUP, the fourth largest tour operator in Europe and a specialist in educational travel for children and adults. With six of its own schools in Malta, England, the USA and South Africa, six summer schools for students in England and the USA and more than 70 partner schools, LAL offers courses in nine languages on all five continents. With more than 35 years of experience, the Munich-based company stands for competence in the field of worldwide language travel. If you are interested in a LAL language course, please visit our website, Facebook or Instagram.

Name: Gaffuri Viaggi
Company description: We are an online travel agency, tour operator and bus operator. We offer packages for individuals and groups. Besides we can offer incoming services for foreign partners.

Name: Mundibe
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 28 1º Izda Paseo Santa Maria De La Cabeza, 28045
Company description: MundiBE es una agencia de viajes y eventos especializada en incentivos para empresas, organización de eventos y actividades de teambuilding. MundiBe es un proyecto del GRUPO BIG fruto de muchos años en el sector de los viajes, en la organización de eventos y ocio en toda España y tras muchos kilometros recorridos en diferentes paises alrededor del mundo.  El sueño de sus fundadores fue poder ofrecer experiencias únicas que solo se consiguen dominando y conociendo los destinos y preparando cada viaje como si fuera especial y único. Un atención completamente personalizada, la garantía de ofrecer guías expertos en cada viaje de principio a fin, presupuestos a medida y destinos preparados a gusto del cliente huyendo de los típicos viajes turísticos.  En MundiBE ofrecemos una experencia diferente al turismo tradicional. Nos consideramos viajeros y aprendemos haciendo camino.

Name: Gnammo
Company description: Dal 2014 la nostra mission è quella di rivoluzionare il concetto del “andare fuori a cena”, trasformandolo in un’esperienza socio/culinaria al passo coi tempi. Tutto ciò, viene da noi effettuato quotidianamente creando nuove opportunità di business per gli amanti del cibo e per i brand in cerca di visibilità. In Italia Gnammo è leader nel social eating e vanta un’utenza di 200000 iscritti, tra cui più di 7000 cuochi e numerose collaborazioni con famosi brand come Coca-Cola,Ferrarelle,Porettti e noti Tour operator come: Curioseety,5terre.com e Salento.it . La nostra piattaforma è un’ideale ambiente di mercato per gli amanti del cibo. Qualsiasi utente può scegliere di essere cuoco o ospite, creando o prendendo parte ad eventi culinari a seconda della prossimità geografica e dei gusti personali. Offriamo, dunque, non solo la possibilità di sviluppare un proprio business nel settore culinario, grazie ad una classifica stilata in base alle recensioni degli iscritti, ma consentiamo ,inoltre, all’utente l’occasione di creare un’ampia rete di contatti, rafforzabile pasto dopo pasto. In tre parole: Cucina, Condividi e Incontra. Our Mission: Turning the outdoor eating in a innovating web experience, thus creating new businesses and opportunities for foodies and brands. Gnammo is a social eating company offering a marketplace for food lovers. At any visit users might choose to be a chef or a guest creating or joining a food-related event according to their geographical proximity or personal tastes and meet other users which might (or might not) share some interests. Meal after meal, active users exchange feedbacks and acquire prestigious virtual roles increasing their engagement. In three words it is “Cook,Share and Meet”.

Name: Bulgaria Wine Tours
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Plovdiv, Plovdiv, Emile De Laveleye, 4000
Company description: Bulgaria Wine Tours is the first Bulgarian tour operator specializing exclusively in wine tours. Our aim is to put Bulgaria’s wine regions on the map of global wine destinations. We offer wine tours in all shapes and sizes. We organize group tours as well as individual tours. We focus on small groups to maximize the experience for our guests and to emphasize interaction with each other and the local hosts. Group tours are scheduled at fixed departure dates and itinerary and we provide a tour leader and a driver who accompany the group. Private customized tours that completely suit your needs and wants are tailored upon request for as little as two people. Our wine tours will satisfy the wine expert, the wine enthusiast, as well as the wine novice. There is a little bit of everything for everyone. We have personally checked each destination, wine cellar and hotel so that we are certain that our guests will get quality service and at the same time experience the rich flavours of Bulgarian wines. Our tours show the best of Bulgarian wine regions and also include visits to cultural heritage sites, SPA, recreational activities and rural tourism.  Bulgaria Wine Tours also organizes one day events upon request which could include visits to different wine cellars, visits to events at wine cellars, visits to places of interest etc. We can also arrange your corporate event, incentive trip, business meeting, product launch or teambuilding event. Allow us to familiarize your guests with Bulgarian traditions, culture, history, food and wine. Explore our tours. Let’s start creating memories together!

Name: Biuro Podróży SONRISA Kochampodroze.pl
HQ Location: Poland, Pomerania, Gdynia, 9 Ulica Zygmunta Augusta, 81-359
Company description: Biuro Podróży SONRISA, powstało w styczniu 2008 r. w Gdyni. Od tego momentu zbudowaliśmy ofertę z zakresu kompleksowej obsługi podróży, turystów indywidualnych, jak i osób delegowanych służbowo. Dbamy o to aby nasi klienci nie martwili się o formalności związane z wyjazdem, świadcząc m. in. profesjonalne pośrednictwo wizowe do wszystkich krajów objętych tym obowiązkiem. Ponadto rezerwujemy bilety: lotnicze, kolejowe oraz promowe; rezerwujemy hotele, legalizujemy dokumenty, a także, we współpracy z Towarzystwem Ubezpieczeniowym AXA, Signal Iduna i ERV, oferujemy polisy turystyczne. Ofertę biura uzupełnia sprzedaż wycieczek. Naszym klientom proponujemy wyłącznie sprawdzone i starannie wyselekcjonowane oferty znanych touroperatorów.  W bogatym portfolio naszego biura podróży znajduje się ponad 50 000 umów o współpracy w zakresie obsługi podróży. Zaufali nam podróżujący indywidualnie, jak i czołowe polskie firmy, urzędy, fundacje, uczelnie, a także znane międzynarodowe korporacje.  Zdajemy sobie sprawę z tego, że każda podróż jest inna i każdy klient wymaga indywidualnej obsługi!   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SONRISA Travel Agency was established in January 2008 in Gdynia. From that moment on we have built an offer in the field of comprehensive travel services for individual tourists as well as business delegates. We ensure that our clients are not worried about the formalities concerning their trips providing professional visa intermediation for all countries which require this obligation. Moreover, we book hotels, flight, train and ferry tickets as well as legalise documents. We also offer tourism policies in cooperation with the AXA, Signal Iduna and ERV Insurance Associations. The above offer is completed by the sale of tours. We offer our clients only verified and carefully selected offers of well-known tour operators. The rich portfolio of our travel agency includes over 50,000 cooperation agreements regarding travel services. We have been trusted by individual travelers as well as leading Polish companies, offices, foundations, universities as well as well-known international corporations.  We are aware of the fact that each case is different and each client needs individual service!

Name: OlaSpain
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, L'hospitalet De Llobregat, 3 Carrer Cooperativa Escala, 2o-2a
Company description: OlaSpain is a travel agency located in Barcelona, serving mostly Turkish clients  who are visiting the magnificent Iberian Peninsula, Spain every year. Our aim is to direct well all the Turkish people who visit Barcelona and Spain. We accompany and help them to choose nice restaurants, hotels, leisure activities depending on their budget. We recommend places to visit not only touristic but also the real Spain and live like a local.   We – as a talented and professional team – select the most exclusive and suggested places for you to make your Spain trip unforgettable.

Name: Mix2Travel
Company description: Mix2Travel is a company whose portfolio covers a wide range of flexible end-to-end, intuitive e-commerce solutions for the tourist industry in the global B2B / B2B2C/ B2C and enterprise segments. Our solutions offer travel agencies, tourist operators, hotels and other players the possibility to market their products on a single effective and ultra-flexible platform. These solutions comprise engines for booking flights, hotels, transfers and other activities in various destinations. These can be combined, while at the same time finding the best price. Using our solutions, products and services, you can manage your e-commerce platform in real time and make it easy and highly intuitive for your client. We provide everything you need from design to the implementation of a third party service to start or strengthen your involvement in the world of e-commerce smoothly, boosting your economy of scale and starting or increasing your online sales from day one in the partnership. From flights to hotels, including a vast databank of individual or combined activities within a static or dynamic package or not, or better still using both at the same time, your clients will have access in just a few clicks to holidays that meet and are perfectly adapted to their current needs. They can select packages previously created by you and customise them according to their own preferences. The booking engines can be personalised so you can just sell your own products/services to your existing clients, or you can use the full range of services, for which we offer the opportunity of a partnership to reach more customers.

Name: Indigo Travel Group
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Montichiari, 5/a Via C. Battisti
Company description: Indigo Tour Operator nasce dall’esperienza di Anna, imprenditrice da sempre, che con la sua passione ha creato un tour operator capace di fare del viaggio uno stile di vita, un’esperienza irripetibile. Competenza, professionalità e alta qualità sono le caratteristiche che, fin dall’inizio, sapevamo sarebbero rimasti i nostri punti di forza. Fondamenta solide che hanno permesso ad Indigo di affermarsi nel mercato italiano ed estero. Grazie alla collaborazione di tutto lo staff, Indigo ha ampliato i suoi orizzonti con oltre 7 uffici nel mondo ed uno staff creato esclusivamente per voi, che saprà assistervi in ogni aspetto della vostra vacanza. Emirati Arabi, Oman, Maldive, Mauritius, Sri Lanka, Thailandia, Caraibi… la nostra grande famiglia, in ognuna di queste destinazioni è pronta ad accogliervi di persona e rendere il vostro viaggio indimenticabile.

Name: Travel Agency Spare / Ax Group
Company description: AX Group is a business chain which also includes Travel agency Spare and Spare sport. It means more than 20 years of successfully providing tourism services both in Latvia and in the international market. Our related businesses offer services for individual tourists or VIP clients and sport or medical tourism alike. AX Group offers luxury car rental with or without driver. For our clients we provide transfers wherever necessary, even transfers with a helicopter. What should be emphasized is our specialization and successful experience in the area of VIP customer services:  faster reception in the embassies of Republic of Latvia for acquiring a visa or an invitation,  booking of VIP terminals in airports,  transport from the terminal,  plane rental,  transfers and excursions with a helicopter,  cars with or without a driver,  booking of hotels or VIP apartments,  booking of tickets and restaurants and organization of business meetings.  Because of the large amount of interest, we also offer obtaining of residence permits in Republic of Latvia. Spare Sport is successfully providing services for sport tourism - football, volleyball, basketball and fencing game organization for commands, clubs and training camps around the world. For the sportsmen we offer obtaining of visa, booking of hotels, transfers, uniform cleaning, rental of the best sport halls and fields. Medical services are also available by the best specialists in Latvia. Our clients return to us because they are satisfied with the quality of our services and individual handling of each client's requirements.

Name: CroGulets
Company description: CroGulets is a luxury travel agency specialized in boat rentals in Croatia. CroGulets is offering hand-picked boats available for charter in Croatia. We take care of the whole charter process, from start to finish; from finding the perfect boat, planning the best itinerary, and welcoming the clients on board. Our team is available anytime before, during, and after your trip. We work directly with boat owners, to assure the best prices and carefully select all partners that provide experiences and services.  Your Adventure Starts Here.

Name: Nomade 4 SDGs
Company description: Nomade4SDGs is the fundraising platform for your local, positive impact project. Nomade is a mobile platform designed for digital nomads and remote workers to confidently travel with a positive impact. Unlike other online travel agencies, Nomade allows their users to contribute 100% of nomade's booking commissions to projects aligned with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals, make genuine human connections centered around experiences, and manage their work/life schedule.

Name: Blutravel
Company description: Blutravel vanta oltre 10 anni di esperienza nel mercato del turismo offrendo soluzioni capaci di far fronte a tutte le esigenze. Il team di Blutravel è giovane e dinamico ed opera con serietà e professionalità assicurando ai clienti la perfetta riuscita di ogni evento, viaggio o meeting aziendale.  La nostra agenzia collabora con i migliori Tour Operator, compagnie aeree ed i migliori fornitori di location a livello internazionale, consentendo di individuare le strutture ricettive ideali alle esigenze di ogni Cliente per offrire una gamma completa di servizi e soluzioni.  Di seguito alcuni servizi offerti: • VIAGGI DI NOZZE • PACCHETTI TURISTICI  • STRUTTURE ALBERGHIERE • VIAGGI DI GRUPPO/ INCENTIVE •  BIGLIETTERIA AEREA/ MARITTIMA/ FERROVIARIA

Name: Algarve Treasures - Experiences & Events
HQ Location: Portugal, Faro, Faro, N.º 6 Rua Do Parque Infantil, 8005-269
Company description: Algarve Treasures — Experiences & Events Tourist entertainment company and local experts in creating authentic experiences and memorable events for Groups in the Algarve region. With over 20 years of experience in the tourism sector, we work exclusively with local partners and offer a wide range of unique proposals — always with detail, dedication and passion for our territory. In 2025, we assumed a new identity: more solid, more mature and fully aligned with our purpose. From “Tours & Experiences” we evolved to “Experiences & Events”, reflecting what we really are today: strategic partners for Travel Agencies, DMCs and Event Organizers, with personalized, dedicated and reliable service. With a strong focus on the corporate segment, we also support the organization of incentives, conferences, congresses and business events, offering various services and also creating memorable experiences that strengthen teams, mark (re)encounters and elevate each Event. We believe that true luxury lies in authenticity. That’s why we always strive to create unforgettable moments that blend and celebrate the culture, nature and genuine traditions of the Algarve.

Name: Vago Viaggi
Company description: VagoViaggi, tour operator con sede a Firenze, creiamo viaggi in bus per Italiani con destinazioni di corto-medio raggio.  I nostri viaggi  prevedono partenze dalla maggior parte delle città toscane ed alcune anche extra regionali. Tra i nostri viaggi trovere una ricca offerta di gite giornaliere ma anche viaggi multiday. Visitate il nostro sito per scoprire le destinazioni del momento. Siamo anche sempre alla ricerca di giovani accompagnatori ed agenzie che desiderino affiliarsi ai nostri prodotti, scriveteci e vi risponderemo al più presto!

Name: VIATGES4KIDS
Company description: Viatges4Kids es una agencia de viajes familiar que inicia su camino en el 2017, pero detrás hay más de 17 años de experiencia en el sector y con muchos sellos en el pasaporte. Viatges4kids nace como culminación de un sueño, unir los dos mundos que conocíamos mejor : el turismo y ser padres!!! Porque todos llevamos dentro un viajero y el hecho de ser madre o padre, no es motivo para dejar de lado la inquietud y las ganas de seguir conociendo este planeta y ahora, aún mejor, acompañados de los más pequeños de la casa.  Comprendemos muy bien (y compartimos), las necesidades de nuestros clientes que requieren de un apoyo profesional que ayude, ofrezca experiencia y seguridad en todas las tipologías de viajes : escapadas o  vacaciones familiares, vacaciones escolares, viajes en grupo o a medida, viajes temáticos o viajes aventureros.  Nuestra oficina física se encuentra en Sabadell, en la calle Sant Pere, 29, però damos servicio a todo el territorio.

Name: UT POINT
Company description: UT POINT è una agenzia viaggi e tour operator, nata dall’unione delle competenze di un gruppo cospicuo di persone. La società è formata da 9 ragazzi che assieme cooperavano nell’associazione universitario UNIVERSITY TRAVEL, presente da oltre dieci anni e promotrice di svariati viaggi di gruppo per studenti universitari; oltre ai soci collaborano alla realizzazione del progetto imprenditoriale due impiegate provenienti dal mondo delle agenzie viaggi, un direttore tecnico con 20 anni di esperienza e svariati collaboratori che seguono i filoni tematici. Una compagine estremamente variegata e competente, che collabora per la realizzazione di un progetto. UT POINT si propone come gestore e organizzatore dei vostri desideri di viaggio, con soluzioni promosse dai migliori t.o. sul mercato e con soluzioni di viaggio proprie di UT POINT. Possiamo gestire una serie di servizi quali: -	Viaggi individuali in tutto il mondo -	Viaggi di gruppo -	Viaggi aziendali -	Voli aerei, treni, traghetti -	Soggiorni in strutture alberghiere -	Partecipazione ad eventi -	Liste nozze -	Biglietti per concerti ed eventi -	Organizzazione e gestione tecnica eventi e manifestazioni (congressi, meeting, stages formativi..) Vi aspettiamo in Agenzia per conoscerci  e per realizzare qualunque vostro sogno di viaggio…

Name: Ajimba African Tours GmbH
Company description: Ajimba African Tours GmbH ist ein Reiseveranstalter für individuelle und Kleigruppenreisen mit den Zielgebieten Südafrika, Namibia, Botswana und Simbabwe.  Berührend, nachhaltig und fair - eben Ajimba.

Name: Go2East - VistoperlaRussia
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, Via Mariotto Albertinelli, 20148
Company description: Servizio di visto per la Russia. Tour Operator specializzato per la Russia

Name: TourExpi GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Rheinland-pfalz, Bingen Am Rhein, 36 Mainzer Straße, 55411
Company description: Tourexpi GmbH is a Bridge between European travel agencies - destinations and hotels worldwide and offers detailed product  information and marketing  opportunities

Name: La Centrale De Réservation
Company description: LCDR est en mesure de fournir un service personnalisé, un engagement et des tarifs avec lesquels aucune autre agence de voyage ne peut rivaliser. Nous offrons à nos clients des vacances de grande qualité, flexibles et à des prix abordables.

Name: Viajeros Adoquier
Company description: Viajeros Adoquier is a Spanish Travel Group founded in Mallorca in 2012. We offer competitive prices and inspiring travel ideas, our group travel arrangements cover  hotels, ferry crossings, flights, sightseeing, motor-coach hire, transfers and guide service. Our main clients are tour operators, travel wholesalers, OTAs , travel agencies, but we also work directly with the final customer viar our own B2C channel. 2 business lines and brands deliver first class service to the travel industry: •	Smaytip  (B2B)- with offices in Balearics and Granada •	Trip Experience: manages all activities and excursions

Name: Global Alpha Travel
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 135 Carrer De L'hospital, 08001
Company description: ¿Quiénes Somos? Global Alpha Travel es un proveedor global de servicios en más de 100 países, ofreciendo alojamiento, traslados, excursiones, circuitos y servicios de handling.  Iniciamos operaciones desde el año 2006 por nuestros clientes. nuestro experiencia y profesionalidad han contribuido a que cada vez más agencias de grandes mercados como España, Francia, Italy, Rumanía, Portugal, Egipto, Estados Unidos o Medio oriente confíen en su respaldo para ofrecer el mejor producto a sus clientes.  Nuestra Visión: Convertirnos en la agencia de viajes preferida por nuestra dedicación a la excelencia y nuestra capacidad para crear experiencias únicas. Queremos ser tu compañero de confianza en cada aventura, desde la planificación hasta el regreso a casa. Algunas cifras: 800 hoteles de contratación directa, inventario global de 100.000 hoteles únicos y más de 100.000 clientes . Nuestros Servicios: Viajes al antiguo Egipto (la tierra de los dioses faraónicos) para ver El Cairo y las Pirámides,  desde Asuán a Luxor con crucero Nilo , Abu Simbel y el Mar Rojo (Hurghada y Sharm El-Sheikh), y reservar las actividades  y paquetes todo incluido  más baratas desde Madrid, Bilbao, Valencia, Barcelona Ofertas 2024

Name: LetsStay B.V.
Company description: Hoteliers like yourself pay more and more commission to Online Travel Agencies every year. Even more disturbingly, there is no alternative. Believing this was a major opportunity, we build LetsStay.net as a true alternative to other booking websites helping you to regain control, earning the profit you deserve. LetsStay.net helps hoteliers reach a worldwide audience by providing an online booking platform without paying (any) unreasonable commissions.

Name: Perlen Travel
Company description: Reliability of high quality services and utmost professionalism make Perlen Travels a leader in the Maldives travel and tourism sector. Compared to the general services in typical travel agencies in the Maldives Perlen travels goes further and deals with the full range of travel services for both individual and corporate clients. Based in Germany. Maldivians and Germans working together, based on the experience in the front line of the Maldivian Tourism Industry to ensure our clients experience the best vacation on planet. Why are we the right partner for you in planning your special dream vacation? We are Maldivians, premium Travel Experts and know our country and the other Dream destinations best. We have your best interest at heart to fulfill your dream of coming to Maldives, Sri Lanka, Thailand or India and like to share with you our beautiful beaches, magnificent islands, Wilde life Adventures, Hill country, Multi cultural hubs, Traditions, Heritages and amazing underwater sceneries. We are of course a continuously reliable & committed travel planner for our guests who like to return and discover the Destinations over and over again. We give individual advice in planning your trip (whether wellness, honeymoon, diving, weddings or just relax and beach holidays) - we accommodate all wishes and to make your trip an unforgettable one. We are based both in Germany as well as Maldives and are happy to assist you anytime.

Name: ABC Travel Romania
Company description: Here you will find the best vacation and discover our beautiful country – Romania! Young and dynamic team of tourism professionals Our travel agency is specialised in the incoming activity for Romania and provides you with a full range of touristic services such as transportation, airport transfers, accommodations, guides, drivers, flight tickets, meal reservations, different events tickets.  Our services accommodate large or small groups.

Name: Links Golf Ireland - Tour Operator
Company description: If you are considering golf vacation options to Ireland, Scotland, England or Wales then look no further than Links Golf Ireland. We are a tour operator based in Ireland capable of handling golf travel options for Ireland, Scotland, England and Wales. While we work directly with most clients, we also provide ground handling services for agents and operators based outside of Ireland.

Name: MIEL Travel Agency And Tour Operator
Company description: History and Mission Established in 2003 with the purpose of organising events and providing high-class tourist services. MIEL is involved in organising events, inbound and outbound tourism and selling air tickets. Serves over 20 corporate clients and over 1,000 individual travelers.admitted and recognised as a full and sole representative of Bulgaria in the World Association of Travel Agencies (WATA) - 2006. MIEL wins the household for the 58th WATA General Assembly in Sofia in November 2007, when a Bulgarian representative for the first time was elected to the Association Board. Following the merger of WATA with WOI (World of Incentives) in October 2011, our chairman was re-elected as a "executive manager" for a new 4-year term in the Board of the New Association. The company has a developed partner network in Bulgaria and in more than 82 countries worldwide. MIEL works with 6 international hotel reservation systems worldwideThe European Commission has nominated MIEL as a Best Practices Firm from Bulgaria for 2009 in the panel "Encouraging Creativity in Entrepreneurship". Our corporate clients from Europe are: Centre for Business and Information - France; Societe Francaise Des Parfumeurs - France; DEMS Production - France; UMDESA Trading - France; FINASS RAISEN AG - Switzerland; MAGIC GARDEN production - United Kingdom; Liberty International - Czech Republic Programs implemented with MIEL From 2007 on a joint project between the Bulgarian Training Centre for Education and Training at the Ministry of Education and Youth and the MIEL Agency for Practical Training and the Implementation of Young People - Students from Vocational High Schools with Interests in the Tourism Industry.From the beginning of 2009, the popularisation of the Stara Zagora region as one of the most interesting cultural and historical destinations of Bulgaria with the help of the World Association of Travel Agencies - WATA. Joint initiative with the CTR of Stara Zagora, regional leadership

Name: Trail Trips
Company description: We say that Trail Trips is the unique brainchild of two kindred spirits. Alex & Gio have created this Travel Agency because they live this kind of life of travel. “We love to see happy travelers. We have met while traveling, we have both studied tourism and nature, we love Romania -- so it’s what we definitely love to do.” Everything started with Alex and his extreme passion for riding enduro. His love for forests and mountains and Gio’s passion to make travelers in Romania happy has lead to the creation of Trail Trips: because our country has so much to offer and they want to share it. They believe in sustainable tourism, which is why they stay in rural areas as much as possible. Trail Trips offers a wide variety of VACATIONS developed for different tastes and minds eager to discover ROMANIA. We want you to ride the best trails and slopes, enjoy the sun and the some of the world’s healthiest sea air, take in the freshness of the Carpathian Mountains, enjoy our culture, the tasty food, all the while creating awesome memories. All you have to do is to pick your trip style!

Name: Beontrips
Company description: BeOnTrips is an innovative regional online travel agency, founded to offer value to customers through dynamically created flight and accommodation travel packages and other travel related services in the Central-Eastern European market primarily through its website beontrips.com / beontrips.hu.

Name: Vamos Football Agency | Spain Soccer Tours
Company description: Vamos Football Agency, which was founded in Barcelona, is one of the most well-known Spanish football tour operators, offering high-quality training activities in Spain to clubs, academies, and federations from all over the world. We offer year-round football tours and training camps; however, there are no predetermined schedules, dates, or costs; all of our offerings are fully customized. We take into consideration your goals, aspirations, and demands when designing your package. Road to Spain

Name: Versis America Srl
Company description: Versis America e' ad oggi uno dei tour operator italiani leader in viaggi e tour negli Stati Uniti. La sua programmazione include anche il Messico e l'area caraibica, sia come prolungamento fisiologico di un viaggio negli USA, sia come soluzione di viaggio fine a se stessa. Un viaggio negli Stati Uniti è la soluzione ideale per chi desidera poter godere di panorami mozzafiato, immersi nella natura incontaminata dei parchi nazionali, senza rinunciare alle atmosfere e alle mille luci delle più famose metropoli americane. Scegli la formula di viaggio più adatta alle tue esigenze tra i tour organizzati se desideri non preoccuparti di nulla, oppure tra i Fly and Drive se preferisci viaggiare in assoluta libertà. In entrambi i casi affidati all'orgnizzazione di un Tour Operator specializzato sugli USA. La nostra migliore pubblicità sono i vostri ricordi e il vostro entusiasmo! L'accurata selezione di viaggi che proponiamo nasce dalle attente scelte di un qualificato team di esperti che mette in campo tutta l'esperienza maturata i anni di attività per offrire ai nostri clienti la migliore combinazione degli elementi che comporranno il loro viaggio. Lavoriamo costantemente sulla qualità dei servizi per assicurarci la totale soddisfazione dei nostri clienti in quanto siamo pienamente consapevoli che per noi la migliore pubblicità siano i vostri ricordi e l'entusiamo che ancora vi pervaderà alla fine del viaggio. Il nostro è un prodotto turistico di qualità, costruito con voli di linea delle principali compagnie aeree internazionali, con le quali negli anni abbiamo costruito intensi rapporti di collaborazione che ci consentono di offrirvi le migliori tariffe aeree sulle destinazioni oggetto della nostra programmazione.

Name: Www.trotamar.com
Company description: www.trotamar.com es una agencia de viajes online especializada en la reserva de hoteles online, y la organización de todo tipo de viajes en grupo y cruceros. Nace con vocación de ser la agencia con mejors servicio del mercado al mejor precio. En caso de encontrar un presupuesto de hotel online más barato, envíanoslo por e-mail y te lo igualamos.

Name: Destinyze
Company description: Destinyze Group main expertise is Destination Management, and we are known as a leading DMC (Destination Management Company) serving in Budapest, Vienna, and Prague. We are offering and perfecting our services since 2008. Destinyze is operating in the region of Budapest, Vienna, and Prague, serving governmental organizations, convention bureaus, major multinational companies, travel companies, and tour operators coming from around the world. We create the strategy, manages incentive programs, conferences, large-scale corporate events, and luxury group tours by providing a complete range of destination management services.

Name: Arctic Expedition
Company description: Arctic Expedition is a tour operator and activity supplier in Arctic Norway, based in Tromsø. We specialise in travel above the arctic circle. With our boat fleet from Arctic Explorer, we sail from Tromsø to Lofoten or north to Alta. From Northern Lights chasing by boat, Whale Watching, Ski by Boat or Hike and Bike by boat, we offer all around activities, both in the Winter as well as in the Summer time, that will make your stay in Norway absolutely interesting, magical and full of amazing memories and moments! We also offer activities on land like dog sledding, snowmobiling and hiking and biking by boat. We are present in Tromsø, Lofoten, Skjervøy, Skibotn and Alta. Our Expedition Cruises last four or five days, in the Northern Norway region, with all meals included and daily activities such as whale watching (between November and January), northern lights chasing, lectures onboard, visiting Norwegian villages, among many others. Our fleet can also be chartered, from the smallest Rigid Inflatable Boats (12 people each), to our biggest ship Quest (maximum 60 people sleeping). We can provide you with crew, guides and design the route to your wishes.

Name: IdemRAD
Company description: idemRAD offers fully organised cycling and hiking holidays in Central-Europe. Our goal is to give our customers the best time during their visit. From short breaks to two weeks on the road, all our holiday packages keep the same high standards. This includes luggage transport between the different stops during a journey, staying in the best hotels along the route and the possibility to tailor a trip to the wishes of our customers.

Name: INDIGÈNIO
Company description: INDIGÈNIO è la sharing economy per l'organizzazione dei viaggi e delle vacanze. Attraverso un portale web, mettiamo in contatto i viaggiatori con delle persone che abitano nella destinazione di viaggio e che mettono a disposizione la loro conoscenza diretta del territorio e la loro attitudine al problem solving, per organizzare il viaggio sulla base della richiesta specifica del cliente. Si parla quindi di un livello di personalizzazione dei viaggi altissimo, ossia di un servizio sostitutivo o complementare al "viaggio fai da te", che si differenzia nettamente dall'offerta dei tour operator fatta da servizi standardizzati.

Name: Napur Tours GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Eitorf, 7 Am Alten Weingarten, 53783
Company description: napur tours ist ein Reiseveranstalter und Spezialist für Mittelamerika und Südamerika Reisen mit Sitz in Kevelaer, Deutschland. napur tours GmbH is a tour operator and specialist for individual and group travel to Central and South America, based in Kevelaer, Germany.

Name: Meet Piemonte
Company description: Meet Piemonte is an Inbound Tour Operator that focuses on Northwest Italy only rather than on the entire country. In fact, the style and the aim of Meet Piemonte is to provide the most unique experience and to fully commit to personalized service. The Piedmont region of Italy boasts a wide array of resources and activities whose selection and planning require the highest level of care. Only a specialized Incoming Tour Operator like Meet Piemonte can effectively serve customers with detailed travel services beyond the ordinary tourist itineraries. Our guests can be individual travelers (FIT),  small groups, corporate travel and anyone wishing to experience Piedmont like a local in a safe, comfortable, hassle-free way. Our partners are vetted and carefully selected. We work with those who deliver excellent services and share our purpose to bring our guests beyond an ordinary experience.

Name: Vacation Greece
Company description: Vacation Greece is an Incoming Tour Operator licensed and bonded by G.N.T.O. (Greek National Tourist Organization) with license registration number 1144E61000079900 operating solely on the Internet. In our website http://www.vacation.gr we offer online reservations for any accommodation type in Greece, Cyprus & Turkey along with any other services that are related, such as international flights, ferry tickets, transfers, excursions, car rental, organizing weddings and conferences.

Name: Rentxpress
Company description: Welcome to Rentxpress Company Page on LinkedIn! Follow us for regular updates about travel tips, serviced apartments and rental market! Also, check our PRODUCTS TAB and find out what we can offer you. Rentxpress is an online agency, based on 25 years of experience, specialized in the rental of apartments in top destinations worldwide, to both tourists and businessmen alike. The company’s expert staff are on hand to provide assistance in 10 languages, and a sophisticated web based system helps businesses and private clients quickly identify the most suitable options based on their requirements. Rentxpress is also a reliable partner for relocation and travel agencies, travel management companies or embassies, looking for an efficient service for the accomodaton search, able to satisfy even the more demanding guest.  Finally, Rentxpress is a distribution channel for professional rental companies who want to market their apartments and holiday homes worldwide. Check our Products Tab and find how we can support you! Specialties corporate apartments, vacation rentals, serviced apartments, property promotion

Name: Amarok Adventures
Company description: We're Amarok Adventures, travel agency managed & led by a small team of certified guides specialised in hiking, backpacking & adventure trips to the most remote corners in the Arctic & Antarctic regions.

Name: Stiva General Partnership
Company description: Our aim is to liaise between hotels and tour operators agencies, searching for the product that best adapts to individual requirements. We established the Stiva Group to bring together the hotels with tour operators and agencies. From the start we have focused our efforts on establishing solid and lasting relationships with both our providers and customers, always on the lookout for a win-win relationship. At Stiva we manage around 800.000 reservations in a portfolio of more than 100 hotels in different countries on a yearly basis. Specialising in all-inclusive vocational tourism, our turnover is around 900.000.000 USD which places us among market leaders. This position encourages us to continue improving and for that reason since 2011 we have been developing a new business line of city hotels. We are a solid, dynamic and flexible group, capable of swiftly adapting to change. This leads us to categorically support new technologies given that these allow us to be ever more efficient in our business.

Name: CruceristaVip
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, Carrer Del Progrés, 08570
Company description: CruceristaVip.com nace como agencia de viajes especializada en la comercialización de cruceros y en asesoramiento personalizado a sus clientes. Trabajamos con todas la navieras del mercado internacional, siendo una marca totalmente independiente que antepone las necesidades de nuestros clientes. Nuestro equipo de expertos, con experiencias reales en todas las compañías marítimas y fluviales, guía hacia la mejor elección posible según las necesidades de cada cliente. Para nosotros es muy importante conocer los gustos de los clientes y nuestro principal objetivo, nuestra preocupación nº1, es aconsejar el mejor crucero para que la experiencia sea todo un éxito. Estamos en contacto permanente con las principales compañías de cruceros y nuestro equipo de asesores os recomendará los mejores itinerarios según la época del año y las promociones más exclusivas, como también compartirá detalles sobre los idiomas que se hablan a bordo de los barcos, las mejores excursiones a realizar en tierra, los packs recomendados de bebidas, los mejores cruceros para viajar con niños, en grupo, en familia, en pareja... y otros mil y un detalles que únicamente podemos compartir tras muchas experiencias. Estamos encantados de recibirte y conocerte. Queremos compartir contigo, desde los preparativos hasta el final de tu crucero inolvidable.

Name: Sfrecciando
Company description: Sfrecciando sells on-line train based packages (i.e. train & hotel, train & event tickets, train & event 	ticket &  hotel,…) dynamically generated on-demand, at the “best price guaranteed”. Sfrecciando is the only engine able to compare in real time the best Public and Tour-Operator train tariffs in Italy and bundle them dynamically with special hotel rates and any potential other service.  Sfrecciando transforms the online travel arrangement in pleasant experience, enabling planning and purchasing, in a single transaction, each component of the train itinerary (city by city) and all related services

Name: Palidosim.lv
HQ Location: Latvia, Riga, Riga, 67 Gustava Zemgala, lv-1039
Company description: Palidosim.lv is travel agency that provides individual and non-standard travel itineraries. We help people to reach most remote parts of the world. Long knowledge in arranging travel needs for corporate business and individual clients let us provide wide range of services, including flights, trains, cruise, ferries, busies, car rental, transfers, hotels and insurance.

Name: Global Travel BG
Company description: We are "Global Travel BG"​ - licensed tour operator for exotic destinations established in the Bulgarian market with quality and boutique services in competitive prices. We have built a team of young and energetic people, whose aim is to make your trip an unforgettable and unique experience. We personally select and explore the best hotels and services for you.

Name: Baja Bikes Valencia
Company description: Baja Bikes Valencia offers guided bike tours through Valencia. Our tour guides take you in three hours through Valencia in Dutch, English and German. Our tours are sold through major tour operators, incentive and leissure agencies but can also be booked directly.

Name: Go! Sailing Bcn
Company description: Agencia de viajes especializada en viajes en velero y alquiler de barcos en todo el mundo. -Viajes en velero con patrón, organizados por plazas o bien para grupos. Baleares, Grecia, Croacia, Italia Turquía. -Alquiler de barcos (velero, catamarán, goleta y yates a motor) con o sin patrón en cualquier parte del mundo.

Name: Meditravel BV
Company description: Meditravel is the B2B Online Platform for Tour Operators combining travel services in 5 Eastern Mediterranean destinations: Greece, Turkey, Israel, Jordan and Egypt. Members can instantly book tours and packages, excursions, accommodation, cruises and ferries within and among above destinations. Professionals can choose any of English, Portuguese, Spanish or French to navigate within the platform and reach products operated in any of those languages. As of 2015, agents introduced by the Tour Operators can connect Meditravel via  B2B2B module. Meditravel offers 24/7 available customer service line.

Name: Your Personal Shopping
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 15 Via Cascina Bianca, 20142
Company description: Your Personal Shopping, founded in 2003 from Francesco Rabita, is Italy’s first personal shopping agency and launched the trend in this country. What began as a trial project for the fashion division of Gruppo Discovery Srl (Silvano Rabita) has now become a distinct reality offering exclusive services promoting the best in made in Italy. Aimed to allure top clients of luxury hotels and best tour operators, multinationals and embassies. Promoting shopping itineraries with style and professionalism is the mission of our YPS consultants. Searching out the newest trends and creating exclusive fashion tours. YPS has launched an alternative to traditional shopping with the collaboration of prestigious partners and an expert team of personal shoppers, at a time of great evolution in Italian fashion, design, art, music, food and wine. A new shopping experience with the assistance of our consultants will make shopping more incisive, elite, taking care of every detail and satisfying every request, including visiting boutiques before and after opening hours. Presenting our clients, who wish to explore less well known but highly exclusive locations such as Como and Maggiore Lakes, Portofino, Forte dei Marmi, St. Moritz, Cortina D’Ampezzo and Costa Smeralda, is the task of our assistants and consultants, who will make shopping far more enjoyable by cutting out all the exhausting research work. With charm they will tell you about the secrets and the history of the town; revealing to you every hidden corner, from deluxe boutiques to workshops of local craftsmen; from the trendiest place to have an aperitif to the most fashionable restaurant.  YPS has been chosen various times to organize fashion events, fashion shows, trunk shows, informal modeling and luxury street events. Just on request for total creative organization about luxury wedding plan.

Name: Venum Travel - Sales & Solutions
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 158 Entreplanta Oficina 13 Calle Fuencarral, 28010
Company description: Venum Travel is a team of sales professionals and solution makers with more than 20 years of experience in the international tourism industry. We are part of the sales team of a large selection of hotels in the main European destinations. We promote and sell our hotels directly to the leading tour operators, MICE agencies and group organisers in the trade. Our goal is to bring added value to our clients and hotels by assisting them in finding the best solutions and deals, always through a proactive and professional approach focused in obtaining the best results. Our main advantages for you: •	Knowledge: Specialized in group traveling (Leisure & MICE) •	Support: We are the sales team of our hotels  •	Efficiency: Access to a large network of hotels via one dedicated sales professional  •	Savings: Direct rates from our hotels, without intermediary or extra cost •	Transparency: Contracts are signed directly with our hotels •	Direct Relationship: A day-to-day communication between our clients and hotels •	Results: The best deals in all our destinations                                                   We are solution makers, always ready to walk the extra mile

Name: Normativa Casa Vacanze
Company description: Welcome to Normativa casa vacanze Company Page on LinkedIn! Normativacasavacanze is  1° Italian company specialized in finding short-medium term accommodations.  We have 10 years experience in finding Luxury VILLAS and APARTMENTS located in the most important city around the World. We also provide on-line short term web agency affiliation. Become affiliate: info@normativacasavacanze.com Are you sick to book wrong accommodation, maybe in a bad area, and without the services you required? Reviews, ratings, stars and references that describe and classify the hotels or apartments are visible on numerous websites, at times, are not true or are dated and do not prove the actual quality of accommodation. Our Italian consultants who will carry out the research for you.We are experienced tourist operators of the major cities of the world and no one knows the cities and accommodation (hotels, apartments and villas) better than us. We will propose, really, the best accommodation at the lowest price! Name: Live2Travel Nederland BV
Company description: 🌴 Stel je voor... Een klant wandelt een reisbureau binnen met een glinstering in z’n ogen: “Ik wil iets bijzonders. Iets wat je niet op Booking.com vindt. Wakker worden van leeuwengebrul in de verte, of wandelen tussen de eeuwenoude baobabs bij zonsondergang” De reisagent kijkt op, glimlacht… en belt ons. Live To Travel. Wij zijn geen touroperator zoals zovelen. Wij zijn dromenvangers. Routebouwers. Reisarchitecten met een neus voor het onverwachte. Wij maken reizen voor mensen die méér willen dan een vlucht en een hotel: ze willen een verhaal. Onze reizen? Denk groot. 🦁 Een vliegsafari Safari in Botswana, met ontbijt op de savanne. 🌴 Eilandhoppen bij Seychellen, ontmoet reuzenschildpadden op La Digue en ga kajakken door tropische mangroves. 🚗 Zelf rijden door Nieuw-Zeeland, van fjorden tot vulkanen. 🛖 Een lodge in Namibië waar je zonder wifi, maar met wijde blik wakker wordt. Wij werken exclusief met reisbureaus en zelfstandige reisagenten in Nederland en België. Omdat we geloven in persoonlijk contact en écht luisteren. Geen callcenter, maar een klein team dat elkaar kent én versterkt. 🤝 Samenwerken? Ben je klant? Vraag jouw reisagent naar Live To Travel. Ben je reisagent? Dan wil je ons leren kennen. Ben je op zoek naar een nieuwe baan? Kijk bij onze vacatures of stuur een spontaan bericht. We houden van initiatief.

Name: Primaclub Vacanze

Questa chiave di business si è rivelata vincente portando il Gruppo dal 2013 ad un volume di affari di 110 milioni di euro. Siamo stati i nostri primi Clienti, il risultato ottenuto ha superato qualsiasi proiezione; è stato un successo incredibile che ora desideriamo condividere. PRODOTTO L'offerta turistica Primaclub è stata concepita per offrire ai viaggiatori attimi di pura serenità. Il nostro circuito turistico comprende strutture di proprietà  o in gestione. Questo ci permette di assicurare la piena soddisfazione dei clienti. Inoltre collaboriamo direttamente con enti del turismo e tour operator per offrire un prodotto sempre più completo ASSISTENZA A 360 GRADI Il nostro Centro Prenotazioni di Roma, il Quality Center, il personale in loco ogni giorno si dedica con amore e professionalità alle vacanze dei Clienti, selezionando e testando le strutture, seguendoli prima, durante il soggiorno ed ascoltando al ritorno dalle vacanze i preziosi consigli. FIDELIZZAZIONE, CROSS SELLING, SELL-OUT, SELL-IN? Primaclub Vacanze è il partner ideale per promuovere un servizio/prodotto o per attivare campagne di fidelizzazione o concorsi a premio. Offriamo la possibilità di convertire la nostra offerta turistica in buoni vacanza utilizzabili come premio o incentivo sull'acquisto di un prodotto/servizio o come premio aziendale. Contatti: Ufficio Booking: prenotazioni@primaclubvacanze.it Ufficio Commerciale: commerciale@primaclubvacanze.it Per gli Albergatori o Proprietari: programmazione@primaclubvacanze.it

Įmonei priklauso registruoti prekės ženklai: poilsinių ir pažintinių kelionių rezervavimo sistema Baltictours.lt, atvykstamojo turizmo kelionių rezervavimo sistema Baltictours.com, lėktuvo bilietų rezervavimo sistemos Skrendu.lt, Lektuvubilietai.lt, Aero.lv. Ši įmonė priklauso Tarptautinei oro transporto asociacijai (IATA) ir nuo 2013 m. sertifikuojama kaip „Stipriausi Lietuvoje lyderiai”.  Įmonės prekės ženklas Skrendu.lt yra vienas didžiausių Lietuvoje on-line lėktuvo bilietų pardavimo tarpininkas.
