Name: The Spain Event
HQ Location: Spain, Valencia, Valencia, 22 1c C/ Padre Tomás Montañana
Company description: The Spain Event is a Travel Agency and Destination Management Company specialising in HEN & STAG do's in Spain & Portugal. Members of AEVAV – Spanish Travel Agents Association (Valencia) The Spain Event is the first Operator for Stag and Hen Weekends in Spain and Portugal.  As people who have a passion for España and as genuine devotees of the Spanish towns and cities we have chosen to live in, we know about trips and activities in Spain through tried and trusted personal experience. We are proud of our highly successful record at supplying Spanish travel services, and our team regularly receives praise for its efforts from satisfied customers. We are proud to be considered the number one Spanish Destination Management operator. The company operates all over Spain and Portugal with a well established network of suppliers and parters. Our main destinations for Stag weekends are Barcelona, Madrid, Valencia, Marbella, Benidorm, Lisbon and Algarve. We offer our groups a range of services and activities in each location. You can book apartments and airport transfers, dinners and nights out, daytime activities like go karting, baby bull running, beer bikes and paintball. We also source and deliver football tickets for the Spanish and Portuguese League and UEFA matches: Real Madrid, Barcelona, Atletico, Valencia, Benfica, Sporting Lisbon. A popular summer time pastime for our groups is to rent a boat, yacht or catamaran. In all of our locations you can celebrate your stag or hen weekend in style with a well-organised night out, including a meal, lots of drinks, and finishing in one of the best nightclubs.

Name: Travel Vibe - Greek Travel Bloggers Community
Company description: Travelvibe was created in 2018. A really unique idea at the time, since there was nothing like it in Greece. Today, its the biggest community of active travel bloggers in Greece and through actions on its official website and social media accounts the community tries to achieve its goals. As a community they have two main goals. The first one, is to inspire Greek travelers to try new experiences, adventures or activities and discover new aspects of themselves. The second goal of the Travelvibe community is to help tourism professionals get closer at a very promising market – the travel bloggers’ market – that has fresh ideas, is heavily involved in social media and active blogging and is able to help the entire industry, since they use word of mouth to communicate with their audience. In its first year of operation, Travelvibe has managed to build a strong team of more than 70 people including travel bloggers, vloggers, instagrammers, photographers and videographers, collaborate with travel agencies and hotels, participate in projects to promote a great idea and all of the above without ever loosing sight of its main goal…  discovering new places and new spots throughout the world! It’s worth mentioning that all effort is voluntary. There is no company involved supporting the team financially or in any other way or trying to make profit out of it. Travelvibe is a group of people trying to communicate their passion for travel alongside with tips and useful information for each location they visit. Some have even traveled all the way to Everest Base Camp, Mexico and exotic islands, such as Sentosa, captured their great adventure and shared their extraordinary experience. On Travelvibe’s official website, one can find over 400 travel stories whilst on its social media one can really feel the travel vibes! In addition to providing information and tips for short or long trips, the team is also supporting causes related to innovation, green behavior, and safety

Name: Wosler
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Granada, Calle Del Profesor Luis Molina Gómez, 18004
Company description: A traveler falls ill in Spain. They don’t know where to go, face language barriers, and worry about spending hours in a waiting room. This is where Wosler comes in. We are a startup specialized in digital medical assistance for tourists, ensuring fast, accessible care from bilingual healthcare professionals. Through our platform, travelers receive medical guidance, diagnosis, and coordinated healthcare services—without stress or delays. But Wosler is more than just a health service: we promote a safer, more innovative, and sustainable approach to tourism. With our virtual preventive healthcare assistant—the first of its kind for tourists in Spain—we help travelers prevent health risks before and during their stay, enhancing their overall experience. We collaborate with tourism businesses committed to healthy, responsible, and sustainable travel through innovation, including hotels, travel agencies, DMCs, and tourism platforms. Our solution not only enhances the traveler experience but also strengthens our partners' service offerings, boosting their competitiveness and building trust with their customers. 🚀 Fewer worries, more experiences. If you’re looking to innovate in the tourism sector and provide seamless healthcare services, let’s talk.

Name: Today International
Company description: LA TODAY INTERNATIONAL è un Tour Operator  che opera da oltre 20 anni nel settore della formazione linguistica su tutto il territorio nazionale. Con sede a Roma è specializzato nelle Vacanze Studio all’estero, Mini Stay, Corsi individuali “Full Integration /Academic Year”, Corsi per Adulti e Summer Camp. Viaggi Studio per ragazzi di tutte le età, a partire dai 7 anni e naturalmente per adulti senza limiti di età. I corsi proposti sono tutti effettuati presso prestigiose Scuole ed Università abilitate alla certificazione internazionale delle lingue e riconosciute dagli enti certificatori di Inghilterra, Scozia, Irlanda, Malta, Francia, Germania e Spagna. Le nostre scuole sono riconosciute in Gran Bretagna dal British Counsil, mentre in Irlanda dal Rei Melsa.  Ci occupiamo personalmente delle ispezioni e supervisioni dei centri, strutture ricettive e dei college pubblicati sul nostro catalogo, mentre le famiglie vengono selezionate, ed a volte testate, da organizzazioni locali, preposte solo a tale compito. Vi possiamo assicurare che il tempo non ha scalfito la voglia di rendere ogni vacanza un’esperienza completa ed indimenticabile. Ci rendiamo altresì conto che, un “soggiorno studio” non è una vacanza come le altre, ma qualcosa di UNICO!. Integrare la necessità di apprendere una lingua straniera con l’aspetto vacanziero non è facile ma, vi garantiamo di fare il massimo, al fine di ottenere un risultato che sia in tutti i sensi entusiasmante!

Name: TravelToPersia
Company description: The website https://www.getiranvisa.com is a commercial website of the TraveltoPersia E-Tourism Group. We are a tourism company based in Poland (Traveltopersia Sp. z o.o) and are supported by Bita Tour and Travel Agency inside of Iran. Bita is permitted to work in the field of tourism and registered in the Iran Cultural Heritage, Handicrafts, and Tourism Organization (registration no.: 942/12140/3716). We are presently functioning as a Polish – Iranian travel agency, actively handling incoming tours to Iran. Bita Tour and Travel Agency is located in Mashhad, the second largest city in Iran. We are also authorized by the Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs as an Iran e-visa appointed agency to apply for Iran visa authorization code (Iran visa grant notice) for foreign tourists. We also have permission to operate official tours in Iran. Our Goal This website was created in 2015 and our main goal is to help foreign visitors to Iran to effortlessly get information regarding their Iran visa and assist in planning their trip. There is an array of information on traveling to Iran scattered on various sites and adding to the confusion, visa policies and laws are often changing. So, we decided to gather all the information on how to get an Iran visa and publish them on our site in an organized and convenient way. At the same time, we are monitoring all policy changes, new laws, and procedures and we update our website regularly. We are commitment to our clients by providing them with updated and accurate info and making planning their trip to Iran much easier. Other Services At Bita Tour and Travel Agency we also book hotels and flights within Iran, manage airport transfers in Tehran and Mashhad and issue travel insurance policies. Additionally, to help our clients solve current payment difficulties in Iran, we have put an online payment gateway (PayPal) on our website so they can easily pay the service fee using their PayPal account or any debit or credit card.

Name: RistoGiusto By Italservice Restaurants S.r.l.s.
Company description: WWW.RISTOGIUSTO.COM LA PIÙ GRANDE PIATTAFORMA ITALIANA  PENSATA ESCLUSIVAMENTE PER GRUPPI BASATA  SULLA TECNICA  VIRALE DI “BOOKING”  SVILUPPATA E SPECIALIZZATA IN “BOOKING RESTAURANTS” DEDICATA A TOUR OPERATOR E AGENZIE DI VIAGGIO  CON OLTRE 300 RISTORANTI PARTNER GIÀ ON-LINE, RAGGRUPPATI PER CITTA’, ORDINATI PER VICINANZA A MONUMENTI O PUNTI D’INTERESSE, PERMETTE DI SCEGLIERE I LOCALI, I MENU AL TUO BUDGET, E INVIARE LE RICHIESTE CON POCHI VELOCI CLICK. ITALSERVICE RESTAURANTS  Con un’esperienza più che ventennale nel settore, fornisce servizi di ristorazione per gruppi turistici e incentive in tutta Italia.  Per mezzo di un piccolo e fidato team di professionisti l’azienda è costantemente alla ricerca di originali soluzioni gastronomiche che possano soddisfare la domanda di un mercato esigente e di una clientela oggigiorno molto informata. Particolare attenzione va prestata in tal senso al nostro Paese, territorio ricco di storia, tradizioni e di una varietà di eccellenze culinarie.  Il “Tour dei Sapori” è tra le offerte più gradite del 2023, gusto e cultura in simbiosi per le vie del centro storico di Roma.  Di grande rilevanza la scoperta delle cosiddette “chicche”, rari e raffinati ristoranti nei piccoli borghi italiani che incantano i turisti. Italservice coopera con laboratori di prodotti artigianali proponendo visite e degustazioni. Cantine, frantoi e pic-nic tra i filari.  Dispone di location dal design moderno e di tendenza, terrazze panoramiche, ville e palazzi d’epoca, catering e musicisti per l’organizzazione di eventi aziendali, workshop e feste private.

Name: Go-Etna
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, San Giovanni La Punta, Via Fiuggi, 95037
Company description: Since 2009 we have made it our business to make sure that visitors of our beautiful island Sicily have a most pleasant stay. Quality and professionalism are our top principles. Go-Etna is a fully-authorised tour operator (Licence D.D.S. N ° 3451S7), which meets all required legal standards. Our multilingual guides (English, German, Italian, Spanish, French etc.) have become a real trademark of Go-Etna. Who could bring a foreign country closer to you than a local? Getting to know the place by taking a “look behind the scenes” – we have been following this principle for years. Beside the classical highlights, our guides will show you the authentic Sicily from their perspective. Among our standing and satisfied customers we reckon hotels, camping sites, cruise ship passengers, company clients, travel agencies, tour operators and tourist facilities in the area of Catania and Taormina. The GO-ETNA team and our partners have the ability to meet the requirements of all our customers, with a team of experienced staff, a well-equipped fully licenced vehicle fleet and technical material. Our task is to offer the perfect service to every client, to make come true even the most challenging, individual requirements and to leave no question about Sicily unanswered. The satisfaction of our customers is our greatest concern and we hope that our tours will become the highlight of your holiday in Sicily.

Na het vissen staat er een lekkere warme maaltijd klaar om gezamenlijk te eten.  Het concept van Visservice is uitermate geschikt voor teamuitjes. Wij verzorgen de reis vollid van vliegtickets tot transfers, boten, brandstof en noem maar op. Op locatie in Noorwegen zijn altijd twee visgidsen aanwezig die u helpen met techniek en materiaal en zij varen u baar de beste stekken. Daarnaast verzorgen zij alle maaltijden en wat nog meer nodig is. Meer informatie? Neem snel contact met ons op of kijk op www.visservice.nl

Name: FotballTravel
Company description: FotballTravel is the Norwegian daughter company of the Dutch brand of VoetbalTravel. We are an online travel agency that for the last few years have specialised in all-inclusive football trips for the best matches European football has to offer. Having sent hundreds of thousands of football fans to their football heaven whether they be in Spain, England or Germany, we have grown to become the biggest company of our niche in Europe. Through FotballTravel, our aim is to become the first choice of Norwegian football fans wishing to take part in the stadium when their football club is meeting their rivals in the field abroad. Our vision is to make football matches more available to Norwegians, so that they too can make every match count to the fullest. We take pride in what we do and are looking forward to keep growing in the years to come.

Name: ZonnigZeilen.nl
Company description: Welcome on board!  ZonnigZeilen/ SailingBeauty is a Dutch travel agency with, that organizes all-inclusive sailing cruises along the Turkish Aegean coast and the Greek islands.  This area is very unique and suitable for a comfortable sailing cruise. Spectacular landscapes with a fascinating history. Cristal clear waters, sunny weather and a beautifull yacht: all the ingredients needed for superb sailing.  Besides enjoying the natural and cultural beauty of the area, a ZonnigZeilen sailing cruise is all about offering you the ultimate leisure cruise. Simply bask in the sun while getting away from all the routines at home, sample delicious dishes, visit historic places and above all enjoy the tranquil sailing along the fabulous Greek and Turkish coastlines. Our yachts are suitable for people of all ages, nationalities, including families with (young) children, couples, singles and groups of friends

Name: Rete Destinazione Sud
Company description: Rete Destinazione Sud è una rete d’imprese nata nel 2014 da imprenditori del turismo aderenti a Confindustria, tra i quali: tour operator, agenzie di viaggio, strutture ricettive, ristoratori, società di trasporto, reti d’impresa e consorzi di quattro regioni (Basilicata, Calabria, Campania e Puglia). L’obiettivo è quello di avere un nuovo approccio al mercato, attraverso un progetto condiviso basato sulla creazione di destinazioni, aggregando imprese, istituzioni, associazioni, consorzi, opinion leader e stakedholder dei territori del Sud Italia. La capacità di attrazione e di competizione di una destinazione turistica cresce al crescere del livello d’integrazione e di coordinamento tra i diversi operatori che sono coinvolti nella messa a punto dell’offerta turistica. In tale prospettiva Rete Destinazione Sud propone le Destinazioni come una serie di reti interattive, assumendo il compito di coordinare strategicamente tutte le risorse e gli operatori presenti sul territorio. Un processo di coinvolgimento delle aziende, degli amministratori locali e delle principali rappresentanze delle categorie di operatori pubblici e privati per la promozione di un sistema di offerta della destinazione stessa, che diventa così prodotto vendibile sul mercato.

Name: Revotrip.com

Company description: Revotrip was founded in 2016 as a small private company with the aim of providing the first-class service in the field of individual transportation to our clients. Thanks to the quality of services and rising demand, the REVO group company was established on March 15, 2019, after less than 3 years. The first outsourced drivers started to work with the company and the original fleet of Mercedes Benz cars expanded to include more brands.  On February 20, 2020, a new version of the website was launched, where customers can order all services online. Customer satisfaction is always the top priority for Revotrip, therefore we only work with drivers who speak English, have the necessary professional licenses, receive the necessary training, medical check-ups, drive professionally for at least 2 years and drove over hundreds of thousands of kilometres. All partners must then adhere to the strictly set REVOTRIP PARTNER CODEX to ensure quality standards, guarantee passengers safe and reliable and comfortable transportation. We believe that you will be satisfied with our services as well as many of our customers and clients from the ranks of travel agencies and large corporations.

Name: Incint

We are skilled and experienced in creating unique, brand focused incentive trips in Finland, as well as in the neighboring countries Russia, Estonia and Sweden. Our services are tailored precisely to your audience and according to your specific wishes. Your event will be tailor-made by us, the program hand-picked of the most exclusive and unique incentive travel experiences available to corporate groups. Our strong connections with local service providers and our long-time experience in the business give us the ability and the vantage to offer significant value for your special event, making it unique and memorable.

Name: Golfresepti

Through the extensive network that comes from operating within the golf industry for over 20 year Golfresepti has become an established and a well known player in Finland and Scandinavia in many golf related fields, such as golf travel and event organization. The company has pioneering role and status in Scandinavian golf industry. Golfresepti produces unique golf trips, organizes high-end corporate golf outings and operate major golf events such as the Finnish Amateur and annual Helsinki Golf Fair (the largest consumer golf show in Northern Europe). Golfresepti is an approved tour operator (KuVi3557/07/MjMv), an official partner of the Finnish Golf Union and a long-time member of the international golf tour organization IAGTO.

Company description: Siam Air Tours is an international tourist company with headquarters in Varna, Bulgaria.The main activity of the company is organization of tours and excursions to Thailand at very low prices prepared especially for the Balkans Tourist Market.The company's activity is kindly supported by the Honourable Consul of Kingdom of Thailand in Bulgaria, as well as by the Bulgarian mission in Thailand.   The main advantage that we can point and which is of great convinience for the tourists who want to visit Thailand is the fact that the travel is organized in Bulgaria, by direct charter flights from Sofia to Bangkok twice a month. Thus we provide an easy and convinient way of travelling not only for Bulgarian tourists but for tourists from the neighbouring countries as well.The flight lasts 10 hours and there are our representatives on the plane and others waiting in Bangkok who will help our tourists to be transferred to the hotels and to have a nice stay without any problems. Apart from the other flights, our tourist are allowed 30 kg luggage and 7 kg hand luggage without extra payment.The company has made contracts with many 3,4 and 5 stars hotels in Thailand which allows us to offer packages at very low prices.The purpose of our activity is to present the people in our region a new and comparatively unknown destination, a new culture with different manners and habits. We have made contracts with many travel agencies not only in Bulgaria but in the neighbouring countries as well- Serbia, Romania and Macedonia. We have plans to organize charter flights to Kuba together with the Serbian Travel Agency ‘ Putnik’ and a charter flight to Prague together with the Bulgarian Travel Agency ‘Alexander Tour’.

Name: Slow Active Tours
Company description: Slow Active Tours è tour operator orientato ad attività outdoor, con particolare specializzazione nel campo del cicloturismo e viaggi a piedi esperienziali. L’impresa individuale nasce ad aprile 2015 da un’idea di Marco Ferriero, classe 1979, socio fondatore dell’Associazione Ruotando costituita nell’aprile 2011 nell’ambito del bando regionale Bollenti Spiriti 2010. Marco ha conseguito la laurea in Economia del Turismo presso l’Università di Rimini, un master in Turismo Responsabile e Sostenibile presso il Centro Studi CTS Albalonga di Roma e 7 anni di esperienza presso Girolibero, tour operator italiano di riferimento per le vacanze in bicicletta. Nel 2024 la ditta individuale conferisce l’azienda all’attuale Slow Active Tours srl. L’obiettivo di Slow Active Tours è proporre vacanze attive nel Centro e Sud Italia adatte a tutti, in piena sicurezza e nel rispetto del contesto naturale e culturale del luogo ospitante. Si organizzano viaggi culturali e religiosi, trekking, itinerari in bici, escursioni in Vespa e snorkeling, includendo l’utilizzo di mezzi pubblici e veicoli privati e noleggio di biciclette. I partners vengono scelti con cura secondo l’etica aziendale per garantire l’autenticità dell’esperienza. L’azienda, con sede a Lecce, ha 3 dipendenti a tempo indeterminato (ed altre 3 persone vengono impegnate stagionalmente) che offrono competenze nei campi di conoscenza delle lingue straniere (inglese, spagnolo, portoghese), di gestione e accompagnamento gruppi, del web e della comunicazione.

Name: Tansania Reiseabenteuer SDL GmbH
Company description: Tansania Reiseabenteuer, ein kleines Team bestehend aus begeisterten Tansania-Fans und dem gebürtigen Tansanier und Inhaber Samson Simon Kyashama, bieten Ihnen Individual- und Gruppenreisen nach Tansania an. Neben Safaris organisieren wir außerdem Bergbesteigungen auf den Kilimanjaro und den Mount Meru sowie Aufenthalte auf Sansibar. Ein besonderes Highlight sind die kulturellen Touren, bei denen man in Kontakt mit indigenen Völkern wie den Massai oder den Hadzabe kommt. Des Weiteren bieten wir Selbstfahrerreisen als besonderes Highlight an. Was unsere Reisen bei Tansania Reiseabenteuer so besonders macht? Da unser Inhaber Samson Simon Kyashama selbst für mehr als 10 Jahre als Safarifahrer tätig war und alle Geheimtipps und die schönsten Orte in Tansania kennt, können Sie sich auf eine ereignisreiche und besondere Reise freuen! Auch der Aspekt, dass wir neben der Besichtigung von traumhaft schönen Landschaften und Tierwelten den kulturellen Austausch durch die Besichtigung sozialer Projekte fördern und stark darauf achten, dass der Großteil der Unterkünfte, in denen Sie übernachten, ökologisch und nachhaltig handeln, macht uns zum Reiseveranstalter erster Wahl. Ihre Wünsche und Erwartungen stehen bei uns an erster Stelle – egal, welchen Wunsch Sie haben, wir setzen alles daran, ihn zu erfüllen!

Name: JUST GO TRAVEL
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 62 Calle De Orense, 28020
Company description: Just GO Travel nace de una iniciativa personal e innovadora cuyo objetivo es acercar el mundo a todo aquel que tenga pasión por viajar. Queremos romper con el concepto de agencia de viajes convencional y ofrecer a nuestros clientes, experiencias y aventuras en función de sus gustos. Somos apasionados de los viajes, nos encanta descubrir sitios nuevos y con encanto. Siempre intentamos darle un toque diferente a cada viaje, para poder descubrir lugares poco conocidos que se salgan de las rutas habituales. No ofrecemos ni recomendamos ningún destino ni experiencia que no hayamos vivido. Para ello hemos seleccionado 44 destinos, todos ellos conocidos de primera mano para poder garantizar un servicio excelente y personalizado. Somos expertos en analizar los diferentes perfiles de viajeros para poder ofrecer el viaje a medida que más se ajuste a sus preferencias y su presupuesto económico. En Just Go creemos que no hay dos clientes iguales, por lo que cada viaje debe ser exclusivo y único, para ello utilizamos nuestra propia experiencia y  conocimiento de viajes para encontrar las vacaciones que mejor se adapten a cada persona. En “Just GO”  queremos que el cliente confíe en nosotros y solo se preocupe de disfutar del viaje.

Name: Trevida Travel
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 3 Via Santa Maria Valle, 20123
Company description: Trevida Travel is dedicated to organizing tailor made luxury holidays in Italy. A destination management company specializing in curated travel experiences. Offering exclusive, high quality service and taking personal care of clients all over the world. Allowing them to experience Italy with seamless organisation of even the smallest detail. Located in Milan, the heart and soul of art, culture and fashion, we are the exclusive travel agency in Italy that builds your personalized itinerary. We feature a client-centric service that focuses on organizing fully customized travel. Trevida Travel is a travel designer creating Bespoke Travel. We work in close contact with our clients to create an unforgettable experience to our country.

Name: Avventure Bellissime | Tours-Italy
Company description: Avventure Bellissime (Tours-Italy) is an Italy-based, Italian- and English-speaking tour operator offering world-class tours of Italy since 1999. Based in Venice, Tours-Italy offers an exciting selection of superior-quality city tours, day trips, and vacation packages across Italy to fit the needs of every type of traveler. So whether you’re looking for history, romance, or relaxation (walking tours, private tours, group tours, and more!) in Rome, Venice, Florence, Tuscany, Milan, Naples, Capri, Cinque Terre and the Amalfi Coast, visit us online at www.tours-italy.com. We’re looking forward to helping you create an itinerary for the Italy trip of a lifetime.

Name: Plenia - Travel Architects
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 93 Calle De Serrano, 28006
Company description: Plenia – Travel Architects transforms destinations into masterpieces, curating every detail for seamless adventures and unforgettable journeys for UHNWI clients worldwide. Founder of the European Virtuoso travel network since 2014. Winner of Best European Luxury Travel Agency in 2021 and nominated for Best in the World in 2023 and 2024 by World Travel Awards.

Name: Travel Tips S.r.l.
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Naples, 149 / A Via Orazio, 80122
Company description: Travel Tips, operativa dal 1993 con sede in Napoli alla Via Orazio 149/a  Il passare del tempo non ci rallenta, bensì, favorisce la nostra crescita grazie alle innovazioni e ai traguardi che raggiungiamo ogni giorno. Per ultima, ad esempio, abbiamo creato la sezione  MY TRAVEL TIPS- VIDEO INTERVIEW legata a YOUTUBE, che vi invitiamo  a visitare e a partecipare con puro divertimento,alle video interviste:Il viaggiatore diventa protagonista. Da alcuni anni vicini al mondo del Golf,  sponsorizziamo  Tornei e Gare  in collaborazione con i migliori Tour Operator Forti di queste esperienze e noi stessi giocatori di Golf, abbiamo creato un prodotto Golf molto vicino alle esigenze dei giocatori, senza  per questo dimenticare gli accompagnatori. Presentato al TTG Golf del 2009, nasce il Catalogo Travel Tips è Golf che vi invitiamo a prendere visione nella sezione dedicata. Il Golf non è la sola unica nostra specializzazione, infatti  da anni sviluppiamo un prodotto INCOMING  “Naples as never before” volto a far conoscere al meglio il territorio campano utilizzando una  nuova chiave di lettura; storia, architettura, tessuto urbano, gastronomia, mito e leggenda,  svelano le tradizioni, i segreti e la  forza di un popolo   dai mille volti. Ed ancora, la nostra professionalità al servizio dei viaggiatori: viaggi su misura e proposte dei migliori tour operator  di cui siamo "Agenzia Partner", per realizzare il TUO viaggio

Name: Itravel Italia
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 4 Via Francesco Londonio, 20154
Company description: 𝘾𝙝𝙞 𝙨𝙞𝙖𝙢𝙤? itravel è attivo da oltre 10 anni sul mercato tedesco, svizzero e austriaco, e in fase di espansione sul mercato italiano, francese e svedese. Per rispondere alle esigenze dei nostri clienti, lavoriamo direttamente con hotel, agenzie e operatori locali, senza ricorrere a intermediari e senza vincolarci a circuiti tradizionali.  Siamo uno staff di circa venti consulenti che regolarmente si mettono in viaggio alla scoperta di nuove destinazioni o anche di mete già note, ma da vedere con nuovi occhi; una squadra di product manager che si impegna per sviluppare sempre nuovi eccitanti viaggi; un team di esperti di marketing e di redattori che divulgano le nostre offerte con contributi e articoli creativi e interessanti; e infine tecnici informatici e amministratori che garantiscono che tutto funzioni sempre come deve. 𝙋𝙚𝙧𝙘𝙝𝙚́ 𝙡𝙤 𝙛𝙖𝙘𝙘𝙞𝙖𝙢𝙤? Ci spinge la passione per destinazioni lontane, l’interesse per culture e tradizioni differenti, ma soprattutto il desiderio di rendere possibile, con il nostro impegno, ciò che non offre il turismo di massa: itinerari ed esperienze uniche costruite su misura. 𝙇𝙖 𝙨𝙤𝙨𝙩𝙚𝙣𝙞𝙗𝙞𝙡𝙞𝙩𝙖̀ 𝙚̀ 𝙞𝙡 𝙣𝙤𝙨𝙩𝙧𝙤 𝙥𝙞𝙡𝙖𝙨𝙩𝙧𝙤 Siamo un’azienda a impatto climatico zero e siamo soci attivi di organizzazioni ambientali e di protezione della fauna. Attraverso viaggi sostenibili sosteniamo, le comunità locali che contribuiscono alla conservazione degli ecosistemi più importanti e, come tour operator, garantiamo il rispetto dei più elevati standard di sostenibilità. 👉 Scopri di più riguardo i nostri viaggi! Sul nostro sito https://itravel.it/ è presente la nostra offerta di viaggi esclusivi divisi per categorie con la possibilità di costruire viaggi su misura. I nostri consulenti sono sempre a stretto contatto con il cliente per configurare le proposte di viaggio esattamente secondo i suoi desideri. 🏝 Segui la nostra passione e diventa parte della nostra community! #forthatmoment

Name: FindYourItaly
Company description: FindYourItaly is a Tour Operator and DMC expert in promoting sustainable tourism and business travel in the whole of Italy. We offer both classic destinations with a local flavour, as well as hidden locations and amazing experiences away from the tourist crowds. We are specialized in helping travellers from all over the world to make them feel home and live an unforgettable experience in Italy.  @FindYourItaly On Facebook: www.facebook.com/FindYourItaly

Name: Explore Europe Travel
Company description: Explore Europe Travel is a tour operating company primarily serving United States military members and their families stationed in Germany. As a company and as tour operator, our mission is to provide our clients with once in a lifetime experiences by guiding them through the exploration of diverse and culturally rich European countries. Specializing in excursions of the best locations in Europe, it is our mission to provide affordably priced tours that create lifelong memories.

Name: Grato Viaggi E Vacanze
HQ Location: Italy, Umbria, Foligno, 32 Via Giuseppe Garibaldi
Company description: Dalla volontà di soddisfare le esigenze di chi desidera viaggiare e divertirsi in giro per il mondo nasce l’agenzia Grato Viaggi e Vacanze. Nel 1986, da un’idea di Angelo Antonio Cesarini insieme a Maria Gabriela Cesarini l’idea diviene da subito un progetto vincente! Leader sul territorio per vacanze, viaggi di gruppo, viaggi di nozze, crociere, viaggi d’istruzione e gite scolastiche, vacanze studio e stage all’estero per i più piccoli (8/18 anni), servizi business per aziende e imprese la Grato Viaggi diviene un punto di riferimento per clienti esigenti e per i professionisti del settore turistico. Nel 1994 la Grato Viaggi cresce ed amplia la sua identità, come Tour Operator crea il brand “ITALIA IN CAMPAGNA” www.italiaincampagna.com specializzato nell’incoming in Umbria e Toscana selezionando strutture ricettive nelle due regioni e commercializzando Agriturismi, Ville Singole con piscina, Antiche dimore, Castelli, Case vacanze, Appartamenti Vacanze, Hotel in città e in campagna. Italia in campagna ha aiutato e accresciuto in modo esponenziale il “turismo nel cuore verde d’Italia” attraverso la promozione delle settimane verdi in Umbria e Toscana per turisti italiani, olandesi, belgi, americani, norvegesi e canadesi. Con loro sviluppa poi turismo sportivo (tour in bike, trekking e climbing in tutta la regione Umbria e Toscana). Una sempre particolare attenzione è stata dedicata e tuttora è nella nostra mission, ai “viaggi family”, vacanze a misura di bambino, vacanze e week-end con animazione e attenzioni dedicate ai più piccoli con la missione di far divertire grandi e piccoli! I bambini sono sempre al centro della nostra attenzione! Oggi, attraverso i migliori canali di prenotazione e supportati dalla fiducia che i tour operator major hanno su di noi riusciamo ad avere sempre il miglior rapporto qualità-prezzo su tutti i viaggi e con la nostra esperienza siamo in grado di selezionare i migliori alberghi Italiani ed Europei, commercializzando viaggi di gruppo

Name: The Queer Travel
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes receptiva con sede en Madrid especializada en grandes viajes y grupos en España para gays, lesbianas y resto de personas LGTBQ+. Ofrecemos la posibilidad de viajar desde una perspectiva diversa, igualitaria y segura, con estancias y actividades a medida para disfrutar y conocer el destino siendo uno mismo. Además, también hemos desarrollado nuestros propios itinerarios tanto nacionales, como internacionales, donde poder conocer los mejores destinos gay-friendly del mundo.

Name: CyclingHero Inc.
Company description: Personalized Cycling Adventures in Northern Italy. Official Tour Operator for the Maratona dles Dolomites - Enel 2025. From the breathtaking Dolomites to the iconic Stelvio Pass, from the rolling Prosecco Hills to the vineyards of Piedmont and the majestic Alps, we craft unforgettable cycling experiences tailored to your pace and goals. Leave the logistics to us. With our local expertise and personal touch, we handle everything—so you can focus on the ride.

Name: Orient Tours
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes especializada en convertir tus deseos de viajar en realidad. Ofrecemos servicios a todo el mundo, aunque estamos especializados en países como Túnez, Japón, Jordania, Egipto entre muchos otros.

Name: CHIPANGO
HQ Location: Italy, Piedmont, Turin, 30 A Corso Castelfidardo, 10129
Company description: Our mission is to create a global network of independent travelers. We are not building a tour operator. Instead, we are developing the first CO-TRAVELING platform, a peer-to-peer venue where travelers can propose their trip, find the ideal companions and organize safely and affordably, as an independent group. Chipango overturns the traditional business model of holiday packages and is totally shaped on the mindset of Millennial travelers.

Name: Mediterranea Welcome - Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, San Nicola La Strada, 29 Via Torino, 81020
Company description: Mediterranea Welcome nasce dal forte desiderio di valorizzare, di promuovere e di far conoscere, sotto ogni forma, il nostro magnifico territorio. Siamo un Tour Operator e ci rivolgiamo sia al turista che al cittadino, a tutti coloro che si approcciano per la prima volta alla Campania e alle sue bellezze e a chi, invece, le conosce già e le vuole riscoprire e riassaporare insieme. Proponiamo itinerari enogastronomici, artistico-culturali e naturalistici, riservando tra le diverse soluzioni, tour pubblici e privati. L’attenta selezione degli itinerari, la cura per i particolari, la passione per il nostro territorio e le sue bellezze…tutto questo ci permette di farvi vivere un’esperienza unica ed emozionante.

Name: Holding Turismo S.r.l.
Company description: Agenzie di Viaggio e Tour Operator

Name: PROMESSE VIAGGI
Company description: PROMESSE VIAGGI nasce nel 1992 grazie alla passione ed alla volontà del Suo ideatore, Francesco Marini, il quale attraverso l’esperienza maturata nei suoi molteplici viaggi (ASIA, SUD AMERICA, AMERICA, EUROPA) e soprattutto attraverso le competenze tecniche-organizzative sviluppate in un importante Tour Operator operante a livello nazionale, fa si che il suo scopo primario sia quello di selezionare e mettere a disposizione dell’utenza le migliori proposte del settore turistico.

Name: Globalevents
Company description: Your preferred partner with more than 20 years of experience in the meeting industry. Incentives are unique. As such they differ from the usual tourist travel and can therefore neither be booked nor organised through normal travel agency channels. They lead to unexpected adventures and to impressions, never experienced before. Incentives are not only the source for motivation, long-lasting memories and the stimulation of fantasy, but also an incentive to ever-higher achievements and positively influence team spirit, company loyalty and image. Our experienced International team listens to your needs, assesses you, designs, Implements and manages the strategies and programmes tailor made for your challenges ahead. Explore the World making your Events in a more profitable way. Our global network of reliable and highly rated local experts is your guarantee for the ultimate in customer service. We will ensure that synergies are exploited by placing our trust in professional partners and include them in our team. We plan all types of events from meetings and conferences, to product launches, road shows, incentives and luxury vacations - worldwide.

Name: CultureLabs E.G.
Company description: Die Genossenschaft CultureLabs ist ein Kultur-Reiseveranstalter und wurde 2010 in Berlin gegründet. Ausgehend von Gedenkstätten und Orten der Erinnerung in Europa erarbeitet und organisiert CultureLabs Gedenkstätten-, Seminar- und Bildungsreisen für Reisegruppen, die sich mit europäischer Zeitgeschichte und politischen, sozialen und kulturellen Themen auseinandersetzen wollen. Mittels unserer Reiseprogramme werden Geschichte und authentische Orte verstehbar. Reiseziele sind sowohl zeitgeschichtlich wichtige Orte in Deutschland und Italien, als auch in Polen, Österreich, Frankreich, Slovenien, Israel und den Baltischen Republiken. Unsere Angebote vereinen hohen didaktischen Anspruch mit Freizeitelementen und kulturellen Genüssen. CultureLabs pflegt enge Beziehungen zu zahlreichen europäischen Partnerorganisationen, bildet selbständig spezialisierte Reisebegleiter und Erinnerungsarbeiter aus und erarbeitet gemeinsam mit dem Geschichtsinstitut Istoreco Reggio Emilia Schulungsunterlagen und Lehrmaterialien.

Name: Ultramar Touristik Süd GmbH
Company description: Als langjähriger Mexiko-Reiseveranstalter, etablierter China- und Dubai-Spezialist seit mehr als drei Jahrzehnten und versierte internationale Touristik-Experten stehen wir Ihnen gerne für individuelle und maßgeschneiderte Gruppenreisen, Seminare, Incentives, Konferenzen, Veranstaltungen und Events zur Verfügung.

Name: Incento Travel Consultants BV
Company description: Incento Travel Consultants is a full-service tour operator specialized in train holidays and custom-made group and incentive trips around the globe. We are the official representative in the Netherlands and Belguim for several luxury train companies, such as Belmond Trains & Cruises, Golden Eagle Luxury Trains,  Amtrak USA, Via Rail Canada, Great Rail Journeys, Amtrak Vacations, USA Vacations by Rail and Great Southern Rail Australia.

Name: Viatges Santamar
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Ripollet, 108 Carretera De Barcelona, 08290
Company description: Agencia de viajes especializada en grupos.

Name: Mediterranea Trekking
Company description: Mediterranea Trekking s.r.l. è un tour operator incoming che nasce nel 2005 grazie all’esperienza di oltre 8 anni nel settore dei soci fondatori, grandi appassionati di attività outdoor. Nel corso di 13 anni l’azienda è cresciuta fino a coprire oggi la domanda turistica a 360°, con servizi che spaziano dal trekking alla crociera in caicco. Sin dalla fondazione l’azienda è partner di fiducia di Terres d’Aventure, principale tour operator francese del settore “voyages d’aventure” per il quale fornisce un servizio attento e curato in ogni dettaglio, per trekking in tutta la Sicilia e oltre. Dal 2013 l’azienda è in società con Mediterranea Crociere e realizza crociere in caicco alle isole Eolie, avvalendosi di due caicchi, mentre nel 2015 si è creata la società con Mediterranea Rifugi, prendendo la gestione del rifugio Chalet Clan dei Ragazzi, il più grande e importante rifugio posto sul versante Nord dell’Etna. Mediterranea Trekking si avvale della professionalità di circa 10 guide freelance dalla comprovata esperienza e capacità, tutte dotate di regolare patentino per l’esercizio della professione e parlanti più lingue straniere. L’equipe del back office è composta da un direttore tecnico, Igor Fedele, e da due responsabili del booking, della programmazione e delle vendite, Simona e Maria. Mediterranea Trekking aderisce ai valori della sostenibilità ambientale ed ogni sua azione è volta alla promozione di un turismo responsabile e green. Tale vocazione aziendale è comprovata dal certificato ricevuto nel 2011 da parte di ATR (Agir pour un Tourisme Responsable).

Name: Fragrance Tour
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 6 Via Monti Parioli, 00197
Company description: Fragrance Tour is a dynamic incoming Tour Operator and Destination Management Company, based in Rome with branches in Tuscany, Venice area and Puglia. We offer tailor-made travel services for individuals, leisure groups, MICE / Corporate Travel Industry (incentives and team building), and events in Rome, Lazio and the rest of Italy. Our proposals are supported by a careful selection of the supplier, by a constant analysis of the tourist demand from different countries, and by a highly professional staff.  We aim to provide you and your clients with quality and original products at the most competitive prices, offering a personalized service in order to meet your clients’ need, wish and expectation. Our philosophy is to promote original, innovative and quality tourism in Italy, with the goal to make travel an unforgettable and authentic experience for all our clients. We also offer thematic and seasonal packages, always tailored to each type of traveler.

Name: Kaoma Travel
Company description: Welcome at Kaoma Travel Kaoma Travel is a Luxury Tour Operator and an international network of experts which aims to provide distinct lifestyle management services to their clients. Travel Designers, Events & Wedding Planners, Image Consultants & Personal Shoppers: We use our extensive collective experience to develop unique and highly personalised services, which are based on professional ethics and standards. Our international network of expert and brilliant travel specialists have unearth the most amazing destinations and handpicked authentic and extravagant experiences to design bespoke travels & luxury services. Whatever is your dream: travelling and shopping antiques and handicraft across Europe with a local, or saying “I do” than overlooking Italy's most majestic lake. Trekking into the wilderness of Africa on safari, or cruising from Athens to Venice. Witness the Northern Lights from the Arctic Circle, or discovering the wonders of Japan. Exploring the Scottish Highlands by steam train, relaxing on Philippine's most idyllic beaches, or soaking up the charm of Capri while tasting the traditional limoncello. Our expert team has journeyed across the globe to discover the world’s best destinations and experiences.

Name: Travel Zmart
Company description: Travel Zmart – en personlig resebyrå För oss handlar det inte om att sälja en resa – det handlar om att öppna dörrarna till en helt ny upplevelse. Och för oss är en upplevelse något som du ska bära med dig i resten av ditt liv. Skräddarsydda resor Vi på Travel Zmart skräddarsyr din resa för att passa din budget och dina önskemål. Genom våra hundratals resepartners världen över löser vi dina behov, oavsett om det är en sista minuten, den stora familjeresan, drömsafarin eller den lyxiga kryssningen. Hos oss på Travel Zmart får du alltid personlig service, samt värdefulla tips och råd inför din resa. Vi hjälper dig att hitta inspiration och guldkornen på platserna du vill åka till. Vi arrangerar din resa Oavsett om du vill åka på kryssning i Karibien, se på fotboll i England, en weekend i Prag, eller en konferens med företaget, så skräddarsyr vi resan så att den passar dig. Allt från företagsresor, temaresor, kryssningar, sportresor, fotbollsresor, padelresor, solresor eller vinprovning mm.

Name: Dreavel
HQ Location: Italy, Umbria, Terni, 14 Via Del Falco, 05100
Company description: Dreavel.com is a travel agency skilled in incoming sector and active since march 2013. It is a tour operator and a web portal for online bookings of activities and stayings all over in Italy. Dreavel has the primary objective to suggest to the tourist all possibilities to gladden his stay: outdoor sports, cooking class or handycraft courses, guided tours, tastings. Dreavel.com is synonimus of Active Tourism!

Name: Buspaket Derenbach
Company description: Buspaket Derenbach ist ein familiengeführter Paketreiseveranstalter spezialisiert auf die Inseln Korsika, Sardinien, Sizilien, Elba, Malta und Mallorca sowie die auf dem Festland umgebenen Regionen Toskana, Kalabrien und Apulien in Italien und Côte d’Azur und Provence in Frankreich. Seit 1989 richten sich unsere Angebote an Busunternehmen, Reiseveranstalter, Privatgruppen und Reisebüros, die touristische Leistungen für Gruppen einkaufen.

Name: Eco Farm Tourist
Company description: eco farm tourist ist der erste Reiseveranstalter für umweltfreundliche und soziale Urlaubserlebnisse. Für Tourist*innen die individuell reisen und nachhaltig für die Umwelt wie auch Menschen einen Mehrwert schaffen wollen bietet eco farm tourist Begegnungen auf Augenhöhe mit Einheimischen an.  Dazu bestehen unsere Reisebausteine aus Unterkünften auf naturverbundenen und traditionellen Farmen sowie deren sozialen Projekten. Mit den Bausteinen lassen sich nicht nur individuelle Reisen zusammenstellen, sondern auch bestehende Rundreisen umweltfreundlich und sozial bereichern.

Name: Feelgood Reisen GmbH
Company description: Feelgood Reisen is a german tour operator and specialist for individual travel experiences in Northern Europe. Sustainable tourism is our ambition. Rail tours and round trips with your own vehicle. Walking tours. Wildlife and animal observation. Aurora tours. Bicycle and motorbike tours. Based in Mölln, northern Germany.

Name: Green Center Srl
Company description: Greencenter nasce nel 1984 come Agenzia di Viaggi nelle splendide colline circostanti Perugia per trasformarsi poi in Tour Operator con lo scopo di soddisfare in maniera più adeguata le richieste di una clientela sempre crescente non solo nella quantità, ma anche nelle esigenze.

Name: Arena Tourist
Company description: We are a leading Incoming business in the Veneto region and in particular the beaches of the northern Adriatic, Lake Garda, the Dolomites and the cities of art.  Arena Tourist is based on many years of experience working with professionals who are motivated to promote hospitality in Italy. Today's changing tourism landscape has led us to transform the traditional tour operator into a company sensitive to the dynamism of the market.  Arena Tourist has a net-rate hotel and non-hotel tourism offering that allows for excellent margins for resale.  Our innovative technology allows us to offer an xml/api connection that is quick and easy to develop.  Through login, you access an intuitive interface that allows you to manage the purchase and resale of our products.  Our experience and professionalism, presence in the area, and multilingual staff allows tour operators and travel agencies to have a partner capable of handling all accommodation, transfer and excursion requests.

Name: RheinFit Sportakademie GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Köln, 24 Metzer Str., 50677
Company description: Leidenschaft für Sport. Herz für Erlebnisse. Bei der RheinFit Sportakademie ist „Bewegung“ mehr als nur unser Geschäft – es ist unsere DNA. Wir sind ein sportbegeistertes Team, das jeden Tag daran arbeitet Kindern, Jugendlichen und Erwachsenen eine aktive und wertvolle Zeit zu ermöglichen. Was uns antreibt? Das Leuchten in den Augen eines Kindes nach positiven Erlebnissen in einem Feriencamp, der Stolz eines Abiturienten nach dem bestandenen Sporteignungstest oder der Spaß von Familien auf unseren Adventure Minigolfanlagen in Duisburg und Bochum. Wir wachsen stetig und entwickeln uns weiter. Was als Ausgründung aus dem Umfeld der Sporthochschule Köln begann, ist heute ein etablierter Anbieter für Jugendreisen, Sportbildung und Freizeitevents. Dabei haben wir uns unseren Start-up-Spirit bewahrt: flache Hierarchien, viel Eigenverantwortung und ein Team, das zusammenhält. Unsere Kompetenzfelder: 🔹 Plattform-Ökonomie & Vermittlung: Mit Marken wie Campfuchs, Schneefuchs und dem Klassenfahrten Kompass betreiben wir reichweitenstarke Portale, die Angebot und Nachfrage im Bereich Kinder- und Jugendreisen effizient zusammenbringen. 🔹 Betrieb von Freizeitanlagen: Wir betreiben moderne Adventure Minigolfanlagen und schaffen so attraktive Naherholungsziele für Jung und Alt und bereichern die Freizeitpotenziale von Kommunen und Regionen 🔹 Bildungsträger: Unsere Sporteignungstest-Vorbereitungscamps gelten als Benchmark für angehende Sportwissenschaftler, die in Köln oder Bochum studieren möchten. Wir setzen auf nachhaltige Partnerschaften und hohe Qualitätsstandards. Ob als Partner für Reiseveranstalter, Schulen oder Städte – wir bieten professionelle Lösungen, immer am Bedarf der Kunden orientiert und immer auf Augenhöhe. Lassen Sie uns gemeinsam etwas bewegen!

Name: The RouteBook
Company description: The RouteBook, es una agencia de viajes pionera, comprometida con crear las experiencias más auténticas y exclusivas en cada rincón del mundo. Nos guiamos por el profundo conocimiento de nuestros expertos locales para diseñar itinerarios hechos a medida, pensando siempre en lo que realmente te inspira. Creemos que una nueva forma de viajar es posible: más personal, más única, creada especialmente para ti.

Name: Viagea
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 10 Via Monte Rosa
Company description: Viagea is a boutique Italian tour operator specializing in tailor-made travel experiences, crafted to reflect each traveler’s unique desires, pace, and passions. With first-hand expertise gained across more than 100 countries, the Viagea team designs exclusive, personalized itineraries with the same care and precision as a bespoke suit. In addition to its outbound travel services, Viagea also operates as a Destination Management Company (DMC) for Italy, with a dedicated incoming branch that offers curated travel solutions for international travelers seeking authentic and refined Italian experiences. From iconic destinations to hidden gems, Viagea creates unforgettable journeys for discerning travelers. Participating in this travel exhibition is a valuable opportunity for Viagea to connect with new partners and share its passion for custom-designed travel experiences.

Name: Grace Tours - Et Rejsebureau Med Sjæl!
Company description: Grace Tours is an independent fully licensed tour operator based in Copenhagen. It was founded 1991 and has also a joint ownership of a South Indian travel agency and has through its involvement in Chalukya Grace Tours initiated quite a few different local development projects such as a locally run guesthouse on an island in the Backwaters, yearlong involvement with a local NGO running an orphanage and a school and a driver-training program in South India. Through its locally based company Grace Tours has also worked for equal rights for all its employees.  On our tailor made tours we will normally be using small family-run hotels and guesthouses, eat in local restaurants and use local transport as much as possible. In addition all local guides and agencies used are considered friends rather than business contacts. The idea being that the visit will be rather as guests than as tourists.  Our extensive knowledge of the Indian Subcontinent enables us to offer original tours itineraries providing a balance between the regions well-known “must-sees” and off-the-beaten-track “best kept secrets”. Our tours will provide a real insight – culture, history, landscapes and natural world – and provide the opportunity for genuine interaction with the local people.  Grace Tours pioneered in the field of Ayurveda tours, and introduced the concept to the Danish market.    Respect for local people, their cultures, traditions, religions and environment are essential to our philosophy and our tours, and we work hard to ensure our groups have a positive impact on the places and the people visited. We hope that our customers will be treated as guests and behave as guests whilst travelling with Grace Tours.

Name: IL RITUALE
Company description: IL RITUALE è una società che vuole far ri-scoprire il piacere dell'AUFGUSS nella sauna finlandese, la delizia degli SCRUB e PEELING nell'hammam  turco e dei rituali con WRISKERS nella banja russa, organizzando eventi, feste e serate a tema all'interno delle SPA,  WELLNESS, HAMMAM, etc. in collaborazione con i vari management. Forniamo ABBIGLIAMENTO per spa, sauna etc In base ai Vostri bisogni possiamo fornire direttamente o attraverso i nostri partners Progettazione, costruzione, assistenza e fornitura materiali per saune, hammam e bania. Costruzione di casette in legno esterne in varie tecnologie ecosostenibili, saune e banie esterne, servizi chiavi in mano. Fornitura di braceri per saune, generatori di vapore per hammam e braceri specifici per banie russe. Proponiamo  formazione ed assistenza alle Spa, Wellness per migliorare la comunicazione   cliente/operatore spa. Sviluppiamo collaborazioni con altre spa,wellness , hammam e scuole di sauna in Italia ed all'estero per  far conoscere le varie cerimonie direttamente presso i vari centri spa e wellness e mantenere i vostri operatori sempre aggiornati. Siamo certificati AISA e CIDESCO. Possiamo creare progetti per lo sviluppo dei vari territori con enti locali, comunità, tour operator, spa-manager, titolari e gestori di  strutture ricettive, nonchè direttamente con turisti ed appassionati proponendo eventi in ambito saunistico a completamento delle attrazioni che caratterizzano i diversi ambiti territoriali mettendo in evidenza le varie peculiarità turistico, gastro-enologico, sportivo etc locali. Siamo una SPA WEBAGENCY per lo sviluppo e l'incremento della conoscenza saunistica su tutto il territorio europeo aiutando i vari centri con progetti specifici sulle loro necessita attuali e futuri per incrementare la domanda dei loro servizi.

Name: Wine Tour Maker
Company description: Wine is a social beverage which often is a common reason for making new connections, new friendships, as well as new partnerships. Wine making is an art that should be shown to wine lovers.It should provoke discussions and make people want to discover the artist and his “studio”. Wine can be just a preferred drink or a passion and desire for more and more meetings with it but for some people wine is a profession, even a business.  One of our purposes is to help wineries and wine bars  develop successful wine tourism and become a desired wine travel destination. For wine lovers that are looking for more positive emotions we are able to organize local wine tastings, events and wine tours. And that’s not all! The most difficult thing and our biggest ambition is to include wine into more and more business and corporate events and to make more people passionate about it.   We set ourselves the task of making more and more tour operators share our views and include at least one winery in their tours, excursions, holidays, seminars, events for their foreign and Bulgarian customers.  We have experience, knowledge and we know the right people! It’s up to you to trust us in achieving your SUCCESSFUL  WINE TOUR(ISM).

Name: Your Friend In Reykjavik
Company description: For 11 years, Your Friend In Reykjavik has been welcoming travelers from around the world, providing award-winning tours and travel services for travel agencies, corporate clients, and event planners. Whether you need a scheduled daily or private walking tour in Reykjavik, a single-day excursion, a full Iceland itinerary, reliable transfer services, exclusive dining experiences, or access to unique accommodations, we adapt to your specific needs, ensuring a seamless and memorable journey for your clients. With thousands of five-star reviews and recognition as a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice winner for many years in a row, we are known for delivering exceptional service, expert local guides, and tailored travel solutions. As a Destination Management Company (DMC), we take care of everything from A to Z, ensuring your clients have a stress-free and unforgettable Icelandic experience. When planning trips to Iceland, you want a trusted partner who is not just there when things go right, but also when things go wrong. Whether it’s a last-minute itinerary change, unexpected weather disruptions, or an urgent client request, we do our best to support you when you need us the most, ensuring that your clients are well taken care of at all times. We also understand that travel can be unpredictable, which is why we offer a 24-hour cancellation policy on most of our tours and experiences—giving you and your clients the flexibility you need when plans change. Why Partner With Us? ✔ Award-Winning Tours & Services – Recognized for excellence year after year ✔ Scheduled Daily & Private Walking Tours in Reykjavik – Perfect for first-time visitors and those seeking a deeper cultural experience ✔ Private, Fully Customizable Driving Tours & Itineraries – Tailored to your clients' preferences for an exclusive experience ✔ Luxury Private Driver-Guide Experiences – Combining comfort and expert storytelling for a premium tour ✔ Expert Guide & Driver-Guide Services in Any Language

Company description: Palladian Routes is a new Destination Management Company and Tour operator, a spin-off of the network company founded by the owners of the Unesco Heritage Palladian villas, spread all around the Venetian Inlands. VENICE IS MORE THAN VENICE There's a huge heritage of the Serenissima Republic that few people know. You need a very good insider to visit it, since the vast majority of these extraordinary architectures are private and often closed to the public. Only the network of Palladian Routes opens all these doors, to offer tours and experiences in and around Venice that no one else can create. THE MOST AUTHENTIC CORNERS of art cities like Vicenza, Verona and Treviso. Ancient hamlets like Marostica, Asolo or Peschiera, which is framed by enchanting landscapes among Garda Lake. Discover our world-renowned vineyard hills, the Venetian waterways Rivieras, and of course the Laguna and its islands. Not to forget the worldwide imitated Palladian Villas. THE VERY BEST OF OUR FOOD, WINES AND HANDCRAFT, IN OUR HISTORIC CELLARS, WORKSHOPS AND RESTAURANTS. We certify all our suppliers and locations. All our accomodations, restaurants and pathways are high-standard and soaked by history, conformed to offer an immersion in an unforgettable and inimitable experience.

Name: NEO TRAVEL DESIGNERS
Company description: NEO TRAVEL Designers is a passionate, vibrant travel company that specializes in creating truly exceptional tailor made travel for discerning clients. We belief that no one person on this earth is the same, so therefore no holiday created should be the same.We take a thoughtful approach to crafting and building tailor-made luxury holidays for our clients. We are proud to say we’re different to your average tour operator or travel agent, we provide small groups and independent travelers the rare opportunity to connect with nature and local cultures. We offer something a little more special.  We’re not like the travel companies you’ll walk past on the high street, or the faceless booking engines you might stumble upon online. We’re here to guide you, to inspire you, to tailor a trip to your precise needs, and to make sure your time away is perfect.  We LOVE what we do and we do what we love!. The choices for travel are vast - from safaris and cultural treks to family vacations and exotic expeditions to places you have never even imagined, there is an adventure for everyone. We have a dedicated team of luxury travel experts who are here to give clients the inside track on the best destinations, hotels and activities to match their requirements. Name: Graffiti Travel
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 53b Viale Ettore Franceschini, 00155
Company description: Da 25 anni trasformiamo il viaggio in un’esperienza autentica, esclusiva e su misura. Graffiti Travel nasce dall’esperienza dei suoi fondatori che dal 1980 creano itinerari straordinari per veri viaggiatori. Oggi con un team di esperti travel designer costruiamo esperienze sartoriali per chi cerca emozioni autentiche e destinazioni spettacolari. Siamo guidati da passione, creatività e un impegno concreto per un turismo sicuro, etico e sostenibile. Ogni tour è testato e selezionato dai nostri destination manager per garantirti il meglio oltre l’ordinario e lontano dal turismo di massa. Dall’Africa Australe all’Oceano Indiano, dall’Asia alle mete più esclusive progettiamo viaggi privati, gruppi tematici, lune di miele e soluzioni aziendali tailor-made.  Esplora e vivi. Scopri il viaggio su misura per te ✔ Tour esclusivi testati e selezionati ✔ Viaggi personalizzati al 100% ✔ Accompagnatore dall’Italia ✔ Guide locali esperte ✔ Assistenza H24 ovunque tu sia. Lasciati ispirare... la tua prossima avventura inizia qui Contattaci per creare il tuo viaggio su misura! Luxury | Wellness | Safari | Glamping | Overland | Avventura | Gruppi Esclusivi | Viaggi di Nozze | Eventi & Incentive Licenza tour operator A/690 del 03/03/2000

Name: Trails Beyond
Company description: Trails Beyond is a boutique tour operator in Greece, offering unique guided adventures, off the beaten pathway. It’s a company of and for travelers, dedicated to creating authentic, meaningful and transformative travel experiences.  We are strong believers that traveling is not just visiting a destination, it’s all about the experience you get…  We have developed therefore authentic, life-enriching explorations, all handcrafted with special care and attention to detail, that benefit not only our travelers but the places and people we visit.   With Trails Beyond you won’t just visit Greece; you will immerse yourself in the country, you will experience Greece from a local perspective and enjoy an adventure you will remember for years! If you’re looking to experience the best of Greece beyond the beaten trails, without worrying about which places to visit, what things to do or with no concern about managing logistics or wrangling maps, Trails Beyond is your best choice!  Whether you opt for one of our scheduled explorations or you wish to travel on your own dates or set off on a 100% personalized exploration just with your own group of friends, family, couple or business partners, our team of experts is here to assist you with any inquiries you may have! The only limitation is your imagination… Join us in any of our explorations and share with us our passion about exploring, experiencing and enjoying the secret side of Greece like a local!

Name: CARPATOUR
HQ Location: Romania, Braşov, Braşov, Bulevardul 15 Noiembrie Nr.1
Company description: În caliate de turoperator, oferim o varietate largă de servicii turistice precum croaziere, vancanțe exotice, sejururi în Europa, circuite cu ghid, City Breaks, bilete de avion și corporate travel. Cu o experiență de peste 15 ani în domeniul turistic, am dezvoltat serviciile oferite pentru a îndeplini cerințele tuturor clienților și colaboratorilor noștri, luând în considerare și tendințele actuale din turism. Ne definim serviciile prin diversitate și flexibilitate, de la circuite cu temetică istorică, la vacanțe exotice în resorturi delux, la pachete complete cu zbor și cazare pentru cei ce călătoresc în scop profesional, acoperim o gamă extinsă de beneficii. Echipa noastră de consultanți se dedică promptitudinii și profesionalismului dar, în același timp adaugăm o notă personală în a asista clientul și a-i planifica o vacanță unică.

Name: Trip Tailors
Company description: Trip Tailors, somos una agencia de viajes especializada en Grecia. Nuestra trayectoria profesional en el sector turístico, en combinación con el amor por nuestra tierra y los viajes, nos hace capaces de confeccionar cualquier tipo de viaje a Grecia. Grecia es uno de los mejores destinos para viajar. Aunque es un país pequeño, está lleno de bellezas naturales e importantísimos lugares históricos. En Trip Tailors hemos viajado por toda Grecia más de una vez buscando estos pequeños rincones y detalles que harán que un viaje sea inolvidable. Para nosotros, cada cliente es único y cada servicio que prestamos está diseñado para ser una experiencia única, adaptada a sus deseos y necesidades. EN --- Trip Tailors is a travel agency specialized in welcoming visitors from all around the globe in Greece. With long experience in the sector of tourism, profound knowledge of the Greek beauties, Trip Tailors can organize any trip in accordance to the necessities of each individual, group, or company. From simple transportation all over Greece to surfing the Greek islands, discovering ancient ruins or trekking up Olympus are just some of the service and experiences that Trip Tailors offers.

Name: Travel One Tour Operator
Company description: We offer our consolidated experience in tourism, profound knowledge of the territory and specialization in the organization of groups and events.  Our accessible and reliable solutions will meet your every holiday, sport, flavor, history, relaxation, fun and nature need. The staff of Travel One Tour Operator will satisfy any request in an efficient and timely manner, whether it be a "turnkey" holiday or a specific event, saving you considerable time and energy! The headquarters of Travel One Tour Operator is in Friuli Venezia Giulia. Firmly rooted in a land that offers unexpected thrills, with its diverseness, its essence and its magical locations, from the Central European atmosphere of the city of Trieste to the Dolomites. Travel One Tour Operator organizes stays or day trips to discover the treasures of this land.  Set off on a quest to discover authentic flavors, regional capitals, sandy beaches, nature parks and the lagoon, ancient burgs and rural villages, slow life, history and traditions.

Name: StarGroup Athens Taxi Services
Company description: StarGroup is based in Athens - Greece and consists of Luxurious TAXI Cars of the Mercedes Benz brand, air conditioned and equipped with the latest technology, able to cover your every transportation need with comfort, security, and luxury. Our business philosophy is expressed in three words: Safety - Quality - Reliability! We work together with the majority of the Hotels, Travel Agencies and Business Firms, Entrepreneurs, Shipping Companies, Law Firms, Yacht Rental Firms, Greek and Foreign, as well as individuals that have entrusted us with their transportation needs for years now. Our best reference, is our clientele's use of our Group, to fulfill, all their transportation needs. The leading position we enjoy today, is due to hard work and constant pursuit of rendering, the highest quality of services.Our members are very carefully chosen, they all own their vechicles, speak at least one foreign language and are all eager, to provide our customers, with stellar service. If you come to Greece on vacation or business, we are ready to assist with your transportations from Airports, Ports, Railway Stations, Bus Stations etc. and transfer you, to your hotel or any other desired destination, with reliability and security. Additionally, you can choose from any of the proposed Excursions or Tours that you would like through our website, and experience the sights and beauties of our country. Whichever your transportation need might be, inside or outside Athens, don’t hesitate to contact us and we will confirm your reservation in the shortest possible time. Sincerely Yours Dimitris Stamatelatos StarGroup Team Manager

Name: Omnirooms.com
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Las Palmas De Gran Canaria, 71 Alfredo Calderón, 35006
Company description: Omnirooms.com: Tus vacaciones accesibles, ¡solo con un clic! Omnirooms.com es un portal online donde podrás reservar tus vacaciones accesibles directamente desde tu ordenador, móvil o cualquier otro dispositivo.  ¿Qué encontramos al realizar una búsqueda de habitaciones en Omnirooms.com? Pues fácil: una serie de habitaciones accesibles con sus características y fotografías reales. Esto es muy importante ya que normalmente en otros portales aparecen fotos genéricas. Sin embargo, nuestra web dispone de fotos reales de las habitaciones adaptadas, así como una descripción de sus características y de los servicios del establecimiento.  Así, cualquier persona con movilidad reducida podrá decidir si la habitación se adapta a sus necesidades personales o no, simplemente echando un vistazo a las fotografías y a la descripción, sin tener que llamar al hotel, enviar emails, etc.  De esta forma, el proceso de reserva se simplifica y aumentan las posibilidades de encontrar lo que realmente se necesita, ya que hemos seleccionado personalmente todas las habitaciones que aparecen la web: están 100% adaptadas y sus fotografías se corresponden con la realidad.  ¿Qué conseguimos con este tipo de buscador? Pues sobre todo disminuir el tiempo de búsqueda y reserva. Una persona con movilidad reducida puede reservar, en menos de media hora y cómodamente desde casa, una habitación que cumpla con sus necesidades y expectativas.  Así conseguimos que para todo el mundo sea igual de fácil reservar un hotel. Ya no es necesario acudir a una agencia de viajes para estar seguros de que la habitación cumplirá con nuestras necesidades. Con Omnirooms.com podremos reservar directamente y al momento. ¿Será accesible el alojamiento elegido? Si está en Omnirooms.com, ¡la respuesta siempre es sí!

Name: Viajes A Medida | Viajes De Lujo España
Company description: Viajes a medida de autor que te harán disfrutar de únicas experiencias. CIRO Travel es el nuevo concepto de agencia de viajes a medida que demanda el viajero con ganas de disfrutar de los viajes más exclusivos. No es una agencia de viajes a medida común, podrás contratar desde un viaje exclusivo en bicicleta en el Camino de Santiago,  como reservar tu hotel al mejor precio sin competencia en tu propia ciudad ó en tu sitio preferido. Contratando y reservando tu viajes con cirotravel.com  conocerás el gran placer que es descubrir sitios únicos a un precio irresistible. ¿A qué estás esperando para reservar en la agencia de viajes a medida líder?

Name: Sicily In Tours - Incoming Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Catania, Piazza San Placido, 95131
Company description: Sicily in Tours is a Tour operator incoming in Sicily that organizes tours for groups and individual travellers. Sicily in Tours is inspired by the philosophy of "destination management"; a way to conceive the Inbound that foregrounds not only the individual services, but also the destination and its capacity to offer integrated services. For this reason, the destination has to embrace all the services that the tourist needs and must have a centralized management activity. The main aim of Sicily in Tours is that of creating balanced inbound tourism flows, suitable and sustainable for the economic needs of the actors involved in the activity. Therefore development and growth! Sicily in Tours -  Tour Operator incoming in Sicily: Our services: -        Sicily Tours (cultural,wine and food and naturalistic tours) -        Tours for groups and individuals travellers -        Hotel booking in Sicily. -        Restaurants and tasting of local products -       Organization of meetings and conferences -       Incentive and business travels -       Special events -       Transfer services  / Coach and minivan hire -       Plane and train tickets -       Apartament and Villa holidays in Sicily

Name: ToBe Incentive&Convention Srl
Company description: ToBe Incentive&Convention è una società che nasce 15 anni or sono con l’obiettivo di emergere nell’ambito del mercato dell’incentivazione aziendale: organizzazione di viaggi, team building, meeting e congressi, concorsi, cene aziendali, ecc. ToBe Incentive&Convention fornisce soluzioni uniche ed irripetibili per motivare ed incentivare chiunque graviti intorno o all’interno di un’azienda, al fine di raggiungere un aumento e/o un miglioramento della produzione e ottenere un ottimo spirito di appartenenza. Nel corso degli anni ToBe Incentive&Convention ha creato un Tour Operator denominato "ToBe Globe" che si occupa dello sviluppo turistico dei propri territori (Franciacorta, Lago d’ Iseo, Vallecamonica) e dell'organizzazione di viaggi di gruppo in Italia e all'estero. Da qualche anno ToBe Incentive&Convention si è specializzata nella realizzazione di viaggi e stage scolastici/linguistici per studenti di ogni fascia d’età. Dal 2010 ToBe Incentive&Convention gestisce in esclusiva il Treno dei Sapori, treno enogastronomico, pensato per la promozione del territorio bresciano lungo la tratta che da Brescia arriva fino ad Edolo. Negli ultimi anni, ToBe Incentive&Convention ha inoltre sviluppato un nuovo ramo legato all’accoglienza turistica sul Lago d'Iseo e in Toscana, gestendo diversi appartamenti ideali per viaggi leasure o business.

Name: Gulf Booking
Company description: Gulf Booking is an international company that specializes in global travel & tourism booking services. With almost 10 years experience in travel industry, we developed the system that takes into account all possible needs of your travelers. We aim to make the process easier, quicker and affordable by connecting all booking services in one place. With one account you will get access to thousands of hotels worldwide, hundreds of flights and ground transportation in every country. Our system allows easily to manage group and individual bookings while fair rates and individual offers make partnership with us truly lucrative.   We choose our suppliers based on evaluating their standards and the level of the services. Meantime, when these services are totally available, we keep an eye on the market needs and work on the further expansion.   In the digital age, when technologies made a significant and remarkable growth in the travel business, our team is focused on constant improvement and development. We crave to empower global travel and promote e-tourism. Thus, a specialized dedicated IT-department upgrades an online booking platform according to the latest trends. At the same time, comprehensive high-quality service promises only pleasant experience of cooperation with us.   With minimum time- and efforts-spending, but with maximum gain, our customers increase own revenue, arrange only outstanding holidays and satisfy even the most demanding needs. Gulf Booking is present in three strategic regions for tourism (Europe, Near East and GCC). It allows to provide our travel partners only with fast first-class 24/7 support and efficiently target the entire international market. Whether you are a hotel, travel agency or a tour operator, with Gulf Booking traveling brings values.

Name: FUN Srl

Company description: EUROSUN HOLIDAYS operates though Canada in very promising markets: senior and heritage/cultural markets. These are growing every year, both in the number of visitors, and in more demanding standards. As a result of this strategy, we are responsible for services of more than 6.500 costumers between September and May each season. Eurosun Holidays - travel agency Although all care is taken when arranging our tour packages, car rentals, excursions and other services for our clients, the occasion may arise when local assistance is necessary. Eurosun Holidays has a local office with a team of professionals ready to take care of any unforeseen problem and make it right to our client satisfaction.
