Name: Berlin City Tours
Company description: BerlinCityTours.com is an inbound tour operator to Berlin and Germany offering a wide range of tailor-made services for individuals, groups and incentives such as hotel accommodation, transfers, guided tours & sightseeing excursions, special visits and cultural events. We offer a high quality and professional service to our valued clients worldwide. Whether you are looking for hotel accommodation, sightseeing and guided tour by bus,bike,foot, or by luxurious car/mini-van, river cruises or of taking charge of your entire stay in Berlin, you are at the right place. Our team has a thorough knowledge of Berlin as a travel destination. BerlinCityTours.com is the only website that offers all tours in Berlin on one website at the best price available with the best customer service and live support. Special tours and excursions can be arranged and buses are available for private charters on request.

Name: Paisajeros
Company description: Paisajeros está formado por un equipo de profesionales amantes de los viajes y con un desarrollado sentido de la conservación y de respeto por el entorno, estos valores se plasman en cada experiencia que diseñamos.  A lo largo de diez años Paisajeros se ha especializado en el diseño y puesta en marcha de viajes para grupos, en cada experiencia y desarrollo del itinerario cuidamos el detalle porque partimos de que no todos los clientes son iguales, por ello adaptamos las propuestas a las necesidades de los viajeros.  Este equipo multidisciplinario está formado por profesionales compuesto por guías titulados, hosteleros de reconocida trayectoria, especialistas en organización de eventos y logística, y aunque procedemos de ámbitos diferentes nos une esa pasión por los viajes, por descubrir nuevos destinos donde la cultura, el ocio, el deporte y la naturaleza van de la mano.   Contamos con el soporte técnico y logístico de la Agencia de Viajes Royal Touring y de Autocares Vista Alegre S.L experiencia que se avala por sus más de 40 años en el sector.

Name: Mondial Holiday Travel Agency
HQ Location: Romania, Cluj, Cluj-napoca, 62 Strada Teodor Mihali, 400591
Company description: In over 20 year of activity, our travel agency Mondial Holiday, learned and grew alongside those who traveled with us. The travel agency was set up in 2004. In spring 2012, a branch office was opened in the western part of the country, in Timisoara city until 2023 when the head office was moved to Cluj-Napoca. What unites our team is the passion for travel, people and new experiences, which we then share with our extended family, our clients. We are excited to take part with you in the experiences, emotions and memories gained during a vacation. We like to believe that by doing what we do, we can bring a smile into your hearts.  Our travel services     accommodation for individuals and groups in hotels, pensions, villas     rent a car and  transfers     city breaks     guided tours     round trips for individuals or groups     self-drive tours     airline tickets     fully customized itineraries Actions speak for themselves, so we invite you to contact us and we will do our best to prove that our passion can work wonders!

Name: TOP ONE TOUR OPERATOR
Company description: Top One è un Tour Operator specializzato nell’organizzazione di viaggi in Italia e Europa. Siamo esperti nella creazione di viaggi organizzati sia individuali che per gruppi.   TOP ONE VUOL DIRE ESPERIENZA Top One Tour Operator opera nel settore dei viaggi da quasi 40 anni. Abbiamo organizzato tour in tutto il mondo e continuiamo a farlo, mettendo a disposizione della nostra clientela tutta la nostra esperienza. Garantiamo ai nostri clienti viaggi organizzati con professionalità e cura dei dettagli.  TOP ONE VUOL DIRE SICUREZZA Viaggiare è sinonimo di vacanza, divertimento e svago, ma scegliere bene a che tour operator affidarsi è importante. Offriamo un servizio di assistenza completo sia prima, che durante e dopo la vacanza. Curiamo ogni aspetto del vostro viaggio: dalla scelta delle località di soggiorno alla qualità delle strutture e dei servizi, la qualità dei trasferimenti, organizziamo nei minimi dettagli i tour selezionando i luoghi di maggior interesse da visitare ed eventualmente prenotando per voi gli ingressi ai principali musei e mostre. Selezioniamo con attenzione le guide che vi accompagneranno per dare un valore aggiunto all’esperienza di viaggio. TOP ONE VUOL DIRE VIAGGIARE Sappiamo che viaggiare e scoprire destinazioni uniche al mondo è un’emozione, per questo vogliamo rendere ogni viaggio indimenticabile. Vogliamo offrirvi una esperienza di viaggio a 360 gradi: proponiamo destinazioni lontane e uniche al mondo per farvi conoscere nuove culture, tour guidati delle più famose città d’arte, viaggi alla scoperta delle meraviglie che la natura ci riserva, visite a luoghi nominati dall’UNESCO patrimonio dell’umanità, pellegrinaggi. Affinchè la vostra esperienza di viaggio sia completa vi offriamo anche la possibilità di effettuare delle esperienze enogastronomiche che vi permettano di conoscere pienamente i territori che state visitando.

Name: Coyote Transfers
Company description: Coyote Transfers is one of the most dynamic up & coming transfers & excursions tourism agencies in North Greece & Athens. We offer the full spectrum of Local Handling and Land Services for Travel Agents & Tour Operators who want to bring their FITs & Tourist Groups in Greece, i.e. all kinds of private & shared transfers, rent-a-car, excursions & guided tours, special interest tourism programs and team building activities. The competitive advantage of Coyote Transfers lies in our ability to deliver premium quality services at some of the most competitive rates in the market, thanks to our new fleet, our buying consistency in the local market and the know-how of our young, yet dynamic and very experienced staff, with an average of 10 years in the tourism industry. Our headquarters are in Thessaloniki and we also operate in Athens and in some of the most important summer destinations like Halkidiki, Thasos, Olympus Riviera, Rhodes & Crete. We are able to cover all your needs for private or shared transfers for both individuals and groups thanks to our own brand new fleet and our extensive affiliate network of partners all over Greece. Our privately own vehicles are brand new and those provided by our major suppliers also apply to our own very strict standards regarding quality, safety and comfort. All our drivers are trained professionals and all our vehicles, from rental cars to mini-vans to double-decker buses to limousines are fully ensured and certified for operational excellence. In its core, Coyote Transfers is committed to provide top quality transfer services according to the following standards: - All our vehicles are properly maintained and regularly serviced - All our vehicles are Air-conditioned - All our drivers have received proper professional training - All our drivers speak English - All pick-ups/drop-offs are door-to-door This way we are able to ensure to our customers: - Availability - Low-cost Rates - Comfort & Security - Top quality vehicles

Name: 3e Luxury Services Barcelona
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 12 Passeig De Gràcia, 08007
Company description: Welcome to 3els Barcelona. 3e Luxury Services is an incoming travel agency (DMC-Destination Management Company) based in Barcelona. We are specialists in tailor-made experiences and events and offer all kinds of incoming services -concierge- around Spain & Portugal. Excellence, exclusivity and expertise (the "3e") are our basic principles and we work continuously to ensure they are infused in all of our projects. However, at 3els, we offer much more than excellent service, we strongly believe that the real luxury is to offer experiences that give our clients goose bumps and, at the same time, respect and contribute to improve our environment. That’s why we are committed to Responsible Tourism collaborating with local NGO's and providing, as far as possible, an eco-sustainable service. 3els is composed of a team with a long experience in tourism and event planning. We design your tailor-made program with absolute professionalism and we offer 24/7 assistance in your destination. We take care of all the little details so the only thing you will have to worry about is enjoying your trip or event. As well as Barcelona and the rest of Catalonia, we also manage other destinations in Spain & Portugal such as Balearic Islands, Madrid, Andalusia, the Basque Country, Valencia and Lisbon, Porto or Algarve, among others. Tell us your wishes and we will work to make them come true. We hope to see you soon. Bon voyage. Rocío Gutiérrez Founder & CEO

Name: Freedive Iceland
Company description: Freedive Iceland is a small family-run business in Iceland that operates 5-star rating tours. These tours are private in freediving, scuba diving, and snorkeling. We are proud to say that we’re a 5-star rating tour operator since we emphasize giving the best possible personal experience. Our tours are mostly held in Silfra, Iceland’s clearest lake in Þingvellir national park. Freedive Silfra in wetsuits between continents in the best visibility with the best freediver gear available! Silfra is one of the TOP freedive places in the world. Visibility is 100+ on most days.

Name: Slowe
Company description: Founded in June of 2018 and based in Milan, Italy, Slowe is a trusted community marketplace for people to list, discover, and book unique travel experiences around the world with a sustainable perspective — online or from a mobile phone. Whether a bike tour for a day, trekking holiday for a week, or a boat travel for a month, Slowe connects people to unique travel experiences, at any price point, in more than 2500 destinations and 80 countries. And with world-class customer service and a growing community of users, Slowe is the easiest way for agencies, and tour operators  to increase their business to an audience of millions all around the world.

Name: Doctor Near Me
Company description: Web platform / agency managing your PCR and Doctor booking near you Special Packages for travel agencies, companies and tour operators or other groups. Προγραμματισμός test και υπηρεσιών υγείας σε όλη την Ελλάδα. Συνεργασία με μεγάλο αριθμό διαγνωστικών κέντρων και ιατρείων απο Κέρκυρα έως Θεσσαλονίκη και από Κρήτη έως Ρόδο. Ειδικά πακέτα για παρεχόμενες υπηρεσίες υγείας ή #ΤΕΣΤ σε εταιρείες, ομάδες ατόμων, τουριστικά γραφεία, κ.α.

Name: Bombovo
Company description: Cestovná kancelária s viac ako 20 ročnou históriou, ktorá rozumie deťom a ich potrebám. Špecializujeme sa na tábory, školy v prírode, adaptačné kurzy a akcie pre deti.

Name: Ignia
Company description: Ignia auttaa kasvuhaluisia kuluttajatuotteita ja -palveluja myyviä yrityksiä kehittämään digimyyntiä strategisen konsultoinnin ja valmennuksen avulla.  DIGIMYYNNIN KASVUSUUNNITELMA -PALVELU Digimyynnin kehitystä lähdetään hakemaan digimyynnin kasvusuunnitelma -palvelun avulla, joka on uniikki projektikonsepti, joka hyödyntää valmentavaa lähestymistapaa sekä ketterän kehityksen metodeja. Myynnin kasvun lisäksi se auttaa optimoimaan resursseja sekä tuo fokusta olennaisimpiin asioihin ja intoa tekemiseen. Digimyynnin kasvusuunnitelma on saanut inspiraation Finnairilla käytetystä digimyynnin kasvattamisen mallista.  Loppuasiakkaat ovat tärkeässä roolissa myynnin kehityksessä. He ansaitsevat kaikin puolin hyviä tuotteita ja palveluita ja vastaavasti hyvät tuotteet ja palvelut ansaitsevat tulla myydyiksi.  Hyvä suunnitelma on olennainen asia, mutta aivan yhtä tärkeää on saada suunnitelma toteutetuksi. Siksi panostamme siihen, että se on helppo toteuttaa ja tarvittava tuki on saatavilla.  KOKEMUS DIGIBISNEKSESTÄ Ulkopuolinen asiantuntija tuo uutta perspektiiviä kehitysprojekteihin. Ignian perustajalla Janica Soppelalla on yli 10 vuoden kokemus digitaalisen liiketoiminnan kehitystehtävistä tunnetuilla kuluttajabrändeillä kuten Finnair, Holiday Club, Amer Sports ja Nespresso. OPPAAT & KURSSIT Ignia.fi:stä löydät myös digimyynnin kehittämisen oppaita ja kursseja. Organisaatioille on tarjolla räätälöityjä koulutuksia.

Name: Saleslink Marketing Travel Marketing Services
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, 171 4 Rua Prof Sousa Da Camara, 1070-215
Company description: 2002-2025 REPRESENTATION SPECIALISTS TO THE IBERIAN GROUP, MEETING AND INCENTIVE TRAVEL INDUSTRY 21 years of building solid business and gaining successful experience in increasing revenues  for quality worldwide DMC’s (Destination Management Companies) connecting our brilliant  worldwide DMC network to outbound MICE organizers in Spain and in Portugal SALESLINK MARKETING – OUTGOING PORTUGAL We specialise in increasing revenues for DMC’s (Destination Management Companies) connecting our brilliant worldwide DMC network to MICE organizers in Portugal SALESLINK MARKETING – OUTGOING SPAIN We specialise in increasing revenues for DMC’s (Destination Management Companies) connecting our brilliant worldwide DMC network to MICE organizers in Spain IdeMICE  Asociación Viajes de Incentivos - “Partner Oficial” Association of Specialized Incentive Travel Agencies “Official DMC Partner” We are an outsource sales service company for DMC's (Destination Management Companies) worldwide.

Name: Best Food Lisbon
Company description: Best Food Lisbon was born in 2019 to help Travel Agencies in finding the best gastronomic services for their tourist groups. Based on a focused consultancy, the company aims to optimize each travel agency resources by choosing the best restaurants and menus for their excursions. Best Food Lisbon currently works with different types of traditional Portuguese restaurants and with different meat and fish menus.

Name: Taiga Euro Baltika
Company description: Since 1992  Vilnius-based Taiga Euro Baltika is one of the leading Incoming Tour Operators to Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia, specializing in tailor made itineraries for groups for B2B. 123baltic.travel TM is a branch specializing in tailoring travel itineraries to the Baltics for B2C.

Name: Kelionių Fėjos
Company description: Kelionių fėjos was founded in 2011 as a travel agency. By the end of 2013, Kelionių fėjos reborn as a trip organizer. Kelionių fėjos offers its clients leisure travels, sightseeing tours, but skiing is our passion. We seek to create a relevant feedback with our clients.

Name: PANDA TRAVEL
Company description: Kelionių agentūra - "Panda Travel" Skrydžių bilietai ir viešbučiai, poilsinės / egzotinės kelionės, pažintinės kelionės lėktuvu ir autobusu, automobilių nuoma.  Gausus avialinijų pasirinkimas, greita bei patogi paieška, malonus aptarnavimas ir saugus atsiskaitymas. Mūsų klientai - tai ne vien savarankiškai keliaujantys turistai, tačiau ir verslo klientai.

Name: Magelano Kelionės
Company description: LTD "Magelano kelionės" is a lithuanian tour operator based in Vilnius, working with outbound (concentrating on exotic and exceptional destinations) and inbound tourism (exceptional and alternative tours around Lithuania for foreigners). Company works in local market as well, creating new products like Vilnius Classical and Vilnius Alternative tours. The difference in tourism "Magelano kelionės" make with exceptional service, young and energetic, knowledgeable and enthusiastic guides, big experience in travelling and eco-friendly approach.

Name: Travel Feeling
HQ Location: Portugal, Porto, Matosinhos, Nº155 Rua Alfredo Cunha, 4450-023
Company description: A Travel Feeling (marca regista da empresa MundoNeutro, Lda) encontra-se implementada no mercado desde 2018, e é mais do que uma Agência de Viagens. Entramos no mercado turismo com a certeza, que com a nossa equipa jovem e dinâmica aliada a experiência de colaboradores com muitos anos na área do turismo, seremos capazes de elevar a sua simples viagem a um patamar superior. Se pretende que a sua viagem, seja uma experiência, crie vivencias, sentimentos únicos e marcantes, então conte connosco. Temos ao seu dispor uma equipa empenhada, dedicada e preparada para o aconselhar, planear a sua viagem desde o início da sua experiência até ao seu regresso. Temos como missão fazer um tratamento personalizado, porque cada cliente é único e será um universo próprio na nossa agência. Portanto colocamos ao seu dispor a melhor seleção de parceiros, e a nossa equipa 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana, de forma a garantir máxima eficiência e eficácia nos desejos e necessidades individuais de cada um. Se pensa viajar, em lazer ou negócios, na Travel Feeling vai encontrar os nossos valores:  •	Confiança •	Rigor •	Idoneidade •	Simpatia •	Comprometimento Total Travel Feeling a criar emoções em qualquer lugar. Teremos todo o gosto em fazer as suas marcações de viagem, pelo que aguardamos o seu contacto. Travel Feeling - Agência de Viagens | marca regista da empresa MundoNeutro, Lda  NIF: 515189308 | RNAVT 8203 Morada: Centro Comercial Parque | Rua Alfredo Cunha, nº155, 2º Andar, Escritório 6 4450-023 Matosinhos  Tel: +351221109679 | Tlm: + 351910226276 | comercial@travelfeeling.pt  www.travelfeeling.pt

Name: Urban Escape Tours SL
Company description: At Urban Escape Tours, we innovate the travel experience. We are dedicated to providing unparalleled tourist adventures, transforming each destination into a canvas of history, culture, and excitement. Our tours, whether guided or self-guided, are carefully designed to immerse travelers in the soul of the cities, enriched with observation challenges that make each stop an interactive experience through our exclusive app. Beyond tourists, Urban Escape Tours is the ideal choice for team building activities and educational programs. We design experiences that guide groups through an unforgettable journey into the heart of cities, promoting collaboration and camaraderie in an entertaining and educational way. We provide a complete customer service in a white-label mode, perfect for hotel chains and travel agencies, with mutual benefits for all involved. We offer more than a tour: an opportunity for companies to discover enigmas and legends, like the hidden treasure of Philip IV in Madrid or the story of Saint George in Barcelona, with over 30 different experiences. At Urban Escape Tours, we not only turn trips into lasting memories, but we also create custom thematic tours for organizations that want to stand out. Our personalized approach allows each entity to enjoy an exclusive odyssey, designed to emphasize their identity and provide an extraordinary experience to their members or clients. Unique and distinctive service is our promise at Urban Escape Tours. We collaborate closely with each client to forge a tour that is more than a journey: an expression of the brand, a chance to stand out and offer something unprecedented. Experience exclusivity with Urban Escape Tours. Shall we collaborate? We await your message to schedule a meeting.

Name: Oliv Travel/OportoGolf.com/LyPa Golf
HQ Location: Portugal, Porto, Porto, 728 Rua Júlio Dinis, 4050-012
Company description: Travel Agency Outgoing / Incoming Leisure travel / Corporate travel Special destinations Cruises Douro river cruises Own agents worldwide Local private transfers Private transfers worldwide Golf Tour Operator Organizing Golf events Golf trips wordwide

Name: Tickwell Travel
Company description: Dein exklusiver Reiseveranstalter für außergewöhnliche Erlebnisse: Wir öffnen dir die Türen zu den größten Sport-, Musik- und Kulturevents weltweit. Bei Tickwell Travel bekommst du alles aus einer Hand – von offiziellen Tickets und handverlesenen Hotels über durchdachte Reiseplanung bis hin zu Flug und persönlichem Chauffeur-Service.

Name: IH-travel
Company description: Personal travel agency with organized trips to the whole world

Name: Una Boricua En Madrid S.L.
Company description: Agencia de Viajes en Madrid LIC #4406 Servicio de excursiones personalizadas para boricuas y latinos. Presentamos un turismo alternativo y experiencias para conocer la vida de los españoles fuera de las zonas turísticas. Todas las excursiones son con ida y vuelta desde Madrid. EXCURSIONES: Ribera del Duero, Rioja, Asturias, Cantabria, Ruta del Quijote, Campos de Lavanda, Cuenca, Pueblos Medievales, Alcalá de Henares, Segovia, Ávila y Toledo.

Name: Baltic Nature Adventures
Company description: "i-Dā" Adventures is a sustainable nature travel company based in Latvia and a best-rated local tour operator. Our aim is to help people reconnect with nature. We value the principles of sustainable tourism and truly believe that individual and small like-minded group adventures are the best travel experiences. We are all about authentic experiences and quality time spent out in nature, and we love what we do. Even more, we are professional nature conservationists. We educate people about biodiversity and the role of different ecosystems in our lives, and we do that in a fun and engaging way. Also, with our unique improvisation approach to our trips, we ensure the best engagement of all travelers and help people to recharge both mentally and physically. We organize local sightseeing, hiking, and kayaking trips combining "must-see" places with off-the-beaten-path adventures in Latvia. We focus on small groups, families, couples, and individual travelers. We also do detailed travel planning for our customers aimed at authentic experiences both in Latvia and elsewhere. Latvia is a unique combination of vast forests, pristine wetlands, long sandy beaches, and plenty of rivers and lakes. It has a long-lasting cultural legacy and Baltic traditions that are deeply rooted in nature. We are bringing people to the most beautiful places to reveal the best of the local nature and culture. If you are in search of individuality and authenticity in your travel experiences and you want to go to authentic places, do eye-opening things and meet like-minded people we are your one-stop travel company.

Name: Esperi.it
Company description: Esperi.it è una OTA specializzata sul turismo esperienziale in Campania. Tra gli obiettivi c'è quello di valorizzare il comparto turistico regionale digitalizzando e aggregando le migliori proposte esperienziali per renderle fruibili, in unico "contenitore virtuale". Un catalogo online sempre aggiornato, adatto ad ogni device, semplice ed intuitivo permette a turisti o locali, di vivere una giornata o un weekend indimenticabile prenotando in totale sicurezza con pochi semplici clic. Siamo qui per innovare il mondo delle esperienze in Campania creando una rete tra guide turistiche, tour operator, agenzie di viaggio e strutture ricettive.

Name: Via Panoramica
Company description: Via Panoramica is your Italian partner for premium cycling tours and bike rentals. Based on the Adriatic Coast between Emilia-Romagna and Marche, we create guided and self-guided journeys that combine top-tier bikes, scenic routes, authentic food & wine, and true Italian hospitality. With more than 10 years of experience, we welcome international cyclists with a full range of services:  * high-end road, gravel, e-bikes and e-MTB rentals;  * expert local guides; * professional logistics including van support and luggage transfers. Our itineraries are designed to capture the essence of Italy.  From Emilia-Romagna to Tuscany, the Dolomites, Puglia and Sicily, every route blends landscapes, history, and traditions. Guests ride along legendary roads and hidden trails, visit medieval castles and UNESCO cities, and stop to taste wines, cheeses, and truffles with local producers. We work closely with travel agencies, tour operators, and corporate groups who seek to offer their clients a cycling holiday that is both seamless and unforgettable.  Whether for a leisurely ride, a luxury cycling vacation, or a challenging adventure, our team tailors every detail to deliver comfort, authenticity, and a sense of discovery. At Via Panoramica, cycling is more than sport: it’s a way to connect people, places, and cultures. Every tour is crafted to be not just a trip, but a true Italian experience.

Name: One Maldivian
Company description: Travel Agency , Celebrate every occasion

Name: Voarmais.comFeigenTravel
Company description: A Voarmais.comFeigenTravel é uma agência de viagens que transcende a mera organização de itinerários, elevando a jornada do viajante a um patamar de sofisticação e descobertas. Com uma equipe dedicada e experiente, nossa missão é proporcionar experiências únicas, meticulosamente planejadas para aqueles que buscam não apenas destinos, mas vivências enriquecedoras. Nossos serviços são concebidos com uma fusão de elegância e inteligência, oferecendo roteiros que refletem o nosso compromisso com a excelência. Desde destinos clássicos até lugares exóticos, cada viagem é uma oportunidade de explorar culturas, apreciar a diversidade e criar memórias que perdurarão. Na Voarmais.comFeigenTravel, acreditamos que uma jornada bem vivida é mais do que um simples deslocamento geográfico. É um convite para desbravar o extraordinário, guiado por especialistas que entendem que o verdadeiro luxo está na atenção aos detalhes e na personalização de cada itinerário. Embarque conosco e permita-se vivenciar o mundo de uma forma única e refinada.

Name: Visit The Nordics
Company description: Visit the Nordics is an online travel agency specialized in the Nordics and other cold tourism destinations. Know more at https://visitthenordics.com

Name: Le Bureau Du Voyage
HQ Location: Belgium, Watermael-boitsfort Brussels Region, 68 Boulevard Du Souverain, 1170
Company description: Chez Bureau du Voyage, nous sommes fiers de notre expertise dans l'organisation de voyages sur mesure, tant pour les particuliers que pour les clientèles "Business" et "Groupes" en Belgique et à l'international. Historiquement axés sur le voyage d'affaires et les groupes, nous avons étendu nos services de qualité à une clientèle privée, mettant l'accent sur la personnalisation et le soutien tout au long de leur expérience de voyage. Nous sommes conscients de l'unicité de chaque voyage de loisir, c'est pourquoi nous évitons les offres standardisées. À travers un dialogue approfondi, nous visons à comprendre précisément vos besoins spécifiques, vous assurant ainsi un voyage sur mesure, parfaitement adapté à vos attentes. Notre site web est un reflet de notre engagement envers un service clientèle exceptionnel. Vous y trouverez une multitude de liens utiles pour vous aider à planifier votre voyage, quelle que soit votre destination. Chez Bureau du Voyage, votre expérience de voyage est notre priorité. N'hésitez pas à nous contacter pour que nous puissions vous aider à réaliser le voyage de vos rêves. Votre satisfaction est au cœur de notre métier.

Name: Inspitour
Company description: En Inspitour, somos una agencia de viajes con amplia experiencia en la creación de viajes excepcionales. Con más de 30 años en la industria del turismo y habiendo visitado 52 países y territorios en 5 continentes, podemos ofrecer aventuras emocionantes, inmersiones culturales, viajes de negocios o momentos de relajación en hermosas playas. Nuestro equipo está compuesto por expertos viajeros que han vivido diversas experiencias alrededor del mundo. Hemos escalado glaciares en Islandia, cabalgado por la estepa mongola, disfrutado del emocionante rafting en aguas bravas desde las cataratas Victoria por el río Zambeze, esquiado en las pistas de Austria y relajado en las hermosas playas de Zanzíbar, solo por mencionar algunas de nuestras vivencias. Esta amplia trayectoria nos ha permitido conocer de cerca los destinos y actividades que harán que tu viaje sea realmente inolvidable. Además, hemos acumulado una vasta experiencia en viajes de negocios, lo que nos ha brindado un entendimiento profundo de los requisitos y detalles necesarios para que este tipo de desplazamiento sea cómodo y productivo.   En Inspitour, nos enorgullece brindar una atención meticulosa a los detalles y una planificación minuciosa para cada aspecto de tu viaje. Desde la selección de alojamientos hasta la personalización de itinerarios, nos aseguramos de que cada momento sea extraordinario y se ajuste a tus preferencias. Ya busques una emocionante aventura llena de adrenalina, la inmersión en la riqueza cultural de destinos fascinantes, un viaje de negocios o simplemente relajarte en playas paradisíacas, en Inspitour estamos preparados para hacer de tu viaje una experiencia especial. Permítenos inspirarte y llevarte a explorar el mundo de manera auténtica. Con actividades emocionantes, opciones de alojamiento exclusivas y destinos sorprendentes, te garantizamos momentos mágicos y recuerdos inolvidables. Descubre el mundo con nosotros y deja que hagamos realidad tus sueños de viaje.

Name: Raro Discovery
Company description: RARO DISCOVERY - Licensed luxury travel agency Based in Milan, we handle requests throughout Italy and the Mediterranean.  We are a close team of travel professionals inspired by our own individual passions: our passions drive us to create rare and inspiring itineraries. As a team of innovators, we are excited to be the first Mediterranean travel agency that is developing non-fungible tokens (NFT). Our Collection A passion fulfilled can transform travel into an indelible memory. An experience that lifts your energy long after you’ve returned to your busy life. > Cambuse: we offer personalized charters and cruises in the best Mediterranean destinations combined with cuisine by professional Chefs. Our curated fleet includes catamarans, powered catamarans, sailing yachts and motorboats. > Golf Charme: we create premium golf tours across Italy, blending sport with Italy’s best food, wine, art, architecture, history, and stunning landscapes. > Travel & Savour: for travellers who love to explore Italy through its culinary heritage. Our team organizes gourmet itineraries that showcase each region's distinct  flavors, including luxury trains and vintage cars journeys.  > The Rural Collection: features unique farm houses, countryside hotels, cottages and authentic rural experiences. Our team of expert Travel Designers will tailor make itineraries individual to your clients. No two are the same. Our experiences are unique, entirely driven by the clients’ passions.  Raro Discovery acts as an IATA accredited luxury travel agency and as a DMC for inquiries across all of Italy, including Sardinia and Sicily, and extends to the Mediterranean for golf, yacht and sailing, and luxury rural inquiries. @rarodiscovery (Instagram)

Name: Itinerari Nomadi S.r.l.s.
Company description: 🌍 Benvenuti in Itinerari Nomadi! 🚐⛵ Siamo il vostro compagno di avventure nel mondo, specializzati in viaggi di gruppo unici e indimenticabili. Il nostro focus si concentra su esperienze straordinarie, dalla libertà di esplorare a bordo di camper alle emozionanti crociere fluviali e velieri maestosi. ✨ Esplora il Mondo con Noi: Viaggia al tuo ritmo con i nostri tour in camper, dove la strada diventa la tua guida e la libertà è il tuo compagno di viaggio. Da panorami mozzafiato a destinazioni nascoste, i nostri itinerari sono progettati per soddisfare l'anima del nomade in ognuno di noi. ⛵ Crociera in Stile: Imbarcati in una crociera fluviale o salpa verso l'orizzonte su un veliero elegante. Le nostre crociere offrono un mix perfetto di lusso, avventura e relax, navigando attraverso acque scintillanti e destinazioni affascinanti. 💑 Fughe Romantiche: Celebra l'amore in scenari da sogno. Le nostre fughe romantiche sono create su misura per coppie che cercano momenti speciali in luoghi straordinari. Dai tramonti sulla spiaggia alle serate sotto le stelle, trasformiamo sogni in realtà. 📸 Esperienze con Travel Blogger: Unisciti a noi in avventure curate dai migliori travel blogger. Esplora il mondo attraverso i loro occhi esperti, scoprendo segreti nascosti e gemme poco conosciute. 🦓 Safari Indimenticabili: Abbraccia la bellezza selvaggia dell'Africa con i nostri safari su misura. Dalle savane ai deserti, offriamo esperienze uniche per incontrare la fauna selvatica in modo sostenibile e responsabile. 🌐 Connettiti con Itinerari Nomadi: Siamo più di un tour operator; siamo creatori di esperienze. Unisciti a noi nel viaggio della vita e scopri il mondo attraverso gli occhi di Itinerari Nomadi. 🌟

Name: Alvorada Vitalicia
Company description: Alvorada Vitalicia is a travel agency that specializes in private group tours throughout Portugal. We take pride in our commitment to responsibility and offer a diverse range of tour options. Our company provides FIT tours, allowing you to tailor your trip to your preferences and leave the planning to us.

Name: MAD HOLIDAYS P.C.
Company description: M.A.D HOLIDAYS would like to introduce itself! Who we are: M .A. D HOLIDAYS (Make Any Dream!) is a Tour Operator based in Athens, Greece providing outstanding travel services. Our team of experts in the Greek and European travel industry offer their experienced service with a personal touch on a 24 hour basis. We are based in Greece, one of the most beautiful countries in the world with a very long history in the travel industry. M. A .D HOLIDAYS P.C. is your best choice to see Greece, the Mediterranean and the rest of Europe in a unique and exclusive way! What we offer: Our luxury buses (Euro-4 and Euro-5) are equipped with W.C., air-condition, TV and DVD, Wi-Fi and of course a friendly and professional driver to drive the visitors around Greece and all over Europe. Clean, safe, modern hotels everywhere we go. Carefully selected accommodation from luxury and boutique to traditional. Expert guides and escorts will always be there for everything is needed as well as a professional team in our head offices to make sure every holiday is going to be unforgettable! Our services include: Flexibility: All our tours and travel arrangements can be fitted to the clients’ needs: Tailor-made programs to satisfy THEM: Summer program or Winter holidays? Less or more optional tours? Extra shopping? Just think out of the box and ask us to change the tour according to your customer’s needs, it’s that simple! Professionalism: Always know that the standards of our services are the highest and at the most competitive prices. You will be the FIRST to know about fresh and new destinations unlike the pre-fabricated programs that are being sold the last 20 years! Our team will make sure that visitors will have a different story to tell when they get back home… We thank you for your time and we will be happy to welcome you to our team. Let’s Make Any Dream together!

Name: Outsiders Iceland
Company description: Outsiders is an Icelandic tour operator that specialises in adventures for individuals and companies.  We offer exciting and memorable outdoor experiences guided by professional guides. We believe that travelling is not only an adventure but also a chance to learn, inspire, and grow.  We encourage all of our guests to explore beyond their comfort zone so they can discover themselves outside the normal tourist paths. We trail run, ski, climb, kayak, swim, mountainbike and hike.  Our expeditions are all over the world, in all seasons and all kinds of weather.  We can make your Icelandic dream adventure come true! Adventures should not be once in a lifetime. Our life should be an adventure. We are the go to guides and coaches for Icelanders.  We publish Icelands only outdoor magazine: Úti. We produce Icelands number one outdoor television show: Úti.  We are the Outsiders movement. No one knows Iceland like we do.

Name: Fresh Travel International
Company description: Travel Agency founded in Bucharest, 2012, with the purpose of offering tourism and adjacent services (financial, insurance, leisure).  Its mission is to offer assistance in searching holiday destinations, through transparency and quality in services. Our vision is to promote not only outgoing policy, but also incoming, through sustaining the comfort during traveling, should they be for business or for touristic purposes.  Fresh Travel International has as values a young collective, with experience in different fields, eager to offer quality services, through respect towards the customers, partners and collaborators.

Name: Oak Tree Travel SRL
Company description: Romania Guided Tours is a tour operator organising private trips and holiday packages in Romania for small groups.  We own a tour-operator license issued by the Romanian Ministry of Tourism and a transport license from Romanian Road Authority.  We are based in Sibiu, Transylvania and we are organising trips all over Romania, from Bucharest as far as Maramures, Danube Delta, Maramures or Bucovina. Our tours are always private, dedicated to small groups, usually friends, families or colleagues. We offer private transfers with our own, modern minivan. The thematic of our packages ranges from cultural,  gastronomy, nature, photo, active or rural adventures. Our preferred tours are the ones focusing on the rural culture as we believe that Romania countryside is really unique,  and has the power to differentiate our country from other touristic destinations.

Name: ANCAPAVEL.RO
Company description: ANCAPAVEL.RO is a complete and inspiring travel source for passionate travellers and for people interested in travel recommendations, tips & tricks or travel packages in the most beautiful destinations. My favorite aspect of this blog is literally interacting with people and I’m incredibly grateful for the opportunity to share with them my travel passion, experience and know-how.   The biggest asset of my blog is to reach both segments of the public interested in holidays and travel experience. According to this, my audience is made up of people who are directly interested in traveling and leisure, as well as travel companies or closely connected corporates: transportation, tour-operators, travel agencies, hotels & resorts, rent a car, insurances, mass-media, events, art and crafts etc PARTNERSHIP For hoteliers, travel agencies, airlines or other business related to travel industry: this website offers the opportunity to promote certain services or products. Name: Danube Destinations - Discover Central Europe
Company description: RUTA LLC. Subsidiaries: Danube Destinations and Discover Central Europe MISSION STATEMENT  Our mission is to provide a travel service center for foreign visitors. Here at RUTA LLC (DMC and Tour Operator, parent company of “Danube Destinations” and Discover Central Europe), we maintain the highest standards of service while creating quality and unique travel and cultural experiences of Hungary which present the true beauty of the country. Our goal is to exceed your expectations! WHO WE ARE? RUTA LLC (DMC and Tour Operator) is your full-service travel concierge, specialized in creating cultural and special-interest tours, events, and programs in Hungary for the individual traveller, tour groups, and expatriates living in Hungary.  Our activities are built on the high level of competence and dedication of our team of specialists who have 20+ years of experience in the tourism business. Throughout our professional career, we gathered the skills and experience in organising domestic and international cultural and educational tours or events and we are proud to have many satisfied clients and returning travellers. WHY DID WE START?  We started our company with the goal of providing specialized and uniquely individualized programs and services for those visitors interested in a more culturally and socially focused way of discovering Hungary. OUR VALUES: Our company strives to provide a highly personalised, unique travel experience in Budapest and Hungary which is aimed to exceed all your expectations! Our programs and tours are lead by a group of enthusiastic and knowledgeable local guides, telling about the history, architecture, social situation of Budapest as well as sharing personal experiences. An unrivalled cultural experience is guaranteed by our team of experts: professors of various national and international Universities and educational institutions, who are extremely knowledgeable and passionate about their field. We are particularly proud to volunteer at local cultural institutions. WHAT WE DO? Please click here to see: http://www.danubedestinations.com/about-us/

Name: BookinIT
Company description: BookinIT is a comprehensive online platform designed for modern travel agencies. Name: Lavoraresubito.com
Company description: Chi siamo: ti connettiamo con chi cerca lavoro.: The Work Now fa parte di un gruppo specializzato in telecomunicazioni con un pacchetto di oltre 100.000 clienti attivi in Italia. L'azienda porta connettività in tutta la regione e risolve ogni problema di Digital Divide. Scegliamo di mettere a disposizione con "The Work Now - Lavorare Subito" le nostre competenze per "connettere" oggi chi cerca lavoro, chi vuole trovare lavoro e chi ha bisogno proprio di Te per lavorare. The Work Now garantisce serietà e punta ad offrire un servizio utile alla società contemporanea. L'idea: è nata dall'esperienza diretta, ascoltando le persone. L'idea "The Work Now - Lavorare Subito" è nata per esperienza diretta: spesso abbiamo avuto bisogno - nella nostra rete di aziende - di specifici ruoli professionali per una settimana, per un mese, per due giorni. Dove trovare queste persone così all'improvviso e come trovarli rapidamente senza fare interminabili ricerche, telefonate a conoscenti o agenzie? L'idea è nata ascoltando il mondo che parla: la vicina di casa con la gamba ingessata per un mese che cerca un dog-sitter per portare a passeggio e accudire i cani; l'amica che cerca una baby sitter per il sabato sera; il tour operator che ha bisogno per un weekend di interpreti cinesi; lo chef che deve trovare un aiuto-cuoco in più per una cena di gala; l'impresa che per portare a termine progetti e impegni valuta un rafforzo del personale per un determinato periodo.  Mission, Obiettivi e Vantaggi: Il bisogno giornaliero di svariate figure lavorative ci ha portato a sviluppare il concept e la piattaforma LavorareSubito.com per aiutare sia chi cerca lavoro sia chi è alla ricerca di personale. Grazie ai campi di ricerca personalizzabili è possibile trovare molteplici figure e disponibilità in una determinata zona.

Name: Oncarbon
Company description: Offer your customers options to manage flight emissions through SAF and carbon withdrawal credits. 💨 Flight emissions calculations Display flight emissions information based on the latest science and highlight low carbon options. 🌱 Carbon withdrawal credits Provide your customers with quality carbon withdrawal credits with high permanence. ✈️Sustainable Aviation Fuel credits Offer a “buy-and-claim” solution allowing your customers to claim the CO2 reduction achieved through their purchase. Our mission While we want people to continue to enjoy the benefits of travel, we believe that awareness of the environmental footprint of travel today is the first step toward reducing emissions in the future. The earth is warming rapidly. Emissions from air travel alone account for about 3.5% of total global warming. The travel industry needs to change, and we need to travel more consciously, because if we continue to emit current levels of greenhouse gasses, we will exceed the 1.5℃ global warming limit agreed to in the 2015 Paris Agreement, and we will do so in a serious way. The first step in this journey is to educate people about the climate impacts of different travel choices. The second step is to empower them to reduce and offset those impacts with reliable, proven tools. There is no room for greenwashing - talking openly about emissions is much better than avoiding discussion! Our goal is to help airline and travel agency customers understand travel-related emissions and how to reduce them, without fooling them into thinking that the €5 they pay for carbon offsets will offset the environmental damage of a long-haul flight. We are committed to minimizing the harmful impacts of travel and pushing for better supply of and demand for low-emission travel products. We want the travel industry to be more transparent and sustainable. We are not here to make a quick buck - we want to make a difference.

Name: TravelNet
Company description: TravelNet is a global marketing alliance built for the entire travel ecosystem: destinations, attractions, hotels, experiences, tour operators, travel agencies, cruise ships, tour guides, travel service providers, restaurants & bars and creators. Instead of each business spending alone to reach travelers, we connect them into one shared network, turning current competition into collaboration. Our AI-driven platform detects traveler's emotional intent from millions of stories, videos, and reviews, identifying emotions like adventure, serenity, or connection long before the booking stage. That’s how we reach travelers at the first minute of their journey, when dreams turn into decisions. Decisions you can influence. Why? Because the truth for most tourism businesses is, that most travelers don’t come back to the same place. They move from one experience to the next, one destination to another. In a lifetime journey like this, no single business can own the traveler alone. But together, we can. Every traveler one member attracts can become a customer for another through our lead-pooling network. Together, we build marketing equity, reduce acquisition costs, and finally keep ownership of our audiences, without commissions, unreasonable ad-spend or middlemen. Travel is a lifetime journey. Marketing it should create lifetime value, not just a transaction. Every Business that jois the TravelNet Alliance becomes part of the next chapter in how the world discovers travel

Company description: DTN Group si occupa dell’organizzazione di corsi di formazione residenziali finalizzati all’aggiornamento del personale medico e all’attribuzione dei relativi crediti ECM, curando ogni aspetto inerente l’evento residenziale, dalla richiesta di accreditamento dell’evento ECM, (Provider n. 4162) agli aspetti direttamente collegati con l’organizzazione dell’evento stesso, come i servizi di segreteria, di catering, di hostess, di ospitalità dei relatori e di logistica. DTN Group dispone, nella propria sede operativa accreditata presso la Regione Sicilia, di aule attrezzate con tutti i supporti utili alla realizzazione di attività formative di qualsiasi natura, consentendo anche ad aziende o enti esterni la realizzazione di corsi di formazione professionale sia per giovani disoccupati, che per persone occupate per adeguarne la professionalità al cambiamento organizzativo e tecnologico; la formazione e qualificazione professionale di personale di imprese, enti pubblici e privati; lo svolgimento di attività didattica di ogni genere per la formazione, l’aggiornamento, la riqualificazione e la riconversione professionale. DTN Group è un ente di formazione radicato nel territorio nazionale attraverso un'ampia rete di rapporti di collaborazione con esperti e docenti, in particolar modo nell’organizzazione di progetti formativi a vocazione internazionale (MUN), che vedono coinvolte sia le scuole medie superiori, sia le Università di tutta Italia e che si concludono con la partecipazione alle principali Conferenze Onu di New York, Boston e Washington. DTN Group è, inoltre, agenzia di viaggi di categoria A/Illimitata e pertanto organizza pacchetti turistici, stage formativi e corsi di lingua per studenti, docenti e professionisti, attività extrascolastiche ivi compresi scambi culturali.

Name: Events & Co.
Company description: Born to Create Unforgettable Experiences Events & Co. is not just an agency, it’s a movement in experiential communication. Since launching in 2000, we’ve evolved from a niche incoming travel agency to a multi-award-winning powerhouse in luxury event production, brand storytelling, and destination experiences. Rooted in the vibrant city of Seville, and with a footprint that spans Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Lisbon, and Verona, we fuse local soul with global sophistication. Our multicultural team of industry leaders designs, curates, and delivers moments that move people—whether it’s a bold product launch, a high-impact brand activation, or a bespoke hospitality program. Today, under our signature philosophy "Communicating Through Experiences," Events & Co. leads with vision. From the fast-paced world of MICE to the ever-evolving needs of premium brands, we bring ideas to life through immersive design, strategic storytelling, and flawless execution. As part of The Concept Power and a proud member of UAN – United Agencies Network, we’re connected to the pulse of next-generation communication across Europe and beyond.  Our promise? World-class standards, meticulous attention to detail, and emotionally resonant experiences that redefine what an event can be. Events & Co. | Communicating through Experiences Our Offices: SPAIN: Seville (Headquarters), Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia & Tenerife PORTUGAL: Lisbon ITALY: Verona Events & Co. | Awards Premios Evento Plus 2009 | 2012 | 2013 | 2014 | 2017 eubea | First Prize Winner FIP | First Prize Winner | Gota de Cristal 2012

Name: Lisbon Story
Company description: Tour operator with services for all those who want to know Portugal. We want to show you the sights of Portugal , it's culture , music, flavors, smells and the friendliness of the Portuguese. Our offering includes practical information regarding many aspects linked to leisure , history and portuguese quootidiano. We help you organize your holiday featuring a wide range of services such as transportation, reception and assistance in the different languages, accommodation in hotels , villas and apartments, tour and translation guide services, management and organization of events.

Name: Poland Pros DMC
Company description: You choose Poland, we choose the best for you! We are incoming travel agency and we work in two sectors of the business - tourism and MICE. Contact us and check what can we do for you!

Name: Transparent Travel
Company description: 🇨🇿 Službou, kterou je Transparent Travel nejen zcela originální, věříme i v měřítku světovém, a na které naše agentura také vznikla je vysoká míra individualizace Vaší příští dovolené. Vybereme Vám, dle Vašeho profilu ideální místo pro Vaši příští dovolenou, ať již pojedete na vlastní pěst nebo s cestovní kanceláří. Výběr destinace je rozhodně tím nejdůležitějším krokem při zařizování jakékoliv cesty a krokem, který je nesmírně nelehký, pokud nejste zkušený světoběžník nebo naprostý nadšencem do cestování. Vycházíme z toho, o čem jsme se sami mnohokrát přesvědčili, že když se někomu nějaká destinace, hotel atd. líbí, ještě to neznamená, že je vhodná pro někoho jiného. 🇬🇧 Service, which defines worldwide originality of Transparent Travel, and which is the basis on which our agency was created, is undeniably high degree of individualization your next vacation. We will choose destination right for you according to your profile regardless you will travel with travel agency or on your own. Choosing a destination is definitely the most important step which you have to make when you plan any trip. This step is really difficult if you aren´t experienced globetrotter or long-term fanatic to travelling. We are based on what we ourselves have convinced many times, that when someone likes a destination, hotel, etc.. it doesn´t mean that the same place is suitable for someone else.

Name: The Ezz Baily Company
HQ Location: Spain, Asturias, Oviedo, 16 Calle Ribera De Arriba, 33006
Company description: Ezz Baily customized training camps in endurance sports (cycling, running, swimming and triathlon) are organized and prepared by the Ezz Baily Company, based on customers goals and needs. The Ezz Baily company is a well-based sport travel agency providing professional training guidance in endurance sports as well as settling up personalized camps for triathlon and cycling clubs around Europe in several Spanish locations.

HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, 8 1 E Rua Sampaio Bruno, 1350-283
Company description: An online journal where you can consult information about trips, promotions, hotels, cruises, national and international trips, proposals of the tour operators, Tourism Fairs, Summits, Conferences and much more in www.oturismo.pt.

Name: NorthernShots Tours
Company description: Pioneer, chasing lights since 2012. NorthernShots is a tour operator in Norway, Tromsø The company organizes tours with guaranteed daily departures. NorthernShots can count on an incredibly experienced team of guides and professional photographers, who will accompany our guests on day and night tours around the Tromsø region. NorthernShots Tours AS is an associated member of USTOA, NHO.

Name: Jensen Tour ApS
Company description: Jensen Tour is a Danish/Chinese traveling agency based in Denmark but has a clientele that spans the globe, offering high end quality travel solutions to business and leisure travelers. We got excellent sustainable connections thru a network of travel agencies worldwide. We offer a full range of services - private sightseeing, chauffeured transportation and destination management to provide the finest tours and vacations. Our aims are to provide our valued visitors with the highest quality service expected. We take enormous pride in our fully personalized service and do our outmost to fulfill any requirements - courteous, thoughtful, flexible, discreet and secure. We value our staff, and assure that they are valued members of a company that is prepared to invest in them and is committed to the interest of all parties. As a result, our guides frequently go beyond what may be expected of them. We value our suppliers and partners, and assured they are carefully selected and fully prepared and committed to secure our visitors the high quality service expected. Our partners are the best available on the market. Please contact us if you would like to hear more about us and our services. If you have toured with us before and would like to make any comments about our service or your tour guide, we would love to hear from you.

Name: Nordic Safari Club
HQ Location: Denmark, South Denmark, Haderslev, 44 Sillerup Møllevej, 6100
Company description: Nordic Safari Club is an association for hunters in the Nordic countries with a special passion for international hunting. Nordic Safari Club was founded in May 1972 by well-known Nordic trophy hunters. The club is independent of hunting travel agencies and hunting organizations, and is for all Nordic hunters, with a special interest in international hunting. The purpose of the club is to work for the benefit of this type of hunting. We give information about international hunting - we seek to give our members a chance to exchange experiences, we promote the members' opportunities for hunting abroad and fight for their interests as international hunters. Our mission is to stand up for sustainable hunting by explaining it to non-hunters all over the world. We try to be as proactive as possible but naturally we also take action when hunting is under attack. Hunting magazine: TROPHY is issued by the club 6 times a year. The magazine primarily contain member's articles on hunting abroad. In addition, we write about gear, we test ,  write informative articles, hunting reports, historical articles and portraits of hunters. Trophy measuring: NSC measure trophies from all over the world. We measure according to Safari Club International and CIC's rules. Shooting events: Among other things we arrange field shooting with rifles. We aim to give our members the opportunity to practice for stationary and moving targets at distances from 10–600 meters. Auctions: Auctions of donated hunting trips and hunting related equipment are held at our website. Be ready to make a really good purchase! Club slams: NSC has established a number of slams: Nordic Slam, European Slam, European Grand Slam, NSK Slam 50, NSK Slam 100, NSK Slam 150, NSK Slam 200. Big Five Slam, Tiny Ten Slam and Predator Slam. Counseling: To advise in insurance cases in connection with thefts, destruction, hunting trips, etc. NSC has an expert committee to deal with these issues. Welcome to Nordic Safari Club

Name: MUSAI TRAVEL
HQ Location: Romania, Cluj, Cluj-napoca, Nr. 18 Bd. Eroilor
Company description: Agenție touroperatoare având ca destinație România și întreaga lume / Tour Operator Travel Agency with focus on Romania and worldwide destinations. Musai Travel s-a născut din dorința de a promova și a face cunoscută România ca destinație turistică, prin frumusețile, tradițiile, meșteșugurile și istoria ei. Deasemenea, încercăm să promovăm călătoriile în întreaga lume ca o modalitate de educație, cunoaștere și descoperire de sine. Ne-am propus sa oferim calitate si vom incerca să nu facem compromisuri când vine vorba de pachetele si serviciile propuse si comercializate, fie că acestea au ca și destinație România, fie străinătatea. Lumea asta e absolut senzațională și merită descoperită. Așa că hai cu noi și "hoinărește românește" :)

Name: VRBookings
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Montevarchi, 11 E Via Ettore Majorana, 52025
Company description: VRBookings is a well-rounded solution for each necessity related to holiday homes rent. It is a complete solution, able to adapt to every needs in the field of vacation rental; from the owner of a single lodge to the agency or tour operator without any limitation in the number of accommodations.

Name: Good Vienna Tours
Company description: Good Vienna Tours is Vienna’s most rated Free Tour operator on TripAdvisor, and for the last six consecutive years, we have received the Traveler’s Choice Award from them.  We are specialized in offering Free Walking Tours of the Vienna historic center (in English, German and Spanish), but we also offer other kinds of tours, such as:  - Schönbrunn palace and garden tour  - Emperor Sissi tour  - Hitler’s Vienna tour  We are always ready to listen to our client’s dreams, needs and interests, to offer the best experience and if requested a private tailored tour! Our team is formed by a mix of people of different ages, genders, and backgrounds, but each of us shares with the others the same great love for our city! We work only with the best state-certified tourist guides that will make your experience in Vienna memorable!  To reach and maintain a high quality of our tours, we make sure to hire only the best guides, but the key to our success lay in how we manage, train and support every single person in our team (guides and back-office personnel). We see Good Vienna Tours team as a family, and we believe that sharing time could enrich every team member. For this reason, we organize periodic events, such as lunches, dinners or parties that are aimed to obtain better cohesion among us, increase the people's happiness and share experiences and suggestions.  Our company is strongly oriented to the future. So, being aware that the tourist market is a variable reality, we are looking forward to adapting to its changes and to increasing our competitiveness!

Name: Tuscan Escapes By Papilio Tours
Company description: Tour operator based in Siena, Tuscany. We offer personalized Tuscan wine tours, a la carte tours, villas and vacations in Tuscany, we also provide private art city guides, trekking, horse Riding, bike tours and cooking classes in central and southern Tuscany.

Name: EUDI SHOW | European Dive Show
Company description: Siamo giunti alla 29° edizioni di EUDI, la fiera della subacquea che si tiene annualmente in Italia, per presentare al popolo del mare le principali novità dal mondo dei produttori, dei diving center, dei tour operator.  Una visione della subacquea a 360°, che offre grande rilevo a fenomeni come l’apnea, la subacquea tecnica, la foto, video subacquea e molto altro.

Name: Go4Cycling
Company description: Go4Cycling (Spring Classics - Grand Tours - Corporate Events - Hospitality) Go4Cycling is a Belgian sports tour operator who is specialized in customized cycling events during the Spring Classics and Grand Tours. With our knowledge of the course, you will have exclusive inside information first, capture the best moments of the races and experience the joy of world class road cycling at the front row. Go4Cycling is Official Tour Operator "Tour of Flanders"!  www.go4cycling.com

Name: SpaDreams ES
Company description: SpaDreams, fundado en el 2013, es la marca internacional del turoperador alemán Fit Reisen, líder en el sector del turismo de salud y bienestar en los países de habla alemana. Nuestra visión es ayudar a las personas a llevar una vida más feliz y saludable. Desde la fundación de Fit Reisen, en 1975, lo hemos logrado con una variedad de paquetes de viajes holísticos adaptados a las necesidades individuales de nuestros clientes. Estamos convencidos de que la salud y el bienestar están estrechamente relacionados. Nuestro objetivo es ofrecer a nuestros clientes una amplia gama de programas de salud y bienestar que les ayuden a mejorar su bienestar físico, mental y emocional. Tenemos mucho cuidado en asegurarnos de que cada uno de nuestros programas sea desarrollado e impartido por grandes profesionales para garantizar una alta calidad y eficacia. Nuestra oferta incluye una amplia gama de programas de salud y bienestar, adaptados a las necesidades y preferencias individuales de nuestros clientes. Ofrecemos programas en todas las áreas de la salud y el bienestar, desde programas detox y Ayurveda hasta retiros de yoga y programas wellness bajo supervisión médica. Se añaden nuevas formas de terapia al programa, así como nuevos destinos. Con SpaDreams, puede elegir entre más de 5.000 ofertas cuidadosamente seleccionadas en más de 400 destinos de 50 países diferentes.

Name: RCI TICKETS - ROYAL CLASS INVESTMENTS
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Marbella, 9 Avda. De La Fontanilla
Company description: Our company specializes in the sale of tickets and packages for sport events worldwide.   In 2003 our company was established in Europe. Due to our hard work, professionalism, reliability and great service we have become a very serious player in the sport event market with offices located in several countries. In 2012 we start an office in Dubai/Sharjah and Hong Kong to be closer to our customers.    At the moment we are looking to establish relationships with travel agencies, like your company, to sell our products to their clients. Your clients will be very pleased to be able to get premium tickets for football matches, Formula 1 races, tennis matches and other events, for which your clients would never be able to purchase tickets otherwise. And, of course, your benefit is an excellent commission on such purchases.    We are proud to announce that we are an official partner of Liverpool, Chelsea, Manchester United and Tottenham Hotspur and that we have great, well-established contacts with Arsenal (sub agent), Real Madrid, FC Barcelona, Bayern Munich, Dortmund, AC Milan, Juventus and many other clubs and organizations!

Name: Tomeeto
Company description: Tomeeto: reisorganisator voor éénbeslissers* Tomeeto organiseert groepsvakanties voor singles en éénoudergezinnen (we noemen ze beiden "éénbelissers").  Het verschil met een klassieke reisorganisator is dat je bij onze singles vakantie gegarandeerd onder leeftijdsgenoten terechtkomt, en in een groep met een evenwicht in het aantal mannen en vrouwen (maximale afwijking is 60/40). Ga je met onze éénoudervakanties mee dan ben je enkel met andere éénoudergezinnen op stap - met kinderen van dezelfde leeftijd. We beschouwen je als één van ons De "to meet" in onze naam spreekt voor zich, maar er is meer dan dat. De "mee" in Tomeeto is voor ons ook een heel belangrijke lettergreep. Wij sturen je niet weg op reis, maar we nemen je mee op vakantie. We zorgen voor je, beschouwen je als een van ons zonder dat je daarvoor aan persoonlijke vrijheid moet inboeten. Je bepaalt zelf op elk moment hoe intens je meedoet aan de activiteiten. Heb je zin in actie? Of juist in chillen? Daar is allemaal tijd en ruimte voor tijdens onze weekends en groepsreizen voor singles. Meer info op www.tomeeto.be, info@tomeeto.be of 0474096179

Name: Chinareisen.de
Company description: Wer nach China reist findet schnell heraus, weshalb es ein so beliebtes Reiseziel ist.  Zhong guo – die Größe des "Reichs der Mitte" ist vergleichbar mit Europa - erwartet Sie mit seiner unermesslichen Vielfalt in jeder Hinsicht: Eine der ältesten Hochkulturen der Erde, die chinesischen Landschaften und Nationalitäten... Aber China ist auch ein Land der Gegensätze: Uralte Kultur verbindet sich mit optimistischer Lebenshaltung und Wirtschaftskraft, Ultra-Moderne mit Tradition. Chinareisen.de ist ein führender China Reiseveranstalter,spezialisiert sich schließlich auf Chinareisen und bietet maßgeschneiderte China Reisen für Kleingruppen und Individualreisen an.

Name: Stichting Creator | Werkplaats12
Company description: Stichting Creator is een instelling die zich inzet voor het stimuleren van culturele verrassingen en het leggen van dwarsverbanden tussen diverse kunst disciplines.  Organisatie en initiatief van onder meer: - Droomreis - reizende groeps expositie in het donker over de droomwereld van de kunstenaars - MuseumTor - het kleinste museum terwijl  - Tempo-Art - kunst beweging met de snelheid van de snelweg - A Day at the Parking - kunst project Een dagje gestrand - Pandora en de Zeven Hoofdzonden - interactief kunstproject - Mea Vulva - reizende groeps tentonnstelling  - Natuur op zijn Kant - kunst milieu project - Wrakkentochten - kunst milieu project / reisbureau - Facebak - kunst project social media - Amsterbannertje - public relations omgeving Amsterdam - Artefacts - kunst collectie - Goed Mis! (eerste prijs "Prix d'Albert" op KunstCuyp Amsterdam) - kunst collectief - Groep expositie Het Wonder van Woerdes - 2008 - samenwerking met Stichting En NU: Kunst! - Groep expositie Woerdstock - 2007 - samenwerking met Stichting En NU: Kunst! - Wildart (Zwerfkunst.com - samenwerking met Stichting En NU: Kunst! - kunst collectief - ArtArk - kunst project, atelier - ArtAmuse - straat object / installatie voor het uitwisselen van kunst emoties door het publiek

Name: Noble Krakow - Poland Incoming Tour Operator
HQ Location: Poland, Lesser Poland Voivodeship, Kraków, 14/p1 Gertrudy, 31-048
Company description: Noble Krakow company is a professional travel agency providing services of incoming tourism in Poland. The company takes care of the complete organisation of the stay in Poland, in particular regarding Krakow and its surroundings. We offer such services as searching and booking hotel rooms, airport transfers, guides, entrance tickets, restaurants etc. We prepare programs individually for each group. We provide services for larger groups, families, individual clients, tour operators, companies, VIP Clients, govenmental institutions, schools. We guarantee tailor-made services with a strong emphasis on high quality and professional realisation of all requests. Among our Clients, there are: companies, institutions, sport clubs, tour operators - clients from around the world. We provide services in languages of your choice, and our staff speaks Polish, English, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian. We encourage you to use our service.

Name: Latvian Health Tourism Cluster
HQ Location: Latvia, Riga, Riga, 214b Brīvības Gatve, lv-1039
Company description: Latvian health tourism cluster includes a wide spectrum of health tourism entrepreneurs. with an aim to provide high quality medical services to foreign patients as well as locals. There are 64 cluster members, wide variety of health tourism providers: government, municipality and regional hospitals, private clinics, rehabilitation centers, resort hotels, travel agencies, educational and research institutions. Cluster gives an opportunity to improve cooperation among health tourism providers, to organize common marketing activities, to invent and market integrated, innovative tourism products and services, and to make them more available to locals as well as foreign tourists.

Name: Sgoomys
Company description: Sgoomys è la piattaforma digitale nata per promuovere in tempo reale, in Italia e in Europa, i territori e le loro specificità, attraverso la valorizzazione delle mete mobili.  Ideata da amanti del turismo en plein air, supportati da un team di professionisti di marketing e comunicazione dedicati alla definizione e promozione delle destinazioni turistiche, l'App Sgoomys è la risposta alle esigenze di chi ama gli spostamenti liberi e richiede informazioni utili e immediate per andare alla scoperta dei territori, senza dover consultare guide su guide o senza dover fare preventivamente delle ricerche.  Disponibile sugli store per Android e iOS in formula gratuita per gli utenti, l'App garantisce a turisti italiani ed esteri di visualizzare subito sulla mappa luoghi da vedere (musei, aree archeologiche, parchi, castelli, cantine, aziende agricole, ecc...), cose da fare (eventi, sagre, percorsi enogastronomici, raduni, concerti, ecc...), parcheggi auto, aree sosta camper, officine e servizi vari aeroporti, supermarket,ecc...), altri eventuali utenti a cui poter chiedere informazioni sul viaggio o con cui conidvidere la sosta o il percorso. L'utente Sgoomys può usufruire anche del servizio di navigazione fino alla località, in quanto tutti gli indirizzi sono attivi sulla mappa. Sgoomys si rivolge anche agli Stakeholder e ai Soggetti che promuovono itinerari turistici: Comuni e Assessorati, Borghi, Tour Operator, Aziende che promuovono il territorio o prodotti tipici possono trovare nella piattaforma un sistema di promozione innovativo e veloce come un click. Il team Sgoomys studia per loro il posizionamento sulla mappa interattiva, offrendo una serie di servizi a pagamento per la promozione istantanea verso target specifici. Per info e ulteriori dettagli, inviare una mail a info@sgoomys.com.

Name: F.A.S. Airport Services
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Grumello Del Monte, 2 Via Don Luigi Belotti, 24064
Company description: FAS Airport Services offre in tutta Italia, 365 giorni l’anno e 24 ore su 24, servizi di gestione emergenze aeroportuali rivolti a tour operator, compagnie aeree, aeroporti, passeggeri, equipaggi e tecnici.

Name: Manet Mobile Solutions
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Rome, 67 Via E. D'onofrio, 00155
Company description: Manet Mobile Solutions is an Italian company which develops Manet, a digital solution offering travelers Internet connectivity abroad together with a universe of content and services related to their trip and to the destination. The service is offered via an App - which uses eSIM technology to equip travelers with fast and convenient Internet connectivity on their smartphones - and/or a fully customized physical Device. The solution is designed for guests of hotels, b&bs, vacation rentals and for customers of car rentals, tour operators and of any other travel professionals. The operator is provided with a web Dashboard allowing him to customize the content of Manet, interact with customers and increase revenues by improving customer’s engagement.

Name: Villsy Villas
Company description: Villsy.com is an online travel agency specialized in renting Villas with pool for your perfect holidays. Long experience and handpicked Villas we offer, will guarantee perfect holidays for you and your family and friends. Who we are? It was in the year 2008 that we built our first villa in central Istria. However, we weren't satisfied with the overall experience that different agencies offered us. Moreover, the guests arrived without proper information about the villas. In the year 2013, we realized we are self-sufficient to offer our clients with an exceptional vacation and Isrian Villas was born. Our business has been growing constantly since the day we started renting houses from homeowners. Every home is charming in its own way and offers exclusive benefits to the customers. After thorough evaluation, we have handpicked every villa for our guests. Not only do we take care of your comfort but also offer you the villas at unbelievable prices by eliminating middle men. Every house undergoes a proper inspection to ensure our guests have no trouble staying in them. Our local support can guide you on the kind of activities you can be a part of during your vacation. Enjoy your holiday and our extravagant villas. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/villsyvillas Twitter : https://twitter.com/villsy2 Instragram: https://www.instagram.com/villsyvillas/ Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/villsyvillas/

Name: Krk Adria d.o.o.
Company description: KRK ADRIA is travel agency under VISIT KRK brand, situated on the island Krk in Croatia. The main activity is high quality accommodation rental on the island of Krk. We are open for cooperation with similar companies worldwide.

Name: Kompas Croatia
HQ Location: Croatia, Istria, Poreč, 20 Ulica Mate Vlašića, 52440
Company description: Kompas Croatia, a part of the Kompas Group, offers a wide range of premium travel services designed to deliver exceptional experiences in the Adriatic region and beyond. With over 70 years of industry expertise, we are dedicated to providing high-quality, personalized travel solutions that meet the diverse needs of our clients. Our services include luxury cruises along the Croatian coastline through Adriatic Cruise, and efficient ferry services connecting Istria (Croatia) with Venice (Italy), as well as Dubrovnik with Budva (Montenegro) via Adriatic Lines. We also provide exclusive villas and vacation homes in Croatia through Kompas Villas, as well as guided tours that immerse travelers in local culture and history. Our services extend to reliable passenger transportation and engaging excursions, as well as comprehensive MICE solutions. Additionally, we offer tailored accommodation arrangements for groups and corporate clients. Based in Slovenia, Kompas is renowned for its extensive network of 20 offices throughout Europe and the USA. This extensive network, combined with our  commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, allows us to offer innovative and top-quality travel experiences. Kompas Croatia carries forward this tradition, serving as a gateway to unforgettable journeys in the Adriatic region and beyond.

Name: Putolovac
HQ Location: Croatia, City Of Zagreb, Zagreb, 5 Tkalciceva Ulica, 10000
Company description: Putolovac je turistička agencija sa sjedištem u Zagrebu. Ekipa Putolovca mlada je, uhodana i željna putovanja. Naša velika prednost leži u činjenici da je većina naših zaposlenika kroz iskustvo turističkog vodiča iskusila destinacije koje Vam nudimo, te Vam stoga možemo osigurati sve potrebne/poželjne informacije i podršku u procesu odabira i pripreme za putovanje.  Susreli smo se sa svim situacijama koje organizirano putovanje podrazumijeva, poznajemo okolnosti i prilike na terenu i vrlo smo iskusni u vođenju turističkih grupa. Također, surađujemo i kreiramo nove programe s dugogodišnjim vodičima i najvećim agencijama u Hrvatskoj. Preko Putolovca možete uplatiti aranžmane naših partnera kao što su Atlas, Kompas, Palma, Nikal, Mondo Travel, Idea Putovanja, Bravo putovanja, Integral, Svijet Krstarenja, Idea Club Travel MSC Cruises i mnogi drugi. I ne zaboravite da za svako putovanje u aranžmanu naših partnerskih agencija također dobivate bodove u Putolovac klubu putnika koje možete iskoristiti na drugim polascima.

Name: Aurea International
Company description: Aurea International is a Travel Agency that was established in 1990 with a principal office in the city of Krk, Island of Krk, Croatia. Our primary activity is the provision of hotel and apartment accommodation on the Krk Island, as well as the provision of a complete tourist service, from transfers and car rental, to excursions, boat trips and group trip arrangements.

Name: Yachtcharter Kiel
Company description: Yacht Charter Kiel ... not only stands for many services in the maritime yacht and sailing sector - and not only in the Bay of Kiel. We always act according to the Hanseatic tradition: reliability, decency and fairness. This has resulted in us being able to offer our customers and guests a much larger portfolio of services by means of partnerships and collaborations with "supposed competitors" than without this network.  Since 2015 we have been offering our own sailing yachts in Kiel's inner fjord.  2016, sailing trips were added to our training yacht, which was approved by German Gouverment "BG-Verkehr". New in the program: sailing events (e.g. Sail & Wine, Sail & Dine, Sail & Run), flotilla cruises (with up to 8 yachts) and other activities related to water sports. The first flotilla trips with companies took place  in 2017. e.g. our "Triple X" with 3 sporty X-yachts and a Dufour 43. The first yacht service / refit orders for foreign yachts were processed. The first customer ships were taken over in the charter service.  The charter offer was expanded in 2019 - from now on, our customers can charter from us worldwide. In addition, we now offer other themed trips, including through partner companies, such as: “Inselerwachen”, “Single and solo traveler trips” and are active as a travel agency.  In 2020, 4 more sailing yachts came into the fleet. We also have a luxury motor yacht for charter and events right on the keel line for the first time. We are now the largest provider of sailing and motor yachts for the Kiel area and also offer SBF-SSS training. Services: the brokerage and chartering of owner-charter yachts in full service, brokerage of traditional ships, skipper training, training, yacht repairs, winter storage etc.

Outline Travel ontwikkelt zowel voor kleine als grote groeperingen reizen, die afgestemd zijn op de wensen en het budget van uw organisatie. Kunstzinnig, historisch, cultureel, recreatief, sportief…elk thema krijgt een plaats. Op vraag werken we graag uw projecten uit. Door de jarenlange aanwezigheid in Tsjechië, Polen en Slovenië kunnen we snel en doeltreffend reageren op uw vragen. ONZE TROEVEN - Elk programma wordt samengesteld naargelang de wensen van de groep - Professionele begeleiding in een taal naar keuze - Bij noodgevallen is er een 24/24 service van het Outline-team - Reizen voor elk budget - Outline is als reisbureau lid van het VVR en als buitensportorganisatie lid van het BFNO

International tour operators, major insurance and travel assistance companies have already chosen Zante Medical Care, as their exclusive medical partner, due to our reputable previous work.

Name: Ecotrav
Company description: ecotrav’s mission is to help corporations manage and reduce their Travel and Expenses (T&E) costs On-demand Travel & Expense Solution providing a ‘one stop shop’ for corporate travel, putting in relation corporations with selected Travel Agencies chosen by the corporation The interest of this constant and automatic pitch for the company is triple: - The fix fee concept disappears.
