They are amongst the first in Greece to provide travel services to the Chinese tourists who began visiting Greece in early 2000.  Both founders are extensively experienced in the hotel and travel industry in China, and in Greece. In 2010, in order to better cater to our clients, a sister travel agency was opened in Beijing, welcoming Greek visitors to China and also providing general travel service for our local Chinese clients. Multipath Travel provides expert travel services to visitors from and to China, and is now among the leading travel agencies in Greece for Chinese travelers.   Multipath Travel has years of experience in organizing wedding trips for Chinese visitors within Greece. The planning of wedding trips, may include traveling and accommodation, as well as any additional services which may help to create a spectacular wedding day.   Multipath Travel also acts as a general tourism agency, prepared to handle various travel requests such as tour packages, conferences, conventions, business or leisure events, and weddings.  Multipath Travel are experts in handling the extremely high demands and sensitivities of our culturally diverse clientele.  Multipath Travel proudly collaborates with some of the biggest outbound Chinese tourism providers, and is now a leading travel agency in Greece.

Name: DISCOBUS S.r.o.

Company description: Conoscere e far conoscere il mondo alla ricerca di culture e costumi diversi, esperienze, persone, sapori e storia. Forza7 Travel Agency nasce nel 1983 da una esperienza di lavoro nell’ambito turistico pluriennale da parte dei soci che tutt’oggi conducono l’azienda. La ricerca dell’eccellenza , il desiderio di soddisfare i nostri clienti e capirne le esigenze ha sempre contraddistinto il nostro operato. L’esperienza pluriennale nel settore del turismo “Leisure”  e “Incentive” ha determinato una conoscenza profonda del prodotto e sviluppato una forte sensibilità rivolta ai nostri clienti. Nos adaptamos a nuestros clientes ofreciendo las mejores opciones desde un ámbito cercano y familiar. Queremos que disfrutes de tus merecidas vacaciones de una forma segura y cómoda. Y, con la confianza de que dispone de nuestra atención las 24 horas del día, en caso de necesitarnos. Nuestro Objetivo es preparar "el viaje de tus sueños", según tus necesidades y cubriendo todas tus expectativas, creándote "experiencias únicas y memorables". Así mismo, el equipo de Iberoandino Travel, te asesorará de la mejor manera para que vivas una experiencia inolvidable, a un precio competitivo, brindándote todo tipo de facilidades.  ¡Iberoandino Travel te lleva a descubrir mundo!

Name: Trinakria Tours
Company description: Agencia de viajes especialista en Sicilia, Cerdeña, Puglia, Creta, Peloponeso y Grecia continental. Somos una asesoría de viajes online y trabaja intentando combinar en la mejor manera posible trato personalizado, eficiencia, rapidez e innovación tecnológica. MISIÓN: Promocionar la cultura, el arte y el turismo del Mediterráneo ofreciendo una visión global pero sin olvidar sus peculiaridades. Nuestra manera de trabajar según una cliente (2008): "Lo más increíble de todo, es que cuando hablas con los amigos, etc...ves como muchos de ellos han intentado viajar a Sicilia pero con el típico tour operador, o por su cuenta, no se si por precios o porque la oferta o itinerario que ofrecen es muy cara o no acaba de convencer, muchos de ellos se han echado para atrás y finalmente no han viajado a esta isla...desde luego les estoy pasando tu web para que puedan descubrir que lo tenéis muy bien montado y que notas que realmente esto es vuestro negocio..pero que no todo es business sino un proyecto para que la gente conozca vuestra tierra y se le pueda dar una vuelta a los tópicos de siempre, hay un ambiente entre todos vosotros de amistad y de ilusión en un proyecto común y eso no se ve todos los días, y menos cuando hablamos de turismo" (Manoli, Tarragona)

Name: East Travel
Company description: East Travel is an establishment of travel related companies which started their activities from 2006. Starting off with Eastern World, our experience in providing high standard services has been continuously growing, having served thousands of tourists from different countries of Europe and all over the world. Nowadays, East Travel is a Destination Management Company specialising in travel services throughout Central and Eastern Europe. Together with our dynamic team, we are continually working on improving and developing our tours to find new attractive tourist destinations and satisfy our customers’ needs.   Our Mission Treat tourists from around the world by showing them the most of Central and Eastern Europe and meet all the needs of our clients' thanks to our excellent customer service. We want to maintain competitive prices for our clients and let the customer enjoy delightful travel opportunities Our Vision Increasing our independent systems. We are working to expand our network of travel agencies. As a result, there will be more options for customers who seek to increase their sales and profit. We also plan to acquire new travel agencies in other countries. This will make sure we expand our strategy to have a commanding presence in the world market.   Our Philosophy Your vacations should be a time to forget your complex and busy lives so that you can successfully rejuvenate yourself. We are here to help you with choosing the right destination for your trip. Our experienced staff present suggestions and arrangements to make the trip uniquely yours. We will find the perfect destination for you.

Name: Made In Uvet
Company description: Made in Uvet is the Tour Operator and Destination Management Company belonging to the Uvet Group, the leading Travel Management company in Italy (estabilished in 1950) with branch offices in France, Switzerland, Sweden, Finland, Latvia, Romania and the United Kingdom. Made in Uvet offers Luxury and tailor-made travel services in Europe, with a special focus on Italy, thanks to its long experience in Business and Leisure Travel, Mobility, Meetings, Incentives, Conferences and Events. Within Italy, the Uvet group has operating centres in Milano, Turin, Treviso, Bologna, Florence and Rome, and it is the major shareholder in a network of more than 1,500 travel agencies throughout Italy. In each region, they ensure direct knowledge of the territory, products and local suppliers, as well as offering a complete service to their clients. The mission of Made in Uvet is to offer travel programmes and experiences which enable people to sample the best of Italian lifestyle and the excellence it has to offer. With passion, skill and professionalism, the multilingual Made in Uvet team will create custom-made travel itineraries and provide services for every type of demand and budget. It will take care of hotel bookings, train and airline tickets, transfers, restaurants, guided tours and entertainment, but also private jets and helicopters, yachts, limousines, and unique, exclusive locations for private events, weddings or honeymoons. Be inspired by our itineraries and travel packages focused on: Art & Culture, Food and Wine, Sport & Adventure, Secret Places & Unique Events, Glamour & Fashion, Movie Set & Music, Land & Nature, Architecture & Design. Phone: +39.0281838349 E-mail: info@madeinuvet.com WeChat: MadeinUVET

Company description: Viajespapiro.com es el primer proyecto online de Grupo Papiro, una agencia de viajes multidestino cuyo comercio electrónico es capaz de adaptarse a prácticamente a cualquier oferta del mercado actual por parte de los touroperadores españoles. Como parte del Grupo Papiro cuenta además, con una gran cantidad de ofertas basadas en producto propio y se ha convertido en una referencia para el mercado español en viajes a Egipto, Jordania, Turquía e Israel, touroperados por Papiro Tours. Su sistema permite conocer detalles para viajar con adultos, niños y bebés, diferenciando categorías y regímenes de alojamiento.

Name: Abruzzotravelling
Company description: Il Consorzio Abruzzotravelling è nato nel maggio 2005 per valorizzare e migliorare l’offerta turistica nel territorio abruzzese. Sin dalla sua creazione, il Consorzio è stato animato da una chiara vision: attuare un sistema regionale turistico-ricettivo ad ampio raggio, mettendo “in rete” risorse, know how e strategie di marketing del più alto numero possibile di aziende per stimolare e migliorare il rapporto tra domanda ed offerta turistica in tutti i periodi dell’anno e creare un rapporto stretto fra i segmenti turistici regionali da una parte, e tutte le altre attività economiche del territorio che in qualche modo possono contribuire in modo sinergico a far crescere il complesso sistema turismo.  La mission di Abruzzotravelling è coordinare l’attività delle imprese turistiche consorziate al fine di migliorarne la capacità produttiva, l’efficienza ed i risultati annuali e stagionali.  Chi desidera visitare l’Abruzzo senza far a meno di tutti i servizi può, grazie agli associati, avere a disposizione guide professionali, itinerari programmati o realizzati su misura secondo le proprie esigenze, oppure la possibilità di noleggiare dalla semplice bicicletta, al pullman.  Le strutture appartenenti al Consorzio sono 77 di cui, Tour Operator, Camping e Villaggi, Società di Servizi per il Turismo, Strutture Ricettive e Aziende di Produzione Tipica. Con una capacità ricettiva totale di 100 Appartamenti, 250 Bungalow, 350 piazzole, 3.500 camere e 7.300 posti letto.

Name: Motivi Tours

Name: Www.NoNameTravel.ro
Company description: On www.NoNameTravel.ro compare the best international tour operators' offers. Book the one the suits you best. No aditional commission. Trips, cruises, weekends, honeymoons, ski, adventure, spa, sightseeing, flight tickets, hotel ... Fly Your Dream

Name: ARIAS Travel & Services
Company description: La agencia de viajes Ski Arias fue fundada por Miguel Arias en 1981, un visionario que anticipó la necesidad de una agencia que ofreciera un servicio exclusivo y personalizado, basado en sus propias experiencias de viaje, especialmente en estaciones de esquí. Su objetivo fue diseñar viajes a medida que permitieran a los clientes de ARIAS travel & services vivir y experimentar lo mejor de cada destino.  El entusiasmo de Miguel se ha transmitido al equipo de ARIAS travel & services, donde cada miembro comparte su misma pasión, compromiso y eficacia en cada solicitud. Esto se refleja en la confianza depositada por numerosas empresas y clientes particulares a lo largo de los años, quienes han valorado la dedicación y el profesionalismo de nuestro equipo. Contamos con productos exclusivos como CMH Heliesquí y Micato Safaris en España, lo que nos permite ofrecer experiencias únicas y memorables a nuestros clientes. Además, colaboramos estrechamente con los mejores especialistas a nivel mundial para garantizar un servicio a medida, cuidando cada detalle para superar las expectativas de nuestros clientes. Detrás de cada propuesta de viaje hay una persona, una forma de trabajar y una visión específica. En ARIAS travel & services, sabemos escuchar y adaptar nuestras propuestas a las necesidades y deseos de cada cliente.

Name: ISIC - International Student Identity Card - Germany & Austria
Company description: The ISIC International Student Identity Card is the only internationally recognized student ID card, endorsed by the UNESCO. It allows students to prove their official student status all over the world and additionally offers access to 150.000 benefits in over 125 countries. The ISIC card is available for full-time students at schools and universities, aged 12 and over. Many of the discounts and services are also accessible to young people up to 30 years of age with the IYTC International Youth Travel Card and to full-time teachers with the ITIC International Teacher Identity Card. In Germany, the ISIC card is represented by rds Reisedienst Deutscher Studentenschaften GmbH and can be ordered online and nationwide in our issuing offices, such as student unions, student services and travel agencies.

Name: Fussballreisen.com - Eine Marke Der RES Touristik GmbH

We are a specialized group tour operator with more than 15 years of experience in organizing groups , incentive travel and MICE  We are based in Sicily and Malta  Our services include hotels, guides, excursions, coach/bus rentals, restaurants, wine and specialty tastings, cooking class , incentives and meeting and in short every service you need for your tour to Sicily & Malta destination .  旅遊在西西里傳入旅遊公司組  我們在南風意大利西西里島和馬耳他專科旅行社安排的團體旅遊。我們是一家專業的旅行團運營商，黑莓超過15年的經驗，在組團，獎勵旅遊和會展  我們的總部設在西西里島和馬耳他  我們的服務包括酒店，導遊，遊覽，教練/巴士出租，餐館和特產的葡萄酒品酒會，烹飪班，會議及獎勵總之每次你需要為你的旅遊西西里島和馬耳他的目的服務。 TRAVEL в Сицилии принимающий туроператор для групп  Мы являемся специалистами туроператора организации групповые поездки в Souther Италия Сицилия и Мальта. Мы являемся специализированным группа туроператор с ежевикой, чем 15-летний опыт в организации групп, инсентив-поездки и MICE  Мы находимся в Сицилии и на Мальте  Наши услуги включают в себя отели, гиды, экскурсии, прокат тренер / автобус, рестораны и специализированные винные дегустации, кулинарные мастер-классы, встречи и стимулы в короткий каждой службе, что нужно для вашего тура в Сицилии и Мальты назначения. グループのシチリアの着信ツアーオペレーターの旅行  私たちは、サウザーイタリアシチリア、マルタのグループ旅行を配置し、専門のツアーオペレーターです。私たちは、整理、グループ、インセンティブ旅行やMICEの経験15年以上のブラックベリーを持つ専門のグループツアーオペレーターです  私たちは、シチリア、マルタに基づいています  当社のサービスはホテル、ガイド、遠足、コーチ/バスのレンタル、レストラン、専門ワインの試飲、料理教室、ショートでの会議やインセンティブあなたはシチリア＆マルタ宛先へあなたの旅行のために必要なすべてのサービスが含まれます。

Name: Globitalia International Srl
Company description: GLOBITALIA International S.R.L. è, ad oggi, uno dei primi franchising di agenzie di viaggi presenti in Italia, nato circa 13 anni fa dall’intraprendenza di un giovane imprenditore, VINCENZO SCHIAVO, ed appartenente al gruppo NEAPOLIS GROUP a cui appartengono anche un tour operator specializzato in viaggi individuali e di gruppo di medio e lungo raggio, con sedi in Italia, Grecia, Spagna; due agenzie di viaggio; una società di autonoleggio con 25 autobus di proprietà; una società che si occupa della vendita di case mobili ai privati. La nostra proposta di affiliazione si rivolge principalmente a Start up, ma di recente è stata creata anche la formula “Globitalia Friends” che consente l’adesione al gruppo anche ad agenzie già consolidate. Questo ci permette – fra le altre cose – di vantare fatturati più alti nei confronti dei tour operator, ottenendo così migliori condizioni di mercato. A oggi, possiamo dunque affermare senza esitazioni che il Network GLOBITALIA è uno dei pochi che riesce a garantire all’affiliato il conseguimento di obiettivi concreti in un tempo ragionevole, trasformando un sogno – quello di aprire un’agenzia di viaggi – in un’attività divertente e redditizia. Oltre al fatto che l’affiliato è dotato di una propria licenza e dunque è autonomo e indipendente. Il sistema del franchising offre, infatti, numerosi vantaggi per i potenziali franchisee, fra i quali:       Una maggiore possibilità di successo aziendale;     La certezza di utilizzare sistemi operativi testati;     Il potere di acquisto di una grande organizzazione;     La sinergia del gruppo e l’interazione con altri franchisee;     Programmi di formazione, training e supporto;     Un nome ed un marchio riconosciuto dai fornitori e dai clienti

Name: Osuuskunta Lahden Seudun Kulttuuri- Ja Elämysmatkailu

We also support museums, entrepreneurs and companies that in their own way uphold the area’s cultural and natural resources and encourage the preserving of these resources through sustainable principles. We are also known by the name ELMA Travels (ELMA Matkat), which produces, sells and markets package tours. We are constantly developing and adding new destinations to our selection. We offer visa services too. Our goal is to differentiate ourselves from other travel agencies with the experiences we offer and the quality service of our tour leaders and guide services. Our office is located in the centre of Lahti on Hämeenkatu 15, on the 4th floor of the building. We welcome anyone interested in traveling, culture and experiences to join us. You can participate either as a member of the cooperative, partner or a customer.

We love our work, we are passionate about Portugal and Spain and its a great pleasure to share this passion with our clients! Le principali destinazioni programmate sono: Namibia, Botswana, Zambia, Sudafrica, Etiopia, Tanzania, Uganda, Burundi, Ruanda, Kenya, Ghana, Togo, Benin, Senegal, Guinea Bissau, Giordania, Armenia, Georgia, Uzbekistan, paesi della via della seta, India, Giappone, Birmania, Cambogia, Laos, Vietnam, Indonesia, Australia, Vanuatu, Nuova Caledonia, Isole Cook, Polinesia Francese, Argentina, Cile, Bolivia, Ecuador, Colombia, Perù, Messico, Guatemala, Islanda, Groenlandia, Norvegia, Svezia, Finlandia, Far Oer, Svalbard e Groenlandia. Ogni destinazione è curata da membri dello staff di Bigmama, che conoscono le varie sfaccettature del paese e guideranno il Viaggiatore nella realizzazione del suo itinerario. Itinerari Evolutivi è una linea di programmi di viaggio dedicati alla scoperta e improntati all'evoluzione personale dell’individuo, infatti sono ideati per portare un valore aggiunto al Viaggiatore, con lo scopo di arricchirne le conoscenze antropologiche, naturalistiche ed umane. Bigmama programma sia partenze a date fisse per il viaggiatore singolo e non, che ama unirsi a piccoli gruppi, mai troppo numerosi, sia partenze individuali, calibrate sulle esigenze di durata, budget, itinerario, tipologia di sistemazione per singoli, coppie, piccoli gruppi di viaggiatori. Bigmama pone grande attenzione ai viaggi di nozze fuori dall’ordinario, per coppie che amano differenziarsi dal turismo di massa. Lo staff di Bigmama - Itinerari Evolutivi è composto da professionisti del settore dei viaggi con esperienza decennale: Bigmama è giovane ma con un background solido. Oltre i confini della vostra zona di comfort...

Name: Reiseservice Africa GmbH

Mit immer neuen, spannenden Eindrücken stellen wir individuelle Highlights für Ihre Traumreise zusammen – persönliche Tipps und ausführliche Beratungsgespräche inklusive. Außerdem planen wir für Sie auch interessante Reisen in den Oman, nach Abu Dhabi, Dubai und Sri Lanka. Einzigartige Orte, luxuriöse Unterkünfte und unvergessliche Momente bietet der Afrikanische Kontinent. Wir vermitteln aufregende Buscherlebnisse in der einzigartigen Wildnis von Botswana, Sambia, Namibia, Tansania, Kenia und Südafrika neben inspirierenden Badeparadiesen in Mosambik, Malawi oder Sansibar.  Orientalisches Flair, attraktive Golfplätze und vielfältige Landschaften erleben Sie bei unseren Reisen nach Marokko.

Immersa Global is the brainchild of Sheree M. Mitchell, bespoke travel expert, curator, and international travel speaker. Mitchell, who has curated high-end travel since 2002, started the company to offer something more than just "soulless standardized travel packages". Her idea was to help curious and discerning travelers gain one-of-its-kind experiences by connecting them with the absolute best local artists, winemakers, historians, award-winning chefs, and off-the-beaten-track places in each destination. This concept is so true that the company's tagline is, "If you can find it in a guidebook or online, then you don't need us!” RNAAT n°49/2021  / FL ST41997

Name: Trip Trip Viajar En Grupo
Company description: Start up de viajes en grupo.  Viajar en grupo siempre es mucho mejor! Primera plataforma Europea en Internet para viajes en grupo. Todas las agencias de viajes son bienvenidas, publica gratis tu viaje para grupos . http://triptrip.es Triptrip.es no es una agencia de viajes. Es una plataforma de publicación de viajes en grupo . Hacemos de intermediarios entre los viajeros en grupo y las agencias de viajes. También seleccionamos que viajes en grupo deben aparecer en el sitio web y que viajes en grupo no deben aparecer (por ser poco fiables) Además somos una plataforma social, donde las agencias de viajes y los viajeros se pueden conocer mas a fondo, discutir temas e incluso chatear entre ellos! Si, cualquiera puede organizar un viaje en grupo. Hay que tener muy claras las fechas y la localización. Todo lo que se planee con anterioridad será muy bien visto por los administradores. No todas los viajes son publicados. Cuidamos mucho las experiencias a la hora de viajar en grupo de nuestros usuarios. Por eso revisamos a conciencia todos los datos de las agencias de viaje.

Name: Maestro Viajes - Luxury Travel
Company description: Maestroviajes is the outcome of mind and heart, experience, and dreams. In 2009 Enrique Bellver Fraga, CEO and Founder of Maestroviajes, decided to follow his everlasting passion for adventures, journeys to faraway places, and his interest towards other cultures and traditions, giving life to his long-cherished dream: Maestroviajes. Today, Maestroviajes is a luxury eco-travel agency, specialized in responsible tailor-made travels, which are based on our own experience. We are driven by the respect for our planet and the curiosity to discover every corner of it with the least possible impact, to preserve the environment and enhance local communities. We enjoy sharing our knowledge and personal experiences and carefully listening to our clients' wishes to craft for them unique and exclusive journeys to destinations that we had the pleasure to know first-hand. We are part of the Serandipians Traveller Made network of luxury travel designers dedicated to providing unique and exclusive bespoke journeys to travellers looking for different and original experiences, requiring skilled and knowledgeable advisors who are committed to fully servicing their clients. Remote expeditions, extraordinary landscapes, unique adventures, stunning accommodations and much more awaits you in Maestroviajes.

Name: Vento Di Grecale S.r.l.s
Company description: We are a company based on the East Coast of Sicily, just a few miles from the stunning Taormina. We offer a wide range of services according to your needs. We can provide Sailing Boats, Catamarans, Luxury Yachts and Gullets for a daily or weekly period, for private regattas or business meetings, for relax or just to enjoy our beautiful sea.  You will be able to travel along the Sicilian coast, admiring the uniqueness of our historical context and enjoying all the aspects which make Sicily a perfect bond between Sun and Sea. All is connected with our Typical products and the magnificence of the Mt. Etna. Thanks to our passion and experience connected with our know-how, Vento di Grecale offers quality services. Our partners are tour operators worldwide and best hotels in Sicily. The passion for the sea and the care of our services represent our goal. This is what we want to share with anyone who wants to live a beautiful experience. The only way you can feel it is Joining Us!

Name: Madoc Viajes
Company description: Madoc Viajes es una agencia de viajes online, creada para ser una alternativa a la adquisición de viajes de ocio tradicional, y así a principios del año 2015 nuestro proyecto toma fuerzas, y se afianza con la participación en el Programa Jump! de Acción Contra el Hambre.  Nuestra filosofía es recuperar y ofrecer al viajero un servicio integral que se ha ido perdiendo con el tiempo, donde somos nosotros los que nos adaptamos a nuestros clientes para optimizar su experiencia de viaje.   ¿Por qué elegirnos para tus viajes? Te asesoramos gratuitamente sin ningún compromiso (no cobramos gastos de gestión). Precios ajustados y adaptados a tus necesidades (reducción de gastos al ser agencia online). Atención personalizada y asesoramiento integral (consejos, guías, costumbres, …). Búsqueda pormenorizada de las mejores ofertas entre los diversos proveedores con los que trabajamos. Años de experiencia en organización de viajes a medida.  Somos innovadores en viajes personalizados. Podrás encontrar: Productos de agencia de viajes convencional (alojamientos, vuelos, paquetes, entradas, seguros, …) Especialidad en Europa, Caribe y EEUU.  Viajes a medida.  Somos viajeros como tu, a los que nos encanta hacer de cada viaje una experiencia única y transmitírsela a nuestros clientes.  Por eso, tu viaje es nuestro proyecto.

Name: BarcelonaPoint By LudoParks
Company description: BarcelonaPoint is an online travel agency based in Barcelona, Spain. We have over 10 years experience in the business and online marketing. We offer holiday accommodations in Barcelona, Costa Brava, Costa Dorada and the Baleares. You can choose between holiday apartments or hotels. To make your life easier, we also provide tickets to theme parks, museums and activities directly online! If you are looking for sensations, enjoy a day at the PortAventura theme park and benefit from our Tickets + accommodation packs. With us, you have the choice of staying in a hotel in the park or outside the park in Salou! Our team is there to Help you and will answer your questions in all languages! Don’t hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to help you plan your journey.

Name: Viaggimmagine
Company description: Da 20 anni, nuove idee per viaggiare il mondo! Viaggimmagine è un tour operator di Milano specializzato nel proporre itinerari personalizzati, progettati insieme ai viaggiatori in base ai loro desideri, al tempo di cui dispongono, a quanto intendono spendere, suggerendo sempre le migliori destinazioni consigliabili a seconda della stagione. Non proponiamo solo pacchetti turistici preconfezionati, ma siamo disponibili a realizzare alle migliori condizioni possibili le tue idee per viaggiare il mondo, presentandoti per ogni destinazione proposte pensate per realizzare un viaggio indimenticabile, che soddisfi appieno i tuoi desideri. La nostra esperienza deriva dalla conoscenza diretta dei Paesi proposti, dalla preziosa collaborazione con agenzie-corrispondenti nelle varie nazioni del mondo e con le migliori compagnie aeree e di autonoleggio, ma anche dai tanti anni di attività che ci consentono un ottimo controllo delle offerte di viaggio per le quali otteniamo le migliori condizioni.

Name: Bush Legends GmbH
Company description: Als Reiseveranstalter für die professionelle Organisation maßgeschneiderter Reisen in das südliche und östliche Afrika bieten wir Ihnen eine Reise als einzigartiges Erlebnis. Ein Erlebnis, welches ausgewählten Luxus, Exklusivität und höchste Qualität miteinander vereint. Seit über 20 Jahren sind wir spezialisiert auf die perfekte Planung und optimale Durchführung qualitativ hochwertiger Reisen in das südliche und östliche Afrika. Jede unserer Reisen wird nach Ihren individuellen Wünschen und Vorstellungen gestaltet. Erleben Sie faszinierende Natur und herzliche Gastfreundschaft in Afrika - auf Safari in der Wildnis, am weichen, weißen Sandstrand oder in Kombination mit Lifestyle und Gourmet in einer afrikanischen Metropole. Unsere ausgesuchten Reisen bieten Ihnen die Möglichkeit, diese abwechslungsreichen und spannenden Regionen auf luxuriöse und entspannte Weise zu erleben. Wir bieten Ihnen maßgeschneiderte Reisen: ob Familienreise, Hochzeitsreise oder Jubiläumsreise, Ihre Reise wird sowohl mit Erfahrung als auch Liebe und Aufmerksamkeit zum Detail gestaltet. Dabei stellen wir sicher, dass alle wichtigen Komponenten bestmögliche Berücksichtigung finden, so dass Sie während Ihrer Reise wunderbare Momente genießen können. Unsere Kunden schätzen den Mehrwert unserer qualitativ hochwertigen und ebenso nachhaltigen Reisen. Einen Mehrwert, den nicht nur Sie als Reisende spüren, sondern den Sie gleichzeitig für die Menschen und Naturschutzprojekte vor Ort bewirken, welche Sie über unsere ausgewählten Kooperationspartner in unseren Zielgebieten unterstützen. Damit tragen Sie parallel zu fairen Arbeits- und Lebensbedingungen der einheimischen Bevölkerung bei. Weil Reisen nicht nur bewegt, sondern weil Sie mit Ihren bei uns gebuchten Reisen auch ganz viel bewegen. Wir freuen uns sehr darauf, von Ihnen zu hören, und Ihre besondere Afrika Reise für Sie organisieren zu dürfen. Herzlichst, Ihr Bush Legends Team

Name: Magni Mundi
Company description: We are a travel agency based in Turku, Finland. We offer tailored group and FIT tours and travel packages in Finland. Our main operational area is Turku Region and South-Western Finland.  Our passion is to offer rich cultural experiences, according to customer needs and wishes. Our specialties include architecture, history, food, life style and more.

Please contact us if you think we may be able to help

Name: Global Travel Cloud
Company description: Global Travel Cloud provides business process integration in the travel industry with its innovative proprietary platform. Global Travel Cloud provides both cost savings and quality improvement in the data exchange between tour operators and suppliers in the travel industry.

Name: Cometa Living
Company description: A Home for the World’s Adventurers to come together and belong. A dream place to explore, play, work, and connect. Entrepreneurs, free spirits, and digital nomads from all around the world have joined our exclusive community and can now: Explore and live in remote havens worldwide, enjoying the comfort of a home and the seamless living of a hotel, with premium amenities and top-tier locations. Connect with kindred spirits who share their passions and interests, hand-selecting travel companions and joining a community of exceptional individuals. Cultivate a local and healthy lifestyle wherever they travel, enjoying discounts and recommendations from our strong partner network (e.g., workspaces, travel agencies, wellness activities). It's perfect for anyone who loves sports, exploring, has freedom and wants to find their tribe.

Name: Mdf Incentives & Slow Tours
Company description: Welcome to Our World: MDF Incentives & Slow Tours is a boutique Leisure & MICE travel agency founded by Maria Di Fede, a certified Event Manager, proud member of MPI International, passionate globetrotter, and, above all, a multilingual, naturally gifted Sicilian. With her expertise and vision, the agency delivers exceptional travel experiences, events and weddings tailored to every client's needs. Humble, flexible, empathic, wildly imaginative and creative, dreamer, warrior, Sicilian, — these traits not only define her personality but also form the foundation of the identity she envisioned for her company. "We are the Architects of Tomorrow of your incentive travels, ". This is our powerful and visionary slogan that aims to convey our message of leadership, innovation, and customization.  It’s not just about organizing trips; it’s about designing transformative experiences. Every journey is crafted to inspire, motivate, and reward participants, leaving a lasting impact. This is the reason why we offer Tailored Experiences: Each trip is unique and designed to reflect the company’s values and goals. Our Focus is both on the Past and on the Future: we want to create itineraries that promote sustainability, and personal or professional growth through Emotion and Inspiration: Participants will experience journeys that motivate and recharge them. Sicily: Our Iconic Destination: A land where tradition meets innovation and culture thrives. Sicily is more than just a destination—it's a transformative experience.  mdf incentives & slow tours more than a DMC, it is a long-held personal wish that comes true. Therefore, all our journeys and programs are planned to be as unique as you are! As a Luxury Event Creative and Destination Wedding Planner we provide tailor-made VIP events and experiences. The creative team aims to make each Personalized Travel Solutions, Event and Experience beyond expectations

Name: Tour Operators WE Travel Group
Company description: Tour Operators WE Travel Group is a family of eight tour operators with expertise of destinations worldwide. Together, we offer a comprehensive range of tours with a variety of themes. Within the group there are experts in wildlife, flora and fauna, trekking, culture, gardening and music. At WE Travel Group, we work with the segment’s best travel creators. Discover the world with us!

Name: Porta Occidentale
Company description: Porta Occidentale is a private school of modern languages which operates with its own travel agency to offer a large variety of language services to individuals, schools and businesses alike.  We offer classes all year round in our centre for learners of all ages in italian, english, french, german, spanish, russian, arab, cinese, portuguese, greek and latin.  We collaborate with schools and universities to organise study & work holidays, english summer camps, storytelling, online english courses and english theatre sessions.  We are happy to support businesses with official legal translations and we can provide foreign interpreters for events and meetings.   We can also organize business training for professional people, accommodation for young girls as "Au Pair" and short working stays anywhere in the world in collaboration with international schools of languages.

Name: CONNEA TRAVEL S.r.o.
Company description: Jsme CONNEA TRAVEL, naše heslo je LET’S MOVE, vždy spolehlivá, vstřícná a dobře etablovaná cestovní kancelář zaměřená na incentivní cestování, kongresovou turistiku, světové top události, VIP jazykové kurzy s programem a golfovou turistiku. Již od roku 2004 jsme součástí skupiny CONNEA – dceřiná společnost CONNEA TRAVEL, s.r.o. a zajišťujeme nezapomenutelné okamžiky fyzické i duševní relaxace našich klientů doma i v zahraničí. Dokážeme se postarat o individuální účastníky, ale i o velké skupiny cestujících. Poskytujeme našim klientům kompletní servis na klíč a se smyslem pro nejmenší detail jim plníme i ta nejnáročnější přání. Je pro nás výzvou vytvořit originální aktivity a překonat představy o programu a také neustále zdokonalovat poskytovaný osobní servis. Mnoho netradičních zážitků jsme našim partnerům zprostředkovali v destinacích, jako jsou Karibik, Dubaj, Srí Lanka, Madeira, Maroko, Irsko, Island, Finsko, Švédsko, Kypr, Mauritius, Thajsko a v mnohých dalších. Naším cílem je špičková péče v oblasti cestování. Položte si jen otázku „Kdy“a zbytek nechte na nás. CONNEA TEAM

Name: Countryside Travels
Company description: Vi är en professionell researrangör specialiserad på landsbygd. Vi producerar skräddarsydda upplevelser såsom lantbruksresor, skogsresor och andra specialresor såsom kulturresor, hästresor, jaktresor, mat och vinresor 🌱 Vi är stolta medlemmar av det internationella nätverket ATOI, Agricultural Tour Operators International, medlemmarna i vår organisation besitter omfattande kunskap om jordbruksindustrin och vi har en unik position för att skapa skräddarsydda upplevelser som tillgodoser våra kunders specifika intressen och önskemål över hela världen.  Dessa upplevelser kan inkludera:  📍Besök på olika platser, inklusive småskaliga familjeföretag och storskaliga kommersiella gårdar och rancher inom alla inriktningar.  📍Fokus på specifika produkter som grödor, boskap, mjölkproduktion, skogsbruk, frukt, grönsaker, trädgårdsodling, förädling mm  📍Dessutom erbjuder vi möjligheter att utforska konferenser och evenemang inom jordbrukssektorn. Vårt kontor finns på Hagbyberga Säteri utanför Katrineholm, Södermanlands län.

Name: Arctic Cruise In Norway AS
Company description: Charter|Sailing|Norway|Tromsø|Lyngen|See Northern Lights|Midnight Sun Northern Norway is one of the world’s most exciting destinations, writes the renowned magazine, Lonely Planet, which gradually has become a giant in tourism. Norway is described as “one of the top destinations for active tourists and adrenaline junkies, the midnight sun and northern lights in Tromsø highlighted as one of the major attractions”.  You will arrive Tromsø airport where your exciting journey will start. See the famous church in blue winter Tromsø City – Northern Norway Tromsø, «The capital of the Arctic» is a lively and beautiful city. Tromsø is packed with culture and history and surrounded beautiful by mountains, glaciers, wildlife, fjords and islands. With it ́s spectacular nature its like a paradise in the North. Lagoon 450 videoYou will stay on our floating “hotel” a 45 feet Lagoon sailing yacht. You will stay on the yacht, while traveling in exiting nature and elements such as sailing, fishing, kayaking, Nortrhern Lights/Aurora borealis, midnight sun, photography and more. Using our Lagoon 450,  we will bring you to all the spectacular nature/ places in the area. On this spots we rent the services of already established tour operator experts like snowmobile activity’s, dog sleights, ski guides, sami camps, helicopter lifts and more.  You will have a private extraordinary outstanding event in arctic nature in your lifetime.

Name: CK Pan Asia Travel
Company description: Pan Asia Travel and Tours was established in 2004 by Mrs Laura Misurova. Using her years of living in Asia and her hospitality expertise, she founded a luxury tour operator, specialising in tailor-made journeys to Southeast Asia. Though initially focused on golfing clientele, over the years Pan Asia has evolved to provide luxury, bespoke services to the upper crust of Slovakia, accommodating them in boutique properties with signature flair, providing exceptional personal guides, and ensuring their journeys are flawless from start to finish. These unique qualities allow us to proudly count successful entrepreneurs, notable politicians, and showbusiness personalities among our clients. The key factor that differentiates Pan Asia from other operators is our attention to detail and devotion to perfection. Mrs Misurova travels to Southeast Asia several times a year, searching for new properties and destinations that meet her precise requirements for exceptionality. Instead of working with local agents and receiving a haphazard collection of resorts, Pan Asia carefully researches and personally visits each property we work with. After the contract rates are agreed, we keep in close contact with the resort, ensuring that our high standards are maintained. Our guides are similarly carefully selected. While other operators in Slovakia send Slovak delegates, we believe that nobody can know a country better than a local. Personally vetted by Mrs Misurova, they see the little-known paths and stories. Given comprehensive information on the clients, our guides are able to fully accommodate all of their needs and adjust the tour to fit their personalities. This is all part of our desire for every one of our clients to have a unique experience. Nurtured from the seed of a single idea, working with 6 resorts in Malaysia in 2004, the company has grown to promoting eleven countries and more than 90 properties across Southeast Asia.

Name: EUROPEAN LEGACY TOURS
Company description: EUROPEAN LEGACY TOURS  Detail-oriented incoming travel agency. VIP, private customized, Jewish, leisure, pilgrimage & art tours of Poland & Europe. MICE&DMC. European Legacy

Name: PayNow Innovative Travel Solutions
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Sorrento, Via Degli Aranci, 80067
Company description: Innovative and fast solutions to protect travelers’ rights and optimize the operations of travel agencies and travel suppliers. We operate under a B2B model, integrating with OTAs, GDSs, travel suppliers, and accommodation providers at the point of sale, offering immediate support to passengers affected by flight cancellations, delays, missed connections, overbooking, or lost baggage. Our key differentiator: advance reimbursement payments within 96 hours, coverage for situations not included in traditional travel insurance policies, and specialized legal assistance to secure the rightful compensation established by law. With over 10 years of experience in the industry, we combine efficiency, legal expertise, and technology to streamline processes and eliminate the stress of dealing with airlines.

Name: Doris Travel
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Sofia-capital, Sofia, 29 Petar Parchevich Str, 1000
Company description: Transport and touristic company Doris Ltd are among the market leaders in the Bulgarian market of transportation services and tourism. The company is created in 1991 as a family business and as almost two decades later it has grown a successful and respected image among both domestic and international customers and partners. It offers a well-established value of professionalism and responsibility. The company is a part of the Association of Bus Carriers, Employer’s Union, The Association of Bulgaria’s Tour Operators and Travel Agencies, and International Association of Air Transportation.  Doris Ltd has a vehicle fleet of over 50 buses and minibuses with an estimate of 8 till 60 seats. Each vehicle is handled with care, being technically well maintained and renewed yearly which contributes to quality of service and security of passengers. The business offers both touristic and transportation services in a strict delivery of service cycle including professional performance and attention in detail. Doris Ltd.’s services include:  • Own bus and flight programmes; • Tourist trips for both Summer and Winter seasons – excursions, holiday breaks, business trips, school trips, and corporate events; • Flight bookings; • Tour operations; • Day trips; • International and domestic regular bus transportation; • Corporate transport; • Touristic services for events and business conference; • Cruise trips; • Rental Currently the business operates in Bulgaria, Ukraine and Georgia and it mostly relies on human resources, handling the services with professionalism and passion. High cultural etiquette and behaviour is of great importance.

Name: Video Korekt - Ognian Handev ET
Company description: V.Korekt Tour-operator is licensed tour-operator with offices in Las Vegas (USA) and Sofia (Bulgaria). We have the pleasure to propose you collaboration for tourist services in USA and Bulgaria. We organize holidays, excursions, business meetings - seminars, conferences, work groups and etc.  We have experienced team, proposing you tailor-made programs and precisely balanced prepositions.  Our services:  Accommodation  Guides  Transfers  Tourist programs  Grand Canyon Tour – with helicopter, car, bus or aircraft  Excursions all-over Bulgaria  Rent a car  Organization of weddings, shows and programs  Organization of seminars, conferences and sport events  Air-plane and bus tickets  Flexible and tailor-made services  24 hours support  We would be glad to see you among our clients or partners.  We believe that everyone deserves an individual approach.

Name: Alfatour JSC
Company description: Alfatour JSC is a licensed tour operator specialized in comprehensive services for corporate clients in Bulgaria and abroad, organization of conferences, seminars and business trips. We provide our customers the following services:  - Comprehensive service for organizing and conducting seminars. - Conferences and congresses in Bulgaria and abroad. - Organizing social and entertainment programs for international and local events. - Booking airline tickets at home and abroad. - Hotel reservations in Bulgaria and abroad. - Reservation of bus, rail and ferry tickets at home and abroad; - Visa services;  - Organization of rental cars / buses and transfers in the country and abroad;  - Guide services;  - Medical insurance;  - Providing preferential conditions and assistance to employees in choosing of options for relaxation;

Name: Expo Travel Solutions
Company description: About Us We are an independent travel agency, specialized in trade fair, congress and exhibition travel services. Our highly motivated, young team of travel professionals with years of experience in the industry is a leading provider of global hotel accommodation aimed mainly at business travellers. Our mission Our mission is to be truly 21st century travel agency, to anticipate and act upon the evolving needs of our customers and partners, responding to them with excellence in our people, processes and technologies. Why Choosing Us We are dynamic, flexible, fast, precise, reliable and very focused in demonstrating it every day to our valuable customers, always in touch with your needs. That’s why we are constantly innovating, taking the smallest detail into account in our pursuit of excellence and perfection. So look no further, you now have the right contacts for your next event!

Name: ESPRESSO TRAVEL
Company description: Espresso Travel is a travel agency providing FIT and group travel services - air tickets, hotel bookings, transfers, rent-a-car, package tours.

Name: BTM Travel Agency
Company description: Mission Our goal is to find the best solution to your specific needs!   About us A main principle in our work is attention to detail and individual approach to each client, offering the best ratio between price, reservation terms, and quality. If there are unexpected crises and extraordinary circumstances, you can rely on us for an adequate reaction, as we guarantee you a quick solution to your problems. Services we offer: Sale of airplane tickets Hotel accommodation Organisation of charter flights Cruises Transportation services – transfers, rent-a-car Organisation of company events, business meetings, team building programmes, accompanying programmes of the events Registration, organization and complex service related to attending of seminars, exhibitions, conferences in the country and abroad Visa services Medical insurance 24/7 Service And more...... Individual programmes Miles & More, Partner Plus, Sky Blue, Frequent Flye, etc. – they are formed on the basis of flown miles, as the collected miles can be used also for issuing of free airplane tickets, hotel reservations, etc. Possibilities to provide a detailed Service Level Agreement. We provide a variety of accounting and reports that company policy requires – preparing tables for the sales at regular periods of time, detailed information on customer deliveries, numbers and amounts in invoices, cost centers, numbers of purchase order, etc. Complete transparency of service charges We guarantee full transparency of pricing and service charges. Business Travel Management is certified to the latest ISO 9001:2015 standard and is a member of the Bulgarian Association of Tour Operators and Tourist Agencies – BATA.

Name: Accion Viajes SL Vayacruceros.com
Company description: Agencia de viajes online minorista que opera en Internet con una marca reconocida, Vayacruceros.com, especializada en venta de cruceros.

Name: Best Of Scandinavia Incoming AS
Company description: Best of Scandinavia is a family run incoming tour operator since 1997. The administration office is situated in Beitostølen, 230 km in the northwest of Oslo. The booking and production is situated in the university city of Umeå, 600 km in the north of Stockholm.

Name: Hotelverse
Company description: Hotelverse is a pioneering company that specializes in creating hyperrealistic digital twins of hotels, providing an immersive online booking experience that transforms how potential guests interact with properties. Its mission is to elevate the guest experience by allowing customers to explore hotels virtually, thereby boosting engagement and maximizing revenue through innovative marketing strategies. Hotelverse targets hotels looking to enhance their direct sales channels and improve customer insights, while also empowering travel agencies with an engaging platform for their clients. By integrating seamlessly with existing hotel technologies, Hotelverse offers a scalable solution that not only showcases hotel facilities but also optimizes operations and upselling opportunities, ultimately redefining the hotel booking landscape.

Name: Ganesha Travel
Company description: Ganesha Travel es una agencia de viajes especializada en aventura y expediciones, nacida en 2002 en Girona. Desde enero de 2012, Xavier Urpí y Marta Casals nos hacemos cargo de la misma, poniendo a vuestro servicio la solidez de diez años de la agencia y nuestra experiencia propia. Después de trabajar durante más de 12 años en el sector turístico en Barcelona, decidimos dar un giro radical a nuestra vida, nos colgamos la mochila a la espalda y nos fuimos a recorrer Oceanía y Asia, visitando países como Australia, Nueva Zelanda, Fiji, Vietnam, Laos, Camboya, Singapur, China, Indonesia… A nuestro retorno, tuvimos claro que dedicarnos a ayudar con nuestras experiencias a todos aquellos viajeros que quisieran viajes a medida y personalizados era nuestra prioridad.  Ganesha Travel ofrece rutas a medida para viajeros aventureros que siguen los principios del turismo activo, con un total respeto por el medio ambiente. Si buscas un viaje para descubrir África, una ruta por Oceanía, un recorrido por Latinoamérica o una visita a las capitales europeas te ofrecemos toda nuestra experiencia y profesionalidad para hacer de tu viaje un recuerdo inolvidable. Sea cual sea el viaje que buscas, contáctanos y encontraremos el itinerario que mejor se adapta en ti. ¿Estáis preparados para empezar la aventura?

Name: Rickys Travel
Company description: "Ricky’s Travel Agency Ltd — 30+ years of trusted expertise in global travel. Specialists in flights, cruises, hotels, tours & tailor-made packages with exceptional customer care."

Name: RM TURISMO
Company description: Corsi di specializzazione: -Agente di Viaggio e Tour Operator - Direttore Tecnico -Accompagnatore Turistico

Name: Esja Travel
Company description: A trip to Iceland with Esja Travel is an escape from the ordinary.  Located in Iceland, Esja Travel is a fully licensed tour operator and travel agency supplying independent journeys and small group tours. Our vision is simple: we believe Iceland is not just another pretty place but an experience that transforms you - body, mind and spirit. Our passionate travel advisors create experiential tours in extraordinary locations that immerse travelers in activities whether their travel dreams include nature hiking, photography, wildlife adventure, wellness or slow travel, just to name a few. Esja Travel is dedicated to quality service and it shows in our attention to detail from our selection of boutique accommodations to our hand-picked expert guides. Mindfully crafted by the Esja Travel Team, our inspiring journeys connect visitors to a realm of unspoiled places, where they are embraced by local flavors, traditions, and the unforgettable Icelandic people. Inspiring locations, authentic experiences, quality service and a touch of the unexpected – that’s the Esja Travel difference.

Cestovná kancelária SOLVEX získala prestížne ocenenie – Pečať Bonity. Pečať Bonity udeľuje Národné informačné stredisko Slovenskej republiky a Slovenská informačná a marketingová spoločnosť na zaklade hodnotiacieho systému, ktorým sa zhodnotila bonita komerčných subjektov, ktoré podnikajú na území Slovenskej republiky. S kvalitou a so zvyšovaním dopytu po našich službách, rastie aj naša sieť pobočiek, ktoré dnes nájdete v Bratislave, Banskej Bystrici, Nitre, Žiline, Liptovskom Mikuláši, Trenčíne, Poprade, Prešove, Košiciach a v Českej republike v Prahe. Na našich pobočkách sa na Vás tešia školení pracovníci, ktorí Vám ochotne poradia pri výbere vhodnej dovolenky a správneho hotela, z ktorých mnohé navštívili. Prajeme Vám len tie najpríjemnejšie spomienky a nezabudnuteľné zážitky z dovolenky strávenej s nami. Kolektív cestovnej kancelárie Solvex

Temos uma equipa experiente, profissional, dinâmica e criativa, centrada nos resultados e nos objetivos dos clientes. Name: Travelbike Tours
Company description: Si te gusta los viajes en moto por España, Europa o el mundo, Travelbike Tours es la agencia de viajes de moto número 1 en habla hispana. Con una dilatada trayectoria en la organización de tours guiados en moto y sede en Rivas Vaciamadrid (Madrid, España), Travelbike Tours es partner oficial de BMW Motorrad y cuenta con una flota propia de motocicletas de alta gama que supera el medio centenar. Si estás interesado en alquiler de motos para tus viajes, podrás disponer de los últimos modelos BMW, completamente equipados, a través de Travelbike Rent. No te pierdas nuestra oferta de motos de alquiler. Travelbike Tours es la agencia de viajes de referencia si eres un apasionado de los viajes en moto: tours autoguiados, viajes de aventura, rallyes mototurísticos… Nuestro equipo de atención al cliente y, una vez en ruta, nuestros experimentados guías, se encargan de cuidar cada detalle para que vivas una experiencia única y disfrutes del placer de viajar en moto. Si prefieres viajar por libre, también te ayudamos en lo concerniente a tu ruta. Y si lo que deseas es un servicio personalizado, contacta con nosotros para que podamos confeccionarte a ti o a tu grupo un viaje en moto a medida. Viajes en moto por España, viajes en moto por Europa, viajes en moto por Marruecos y África, viajes en moto por Asia, viajes en moto por Estados Unidos… En la lista de los mejores destinos en moto no podían faltar las grandes rutas del mundo: Ruta 66, Ruta de la Seda, Alpes, Ruta Vía de la Plata, Patagonia, Carretera Austral… Travelbike Tours es especialista en aventura, con las máximas garantías y un trato individualizado y profesional. También te llevamos hasta algunas de las más importantes citas moteras, como la Isla de Man TT, los BMW Motorrad Days de Garmisch (Alemania) y los BMW Motorrad Days de Sabiñánigo (España).

Name: Split Hostel Group

Each hostel under the Split Hostel Group is an award-winning brand. Booze and Snooze Hostel- is, centrally located in the Centre of town. It is 1-minute walking distance of the most famous sites and attractions in Split as well as minutes' walk from the bus, ferry, train terminals. Newly renovated, Booze and Snooze has three dorms (six-bed, seven-bed, and split level 11 bed), each with its own bathroom, air conditioning unit and lockers.  It has an outside terrace/kitchenette, 24 reception and security. Fiesta Siesta Hostel is also newly renovated and also centrally located we have everything from (two, four, five, six to eight-bed dorms). have toilets and showers (separate spaces) on every level and air conditioning unit and lockers in every room. Our two buildings are located directly across from each other. Both buildings have also been completely refurbished to give you a good mix of traditional Dalmatia and comforts of home. The Charlies Backpackers Bar is arguably one of the most popular bars in Split, Croatia. Charlies is known for organising daily unique experiences, whilst facilitating the best possible experiences for backpackers and other travellers. Charlies constantly works on building unique promo events, theme nights, group dinners, private parties and offers tailor-made partnerships and brand strengthening collaborations for all groups and travel partners. Name: La Crète By Manolis
Company description: Vous souhaitez découvrir la Crète autrement, hors des sentiers battus, hors du tourisme de masse ? Alors, faites appel à un expert passionné par son île qui vous fera découvrir tous ses endroits secrets ! Amoureux de la Crète et de la Grèce, je mets un point d’honneur à tester les hébergements, locations et activités que vous allez rencontrer. Il ne s’agit pas seulement de vous faire découvrir mon pays, mais de vous faire vivre un voyage d’émotions en vous offrant un service de qualité et de confiance. En tant que fils du pays, je souhaite vous faire partager ma vision de la Crète et vous faire profiter de mes coups de cœur pour un véritable voyage en immersion. En deux mots, un voyage organisé par La Crète By Manolis, c’est l’assurance d’une véritable expérience. Je vous propose des conseils personnalisés et sur mesure car à mes yeux, chacun des voyageurs est différent et chaque voyage est unique ! Des conseils sur mesure, c’est la possibilité de voyager à votre image et selon vos envies. Je ne propose pas de circuit lambda et en grand groupe. Je préfère vous faire part de ma propre expérience en tant que Crétois, mais aussi en tant que professionnel et les combiner à vos attentes. Vous désirez organiser un voyage en famille, entres amis, en couple mais ne souhaitez pas réserver dans de grandes chaînes hôtelières, préférant l’authenticité et l’intimité de petits hôtels indépendants ? Je vous trouverai les meilleurs hôtels de charme, tenus par des familles Crétoises, pour vous satisfaire. Du transport à l’hébergement en passant par les activités, je vous conseils tout de A à Z (ERVAKIS) afin de réaliser tous vos désir de voyage en Crète.

Name: InArrábida @ Experience With A Local Lda

Company description: InArrábida is an incoming tour operator. We provide the best experiences in the region of the nature park Arrábida. Of course, all this is done using our most valuable product as background: the Arrábida region. After all, it is not by chance, that it is precisely in this region that the most famous Muscat wine is produced all over the world. It is not by chance, that this is an area where golden sand beaches delight thousands of vacationers annually and one of them has even been considered European Best beach destination of 2017. It is not by chance that in Setúbal there is one of the most beautiful bays in the world. So what do you say?  Are you in for an adventure?

Owing to their significance, they should become trademarks representing Pag all over the world.

Our Mission Our mission is to offer low cost holidays hand in hand with excellent personal service and high quality holiday accommodation. We always look at the long term health of the holiday and tourism industry and seek to gain a loyal customer base. We see our aim as holistic where we consider not only the expansion of our own company but the growth of tourism in our target areas. This means that we work in accord with our partners and in harmony with our environment and always have our clients’ best interests at the heart of our drive towards excellence.    Low-cost Holidays Whether you are looking to book a luxury villa holiday, or one of our great value holidays, you can be sure that our prices will always be highly competitive. We are ever-determined to offer the best services at the best price.

Name: Sivori Viaggi
Company description: Dal 1975 pensiamo a farvi viaggiare Sivori Viaggi nasce a Chiavari nel 1975 dalla passione di Natale Sivori. Oggi l’azienda è guidata dai figli Nicola e Massimo e offre una vasta gamma di servizi di viaggio, dal weekend al giro del mondo, ogni genere di biglietteria e svariati servizi accessori. Name: Web Advisor Travel Services
Company description: WebAdvisor is a Travel Agency based in Athens/ Greece, operating since 2007. Although in its first two years of operation, the agency focused in specific areas of the travel sector (Internet Reservation Systems, Group handling, Tailor Made Itineraries), the WebAdvisor team has now grown and is ready to take over more initiatives. The team is composed of young, yet experienced people, who have been working in the travel industry for a number of years. In the past its members have worked in key positions of major Tour Operators in Greece and abroad, gaining knowledge and experience. WebAdvisor has now established solid business relationships with a number of professionals in Greece, and is growing by the day. Our business focuses on the "On Line bookings" sector, as we provide expertise advice both for the exposed hotels and the internet retailers. Since the market has already changed dramatically in the past years, with the revenue created from E-Sales multiplying by the year, it is our strong believe that the Travel professionals have a lot to gain by optimising their On Line Marketing policy.  Our operations also now expand in the mainstream Tour Operator handling, offering Exclusive Packages, Fly & Drive programs, Island Hoping packages, Classic Tours, Shore excursions and more. Our "philosophy" and at the same time our strong selling point is our high level of specialised service and our efficient handling of guests. At the same time we offer highly competitive rates and numerous special offers, which are communicated to our partners on time, so as to keep them competitive and well informed.

Name: Zona Fin De Curso
Company description: Nuestra filosofia Convencidos como estamos que la formación de los niños y jóvenes no se termina con lo que puedan aprender en las aulas, nuestro objetivo es complementar, hasta donde sea posible, en la educación que ofrecen las escuelas y familias. Es por este motivo que consideramos que las colonias, las excursiones de un día, las esquiadas, los trabajos de síntesis o simplemente unos juegos alejados del medio habitual, nos pueden ayudar a trabajar valores y actitudes que normalmente, en el día a día, no podemos darles la atención que se merecen. Nuestra experiencia hace que regularmente te podamos proponer unas actividades más personalizadas, con las salidas que han funcionado mejor y las novedades más recientes, siempre pensadas para realizarse durante el horario escolar. Como agencia de viajes, podemos ofrecerte cualquier tipo de producto, desde una actividad totalmente acabada, hasta una creada a medida de tus necesidades, o bien solamente una entrada, el autocar o monitores de refuerzo. Gracias por tu confianza y aprovechamos para desearte un buen curso escolar.

Name: Neyja
Company description: Neyja simplifies the process of finding, booking and managing wellness and adventure holidays online. They can also share plans with friends or read engaging content from the world of action-sports and travel. All from a single platform. Business listings are always free for merchants and Neyja’s commission rate is much lower than portals or online travel agencies (OTAs). The use of our services is completely free for travellers!

Name: Sila Greenland DMC
Company description: Sila Greenland DMC was established June 2018 to serve as a link between international agents and tour operators and local local suppliers in Greenland. With 20 years of experience at Visit Greenland, Lykke Geisler Yakaboylu knows Greenland and can tailor make the experiences for the clients that are looking for something extraordinary.  Sila means "weather" in Greenlandic and is also the personification of of weather in our traditional belief. It can also be interpreted as "state of mind". Greenland is a destination for the adventurous and curious traveler - Greenland is a destination where weather still rules and where you feel small and humble about the harsh environment, but incredible beautiful nature. My ancestors have my deepest respect for living and surviving in Greenland for generations. My grandparents lived as a traditional hunting family - my grandfather provided the meat and my grandmother sew their skin clothing. Today Greenland is a modern society, but still deeply rooted in the Greenlandic culture and nature. In a country the size of Western Europe - with no roads connecting the towns, you need professional help to tailor make the experience and take care of logistics. Sila Greenland DMC is mainly working B2B with professional companies around the world looking for bespoke travel. We are looking forward to serve your clients as well as the suppliers in Greenland.

Name: Select Poland DMC
Company description: We are an incoming travel agency specialized in group travels to Poland and its neighbours. Un’accurata gestione delle politiche tariffarie della struttura, calcolate in tempo reale in base alla domanda del prodotto, consente di realizzare da subito maggiori ricavi e il più alto tasso di vendite possibile in ogni periodo dell’anno. Into the Revenue vanta relazioni con i principali attori del mercato turistico internazionale: Tour Operators mondiali, portali di vendita turistica online, Hotel representative, Meeting & Incentive Planners, Gds representative. Ha una profonda conoscenza del segmento corporate e congressuale e una pluriennale esperienza nell’organizzazione di eventi. Sempre attenta ai nuovi scenari di sviluppo, sarà in grado di assicurare  la giusta visibilità grazie al suo innovativo approccio al mercato, alla forte passione e alla professionalità del suo team.

Name: Betravel Grups

Company description: Beatgers es la nueva marca de Betravel encargada de cuidar hasta el último detalle de tus vacaciones y viajes de ocio. Name: SF Events Italy S.r.l
Company description: SF Events Italy S.r.l is a roman based company that provides exclusive and personalized experiences, ticketing and services for all major entertainment events, shows and cultural offers. Our client portfolio contains luxury hotels all over Italy (in collaboration with the prestigious Concierges Les Clefs d’Or), International embassies and Tour Operators worldwide. At Tijnmedia Martijn works freelance as producer, director, camera operator and editor for clients like BNNVARA, AVROTROS and Omroep Brabant, but also for municipalities, universities and (international) travel agencies.

Name: Airquest Travel Services
Company description: Welcome to Airquest Travel Services, your premier incoming travel agency in Crete, Greece. With nearly 30 years of experience, we specialize in providing unforgettable travel experiences that showcase the rich culture, history, and natural beauty of this beautiful island. At Airquest Travel Services, we believe that travel should be personalized and tailored to your unique interests and preferences. That’s why we offer customized travel itineraries in Crete, Greece that cater to your every need, from transportation and accommodations to tours and activities. Our team of expert travel planners is dedicated to providing personalized service that exceeds your expectations, with a commitment to transparency, honesty, and exceptional value. We work with you every step of the way to ensure that your journey is seamless, stress-free, and truly unforgettable. As a trusted travel agent in Crete, Greece, we have the expertise and knowledge to create the perfect itinerary for you. Let us help you discover the hidden gems and local secrets of Crete, Greece, and make memories that will last a lifetime. Contact us today to start planning your dream trip to Crete, Greece with Airquest Travel Services, your premier incoming travel agency in Crete, Greece.  Our Mission At Airquest Travel Services, our mission is to provide unparalleled travel experiences that showcase the rich culture, history, and natural beauty of Crete, and Greece in general. With nearly 30 years of experience as an incoming travel agency, we offer customized itineraries and personalized service to ensure our clients have a truly unforgettable journey. We are committed to providing exceptional value, transparent pricing, and unrivalled customer service, with the goal of building lasting relationships with our clients and partners in the travel industry.

Name: Visenso

Name: NCC Star Service Rome
Company description: NCC STAR SERVICE ROME is a chauffer drive rental society and provides service in a number of high level hotels, travel agencies, tour operators and national companies. Our philosophy is to assist the customer in every detail, to help him in the right choice of rental, according to his need, and to guarantee him a high quality service, punctuality, and efficiency in his transfer. Our fleet is exclusively composed of Mercedes, ideally suited for the service categories we offer. We invested in it as the vehicles from Stuttgart house are the best in terms of security and comfort standards. Each car is carefully inspected before leaving our garage, and our drivers seem to have a particular skill with these flagships models. ..Those who travel with Star Service Rome always see the difference...

Name: AvenTouro Z.s.
Company description: AvenTouro, z.s. is the non-profit organization, our goal is to support and benefit from the creation of sustainable adventure travel market in the Czech Republic and Slovakia with focus on people, ecology, and growth. We are dedicated to providing authentic and personalized program and cultural trips in the Czech Republic and Slovakia. We are a group of educated and positive young people who decided to make their hobbies into a job. Most of the travel agencies will take you only to the cities but we believe that is not enough, nature is always the answer. AvenTouro‘s mission is to show the beauty of the Czech Republic and Slovakia in a different way, in an outdoor way. We hike in all natural parks in Slovakia and the Czech Republic. Spending time outside with nature really set us free. In today's world, many people have lost touch with our land and the freedom that nature gives us. We encourage people to go and have fun outside, to feel the fresh air and the sunshine in their bodies. Perfect country to experience the outdoors life and to discover the healing power of our Pachamama We organize not only public trips but also private tailor-made tours for smaller groups or companies. We are here for you that is why we are able to adjust the whole program to your needs. The level of hiking is adjusted. You sometimes don’t have to hike a lot and you can see stunning places anyway.

Name: CORPORATE TOURS
Company description: CORPORATE TOURS es una agencia de viajes especializada en viajes empresariales y vacacionales dirigida por una profesional que cuenta con 25 años de experiencia en el sector de la preparación de viajes tanto a nivel empresarial como vacacional. El conocimiento de los destinos, adquirido en años de experiencia, hace que podamos conformar una amplia gama de propuestas, siempre tratando de ofertar las mejores condiciones. Para sus viajes de negocios nos implicamos en sus políticas de desplazamientos,aportamos soluciones adaptadas a sus necesidades y nos convertimos en sus intermediarios entre los proveedores y sus viajeros. Nuestro objetivo es que la preparación,gestión y seguimiento de sus viajes de empresa dejen de ser para ustedes una preocupación y una inversión de tiempo.Nos convertimos por tanto en su aliado,aportando nuestro conocimiento y diseñando la mejor linea a seguir para que sus contrataciones de desplazamientos se adapten a su presupuesto sin renunciar a la calidad. Para sus viajes de placer podemos ofrecer a nuestros clientes un amplio catálogo de programaciones. Somos expertos en cortas,medias y largas distáncias.Contamos con una amplia red de corresponsales que nos posibilita diseñar junto a usted su viaje soñado,de forma totalmente personalizada y a medida.

Name: El Torito - Urlaub Neu Erleben!
Company description: Ihr deutscher Reiseveranstalter für exklusiven und aussergewöhnlichen Urlaub in Almeria (Andalusien). Entdecken Sie auf unseren  Erlebnisreisen und Aktivreisen in Almeria eine neue Welt fernab des Massentourismus. Sowohl unsere speziell auf jede Saison abgestimmten Erlebnisreisen, als auch unsere Wander- bzw. Radreisen machen Ihren Urlaub zu einem einzigartigem Erlebnis. Für alle mit Benzin im Blut haben wir Motorsportreisen der Extraklasse im Angebot.

Name: Bhr Tour & Travel
Company description: We are a group of experienced and passionate specialists in tourism and hospitality management in particular. BHR.RO is an online booking website, specialized in travel business. Name: Poracciinviaggio.it
Company description: Poracciinviaggio.it è il primo Travel Blog in Italia che condivide, nella maniera più chiara e semplice possibile, le migliori offerte del web per viaggi low cost in Italia e all'estero. Selezioniamo i migliori voli, i migliori hotel ed i migliori pacchetti volo + hotel per viaggi da sogno che di low cost hanno solamente il prezzo, senza rinunciare a comodità e qualità. Supportati da una community in continua espansione, con un volume di investimenti pari a zero euro, in meno di 3 anni siamo riusciti ad imporci nel mercato italiano come punto di riferimento di fama nazionale nel settore delle offerte di viaggi e del turismo, puntando tutto sulla qualità imbattibile dei contenuti proposti e creando una forte Brand Identity. Offerte di viaggio, Voli LowCost, Hotel, Pacchetti Volo + Hotel, ma anche Codici Sconto, Promozioni Esclusive, Offerte per Treni e Bus, Travel Video e Influencer Marketing per Tour Operator e Aziende del settore turistico. Dati Analytics: - Pagina Facebook da +132.000 likes - Profilo Instagram da +92.000 followers - Canale Telegram da +29.000 membri - Sito Web da +300.000 visitatori unici al mese - App Android da +650.000 installazioni con +220.000 utenti attivi

Name: No Riding Elephants
HQ Location: Czech Republic, Moravskoslezský, Ostrava, 1263/24 Sokolská Třída, 702 00
Company description: Saving gentle giants one at the time.  We spread education about the dark side of the tourism industry. We protect abused elephants. We show the public and tour operators more enjoyable and appealing alternatives. No riding. No hurt. No abuse.

Company description: GLAMOUR and JOY Ltd is a Tour operator and Travel Agent. OUR PORTFOLIO Hotel reservations Excursions and vacations Cruise reservations MICE Organization of your Personal and Family Holidays Guided services Transfers Language Courses abroad  OUR MISSION To be Your reliable and personal Travel Agent We are motivated and experienced to offer to You quality products and services We do not offer everything, we simply select for you according to our professional criteria and responsibility We are focused on personal approach •	We strive to exceed guest expectations

Name: The Venetian Luxury
Company description: Customized guided tours, exclusive experiences and tailored made events: all this is The Venetian Luxury, your luxury private travel agency in Italy!

Name: Travellanda Bulgaria
Company description: Travellanda Bulgaria is a B2B company providing a vast powerful network of hotels and travel services in one unique system, to help Travel Agents and Tour Operators. Name: ÜberRot
Company description: übeRot. Bewegte Bilder, die Ihr Projekt bewegen! Wir konzipieren, produzieren und vermarkten ihr Projekt mit Fokus auf gezielter Verbreitung im Internet. Video Marketing sowie klassische Filmproduktionen komplett aus einer Hand. Unser Team steht für medialen Umschwung, für Andersdenken, für weg vom schnöden Standard! Niemand braucht noch mehr langweilige Werbung, Filme und Videos. Online, wie offline. Wir arbeiten mit Emotionen. Mit Viralität. Mit den bekannten und den „neuen Medien“. Wir sorgen mit Videoinhalten dafür, dass sich Ihr Produkt, Unternehmen oder ihre Marke im Web zielgruppenorientiert und themenspezifisch verbreitet. Diese Überzeugung hat uns nicht nur zahlreiche Auszeichnungen beschert, sondern treibt uns zudem an, immer wieder neue Ideen und Grenzen zu entdecken, um am Ende das bestmögliche Ergebnis zu erzielen. Effektiv. Zielgerichtet. Mutig. überRot. (Grün kann jeder…) Referenzen: Unitymedia GmbH, AEG GmbH, Luxuslärm, Road Stop GmbH, Internationales Werbefilmfestival Spotlight, Fernseh Berlet GmbH & Co.
