KG, Bounty Kommunikationsagentur GmbH, Redtree GmbH, Ja, ich buche im Reisebüro e.V., Rotonda Business Club GmbH & Co.KG , Online-Stammtisch Deutschland, Universität Darmstadt, NETgemacht EVENT UG, Clusterhaus Köln, Content-Management-Conference 2012, Web de Cologne e.V., Hans Wanning & Gilda Razani, Fernsucht GbR, Mayo-3, Indigo, Internationales Videofestival Bochum, Just Pink, , uvm.

Name: Tiebreak Travel
Company description: The leading tennis travel agency in Sweden, offering tailor made tennis trips for both private persons, companies, groups and tennis clubs. Trips are package to include hotels, tennis courts, training sessions and/or tickets to the largest ATP, WTA and Grand Slam Tournaments.

Name: Katolickie Biuro Pielgrzymkowe
Company description: Katolickie Biuro Pielgrzymkowe is a solid Tour Operator, which began its pilgrimage mission in 1991. Our team has been the same for many years, thanks to which the organization of pilgrimages remains consistently at the highest level based on tradition and rich experience. We organize pilgrimages with great care and commitment. The fruit of our activities is over one hundred and fifty thousand satisfied Pilgrims, over 3000 Priests, many distinguished Priests of Cardinals, Archbishops, and Bishops who have benefited from our offer and are still returning to the pilgrim routes. We offer wonderful pilgrimages to: Holy Land, Mexico, Fatima, Marian Shrines of Europe, the USA, Georgia and Armenia, Malta and many other beautiful places.

Name: Omnivia Travel Agency
Company description: Relying on the decade-long experience in tourism, Omnivia was founded in 2006 with a clear goal – to present to the world Omiš, Dalmatia and their rich blend of cuisine, natural attractions, cultural heritage and customs.  Our programs are intended for both independent travelers, organized groups and bussines events. They are designed to fit various interests, age and availability of time. By organizing one-day and multi-day programs in beautiful sceneries based on immersion in the local community, we create for our clients extraordinary experiences on one of the most attractive locations in the Mediterranean.  Using our tailor-made programs, clients can fully realize their own vision of their travel, agencies can realize their own complete itineraries and companies can have business events that perfectly match their needs.  OMNIVIA also owns two top-quality restaurants in Omiš, on attractive locations in the River Cetina canyon, offering traditional dishes guests can enjoy and local customs guests can experience and learn.

Name: Better Business Travel B.V.
Company description: Doing Business Travel Better! Years of experience, a global purchasing network, personal service and competitive fees are what make the Noordoostpolders/Northeast polder’s newest business travel agency unique. Small and mid-sized corporations in the polder and surrounding areas travel frequently but had to look elsewhere for a travel agency specialized in business travel. Not anymore. Better Business Travel is a company IN the polder FOR the polder. Director Lori Duin: “We are located “just around the corner” but we are a member of a worldwide purchasing network. This allows us to offer competitive fares that are often cheaper than the internet. The bottom line still counts and Better Business Travel has realized savings of more than 15% for clients.  And we offer personal service. We take care of your every travel need: tickets, accommodation, car rental, trains, visas, insurance and much more. Plus we are available when other agencies are closed and offer an emergency phone number for travelers en route.” Flexibility and ad hoc decision making are crucial for business travelers. “A very good reason to leave organizing a business trip to the experts. You can concentrate on doing business while we handle the logistics”, according to Lori Duin. “Because at the Better Business Travel, you are never just a number. Personal service is our number one goal.” For more information contact Lori at lori@bbtl.nl and make an obligation-free appointment today.

Name: ATVIAGGI INCENTIVE E TURISMO SRL
Company description: ATVIAGGI opera nel settore Turistico, offrendo oltre a tutti i servizi di un’Agenzia di Viaggio e Turismo, anche quelli legati all’Incentive, adeguandosi perfettamente ad ogni richiesta dei clienti. La creatività nell’immaginare proposte e itinerari, la qualità del servizio e l'impegno sono alcune delle nostre caratteristiche principali che, unite a puntualità, facilità nel contattarci, competenza, professionalità, disponibilità e cortesia, rappresentano il nostro punto di forza. ATVIAGGI, grazie all’esperienza acquisita in 15 anni di attività, offre, con grande professionalità, i seguenti servizi: -	Biglietteria aerea e marittima  nazionale ed internazionale con emissione diretta  -	Biglietteria ferroviaria -	Noleggio auto con o senza conducente  - Servizio di  Mini Bus & Navetta -	Noleggio auto d’epoca per matrimoni – Noleggio auto di prestigio  -	Prenotazioni alberghiere in Italia e nel Mondo -	Agriturismo, Bed and Breakfast in Italia -	Organizzazione di viaggi individuali, di gruppo e Crociere in collaborazione con i migliori Tour Operator  -	Vacanze studio, culturali, religiose -	Organizzazione viaggi di lavoro ed assistenza ad hoc in loco -	Viaggi Last Minute  -	Convenzioni con Parcheggi  -	Assicurazioni sanitarie e per annullamento viaggio -	Parchi di divertimento -	Guide Turistiche -  Traduttori ed Interpreti -	Hostess & Assistenti – Accompagnatori Bilingue -	Chef a domicilio -	Decorazioni Floreali  -	Visti d’ingresso  -	Corsi di formazione  -	Organizzazione Mostre

Name: Chartair Ltd
Company description: Туристическа агенция ChartAir е основана през 2005 година в гр. Варна. Агенцията е специализирана в предлагането на комплексно туристическо обслужване и авиационна брокерска дейност. Фирмата притежава IATA лиценз за издаване на самолетни билети. Силно специализирана е в издаването на самолетни билети по чартърни полети - най-вече за Германия, Скандинавските страни, Великобритания, Русия и други.   Основната цел при създаването на ChartAir е основана на идеята за първокласен Травел агент, която нашия екип отстоява и защитава всекидневно и с времето е станала запазената марка на агенцията ни. Всеки се нуждае от професионално мнение, коректно отношение и бързо обслужване когато се касае за бизнес или лично пътуване. Нашата задача като Травел агент е максимално да улесним непредвидени или планирани пътувания, а целта ни винаги ще бъде поставяне на нуждите на клиентите на първо място и всекидневно доказване на доверието в нас.

Name: Quest4Journeys
Company description: As an independent travel consultant I am a member of the BTS Travel Experts group in Belgium. I work from home and also visit my clients at their home or office, even outside of the general office hours.  I focus mainly on leisure travel from packaged beach holidays to fully made to measure travel programs worldwide and work with Belgian tour operators as well as hoteldatabases, car rental companies, destination management companies, train and airlines booking systems, and other reservation channels.  Travel insurance is also an important part of my business (max. Belgium and Luxemburg citizens)

Name: Biciz
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Vejer De La Frontera, 27 Avenida De Andalucía, 11150
Company description: “BICIZ is Southern Spain's leading bike Tour Company. BICIZ provides the type of bike tours we all dream of. At our company we do not only offer tailor-made bike adventures, but also vacation packages, including transfers from/to airport and train station, accommodation, special interest tours, etc. Our services are aimed to sportmen and families. Our company is based in Vejer de la Frontera in Cadiz. Our bike tours take place in the neighboring area. Remarkable and unique scenery is waiting for you! Endless wild beaches, stunning nature parks, impressive and beautiful white washed villages and breathtaking views of the ocean and the african continent. We aim to bring a new level of excitement to each and everyone of our clients. All of our trips and bike tours are designed to put you on the right trails at the right time of year. At BICIZ we have dedicated an experienced staff in adventure tourism. During our clients’ holidays, we take care of everything from beginning to end. We provide tailor-made solutions to ensure your trip becomes an unforgettable experience. We organize bike tours and customized vacation packages, where our clients can choose a totally customized excursion according to their preferences. We offer our services to individuals, families, private groups, travel agencies, tour operators, etc. Our aspiration is to make your trip truly epic. We will make the most of your holidays. Get ready to enjoy the beach and leisure! Services provided by our company: - Customized bike tours - Bike rentals - Holiday rental apartments

Name: I EAT. Food Tours & Event Planning
Company description: I Eat Food Tours is a tour operator that hosts and organizes food tours, fine dining soirees with live cooking in Turin, private social events and travel itineraries across Italy. Since 2017 Abram Stringa, a Dutch chef, and his Italian wife Cecilia, a Sociologist and Storyteller, founded the company together. Their mission is to see guests happy by proudly sharing their love and knowledge of the local food and culture of the Piedmont region. We want you to be part of something unforgettable and extraordinary. And you?

Name: Meetingpoint Cruises
Company description: Meetingpointcruises.it was founded with the goal to increase the knowledge of Passenger about Cruises in the Italian Markt. Since its founding as Blog in November 2009 and then in Juli 2011 as Website, Meetingpointcruises.it reaches exciting and unexpected results that pushing it to become a crucial reference point for lovers of the world of cruises, and especially for tour operators and professionals. Meetingpoint Cruises is, in fact, regularly inspected by Costa Cruises, MSC Cruises, Carnival Cruise Line Transocean Kreuzfahrten, Premicon AG, Fincantieri, Norwegian Cruise Line, Royal Caribbean International, Celebrity Cruise Line, TripAdvisor and many others.   In the Website is also possible to find the latest interviews with  CEOs, Presidents, Sale & Marketing Managers and Employees of the different Cruise Company. In addition the Visitor will find a lot of information also about Ports and River Cruises but especially the Experince of other Passenger. During this time Meetingpoint Cruises recieved awards from Royal Caribbean International UK, Holland American Line USA, Hurtigruten ASA and Norwegian Cruise Line USA. Meetingpointcruises.it collaborate also with the italian national Newspaper "ILSECOLO XIX". The website it is not all. Meetingpoint Cruises is present also in Facebook http://www.facebook.com/meetingpointcruises, Twitter @MeetCruises and Youtube http://www.youtube.com/user/meetcruises. Visit Us! We are looking forward you!

Name: Italia Reservation - Agenzia Viaggi E Tour Operator
Company description: Italia Reservation, Agenzia Viaggi e Tour Operator di Padova, è specializzata in viaggi e vacanze in tutto il mondo, con i migliori Tour Operator e le offerte più vantaggiose per qualsiaisi destinazione.  Grazie alle sue piattaforme web, non è più necessario recarsi nell'agenzia di viaggi, negli scomodi orari d’ apertura, per visionare decine di cataloghi e calcolare complicati preventivi.  Basta collegarsi ai portali di riferimento, www.italiareservation.com, www.italiareservation.it, www.informavacanze.it, per avere a portata di mouse, le migliori offerte per tutte destinazione in grado di soddisfare qualsiasi esigenza di budget e sistemazione: viaggi individuali e viaggi di gruppo, viaggi su misura, crociere e viaggi di nozze,  last minute, voli, prenotazioni hotels, viaggi d'affari, etc. Infine con il portale www.couponviaggio.it propone offerte di vacanze scontate nelle più bellelocalità italiane.

Name: NEXT SHOPPING CERRADO DE CALDERON SL
Company description: Next Shopping ofrece una amplia oferta gastronómica para elegir: desde el café del desayuno o la merienda, con un obrador de confitería propio, hasta una selección de tapas o platos típicos de la tierra con un toque gourmet. La Terraza ofrece gastronomía y relax en un mismo espacio, que destaca por su belleza y tranquilidad. Next Shopping ofrece tiendas para las compras del día a día: supermercado, ferretería, papelería, tintorería, peluquería, atención nutricional y agencia de viajes. Una amplia oferta de servicios en Cerrado de Calderón.

Name: Hellenic Tourism Society
Company description: The Hellenic Tourism Society aims to be the professional membership body for people working in all sectors of the visitor economy, such as airlines, cruise lines, national tourist offices, hotel firms, retail travel agencies and other special travel interests.  The group is open to people working in every sector of the industry - public, private or voluntary - and to those well-established in their career path as well as those starting out on a travel or tourism course at college or university.

Name: Odysight - Travel Experts
Company description: Je m’appelle Tanguy et je suis passionné par les voyages et les découvertes culturelles. Après des études en tourisme, j’ai décidé de fonder Odysight.  En tant que membres du réseau Travel Experts, nous dépassons le concept de simples agents de voyage, puisque nous vous transmettons notre passion, nos conseils professionnels et nos bons tuyaux, tout en vous organisant un voyage sur mesure qui vous ressemble !

Name: Touch Of Thai d.o.o.
Company description: We are pleased to announce that Touch of Thai Massage and Spa in Dubrovnik is a Winner of 2018-2022 Service Excellence Award for Spa, Fitness & Wellness by Luxury Travel Guide. Each year, the Luxury Travel Guide invites subscribers, guests, travel agencies and industry experts from all over the world to vote on Spas. Fitness centres, Yoga Studios & Wellness retreats they feel are deserving of recognition. www.luxurytravel-guide.com www.TouchofThai.eu

Name: Central Asia Tours
Company description: Central Asia Tours is a Danish travel agency that specializes in package tours exclusively to Central Asian countries, and offering rare “One-of-a-kind” activities in that region. We plan itinerary based on your requirements. It is fully customized and planned according to the number of days, and sights you would like to see.  None of the other travel agencies in the Danish market can be equally professional in regard to Central Asia, because our employees originally are from countries of Central Asia, so language, traditions, culture, customs etc. are their best knowledge.  Discover the New World and be the first of your friends!

Name: FotoViaggiando
Company description: www.fotoviaggiando.it facebook.com/FotoViaggiandoTravel/ instagram.com/fotoviaggiando.it/ Siamo un tour operator specializzato in Workshops e Viaggi Fotografici.  FotoViaggiando nasce dalla passione di una squadra di professionisti nel turismo appassionati di fotografia. La crescente esigenza di un operatore turistico professionale in grado di organizzare e curare i dettagli richiesti dai viaggi fotografici, ci ha portato alla creazione di questo marchio specializzato, avvalendoci della nostra esperienza decennale in campo turistico e di forti collaborazioni con fotografi professionisti in tutta Italia. FotoViaggiando organizza e segue direttamente tutti gli itinerari di viaggio proposti, in modo da poter garantire sicurezza, professionalità ed affidabilità dal punto di vista dell’organizzazione tecnica dei viaggi. A questa organizzazione di base abbiniamo la qualità dei workshop fotografici proposti durante i viaggi. Un binomio vincente per offrire proposte apprezzate dai viaggiatori appassionati di fotografia. ---------------------------------------------------- VIAGGI FOTOGRAFICI di FOTOVIAGGIANDO.IT Accompagnati sempre da un fotografo professionista gli itinerari saranno ad hoc per sfruttare le migliori condizioni per fotografare. A seconda della destinazione anche workshop fotografici specifici come fotografia notturna, naturalistica e di ritratto con modelle etc. Tutte le destinazioni su fotoviaggiando.it/viaggi-fotografici/ Workshops fotografici in format breve su temi specifici, viaggi fotografici a corto e a lungo raggio. Ovunque nel mondo con i migliori fotografi professionisti.

Name: In2Travel Lda
Company description: In2Travel é uma agência de viagens incoming e outgoing sediada em Setúbal, Portugal. Inseridos no grupo GEIA, a In2travel é especializada em proporcionar pacotes de férias para todos aqueles que gostam de viajar sem preocupações.  Quer viajar pelo mundo fora de uma forma exclusiva e ter a garantia de que sai satisfeito?  Então somos a sua companhia! Férias exclusivas, circuitos para grupos, produtos corporate e muito mais.  Connosco, Viajar é Viver! A InArrábida, primeira marca registada da empresa, é a primeira grande aposta da empresa enquanto agregadora e prestadora de serviços numa região.  Orgulhamo-nos de trabalhar com os melhores de cada região e desta forma garantimos experiências únicas e INesqueciveis.

Name: Emerald Custom Tours
Company description: Emerald Custom Tours is a leading incoming high end tour operator for UK, Ireland & Italy. We arrange bespoke private tours of Britain & Ireland for groups, families, companies and individuals.  We work actively with travel agents from Ensemble, Virtuoso, Signature and American Express. We have offices in Dublin and Edinburgh.

Name: Solo Affitti Vacanze S.p.A.
Company description: Solo Affitti Vacanze è il portale e-commerce che consente di prenotare online soggiorni in case vacanze garantite e certificate dal  n° 1 dell’affitto.  Le proposte di soloaffittivacanze.it sono oltre 70.000, distribuite in tutta Italia ed in Europa, e vanno dal monolocale vista mare, alla villa con piscina per gruppi di amici e famiglie, al casale immerso nel verde per vacanze in relax.  Seguendo il nostro motto Sentiti a casa nella tua vacanza, lavoriamo per trasformare le vacanze in un’esperienza estremamente piacevole, scegliendo per voi le migliori case vacanze garantite e certificate dal marchio Solo Affitti Vacanze acquistabili online su www.soloaffittivacanze.it. Siamo sempre alla ricerca di aziende, agenti immobiliari, tour operator, partner con cui collaborare per rendere sempre più ampia e ricca l’offerta da proporre ai nostri clienti. La nostra direzione centrale si trova a Cesena ma abbiamo filiali distribuite in tutta Italia e in Spagna.

Name: Mitravel.gr
Company description: Lately, the internet has been part of our lives while it manages to “gain” a  significant role in our daily routine. However, there is a substantial number of people who still trusts exclusively the “traditional”  travel agents as the booking procedures online seem complex and confusing, especially when the destinations wanted have to go through "difficult"​ itineraries with many stopovers or when the booking engine does not have all possible requested conditions, thus they do not satisfy the passengers’ needs ( ie travelling with pets). Most online travel agencies do not provide the security that is gained by the human contact with your travel agent, a person that you probably have been acquainting with, the last few years.   Mitravel.gr is a new company with this aim: Bringing the traditional travel agency in your house through the computer screen. Thus, it gives you the ability to create a shopping basket in order to purchase all services with a single usage of your credit card.   Simple booking engines offering multiple options, competitive prices and most importantly high quality making your services, the number 1 priority for us. We are here to answer any questions and make your trip as easy as pressing a button ...

Name: Surreal Hospitality
HQ Location: Cyprus, Nicosia, Nicosia, 30 Costa Anaxagora Street
Company description: The Leading Online Platform For GDS & IDS Distribution in the Industry. Booking Engine, Channel Manager & Call Center Module for your Hotel. For First Time Ever ability to Send Unlimited Personalized Multiple Offers to Future Guests & Convert them to Confirmed clients! Absolute solutions for Independent Hotels, Hotel Chains, Camps & Holiday Rentals. Surreal Hospitality & Constructions Group LTD with the Brand Surreal Hotels & Resorts, undertakes the full Management of Properties (Hotels, Resorts, Villas) under Long or Short Term Management Agreements. This is a Win - Win Partnership between the Hotel Owners | Investors & Surreal Group. Under our Professional Management Service, Current Hotel Owners & Future Hospitality Investors can take advantange of a Fully Flexible, Risk Free Cooperation Model. Our motivation is simple: We love to ride in or country and we want to share that with you.  We founded "Go Cycling Portugal" to help independent travelers ride in our country. Go Cycling Portugal is not a bike tour company, as we do not sell self-guided or guide bike tours. Instead, we focus on providing everything you need to prepare your cycling holidays in Portugal, from bike rentals, bike gear rental, creating and designing bike routes and providing support services for your own tour in Portugal. Our aim is to be of service for you, the cyclist, and your family/group - whatever the pace, goals, region, terrain type or experience you prefer.

Name: Active Holidays In Greece - Gnosis Active Travel
Company description: We are a Greek specialist adventure tour operator & travel designer that offers hiking, cycling, nature and culture trips, MTB touring, small group authentic travel experiences, guided and self-guided tours, unique tailor-made holidays, sightseeing tours that can include outdoor activities. Our goal is to show you authentic Greece; a beautiful, safe to visit, relatively small but incredibly diverse and biodiverse country with thousands of miles of coastline, innumerable beaches and islands as well as high mountains and dense forests; a country brimming with famous ancient monuments associated with democracy, philosophy, theatre and so much more. Greece is a unique adventure and culture destination.

Name: La Bruguera De Púbol
Company description: La Bruguera is a unique homestead, run on permaculture & degrowth principles, which includes a large 10 bedroom guest house, a retreat centre, yoga studio, bike-friendly facilities, a biodiverse agroforestry system, fermentation lab, and runs entirely on renewable energy. The Guest House The guest house consists of 6 twin bedrooms and 6 bathrooms: two “suites” with en-suite bathrooms, and 4 bedrooms with adjacent bathrooms. There are many dining areas, interior and exterior and out, including a massive, glass-walled dining room overlooking the forest garden. There is a large double living room, and a fully-equipped, stunning modern kitchen. The castle tower atop the villa offers views of the Pyrenees and Garrotxa mountains, as well as the neighbouring Gavarres hills and the valley leading to the villages of Púbol and La Pera. The Studio The former Casademont Art Gallery has been transformed for creative, active and well-being activities. It boasts underfloor heating, 4m high ceilings, is fully-equipped for yoga, and has a huge glass wall which opens out over an Asian-style cloistered fishpond, with views into the forest. There are bathrooms and a shower, and air conditioning in summer. La Bruguereta This additional apartment is perfect for visiting teachers, cycling coaches, tour operator staff, or guests who would like a spot separate from the main villa. Adjacent to the yoga studio, La Bruguereta has two inter-linked bedrooms, a new kitchen, its own bathroom, parking, wifi, laundry facilities, and private entrances. It also has an outdoor eating area and patio space with lounge chairs. Sustainability  The estate runs entirely on renewable energy, stores rain water for irrigation and produces the majority of the produce and food products served. We source external produce hyper-locally, and practice permaculture and regenerative agriculture across the estate.

Name: Medical Center Glavic - Polyclinic Glavic
Company description: Medical Center Glavić is a private health care institution consisting of the Polyclinic Glavić, the Medical Institution Glavić and Glavić Med ltd.  The Polylinic Glavić provides medical services, examinations, and diagnostic procedures from field of neurology, ophthalmology, physical medicine, and internal medicine. Furthermore, the Glavić Institution offers medical transport services, physical therapy, laboratory examinations, occupational health medicine and also provides health care services for patients at their homes. In addition to all of these, Glavić Med ltd. is conducting business as a travel agency specialized for health tourism and Optics which has a wide offer of spectacles and sunglasses.   Medical Center Glavić follows latest  trends in medicine and that is shown in the last venture and expansion of services, bringing the revolutionary robot Armeo Spring and Armeo Pediatric hand neuro-rehabilitation, by reputable company HOCOMA. In addition to cutting-edge medical equipment, realizing the importance of the expertise of the medical staff, Medical Center Glavić has amassed a respectable team of doctor specialists who follow international trends. With their constant perfecting, they are further contributing towards the more powerful position of the Centre on the market of medical services. Medical Center Glavić also has an impressive team of experts in marketing, public relations, accounting and IT services that contribute to the professional and successful work of the whole Centre. With robotics neuro-rehabilitation, medical center Glavić is proud of project Art and Medicine, which beautifully completes the ambient modernist building of the Center.

La proprietà immersa nel verde offre ai suoi clienti tranquillità, relax ed un luogo dove poter staccare la spina ed entrare in un oasi di pace. Un Petit Paradis è anche la migliore soluzione per uomini di affari, aziende, agenzie, tour operator e viaggiatori individuali. Tutte le destinazioni turistiche più popolari, come Assisi, Gubbio, Spello, Todi e il Lago Trasimeno sono facilmente raggiungibili in auto. Orvieto e Siena sono solo un'ora e il centro di Roma a due ore di viaggio. Il tuo Relax, il nostro Lavoro!

Name: Ponto Por Ponto
Company description: A Ponto por Ponto nasce da Cooperativa de Turismo de Trás-os-Montes e Alto Douro, entidade privada, criada à cerca de 8 anos para organizar o produto turístico da região e levá-lo ao mercado. Resolvemos criar um Operador Turístico, cujo nome comercial é PONTO POR PONTO, e também trabalhar diretamente o consumidor final, pois era nosso entendimento que o espaço que os Operadores Nacionais dedicavam a Portugal era demasiado redutor, o que comprovamos. Partilhar antigas rotas e velhos caminhos, comunicar com gentes diferentes, tradições fortes e culturas ancestrais, é o nosso lema. A literatura, o templarismo, a arqueologia, a arquitetura popular são algumas das temáticas onde nos movemos. Somos alfaiates por medida e continuamos a aceitar desafios. Localizada em Vila Real, a Ponto por Ponto orgulha-se de criar eventos culturais e temáticos com o apoio dos nossos colaboradores profissionais, dinâmicos e criativos. Acreditamos no desenvolvimento e no sucesso e o nosso principal objetivo é responder, de forma eficiente e eficaz, às expetativas e necessidades dos nossos parceiros e clientes.

Name: Travelle - Wellness Travel & Events
HQ Location: Romania, Ilfov, Voluntari, Str. Emil Racovita Pipera, 077190
Company description: Wellness Travel & Events Romania We specialize in wellness tourism and events. We are a Tour Operator “Hub” Agency that operates wellness trips (in Romania, as well as abroad). We wish to offer not only the Travelle’s wellness programmes that can include wellness & cultural tours, “Spaventura” Wellness Retreats etc., but also different types of services from our partners - spa centres, detox procedures, consults with specialists in yoga, tai chi, Pilates, Ayurveda, Chinese medicine, healthy-cooking schools, and also mountain guides, guides specialized in adventure-tourism, equestrian tourism, etc. Through our tours, our wellness retreats and our Travelle events, we offer an all-inclusive charge-up for the mind, body and soul. We do not intent to overwhelm your mind with teachings of the ancient Zen manual, instead we have managed to introduce in our Travelle programmes different types of tips & tricks which you can apply every single day, even if your lifestyle maybe be quite hectic, and your agenda always full. Who are our customers? Whoever is interested in a healthy lifestyle and in the way that such a lifestyle can be integrated into their daily routine.  Our trips and events are suited for different types of clients that vary from families with children, couples or elderly people, to groups and teams of people working together in various companies or corporations, or people that are on a journey of self-discovering. Starting from each person`s needs or the group`s specifics, a customized programme is being created that takes into consideration important aspects such as: time frame, location, activities, etc. What are the benefits following a Travelle wellness programme? First of all, a recharged body, a refreshed mind and a calmer spirit! You will learn and then be able to perform, daily, different types of relaxation exercises, that can become healthy habits in your life. What you will learn in our programmes, will endure throughout your entire lifetime.

You will be able to preview some offerings on our web site www.secretvenice.it. In Venice we are organizing  guided visits that offer the most visited sites of interest like: piazza San Marco and the Rialto bridge; gondola rides Guided visits that are more strictly cultural and unique  - Authentic Venice tour  - the Jewish Ghetto tour  - the secret gardens of Venice  - the secret palaces and gardens of Venice  - the squeri – local boat yards and forcola work  - Alberto Toso Fei ghost tours  - photographic tours  - wine and local delicacies tour All tours are held by professional guides with valid permits and members of the provincial register, all highly qualified and with a readiness to help comprehend their knowledge of this city in various languages. Apart from the tours we offer the possibility for: personal transfers to and from the airport finding proper sleeping accommodations (hotel, bed & breakfast, apartments) professional personal shoppers We are also available to create all-inclusive travel packages, specifically realized for your clients, including tours of Veneto (Palladian villas, Prosecco and wine route, Padova, Vicenza, Verona, Italian UNESCO World Heritage tours) and other italian cities.

Name: CRUISEXPERTS HELLAS S.A
Company description: CRUISEXPERTS HELLAS S.A. was established in February 2009, we are licensed and bonded with the Greek National Tourism Organization, E.O.T.  and members of HATTA, the Hellenic Association of Travel & Tourist Agencies.    We specialize in Cruise Tour Operating, Holiday Planning and Land Services of cruise lines and we offer high quality services to our clients, which we plan, design and organize according to their needs. From our headquarters in the very centre of Athens, we also carry out direct retail sales for FITS and groups and the co-ordination of the land services we offer to all Greek destinations.    In February 2009, CRUISEXPERTS HELLAS S.A. was appointed as Preferred Sales Agent for Costa Cruises, followed a few months later by our appointment as Preferred Sales Agent for Holland America Line. We also work directly with several other cruise lines.    Although we are a new brand, our management team, executives and staff have long-standing experience in the cruise market. Our executives have previously held various top positions in sales and operations for local and international cruise lines and tour operators, such as Royal Olympic Cruises, Louis Cruises, Festival Cruises and Easy Cruise, Travel Plan and Cruise Plan and accordingly all member of our team have experience and knowledge of the industry and have developed an extensive sales and operations network.    CRUISEXPERTS HELLAS S.A. maintains excellent relations with the local market and we co-operate with all the leading local tour operators and travel agents on various projects.

Name: Manatees & Friends KG
Company description: Germany: tourism, full service travel agency, outgoing agency; private, corporate travel services, main business with USA USA: tourism, incoming agency, tourism development, destination development and services, destination marketing --> Florida´s Nature Coast

Name: Wedoncruises
Company description: Celebramos  el día más  bonito de tu vida   de forma privada a bordo de un crucero de lujo  en cualquier lugar del mundo; Nuestro equipo ( brokers de cruceros, wedding planners, agencia de viajes ) pone a disposición de los clientes un abanico enorme de servicios y opciones para que el gran día sea perfecto, pudiendo coordinar  una boda perfecta y una experiencia de viaje inolvidable.

Name: I VOSTRI VIAGGI Di Sivet S.r.l.
Company description: I Vostri Viaggi di Sivet s.r.l., Tour Operator in Sicilia da oltre 35 anni. Specializzati in Outgoing, pacchetti organizzati per individuali e tour di gruppo, su corto e medio raggio, ossia EUROPA e MEDITERRANEO fino al Medio Oriente. In questo periodo la nostra azienda ha avuto modo di crescere in esperienza e professionalità, aggiornandosi naturalmente anche al nuovo panorama commerciale e tecnologico del mondo turistico; conta oggi fino a 30 dipendenti in periodi di alta stagione (con i dipendenti stagionali e gli assistenti all'estero), che operano sinergicamente in una struttura orientata per DESTINAZIONE, allo scopo di favorire nel proprio staff una costante crescita professionale e personale, per rispondere sempre con puntualità ed affidabilità ad ogni esigenza dei propri clienti. I VOSTRI VIAGGI tour operator è membro ASTOI (Associazione Italiana Tour Operator) e collabora oggi con i principali operatori nazionali e con le migliori compagnie aeree sul mercato. Le destinazioni su cui operiamo sono oltre trenta, tutte nel corto-medio raggio, in pratica tutta l'Europa e il bacino del Mediterraneo. I nostri pacchetti turistici sono frutto di accurate ricerche di mercato, quindi orientati a soddisfare tutte le possibili richieste e tendenze del settore, ma sono anche esito di attente valutazioni sulla affidabilità dei corrispondenti in loco, sulla qualità dei servizi e delle strutture proposte e costante monitoraggio per garantire nel tempo standard di qualità sempre elevati. Da sempre uno dei nostri "must" è stata l'ASSISTENZA costante al cliente. Potrete contattarci attraverso le vostre AGENZIE VIAGGI di fiducia, direttamente ai nostri recapiti, o attraverso il nostro sito ed i social network.

Name: Farvegur Travel Investments
Company description: Farvegur ehf. invests and advices in the tourism, real estate and health care sector in Iceland and the Arctic region. We lead and advice tourism start-ups with strategic development of products, sales & marketing procedures and workflow. We provide seed funding for good ideas in tourism, specifically in activities and transport. We advice CEOs and company boards of activities, transport and travel agencies on product development, on and offline marketing, international sales, joint ventures etc. Our current investments are: Whale Safari Mr. Puffin Whale Watching Akureyri Reykjavik Sightseeing Airport Direct Intuens Health

Name: Villas2rent Mallorca
Company description: Your own Luxury Villa by the Golden Bay of Mallorca.  If you measure success in the number of properties for rental, we hasn’t achieved all that much. We have never focused on being the biggest. We prefer to think small. Intimate. Involving. It’s not that we are better than big rental companies because we are small. We are different, that’s all.  We own the properties, we know every room, we care.  We offer a lifestyle experience, without limitations.  Our properties are situated on the South-East Coast of Mallorca nearby white sandy Beaches, Marina, Golf, Shops and Restaurants. At Villas2rent Mallorca we have discovered there is an alternate path, it is possible to build environmentally friendly and aesthetically pleasing properties. That small is good for business as well as guests. That less is more.  “I would like to express my admiration for and heartfelt thanks to our Team - our cleaners, cooks, drivers, gardeners, maids and our technical service department. In the end, performing their invaluable small roles, pleasing you, they are the true Villas2rent", says Danish Founder and Manager Lone Soerensen.  " I personally assist the guests through-out their Holidays in our properties. Guests can mostly communicate with me in their own language: Danish, English, German, Norwegian, Spanish and Swedish.  It's easy : simply browse, select, book and enjoy. When needed our friendly, experienced and multilingual Team in Mallorca are looking forward to assist you. Birthday. Wedding. 24/7 ... no matter what." With 25 years experience in European incoming tourism in Spain - more than 20 years in Mallorca, Lone has enabled to offer excellent service in a unique selection of beautiful, quality Villas. Our family company Roig.com founded in Cala d'Or in 1958 do offer : Bus Transport, Excursions, Limousine Service, Petrol Station, Rent a Car, Security Company, Taxi, Travel Agency, and now :  Villas2rent Mallorca Come stay with us ...

Name: SOTOGRANDE REAL ESTATE S.L
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Jimena De La Frontera, Calle Ronda Del Secanillo, 11340
Company description: SOTOGRANDE REAL ESTATE nace en 2016 como una empresa inmobiliaria que trabaja cinco actividades: Servicios Inmobiliarios, Seguros Generales, Administración de Fincas,  Servicios Financieros, Agencia de Viajes  y Servicios de Limpieza. Enfocada a expandirse a nivel nacional e internacional hasta crear una red de colaboración entre agencias mundial. Nos hemos consolidado como empresa destacada del sector por nuestro trabajo serio y por ser profesionales en las actividades que desarrollamos. Trabajamos en diversos proyectos de desarrollo, sin olvidar a nuestros agentes para que tengan su propio negocio con la mayor rentabilidad posible. Gracias a una formación constante y a nuestra experiencia como empresarios y emprendedores, le damos a nuestros clientes una visión completa de todos los servicios que desarrollamos.

Name: TOUR OPERATOR SERENDIPITY - EVENTYR LTD
Company description: WELCOME TO MAGICAL BULGARIA !  Eventyr LTD is is a fast growing company  in Bulgaria, working  for popularize different destinations both in Bulgaria and around the world. The brand name of the tour operator is Serendipity - means to find something different, but more value for you. Nature is the most important resource for every destination.We give to our clients and patners the oportunity to meet each other and to experience unforgettable moments, getting to know national folklore, culture, traditions and valuables.   Our team wishes to help in the preservation of Bulgarian traditions and values. To support the development of crafts and smaller settlements. It is time to turn ourselves into the nature and our eternal valuables, which help us to protect ourselves and develop successfully! Our team is working not only for the popularizing of its own products, but for popularizes Bulgaria as a tourist destination. To promote successfuly a tourist destination is necessary efforts by both – the government and the industry that actually communicates with customers.  Our goal is to satisfy the both sites – to present to our clients a unique product, making unforgettable memories -  in this way we give the oppurunty to smaller comunities to develop successfuly and derive economic benefits. We do not make compromise with the quality! The most important to us is making people rich in a spirit, to protect the nature and traditions. High quality and unique experience , provided to our clients is our  main goal! Preservation and improvement of the smaller settlements is a source of sustainable development. We appreciate nature and wish  to give our solves this beauty , without  depriving future generations of the oppurtunity to enjoy it.

Name: Philippinen Tours
Company description: Philippinen Tours ist ein Spezialreiseveranstalter, der individuelle Rundreisen auf den Philippinen anbietet. Dabei liegen die Anfänge der Reiseagentur in 2009, als die Website www.philippinen-tours.de ins Leben gerufen wurde und zunächst als Blog über Land und Leute informiert hat. Im weiteren Verlauf sind abenteuerliche Rundreisen entstanden, die im Austausch mit hunderten Lesern entworfen wurden. Mittlerweile zählt Philippinen Tours über ein Dutzend Mitarbeiter, welche in Deutschland, den USA und vor Ort auf den Philippinen arbeiten. Das Team hat  seit den frühen 1980er Jahren zusammen über 40 Reisen auf den Inseln unternommen und baut seit Jahren ein Netzwerk aus zuverlässigen Dienstleistern, Fahrern, Bootsleuten, Hotel- und Resortbetreibern auf, wovon die Gäste maßgeblich profitieren. Die Mission von Philippinen Tours ist es, den nachhaltigen Tourismus zu fördern, für kulturellen Austausch zu sorgen und besonders philippinischen Jugendlichen eine Perspektive im Öko-Tourismus zu geben. Ein eigenes Bildungsprojekt hilft lokalen mittellosen Studenten, ihr Studium zu finanzieren.

Name: Questlog
Company description: Questlog sind der Aufbewahrungsort für Reiseandenken. Mit Questlogs bleiben schöne Urlaubsmomente im Alltag präsent. Sie sind das perfekte Kundengeschenk: Egal ob für Hotels, Reiseveranstalter oder Reisebüros, mit Questlogs erreicht man eine tiefe Kundenbindung im Tourismus.

Name: MallorcaAuthentic
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, 15 Carrer De Marbella, 07610
Company description: mallorcaAuthentic est une agence de voyage réceptive en ligne, située à Majorque sur les Îles Baléares et travaillant initialement avec le marché francophone. Elle est spécialisée dans la vente de voyages sur mesure, avec des séjours à la carte et des séjours thématiques entièrement personnalisables. En offrant proximité, flexibilité et qualité, elle œuvre au service des voyageurs groupes et individuels, qu’il s’agisse d’un voyage en famille, en couple, entre amis, entre membres d’une association, d’un comité, d’une colonie de vacances, etc. Elle propose des produits différents, originaux et qui sortent des sentiers battus. Elle n’écarte cependant pas tous ceux qui souhaitent un séjour plus classique, « sol y playa ».  Son objectif est de conseiller les clients et les aider à organiser, de A à Z, leurs vacances à Majorque, en tenant compte de toutes leurs exigences, leur personnalité, leurs envies et leur budget. Les clients pourront décider eux-mêmes de toutes les composantes de leur séjour (transport, logement et activités), tout en pouvant choisir les dates et la durée de leur voyage.

Name: Felices Vacaciones
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 17 C/ramírez De Arellano, 28043
Company description: Felicesvacaciones.es es un agencia de viajes online con su sede central en Madrid.  Está compuesta por un equipo altamente cualificado que le asistirá en la organización de sus vacaciones. Felices Vacaciones es una agencia de viajes registrada en la Dirección General de Turismo de la Comunidad de Madrid con CICMA 2345.

Name: SCAY GROUP Snc
Company description: SCAYGROUP : ACCOGLIENZA E SERVIZI TURISTICI PER IL VIAGGIATORE CON LE SCAY'S ANGELS VIAGGI DA VIP! In aeroporto, ci chiamano così, perchè cordialità, professionalità e un sorriso accogliente contraddistinguono il nostro operato.  Siamo specializzate nel proporre servizi dedicati al viaggiatore sia in partenza che in arrivo, velocizzando le procedure di viaggio, facendo risparmiare tempo e inutili ansie ai passeggeri. come? Possiamo effettuare il check-in per voi, stampare le carte d'imbarco, effettuare prenotazioni e preassegnazioni di posti aerei, prenotare le lounge, portarvi al gate o sottobordo con servizi personalizzati. Volete pranzare in aeroporto o fare una sorpresa accattivante all'amica che festeggia gli anni? o semplicemente partire senza il pensiero delle valigie, che abbiamo provveduto a spedirvi a casa o ancora recapitarvi a casa gli acquisti effettuati in aeroporto. Accogliervi all'arrivo ottimizzando le attese o aiutandovi a risolvere eventuali disguidi con i bagagli. Scay è una realtà tutta al femminile, nata nel 2001 dall'intrapredenza delle due titolari Cristina e Silvia, dapprima come punto di riferimento per grandi Tour Operator italiani e poi sempre più specializzate nell'accoglienza a tutto tondo, dai grandi gruppi a viaggi incentive, passando per famiglie e gita scolastiche ogni tipo di viaggiatore si è affidato a Scay.  Accoglienza che per noi è la nostra parola d'ordine, si è ramificata fino ad arrivare ad essere punto di riferimento per eventi a Bergamo e dintorni.

Name: Bulgarian VIP Travel
Company description: BRIEF OVERVIEW Bulgarian VIP Travel is a leading Travel Management Company (TMC), based in Bulgaria, established in 1992.  The company provides high quality comprehensive travel management services to corporate and individual travelers and leisure tailor made travel products; Bulgarian VIP Travel Ltd is member in RADIUS® - The Global Travel Company (www.radiustravel.com) since 2004 and is currently providing travel management services to more than 100 corporate clients. BUSINESS AFFILIATIONS IATA accredited agent since 1994 Member and Shareholder of RADIUS® - The Global Travel Company Member of the American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA) Member of the American Chamber of Commerce in Bulgaria (Amcham) Co-founder of the Association of Bulgarian Tour Operators and Travel Agents (ABTTA)   SPECIALITIES Corporate Travel management, Travel Incentive Programs, Leisure Тravel Мanagement, Airplane Tickets, Hotel Bookings and Car Rentals, Transfers, Holiday Packages, M.I.C.E. Services, Cargo Services, Charters                            PRODUCTS:  www.tzone.bg  is a leisure travel portal which offers: Package Holidays, Citybreaks, Escorted Group Tours, Exotic Holidays, Cruise Offers. Departure country: Bulgaria

Name: Samos Travel Services
HQ Location: Greece, Samos Island, 5 Themistokli Sofouli Str., 83100
Company description: Samos Travel Services is a local travel agency with multiannual experience, which has as a top priority to ensure a memorable holiday for you on Samos Island! Your ticket and accommodation bookings, as well as your island tours and transfers (from the airport to your hotel etc.), are strictly our agency's mission! Samos Travel Services co-operates with a variety of hotels suitable for every individual need, offers transportation services and arranges island tours, as well as custom-made services according to the customer’s needs (transfers according to your schedule, private tours etc.). In addition, it takes care of your airline and ferry bookings, at the lowest fares available! In the corporate field, it handles large scale events and/or activities such as: incentive tours, conferences, workshops, as well as handling agents for tour operators. Samos Travel Services was established by Mr. Manolis Kypreos in July 2012, after a 25-year experience, which comes along with the vision to expand and improve the agency’s services.

Name: OnWayTransfers.com
Company description: We offer airport transfer services in more than 3000 airports worldwide. Choose from a wide range of quality vehicles, from low cost shuttle bus to luxury vehicles. Our most popular vehicles are private cars, mini-vans and mini-buses.  We collaborate with more than 500 clients. Among our satisfied clients are wholesalers, consolidators, tour operators, airlines and travel agencies.

Name: EXPAIRTOURS
HQ Location: Belgium, Brussels Capital, Bruxelles/brussel, 58-60 Rue De La Montagne/bergstraat, 1000
Company description: Expair Tours : le voyage autrement! Le but de voyage n’est pas seulement la destination mais aussi le chemin qui y mène. Expair Tours est un tour opérateur spécialiste actif sur le marché belge depuis le 1er juillet 2003, date de sa création. Expair Tours compte une équipe de 10 collaborateurs principalement composée des spécialistes attitrés sur onze destinations : la Croatie, la Slovénie, le Monténégro, la Grèce, le Portugal, l’Italie, l’Espagne, la Russie, Malte, la Tunisie, le Maroc et les croisières Expair. Les produits sont choisis suivant des critères de sélection stricts dictés par une solide connaissance des destinations. C’est pour ces raisons que les spécialistes d’Expair Tours s’efforceront de faire du voyage de chacun de ses clients, un authentique voyage sur mesure répondant parfaitement à leurs attentes, allant des séjours balnéaires aux itinéraires élaborés sur mesure.

Name: Colors World Srl
Company description: Creata da Renato Scaffidi nel 1991, opera nel settore tour operating sino all'anno 1999 quando viene assorbita nel gruppo Teorema Tour.   Inizia la propria trasformazione da tour operator a rete di agenzie viaggio con una forte propensione al Franchise Network.  L’affliazione a Colors Word consente di instaurare una relazione con un marchio in forte espansione, che possiede un know how aziendale affermato e motivato in sede e può contare su una rete di 60 agenzie di proprietà presenti e ben radicate nel territorio.  L’ esperienza maturata, ha insegnato a Colors World che solo attraverso un alto livello professionale è possibile essere vincenti. La partnership con i più importanti Tour Operators a livello nazionale garantisce un’ampia offerta del prodotto turistico ed una ottimizzazione dei margini aziendali. L'azienda raggiunge le 70 unità nel 2006, l'anno seguente viene ceduta da Teorema Spa a Bluinvest (la società cui fanno capo Investitori associati Sgr, Bluvacanze e Cisalpina Tours); l’insegna è sparita da tutte o quasi le agenzie, e sostituita da quelle di Bluvacanze o Vivere & Viaggiare by Cisalpina Tours.

Name: Effeweg.nl
Company description: Effeweg.nl is a specialist in touring car holidays throughout whole Europe. Established in 2002, we are now the leading tour operator in our core markets.  Effeweg.nl is a direct seller to a broad focus group. As we conduct and arrange everything in-house, from buying, selling to marketing and accounting, we can battle with low prices. A competitive price-quality ratio is what our company is known for and has given a solid position in the Dutch Travel industry.

Name: Go InStyle Travel
Company description: Välkommen till en ny spännande researrangör! Vi som startat Go InStyle har ”alltid” jobbat med resor  och har tillsammans en enorm kunskap och erfarenhet. Vi har förmågan att förstå dig som kund och hitta det där lilla extra som du söker för dina resor. Genom ypperlig personlig service och all vår erfarenhet och våra kontakter, ska vi erbjuda dig de bästa resmålen, det bästa boendet och de unika reseupplevelserna. Vad betyder då ”Go InStyle”?   Det betyder förstås hög kvalitet, ofta lyx, men inte bara lyx, utan även unika, mindre hotell som du inte hittar så lätt och som erbjuder något utöver det vanliga. Vi har valt att fokusera på TOP 5 på varje resmål, vi vill ge dig ett litet vasst urval där vi vet att du kan hitta det du söker. Även spännande kombinationer, t ex fler öar i Karibien, kryssning och öar och helt skräddarsydda varianter precis som du vill ha dom. Vi kommer från början att fokusera på öar, huvudsakligen i Västindien och Indiska Oceanen, samt kryssningar med fokus på ett mer exklusivt och smalare urval. Utbudet kommer efterhand att växa och omfatta fler destinationer, storstäder samt aktiviteter, t. ex. Ski InStyle och Golf InStyle. Förutom boende kan du givetvis boka flyg, service, transfers, hyrbil, upplevelser, utflykter etc. hos oss.

Name: Douro Criativo
HQ Location: Portugal, Vila Real, Vila Real, Rua De Santo António Entrada D Sala 4bs, 5000-607
Company description: A Douro Criativo é uma agência de viagens licenciada pelo Turismo de Portugal com o RNAVT 7667. Somos uma empresa Jovem e Dinâmica que além de comercializar online pacotes turísticos do Douro, também cria e promove conteúdos digitais/multimédia de forma a chegarmos a todo o mundo. A Douro Criativo conta com uma equipa de profissionais com larga experiência na organização de viagens que, aliada a uma rigorosa seleção dos seus parceiros, garante qualidade na prestação dos vários serviços. OS NOSSOS CLIENTES SÃO A NOSSA DEDICAÇÃO! - Atendemos cada cliente de forma exclusiva - Identificamos as necessidades e desejos do cliente - Garantimos a sua satisfação

Name: RTS Media Reisen GmbH
Company description: Gemeinsam mit unseren Partnerbüros, dem City Reisebüro Dortmund und dem Globus Reisebüro Schwerte, bringen die Reiseexperten der RTS Media Reisen GmbH (RTS) dich zu den schönsten Stränden, den aufregendsten Metropolen und faszinierendsten Landschaften dieser Welt. Das Besondere an uns: RTS vereint den stationären Vertrieb über das gleichnamige Reiseportal mit der persönlichen Reiseberatung in unserem Reisebüro in der Dortmunder Innenstadt.

Name: Navigator Travel Agency
Company description: Navigator is a Romanian Travel Agency, founded in 2011, with the goal to differentiate through great customer experience. The core values that stand at the very foundation of Navigator are the ones that form the main component of every partnership that we conclude: customer focus, transparency, flexibility, proactivity, vision and reliability.  Through complete transparency, Navigator can impact a company's total travel investment, maximizing its return while reducing the overall administrative costs. After concluding a partnership, we begin by identifying and evaluating our client's business priorities so that we can further develop a complete strategy for optimizing the business travel budget.  In just a few words, we help our clients travel smart and achieve more.  We understand the needs of business travelers because we are business travelers ourselves. From planning  the trip, to checking in for the flight or for upgrading the hotel room, Navigator's travel consultants are there every step of the way to make our clients trips successful.

Name: Balea Travel
Company description: Trabajamos para brindarte una experiencia. Conoce un lugar, disfrútalo, vívelo.  Desde 2013 buscamos ofrecer una vivencia turística completa donde puedas llevarte ese lugar de vuelta a casa. Balea es una agencia de viajes que aúna el trato personal y cercano, ofreciendo servicios de calidad enfocados a experiencias en Granada capital y provincia. Y trabajamos para que esas experiencias sean de todo tipo: turísticas, culturales, gastronómicas o vivencias excepcionales que uno solo puede descubrir cuando viaja. Nuestros valores son sencillos: diversión pasión, compromiso, curiosidad, colaboración, cercanía y confianza.

Name: Alltours Reisecenter Essen
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Essen, 83 Berliner Straße, 45145
Company description: Bereits seit Dezember 2005 sind wir in unserem Reisebüro in Essen Frohnhausen Ihr Ansprechpartner für einen unvergesslichen Urlaub - von der klassischen Badereise über individuelle Rundreisen bis hin zum Städtetrip bieten wir Ihnen die komplette Palette des Reisens. Dabei vertrauen wir ausschließlich renommierten Reiseveranstaltern, wie alltours, DER Touristik, Schauinsland-Reisen und vielen mehr! Mit viel Leidenschaft, Engagement und bestem Service helfen wir Ihnen bei der Erfüllung Ihrer ganz persönlichen Urlaubsträume.

Name: US Flights24
Company description: We are travel agency specialized in flight business from Germany to the United States of America and vice versa.  Our portfolio also includes cruises and packages deals for all over. The most important thing is, that our customers are 100% satisfied with our service. We like it to keep it as simple as possible!

Name: GDSM Global Distribution Sales & Marketing -HERTZ GSA En España
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 87 Avenida De La Victoria, 28023
Company description: Fundada por Manlio Olivero, Presidente y CEO, Global distribución Sales & Marketing (GDSM) es el representante B2B exclusivo de Hertz en Italia y España para los sectores vacacional y business travel; en este último caso cubre las necesidades del alquiler de vehículo con las PYMES, siempre a través de una Agencia de viajes. Los socios de Global Distribution son los organizadores y distribuidores de paquetes turísticos, que encuentran en Hertz el líder de Alquiler de vehículos en el mundo, fortalecido con la adquisición de Dollar y Thrifty. A finales de 2014, Global ha puesto en marcha Vacanzeincamper.com, el bróker de alquiler de Auto Caravanas en el mundo. La empresa también representa Air Madagascar y Air Calin. GDSM es también miembro de la asociación Visit Usa Italy y Visit Usa Spain y asociados a FTO – Federviaggio (Confcommercio).

Name: 88 Lifestyle
Company description: 88 Lifestyle is an IATA-accredited luxury travel agency that has become a global concept in fully facilitating travel organizations for nearly a decade. Our mission is to make all your travel dreams come true, with unparalleled attention to detail where your personal wishes and needs always come first. Together with our team of professionals, we combine extensive knowledge with valuable industry connections. This enables us not only to find the most idyllic destinations but also to offer you exclusive benefits at leading hotels. Our vision is to offer you more than a trip: a story that you can share and cherish. We provide expertise in the field of hotels, villas, and yachts, and are also one of the few travel agencies with our own private jet brokerage. This reflects our deep connection with aviation. Travel should be about convenience and enjoyment, and that is exactly what we deliver. Let us take the reins in organizing your trip. At 88 Lifestyle, we create a home away from home. More information: booking@88lifestyle.global Whatsapp +31 6 20066566 www.88lifestyle.global

Name: Manzelka Africka
Company description: We are a safari travel agency with one aim – we want to enable you to experience life, nature and Africa at their fullest. There is no better place to start than our beloved Botswana and its neighbouring country, mysterious Zambia. Our experienced travel agents meet the industry’s highest standards and are ready to plan your itinerary to fulfil your specific wishes. Just contact us, let us make you a tailor made safari offer and let the adventure of your lifetime begin.

Name: Amber Voyage Limited
Company description: Leading taxi to coach company based in Paphos. Operating a big fleet from 4-Seats to 53-Seats vehicle, serving thousands of happy customers each year and many reliable Tour Operators.

Name: Moneydirect
Company description: Moneydirect, an Amadeus and Sabre joint venture, is the leading provider of multi-channel payment solutions for the global travel industry. The flexible solution enables customers to streamline payment and collection processes, delivering significant advantages in terms of efficiency, customer service, increased productivity and improved cash flows. Moneydirect is easy to use, secure and reliable and can be deployed irrespective of booking channel, direction of funds, type or timing of payment or currency.  Moneydirect solutions (Moneydirect Supplier Payments, Easy Collect, Central Settlement, Traveler Payments, Direct Billing (bill-back), Commissions) are available to travel agencies, tour operators, consolidators, cruise lines, car rental companies, hotels, ferry operators, rail companies, corporate travel departments (travel management companies), travel insurance providers and airlines.  More than 8,000 customers currently trust Moneydirect to securely manage more than $2 billion annually in global travel payments on its best in class processing platform.

Name: World Travel Agents Associations Alliance
Company description: The World Travel Agents Association Alliance (“WTAAA”) is the single global voice facilitating the exchange of ideas and information to the global agency community. WTAAA interacts with supplier partners; airlines, GDS companies, government agencies representing and lobbying on issues on its members behalf. It also mediates with IATA on the global council representing 11 global markets associations with a presence in 56 countries which constitute more than 70% of global airline sales made through the travel agency channel.

Travel2C enjoys an excellent reputation in outstanding (personalised) service and flexibility in combination with high quality products for reasonable rates. Name: Campfirebg
Company description: Campfirebg is a tour agency specialized in adventure and culture trips in Bulgaria and the Balkans.  Bulgaria and the Balkans are the best-kept secrets of Europe. They are a destination for the people with a taste for exploration, with a passion for history, with a taste for wine and gourmet, and curious about wildlife watching and ethno rituals. We always pursue a way to bring people closer to nature, and we help them discover the wild and untamed beauty of the mountains, caves, rivers, and villages of Bulgaria. The trips we make are more than perfectly crafted and executed, they are „energizing experiences“. We work with a versatile network of tour guides, coaches and storytellers, who help us make #holidays to remember.   We have over 10 years of experience in: •	High-altitude trekking &expeditions  •	Adventure tours – guided trekking in Bulgaria’s beautiful mountains- Rila, Pirin and Rhodope, cycling, kayaking, yachting  •	Cultural trips with wine tasting, visits of monasteries, ethno-tourism, folk festivals •	Multi-tourism features such as – birdwatching, yoga retreats, botanic tours *** We are now seeking partners to grow our network!  ** If you are tour operator and you want to offer a new, fun experiential destination in the beautiful Balkan peninsula contact us.  * We can make your plans happen.  Please discuss them with us. Campfirebg is licensed Bulgarian tour operator (license number

Name: Pelion Scout
Company description: Pelion Scout is a travel agency specializing in outdoor activities and adventure holidays all around the Pelion peninsula, in Greece. Created with love by a local, Pelion Scout’s aim is to share the beauties and secrets of Pelion, often called “the Magic Mountain”, with travelers searching for responsible recreational tourism. We offer unique ecotourism experiences in Pelion’s breathtaking natural scenery, through an array of activities and things-to-do for all kinds of ages, moods and physical conditions. Whether you are looking for a family-friendly activity or you are into some serious action, our tours and tailor-made trips are suitable for everyone.

Name: Visitslovenia.pl
Company description: 🏆  We are the largest source of information about Slovenia in Poland!  Visitslovenia.pl is a project of the Green House Marketing Agency, which specializes in territorial marketing (the marketing of places). 🌐  We serve travel agencies from all over the world that organize the stay of groups in Slovenia on a DMC basis. We also help individual clients. We work with the Slovenian Tourism Organization FeelSlovenia and several dozen partners of the Slovenian tourism industry (hotels, attractions, transfers, regions, MICE). 🗺   For over a decade, we have been planning and organizing stays for travel agencies not only from Poland but also from Europe. We organize trips to Slovenia, and we also reserve accommodation for companies and individual clients. Our goal is to promote Slovenia as a place that needs to be added to the travel list. We want Slovenia to be appreciated by tourists from all over the world, just as we became fascinated with it many years ago and it is still our favorite place on earth. ✅  The development of the visitslovenia.pl website took almost two years. The site is steadily growing in popularity among Polish-speaking Internet users, both within the country as well as abroad. This is surely because of the attractiveness and accessibility of the information on the website, selected especially for tourists who want to discover Slovenia.  🇸🇮 With visitslovenia.pl one can learn about the Slovenian sights, the country’s accommodation base as well as its featured attractions. Each visitor of our website will find a lot of practical information concerning travelling in Slovenia, which will help them get around the country. The possibility to plan your own trip is a unique free feature of the service. If you have any questions - contact us!  💻  www.visitslovenia.pl/ 📧  info@visitslovenia.pl Our social media 📱 Facebook - www.facebook.com/visitslovenia/ Instagram - www.instagram.com/visitslovenia/ Twitter - https://twitter.com/visitsloveniapl

Name: Adrian Matkat
Company description: Adrian Matkat is a privately owned travel agency and tour operator specialised in tailor-made trips to Europe. We offer tailored trips with guaranteed departure starting from one passenger. Welcome individuals, families, groups of friends, colleagues, school groups, hobbyists! Adrian Matkat’s highly customised trips offer round trips, culture tours, luxury cruising, luxury  beach holidays, opera and music tours, wellness, study trips, hobby tours, Christmas trips. Our main destinations are: Croatia, Germany, Italy, Slovenia, Austria and France. We offer also luxury holidays in Croatia with accommodation in villas with swimming pool, luxury cruising on private ship, sailboat or power yacht.  Adrian Matkat is proudly promoting slow tourism with its all values and that’s why we cooperate with local agents highlighting local services, food and local culture. We offer also incoming services to Finland and neighbouring countries.  We are a member of the Association of Finnish Travel Agencies.  Adrianin matka on yksilöllinen, suunniteltu vain Sinulle ja omalle seurueellesi. Sinulle suunniteltu matka toteutuu aina.

Name: Imagina Travel.es
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 13 Calle Marqués De Lema, 28003
Company description: At Imagina Travel we work "hand in hand" with Collectives and Companies providing our services to manage your trips, incentives and commercial activities inside and outside of Spain. We act as one more Department of the organization to which we provide our services, having common interests in the management of our services. We seek efficiency and economy in the management of the trip, making our work viable. We adapt to any need that our clients have, facing it as a challenge to beat. Among our clients we have Large Companies, SMEs, Associations and Sports Clubs nationwide. As well as international tour operators and travel agencies that we support in the Spanish and Portuguese markets. Our value is Experience and Personalized Service.

Name: Borsa Mediterranea Del Turismo
Company description: La BMT, Borsa Mediterranea del Turismo è organizzata da PROGECTA srl che ha sede a Napoli, in Via Vannella Gaetani 27.  L’evento si svolge presso il quartiere fieristico MOSTRA d’OLTREMARE, sito in Napoli, in viale Kennedy. La manifestazione fieristica, leader nel settore B to B, si rivolge all’intera rete agenziale italiana, registrando la presenza di oltre 22.000 visitatori professionali, ed ospita 500 espositori distribuiti su un’area espositiva di 20.000 mq e divisi in 2 principali aree:   BMT dedicata alle destinazioni OUTGOING;   BMTI dedicato alle destinazioni INCOMING. Anche quest’anno prevediamo un programma di FORMAZIONE dedicato ad agenti di viaggio ed albergatori, affrontando i temi più attuali direttamente con i protagonisti del mondo del turismo. Inoltre, come sempre, a fine lavori organizzeremo un evento nell’evento, con cena, musica e spettacolo, realizzando un vero e proprio “Get together PARTY” tra espositori e visitatori, festeggiando insieme i 22 anni della BMT. Durante la manifestazione si svolgerà un workshop, con il patrocinio dell’ENIT, al quale parteciperanno 100 tour operator stranieri specializzati sul prodotto Italia e 20 operatori specializzati sul segmento Terme & Benessere. Segnaliamo che per vivacizzare la fiera stiamo lanciando, in collaborazione con alcuni partners mirati, un invito riservato agli agenti di viaggio con un forte  sconto sui Frecciarossa, sui principali traghetti ed hotel gratis.

Name: Der Reise Riese Berlin GmbH
Company description: Als Reiseveranstalter/Reisebüro sind wir auf die Organisation von Kreuzfahrten und maritimen Erlebnissen auf den Meeren und Flüssen der Welt spezialisiert.  Seit 1993 bieten wir unseren Kunden maßgeschneiderte Reisen an, die ihren individuellen Wünschen und Bedürfnissen entsprechen. Zu unserem Angebot gehören zum Beispiel Flusskreuzfahrten auf der Donau, Rhein oder Mosel sowie Seereisen im Mittelmeer oder in Nordeuropa. Aber auch Gruppen-, Bus- und Kurreisen sind Teil unseres vielfältigen Reiseprogramms.  Unsere Leidenschaft sind die kleinen, deutschsprachigen Schiffe, die eine familiäre Atmosphäre und überschaubare Größe bieten. Diese Schiffe ermöglichen es, abseits der Massen die Flüsse und Meere zu erkunden und unvergessliche Erlebnisse zu sammeln.  Unser Team besteht aus erfahrenen Reiseexperten, die bei der Auswahl und Planung von Flussreisen und Hochseereisen gerne behilflich sind. Wir bieten eine breite Auswahl an Reiserouten und Schiffen, die den individuellen Bedürfnissen unserer Kunden gerecht werden. Egal ob man sich für eine entspannte Kreuzfahrt im Mittelmeer oder eine Flussreise durch die malerischen Landschaften Europas interessiert, wir haben das passende Angebot.  Unsere Schiffe sind komfortabel ausgestattet und bieten eine Vielzahl von Annehmlichkeiten wie Restaurants, Bars und Wellnessbereiche. Mit unserem umfangreichen Service sorgen wir dafür, dass unsere Kunden ihren Urlaub in vollen Zügen genießen können. Zudem bieten wir auch Ausflüge an, um das Reiseerlebnis unserer Kunden noch unvergesslicher zu machen. Unser Flussschiff ReiseRiese PRESTIGE bietet eine luxuriöse und exklusive Möglichkeit, Europa zu entdecken. Mit geräumigen Kabinen, einem erstklassigen Restaurant und einem Wellnessbereich an Bord können unsere Kunden den Komfort und die Entspannung während ihrer Reise voll auskosten. Unser eigenes Schiff ist auf Routen entlang der Donau, des Rheins, des Mains, der Mosel, der Saar sowie in den Niederlanden und Belgien unterwegs.

Name: Ultreya Tours Camino De Santiago SL
HQ Location: Spain, Galicia, Santiago De Compostela, 3 Plaza De La Quintana, 15704
Company description: Ultreya Tours is a Tour Operator specialized in organizing comprehensive and highly personalized walking tours for groups on the Camino de Santiago also known as the Way of Saint James. Founded and based in Santiago de Compostela, we know the region of Galicia and the secrets of the Camino by heart. The Camino de Santiago is not just our business it is our way of life and we would love nothing more than to introduce you to our vision of the Camino. We work with Travel Agencies, Clubs and non-for-profit Organizations worldwide as well as any type of pre-formed groups. Our only condition is that we require at least 6 participants for a tour to leave.  We carefully crafted a few tours and itineraries to inspire you but all our tours are fully customizable and we will guide you every step of the way from organizing the tour to finding your route to Santiago. We also provide three levels of comfort for every budget.

Name: Azzurra Viaggi - Yuppie Srl

After many years providing services in Russia, we, Azzurra Viaggi Tour Operator decided to internationalize our own professional experience in other markets. Zaseban segment poslovanja je upravljanje poslovanjem privatnih villa u regiji, koje promovira naša stranica „Unique Adriatic Villas“. Dio Traveller Made® zajednice.

Name: Baila Habana
Company description: With baila habana you can book online dance lessons with professional dance teachers. With us you can dance on terraces above the rooftops of Havana, or in one of the many beautiful saloons in historic houses. With each lesson you have a Cuban dance partner. Besides dance figures and rhythm theory you are also working on styling. The lessons are perfectly tailored to your previous knowledge and expectations. All your Cuban dance partners have a professional training and years of experience as dance teachers. All dance teachers and dance locations are personally checked baila habana is also a social project, with the task of supporting the Cuban people to build an independent life. Cubans can be self-employed since early 2011. However, they are lacking of resources and skills for their independence. Despite excellent training most dance teachers are working for tour operators or dance schools for a small salary and unfair conditions. At baila habana the fee for the dancing lessons goes to 90 % to the dance teachers The Agency reserves only an administrative charge of 10%.  We support the dancers also in their professional and personal development with language courses f.e..

Name: Europe Incoming Budapest
Company description: Europe Incoming Budapest is present in Hungary as a ground handler company for more than 10 years. Name: Travelncycle.com
Company description: Travelncycle.com established in 2012 providing guided trekking and Mountain Biking tours all over Greece. Our professional team offers top quality innovative bike tours from small to large groups and tailor made private services. We will bring your adventure holiday to life and we will share our passion and knowledge for Greece in ways beyond expected. Our aim is to develop and to create unique, fun loving, challenging bike tours and to discover together the beauties, the culture and the heritage of the land of Gods. The team’s limitless passion for cycling as well as their expertise in every field, guarantee unforgettable moments of true hospitality. We are committed to high quality services and we are willing to hear every need of our guests. Being a flexible, responsible and sustainable bike tour operator our philosophy is: “to treat our guests as friends and to offer them a lifetime experience as well as a lifelong friendship”. Through our rides we always seek the opportunity to develop personal connections and relationships with our guests and we are determined to make them feel part of our bike riding family wanting to come back again and again. Travelncycle.com is the leading bike tour company in Greece and we are happy to confirm that at any bike tour you choose

Name: Spazio 8
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Assago, Via Antonio Meucci, 20090
Company description: www.spazio8.it è un progetto intrapreso da Mario Malerba, fondatore del Network ITN, con altri titolari di AdV del Gruppo. Spazio 8 è un luogo di condivisione e collaborazione tra Agenzie di Viaggio per generare nuove opportunità di business: un sito interattivo in cui consultare le proposte disponibili o inserire le proprie offerte. Spazio 8 vuole essere uno spazio digitale in cui mettere in relazione piccoli Tour Operator specialisti  e Agenzie di Viaggio che abitualmente sviluppano prodotti turistici per i propri clienti con altre Agenzie di Viaggio interessate a commercializzarli in aggiunta o in alternativa a prodotti standard proposti dai tradizionali Tour Operator.  Spazio 8 vuole aiutare le Agenzie di Viaggio ad innovarsi e ad essere sempre più competitive in un campo che ha subìto e subirà cambiamenti radicali.  Proprio in virtù dei mutamenti intercorsi nel settore in un’epoca in cui la tecnologia è diventata predominante, e per offrire un prodotto davvero al passo con i tempi e variegato, Spazio 8 collabora a stretto contatto con altre realtà tra cui alcune giovani e molto valide.

Name: Hillman Travel

On the one hand, you will have the price-conscious traveler for whom packages are put together under the Hillman Brand. In this way we dierentiate ourselves from other tour operators by having more attention for personal needs and a higher level of service within these packages. On the other hand we have the more high-end traveler who is looking for a personalized holiday. Through our dynamic packaging we oer this traveler the possibility to discover the whole world with the necessary flexibility. This approach is necessary because the customer will become more demanding in and after 2021.
