Name: Ubadat Viajes
Company description: Ubadat Viajes somos una agencia con más de 15 años de experiencia en el sector llevando a nuestros viajeros a los rincones más insólitos. Especialistas en Lunas de Miel contamos con destinos como Thailandia, Nueva York, Caribe, Argentina, Safari por África, Islas Exóticas, Perú.. entre un amplio abanico de posibilidades. Además de todo tipo de estancias, escapadas, circuitos nacionales e internacionales, vuelos, billetes de tren y de bus, coches y traslados, parques temáticos y todo tipo de entradas, visitas o excursiones, viajes para mayores de 55 años, y todo tipo de grupos de estudiantes, asociaciones o incentivos, entre otros, contribuyendo de este modo a hacer más especial si cabe, el "Viaje de sus Sueños". Si algo caracteriza a esta agencia de viajes es en el nivel de calidad de los servicios que realizan y ofrecen. Prueba de ello es la reciente obtención del distintivo del Sistema Integral de Calidad Turística en Destinos SICTED, promovido por Turespaña. Esta certificación garantiza al cliente unos estándares de buenas prácticas que proporcionan un nivel de excelencia en el servicio. Esta distinción convierte a Ubadat Viajes en la única agencia de viajes de Úbeda y Baeza con el distintivo de calidad, una de las 4 únicas de la provincia de Jaén, y una de las tan sólo 24 agencias de viajes Sicted de toda Andalucía. Porque en Ubadat somos más que una agencia de viajes... Descubre la filosofía Ubadat! #UbadatViajes #TuViajeNuestroSueño_UV #YoViajoconUbadat #TuLunadeMielPerfecta_UV

Name: Querido Mundo - Lateinamerika Gruppenreisen
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Köln, 221 Niehler Straße
Company description: Du möchtest völlig sorgenfrei nach Lateinamerika reisen? Dann entdecke mit Querido Mundo, deinem deutschsprachigen Reiseveranstalter für Gruppenreisen, die bezauberndsten Länder Lateinamerikas. In kleinen Gruppen, d.h. mit maximal 14 Reisefreunden, meist zwischen 25-50 Jahren, erlebst Du auf Deiner dreiwöchigen, unkonventionellen Reise, die schönsten Orte dieses faszinierenden Kontinents. Unkonventionell ist Querido Mundo sehr wichtig und deswegen ist das Herz unserer Reise auch ein flexibles Programm, das schon etwas von Individualreisen hat. Nur mit dem Vorteil, dass Du Dich um nichts kümmern brauchst, denn Deine Reise ist bereits liebevoll für Dich entworfen. Und mit dem kleinen Unterschied, dass Du mit Reisefreunden, die ähnlich ticken wie Du, Deine unvergesslichen Reisemomente teilst - Sei es, wenn Du in das Leben der Einheimischen eintauchst oder Deine Seele in der Natur baumeln lässt. Deine Reise ist gespickt mit einer perfekten Mischung aus diversen Aktivitäten und unterschiedlichen Entspannungsphasen - aber Langeweile ist nie mit an Bord. Ganz im Gegenteil! Du erlebst Dein Reiseland mit seinen Highlights auf eine sehr authentische Art ohne in der Masse von Touristen mit zu schwimmen. Immer mit einem offenen Ohr an Deiner Seite: Dein authentischer Querido Guide. Für Außenstehende wirkt er eher wie ein Teil der Gruppe, und nicht wie ein „typischer“ Reiseleiter. Denn er ist genauso begeistert von Deinem Reiseland wie Du und lässt Dich mit ehrlichen Tipps und einer top Organisation tiefer in das Land eintauchen. Und das wichtigste: Er hat das Herz am rechten Fleck. Wäre so eine Reise mit einer zuverlässigen Betreuung vor, während und nach Deiner Reise was für Dich? Ja? Na dann geh hier auf Entdeckungstour:  https://www.queridomundo.de

Name: Dutch Tourism
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Koog Aan De Zaan, 3 Lagendijk, 1541
Company description: Dutch Tourism is dé autoriteit op het gebied van arrangementenontwikkeling voor de toeristen in Nederland. Wij creëren binnenlandse toeristische arrangementen, leren ondernemers om via arrangementenontwikkeling meer toeristen aan te trekken en helpen organisaties om plannen om te zetten naar uitvoering. Vanuit ons kantoor nabij de Zaanse Schans - één van de toeristische trekpleisters in Nederland - werken wij aan nieuwe arrangementen voor onder andere lokale overheden, marketingorganisaties, ondernemers in de sector en buitenlandse tour operators. Met onze werkervaring van meer dan 25 jaar, zijn onze collega’s een aanspreekpunt voor de diverse vraagstukken die er spelen op het gebied van toerisme in Nederland. Naast dat wij organisaties en ondernemers verder helpen bij de productontwikkeling die erop gericht is om de toeristen te vermaken in een specifieke regio, zorgen wij ook voor de borging hiervan.  Waar normaal veel initiatieven stranden bij een plan, zorgen wij dat de ontwikkelde toeristische arrangementen ook tot uitvoering worden gebracht en blijven bestaan en worden doorontwikkeld. Hoe wij dit doen? Neem contact met ons op om meer informatie te ontvangen.

Name: Ryce Travel
Company description: Ryce Travel is an inspiring social entreprise promoting adventurous travels to unknown destinations. Who Are We? Peter Hofman, director of Ryce Travel, created a platform in 2007 for adventurists tired of soaking up culture in Magaluf, strolling La Rambla or getting a teint in Cyprus. The world is full of amazing places but we are destined by large tour operators. Sequacious, because mass tourism means affordable prices. Meanwhile all touristic destinations are likewise and it’s difficult to experience local cultures. The local population doesn’t always share in the enormous revenues. Many hotels are owned by large (Western) European multinationals. In fact, they are in charge of the touristic destinations. Cash flows directly from the Western tourists to the Western investors. Ryce Travel wants to break this spell. If you travel with Ryce Travel you’re not going on vacation but you’re definitely travelling. You’ll experience local cultures, you’ll see amazing and undiscovered places and your expenses will stimulate local economies. I have tried to catch this in one sentence: “The world is ours but we also belong to the world. If you don’t understand the world, you don’t know who you are”. Support developing countries Ryce supports local projects in developing countries Working with locals Ryce works with local guides, drivers and guesthouses as much as possible Not ordinary Our tours are adventurous and the destinations are not easy to point on a map. For who? The trips are for any fit and adventurous traveler who likes to explore and experience local cultures.

Name: Impronte Wilderness Safari
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Lido, 22 Via Giovanni Cimabue, 55041
Company description: Dal 1999 il Tour Operator Impronte Wilderness Safari si impegna per proporre un turismo diverso, rinunciando all’abusata formula "pacchetto" rivolta alla massa chiassosa che invade i luoghi che attraversa, e indica nuove modalità più intime e rispettose che portano i viaggiatori ad ascoltare il racconto degli abitanti di terre lontane. Impronte Wilderness Safari si impegna affinché anche i suoi viaggiatori mettano nello zaino la volontà di condivisione, il rispetto dell'ambiente, delle culture locali e la volontà di costruire di un rapporto autentico con gli altri. Impronte Wilderness Safari propone viaggi avventurosi per cuore e gambe, ma qualunque sia la meta la priorità è viaggiare in sicurezza e per questo scegliamo solo mezzi e guide fornite dai nostri corrispondenti locali, con cui collaboriamo ormai da molto tempo. Impronte Wilderness Safari è specialista per Safari in Africa, India e le terre selvagge delle Americhe.

Name: Brickscape
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Florence, 5 Via Del Campuccio, 50125
Company description: Il primo ed unico motore di ricerca di Turismo Esperienziale in Europa. Una nuova strada per raggiungere i tuoi clienti e viaggiare con le emozioni! Sempre più utenti cercano esperienze di viaggio da acquistare on line ma pochi riescono a trovarle. Immagina quanto sarebbe più semplice proporre i tuoi prodotti turistici esperienziali in un motore di ricerca simile a quello utilizzato per voli e hotel. #BrickScape la finestra nazionale sul turismo esperienziale Lavoriamo a fianco di agenzie di viaggi, tour operator, market- place per proporre un'offerta a tutto tondo del prodotto esperienziale italiano e facilitarne la ricerca al viaggiatore. Nel motore di ricerca BrickScape catalizziamo le offerte provenienti dai siti degli operatori turistici, mostrando prezzi e disponibilità presenti al momento sul sito della struttura, per una data ricerca. Reindirizziamo alla pagina di prenotazione dell'operatore, con già le date e i criteri scelti dall'utente. In questo modo l'utente, in un paio di click procede alla prenotazione. Non applichiamo nessuna maggiorazione sul prezzo dell'esperienza stabilito dall'operatore a cui lasciamo la libertà di scegliere quali e quante esperienze inserire nel motore. Il motore raccoglie esperienze provenienti dal mondo dello sport, del benessere, dell'enogastronomia, della cultura, della natura e..  BrickScape aggiorna costantemente le informazioni delle esperienze presenti, grazie al suo innovativo algoritmo di gestione canali.

Name: Beers & Travels
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes especializada en descubrir, disfrutar y difundir el placer de la  cerveza. En nuestra sección de Viajes encontrarás rutas exclusivas a los grandes paraísos cerveceros: acompáñanos a desentrañar los secretos mejor guardados de las abadías belgas, descubre en Irlanda porqué sus acogedores pubs se han extendido por todo el planeta, sigue los pasos de la elaboración de las más antiguas cervezas checas o comparte la explosión de alegría que inunda Munich durante el Oktoberfest.

Name: Keliautoju Klubas
Company description: Kelionių agentūra “Keliautojų klubas” - nuo 1994 metų sėkmingai organizuoja poilsines, pažintines ir verslo keliones po visą pasaulį. Mūsų moto - “išskirtinis dėmesys klientui” – įpareigoja mus operatyviai, profesionaliai ir kūrybingai įgyvendinti pačius netikėčiausius keliautojo norus ar pageidavimus. Jaunas, energingas, sparčiai tobulėjantis kolektyvas padarys viską, kad Jūsų atostogos būtų sklandžios ir patogios. Bendradarbiaudami su didžiausiais kelionių organizatoriais galime pasiūlyti įdomių ir įvairių kelionių, garantuoti aukštą paslaugų kokybę, geras kainas, patrauklią nuolaidų sistemą. Jei norėsite keliaudami pažinti kitus kraštus ar tiesiog atsipalaiduoti ir pailsėti, visada galite kreiptis į „Keliautojų klubą". Mūsų siūlomos pažintinės kelionės po Austriją, Italiją, Šveicariją, Vokietiją, Graikiją, Ispaniją, Čekiją, Vengriją ir kitus kraštus Jums atvers duris į kultūros, meno, muzikos ir architektūros lobyną, kurį žmonija kaupė tūkstantmečiais. Jei ieškote aktyvaus kalnų poilsio - Alpės, Dolomitinės Alpės, Tatrai ir t.t. svetingai pasitiks Jus savo snieguotomis viršukalnėmis. 0 jei norite paprasčiausiai pamiršti visus darbus ir rūpesčius, galėsime Jums pasiūlyti poilsinę kelionę prie ežero, jūros ar vandenyno kranto. Saulė, vanduo ... ir jokių rūpesčių, nes juos atiduosite mums! Ras iš ko pasirinkti ir egzotikos mėgėjai. Visada patarsime keliaujančiam, ką pasiimti į kelionę, kaip jai pasiruošti.

Name: WeDesignTrips
Company description: WeDesignTrips ist ein innovativer Reiseveranstalter, der sich auf die individuelle Planung von Reisen spezialisiert hat, unterstützt von einem Netzwerk aus über 100 lokalen Experten weltweit. Die Mission des Unternehmens ist es, nachhaltige und authentische Reiseerlebnisse zu schaffen, die sowohl den Reisenden als auch den lokalen Gemeinschaften zugutekommen. Durch einen einfachen vierstufigen Prozess ermöglicht WeDesignTrips seinen Kunden, ihre Traumreise unkompliziert zu gestalten, indem sie direkt mit erfahrenen Reiseprofis aus dem gewünschten Zielland kommunizieren. Das Unternehmen legt großen Wert auf Transparenz, Sicherheit und die Förderung des nachhaltigen Tourismus, indem es mit zertifizierten Partnern zusammenarbeitet, die höchste ökologische und soziale Standards einhalten. Die Zielgruppe umfasst abenteuerlustige Reisende, die maßgeschneiderte Erlebnisse suchen und gleichzeitig die lokale Wirtschaft unterstützen möchten.

Name: Basque Destination Creating Memories
Company description: Basque Destination is your Incoming Travel Agency in the Basque Country.  Euskadi-Basque Country is a big little country that offers so many experiences that the help of Basque Destination will be essential to squeeze the most of your trip.  We’ll help you to configure your experience no matters who you travel with, alone, couple, family or friends. Striking the balance between the urban and the natural, the gastronomic variety, tradition and modernity, art and culture of Euskadi, is an artisan work in which Basque Destination specializes. ********************************************************* Basque Destination es tu agencias de viajes en Euskadi. Euskadi es un pequeño gran país, que ofrece tal cantidad de experiencias, que la ayuda de Basque Destination para exprimir al máximo tu viaje te será imprescindible.  Si viajas solo, en pareja, en familia o con amigos, te ayudaremos a configurar a tu medida la experiencia. Conseguir el equilibrio entre lo urbano y lo natural, la gran variedad gastronómica, lo tradicional y la modernidad, el arte y la cultura de Euskadi, es un trabajo de artesano en el que Basque Destination es especialista. ************************************************************************************** Le Pays Basque est un grand-petit pays qui t’offre une telle quantité et variété d’expériences que l’aide de Basque Destination pour en extraire le maximum seras indispensable. Si tu voyages seul(e), en couple, en famille ou avec des ami(e)s, nous t’aidons à organiser une expérience de voyage sur-mesure. Atteindre l’équilibre parfait  d’un projet entre la zone urbaine et milieu rural, l’ample variété gastronomique, la tradition et le modernisme, l’art et la culture du Pays Basque, est une tâche artisanale  ardue pour laquelle Basque Destination est ton expert.

Name: Promajna Tours

PROMAJNA TOURS is a place where you can find an apartment, villa with swimming pool, a room, a hotel, Robinson house or a holiday house. Promajna Tours also offers apartments with special requirements, such as bringing pets on vacation too, access for disabled persons, sea view apartments, apartments with children’s playground and, etc. Promajna apartments consist of high-quality apartments, each with air conditioning, balcony or terrace, wi-fi internet access and, etc. Promajna Tours in the price of their apartments includes the tax price. Some of our accommodations have the option of using the grill, but all the apartments have their own parking lot. All of the properties on this site have been personally inspected and chosen because they meet our high standard of quality. We write our own personal descriptions and take our own photos whenever possible. As a result, each listing is an accurate representation of what the customer will experience upon arrival. Our Makarska villas with swimming pools and Makarska apartments offer guests some of the most perfect spots to unwind and spend some holiday time with loved ones. If taking a dip in the Adriatic Sea is more your style, then our seaside villas with swimming pool in Makarska may be just right for you. If you want to relax, take a romantic break surrounded by stunning scenery or enjoy the sun in a most secluded beach, take a look at our private apartments offer along the Makarska Riviera. Select your favorite zone, display the apartments with the description, take a look at the photos of various facilities, and you can contact us directly! Promajna Tours is here to help you find any type of private accommodation that will suit your needs and desires. We can not wait for You to enjoy the stunning scenery, fascinating cultural heritage and spectacular coastline.

Name: TravelBeats
Company description: Folk sine reisevaner har endret seg enormt mye bare de siste 10 årene. Vi har gått fra charterturer med kollektiv busshenting på flyplassen og velkomstmøter med informasjon om å ikke drikke vannet fra springen, til å i dag dra på opplevelsesturer, og gjerne da så tett på landet man besøker som mulig.  Til tross for at folks reisevaner nærmest har endret seg til det ugjenkjennelige, har reiselivsbransjen stått i ro. Det ønsker vi i TravelBeats å gjøre noe med. Vi ønsker å gå foran for en endring vi ikke bare mener er viktig, men også faktisk helt nødvendig – både for planeten og befolkningen vår.  I 2018 startet endringene, og det tradisjonelle reisebyrået Asiaspesialisten gjennomgikk en totalforandring, og kom ut igjen i 2019 som reise- og inspirasjonsportalen TravelBeats. Med nytt navn, flere ansatte og en stor nysgjerrighet ønsker vi å utfordre dagens reiselivsbransje ved å snu fokuset fra dagens priskrig, til det å ta den reisegleden, nysgjerrigheten og individualiteten vi ser hos dagens reisende inn i reiselivsbransjen.  TravelBeats er derfor ikke bare et reisebyrå, men en reise- og inspirasjonsplatform for reisebloggere, reiseplanleggere og reiseelskere. Vi ønsker å være det naturlige valget når du skal finne inspirasjon til din neste reise, når du skal booke din neste reise, eller når du skal finne informasjon om et nytt sted. Vår kombinasjon av uredde og nytenkende reisebloggere, sammen med våre erfarne og trygge reiseplanleggere, gir deg muligheten til å virkelig kunne samle på unike minner og opplevelser fra andre land og kulturer.

Name: Sociedad Histórica De Viajes Y Expediciones

En HISTÓRICA diseñamos viajes exclusivos adaptados a las temáticas culturales que mejor se adaptan al perfil de cada cliente. Viajar con HISTÓRICA es volver al pasado y seguir los pasos de insignes aventureros y pioneros de la exploración, una aventura forjada a su medida.  Desarrollamos los argumentos más espectaculares en aquellos destinos cuya historia conocemos, donde somos capaces de satisfacer las altas expectativas de nuestros clientes, y a través de una red de profesionales está altamente cualificada, pertenecientes al mundo del turismo pero también a otros segmentos atípicos en nuestro sector: académicos, científicos, escritores... Nuestros paquetes de viaje Hospitality, a cualquier evento del mundo, satisfacen las preferencias y requisitos que las empresas solicitan para viajar con nosotros. Nuestro objetivo final es que nuestros viajeros cumplan el sueño de vivir in situ un acontecimiento único cómo puede ser una final de Grand Slam o un partido de la Premier League.  Sus prioridades son las nuestras. ¡Descúbrelo!

Name: Viajes Arpa
HQ Location: Spain, Valencia, Valencia, 9 1º 2ª C/ San Francisco De Borja, 46007
Company description: Para responder a las enormes exigencias que cada día nos plantean nuestros clientes es necesario contar con un equipo humano excepcional, ya que son las personas, con sus conocimientos, su voluntad y su empuje las que marcan la diferencia. Los responsables, Francisco Montijano y Rafael Giménez, son  personas con más de 30 años en el sector. Su vida laboral es muy extensa y han ido progresando a lo largo de su vida profesional en distintas empresas del sector,  reconocidos  en el gremio turístico cómo  pioneros y expertos empleados de las agencias y especialmente los  creadores de viajes profesionales a ferias, ambos en su etapa anterior en Hippo Viajes, agencia valenciana que marco en España un estilo propio, innovador y exitoso durante más de una década,  en el periodo desde 1990 hasta 2004. Nuestra experiencia, profesionalidad y dedicación han hecho, que existan actualmente desarrollos de facilidades en materia de viajes de negocios que no se habían cubierto en nuestro país. Fuímos  impulsores de los vuelos chárter en el campo sectorial, viajes agrupados para grandes colectivos y asistencias profesionales,  ayudaron y extendieron las tendencias, hábitos y  formas de viajar desconocidas hasta entonces, que marcaron una época y desarrollaron un cambio moderno, estructural y  organizado para que el cliente se beneficiara con toda comodidad del servicio de la agencia de viajes en beneficio de su propio negocio.

Name: REVVA - BI + Revenue Management Platform
Company description: Because business decisions should not be based on hunches….    As much as carriers and hotels, tour operators, DMCs and other travel-related businesses need to sell all available products and services on any given date, at the best possible rate, being the obvious objective to reach higher revenue with lower costs.   Our platform's conceptual foundation lies on BI and Revenue/Yield Management, a technique as of today not widely implemented in our target client companies’ decision processing. REVVA aims to democratize an increasingly indispensable set of tools for mid-small sized operators and hotels, in order to optimize financial & operational performance in all market conditions.

Name: Maliciosa Tour
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes en la que lo más importante para nosotros es TU EXPERIENCIA. En Maliciosa Tour nuestro fin es que al viajar nunca te sientas solo, jamás nos despreocupamos, ya que lo más importante para nosotros son las personas y sobretodo las historias y vivencias que nos cuentan cuando regresan.  ¡Viajar es recordar y con nosotros te llevarás el mejor de los recuerdos! Ésta es la filosofía de Maliciosa Tour, un turoperador diferente para ese turismo diferente que todos buscamos, original y personalizado. En Maliciosa Tour queremos ayudar a nuestros clientes a vivir experiencias únicas, disfrutar al máximo de sus vacaciones y conseguir un momento especial con sus seres queridos, conocer gente estupenda y conocer lo mejor de cada lugar.  Enamorados de la idea de viajar y atesorar experiencias, en Maliciosa Tour decidimos fusionar las nuevas tecnologías con un servicio de asesoramiento original personalizado, por lo que podemos ofrecerte experiencias de viaje como nadie más. Con nosotros harás de tu viaje una experiencia inolvidable, sobre todo porque TÚ MISMO podrás elegir cada detalle de una aventura que nosotros organizamos para ti pero en la que TÚ eres el gran PROTAGONISTA. ¿POR QUÉ RESERVAR CON NOSOTROS?     • Elegimos personalmente a los proveedores de cada servicio que contratas para que no tengas que                                                                  preocuparte de nada. Nos hacemos responsables de que obtengas la mejor calidad a un precio interesante     • Las reservas se hacen de forma rápida y segura. Aceptamos cualquier forma de pago.      • Nuestro sitio web se adapta a cualquier dispositivo. Atención telefónica y por e-mail.     • MEJOR PRECIO GARANTIZADO.       Pero lo más importante es que en Maliciosa Tour queremos que disfrutes a fondo de tu experiencia, que        cuando recuerdes tu viaje siempre vuelva una sonrisa a tu rostro. ¿Cómo lo conseguiremos?            • Ofreciéndote siempre LOS VIAJES MÁS ORIGINALES Y DIVERTIDOS, en los cuales no habrá ningún        resquicio al aburrimiento porque siempre tendrás cosas interesantes que hacer y que ver.     • Te damos IDEAS NUEVAS que nadie aporta en el mercado y con un enfoque dinámico, para que saques el        máximo jugo de cada minuto de tu viaje: disfrutarás y aprenderás cosas en cada vuelta del camino.     • Conocemos las zonas a las que irás y SEGUIREMOS TU VIAJE a distancia para aconsejarte cosas y         asegurarnos de que todo marcha bien. Con nosotros sólo te llevarás sorpresas positivas. De lo que se trata al fin, como dijo un poeta anónimo, es de la experiencia que vas a vivir: “No viajamos para escapar de la vida, viajamos para que la vida no se nos escape”.

Name: MaaR Travel
Company description: Maar travel, we are a travel agency specialized in trips to Europe, we operate with clients from Latin America, Europe and Asia. We rely on the more than 20 years of experience of our Spanish tour operator Intravel to take that leap in quality that differentiates us from other options on the market. We offer you the trips dreamed of and made by some adventurers. If you like any of them, we will quote them to suit you and without obligation. Still, in case you have another dream, idea, tell us about it, and we will help you make it come true. At MaaR Travel we firmly believe that personalization and specialization is the key to establishing a relationship of trust with our clients. For us, each client is unique, and the design and development of each service will be an exclusive travel experience. Our travel offer is carefully designed to suit the client's desire. MaaR Travel We are a different alternative With our work and dedication, we ensure that our clients have us as the first option when planning their trips. Our focus on excellence has allowed us to provide tourist services to large companies and families, who see in us a partner that will meet their requirements and make them reach the right destination. The Keys to Our Success: Personalization Specialization Trust Culture of excellence Quality The best prices We differentiate ourselves thanks to the excellence of our products, our competitive prices and the professionalism of our staff. To achieve this, we place an emphasis on quality of service, with competitive prices and real offers. For this reason and because we are interested in your trust, our work will continue to be of the first level, in order to provide you with the best service and above all to support our clients.

Name: Trip To Help
Company description: Trip to Help is a sustainable and regenerative tourism platform to find unique and once-in-a-lifetime experiences around the globe with positive social impact on local communities, culture and environment.  We work closely with NGOs, local associations, development projects and local communities to design cultural immersion experiences on wild environments. All our activities are designed, coordinated and executed by local people, putting the local knowledge and cultural and natural heritage at the center of all our decisions when choosing the experiences we offer.  Trip to Help is made for a new generation of travelers, who are hungry to experience and get personal growth and enlightenment by traveling, but not at all costs. Conscious travelers who make choices when planning their next adventure, who choose natural conservation, positive impact on the territories they explore and the well-being of the local people.  The 80% of all our packages goes to local territories, and you can have amazing experiences and see where your money goes in the end. We don't work with massive tour-operators, European vendors nor travel agencies, and we don't offer volunteer tourism stays either. With Trip to Help, while you go on safari in Tanzania or discover the Amazon with native people you contribute to their local development.  It’s founded by Raquel Priego and Xavier Claveria, two well-experienced travelers who have always worked on the startup ecosystem in Barcelona. After more than 30 countries visited together and a true nomadic essence that is calling us more & more often, we decided to turn our passion into our day-to-day life. We act as travel curators, all activities and packages you can find on the website have been carefully selected by us, and we have experienced them all firsthand.  Our mantra: traveling the world is a luxury, and we should not forget that all our trips have a negative impact. But how many of them have a positive one? For us, all of them should.

Name: Brújula Viajes
HQ Location: Spain, Cantabria, Santander, Nº 11 B Calle Francisco Tomás Y Valiente, 39011
Company description: Brújula Viajes, nace con la filosofía de personalizar, preparar, gestionar y mimar tu viaje, para que solo te preocupes de viajar. Brújula Viajes es una agencia de viajes online, especialista en viajes a medida y viajes de novios con más de 20 años de experiencia en el sector. Como las cuatro bolitas de nuestro logotipo, nuestra política la basamos en cuatro pilares fundamentales; Trato personalizado, comunicación bidireccional, rapidez y fluidez y precio. Ello lo tenemos presente en todo lo que hacemos. >> Cómo puedes contactar con nosotros: Teléfono fijo: 942.077.834 / 634.555.804 Whatsapp: 634.555.804 (Marta) E-mail: Info@brujulaviajes.com     >> ¿Por qué viajar con Brújula Viajes?   Porque contamos con los mejores motores de búsqueda aéreos y hoteleros, los mejores consolidadores del momento. Porque estamos en constante movimiento y evolución, buscando siempre las mejores herramientas para ofreceros los mejores precios y los mejores destinos. Porque nos implicamos en cada viaje, como si fuésemos a viajar nosotros mismos. Porque tenemos más de 15 años de experiencia en el sector. Porque estamos respaldados por un grupo de gestión de infraestructuras turísticas con una amplia trayectoria en el sector turístico, nuestra mejor garantía para satisfacer todas tus necesidades.     >> Cómo podemos ayudarte: Brújula Viajes, confecciona tu itinerario y asesora de manera independiente y siempre pensando en tus necesidades. Trabajamos con todos los destinos, paquetes vacacionales y viajes a medida. Te informamos y tramitamos la documentación necesaria de tu viaje: visado, seguros de cancelación... Asesoramiento gratuito y sin compromiso para tus viajes: pregúntanos qué ver en cada destino, consejos de viajes, moneda y cambio, electricidad en el destino, estamos aquí para resolver tus dudas y ayudarte a organizar tu luna de miel para que te olvides de todo y puedas disfrutar de tu viaje de novios.

Name: Aventuradas
Company description: Agencia de viajes online centrada en el servicio cercano y bajo demanda al cliente al mejor precio. Podemos ofrecerte los mejores precios para que viajes a cualquier parte del mundo. Descríbenos el viaje que te gustaría hacer, y sin compromiso te enviaremos varias opciones que se adapten a tus gustos y preferencias, siempre podrás indicarnos si te gustaría realizar algún cambio. Nos centramos en el servicio no solo pre-venta, también estaremos a tu disposición durante y después del viaje por si tienes alguna duda o surge algún problema. Ofrecemos vuelos, hoteles, entradas a espectáculos, excursiones, visados, coches de alquiler, seguros de viaje y todo lo que necesites para que tu viaje sea perfecto.

Name: EATour Specialist
HQ Location: Spain, Galicia, Vigo, Calle Marques De Valladares 14, 36201
Company description: EATour Specialist is a Registered and Fully Bonded Travel Agency License Number XG-504 / EATour Specialist es una Agencia de viajes minorista con Nº de registro XG-504 EATour Specialist – We are a specialty online travel agency based in Galicia, Northwestern Spain and where our co-founders Sean O’Rourke and Marcos Garcia Espada are dedicated to personally guiding many of our Food and wine tour departures to this intriguing corner of Spain. If you would like to read some wine articles of his featured tours published in various wine magazines visit our MediaCentre . Our services included many types of unique tours and customized travel to Spain and Portugal. Trips are related to a wide variety of interests/preferences like: Wine, Food, Culture, Golf, Spa, Honeymoons, VIP Private Guides, Driver/Guides, Small Groups, Airport Transfer, Accommodations, etc… We specialize in creating personalized itineraries for mid to high-end groups and individual clients visiting Spain and Portugal. Over the years we have built up an extensive database of all different types of customized services. Whether it is just a privately guided day tour in Barcelona, or a Cooking Lesson with an expert Basque Chef, we can help you fulfill your unique vacation needs. For high-end clients we can create extensive luxury private chauffeur driven tours with local VIP specialist guides to visit various monumental cities. Also staying in the best hotels, either 5*GL or hidden boutique hotels, Paradores, Pousdas, etc… Not forgetting to mention table reservations or we can even select set gourmet meals in the finest restaurants throughout Spain & Portugal. Or even just a hotel private transfer for you client, big or small we are glad to help you out. To get familiar with our tour products and services start your search now in our VacationCentre .

Name: Latus Travel
Company description: We are a specialized Travel Agency for Exclusive and Specially Tailored Made Trips around the world. We are ready to meet your needs and desires; we will design your exclusive tours around the world meeting all your requirements. We will adjust each schedule to your budget and needs, both as an individual client or as a group, having you in mind for every detail and being there for you in the best way in each country. We offer you our wide experience in this kind of specialized trips for Professionals or Amateurs in different topics: Bullfighting, Sports, Food and Gastronomy, Enology, Horse, … or any other worlds of your particular interest. Just contact us, tell us about your needs and dreams and we will Taylor a unique experience for you or your group!!!

Name: Fulltime Guides
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes receptiva y especializada en viajes exclusivos en el medio natural que abarcan toda la provincia de Huesca. Nuestro equipo es uno de nuestros grandes valores. Tras quince años trabajando como guías acompañantes y de montaña, y animados por otras empresas del sector, hemos decidido emprender un proyecto que marque la diferencia en los servicios ofrecidos a los viajeros que se acercan a conocer este variado y en ocasiones desconocido territorio. Ofrecemos viajes guiados para grupos reducidos siempre con un alto nivel de atención y servicio. Nuestro objetivo es sorprender al viajero con propuestas originales, combinando ocio, cultura y naturaleza en la proporción que demande. Qué nos diferencia: - Viajes personalizables, con orden lógico y un hilo argumental claramente definido. - Servicio de transfer de ida y vuelta a la estación de AVE Zaragoza-Delicias incluido.  - Guías con experiencia, grandes conocimientos de la zona y vocación de servicio. - Furgón Mercedes Viano especialmente equipado, con chófer y a disposición del grupo las 24 horas. - Grupos limitados, que aseguren la calidad de la experiencia y permitan un trato humano y personalizado. - Actividades y visitas de primera calidad. Sabemos con quién trabajar y con quién no y cuidamos cada detalle del servicio. - Conocemos de primera mano todos los recursos turísticos y actividades que ofrece el Altoaragón, y lo más importante: escogemos el momento exacto para visitar cada lugar y vivir cada experiencia. - Ofrecemos, como valor añadido, un estudiado servicio de catering gourmet en lugares increíbles. Cocina en el momento, copas y cócteles, productos de la tierra… Excelente remate para unas visitas originales con actividades verdaderamente exclusivas.

Name: Alcandia Travel GmbH
Company description: Our vision is to create a whole new travel experience, starting from the consumer's first travel desire, first contact and individual advisory through travel agencies, improved existing infrastructure to the final point of cutting-edge technological progress to take today's market standards to the next level. We develop harmonized solutions for hundreds of isolated applications in the travel market to serve tour operators, travel agencies, and above all the customer. We strive to take travel forward by new and revolutionary technology, both nationally and internationally. We are constantly looking for support and talented people. If you are interested in working in a startup environment and if you are passionate about travel, get in touch with us!

Name: Activebreak
Company description: Welcome to the world of Activebreak, where ordinary vacations are a thing of the past and the extraordinary reigns supreme! We're not just an innovative platform, we're a thriving community of outdoor enthusiasts, thrill-seekers, and adventurous souls. Our team is a vibrant mix of passionate individuals who love outdoor sports, travel, and above all, the thrill of a challenge. At Activebreak, we don’t just offer jobs—we craft exciting careers. Join us and be part of a transformative journey that not only nurtures your professional growth but also lets you contribute to shaping the future of adventure tourism. For the incredible tour operators out there, we're your ultimate ally. Think of us as the trusty backstage crew that ensures your show runs smoothly. We handle all the nuts and bolts, from payments and dealing with currency risk, to promoting your amazing tours. This way, you're free to focus on delivering those life-changing experiences that our global audience of adventure junkies craves. We’re all about shared success, and nothing makes us happier than seeing our partners thrive. Activebreak is more than a business, it's a revolution in the way people book outdoor sports adventures. We're growing fast, with solid partnerships worldwide, and an insatiable commitment to sustainable practices. The market sector we cater to is thriving, filled with enthusiastic customers looking for their next big adventure. We invite you to join us in this journey! At Activebreak, we're making the world a more adventurous place, one thrilling experience at a time. Be a part of this extraordinary journey!

Name: Aeroplan Flugbüro GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Düsseldorf, 5 Homberger Straße
Company description: Aeroplan Flugbüro GmbH ist ein Reisebüro und ein weiterhin unabhängiger Ticket-Großhändler mit Sitz in Düsseldorf. Das Unternehmen wurde im Jahr 1988 von den Brüdern Alireza und Bahram Khatibi gegründet. Die beiden Herren und Geschäftsführer sind bereits seit 1980 im Reisebüro-Bereich tätig. Zusammen mit ihren Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeitern unterstützen sie Sie mit ihrer langjährigen Erfahrung bei Ihrer Reiseplanung.

Name: Euroflug Touristik
Company description: EUROFLUG TOURISTIK - DAS SIND WIR Seit der Gründung im Jahr 2005 setzen wir spannende Urlaubsideen mit Leidenschaft in unvergessliche Reiseerlebnisse um. Euroflug Touristik ist als familiengeführter Reiseveranstalter mit Sitz in Trier, Rheinland-Pfalz, der Spezialist für maßgeschneiderte (Gruppen-)Reisen innerhalb Europas und zu ausgewählten Ferndestinationen sowohl im Direktvertrieb als auch in der Zusammenarbeit mit ausgewählten Reisebüro Partnern und den wichtigsten lokalen Zeitungen in der Sparte Leserreisen.  Ob Urlaubs- und Erholungsreisen, Erlebnis- und Entdeckungsreisen oder Rund-, Wander- und Städtereisen: Wir entwickeln mit viel persönlichem Engagement und einem besonderen Anspruch an Qualität eine wundervolle Auswahl an Reiseangeboten.  Kurz: Wir bieten Traumreisen zu den schönsten Reisezielen! Als Teil unseres Teams, das Tradition und Innovation verbindet, haben usnere Mitarbeiter*innen die Möglichkeit, an der Gestaltung dieser einzigartigen Urlaubserlebnisse mitzuwirken. Mit Neugier und Entdeckergeist arbeiten wir in moderner Arbeitsumgebung und freundlicher Arbeitsatmosphäre am Standort Trier an spannenden Aufgaben rund um das Thema Reisen.  Möchtest Du mit Neugier und Entdeckergeist die schönste Zeit des Jahres für unsere Kunden*innen aktiv mitgestalten? Dann erlebe eine neue (berufliche) Reise bei Euroflug Touristik! Unser Team bildet das gesamte Aufgabenspektrum von der Produktgestaltung über den Einkauf der touristischen Leistungen bei unseren Partnern bis zur Katalogproduktion, Buchhaltung, Marketing und Verkauf ab. Wir arbeiten als Spezialisten und gleichzeitig als Allrounder Hand in Hand für ein ganz besonderes Reiseprogramm, das unsere Kunden*innen und uns begeistert.  Flache Hierarchien, klare Kompetenzen, kurze Wege, Teamgeist und umfangreiche Möglichkeiten zur Mitgestaltung prägen unseren Arbeitsalltag.

Name: NUR Touristik GmbH
Company description: Nur Touristik GmbH = we NUR in on travel = unser Fokus liegt ganz auf Reisen. Sie reisen gerne und wollen das Bestmögliche aus Ihrem Urlaub machen? Dann sind Sie gut und sicher gelandet bei Nur Touristik GmbH , dem sympathischsten Online-Reisebüro und jüngsten Online-Reiseportal. Als Unternehmen sind wir zwar jung, in der Touristikbranche aber alte Hasen. Ein versiertes Team aus Reiseverkehrskaufleuten, Touristikfachwirten, Reisefotografen und IT-Experten, das langjährige Touristik-Erfahrung, Insiderwissen und Reiseleidenschaft für Sie bündelt, kümmert sich am liebsten ganz persönlich um Ihre individuellen Wünsche. Kreativ, ganzheitlich und dynamisch. trazoom entstand aus der ehrgeizigen Idee, das zu verkaufen, was Sie und uns mit Begeisterung erfüllt: Wir wollen Ihren ganz persönlichen Urlaubstraum verwirklicht sehen! Daher müssen Sie bei uns auf nichts verzichten, was Sie von Ihrem stationären Reisebüro gewohnt sind. Sie geniessen sogar eine Menge Vorteile, die dieses nicht bietet. Und darauf sind wir stolz. Für Sie geben wir unser Bestes. Sicherheit und Fairness stehen bei uns ganz oben auf der Gepäckliste.

Name: Kootstra Schiffsreisen GmbH

Name: Travelmanufacture
Company description: Hey – schön, dass du da bist! 🤍  Wir sind Alina & Chantal – Zwillinge und Inhaberinnen der digitalen Reiseagentur "travelmanufacture". Im Jahr 2021 haben wir uns den großen Traum der Selbstständigkeit erfüllt und dürfen auf Instagram inzwischen mehr als 19.000 Menschen inspirieren und Kundinnen und Kunden aus Deutschland, Österreich und der Schweiz zu ihrem Traumurlaub verhelfen. Dabei haben wir das Ganze von der Pike auf gelernt – denn wir sind beide gelernte Tourismusfachwirtinnen mit einigen Jahren Berufserfahrung im klassischen Reisebüro. Mit dem Aufbau unserer Reiseagentur war für uns eine Frage entscheidend: Wie schaffen wir es, aus der Masse der Reiseagenturen in Deutschland hervorzustechen? Unsere Antwort: Wir suchen uns eine noch nicht besetzte Nische und sprechen die Menschen zeitgerecht an. Mit der Nische Boho-, Boutique-, Lifestyle-Hotels und einem konsistenten und einheitlichen Instagram-Auftritt dürfen wir stolz sagen, dass wir genau das geschafft haben.  Wir freuen uns darauf, uns mit dir zu vernetzen.  Alina & Chantal

Name: Experiencr
Company description: Die Suche nach aufregenden und zugleich aktiven Reisen ist mühsam und kompliziert. Auf der einen Seite gibt es überall auf der Welt zahlreiche kleine Spezialisten mehrtägiger sportlicher Touren und Erlebnisse verschiedenster Art. Auf der anderen Seite existieren große Reiseveranstalter, die Komplettpakete für Sport- und Abenteuerreisen anbieten.  Experiencr wurde im Jahr 2014 als eine unabhängige Plattform gegründet auf der die Angebote verschiedener Veranstalter und Anbieter vergleichbar gemacht werden. Ziel ist es, Transparenz in den Markt für Sport- und Abenteuerreisen zu bringen und die Vielfalt der Reisen jedem zugänglich zu machen.  Lassen Sie sich von den einzigartigen Angeboten inspirieren, und erleben Sie Aktivitäten, die Sie schon immer einmal ausprobieren wollten!  www.experiencr.com _________________________________________________________________________________ Searching online for exiting and active sport and adventure travels is troublesome and complex. On the one hand numerious local but unknown travel experts sell their multi-day sport trips. On the other hand large tour operators arrange complete adventure travel packages all over the world. Experiencr.com was founded as an independent web platform in 2014, comparing different sport and adventure trips from various travel experts. Our aim is to bring transparency into market and make unforgettable memories accessible for everyone.   Get inspired by the broad range of unique offers, covering all the activities you ever wanted to try!  Check out www.experiencr.com! SEE NEW WORLDS. FEEL NEW EMOTIONS. EXPERIENCE NEW THINGS.

Name: PATA Deutschland E.V.
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Bielefeld, Friedrich-verleger Straße, 33602
Company description: Promoting tourism to and from the destinations of Asia and the Pacific, expanding tourism knowledge, training travel professionals: The Pacific Asia Travel Association Germany Chapter., PATA Deutschland for short, has been the contact point for tourism professionals and those who want to become one for more than two decades. PATA Germany Chapters offers an ideal platform for the exchange of experience and knowledge within and across the industry, as well as a comprehensive range of practical training and services to support anyone selling travel to the fascinating destinations of Asia and the Pacific. PATA Germany offers travel agents and travel agencies a variety of different training, workshop and education formats: Whether one-day training sessions, Culinary Sessions with a reference to the culinary side of Asia, classic multi-day road shows or the presence at the major and regional tourism fairs for end consumers - the aim is always to link the more than 100 members of PATA Germany Chapter even more closely with the various distribution channels.

Name: Via Island
Company description: Travel Agency

Name: Green Home Of Travel
Company description: Ihre Reisewünsche und Sie als Kunden immer fest im Blick, finden wir gemeinsam die für Sie passende Reise, den nächsten tollen Urlaub. Angebote gibt es viele - aber wo liegen die Unterschiede?  Welcher Veranstalter ist zuverlässig? Welches Hotel passt zu meinen Urlaubswünschen? Wir sind die richtige Anlaufstelle, wenn es ums Reisen geht. Mit über 30 Jahren Erfahrung und Leidenschaft für unsere Branche sind wir für unsere Kunden vor, während und nach der Reise persönlich da. Zu Coronazeiten haben wir über 1800 Anrufe mit Kunden, Leistungsträgern und Veranstaltern abgewickelt, haben Kunden zurückgeholt und sind Ihnen zur Seite gestanden. Nun geht es wieder los, die Länder öffnen und wir kennen die Coronaregelungen. Unsere Kunden sind bestens informiert.  Wir sind für Sie da: Persönlich in unserem modernen Büro oder per Videoberatung. Am liebsten auf Termin, damit wir uns für Sie Zeit nehmen können und unsere Aufmerksamkeit ganz Ihren Reisewünschen widmen können. Was ist bei uns anders? Sie sollen sich bei uns wohlfühlen, ein bisschen wie Zuhause. Wir sagen auch ehrlich, was Sie besser nicht buchen sollten. Wir sind unabhängig und führen nicht nur die gängigen großen Reiseveranstalter sondern auch handverlesene Spezialisten und nachhaltige Veranstalter, die uns besonders am Herzen liegen. Wir brennen für unseren Beruf, sind reiseerfahren, schulen uns laufend. Ihre Reisewünsche stehen bei uns immer im Fokus.  Unsere Leidenschaft sind hochwertige, schöne und nachhaltigere Reisen, Green Luxury Travel. Wofür brennen Sie? Was macht Ihren Urlaub zum WOW?  Wir finden es heraus.

Name: Wedgewood Germany
Company description: Welcome to the country of Wuerstchen, Cuckoo clocks and Sourkraut! Germany is at your service and we open the doors. By one office, one contact – but for the whole country! And at the same level of attendance, same level of quality, same way of offering and operating groups! We are an incoming tour operator, destination management & event design company for Germany. Our office is located in Mainz, the very heart of our contry. Operating from here, we can provide all services you can expect from a decent DMC and your local partner:  - traditional or stylish new accommodation  - event locations with that special wow-factor  - reliable transfers  - guiding with a personal note  - conference and meeting planning to the very last detail  - hidden gems  - up to date in-restaurants  - team building, where teams are built  - etc. etc.  regardless if you want to run your event in Berlin, Dresden, Frankfurt or Munich Our offers and programmes are always tailor made and based on your briefings – You can be sure that you don’t get standardised pages or a “catalogue” of services! Our speciality are creatively and logistically highly demanding incentive groups, but we can also  provide a simple transfer and restaurant booking for the small low budget group.  “Germans are boring?” – that was yesterday! Test us and discover a country, which in terms of incentive travel, is still regarded as “No Man’s Land”  - You would be amongst the first!

Name: Reisebüro Mohrhof
Company description: Herzlich Willkommen! Reisebüro Mohrhof... das ist Urlaub von Anfang an. Seit mittlerweile 19 Jahren leben wir erfolgreich diesen Slogan!   Sie haben noch keine Idee für Ihren nächsten Urlaub? Wir freuen uns, dass Sie uns Ihre kostbarste Zeit des Jahres anvertrauen! Das Team vom Reisebüro Mohrhof unterstützt Sie gerne mit Ideen und eigenen Erfahrungen. Wir sind Ihre kompetenten, erfahrenen und dynamischen Ansprechpartner in allen Dingen rund um Ihre Traumreise! Ihre Wünsche - individuell und pauschal -  stehen bei uns im Vordergrund. Vereinbaren Sie Ihren für Sie persönlich reservierten Termin bei uns. Wir freuen uns auf Ihren Besuch! Ihr Team vom Reisebüro Mohrhof

Name: Tamici UG
Company description: Do you feel happy doing sports with music and like-minded people? We provide the right holiday for you & your friends. Tamici is a tour operator offering group fitness holidays. Everyone is welcome at Tamici - no matter how fit or how old you are, whether you are travelling solo or as part of a group and how you would like to balance intensive exercise with relaxation and mindfullness, Professional fitness instructors are providing a fun-filled schedule of your favourite group fitness courses and new trends. Our first holiday will take us to Sicily where you have the chance to enjoy la dolce vita and the beauty of the island as well as working out every day!

Name: Segreti Natura Srls
Company description: SEGRETI NATURA srls propone forniture di articoli e complementi per hotel, bed and breakfast, villaggi, case vancanza e nasce dall'idea di creare un punto di riferimento per chi cerca prodotti e accessori di cortesia e cosmetici affidabili e di alta qualità sia per privati che per aziende. L'esperienza maturata in oltre 20 anni nel mondo del turismo ci ha consentito di capire le necessità di albergatori e privati del settore albergiero ed extralberghiero, portandoci alla creazione di un servizio Business-to-Business (B2B) e Business-to-Consumer (B2C) per la fornitura di Linee Cortesia economiche ma di elevatà qualità. Un'accurata scelta dei nostri fornitori ci ha consentito di selezionare i migliori prodotti disponibili sul mercato, dermatologicamente testati sull’uomo e non sugli animali in accordo con le più recenti disposizioni legislative delle direttive europee, per offrire prodotti con un reale beneficio sia estetico che pratico. Nel tempo abbiamo ampliato le nostre linee di prodotti creandone nuovi come i nostri kit benvenuto utilizzati per la pulizia e l'igiene delle strutture turistiche quali residence e case vacanza, con un occhio di riguardo all'ambiente e all'utilizzatore, e consentendo una riduzione degli sprechi pur mantenendo efficacia e qualità Ci rivolgiamo sia alle piccole realtà alberghiere, sia alle grande strutture organizzate e tour operator, offrendo prezzi molto competitivi, grazie agli accordi diretti con i produttori che ci permettono di abbattere i costi di rivendita. Le nostre confezioni sono pensate sia per chi necessita di quantitativi elevati sia per le piccole strutture o i privati.

Name: ActiveHolidayFinland

All our tours are ecological and socially responsible. Skafur-Tour is recommended by Responsible Travel. Please note! Most of the activities suit well for companies as recreational company activities. We can also arrange small group meetings in unique locations.

Name: V.Alamäki Oy
Company description: A family-owned bus company and tour operator in third genertion in Oulu Region. We transport your group safely with our high quality, comfortable and modern buses and adjust our travel services to fit your needs.

Name: Mucho Gusto Accessible Travel
Company description: Travel planning for disabled, accessible trips in Barcelona & Catalunya.  Mucho Gusto Travel is a personal travel agency founded by Esther De Wildeman and Daniel Lee Baker. Specialising in wheelchair accessible and inclusive trips in Barcelona and throughout Catalunya, you can rely on us for everything from hotel recommendations, equipment rental such as a shower wheelchair or a hoist, transportation from Barcelona airport or port, to a host of original daytime activities. We'll only recommend hotels, restaurants or activities that we’ve experienced personally and are accessible for disabled travelers. Whether you prefer to book a single item such as disabled Barcelona airport transfer, or you’d like to combine a few of the different services we can offer, we’ll be happy to help with your specific needs – just feel free to talk to us. All trips are inclusive and accessible for disabled passengers with reduced mobility, whether in a wheelchair, mobility scooter or other accessible vehicle.  Our services and activities are suitable for solo travellers, couples, families and groups of friends alike.  We also work together with sociable organisations with disabled members wanting to organise an original group holiday. Your journey, your way!

Name: Spain Is More
Company description: Personal travel experiences in authentic Northern Spain. Spain is More is a reputable Travel Agent and Inbound Tour Operator specialized in personalized, tailor-made, quality vacations in Northern Spain for both individual Travelers and Private Groups. We ourselves are living in Northern Spain and both have great love and thorough knowledge of the region. At "Spain is More" we provide our guests with a travel experience that is based on our local knowledge and that surpasses the ordinary. For example our holidays offer stays in charming hotels or in the area's most beautiful Holiday Cottages or Villas, excursions and activities with the best guides and instructors, tips on the most beautiful beaches, local people's favorite restaurants, tourist attractions such as San Sebastian, Bilbao, Madrid and Santiago de Compostela visited in new ways, and sights that you might otherwise overlook. Since our main office is located right in the middle of the area, we are close to you during your stay and can be contacted, to quickly answer any questions or solve any issues. All our trips are organized and customized to your specific needs, so that you get the most out of your holiday, whether you are focused on family, romance, authentic Spanish charm, relaxation, nature, hiking, active vacations or wine and gastronomy. In the menu under 'Travels' you can read about the different types of holidays – e.g. walking or cycling along the Camino de Santiago, Luxury Train Cruises through Northern Spain, extravagant vacations in the legendary Parador hotels, charming self drive holidays or relaxing in your own private Vacation Cottage. We look forward to welcoming you to lovely Northern Spain, where we will do our best to create a framework to provide you with a memorable vacation. Call or e-mail Spain is More and let us design your perfect vacation experience in Northern Spain.

Mozaik Hospitality is the driving force of your sales and marketing strategy. We believe in the individual character of every hotel and the unique customer experience it can offer. With creative strategies and proven best practices we turn around hotel properties. We challenge the status-quo; we re-position hotels to outperform their competition and to become leaders in their local market.

Name: Tantosvago Società Benefit
Company description: Tantosvago Società Benefit is a pioneering company that operates in the travel and welfare sectors, providing a unique portal called SvaGO. This platform enables travel agencies to tap into the corporate welfare market, offering tailored vacation packages to over 5 million employees with welfare credits. Tantosvago's mission is to enhance the travel experience for employees while helping agencies increase their sales and customer loyalty through innovative solutions that comply with fiscal regulations. The company collaborates with more than 600 travel agencies and over 60 welfare providers, serving a diverse clientele that includes both businesses and individual users. By leveraging technology and strategic partnerships, Tantosvago aims to transform welfare credits into memorable travel experiences, ultimately contributing to the well-being of employees and their families.

Our company`s experience and methodology helps us identify and provide flexible, tailor-made solutions to fit the exact needs of the Tour Operators we represent, contributing to the growth and development of the Tour Operator`s business.

Name: Galea Travel

Company description: Motivated by our love and experience of our many personal trips to Greece and the World, we decided to establish our own travel company so that we can do our passion for the magical world of Tourism and the best possible service for the traveler, our daily work. Galea Travel is a modern Greek travel agency that provides reliable high quality travel services both in Greece and abroad. Right in the heart of Glyfada and within the shopping center “Vero Peso” we serve daily travelers visiting our office as well as travelers who prefer to communicate with us from a distance using the means offered by modern technology such as Facebook, Skype, E-mail, Instagram, Online reservations, Telephone, Fax. Our goal is to continuously upgrade our services in order to satisfy even your most specialized travel needs, providing you with excellent service and professional response to your every request. We have chosen a wide network of specialized associates in Greece and abroad, which we evaluate and visit often enough to control and ensure the high quality of our services. Our experienced and well-trained staff has great know-how in the field of tourism and is constantly informed about all the developments in the tourism industry so that it can meet the needs of our time and serve you in the best possible way. Galea Travel can provide you with the following services: * Issuance of ferry tickets to all of Greece and Italy. * Issuance of air tickets for Greece and abroad. * Reservation of hotels in Greece and abroad. * Car rentals in Greece and and abroad. * Organized individual packages in Greece and abroad. * Organized excursions for groups in Greece and abroad. * Wedding trips in Greece and abroad. * Wedding List – Gift Certificates. * Cruises in Greece and abroad. * Group trips for special groups of travelers, (Clubs, Sports Associations, Schools), as well as Groups of Travelers with Special Competencies. * Conferences, Meetings, Events, Business Trips, Corporate Meetings.

Name: Travel Memoreez OÜ
Company description: Travel Memoreez ist der einzige Veranstalter weltweit, der seinen Reisenden die Schönheit exotischer Ziele aus den Augen eines Einheimischen entdecken lässt und dafür soziale Verantwortung übernimmt. Alle angebotenen Reiseziele wurden von uns selbst bereist und die besten Attraktionen mit höchster Sorgfalt für Sie ausgewählt. In Zusammenarbeit mit unseren Partnern vor Ort haben wir unsere Reiserouten durch un-sere eigene Erfahrung optimiert und die besten Geheimtipps ausfindig gemacht. Dadurch erleben Sie nicht nur ausgezeichneten Reiseservice vor Ort, sondern können bei jegliche Anliegen gerne auf uns zukommen. Zudem bieten wir Ihnen große Flexibilität bei der Auswahl Ihrer individuellen Lieblingsaktivitäten und gehen gerne auf Ihre persönliche Wünsche ein.Durch unsere gezielte Auswahl an Hotelvorschlägen brauchen Sie sich keine Gedanken mehr machen, wo Sie Ihre kostbare Zeit verbringen möchten. Wir haben die Suche nach hochklassigen Hotels mit höchster Qualität und Service persönlich in die Hand genommen um Ihnen eine stressfreien Urlaub und vollste Erholung versichern zu können. Unsere Verantwortung liegt darin Ihren Aufenthalt so angenehm und erlebnisreich wie möglich zu gestalten, damit Sie mit unvergesslichen Eindrücke an exotischer Länder und ihrer Kultur im Gepäck zurückkehren.Unserer Firmenvision ist sehr durch Nachhaltigkeit und Fairness geprägt. Mitarbeiter und Partner von Travel Memoreez erhalten nicht nur eine gerechte Entlohnung und faire Arbeitsbedingungen, wir gewährleisten zudem nachhaltige Investitionen in den Bereichen Bildung, Medizin und anderen sozialen Bereichen in den jeweiligen Reiseländern. Aus unseren Gesamterlöse kommen 40% sozialen Zwecke vor Ort zugute um sozial Schwächeren eine bessere Zukunft zu schenken. Die verbleibenden 60 % der Erlöse werden in den Erhalt und der Erweiterung unserer Angebote investiert um unsere Mission in ein globales Projekt zu verwandeln. Gegenüber herkömmlichen Reiseveranstalter garantiert Ihnen Travel Memoreez nicht nur professionelle Durchführung aller Services sondern auch beste Marktkonditionen. Ihre Reiserfahrung und die nachhaltige Unterstützung der Zielgebiete stehen an erster Stelle.Wir verwandeln Träume in Erinnerungen, die Sie ein Leben lang begleiten werden.Werden Sie Teil unserer Mission eines nachhaltigerem und fairem Tourismus und hinterlassen Sie Ihre Fußspuren auf einer spannenden Kultur-reise in ein exotisches Land Ihrer Wahl.

Name: SEA NEREIDES Ltd.

Name: Sanare Health
Company description: Sanare Health - Leisure & Travel Company  The company was founded in 2014 - the year of new development of Latvian health resorts, famous in Europe because of their unique thermal springs and healing mud.  Sanare Health headquarters are located in the heart of Jurmala the biggest resort in Baltics. Sanare Health is official distributor of Marienbad AG in Latvia. It gives the possibility getting the most competitive prices and most attractive special offers for medical treatment at Marianske Lazne spa resort.  The main concept of Sanare Health is to be always one step ahead & guarantee the quality of products and services offered.  Sanare Health has office in Riga offering variety of hotels and tours in the capital. Sanare Health company has its own fleet of cars providing transfers to hotels and sanatoriums.  Well trained and highly qualified staff has a huge experience in medical tourism meeting the interests and requirements of the clients, even with the highest demands. The high level of reliability of Sanare Health is guaranteed by the professional staff.  Sanare Health operates in 7 countries including Slovakia, Czech Republic, Israel, Latvia, Lithuania, Estonia and Poland.

We work with small groups of  guests to make the friendly and individual atmosphere in our tours. We sell only our own products and take the full responsibility. We also provide custom tours to our customers. We are always happy to answer to your questions, so contact us anytime we will respond to you in the nearest time. We hope to see you  in our tours!

Name: Adeona Tour

From public sector, in our portofolio are twinned cities, city administration seminars, new museum sections, cultural festivals, sportive events, etc. From private sector we have in portofolio business events related medicine, agriculture, wine producing, energy, IT, etc. To discover places, cities, art, local cuisine, local traditions and habits of all countries of the world, Adeona Tour offers you, up to the smallest details, general or thematic tours, varied and original. Name: Golf Estonia
Company description: Estonia - destination of your next golf holiday Been there? Done that? Why not surprise yourself with a novel destination that will show a side of Europe you've never seen? It will keep you talking for months. www.golfestonia.com Golf Estonia is the only golf specialized inbound tour operator in Estonia offering all golf travel services on Estonian territory – green fees, accommodation, transfers, car rent, restaurants etc. Through owning the playing rights at the golf courses we are able to offer the best value for money golf packages, golf breaks and golf holidays on the market. Estonia is a remarkable golf destination and a great alternative to other much visited destinations – new, different and very interesting indeed. The six golf courses around Estonia are all very different from each other, well maintained and offering at least average or superb quality. With the short golf history starting from 1993, Estonian golf has already gained a remarkable attention in the world: - The Omega Mission Hills World Cup European Qualifier was held in Estonia in 2009 and 2011 - The Estonian Golf & Country Club is one of only few European Tour Courses in Europe, and Golf World's TOP100 European Course in 2009 and in 2011 - European top-level events have been held in Estonia – Finnish Golf Tour events, European Boys Challenge Trophy, European Mens Challenge Trophy, European Mid-Amateur Championships, Rotary International 37th European Championship etc

Name: Nausail Yacht Charters

With 22 years in operation and over 30 years sailing the Greek seas, we offer access to over 2,000 sailing yachts in Greece.  We tailor yacht rentals to any occasion and have recently launched curated sailing trips for every taste. Families, sailing enthusiasts, honeymooners, colleagues, or simply friends, we' ve got you all covered! Whether seeking to rent a boat in Greece for the holidays, a bachelor party, the celebration of a graduation, a promotion, a birthday, an anniversary or the honeymoon of your dreams, Nausail ensures to make your special occasion a lifetime experience.  Beyond being avid sailors we are also world travellers, explorers and seekers of unique experiences. This is why we deeply understand travellers’ expectations and can create truly authentic and personalized holiday experiences. Contact us for an amazing sailing holiday in Greece!

Travelers can search by destinations, attractions or categories of any activities they would like to do in visited cities. For every promenade, excursion or even camping in the woods you will find honest reviews which rating consists of 4 basic components - Service, Organization, Value, and Safety. Tour operators or any other tourism professionals can use our platform and enhance their products to match travelers expectations.

Name: Hiking Greece
Company description: Hiking Greece specializes in corporate team building hiking trips in Greece.  Nature binds us as nothing else out there. Contact us to design your next company trip according to your needs. We offer guided trips to the most scenic mountains in mainland Greece and also hiking holiday packages in the beautiful and famous Aegean islands. Greece is a relatively unkown paradise regarding its mountains. Actually, 80% of the total area of Greece is mountainous! Our guided hiking trips focuses on the Mythical Olympus mountain and North Pindus National park.  Additionally, we offer active holiday packages that you can combine your holidays with hiking. Kalymnos, Sifnos, Kos are the hidden treasures of Aegean with extensive and beautiful network of paths to enjoy during your holidays. Guided day hikes around Thessaloniki and Athens is also something that we do. If you are in Greece for business, your time is limited and you want to exlpore the outdoors nearby, come and join us to efficiently guide you to the best places around.

Name: Professional Travel & Conference
Company description: Incoming Travel Agency  specialized in Attica - Dodecannesos-Peloponnesos & Classic Greece  . Allotments for tour operators, groups and fit services.

Name: Romania's Friends Travel
Company description: We are a travel agency, SPECIALIZED IN CULTURAL AND NATURE FRIENDLY TOURS AND SEJOURS.  With highly trained personnel, ready to offer a new and improved business management we strongly believe that the quality of our services is the only way to show the respect we have for ourselves, for our country's culture and traditions and above all for the tourists interested in discovering this piece of heaven. From every perspective this country is unique, from our point of view Romania’s potential has been internationally recognized while acknowledging the seven UNESCO World Heritage sites:  the largest and best preserved of Europe's delta’s, the villages with fortified churches in Transylvania,  the wooden masterpieces of Maramures, the last truly rural region in Europe, the Painted Monasteries of Bukovina, a phenomenon and a unique masterpiece of wall art,  the sacred areas of the Sarmisegetuza , the capital of the ancient inhabitants of Romania, a site constantly compared to the colossal Stonehange, the Horezu monastery,  the place where the famous Horezu ceramics are made,  the citadel of Sighisoara, considered to be the most beautiful and well preserved inhabited citadel in Europe. A tour of these sites is the best way to discover Romania.

Name: BELKY - Cestovná Kancelária / Touroperator
Company description: WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF BELKY “I WAS WALKING THROUGH THE WOODS, LISTENING TO IT’S VOICE SINGING. I WAS LOOKING WITH THE JOY IN MY EYES AT THE BEAUTY. THE BEAUTY THAT GRACED US, THE WONDROUS WORLD THAT BECKONS – LET’S GO.” We invite you to Slovakia, to discover the hidden treasure in the heart of Europe. Slovakia boasts a unique landscape that offers a wealth of unparalleled historical and cultural heritage, beautiful wildlife, folk art and ever-living folklore with its traditions. The travel agency BELKY is unique in its character and philosophy based on folklore, traditions and folk culture. BELKY brings You unique travel options. Choose from our offer and not only delight your eyes, but also soothe your soul.

Name: Yummy Pedals - Mykonos Cycling & Hiking Tours
Company description: Yummy Pedals is a Travel Agency specializing in guided bicycle and hiking tours in Mykonos, Greece. Engage with a fascinating blend of experiences while exploring Mykonos Island on two wheels! Your local guides will be unveiling the authentic side of Mykonos to you. Yummy Pedals’ cycling and hiking adventures offer scenic tours to pristine beaches of the Aegean Sea and to the island’s hidden gems, leisurely and fun rides and hikes on sunkissed routes at the countryside as well as romantic private escapes for special events. Our tours are also combined with underwater photo shooting, an insight into Mykonian traditions and culture and a visit and wine tour at a quaint organic vineyard. Our half-day or full-day guided tours are tailor made for cruise passengers, singles, couples, families with kids, athletes, leisure cyclists, newbies, culture explorers... Simply choose the best bike or walking tour for you and join one of the top alternative things to do in Mykonos. Our top priority, as you uncover our island on wheels, is to provide one of the top things to do in Mykonos. An unforgettable, authentic, cycling or walking experience through off the beaten track routes, but also a safe and kids friendly adventure. At our guided bike and hiking tours we provide insurance coverage, first aid, technical assistance, thoroughly maintained equipment and a selection of trails under the criteria of safety. During all biking and hiking tours we guide you through the least used back roads to refreshingly pristine beaches, we provide an insight into our cultural and religious heritage, we offer homemade treats and make sure you leave the beach with the best souvenir, some really unique underwater photos. We also rent e-bikes (electric motor-assisted bicycles) to our participants, if you want to both enjoy the thrill of cycling and take it easy during your holidays!

Name: Smart Travel Estonia
Company description: Smart Travel is an incoming Tour Operator for the Baltic States and neighbouring countries. We started offering our services in 2005 and our office is located in Tallinn (Estonia). We are specialised in organising tailor-made tours for private/pre-established groups as well as creating tours packages for individual travellers. We offer cultural/leisure/historical/religious tours as well as all the arrangements for MICE programs. We also proposes several guaranteed departures tours in the Baltic States, Russia, Scandinavia, Poland, Ukraine and Belarus and provide a full range of in-land tourist services. We are willing to share information, news and tips about the Baltic States and to cooperate with other Tour Operators, Travel Agencies, Organisations and Associations by offering our services at special rates. We speak English, Italian and French. For more information 👉 https://www.smarttravel.ee 👈  and  👉 https://www.facebook.com/SmartTravelEstonia 👈 Contact: info@smarttravel.ee

Our tours access unique places and people and bring together a collection of history, heritage and culture, delivering your passengers wonderful and authentic experiences.

Name: Satellite ES Travel
Company description: Satellite-ES Ltd. is a Bulgarian tour operator and MICE organizer with over 30 years of experience in crafting memorable, high-quality experiences for both corporate and private clients. Established in 1993, the company has built a strong and trusted reputation as one of the most reliable ground agents in the region. Since its founding, Satellite-ES has been a dedicated partner in organizing business and leisure travel and events, conferences, thematic tours, incentive trips, team-building programs, and special events both in Bulgaria and internationally. We specialize in tailor-made travel and events that reflect the richness of local culture, natural beauty, wine and gastronomy, and authentic regional traditions. Our work is grounded in the philosophy of experience and slow travel, promoting responsible, sustainable tourism and meaningful encounters that leave lasting impressions. We are trusted for our expertise in offering and handling full-service solutions with precision, professionalism, and creative flair. Every project is approached with a commitment to efficient, reliable, and personalized service—ensuring not only flawless organization, but also emotional resonance and value. Our incoming brand, Slow Travel Bulgaria, offers curated and immersive journeys through Bulgaria’s spectacular nature and rich cultural heritage.  Whether planning a corporate retreat, cultural tour, or tailored event, we ensure a high-quality, seamless, and impactful result. Travels with character. Events with vision. Experiences with value.
