Name: Kithira Travel
Company description: Founded in 1983, established in Chora(Capital) of the Island of Kithira. Initially, activities were tour as a correspondent of OLYMPIC AIRWAYS and Shipping Agency for the Kithira Flying Dolphins CERES. In 1986, our office took the General GSA Factoring Kithira's Olympic Airlines, as well as outside the CERES, took over the Naval Factoring Kithira of GREEK SHIPPING MC. In 1994, our Office has been awarded by the MMM and JV CERES , for the activities and initiatives shown by contributing to the development and progress of the passenger area of our maritime services and tourism development in the region of LD Aigaiou. From 1995, our Office upgraded to Shipping Agency. Assigned to Marine Factoring, through their representative offices Maritime in Greece, visiting Kythera, New Companies such as: Costa Cr., Club Med, Festival, Silver Seas, Star Clippers, Phoenix, Wind Star, Astor, Deutschland, Delphin, Renaissance, Swann Hellenic, Le Ponant, R-One, Sea Cloud etc. Since 1996 our office has been assigned for the shipping agency of the Companies: MINOAN LINES, MINOAN FL. DOLPHINS, HELLAS FLYING DOLPHINS, SARONIC DOLPHINS, GAFERRIES, ATLAS V, HELLENIC SEAWAYS and PORFYROUSA. From 2001, upgraded to an IATA / UFTAA Office Kythira, with the possibility of plane tickets for all IATA Airlines worldwide and for all destinations.  Furthermore, Owner & General Manager of our office, assigned to our Office the representation abroad Tour Operators, as Ross Holidays. Today, continuing to hold the top position of the first and largest Founded Tourism-Travel Agent in Kithira, the consistency, reliability, diligence, knowledge and long experience, we managed to gather the universal respect and trust. Our purpose is and will be, with the continuous and tireless efforts, to maintain and further improve of our services, while providing the highest quality and our product Tourism Economics, contributing to the development and the island's economy, but also of our country.

Name: Iceland By Guide
Company description: Welcome to Iceland by Guide—Your Gateway to an Unforgettable Icelandic Adventure! Dive into the heart of Iceland with us, your premier companions for an unparalleled journey through this land of fire and ice. Iceland by Guide is more than just a tour operator; we're your gateway to experiencing Iceland's majestic landscapes, vibrant culture, and the warm, welcoming spirit of its people, all wrapped up in exclusive, personalised travel experiences. What We Offer: ------------------------------------------------------------------ + Private and Self-Guided Tours: Choose from exclusive, guided explorations or embrace freedom with our self-drive tours, all customizable to ensure a journey that's uniquely yours. + All-Inclusive Booking Service: Let us seamlessly plan your stay, from cozy accommodations to thrilling activities, ensuring a hassle-free Icelandic adventure. + Custom Itineraries for the Independent Traveler: Explore at your own pace with our expertly crafted itineraries, designed for those who seek adventure on their terms. + Corporate Travel: Elevate your team-building or client relations with our specialized incentive travel, promising unique experiences that inspire and connect. Why Choose Iceland by Guide? Iceland by Guide is synonymous with exceptional, personalized service, deep local insights, and a commitment to creating travel stories that last a lifetime. Whether you're an adventurer at heart, a family in search of magic, or a company aiming to inspire, we're dedicated to making your Icelandic journey extraordinary. Embark on Your Adventure: Ready to explore Iceland like never before? Connect with us and let Iceland by Guide be your compass to the extraordinary. Your dream Icelandic journey starts here!

Name: Reisibüroo Karol
Company description: Reisibüroo Karol on Eesti suurim messireiside korraldaja, omades juba üle 20 aasta kogemust. Reisibüroo Karol on ka mitmete suurte rahvusvaheliste messide ametlik esindaja ja partner pakkudes oma klientidele täisteenusena võimalust külastada messe mitte ainult külastajana, aga ka eksponendina.  Me oleme… - maailma juhtiva messikorraldusorganisatsiooni, Reed Exhibitions, ametlikuks esindajaks Baltikumis. - Stockholmi messide, Stockholmsmässan, ametlik esindaja Baltikumis. - Messe Frankfurt ja Messe Düsseldorf koostööpartneriks Eestis. AS Karol on Eesti erakapitalil baseeruv firma, mis asutati 1991.a. Reisibüroona alustati tegevust 1993.aastal, alates 1996. aastast korraldatakse reise rahvusvahelistele välismessidele ja näitustele. Loe lisaks: http://www.karol.ee/firmast/  *** Travel Agency Karol is the leading travel agency in Estonia with the main focus on organising visits to international trade fairs. Travel Agency Karol is also an official representative and partner of the biggest trade fairs offering its clients a full service to participate both as a visitor as well as an exhibitor. We are... - the official representative of one of the leading events organizer Reed Exhibitions in all the Baltic states. - the official representative of Stockholm fairs organizer Stockholmsmässan in all the Baltic states. - also a cooperation partner of Messe Frankfurt and Messe Düsseldorf in Estonia. Karol Ltd. is based on Estonian private capital. The company was founded in 1991, since 1993 it is working as a travel agency. Beginning from year 1996 we started to organise trips to international trade fairs and exhibitions.  Read additionally: http://www.karol.ee/en/kontakt

Name: OXENTIA TOURISM
HQ Location: Romania, Timiş, Timişoara, Nr. 8 Str. Salcâmilor
Company description: Oxentia Tourism is one of the leading travel agencies which caters to the evangelical Christian community.  At Oxentia Tourism we want to be more than just a tour company: - we want to be a bridge between Israel and Christians around the world.  Oxentia Tourism goal is to help Christians create and maintain ties with the land of Israel.  Our ultimate goal is for Christian believers to grow in their Biblical faith and renew and expand their hunger for the Word of God.  We want you to leave Israel with more than just souvenirs from another trip; we want you to leave having received the spiritual gift of a deeper understanding of God’s Word and how His plan has, and continues to, unfold in history.

Name: Tourism And Transport Agency Vakancia
Company description: Vakancia was established in 1994, in Sofia. The company possesses the following licences: -Tour operator licence No 0275 and tour agent licence No PKK-01-6213 -Licence for international transportation of passengers No 0198 -ISO 9001:2008 -All insurances which are necessary in relation to the aforementioned licences. The company has over 20 years of experience in the field of tourism and transport and is offering excursions and holidays adapted to the preferences of a diverse range of clients. Vakancia is in charge of the whole organization of your trip and possesses their own luxurious buses. The company secures accommodation, tour guide services and arrange the tourist program. Vakancia has their own office in Sofia and is working with authorized tour agents from all parts of Bulgaria. The company disposes of their own three star category buses. The buses are BOVA, SETRA and MAN and are equipped with a DVD system, air-conditioner, fridge, mini-bar, coffee machine, etc. Vakancia is also conducting a city sightseeing tour of Sofia, which attracts a great interest from tourists and business guests in Sofia. Apart from tourism, Vakancia is also actively working on the management of EU projects and the organization of public events. The company holds scientific conferences, seminars, round tables and exhibitions in Bulgaria and abroad, organizes training courses for increasing the qualification of staff and language training for corporate clients. The company has collaborated with ministries, transport companies, municipalities, embassies in Sofia and high schools within the implementation of many EU projects. Vakancia is publishing “Buses and Coaches” magazine, which is the only specialized magazine in the transport sector in Bulgaria. It allows the company to establish contacts with journalists, media and organize seminars for Bulgarian and foreign participants from the bus branch.

Name: Sóti Summits
Company description: Sóti Summits is a North Iceland travel agency, operated by Icelanders who have a desire for adventure travel and are inspired by the pristine nature of northern Iceland and the Troll Peninsula. We design our experiences based on our own passion for nature, adventure, and sustainability. Icelands natural environment is at the core of our experiences and we take every measure to ensure that it will be there for years to come. We demonstrate our ambitions for sustainability through our practices, basing our products on local expertise and quality services. Our trips are hand-crafted with the exploring adventurer in mind and through them we can share our passion for the stunning Troll Peninsula and the north of Iceland. All our experiences showcase the region through tours and activities, and also through delicious local food and superb accommodation. Last but not least, our local guides are our backbone. With extensive outdoor adventure experience coupled with  in-depth knowledge of local stories and history, you are in good hands.

Company description: Natassa Travel was founded in 1991 in Larissa and today holds one of the top positions in the Greek travel industry, with a large network of collaborations worldwide (Greece, Europe, America and all exotic destinations). Name: Outdoor Norway
Company description: We’re an adventure tour operator based in the adventure Mecca of Norway, the town of Voss. Encountered in the heart of Fjord Norway, Voss is a prime location to explore the outdoors.  You will find us rafting, canoeing, E-MTB, mountain biking, fjord kayaking, skiing, and snowshoeing in western Norway, where we can access the most magnificent views, trails, fjords and rivers in Northern Europe. Our knowledgeable and enthusiastic guiding team specialize in land, air and water activities. We take pride in offering unique and memorable experiences for all guests.  Our team of qualified and professional guides ensure you will have the experience of a lifetime! We are your adventure specialists and can arrange a variety of activity options based on your preferences and length of stay in Norway.

Name: AVIPTRIP Private Tours In Spain & Portugal
Company description: Enjoy private daytrips with private car and driver in luxury vehicles to the magnificent countryside and fascinating cities of Spain and Portugal. Together with a carefully selected team of professionals, we combine our enthusiasm and passion for Spain with luxury, discretion and excellent personal service. Let AVIPTRIP show you the best of Barcelona, Madrid, Segovia, Avila, Seville, Cordoba, Ronda, Granada, the White Villages, Jerez, Doñana, Grazalema, Malaga, Valancia etc or the nicest places of Portugal. Ask for our customized excursions or private transfers. We will also assist you in finding best lodging, fitted to your all needs. Important note: AVIPTRIP has all official & legal travel agency licenses All our dirvers & guides are certified tourist license: C.I. AN-412057-2 See you soon! AVIPTRIP team

Name: SergianTravel
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Naples, 98 Via Luca Giordano, 80128
Company description: La SergianTravel è una piccola agenzia di viaggi ubicata nel cuore del quartiere Vomero, in Via Luca Giordano 98 all’interno del vialetto situato di fronte a Trony (accanto a “La Botteghina” e” I giochi dei grandi”). L’agenzia, nata dalla volontà e dall’intraprendenza di Serena Maresca, opera da oltre 10 anni nel mondo del turismo offrendo un ampio ventaglio di proposte turistiche e di servizi, che vanno dalla biglietteria aerea, ferroviaria e marittima, alle crociere, ai pacchetti turistici dei migliori tour operator nazionali, offrendo alla clientela sempre prodotti di alta qualità e vacanze indimenticabili. Ciò che ci caratterizza è l’essere una piccola realtà capace di coniugare prezzi convenienti con i più elevati standard di professionalità, di assistenza pre e post-partenza, personalizzazione ed organizzazione dettagliata di itinerari turistici sia per i clienti privati che per i dipendenti delle aziende da noi seguite, alle quali garantiamo un’ottimizzazione dei costi delle trasferte senza dover però rinunciare alla qualità e al comfort desiderato.

Name: HMO Hakuna Matata Outdoor
Company description: We are an incoming tour operator specialised in active holidays in Tuscany. HMO is the acronym of Hakuna Matata Outdoor, which identifies our philosophy and way of life. we create tailor-made tours and programs with team building activities, games, orienteering and much more...

Name: Holimites
Company description: Holimites Srl was founded in 2000; it is the result of the ingenious idea of 5 young hoteliers of the Alta Badia - Dolomites. Our company name derived from the idea of spending your Holiday in the Dolomites; thus calling ourselves Holimites. It is our mission to create a new way of understanding and actively experiencing 'the mountain' by exposing the full potential the Dolomites has to offer its visitors. Imagine a holiday filled with endless sporting opportunities, a delicious cuisine and many other traditional cultural adventures that are sure to make your visit to this amazing territory unforgettable. In the year 2002, this idea won the SMG Marketing Award, a prestigious recognition of the South Tyrol Marketing Company (SMG) for the most innovative and creative idea. It was successfully designed to enhance the competitive capacity of Alto Adige - Südtirol destinations abroad. In 2003, Holimites became the official tour operator of the 'Maratona dles Dolomites'. With our robust reservation platform, we have the ability to sort through bookings and provide accommodations for over 1,500 participants and their guests in a very short amount of time. Holimites gives a special thanks to all of our official partners for contributing to our continued success. Every year, our partners propose ideas such as: new hikes, cycling trips and other mountain adventures that make our vacation packages unique and exciting for everyone. But, making your vacation a truly unforgettable holiday in the Dolomites remains our greatest success!

Name: Tourbuds
Company description: Tourbuds è una guida smart come il tuo cellulare. Grazie alla travell app Tourbuds potrai trovare il tour che desideri in pochi secondi. Scegli quando visitare un luogo ed esplorarlo secondo i tuoi ritmi. Immagina di condividere il tour con chi vuoi e, allo stesso tempo, risparmiando.  Tourbuds è questa guida, nata da un pluripremiato tour operator, con tutti i tour costruiti internamente e un’intrefaccia user-friendly.

Name: Travel South Africa By Siam Viaggi
Company description: Brand di Siam Viaggi per la programmazione Tour Operator dedicata ai viaggi in Sud Africa

Name: AR Viagens E Turismo UNP LDA
HQ Location: Portugal, Azores, Ponta Delgada, 14 Rua Jordão De Vasconcelos
Company description: Somos uma agência de viagens, em constante procura dos melhores recetivos locais, para que não falte nada na sua viagem. Somos especialistas em viagem em Grupo Acompanhados pelos Açores, Portugal, Europa e Mundo.

Name: Scaape Adventures
Company description: It was in 2020, when the world seemed increasingly different from what we were used to, that we felt the need to create something to show more people what we like most: nature and photography. We did not want to create another travel agency, but rather a new way of traveling and sightseeing. Where we connect with landscapes, trails and the experience of photographing all this with new knowledge. Because there is nothing better than being able to travel and return with great memories.

Name: Faraway Snc
Company description: Dal 2009, Faraway Viaggi opera a 360° nel settore dei Viaggi d’affari e del Turismo. La completa e costante soddisfazione dei bisogni dei nostri clienti è la sola misura della nostra competenza. Vieni a scoprire presso la nostra sede in Corso Torino 4 a Rivoli, le numerose offerte e proposte di viaggi e vacanze dei migliori Tour Operator italiani e internazionali. A vostra disposizione, un reparto interamente dedicato alle vostre vacanze, da soli, in famiglia o con gli amici, verso qualsiasi destinazione, dalla più vicina alla più lontana.  Uno staff di esperti è pronto a consigliarvi e a programmare i vostri Viaggi su misura, Viaggi di nozze, Crociere o Tour alle condizioni più vantaggiose sul mercato e a seguirti ad ogni passo per costruire la tua vacanza: dalla prenotazione alla partenza, con assistenza per ogni singola esigenza. Il nostro impegno è di rispondere alle necessità dei nostri clienti, fornendo loro una gamma di servizi di viaggio competitivi: voli, hotel, autonoleggi, trasferimenti, tour ed escursioni.

Name: MDS Experience
Company description: MDS EXPERIENCE nasce da un’ispirazione: come ripartire in piena pandemia, quando tutto il mondo si era fermato?  Abbiamo deciso di creare un portale dedicato al TURISMO ESPERIENZIALE, innovando e dando finalmente spazio ad un concetto fondamentale che sta alla base dell’idea di viaggio: l’ESPERIENZA. L’esperienza è sperimentazione, è vivere a contatto con realtà nuove, incontrare persone e conoscere culture.  MDS Experience (supportata da Mari del Sun Tour Operator https://www.mdsviaggi.com/ ) presenta la nostra selezione di esperienze, attività e soggiorni e si occuperà anche creare itinerari ad hoc e personalizzati!

Name: La Vita Toscana
Company description: La Vita Toscana is owned by Fabio & Silvia, two experienced and competent professionals in the tourism market who love their work, which they live with, done with utmost respect for foreign visitors who are planning to come to Italy and spend a holiday in our beautiful country. La Vita Toscana is not a travel agency but a small private organization specialized in developing tailor made tours in Tuscany in collaboration with selected farmhouses and villas, with which it has contracted conventions that provide up to 30% discount on official rates in behalf of its customers.

Name: Celtic Chauffeur Vacations
Company description: Welcome to Celtic Chauffeur Vacations Celtic Chauffeur Vacations  is a leading private tour operator in Ireland and Scotland. We are an Irish, family run business, based in Ireland’s Ancient East. We are passionate about travel in Ireland and Scotland and incorporate this passion with local knowledge and expertise to curate your bespoke trip of a lifetime. We pride ourselves in ensuring you get the most out of your holiday, enjoying a diversity of experiences, while staying in Ireland and Scotland’s most exclusive and celebrated accommodation, and travelling in style in our luxury fleet. By booking with us, you are ensuring an effortless holiday, where your focus can be on creating memories every step of the way.

Name: Meet West
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, Praça Nuno Rodrigues Nª7, 1600-171
Company description: Meet West is a Travel Agency which specializes in: Business & Leisure tourism Meetings and Events for organizations Incentive Trips, for team motivation Congresses, Conventions, Seminars and related events Promotional events, such as Brand and Product Launching, Press Conferences, Inaugurations, etc. We are experts in events organization in Lisbon, Estoril, Algarve, Porto and Madeira.

Name: City Contracts
Company description: City Contracts is your representative in Barcelona and Paris and focuses on negotiating the best contracts for the international Tourism Business.  Our multi-skilled team of professionals offers the highest level of service, excellent quality and the know how to meet all the needs & requirements of the client in today's competitive marketplace.  City Contracts has offices in the city centre of Barcelona and Paris and is therefore the key representative for all tourism services and international tour operators.

Name: Travexus
Company description: TRAVEXUS is a full-service destination management and M.I.C.E. company, that takes pride in building relationships on trust.   We aim to offer the best possible services for our partners and clients, by providing outstanding experiences for every guest in every group, in every setting. We have offices in Amsterdam, Rome, Berlin and New Jersey with dedicated staff, who specialize in the below mentioned service areas.    What we do Incentive travel Corporate travel Event management Business travel and meeting organization Leisure and holiday packages for groups Congress & Fair groups   Our Service Areas Netherlands Belgium France Germany Switzerland Italy United States of America

Name: PORTUGAL FOR YOU TRAVEL
Company description: Portugal For You Travel is a TOUR OPERATOR active in Madeira and Portugal with support in all languages by our team. Escape from your usual everyday life, we wait for you to realize your DREAMS

Name: The Roman Gay
Company description: BE YOURSELF. EVERYWHERE.  Official tour operator based in Rome, Italy. We are organizing guided tours of the Colosseum, Vatican Museums and walking tours of Rome. Mainly working with LGBT community.

Name: Road Trippin Italy
Company description: Road Trippin’ Italy is a boutique travel company specialising in premium transportation and tailor-made experiences across Tuscany and Italy. We own and operate a fleet of Mercedes-Benz vehicles, ensuring consistent quality, comfort, and reliability for every transfer—from airport pickups to multi-day itineraries, destination weddings, and corporate events. Our multilingual team works exclusively with travel agencies, event planners, and discerning clients who value attention to detail and authentic Italian hospitality. ✨ Your trusted partner for seamless journeys and unforgettable experiences in Italy.

Name: Italian Heritage Travel
Company description: Heritage Experience è guidata da Luigi Garzillo, partenopeo di nascita, toscano d’adozione, che dal 1970 studia e realizza viaggi emozionali, progettati per quei turisti sempre alla ricerca di esperienze nuove e autentiche. Luigi, grazie a diversi dottorati di ricerca in lingue, letterature, istituzioni dell'Europa Occidentale ed economia del turismo, è grande protagonista del settore “Tour Operator” da diversi anni. Le sue competenze sono state apprezzate più volte, durante le fasi di progettazione e organizzazione di alcuni tra gli eventi culturali più importanti degli ultimi tempi: manifestazioni internazionali di musica e teatro, mostre d'arte e archeologia, nonché organizzazioni congressuali, in tutto il Bel Paese. Come dice il suo brand, Luigi ha lavorato tutta la vita per lasciare un’eredità (heritage), non solo ai suoi clienti in termini di sensazioni, ma anche ai suoi figli che, seppur giovanissimi, affiancano il padre già da anni. Leila, Yasmine ed Omar riescono a coniugare perfettamente tradizione ed innovazione e possono vantare una buona esperienza nel settore. La famiglia Garzillo, propone viaggi “fuori dall'ordinario”, dove le mete diventano luoghi dell'anima. I viaggiatori scoprono usi, costumi e tradizioni culturali in un percorso ricco di emozioni, riuscendo a percepire la vera essenza di ogni luogo. Con Heritage Experience il viaggio non è solo spostamento, ma ricordo indelebile. La nostra Filosofia I nostri viaggi non si misurano in chilometri, ma in emozioni. Ti sembrerà di vivere dentro un film. Un film scritto e diretto da te, grande protagonista, insieme ai tuoi compagni d’avventura. Tutto ciò che pensi di sapere sul turismo sta per cambiare! Con Heritage Experience non soggiornerai “solamente” negli alberghi più belli, ma sarai accompagnato in un percorso studiato e cucito su misura per te. Vedrai città e paesi con occhi nuovi e da altre prospettive. I siti dell’UNESCO sono la nostra fonte d’ispirazione primaria. È da questi luoghi incantati che deriva la nostra idea di un turismo senza eguali sul mercato. La filosofia alla base di Italian Heritage Travel esprime un nuovo modo di vivere i Luoghi, fondato sul come esperire al massimo le mete prescelte. Partire con noi sarà uno stimolo continuo tra storia, curiosità, gastronomia e al rientro non potrai fare altro che parlarne agli amici. Scopri un nuovo modo di viaggiare, prenota uno dei nostri soggiorni. I nostri itinerari Le tue esigenze sono il cardine attorno al quale ruotano la gestione e l'organizzazione dei nostri itinerari, prodotti su misura, da sviluppare su ogni tua singola richiesta. Lavoriamo con una filosofia nata dall'idea di offrirti viaggi fuori dall'ordinario, dove i posti diventano luoghi dell'anima, raccogliendo usanze, costumi e tradizioni culturali da offrire ad un viaggiatore alla ricerca di un excursus emozionante, desideroso di una più chiara percezione del luogo visitato. Progettiamo esperienze che coinvolgono i sensi, tutti. I nostri viaggi sono viaggi del cuore, viaggi che arricchiscono in termini di conoscenza e cultura, ma soprattutto di emozioni nei siti italiani patrimonio dell'umanità, protetti dall'Unesco e scelti opportunamente per rendere un viaggio non solo uno spostamento, ma un ricordo indelebile. I nostri esperti Durante i tuoi viaggi sarai accompagnato dai nostri esperti scelti con grande cura. La loro conoscenza è innegabile, ma la capacità di comunicarti il loro sapere è altrettanto importante. Nei vostri viaggi potrai essere affiancato da archeologi, accademici, pittori, scultori, scrittori, musicisti, chef e non solo. Non ti trasmetteranno solo informazioni, ma verrai coinvolto in un’esperienza emozionale insieme a loro. In quasi tutti i nostri tour, è previsto un accompagnatore che si occuperà dei dettagli amministrativi, in modo che tu possa godere al massimo il tuo tempo.

Name: 5 Elements S.r.l.
Company description: 5 ELEMENTS è un'azienda nata dalla passione ed intraprendenza di affermati professionisti del settore turistico. I suoi fondatori sono figure professionali che vantano decenni di esperienza nel Tour Operating, nell’Incoming, nell’Alberghiero e nella rappresentanza di Aziende o Gruppi di Aziende di rilevanza internazionale. Un gruppo di lavoro moderno e affermato che non vuole inventare nulla di nuovo. Vuole ottimizzare e mettere al servizio del Cliente l’esperienza sviluppata in tanti anni con la giusta dose di attenzione ai propri clienti, flessibilità e innovazione. 3 sono i nostri dipartimenti:  - DMC (incoming in Italia per stranieri o per italiani che vogliono vivere e conoscere le nostre stupende città e regioni con il supporto di un’agenzia locale a loro disposizione) - GSA (rappresentanza di nomi e aziende illustri nel mondo del turismo) - TRAVEL (5 elements è anche agenzia di viaggi “tradizionale” con le migliori offerte di biglietteria aerea, navale e ferroviaria oltre ai pacchetti viaggio dei maggiori Tour Operator del panorama nazionale ed internazionale)

Name: Tritt - Case In Italia
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Zwijndrecht, 1 Mandenmakerstraat, nl-3334ke
Company description: Tritt - Case in Italia is an on-line travel agency specialised in offering holiday accomodation in Italy to the market. All locations are selected carefully directly from the owners and are of high quality. The portfolio includes apartments, villa's, farmhouses, residences and agriturismo locations. On a regular basis we inform our clients of new additional locations via the monthly newsletter - which is available on request via www.tritt.nl

Name: Le Vie Della Perla - Travelling In Calabria
Company description: Le Vie della Perla is a tour operator specialized into Calabria destination and Southern Italy. They provide every service you need for your stay: accommodation, tour guide, restaurants, transportation, activities and experiences, ancestry tour for finding your roots, destination wedding, consulance for helping you to organize your holiday by your own.

Name: Welcome To Italia
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Milan, 1 Via Ezio Biondi, 20154
Company description: Welcome to Italia è una rete d’imprese che riunisce: Proedi Comunicazione srl, leader nazionale nella comunicazione turistica; Vox Group, impresa specializzata nel fornire supporti tecnologici al mercato turistico e i principali tour operator delle più importanti aree turistiche nazionali. L’obiettivo di Welcome to Italia è quello di promuovere il patrimonio turistico italiano a livello nazionale e internazionale grazie ad una piattaforma online che unisca informazioni turistiche autorevoli e selezionate alla vendita di esperienze di alta qualità.

Name: BTTour - Portugal Bike Tours
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Caneças, 4 A Rua Dom João V, 1685-104
Company description: Portugal Bike is the commercial brand of BTTour, a leading bicycle tour operator in Portugal offering more than 25 bike tours. We develop a touristic product in Portugal. We are a Portuguese Tour Operator, licensed by the Official Tourism Board in Portugal, and we have operated since 1995. Our programs are designed so that the Client visits Portugal in a different way. These are one-week complete programs (or two weeks if you join two programs). Each program includes the transfers from and to the airport, daily picnics, the Tour with a Guide, daily dinners presenting the Portuguese gastronomy (cheese, regional desserts, our famous wines, etc.). It also includes accommodations (4* hotels, Charm hotels, B&B (Turismo Rural) and POUSADAS - lodgings in Castles, Palaces, Fortresses, Convents and Monasteries). It also includes the rental of a high-quality bicycle, personal Accident Insurance, Liability Insurance, backup car, assistance during the entire tour, documentation about Portugal Bike Tour, etc. In other words, it is a complete program... and it is unforgettable! :) Our purpose on each bicycle tour is to take people to get to know our History, the places of old battles and ancient conquests, contacting Nature, our Culture and our People, our Gastronomy and our Landscape. Our Client's profile is a demanding person with a medium/medium-high economic level, and the average age is 55. Clients come from many different places, such as USA, Canada, Ireland, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and also Germany, the Netherlands and Brazil.  Portugal Bike Tours - Discover Portugal ...on a bicycle!

Name: Cenários D ́Ouro
HQ Location: Portugal, Vila Real, Vila Real, Lote 16-a Loja D Av. João Paulo Ii, 5000-198
Company description: Cenários D´Ouro is a Tour Operator specialized in Incoming to the Douro and the North of Portugal. This operator was created by the touristic agents of our land with the objective of giving the ones who visit us true moments of culture and joy!

Name: Travelandia Srl
Company description: Travelandia è da 20 anni un tour operator che organizza vacanze, soggiorni mare, tours, fly and drive, crociere, viaggi di gruppo ed  incentive nelle principali mete turistiche mondiali.  Nel corso degli anni, la programmazione si è concentrata sul Brasile - ‘storica’ specializzazione di Travelandia - per poi allargarsi a Paesi come Cuba, Portogallo e Turchia. Negli ultimi mesi  sono state introdotte nuove destinazioni per soddisfare le numerose richieste dei clienti fidelizzati Travelandia e non,  che ci chiedevano di  visitare anche altri paesi nel mondo.

Name: ItaliaBella By AS SERVIZI - BOLZANO - ITALY
HQ Location: Italy, Trentino-alto Adige, Bolzano, 34 Via Novacella, 39100
Company description: ItaliaBella by AS SERVIZI è un'Azienda che si posiziona nel mercato turistico come specialista per l’Incoming nel Nord Est Italia. Per farvi una rapida idea di noi Vi consigliamo di visionare il nostro sito internet: www.italydolomites.com Agenzia aperta a febbraio 2010. Abbiamo lavorato esclusivamente con Clientela russa per i primi quattro anni. Dalla primavera 2014 abbiamo deciso di ampliare la nostra offerta a tutti i principali mercati turistici internazionali. Il nostro sito internet dispone di 10 versione linguistiche complete e per ogni mercato abbiamo una Collaboratrice indipendente madrelingua che gestisce i contatti con i Tour Operator esteri e i Clienti finali.   Siamo specializzati sulla nostra regione, il Trentino Alto Adige ma siamo operativi in tutta Italia, Baviera ed Austria.   target clientela: 2 target ben distinti: Clientela di alto livello da una parte e gruppi di turisti (Clientela di fascia media)    Le nostre proposte turistiche alla Clientela nazionale ma soprattutto internazionale:  - Vendita di escursioni giornaliere nel Nord Est Italia http://italydolomites.com/home-it/; - Vendita (tramite Agenzia di Viaggio) di tour di più giorni; - Noleggio di moto e moto-tours guidati nelle Dolomiti http://italydolomites.com/motorent/ - Selezione e prenotazione delle strutture alberghiere più adatte alla Clientela;  - Servizio di accoglienza in aeroporto e transfer presso le strutture alberghiere scelte; - Prenotazione servizi vari; - Organizzazione eventi;

Name: Wai Travel Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Cervia, 13 Via Giuseppe Parini, 48015
Company description: WaI Travel is born from the collaboration between Travel Designer Monia Montanari and Atonga Viaggi, the agency founded by Luca Maraldi and Laura Ronconi, who for over 10 years is partner of the best Italian Tour operators transforming ideas into dreams, desires in unforgettable experiences. Let’s them garant you a top level holidays by TOP Players.

Name: Riccione Notte
Company description: COS'È Operazione Riccione Notte è un pacchetto turistico (attivo fin dal 1998) che offre a prezzi vantaggiosi il meglio dell’offerta giorno e notte della Riviera Romagnola. CHI SIAMO Operazione Riccione Notte è il pacchetto turistico nato nel 1998 da un’idea di Pier Pierucci. Il Tour Operator che gestisce il pacchetto è PA incentive srl di Rimini, il responsabile e coordinatore del progetto è Claudio Aulizio, Antonella Mussoni è la responsabile commerciale, Maria Elena è la referente per le prenotazioni, Matteo Arlotti è il responsabile informatico e web designer e Pier Pierucci è il supervisore marketing. Operazione Riccione Notte e Operazione RN sono marchi di proprietà di Operazione Riccione Notte srl, i cui soci sono: Pier Pierucci, P.A. Incentive srl e DAMS Agency srl. Claudio Aulizio è AD di Operazione Riccione Notte srl.

Name: Absolute Ireland Travel
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, 31 Highthorn Park Glenageary, a96f4a6
Company description: Experience the ultimate in luxury and personalized travel with Absolute Ireland Travel. Our Dublin-based DMC specializes in designing bespoke travel itineraries throughout Ireland, Northern Ireland, and Scotland that cater to your unique interests and preferences. From breathtaking landscapes and ancient castles to vibrant cities and rich cultural experiences, we offer a diverse range of destinations and activities that will leave you with unforgettable memories. Our team of expert travel planners has a wealth of local knowledge and experience, ensuring that every detail of your trip is carefully considered and tailored to your needs. At Absolute Ireland Travel, we pride ourselves on our commitment to providing exceptional service and creating once-in-a-lifetime experiences. Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway, an adventure-packed vacation, or a luxurious escape, we can craft the perfect itinerary for you. Let us help you discover the beauty and magic of Island of Ireland and Scotland with a bespoke travel itinerary that exceeds your expectations

Name: VisitÉvora - Alentejo Portugal
Company description: At VisitÉvora, we believe in a culture of really getting to know the Alentejo, not just its stunning places. Our local guides and hosts are proud to welcome our guests and deliver memorable explorations. They have life stories and a background in the Alentejo, a region they love to share. We have thoughtfully put together tours and experiences that appeal to the senses of independent travellers or those who choose to hire your agency to help them find the most interesting and authentic activities in the South of Portugal.     If you have a Portuguese or international DMC/Travel Agency, VisitÉvora can help you plan all kinds of itineraries and activities that will meet your clients’ expectations. Working in close partnership, we will create the perfect agenda, while still allowing time to relax and enjoy the quietness of the Portuguese interior.  What we can offer: - HIGHLIGHT - TOUR OLIVE OIL, WINE, CORK AND GASTRONOMY - THE BEST OF THE ALENTEJO; - Private walking and car tours (half day, full day) in Évora and throughout the Alentejo (Elvas, Monsaraz, Estremoz, Vila Viçosa, Arraiolos, Redondo,  Evoramonte, castles, megalithic monuments,...); - Multi-day tours in the Alentejo (some also visit part of the Spanish Extremadura, the Algarve coast, the Beiras,…); - Day tours from Lisbon (to the Alentejo, Sintra, Cascais, Fátima, Óbidos, Santarém, Mafra, …); - Unique activities and experiences (olive oil, cork, wine tourism, gastronomy, hot air balloon rides,…); - Help organising different types of events in the Alentejo (scouting, locations, video, team building,…); - Private transfers and transport in vehicles of various sizes; - Classic car tours.

Name: Katana Viaggi
Company description: travel agency from 1989 in the centre of Catania our core business is due by honey moon, cruises and school trips. Highly specialised in groups management, incentive travel, events, wedding planner Incoming agency for  groups who want to discover the most hidden corners of Sicily

Name: Traviqo
Company description: Traviqo is an online platform where we match travelers with local experts who love to plan your next trip. These local experts live where you wanna go or  have been there regularly in the past. We call them our Wizards.  They know all about the place you'd like to go and would love to help you find the best deals. Whether that's a place to stay, a way to get there or just everything to do with it. It's like a travel agency, by locals.  And for a fraction of what you pay  at a regular agency.

Name: The Golf Traveller
Company description: "Come and be The Golf Traveller" The Golf Traveller verzorgt golfreizen voor diegene die kiest voor luxe, comfort, kwaliteit, service en flexibiliteit. Onze bestemmingen zijn primair Zuid Afrika, Thailand, Wales en Schotland. Met meer dan 30 jaar golf- en reiservaring maken wij reizen op maat voor de individuele reiziger en groepen. Wij garanderen onze klanten een uitmuntende en vergaande service samen met persoonlijke betrokkenheid en een bijzonder golfreisaanbod van de allerbeste kwaliteit. Ook geloven wij in 100% transparantie en objectieve informatie. Door onze onafhankelijkheid kunnen we u het beste ter wereld aanbieden. Stijlvolle hotels, charmante B&B, zorgvuldig geselecteerde golfaccommodaties, culinaire verwondering en culturele verbazing. Als geen ander weten we hoe belangrijk uw golfvakantie is. Dus regelen we alles, zodat u alleen nog maar hoeft te genieten. Wij bieden flexibele reisdata, privé transfers van deur tot deur, gerenommeerde luchtvaartmaatschappijen, uitstekende hotels, de mooiste locaties… The Golf Traveller is aangesloten bij IAGTO, International Association of Golf Tour Operators. Door dit wereldwijd netwerk kunnen wij u toegang verschaffen tot de meest bijzondere golfbanen en hotels in de wereld. Het biedt financiële zekerheid voor alle aangesloten touroperators en haar klanten.

Name: Travel Age
Company description: Travel Age è un Boutique Tour Operator online, con sede a Milano, specializzato in viaggi tailor made e tour creati su misura per privati e piccoli gruppi. Travel Age si presenta come un tour operator di lusso nuovo ed innovativo capace di offrire soluzioni ottimali per una clientela che desidera un viaggio interamente creato su misura con esperienze esclusive. Il team di Travel Age organizza, inoltre, viaggi di nozze per avverare i sogni di viaggio delle coppie in luna di miele, Incentives Travel, viaggi corporate e Retreat aziendali.  Il target di clienti sono viaggiatori con un budget medio-alto.  Travel Age ha un sito online da cui trarre ispirazione per viaggi in tutto il mondo. La vendita è basata su tour di lunghezza di medio-lungo raggio ed ha un database di circa 15.000 clienti, la maggior parte VIP. Si tratta di un'esperienza di acquisto "digi-physical" basata su un'idea ispirazionale online, la creazione del tour offline, la apertura di una web area personale sul sito e il miglior prezzo garantito.  Fondata nel 2013 da Marta Coin (Coin family), Travel Age è composta da un Team giovane, 2.0 e ovviamente appassionati di viaggi e wanderer, diretto da managers con oltre 10 anni di esperienza in viaggi tailor made e supportati finanziariamente da solidi investitori.

Name: Sulla Strada Srl
Company description: Sulla Strada srl is a company based in Rome that deals with renting and sale of electric vehicles for eco-sustainable mobility and tourism. We have our first shop of Elerent franchise for rental and sale of Ebike in Via Paola 35, where we also propose green and susteinable tours and visit of Rome and his neighboroud. In our second shop in Via Frangipane 22, near Colosseum, we are involved in the promotion of Guided Tours of Rome and the marketing of Made In Italy products for tailoring, handicrafts, food and wine. We strongly believe in green and sustainable future, especially in the tourism sector. We want to multiply the business opportunities between the traveler and tour operators, local and global.  Sulla Strada srl, your Eco-local guide in Rome.

Name: Fly2Europe Travel
Company description: I have the pleasure to introduce Fly2Europe Travel is an International tourism supplier offering its services for Tour Operators and Travel Agencies. Our buying power is strongest in Italy, but we can meet our clients’ needs in all tourism cities in Europe. By working with us you can benefit of our larger volume and stronger negotiation power and take an advantage of better rates. Our goal is to provide the best service for our clients, and to make their tour production as easy as possible..

Name: ITT Italian Travel Team
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 212 Via Alberto Ascari, 00142
Company description: Luxury & Bespoke Itineraries: Crafting highly personalized and luxurious travel experiences throughout Italy, catering to discerning clientele seeking unique and unforgettable journeys. Curated Culinary Experiences: Connecting travelers with Italy's rich gastronomic heritage through exclusive wine tastings, private chef dinners, cooking classes, and gourmet tours. Hidden Gems & Authentic Discoveries: Unveiling the lesser-known treasures of Italy, from charming villages and boutique hotels to authentic local experiences. For over two decades, ITT has been a leading force in the Italian travel industry, acting as both a Receptive Tour Operator and a Destination Management Company (DMC).  Our expertise spans a wide spectrum of travel needs, from crafting bespoke itineraries for families and groups of friends to orchestrating large-scale incentive programs, conferences, corporate events, and major university study tours.  We don't just arrange travel; we curate experiences, weaving together the rich tapestry of Italian culture, history, and gastronomy to create memories that will last a lifetime. **Crafting Your Perfect Italian Itinerary:** At ITT, we understand that every traveler is unique.  Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway amidst the rolling hills of Tuscany, an action-packed adventure through the Dolomites, or an immersive exploration of ancient Roman ruins, our team of seasoned travel experts will work closely with you to design a tailor-made itinerary that perfectly aligns with your interests, preferences, and budget. Our process begins with a deep dive into your vision for your Italian journey.  We'll listen attentively to your desires, asking questions about your travel style, must-see destinations, desired activities, and any special requests you may have.  From there, we'll leverage our extensive knowledge of Italy and our vast network of trusted partners to create a personalized itinerary that showcases the best of what Italy has to offer.

Name: Innovazione Vacanze
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 62/64 Via Dei Gracchi, 00192
Company description: La nostra è un Agenzia di Viaggi con Servizio Digitale Innovativo. Con noi le tue vacanze non saranno più un sogno ! Da noi trovi viaggi di lavoro, viaggi di piacere,viaggi di nozze con i migliori tour operator. Creiamo viaggi personalizzati secondo le tue esigenze. Scegli le tue vacanze con noi. Abbiamo riunito la nostra passione per le culture, paesi diversi con la passione per la comunicazione digitale innovativa, la tecnologia 4.0. In un Unico Progetto realizzato a Roma come Start up realizzato con Il Ministero Dello Sviluppo Economico e Confidi.Perché siamo convinti che il futuro la qualità della nostra vita e la crescita economica di questo paese appartengono alla tecnologia 4.0.

Name: EspritLibre.Travel

Name: Cicloposse
HQ Location: Italy, Siena, Pienza, 27 Via I Maggio, 53026
Company description: We are a bike tour operator – we organize cycling tours & vacation. Headquarter is in Pienza a lovely, famous, hill town in Tuscany.  We offer biking holidays: from Guided fully escorted tour  to Self guided to just few days bicycling experience to even the simple bike rental service. In addition, we developed the ultimate  cycling & cooking adventure, an active culinary tour. We help to create great  memories and lifetime journeys on saddle. Therefore we own the bikes,  in this way we control the quality and we’re fully responsible for your great experience Personally we selected the best region and areas to discover by bike under many point of view – scenic & quiet road, history and art, food & wine; nice lodging. First of all Tuscany – then our top  list is Sardinia, Puglia, Umbria, Piedmont, Mallorca and for 2020 Sicily. When we started we have been pioneers offering so well organized self guided itineraries. Now we are expert, we lived the evolution in technology and popularity, we consider ourselves part of Italian Excellence that makes the world dream. Gravel biking is the new project, we love it  and the challenge future. New for 2020 si the self guided or guided tour on strade bianche in Tuscany to enjoy the breathtaking landscape on real quiet roads.

Ci impegniamo a superare le aspettative dei viaggiatori più esigenti, assicurando qualità, professionalità e un pizzico di creatività in ogni itinerario che proponiamo. Ci posizioniamo in un segmento di mercato medio-alto, garantendo ai nostri clienti un eccellente equilibrio tra la qualità dei servizi e il prezzo proposto. Offriamo inoltre assistenza h24 per emergenze e un servizio di concierge di viaggio dedicato alla nostra clientela più esclusiva. Abbiamo rapidamente compreso che il nostro obiettivo non era quello di proporre i consueti pacchetti turistici offerti dalla concorrenza. La nostra aspirazione è quella di creare esperienze esclusive e affidabili, che possano lasciare un’impronta indelebile nel cuore e nella memoria dei nostri clienti, regalando emozioni che possano essere tesaurizzate per sempre. 𝗩𝗜𝗦𝗜𝗢𝗡 Diventare il partner ideale per viaggi straordinari negli Stati Uniti. Ci impegniamo a offrire viaggi personalizzati, con un approccio sostenibile e un servizio che ti segue passo dopo passo. Il nostro obiettivo è assicurare un’esperienza di viaggio senza stress, curando ogni dettaglio e fornendo assistenza continua. Con noi, ogni viaggio negli Stati Uniti sarà un’esperienza memorabile, semplice da pianificare e bella da vivere.

Name: Yoäg
Company description: Yoäg is a travel agency specialised in wellness travel: discover a country and have a wellness experience each day. At a time where we’ve never been so disconnected from ourselves and the natural world around us, we want our breaks to be more than an opportunity to see a nice landscape. We want them to inspire us on a deeply emotional level.  That's why our trips are not just holidays. They are transformative experiences. We help wellness professionals who want to offer a trip to their community ; and companies who want to offer a unique perk to their workforce: a moment to look after themselves.  What we do best?  Organise a gorgeous all-inclusive break with trusted partners ; so that our groups are left with only one thing to do: relax. Our values? Beauty: protecting the beauty of our fragile world with responsible trips Integrity: putting customer experience and healthy partnerships at the heart of everything we do Freedom: advocating for self-care in a world that spins a little too fast As a business made by human beings for human beings, we do everything we can to raise awareness around equality, diversity and inclusion.

Company description: Welcome to Romagna, Welcome to Italy. We are an Italian Tour Operator operating in Emilia Romagna and  Italy. Name: BonaFide Travel & Events
Company description: Running a travel agency and beginning to stress out ?  Are you overloaded with requests and need quick quotations to send to your clients?  Then we can help you!  We have built a huge global network since we started out in 2003, this means we have got you covered regardless of where your client is going or what they are looking for.  Buses, transfers, guides, tours, hotels, villas, meet & greet, team-building solutions, cooking, wine-tasting, beer tasting, restaurants , to mention some of the services we offer for your group or individual traveler. ONE contact for ALL destinations focused on competitiveness and first-class services. Name: Quattro Angoli Travel
Company description: Quattroangoli.com, Italy’s leading online travel company was founded in the year 2008. Quattro Angoli Travel’s rise has been lead by the vision and the spirit of each one of its employees, for whom no idea was too big and no problem too difficult. With untiring innovation and determination, Quattro Angoli Travel proactively began to diversify its product offering, adding a variety of online and offline products and services. Quattro Angoli Travel also stayed ahead of the curve by continually evolving its technology to meet the ever changing demands of the rapidly developing global travel market. Today, Quattro Angoli Travel is much more than just a travel portal - it is a one-stop-travel-shop that offers the broadest selection of travel products and services in Italy.  Quattro Angoli Travel’s Products:     * International and Domestic Air Tickets     * Low Cost Air Tickets     * Holiday Packages and Hotels     * Rail Tickets     * Cruise     * Car Rental     * B2B and Affiliate Services
