Name: The Doge Of Venice - Incoming Tour Operator
Company description: Our office is in the beautiful and funny beach resort Lido di Jesolo, at only 40 km from Venice. Our tour operator is specialized in incoming services in the Veneto area.  All employees are resident in the area and everyone knows their region. We speak Italian, English, Spanish, French, German and Russian. We have more than 500 Hotels and apartments in all Veneto area but especially in the most famous resorts of the Venetian Riviera: Jesolo, Caorle, Bibione, Lignano. During Summer, we have a wide offer of interesting excursions from Lido di Jesolo but we can always organize also individual excursions for the most demanding customers or for those traveling in low season.  Our EXCURSION’S PROGRAM includes full or half day excursions in English to Venice, the islands of the lagoon, Verona and Lake Garda, Verona Opera, the famous amusement park of Gardaland, Treviso & Wine Tasting, Noventa’s designer outlet and Florence. Our group department is able to offer you a wide choice of hotels in the main resorts and city. We are not specialized only in our region Veneto, but also all around Italy. We work with the best hotel and thank of our business we are able to offer you the most interesting rates for: Hotels, Guides, Boats, Restaurants and Cantinas and what evert you could need for the group selling. On request our TRANSFER department organizes transfer by bus, minibus or cars/van from airport/stations. At arrival the driver will wait for clients with a board in the airport/station arrival area. For the departure we advise your clients directly at the hotel about departure time and pick up.

Name: Samatur Viaggi
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 452 Viale Caduti Guerra Di Liberazione, 00128
Company description: Offerte Maldive scaturisce dall’esperienza ventennale maturata dall’agenzia Samatur Viaggi Turismo che, nel 2004, ha deciso di specializzarsi nella vendita di pacchetti turistici per le Isole Maldive.  Facendo questo mestiere da oltre 20 anni, sappiamo bene come chi decide d'investire in un soggiorno da sogno in un lontano paradiso tropicale cerchi un interlocutore di fiducia, cui affidare, senza remore, le proprie aspettative di una vacanza indimenticabile. Proprio per questa ragione, noi di Offerte Maldive abbiamo deciso di offrire alla nostra clientela un servizio di prim’ordine, che non ha eguali nel panorama dei tour operator italiani in termini di affidabilità, flessibilità e accuratezza.

Name: 365 Viagens
HQ Location: Portugal, Leiria, Pombal, Largo Da Biblioteca, 3100-566
Company description: Somos uma agência de viagens diferente e inovadora, proporcionando-lhe um atendimento cuidado e personalizado.

Name: Flumen Viaggi
Company description: Siamo un tour operator, attivo dal 1999 a Fiume Veneto, con una forte predisposizione verso il turismo accessibile. Abbiamo studiato e testato itinerari, che permettono di immergersi completamente nell'atmosfera speciale dei luoghi da noi selezionati, attraverso esperienze che coinvolgono tutti i sensi: si potrà ascoltare, toccare, vedere, gustare o apprezzare con l'olfatto.  Siamo alla ricerca di un viaggiatore slow, a cui proporre esperienze di forte impatto emotivo, che non ha fretta e vuole sentirsi parte dei luoghi che visita, fuggendo dalla massa e privilegiando le piccole realtà genuine e autentiche.  I nostri percorsi sono del tutto inclusivi e agevolano l'esperienza di ipovedenti, non vedenti e persone con difficoltà motorie. Sono stati creati coinvolgendo l'eccellenza degli operatori del territorio, facendo incontrare i professionisti del turismo con esperti qualificati in ambito accessibile.  Un progetto svolto con grande passione, entusiasmo ed energia.  Siamo inoltre specializzati in: -	incoming alla scoperta del Friuli Venezia Giulia per il mercato italiano ed estero; -	itinerari culturali, enogastronomici, trekking e settimane bianche/verdi in Carnia; -	turismo religioso, cicloturismo con proposte create "su misura"; -	tours negli USA "Viaggiare da Protagonisti", per piccoli gruppi in minivan, nella West, East Coast e in Florida, accompagnati direttamente da noi. Offriamo pacchetti vacanze con ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo, in quanto soci del network Welcome Travel, servizi di biglietteria aerea e navale, assicurazioni e visti turistici per aziende e privati. Serviamo CRAL, banche ed associazioni quali UTE, Lions, circoli culturali e sportivi. Abbiamo contatti diretti con fornitori qualificati ed affidabili, in Italia e all'estero, che garantiscono un'attenta assistenza in loco. Contattateci per qualsiasi richiesta, saremo lieti di servirvi. Tel: 0434 564112 E-mail: info@flumenviaggi.it

Name: PUGLIA TRAVEL AGENCY
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Lecce, 80 Via Ludovico Ariosto, 73100
Company description: For us at Puglia Travel Agency, sharing the deep knowledge of the Apulian territory means building original paths, to be proposed with familiarity and authenticity. Ours is a journey that starts from afar: it blends the experience of the "365 giorni in Puglia" and "BTM"  projects on the one hand, and the skills gained with "Vestas Travel" on the other. A synthesis that focuses on great human and professional potential as the natural culmination of a path made of commitment, passion and indissoluble bond with our deepest roots. This, in summary, is the concept behind Puglia Travel Agency, an ambitious project created to overturn the classic concept of Tour Operating and to give life to a new vision of Incoming Tourism. A project born already mature, ready to catalyze the best offers to be offered to service providers, operators and to the public itself. A B2B that, if necessary, becomes B2C.

Name: Iberian Travellers
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, 100 Rua José Elias Garcia, 2775-215
Company description: Iberian Travellers is an inbound travel agency focusing on exceptional holiday packages in Spain, Portugal, Azores, Madeira and Ibiza.

Name: EW Travel & Events AB - Europaweekend
Company description: Europaweekend är en privatägd researrangör som vänder sig till företag, privatpersoner, föreningar, skolor och andra sällskap som reser iväg tillsammans. Vår specialitet är att skräddarsy program för grupper i alla storlekar, konferensresor, incentive, teambuilding, utbildningsresor, personalresor och projektresor med studiebesök. Hos oss är kunskap allt och vi är själva ute på våra destinationer så ofta vi kan. Ibland med kund på plats och ibland på egen hand för att säkerställa kvalitén hos de leverantörer vi använder oss av. Vi besöker våra hotell, provar nya restauranger, träffar våra guider, kort och gott så säkerställer vi att alla de produkter som vi använder och rekommenderar är av högsta klass. Varje år arrangerar vi ett stort antal gruppresor i storlek från ett par personer upp till ett par hundra och vi har många kunder som årligen återkommit sedan starten. Vår ambition är att vara bäst på det vi gör och vårt mål är att du alltid ska vara 100% nöjd, vid bokningen, under resan och efteråt, när du kommit hem. Välkommen till oss!

Name: Lomatka Travel Company
Company description: Lomatka is a Tour operator in Finland, designing and selling sustainable tour packages customized to your wishes, we are you welcoming agent in Finland!

Name: Solmar Reizen
Company description: Solmar : al meer dan 45 jaar trendsetter in Limburg! Begin jaren '70 heeft Tony Vetrugno, zoon van Italiaanse immigranten, een visie. Hij droomt van een vakantie in het zonnige zuiden en hij wil deze droom graag delen met vele anderen. Dat dit indruist tegen de tijdsgeest deert hem niet en op 6 januari 1972 richt hij z’n eigen reisbureau “Solmar” op. De zon en de zee klinken alvast door in de naam maar het echte werk begint nu pas. Met een aantal zelfgemaakte smalfilms en een gitaar onder de arm schuimt hij de provincie af met een heilige missie : de Limburgers een opening bieden naar de wereld. Tijdens die infoavonden legt hij de fundamenten van z’n succesverhaal. Touroperator In 1973 stampt Tony naast het reisbureau ook een touroperator uit de grond. Hierdoor zet hij met enkele andere voortrekkers het internationaal toerisme mee in de steigers in België, met Italië als een van de trekpleisters. Het levert hem een reeks nationale en internationale awards op. Hij diversifieert gaandeweg het aanbod met nieuwe formules voor families, ouderen en zakenmensen. Naast de autovakanties zet hij ook de school- en cultuurreizen en de skivakanties naar Italië op de kaart, een segment waarin Solmar vandaag nog altijd marktleider is. Maatwerk Vandaag heeft Morena de fakkel van haar vader overgenomen. Samen met haar ervaren en enthousiast team doktert ze met de glimlach de meest geschikte reisformule uit voor alle reislustige klanten. Ze gaan voor niets minder dan het beste, de pioniersrol en de waarden van Tony Vetrugno indachtig. Het bestaande aanbod schaven ze voortdurend bij want maatwerk en innovatie zitten nu eenmaal in de genen. En zo blijft Solmar in Limburg al meer dan 45 jaar lang de referentie in schoolreizen, groepsreizen en individuele reizen. Uw vakantie begint hier!

Name: Explora Natura & Sport Tour-Opérateur Francophone Basé À Palerme
Company description: Tour-Opérateur et agence de voyage spécialisé sur le tourisme en Sicile. Circuits accompagnés, randonnées, découverte et fly and drive.

Name: Macro Viagens | Índia E Muito Mais
Company description: A Macro Viagens é uma agência de viagens de autor, certificada pela BIOSPHERE Responsible Tourism. Organizamos viagens de grupo autênticas, profundas e compassivas, com uma forte componente espiritual, para países como a Índia, Sri Lanka, Nepal, Butão e Tailândia. Fundada em 2017 pela Diana e pelo Igor - um casal praticante do Dharma de Buda, viajantes experientes e buscadores sinceros -, a agência surgiu da motivação de proporcionarem a quem viaja com eles um mergulho para dentro, a única viagem que consideram ser capaz de proporcionar realização profunda.

Name: InbicTours Douro Transfers & Tours
HQ Location: Portugal, Porto, Porto, Rua De Monsanto, 4250-292
Company description: Founded in the year 2018, in the invencible Portuguese cty of Porto, InbicTours is a tour operator that provides private and premium services. Our team is composed of young, motivated individuals driven by the passion to offer the best and unique experiences to our clients. We prioritize maintaining an intimate relationship between both parties. Join us now!

Name: Gli Unici Esperienze E Tradizioni Toscane
Company description: Attraverso un’ispirazione che guarda al futuro, il tour operator Mugeltravel e l’agenzia marketing Farmugello, hanno deciso di dare alla luce lo Scrigno de “Gli Unici – Esperienze e Tradizioni in Regalo”. Lo Scrigno racchiude esperienze e tradizioni di incantevoli territori come il Mugello, la Valdisieve, il Valdarno ed il Casentino, momenti unici di condivisione del tempo libero e delle proprie passioni. Sei tipologie di Scrigno: Perla, Acquamarina, Zaffiro, Smeraldo, Diamante e Rubino e sei diverse categorie: Soggiorni, Attività, Benessere, Esperienze, Tradizioni in Cucina e Idee Regalo. Un’ampia scelta di attività per scoprire territori inesplorati ma ricchi di storia, natura, benessere, enogastronomia e tradizione. Vivere un’esperienza straordinaria grazie ad una meticolosa selezione di partner. Micro e piccole imprese che rendono unico il tessuto economico e culturale; artigiani, produttori, albergatori,chef, aziende agricole, guide turistiche/ambientali, e tante altre aziende e realtà di qualità. Ognuno pronto a trasmettere la propria passione e professionalità legata al proprio territorio e alle tradizioni, dove poter riscontrare in prima persona l’originalità e la qualità nei prodotti e servizi forniti, una serie di esperienze esclusive. Il Team de Gli Unici opera con l’obiettivo di espandere il proprio raggio di azione sempre su quelle zone interne della nostra regione dove spesso il turismo ha più difficoltà ad emergere e le varie realtà economiche non hanno la stessa visibilità delle grandi città d'arte o delle zone costiere; quest'ultime potranno avere comunque un ruolo attivo, sostenendone la valorizzazione attraverso punti di promo-commercializzazione. Stiamo inoltre realizzando una forte azione di marketing e comunicazione e un rilevante avanzamento del progetto tramite una sinergia con attori della filiera turistica in diverse regioni d’Italia così da ricevere ancora maggior interesse per il nostro territorio.

Name: Sulle Orme Della Storia
Company description: Sulle orme della Storia è il primo tour operator italiano specializzato nel turismo storico Sulle orme della Storia nasce nel 2009 dall'iniziativa privata di diversi professionisti dei settori storico e militare e del settore turistico; la sinergia di queste realtà ha dato così vita al primo tour operator italiano specializzato esclusivamente in tale ambito.  L'esperienza ventennale del management di Sulle orme della Storia nei campi di rispettiva provenienza ha così consentito di proporre sul mercato italiano un nuovo ed esclusivo progetto che ci auguriamo possa riscuotere consensi fra i moltissimi appassionati.

Name: I BIKE NAPLES
Company description: " I Bike Naples" è un progetto di visite guidate in bicicletta per le strade di Napoli lanciato quattro anni fa dal consorzio ANEA, attivo nel campo dell'energia rinnovabile e della mobilità sostenibile. Il nostro team è composto da giovani napoletani con la passione per la bicicletta e con un grande amore verso Napoli. Crediamo nel grande potenziale della nostra città e soprattutto nella nuova frontiera del Turismo Sostenibile, visitare Napoli nel modo più divertente e meno inquinante possibile. In questi anni abbiamo accolto più di 3000 turisti da ogni parte del mondo con l'unico scopo di farli innamorare della nostra città e di fargli scoprire i suoi tesori più nascosti. Abbiamo concluso accordi con le maggiori strutture ricettive e agenzie di viaggio del territorio e con vari tour operator attivi sulle crociere, così da poter raggiungere ogni tipo di turista. Ci impegniamo ogni giorno per realizzare nuove offerte di ciclo passeggiate guidate che prevedano la visita della Napoli panoramica, storica e finanche una pizza a pranzo in una rinomata pizzeria partenopea. Napoli è un museo a cielo aperto che aspetta solo di essere visitato! C'è davvero un modo migliore di farlo se non in bicicletta con persone provenienti da tutto il mondo? "I Bike Naples" is a project of guided bicycle tours through the streets of Naples launched four years ago by the ANEA consortium, active in the field of renewable energy and sustainable mobility. Our team is made up of young Neapolitans with a passion for cycling and a great love for Naples. We believe in the great potential of our city and especially in the new frontier of Sustainable Tourism, to visit Naples in the most amusing and least polluting way possible. In these years we have welcomed more than 3000 tourists from all over the world with the sole purpose of making them fall in love with our city and let them discover its most hidden treasures. We have concluded agreements with the major accommodation facilities and travel agencies in the area and with various tour operators active on cruises, so as to be able to reach every type of tourist. We commit ourselves every day to realize new cycle offers guided walks that include a panoramic tour of Naples, historical and even a pizza for lunch in a renowned Neapolitan pizzeria. Naples is an open-air museum waiting to be visited! Is there really a better way to do this than cycling with people from all over the world?

Name: Dafne Viaggi Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Genoa, 82r-84r Vico Del Fico, 16128
Company description: Dafne Viaggi is a Tour Operator specialized in proposals for the discovery of Liguria’s protected areas and its main historical and cultural sites. From the splendid Mediterranean villages and landscapes of the Nature Parks of Portofino and Portovenere, to the historic center, the museums and the Aquarium of Genoa, from the famous stone walls and vineyards of the Cinque Terre to the woods and mountain landscapes of Beigua, Antola, Aveto and Alpi Liguri ... an unexpected Liguria to be discovered. School trips: for several years our Tour Operator has been working closely with the world of the school by creating incoming proposals for Liguria and carrying out visits and educational trips also to other Italian regions. Tailor made offers for groups and individuals, overnight stays in mountain huts or farms, walks, kayak and mountain bike excursions, food and wine tours, cooking classes... Dafne Viaggi has been selecting the best opportunities and the best itineraries that Liguria has to offer for years.

Name: BTM VIAGENS E TURISMO Lda.
HQ Location: Portugal, Porto, Porto, 144 Rua Arq. Marques Da Silva, 4150-483
Company description: Agência de Viagens

Name: Amaral's Trilogy
HQ Location: Portugal, Setubal Peninsula, Azeitao, 11 Rua Cruz Tudo, 2925-130
Company description: We're a boutique incoming tour operator run by proudly Portuguese hosts - friendly, multi-lingual and passionate about Arrábida Natural Park/Azeitão/Setúbal Peninsula - only 45mins from Lisbon.  We craft our experiences around the trilogy of Nature, Food & Wine – guests will enjoy the best our country has to offer, meet the locals and learn about our culture. We understand the expectations of our more discerning visitors.  Our programs are carefully crafted with every detail in mind so our guests can explore an authentic side of Portugal, off the beaten path and away from the crowds!

Name: Polar Viagens
Company description: Founded in 1961, "POLAR - Agência de Viagens e Turismo, LDA.", Based in Portimão, has a vast experience gained over the years resulting from investment in the quality of services and the tourism industry that it acted as  Along with the biggest and best global players travel and tourism, "Polar" is dedicated to providing the most complete and varied service, always looking to meet and serve the needs of our customers;  ◦ tickets for business or leisure;  ◦ Hotel Reservation in the world;  ◦ Planning and scheduling of holidays according to the customer profile, and has a varied offer and up to several national and international destinations;  ◦ Planning and Scheduling Professional Fairs, National and International travel and accommodation;  ◦ Travel Group;  ◦ Religious Tourism;  Come find us in one of our offices in Oporto, Gaia, Figueira da Foz, Quarteira and Portimão or contact us via our Site.

Name: GreenwaysItaly Tours
HQ Location: Italy, Pg, Bevagna, 6 Piazza Del Castello, 06031
Company description: We are an official Italian Tour Operator based in the heart of the beautiful region of Umbria.  We specialize in creating Unique  Bike Tours, Outdoor and Food & Wine Experiences in the Italian countryside. Our tours are unique off-beaten- path Experiences, designed to suit all fitness levels, from outdoor experts to family looking for small adventures.  We work closely with family-owned businesses, wineries, farms and organic food producers of the area who make this land a paradise for travelers. Umbria, a hidden green paradise, is the perfect place for nature lovers and travelers looking to experience Italy in a slow, peaceful and GreenWay.

Name: Luxurious Ireland
HQ Location: Ireland, Connaught, Sligo, Yeats Village Ballinode
Company description: Luxurious Ireland is the tour operator which specialises in luxury travel, bespoke private vacations, destination weddings, events and private tours for groups and individuals. We offer indulgence and our promise is one of unexpected enrichment and enchantment. We have available Ireland’s fabulous Castles, Great Houses and Luxury Hotels & Spas. Our handcrafted itineraries are designed to fulfill your longstanding dreams into travel reality.

Name: Exploro Tours
Company description: We are two young entrepreneurs with over 10 years of experience in the Italian tourism industry. We’ve always had a dream: share our passion for art and history with visitors traveling to Italy, by offering them exclusive and memorable tour services. Everything began in Rome, the Eternal city, which arguably boasts the most beautiful and popular masterpieces that the world has to offer. After many years of work in some of the most awarded travel agencies of Rome, we decided to start our own business and partnered with Love Holidays, a long-standing tour operator in Italy. With their help, we managed to establish Exploro Tours, an online tour operator firm whose mission is to offer exclusive tour experiences at competitive rates. We like to call it: “affordable luxury”.

Name: Portugal Hike
Company description: ABOUT PORTUGALHIKE PortugalHike is a tour operator specialist in Hiking, Walking and Multisport Adventure Tours in Portugal. We also run PortugalBike, which is specialized in Cycling and MTBiking Tours. Since 1995 we have been organizing Bicycle, Hiking, Trekking and Kayaking tours in Portugal. Being a Portuguese-owned Company, we know our country better than anyone else and we want to expose people to places and curiosities about Portugal that only a Portuguese knows!  Our target is that you visit Portugal …walking and hiking! On PortugalHike Tours you have the opportunity to visit our historical, cultural and landscape heritage in our National Parks, enjoy the sun and the beaches, and at the end of the day you can recover your strength with an exquisite dinner. You can taste our famous wines, amazing cheeses and lovely desserts, and try typical dishes of each region of Portugal. You will rest in cosy and charming accommodations. We always choose 3 or 4-star quality hotels whenever possible in each region or Bed & Breakfast units. Our accommodations are always the best offer of each region. With PortugalHike            Discover Portugal ... Walking and Hiking!

Name: Airzoone Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Sesto San Giovanni, 43 Via Levada, 33079
Company description: Airzoone - Il Tour Operator dei viaggi avventura Airzoone nasce nel 2001 come Tour Operator italiano che organizza viaggi di interesse naturalistico, culturale, storico-archeologico, geologico e sportivo in quei luoghi ancora sconosciuti al turismo di massa. Airzoone progetta viaggi avventura in QUAD - ATV - UTV - BUGGY - MOTO - ENDURO - MAXI ENDURO - 4X4 - MOTOSLITTA - MTB che previo accordo tra le parti vengono caricati sui nostri mezzi, carrelli o bisarca, e trasportati in qualsiasi destinazione dove si svolge il viaggio stesso e riportati a al proprietario. Per la conduzione dei viaggi disponiamo di mezzi all’avanguardia quali camion Unimog Mercedes Benz 4X4 doppia cabina, fuoristrada Toyota HJ80 e HJ100, fuoristrada Toyota HI-Luxe doppia cabina, fuoristrada Land Rover Discovery, carrelli da 3 a 8 metri per il trasporto dell’attrezzatura, minibus di diversa capienza per i trasferimenti, telefoni satellitari e rilevatori GPS. L'obiettivo principale che ci poniamo è l’elevata qualità dei servizi prestati e dal 2009 abbiamo in dotazione per la sicurezza dei clienti lo "SPOT localizzatore satellitare GPS". Attualmente Airzoone ha al suo attivo oltre 500 viaggi e raduni organizzati sia in Italia che in Europa, in Asia e in tutto il Nord-Africa. Ha servito oltre 3000 clienti provenienti da quasi tutta Italia, con assistenza logistica periodica durante l’anno a scuole di enduro e quad, oltre a manifestazioni di carattere nazionale quali ad esempio il Woman Desert Ride.

Name: Byways Of Italy
Company description: Byways of Italy is an Italian travel destination company specialized in creating unconventional travel itineraries off the beaten track. With passion and care we organize customized getaways and holidays in rural settings, villages and small towns in Italy for small groups, families, couples or solo travelers. Whether you want to reclaim your natural rhythm surrounded by charming natural landscapes, learn the art of mosaic, pottery and wood, live an unforgettable outdoor experience cycling or recreate your favourite traditional pasta dish, Byways of Italy can help you experience the pleasure of travelling far from mass tourism and live the authentic Italy. We strongly believe in the power of local communities and we promote a more sustainable and conscious tourism.  Explore the hidden gems of this wonderful country, differently. Get inspired by our all-inclusive holiday packages & tours (regenerate, taste and discover) or design your bespoke itinerary with us.  We provide: o	stress free all-inclusive itinerary o	accommodation (i.e. historical homes, family-run farmhouses & boutique hotels, country villas, bnb, agriturismo, albergo diffuso) o	immersive experiences (artisans workshops, food & wine tasting, local festivals)  o	transfers from/to airports, ferry/train tickets o	guided tours with professional local guides o	admission tickets o	self-drive packages o	support 24/7 Go beyond traditional routes, discover Italy through an unconventional lens, experience Byways of Italy. Contact us to help you get oriented

Name: BeTuga Travel
Company description: We are a brand within a major company / consortium, which has over 28 years of Trade and Hospitality Management in four Continents, BeTuga Travel was born not to be one more Travel Agency in the Market, but to provide traveling unique experiences to all our guest and friend. The Properties portfolio that BeTuga Travel represents, it is not extensive like most of Travel Agencies / DMC’s available in the market, but due to our vast knowledge and quality requirements only the ones that fulfill all parameters and criteria are accepted. Our Team are passionate by this industry and with their dedications and professional commitment they strive constantly to find new products that can apply to all our demanding standards, by this we can guarantee the best available product, service and above of all “value for money” which at the end, it can be understood as “Happy Guest”. Our mission is to empower our business partners with different business opportunities, biding our business relationship stronger, steady and life longer.

Name: Agenzia Viaggi Deotto Sas
HQ Location: Italy, Friuli Venezia Giulia, Codroipo, 1 Piazza Della Legna, 33033
Company description: L’Agenzia Viaggi Deotto è operativa sul mercato da oltre trent’anni. Nata inizialmente come agenzia dedita ai viaggi di piacere, negli ultimi 10 anni si è specializzata anche nel Business Travel.  Con grande professionalità ci proponiamo alle aziende locali e non, ottimizzando la fornitura di voli, hotel, autonoleggi e servizi di viaggio accessori.... in una logica di personalizzazione a 360°. L'utilizzo delle più aggiornate tecnologie e l'attenzione alle policy aziendali, ci permettono di soddisfare le esigenze delle aziende in termini di semplificazione della gestione dei viaggio e del contenimento del dudget di spesa. Manteniamo sempre alto anche il presidio dei viaggio organizzati appoggiandoci ai migliori tour operator italiani. La partnership col network Welcome Travel Group, network leader in italia, ci garantisce competitività e strumenti all'avanguardia. La nostra mission è dare un servizio attento e artigianale a qualsiasi cliente, leisure o business che sia.

Name: European Travel Xperts
Company description: -> We are an Austrian based Tour operator specialized in group tours       with a focus on the central part of Europe -> We are a full service incoming travel agency for Austria and other       European countries with a reputation built up by long-time business       relationships with touroperators, travel agencies and group organizers as       our clients -> We are your reliable partner for customized Coach tours in Europe,       Ski vacations and Transfer services

Name: Viagens Lucas Lda.
HQ Location: Portugal, Santarém, Rio Maior, 46 Praça Da República, 2040-321
Company description: A empresa Viagens Lucas foi constituída no ano de 1980 na cidade de Rio Maior, e desde o início da nossa atividade que nos dedicamos exclusivamente à “indústria da paz”: O Turismo. Iniciámos o nosso percurso com vários destinos no país e fora dele, desenvolvemos acordos com muitas companhias aéreas, sempre dando prioridade à TAP Air Portugal. A filosofia da empresa privilegia propostas inovadoras no conceito de tudo incluído. Esta modalidade revela-se um sucesso de vendas confirmado ano após ano, e esta especialização tornou-nos uma agência de viagens de referência no mercado. Ao longo dos trinta anos de atividade, a nossa equipa foi aperfeiçoando os métodos de trabalho e adquirindo a experiência necessária para lhe poder prestar serviços com toda a qualidade e segurança. Atualmente dispomos de modernos meios informáticos, pessoal devidamente especializado, pronto a servir na perfeição os nossos clientes! A sua satisfação total é o nosso principal objetivo!!

Name: SóPraSi
Company description: At SóPraSi, a tailor-made travel agency, we will always be at your disposal to organize an exceptional, private and quality trip to Portugal that aligns perfectly with your expectations! With a smile and good humor! We are Emeline (French) and Virginia (Franco-Portuguese), the two managers of the SóPraSi agency, based in Aveiro, Portugal, and launched in 2022. Our greatest pleasure is organizing a unique and memorable discovery of Portugal, not only for what you'll see but also for what you'll feel, share, and experience. Your desires, rhythm, and constraints will always be our first priority when creating a tailor-made and private program just for you. Moreover, our greatest satisfaction comes from knowing that you are happy with your experiences and delighted with your stay. Ultimately, our best reward is that you want to come back and visit us for more surprises!

Name: GRANDANGOLO VIAGGI
Company description: GRANDANGOLO VIAGGI - agenzia viaggi e tour operator

Name: Across - Luxury Travel & Safaris
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, Rua Latino Coelho 1
Company description: O seu operador turístico em todo o mundo. Contacte-nos e descubra uma forma distinta de viajar! O nosso produto de referência, o produto Across África, continua em crescendo de procura para destinos como Quénia, Tanzânia, África do Sul, Namíbia, Botswana e Moçambique com a sempre apetecida combinação do fantástico produto Safari com alguns dias de repouso em magníficos resorts nas espectaculares praias de Mombasa, Zanzibar, Pemba Island ou mesmo nas Ilhas Mauricias.

Name: Coimbratur Lda
HQ Location: Portugal, Coimbra, Coimbra, 6 Rua Dr. Rosa Falcão
Company description: Agência de Viagens em Coimbra, com mais de 20 anos de experiência no sector.

Name: La Piazza Travel & Tours
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Siena, 44 Via Giovanni Duprè, 53100
Company description: Incoming Tour Operator & Travel Agency The most dynamic agency in Siena! Today, thanks to a vibrant staff and effective use of the Web, we can find for you the best vacation at the best price anywhere in the world. Want to take a vacation in Siena, or you have to come for work/study? Contact us! We can find the right solution for your needs with competitive prices and services! Check our website and see our "Spread Bed&Breakfast" in the mediaval center of Siena! Do you have an apartment in Siena and you want to rent for short or long periods? Come to us! We can find the right guest for you!

Name: FORMAT TOUR PLANNER
Company description: Format Tour Planner is an Italian Tailor Made Tour Operator. Our offer, on the Italian national territory, is very wide and for all taste and needs. If this is your first time coming to Italy we'll let you live a unique and luxury experience in major tourist destinations, recognized worldwide, but with a different range from the normal standardized travel packages.  If you already have visited the main Italian cities, instead, we are going to make you leave the real Italian style of life you surely never felt before.  Our lovely Country has made up of thousands of villages to major implications both cultural and natural, unfortunately, not all known to the touristic business abroad. We are able to arrange your participation at exciting special events to make you live and touch by your hands the origins of our historical past, through workshops made by carpenters, papermakers master, glass laboratory masters etc…feeling and tasting the best ancient Italian tradition.  For your children we offer the opportunity to participate in summer camps at “Agriturismo”, where they can discover the feeling with the animals and the respect of nature, or Astronomical Observatories participating also at simulations of excavations with professional archaeologists on the around sites.  WWF Summer Camp, a great living experience into a National Natural Reserve, or Sailor Camp both the sea and the lake are our concept of vacation for youngest.  For adults such offer is available with various modes and levels.  During an Experience organized by Format Tour Planner you will not be treated as tourists but welcomed as friends to enjoy the full Italian hospitality.

Name: JoynPlayce
Company description: Joynplayce offers products of a high emotional and relational value, designed for an international clientele, sensible to relationships and unconventional routes, “off the beaten track”. People who really want to immerse themselves in the territory feeling at home together with our locals, people who want to be the protagonists of an adventure that generates a memorable, unique and unrepeatable experience.   JoynPlayce represents the joy of staying together (JOY), the pleasure of participating (JOIN) to an experience that engages and involves places (PLACE), people and passions, a game (PLAY) that enriches and unites the participants.  How many times have you heard these words? For us they are not just marketing catch phrases but a promise made to our customers (Tour Operators, Travel Agencies, and Travel Advisors) and to keep it we have deployed so much work, professionality, methodology, creativity, empathy and passion.  The brand JoynPlayce “Stories to live together” springs up to respond to the needs of a clientele who looks for professionality, safety and originality.

Name: GTC Company Broker Service
Company description: Siamo la GTC Company, consolidata azienda operante nel settore del turismo, con spiccata e strutturata attitudine al brokeraggio. Ci proponiamo, grazie all’esperienza maturata nel tempo, di garantire la massima visibilità alle strutture ricettive nel contesto nazionale, nonché dare loro supporto nei periodi di bassa stagione o di minore recettività del settore. La nostra realtà consta di un raggio di azione che si concretizza in 85 tour operator, distribuiti sul territorio nazionale, che si avvale inoltre di importanti accordi con Cral, Associazioni Sportive e Scuole.

Name: Aroopa Travel
Company description: Aroopa Travel is a travel agency based in Vienna. Our focus is on international and national trips and tours as well as cultural trips for larger groups. Friendliness and respectful cooperation are very important to us and we love getting to know new people and destinations on this exciting planet.

Name: Easylake Incoming
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Desenzano Del Garda, 17 Piazza Duomo, 25015
Company description: Since 2002 we offer our experience to support interntional tour operators creating and developing destinations in Italy. Expert in creation of bespoke packages for FIT, groups and incentive.

Name: I Viaggi Dello Stretto s.a.s.
Company description: I Viaggi dello Stretto nasce a Messina nel 1988 di fronte le coste calabre e il promontorio di Scilla dal desiderio e dalla volontà di creare un Tour Operator caratterizzato da un’alta professionalità, passione e dalla conoscenza personale ed approfondita di ogni destinazione proposta. Nel gennaio 2013 il fondatore de I Viaggi dello Stretto passa la mano ad una nuova proprietà  che mantiene inalterati i valori che l'hanno sempre contraddistinto legando nel solco della continuità, la vecchia proprietà alla nuova. Dal gennaio 2017, I Viaggi dello Stretto assume una veste societaria, con l’entrata in gioco di un giovane socio che ne prende la direzione, puntando ad ampliare il core business con la promozione delle bellezze dei luoghi rinomati ma anche insoliti e di grande suggestione della Sicilia e delle sue radici architettoniche e storiche.  I Viaggi dello Stretto coniugando la serietà e professionalità dello staff ad una offerta che ha la sua cifra nel mettere al centro il viaggiatore, per assicurargli una vacanza in empatia con quel territorio e con quelle tradizioni, è il brand ideale per chi voglia recarsi in Sicilia e nel suo incantevole contorno di isole.

Name: Rentautobus.com
Company description: Welcome to the LinkedIn home for RentAutobus.com - your favorite starting point for all chauffeured transportation and travel in Europe! Travel planners can make use of RentAutobus.com to book group travel in Europe, and save time comparing proposals from various ground transportation companies. RentAutobus.com makes it easy to schedule all type of Airport Transfers, Airport Transfer Services, Transport to and from Airports, Transfers to and from Airport, Airport Taxi Service, Airport Shuttle Services, Coach Hires, Coach Rentals, Bus Rentals, Bus With Driver Rentals, Minibus Rentals, Minibus Hires, Charter Bus Hires, and Charter Bus Rentals, Get information about private chauffeured transportation for individuals and groups traveling in Europe and around the world. Find various travel and transportation options like coach rental, airport transportation, limousine service, taxi service and tours around Europe. Transportation/shuttles to and from airport: this normally involves short rides between your hotel or other accommodations and your airport of arrival or departure, normally without any stops along the way, and normally for individuals or small groups. The vehicle and chauffeur provide you with a pick up and a drop off.  Take a look at our airport transport services. Coach Hire: service for small or large groups who are planning single or multi-day tours. The coach hire service can be around various countries or just around a city. Normally a fixed route and time schedule are planned. Coaches with drivers in Europe are also rented for days or half days without a fixed route for the purpose of city trips or day tours. In those cases a maximum distance per day is purchased and extra distance may be billed at a separate rate.

Name: Sugestões D'Aventura Viagens E Eventos Lda
Company description: Agência de Viagens Somos uma Agência de Viagens dedicada ao Turismo de: Aventura * Ecológico * Temático * Espiritual * Social * Negócios * Cultural * LGBT * Saúde * Grupos Travel Agency We are a Travel Agency dedicated to travel and leisure in: Adventure * Ecological * Thematic * Spiritual * Social * Corporate * Cultural * LGBT * Health * Groups

Name: Solférias Madeira
HQ Location: Portugal, Madeira, Funchal, 19 Rua Visconde Do Anadia
Company description: Sob esta designação desde 2013, a Solférias Madeira é um Operador Turístico de referência que oferece ao mercado português (com especial incidência sobre o mercado madeirense) programas turísticos de lazer e negócios para cerca de 50 destinos espalhados pelos cinco continentes. Com uma variedade de pacotes turísticos de qualidade, a Solférias Madeira tem como missão tornar os sonhos dos clientes uma realidade e superar as suas expetativas, procurando a excelência dos produtos e serviços desenvolvidos. Toda a direção e gestores de destinos têm mais de 15 anos de experiência no mercado turístico português na vertente de Operador Turístico.

Name: MyItalytotheWorld
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Florence, 8r Via Il Prato, 50123
Company description: Tecnologia, esperienza pluridecennale, unicità, creatività: siamo un nuovo Tour Operator on line nel panorama italiano, ma anche molto di più. Il nostro sistema di booking online B2B è user-friendly, estremamente veloce, intuitivo ed eccezionalmente performante. Noi lavoriamo con l’agenzia e non per l’agenzia, costruiamo insieme al cliente il prodotto finito, dando al rapporto professionale, quel valore aggiunto di cui l’agente di viaggio ha bisogno rispondendo alle esigenze più diverse. Offriamo prodotti e servizi che si distinguono da quelli degli altri player del mercato per la loro unicità e particolarità e numerosità, con un eccellente rapporto qualità/prezzo.

Name: Travel-in-Holland.nl
Company description: www.travel-in-holland.nl is een nieuw concept op het gebied van ”unique recreation accommodations”. Op ons platform worden alleen de idyllische plekjes van Nederland getoond. Het doel van dit nieuwe concept is een toegevoegde waarde bieden aan recreanten en recreatieondernemers. Travel-in-holland.nl werkt met een unieke combinatie. Zo vindt u op onze site een overzicht van hotels, B&B, campings, recreatiewoningen en appartementen. Door deze combinatie hoeft de recreant niet verder te zoeken als ze een hotel willen in plaats van een camping. Door dit aanbod is het eenvoudig zoeken voor buitenlandse toeristen en mensen die niet bekend zijn in de regio. Travel-in-holland.nl biedt u meer dan alleen idyllische accommodaties. Bij de recreatieaccommodaties vindt u informatie over de provincie. Tegelijk wordt er een overzicht van leuke activiteiten en bezienswaardigheden getoond. Zo kunt u uw complete vakantie boeken vanaf 1 platform. Wilt u optimaal genieten van uw vakantie? Reserveer dan direct een restaurant. Travel-in-holland.nl biedt u dan ook alle comfort van een reisbureau, alleen dan thuis vanaf de bank te boeken. Zo kunt u genieten van een heerlijke romantische, culturele of actieve vakantie!

Name: YourDMC
Company description: YourDMC is a concept which was made as an answer to modern travellers and travel company’s needs. YourDMC part of the PIBI Group, renown Polish event organizer. YourDMC is PIBI Group’s international brand dedicated to deliver the best services in destination management in tourism. It is a combination of more than 15 years of experiences gained working in different segments of the travel industry from guiding, planning, producing, hospitality, team buildings, events, up to congresses and major international events like EuroBasket 2013 or EURO 2012. Through many years of working we have build up a strong partnership network in Central and Eastern European countries. Therefor we’re able to offer you competitive prices and the best quality of the services. Our speciality is a client focused approach and extraordinary services for a reasonable price. YourDMC, destination management company offers services for travel agents, tour operators, companies, associations as well as individual travellers. Beside DMC services we are as well professional congress organizer (PCO) and marketing agency. You search, we provide concept – is putting focus on you – our customer, for us nothing is impossible and we’ll gladly prove it if you’ll be willing to give us a chance. 24h emergency service and support – we have 24h emergency and support service to guarantee your safety and maximum comfort. 24h reply/offer guarantee – we strive to answer to your request and send you first offer in 24h. Destinations: Albania, Austria, Baltic countries (Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia), Belarus, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Czech Republic, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Montenegro, Netherlands, Poland, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Switzerland, Ukraine.

Name: LiberalViagens

Company description: Somos uma agência de viagens fundada em 2006, com muita experiência no mercado, pautamos por um serviço personalizado, 24h por dia, 7 dias por semana. Dispomos de ofertas que abrangem os quatro cantos do mundo, assegurando cruzeiros, hotéis, voos, transferes, excursões e seguros. Se procura um destino para fazer uma escapadinha com a sua cara metade, umas férias em família ou até mesmo uma lua de mel apaixonante, nós iremos ajudá-lo a encontrar uma opção à sua medida, para que tenha uma experiência completamente inesquecível! Também organizamos e acompanhamos excursões a nível nacional e internacional. Liberal Viagens, Damos asas aos seus sonhos!

Name: Honest Routes
Company description: We are the travel agency for curious travellers that want to go deeper in exploring Portugal. We plan and develop every experience to be unique, surprising, delicious, unforgettable. We create cultural and historical tours with local amazing guides. Come along - where there’s a tale, there’s a way - let us show you the way.

Name: 8Seasons Lappland Tours AB
Company description: 8Seasons Lappland Tours is specialized in the travel industry for Scandinavia since 2009.  The strengths: The team is working in most of the segments of the branch all year around – as tour operator, travel agency, DMC and as tour guides. This gives a widespread insight in the travel industry and we are always up to date regarding new trends. The further development of sustainable tourism in the North is one key factor in the work of 8Seasons Lappland Tours. One department, mainly under the brand name Vision Travel North, works as a consultant for local companies and tourism board organizations, like Heart of Lapland, part of Swedish Lapland.  We are a proud member of forumandersreisen since 2012 and are regularly completing the TourCert Check. This emphasizes our philosophy and intensive efforts to develop sustainable tourism in Europe. Lappland Tours is the brand name for the online travel agency from 8Seasons Lappland Tours. Operating directly from Swedish Lapland results in an excellent knowledge about Finnish Lapland, Swedish Lapland and Northern Norway. Lappland Tours is focused on the German speaking market. www.lapplandreisetours.de www.silvester-in-lappland.de 8Seasons4Women is the brand name for the women travels to Scandinavia. Our travel´s offer an experience in real silent with a close contact to nature and the opportunity to experience the culture of the Northern regions. We attach much importance to maintain the existing infrastructure and to develop the collaboration between the local companies. www.8seasons4women.com

Name: Laifain Experiences
HQ Location: Italy, Trentino-alto Adige, Bolzano, 16 Via Piave, 39100
Company description: We organise guided tours and MICE events in South Tyrol. Thanks to our know-how and extensive network of partners and locations, our clients get to experience South Tyrol in a tasteful away.  Following the principles of slow, genuine and gentle discovery, our guests can get in touch with South Tyrolean culture and nature. Hand-picked routes around art, culture, cuisine and wine are on the programme, as well as soft hikes and bike tours to wineries and other fascinating culinary stations. The focus of these activities is on encounters with the local people.  laifain experiences is the new business field of Luis Pichler GmbH Travel Agency in Bolzano, Italy. Its many years of experience - it has been around since 1981 - make it one of the most successful travel agencies in South Tyrol. laifain for companies: •	Events, meetings and conferences in premium locations  •	Incentives and retreats that impress from arrival to departure  •	Day and multi-day experience packages suited to the company’s needs laifain for private clients: •	Art, culture, culinary and wine experience packages •	Tailor-made itineraries according to our clients’ interests

Name: CAT VIAGGI
HQ Location: Italy, Piedmont, Turin, 68 Via San Secondo, 10128
Company description: Siamo riconosciuti ufficialmente dall’Ente del Turismo Australiano, certificati dell’Ente del Turismo della Polinesia Francese, nonché specialisti di Nuova Caledonia, Nuova Zelanda, Isole Fiji, Isole Cook e Pacifico in genere. Siamo pronti ad ascoltare i vostri desideri e a rendere la vostra vacanza o il vostro viaggio di nozze un’esperienza indimenticabile. E se avete dei bimbi … koala e canguri li aspettano! Our tours can also be customised with a wide range of activities that happen amidst the exceptional beauty and vibrancy of Ireland and are supported by leading national tourism service providers, top hotels and expert guides.

Name: AVD Travel
Company description: AVD Travel, Opgericht in 1979, een reisbureau in het hartje van Mechelen met een groot aanbod aan reizen op maat. Deskundige, persoonlijke service, doorgedreven productkennis en jarenlange ervaring is wat AVD Travel u kan bieden.

Name: Youfishnorway
Company description: Youfishnorway is a modern travel agency that provides authentic fishing experiences to people all over the world. With our local expertise, hosts, sustainable approach and digital technology we seek and work to give you a smooth and transcendent travel experience. We love travel by any sort, but we especially fancy the combination of outdoor recreation and luxury. We also want to inspire the industry to create, take action and preserve the environment. In this we mean that innovation and businesses must work with nature, so that the world tourism can grow sustainable and have strong and healthy bones to carry the next generations to come. At last you dont have to be a "die hard" fisherman to travel with us. Yes its our passion but nature is our playground and the opportunities are endless. We always want to show the joy that fishing offers, even if it’s just for one day. Team Youfishnorway, our host, partners and local experts have so much to show you.

Name: BLASTER SRL
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Cassola, 74 Viale San Giuseppe, 36022
Company description: Fidatevi!  Mettiamo a vostra disposizione 20 anni di esperienza e conoscenza dei territori per trasformare un semplice desiderio in un viaggio reale e mai banale AGENZIA VIAGGI E TOUR OPERATOR RICONOSCIUTA SUL TERRITORIO....                                            e ricordate in AGENZIA è MEGLIO PERCHE': VI ASCOLTIAMO ! Perché  i viaggiatori  non sono tutti uguali ….. sappiamo che c’è chi quando viaggia non può fare a meno di provare la gastronomia locale e lasciarsi andare ai piaceri della tavola, altri  invece si fanno coinvolgere dal ritmo della musica e delle danze e cercano sempre la colonna sonora perfetta per rendere indimenticabile un esperienza,  altri ancora ricordano con piacere e intensità l’odore di un luogo o le persone che hanno conosciuto e con cui hanno condiviso avventure e scoperte. …. la Blaster Viaggi vi saprà consigliare …. CI METTIAMO LA FACCIA ! Vi tuteliamo a rigor di legge, conosciamo i vostri diritti e li rispettiamo e li facciamo rispettare ai tour operator, corrispondenti e compagnie aeree. Operiamo in maniera chiara e avendo un ampia conoscenza del mercato vi salviamo dagli ‘specchietti per  allodole” che a volte il mondo del turismo online  vi riserva! ESCLUSIVITA' ! Realizzeremo il vostro viaggio personalizzandolo per renderlo unico, creando solo per voi itinerari con mete che non avete ancora mai avuto modo di  vedere neanche nei cataloghi di settore; oppure riflettere su viaggi  "base" pre costituti e di variare poi itinerari e strutture alberghiere, sempre ovviamente guidati dalle nostre ragazze MAI SOLI! Un'assistenza continua che inizia con il primo contatto ed è sempre presente fino al vostro ritorno con una linea Helptosmile a vostra disposizione. AFFIDATEVI A NOI, SARA’ COME FIDARVI DI VOI STESSI!!

C2I represents an exclusive and innovative network focused on the leisure and lifestyle sector, which brings together both international tour operators, who work with Italy, and Italian tourism entrepreneurs, owners, or managers of tourism products and services. www.connect2italy.com Twitter  https://twitter.com/connect2italy

Name: Bianco Viaggi Tour Operator
Company description: Siamo specializzati in Viaggi e Pellegrinaggi a Medjugorje, Lourdes, Fatima, San Giovanni Rotondo, Roma, Collevalenza, Assisi, Terra Santa, Roma. Bianco Viaggi Tour Operator cura tutti gli aspetti di Direzione Tecnica per ogni viaggio in partenza. Cosa significa? In pratica potrai beneficiare di un efficiente servizio di prenotazione, un accurato servizio di assegnazione camere in hotel scelti tra i migliori, una scelta di operatori per i trasporti e trasferimenti tra i più confortevoli e con autisti gentili e disponibili. Non da meno la dedizione e cura, insieme alla squisita delicatezza e profonda spiritualità delle guide che accompagnano tutti i pellegrinaggi.

Name: Imperial Travel Vienna
Company description: Imperial Travel Vienna is led by the second generation within our family company.  We have 15 years of experience in incoming group and private tours.  Travel is not only our work but also a passion we live for. Be it exploring the world ourselves or showing our most loved cities to our valued visitors. From our own travels, we know that holiday time is too precious to be spent on a mediocre tour. The experience of an outstanding tour will stay with you for a lifetime.   Unlike other travel agencies, we self-deliver our tours not only in Vienna but in Budapest, Prague, and Bratislava as well. For this reason, you can be sure you will experience the same high-quality services in all of our tour locations.   We are specialized in Jewish heritage tours.  We offer both private and group tours oriented at discovering the rich Jewish cultural and religious history of Central Europe.  Jewish heritage intertwines with our personal family history and for this reason; it is especially close to our hearts.   We pride ourselves on providing the highest standard of services. As we have traveled extensively we put together our tour itineraries to meet the needs of the most demanding travelers. When you travel with us no request can be too small or too big!   Using Mark Twain´s words we would like to encourage you to ``Explore. Dream. Discover``!   We hope to meet you in person and have the chance to help you discover our most loved cities and create memories of a lifetime!

Name: Becool Travel
Company description: BeCool Travel connects independent travellers to local tour operators, for fairer and more sustainable ways of traveling. We offer a great range of nature holidays in Portugal, and travel services with live availability, catering for an assortment of interests and needs. Find that interesting small hotel, take a walking tour on the back trails away from the crowds, join a small guided group with like-minded travelers, explore secret spots on a road-trip, among many other meaningful holiday experiences! #natureholidays #becooltravel #walkingholidays #travelinportugal #selfguidedholidays #smallgrouptours #wandern #wanderreisenportugal #sustainabletourism

Name: Via Con Me
Company description: Via con me somos un tour operator español, innovador en el concepto de crear propios viajes, a destinos muy específicos como Italia, rincones y lugares poco conocidos. Innovadores por nuestro concepto de viajar exclusivo y sobre todo sin intermediarios. En Via con me actuamos como receptivos, sin intermediarios, gestionando directamente los servicios de cada destino, asegurando los mejores precios y estándares de calidad propios. Contamos con un equipo profesional de gestión, con agentes especializados expertos en cada uno de nustros viajes y una red de correspondientes en cada destino. Todo supervisado siempre por la persona experta en el territorio. Además ofrecemos viajes con un número limitado de salidas para garantizar una serie de mejores servicios. Nuestra meta es crear viajes exclusivos y diferentes para ofrecerlo al mejor precio.

Name: Calsedon Vakanties
Company description: Calsedon Vakanties is an innovative and dynamic all round tour operator on the Dutch Market operating from Amsterdam to several destinations.

Name: MariaCares Sweden AB
Company description: MariaCares Sweden AB is the first medical tourism agency in Sweden arranging medical treatments abroad.🌍 ⠀ MariaCares helps you to combine #traveling with the best medical treatment. We consult you on your request and prepare a medical plan within 48 hours. 🔖 The whole planning and organizing process is under our control. Moreover, we take care of all formalities throughout your #experience with us. ⠀ Our goal is to provide top quality care and medical experience. ⠀ MariaCares is a medical travel agency in love with bringing value to its customers. We are pioneers in the Swedish market and connect you and the clinical provider. The idea of helping people to improve their #health alongside the unforgettable experience drives our work. ⠀ Therefore, we provide outstanding quality experience on the market. Together with the best medical providers in partnership, MariaCares fulfills the goal of bringing advanced medical solutions for everyone. ⠀ Follow our publications, here we will talk about our work and opportunities to preserve or restore your health.💚🩺 ⠀ #mariacares #mariacaressweden #mariacaresswedenab #medicaltourism #medicaltourismagency #assistantagency #treatmentabroad #medicaltreatment  #medicalcare #professionalcare #healthylife #behealthy #behappy

Name: Caropa AB

Name: Navitalia.com
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Bari, 6 Corso Vittorio Veneto, 70123
Company description: S E M P L I C I T A'  e  S I C U R E Z Z A ►  Navitalia è una piattaforma per prenotare traghetti in modo facile ed indipendente: attraverso pochi step guidati è possibile eseguire la prenotazione desiderata e procedere al pagamento  con carta di credito nella massima sicurezza (il nostro programma e-commerce è prodotto egestito dal Consorzio Triveneto). ►  Il nostro Booking on line è sempre attivo; in alternativa è possibile eseguire opzioni, prenotazioni o ricevere assistenza contattandoci . ►  Siamo una vetrina costantemente aggiornata che:      •  anticiperà le bellezze dei porti di partenza e di quelli di arrivo di tutte le Compagnie di Navigazione operanti nel Mediterraneo;      •  stuzzicherà la mente con allettanti pacchetti vacanze. C O M P E T E N Z A Da oltre 50 anni nel settore dei trasporti e dei tour operator internazionali e nazionali, abbiamo unito conoscenze e capacità di diverse generazioni, certi di poter offrire al pubblico un servizio altamente competitivo. A garanzia ci sono le ottime doti di problem solving che caratterizzano l'intero staff: il nostro capitale umano, con la sua esperienza, è ogni giorno al servizio del cliente per la sua massima soddisfazione. P A S S I O N E L'amore per il mare e la passione per le navi sono stati tramandati da padre a figlio dando vita all'Agenzia Marittima Maurino Shipping, raccomandataria della Compagnia Marittima Tirrenia di Navigazione, e al marchio Navitalia.com, dedicato alla biglietteria marittima passeggeri/merci ed ai viaggi. Questo amore e questa passione si fondono in un team che lavora con la consapevolezza e la gioia di svolgere uno dei lavori più belli al mondo. La richiesta di preventivo per una partenza è il primo passo per far viaggiare la mente oltre i confini del proprio campo visivo. Troveremo noi la migliore soluzione per trasformare il preventivo in una prenotazione. Non resta che preparare le valige...

Name: Voice4Africa

Name: VTasking
Company description: At VTasking, we help small business and entrepreneurs focus on their core mission while offloading business travels, contract renewals, expense reporting and more. Yolanda's background is in the travel industry and management, where she had worked for a subsidy of Expedia as well as an independent agent. She was the Founder & CEO of a Travel Consultancy, a personalized travel agency focusing on creating custom experiences. This background had enabled and trained her to handle complex coordination and scheduling tasks that resulted in the founding of the virtual assistance service, VTasking.com Our mission is to provide excellent support to the entrepreneurs and small business that make the present and create the future. We strive to ensure our clients reclaim their time and focus on what matters to them while we provide them with the needed foundation to take care of the necessary tasks no business can escape. Name: Brand New Journey
Company description: Met Brand New Journey pakken we het anders aan. Breder, frisser, beter. We weten hoe we jouw merk verder op weg kunnen helpen. Wat daarvoor nodig is. Waarom en hoe. *We’re a travel agency for brands* Samen stippelen we de optimale route uit. We kijken naar de kracht van jouw merk, maar vooral ook naar je positie en je passagiers. Want wat gebeurt er om je merk heen? Waar zitten je klanten én hoe zorgen we daar voor meer interactie en beweging? Vanuit een sterk creatief concept en een doordachte content strategie trekken we eropuit. We zorgen zo voor een frisse aanpak en een unieke, combinatie van new media storytelling en old skool positionering. Dit geeft jouw merk richting en de juiste brandstof om te kunnen versnellen. *To infinity and beyond* Wij zorgen ervoor dat jouw boodschap op de plaats van bestemming komt. We weten hoe je je merk verder brengt, waarmee je meer bereikt en dichter bij je doelgroep komt. We willen jou inspireren, enthousiasmeren. Brand New Journey werkt nooit op de automatische piloot; jouw merk en de bestemming staan centraal. En daar gaan we heel ver in. *Our force is with you* Brand New Journey is uitstekend thuis in concepting, art direction, copywriting, storytelling, content strategie, online marketing en webbuilding. We weten de weg door de hele customer journey én we weten alles met elkaar te combineren. En daarin zit onze unieke kracht. Dankzij de verschillende disciplines die hecht samenwerken, zorgen we voor een verbindend en verrassend brandingstraject.

Name: CONNECTED DESTINATION By TRAFFICS.DE
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, Plaça Cort 12, 07001
Company description: Connected Destination is a new Platform made for hoteliers for contracting use.  With Connected Destination, we digitize entire holiday regions and connect them online with a various B2B & B2C distribution channels.  Unique is the merging of traditional distribution channels with online channels.  Thus, providers from the destination in real time and digitally can provide their services and availabilities, prices to travel distributors such as tour operators, travel agencies and OTA's. Connected Destination was founded by a long-standing team of tourism experts, TravelTech experts and investors from Germany. The team members have over 30 years of professional experience in various fields of industry and bring with them an excellent network. the vision behind Connected Destination Connected Destination based in Berlin and Palma de Mallorca, develops and distributes technical solutions for the central digitization of the global provider / customer process of a tourist destination. So are the services of the providers like. eg hotel rooms, apartments, villas, sports activities, bicycle, boat rental etc .. digitized and displayed in real time on all point of sale online bookable. In addition, we cooperate with governments from the target area and enable tourist offices and city halls of the regions to digitize their information and offers and place them on the Connected Destination global platform for the sales channels. the travel technology company behind Connected Destination The Connected Destination Holding Company is owned 100% by traffics GmbH with Headquarter in Berlin, Germany. The Holding Company runs with several partners and investors on a global front. stay connected

Name: LAB051
Company description: LAB051 è una azienda nata nel luglio 2016 a Marzabotto, con all’interno competenze trasversali e un forte legame al proprio territorio. Ci occupiamo di produzione video, fotografia, campagne di comunicazione, social, multimedia, promozione del territorio ed organizzazione di escursioni e viaggi sull’Appennino Bolognese. La vittoria del premio Incredibol! nel 2017 con il progetto Enjoy Appennino ci ha dato notevole visibilità, permettendoci di far conoscere il nostro lavoro e il nostro territorio, e di acquisire numerosi nuovi clienti.  Sul fronte della comunicazione, ci siamo specializzati su contenuti di promozione del territorio, aumentando la qualità dei nostri prodotti e ottenendo grandi soddisfazioni professionali. Lavorando per privati ed istituzioni, abbiamo realizzato numerosi video promo delle attrattive turistiche dell’Appennino; ci siamo occupati di fotografia e riprese aeree per  film e documentari; siamo tuttora impegnati nella realizzazione di un innovativo museo multimediale dedicato ai fatti di Monte Sole; stiamo lavorando per creare un database fotografico completo ed aggiornato delle attrattive turistiche della Città Metropolitana; stiamo realizzando un Web Doc sul progetto Shaping Fair Cities con la Regione Emilia-Romagna. Sul fronte della promozione turistica, Enjoy Appennino si è concretizzato come Tour Operator nel luglio 2018, presso lo spazio di Via Indipendenza. In questo ultimo anno abbiamo fatto conoscere il territorio a numerosi visitatori, per lo più stranieri, che hanno preso parte a tour enogastronomici e culturali, trekking ed escursioni in e-bike, visite guidate ed esperienze. Inoltre grande successo stanno avendo tuttora i canali di promozione online e i social, in cui mostriamo regolarmente le bellezze del nostro territorio. icazione.

Name: ConsulenzaTurismo Srl
Company description: ConsulenzaTurismo srl è una società che opera nel settore turistico con servizi dedicati alle imprese. Specializzata nel marketing territoriale e nell'event management, ConsulenzaTurismo ha costruito negli anni una fitta rete di relazioni nell'universo dei servizi turistici e di prodotto, strutturando rapporti con operatori internazionali, enti, ambasciate e camere di commercio che hanno accresciuto la competenza oltre lo specifico settore di riferimento, estendendo le competenze di molti paesi a livello culturale e socio-economico. ConsulenzaTurismo è anche Tour Operator di incoming con il marchio CT World Way. Posizionata su un target extra lusso dalla Cina, dall'Est Europa e dai Paesi Arabi mette a sistema l'alta qualità del Made in Italy per il raggiungimento di nuovi mercati attraverso attività di analisi e promozione, direttamente sul paese verso cui orientare il processo di internazionalizzazione del mercato turistico italiano. MISSION Il nostro specifico valore aggiunto si esplicita nel punteggio di premialità che riusciamo a far ottenere ai vari progetti attraverso le referenze specifiche che siamo in grado di apportare, e nella capacità di sintesi e attuativa che siamo in grado di esprimere sulle singole attività che di volta in volta andiamo a realizzare, tenendo presente che sugli aspetti di Comunicazione internazionale è richiesto uno skill specifico derivante dalla profonda conoscenza dei target locali e della cultura del Paese obiettivo. LE SEDI La sede principale è a Roma, poi Terracina (LT) con le altre aziende del gruppo ed abbiamo due sedi estere rispettivamente a New York (USA) e Tianjin (Cina). Precisiamo che le due sedi estere sono di nostre aziende controllate costituite in forma giuridica sul territorio. Inoltre abbiamo una “antenna commerciale” o ufficio di rappresentanza in Kazakistan nella città di Astana.

Name: First Class Mag
Company description: First Class Mag, edita e sviluppata dall’agenzia immobiliare luxury First Class House di Siena, è una rivista che parla di eccellenze internazionali. Dall’arte all’architettura, dal design al food, fino all’esclusiva rubrica immobiliare con le più interessanti proposte di First Class House. A questo interesse sul lifestyle a tutto tondo si affiancano interviste a personalità di rilevanza internazionale e una rubrica scientifica tesa a evidenziare il lavoro delle tante pregevoli realtà italiane in ambito sanitario, scientifico e ingegneristico. I contenuti sono fruibili in 4 lingue: italiano, inglese, russo e tedesco. Caratteristica principale di First Class Mag è la copertina, per ogni numero realizzata da un artista contemporaneo diverso . La rivista esce a cadenza quadrimestrale, e la sua distribuzione certificata è gratuita o con abbonamento annuale/biennale in molti punti strategici dell’Italia e dell’Europa, in particolar modo nelle Fiere più importanti, in Hotel a 4 e 5 stelle, agriturismi di lusso, stabilimenti balneari, SPA, tour operator, gallerie d’arte, studi notarili e di avvocati, aziende vinicole e studi di architettura/design.

Name: Viajes VIATICA

Company description: SOMOS PERSONAL TRAVEL PLANNERS - Te ayudamos tanto si quieres VIAJAR POR LIBRE, como si quieres VIAJAR CON TODO ORGANIZADO y reservado. Puede que tengas entrenador/a físico personal, un/a coach, una gestoría para tus finanzas… Entonces, ¿por qué no un PERSONAL TRAVEL PLANNER? Alguien que te acompañe de forma muy cercana durante el proceso de creación y organización de tu viaje. En nuestro apartado de ASESORÍAS descubrirás todos los asesoramientos y los acompañamientos viajeros que ofrecemos. Puedes reservar cada uno directamente desde nuestra web o puedes solicitar una LLAMADA DE DESCUBRIMIENTO con nosotros, y te guiaremos para que escojas el servicio que más se adapte a tu proyecto de viaje. Queremos dejar atrás las etiquetas de “agencia de viajes”, “viajeros independientes”, “blogueros”, “mochileros”, “organizadores de viajes”… Porque tod@s queremos lo mismo: VIAJAR. Y desde VIATICA creemos que viajar es un derecho universal, así que nos da igual qué tipo de viajer@ seas. Lo verdaderamente importante para nosotr@s es contribuir a que tu proyecto de viaje sea totalmente personalizado para ti. Un plan de viaje a medida, equilibrado, consciente, responsable, seguro y bien aprovechado. ¿Comenzamos?

Name: WiFi4all S.L Spain

Name: JUST LIFE COMPANY S.r.o.
HQ Location: Czech Republic, Liberecký, Liberec, 176/1 Na Svahu, 46001
Company description: Nejsme cestovní kancelář, ta Vám nevytvoří plnohodnotný program a prostor pro seberealizaci. My vytváříme příběhy, zážitky a vzpomínky, které ve Vás zůstanou. Hranice klademe jen sami sobě, mnohdy zbytečně. A ten kdo je nezná, je u nás správně. Pro nás je hlavním cílem cesta, která nás naplňuje - vytváření vztahů mezi stejně naladěnými nadšenci Naší cestou je budování partnerských vztahů se společenským přínosem (charita, jiné neziskové organizace, podpora různých událostí), možnosti seberealizace mládeže i dospělých. Sdružujeme lidi s podobným nadšením a umožňujeme jim vyzkoušet si adrenalinové i relaxační sporty v zahraničí formou aktivní dovolené, nebo akcí na objednávku v ČR. Akce na objednávku jsou firemní akce, školní kurzy, nebo různé sportovní kempy a výcvikové kurzy. Cítíme v tom podporu prevence drog, rizikového chování, rozmanitost volnočasových aktivit a životní styl, který má blízko k etickému chování k sobě i svému okolí. Podpora kultury a vzdělávání široké veřejnosti neustále roste i na Zážitkovém festivalu JUST LIFE 2015 - - Festival je slovo často spojované s jiným druhem události náš je o zkušenostech s různými sporty a aktivitami pro společensky aktivní jedince. Možnosti seberealizace v zapojení do projektů JUST LIFE jsou obrovské...

Name: Dialysis Vacations
Company description: Patients with end stage kidney disease on hemodialysis are usually wondered if they are able to travel to foreign destinations due to the need for dialysis thrice weekly. However, most patients can combine dialysis treatment and holidays in very nice and sunny places. DialysisVacations targets to secure high quality dialysis treatment in qualified with international health standards centres and holidays with their beloved accompanied persons in the most popular destinations in Greece such as Athens, Thessaloniki, Creta, Corfu and Chalkidiki. In these places there are Autonomous Dialysis Centres with very modern and fully equipped dialysis machines, excellent medical and nursing stuff that are affiliated to large University or Public Hospitals in order to provide all necessary covering needed for their patients. DialysisVacations is in close collaboration with high quality Dialysis Centres and very nice Hotels in the above places and ensures high quality services to affordable prices including dialysis treatment, medical care and holiday packages for patients and accompanied persons. We take care the communication with the Dialysis Centre and the whole holiday package in Athens, Thessaloniki, Creta, Corfu and Chalkidiki according to your preference. You can choose one of the available holiday packages and our team will adjust it to your needs. All Dialysis Centres that are in collaboration with DialysisVacations follow all international standards, are qualified and have very experienced medical and nursing staff with long term experience in managing patients with end stage kidney disease. They are equipped with very modern dialysis machines and provide all types of dialysis from classic hemodialysis to on line hemodiafiltration. DialysisVacations is also the best choice for patients on peritoneal dialysis if they want to travel and have holidays in Greece. So you can concentrate on your holiday and enjoy yourself leaving the rest to DialysisVacations!

Name: TopSub - Escola De Mergulho Unipessoal Lda

Company description: TopSub Dive Shop & Dive School was a company located in the center of Lisbon focused in providing a leading service in training and developing new divers, selling new gear and to run local and international dive trips. Services: - Scuba Diving training from beginner to Instructor levels; - Training of Technical Divers and Technical Instructors; - PADI, SSI, CMAS and GUE Training; - Authorized Dealer: SCUBAPRO, Aqualung, Apeks, Waterproof, SUUNTO and SANTI; - Repair workshop specialized in repairing DrySuits, Surf and Triathlon neoprene suits; - Repair workshop of all brands of regulators and bcds; - Local dive trips at Professor Luiz Saldanha's Marine Park; - Travel agency: Diving and Surf Liveaboards. On the later years the company was also focused in cater the touristic market that was boom in Lisbon. This company operated from November-2000 to November-2015. The Lisbon location is now closed. TopSub original owner has evolved in the business and moved to Honduras where is now running a Dive Resort and in parallel focused in Advanced Diver Training (TopSub Academy Roatan).

Name: MaridaJerez
Company description: Agencia de viajes online receptiva especializada en turismo enogastronómico del Marco del Jerez. MaridaJerez paquetiza la oferta relacionada con el vino y la gastronomía del Marco del Jerez y la oferta complementario y la ofrece o bien a travé de paquetes preconfigurados, a través de la opción "a medida" en la que el cliente crea su propio viaje o bien a través de la atención personalizda, ya sea para grupos grandes o pequeños. A través de nuestra página web www.maridajerez.com queremos facilitar al turista el acceso a la amplísima oferta enogastronómica y complementaria que El Marco del Jerez ofrece. Preparamos excursiones y visitas con alojamiento desde una a varias noches de estancia, o visitas de un día o de varias días sin alojamiento. MaridaJerez se constituye así en un sello de calidad que garantiza al visitante una experiencia plena en el destino, con un conocimiento exhaustivo de lo que El Marco del Jerez ofrece y ofreciendo al visitante actividades y visitas adecuadas a sus pretensiones. Un referente en el enoturismo de Andalucía, centrado en turismo y gastronomía de Jerez (Marco del Jerez) y toda la oferta complementaria: Visitas a bodegas, Catas, Menús maridados, Paseos a caballo, Espectáculos ecuestres, Flamenco, Visitas a viña, Coto de Doñana, Real Escuela Ecuestre, Visitas guiadas...

Name: VSail
Company description: The main aim of VSail's non-profit start-up is primarily to introduce sailing as a sport that can be done by adventurers regardless of their financial security, age or other parameters. The sad truth of our time is, that travel agencies, charter companies, or other entities try to sell weekly stays on a ship for unreasonably shuffled prices. Our start-up stands as a transparent example of the fact, that going for a full week of sailing can be cheaper than a week-long stay at a cheap hostel.  We at VSail are not as experienced as others, but we have the guts! Get used to it and voyage with us for a horizon!

Name: RunninGreece
Company description: RunninGreece is a sports&travel agency specialized in organizing, facilitating and promoting running & other adventure events in Greece.   We are here to offer you the opportunity to run in unique routes and participate in race events all over Greece.  We love running, we love travelling and we love Greece. This is how we thought to offer you the possibility to experience Greece, its nature, its history, its culture and cuisine through what we love more: running! We will help you select the ideal running event for you and confirm your participation. We will find for you the ideal place to stay and the ideal way to travel. We will offer you activities, sightseeing and training. And we will run with you to help you achieve your personal goals! Based on our vast experience as runners and/or race directors we offer a wide range of services: - Organizing running (& triathlon, biking, swimming and more...) events - Facilitating such events with specialized services like registrations, event management etc - Promoting such events to our global network - Creating Travel offers & solution for runners from all over the world to join and enjoy events in Greece. - Hosting running camps in various areas in Greece Moreover we like to talk, so please contact us for any questions you may have or information you might need. Looking forward running with you in Greece! Happy running!

Name: A Scuola Di Gusto
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Bologna, 5 Via Cesare Gnudi, 40127
Company description: A Bologna la scuola di cucina è a Scuola di gusto - TEAM COOKING - CORSI PROFESSIONALI DI CUCINA - SHOW COOKING - SPAZIO EVENTI a Scuola di gusto nasce nel 2010, come nuovo brand di Iscom Bologna, la struttura di formazione di Confcommercio Ascom Bologna, accreditata presso la Regione Emilia Romagna. La scuola di alta formazione dispone di un’area di 250 mq composta da una sala corsi e da un ampio laboratorio attrezzato con strumenti che rispondono alle esigenze della pasticceria, panetteria, pizzeria  e cucina con prestazioni di altissimo livello, eccellenza del design, facilità nell’utilizzo e grande qualità nei risultati. A Scuola di gusto propone corsi professionali con la possibilità di completare la formazione attraverso stage in azienda, corsi di specializzazione di durata media incentrati su un singolo argomento e dedicati a principianti o esperti, corsi brevi e serate a tema, corsi per bambini e ragazzi. Grazie all’esperienza di Iscom Bologna sui temi della formazione per le IMPRESE, a Scuola di gusto è in grado di offrire percorsi di sviluppo di competenze manageriali attraverso il format del TEAM COOKING: i nostri formatori vantano esperienza pluriennale nell’analisi, progettazione, gestione e realizzazione di percorsi ad hoc per le varie necessità del mondo imprenditoriale per realizzare esperienze che consentano di lavorare su: gestione del gruppo e del tempo, leadership, comunicazione, costi e acquisti. A Scuola di gusto costituisce anche un importante punto di riferimento per i TOUR OPERATOR ai quali offre percorsi formativi personalizzati quali SHOWCOOKING,  dimostrazioni, degustazioni, cooking class in italiano e in lingua straniera. Il corpo docente è costituito da chef, maestri pasticceri, panettieri, pizzaioli, maître, chef stellati e specialisti del nostro territorio, selezionati per l’esperienza maturata e per la passione nel diffondere la conoscenza della nostra cucina.
