Tutto il nostro personale è regolarmente assunto secondo le leggi vigenti. Le nostre strutture hanno i migliori punteggi su Trip Advisor e Holiday Check Alcuni dei nostri clienti soddisfatti: Hotel Rocca Nettuno Labranda (Tropea – VV) ; Hotel Abi D’Oru (Porto Rotondo – OT) ; Hotel Bella Vista (Trafoi – BZ); Hotel Borgo del Principe (Zambrone – VV) Venite a conoscerci meglio su www.majulisrl.com scoprirete la professionalità con un pizzico di eleganza.

Company description: Event Travel Sports & Events is the leading tour operator in sports and event travel business in Finland. We are the perfect partner for you, when you want to reward or incentivize your employees or partners. We can provide access for you and your customers to the most exclusive events in the world. If you want to organize a conference anywhere in the world, we can make that happen with over 20 years of experience. We are the one door solution for you if you want to organize a trip or conference for you and your partners. Since we are an official IATA agent, we can provide all the necessary services from flight tickets and transfers, hotels, program services and event tickets. We can design the whole event for you or we can provide only the logistics and services if the program is already planned by you. Our philosophy is to provide seamless solutions with minimum effort from the client. If you want to create an unforgettable experience, we are your partner for that.

Company description: Travel Guide is a Corporate & Leisure Travel Agency operating in Bucharest, Romania. It's experienced travel consultants will be always there for you to assure you'll have a perfect trip.

Name: Winetourismspain
Company description: Winetourismspain.com is Spain´s leading provider of wine, food and cultural travel.  We partner with travel agencies that want to ensure their customers experience the real taste of Spain.  We run daily tours to wine region from Madrid, Barcelona, Rioja, San Sebastian and Bilbao. We specialise in luxury itineraries that are specially designed for those looking for a planned holiday in Spain including transportation between cities. Explore Spain’s top cities and discover its most incredible wine regions like Rioja and Ribera del Duero. Our itineraries include our very own hand-picked wineries, restaurants, guided tours, hotels, and more. Spain is the world´s 3rd wine producer, the 2nd country in Unesco´s ranking (of World Heritage & cultural sites). Spain also stands number 3 in the list of most visited countries in the World. With an increasing number of Michelin starred restaurants and a growing demand for high quality tourism, our aim is to provide outstanding services to all our customers and let them discover Spain the way it deserves.

Name: CARISA TRAVEL GROUP LTD
Company description: Carisa Travel Group is a leading Scandinavian DMC focused on high quality and responsible services on tourism and organisations. From incentives to individuals, multi day tours to day tours, King Crab safari to glacier hiking, Scandinavia city breaks to conference organizations, we provide MICE services fulfilling the specific requirements of every group and guarantee a customised and professional itinerary. Carisa Travel Group has a professional team of skilful tour guides and local travel coordinators with extensive experience of designing specialized itineraries for domestic and international travel groups, corporations, associations, schools, and independent travellers. We are fully committed in the field to see requirements and new opportunities to improve ourselves. Our tour coordinators and travel guides travel consistently throughout all the destinations in Scandinavia. With the updated knowledge and experience, we design and suggest the right tour packages for you and your group best suiting your travel requirements and preferences. Carisa Travel has been in the industry for many years that have led to a strong partnership with top-rated service providers for the convenience of clients. We work as a partner with the industry-best hotels, bus companies, restaurants, tour operators, and guides, meeting venues, and more. We clearly understand that different clients have different requirements and create the best possible programs for groups and individual travellers. With Carisa Travel Group, you can rest assured that you make the most out of your travel experiences. Carisa Travel Group owns Finland Local Guide as local daily tour operator to serve your travel needs at the best. For business meetings, incentives, events, conferences, and teambuilding, you can count on us for skilled and professional planning and execution of your event throughout Scandinavia. Our DMC strives to maintain high-end professionalism and deliver optimal customer satisfaction ensuring a new experience for both individuals and groups. We are dedicated to adding a great value to your travel experience and deliver a delightful getaway you’ll treasure forever.

Name: Iceland Unlimited Travel Service
Company description: Iceland Unlimited is an independent tour operator in Iceland. We are specialized in tailor-made self-drive holidays and guided private tours in Iceland and Greenland. All our tours are thought through and carefully planned according to each of our visitors' preferences. We offer a wide selection of tours available the whole year-round.  Whether you are looking for a self-drive tour, a guided group tour, a private tour, a family vacation, a tour over Christmas and/or New Year's Eve or luxury travel, we are here to help you. Everyone can surely find the ideal tour among the company's wide selection, from a few days getaway to 14 days full circle of the country. Iceland Unlimited was founded by Jón Gunnar Benjamínsson, a former guide and travel agent who in 2007 suffered a spinal cord injury in a car accident that nearly ended his life. Iceland Unlimited aims to make Iceland accessible for disabled tourists. We offer accessible tours in Iceland, and we are proud that our disabled visitors will miss almost nothing of what the country has to offer.

Name: Viajes Cau Cau- Experiencias De Lujo De Ocio Y Negocio En Chile Argentina Peru Bolivia Y Uruguay
Company description: Somos un grupo de profesionales del turismo,  pasión “el detalle en los viajes”. Esta inquietud, junto con nuestra experiencia se refleja en nuestra agencia de viajes totalmente especializada y enfocada en experiencias singulares a medida, en Chile, Argentina, Perú, Bolivia y Uruguay. Te ofrecemos sensaciones increíbles, viviendo tu viaje desde la emoción. Experimentando tus pasiones mientras recorres paisajes espectaculares, envolviéndote con su cultura, gastronomía, sus gentes.  No siendo un mero espectador, no dejes que te lo cuenten, ¡vívelo! ¡El límite lo pones TU! Itinerarios a medida Cuando te enfrentas al desafío de crear viajes extraordinarios, atractivos y memorables, los viajeros inteligentes cuentan con la experiencia de Viajes Cau Cau. Nuestros viajes no salen de la estantería, no hay una receta establecida: están hechos a medida hasta el más mínimo detalle, para las personas más exigentes. Somos expertos locales Nuestra filosofía es simple. Para ofrecerte la mejor experiencia de viaje posible, creemos que la única manera de lograrlo es contar con expertos genuinos para cada destino que tengan un compromiso absoluto con la calidad y el conocimiento de primera mano nacido de su experiencia personal. Te mostrarán los aspectos más destacados bajo una luz diferente.  Calidad y responsabilidad Te garantizamos viajes de lujo personalizados sin complicaciones, satisfactorios y enriquecedores. Ya sea que estés interesado en explorar las artes, la cultura o los sitios históricos, disfrutar de la naturaleza y la vida silvestre, experimentar la emoción de una aventura fuera de lo común, o simplemente relajarte en termas naturales. Disfrutarás de la accesibilidad exclusiva, el conocimiento interno y la dedicación inquebrantable a los viajes de lujo que nos enorgullecemos de brindar a nuestros Clientes. ¿EN QUE TE PODEMOS AYUDAR?  Contacta con nosotros! 👉 mariana@viajescaucau.com 👉+34 629638252👉 www.viajescaucau.com

Name: ELIT Events Baltic
Company description: Our team present professional, creative, specially designed ideas and solutions for our clients to experience & remember. We believe that a great reward is to let live at ease, when details matter. ELIT Events Baltic by Lithuanian Tours - full service Destination Management Company specialized in Incentive, Conference, Congress and Association Management. Providing services in Baltic countries - Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia, ELIT Events Baltic is a department of the most experienced incoming tour operator Lithuanian Tours Ltd successfully working on the International market since 1991.

Name: Play Sport Viaggi Srl
Company description: Play Sport nasce a Cesena, in Romagna, 17 anni fa con lo scopo di contribuire e promuovere i contatti e le relazioni internazionali fra clubs di calcio. E’ un' agenzia di viaggi, tour operator e organizzazione eventi sportivi che opera nella terra dell'accoglienza e dell'ospitalità. Play Sport armonizza e fonde insieme Sport e Turismo in un’esperienza ludica ed educativa, il torneo di calcio, che ha per protagonisti i giovani. Per tutti è l’occasione di condividere momenti di aggregazione, sana competizione in un itinerario di ben-essere, emozioni, arte, sport e divertimento. La denominazione PLAY SPORT nasce dall'idea che lo Sport deve essere davvero considerato un gioco, un mezzo per aiutare i ragazzi a ritrovare se stessi attraverso il superamento delle varie e possibili difficoltà. Offre – insieme all’ampia proposta di Tornei – informazioni chiare, programmi e condizioni di viaggio trasparenti, efficienza e sicurezza sportiva e un ottimo servizio, dalla pianificazione del viaggio alla sistemazione alberghiera.

Name: Marlies Tour
Company description: We are your local agency guiding you through the wonders of this beautiful island. Specialized in receptive tourism and excursions, able to offer services for individuals, groups, tour operators and travel agencies. Sicily Round Tours: Information, culture, gastronomy and guides on the best locations. Excursions: Carefully chosen routes for your best experienced excursions. HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 21 1ºa Avenida De La Zarzuela, 28023
Company description: Agencia de Viajes Online. IlusionTRAVEL es una realidad en el mundo de las agencias online minoristas que está avalada por los proveedores más prestigiosos del sector. Nuestros objetivos son proporcionar el mejor precio online y la orientación más apropiada que permita convertir la planificación, y la posterior realización del viaje, en una tarea sencilla con la mejor relación calidad-precio posible y respaldada por lo mejores profesionales.

Name: CruiseClub
Company description: CruiseClub is a large cruise tour operator situated in the Netherlands. CruiseClub is proud to provide for the best cruises according to the wishes and needs of the clients. CruiseClub is well known for her personal touch.   The key values of CruiseClub are personal contact, customer care and excellent service. We always go a little bit further because cruising is in our heart. With more than 100 cruise ships from different cruise companies we offer a large variety of cruises all over the world. From overnight cruises to world cruises of more than 100 days, CruiseClub can meet your needs.   Our office is situated in Rotterdam, surrounded by free parking places. Whether the clients wish is to book a cruise online, in our beautiful store or per telephone, our cruise experts are always willing to help you create your perfect cruise holiday. CruiseClub always remembers that making a cruise is a special experience for the client. That is why we always invite you to come to our beautiful store to get to know the client and their wishes over a cup of delicious coffee.     We offer our clients not only a cruise, but offer the possibility to create a personalized cruise journey including flights, hotels, transfers or anything our clients desire. Our variety of cruise experts always make sure the clients wishes are fulfilled. CruiseClub is affiliated to the ANVR, SGR and the foundation in case of emergency situations (Calamiteitenfonds). These organisations ensure the protection of our clients. 	 •	Website http://www.cruiseclub.nl •	Branch Leisure, travel and tourism •	Type Private company •	Head office Dorpsweg 98-100, 3083 LE Rotterdam, The Netherlands •	Founded 2011

Name: Viatica
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 7 C/ Mateu Ferran, 08030
Company description: Viatica es una agencia de viajes artesanales del barrio de Sant Andreu en Barcelona. Nuestro objetivo ha sido llenar los viajes de experiencias que los viajeros puedan vivir, disfrutar y recordar. En Viatica somos los organizadores y diseñadores de los viajes que vendemos. Hemos eliminado todo tipo de intermediarios con el objetivo de abaratar los precios y tener un mayor control de la calidad de los servicios. Somos expertos en los destinos que vendemos y nos dedicamos a buscar otros profesionales en los países de destino que puedan encargarse directamente de nuestros viajeros, otorgándoles un viaje totalmente personalizado.  En nuestras propuestas diseñamos viajes donde los viajeros tengan que participar en los mismos. Buscamos actividades en las que interactuar con gente local, que sean divertidas, didácticas y permitan conocer mejor los países que se visitan, sin olvidar los puntos más importantes de interés turístico. Intentamos crear experiencias que permanezcan en la memoria de los viajeros, más allá de las puras visitas. Por ejemplo: clases de cocina en Vietnam, talleres de agricultura ancestral, decoración de elefantes en la India y muchas más. Nuestros viajes artesanales son totalmente flexibles a gusto de los viajeros., por lo que podemos realizar cualquier proyecto de viaje que sea realmente viable.

Name: AndAdventure Croatia
Company description: &Adventure DMC specializes in providing private, uniquely designed, upscale experiences, as well as white-labeled small group multi-day experiences. Our vision is to take our clients’ on an unforgettable journey through Croatia. Our clients are individuals looking for something different, they are driven by adventure, but not the traditionally known high-energy and high-impact type of adventure, more through the experiential, sustainable, and meaningful adventure. &Adventure provides services to tour operators and travel advisors from North America, Europe and beyond. We put together carefully designed custom itineraries based on the specific needs and expectations of our clients and work collaboratively with each of our partners to achieve that goal. Whether traveling by land or sea, our extensive itineraries incorporate local cultural immersion and active exploration. Active exploration means getting to know the beautiful Croatian scenery through a series of optional activities such as kayaking, hiking, and cycling, whereas community-focused culinary experiences through wine tasting and participatory cooking to get a deeper insight into the fascinating cultures and gastronomic traditions of the region. Across these experiences, our clients are able to see firsthand how tourism can be sustainable and impact positively on the environment and local communities. We also offer unique and hard-to-find short sailing trips on sailing yachts and catamarans for 2-3 days, as well as week long trips available on luxury yachts of various sizes and gullets along the exquisitely beautiful Dalmatian Coast.  Our team takes pride in the value it places on providing a high-quality service whilst ensuring sustainable practices and is always open to developing new partnerships with those whose business ethos and products align with AndAdventure’s.

Name: Gravitas Adventures
Company description: Adventure Travel Agency for summer and winter. Giacomo (28) and Siebe (25), from Belluno – Dolomites (IT) and Culemborg – Holland, are both ski instructors with years of working experience, in Austria, Italy and Argentina. Thanks to competitions but also and especially to our passion for mountain activities, we have a spread-out knowledge of the terrain, the European Alps. In order to share our passion, we started our own agency Gravitas Adventures. Together we have the ambition to share our excitement for the outdoor. But not only, we want to offer fully-comprehensive travel packages deeply rooted in the territories of the localities we visit, meaning that through our wide network of mostly friends and colleagues, our guests will be fully immersed in the real life of the insider-spots.  #RIDEWITHUS

Name: Plavel Tours
Company description: Agencia de viajes en Valencia especializada en viajes de larga distancia y Lunas de Miel. Diseñamos tus itinerarios a medida con las mejores condiciones.

Name: MOTOURISMO
Company description: Can I ride my motorcycle somewhere in the sun for two weeks in February? The question was easy, the answer difficult. That's how the idea for MOTOURISMO.com was born. Founder Michael Carlin was able to find many motorbike travel offers on the Internet - but there was no place to get an overview and compare. MOTOURISMO.com closes this gap in the Internet. Right from the start, MOTOURISMO.com was the largest portal for motorcycle travel, motorcycle training and motorcycle shipping. In the meantime, it continuously integrates between more than 3,000 offers from currently 80 tour operators and it is constantly growing. MOTOURISMO.com thus offers for the first time an overview of a diverse industry. Motorcyclists can find, compare and book their offers quickly and easily using a fine filter.  It was only through MOTOURISMO.com that many customers recognised the possibilities offered by the many organisers in this sector: from one-day training courses, guided road and off-road tours on their own motorcycles, to trips lasting several weeks including motorcycle transport or rental motorcycles to almost all regions of the world and in all categories - whether it be the short enduro winter escape in Southern Europe, the big Harley tour in New Zealand or the long adventure trip along the Silk Road.  Among the providers at MOTOURISMO.com are both well-known names in the industry as well as many smaller tour operators and specialty providers.

Name: LebensWert Thailand
Company description: LebensWert Thailand is a German tour operator based in Hamburg. We are specialized in individual tours in Bhutan, Myanmar and Thailand. All tours are tailored to the wishes and desires of our customers. The program includes adventure travel, individual travel, round trips, luxury travel, study trips, beach holidays, island hopping and trekking. All countries are regularly visited by us to check our services on site and explore new places. Our employees know all destinations and places of interest personally so that they can serve you in the best possible way. We show you the most beautiful and interesting sides of the countries with their cultural highlights, fascinating landscapes and guaranteed insider tips, where you will not meet any other tourist.

Name: Killarney Jaunting Cars Ltd - Tangney Tours Ireland
HQ Location: Ireland, Kerry, Killarney, 10 B Muckross Close Muckross Road, 0000
Company description: Killarney Jaunting Cars Ltd – Tangney Tours Ireland is a Family run business and has operated for over 200 years within the family. Today the tour business is operated by Michael Tangney Snr / Jnr, Paul Tangney and Laura Tangney.  We provide guided tours of all Killarney National Parklands & Lakes - Passengers can step back in time and experience Ireland's most traditional mode of transport - the Jaunting car/ or take a cruise on The World renowned Lakes of Killarney.  Our tours operate through areas where no motor traffic is permitted- offering a unique tour to your guests. We can offer you a combination of tour options ranging from 45 minutes – 5 hours all showing you Killarney and The Gap of Dunloe at its finest.  Visitors are informed of the history, legends and folklore of the area while they are touring, and also adding a fun element to the tour with their Jarvey (driver of the carriage) sharing local jokes and banters. A popular group tour option is to combine your Jaunting car tour with our glass covered lake cruise - this is a very enjoyable way to see the Killarney National Parklands & Lakes. Whichever option suits, you won’t be disappointed! Our tours are ideal for a group’s leisure day in Killarney, Family day out, Proposals, Corporate/Team building, Students, Birthday’s, School Tours Killarney Jaunting Cars Ltd - Tangney Tours Ireland is the only registered Jaunting car Company in Killarney and is a member of The European Tour Operators Association.

La nostra clientela, esclusivamente estera, si distingue per la grande apertura e voglia di vivere esperienze uniche e private, destinando budget molto importanti alle loro vacanze e pretendendo, di contro, un elevatissimo grado di organizzazione, precisione ed attenzione al dettaglio: questo fa si che, nonostante le piccole dimensioni, Italian Safari si sia strutturata nel tempo in modo estremamente professionale e dinamico, per rispondere alle esigenze sempre mutevoli della clientela.

Company description: BALKAN PRO TRAVEL is destination management company in Bulgaria, founded in 2013. Name: AlgarveVIPS - All Inclusive VIP Travel Agency
HQ Location: Portugal, Ferragudo, 16-a Rua Afonso De Albuquerque, 8400-249
Company description: AlgarveVIPS offers prestigious and high quality customised services, products and holiday packages – creating the finest combination of luxury, excitement and comfort in anything clients might require while holidaying in the Algarve, Portugal. Our number one priority and commitment is therefore to offer, at all times, an outstanding service which enables our clients to experience a memorable holiday that is luxurious and relaxing in every way.

Name: Visit Sardinia
Company description: Visit Sardinia is a leading tour operator that specialises in premium Corsica and Sardinia vacations for travellers who expect luxurious, fully curated experiences. As a family-owned boutique agency, we take personal pride in giving our clients the very best things in life. Whether we’re organising Sardinia holidays for high-achieving professionals or creating bespoke private tours to Corsica, everything we do comes from a place of love. Put simply, we love these two stunning destinations — which is why we’re so good at what we do. The secret to our success is our affinity with both of these breathtaking Mediterranean islands. We are fully immersed in the culture, history and daily life of Sardinia and Corsica, so we know exactly how to get the most out of visits to both. By creating memorable moments through the provision of premium accommodations, gastronomic adventures, exciting excursions and luxury experiences, we get to live vicariously through our clients. Every time we see that look of wonder on a traveller’s face, it’s as though we’re experiencing the joy of Sardinia or Corsica for the very first time. Using a combination of experience, exclusive contacts and passion for both of these breathtaking islands, we turn dreams and wish lists into life-affirming experiences. Everyone’s a VIP with Visit Sardinia. When you book travel to Sardinia or Corsica with us, you get to become the VIP of your own adventure story. Luxury Hand-Picked Accommodations Yacht Charters Private Jets Once-in-a-Lifetime Experiences Gastronomic Adventures Event Planning Concierge Travel Services

Company description: Agencia de viajes. Ofrecemos gestión de eventos deportivos, viajes de empresa, viajes de aventura etc.. Dinos cómo quieres que sea tu viaje y lo hacemos posible. Name: PlanB Travel&Events S.L.
Company description: PlanB Travel&Events S.L. es una red social y agencia de viajes diseñada para ofrecer viajes en compañía. Encuentra compañeros de viaje para viajar solo en grupo. Name: Destinos Exoticos Viajes
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes mayorista .minorista de viajes y receptivos en españa. Destinos exoticos es un portal de la red de portales de www.destinos-exoticos.es , editado, y mantenido por guías de turismo . Destinos exoticos es nuevo concepto de portal turístico donde se combina la información, material multimedia, photos, videos, locuciones con la oferta turística y la participación de los usuarios . En destinos-exoticos.es, ofrecemos una amplia gama de programas turísticos propios que abarcan todas las actividades que se pueden realizar en estos fantásticos páises ¿Por que viajar con destinos-exoticos.es? Kristofer Andersson kept the company Scanbalt Experience but in the asset deal Aikamatkat took over Scanbalt operations and most of the company’s staff followed as well. Later Scanbalt Experience changed its name to Sublime Leisure Group.

Name: FEDHATTA Federation Of Hellenic Associations Of Travel & Tourist Agencies
Company description: FEDHATTA, the Federation of Hellenic Associations of Travel & Tourist Agencies, is the nationwide representative of the entire travel agency sector in the relevant national, European and international organizations. Established in 2002, it aims to unite and strengthen the associations of travel agencies in Greece. FEDHATTA, through its member associations, represents approximately 2.500 travel agencies, employing approximately 22.000 people, across Greece. FEDHATTA member agencies span the range of tourism products – conference & event, cultural, religious, recreational, yachting, luxury etc. tourism – and include coach companies. The agencies develop the Greek tourism product and handle all aspects – hotels, airline and ferry tickets, transfers, tours, visits to archeological sites, conferences – for Greek and foreign travelers throughout the country. FEDHATTA actively seeks the unification of all primary employer trade associations of the country, whose members are active in tourism enterprises (travel agencies), in order to study, preserve and develop the economic, professional, insurance, social and trade interests of its members and the industry as a whole. FEDHATTA pursues the development and promotion of Greek tourism and contributes to the effort of the country for the expansion and enhancement of tourism services. FEDHATTA acts as the official consultant to and interlocutor with the State in all matters concerning the tourism industry and has a determining role in the elaboration of the developmental policy for tourism and the formulation of the national strategy regarding the promotion of the tourism product, in cooperation with all competent Greek, European and international tourism entities and organizations.

Company description: Break in Italy è un t.o. con sede a Pesaro, specializzato nella regione Marche, Umbria ed Abruzzo. Dal tour dei cibi di strada nelle Marche, ai paesaggi invisibili di Piero della Francesca, alle degustazioni con i pescatori sul Trasimeno, alle visite e degustazioni presso presidi slow food, ai mercatini di Natale, alla sfossatura del formaggio di fossa ecc.  I tour del catalogo sono solo alcune delle nostre proposte, ogni viaggio viene realizzato su misura, in considerazione delle richieste e delle esigenze di ogni gruppo. Siamo sempre disponibili ad accogliere ogni tipo di richiesta e ben contenti di contribuire a fare conoscere la ricchezza di questo territorio, ancora poco conosciuto. Break in Italy is a tour operator with seat in Pesaro, particularly specialized in preparing tours in Marche, Umbria and Abruzzo region. Thanks to long experience and deep knowledge of the territory, its history, traditions, culture and events, we are able to arrange each kind of custom-made tour packages. Cultural, eno-gastronomical, naturalistic tours as well as holiday by the sea or in the countryside. A continuous in-depth study on the territory with the aim to enrich our proposals and made them more exciting, is the base of our work. Moreover, we like voyagers to have a direct approach to the local inhabitants and uses, thus we propose for example lunches at farms, tasting food specialities, visits at factories producing traditional hand made products, etc.

Name: Hotéis Algarve Sol
Company description: O Grupo Algarve Sol Hotéis com mais de 30 anos de experiência, apresenta-se com uma forte aposta no sector Hoteleiro e Turístico do Algarve. Duas das unidades hoteleiras foram totalmente remodeladas: o Hotel Globo em Portimão e o Hotel Quarteira Sol em Quarteira. Ambos os hotéis são emblemáticos e ainda hoje fazem parte do património das gentes locais. O Hotel Globo reabriu em Maio de 2008, seguindo-se do Hotel Quarteira Sol em Setembro do mesmo ano. É nossa missão marcar a diferença pelo serviço aliados à simpatia e profissionalismo dos nossos colaboradores, apresentar unidades hoteleiras de qualidade com diferenciação e personalização de serviços, sempre a pensar nos nossos clientes. Fazem também parte do grupo, POLAR - Agência de Viagens e Turismo, Lda., com balcões em diversos pontos do país, oferecendo inovação e qualidade dos serviços. Temos ao seu dispor variadíssimos serviços que vão desde a restauração, ao desporto e lazer, centros de Spa, conferências e programas especialmente criados para si de forma a melhor poder desfrutar das suas férias.

Name: Italy Charme
Company description: CHOOSE AUTHENTICITY. EXPLORE WITH THE ITALIA EXPERTS. Anyone can dream a visit to Italy and see the famous sights. We celebrate what is really possible in Italy, not just what people have heard or read about. We love Italy; it’s our home, our favorite place. Yet we appreciate that it can be hard to scratch below the surface of the country. There is so much to discover yet where do people start? Especially when so much can’t be found in guidebooks. At Italy Charme Lux we specialize in authentic and exclusive experiences that other operators don’t know about. This is the real Italy, from the Italia experts. From sleeping in monasteries and castles to behind closed door experiences, there is a real Italy waiting for those who seek it. For every Colosseum there are a dozen personal encounters to have, off the beaten track. For each famous art museum there is a private gallery we have keys for. Travel companies partner with us for many reasons. Many of the experiences we offer are not offered by other local operator. We can individualise and specialise the most unique wishes and itineraries, as shown by designing programs for various television broadcasters. Put simply, with Italy Charme Lux we can offer your clients something different. These unique experiences and vacations are handles with a real dedication to detail. This is what we love to do, and this is our excellence. We are a team that of professional travel planners, dedicated only to the most exclusive experiences, those that really allow visitors to live their dream. We are ready to listen and to understand, eager to help visitors realise their idea of a perfect journey. We are ItalyCharme. And what we do is make Italian dreams comes true.

Name: Kuoni Travel Belgium
Company description: The Kuoni Group is one of the world’s leading globally-active leisure travel organisations. Kuoni’s activities are focused on its core leisure travel and destination management businesses. The head office of Kuoni Travel Holding Ltd. is in Zurich, Switzerland, where Alfred Kuoni founded the company back in 1906. The Kuoni Group has steadily and systematically developed its position in the world travel market over the years, and has branch operations today in more than 40 countries in Europe, Asia, Africa, Australia and North America. In the premium and specialist segment, Kuoni is the world’s number-one provider. Kuoni aims to be not only the leading but also the most successful and most internationally-established tourist travel company in this business segment. The Kuoni Group was named “World’s Leading Tour Operator” at the annual World Travel Awards for eleven years in a row. In Belgium,  Kuoni holds Koning Aap Reizen, Kuoni and Best Tours as long-haul specialist brands.

We organise guided tour packages, including a full range of services: - Pick up from the airport - Transfers - Accommodation - Logistical support - The services of experienced local guides, artists, museum curators, historians, competitive bikers - Professional photography and videos of your holiday. For those who are only interested in the tours themselves without additional services, whether they’re already in Bulgaria or not, we organise separate experiences: - Degustations - Adrenaline and extreme sports adventures - Nature walks, horseriding and biking excursions - One-day tours exploring the local culture, sights, nightlife and shopping We know how best to share Plovdiv with both friends and newcomers alike, which sights leave the strongest impression, which rooms and hotels feel the most like home and which flavours will make you remember Bulgaria with a smile. We are dedicated to giving you up-to-date information about Plovdiv and Bulgaria. Name: BARCELONA SPECIAL TRAVELER
Company description: Barcelona Special Traveler is Barcelona's first receptive travel agency to specialize in accessible tourism.  An innovative initiative that fills an extremely specific gap in Barcelona's already unbeatable tourism offering. Our objective is to seek out, design and offer a series of unique and completely satisfying experiences to anybody suffering from a disability (be it sensory, physical...) and to people with reduced mobility problems and their families. The concept behind the company is based on a profound knowledge of the needs and wishes of the disabled tourist and a desire to offer experiences until know unimaginable for them in Barcelona and Catalunya. Barcelona Special Traveler provides disabled tourist with everything they might possible need (accommodation, transport, services, technical support, touristic experiences...) in Barcelona in a single and coordinated package, thereby ensuring that no problem spoils what will be, without doubt, a fantastic experience.

Name: SpainDMCs
Company description: Why organize your event in Spain in conjunction with a member of SpainDMCs?. Contracting the services of a DMC to assist with the logistics and operation of events, conventions, meetings or incentive programmes is like having a temporary extension of your own office in the destination where the event is to be held, with a team of local professionals at your disposal just for the time you need them, from the initial planning stage through to execution. SpainDMCs only accepts the best DMCs as members in the conviction that the extensive operational experience and detailed destination knowledge these companies represent will make a tangible contribution to the success of any event in which they collaborate. Furthermore, members of Spain DMCs offer: LEGALITY: All of them are official Travel Agencies which, according to current legislation, are the only entities with the exclusive right to put together and market the types of services described. RISK COVER: All of SpainDMCs’ members are bonded and most have liability insurance policies in place which far exceed the statutory minimum requirements placed on travel agencies by Spanish law. SPECIAL AGREEMENTS Based on the collective bargaining power of the Association’s members, several agreements have been signed with hotel chains and other suppliers to secure the best possible rates. SOLVENCY SpainDMCs rigorously vets its members to be confident of their financial stability and ethical working practices. PROVEN EXPERIENCE AND PROFESSIONALISM DESTINATION KNOWLEDGE Our members live and breathe their business seven days a week and nobody is in a better position to know how everything works at a local level and how best to get things done. GOOD CONTACTS: One of the DMC’s most important roles in delivering memorable events is to “know someone in the know” i.e. to have influential contacts with local authorities and suppliers who can help to achieve things which, at first sight, seem impossible. ETHICAL COMMITMENT: All members

Name: Tripito.eu
Company description: Cestovná kancelária Tripito vznikla v 2016 ako dovolenkový a pobytový špecialista na bývalé krajiny Sovietského zväzu (Rusko, Ukrajina, Gruzínsko, Azerbajdžan, Arménsko a Uzbekistan). Okrem nich ponúkame pobyty aj do destinácií ako Jordánsko, Izrael, či Kuba.  Snažíme sa, aby si každý odniesol z dovolenky zážitok, preto vyberáme tie najlepšie exkurzie a destinácie. Všetky pobyty, ktoré ponúkame sme si sami vyskúšali. Pri každom našom zájazde sú exkurzie a vstupné do pamiatok v cene a vždy je s vami slovenský alebo český sprievodca. Vybavíme pre vás aj víza a všetko potrebné okolo výletu. Stačí si len vybrať a ostatné nechať na nás.  Okrem destinácií vo svete organizujeme aj výlety a exkurzie po Slovensku. Pomôžeme vám stať sa vinárom na jeden deň, ochutnáte slovenské šampanské, či len tak sa s nami môžete poprechádzať po Bratislave s odborným výkladom. Naše aktivity sú vhodné pre školy, ale aj ako výborný a dobrodružný teambuilding. Pripravíme Vám a vašim kolegom zážitky, o ktorých si budete vo firme ešte dlho rozprávať.  Váš tím Tripito „Zážitky, ktoré inde nenájdete!“

Name: Encantado
Company description: Niels Leenders, owner of Encantado, works as an independent guide and trainer. He is capable of getting the best out of hikers, climbers or a travel group. Adding value to an expedition or a group trip not only by quality, but by focusing on the individual. Furthermore Niels is a trainer, he organizes and leads leadership expeditions and educates International Mountain Leaders for the UIMLA. Travelling is not only about booking a flight or a mountain tour. But the large number of travel agencies and volatile travel behaviour give the impression that it's not more then a habit. Imagine a trip in which the contact with (local) people is authentic and wherein you experience the beauty of group dynamics. Where you identify landscapes with emotions and experiences that can be shared with other people around you. Culture which is more than a temple and nature more then just a mountain. And where the experience of your special trip is touchable long before departure, and just as important, long, long thereafter. Does it appeal to you? Please get in touch. Because this trip feeling exists. And it does not necessarily have to be expensive. And everything you give .. comes back to you. In the quality of the trip. And in the quality of the interactions.

Name: BIKE TOURS BARCELONA
Company description: UN COTXE MENYS – BICICLETAS”. This is the original and Catalan name of our company. When you ride your bike, you do not have to drive a car….so, it is “One Car Less - Bicycles”. In 1995 Barcelona had no bike lanes, and very few people would ride bike around the city. In that year Bike Tours Barcelona (Un Cotxe Menys-Bicicletes) was created,  and from the very beginning we have been working hard, together with the City Council, to promote cycling in Barcelona and to make the city safer and friendlier for cyclists.  Today in Barcelona, there are over 180 km of bike lanes, and the amount is still increasing. Our 20 years experience, working with: Private costumers, Corporate Groups, D.M.C., Incoming travel agencies, and together with our proffesional guides, makes our company a reference in Barcelona, for guided bike tours and rental bike service. Proud  of our multilingual guides, they will take care of you and your customers during our bike tours. Barcelona Bike Tours is also an active member of:  Associació BiciTours Barcelona (founding member): an association promoting cycling.  Barcelona Convetion Bureau (Barcelona Tourism): promoting Barcelona as a host city of  conferences,  conventions and meetings.  Pacte per la Mobilitat del Ajuntament de Barcelona: a city department working on its mobility.

Name: ITrialon
Company description: We are a travel agency and IT service company. We will guide you to the birth of Christianity in the Catacombs of Rome, visit the Catholic's "capital" in the Vatican, guide you through prestine Swiss mountains to St. Moritz, follow us on the battlefields of the Great War in Yepern, visit the Cold War in Berlin, learn about the resistance group of the "White Rose" and rise of the NSDAP dictatorship in Munich, visit magnificant castles in France and Neuschwanstein and fall in love with Paris and the "Bell Epoche" and many more destinations. Name: Savonlinna Opera Festival
Company description: The Savonlinna Opera Festival, established in 1912, is one of Finland's most prestigious cultural events, celebrated for its unique setting at the medieval Olavinlinna Castle. The festival showcases a diverse range of opera performances, featuring both classic and contemporary works, and aims to provide a world-class artistic experience that captivates audiences from around the globe. Its mission is to promote opera as an accessible and enriching art form, while its vision includes fostering a vibrant cultural community and supporting emerging talent through initiatives like the Timo Mustakallio Singing Competition. The festival attracts a wide audience, including opera enthusiasts, tourists, and local residents, and collaborates with various partners, including tour operators and cultural organizations, to enhance the overall experience. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, the Savonlinna Opera Festival continues to be a beacon of artistic expression in the heart of Finland's stunning Lakeland region.

Denn neben Wildnis und Strand bietet die Region versteckte Naturperlen, pulsierende Städte, kulturelle Veranstaltungen sowie aussergewöhnliche Bars und Restaurants. Safari ist mehr als Parks, Tiere und Strand. Es ist das Suaheli-Wort für Reise. Und in Ostafrika gibt es neben den 4×4 Jeep-Safaris durch die Nationalparks noch viel mehr Optionen die Länder zu bereisen. Ob per Boot, Rad, Bus, Zug oder zu Fuß mit safarizeit Erlebnisreisen entdeckst du Ostafrika anders als die Anderen.

Sie erzählen uns, wie Ihr Traumurlaub in der Schweiz aussehen könnte, und wir nehmen die maßgeschneiderte Reiseplanung und Urlaubsbuchung vor. Hierbei können wir Ihnen ganz individuell jeden Wunsch erfüllen. Besonders im Bereich Bahnreisen in der Schweiz sind wir der zuverlässige Partner mit jahrelanger Erfahrung.

Name: Shangrilaya Aktivreisen GmbH
Company description: Wer sind wir?   Die Shangrilaya Aktivreisen GmbH ist ein deutscher Reiseveranstalter mit Spezialisierung auf die Himalaya-Region. Nepal, Tibet, Bhutan und Indien sind mythenumwobene Länder, die seit Jahrhunderten Entdecker und Reisende aus aller Welt anlocken. Aufgrund unserer Herkunft fühlen wir uns mit dieser Region zutiefst verbunden. Daher rührt unser Engagement und die große Leidenschaft für unsere Tätigkeit als Reiseveranstalter. Unser Bestreben liegt darin, Ihnen die reichhaltige Kultur und die atemberaubenden Landschaften dieser Länder nahe zu bringen.   Was bieten wir? Die Shangrilaya Aktivreisen GmbH bietet standardisierte Reisen an, sowie maßgeschneiderte, individuelle Touren und Dienstleistungen, mit dem Ziel, Ihren Urlaub zu einem besonderen und einzigartigen Erlebnis zu machen. Denn Sie sollen auch in Zukunft noch lange von Ihrer Reise zehren können. Wir bieten eine breite Palette von Reiseangeboten für Aktivurlauber an. Diese reichen von Kulturreisen, Trekking, Städtebesichtigungen, Klettertouren, Rafting, Safaris, Bergflüge, Natur & Ökoreisen bis hin zu Fahrrad- und Yogatrips. Was auch immer Sie sich vorstellen, sprechen Sie uns an.

Name: GoodVibes Ibiza
Company description: In 2006, a tight-knit group of friends began organizing trips to Ibiza for European students. After eight years, our Ibiza trip has become the largest in Europe with more than 2500 people every year. In 2012 we decided to create a new concept for trips to Ibiza, specifically designing the experience for study abroad students in Europe (mainly from the United States). This year, in cooperation with the Delis Group, we have created the commercial brand known as GoodVibes Ibiza. Due to our extensive experience in providing safe, affordable, and quality trips, GOOD VIBES Ibiza has become the most professional and specialized travel agency organizing trips to Ibiza for international students. We believe in providing a service of the utmost quality, and due to this we only offer three trips per year based on specific dates for the best weekends in Ibiza. As a result, our clients remain happy and our reputation continues to grow. In planning each trip, Good Vibes conducts extensive research as to what events will be going on, which DJs will be playing, and all other relevant details during your specific dates of travel. We choose the best possible accommodations, the most enjoyable day activities, and the most spectacular parties. The highest level of effort goes into planning each of these three unique trips, and we guarantee you won’t be disappointed. Without a doubt, Good Vibes Ibiza is the best way to discover this island paradise in one weekend at the most competitive price.

Name: Scanway / Tyrkiet Eksperten
Company description: Tyrkiet Eksperten has grown over the years to become one of Denmark's largest travel agencies. Tyrkiet Eksperten ApS was founded on January 13, 1997, in Copenhagen, and today has six branches in Denmark. We have sales offices in Copenhagen, Odense, Aarhus, Herning, Aalborg, and both Billund and Copenhagen Airports. Tyrkiet Eksperten is owned by the Turkish travel conglomerate Scanway, headquartered in Turkey. Scanway's business areas include managing the hotel chain "Tulip Hotels and Holiday Apartments," bus transportation, real estate sales, and car rentals. Today, Scanway employs more than 750 people. Tulip Hotels and Holiday Apartments is Scanway's own hotel chain. In 1999, we acquired our first hotel in Side, and in the following years, we expanded our chain to now encompass over 30 hotels. All these hotels are distinguished by their excellent quality and offer a perfect blend of Danish coziness and Turkish hospitality.

Name: BIG Travel Denmark
Company description: BIG Travel was founded in Sweden in 1983, and we have since become one of the fastest growing travel management companies in Scandinavia. As a privately held company, our owners place great emphasis on creating a business for the future. With the establishment of our centrally located office in Copenhagen in 2017  BIG Travel Denmark has quickly assumed a position amongst the top 10 corporate travel agencies in Denmark. With a clear client centric focus and strong personal service we aim to be your local corporate travel agency choice. Our strategy is different from our competitors. We do not focus on volume or market share - our goal is to become our customers business partner. We focus on how we can advise our customers as best possible and work towards our customers' goals. We have a flat organizational structure, which means that the decision-making process is short and streamlined. We offer customized solutions through open dialogue with our customers, where we focus their needs. We collaborate with our customers to deliver tailor made solutions to achieve greater savings, improve productivity, and increase service. BIG Travel is a member of Radius Travel, the leading global network of independent travel agents for business travelers. This means that BIG Travel has the capacity and resources to help its customers strengthen any travel program, both regionally and globally.

The tour operator brands have been a part of the same owner structure for several years but are now finally gathered within the same group under the corporate name of TravelCo Nordic. The tour operator brands of TravelCo Nordic: Bravo Tours · Matkavekka · Solia · Solresor · Sun Tours · Heimsfedir · Terra Nova Chairman and owner of the company is Andri M. Ingolfsson.

Name: Caminando Caminando

Company description: We are an incoming tour operator specializing in organizing itineraries for the Way of Saint James (Camino de Santiago) on foot or by bicycle. The incoming services provided by our company are a world away from inflexible, bundled package holidays, standard services and package tours. Our company is well aware of the needs different pilgrims have and consequently provides bespoke services to cater for them, adapting and customising each itinerary. We are specialists in the Camino and currently offer seven of its different routes. We are experts in these routes, which is essential to be able to put together personalised itineraries, hand pick hotels one by one, and provide a range of complementary services with meticulous attention to detail. Our routes centre on the Spanish Way of Saint James, although we offer a large range of other options based around the Camino de Santiago, such as food and wine tours, as well as many other alternatives around Spain. What you see on this website (which is constantly updated) is only a sample of the ideas, tours and trips we can organize for you. Just ask us for further information. For Caminando Caminando, every customer is unique and every trip is put together and created as an exclusive tourist adventure, carefully tailored to the world of emotions and sensations that travellers hope to experience at every turn of their journey.

Name: Cyprus Health Tourism Council
HQ Location: Cyprus, Nicosia, Nicosia, 11 Nicosia / N. Cyprus Trnc, 99010
Company description: The Cyprus Health Tourism Council was established in 2015 to diversify tourism in North Cyprus and spread it to 12 months in particular, and in particular to contribute to raising the value added in the country through a sustainable and continously developing structure in Health Tourism. Cyprus Health Tourism Council is the only institution in North Cyprus that has the widest representation in the tourism and health field, established by cooperation of the most esteemed institutions, associations and foundations of North Cyprus such as Cyprus Turkish Tourism and Travel Agencies Association (KITSAB), Cyprus Turkish Hoteliers Association (KITOB), Association of Privately Working Doctors, Private Hospitals Association, Cyprus Turkish Guides Association (KITREB), Near East University and Near East University Hospital, IVF centers and the presidents and executives of reputable hotels and tour operators. The Cyprus Health Tourism Council has also become a member of the Global Healthcare Travel Council, established in Monte Carlo, Monaco, in 2015, as the 54th country representing the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus (TRNC). In addition, in April 2018, the position of Vice-President of the World Health Tourism Council was given to the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus and the Cyprus Health Tourism Council. The Council, which has contributed to many projects in order to develop alternative tourism varieties, especially in Health Tourism sector, contributes to promotion of North Cyprus through the international relations it has already established.

All tours sold through our website will be carbon neutralized by planting trees in collaboration with Kolviður fund (www.kolvidur.is). For more information about us and to check out our tours around Iceland, please visit our booking website www.nordicgreentravel.com.

Name: SOCOTRA TRAVEL GUIDE & TOURS
Company description: We are tourism agency located on the Island of Socotra. We are an extremely innovative company offering a number of services to travel agencies. As we are based here, we have up-to-date information and many contacts for supplying all the needs of those wishing to visit our beautiful island. The package tours we offer are varied and can incorporate cave exploration, socotra diving, riding camels, fauna and flora, boat trips, trekking and hiking, in the mountains and or on the beaches. We are able to tailor tours to meet the tourist's wishes.

Name: Magnificent Croatia
Company description: Magnificent Croatia is a Croatian DMC travel agency that takes you on unforgettable journeys – perfectly tailored, entirely personalized, and truly authentic.  We will design your adventures and luxury travel experiences with utter commitment, professionalism, creativity, knowledge, and love.  Because traveling inspires us, drives us, fulfills us and nothing makes us happier than sharing this passion with you. Travel differently, travel deeper with Magnificent Croatia.

Company description: Aventures en Islande est une opération organisant des excursions d'aventures sur le territoire islandais. Au programme, la visite des glaciers, des champs de lave et de leurs grottes, les randonnées dans les hauts plateaux et régions isolées, la traversée d'un fjord en kayak, la descente en rafting de rivières glacières... Name: Robinson & Friday SE
Company description: Mladá a dynamická cestovní kancelář nabízející forfaitové zájezdy pro golfisty do celého světa. Zajistíme pro vás: -dopravu -ubytování -green fee -transfery -pojištění Neváhejte nás oslovit pro přípravu nabídky. Cestovní agentura R&F nabízí pestrou paletu služeb z oblasti cestovního ruchu. Name: Unique Slovenia / Custom Tour Designer
Company description: UNIQUE SLOVENIA is a tour designer offering custom made tours for a traveller who think travel is more about a unique, authentic experience – with personalisation, privacy, spiritual well-being and even simplicity as the overarching goals. The company was established to share our intimate knowledge of Slovenia with those travelers looking for unique travel experiences. We pride ourselves in being able to take clients to unique destinations, while proving the highest levels of personal service. We strive to do this with elegance and sophistication, exclusivness and individuality. Our goal is to consistently exceed our client’s expectations and personally ensure that every aspect of client's time with us is perfect.  We create specialised tours (wine and gourmet tour, cooking tour, active tours…), short breaks or getaways and custom made tours that are designed according to client's desire and budget. Luxury private jets to Slovenia or any other world destination with inclusive or exclusive custom voyages can be obtained for most demanding clients.  On the US market we  partner with Virtuoso member tour operators Travcoa and Frontiers International Travel. Lately we have established partnership with Searchlights, an incentive tour operator. In Great Britain we work closely with luxury tour operator Amazing Voyages.   Our motto »You name it, we do it« is literaly what we do. Slovenia is our country and we know it backward and forward. We know the best place to stand to get that perfect photography of Bled Island, how to beat the crowds in the popular summer months, and where to go when you want to get off the beaten path. Slovenia is full of secrets, too— hidden places most people don't know about. We've traveled the country from top to bottom innumerable times, so if there's something worth seeing, we know about it. Just consider us your personal concierge—wherever you want to go, whatever you want to do, we'll make it happen.

Name: Atostogauti.lt
Company description: Ar pagalvojus apie atostogas, kurių metu tobulai pailsėtumėte, juntate per kūną pereinantį malonų šiurpuliuką? O jei dar ir jų planavimas nekelia rūpesčių, tuomet išvis – rojus. Kelionių agentūra Atostogauti.lt pasirūpins viskuo tam, kad Jūsų kelionė būtų lengva, maloni ir turininga! Mes daugiau nei 20 metų gyvename kelionėmis ir siekiame, kad visi mūsų klientai patirtų kelionių malonumą. Nesuskaičiuojama galybė kelionių patirčių ir įgyvendintų klientų poreikių padės Jūsų norus paversti realybe. Rūpinamės kiekvienu keliautoju individualiai, tad gausite: - pagal Jūsų poreikius parinktus skrydžio bilietus - apgyvendinimo, automobilio nuomos, draudimo paslaugas - ekspertiškus patarimus - gerąja praktika paremtus nuoširdžius patarimus Nuo rekomendacijų, ką verta pasiimti į lagaminą, iki vietos kontaktų, kur galima patirti skaniausios atostogų vakarienės malonumą. Pasirūpinsime automobilio parkavimo Lietuvos oro uostuose paslauga ir kitais galimais rūpesčiais, dar užbėgdami jiems už akių – nesvarbu, planuojate trumpą pabėgimą, ilgas saulėtas atostogas ar verslo kelionę. Per atostogas galva turi suktis nuo malonumų, o ne nuo persekiojančių rūpesčių! Po vienu kelionių agentūros Atostogauti.lt skėčiu pateikiami visų Lietuvoje veikiančių kelionių organizatorių pasiūlymai. Gyvename, kad keliautume ir keliautų mūsų klientai!

Name: Destination Break S.r.o.
Company description: Destination break is a unique concept, providing a network of suppliers and costumers with one final product “Destination Card”. The company is developing a specialized card system with multiple benefits for the final costumer. We are based in Prague, Czech Republic and despite being a young company, our experienced team has a long history of providing services for tourist groups and has a strong partner network among travel agencies.     We would like to upgrade travel experience thus introducing unique cards for multiple activities in the Czech Republic, for now! The project is focusing not only on tourist spots but rather includes fun activities, interactive museums, nightlife experience and offers various subscription plans, up to 1 year validation. We will gradually present our card types, which will differ from each other according to users’ age, personality profile, experience type. Our mission is to combine and present all valuable activities, from sport, culture, to art and nightlife, including various benefits for our users, at the moment focused on the Czech Republic with aim to spread to multiple European countries. Suppliers are regularly presented and visible to our clients on our website.   Our users are currently student travelers, and we constantly work to improve and reach more & various interesting crowds. However, we are targeting groups and individuals, agencies or solo travelers, locals or expats, young or adults, looking forward to being amazed by the unique experience that Destination Break Card has to offer. If you have interest in more info, please visit our web page.  We are welcoming new propositions, partnerships, suppliers, museums, unusual spots, activities, craft & arts, workshops, nightlife to create a unique team together. Please feel free to join us and write us on our contact details given below. email: milena@destinationbreak.com

Name: DORADO TOURS KFT BUDAPEST
Company description: Incoiming and DMC Travel Agency based in Budapest. Dicen los hungaros que el Danubio a su paso por Budapest, lejos de dividir la ciudad la une aun mas.   Budapest, como tal, nació en 1873 gracias a la unificación de Buda, Pest y Óbuda, pero sus orígenes se remontan a la antigua Roma.   Los primeros en aprovechar su emplazamiento a orillas del río fueron los romanos, quienes la bautizaron  como Aquincum. Después, vendrían godos, ávaros y magiares (considerados los antepasados de los  húngaros) que llegaron al mando de Arpad 896, seguidos de mongoles y turcos. Sin embargo, fueron los Habsburgo quienes,bajo el dominio austrohúngaro, en tiempos de Sissi y Francisco Jose, dieron a Budapest el carácter imperial que aún se siente pese a la destruccion casi total de la II Guerra Mundial. Igual de imperial que Viena pero mucho mas apasionada y vital. Alguien puso como ejemplo de su apasionado caracter a algunos de sus ciudadanos mas internacionales:  Zsa Zsa Gabor (apasionada por el cine), George Soros (apasionado por el dinero) y Ilona Staller, alias Cicciolina (Apasionada por... por...). Una buena opcion para descubrir Budapest es optar por alguno de los cruceros que surcan el Danubio y desplazarse en transporte público que cubre la ciudad con una densidad muy importante.

Name: Cruise Iceland
Company description: Cruise Iceland was established in 2004 to combine the resources of all those involved in receiving cruise ships to help promote Iceland as an exciting destination. Name: Discover Greek Culture
Company description: Discover Greek Culture (DGC) is a new inbound tour operator that provides travelers with hands-on Cultural Tourism Experiences in Greece. Founded in 2013 by trained cultural experts, DGC promotes Greek culture by showcasing the history, archaeology, art and gastronomy that set Greece apart from the rest. DGC ‘s unique tours weave together the very best of the Hellenic experience for discerning travelers looking to immerse themselves in Greek culture. DGC works closely with a number of institutions, organizations and sites to secure private viewings, exclusive visits to limited-access areas, expert hosts. In a highly saturated sightseeing and excursion market, DGC stands apart by offering travelers the opportunity to not only discover the breadth and wealth of Greek culture, but to live it for themselves.

Name: Bearing True South
Company description: Bearing True South is an adventure tour operator based in Athens, Greece. We are a team of like minded, experienced travelers who share certain values on what a journey means to everyone involved in the process, be that the visitor, the host community, or the natural environment itself. Realizing the true potential of Greece's huge cultural and geographical diversity, we organize nature based guided tours, ranging from 4x4 road trips and treasure hunt themed sailing adventures, to shipwreck diving and adrenaline charged, multi-activity holidays, with the objective of providing travelers with authentic, memorable, 'place dependent' experiences. We cooperate with hand-picked certified specialists, with several years of professional experience for each activity and work together with carefully selected locals who contribute their extensive knowledge of the destinations we visit, in order to deliver high quality travel experiences by travelers for travelers. Check your compass, get your bearings, join us on one of our adventures and let us show you Europe's stunningly beautiful True South!

Name: Suomen Matkailualan Liitto SMAL Ry
Company description: The Association of Finnish Travel Industry (SMAL) is a consortium of over 160 travel agencies, tour operators and incoming agencies that drives its members’ interests in relations with public authorities, legislators as well as in the field of domestic and international organizations. Total sales of SMAL member companies in 2019 was amounted to over 1.9 billion EUR, which is about 95 % of the sector’s total sales in Finland. SMAL members employ at home and abroad a total of about 2500 people. Founded in 1940, the trade association’s international member network now includes more than 110 other travel and tourism companies and entities such as transport companies, accommodation providers, domestic and foreign tourism offices, travel and tourism industry educational institutes, travel consultants, travel media and technology companies. MATKA Nordic Travel Fair, Northern Europe’s largest travel and tourism event is commissioned by SMAL. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Suomen matkatoimistoalan liitto ry (SMAL) on yli 180 matkatoimiston, matkanjärjestäjän ja incoming-matkatoimiston yhteenliittymä, joka ajaa jäsentensä etuja suhteissa viranomaisiin, lainsäätäjiin sekä alan kotimaisiin ja kansainvälisiin järjestöihin. SMALin jäsenyritysten kokonaismyynti vuonna 2019 oli yli 1,9 miljardia euroa, mikä on noin 95 prosenttia Suomen koko matkatoimistomyynnistä. SMALin jäsenet työllistävät kotimaassa ja ulkomailla yhteensä noin 2 500 henkeä. Vuonna 1940 perustetun toimialajärjestön kansainväliseen jäsenverkostoon kuuluu nykyään myös yli 110 muuta matkai-lualan yritystä ja tahoa, kuten kuljetusyhtiöitä, majoitusliikkeitä, kotimaisia ja ulkomaisia matkailutoimistoja sekä matkailualan oppilaitoksia, konsultteja, medioita ja teknologiayrityksiä. SMALin toimeksiannosta järjestetään vuosittain Pohjois-Euroopan suurin matkailutapahtuma MATKA-messut.

Name: Italea Trentino-Alto Adige
Company description: Immerse yourself in the wonders of Trentino-Alto Adige with MyAncesTrip APS. We are the group chosen by the ITALEA project of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation (MAECI). Our vision is to connect travelers with the cultural richness of our picturesque villages, born from the meeting of historians, genealogists and tourism professionals. Personalized experiences: Your journey, our passion In partnership with leading tour operators, we create unique itineraries tailored to your interests and desires. Every aspect of your trip is curated to provide a deeply personal and meaningful experience, from staying in authentic accommodations to participating in immersive cultural activities. Our innovative approach blends genealogical research with cultural exploration. Whether you want to discover your family's origins or immerse yourself in local traditions, MyAncesTrip APS will take you on a journey that transcends tourist discovery and leads you on an adventure that touches the strings of your heart and soul. We promote conscious tourism that respects communities and their heritage. Our partnership with specialized tour operators ensures that each trip supports the local economy and culture, creating a lasting bond between you and the wonders of Trentino-South Tyrol. Traveling with MyAncesTrip APS is a journey of personal discovery, an adventure that connects you to your past and enriches your present. We are proud to be part of the ITALEA project. We work with excellent partners to offer you an unforgettable experience.

Name: Simon's Best Travel GmbH
HQ Location: Austria, Lower Austria, Loosdorf, 2 Otto-glöckel Straße, 3382
Company description: Simon's Best Travelling ist der neue Reiseveranstalter für Young Travelling, Single Reisen und Spezial-Gruppenreisen. Unsere Reisen sind auf die jeweilige Alters- und Interessengruppe abgestimmt und beinhalten einzigartige Highlights, die man einmal erlebt haben muss.  Mit Young Travelling bieten wir erlebnisreiche Gruppenreisen für die Altersgruppe der 25- bis 39-Jährigen an. Außergewöhnliche Erlebnisse und eine junge, stimmige Reisegruppe machen diese Reisen zu einem Highlight. Keine Lust, alleine zu verreisen? Im Rahmen unserer Single Reisen haben wir wundervolle Gruppenreisen für Alleinreisende nach den Altersgruppen "25 - 39 Jahre" und "40 - 55 Jahre" organisiert. Eine gesellige Runde und ein interaktives Programm versprechen tolle Reiseerlebnisse und neue (Reise-)Bekanntschaften. Mit unseren Spezial-Gruppenreisen bieten wir außergewöhnliche Reisen für alle Altersgruppen in die Ferne sowie Hobby-Reisen mit Fotografieren, Yoga oder Kulinarik an. Alle Reisen werden von Reiseprofi Simon Edtbrustner konzipiert und organisiert. Die jahrelange Erfahrung, die Simon bereits in der Reisebranche gesammelt hat, und die Leidenschaft fürs Reisen tragen dazu bei, dass jede Reise wirklich nur "das Beste" beinhaltet und vorab persönlich getestet wurden. Damit die Qualität auch während der Reise garantiert ist, wird jede Reise von einem Simon's Best Reiseleiter begleitet.

Name: Geocometa

Contamos con un local minimalista, muy funcional y con diseño situado en Catarroja (Valencia).  En Geocometa, estamos en continuo crecimiento y siempre al día de las novedades de nuestro sector. Al pertenecer al grupo de gestión NEGO, podemos confeccionar paquetes de viajes por todo el mundo de forma exclusiva. Esto hace de un elemento diferenciador, ya que diseñamos los viajes con un cuidado exquisito en la selección de alojamientos y servicios, trabajando directamente con los mejores corresponsales en destino, y siempre pendientes de superar las expectativas de cualquier cliente. Las agencias NEGO nos caracterizamos por tener unas cualidades muy orientadas al servicio al cliente. Haremos que tu viaje sea inolvidable, realizando un estudio dedicado y personalizado del destino que más cubra tus necesidades.  Talento, calidad, cercanía o profesionalidad haran que el viaje más importante de tu vida sea todo un éxito. The initiative to work with local operators contribute to sustainable development of local economies. Operation starts in Spain, with a subsequent implementation worldwide.  If you would like more information or assist us in developing the site, visit our www.openmarket.travel.

Name: Maistral
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Venice, 21 Via Fabio Mutinelli, 30174
Company description: Maistràl is a Venetian DMC Tour Operator born from several years of collaboration and friendship of a close-knit team of experts, each with their own set of skills and specificities, which complement each other. Why “Maistràl”? the term Maistràl refers to the ancient name used by Venetian navigators to indicate the Mistral wind, which blowing from the North-West crossed Venice and the entire Adriatic Sea, becoming a favorable current for departure and an absolute reference to always find the way back towards the Serenissima Republic of Venice also called “La Magistra”. Like the Mistral wind, Maistràl wants to be a unquestionable reference for the travelers, accompanying them with devotion and passion in every moment of their journey to discover the magnificent places, traditions and products that the Veneto Region has to offer. To guarantee the best experience at all times, Maistràl relies on a wisely selected network of collaborators and structures, making sure that each has the same attention, passion and competence as its team. Each project is designed and tailored to each customer, with care and attention to his specific requirements and needs.

The main activities of the agency are initially focused on the island of Tenerife and its enormous natural diversity and options of more conscious experiences of leisure. Focusing on peoples well being and the opportunity to enjoy natural spaces, good food and just have the time of the lives in a safe and healthy environment.

Name: Enula Viaggi
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, San Miniato, 629 Via Tosco-romagnola Est, 56028
Company description: Enula Viaggi nasce nel 2011 e da un decennio sono tre gli ingredienti fondamentali che muovono il nostro lavoro: professionalità, passione e voglia di scoprire le bellezze del mondo. Dedichiamo una minuziosa attenzione ai nostri clienti e ad ogni nostra proposta perché la parte più bella del nostro lavoro è vedervi tornare dai vostri viaggi con quello scintillio negli occhi! Negli anni, abbiamo stretto accordi con i Tour Operator più importanti sul panorama italiano e su quello internazionale per riservarvi le offerte più competitive sul mercato, mantenendo un'ottima qualità dei servizi. Garantiamo un'assistenza completa prima e, soprattutto, per tutta la durata del viaggio.  Vi aspettiamo in agenzia!

Name: All México Pass
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes mayorista/minorista, establecida en España, fundada por socios mexicanos e hispanomexicanos, enfocados en la promoción y venta de servicios de viajes en México.   Ofrecemos un producto único en el mercado para facilitar la transportación y servicios de viaje en México, a través de su agencia de viajes o directamente en nuestro sitio. A través de nuestro moderno y eficaz sistema de reservaciones, encontrará siempre la mejor oferta, así como una cuidadosa selección de proveedores, con los que podrá realizar sus viajes a la medida, dentro de México.    Ofrecemos a nuestros clients, agencias de viajes y viajeros en general,  toda la información turística y medios para realizar su itinerario a través de nuestro sitio. Ofrecemos también esta página a todas las oficinas de turismo de México que quieran utilizar un canal en Europa, Asia y Latinoamérica, con sus clientes.   Nuestros clientes online, disponen de herramientas para la selección de servicios a través de un mapa interactivo de búsqueda de ofertas, destinos, proveedores, formas de pago seguras y garantizadas con servicio antifraude. También contamos con un sistema de detección de su IP local para mantenimiento y compra, identificando de esta forma el lenguaje a utilizar.   Nuestros productos se venden  únicamente en Europa, Asia y Latinoamérica. No está permitida su venta en México, Estados Unidos y Canadá; lo anterior por motives contractuales con nuestros proveedores.

Name: Travel's Easy
Company description: Travel Designer / Tour Operator specialising in bespoke tours in Ireland, England, Scotland and Wales, + other European countries.  Self drive, bus-, train tours, city tours,  luxury cruises etc.

Name: Holiday Cloud
Company description: Established in 2017, HolidayCloud has helped 1000's of people get great deals on sun holidays and city breaks. HolidayCloud is partnering with Irish Travel agencies, Hotel Chains and small independent travel operators in 2018 with a new innovative online travel solution.  The aim of HolidayCloud.ie is to help Irish businesses grow their brands through our extensive network of holiday makers.  By tapping into our database of 60,000 subscribers our partners have seen huge increases in bookings made and have been able to establish a much bigger and higher converting digital presence than ever before.

Company description: Agencia de viajes on-line, que nace del sueño de unos jóvenes emprendedores apasionados por el turismo y encuentran en  la organización de viajes y poder lograr los sueños de los demás mediante un viaje, su profesión perfecta.

Name: Discovering Cork
Company description: Discovering Cork is the only specialist inbound tour operator for the South Coast of Ireland. Services We Offer: Meet & Greet, VIP Transfers, Private multi-day itineraries and stand alone day tours, Accommodation reservations, Restaurant bookings, Hen & stag parties, Golf tours, angling trips, family breaks, foodie tours and much more.

Name: Glocal Way
Company description: Glocal Way is a portal for travellers and inbound tourism operators,an innovative networking experience. Tourists visiting Glocal Way will have the possibility to find and contact local guides, tour operators, transport services to plan and realize their perfect travel, without middle man.

Name: ACONVI
Company description: Agencia de Viajes.- Asesoramiento y Contratación de Viajes.- Moderna plataforma que combina los trámites de la agencia de viajes tradicional con las gestiones de venta on-line. ACONVI reúne experiencia y modernidad.-

Company description: PINK TRAVEL - Agência de Viagens e Turismo, Nazaré e Oeste.

Name: Viajes Gilbo
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Jerez De La Frontera
Company description: Viajes GIlbo  es una agencia de viajes donde ofrecemos servicios a las empresas.  Proporcionando servicios al mejor precio siguiendo la política de viajes de la empresa. Los viajes corporativos incluyen muchos gastos que se dispersan. Hoteles, vuelos, restaurantes, taxis, trenes, etc. Por ello, nuestra agencia dispondrá de un agente para  facilitar la gestión de vuestro  viajes corporativo. Únete a Viajes Gilbo

Name: ONEIRA Club De Viajeros
Company description: ONEIRA  es un club de viajeros pensado para los amantes de viajes intensos y personalizados para un grupo de amigos. Viajes con alma; diseñados para los viajeros más exigentes.  Queremos prepararos los mejores viajes de grupo posibles y contando para ello con la organización técnica y la garantía de la mejor agencia de viajes. El nombre de nuestro club de viajeros, de vuestro club desde ahora mismo, es ONEIRA. El nombre nos inspira territorios oníricos, tejidos a menudo con recuerdos de viajes pasados, que retenemos en nuestra memoria. Alguien escribió “los viajes primero son sueños”. ONEIRA deriva de la traducción al griego de la palabra “sueño”. Pues no en vano la experiencia de viajar y soñar pueden ser territorios comunes.  Nos seduce muy especialmente esta cita de Guy de Maupassant: “El viaje es una puerta por donde salimos de la realidad conocida para penetrar en una realidad inexplorada que nos recuerda a los sueños” El antecedente más próximo de nuestro proyecto fue PERIPLOS. Con el equipo de PERIPLOS iniciamos una inolvidable singladura en el año de 2009, realizando y diseñando nuestro primer viaje en 2010  a la fascinante India del Norte y Nepal y hasta 2018 no hemos parado de viajar con nuestros amigos viajeros, realizando más de 40 salidas de grupo, en una evolución que nos ha llevado a ONEIRA club de viajeros. Nuestros viajes son diseñados concienzudamente con nuestro sello especial. Te presentamos viajes de grupo a tu medida, en su mayoría de gran recorrido y grandes destinos, con especial interés en las gentes,  la cultura y la naturaleza de los lugares que visitamos, prestando la mayor atención a lo que realmente el viajero demanda: vivir y sentir viajes auténticos, en el relativamente corto tiempo que invertimos en cada uno de ellos . Buscamos la belleza del mundo que está ahí afuera.

Name: Travel Explorations
Company description: Travel Explorations is a global travel guide for genuine adventurers! Our mission is to inspire people to explore more of the world and achieve unique adventures! With great passion and enthusiasm for travelling, we share stories and articles from our journeys, see also our website www.TravelExplorations.com.  Travel Explorations uses also social media to connect with travellers around the world. We utilize each social network for a different purpose. Our business is mostly active on leading social networks as Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. Social media is integrated on our website to strengthen our brand and interact with travellers. Our business idea is to attract travellers to tour operators who can realize their wildest travelling dreams. Our business is located in Moss, Norway, 65 kilometres south east for the capital Oslo. Travel Explorations provides consultant services in Internet marketing and e-commerce. We contribute to turn websites and social media into measurable revenues for companies and organisations, both in the travel industry and other industries.   Travel Explorations offers the following services and products:  - Publishing of news, travel tales, articles, photos and videos about expeditions and adventure travelling. - Booking of adventure tours, flights, hotels and more. - Planning and running of campaigns - Advertising and company presentations: we offer a wide range of advertising and sponsorship opportunities for promoting your business. We can help you to put together a package to fit your specific objectives and needs.  - Providing of marketing consultant services as building agent network, conducting market analysis, establishing websites, submitting to search engines, establishing in social media, integrate social media on websites, writing articles and taking photos.

Name: Bangladesh Consult
Company description: Contacts - creative project development - events - translation (spoken Bangla) - counseling - tour programs (individual and group tours to Bangladesh and Nepal) - holiday packages or escorted tours - books on Bangladesh (in Danish)
