Company description: Travel Agency placed in the best part of  Tuscany "Siena"  , we have been for 25 years  offering off of the beaten path  tours of  our beatiful land incuding , History , sight seen , wine a food with a personal touch .

Name: Get Tours
Company description: Guided Sightseeing day Tours with private driver in Italy; Exclusive Wine Tours in Tuscany with enthusiast wine experts; Authentic Food Experiences with local food guides Get Tours is an authorized tour operator and a certified car services company based in Cortona, within the heart of Tuscany in Italy, offering reliable and professional car services with expert English speaking drivers and luxury vehicles (Mercedes-Benz sedans, minivans, limousines and minibuses) for visiting and exploring the most beautiful cities and hill towns in Tuscany and Italy: Florence, Siena, Cortona, Montepulciano, Pienza, Montalcino, Lucca, San Gimignano, Arezzo, Assisi, Perugia, Orvieto and many others charming tourist destinations. Let our wine experts and certified sommeliers guide you into the top Italian wine regions, visiting the best wineries and tasting the finest Tuscan wines: Brunello di Montalcino wine, Chianti Classico wine, Nobile di Montepulciano wine, Supertuscans wines and many others; discover the best food experiences and wine tours in Tuscany and Italy with our local experts and with private transportation from Florence, Siena, Cortona, Montalcino, Montepulciano, Pienza, San Gimignano, Assisi, Arezzo, Perugia, Orvieto, San Gimignano and all the major cities and towns in Tuscany and Italy.

Name: TunaFish
Company description: TunaFish (www.tnfsh.nl) is a travel agency for independent travellers based in the Netherlands. Focusing mainly on the Dutch student and youth market, TunaFish yearly helps around 50.000 travellers preparing for their trip, e.g. by finding a cheap flight and/or a quality travel insurance. TunaFish focuses on the trip basics (flight + insurance) and believes travellers should arrange most of their trip locally, using local travel providers.

HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Fossò, 51 Via Provinciale Sud, 30030
Company description: Agenzia di viaggi e tour operator. Viaggi di gruppo e su misura nelle Dolomiti. Attività ed esperienze nelle montagne più belle del mondo.

P.IVA 03626980548

Name: Imperial Tours & Events
HQ Location: Austria, Lower Austria, Bad Vöslau, 11 Dr. Sigmund Stransky-straße, 2540
Company description: Sie lieben Reisen so wie wir? Dann sind Sie bei uns genau richtig! Als Ihr persönliches Reisebüro planen wir Ihren perfekt maßgeschneiderten Urlaub und richten uns ganz nach Ihren persönlichen Bedürfnissen. Als Fullservice – Reisebüro bieten wir folgende Leistungen: ✿ Pauschalreisen – rundum wohlfühlen ✿ Individualreisen – für Sie und Ihre Liebsten ✿ Kleinstgruppenreisen – Travelling with Friends ✿ Reiseleitung / Reisebetreuung

Name: BRASIL NA ITALIA Di Fernandes Bueno Barbara Helen
Company description: A agência de viagens online BRASIL NA ITALIA tem sede na Itália e foi aberta por mim,  Barbara Bueno. Talvez você já tenha conhecido alguns dos meus blogs que estão no ar há mais de uma década como o brasilnaitalia.net e o trabalhonaitalia.com. De qualquer modo, me apresento: sou brasileira, residente na Toscana desde o início de 2005 (isso mesmo, há mais de dez anos). Trabalhei no primeiro social media team oficial da Regione Toscana para promoção oficial de turismo na Toscana no distante ano de 2009/2010 quando projetos do gênero eram uma novidade. Adoro viajar pela Italia, um país maravilhoso com centenas de pequenos vilarejos charmosos além das clássicas cidades imperdíveis como Roma, Florença, Veneza e Milão. Selecionamos e colaboramos apenas com os melhores profissionais da Italia para você ter a segurança de um serviço de qualidade e seguro garantido por uma agência de viagens totalmente regular de acordo com as rigorosas leis e normas italianas (mais informações  aqui: https://brasilnaitalia.com/a-agencia-de-viagens-brasil-na-italia-e-confiavel/ ) --- Mission: Nós investimos no português! Ser recebido na Itália em língua portuguesa faz toda diferença: você pode descansar e aproveitar a viagem invés de ficar pensando em como se comunicar, ou tentar entender explicações em uma língua que para você não é tão natural como a sua língua mãe. Se para uma clássica agência de viagem ou hotel italiano o português pode ser mais uma das línguas, para os brasileiros que vivem na Itália ele é a prioridade. É um orgulho cultural que nos esforçamos para manter vivo com o passar do tempo. É  por isso abrimos na Italia uma agência de viagens que fala português. Espero que em alguns anos o Brasil entre para a lista de “países importantes” aqui na Itália. Seria ótimo para nós brasileiros que moramos aqui e para os brasileiros pelo mundo, que terão muito mais opções por um preço melhor.

Name: NORTH And AWAY
Company description: NORTH and AWAY is an independent tour operator specialized in the Nordic Countries: Denmark - Norway - Sweden - Finland - Iceland - Greenland - Faroese Islands - Spitsbergen. We offer summer and winter holidays to Scandinavia for private customers and companies through our website www.northandaway.be.

Name: Zuidland Travel
Company description: Zuidland Travel is een zelfstandig reisbureau. Wij zijn niet gebonden aan een reisorganisatie of keten, u kunt erop rekenen, dat u van ons altijd een eerlijk en persoonlijk reisadvies krijgt. Ons hele team van zeer ervaren reisadviseuses staat altijd enthousiast voor u klaar om uw vakantie tot een succes te maken. Wij maken regelmatig studiereizen en kunnen uit eigen vakantiebelevingen, ieder met onze eigen specialisatie, de beste reisadviezen geven!

Name: Gesticlaim
Company description: L’impresa moderna orientata al cliente non può fare a meno di un efficiente ufficio Customer Care. Negli ultimi anni  il micro contenzioso tipico del settore ha però determinato la necessità di affiancare a questo essenziale servizio un ufficio per la Gestione del Contenzioso.  Una soluzione possibile è Gesticlaim: una società giovane, dotata di un team di esperti in materia di Diritto del Turismo che si mette a Vostra disposizione per fornire un efficiente apporto consulenziale per la gestione del contenzioso, la strutturazione e la formazione del personale nel Vostro ufficio Customer Care. E non solo. La finalità di Gesticlaim è di “fare sistema” consentendo di pervenire ad una più corretta, efficace ed efficiente gestione globale dei contenziosi, senza perdere di vista la qualità della relazione con la clientela. Gesticlaim offre servizi legali che si orientano a tour operator, agenzie di viaggio, network, fornitori di servizi, compagnie e broker assicurativi.

Name: Agencja Turystyczna Tramp
Company description: Our company offers guided coach tours for schools, companies and visitors of Busko-Zdrój's spas. Our offer includes guided tours to many tourist attractions of the region. It was established in 1990 and is holds a license for tour operators issued by the Marshall of Swietokrzyskie province.

Name: Utac Viaggi spa
Company description: Il gruppo Utac rappresenta, nello scenario turistico italiano il gruppo leader nel settore viaggi / vacanze in Grecia. E’ composto da società e marchi operanti nella gestione e commercializzazione di villaggi e alberghi, nell'attività di tour operator , nel trasporto marittimo , nel noleggio pullman g.t. , nella editoria, nella distribuzione. Fondato nel 1983, è oggi una realtà capace di soddisfare le molteplici esigenze espresse dalla clientela, in termini di vacanze e soggiorni fornendo un prodotto ed un servizio di alta qualità nei vari segmenti: vacanze individuali, vacanze di gruppo, tours, crociere, congressi, convegni, turismo sociale / scolastico / religioso / sportivo. Trasformato in S.r.l. nel 1987 e in S.p.a. nel 2006, il Gruppo Utac ha sempre visto aumentare la propria quota di mercato nell'attività di tour operator, incrementandola particolarmente nel settore viaggi di gruppo in Grecia.

Name: A Peu
Company description: A Peu is a  travel agency specialised in the walking and cycling itineraries and tours, affording visitors a leisurely and relaxed discovery of Catalonia’s nature, history and gastronomy.  The company’s services include the design of customised routes, tours and holidays for private groups and the arrangements for all transport, accommodations, meals, guides and logistical support necessary for such outings.

Name: Tuscany 4 Explore
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Florence, Via Di Ripoli, 50126
Company description: Tuscany4Explore is a small tour operator founded in 2019 by Luciana Gualtierotti, a tourism expert with over 20 years of experience as a professional guide and tour leader. We use to say that Tuscany4Explorer is “proud to be small”, since every tour we organize is handled from the very beginning, with the utmost attention and care. Tuscany is our specialization: the professionals working for the company have been in the tourism industry of this Region for years and therefore have strong connections with hotels, restaurants, villas and highlights in Tuscany, which enable us to consistently provide quality services at a good value. Tuscany4Explore is based in Bagno a Ripoli, in the very heart of Chianti region (renown worldwide for its vineyards and wine production). Our company organizes private and small group activities: our guests can choose from a list of suggested experiences or create customized itineraries based on specific needs or requests. We love to deliver experiences connected to nature, food & wine culture and respect of the beautiful environment that surrounds us. Some of our highlights include visits to the Florence countryside, Siena, Volterra and San Gimignano, Val D’Orcia (Unesco heritage), Montalcino, the natural thermal baths of Bagno Vignoni, and many other areas of Tuscany (up to reach Cinque Terre, in Luguria)

Name: Piceno Incoming
HQ Location: Italy, The Marches, Ascoli Piceno, 196 Corso Mazzini, 63100
Company description: Dal 2009, Piceno Tour è un tour operator specializzato nell’Incoming per le Marche in particolare per Ascoli Piceno e la sua provincia. L’esperienza ottenuta nel corso degli anni e l’entusiasmo dei titolari hanno fatto sì che Piceno Tour ampliasse la propria offerta sulle regioni Umbria ed Abruzzo favoriti dalla posizione centrale e dalla estrema vicinanza. Oggi, grazie all’aumento del portfolio clienti che hanno creduto nella professionalità dello staff, Piceno Tour è uno delle principali Incoming Agency della Regione Marche e del Piceno. Since 2009, Piceno Tour is an Incoming Tour Operator focused in Marche Region especially in the Piceno area. Now Piceno Tour works in the whole heart of Italy: Lazio, Marche, Umbria and Abruzzo Regions enhancing the capability and providing new services, unusual experiences and activities to give you the chance to live the italian real life. Today, thanks to the increasing customers portfolio, who believed in the professionalism of the staff, Piceno Tour is one of the leading Incoming Agency of Marche and Piceno.

Name: Burro & Cacao Viaggi
Company description: Burro & Cacao viaggi è un´agenzia creata da persone intraprendenti e dinamiche, che hanno fatto della loro passione una professione. La nostra missione è: soddisfare al meglio le esigenze del viaggiatore, ed il tutto garantendo sempre competenza, professionalità, e cura nei dettagli. Collaborando con i migliori tour operator nazionali ed internazionali, riusciamo sempre ad organizzare ogni itinerario turistico, prestando sempre la massima attenzione al rapporto qualità/prezzo. Tra le nostre proposte troviamo: splendidi viaggi di nozze, crociere da sogno, viaggi individuali e di gruppo, viaggi scolastici, meeting ed incentive. Completano la gamma dei nostri servizi le attività di biglietteria aerea, ferroviaria e marittima. Burro & Cacao é in grado di fornire ai propri clienti i seguenti servizi :  •	Biglietteria aerea, ferroviaria e marittima •	Prenotazione di hotel •	Prenotazione di pacchetti di viaggio •	Organizzazione di viaggi personalizzati "su misura" •	Organizzazione di viaggi di gruppo ed individuali •	Viaggi di nozze •	Agriturismo •	Neve •	Mare italia & estero •	Tour con accompagnatori •	Viaggi studio •	Viaggi sportivi •	Viaggi per Single •	Viaggi d'affari •	Viaggi Benessere ORARI DI APERTURA:           lun-ven              09.00 - 13.00 /  15.30-19.30                                                     sab                    09.00 - 13.00 sabato pomeriggio, ore serale, pause pranzo siamo a vostra completa disposizione previo appuntamento

Name: Gullies Tours | DMC T.O. Italy & Argentina
Company description: Travel is my Passion! GULLIES TOURS DMC & T.O. is my dream that comes true. Gullies Tours DMC & T.O. is a young professional Destination Management Company and full-service wholesale tour operator specialised in the organisation of tour packages, leisure, events and incentives in all regions of Italy and Argentina. My more than 28-years of experience within the tourism industry makes me an excellent Travel Agent and Travel Organizer. I am responsible for ensuring travel arrangements for incoming & outgoing groups from the beginning to end, as well as providing them with technical and practical support through the trip. I have in-depth knowledge of travel and tourism products in Italy and in Argentina for foreign and Italian groups, negotiating rates and deals to arrive with excellent services at the best package for the best price per person. My approach involves using a savvy understanding of time and travel scheduling as well as extensive travel experience in multiple countries.  GULLIES TOURS DMC & T.O. | Passion for Travel! Follow us also on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and YouTube, Wechat, Telegram @GulliesTours

Name: Only Sicily By Paraiba Travel
Company description: La vita è un viaggio e viaggiare in Sicilia è l’ossigeno per la vita.    Only Sicily nasce dall’esperienza di Paraiba Travel, il Tour Operator al servizio dei viaggiatori dal 1996, specializzato nel creare vacanze personalizzate ed esclusive alla scoperta degli aspetti più incantevoli ed autentici della Sicilia : cuore pulsante e prezioso del mediterraneo. Attraverso formule uniche e personalizzate di viaggi, tour, soggiorni, meeting e last minute Only Sicily vi condurrà in un percorso straordinario lungo la storia della Sicilia più vera.  Nel sito troverete diverse proposte esclusive per entrare in contatto con l’ineguagliabile patrimonio culturale e artistico della Sicilia, le sue bellezze naturali, le sue insuperabili bontà enogastronomiche e le sue più autentiche tradizioni.  Only Sicily Benvenuti in Sicilia.

Name: Cuba Tulike
Company description: Agencia de Viajes especialista en Cuba !!!

Name: Glitrende Kroatia
Company description: Glitrende Kroatia is a unique travel agency focused on trips to magnificent Croatia. With more than 2000 islands, its stunning coast, crystal clear blue water and medieval architecture, Croatia is with reason one of the most beautiful countries in the world. Glitrende Kroatia will give you opportunity to experience Croatia in the best possible way. We are looking forward to offer you unique and unforgettable experience. Luxury accommodation and transport, detailed organization and highly specialized services is what we are really proud of.  Glitrende Kroatia will give you exclusive access to most beautiful locations and hidden gems. Our finest stauff and first-class local hosts will be at your services at all time. Our portfolio includes only the best 4 and 5 star hotels, boutique hotels, heritage properties, and private villas. Our main focus point is quality. By providing specialized attention to our clientele and their specific needs and wishes, we are able to deliver a professional and unique experience, not just a service. There are thousands of places to visit, sights to see and things to do in Croatia – which is great – but it can be overwhelming when starting to plan your holiday from scratch. We as your travel agency have explored and researched Croatia –  we know the greatest places and we’ve done the best things there are to do. Let us put our expertise to work! Are you looking for a family holiday, a relaxing getaway, an adventurous trip, or a honeymoon in Croatia? We can design the perfect package just for you and yours! Visit historical sights, try local food & wine, sail to the islands, relax on the beach, hike to mountain peaks, cycle through the countryside and more! We are looking forward to have you as our customers!

Company description: Il viaggio è un momento di scoperta che riempie la vita, un evento sempre unico che noi di SAP Viaggi e Turismo costruiamo con la massima attenzione ad ogni minimo dettaglio per renderla un’esperienza indimenticabile. Puoi contare sulla solida esperienza pluriennale dei fratelli Michele e Andrea Pizzo, pronti ad offrire le migliori soluzioni, contraddistinte da un rapporto qualità prezzo eccellente, frutto di collaborazioni esclusive solo con i migliori tour operator e partnership. Rivolgendoti a noi, potrai avere accesso a una moltitudine di servizi turistici, che includono trasporti di terra su ruota o rotaie, biglietteria marittima, navale e aerea, prenotazione alberghiera e di qualsiasi struttura ricettiva, servizi di ristorazione e accessori. Vuoi dar vita al viaggio che hai sempre sognato? Ci pensiamo noi! SAP viaggi e turismo realizza davvero il viaggio che sogni di fare, da quello per le nozze alle vacanze che tanto aspettavi, ci occupiamo noi di tutto, grazie a personale qualificato e disponibile. Dalla progettazione del viaggio fino al ritorno, il nostro obiettivo è quello di rendere speciale ogni momento che sia un viaggio di istruzione scolastica, un tour enogastronomico, una settimana all’insegna del divertimento o anche un pellegrinaggio. Inoltre, per soddisfare davvero ogni esigenza, abbiamo un parco macchine di pregio, dotato anche di autobus nuovissimi, a bordo dei quali troverai solo personale altamente qualificato e con esperienza sul territorio nazionale e internazionale. AVRAI SOLO BISOGNO DI SCEGLIERE LA TUA DESTINAZIONE, DI TUTTO IL RESTO CE NE OCCUPIAMO NOI.

Name: Incognito
HQ Location: Cyprus, Larnaka, Tochni, Agion Konstantinou Kai Elenis, 7740
Company description: The shift of the UK nighttime industry in the last decade from nightclubs to festivals is both sad and exciting. For various reasons, more and more of the population are opting to go out less, and instead spend their disposable income on bigger social outings only a handful of times per year. Because of this, festivals are hot right now and new entries into the market are popping up all the time, but the fact remains that the British weather is highly unpredictable and the spaces that these events are held in -- usually a set of marquees on open brownfield land -- leave a lot to be desired. While organisers push themselves to go bigger and better with their line-ups and production each year, they remain limited in their quest by one factor: location. It is only a matter of time before people get bored of the wet and muddy field format and go in search of 'the next thing'. At Be, our aim is to become a national outbound tour operator specialising in festival-style experiences and authentic connections. We believe that setting is the single most important factor in making or breaking an event, and a true differentiator if you find the right one. Following Managing Director Luke Fisher's relocation to Cyprus in 2019 and his involvement in the local events scene this past summer, we have seen first-hand that Larnaca has some truly breathtaking spaces along the coast and is stupidly underutilised compared to the over-commercialised party town of Ayia Napa. By combining his industry contacts in the UK and knowledge of his new local area, we can be at the forefront of a movement to make Larnaca an attractive destination for parties and events. With its subtropical climate, array of coastal venues, own airport and relatively inexpensive flights from most major UK airports, it is ideally poised as a backdrop to world-class events and within easy reach of UK audiences.

Name: Flygstolen Nordic AB
Company description: Flygstolen Nordic AB is an online travel agency operating in Sweden. The company  was started by Linda Bjernstål in 2004. We want to offer our customers full flexibility, where each individual can find their solution whether it’s a flight ticket or package deal. Economy class or business. Everything is easily accessed and possible to book 24 hours a day on our website.   Since July 2013 we can offer companies and leisure travelers a log-in option, where all travel details are saved for quick and easy booking. Search for your trip, choose who’s going to travel, confirm payment and it’s all set to go. We have your date of birth, passport number, frequent flyer number and you can print e-tickets and receipt for all your trips in one place.   Even though we operate online we want to offer you the best customer service. If you have questions or problems with your booking our experienced and skilled customer service is here to help you. Name: DS TOURS LTD

Company description: “Ди Ес Турс” ООД е туроператор и туристически агент с удостоверение за регистрация № РК-01-6613 от 04.08.2010 г. Ние предлагаме разнообразни туристически услуги: - Настаняване в страната и чужбина; - Екскурзии и почивки в цял свят; - Индивидуални и групови пътувания; - Продажба на самолетни билети на редовни и чартърни авиокомпании; - Конгресен туризъм; - Тиймбилдинги; - Трансфери; - Рент а кар; - Застраховки; „Ди Ес Турс“ ООД има собствена чартърна програма, ориентирана към туристически дестинации като: Палма де Майорка, Крит, Сицилия, Тенерифе, Барселона, Португалия, Прага, Дубровник, Корфу и др. Ние гарантираме за добрите условия и високото качество на предлаганите от нас продукти. Наши партньори са водещи туроператори, наложили се на световния туристически пазар, благодарение на високите си стандарти за качество: DERTOUR, ITS, MEIERS, TRAVELiX, JAHN REISEN. Отличните ни контакти и работа с чуждестранни туроператори и хотелиери, ни позволяват максимално да удовлетворим желанията и потребностите на всеки клиент. Подхождаме гъвкаво при организирането на групови и фирмени пътувания, като се стремим да предложим най-доброто съотношение между цена и качество, съобразени с бюджета на клиента. Екипът ни е съставен от обучени и опитни кадри, чийто опит и внимание е изцяло на Ваше разположение. Те с радост ще подготвят необходимата информация за Вашето пътуване, както и подходяща оферта, отговаряща на изискванията Ви.

Name: ITALY CHINA TOURISM - QSC Program
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Bologna, 19 Via Marco Polo, 40131
Company description: Il Programma QSC è un progetto cinese. E' stato implementato originariamente dal CNTA (China National Tourism Association) a seguito della nuova Legge Cinese sul Turismo del 2013, ed è attualmente seguito direttamente dall'Associazione Nazionale Cinese dei Tour Operator. Il Programma QSC si propone di stilare una lista delle eccellenze turistiche di qualità, i loro prodotti e servizi saranno evidenziati e promossi ai tour operator, alle agenzie di viaggi e ai viaggiatori cinesi. Il Programma QSC è un progetto "no profit" e l’adesione al Programma QSC è gratuita.

Name: Nomaddict
Company description: We are not a travel agency, neither you are going to go for any package holiday with us. Nevertheless, we will fuel your traveling dreams, show you how to make them real, prepare you to go and assist with anything you may need on the go. Nomaddict offer is about providing you with based on hands-on experience consultancy and efficient, complex assistance.  We create the personalized itineraries for both, the traveling amateurs and enthusiasts, and take care of its formal and technical details. Our goal is to satisfy your craving for adventure without getting buncrupt or into any trouble. We work together with you to elaborate the optimal result - your individually tailored, personalized, sustainable travel experience.  Nomaddict believes in the balanced way of living (such as permaculture) and mindful travelling, trying to apply them in all its operations. We are always striving to find the alternative, less common way while questioning consumptional lifestyle or taking any commercial or soft option. We have learnt that doing things yourself is the most rewarding way of any act - that is why we are providing you with the know-how instead of the package holiday. Nomaddict: - wants to inspire you and convince that every great travel begins with a seeminly intangible idea, - helps you make up an idea and/or elaborates yours, - advises you on how make it real, - takes care of the formalities and logistics, - provides you with an estimated budget, - offers its 24h support, - helps you pack (preparing a tailored to your needs and climate zone(/s) packing list, choosing a proper outdoor equipment, etc.), - prepares the 3 Questionnaire-based Travel Drafts to suggest what we think will match to your needs,  - offers 3 types of Travel Plans: Compass, Map and Navigation, tendering different range and complexity of the services provided, - asks you to fill out the Questionnaire so that we get to know more about you, your ideas and preferences. You: - are a single person or group of people, - have some free time to spend, - are going on holiday soon, - have a calling to travel, - are overwhelmed by the immensity of information available in the web, - wish to gain hands-on understanding of the external and internal world, - seek for true, enriching experience, - feel a need to contribute to the world's situation improvement (by sustainable travelling instead of commercial) - want to give a try to the things you have only dreamed about before, - please to strengthen your personality and get deeper into your inner self,  - are keen on meeting friends for lifetime, - look for an alternative and a meaning(/s) but - have never travelled before, - do not have time to lose, - do not actually know how to start planning, - are afraid, - do not have any companion to do it with, - have a do-it-yourself approach, - do not have any outdoor equipment, - need some special assistance or treatment, - and do not speak foreign languages. We (you&nomaddict): - discuss the plan and brainstorm, - co-operate to create the best-fitting sollutions which are meeting your needs and fulfilling your tastes, - we do a research so that you save time and money, - will be in touch as long us you are gone, - create an unforgetable experience  - ... and, as a side effect, addiction to travel :) Follow these 3 Steps to create an unforgettable travel memories: 1- Questionnaire: https://nomaddict.org/questionnaire/ 2 - Three TRAVEL DRAFTS: https://nomaddict.org/travel-planner/  3 - Travel Planning: https://nomaddict.org/planning-travel-itinerary/

Name: Intertours Norway AS
Company description: Intertours Norway AS: Your Trusted Partner for All-Inclusive Group Tours in Norway Intertours Norway is a specialized tour operator offering bespoke, all-inclusive tours to foreign travel agencies. Our comprehensive tour packages are fully organized and managed by our experienced team, ensuring a seamless Norwegian travel experience for your clients. Our Philosophy Our commitment to curating memorable and authentic Norwegian experiences goes beyond mere tour planning. We believe in exploring our destinations firsthand, ensuring that every detail of the tour is meticulously crafted to offer our guests the best of Norway. Uncompromising Quality and Service At Intertours Norway, we prioritize high-quality service. Our robust network of reliable suppliers shares our dedication to customer satisfaction. With our tours, there are no hidden costs – everything from meals, transportation, accommodations, tour guides, to entrance and boat tickets are all included. This ensures your clients can relax and immerse themselves in the splendor of Norway without worrying about additional expenses. Creating Exceptional Experiences Our commitment extends beyond transportation and hotel bookings. We strive to create a personal connection with our guests, facilitating a relaxed and enjoyable experience throughout their tour. A special surprise awaits every guest at the end of their journey – a token to keep their Norwegian memories alive. Partner with Intertours Norway We warmly welcome collaborations with new tour operators. We take pride in our ability to customize our tour packages to meet your clients’ specific needs. Reach out to us with a brief about your company and requirements, and we’ll be in touch swiftly. At Intertours Norway, we don’t just arrange tours – we create unforgettable experiences. Experience the Intertours difference today!

Gimignano, luogo che conosciamo molto bene perchè siamo presenti con la nostra agenzia. Inoltre la nostra agenzia é specializzata nell'organizzazione del viaggio per le persone disabili, avendo a disposizione personale specializzato nel settore che vi potrà consigliare al meglio la vostra vacanza. Abbiamo a disposizione mezzi di trasporto idonei a persone con handicap motorio. Spread Your Wings is a travel agency specialized in creating tours through the most enchanting and characteristic places of TUscany.  You can choose between one-day tours and a great variety of other itineraries that will bring you through the Val d'Orcia (D'Orcia Valley) or the Chianti region or through the majestic cities of Florence and Siena or in the Val d'Elsa. If you were charmed by San Gimignano, we can organize a tour in this hamlet as well since We know it very well and as it is the place where our travel agency is located.  Spread Your Wings is specialized in organizing travel tours for people with disabilities as well, making skilled staff available for you, and who will help you plan your holiday in Tuscany. We have disabled vehicles too.

FlyUvet fa parte del Gruppo Uvet, fondato nel 1950 e con sede a Milano. Il giro d’affari 2015 del Gruppo Uvet si è attestato a circa 2,5 miliardi di euro.

Name: Avicenum
Company description: AVICENUM is a full-service travel agency that provides its services to private and corporate clients, travel agencies and government institutions. At present our team consists of 9 internal and 4 external employees. We have been operating on Slovak market and internationally since 2002. To our activities belong:  -	Spa & Wellness  We are proud to be co-creators of a reservation system that has been visited and used by more than 60 thousand clients in its six-years. The reservation system is occur on internet under www.relaxos.com or www.avicenum-travel.com   -	Incoming to Middle Europe   Our international clients come to Central Europe to relax and recharge. We also offer the possibility to discover and explore the beauty and treasures of this region.  Avicenum have a strong background on Slovak, Czech, Hungarian and Austrian markets and we are proud to share our know-how and experiences with allied international agencies. -	Corporate & Incentive Travel  Employees are the biggest asset in a company. It is therefore imperative to attract and retain well educated and highly motivated people. It is equally important to help keep these valuable people mentally and physically fit.  Avicenum make the job easy for you by engaging in the following areas: •	events management •	incentives and educational travel, business trips •	employees benefits programme for corporate partners

Name: Blitz Croatia
Company description: From our beginnings 17 years ago we have become one of the most trusted car-transfer service in Dubrovnik and other regions in Croatia. But even after becoming one of the leading in our industry, nothing much has changed, just the size of our team. We still believe in creating the standards that our customers need and want, to generate a one of a kind experience for our clients, and provide the highest quality they can have from a car-transfer service. Since our beginnings, we made and maintain strong business relationships in the region, in order to provide exclusive opportunities to our clients, as we don’t believe that car-transfer service is just a transfer from one point to another. Even though we are expanding across Croatia every day, we assure you that the level of our service will remain the same. As we are not an ordinary travel agency, we can guarantee you that you will not find these standards and unbeatable quality anywhere else, as we make every journey unique and personal, so it fits your personality and expectations perfectly.  For almost two decades of our existence, we have built the perfectly luxurious land and sea fleet, fitted with needed amenities, so you can have a care-free travel. Every member of our team, as well as our drivers, possesses high levels of skills needed to provide you with the best experience and to give you unforgettable experience as you absorb the picturesque settings of Croatia and its neighboring countries. We are your best choice for traveling and car-transfer services, travel with Blitz, and find out why.

Name: Verdant Experiences
Company description: We are a travel agency specialized in Galicia, on the Northwest of Spain. We focus on organizing all of the logistics to provide you with a premium travel experience.

Name: Tweekends
Company description: Tweekends is a licensed tour operator that organizes exclusive, highly personalized programs for travel, adventure experience and group activities in Europe. The company specializes in bachelor/hen parties, unique group travel experiences and corporate team-building activities in the best locations across Bulgaria, Spain, Romania, Serbia and other European countries. What differentiates us from other companies is the complete freedom of choice we provide to our clients, the large number of (some really unique) activities, the affordable price and the absolute dedication to impeccable customer service and experience. We have solid experience with the organization of activities and adventures as well as close relationships with a large number of bars, restaurants, activity venues. We know extremely well our cities, their best spots and all hidden gems. Our primary purpose is to make each one of our clients fall in love with what they see and experience through our service so that they leave with a smile, warm feelings and a true desire to share their great impressions with their friends.

Name: ILUSSIA SPORT TRAVEL
Company description: Ilussia Sport es una agencia de viajes especializada en fútbol, negocios y ocio. Para Ilussia no existen fronteras ni imposibles en lo que a experiencias viajeras se refiere.  Conoce cualquier parte del mundo, visita grandes estadios y disfruta de las más excitantes citas futbolísticas del mundo. Todo ello en importante sintonía con el mundo empresarial, donde el negocio y los contactos profesionales se unen en armonía con el disfrute de tu deporte favorito. Si lo que te interesa es algún evento deportivo o empresarial que organizar o conocer Ilussia es lo que necesitas.

Name: Tulip Day Tours
Company description: Our mission is not only showing travelers a different side of the Netherlands, but also contributing in issues that Amsterdam is facing with respect to the huge amount of tourists in the city. Moreover, by working together with State Forestry Service, we create awareness and funding for nature in the Netherlands and contribute in these ways too.  Being the first in the Netherlands doing this, we collaborate with State Forestry Service (Staatsbosbeheer), a Dutch governmental organization dedicated to strengthen the position of nature in the Netherlands, and offer tours that explore national parks with an official ranger, or kayak a 10 mile route through a national park.  We do not only offer our tours to travelers directly, but are also available for cruise lines or other tour operators.  If needed, we rent out our Tour Guide Whisper System, but we are also always looking for new partners to work with. We believe that together we are stronger. Don't we all just want our travelers to have a marvellous experience?

Name: International Tourist Travel Agency
Company description: Abaut "International Tourist Travel "agency Is a one-stop solution for all aspects of inbound tourism business comprising of Leisure groups and FIT Travel. We are a team of skilled multi-lingual travel professionals who possess a sound understanding of most global cultures, of this the name International Turist Travel – agency name.  As a DMC (destination Management Company), we will help you arrange and operate your events, conferences, meetings and incentives in any given Croatia destination and Europe. Our team strives to offer programs that meet the most demanding requirements. We combine our expertise and knowledge of destinations in Croatia and around, to offer programs that match your request. Traveling with us, you enter into the world of beautiful memories  Our goal is to make  your trip a unique experience!

Name: Safe Journey Barcelona
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Santa Coloma De Gramenet, 2 Carrer Cristofer Colom, 08921
Company description: Safe Journey Barcelona is an established independent inbound European travel agent and specialised DMC tour operator committed to client choice and efficient travel solutions, our ambition as an independent DMC tour operator is to provide the freedom to marry client expectation to original products without the limit of an off-site travel agent. Innovating products tailored personally and managed professionally to maximise client leisure experience, feel free to consult our knowledgeable research team, always on hand to provide the essential education needed to achieve informed decisions and realise client perspective.

Name: S & L Aktiv Reisen
Company description: S&L Aktiv Reisen ist ein zweisprachiges Reisebüro (deutsch/russisch) mit einem Ladenlokal auf der berühmten Kyffhäuserstrasse mitten im Kölner Studentenviertel. Genauso wie in Deutschland sind wir in Russland und in den GUS-Staaten präsent. Sie können Geschäfts- oder touristisches Visa schnell und zuverlässig bei uns beantragen (auch Express) und alle anderen Leistungen, die Sie in diesen Ländern benötigen, mit unserer Hilfe erledigen. Gerne planen wir für Sie auch Ihre Route mit der berühmten Russischen Eisenbahn oder helfen Ihnen bei der Buchung von einzelnen Bahntickets. Kommen Sie gerne in unser Büro! Rufen Sie uns an oder schreiben Sie uns eine E-Mail! Entdecken Sie die Welt mit uns!  FB: @sundlaktivreisen  Instagram: @s_l_aktiv_reisen"

Name: Persian Legend
Company description: Persian Legend is a tour operator established in 2016 in Lithuania. We specialize in providing high quality incoming tourist services and offer people from the Middle East to visit Lithuania and other European countries. Our main advantage is knowledge of the wishes of tourists from Middle East countries combining with excellent knowledge of the most interesting places to visit in Lithuania and other European countries. The founder of our company is a person who was born and lived in Iran, so he knows everything about oriental hospitality. Our mission is to establish and improve cultural ties and relations between Eastern countries and Europe and to become a powerful tourist services provider in the Baltic region. We achieve our goals by:  • development of new tourist routes • inviting people from the Eastern world to get familiarized with European culture • establishing business relationships with carriers and hotels across Europe • setting reasonable prices for our services and ongoing work to improve the level of provided services.

Name: TravelDesk Romania
Company description: TravelDesk is a multi-national online travel agency, with offices in Romania, Moldova, Ukraine and Russia. Being one of the largest travel agencies in Romania and Moldova, we provide complete services for leisure and business travelers. Our team consists of travel experts from various domains, from airlines to hotels and travel technology.

Name: MBT Belgium
Company description: Maxi-Business-Travel is een full service reisbureau gespecialiseerd in de organisatie van congressen & incentives, de logistieke know-how van travel managementdiensten en een aanbieder van vleigtuigtickets. De wereld is onze thuis ! In de meeste landen is M.B.T. vertegenwoordigd waarbij diverse diensten worden aangeboden.

Name: VoyagesPirates
Company description: Chaque jour nous cherchons pour vous les meilleurs bons plans voyage. Séjours all inclusive, Citytrips, Hôtels pas chers et Vols accessibles, nous parcourons le web en quête des tarifs les plus bas. Nous partageons également avec vous des codes promo et des réductions sur les trains, les bus ainsi que les voitures de location. Ce dont vous avez besoin pour voyager aux meilleurs prix, nous le trouvons. Nous se sommes pas une agence de voyage ou un tour opérateur, nous vous renvoyons vers les sites qui peuvent vous intéresser. Les prix peuvent changer très vite, il faut garder l’œil ouvert. Pour être certains de ne manquer aucune offre, rendez-vous sur notre page Facebook et visitez régulièrement notre site. Tous les jours, de nouveaux bons plans apparaissent, ne passez pas à coté. Voyages Pirates et ses frères européens ont déjà conquis un large public. Nous sommes présents en Allemagne, Angleterre, Autriche, Italie, Pologne, aux USA et dans les Pays-Bas. Où que vous soyez, les bons plans sont a votre portée.

Name: Hunting Pleasure
Company description: Hunting travel agency based in Hungary. We allow our clients to travel all around the world with territories in Africa, Asia, Europe and North America.

Name: DeVinoCatas
Company description: DeVinoCatas es una empresa de servicios, especializada en la planificación, organización, diseño y celebración de eventos de alta calidad entorno a la cultura del vino y la gastronomía. Ofrecemos servicio a las Agencias de Comunicación y Eventos, Tour Operator y clientes particulares amantes del vino y la gastronomía. La identidad que nos define y nos distingue es la excelencia del servicio. Nosotros nos encargamos de todos los detalles para hacer vivir experiencias únicas e inolvidables. IDIOMAS  7 idiomas: castellano, catalán, inglés, alemán, francés, hebreo y ruso. DÓNDE  Cataluña, España.  Realizamos eventos simultáneamente en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Barcelona, Girona, la Costa Brava y en las bodegas de la D.O. Alella, D.O. Penedés, D.O. Priorat y D.O. Empordà.  LOCALIZACIONES  Buscamos el lugar idóneo para el tipo de evento que nos encarguen. Nuestros eventos se realizan en hoteles de 4 y 5 estrellas, en bodegas de vino situadas en bellos entornos naturales y en espacios privados elegidos por su exclusiva singularidad y belleza. Hoteles, casas medievales, bodegas y castillos.  CARTA DE SERVICIOS Catas temáticas y comparativas, cursos de iniciación, catas a ciegas, maridajes, catas de destilados, show cooking. NOVEDADES  Las catas autoguiadas son: una divertida plantilla de gráficos te guiará sobre el modo de catar, podrás puntuar el vino que estás probando, interpretarlo y compartir tu experiencia con la comunidad de wine lovers o DeVinoAmantes. Las Catas de Vulpellac son: catas privadas que se realizan en una casa medieval del SXVII del Empordà Somos los únicos que te ofrecemos catas guiadas por un sumiller en un entorno privado del siglo XVII con servicio exclusivo y personalizado, detalles de calidad y excelencia en el servicio. Todas las catas se hacen con copas Riedel. Cada catador tiene un dossier con toda la información de los vinos catados y las zonas vinícolas de donde proceden. DeVinoCatas El Placer Como Destino.

Name: Shore Excursions 4 Cruisers
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 82 C/ Bravo Murillo, 28003
Company description: We are Shore Excursions for Cruisers,  a leading agency focused on cruise excursions business. Brand of Excursiones para Cruceros Enter Travel S.L. (CICMA: 2963 – CIF:B-86567120). We are proud of being the first ones who offered economic excursions to cruisers. Our rates are actually cheaper than the cruise lines ones. Excursiones para Cruceros Enter Travel S.L. is a renowned Company that offers total reliability, quality and professionalism for any service Enter Travel has been a travel agency from 1996. We offer the lowest rates on the market. (cruise lines and competitors). 24 hours/365 days’ assistance Guarantee return before ship departure Air-conditioned buses Official Guides Travel Insurance We offer excursions packs with huge discounts for families. You can choose among lots of guaranteed excursions at the best rates. If you want to discover our tours just click on Excursions & Rates and find the country and then the excursion. Our excursions are the same of the ones offered on board but they are up to 75% cheaper. You can buy excursions that are guaranteed already or you can make your reservation and join our waiting lists to help us forming a group. On both cases the price will be cheaper for everyone! ¡Enjoy your holidays!

Name: Le Comari Di Puglia
Company description: Siamo un gruppo di guide con decennale esperienza nel settore turistico; operiamo su tutto il teritorio pugliese con visite guidate in italiano, inglese, francese, spagnolo, portoghese e tedesco. Organizziamo escursioni per la città di Bari, nei siti Unesco - Alberobello e Castel del Monte - e passeggiate nei borghi antichi, i pù autentici e tradizionali  Ai fini di una conoscenza più specifica ed approfondita del nostro territorio offriamo percorsi tematici redatti in qualità di itinerari o semplici escursioni di una giornata.  Disponibili anche percorsi a tema su richiesta. Collaboriamo con agenzie di viaggio e tour operator italiani e stranieri e con le maggiori realtà locali.

Name: Lifesparkz Bike Tours
Company description: Lifesparkz Bike Tours create cycling holidays and events, big and small, in coastal regions at the Mediterranean Sea in Europe. We have organised tours and events in the French Riviera since 2016. In 2025 we have evolved into a Cycle Travel Agency that organises custom made trips to Southern France, La Costa Daurada and Costa Brava, Catalonia in Spain, round trips in Albania, Portugal's beautiful Terceira island which is one of the Azores Island and the good winter destination of Algarve on the Portuguese mainland. Italian Veneto, Tuscany and Liguria regions are soon to be added as destinations as well as the Spanish Canary Islands for the european winter months. Do not hesitate to get in touch, if you would like our helt to explore any of these places by bike. Lifesparkz Bike Tours nurture people's health and understanding of coastal regions in Mediterranean countries by facilitating bike tours where cyclists feel a connection to nature and the cultural landscapes that they cycle in. We create and guide cycling one or multiple day tours (leisure, road bikes, gravel and MTB), cycling holidays for active people, guided by certified cycling coaches at our destinations and staying in accommodation that are good for the soul and body to refuel and rest after nice days on the bikes. Lifesparkz Bike Tours create experiences based on sustainable tourism and in honour of our core values respect, trust, quality, unique and fun! www.lifesparkz.com Contact: hi@lifesparkz.com or +45 50 39 56 20 (Denmark) or +33 (6) 40 52 94 39 (France and WhatsApp)

Name: EuTravel Ltd
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Darfo Boario Terme, Piazzale Delle Terme, 25047
Company description: Based in Italy EuTavel Ltd has bridged the gap between tour operator and supplier. Removing the barriers and challenges that come from operating in one of Europes most visited destinations. With over 25 years of experience working in Italy EuTravel Ltd has built a reputation with both Tour Operator and supplier. Matching the needs of both to create long lasting partnerships.   EuTravel Ltd not only offers it’s partners inspirational ideas and solutions to problems  prior to the holiday but also on the ground support with a team of professionals in place to support your staff and Group. The company is made up of five divisions, each offering inspirational ideas and forward thinking staff in place to create new and inspirational packages for clients and partners. Italy Bike Tours Leaders in both top end individual tours and Group cycling packages from Giro d'Italia to Gelateria. EU Active Our dedicated team, made up of British and Italian professionals, can put together a wide variety of holidays for groups, schools and tour operators. Our local knowledge, local prices and on the ground logIstic support makes partnership not a word but a reality. Charity Carefully planned and executed events. Focusing on high profile challenges, we work alongside major and smaller charities to raise money and at the same time raise the profile of the Charity and give those involved an experience of a lifetime. Ski / Winter With over 10 years of experience, we seek out the best value hotels and resorts, create great packages and then add a little more. We ensure that an Italian Ski holiday is special and offers a real taste of Italy. School Sports Rugby and Football tours and tournaments but not as you know it. Not just sport but  a unique Italian experience. Official partner of Atalanta FC.

Name: SAL DE LA RUEDA - VIAJES DE AVENTURA
Company description: Sal de la Rueda es una Agencia de Viajes de Aventura Alternativos, buscamos revolucionar la forma de viajar, con viajes sostenibles, solidarios, respetuosos con las comunidades locales, flexibles y en reducidos grupos.

Name: GreenFish Travel
Company description: Book your next trip or holidays with the new online travel agency that is build by travellers for travellers. We inspire travellers to travel more, GreenFish Travel makes this possible by searching for the best deals, so that you can relax. Complete the travel quiz to see which of the 3 Weekly Travel Deals fits your personality and situation.  Are you dreaming already some time to learn Spanish, go on a surf or yoga camp? Or would you like to go diving? We offer Bucket List Travels and strongly advise you to enjoy your life and do more what makes you happy.  Thirdly, there is an option to get Personal Travel Advice, if the Bucket List Travels and the Weekly Travel Deals don't fit your wishes. Subscribe for the newsletter to receive the Weekly Travel Deals and the Latest Travel Blogs written by our travellers.

Name: Wyprawy RoweLove
Company description: We offer comprehensive organization of bicycle trips around Poland to unusual and exceptional places. We promote active and comfortable rest. Our trips have been prepared with the attention to detail, for everyone who wants to travel and get to know Poland from a two-wheeler perspective, close to nature, close to the culture of different regions of the country.  The routes will lead through meadows and forests, along beautiful rivers and lakes, to magical places, with history in the background and nature in the foreground. As part of the organization of trips and excursions, we provide: bike rental, transport of participants and bicycles, accommodation in original hotel with boarding based on regional dishes, attractions on route, pilot care, car insurance for participants and insurance. We organize tailor-made trips for groups, including company events on bicycles: short and long trips, visiting Polish cities on a two-wheeler with a guide. We have our own program, but we are also open to our clients' suggestions. We (Travel Company Maciej Jędrzejek) are fully licensed by the Central Register of Tour Operators and Tourism Intermediaires (Centralna Ewidencja OTiPT) at Ministry of Sport and Tourism (licence number 2287).

Name: Giappone Autentico
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Negozio, 45b Via Di Portonaccio, 00159
Company description: Giappone Autentico è un tour operator emozionale specializzato nell’organizzazione di viaggi di nozze in Giappone attraverso la condivisione di esperienze autentiche, che propone il viaggio come esperienza di cambiamento attraverso l’ascolto di un sogno, il vostro sogno, la condivisione di esperienze durante la realizzazione di un ricordo unico, a differenza dei concorrenti che propongono pacchetti predefiniti senza ascoltare ciò che il Giappone vuole comunicare al suo viaggiatore.  Scopri il Giappone Autentico il Primo e (Unico!) Tour Operator Emozionale  che ti Permette di Arrivare direttamente al Cuore del Cliente  raccontando la Destinazione attraverso  "un' Esperienza sensoriale virtuale". VALORI Libertà: il viaggio è liberta e la conoscenza è la base per scegliere liberamente.  Autenticità: trasmettere la condivisione di esperienze autentiche per capire l’essenza del viaggio e della destinazione.  Integrità: essere autentici  Esperienza: vivere viaggiando costantemente per dare ai viaggiatori la possibilità di scegliere sempre il viaggio giusto per loro.  Fiducia: essere tramite le nostre agenzie partner il consulente inteso come punto di riferimento nell’organizzazione di ogni singola fase del viaggio.  Passione: impegnare cuore mente e conoscenza in ogni singolo viaggio.  Selezione: agenzie accuratamente scelte per farti vivere ogni viaggio come esperienza unica ed esclusiva.

Name: SegitEasy Travel Agency And Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 47a Piazza Del Gesù, 00186
Company description: Welcome to SegitEasy - your local and independent travel agency and tour operator service! We offer segway tours in all points of the Roman center - admire the grand touristic attractions as well as the hidden gems of this city... all from the comfort of your own segway! _____________________________________________________________________________________ A segway...? In ... Rome? Yes! It's surprisingly easy to use, time-efficient, and ecological. Not to mention crazy fun.  We have tours that cover themes such as; our segway tour of Ancient Rome, The Water Queen tour of Rome's fountains, a tour of some of the most wonderful churches in Rome (with entrance inside), as well as taking a peak at the Trastevere neighborhood (a local artistic neighborhood with the tallest hill in Rome). Or all of these combined in one massive tour with lunch! We have selected all the sights that must be seen if you visit Rome. And with a segway... you can see 3x as much as you would by walking. _____________________________________________________________________________________ Established in 2014, SEGitEASY was founded with the idea to provide an honest service to tourists (who are often swindled) and a few more jobs for young people. So far we have succeeded in this! Bit by bit everyone on the team has learned and developed their skills and knowledge together. A lot of errors were made but we managed to stick through it all! SegitEasy is still a young business run by a young team who want nothing more than to offer a new way to discover Rome; to enjoy its wonders; to learn about the history; and dive into the hundreds of amazing legends it has to offer!

Name: Adrianavilas
Company description: Diseño de Viajes de Lujo. Especializada en viajes personalizados y exclusivos por España, Portugal y Marruecos.  Viajes de autor, experiencias exclusivas con estilo propio para que los viajeros más exigentes y sofisticados descubran la esencia de España, Portugal y Marruecos a través de sus sentidos. Dionissimos, Luxury Travel Agency. We are specialized in customized  and exclusive trips to Spain, Portugal and Morocco. Our travel experiences have a personal style, trips designed for the most demanding and sophisticated travelers. Bespoke trips and exclusive experiences to discover the best of Spain, Portugal and Morocco through your senses.

Name: Croatia Yacht Charter
HQ Location: Croatia, Split-dalmatia, Split, 3 Trg Hrvatske Bratske Zajednice, 21000
Company description: Croatia Yacht Charter is a successful and professional travel agency, specialised in yacht charter and trade. Since the establishment in 2003 we have developed one of the largest charter fleets on this side of Adriatic. Our offer includes more than 950 of all types of vessels – motor yachts, sailboats, catamarans, luxury yachts – for bareboat, skippered or fully crewed charter. Boats are located along the entire Croatia coast, from Poreč to Dubrovnik. Some of them are property of Croatia Yacht Charter, some are in our charter management program, and for most of them we are charter agent. Regardless of who the owner is, all boats in our fleet are in good seaworthy condition, well maintained and equipped.

Company description: Touroperador de grandes viajes

Name: CF1701
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Kongens Lyngby, 10 Lyngby Hovedgade, 2800
Company description: We are specialized in supporting you with your Corporate Meetings, Incentives, Conferences and Events in the Nordic countries & handpicked destinations across the globe. We take pleasure in turning ordinary events and incentives into Extra Ordinary  moments. We handle Luxury High End travel for individuals with care and offer bodyguard and security on any level. We know the market and the latest trends and we always offer guidance with passion and true know-how. As experts we guarantee that everything goes as planned and we work hard to deliver everything stress-free.  We offer one point of contact of all services provided, reducing communications and time.  We have proven high quality and professional standard in every task. We are confident that the relationship with our clients is our best reference. Among our clients you will find Siemens, Autodesk, Flexera, Orsted and Corporate Travel Agencies around the world.

Name: Sundara Viajes
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Vilanova I La Geltrú, 6 Sant Pau, 08800
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes especializada en grandes viajes, principalmente a destinos de larga distancia. Elaboramos viajes a medida y también para grupos reducidos. La personalización es uno de nuestros signos distintivos; gracias a nuestra experiencia en grandes viajes y al conocimiento de los destinos que seleccionamos, podemos asesorar a nuestros cientes en la elaboración de itinerarios a medida, de acuerdo con sus preferencias y expectativas. Te ofrecemos tres tipos de viaje: Viajes privados a medida, Viajes en grupo reducido y Viajes en servicios regulares.  Destinos y propuestas de calidad Apostamos por destinos y por itinerarios de calidad, intentando siempre huir de lugares y rutas masificados, para ofrecer experiencias auténticas y crear viajes para ser vividos. Nos apasiona viajar por el mundo y esta pasión la reflejamos en cada una de nuestras propuestas, elaboradas una a una en base a nuestra experiencia personal y a la de nuestros corresponsales directos. Sin intermediarios En Sundara no trabajamos con mayoristas o agencias intermediarias. Todas nuestras propuestas, tanto los viajes en grupo como los viajes a medida se diseñan en colaboración con los mejores agentes y corresponsales de cada destino. Esto nos ofrece una gran flexibilidad en la organización, un mayor control de los servicios de cada viaje.

Name: SpaDreams.fr
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 28 Ferdinand-happ-str., 60314
Company description: Spadreams est la marque Internationale de l'entreprise mère Fit Reisen, créée en 1975. Avec plus de 35 ans d'expérience dans le domaine du tourisme, nous sommes un tour opérateur leader sur le marché des séjours de bien-être et santé. L'harmonie du corps et de l'esprit est notre domaine. Nous offrons un large éventail de séjours dans des destinations internationales (environ 600  hôtels partenaires), tous différents les uns des autres, dans des cadres exceptionnels, atypiques et surtout mémorables. Nos offres vont de simples séjours bien-être aux grands voyages ayurvédiques qui incluent une variété de programmes de cures. Nos experts sont à votre disposition: la satisfaction de notre clientèle est notre priorité. Nos séjours sont principalement axés sur 5 thèmes : •	Ayurveda &Yoga:  https://www.spadreams.fr/ayurveda/ •	Détox, Minceur & Jeûnes:  https://www.spadreams.fr/minceur-dietetique/ •	Spa & Cures: https://www.spadreams.fr/thalasso-spa-cures/ •	Burn-Out:  https://www.spadreams.fr/beaute-bien-etre/burn-out-anti-stress/ •	Sport & Forme:  https://www.spadreams.fr/sport-forme/ Depuis mars 2013, le marché des séjours de bien-être et santé a connu une croissance remarquable: de ce fait notre groupe s'est étendu au niveau International comme en Pologne, en Espagne, en Russie, etc... et connaît un grand succès. Notre groupe est constamment en recherche des personnes motivées et créatives.  N'hésitez pas à visiter notre site et à postuler ! https://www.spadreams.fr/footer/recrutement/ https://www.spadreams.fr/service/devenir-partenaire/hotels/

Name: Salentowinetour
Company description: Salentowinetour nasce dalla passione per il territorio salentino e le sue eccellenze enogastronomiche.  Mettiamo a frutto le conoscenze specialistiche del suo fondatore Stefano Spagnolo, unite all'esperienza maturata nella vendita dei vini salentini tramite www.salentowineshop.com Certi che la conoscenza di un territorio passi da una comunicazione fatta di racconti di persone ed esperienze dirette. I nostri wine tours coinvolgono aziende che conosciamo personalmente e che garantiscono esperienze di qualità ai nostri clienti. Le cantine racconteranno la propria storia, il proprio territorio attraverso visite, degustazioni e sapori. Cultura e storia di un territorio Salentino spesso sconosciuto. Salentowinetour permette di effettuare la prenotazione del prorpio tour di gruppo, di richiedere tour personalizzati, di affettuare prenotazioni per trasferimenti attraverso il proprio sito. Scopri con noi le stade del vino e vivi il turismo nel salento attraverso nuove esperienze. Salentowinetour è una divisione di: Italy One&only, Agenzia di Viaggi e Tour Operator certificato P. We want to share these “secrets” and make visitors fall in love with this region, like we did. We have created a number of programs, based on our experience and extensive knowledge of the region, ensuring consistent high standards of quality and value.

Name: Iberian Mobility
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Málaga, 11 Nave 1 Carril De La Serrería, 29004
Company description: We are, since 2016, your Premium Travel Partner in South Spain.  Experience creators, this is how we like to describe the human team that integrates Iberian Mobility, a young yet very experienced group of professionals with a common goal: making our guests live a perfect 360º experience. Iberian Mobility is constantly growing and it is currently divided in two main segments. IM Driving: A chauffeur-drive service corporation that counts on a modern fleet of Mercedes-Benz vehicles that offers a premium service to both businesses and particulars. Professional uniformed multilingual drivers, water, mobile charger and Wi-Fi on board, punctuality and discretion are guaranteed both in transfer and in per-hour services.  Lately, high-end minibuses have been added to the fleet, which perfectly complement the second area of the company and allow us to perform Small Group Guided Tours to our favorite destinations. IM Discovering: Based on the quality of the transport and human resources we have, we are founders at a boutique travel agency that counts on its portfolio with the best experiences along Andalusia and Portugal, being Málaga, Seville, Marbella and Lisbon its main departure points. We dedicate a lot of time to traveling and working in the lab to turn our cultural heritage into very rich touristic services, into authentic scenarios. We offer our clients the best cultural and rural trips that exist, trying to always remain out of the traditional touristic flows. Trips can be made completely private, Small Group or in a larger group (depending on destination and customer preferences).

Name: Tripula
HQ Location: Spain, Valencia, Valencia/valència, 42 Calle Micer Mascó, 46010
Company description: Agencia de viajes, eventos corporativos, exclusivas experiencias deportivas, gastronómicas, enoturismo y ocio. Y ahora también agencia receptiva para el mercado nacional e internacional. Tripula nace para ofrecer a sus clientes la organización y gestión de sus viajes, adaptados a sus gustos y posibilidades. A través de un asesoramiento personalizado y una plataforma virtual, podemos ofrecer a nuestros consumidores un servicio ininterrumpido 365. Nuestra especialidad son los viajes vacacionales, grupos, experiencias exclusivas, eventos corporativos poco convencionales y viajes de incentivo.  Gracias a nuestro recorrido y preocupación por la satisfacción de nuestros clientes, llegamos a descubrir un nicho que ha hecho que ampliemos nuestras miras: Tripula Experiencias. Un producto singular con un enorme aporte de valor para gente singular que se lanza a probarlo. Ofrecemos planes diferentes y exclusivos, talleres sugerentes, jornadas de trabajo donde olvidarse de la oficina, así como escapadas culturales, gastronómicas, náuticas y de ocio. Y en todo ello nuestra meta es ofrecer al que lo vive una desconexión de todo lo que conoce hasta ahora, y un acercamiento a lugares, productos y cómo no, experiencias que no haya vivido antes. Nuestro afán por ofrecer estas jornadas únicas se traduce en www.tripulaexperiencias.es

Name: Hello Holland
Company description: About Hello Holland Hello Holland is a local travel agency specialised in tailor-made tours and travel services. Whether you come to The Netherlands for business or leisure, visit multiple countries or only one, stay for a month or a day, come alone or with a thousand people, we love to support you to realise your plans! Our team has extensive in-depth knowledge and has plenty of experience in working with a variety of clients and requests. Feel free to contact us with your requests.

Name: Reise Explorer - Travel Explorer
Company description: Tour Operator and Travel Company - specialising in Boutique Travel to unusual destinations on earth!

Name: We Are Cool Bus
HQ Location: Italy, Verona, Trevenzuolo, Strada San Giuseppe /
Company description: A Team, most of all a Family Driven Business. We are the creators of Cool Bus, an Old American School Bus prepared to host you beautiful places and teach you how to Surf, Kite-Surf on summer time and enjoying Motorsports all year long We are:  Pier Founder and Heavy Duty Work (Kiter) Domi Co-Founder and Travel Planner (Surfer) Chiara Co- Founder and Media Manager (Surfer and Web Surfer)

Name: Together In Rome
Company description: Together in Rome is an independent tour operator that offers a variety of walking tours to independent travellers in Rome. We want to share the best things this country has to offer: art, food, archaeology, you name it with anyone who reaches out to us. Our staff, local licensed tour guides, are fluent in English and passionate about Rome. Our goal is to provide an entertaining, small-sized, relaxed tour, avoiding time spent in the line as we operate using reserved entrance to the Vatican Museums and the Colosseum. Our motto is: make the most of your holiday without any stress, you are on vacation! Considering the complexity of Rome’s history, the food and wine on offer, you really need a professional local guide. That is why we step in, so that you can experience our beautiful country’s culture and art while having fun with your loved ones. We have packaged a selection of tours aimed at giving you the right amount of information and fun facts to make the most of your visit to Rome, stress free! So if you are planning a trip to Rome, call us directly, facebook us, or email us to take advantage of our local knowledge. Our Team will be more than happy to help!

Name: Ituroperator
Company description: ITUR è il tour operator dell'omonima società che, da anni, è punto di riferimento per i servizi di accoglienza turistica del basso Piemonte e rappresenta lo sbocco naturale di una quotidiana attività "sul campo", a stretto contatto con turisti e operatori.

Name: 2Poland - Adventure
HQ Location: Poland, Greater Poland, Poznań, 48/14 Osiedle Orla Bialego, 61-251
Company description: 2 Poland Adventure is an idea of Poland's passionates. They met together long time ago, in an international corporation. Despite their completely opposite ways of life, they could quickly become friends ad share a common passion - traveling. Having plans for travels abroad, it appeared they used to travel together mostly in their own country - Poland. So after a several years of planning they decided to merge powers and cooperate as a travel agency offering the best activities in Poland for foreign visitors. Our aim is to present Poland as no one does. We want You to explore with us its nature, wilderness, and experience all the best it can offer.  You will see Poland from its back doors, off the common routes, and meet the people who live their lives out of the city rush.

Name: Serendipity Travel S.r.o.
Company description: We are a small travel agency specialized in accommodation in heritage hotels - unusual buildings with a true spirit of place, all of which have stories going far back in time. Serendipity Travel is the exclusive representative in central Europe of Neemrana Non-Hotels, an Indian chain of heritage hotels. We are also the voice of many other heritage hotels from India, Tibet, Nepal, Bhutan, Sri Lanka, Laos, Cambodia, and Vietnam.  Serendipity Travel was born out of our own need to step outside the mainstream and follow a dream of travelling. It was born out of our fascination with storied hotels infused with the magic of centuries of history. And it was born out of our admiration for the dedicated people who have raised these old colonial mansions, palaces, and residences from the dust, and who now make their renewed perfection available to the travellers of today.   We create tailor-made programmes for all who appreciate value-added travelling.

Name: Enjoyment Cuba Travel Agency
Company description: We are a travel agency based in Barcelona, Spain. We have personnel who specialize in tourism at your disposal at all times to make your vacation an unforgettable experience. We offer a wide range of services and offers: from lodging and car rentals to excursions in the many different Cuban destinations.

Name: NORRGAM LEISURE GROUP LTD
Company description: We are your specialised tour operator in West Africa based in The Gambia  and Sweden with presence in Guinea Bissau and Senegal. Offering our customers with extensive activities with focus in sport fishing, birdwatching and hunting holidays. We have over two decades of experience in travel and tourism with the capability to deliver and ensure you have a memorable experience. We constantly respond to the demands and needs of our customers and try to tailor- made our packages based on their request. Our brand promise is to provide and deliver to our customers  a memorable, authentic and safest adventure experience available at our destinations. We focus on providing our customer with unique opportunity to discover the beauty and wonderful nature and diversity our destinations offers. Assuring our customers safety and security holidays in all our chosen destinations.
