Name: Sportful Travel
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Busto Arsizio, 6 Via Zappellini, 21052
Company description: SPORTFUL TRAVEL è un tour operator specializzato in viaggi su misura e viaggi sportivi. “Artigiano del viaggio di qualità”, SPORTFULTRAVEL mette i desideri dei clienti al centro delle proprie proposte: che la meta sia all’altro capo del globo o dietro l’angolo, per un periodo lunghissimo o anche per un semplice weekend fuoriporta, ogni vacanza rappresenta un momento unico nella vita delle persone. Per questo SPORTFUL TRAVEL propone un progetto di organizzazione turistica senza confini: dai viaggi di nozze alle vacanze dedite allo sport di ogni ordine e grado, dai tour di gruppo per i single, fino ai pacchetti di viaggio preconfezionati, in location di ogni gamma e livello. Sempre alla ricerca delle migliori opportunità e di nuove e suggestive mete, SPORTFUL TRAVEL vanta consolidati rapporti con organizzazioni locali altamente professionali, grazie alle quali crea vacanze come sinonimo di emozione, improntando la sua filosofia ai valori della professionalità, della sicurezza, dell’entusiasmo e della massima cura dei dettagli.

Name: Transfer Cagliari
Company description: Transfer Cagliari offre servizi Transfer a chiunque si rechi in Sardegna in vacanza o per lavoro. I nostri minivan, dotati di ogni confort sono a disposizione per escursioni in tutta la Sardegna, City tours, visite guidate, Tour enogastronomici, visite a cantine vitivinicole, shopping e Business. Escursioni e Tour personalizzati per piccoli gruppi e croceristi. Il nostro punto di forza sono la professionalità e l'eleganza e un ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Transfer Cagliari si propone come partner ideale di Tour Operator, agenzie di viaggi , Incoming,  Hotel e agenzie congressuali che sono alla ricerca di un operatore affidabile e professionale al quale affidare i propri clienti. Anche l' utente privato troverà in Transfer Cagliari il servizio ideale per i propri spostamenti durante le vacanze in Sardegna. I nostri Mercedes Viano e  Opel Vivaro sono i mezzi ideali per le famiglie numerose e gruppi di amici. I nostri autisti, sempre puntuali ed eleganti , sono a disposizione per qualsiasi vostra richiesta.

Name: Easytraveller.gr
Company description: We are an incoming tour operator for Greece, Turkey, Egypt, Israel and Jordan offering vacation packages, honeymoon packages, Mediterranean cruises, hotels, villas, archaeological tours and transfers. With offices in Athens, Greece and Istanbul, Turkey and representation office in Cairo, Egypt , Jerusalem, Israel and Amman, Jordan we are always close to our clients with professional service and personal care. Our multilingual staff has long experience and is always willing to answer all questions and satisfy all clients needs. Our Groups and Incentives departments are ready with the best suggestions for an unforgettable vacation or event. Our Cruise experts will give you the best solution for a cruise to remember for life. Trusting us you leave your worries behind and enjoy life returning home with the best memories and willing to came back

Name: Reisehaus Stuttgart
Company description: Die CHACO Reisebüro GmbH wurde 2007 gegründet und eröffnete im selben Jahr das Reisebüro Rosenstein im Rosensteinviertel in Stuttgart Nord. Unter dem Namen „Reisehaus Stuttgart“ ist CHACO ab Juli 2013 mit ein Reise Boutique Konzept auf dem Killesberg im Einkaufszentrum Killesberghöhe fur Sie da.

Name: Evolution Group Bulgaria
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Sofia-capital, Sofia, 6 Bulevard Vladimir Vazov
Company description: Business travel agency which aims to to save money and time of companies. Young and strong motivate team provide solution for trips and organization of events. We invite you to discover the world of business travel with us!

Name: Muve Travel S.L.
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 9 Carrer De Ribes, 08018
Company description: Muve Travel S.L. is a travel and tourism digital company founded in 2011 by Pietro and Valeria. They had moved from Italy to sunny Barcelona a few years before that and their enthusiasm towards their new home brought them to start what was to be their first project: the Visitare Barcellona blog.  In the last 7 years what had started out as a small blog has transformed into a reference website for italian tourists in Barcelona. Visits to the website soared as well as comments left from enthusiast readers and satisfied tourists. New websites were born such as Barcelona Hacks and Visiter Barcelone that target respectively english speaking and francophone countries.  In 2015 Buongiorno World was born, a generalistic sustainable travel website that gave the name to the company that was to be founded one year later by Pietro, Sara, Valeria and Oscar. Since then we have worked on the launch of our own ecommerce website, started a tourist agency, expanded to new cities, hired more people...and on to our next challenge!  In 2019 we decided to put all our vibrancy into a new company name: Muve Travel S.L. Aren't we always MUVING after all?? Today we have 11 "MUVERS" in our team and we are planning to expand the family in 2020. Our mission is clear altough not always easy, we work to offer the best, reliable and up to date free content. All tourists who are ready to leave behind traditional travel agencies can start planning their dream trips by themselves, saving money and avoiding bad surprises.  We are the local reference for travellers, we give quick answers to any questions or doubt about holidays planning and we help people enjoy their stay :) Our greatest ambition? Make an impact and change the way tourism is consumed.  What makes us special? We rely on our people and we value their opinion, we believe work is not everything and most importantly...we have fun!

Name: Divine Dalmatia
Company description: Follow us to experience unique story about Croatian cultural, gastronomic and natural wonders... Send us enquiry for free offer of your Croatian cultural experience or become our partner in travel business. We have special suprise for everybody who send us enquiry with word LINKEDIN in subject line! Divine Dalmatia Travel Agency emerged from a simple conversation between two friends. They turned their passion and experience for travel, nature and culture into a project of intimate journeys, bringing together the preservation of cultural heritage and Croatian traditions. Divine Dalmatia is for travelers who wish to further deepen their knowledge about the destination in a cultural and gastronomic sense.

Name: ATS Travel Dmc
HQ Location: Portugal, Faro, Portimão, 53c R. D. Carlos I Edf. Pérola Do Arade, 8500-607
Company description: ATS Travel is a fully licensed Travel Agency dmc, operating in the Algarve, Portugal, since 1999. We are able to offer a wide variety of solutions for travelers within the Algarve region. Offering Airport & Golf transfers, Sightseeing tours, Hotel & Golf reservations, and much more. From Individual travelers to Tour operators, we have the solution for your requirements.

Name: WanderLab Travel
Company description: WanderLab is a boutique travel agency  that offers out-of-the-ordinary and memorable trips to active, curious and open-minded people. Our tours are flexible to meet individual needs and are suitable for couples and singles alike. It is our passion for and experience with traveling that have shaped our business concept. Our vision of traveling consists of five pillars: Indulgence, which means allowing yourself to step into a different world, and to surrender to unfamiliar surroundings. Immersion, or actually becoming part of your new surroundings. It can maximise your cultural experience. This is very much related to indulgence as it takes similar amounts of open-mindedness and courage. 1+1 = 3 when traveling. Experiences are much more valuable when shared with others, whether you know them or not. Interaction is the key word here. Discovery, as there is so much to be explored in this world. An open and curious stance will help you in breathing in impressions and discovering new things about a destination, or even about yourself. Traveling means being a guest. This requires responsible and caring behaviour, which in turn can enrich your own as well as other people’s lives.

Name: Under The Olive Tree
Company description: Under the olive tree is a marketing and travel agency with a passion for rural and charming Portugal, with all its local products, hospitable people and experiences. It offers stays at small scale and special accommodations, from north to south, where travellers can have a local experience and discover unique places, off the beaten track.  It also supports accommodations and tourism organisations in their market positioning, providing advice on marketing, social media, sales, travel trends and organizing promotion activities, focussing on creativity and the local specialities of each region.

Name: Humboldt Society
Company description: Somos una agencia de viajes personalizados pensada para viajeros apasionados. Si eres uno de ellos, nuestro objetivo será guiarte y ayudarte desde que te planteas el destino hasta que vuelvas a tu casa con grandes recuerdos y experiencias.  Ofrecemos una libertad total para poder crear una experiencia propia, personalizada y segura.

Name: Pacific Way S.r.l.
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Corsico, 32 Via Iv Novembre, 20094
Company description: Pacific Way nasce dalla nostra passione per i viaggi. Dopo una lunga esperienza nei principali Tour Operator italiani specializzati nell’area del Pacifico, abbiamo deciso di unire la nostra passione e le competenze organizzative creando Pacific Way. Ogni viaggio è tailor made, costruito a misura di cliente, confezionato in base alle esigenze di ogni singolo viaggiatore. L’attenzione ai dettagli, la cura nel servizio al cliente e l’affidabilità dell’assistenza in loco sono i nostri punti di forza. PACIFIC WAY è inoltre Aussie Specialist; abbiamo quindi viaggiato in lungo e largo sperimentando in prima persona quello che il continente australiano ha da offrire.

Name: Go Basque
HQ Location: Spain, Basque Country, Donostia / San Sebastián, 45 Prim Kalea, 20006
Company description: GO BASQUE is a boutique travel agency based in San Sebastian, Basque Country, Spain that specializes in designing private and bespoke tours throughout the Basque Country and Rioja wine region. Our portfolio of services includes wine and food tours, city breaks, coast and countryside experiences, and a variety of activities that showcase the unique Basque region authentically. Our team is composed of passionate local people committed to creating an exceptional Basque experience every time, and our goal is to share with our visitors the culture, identity, and long-standing traditions of the Basque Country.  We offer: Wine Tours Food Tours Coast & Countryside Tours Active Tours Tours into the Pyrenees Basque Heritage Tours Tailored & Corporate Tours So, what are you waiting for? Check us out and come bask in everything Basque with us!

Name: R. Agrotis Travel ltd
Company description: R. Agrotis Travel ltd is a travel agency founded by Mrs Roula Agrotis and has been operating as a company continuously since 1987 in Paphos, Cyprus. Our experience in the travel industry however goes as far back as 1979. We are accredited by the CTO (Cyprus Tourism Organisation), ACTA (Association of Cyprus Travel Agents) and IATA (International Air Transport Association) and operate from our privately owned building in the very centre of Paphos. We are a founding member, as well as a member of the board of directors, of Tradewings Holidays ltd, a partnership of seven different travel agencies from all over Cyprus founded in 2006 with the purpose of unifying certain parts of our businesses and investing in and developing new travel technologies.

Name: Green Zebra Tours
Company description: Green Zebra Tours is startup tour operator based in Prague, Czech Republic. We focus on out of Prague activities, mainly in the Bohemian Paradise, the region we come from. As we are local in this region and its surrounding, we can guarantee unique experience to you. There is so much beauty behind Prague borders, but still so close to it. As natural as historical as technical – wild rock towns with sandstone towers, mountains with endless views, medieval castles and ruins, small and big local industries – automotive, beer, glass, jewellery. One month is not enough to visit all. We bring experience to everyone who wants to see local and real Czech Republic. Friendly talk about the country, people or customs is what we prefer more than hundreds of historical facts that will be immediately forgotten. Join us and have an unforgettable moments!

Name: New Travelers Italia
Company description: New Travelers Italia è un nuovo Tour Operator B2B online nato per volontà di Natalie Tours, il gruppo turistico più prestigioso in Russia e uno dei più  importanti d’ Europa, con oltre 20 anni di esperienza nel turismo outbound internazionale. Le destinazioni principali sono: Thailandia 				 Spagna Dubai  				 Italia/Europa 		 Grecia Malta Portogallo Russia  Egitto USA Quattro i fattori chiave di successo: Tecnologia propria e sistema di prenotazione/gestione solido, agile, rapido ed intuitivo. Integrazioni con i principali e migliori fornitori di letti e di servizi in tutto il mondo via XML Tariffe alberghiere esclusive e competitive grazie alla sinergia con Natalie Tours, che ci conferisce un’elevata forza contrattuale. Solvibilità e solidità finanziaria. Un pò di numeri: Capitali e città europee per escursioni, city-breaks o business travel: più di 17.000 alberghi.  Long-courier: 50.000 alberghi in più di 6.000 destinazioni urbane e di mare. Più di 12.000 alberghi in Spagna, il B2B online con una maggior offerta e i migliori prezzi di alberghi e di servizi in Spagna sul mercato italiano. Città italiane:  più di 5.500 alberghi sia nelle principali città sia nella piccole località di charme. Più di 95.000 alberghi in 12.000 destinazioni a livello mondiale. Dai low-cost fino ad alberghi di lusso nei luoghi più esclusivi. Tutte le tipologie di alberghi, sistemazionie categorie 2.500 trasferimenti, 8.700 escursioni  in 2.900 destinazioni Il nostro booking system: semplice, veloce, intuitivo 100% online: prenotazioni, consultazioni, modifiche e cancellazioni  Dynamic Packaging: Prenota i prodotti in maniera individuale - Aggiunge le prenotazioni al carrello d’acquisto e raggruppa tutte le prenotazioni sotto uno stesso codice Prenotazioni semplici e facili: 4 passaggi Motore di ricerca geografico per mappa Schede descrittive di ogni prodotto e servizio con immagini, mappe, itinerari, condizioni

Name: ApiRoutes Inspired Travel
Company description: With over twenty years of experience, thousands of satisfied customers and an extended network of business partners, ApiRoutes is a full service tour operator, your trusted partner, specialised in organization and arrangement of travel. We provide comprehensive services, ranging from transfer and accommodation arrangements, to the organization of guided tours, professional seminars and training.  Our partners, such as tour operators, guides, beekeepers, beekeeping associations, decision-makers, initiators, hotels, service providers and tourism workers, are very diverse and wide-spreaded, which allows us to provide tours not only in Slovenia, but worldwide. Our tours offer experiences that transform, inspire, educate and enrich one's life. Moreover, through providing authentic experiences in the presentation of unique forms of knowhow and understanding in apiculture, we offer a new concept in travel – apitourism. Formulated as a fusion of apiculture and travel, the environmentally and socially responsible tours are developed together with our partners on a worldwide level. Our tours and programmes are tailored to interest and requirements of an individual or a group. Our portfolio includes following experiences: - Nature-related tours - Cultural tours - Beekeeping tours & apitourism - Pilgrimage tours - Food & Wine tours - Culinary tours - Agricultural tours - Special interest tours - Group tours - FIT tours Contact us at info@apiroutes.com and become our partner!

Name: Tasting Italy Tours And Weddings
Company description: Tasting Italy is a tour operator and wedding planner agency based in Florence, Italy. It was founded in 2004, after a very long experience in the tourism industry of the owners.  We are a proudly independent family-run company. This means that we are able to offer our customers a high quality and personal attention, before and during their Italian stay. Either to big groups or individual travellers, we grant the same, excellent customer care service.   We organize tours and incentive travels all over Italy, focusing on history, folklore, customs, special events and gastronomic delights of our beautiful country; our itineraries are designed to enjoy the true Italian culture. Our original cooking tours, in which we are specialized, bring visitor to discover Italy through our world famous fine wine making and gourmet cooking traditions. Upon request, we will be happy to create tailor made packages that will surely meet everybody’s expectations and budget.  Our experienced wedding planners team is a trustful and discreet point of reference to those foreign couples who wish to get married in Italy.  We organize civil and religious weddings valid at legal effects, as well as symbolic ceremonies, taking utmost care of all the details. Whether for traditionalists or those who prefer “the unusual”, we have creative and elegant ideas that will make the most important day of their life a memorable, one-of-a-kind event. Our staff of enthusiastic, dedicated and knowledgeable travel and wedding specialists looks forward to sharing more information with you regarding the services we can provide.

Name: GeotraWell
Company description: GeotraWell, viaggiare bene il mondo L’idea di un viaggio nasce sempre per far fronte ad una esigenza, sia essa di lavoro che di piacere.  A volte l’idea di un viaggio viene espressa in modo esplicito, a volte bisogna prestare attenzione alle parole della persona che ti è di fronte… in qualsiasi modo, si parte sempre dall’ascolto.  L'agenzia viaggi GeoTraWell è nata con lo scopo di realizzare i vostri sogni, ascoltando le vostre parole, venendo incontro ai vostri bisogni, rimanendo sempre al vostro fianco anche dopo che siete partiti… Dopo anni di esperienza in un grande tour operator, seguendo questi pensieri, tre anni fa Silvano Casari ha deciso di intraprendere una nuova avventura, dove porre al centro del suo lavoro i sogni dei suoi clienti. L’esperienza pluridecennale nel campo del turismo ha portato Silvano a specializzarsi in viaggi tailor made, realizzando insieme al cliente, mattoncino per mattoncino il sogno di una vacanza… America, Asia, Africa ed Europa non hanno più segreti… I nostri servizi:  - Vacanze - Viaggi business - Viaggi di nozze - weekend

Name: Trift
HQ Location: Ireland, Dublin, E, 30 Upper Erne Street, d02
Company description: Trift is a ‘conscious travel’ platform with trip itineraries, guides, and stories curated by travelers alongside local businesses (tour operators) that deliver impact and a positive footprint. We’re a tech start-up aiming to bring curated and personalized experiences through content creators and local tour operators. We envision to allow people to travel the way they would often see on the internet. Focusing on destinations often seen in a bad light on media or just common misconceptions have given to destinations in underdeveloped economies.  Trift aims to be the bridge between building cultures and breaking cultural myths and perceptions. Unconventional travel is considered to be a less opted choice when it comes to holidays due to how the media or the news portrays a particular place. But the travelers who have been there, have a completely different story to tell. It is not the destination, but the people and experience that matter the most. Usually, there is one set of standard things one would do when they are in the destination. But there is a whole other side to the experience which only the local people in the country can explain to a traveler and that is exactly what people want.

Dabei gilt für uns immer der Maßstab „Qualität vor Quantität“.

Name: LESSINIA NEL MONDO
Company description: IL PRIMO TOUR OPERATOR DELLA LESSINIA  Tour Operat di Nicchia specializzato su Verona ed il suo entroterra, in particolare l’altopiano della Lessinia. Ampio territorio verdeggiante racchiuso tra Verona, il lago di Garda e le province di Trento e Vicenza. Amiamo la Lessinia, ogni giorno. Per questo ci siamo specializzati nell'organizzazione di vacanze a tema e week-end nella montagna veronese e ci dedichiamo alla promozione di questo sorprendente territorio, ancora poco noto e per questo ancora più godibile da famiglie con bambini, amanti dello sport, della fotografia o della vita sana all'aria aperta.  Il tour operator "la Lessinia nel mondo" si occupa di ogni aspetto del tuo viaggio in Lessinia, a due passi dal centro di Verona, in collaborazione con guide esperte e con le eccellenze di questo multiforme altopiano: trasferimenti, pernottamento in hotel o case vacanza, escursioni, prenotazione malghe, rifugi o partecipazione ad eventi, sagre, mercatini e gare sportive. NATURA ● SPORT ● SAPORI ● TRADIZIONI un vasto altopiano da scoprire a piedi con la macchina fotografica a portata di mano, oppure in bici da strada o mountain bike e persino a cavallo. La Lessinia stupisce perché regala un'esperienza autentica a contatto con la natura e con le antiche tradizioni di montagna. Ci sono tanti motivi per amare la Lessinia e per ognuno di essi abbiamo una montagna di iniziative da proporti.

Company description: Romania Private Tours – BookToursRomania is a trademark of Brava Tour, a licensed Romanian tour operator company with more than 10 years of experience in the field of tourism. We provide private tours to Romania specially tailored for you.  Before and after departure we are flexible to customize your tour according to your desires. Throughout a private tour, you will experience unique feelings compared to the traditional tours with large groups, where there is  limited interaction between the guide and the traveller. Along the years, we have met fascinating people and we explored many sights in Romania, therefore we decided to start our own small and beloved project called Romania Private Tours – BookToursRomania, which for us represents an adventure as well as a lifestyle. By doing this with passion and love we have the opportunity to promote Romania as a special destination for vacations. All of our guides are certified and have a significant experience of travel in Romania, in order to  ensure that you get the most of the experience. Our team consists of young people who have graduated in fields as Economics and Tourism, share a burning passion for travelling, have experience in providing tourist services and appreciate their country.  Our team can recommend you the best authentic places to eat, accommodation in centrally-located hotels and are able to offer you inspiring and unforgettable moments in order for you to have a very pleasant stay.  We strongly believe that private tours have the potential of enhancing the  travel experience by offering tourists an enjoyable and friendly environment. Therefore, a tour in Romania with us is ideal for couples, families, small groups as well as  for people who are eager to see and experience the beauties of Romania with the help of locals who are in love with their country.

Name: QueerPlans
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 6 Calle Gran Vía, 28013
Company description: QueerPlans is the new way to travel for the LGBTQ+ community. It is an innovative platform to enjoy vacations in the company of international stars, meet people you like and experience lots of adventures as you won’t find in any traditional travel agency. Meeting your idols never got easier. QueerPlans is a Travel Agency run by LGBT people for the LGBT people. Perfectionist to the last detail. Based in Spain, proud member of the International Gay and Lesbian Travel Association and Valencian Association of Travel Agencies. Monthly trips, beginning in March 2018, are aimed at every niche you can think of, with each trip featuring a number of international social media influencers for fans to meet. The action-packed, 7-day vacations will take holiday-makers on a unique experience to Madrid and Barcelona, with options to customise activities and the guys they’ll meet to suit any budget. For those of you who prefer to travel alone, but are worried about meeting others like you, QueerPlans have got you covered, as there’ll be online chat groups for participants to get to know each other and plan activities together before they set off on their travels. There’s also the option to take part in a room match program, where solo travellers can arrange to share a room with someone they like, saving money and making friends in the process. To keep up to date with the latest influencers announced for the vacations and even get the chance to win free trips, make sure you follow QueerPlans on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter at @QueerPlans. QueerPlans brand is registered in the European Union (EUIPO 016806796) and the U.S.A. (USPTO Serial Number: 87490020). QueerPlans designs and commercializes its own brand of sports and summer clothing. It will be available shortly through QueerPlans’ website and selected partners. For more information or to book this once in a lifetime experience, visit queerplans.com

Name: Caravantours Groups Tour Operator
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Rimini, 19 Via B. Parmense, 47923
Company description: Our company was founded in 1984 by a group of tourist operators, young but with great experience acquired from their vital contribution in building the success of other organizations working in the field of tourist groups.  These budding entrepreneurs pooled their expertise, enthusiasm and enormous desire to work ceaselessly on the continuous enhancement of their organizational and operating skills.  In over thirty years they have maintained constant relations with both clients and suppliers, on the one hand interpreting the needs and preferences of groups eager to make the most of their holidays in Italy and Europe with the best possible combinations of quality and price, and on the other selecting the most interesting offers and the most experienced operators, developing working relationships based on maximum collaboration and correctness.  This growth has been accompanied by the constant addition of new staff to cater for the increase in clients, by the use of advanced communication technologies, also in constant evolution, and by participation at trade fairs, exhibitions and workshops in Italy and Europe, the best places where supply can meet demand.  This is the story of the success achieved in little more than thirty years by Caravantours, now one of Italy’s 40 major tour operators and a leader in the specific sector of group tourism.  The results achieved can be illustrated by some significant figures, including annual sales of over €25m to over 4000 organized groups, and a total workforce of 4 full-time partners and 44 employees.  Every year some 150,000 Italian clients and 50,000 foreign clients travel with Caravantours, for a total of over 400,000 Italian and about 200,000 foreign presences.  These are all excellent reasons to always choose Caravantours for your holidays, to give a solid foundation of certainty to your dreams of leisure, entertainment, adventure and discovery!

Name: Avance Rent A Car

Avance Rent a Car and its people have an ultimate goal of providing superior services to their customers by fulfilling all their desires so as to keep to their highest expectations. We would like to thank all our customers for helping us grow and supporting our business development. We hope that your Avance car rental vehicle will guide you to the most amazing destinations. In our continuous effort to improve, we welcome every suggestion or comment. We would be really grateful to communicate with you via our Contact page. Driving Miles Together

Name: Insolit Viatges

Company description: Insolit Viatges i Aventura, es una agencia de viajes alternativos con rutas propias que nació con la idea de entender los viajes como una forma de vida, una aventura y la experiencia única de disfrutar de la cultura y los paisajes de otros lugares del mundo. Trabajamos rutas propias y la mayoría de nuestros corresponsales y colaboradores se encuentran directamente ubicados en los países de destino, lo que nos permite tratar todos nuestros itinerarios de un modo mucho más personalizado y realizar el seguimiento de nuestros viajes, una vez allí. Cada vez que iniciamos el proceso de creación de una ruta Insolit, intentamos huir de los destinos y lugares más turísticos, para centrarnos en tomarle el pulso al país: tanto en los atractivos naturales (paisajes, fauna, etc.), como culturales (minorías étnicas, formas de vida, etc.). Siempre que la infraestructura de la zona nos lo permita, escogemos lodges, bungalows o pequeños hoteles con encanto, que permitan el sustento y desarrollo de la economía local de la zona. Trabajamos para viajeros de toda España. La documentación de tu viaje, se envía a portes pagados a toda la península y Canarias vía MRW en 24-48 horas.

Join us and discover the world with LATTUR!

Name: Aventura X
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Mafra, Travessa Da Fonte Nº1, 2640-064
Company description: Tudo começou em 2012, como uma Empresa de Animação Turística. Mas a vontade de levar outros a conhecer o Mundo foi crescendo e em poucos anos levou-nos a crescer. Hoje somos uma Agência de Viagens Aventura com Animação Turística, com aprovação do Instituto de Conservação da Natureza e Membro de várias Associações Internacionais de Turismo. Queremos ser diferentes,  e marcar essa diferença em ti. Queremos sentir, no momento da despedida, vontade de voltar e queremos que tu sintas o mesmo. Para nós, só assim faz sentido. Adoramos criar as nossas viagens, imaginar novos desafios e experiências únicas. Queremos apenas criar momentos que deixem sempre a melhor memória, a melhor marca em ti. Fazemos questão de respeitar os lugares, as tradições e culturas por onde quer que passamos, recolher apenas memórias e deixar apenas saudade. Somos assim, é a nossa forma de estar e todos os que fazem parte desta família da Aventura X. E, apesar de adorarmos levar-te a conhecer o Mundo, não esquecemos o quanto este nosso querido Portugal é único.  Por isso, acreditamos que quem nos visita  vindo de qualquer canto do mundo, merece o melhor do nosso país. E assim criámos o Portugal Outside. Vamos mostrar a nossa forma de conhecer, de viver momentos e experiências únicas , também a todos aqueles que falando outra língua qualquer, confiam em nós para conhecer este nosso cantinho maravilhoso. Acreditamos que a viagem até pode ser à cidade mais próxima , mas se for com amigos parece uma volta ao Mundo. Também estamos sempre disponíveis para criar uma viagem ou Aventura para ti ou para o teu Grupo. Sente-te confortável para nos desafiar. Estamos a tua espera.

Name: Quality Travel Of Scandinavia
Company description: Quality Travel är en researrangör med snart 40 års resebransch erfarenhet. Vi är vad vi heter. Vi har erfarenhet av reseproduktion från tidigt 80 tal och till Andorra sedan sent 80 tal. Sedan 2009 år är vi representant för Andorra i Sverige. Bokar du din Andorraupplevelse med oss får du hjälp av Andorraexperter både vid bokning och på resmålet. Vårt guideteam finns på plats hela säsongen och ger dig kostnadsfria pistvisningar med värdefull information. De finns tillgängliga om det inträffar en skada eller sjukdom. Maj 2018 lanserade vi Spaniens största skidort som också ligger i Pyrenéerna: Baqueira-Beret. Vi har även en produktion av safariresor. Varje arrangemang är skräddarsytt efter kundens önskemål och förväntningar. I Afrika samarbetar vi med en partner som arrangerat safari resor i tre generationer. Name: Kidy Tour
Company description: Tarptautinis kelionių organizatorius „Kidy Tour” siūlo poilsines keliones visai šeimai geriausiuose Turkijos, Egipto, Bulgarijos ir Tenerifės viešbučiuose. „Kidy Tour“ priklauso didžiausiai centrinės ir rytų Europos aviacijos paslaugų verslo įmonių grupei „Avia Solutions Group PLC“, turinčiai 90 biurių bei gamybos centrų. Grupės įmonės teikia aviacijos paslaugas bei sprendimus įvairiausių pasaulio šalių klientams. „Avia Solutions Group PLC“ komandoje darbuojasi daugiau kaip 7000 specialistų, teikiančių šiuolaikiškus sprendimus aviacijos ir ūkio sektoriams.

Name: TravelEnglish
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Málaga, 21 C/ Trinidad Grund, 29001
Company description: TravelEnglish es una agencia de viajes especializada en la organización de cursos de idiomas en el extranjero para grupos escolares e individuales. Trabajamos con escuelas de Norteamérica, Irlanda, Reino Unido, Alemania y Francia ofreciendo programas desde una semana de duración hasta un año académico. Nuestra oferta abarca desde los niveles más básicos hasta los cursos de perfeccionamiento, y están disponibles para todas las edades. Si estás pensando en vivir una experiencia de este tipo estaremos encantados de ayudarte. Te esperamos!

Name: Argon Travel Portugal
Company description: Argon Travel is a tour operator founded in 2007. Argon Travel’s vocation is towards tours in western Europe. We build customized packages for groups as well as FIT. Argon Travel is very well known for faith-based tours, luxury destinations, wine and Golf tours. In 2019 Argon Travel build its own online booking platform for dynamic packages or isolated products - www.argontravel.online. The response is fast and very interesting pricewise. Our slogan "Spirituality, Leisure & Culture" shows the wide range of our action. In groups or individually, our programs are created in order to fit the needs of our customers.

Name: Explore Tours
HQ Location: Sweden, Västra Götaland, Alingsås, 37 Södra Ringgatan, 441 33
Company description: Explore Tours är en researrangör som erbjuder exotiska och unika resor. Alla våra resor ger dig som resenär oförglömliga minnen och upplevelser av karaktären ”Once in a Lifetime”. Vi erbjuder 14 spännande rundresor och flera andra resor till världens mest intressanta platser.   Våra rundresor består av unika resekombinationer i tre delar: Kultur/natur, möte med lokalbefolkningen samt avkoppling (ofta i kombination med sol och bad) och de passar både dig som reser solo eller i par/familj. Vi erbjuder även resor på förfrågan till flera destinationer.   E-post: info@exploretours.se  Telefon: 0771-96 74 00  Webbplats: http://www.exploretours.se/

Name: Relax Time Travel Ltd
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Sofia-capital, Sofia, 130 132 Bul. Aleksandar Stamboliyski, 1309
Company description: Relax Time Ltd-a Bulgarian tour operator and travel agent registered by the law with license number PK-01-7207. Our team is young but very ambitious to change the face of the Tourism industry in Bulgaria. Our aim is to provide exclusive combination between professional service and friendly attitude.  Just share with us your dream holiday and we’ll take care to make it real… We are open minded to the changing tourism industry, ready to face the new trends and of course our customer’s vision.  Specialist in city tours and expert in bespoke holidays – Relax Time Ltd is a professional tour operator offering exceptional range of packages, short trips and additional services. Join us in one unforgettable experience and let’s discover Bulgaria’s most remarkable, beautiful and amazing places together…Some of the trips and the packages you can enjoy are: sea side vacations, mountain vacations, cultural trips, sport and adventure trips, close to the nature trips, spa and wellness and a lot more. Choosing Relax Time Ltd. you  will benefit from an exclusive cultural group tours, top quality private tours and weekend escapes. Share your travel ideas with us and we will tailor the itinerary to your unique interests and preferences. With a fantastic choice of accommodation, from luxury 5 star hotels, private villas, apartments and family friendly resorts we can make your holiday one remarkable and exciting experience. Because for us tourism is not business but making happiness and wonderful moments. If you have traveled with us before, may we take this opportunity to thank you for entrusting us with your travel arrangements and that we look forward to assisting you again soon. If you haven’t this is an opportunity to give us the honor to make your trip to Bulgaria as memorable and as amazing as possible! Travel Experts: General Manager - Mr. Amer Koulakji Sales Manager- Ms Emanuela Emanuilova

Name: RealPoland
Company description: We are an incoming travel agency, specialized in tours around Poland. Our aim is to make your stay here an unforgettable experience. Our team consists of natives, fascinated by their homeland, licensed guides and touring agents with huge knowledge and energy to share.

Name: Ecological Tourism In Europe - Linking Tourism And Conservation E.V.
Company description: Ecological Tourism in Europe - Linking Tourism and Conservation e.V., - Association for Sustainable Tourism (abbreviated to Ö.T.E. - LT&C) is a membership-based NGO with a dedicated board of tourism and conservation experts. The association advocates for sustainable tourism in Europe and worldwide. It supports the goals of national strategies and international conventions in the field of sustainability, biodiversity and tourism, especially the 30x30 goal of the Convention on Biological Diversity. It aims to achieve a balance between the protection and restoration of nature and the social requirements of professionals and residents in tourism regions vis-à-vis tourism demands. In this sense, the association works in particular with tour operators, protected areas, tourism communities, marketing organisations, accommodation providers and tourists.  Our vision: We envision a world where tourism is a driving force for nature conservation and community well-being and where key tourism and conservation stakeholders form effective partnerships.

Name: Lisboasightseeing Unipessoal Lda
Company description: Lisbon tours. Porto tours. Portugal tours.  Excursions and trips from Lisbon, Porto, Fatima, Algarve, Portugal.   Lisbon Travel Agency and Tour Operator. Excursions, sightseeing tours and daytrips to Sintra, Cascais, Estoril, Obidos, Fatima, Guimaraes, Braga, Minho, Douro. Throughout our site www.lisboasightseeing.com visitors can learn about sightseeing tours in Portugal provided by local Tour Operators in Lisbon, Porto, Algarve and Fatima. Lisboasightseeing is a registered Travel Agency in Portugal by the main Tourism authorities (DGT – Direcção Geral de Turismo) with license nº 1319/2006. We provide Travel Services in Portugal by online request. Our mission is to offer quality and inspire worldwide travelers with a better perception of our country. Working on a custom-made basis, we aim to supply, all those requesting our services, full satisfaction and a pleasant stay in Portugal. Our professionals have a long experience in the Tourism business and willingness to meet tourists’ expectations. On services like planning cultural and historical excursions, private and group tours, cruises, reservation of quality vehicles and first class tour guides, booking restaurants, accommodation for groups, we intend to present a tailored response.

Name: Green Stays
HQ Location: Portugal, Porto, Porto, 267 1º Esq Rua Honório De Lima, 4200-322
Company description: Green Stays is a Tour Operator that provides the best experiences for travellers who want to visit Portugal in a sustainable way. As sustainability consultants, through targeted communication to domestic and international markets, we help tourism business gain increased visibility in this niche market and capture more customers. Somos um Operador Turístico que tem como objetivo principal divulgar projetos turísticos ecológicos em Portugal, contribuindo assim para a promoção do turismo sustentável no país. Deste modo, desenvolvemos uma gama de ofertas para que os nossos visitantes possam programar as suas viagens e estadias “verdes” da forma que mais desejarem. Damos valor à Preservação do Meio Ambiente e ao apoio das Comunidades Locais onde os hotéis se inserem. Como tal, queremos que uma parte dos nossos lucros revertam para Associações Ambientais ou Instituições de Solidariedade Social, contribuindo assim para um desenvolvimento mais sustentável.

Name: SIRENA Travel Agency
Company description: Professional team of Sirena Travel Agency will guide you through the top 10 of the most famous destinations some of which are natural phenomenons. Choose between full day tours and half day tours: land tour, boat tour and easy or extreme adventure.

Name: Albatros Travel Poland
Company description: Albatros Travel Poland is a premier travel agency dedicated to organizing comprehensive tours across the United States and various popular destinations in Europe, including Italy and Iceland. The company specializes in creating unique travel experiences that span from the iconic cities of Los Angeles, Chicago, and New York to the breathtaking natural wonders like the Grand Canyon and Niagara Falls. With a mission to provide unforgettable adventures, Albatros Travel focuses on delivering high-quality travel experiences that immerse clients in the rich culture and stunning landscapes of America and beyond.  Catering primarily to Polish travelers, Albatros Travel collaborates with local hotels and transportation services to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable journey for its clients. The agency is committed to the comfort and safety of its guests, adhering to strict cleanliness and safety standards in all travel arrangements. Albatros Travel aims to provide enriching cultural experiences, allowing travelers to explore diverse landscapes and local customs while enjoying guided tours led by experienced Polish tour leaders. The company serves a wide range of clients, including individual travelers and groups seeking organized trips with full accommodation and meals. Albatros Travel's target market includes adventure seekers and cultural enthusiasts looking for well-structured travel packages that encompass transportation, accommodation, and guided activities. By continuously refining its offerings based on traveler feedback, Albatros Travel ensures memorable and seamless journeys, connecting clients with the essence of the American dream and the beauty of European destinations. With a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction and authentic experiences, Albatros Travel Poland stands out as a trusted partner for those looking to explore the world.
